ādyantamaṃgalamajātasamānabhāvamāryaṃ tamīśamajarāmaramātmadevam  paṃcānanaṃ prabalapaṃcavinodaśīlaṃ saṃbhāvaye manasiśaṃkaramambikeśam  vyāsa uvāca  dharmakṣetre mahākṣetre gaṃgākālindisaṃgame  prayāge parame puṇye brahmalokasya vartmani  
munayaḥ śaṃsitātmānassatyavrataparāyaṇāḥ  mahaujaso mahābhāgā mahāsatraṃ vitenire  
tatra satraṃ samākarṇya vyāsaśiṣyo mahāmuniḥ  ājagāma munīndra ṣṭuṃ sūtaḥ paurāṇikottamaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sūtamāyāṃtaṃ harṣitā munayastadā  cetasā suprasannena pūjāṃ cakruryathāvidhi  
tato vinayasaṃyuktā procuḥ sāṃjalayaśca te  suprasannā mahātmānaḥ stutiṃ kṛtvāyathāvidhi  
romaharṣaṇa sarvajña bhavānvai bhāgyagauravāt  purāṇavidyāmakhilāṃ vyāsātpratyarthamīyivān  
tasmādāścaryyabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ tvaṃ hi bhājanam  ratnānāmurusārāṇāṃ ratnākara ivārṇavaḥ  
yacca bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca yaccānyadvastu vartate  na tvayā'viditaṃ kiṃcittriṣu lokeṣu vidyate  
tvaṃ maddiṣṭavaśādasya darśanārthamihāgataḥ  kurvankimapi naḥ śreyo na vṛthā gaṃtumarhasi  
tattvaṃ śrutaṃ sma naḥ sarvaṃ pūrvameva śubhāśubham  na tṛptimadhigacchāmaḥ śravaṇecchā muhurmuhuḥ  
idānīmekamevāsti śrotavyaṃ sūta sanmate  tadra hasyamapi brūhi yadi te'nugraho bhavet  
prāpte kaliyuge ghore narāḥ puṇyavivarjitāḥ  durācāraratāḥ sarve satyavārtāparāṅmukhāḥ  
parāpavādaniratāḥ paradra vyābhilāṣiṇaḥ  parastrīsaktamanasaḥ parahiṃsāparāyaṇāḥ  
dehātmadṛṣṭayā mūḍhā nāstikāḥ paśubuddhayaḥ  mātṛpitṛkṛtadveṣāḥ strīdevāḥ kāmakiṃkarāḥ  
viprā lobhagrahagrastā vedavikrayajīvinaḥ  dhanārjanārthamabhyastavidyā madavimohitāḥ  
tyaktasvajātikarmāṇaḥ prāyaśaḥparavaṃcakāḥ  trikālasaṃdhyayā hīnā brahmabodhavivarjitāḥ  
adayāḥ paṃḍitaṃ manyāssvācāravratalopakāḥ  kṛṣyudyamaratāḥ krūrasvabhāvā malināśayāḥ  
kṣatriyāśca tathā sarve svadharmatyāgaśīlinaḥ  asatsaṃgāḥ pāparatā vyabhicāraparāyaṇāḥ  
aśūrā araṇaprītāḥ palāyanaparāyaṇāḥ  kucauravṛttayaḥ śūdrā ḥ kāmakiṃkaracetasaḥ  
śastrāstravidyayā hīnā dhenuviprāvanojjhitāḥ  śaraṇyāvanahīnāśca kāminyūtimṛgāssadā  
prajāpālanasaddharmavihīnā bhogatatparāḥ  prajāsaṃhārakā duṣṭā jīvahiṃsākarā mudā  
vaiśyāḥ saṃskārahīnāste svadharmatyāgaśīlinaḥ  kupathāḥ svārjanaratāstulākarmakuvṛttayaḥ  
gurudevadvijātīnāṃ bhaktihīnāḥ kubuddhayaḥ  abhojitadvijāḥ prāyaḥ kṛpaṇā baddhamuṣṭayaḥ  
kāminījārabhāveṣu suratā malināśayāḥ  lobhamohavicetaskāḥ pūrtādisuvṛṣojjhitāḥ  
tadvacchūdrā śca ye kecidbrāhmaṇācāratatparāḥ  ujjvalākṛtayo mūḍhāḥ svadharmatyāgaśīlinaḥ  
kartārastapasāṃ bhūyo dvijatejopahārakāḥ  śiśvalpamṛtyukārāśca maṃtroccāraparāyaṇāḥ  
śāligrāmaśilādīnāṃ pūjakāhomatatparāḥ  pratikūlavicārāśca kuṭilā dvijadūṣakāḥ  
dhanavaṃtaḥ kukarmmāṇo vidyāvanto vivādinaḥ  ākhyāyopāsanā dharmavaktāro dharmalopakāḥ  
subhūpākṛtayo daṃbhāḥ sudātāro mahāmadāḥ  viprādīnsevakānmatvā manyamānā nijaṃ prabhum  
svadharmarahitā mūḍhāḥ saṃkarāḥ krūrabuddhayaḥ  mahābhimānino nityaṃ caturvarṇavilopakāḥ  
sukulīnānnijānmatvā caturvarṇairvivartanāḥ  sarvavarṇabhraṣṭakarā mūḍhāssatkarmakāriṇaḥ  
striyaśca prāyaśo bhraṣṭā bhartravajñānakārikāḥ  śvaśuradro hakāriṇyo nirbhayā malināśanāḥ  
kuhāvabhāvaniratāḥ kuśīlāssmaravihvalāḥ  jārasaṃgaratā nityaṃ svasvāmivimukhāstathā  
tanayā mātṛpitrośca bhaktihīnā durāśayāḥ  avidyāpāṭhakā nityaṃ rogagrasitadehakāḥ  
eteṣāṃ naṣṭabuddhīnāṃ svadharmatyāgaśīlinām  paralokepīha loke kathaṃ sūta gatirbhavet  
iti ciṃtākulaṃ cittaṃ jāyate satataṃ hi naḥ  paropakārasadṛśo nāsti dharmo paraḥ khalu  
laghūpāyena yenaiṣāṃ bhavetsadyoghanāśanam  sarvvasiddhāntavittvaṃ hi kṛpayā tadvadādhunā  
vyāsa uvāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām  manasā śaṃkaraṃ smṛtvā sūtaḥ provāca tānmunīn  
iti śrīśaivemahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ munipraśnavarṇano nāma prathamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  sādhupṛṣṭaṃ sādhavo vastrailokyahitakārakam  guruṃ smṛtvā bhavatsnehādvakṣye tacchṛṇutādarāt  
vedāṃtasārasarvasvaṃ purāṇaṃ śaivamuttamam  sarvāghaughoddhārakaraṃ paratra paramārthadam  
kalikalmaṣavidhvaṃsi yasmiñchivayaśaḥ param  vijṛmbhate sadā viprāścaturvargaphalapradam  
tasyādhyayanamātreṇa purāṇasya dvijottamāḥ  sarvottamasya śaivasya te yāsyaṃti susadgatim  
tāvadvijṛṃbhate pāpaṃ brahmahatyāpurassaram  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvatkalimahotpātāḥ saṃcariṣyaṃti nirbhayāḥ  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvatsarvāṇi śāstrāṇi vivadaṃti parasparam  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvatsvarūpaṃ durbodhaṃ śivasya mahatāmapi  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi no deṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvadyamabhaṭāḥ krūrāḥ saṃcariṣyaṃti nirbhayāḥ  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvatsarvapurāṇāni pragarjaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvatsarvāṇi tīrthāni vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati jagatyaho  
tāvatsarvāṇi maṃtrāṇi vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati mahītale  
tāvatsarvāṇi kṣetrāṇi vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati mahītale  
tāvatsarvāṇi pīṭhāni vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati mahītale  
tāvatsarvāṇi dānāni vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati mahītale  
tāvatsarve ca te devā vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati mahītale  
tāvatsarve ca siddhāntā vivadaṃti mahītale  yāvacchivapurāṇaṃ hi nodeṣyati mahītale  
asya śaivapurāṇasya kīrtanaśravaṇāddvijāḥ  phalaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknomi kārtsnyena munisattamāḥ  
tathāpi tasya māhātmyaṃ vakṣye kiṃcittu vonaghāḥ  cittamādhāya śṛṇuta vyāsenoktaṃ purā mama  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi ślokaṃ ślokārddhameva ca  yaḥ paṭhedbhaktisaṃyuktassa pāpānmucyate kṣaṇāt  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi yaḥ pratyahamataṃdri taḥ  yathāśakti paṭhedbhaktyā sa jīvanmukta ucyate  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi yo bhaktyārcayate sadā  dine dine'śvamedhasya phalaṃ prāpnotyasaṃśayam  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ yassādhāraṇapadecchayā  anyataḥ śṛṇuyātso'pi matto mucyeta pātakāt  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ yo namaskuryādadūrataḥ  sarvadevārcanaphalaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ vai likhitvā pustakaṃ svayam  yo dadyācchivabhaktebhyastasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu  
adhīteṣu ca śāstreṣu vedeṣu vyākṛteṣu ca  yatphalaṃ durlabhaṃ loke tatphalaṃ tasya saṃbhavet  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi caturdaśyāmupoṣitaḥ  śivabhaktasabhāyāṃ yo vyākaroti sa uttamaḥ  
pratyakṣaraṃ tu gāyatrīpuraścaryyāphalaṃ labhet  iha bhuktvākhilānkāmānaṃ te nirvāṇatāṃ vrajet  
upoṣitaścaturdaśyāṃ rātrau jāgaraṇānvitaḥ  yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi tasya puṇyaṃ vadāmyaham  
kurukṣetrādinikhilapuṇyatīrtheṣvanekaśaḥ  ātmatulyadhanaṃ sūryyagrahaṇe sarvatomukhe  
viprebhyo vyāsamukhyebhyo dattvāyatphalamaśnute  tatphalaṃ saṃbhavettasya satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi gāyate yopyaharniśam  ājñāṃ tasya pratīkṣerandevā indra puro gamāḥ  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhañchṛṇvanhi nityaśaḥ  yadyatkaroti satkarma tatkoṭiguṇitaṃ bhavet  
samāhitaḥ paṭhedyastu tatra śrīrudra saṃhitām  sa brahmaghno'pi pūtātmā tribhirevādinairbhavet  
tāṃ rudra saṃhitāṃ yastu bhairavapratimāṃtike  triḥ paṭhetpratyahaṃ maunī sa kāmānakhilāṃ llabhet  
tāṃ rudra saṃhitāṃ yastu sapaṭhedvaṭabilvayoḥ  pradakṣiṇāṃ prakurvāṇo brahmahatyā nivartate  
kailāsasaṃhitā tatra tato'pi paramasmṛtā  brahmasvarūpiṇī sākṣātpraṇavārthaprakāśikā  
kailāsasaṃhitāyāstu māhātmyaṃ vetti śaṃkaraḥ  kṛtsnaṃ tadarddhaṃ vyāsaśca tadarddhaṃ vedmyahaṃ dvijāḥ  
tatra kiṃcitpravakṣyāmi kṛtsnaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate  yajjñātvā tatkṣaṇāllokaścittaśuddhimavāpnuyāt  
na nāśayati yatpāpaṃ sā raudrī saṃhitā dvijāḥ  tanna paśyāmyahaṃ loke mārgamāṇo'pi sarvadā  
śivenopaniṣatsiṃdhumanthanotpāditāṃ mudā  kumārāyārpitāṃ tāṃ vai sudhāṃ pītvā'maro bhavet  
brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kartumudyataḥ  māsamātraṃ saṃhitāṃ tāṃ paṭhitvā mucyate tataḥ  
duṣpratigrahadurbhojyadurālāpādisaṃbhavam  pāpaṃ sakṛtkīrtanena saṃhitā sā vināśayet  
śivālaye bilvavane saṃhitāṃ tāṃ paṭhettu yaḥ  sa tatphalamavāpnoti yadvāco'pi na gocare  
saṃhitāṃ tāṃ paṭhanbhaktyā yaḥ śrāddhe bhojayeddvijān  tasya ye pitaraḥ sarve yāṃti śaṃbhoḥ paraṃ padam  
caturdaśyāṃ nirāhāro yaḥ paṭhetsaṃhitāṃ ca tām  bilvamūle śivaḥ sākṣātsa devaiśca prapūjyate  
anyāpi saṃhitā tatra sarvakāmaphalapradā  ubhe viśiṣṭe vijñeye līlāvijñānapūrite  
tadidaṃ śaivamākhyātaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam  nirmitaṃ tacchivenaiva prathamaṃ brahmasaṃmitam  
vidyeśaṃca tathāraudraṃ vaināyakamathaumikam  mātraṃ rudrai kādaśakaṃ kailāsaṃ śatarudra kam  
koṭirudra sahasrādyaṃ koṭirudraṃ tathaiva ca  vāyavīyaṃ dharmasaṃjñaṃ purāṇamiti bhedataḥ  
saṃhitā dvādaśamitā mahāpuṇyatarā matā  tāsāṃ saṃkhyāṃ bruve viprāḥ śṛṇutādaratokhilam  
vidyeśaṃ daśasāhasraṃ rudraṃ vaināyakaṃ tathā  aumaṃ mātṛpurāṇākhyaṃ pratyekāṣṭasahasrakam  
trayodaśasahasraṃ hi rudrai kādaśakaṃ dvijāḥ  ṣaṭsahasraṃ ca kailāsaṃ śatarudraṃ tadarddhakam  
koṭirudraṃ triguṇitamekādaśasahasrakam  sahasrakoṭirudrā khyamuditaṃ graṃthasaṃkhyayā  
vāyavīyaṃ khābdhiśataṃ gharmaṃ ravisahasrakam  tadevaṃ lakṣasaṃkhyākaṃ śaivasaṃkhyāvibhedataḥ  
vyāsena tattu saṃkṣiptaṃ caturviṃśatsahasrakam  śaivaṃ tatra caturthaṃ vai purāṇaṃ saptasaṃhitam  
śive saṃkalpitaṃ pūrvaṃ purāṇaṃ granthasaṃkhyayā  śatakoṭipramāṇaṃ hi purā sṛṣṭau suvismṛtam  
vyasteṣṭādaśadhā caiva purāṇe dvāparādiṣu  caturlakṣeṇa saṃkṣipte kṛte dvaipāyanādibhiḥ  
proktaṃ śivapurāṇaṃ hi caturviṃśatsahasrakam  ślokānāṃ saṃkhyayā saptasaṃhitaṃ brahmasaṃmitam  
vidyeśvarākhyā tatrādyā raudrī jñeyā dvitīyikā  tṛtīyā śatarudrā khyā koṭirudrā caturthikā  
paṃcamī caiva maumākhyā ṣaṣṭhī kailāsasaṃjñikā  saptamī vāyavīyākhyā saptaivaṃ saṃhitāmatāḥ  
sasaptasaṃhitaṃ divyaṃ purāṇaṃ śivasaṃjñakam  varīvarti brahmatulyaṃ sarvopari gatipradam  
etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi saptasaṃhitamādarāt  paripūrṇaṃ paṭhedyastu sa jīvanmukta ucyate  
śrutismṛtipurāṇetihāsāgamaśatāni ca  etacchivapurāṇasya nārhaṃtyalpāṃ kalāmapi  
śaivaṃ purāṇamamalaṃ śivakīrtitaṃ tadvyāsena śaivapravaṇena na saṃgṛhītam  saṃkṣepataḥ sakalajīvaguṇopakāre tāpatrayaghnamatulaṃ śivadaṃ satāṃ hi  
vikaitavo dharma iha pragīto vedāṃtavijñānamayaḥ pradhānaḥ  amatsarāṃtarbudhavedyavastu satkḷptamatraiva trivargayuktam  
śaivaṃ purāṇatilakaṃ khalu satpurāṇaṃ  vedāṃtavedavilasatparavastugītam  yo vai paṭhecca śṛṇuyātparamādareṇa śaṃbhupriyaḥ sa hi labhetparamāṃ  gatiṃ vai  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  ityākarṇya vacaḥ sautaṃ procuste paramarṣayaḥ  vedāṃtasārasarvasvaṃ purāṇaṃ śrāvayādbhutam  
iti śrutvā munīnāṃ sa vacanaṃ supraharṣitaḥ  saṃsmarañchaṃkaraṃ sūtaḥ provāca munisattamān  
sūta uvāca  śṛṇvaṃtu ṛṣayaḥ sarve smṛtvā śivamanāmayam  purāṇapravaṇaṃ śaivaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasārajam  
yatra gītaṃ trikaṃ prītyā bhaktijñānavirāgakam  
vedāṃtavedyaṃ sadvastu viśeṣeṇa pravarṇitam  
sūta uvāca  śṛṇvaṃtu ṛṣayaḥ sarve purāṇaṃ vedasārajam  purā kālena mahatā kalpe'tīte punaḥpunaḥ  
asminnupasthite kalpe pravṛtte sṛṣṭikarmaṇi  munīnāṃ ṣaṭkulīnānāṃ bruvatāmitaretaram  
idaṃ paramidaṃ neti vivādaḥ sumahānabhūt  te'bhijagmurvidhātāraṃ brahmāṇaṃ praṣṭumavyayam  
vāgbhirvinayagarbhābhiḥ sarve prāṃjalayo'bruvan  tvaṃ hi sarvajagaddhātā sarvakāraṇakāraṇam  
kaḥ pumānsarvatattvebhyaḥ purāṇaḥ parataḥ paraḥ  brahmovāca  yato vāco nivartaṃte aprāpya manasā saha  
yasmātsarvamidaṃ brahmaviṣṇurudre draṃ pūrvakam  sahabhūteṃdri yaiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamaṃ saṃprasūyate  
eṣa devo mahādevaḥ sarvajño jagadīśvaraḥ  ayaṃ tu parayā bhaktyā dṛśyate nā'nyathā kvacit  
rudro harirharaścaiva tathānye ca sureśvarāḥ  bhaktyā paramayā tasya nityaṃ darśanakāṃkṣiṇaḥ  
bahunātra kimuktena śive bhaktyā vimucyate  prasādāddevatābhaktiḥ prasādo bhaktisaṃbhavaḥ  yathehāṃkurato bījaṃ bījato vā yathāṃkuraḥ  
tasmādīśaprasādārthaṃ yūyaṃ gatvā bhuvaṃ dvijāḥ  dīrghasatraṃ samākṛdhvaṃ yūyaṃ varṣasahasrakam  
amuṣyaivādhvareśasya śivasyaiva prasādataḥ  vedoktavidyāsāraṃ tu jñāyate sādhyasādhanaṃ  
munaya ūcuḥ  atha kiṃ paramaṃ sādhyaṃ kiṃvā tatsādhanaṃ param  sādhakaḥ kīdṛśastatra tadidaṃ brūhi tattvataḥ  
brahmovāca  sādhyaṃ śivapadaprāptiḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sevanam  sādhakastatprasādādyo'nityādiphalaniḥspṛhaḥ  
karma kṛtvā tu vedoktaṃ tadarpitamahāphalam  parameśapadaprāptaḥ sālokyādikramāttataḥ  
tattadbhaktyanusāreṇa sarveṣāṃ paramaṃ phalam  tatsādhanaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sākṣādīśena bodhitam  
saṃkṣipya tatra vaḥ sāraṃ sādhanaṃ prabravīmyaham  śrotreṇa śravaṇaṃ tasya vacasā kīrtanaṃ tathā  
manasā mananaṃ tasya mahāsādhanamucyate  śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaśca mantavyaśca maheśvaraḥ  
iti śrutipramāṇaṃ naḥ sādhanenā'munā param  sādhyaṃ vrajata sarvārthasādhanaikaparāyaṇāḥ  
pratyakṣaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā tatra lokaḥ pravartate  apratyakṣaṃ hi sarvatra jñātvā śrotreṇa ceṣṭate  
tasmācchravaṇamevādau śrutvā gurumukhādbudhaḥ  tataḥ saṃsādhayedanyatkīrtanaṃ mananaṃ sudhīḥ  
kramānmananaparyaṃte sādhane'sminsusādhite  śivayogo bhavettena sālokyādikramācchanaiḥ  
sarvāṃgavyādhayaḥ paścātsarvānaṃdaśca līyate  abhyāsātkleśametadvai paścādādyaṃtamaṃgalam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe  tṛtīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
munaya ūcuḥ  mananaṃ kīdṛśaṃ brahmañchravaṇaṃ cāpi kīdṛśam  kīrtanaṃ vā kathaṃ tasya kīrtayaitadyathāyatham  
brahmovaca  pūjājapeśaguṇarūpavilāsanāmnāṃ yuktipriyeṇa manasā pariśodhanaṃ yat  tatsaṃtataṃ mananamīśvaradṛṣṭilabhyaṃ sarveṣu sādhanavareṣvapi mukhyamukhyam  
gītātmanā śrutipadena ca bhāṣayā vā śaṃbhupratāpaguṇarūpavilāsanāmnām  vācā sphuṭaṃ tu rasavatstavanaṃ yadasya tatkīrtanaṃ bhavati sādhanamatra madhyam  
yenāpi kena karaṇena ca śabdapuṃjaṃ yatra kvacicchivaparaṃ śravaṇeṃdri yeṇa  strīkelivaddṛḍhataraṃ praṇidhīyate yattadvai budhāḥ śravaṇamatra jagatprasiddham  
satsaṃgamena bhavati śravaṇaṃ purastātsaṃkīrtanaṃ paśupateratha taddṛḍhaṃ syāt  sarvottamaṃ bhavati tanmananaṃ tadaṃte sarvaṃ hi saṃbhavati śaṃkaradṛṣṭipāte  
sūta uvāca  asminsādhanamāhatmye purā vṛttaṃ munīśvarāḥ  yuṣmadarthaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvamavadhānataḥ  
purā mama gururvyāsaḥ parāśaramuneḥ sutaḥ  tapaścacāra saṃbhrāṃtaḥ sarasvatyāstaṭe śubhe  
gacchanyadṛchayā tatra vimānenārkarociṣā  sanatkumāro bhagavāndadarśa mama deśikam  
dhyānārūḍhaḥ prabuddho'sau dadarśa tamajātmajam  praṇipatyāha saṃbhrāṃtaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ muniḥ  
dattvārghyamasmai pradadau devayogyaṃ ca viṣṭiram  prasannaḥ prāha taṃ prahvaṃ prabhurgaṃbhīrayā girā  
sanatkumāra uvāca  satyaṃ vastu mune dadhyāḥ sākṣātkaraṇagocaraḥ  sa śivothāsahāyotra tapaścarasi kiṃ kṛte  
evamuktaḥ kumāreṇa provāca svāśayaṃ muniḥ  dharmārthakāmamokṣāśca vedamārge kṛtādarāḥ  
bahudhā sthāpitā loke mayā tvatkṛpayā tathā  evaṃ bhutasya mepyevaṃ gurubhūtasya sarvataḥ  
muktisādhanakaṃ jñānaṃ nodeti paramādbhutam  tapaścarāmi muktyarthaṃ na jāne tatra kāraṇam  
itthaṃ kumāro bhagavānvyāsena muninārthitaḥ  samarthaḥ prāha vipreṃdrā niścayaṃ muktikāraṇam  
śravaṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ śaṃbhormananaṃ ca mahattaram  trayaṃ sādhanamuktaṃ ca vidyate vedasaṃmatam  
purāhamatha saṃbhrāṃto hyanyasādhanasaṃbhramaḥ  acale maṃdare śaile tapaścaraṇamācaram  
śivājñayā tataḥ prāpto bhagavānnaṃdikeśvaraḥ  sa me dayālurbhagavānsarvasākṣī gaṇeśvaraḥ  
uvāca mahyaṃ sasnehaṃ muktisādhanamuttamam  śravaṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ śaṃbhormananaṃ vedasaṃmatam  
trikaṃ ca sādhanaṃ muktau śivena mama bhāṣitam  śravaṇādiṃ trikaṃ brahmankuruṣveti muhurmuhuḥ  
evamuktvā tato vyāsaṃ sānugo vidhinaṃdanaḥ  jagāma svavimānena padaṃ paramaśobhanam  
evamuktaṃ samāsena pūrvavṛttāṃtamuttamam  ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  śravaṇāditrayaṃ sūta muktyopāyastvayeritaḥ  
śravaṇāditrike'śaktaḥ kiṃ kṛtvā mucyate janaḥ  ayatnenaiva muktiḥ syātkarmaṇā kena hetunā  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe prathamāyāṃ vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyaṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe caturtho'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  śravaṇāditrike'śakto liṃgaṃ beraṃ ca śāṃkaram  saṃsthāpya nityamabhyarcya taretsaṃsārasāgaram  
api dra vyaṃ vahedeva yathābalamavaṃcayan  arpayelliṃgaberārthamarcayedapi saṃtatam  
maṃḍapaṃ gopuraṃ tīrthaṃ maṭhaṃ kṣetraṃ tathotsavam  vastraṃ gaṃdhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ ca bhaktitaḥ  
vividhānnaṃ ca naivedyamapūpavyaṃjanairyutam  chatraṃ dhvajaṃ ca vyajanaṃ cāmaraṃ cāpi sāṃgakam  
rājopacāravatsarvaṃ dhārayelliṃgaberayoḥ  pradakṣiṇāṃ namaskāraṃ yathāśakti japaṃ tathā  
āvāhanādisargāṃtaṃ nityaṃ kuryātsubhaktitaḥ  itthamabhyarcya yandevaṃ liṃgebere ca śāṃkare  
siddhimeti śivaprītyā hitvāpi śravaṇādikam  liṃgaberārcanāmātrānmuktāḥ purve mahājanāḥ  
manuya ūcuḥ  beramātre tu sarvatra pūjyaṃte devatāgaṇāḥ  liṃgebere ca sarvatra kathaṃ saṃpūjyate śivaḥ  
sūta uvāca  aho munīśvarāḥ puṇyaṃ praśnametanmahādbhutam  atra vaktā mahādevo nānyo'sti puruṣaḥ kvacit  
śivenoktaṃ pravakṣyāmi kramādgurumukhācchrutam  śivaiko brahmarūpatvānniṣkalaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  
rūpitvātsakalastadvattasmātsakalaniṣkalaḥ  niṣkalatvānnirākāraṃ liṃgaṃ tasya samāgatam  
sakalatvāttathā beraṃ sākāraṃ tasya saṃgatam  sakalākalarūpatvādbrahmaśabdābhidhaḥ paraḥ  
api liṃge ca bere ca nityamabhyarcyate janaiḥ  abrahmatvāttadanyeṣāṃ niṣkalatvaṃ na hi kvacit  
tasmātte niṣkale liṃge nārādhyaṃte sureśvarāḥ  abrahmatvācca jīvatvāttathānye devatāgaṇāḥ  
tūṣṇīṃ sakalamātratvādarcyaṃte beramātrake  jīvatvaṃ śaṃkarānyeṣāṃ brahmatvaṃ śaṃkarasya ca  
vedāṃtasārasaṃsiddhaṃ praṇavārthe prakāśanāt  evameva purā pṛṣṭo maṃdare naṃdikeśvaraḥ  
sanatkumāramuninā brahmaputreṇa dhīmatā  sanatkumāra uvāca  śivānyadevavaśyānāṃ sarveṣāmapi sarvataḥ  
beramātraṃ ca pūjārthaṃ śrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca bhūriśaḥ  śivamātrasya pūjāyāṃ liṃgaṃ beraṃ ca dṛśyate  
atastadbrūhi kalyāṇa tattvaṃ me sādhubodhanam  naṃdikeśvara uvāca  anuttaramimaṃ praśnaṃ rahasyaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam  
kathayāmi śivenoktaṃ bhaktiyuktasya te'nagha  śivasya brahmarūpatvānniṣkalatvācca niṣkalam  
liṃgaṃ tasyaiva pūjāyāṃ sarvavedeṣu saṃmatam  tasyaiva sakalatvācca tathā sakalaniṣkalam  
sakalaṃ ca tathā beraṃ pūjāyāṃ lokasaṃmatam  śivānyeṣāṃ ca jīvatvātsakalatvācca sarvataḥ  
beramātraṃ ca pūjāyāṃ saṃmataṃ vedanirṇaye  svāvirbhāve ca devānāṃ sakalaṃ rūpameva hi  
śivasya liṃgaṃ beraṃ ca darśane dṛśyate khalu  sanatkumāra uvāca  uktaṃ tvayā mahābhāga liṃgaberapracāraṇam  
śivasya ca tadanyeṣāṃ vibhajya paramārthataḥ  tasmāttadeva paramaṃ liṃgaberādisaṃbhavam  
śrotumicchāmi yogīṃdra liṃgāvirbhāvalakṣaṇam  naṃdikeśvara uvāca  śṛṇu vatsa bhavatprītyā vakṣyāmi paramārthataḥ  
purā kalpe mahākāle prapanne lokaviśrute  āyudhyetāṃ mahātmānau brahmaviṣṇū parasparam  
tayormānaṃ nirākartuṃ tanmadhye parameśvaraḥ  niṣkalastaṃbharūpeṇa svarūpaṃ samadarśayat  
tataḥ svaliṃgacihnatvātstaṃbhato niṣkalaṃ śivaḥ  svaliṃgaṃ darśayāmāsa jagatāṃ hitakāmyayā  
tadāprabhṛti lokeṣu niṣkalaṃ liṃgamaiśvaram  sakalaṃ ca tathā beraṃ śivasyaiva prakalpitam  
śivānyeṣaḥ tu devānāṃ beramātraṃ prakalpitam  tattadberaṃ tu devānāṃ tattadbhogapradaṃ śubham  śivasya liṃgaberatvaṃ bhogamokṣapradaṃ śubham  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ paṃcamo'dhyāyaḥ  
naṃdikeśvara uvāca  purā kadācidyogīṃdra viṣṇurviṣadharāsanaḥ  suṣvāpa parayā bhūtyā svānugairapi saṃvṛtaḥ  
yadṛcchayā gatastatra brahmā brahmavidāṃvaraḥ  apṛcchatpuṃḍarīkākṣaṃ śayanaṃ sarvasundaram  
kastvaṃ puruṣavaccheṣe dṛṣṭvā māmapi dṛptavat  uttiṣṭha vatsa māṃ paśya tava nāthamihāgatam  
āgataṃ gurumārādhyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yo dṛptavaccaret  dro hiṇastasya mūḍhasya prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate  
iti śrutvā vacaḥ kruddho bahiḥ śāṃtavadācarat  svasti te svāgataṃ vatsa tiṣṭha pīṭhamito viśa  
kimu te vyāgravadvaktraṃ vibhāti viṣamekṣaṇam  brahmovāca  vatsa viṣṇo mahāmānamāgataṃ kālavegataḥ  
pitāmahaśca jagataḥ pātā ca tava vatsaka  viṣṇuruvāca  matsthaṃ jagadidaṃ vatsa manuṣe tvaṃ hi coravat  
mannābhikamalājjātaḥ putrastvaṃ bhāṣase vṛthā  naṃdikeśvara uvāca  evaṃ hi vadatostatra mugdhayorajayostadā  
ahameva baro na tvamahaṃ prabhurahaṃ prabhuḥ  parasparaṃ haṃtukāmau cakratuḥ samarodyamam  
yuyudhāte'marau vīrau haṃsapakṣīṃdra vāhanau  vairaṃcyā vaiṣṇavāścaivaṃ mitho yuyudhire tadā  
tāvadvimānagatayaḥ sarvā vai devajātayaḥ  didṛkṣavaḥ samājagmuḥ samaraṃ taṃ mahādbhutam  
kṣipaṃtaḥ puṣpavarṣāṇi paśyaṃtaḥ svairamaṃbare  suparṇavāhanastatra kruddho vai brahmavakṣasi  
mumoca bāṇānasahānastrāṃśca vividhānbahūn  mumocā'tha vidhiḥ kruddho viṣṇorurasi duḥsahān  
bāṇānanalasaṃkāśānastrāṃśca bahuśastadā  tadāścaryamiti spaṣṭaṃ tayoḥ samaragocaram  
samīkṣya daivatagaṇāḥ śaśaṃsurbhṛśamākulāḥ  tato viṣṇuḥ susaṃkruddhaḥ śvasanvyasanakarśitaḥ  
māheśvarāstraṃ matimān saṃdadhe brahmaṇopari  tato brahmā bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ kaṃpayanviśvameva hi  
astraṃ pāśupataṃ ghoraṃ saṃdadhe viṣṇuvakṣasi  tatastadutthitaṃ vyomni tapanāyutasannibham  
sahasramukhamatyugraṃ caṃḍavātabhayaṃkaram  astradvayamidaṃ tatra brahmaviṣṇvorbhayaṃkaram  
itthaṃ babhūva samaro brahmaviṣṇvoḥ parasparam  tato devagaṇāḥ sarve viṣaṇṇā bhṛśamākulāḥ  ūcuḥ parasparaṃ tāta rājakṣobhe yathā dvijāḥ  
sṛṣṭiḥ sthitiśca saṃhārastiro bhāvopyanugrahaḥ  yasmātpravartate tasmai brahmaṇe ca triśūline  
aśakyamanyairyadanugrahaṃ vinā tṛṇakṣayopyatra yadṛcchayā kvacit  iti devābhayaṃ kṛtvā vicinvaṃtaḥ śivakṣayam  jagmuḥ kailāsaśikharaṃ yatrāste caṃdra śekharaḥ  
dṛṣṭvaivamamarā hṛṣṭāḥ padaṃtatpārameśvaram  praṇemuḥ praṇavākāraṃ praviṣṭāstatra sadmani  
tepi tatra sabhāmadhye maṃḍape maṇiviṣṭare  virājamānamumayā dadṛśurdevapuṃgavam  
savyottaretarapadaṃ tadarhitakarāṃ bujam  svagaṇaiḥ sarvato juṣṭaṃ sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitam  
vījyamānaṃ viśeṣajaiḥ strījanaistīvrabhāvanaiḥ  śasyamānaṃ sadāvedairanugṛhṇaṃtamīśvaram  
dṛṣṭvaivamīśamamarāḥ saṃtoṣasalilekṣaṇāḥ  daṃḍavaddūrato vatsa namaścakrurmahāgaṇāḥ  
tānavekṣya patirdevānsamīpe cāhvayadgaṇaiḥ  atha saṃhlādayandevāndevo devaśikhāmaṇiḥ  avocadarthagaṃbhīraṃ vacanaṃ madhumaṃgalam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  vatsakāḥ svastivaḥ kaccidvartate mama śāsanāt  jagacca devatāvaṃśaḥ svasvakarmaṇi kiṃ navā  
prāgeva viditaṃ yuddhaṃ brahmaviṣṇvormayāsurāḥ  bhavatāmabhitāpena paunaruktyena bhāṣitam  
iti sasmitayā mādhvyā kumāraparibhāṣayā  samatoṣayadaṃbāyāḥ sa patistatsuravrajam  
atha yuddhāṃgaṇaṃ gaṃtuṃ haridhātroradhīśvaraḥ  ājñāpayadgaṇeśānāṃ śataṃ tatraiva saṃsadi  
tato vādyaṃ bahuvidhaṃ prayāṇāya pareśituḥ  gaṇeśvarāśca saṃnaddhā nānāvāhanabhūṣaṇāḥ  
praṇavākāramādyaṃtaṃ paṃcamaṃḍalamaṃḍitam  āruroha rathaṃ bhadra maṃbikāpatirīśvaraḥ  sasūnugaṇamiṃdrā dyāḥ sarvepyanuyayuḥ surāḥ  
citradhvajavyajanacāmarapuṣpavarṣasaṃgatinṛtyanivahairapi vādyavargaiḥ  saṃmānitaḥ paśupatiḥ parayā ca devyā sākaṃ tayoḥ samarabhūmimagātsasainyaḥ  
samīkṣyaṃ tu tayoryuddhaṃ nigūḍho'bhraṃ samāsthitaḥ  samāptavādyanirghoṣaḥ śāṃtorugaṇaniḥsvanaḥ  
atha brahmācyutau vīrau haṃtukāmau parasparam  māheśvareṇa cā'streṇa tathā pāśupatena ca  
astrajvālairatho dagdhaṃ brahmaviṣṇvorjagattrayam  īśopi taṃ nirīkṣyātha hyakālapralayaṃ bhṛśam  
mahānalastaṃbhavibhīṣaṇākṛtirbabhūva tanmadhyatale sa niṣkalaḥ  te astre cāpi sajvāle lokasaṃharaṇakṣame  nipatetuḥ kṣaṇe naiva hyāvirbhūte mahānale  
dṛṣṭvā tadadbhutaṃ citramastraśāṃtikaraṃ śubham  kimetadadbhutākāramityūcuśca parasparam  
atīṃdri yamidaṃ staṃbhamagnirūpaṃ kimutthitam  asyordhvamapi cādhaśca āvayorlakṣyameva hi  
iti vyavasitau vīrau militau vīramāninau  tatparau tatparīkṣārthaṃ pratasthāte'tha satvaram  
āvayormiśrayostatra kāryamekaṃ na saṃbhavet  ityuktvā sūkaratanurviṣṇustasyādimīyivān  
tathā brahmāhaṃ satanustadaṃtaṃ vīkṣituṃ yayau  bhittvā pātālanilayaṃ gatvā dūrataraṃ hariḥ  
nā'pśyāttasya saṃsthānaṃ staṃbhasyānalavarcasaḥ  śrāṃtaḥ sa sūkarahariḥ prāpa pūrvaṃ raṇāṃgaṇam  
atha gacchaṃstu vyomnā ca vidhistāta pitā tava  dadarśa ketakī puṣpaṃ kiṃcidvicyutamadbhutam  
atisaurabhyamamlānaṃ bahuvarṣacyutaṃ tathā  anvīkṣya ca tayoḥ kṛtyaṃ bhagavānparameśvaraḥ  
parihāsaṃ tu kṛtavānkaṃpanāccalitaṃ śiraḥ  tasmāttāvanugṛhṇātuṃ cyutaṃ ketakamuttamam  
kiṃ tvaṃ patasi puṣpeśa puṣparāṭ kena vā dhṛtam  ādimasyāprameyasya staṃbhamadhyāccyutaściram  
na saṃpaśyāmi tasmāttvaṃ jahyāśāmaṃtadarśane  asyāṃ tasya ca sevārthaṃ haṃsamūrtirihāgataḥ  
itaḥ paraṃ sakhe me'dya tvayā kartavyamīpsitam  mayā saha tvayā vācyametadviṣṇośca sannidhau  
staṃbhāṃto vīkṣito dhātrā tatra sākṣyahamacyuta  ityuktvā ketakaṃ tatra praṇanāma punaḥ naḥ  asatyamapi śastaṃ syādāpadītyanuśāsanam  
samīkṣya tatrā'cyutamāyataśramaṃ pranaṣṭaharṣaṃ tu nanarta harṣāt  uvāca cainaṃ paramārthamacyutaṃ ṣaṃḍhāttavādaḥ sa vidhistato'cyutam  
staṃbhāgrametatsamudīkṣitaṃ hare tatraiva sākṣī nanu ketakaṃ tvidam  tato'vadattatra hi ketakaṃ mṛṣā tatheti taddhātṛvacastadaṃtike  
hariśca tatsatyamitīva ciṃtayaṃścakāra tasmai vidhaye namaḥ svayam  ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca pūjayāmāsa taṃ vidhim  
vidhiṃ prahartuṃ śaṭhamagniliṃgataḥ sa īśvarastatra babhūva sākṛtiḥ  samutthitaḥ svāmi vilokanātpunaḥ prakaṃpapāṇiḥ parigṛhya tatpadam  
ādyaṃtahīnavapuṣi tvayi mohabuddhyā bhūyādvimarśa iha nāvati kāmanotthaḥ  sa tvaṃ prasīda karuṇākara kaśmalaṃ nau mṛṣṭaṃ kṣamasva vihitaṃ bhavataiva kelyā  
īśvara uvāca  vatsaprasanno'smi hare yatastvamīśatvamicchannapi satyavākyam  brūyāstataste bhavitā janeṣu sāmyaṃ mayā satkṛtirapyalapthāḥ  
itaḥ paraṃ te pṛthagātmanaśca kṣetrapratiṣṭhotsavapūjanaṃ ca  
iti devaḥ purā prītaḥ satyena haraye param  dadau svasāmyamatyarthaṃ devasaṃghe ca paśyati  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ saptamo'dhyāyaḥ  
naṃdikeśvara uvāca  sasarjātha mahādevaḥ puruṣaṃ kaṃcidadbhutam  bhairavākhyaṃ bhruvormadhyādbrahmadarpajighāṃsayā  
sa vai tadā tatra patiṃ praṇamya śivamaṃgaṇe  kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇyatra śīghramājñāpaya prabho  
vatsayo'yaṃ vidhiḥ sākṣājjagatāmādyadaivatam  nūnamarcaya khaḍgena tigmena javasā param  
sa vai gṛhītvaikakareṇa keśaṃ tatpaṃcamaṃ dṛptamasatyabhāṣaṇam  chittvā śirāṃsyasya nihaṃtumudyataḥ prakaṃpayankhaḍgamatisphuṭaṃ karaiḥ  
pitā tavotsṛṣṭavibhūṣaṇāṃbarasraguttarīyāmalakeśasaṃhatiḥ  pravātaraṃbheva lateva caṃcalaḥ papāta vai bhairavapādapaṃkaje  
tāvadvidhiṃ tāta didṛkṣuracyutaḥ kṛpālurasmatpatipādapallavam  niṣicya bāṣpairavadatkṛtāṃjaliryathā śiśuḥ svaṃ pitaraṃ kalākṣaram  
acyuta uvāca  tvayā prayatnena purā hi dattaṃ yadasya paṃcānanamīśacihnam  tasmātkṣamasvādyamanugrahārhaṃ kuru prasādaṃ vidhaye hyamuṣmai  
ityarthito'cyuteneśastuṣṭaḥ suragaṇāṃgaṇe  nivartayāmāsa tadā bhairavaṃ brahmadaṃḍataḥ  
athāha devaḥ kitavaṃ vidhiṃ vigatakaṃdharam  brahmaṃstvamarhaṇākāṃkṣī śaṭhamīśatvamāsthitaḥ  
nātaste satkṛtirloke bhūyātsthānotsavādikam  brahmovaca  svāminprasīdādya mahāvibhūte manye varaṃ varada me śirasaḥ pramokṣam  
namastubhyaṃ bhagavate baṃdhave viśvayonaye  sahiṣṇave sarvadoṣāṇāṃ śaṃbhave śailadhanvane  
īśvara uvāca  arājabhayametadvai jagatsarvaṃ na śiṣyati  tatastvaṃ jahi daṃḍārhaṃ vaha lokadhuraṃ śiśo  
varaṃ dadāmi te tatra gṛhāṇa durlabhaṃ param  vaitānikeṣu gṛhyeṣu yajñe ca bhavān guruḥ  
niṣphalastvadṛte yajñaḥ sāṃgaśca sahadakṣiṇaḥ  athāha devaḥ kitavaṃ ketakaṃ kūṭasākṣiṇam  
re re ketaka duṣṭastvaṃ śaṭha dūramito vraja  mamāpi prema te puṣpe mā bhūtpūjāsvitaḥ param  
ityukte tatra devena ketakaṃ devajātayaḥ  sarvāni vārayāmāsustatpārśvādanyatastadā  
ketaka uvāca  namaste nātha me janmaniṣphalaṃ bhavadājñayā  saphalaṃ kriyatāṃ tāta kṣamyatāṃ mama kilbiṣam  
jñānājñānakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāśayatyeva te smṛtiḥ  tādṛśe tvayi dṛṣṭe me mithyādoṣaḥ kuto bhavet  
tathā stutastu bhagavānketakena sabhātale  na me tvaddhāraṇaṃ yogyaṃ satyavāgahamīśvaraḥ  
madīyāstvāṃ dhariṣyaṃti janma te saphalaṃ tataḥ  tvaṃ vai vitānavyājena mamopari bhaviṣyasi  
ityanugṛhya bhagavānketakaṃ vidhimādhavau  virarāja sabhāmadhye sarvadevairabhiṣṭutaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāmaṣṭamo'dhyāyaḥ  
naṃdikeśvara uvāca  tatrāṃtare tau ca nāthaṃ praṇamya vidhimādhavau  baddhāṃjalipuṭau tūṣṇīṃ tasthaturdakṣavāmagau  
tatra saṃsthāpya tau devaṃ sakuṭuṃbaṃ varāsane  pūjayāmāsatuḥ pūjyaṃ puṇyaiḥ puruṣavastubhiḥ  
pauruṣaṃ prākṛtaṃ vastujñeyaṃ dīrghālpakālikam  hāranūpurakeyūrakirīṭamaṇikuṃḍalaiḥ  
yajñasūtrottarīyasrakkṣaumamālyāṃgulīyakaiḥ  puṣpatāṃbūlakarpūracaṃdanāgurulepanaiḥ  
dhūpadīpasitacchatravyajanadhvajacāmaraiḥ  anyairdivyopahāraiśca vāṇmanotītavaibhavaiḥ  
patiyogyaiḥ paśvalabhyaistau samarcayatāṃ patim  yadyacchreṣṭhatamaṃ vastu patiyogyaṃ hitaddhvaje  
tadvastvakhilamīśopi pāraṃ paryacikīrṣayā  sabhyānāṃ pradadau hṛṣṭaḥ pṛthaktatra yathākramam  
kolāhalo mahānāsīttatra tadvastu gṛhṇatām  tatraiva brahmaviṣṇubhyāṃ cārcitaḥ śaṃkaraḥ purā  
prasannaḥ prāha tau namrau sasmitaṃ bhaktivardhanaḥ  īśvara uvāca  tuṣṭo'hamadya vāṃ vatsau pūjayā'sminmahādine  
dinametattataḥ puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati mahattaram  śivarātririti khyātā tithireṣā mama priyā  
etatkāle tu yaḥ kuryātpūjāṃ malliṃgaberayoḥ  kuryāttu jagataḥ kṛtyaṃ sthitisargādikaṃ pumān  
śivarātrāvahorātraṃ nirāhāro jiteṃdri yaḥ  arcayedvā yathānyāyaṃ yathābalamavaṃcakaḥ  
yatphalaṃ mama pūjāyāṃ varṣamekaṃ niraṃtaram  tatphalaṃ labhate sadyaḥ śivarātrau madarcanāt  
maddharmavṛddhikālo'yaṃ caṃdra kāla ivāṃbudheḥ  pratiṣṭhādyutsavo yatra māmako maṃgalāyanaḥ  
yatpunaḥ staṃbharūpeṇa svāvirāsamahaṃ purā  sa kālo mārgaśīrṣe tu syādādrā r ṛkṣamarbhakau  
ādrā ryāṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu yaḥ paśyenmāmumāsakham  madberamapi vā liṃgaṃ sa guhādapi me priyaḥ  
alaṃ darśanamātreṇa phalaṃ tasmindine śubhe  abhyarcanaṃ cedadhikaṃ phalaṃ vācāmagocaram  
raṇaraṃgatale'muṣminyadahaṃ liṃgavarṣmaṇā  jṛṃbhito liṃgavattasmālliṃgasthānamidaṃ bhavet  
anādyaṃtamidaṃ staṃbhamaṇumātraṃ bhaviṣyati  darśanārthaṃ hi jagatāṃ pūjanārthaṃ hi putrako  
bhogāvahamidaṃ liṃgaṃ bhuktiṃ muktyekasādhanam  darśanasparśanadhyānājjaṃtūnāṃ janmamocanam  
analācalasaṃkāśaṃ yadidaṃ liṃgamutthitam  aruṇācalamityeva tadidaṃ khyātimeṣyati  
atra tīrthaṃ ca bahudhā bhaviṣyati mahattaram  muktirapyatra jaṃtūnāṃ vāsena maraṇena ca  
rathotsavādikalyāṇaṃ janāvāsaṃ tu sarvataḥ  atra dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet  
matkṣetrādapi sarvasmātkṣetrametanmahattaram  atra saṃsmṛtimātreṇa muktirbhavati dehinām  
tasmānmahattaramidaṃ kṣetramatyaṃtaśobhanam  sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇaṃ sarvamuktikaraṃ śubham  
arcayitvā'tra māmeva liṃge liṃginamīśvaram  sālokyaṃ caiva sāmīpyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sārṣṭireva ca  
sāyujyamiti paṃcaite kriyādīnāṃ phalaṃ matam  sarvepi yūyaṃ sakalaṃ prāpsyathāśu manoratham  
naṃdikeśvara uvāca  ityanugṛhya bhagavānvinītau vidhimādhavau  yatpūrvaṃ prahataṃ yuddhe tayoḥ sainyaṃ parasparam  
tadutthāpayadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā'mṛtadhārayā  tayormauḍhyaṃ ca vairaṃ ca vyapanetumuvāca tau  
sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ ceti svarūpadvayamasti me  nānyasya kasyacittasmādanyaḥ sarvopyanīśvaraḥ  
purastātstaṃbharūpeṇa paścādrū peṇa cārbhakau  brahmatvaṃ niṣkalaṃ proktamīśatvaṃ sakalaṃ tathā  
dvayaṃ mamaiva saṃsiddhaṃ na madanyasya kasyacit  tasmādīśatvamanyeṣāṃ yuvayorapi na kvacit  
tadajñānena vāṃ vṛttamīśamānaṃ mahādbhutam  tannirākartumatraivamutthito'haṃ raṇakṣitau  
tyajataṃ mānamātmīyaṃ mayīśe kurutaṃ matim  matprasādena lokeṣu sarvopyarthaḥ prakāśate  
gurūktirvyaṃjakaṃ tatra pramāṇaṃ vā punaḥ punaḥ  brahmatattvamidaṃ gūḍhaṃ bhavatprītyā bhaṇāmyaham  
ahameva paraṃ brahma matsvarūpaṃ kalākalam  brahmatvādīśvaraścāhaṃ kṛtyaṃ menugrahādikam  
bṛhattvādbṛṃhaṇatvācca brahmāhaṃ brahmakeśavau  samatvādvyāpakatvācca tathaivātmāhamarbhakau  
anātmānaḥ pare sarve jīvā eva na saṃśayaḥ  anugrahādyaṃ sargāṃtaṃ jagatkṛtyaṃ ca paṃkajam  
īśatvādeva me nityaṃ na madanyasya kasyacit  ādau brahmattvabuddhyarthaṃ niṣkalaṃ liṃgamutthitam  
tasmādajñātamīśatvaṃ vyaktaṃ dyotayituṃ hi vām  sakalohamato jātaḥ sākṣādīśastu tatkṣaṇāt  
sakalatvamato jñeyamīśatvaṃ mayi satvaram  yadidaṃ niṣkalaṃ staṃbhaṃ mama brahmatvabodhakam  
liṃgalakṣaṇayuktatvānmama liṃgaṃ bhavedidam  tadidaṃ nityamabhyarcyaṃ yuvābhyāmatra putrakau  
madātmakamidaṃ nityaṃ mama sānnidhyakāraṇam  mahatpūjyamidaṃ nityamabhedālliṃgasiṃginoḥ  
yatrapratiṣṭhitaṃ yena madīyaṃ liṃgamīdṛśam  tatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ sohamapratiṣṭhopi vatsakau  
matsāmyamekaliṃgasya sthāpane phalamīritam  dvitīye sthāpite liṃge madaikyaṃ phalameva hi  
liṃgaṃ prādhānyataḥ sthāpyaṃ tathāberaṃ tu gauṇakam  liṃgābhāvena tatkṣetraṃ saberamapi sarvataḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ navamo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmaviṣṇū ūcatuḥ  sargādipaṃcakṛtyasya lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi nau prabho  śiva uvāca  matkṛtyabodhanaṃ guhyaṃ kṛpayā prabravīmi vām  
sṛṣṭiḥ sthitiśca saṃhārastirobhāvo'pyanugrahaḥ  paṃcaiva me jagatkṛtyaṃ nityasiddhamajācyutau  
sargaḥ saṃsārasaṃraṃbhastatpratiṣṭhā sthitirmatā  saṃhāro mardanaṃ tasya tirobhāvastadutkramaḥ  
tanmokṣo'nugrahastanme kṛtyamevaṃ hi paṃcakam  kṛtyametadvahatyanyastūṣṇīṃ gopurabiṃbavat  
sargādi yaccatuṣkṛtyaṃ saṃsāraparijṛṃbhaṇam  paṃcamaṃ muktiheturvai nityaṃ mayi ca susthiram  
tadidaṃ paṃcabhūteṣu dṛśyate māmakairjanaiḥ  sṛṣṭirbhūmau sthitistoye saṃhāraḥ pāvake tathā  
tirobhāvo'nile tadvadanugraha ihāmbare  sṛjyate dharayā sarvamadbhiḥ sarvaṃ pravarddhate  
ardyate tejasā sarvaṃ vāyunā cāpanīyate  vyomnānugṛhyate sarvaṃ jñeyamevaṃ hi sūribhiḥ  
paṃcakṛtyamidaṃ voḍhuṃ mamāsti mukhapaṃcakam  caturdikṣu caturvaktraṃ tanmadhye paṃcamaṃ mukham  
yuvābhyāṃ tapasā labdhametatkṛtyadvayaṃ sutau  sṛṣṭisthityabhidhaṃ bhāgyaṃ mattaḥ prītādatipriyam  
tathā rudra maheśābhyāmanyatkṛtyadvayaṃ param  anugrahākhyaṃ kenāpi labdhuṃ naiva hi śakyate  
tatsarvaṃ paurvikaṃ karma yuvābhyāṃ kālavismṛtam  na tadrudra maheśābhyāṃ vismṛtaṃ karma tādṛśam  
rūpe veśe ca kṛtye ca vāhane cāsane tathā  āyudhādau ca matsāmyamasmābhistatkṛte kṛtam  
maddhyānavirahādvatsau mauḍhyaṃ vāmevamāgatam  majjñāne sati naivaṃ syānmānaṃ rūpe maheśavat  
tasmānmajjñānasiddhyarthaṃ maṃtramaoṃkāranāmakam  itaḥ paraṃ prajapataṃ māmakaṃ mānabhaṃjanam  
upādiśaṃ nijaṃ maṃtramaoṃkāramurumaṃgalam  oṃkāro manmukhājjajñe prathamaṃ matprabodhakaḥ  
vācako'yamahaṃ vācyo maṃtro'yaṃ hi madātmakaḥ  tadanusmaraṇaṃ nityaṃ mamānusmaraṇaṃ bhavet  
akāra uttarātpūrvamukāraḥ paścimānanāt  makāro dakṣiṇamukhādbiṃduḥ prāṇmukhatastathā  
nādo madhyamukhādevaṃ paṃcadhā'sau vijṛṃbhitaḥ  ekībhūtaḥ punastadvadomityekākṣaro bhavet  
nāmarūpātmakaṃ sarvaṃ vedabhūtakuladvayam  vyāptametena maṃtreṇa śivaśaktyośca bodhakaḥ  
asmātpaṃcākṣaraṃ jajñe bodhakaṃ sakalasyatat  ākārādikrameṇaiva nakārādiyathākramam  
asmātpaṃcākṣarājjātā mātṛkāḥ paṃcabhedataḥ  tasmācchiraścaturvaktrāttripādgāya trireva hi  
vedaḥ sarvastato jajñe tato vai maṃtrakoṭayaḥ  tattanmaṃtreṇa tatsiddhiḥ sarvasiddhirito bhavet  
anena maṃtrakaṃdena bhogo mokṣaśca siddhyati  sakalā maṃtrarājānaḥ sākṣādbhogapradāḥ śubhāḥ  
naṃdikeśvara uvāca  punastayostatra tiraḥ paṭaṃ guruḥ prakalpya maṃtraṃ ca samādiśatparam  nidhāya tacchīrṣṇi karāṃbujaṃ śanairudaṇmukhaṃ saṃsthitayoḥ sahāṃbikaḥ  
triruccāryāgrahīnmaṃtraṃ yaṃtrataṃtroktipūrvakam  śiṣyau ca tau dakṣiṇāyāmātmānaṃ ca samarpayat  
prabaddhahastau kila tau tadaṃtike tameva devaṃ jagaturjagadgurum  
brahmācyutāvūcatuḥ  namo niṣkalarūpāya namo niṣkalatejase  namaḥ sakalanāthāya namaste sakalātmane  
namaḥ praṇavavācyāya namaḥ praṇavaliṃgine  namaḥ sṛṣṭyādikartre ca namaḥ paṃcamukhāyate  
paṃcabrahmasvarūpāya paṃca kṛtyāyate namaḥ  ātmane brahmaṇe tubhyamanaṃtaguṇaśaktaye  
sakalākalarūpāya śaṃbhave gurave namaḥ  iti stutvā guruṃ padyairbrahmā viṣṇuśca nematuḥ  
īśvara uvāca  vatsakau sarvatattvaṃ ca kathitaṃ darśitaṃ ca vām  japataṃ praṇavaṃ maṃtraṃ devīdiṣṭaṃ madātmakam  
jñānaṃ ca susthiraṃ bhāgyaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati śāśvatam  ādrā ryāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ tajjāpyaṃ tvakṣayaṃ bhavet  
sūryagatyā mahādrā ryāmekaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet  mṛgaśīrṣāṃtimo bhāgaḥ punarvasvādimastathā  
ādrā rsamaḥ sadā jñeyaḥ pūjāhomāditarpaṇe  darśanaṃ tu prabhāte ca prātaḥsaṃgavakālayoḥ  
caturdaśī tathā grāhyā niśīthavyāpinī bhavet  pradoṣavyāpinī caiva parayuktā praśasyate  
liṃgaṃ beraṃ ca metulyaṃ yajatāṃ liṃgamuttamam  tasmālliṃgaṃ paraṃ pūjyaṃ berādapi mumukṣubhiḥ  
liṃgamaoṃkāramaṃtreṇa beraṃ paṃcākṣareṇa tu  svayameva hi saddravyaiḥ pratiṣṭhāpyaṃ parairapi  
pūjayedupacāraiśca matpadaṃ sulabhaṃ bhavet  iti śāsya tathā śiṣyau tatraivāṃ'tarhitaḥ śivaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ daśamo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kathaṃ liṃgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpyaṃ kathaṃ vātasya lakṣaṇam  kathaṃ vā tatsamabhyarcyaṃ deśe kāle ca kena hi  
sūta uvāca  yuṣmadarthaṃ pravakṣyāmi buddhyatāmavadhānataḥ  anukūle śubhe kāle puṇye tīrthe taṭe tathā  
yatheṣṭaṃ liṃgamāropyaṃ yatra syānnityamarcanam  pārthivena tathāpyenaṃ taijasena yathāruci  
kalpalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ liṃgaṃ pūjāphalaṃ labhet  sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ sadyaḥ pūjāphalapradam  
care viśiṣyate sūkṣmaṃ sthāvare sthūlameva hi  salakṣaṇaṃ sapīṭhaṃ ca sthāpayecchivanirmitam  
maṃḍalaṃ caturasraṃ vā trikoṇamathavā tathā  khaṭvāṃgavanmadhyasūkṣmaṃ liṃgapīṭhaṃ mahāphalaṃ  
prathamaṃ mṛcchilādibhyo ligaṃ lohādibhiḥ kṛtam  yena liṃgaṃ tena pīṭhaṃ sthāvare hi viśiṣyate  
liṃgaṃ pīṭhaṃ care tvekaṃ liṃgaṃ bāṇakṛtaṃ vinā  liṃgapramāṇaṃ kartṛṇāṃ dvādaśāṃgulamuttamam  
nyūnaṃ cetphalamalpaṃ syādadhikaṃ naiva dūṣyate  karturekāṃgulanyūnaṃ carepi ca tathaiva hi  
ādau vimānaṃ śilpena kāryaṃ devagaṇairyutam  tatra garbhagṛhe ramye dṛḍhe darpaṇasaṃnibhe  
bhūṣite navaratnaiśca digdvāre ca pradhānakaiḥ  nīlaṃ raktaṃ ca vai dūryaṃ śyāmaṃ mārakataṃ tathā  
muktāpravālagomedavajrāṇi navaratnakam  madhye liṃgaṃ mahaddravyaṃ nikṣipetsahavaidike  
saṃpūjya liṃgaṃ sadyādyaiḥ paṃcasthāne yathākramam  agnau ca hutvā bahudhā haviṣāsa kalaṃ ca mām  
abhyarcya gurumācāryamarthaiḥ kāmaiśca bāṃdhavam  dadyādaiśvaryamarthibhyo jaḍamapyajaḍaṃ tathā  
sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ jīvaṃ sarvaṃ saṃtoṣya yatnataḥ  suvarṇapūrite śvabhre navaratnaiśca pūrite  
sadyādi brahma coccārya dhyātvā devaṃ paraṃ śubham  udīrya ca mahāmaṃtramaoṃkāraṃ nādaghoṣitam  
liṃgaṃ tatra pratiṣṭhāpya ligaṃ pīṭhena yojayet  liṃgaṃ sapīṭhaṃ nikṣipya nityalepena baṃdhayet  
evaṃ beraṃ ca saṃsthāpyaṃ tatraiva paramaṃ śubham  paṃcākṣareṇa beraṃ tu utsavārthaṃ vahistathā  
beraṃ gurubhyo gṛhṇīyātsādhubhiḥ pūjitaṃ tu vā  evaṃ liṃge ca bere ca pūjā śivapadapradā  
punaśca dvividhaṃ proktaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ tathā  sthāvaraṃ liṃgamityāhustarugulmādikaṃ tathā  
jaṃgamaṃ liṃgamityāhuḥ kṛmikīṭādikaṃ tathā  sthāvarasya ca śuśrūṣā jaṃgamasya ca tarpaṇam  
tattatsukhānurāgeṇa śivapūjāṃ vidurbudhāḥ  pīṭhamaṃbāmayaṃ sarvaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ ca cinmayam  
yathā devīmumāmaṃke dhṛtvā tiṣṭhati śaṃkaraḥ  tathā liṃgamidaṃ pīṭhaṃ dhṛtvā tiṣṭhati saṃtatam  
evaṃ sthāpya mahāliṃgaṃ pūjayedupacārakaiḥ  nityapūjā yathā śaktidhvajādikaraṇaṃ tathā  
iti saṃsthāpayelliṃgaṃ sākṣācchivapadapradam  athavā caraliṃgaṃ tu ṣoḍaśairupacārakaiḥ  
pūjayecca yathānyāyaṃ kramācchivapadapradam  āvāhanaṃ cāsanaṃ ca arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathaiva ca  
tadaṃgācamanaṃ caiva snānamabhyaṃgapūrvakam  vastraṃ gaṃdhaṃ tathā puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ nivedanam  
nīrājanaṃ ca tāṃbūlaṃ namaskāro visarjanam  athavā'rghyādikaṃ kṛtvā naivedyāṃ taṃ yathāvidhi  
athābhiṣekaṃ naivedyaṃ namaskāraṃ ca tarpaṇam  yathāśakti sadākuryātkramācchivapadapradam  
athavā mānuṣe liṃgepyārṣe daive svayaṃbhuvi  sthāpite'pūrvake liṃge sopacāraṃ yathā tathā  
pūjopakaraṇe datte yatkiṃcitphalamaśnute  pradakṣiṇānamaskāraiḥ kramācchivapadapradam  
liṃgaṃ darśanamātraṃ vā niyamena śivapradam  mṛtpiṣṭagośakṛtpuṣpaiḥ karavīreṇa vā phalaiḥ  
guḍena navanītena bhasmanānnairyathāruci  liṃgaṃ yatnena kṛtvāṃte yajettadanusārataḥ  
aṃguṣṭhādāvapi tathā pūjāmicchaṃti kecana  liṃgakarmaṇi sarvatra niṣedhosti na karhicit  
sarvatra phaladātā hi prayāsānuguṇaṃ śivaḥ  athavā liṃgadānaṃ vā liṃgamaulyamathāpi vā  
śraddhayā śivabhaktāya dattaṃ śivapadapradam  athavā praṇavaṃ nityaṃ japeddaśasahasrakam  
saṃdhyayośca sahasraṃ vā jñeyaṃ śivapadapradam  japakāle makārāṃtaṃ manaḥśuddhikaraṃ bhajet  
samādhau mānasaṃ proktamupāṃśu sārvakālikam  samānapraṇavaṃ cemaṃ biṃdunādayutaṃ viduḥ  
atha paṃcākṣaraṃ nityaṃ japedayutamādarāt  saṃdhyayośca sahasraṃ vā jñeyaṃ śivapadapradam  
praṇavenādisaṃyuktaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ viśiṣyate  dīkṣāyuktaṃ gurorgrāhyaṃ maṃtraṃ hyatha phalāptaye  
kuṃbhasnānaṃ maṃtradīkṣāṃ mātṛkānyāsameva ca  brāhmaṇaḥ satyapūtātmā gururjñānī viśiṣyate  
dvijānāṃ ca namaḥpūrvamanyeṣāṃ ca namontakam  strīṇāṃ ca kvacidicchaṃti namo taṃ ca yathāvidhi  
viprastrīṇāṃ namaḥ pūrvamidamicchaṃti kecana  paṃcakoṭijapaṃ kṛtvā sadā śivasamo bhavet  
ekadvitricatuḥkoṭyābrahmādīnāṃ padaṃ vrajet  japedakṣaralakṣaṃvā akṣarāṇāṃ pṛthakpṛthak  
athavākṣaralakṣaṃ vā jñeyaṃ śivapadapradam  sahasraṃ tu sahasrāṇāṃ sahasreṇa dinena hi  
japenmaṃtrādiṣṭasiddhirnityaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanāt  aṣṭottarasahasraṃ vai gāyatrīṃ prātareva hi  
brāhmaṇastu japennityaṃ kramācchivapadapradān  vedamaṃtrāṃstu sūktāni japenniyamamāsthitaḥ  
ekaṃ daśārṇaṃ maṃtraṃ ca śatonaṃ ca tadūrdhvakam  ayutaṃ ca sahasraṃ ca śatamekaṃ vinā bhavet  
vedapārāyaṇaṃ caiva jñeyaṃ śivapadapradam  anyānbahutarānmaṃtrāñjapedakṣaralakṣataḥ  
ekākṣarāṃstathā maṃtrāñjapedakṣarakoṭitaḥ  tataḥ paraṃ japeccaiva sahasraṃ bhaktipūrvakam  
evaṃ kuryādyathāśakti kramācchiva padaṃ labhet  nityaṃ rucikaraṃ tvekaṃ maṃtramāmaraṇāṃtikam  
japetsahasramomiti sarvābhīṣṭaṃ śivājñayā  puṣpārāmādikaṃ vāpi tathā saṃmārjanādikam  
śivāya śivakāryāthe kṛtvā śivapadaṃ labhet  śivakṣetre tathā vāsaṃ nityaṃ kuryācca bhaktitaḥ  
jaḍānāmajaḍānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhuktimuktidam  tasmādvāsaṃ śivakṣetre kuryadāmaraṇaṃ budhaḥ  
liṃgāddhastaśataṃ puṇyaṃ kṣetre mānuṣake viduḥ  sahasrāratnimātraṃ tu puṇyakṣetre tathārṣake  
daivaliṃge tathā jñeyaṃ sahasrāratnimānataḥ  dhanuṣpramāṇasāhasraṃ puṇyaṃ kṣetre svayaṃ bhuvi  
puṇyakṣetre sthitā vāpī kūpādyaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca  śivagaṃgeti vijñeyaṃ śivasya vacanaṃ yathā  
tatra snātvā tathā dattvā japitvā hi śivaṃ vrajet  śivakṣetraṃ samāśritya vasedāmaraṇaṃ tathā  
dāhaṃ daśāhaṃ māsyaṃ vā sapiṃḍīkaraṇaṃ tu vā  ābdikaṃ vā śivakṣetre kṣetre piṃḍamathāpi vā  
sarvapāpa vinirmuktaḥ sadyaḥ śivapadaṃ labhet  athavā saptarātraṃ vā vasedvā paṃcarātrakam  
trirātramekarātraṃ vā kramācchivapadaṃ labhet  svavarṇānuguṇaṃ loke svācārātprāpnute naraḥ  
varṇoddhāreṇa bhaktyā ca tatphalātiśayaṃ naraḥ  sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ kāmanayā sadyaḥ phalamavāpnuyāt  
sarvaṃ kṛtamakāmena sākṣācchivapadapradam  prātarmadhyāhnasāyāhnamahastriṣvekataḥ kramāt  
prātarvidhikaraṃ jñeyaṃ madhyāhnaṃ kāmikaṃ tathā  sāyāhnaṃ śāṃtikaṃ jñeyaṃ rātrāvapi tathaiva hi  
kālo niśītho vai proktomadhyayāmadvayaṃ niśi  śivapūjā viśeṣeṇa tatkāle'bhīṣṭasiddhidā  
evaṃ jñātvā naraḥ kurvanyathoktaphalabhāgbhavet  kalau yuge viśeṣeṇa phalasiddhistu karmaṇā  
uktena kenacidvāpi adhikāravibhedataḥ  sadvṛttiḥ pāpabhīruścettatatphalamavāpnuyāt  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  atha kṣetrāṇi puṇyāni samāsātkathayasva naḥ  sarvāḥ striyaśca puruṣā yānyāśritya padaṃ labhet  
sūta yogivaraśreṣṭha śivakṣetrāgamāṃstathā  sūta uvāca  śṛṇuta śraddhayā sarvakṣetrāṇi ca tadāgamān  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃekadaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  śṛṇudhvamṛṣayaḥ prājñāḥ śivakṣetraṃ vimuktidam  tadāgamāṃstato vakṣye lokarakṣārthameva hi  
paṃcāśatkoṭivistīrṇā saśailavanakānanā  śivājñayā hi pṛthivī lokaṃ dhṛtvā ca tiṣṭhati  
tatra tatra śivakṣetraṃ tatra tatra nivāsinām  mokṣārthaṃ kṛpayā devaḥ kṣetraṃ kalpitavānprabhuḥ  
parigrahādṛṣīṇāṃ ca devānāṃ parigrahāt  svayaṃbhūtānyathānyāni lokarakṣārthameva hi  
tīrthe kṣetre sadākāryaṃ snānadānajapādikam  anyathā rogadāridra ymūkatvādyāpnuyānnaraḥ  
athāsminbhārate varṣe prāpnoti maraṇaṃ naraḥ  svayaṃbhūsthānavāsena punarmānuṣyamāpnuyāt  
kṣetre pāpasya karaṇaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhavati bhūsurāḥ  puṇyakṣetre nivāse hi pāpamaṇvapi nācaret  
yena kenāpyupāyena puṇyakṣetre vasennaraḥ  siṃdhoḥ śatanadītīre saṃti kṣetrāṇyanekaśaḥ  
sarasvatī nadī puṇyā proktā ṣaṣṭimukhā tathā  tattattīre vasetprājñaḥ kramādbrahmapadaṃ labhet  
himavadgirijā gaṃgā puṇyā śatamukhā nadī  tattīre caiva kāśyādipuṇyakṣetrāṇyanekaśaḥ  
tatra tīraṃ praśastaṃ hi mṛge mṛgabṛhaspatau  śoṇabhadro daśamukhaḥ puṇyobhīṣṭaphalapradaḥ  
tatra snānopavāsena padaṃ vaināyakaṃ labhet  caturvīṃśamukhā puṇyā narmadā ca mahānadī  
tasyāṃ snānena vāsena padaṃ vaiṣṇavamāpnuyāt  tamasā dvādaśamukhā revā daśamukhā nadī  
godāvarī mahāpuṇyā brahmagovadhanāśinī  ekaviṃśamukhā proktā rudra lokapradāyinī  
kṛṣṇaveṇī puṇyanadī sarvapāpakṣayāvahā  sāṣṭādaśamukhāproktā viṣṇulokapradāyinī  
tuṃgabhadrā daśamukhā brahmalokapradāyinī  suvarṇamukharī puṇyā proktā navamukhā tathā  
tatraiva suprajāyaṃte brahmalokacyutāstathā  sarasvatī ca paṃpā ca kanyāśvetanadī śubhā  
etāsāṃ tīravāsena iṃdra lokamavāpnuyāt  sahyādri jā mahāpuṇyā kāverīti mahānadī  
saptaviṃśamukhā proktā sarvābhīṣṭaṃ pradāyinī  tattīrāḥ svargadāścaiva brahmaviṣṇupadapradāḥ  
śivalokapradā śaivāstathā'bhīṣṭaphalapradāḥ  naimiṣe badare snāyānmeṣage ca gurau ravau  
brahmalokapradaṃ vidyāttataḥ pūjādikaṃ tathā  siṃdhunadyāṃ tathā snānaṃ siṃhe karkaṭage ravau  
kedārodakapānaṃ ca snānaṃ ca jñānadaṃ viduḥ  godāvaryāṃ siṃhamāse snāyātsiṃhabṛhaspatau  
śivalokapradamiti śivenoktaṃ tathā purā  yamunāśoṇayoḥ snāyādgurau kanyāgate ravau  
dharmaloke daṃtiloke mahābhogapradaṃ viduḥ  kāveryāṃ ca tathāsnāyāttulāge tu ravau gurau  
viṣṇorvacanamāhātmyātsarvābhīṣṭapradaṃ viduḥ  vṛścike māsi saṃprāpte tathārke guruvṛścike  
narmadāyāṃ nadīsnānādviṣṇulokamavāpnuyāt  suvarṇamukharīsnānaṃ cāpage ca gurau ravau  
śivalokapradamiti brāhmaṇo vacanaṃ yathā  mṛgamāsi tathā snāyājjāhnavyāṃ mṛgage gurau  
śivalokapradamiti brahmaṇo vacanaṃ yathā  brahmaviṣṇvoḥ pade bhuktvā tadaṃte jñānamāpnuyāt  
gaṃgāyāṃ māghamāse tu tathākuṃbhagate ravau  śrāddhaṃ vā piṃḍadānaṃ vā tilodakamathāpivā  
vaṃśadvayapitṛṇāṃ ca kulakoṭyuddharaṃ viduḥ  kṛṣṇaveṇyāṃ praśaṃsaṃti mīnage ca gurau ravau  
tattattīrthe ca tanmāsi snānamiṃdra padapradam  gaṃgāṃ vā sahyajāṃ vāpi samāśritya vasedbudhaḥ  
tatkālakṛtapāpasya kṣayo bhavati niścitam  rudra lokapradānyeva saṃti kṣetrāṇyanekaśaḥ  
tāmraparṇī vegavatī brahmalokaphalaprade  tayostīre hi saṃtyeva kṣetrāṇi svargadāni ca  
saṃti kṣetrāṇi tanmadhye puṇyadāni ca bhūriśaḥ  tatra tatra vasanprājñastādṛśaṃ ca phalaṃ labhet  
sadācāreṇa sadvṛttyā sadā bhāvanayāpi ca  vaseddayāluḥ prājño vai nānyathā tatphalaṃ labhet  
puṇyakṣetre kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ bahudhā ṛddhimṛcchati  puṇyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ mahadaṇvapi jāyate  
tatkālaṃ jīvanārthaścetpuṇyena kṣayameṣyati  puṇyamaiśvaryadaṃ prāhuḥ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ tathā  
mānasaṃ ca tathā pāpaṃ tādṛśaṃ nāśayeddvijāḥ  mānasaṃ vajralepaṃ tu kalpakalpānugaṃ tathā  
dhyānādeva hi tannaśyennānyathā nāśamṛcchati  vācikaṃ japajālena kāyikaṃ kāyaśoṣaṇāt  
dānāddhanakṛtaṃ naśyennā'nyathākalpakoṭibhiḥ  kvacitpāpena puṇyaṃ ca vṛddhipūrveṇa naśyati  
bījāṃśaścaiva vṛddhyaṃśo bhogāṃśaḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ  jñānanāśyo hi bījāṃśo vṛddhiruktaprakārataḥ  
bhogāṃśo bhoganāśyastu nānyathā puṇyakoṭibhiḥ  bījaprarohe naṣṭe tu śeṣo bhogāya kalpate  
devānāṃ pūjayā caiva brahmaṇānāṃ ca dānataḥ  tapodhikyācca kālena bhogaḥ sahyo bhavennṛṇām  tasmātpāpamakṛtvaiva vastavyaṃ sukhamicchatā  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ dvādaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sadācāraṃ śrāvayāśu yena lokāñjayedbudhaḥ  dharmādharmamayānbrūhi svarganārakadāṃstathā  
sūta uvāca  sadācārayuto vidvānbrāhmaṇo nāma nāmataḥ  vedācārayuto vipro hyetairekaikavāndvijaḥ  
alpācārolpavedaśca kṣatriyo rājasevakaḥ  kiṃcidācāravānvaiśyaḥ kṛṣivāṇijyakṛttayā  
śūdra brāhmaṇa ityuktaḥ svayameva hi karṣakaḥ  asūyāluḥ paradro hī caṃḍāladvija ucyate  
pṛthivīpālako rājā itarekṣatriyā matāḥ  dhānyādikrayavānvaiśya itaro vaṇigucyate  
brahmakṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ śuśrūṣuḥ śūdra ucyate  karṣako vṛṣalo jñeya itare caiva dasyavaḥ  
sarvo hyuṣaḥprācīmukhaścintayeddevapūrvakān  dharmānarthāṃśca tatkleśānāyaṃ ca vyayameva ca  
āyurdveṣaśca maraṇaṃ pāpaṃ bhāgyaṃ tathaiva ca  vyādhiḥ puṣṭistathā śaktiḥ prātarutthānadikphalam  
niśāṃtyāyāmoṣā jñeyā yāmārdhaṃ saṃdhirucyate  tatkāle tu samutthāya viṇmūtre visṛjeddvijaḥ  
gṛhāddūraṃ tato gatvā bāhyataḥ pravṛtastathā  udaṇmukhaḥ samāviśya pratibaṃdhe'nyadiṇmukhaḥ  
jalāgnibrāhmaṇādīnāṃ devānāṃ nābhimukhyataḥ  liṃgaṃ pidhāya vāmena mukhamanyena pāṇinā  
malamutsṛjya cotthāya na paśyeccaiva tanmalam  uddhṛtena jalenaiva śaucaṃ kuryājjalādbahiḥ  
athavā devapitrārṣatīrthāvataraṇaṃ vinā  sapta vā paṃca vā trīnvā gudaṃ saṃśodhayenmṛdā  
liṃge karkoṭamātraṃ tu gude prasṛtiriṣyate  tata utthāya paddhastaśaucaṃ gaṇḍūṣamaṣṭakam  
yena kena ca patreṇa kāṣṭhena ca jalādbahiḥ  kāryaṃ saṃtyajya tarjjanīṃ daṃtadhāvanamīritam  
jaladevānnamaskṛtya maṃtreṇa snānamācaret  aśaktaḥ kaṃṭhadaghnaṃ vā kaṭidaghnamathāpi vā  
ājānu jalamāviśya maṃtrasnānaṃ samācaret  devādīṃstarpayedvidvāṃstatra tīrthajalena ca  
dhautavastraṃ samādāya paṃcakacchena dhārayet  uttarīyaṃ ca kiṃ caiva dhāryaṃ sarveṣu karmasu  
nadyāditīrthasnāne tu snānavastraṃ na śodhayet  vāpīkūpagṛhādau tu snānādūrdhvaṃ nayedbudhaḥ  
śilādārvādike vāpi jale vāpi sthalepi vā  saṃśodhya pīḍayedvastraṃ pitṛṇāṃ tṛptaye dvijāḥ  
jābālakoktamaṃtreṇa bhasmanā ca tripuṃḍrakam  anyathā cejjale pāta itastannarakamṛcchati  
āpohiṣṭheti śirasi prokṣayetpāpaśāṃtaye  yasyeti maṃtraṃ pāde tu saṃdhiprokṣaṇamucyate  
pāde mūrdhni hṛdi caiva mūrdhni hṛtpāda eva ca  hṛtpādamūrdhni saṃprokṣya maṃtrasnānaṃ vidurbudhāḥ  
īṣatsparśe ca dauḥ svāsthye rājarāṣṭrabhaye'pi ca  atyāgatikāle ca maṃtrasnānaṃ samācaret  
prātaḥ sūryānuvākena sāyamagnyanuvākataḥ  apaḥ pītvā tathāmadhye punaḥ prokṣaṇamācaret  
gāyatr yā japamaṃtrāṃte trirūrdhvaṃ prāgvinikṣipet  maṃtreṇa saha caikaṃ vai madhye'rghyaṃ tu raverdvijā  
atha jāte ca sāyāhne bhuvi paścimadiṇmukhaḥ  uddhṛtya dadyātprātastu madhyāhneṃgulibhistathā  
aṃgulīnāṃ ca raṃdhreṇa laṃbaṃ paśyeddivākaram  ātmapradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śuddhācamanamācaret  
sāyaṃ muhūrtādarvāktu kṛtā saṃdhyā vṛthā bhavet  akālātkāla ityukto dine'tīte yathākramam  
divā'tīte ca gāyatrīṃ śataṃ nitye kramājjapet  ādarśāhātparā'tīte gāyatrīṃ lakṣamabhyaset  
māsātīte tu nitye hi punaścopanayaṃ caret  īśo gaurīguho viṣṇurbrahmā ceṃdra śca vai yamaḥ  
evaṃ rūpāṃśca vai devāṃstarpayedarthasiddhaye  brahmārpaṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā śuddhācamanamācaret  
tīrthadakṣiṇataḥ śaste maṭhe maṃtrālaye budhaḥ  tatra devālaye vāpi gṛhe vā niyatasthale  
sarvāndevānnamaskṛtya sthirabuddhiḥ sthirāsanaḥ  praṇavaṃ pūrvamabhyasya gāyatrīmabhyasettataḥ  
jīvabrahmaikyaviṣayaṃ buddhvā praṇavamabhyaset  trailokyasṛṣṭikarttāraṃ sthitikartāramacyutam  
saṃhartāraṃ tathā rudraṃ svaprakāśamupāsmahe  jñānakarmeṃdri yāṇāṃ ca manovṛttīrdhiyastathā  
bhogamokṣaprade dharme jñāne ca prerayetsadā  itthamarthaṃ dhiyādhyāyanbrahmaprāpnoti niścayaḥ  
kevalaṃ vā japennityaṃ brāhmaṇyasya ca pūrtaye  sahasramabhyasennityaṃ prātarbrāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥ  
anyeṣāṃ ca yathā śaktimadhyāhne ca śataṃ japet  sāyaṃ dvidaśakaṃ jñeyaṃ śikhāṣṭakasamanvitam  
mūlādhāraṃ samārabhya dvādaśāṃtasthitāṃstathā  vidyeśabrahmaviṣṇvīśajīvātmaparameśvarān  
brahmabuddhyā tadaikyaṃ ca sohaṃ bhāvanayā japet  tāneva brahmaraṃdhrādau kāyādbāhye ca bhāvayet  
mahattattvaṃ samārabhya śarīraṃ tu sahasrakam  ekaikasmājjapādekamatikramya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ  
parasminyojayejjīvaṃ japatattvamudāhṛtam  śatadvidaśakaṃ dehaṃ śikhāṣṭakasamanvitam  
maṃtrāṇāṃ japa evaṃ hi japamādikramādviduḥ  sahasraṃ brāhmadaṃ vidyācchatamaiṃdra pradaṃ viduḥ  
itarattvātmarakṣārthaṃ brahmayoniṣu jāyate  divākaramupasthāya nityamitthaṃ samācaret  
lakṣadvādaśayuktastu pūrṇabrāhmaṇa īritaḥ  gāyatr yā lakṣahīnaṃ tu vedakāryena yojayet  
āsaptatestu niyamaṃ paścātpravrājanaṃ caret  prātardvādaśasāhasraṃ pravrājīpraṇavaṃ japet  
dine dine tvatikrāṃte nityamevaṃ kramājjapet  māsādau kramaśo'tīte sārdhalakṣajapena hi  
ata ūrdhvamatikrāṃte punaḥ praiṣaṃ samācaret  evaṃ kṛtvā doṣaśāṃtiranyathā rauravaṃ vrajet  
dharmārthayostato yatnaṃ kuryātkāmī na cetaraḥ  brāhmaṇo muktikāmaḥ syādbrahmajñānaṃ sadābhyaset  
dharmādartho'rthato bhogo bhogādvairāgyasaṃbhavaḥ  dharmārjitārthabhogena vairāgyamupajāyate  
viparītārthabhogena rāga eva prajāyate  dharmaśca dvividhaḥ prokto dra vyadehadvayena ca  
dra vyamijyādirūpaṃ syāttīrthasnānādi daihikam  dhanena dhanamāpnoti tapasā divyarūpatām  
niṣkāmaḥ śuddhimāpnoti śuddhyā jñānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  kṛtādau hi tapaḥśloghyaṃ dra vyadharmaḥ kalau yuge  
kṛtedhyānājjñānasiddhistretāyāṃ tapasā tathā  dvāpare yajanājjñānaṃ pratimāpūjayā kalau  
yādṛśaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ phalameva hi  dra vyadehāṃgabhedena nyūnavṛddhikṣayādikam  
adharmo hiṃsikārūpo dharmastu sukharūpakaḥ  adharmādduḥkhamāpnoti dharmādvai sukhamedhate  
vidyādurvṛttito duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vidyātsuvṛttitaḥ  dharmārjanamataḥ kuryādbhogamokṣaprasiddhaye  
sakuṭuṃbasya viprasya caturjanayutasya ca  śatavarṣasya vṛttiṃ tu dadyāttadbrahmalokadam  
cāṃdrā yaṇasahasraṃ tu brahmalokapradaṃ viduḥ  sahasrasya kuṭuṃbasya pratiṣṭhāṃ kṣatriyaścaret  
iṃdra lokapradaṃ vidyādayutaṃ brahmalokadam  yāṃ devatāṃ puraskṛtya dānamācarate naraḥ  
tattallokamavāpnoti iti vedavido viduḥ  arthahīnaḥ sadā kuryāttapasā mārjanaṃ tathā  
tīrthācca tapasā prāpyaṃ sukhamakṣayyamaśnute  arthārjanamatho vakṣye nyāyataḥ susamāhitaḥ  
kṛtātpratigrahāccaiva yājanācca viśuddhitaḥ  adainyādanatikleśādbrāhmaṇo dhanamarjayet  
kṣatriyo bāhuvīryeṇa kṛṣigorakṣaṇādviśaḥ  nyāyārjitasya vittasya dānātsiddhiṃ samaśnute  
jñānasiddhyā mokṣasiddhiḥ sarveṣāṃ gurvanugrahāt  mokṣātsvarūpasiddhiḥ syātparānandaṃ samaśnute  
satsaṃgātsarvametadvai narāṇāṃ jāyate dvijāḥ  dhanadhānyādikaṃ sarvaṃ deyaṃ vai gṛhamedhinā  
yadyatkāle vastujātaṃ phalaṃ vā dhānyameva ca  tattatsarvaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo deyaṃ vai hitamicchatā  
jalaṃ caiva sadā deyamannaṃ kṣudvyādhiśāṃtaye  kṣetraṃ dhānyaṃ tathā''mānnamannamevaṃ caturvidham  
yāvatkālaṃ yadannaṃ vai bhuktvā śravaṇamedhate  tāvatkṛtasya puṇyasya tvardhaṃ dāturna saṃśayaḥ  
grahītāhigṛhītasya dānādvai tapasā tathā  pāpasaṃśodhanaṃ kuryādanyathā rauravaṃ vrajet  
ātmavittaṃ tridhā kuryāddharmavṛddhyātmabhogataḥ  nityaṃ naimittakaṃ kāmyaṃ karma kuryāttu dharmataḥ  
vittasya vardhanaṃ kuryādvṛddhyaṃśena hi sādhakaḥ  hitena mitame dhyena bhogaṃ bhogāṃśataścaret  
kṛṣyarjite daśāṃśaṃ hi deyaṃ pāpasya śuddhaye  śeṣeṇa kuryāddharmādi anyathā rauravaṃ vrajet  
athavā pāpabuddhiḥ syātkṣayaṃ vā satyameṣyati  vṛddhivāṇijyake deyaṣṣaḍaṃśo hi vicakṣaṇaiḥ  
śuddhapratigrahe deyaścaturthāṃśo dvijottamaiḥ  akasmādutthite'rthe hi deyamardhaṃ dvijottamaiḥ  
asatpratigrahasarvaṃ durdānaṃ sāgare kṣipet  āhūya dānaṃ kartavyamātmabhogasamṛddhaye  
pṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ sadā deyamātmaśaktyanusārataḥ  janmāṃtare ṛṇī hi syādadatte pṛṣṭavastuni  
pareṣāṃ ca tathā doṣaṃ na praśaṃsedvicakṣaṇaḥ  viśeṣeṇa tathā brahmañchrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca no vadet  
na vadetsarvajaṃtūnāṃ hṛdi roṣakaraṃ budhaḥ  saṃdhyayoragnikāryaṃ ca kuryādaiśvaryasiddhaye  
aśaktastvekakāle vā sūryāgnī ca yathāvidhi  taṃḍulaṃ dhānyamājyaṃ vā phalaṃ kaṃdaṃ havistathā  
sthālīpākaṃ tathā kuryādyathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi  pradhānahomamātraṃ vā havyābhāve samācaret  
nityasaṃdhānamityuktaṃ tamajasraṃ vidurbudhāḥ  athavā japamātraṃ vā sūryavaṃdanameva ca  
evamātmārthinaḥ kuryurarthārthī ca yathāvidhi  brahmayajñaratā nityaṃ devapūjāratāstathā  
agnipūjāparā nityaṃ gurupūjāratāstathā  brāhmaṇānāṃ tṛptikarāḥ sarve svargasya bhāginaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ trayodaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  agniyajñaṃ devayajktaṃ brahmayajktaṃ tathaiva ca  gurupūjāṃ brahmatṛptiṃ krameṇa brūhi naḥ prabho  
sūta uvāca  agnau juhoti yaddravyamagniyajñaḥ sa ucyate  brahmacaryāśramasthānāṃ samidādhānameva hi  
samidagrau vratādyaṃ ca viśeṣayajanādikam  prathamāśramiṇāmevaṃ yāvadaupāsanaṃ dvijāḥ  
ātmanyāropitāgnīnāṃ vanināṃ yatināṃ dvijāḥ  hitaṃ ca mitamedhyānnaṃ svakāle bhojanaṃ hutiḥ  
aupāsanāgnisaṃdhānaṃ samārabhya surakṣitam  kuṃḍe vāpyatha bhāṃḍe vā tadajasraṃ samīritam  
agnimātmanyaraṇyāṃ vā rājadaivavaśāddhruvam  agnityāgabhayāduktaṃ samāropitamucyate  
saṃpatkarī tathā jñeyā sāyamagnyāhutirdvijāḥ  āyuṣkarīti vijñeyā prātaḥ sūryāhutistathā  
agniyajño hyayaṃ prokto divā sūryaniveśanāt  iṃdrā dīnsakalāndevānuddiśyāgnau juhotiyat  
devayajñaṃ hi taṃ vidyātsthālīpākādikānkratūn  caulādikaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ laukikāgnau pratiṣṭhitam  
brahmayajñaṃ dvijaḥ kuryāddevānāṃ tṛptaye sakṛt  brahmayajña iti prokto vedasyā'dhyayanaṃ bhavet  
nityānaṃtaramāsoyaṃ tatastu na vidhīyate  anagnau devayajanaṃ śṛṇuta śraddhayādarāt  
ādisṛṣṭau mahādevaḥ sarvajñaḥ karuṇākaraḥ  sarvalokopakārārthaṃ vārānkalpitavānprabhuḥ  
saṃsāravaidyaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvabheṣajabheṣajam  ādāvārogyadaṃ vāraṃ svavāraṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ  
saṃpatkāraṃ svamāyāyā varaṃ ca kṛtavāṃstataḥ  janane durgatikrāṃte kumārasya tataḥ param  
ālasyaduritakrāṃtyai vāraṃ kalpitavānprabhuḥ  rakṣakasya tathā viṣṇorlokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
puṣṭyarthaṃ caiva rakṣārthaṃ vāraṃ kalpitavānprabhuḥ  āyuṣkaraṃ tato vāramāyuṣāṃ kartureva hi  
trailokyasṛṣṭikartturhi brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  jagadāyuṣyasiddhyarthaṃ vāraṃ kalpitavānprabhuḥ  
ādau trailokyavṛddhyarthaṃ puṇyapāpe prakalpite  tayoḥ kartrostato vāramiṃdra sya ca yamasya ca  
bhogapradaṃ mṛtyuharaṃ lokānāṃ ca prakalpitam  ādityādīnsvasvarūpānsukhaduḥkhasya sūcakān  
vāreśānkalpayitvādau jyotiścakrepratiṣṭhitān  svasvavāre tu teṣāṃ tu pūjā svasvaphalapradā  
ārogyaṃ saṃpadaścaiva vyādhīnāṃ śāṃtireva ca  puṣṭirāyustathā bhogo mṛterhāniryathākramam  
vārakramaphalaṃ prāhurdevaprītipuraḥsaram  anyeṣāmapi devānāṃ pūjāyāḥ phaladaḥ śivaḥ  
devānāṃ prītaye pūjāpaṃcadhaiva prakalpitā  tattanmaṃtrajapo homo dānaṃ caiva tapastathā  
sthaṃḍile pratimāyāṃ ca hyagnau brāhmaṇavigrahe  samārādhanamityevaṃ ṣoḍaśairupacārakaiḥ  
uttarottaravaiśiṣṭyātpūrvābhāve tathottaram  netrayoḥ śiraso roge tathā kuṣṭhasya śāṃtaye  
ādityaṃ pūjayitvā tu brāhmaṇānbhojayettataḥ  dinaṃ māsaṃ tathā varṣaṃ varṣatrayamathavāpi vā  
prārabdhaṃ prabalaṃ cetsyānnaśyedro gajarādikam  japādyamiṣṭadevasya vārādīnāṃ phalaṃ viduḥ  
pāpaśāṃtirviśeṣeṇa hyādivāre nivedayet  ādityasyaiva devānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ viśiṣṭadam  
somavāre ca lakṣmyādīnsaṃpadarthaṃ yajedbudhaḥ  ājyānnena tathā viprānsapatnīkāṃśca bhojayet  
kālyādīnbhauma vāre tu yajedro gapraśāṃtaye  māṣamudgāḍhakānnena brahmaṇāṃścaiva bhojayet  
saumyavāre tathā viṣṇuṃ dadhyannena yajedbudhaḥ  putramitrakalatrādipuṣṭirbhavati sarvadā  
āyuṣkāmo gurorvāre devānāṃ puṣṭisiddhaye  upavītena vastreṇa kṣīrājyena yajedbudhaḥ  
bhogārthaṃ bhṛgavāre tu yajeddevānsamāhitaḥ  ṣaḍrasopetamannaṃ ca dadyādbrāhmaṇatṛptaye  
strīṇāṃ ca tṛptaye tadvaddeyaṃ vastrādikaṃ śubham  apamṛtyuhare maṃde rudrā drī ścaṃ yajedbudhaḥ  
tilahomena dānena tilānnena ca bhojayet  itthaṃ yajecca vibudhānārogyādiphalaṃ labhet  
devānāṃ nityayajane viśeṣayajanepi ca  snāne dāne jape home brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tarpaṇe  
tithinakṣatrayoge ca tattaddevaprapūjane  ādivārādivāreṣu sarvajño jagadīśvaraḥ  
tattadrū peṇa sarveṣāmārogyādiphalapradaḥ  deśakālānusāreṇa tathā pātrānusārataḥ  
dra vyaśraddhānusāreṇa tathā lokānusārataḥ  tāratamyakramāddevastvārogyādīnprayacchati  
śubhādāvaśubhāṃte ca janmarkṣeṣu gṛhe gṛhī  ārogyādisamṛddhyarthamādityādīngrahānyajet  
tasmādvai devayajanaṃ sarvābhīṣṭaphalapradam  samaṃtrakaṃ brāhmaṇānāmanyeṣāṃ caiva tāṃtrikam  
yathāśaktyānurūpeṇa kartavyaṃ sarvadā naraiḥ  saptasvapi ca vāreṣu naraiḥ śubhaphalepsubhiḥ  
daridra stapasā devānyajedāḍhyo dhanena hi  punaścaivaṃvidhaṃ dharmaṃ kurute śraddhayā saha  
punaśca bhogānvividhānbhuktvā bhūmau prajāyate  chāyāṃ jalāśayaṃ brahmapratiṣṭhāṃ dharmasaṃcayam  
sarvaṃ ca vittavānkuryātsadā bhogaprasiddhaye  kālācca puṇyapākena jñānasiddhiḥ prajāyate  
ya imaṃ śṛṇute'dhyāyaṃ paṭhate vā naro dvijāḥ  śravaṇasyopakarttā ca devayajñaphalaṃ labhet  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ caturdaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  deśādīnkramaśo brūhi sūta sarvārthavittam  sūta uvāca  śuddhaṃ gṛhaṃ samaphalaṃ devayajñādikarmasu  
tato daśaguṇaṃ goṣṭhaṃ jalatīraṃ tato daśa  tato daśaguṇaṃ bilvatulasyaśvatthamūlakam  
tato devālayaṃ vidyāttīrthatīraṃ tato daśa  tato daśaguṇaṃ nadyāstīrthanadyāstato daśa  
saptagaṃgānadītīraṃ tasyā daśaguṇaṃ bhavet  gaṃgā godāvarī caiva kāverī tāmraparṇikā  
siṃdhuśca sarayū revā saptagaṃgāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  tato'bdhitīraṃ daśa ca parvatāgre tato daśa  
sarvasmādadhikaṃ jñeyaṃ yatra vā rocate manaḥ  kṛte pūrṇaphalaṃ jñeyaṃ yajñadānādikaṃ tathā  
tretāyuge tripādaṃ ca dvāpare'rdhaṃ sadā smṛtam  kalau pādaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ tatpādonaṃ tatorddhake  
śuddhātmanaḥ śuddhadinaṃ puṇyaṃ samaphalaṃ viduḥ  tasmāddaśaguṇaṃ jñeyaṃ ravisaṃkramaṇe budhāḥ  
viṣuve taddaśaguṇamayane taddaśa smṛtam  taddaśa mṛgasaṃkrāṃtau taccaṃdra grahaṇe daśa  
tataśca sūryagrahaṇe pūrṇakālottame viduḥ  jagadrūpasya sūryasya viṣayogācca rogadam  
atastadviṣaśāṃtyarthaṃ snānadānajapāṃścaret  viṣaśāṃtyarthakālatvātsa kālaḥ puṇyadaḥ smṛtaḥ  
janmarkṣe ca vratāṃte ca sūryarāgopamaṃ viduḥ  mahatāṃ saṃgakālaśca koṭyarkagrahaṇaṃ viduḥ  
taponiṣṭhā jñānaniṣṭhā yogino yatayastathā  pūjāyāḥ pātramete hi pāpasaṃkṣayakāraṇam  
caturviṃśatilakṣaṃ vā gāyatryā japasaṃyutaḥ  brāhmaṇastu bhavetpātraṃ saṃpūrṇaphalabhogadam  
patanāttrāyata iti pātraṃ śāstre prayujyate  dātuśca pātakāttrāṇātpātramityabhidhīyate  
gāyakaṃ trāyate pātādgāyatrītyucyate hi sā  yathā'rthahino loke'sminparasyārthaṃ na yacchati  
arthavāniha yo loke parasyārthaṃ prayacchati  svayaṃ śuddho hi pūtātmā narānsaṃtrātumarhati  
gāyatrījapaśuddho hi śuddhabrāhmaṇa ucyate  tasmāddāne jape home pūjāyāṃ sarvakarmaṇi  
dānaṃ kartuṃ tathā trātuṃ pātraṃ tu brāhmaṇorhati  annasya kṣudhitaṃ pātraṃ nārīnaramayātmakam  
brāhmaṇaṃ śreṣṭhamāhūya yatkāle susamāhitam  tadarthaṃ śabdamarthaṃ vā sadbodhakamabhīṣṭadam  
icchāvataḥ pradānaṃ ca saṃpūrṇaphaladaṃ viduḥ  yatpraśnānaṃtaraṃ dattaṃ tadardhaṃ phaladaṃ viduḥ  
yatsevakāya dattaṃ syāttatpādaphaladaṃ viduḥ  jātimātrasya viprasya dīnavṛtterdvijarṣabhāḥ  
dattamarthaṃ hi bhogāya bhūrlokedaśavārṣikam  vedayuktasya viprasya svarge hi daśavārṣikam  
gāyatrījapayuktasya satye hi daśavārṣikam  viṣṇubhaktasya viprasya dattaṃ vaikuṃṭhadaṃ viduḥ  
śivabhaktasya viprasya dattaṃ kailāsadaṃ viduḥ  tattallokopabhogārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ dānamiṣyate  
daśāṃgamannaṃ viprasya bhānuvāre dadannaraḥ  parajanmani cārogyaṃ daśavarṣaṃ samaśnute  
bahumānamathāhvānamabhyaṃgaṃ pādasevanam  vāso gaṃdhādyarcanaṃ ca ghṛtāpūparasottaram  
ṣaḍrasaṃ vyaṃjanaṃ caiva tāṃbūlaṃ dakṣiṇottaram  namaścānugamaścaiva svannadānaṃ daśāṃgakam  
daśāṃgamannaṃ viprebhyo daśabhyo vai dadannaraḥ  arkavāre tathā''rogyaṃ śatavarṣaṃ samaśnute  
somavārādivāreṣu tattadvāraguṇaṃ phalam  annadānasya vijñeyaṃ bhūrloke parajanmani  
saptasvapi ca vāreṣu daśabhyaśca daśāṃgakam  annaṃ dattvā śataṃ varṣamārogyādikamaśnute  
evaṃ śatebhyo viprebhyo bhānuvāre dadannaraḥ  sahasravarṣamārogyaṃ śarvaloke samaśnute  
sahasrebhyastathā dattvā'yutavarṣaṃ samaśnute  evaṃ somādivāreṣu vijñeyaṃ hi vipaścitā  
bhānuvāre sahasrāṇāṃ gāyatrīpūtacetasām  annaṃ dattvā satyaloke hyārogyādi samaśnute  
ayutānāṃ tathā dattvā viṣṇuloke samaśnute  annaṃ dattvā tu lakṣāṇāṃ rudra loke samaśnute  
bālānāṃ brahmabuddhyā hi deyaṃ vidyārthibhirnaraiḥ  yūnāṃ ca viṣṇubuddhyā hi putrakāmārthibhirnaraiḥ  
vṛddhānāṃ rudra buddhyā hi deyaṃ jñānārthibhirnaraiḥ  bālastrībhāratībuddhyā buddhikāmairnarottamaiḥ  
lakṣmībuddhyā yuvastrīṣu bhogakāmairnarottamaiḥ  vṛddhāsu pārvatībuddhyā deyamātmārthibhirjanaiḥ  
śilavṛttyoñchavṛttyā ca gurudakṣiṇayārjitam  śuddhadravyamiti prāhustatpūrṇaphaladaṃ viduḥ  
śuklapratigrahāddattaṃ madhyamaṃ dravyamucyate  kṛṣivāṇijyakopetamadhamaṃ dravyamucyate  
kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ caiva śauryavāṇijyakārjitam  uttamaṃ dravyamityāhuḥ śūdrāṇāṃ bhṛtakārjitam  
strīṇāṃ dharmārthināṃ dravyaṃ paitṛkaṃ bhartṛkaṃ tathā  gavādīnāṃ dvādaśīnāṃ caitrādiṣu yathākramam  
saṃbhūya vā puṇyakāle dadyādiṣṭasamṛddhaye  gobhūtilahiraṇyājyavāsodhānyaguḍāni ca  
raupyaṃ lavaṇakūṣmāṃḍe kanyādvādaśakaṃ tathā  godānāddattagavyena gomayenopakāriṇā  
dhanadhānyādyāśritānāṃ duritānāṃ nivāraṇam  jalasnehādyāśritānāṃ duritānāṃ tu gojalaiḥ  
kāyikāditrāṇāṃ tu kṣīradadhyājyakaistathā  tathā teṣāṃ ca puṣṭiśca vijñeyā hi vipaścitā  
bhūdānaṃ tu pratiṣṭhārthamiha cā'mutra ca dvijāḥ  tiladānaṃ balārthaṃ hi sadā mṛtyujayaṃ viduḥ  
hiraṇyaṃ jāṭharāgnestu vṛddhidaṃ vīryadaṃ tathā  ājyaṃ puṣṭikaraṃ vidyādvastramāyuṣkaraṃ viduḥ  
dhānyamannaṃ samṛddhyarthaṃ madhurāhāradaṃ guḍam  raupyaṃ retobhivṛddhyarthaṃ ṣaḍrasārthaṃ tu lāvaṇam  
sarvaṃ sarvasamṛddhyarthaṃ kūṣmāṃḍaṃ puṣṭidaṃ viduḥ  prāptidaṃ sarvabhogānāmiha cā'mutra ca dvijāḥ  
yāvajjīvanamuktaṃ hi kanyādānaṃ tu bhogadam  panasāmrakapitthānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ phalameva ca  
kadalyādyauṣadhīnāṃ ca phalaṃ gulmodbhavaṃ tathā  māṣādīnāṃ ca mudgānāṃ phalaṃ śākādikaṃ tathā  
marīcisarṣapādyānāṃ śākopakaraṇaṃ tathā  yadṛtau yatphalaṃ siddhaṃ taddeyaṃ hi vipaścitā  
śrotrādīṃdriyatṛptiśca sadā deyā vipaścitā  śabdādidaśabhogārthaṃ digādīnāṃ ca tuṣṭidā  
vedaśāstraṃ samādāya buddhvā gurumukhātsvayam  karmaṇāṃ phalamastīti buddhirāstikyamucyate  
baṃdhurājabhayādbuddhiśraddhā sā ca kanīyasī  sarvābhāve daridra stu vācā vā karmaṇā yajet  
vācikaṃ yajanaṃ vidyānmaṃtrastotrajapādikam  tīrthayātrāvratādyaṃ hi kāyikaṃ yajanaṃ viduḥ  
yena kenāpyupāyena hyalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu  devatārpaṇabuddhyā ca kṛtaṃ bhogāya kalpate  
tapaścaryā ca dānaṃ ca kartavyamubhayaṃ sadā  pratiśrayaṃ pradātavyaṃ svavarṇaguṇaśobhitam  
devānāṃ tṛptaye'tyarthaṃ sarvabhogapradaṃ budhaiḥ  ihā'mutrottamaṃ janmasadābhogaṃ labhedbudhaḥ  īśvarārpaṇabuddhyā hi kṛtvā mokṣaphalaṃ labhet  
ya imaṃ paṭhate'dhyāyaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti sadā naraḥ  tasya vaidharmabuddhiśca jñānasiddhiḥ prajāyate  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ paṃcadaśodhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  pārthivapratimāpūjāvidhānaṃ brūhi sattama  yena pūjāvidhānena sarvābhiṣṭamavāpyate  
sūta uvāca  susādhupṛṣṭaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ sadā sarvārthadāyakam  sadyo duḥkhasya śamanaṃ śṛṇuta prabravīmi vaḥ  
apamṛtyuharaṃ kālamṛtyoścāpi vināśanam  sadyaḥ kalatraputrādidhanadhānyapradaṃ dvijāḥ  
annādibhojyaṃ vastrādisarvamutpadyate yataḥ  tato mṛdādipratimāpūjābhīṣṭapradā bhuvi  
puruṣāṇāṃ ca nārīṇāmadhikārotra niścitam  nadyāṃ taḍāge kūpe vā jalāṃtarmṛdamāharet  
saṃśodhya gaṃdhacūrṇena peṣayitvā sumaṃḍape  hastena pratimāṃ kuryātkṣīreṇa ca susaṃskṛtām  
aṃgapratyaṃgakopetāmāyudhaiśca samanvitām  padmāsanasthitāṃ kṛtvā pūjayedādareṇa hi  
vighneśādityaviṣṇūnāmaṃbāyāśca śivasya ca  śivasyaśivaliṃgaṃ ca sarvadā pūjayeddvija  
ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca kuryāttatphalasiddhaye  puṣpeṇa prokṣaṇaṃ kuryādabhiṣekaṃ samaṃtrakam  
śālyannenaiva naivedyaṃ sarvaṃ kuḍavamānataḥ  gṛhe tu kuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ mānuṣe prasthamiṣyate  
daive prasthatrayaṃ yogyaṃ svayaṃbhoḥ prasthapaṃcakam  evaṃ pūrṇaphalaṃ vidyādadhikaṃ vai dvayaṃ trayam  
sahasrapūjayā satyaṃ satyalokaṃ labheddvijaḥ  dvādaśāṃgulamāyāmaṃ dviguṇaṃ ca tato'dhikam  
pramāṇamaṃgulasyaikaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ paṃcakatrayam  ayodārukṛtaṃ pātraṃ śivamityucyate budhaiḥ  
tadaṣṭabhāgaḥ prasthaḥ syāttaccatuḥkuḍavaṃ matam  daśaprasthaṃ śataprasthaṃ sahasraprasthameva ca  
jalatailādigaṃdhānāṃ yathāyogyaṃ ca mānataḥ  mānuṣārṣasvayaṃbhūnāṃ mahāpūjeti kathyate  
abhiṣekādātmaśuddhirgaṃdhātpuṇyamavāpyate  āyustṛptiśca naivedyāddhūpādarthamavāpyate  
dīpājjñānamavāpnoti tāṃbūlādbhogamāpnuyāt  tasmātsnānādikaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ prayatnena prasādhayet  
namaskāro japaścaiva sarvābhīṣṭapradāvubhau  pūjānte ca sadākāryau bhogamokṣārthibhirnaraiḥ  
saṃpūjya manasā pūrvaṃ kuryāttattatsadā naraḥ  devānāṃ pūjayā caiva tattallokamavāpnuyāt  
tadavāṃtaraloke ca yatheṣṭaṃ bhogyamāpyate  tadviśeṣānpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta śraddhayā dvijāḥ  
vighneśapūjayā samyagbhūrloke'bhīṣṭamāpnuyāt  śukravāre caturthyāṃ ca site śrāvaṇabhādra ke  
bhiṣagṛkṣe dhanurmāse vighneśaṃ vidhivadyajet  śataṃ pūjāsahasraṃ vā tatsaṃkhyākadinairvrajet  
devāgniśraddhayā nityaṃ putradaṃ ceṣṭadaṃ nṛṇām  sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ tattadduritanāśanam  
vārapūjāṃśivādīnāmātmaśuddhipradāṃ viduḥ  tithinakṣatrayogānāmādhāraṃ sārvakāmikam  
tathā bṛddhikṣayābhāvātpūrṇabrahmātmakaṃ viduḥ  udayādudayaṃ vāro brahmaprabhṛti karmaṇām  
tithyādau devapūjā hi pūrṇabhogapradā nṛṇām  pūrvabhāgaḥ pitṛṇāṃ tu niśi yuktaḥ praśasyate  
parabhāgastu devānāṃ divā yuktaḥ praśasyate  udayavyāpinī grāhyā madhyāhne yadi sā tithiḥ  
devakārye tathā grāhyāsthiti ṛkṣādikāḥ śubhāḥ  samyagvicārya vārādīnkuryātpūjājapādikam  
pūjāryate hyaneneti vedeṣvarthasya yojanā  pūrṇabhogaphalasiddhiśca jāyate tena karmaṇā  
manobhāvāṃstathā jñānamiṣṭabhogārthayojanāt  pūjāśabdartha evaṃ hi viśruto lokavedayoḥ  
nityanaimittikaṃ kālātsadyaḥ kāmye svanuṣṭhite  nityaṃ māsaṃ ca pakṣaṃ ca varṣaṃ caiva yathākramam  
tattatkarmaphalaprāptistādṛkpāpakṣayaḥ kramāt  mahāgaṇapateḥ pūjā caturthyāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣake  
pakṣapāpakṣayakarī pakṣabhogaphalapradā  caitre caturthyāṃ pūjā ca kṛtā māsaphalapradā  
varṣabhogapradā jñeyā kṛtā vai siṃhabhādra ke  śravaṇyādityavāre ca saptamyāṃ hastabhe dine  
māghaśukle ca saptamyāmādityayajanaṃ caret  jyeṣṭhabhādra kasaumye ca dvādaśyāṃ śravarṇakṣake  
dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇuyajanamiṣṭaṃsaṃpatkaraṃ viduḥ  śrāvaṇe viṣṇuyajanamiṣṭārogyapradaṃ bhavet  
gavādīndvādaśānarthānsāṃgāndatvā tu yatphalam  tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇutarpaṇāt  
dvādaśyāṃ dvādaśānviprānviṣṇordvādaśanāmataḥ  ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca yajettatprītimāpnuyāt  
evaṃ ca sarvadevānāṃ tattaddvādaśanāmakaiḥ  dvādaśabrahmayajanaṃ tattatprītikaraṃ bhavet  
karkaṭe somavāre ca navamyāṃ mṛgaśīrṣake  aṃbāṃ yajedbhūtikāmaḥ sarvabhogaphalapradām  
āśvayukchuklanavamī sarvābhīṣṭaphalapradā  ādivāre caturdaśyāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe viśeṣataḥ  
ārdrāyāṃ ca mahārdrāyāṃ śivapūjā viśiṣyate  māghakṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ sarvābhīṣṭaphalapradā  
āyuṣkarī mṛtyuharā sarvasiddhikarī nṛṇām  jyeṣṭhamāse mahārdrāyāṃ caturdaśīdinepi ca  
mārgaśīrṣārdrakāyāṃ vā ṣoḍaśairupacārakaiḥ  tattanmūrtiśivaṃ pūjya tasya vai pādadarśanam  
śivasya yajanaṃ jñeyaṃ bhogamokṣapradaṃ nṛṇām  vārādidevayajanaṃ kārtike hi viśiṣyate  
kārtike māsi saṃprāpte sarvāndevānyajedbudhaḥ  dānena tapasā homairjapena niyamena ca  
ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca pratimā vipramaṃtrakaiḥ  brāhmaṇānāṃ bhojanena niṣkāmārtikaro bhavet  
kārtike devayajanaṃ sarvabhogapradaṃ bhavet  vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ caiva bhavedbhūtagrahakṣayaḥ  
kārtikādityavāreṣu nṛṇāmādityapūjanāt  tailakārpāsadānāttu bhavetkuṣṭhādisaṃkṣayaḥ  
harītakīmarīcīnāṃ vastrakṣīrādidānataḥ  brahmapratiṣṭhayā caiva kṣayarogakṣayo bhavet  
dīpasarṣapadānācca apasmārakṣayo bhavet  kṛttikāsomavāreṣu śivasya yajanaṃ nṛṇām  
mahādāridrya śamanaṃ sarvasaṃpatkaraṃ bhavet  gṛhakṣetrādidānācca gṛhopakaraṇādinā  
kṛttikābhaumavāreṣu skaṃdasya yajanānnṛṇām  dīpaghaṃṭādidānādvai vāksiddhiracirādbhavet  
kṛttikāsaumyavāreṣu viṣṇorvai yajanaṃ nṛṇām  dadhyodanasya dānaṃ ca satsaṃtānakaraṃ bhavet  
kṛtikāguruvāreṣu brahmaṇo yajanāddhanaiḥ  madhusvarṇājyadānena bhogavṛddhirbhavennṛṇām  
kṛttikāśukravāreṣu gajakomeḍayājanāt  
gaṃdhapuṣpānnadānena bhogyavṛddhirbhavennṛṇām  
vaṃdhyā suputraṃ labhate svarṇaraupyādidānataḥ  kṛttikāśanivāreṣu dikpālānāṃ ca vaṃdanam  
diggajānāṃ ca nāgānāṃ setupānāṃ ca pūjanam  tryaṃbakasya ca rudrasya viṣṇoḥ pāpaharasya ca  
jñānadaṃ brahmaṇaścaiva dhanvaṃtaryaśvinostathā  rogāpamṛtyuharaṇaṃ tatkālavyādhiśāṃtidam  
lavaṇāyasatailānāṃ māṣādīnāṃ ca dānataḥ  trikaṭuphalagaṃdhānāṃ jalādīnāṃ ca dānataḥ  
dravāṇāṃ kaṭhinānāṃ ca prasthena palamānataḥ  svargaprāptirdhanurmāse hyuṣaḥkāle ca pūjanam  
śivādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kramādvai sarvasiddhaye  śālyannasya haviṣyasya naivedyaṃ śastamucyate  
vividhānnasya naivedyaṃ dhanurmāse viśiṣyate  mārgaśīrṣe'nnadasyaiva sarvamiṣṭaphalaṃ bhavet  
pāpakṣayaṃ ceṣṭasiddhiṃ cārogyaṃ dharmameva ca  samyagvedaparijñānaṃ sadanuṣṭhānameva ca  
ihāmutra mahābhogānaṃte yogaṃ ca śāśvatam  vedāṃtajñānasiddhiṃ ca mārgaśīrṣānnado labhet  
mārgaśīrṣe hyuṣaḥkāle dinatrayamathāpi vā  yajeddevānbhogakāmo nādhanurmāsiko bhavet  
yāvatsaṃgavakālaṃ tu dhanurmāso vidhīyate  dhanurmāse nirāhāro māsamātraṃ jiteṃdriyaḥ  
āmadhyāhnajapedvipro gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram  paṃcākṣarādikānmaṃtrānpaścādāsaptikaṃ japet  
jñānaṃ labdhvā ca dehāṃte vipro muktimavāpnuyāt  anyeṣāṃ naranārīṇāṃ triḥsnānena japena ca  
sadā paṃcākṣarasyaiva viśuddhaṃ jñānamāpyate  iṣṭamantrānsadā japtvā mahāpāpakṣayaṃ labhet  
dhanurmāse viśeṣeṇa mahānaivedyamācaret  śālitaṃḍulabhāreṇa marīcaprasthakena ca  
gaṇanāddvādaśaṃ sarvaṃ madhvājyakuḍavena hi  droṇayuktena mudgena dvādaśavyaṃjanena ca  
ghṛtapakvairapūpaiśca modakaiḥ śālikādibhiḥ  dvādaśaiśca dadhikṣīrairdvādaśaprasthakena ca  
nārikelaphalādīnāṃ tathā gaṇanayā saha  dvādaśakramukairyuktaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatpatrakairyutam  
karpūrakhuracūrṇena paṃcasaugaṃdhikairyutam  tāṃbūlayuktaṃ tu yadā mahānaivedyalakṣaṇam  
mahānaivedyametadvai devatārpaṇapūrvakam  varṇānukramapūrveṇa tadbhaktebhyaḥ pradāpayet  
evaṃ caudananaivedyādbhūmau rāṣṭrapatirbhavet  mahānaivedyadānena naraḥ svargamavāpnuyāt  
mahānaivedyadānena sahasreṇa dvijarṣabhāḥ  satyaloke ca talloke pūrṇamāyuravāpnuyāt  
sahasrāṇāṃ ca triṃśatyā mahānaivedyadānataḥ  tadūrdhvalokamāpyaiva na punarjanmabhāgbhavet  
sahasrāṇāṃ ca ṣaṭtriṃśajjanma naivedyamīritam  tāvannaivedyadānaṃ tu mahāpūrṇaṃ taducyate  
mahāpūrṇasya naivedyaṃ janmanaivedyamiṣyate  janmanaivedyadānena punarjanma na vidyate  
ūrje māsi dine puṇye janma naivedyamācaret  saṃkrāṃtipātajanmarkṣapaurṇamāsyādisaṃyute  
abdajanmadine kuryājjanmanaivedyamuttamam  māsāṃtareṣu janmarkṣapūrṇayogadinepi ca  
melane ca śanairvāpi tāvatsāhasramācaret  janmanaivedyadānena janmārpaṇaphalaṃ labhet  
janmārpaṇācchivaḥ prītiḥ svasāyujyaṃ dadāti hi  idaṃ tajjanmanaivedyaṃ śivasyaiva pradāpayet  
yoniliṃgasvarūpeṇa śivo janmanirūpakaḥ  tasmājjanmanivṛttyarthaṃ janma pūjā śivasya hi  
biṃdunādātmakaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṃgamam  biṃduḥ śaktiḥ śivo nādaḥ śivaśaktyātmakaṃ jagat  
nādādhāramidaṃ biṃdurbiṃdvādhāramidaṃ jagat  jagadādhārabhūtau hi biṃdunādau vyavasthitau  
bindunādayutaṃ sarvaṃ sakalīkaraṇaṃ bhavet  sakalīkaraṇājjanmajagatprāpnotyasaṃśayaḥ  
biṃdunādātmakaṃ liṃgaṃ jagatkāraṇamucyate  biṃdurdevīśivo nādaḥ śivaliṃgaṃ tu kathyate  
tasmājjanmanivṛttyarthaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ prapūjayet  mātā devī biṃdurūpā nādarūpaḥ śivaḥ pitā  
pūjitābhyāṃ pitṛbhyāṃ tu paramānaṃda eva hi  paramānaṃdalābhārthaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ prapūjayet  
sā devī jagatāṃ mātā sa śivo jagataḥ pitā  pitroḥ śuśrūṣake nityaṃ kṛpādhikyaṃ hi vardhate  
kṛpayāṃtargataiśvaryaṃ pūjakasya dadāti hi  tasmādaṃtargatānaṃdalābhārthaṃ munipuṃgavāḥ  
pitṛmātṛsvarūpeṇa śivaliṃgaṃ prapūjayet  bhargaḥ puruṣarūpo hi bhargā prakṛtirucyate  
avyaktāṃtaradhiṣṭhānaṃ garbhaḥ puruṣa ucyate  suvyaktāṃtaradhiṣṭhānaṃ garbhaḥ prakṛtirucyate  
puruṣatvādigarbho hi garbhavāñjanako yataḥ  puruṣātprakṛto yuktaṃ prathamaṃ janma kathyate  
prakṛtervyaktatāṃ yātaṃ dvitīyaṃ janma kathyate  janma jaṃturmṛtyujanma puruṣātpratipadyate  
anyato bhāvyate'vaśyaṃ māyayā janma kathyate  jīryate janmakālādyattasmājjīva iti smṛtaḥ  
janyate tanyate pāśairjīvaśabdārtha eva hi  janmapāśanivṛttyarthaṃ janmaliṃgaṃ prapūjayet  
bhaṃ vṛddhiṃ gacchatītyarthādbhagaḥ prakṛtirucyate  prākṛtaiḥ śabdamātrādyaiḥ prākṛteṃdriyabhojanāt  
bhagasyedaṃ bhogamiti śabdārtho mukhyataḥ śrutaḥ  mukhyo bhagastu prakṛtirbhagavāñchiva ucyate  
bhagavānbhogadātā hi nā'nyo bhogapradāyakaḥ  bhagasvāmī ca bhagavānbharga ityucyate budhaiḥ  
bhagena sahitaṃ liṃgaṃ bhagaṃliṃgena saṃyutam  ihāmutra ca bhogārthaṃ nityabhogārthameva ca  
bhagavaṃtaṃ mahādevaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ prapūjayet  lokaprasavitā sūryastaccihnaṃ prasavādbhavet  
liṃgeprasūtikartāraṃ liṃginaṃ puruṣo yajet  liṃgārthagamakaṃ cihnaṃ liṃgamityabhidhīyate  
liṃgamarthaṃ hi puruṣaṃ śivaṃ gamayatītyadaḥ  śivaśaktyośca cihnasya melanaṃ liṃgamucyate  
svacihnapūjanātprītaścihnakāryaṃ na vīyate  cihnakāryaṃ tu janmādijanmādyaṃ vinivartate  
prākṛtaiḥ puruṣaiścāpi bāhyābhyaṃtarasaṃbhavaiḥ  ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca śivaliṃgaṃ prapūjayet  
evamādityavāre hi pūjā janmanivartikā  ādivāre mahāliṃgaṃ praṇavenaiva pūjayet  
ādivāre paṃcagavyairabhiṣeko viśiṣyate  gomayaṃ gojalaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhyājyaṃ paṃcagavyakam  
kṣīrādyaṃ ca pṛthakccaiva madhunā cekṣusārakaiḥ  gavyakṣīrānnanaivedyaṃ praṇavenaiva kārayet  
praṇavaṃ dhvaniliṃgaṃ tu nādaliṃgaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ  biṃduliṃgaṃ tu yaṃtraṃ syānmakāraṃ tu pratiṣṭhitam  
ukāraṃ caraliṃgaṃ syādakāraṃ guruvigraham  ṣaḍliṃgaṃ pūjayā nityaṃ jīvanmukto na saṃśayaḥ  
śivasya bhaktyā pūjā hi janmamuktikarī nṛṇām  rudrā kṣadhāraṇātpādamardhaṃ vaibhūtidhāraṇāt  
tripādaṃ maṃtrajāpyācca pūjayā pūrṇabhaktimān  śivaliṃgaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca pūjya mokṣaṃ labhennaraḥ  
ya imaṃ paṭhate'dhyāyaṃ śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ  tasyaiva śivabhaktiśca vardhate sudṛḍhā dvijāḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ ṣoḍaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  praṇavasya ca māhātmyaṃ ṣaḍliṃgasya mahāmune  śivabhaktasya pūjāṃ ca kramaśo brūhi naḥprabho  
sūta uvāca  tapodhanairbhavadbhiśca samyakpraśnastvayaṃ kṛtaḥ  asyottaraṃ mahādevo jānāti sma na cāparaḥ  
athāpi vakṣye tamahaṃ śivasya kṛpayaiva hi  śivo'smākaṃ ca yuṣmākaṃ rakṣāṃ gṛhṇātu bhūriśaḥ  
pro hi prakṛtijātasya saṃsārasya mahodadheḥ  navaṃ nāvāṃtaramiti praṇavaṃ vai vidurbudhāḥ  
praḥ prapaṃco na nāstivo yuṣmākaṃ praṇavaṃ viduḥ  prakarṣeṇa nayedyasmānmokṣaṃ vaḥ praṇavaṃ viduḥ  
svajāpakānāṃ yogināṃ svamaṃtrapūjakasya ca  sarvakarmakṣayaṃ kṛtvā divyajñānaṃ tu nūtanam  
tameva māyārahitaṃ nūtanaṃ paricakṣate  prakarṣeṇa mahātmānaṃ navaṃ śuddhasvarūpakam  
nūtanaṃ vai karotīti praṇavaṃ taṃ vidurbudhāḥ  praṇavaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ sūkṣmasthūlavibhedataḥ  
sūkṣmamekākṣaraṃ vidyātsthūlaṃ paṃcākṣaraṃ viduḥ  sūkṣmamavyaktapaṃcārṇaṃ suvyaktārṇaṃ tathetarat  
jīvanmuktasya sūkṣmaṃ hi sarvasāraṃ hi tasya hi  maṃtreṇārthānusaṃdhānaṃ svadehavilayāvadhi  
svadehegalite pūrṇaṃ śivaṃ prāpnoti niścayaḥ  kevalaṃ maṃtrajāpī tu yogaṃ prāpnoti niścayaḥ  
ṣaṭtriṃśatkoṭijāpī tu niścayaṃ yogamāpnuyāt  sūkṣmaṃ ca dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ hrasvadīrghavibhedataḥ  
akāraśca ukāraśca makāraśca tataḥ param  biṃdunādayutaṃ taddhi śabdakālakalānvitam  
dīrghapraṇavamevaṃ hi yogināmeva hṛdgatam  makāraṃ taṃtritattvaṃ hi hrasvapraṇava ucyate  
śivaḥ śaktistayoraikyaṃ makāraṃ tu trikātmakam  hrasvamevaṃ hi jāpyaṃ syātsarvapāpakṣayaiṣiṇām  
bhūvāyukanakārṇodyoḥśabdādyāśca tathā daśa  āśānvayedaśapunaḥ pravṛttā iti kathyate  
hrasvameva pravṛttānāṃ nivṛttānāṃ tu dīrghakam  vyāhṛtyādau ca maṃtrādau kāmaṃ śabdakalāyutam  
vedādau ca prayojyaṃ syādvaṃdane saṃdhyayorapi  navakauṭijapāñjaptvā saṃśuddhaḥ puruṣo bhavet  
punaśca navakoṭyā tu pṛthivījayamāpnuyāt  punaśca navakoṭyā tu hyapāṃjayamavāpnuyāt  
punaśca navakoṭyā tu tejasāṃjayamāpnuyāt  punaśca navakoṭyā tu vāyorjayamavāpnuyāt  ākāśajayamāpnoti navakoṭijapena vai  
gaṃdhādīnāṃkrameṇaivanavakoṭijapeṇavai  ahaṃkārasya ca punarnava koṭijapena vai  
sahasramaṃtrajaptena nityaśuddho bhavetpumān  tataḥ paraṃ svasiddhyarthaṃ japo bhavati hi dvijāḥ  
evamaṣṭottaraśatakoṭijaptena vai punaḥ  praṇavena prabuddhastu śuddhayogamavāpnuyāt  
śuddhayogena saṃyukto jīvanmukto na saṃśayaḥ  sadā japansadādhyāyañchivaṃ praṇavarūpiṇam  
samādhistho mahāyogīśiva eva na saṃśayaḥ  ṛṣicchaṃdodevatādi nyasya dehepunarjapet  
praṇavaṃ mātṛkāyuktaṃ dehe nyasya ṛṣirbhavet  daśamātṛṣaḍadhvādi sarvaṃ nyāsaphalaṃ labhet  
pravṛttānāṃ ca miśrāṇāṃ sthūlapraṇavamiṣyate  kriyātapojapairyuktāstrividhāḥ śivayoginaḥ  
dhanādivibhavaiścaiva karādyaṃgairnamādibhiḥ  kriyayā pūjayā yuktaḥ kriyāyogīti kathyate  
pūjāyuktaśca mitabhugbāhyeṃdri yajayānvitaḥ  paradro hādirahitastapoyogīti kathyate  
etairyuktaḥ sadā kruddhaḥ sarvakāmādivarjitaḥ  sadā japaparaḥ śāṃtojapayogīti taṃ viduḥ  
upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ pūjayā śivayoginām  sālokyādikrameṇaiva śuddho muktiṃ labhennaraḥ  
japayogamatho vakṣye gadataḥ śṛṇuta dvijāḥ  tapaḥkarturjapaḥ prokto yajjapanparimārjate  
śivanāma namaḥpūrvaṃ caturthyāṃ paṃcatattvakam  sthūlapraṇavarūpaṃ hi śivapaṃcākṣaraṃ dvijāḥ  
paṃcākṣarajapenaiva sarvasiddhiṃ labhennaraḥ  praṇavenādisaṃyuktaṃ sadā paṃcākṣaraṃ japet  
gurūpadeśaṃ saṃgamya sukhavāse subhūtale  pūrvapakṣe samārabhya kṛṣṇabhūtāvadhi dvijāḥ  
māghaṃ bhādraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tu sarvakālottamottamam  ekavāraṃ mitāśītu vāgyato niyateṃdri yaḥ  
svasya rājapitṛṇāṃ ca śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca nityaśaḥ  sahasrajapamātreṇa bhavecchuddho'nyathā ṛṇī  
paṃcākṣaraṃ paṃcalakṣaṃ japecchivamanusmaran  padmāsanasthaṃ śivadaṃ gaṃgācaṃdra kalānvitam  
vāmorusthitaśaktyā ca virājaṃ taṃ mahāgaṇaiḥ  mṛgaṭaṃkadharaṃ devaṃ varadābhayapāṇikam  
sadānugrahakarttāraṃ sadā śivamanusmaran  saṃpūjya manasā pūrvaṃ hṛdivāsūryamaṃḍale  
japetpaṃcākṣarīṃ vidyāṃ prāṇmukhaḥ śuddhakarmakṛt  prātaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ nityakarmasamāpya ca  
manorame śucau deśe niyataḥ śuddhamānasaḥ  paṃcākṣarasya maṃtrasya sahasraṃ dvādaśaṃ japet  
varayecca sapatnīkāñchaivānvai brāhmaṇottamān  ekaṃ guruvaraṃ śiṣṭaṃ varayetsāṃbamūrtikam  
īśānaṃ cātha puruṣamaghoraṃ vāmameva ca  sadyojātaṃ ca paṃcaiva śivabhaktāndvijottamān  
pūjādra vyāṇi saṃpādya śivapūjāṃ samārabhet  śivapūjāṃ ca vidhivatkṛtvā homaṃ samārabhet  
mukhāṃtaṃ ca svasūtreṇa kṛtvā homaṃ samārabhet  daśaikaṃ vā śataikaṃ vā sahasraikamathāpi vā  
kāpilena ghṛtenaiva juhuyātsvayameva hi  kārayecchivabhaktairvāpyaṣṭottaraśataṃ budhaḥ  
homānte dakṣiṇā deyā gurorgomithunaṃ tathā  īśānādisvarūpāṃstānguruṃ sāṃbaṃ vibhāvya ca  
teṣāṃ patsiktatoyena svaśiraḥ snānamācaret  ṣaṭtriṃśatkoṭitīrtheṣu sadyaḥ snānaphalaṃ labhet  
daśāṃgamannaṃ teṣāṃ vai dadyādvaibhaktipūrvakam  parābuddhyā guroḥ patnīmīśānādikrameṇa tu  
paramānnena saṃpūjya yathāvibhavavistaram  rudrā kṣavastrapūrvaṃ ca vaṭakāpūpakairyutam  
balidānaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā bhūribhojanamācaret  tataḥ saṃprārthya deveśaṃ japaṃ tāvatsamāpayet  
puraścaraṇamevaṃ tu kṛtvā mantrībhavennaraḥ  punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet  
atalādi samārabhya satyalokāvadhikramāt  paṃcalakṣajapāttattallokaiśvaryamavāpnuyāt  
madhye mṛtaścedbhogāṃte bhūmau tajjāpako bhavet  punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa brahmasāmīpyamāpnuyāt  
punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa sārūpyaiśvaryamāpnuyāt  āhatya śatalakṣeṇa sākṣādbrahmasamo bhavet  
kāryabrahmaṇa evaṃ hi sāyujyaṃ pratipadya vai  yatheṣṭaṃ bhogamāpnoti tadbrahmapralayāvadhi  
punaḥ kalpāṃtare vṛtte brahmaputraḥ sajāyate  punaśca tapasā dīptaḥ kramānmukto bhaviṣyati  
pṛthvyādikāryabhūtebhyo lokā vai nirmitāḥ kramāt  pātālādi ca satyāṃtaṃ brahmalokāścaturdaśa  
satyādūrdhvaṃ kṣamāṃtaṃ vaiviṣṇulokāścaturdaśa  kṣamaloke kāryaviṣṇurvaikuṃṭhe varapattane
