kāryalakṣmyā mahābhogirakṣāṃ kṛtvā'dhitiṣṭhati  tadūrdhvagāśca śucyaṃtāṃ lokāṣṭāviṃśatiḥ sthitāḥ  
śucau loke tu kailāse rudro vai bhūtahṛtsthitaḥ  ṣaḍuttarāśca paṃcāśadahiṃsāṃtāstadūrdhvagāḥ  
ahiṃsālokamāsthāya jñānakailāsake pure  kāryeśvarastirobhāvaṃ sarvānkṛtvādhitiṣṭhati  
tadaṃte kālacakraṃ hi kālātītastataḥ param  śivenādhiṣṭhitastatra kālaścakreśvarāhvayaḥ  
māhiṣaṃ dharmamāsthāya sarvānkālena yuṃjati  asatyaścāśuciścaiva hiṃsā caivātha nirghṛṇā  
asatyādicatuṣpādaḥ sarvāṃśaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk  nāstikyalakṣmīrduḥsaṃgo vedabāhyadhvaniḥ sadā  
krodhasaṃgaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇo mahāmahiṣaveṣavān  tāvanmaheśvaraḥ proktastirodhāstāvadeva hi  
tadarvākkarmabhogo hi tadūrdhvaṃ jñānabhogakam  tadarvākkarmamāyā hi jñānamāyā tadūrdhvakam  
mā lakṣmīḥ karmabhogo vai yāti māyeti kathyate  mā lakṣmīrjñānabhogo vai yāti māyeti kathyate  
tadūrdhvaṃ nityabhogo hi tadarvāṇnaśvaraṃ viduḥ  tadarvākca tirodhānaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ na tirodhanam  
tadarvākpāśabaṃdho hi tadūrdhvaṃ na hi baṃdhanam  tadarvākparivartaṃte kāmyakarmānusāriṇaḥ  
niṣkāmakarmabhogastu tadūrdhvaṃ parikīrtitaḥ  tadarvākparivartaṃte biṃdupūjāparāyaṇāḥ  
tadūrdhvaṃ hi vrajaṃtyeva niṣkāmā liṃgapūjakāḥ  tadarvākparivartaṃte śivānyasurapūjakāḥ  
śivaikaniratā ye ca tadūrdhvaṃ saṃprayāṃti te  tadarvāgjīvakoṭiḥ syāttadūrdhvaṃ parakoṭikāḥ  
sāṃsārikāstadarvākca muktāḥ khalu tadūrdhvagāḥ  tadarvākparivartaṃte prākṛtadra vyapūjakāḥ  
tadūrdhvaṃ hi vrajaṃtyete pauruṣadra vyapūjakāḥ  tadarvākchaktiliṃgaṃ tu śivaliṃgaṃ tadūrdhvakam  
tadarvāgāvṛtaṃ liṃgaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ hi nirāvṛti  tadarvākkalpitaṃ liṃgaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ vai na kalpitam  
tadarvāgbāhyaliṃgaṃ syādaṃtaraṃgaṃ tadūrdhvakam  tadarvākchaktilokā hi śataṃ vai dvādaśādhikam  
tadarvāgbiṃdurūpaṃ hi nādarūpaṃ taduttaram  tadarvākkarmalokastu tadūrdhvaṃ jñānalokakaḥ  
namaskārastadūrdhvaṃ hi madāhaṃkāranāśanaḥ  janijaṃ vai tirodhānaṃ nāniṣiddhyātate iti  
jñānaśabdārtha evaṃ hi tirodhānanivāraṇāt  tadarvākparivartaṃte hyādhibhautikapūjakāḥ  
ādhyātmikārcakā eva tadūrdhvaṃ saṃprayāṃtivai  tāvadvai vedibhāgaṃ tanmahālokātmaliṃgake  
prakṛtyādyaṣṭabaṃdhopi vedyaṃte saṃpratiṣṭhataḥ  evametādṛśaṃ jñeyaṃ sarvaṃ laukikavaidikam  
adharmamahiṣārūḍhaṃ kālacakraṃ taraṃti te  satyādidharmayuktā ye śivapūjāparāśca ye  
tadūrdhvaṃ vṛṣabho dharmo brahmacaryasvarūpadhṛk  satyādipādayuktastu śivalokāgrataḥ sthitaḥ  
kṣamāśṛṅgaḥ śamaśrotro vedadhvanivibhūṣitaḥ  āstikyacakṣurniśvāsagurubuddhimanā vṛṣaḥ  
kriyādivṛṣabhā jñeyāḥ kāraṇādiṣu sarvadā  taṃ kriyāvṛṣabhaṃ dharmaṃ kālātītodhitiṣṭhati  
brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ svasvāyurdinamucyate  tadūrdhvaṃ na dinaṃ rātrirna janmamaraṇādikam  
punaḥ kāraṇasatyāṃtāḥ kāraṇabrahmaṇastathā  gaṃdhādibhyastu bhūtebhyastadūrdhvaṃ nirmitāḥ sadā  
sūkṣmagaṃdhasvarūpā hi sthitā lokāścaturdaśa  punaḥ kāraṇaviṣṇorvai sthitā lokāścaturdaśa  
punaḥkāraṇarudra sya lokāṣṭāviṃśakā matāḥ  punaśca kāraṇeśasya ṣaṭpaṃcāśattadūrdhvagāḥ  
tataḥ paraṃ brahmacaryalokākhyaṃ śivasaṃmatam  tatraiva jñānakailāse paṃcāvaraṇasaṃyute  
paṃcamaṃḍalasaṃyuktaṃ paṃcabrahmakalānvitam  ādiśaktisamāyuktamādiliṃgaṃ tu tatra vai  
śivālayamidaṃ proktaṃ śivasya paramātmanaḥ  paraśaktyāsamāyuktastatraiva parameśvaraḥ  
sṛṣṭiḥ sthitiśca saṃhārastirobhāvopyanugrahaḥ  paṃcakṛtyapravīṇo'sau saccidānaṃdavigrahaḥ  
dhyānadharmaḥ sadā yasya sadānugrahatatparaḥ  samādhyāsanamāsīnaḥ svātmārāmo virājate  
tasya saṃdarśanaṃ sāṃdhyaṃ karmadhyānādibhiḥ kramāt  nityādikarmayajanācchivakarmamatirbhavet  
kriyādiśivakarmabhyaḥ śivajñānaṃ prasādhayet  taddarśanagatāḥ sarve muktā eva na saṃśayaḥ  
muktirātmasvarūpeṇa svātmārāmatvameva hi  kriyātapojapajñānadhyānadharmeṣu susthitaḥ  
śivasya darśanaṃ labdhā svātmārāmatvameva hi  yathā raviḥ svakiraṇādaśuddhimapaneṣyati  
kṛpāvicakṣaṇaḥ śaṃbhurajñānamapaneṣyati  ajñānavinivṛttau tu śivajñānaṃ pravartate  
śivajñānātsvasvarūpamātmārāmatvameṣyati  ātmārāmatvasaṃsiddhau kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ  
punaśca śatalakṣeṇa brahmaṇaḥ padamāpnuyāt  punaśca śatalakṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ padamavāpnuyāt  
punaśca śatalakṣeṇa rudra sya padamāpnuyāt  punaśca śatalakṣeṇa aiśvaryaṃ padamāpnuyāt  
punaścaivaṃvidhenaiva japena susamāhitaḥ  śivalokādibhūtaṃ hi kālacakramavāpnuyāt  
kālacakraṃ paṃcacakramekaikena kramottare  sṛṣṭimohau brahmacakraṃ bhogamohau tu vaiṣṇavam  
kopamohau raudra cakraṃ bhramaṇaṃ caiśvaraṃ viduḥ  śivacakraṃ jñānamohau paṃcacakraṃ vidurbudhāḥ  
punaśca daśakoṭyā hi kāraṇabrahmaṇaḥ padam  punaśca daśakoṭyā hi tatpadaiśvaryamāpnuyāt  
evaṃ krameṇa viṣṇvādeḥ padaṃ labdhvā mahaujasaḥ  krameṇa tatpadaiśvaryaṃ labdhvā caiva mahātmanaḥ  
śatakoṭimanuṃ japtvā paṃcottaramataṃdri taḥ  śivalokamavāpnoti paṃcamāvaraṇādbahiḥ  
rājasaṃ maṃḍapaṃ tatra naṃdīsaṃsthānamuttamam  taporūpaśca vṛṣabhastatraiva paridṛśyate  
sadyojātasya tatsthānaṃ paṃcamāvaraṇaṃ param  vāmadevasya ca sthānaṃ caturthāvaraṇaṃ punaḥ  
aghoranilayaṃ paścāttṛtīyāvaraṇaṃ param  puruṣasyaiva sāṃbasya dvitīyāvaraṇaṃ śubham  
īśānasya parasyaiva prathamāvaraṇaṃ tataḥ  dhyānadharmasya ca sthānaṃ paṃcamaṃ maṃḍapaṃ tataḥ  
balināthasya saṃsthānaṃ tatra pūrṇāmṛtapradam  caturthaṃ maṃḍapaṃ paścāccaṃdra śekharamūrtimat  
somaskaṃdasya ca sthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ maṃḍapaṃ param  dvitīyaṃ maṃḍapaṃ nṛtyamaṃḍapaṃ prāhurāstikāḥ  
prathamaṃ mūlamāyāyāḥ sthānaṃ tatraiva śobhanam  tataḥ paraṃ garbhagṛhaṃ liṃgasthānaṃ paraṃ śubham  
naṃdisaṃsthānataḥ paścānna viduḥ śivavaibhavam  naṃdīśvaro bahistiṣṭhanpaṃcākṣaramupāsate  
evaṃ gurukramāllabdhaṃ naṃdīśācca mayā punaḥ  tataḥ paraṃ svasaṃvedyaṃ śive naivānubhāvitam  
śivasya kṛpayā sākṣācchiva lokasya vaibhavam  vijñātuṃ śakyate sarvairnānyathetyāhurāstikāḥ  
evaṃkrameṇamuktāḥ syurbrāhmaṇā vai jiteṃdri yaḥ  anyeṣāṃ ca kramaṃ vakṣye gadataḥ śṛṇutādarāt  
gurūpadeśājjāpyaṃ vai brāhmaṇānāṃ namo'takam  paṃcākṣaraṃ paṃcalakṣamāyuṣyaṃ prajapedvidhiḥ  
strītvāpanayanārthaṃ tu paṃcalakṣaṃ japetpunaḥ  maṃtreṇa puruṣo bhūtvā kramānmukto bhavedbudhaḥ  
kṣatriyaḥ paṃcalakṣeṇa kṣattratvamapaneṣyati  punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa kṣattriyo brāhmaṇo bhavet  
maṃtrasiddhirjapāccaiva kramānmukto bhavainnaraḥ  vaiśyastu paṃcalakṣeṇa vaiśyatvamapaneṣyati  
punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa maṃtrakṣattriya ucyate  punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa kṣattratvamapaneṣyati  
punaśca paṃcalakṣeṇa maṃtrabrāhmaṇa ucyate  śūdra ścaiva namaoṃtena paṃcaviṃśatilakṣataḥ  
maṃtravipratvamāpadya paścācchuddho bhaveddvijaḥ  nārīvātha naro vātha brāhmaṇo vānya eva vā  
namontaṃ vā namaḥpūrvamāturaḥ sarvadā japet  tataḥ strīṇāṃ tathaivohyagururnirdarśayetkramāt  
sādhakaḥ paṃcalakṣānte śivaprītyarthameva hi  mahābhiṣeka naivedyaṃ kṛtvā bhaktāṃśca pūjayet  
pūjayā śivabhaktasya śivaḥ prītataro bhavet  śivasya śivabhaktasya bhedo nāsti śivo hi saḥ  
śivasvarūpamaṃtrasya dhāraṇācchiva eva hi  śivabhaktaśarīre hi śive tatparamo bhavet  
śivabhaktāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā vedasarvakriyāṃ viduḥ  yāvadyāvacchivaṃ maṃtraṃ yena japtaṃ bhavetkramāt  
tāvadvai śivasānnidhyaṃ tasmindehe na saṃśayaḥ  devīliṃgaṃ bhavedrū paṃ śivabhaktastriyāstathā  
yāvanmaṃtraṃ japeddevyāstāvatsānnidhyamasti hi  śivaṃ saṃpūjayeddhīmānsvayaṃ vai śabdarūpabhāk  
svayaṃ caiva śivo bhūtvā parāṃ śaktiṃ prapūjayet  śaktiṃ beraṃ ca liṃgaṃ ca hyālekhyā māyayā yajet  
śivaliṃgaṃ śivaṃ matvā svātmānaṃ śaktirūpakam  śaktiliṃgaṃ ca devīṃ ca matvā svaṃ śivarūpakam  
śivaliṃgaṃ nādarūpaṃ biṃdurūpaṃ tu śaktikam  upapradhānabhāvena anyonyāsaktaliṃgakam  
pūjayecca śivaṃ śaktiṃ sa śivo mūlabhāvanāt  śivabhaktāñchivamaṃtrarūpakāñchivarūpakān  
ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca pūjayediṣṭamāpnuyāt  yena śuśrūṣaṇādyaiśca śivabhaktasya liṃginaḥ  
ānaṃdaṃ janayedvidvāñchivaḥ prītataro bhavet  śivabhaktānsapatnīkānpatnyā saha sadaiva tat  
pūjayedbhojanādyaiśca paṃca vā daśa vā śatam  dhane dehe ca maṃtre ca bhāvanāyāmavaṃcakaḥ  
śivaśaktisvarūpeṇa na punarjāyate bhuvi  nābheradho brahmabhāgamākaṃṭhaṃ viṣṇubhāgakam  
mukhaṃ liṃgamiti proktaṃ śivabhaktaśarīrakam  mṛtāndāhādiyuktānvā dāhādirahitānmṛtān  
uddiśya pūjayedādipitaraṃ śivameva hi  pūjāṃ kṛtvādimātuśca śivabhaktāṃśca pūjayet  
pitṛlokaṃ samāsādyakramānmukto bhavenmṛtaḥ  kriyāyuktadaśabhyaśca tapoyukto viśiṣyate  
tapoyuktaśatebhyaśca japayukto viśiṣyate  japayuktasahasrebhyaḥ śivajñānī viśiṣyate  
śivajñāniṣu lakṣeṣu dhyānayukto viśiṣyate  dhyānayukteṣu koṭibhyaḥ samādhistho viśiṣyate  
uttarottara vai śiṣṭyātpūjāyāmuttarottaram  phalaṃ vaiśiṣṭyarūpaṃ ca durvijñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ  
tasmādvai śivabhaktasya māhātmyaṃ vetti ko naraḥ  śivaśaktyoḥ pūjanaṃ ca śivabhaktasya pūjanam  
kurute yo naro bhaktyā sa śivaḥ śivamedhate  ya imaṃ paṭhate'dhyāyamarthavadvedasaṃmatam  
śivajñānī bhavedvipraḥ śivena saha modate  śrāvayecchivabhaktāṃśca viśeṣajño manīśvarāḥ  
śivaprasādaśiddhiḥ syācchivasya kṛpayā budhāḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ saptadaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ  baṃdhamokṣasvarūpaṃ hi brūhi sarvārthavittama  sūta uvāca  baṃdhamokṣaṃ tathopāyaṃ vakṣye'haṃ śṛṇutādarāt  
prakṛtyādyaṣṭabaṃdhena baddho jīvaḥ sa ucyate  prakṛtyādyaṣṭabaṃdhena nirmukto mukta ucyate  
prakṛtyādivaśīkāro mokṣa ityucyate svataḥ  baddhajīvastu nirmukto muktajīvaḥ sa kathyate  
prakṛtyagre tato buddhirahaṃkāro guṇātmakaḥ  paṃcatanmātramityete prakṛtyādyaṣṭakaṃ viduḥ  
prakṛṭyādyaṣṭajo deho dehajaṃ karma ucyate  punaśca karmajo deho janmakarma punaḥ punaḥ  
śarīraṃ trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca kāraṇam  sthūlaṃ vyāpāradaṃ proktaṃ sūkṣmamiṃdri yabhogadam  
kāraṇaṃ tvātmabhogārthaṃ jīvakarmānurūpataḥ  sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ puṇyapāpaiḥ karmabhiḥ phalamaśnute  
tasmāddhi karmarajjvā hi baddho jīvaḥ punaḥ punaḥ  śarīratrayakarmabhyāṃ cakravadbhrāmyate sadā  
cakrabhramanivṛtyarthaṃ cakrakartāramīḍayet  prakṛtyādi mahācakraṃ prakṛteḥ parataḥ śivaḥ  
cakrakartā maheśo hi prakṛteḥ paratoyataḥ  pibati vātha vamati jīvanbālo jalaṃ yathā  
śivastathā prakṛtyādi vaśīkṛtyādhitiṣṭhati  sarvaṃ vaśīkṛtaṃ yasmāttasmācchiva iti smṛtaḥ  śiva eva hi sarvajñaḥ paripūrṇaśca niḥspṛhaḥ  
sarvajñatā tṛptiranādibodhaḥ svataṃtratā nityamaluptaśaktiḥ  anaṃtaśaktiśca maheśvarasya yanmānasaiśvaryamavaiti vedaḥ  
ataḥ śivaprasādena prakṛtyādivaśaṃ bhavet  śivaprasādalābhārthaṃ śivameva prapūjayet  
niḥspṛhasya ca pūrṇasya tasya pūjā kathaṃ bhavet  śivoddeśakṛtaṃ karma prasādajanakaṃ bhavet  
liṃge bere bhaktajane śivamuddiśya pūjayet  kāyena manasā vācā dhanenāpi prapūjayet  
pujayā tu maheśo hi prakṛteḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ  prasādaṃ kurute satyaṃ pūjakasya viśeṣataḥ  
śivaprasādātkarmādyaṃ krameṇa svavaśaṃ bhavet  karmārabhya prakṛtyaṃtaṃ yadāsarvaṃ vaśaṃ bhavet  
tadāmukta iti proktaḥ svātmārāmo virājate  prasādātparameśasya karma deho yadāvaśaḥ  
tadā vai śivaloke tu vāsaḥ sālokyamucyate  sāmīpyaṃ yāti sāṃbasya tanmātre ca vaśaṃ gate  
tadā tu śivasāyujyamāyudhādyaiḥ kriyādibhiḥ  mahāprasādalābhe ca buddhiścāpi vaśā bhavet  
buddhistu kāryaṃ prakṛtestatsṛṣṭiriti kathyate  punarmahāprasādena prakṛtirvaśameṣyati  
śivasya mānasaiśvaryaṃ tadā'yatnaṃ bhaviṣyati  sārvajñādyaṃ śivaiśvaryaṃ labdhvā svātmani rājate  
tatsāyujyamiti prāhurvedāgamaparāyaṇāḥ  evaṃ krameṇa muktiḥ syālliṃgādau pūjayā svataḥ  
ataḥ śivaprasādārthaṃ kriyādyaiḥ pūjayecchivam  śivakriyā śivatapaḥ śivamaṃtrajapaḥ sadā  
śivajñānaṃ śivadhyānamuttarottaramabhyaset  āsupterāmṛteḥ kālaṃ nayedvai śivaciṃtayā  
sadyādibhiśca kusumairarcayecchivameṣyati  ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  liṃgādau śivapūjāyā vidhānaṃ brūhi sarvataḥ  
sūta uvāca  liṃgānāṃ ca kramaṃ vakṣye yathāvacchṛṇuta dvijāḥ  tadeva liṃgaṃ prathamaṃ praṇavaṃ sārvakāmikam  
sūkṣmapraṇavarūpaṃ hi sūkṣmarūpaṃ tu niṣphalam  sthūlaliṃgaṃ hi sakalaṃ tatpaṃcākṣaramucyate  
tayoḥ pūjā tapaḥ proktaṃ sākṣānmokṣaprade ubhe  pauruṣaprakṛtibhūtāni liṃgānisubahūni ca  
tāni vistarato vaktuṃ śivo vetti na cāparaḥ  bhūvikārāṇi liṃgāni jñātāni prabravīmi vaḥ  
svayaṃ bhūliṃgaṃ prathamaṃ biṃduliṃgaṃdvitīyakam  pratiṣṭhitaṃ caraṃcaiva guruliṃgaṃ tu paṃcamam  
devarṣitapasā tuṣṭaḥ sānnidhyārthaṃ tu tatra vai  pṛthivyantargataḥ śarvo bījaṃ vai nādarūpataḥ  
sthāvarāṃkuravadbhūmimudbhidya vyakta eva saḥ  svayaṃbhūtaṃ jātamiti svayaṃbhūriti taṃ viduḥ  
talliṃgapūjayā jñānaṃ svayameva pravarddhate  suvarṇarajatādau vā pṛthivyāṃ sthiṃḍilepi vā  
svahastāllikhitaṃ liṃgaṃ śuddhapraṇavamaṃtrakam  yaṃtraliṃgaṃ samālikhya pratiṣṭhāvāhanaṃ caret  
biṃdunādamayaṃ liṃgaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ ca yat  bhāvanāmayametaddhi śivadṛṣṭaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
yatra viśvasya te śaṃbhustatra tasmai phalapradaḥ  svahastāllikhyate yaṃtre sthāvarādāvakṛtrime  
āvāhya pūjayecchaṃbhuṃ ṣoḍaśairupacārakaiḥ  svayamaiśvaryamāpnoti jñānamabhyāsato bhavet  
devaiśca ṛṣibhiścāpi svātmasiddhyarthameva hi  samaṃtreṇātmahastena kṛtaṃ yacchuddhamaṃḍale  
śuddhabhāvanayā caiva sthāpitaṃ liṃgamuttamam  talliṃgaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhustatpratiṣṭhitamucyate  
talliṃgapūjayā nityaṃ pauruṣaiśvaryamāpnuyāt  mahadbhirbrāhmaṇaiścāpi rājabhiśca mahādhanaiḥ  
śilpinākalpitaṃ liṃgaṃ maṃtreṇa sthāpitaṃ ca yat  pratiṣṭhitaṃ prākṛtaṃ hi prākṛtaiśvaryabhogadam  
yadūrjitaṃ ca nityaṃ ca taddhi pauruṣamucyate  yaddurbalamanityaṃ ca taddhi prākṛtamucyate  
liṃgaṃ nābhistathā jihvā nāsāgrañca śikhā kramāt  kaṭyādiṣu trilokeṣu liṃgamādhyātmikaṃ caram  
parvataṃ pauruṣaṃ proktaṃ bhūtalaṃ prākṛtaṃ viduḥ  vṛkṣādi pauruṣaṃ jñeyaṃ gulmādi prākṛtaṃ viduḥ  
ṣāṣṭikaṃ prākṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ śāligodhūmapauruṣam  aiśvaryaṃ pauruṣaṃ vidyādaṇimādyaṣṭasiddhidam  
sustrīdhanādiviṣayaṃ prākṛtaṃ prāhurāstikāḥ  prathamaṃ caraliṃgeṣu rasaliṃgaṃ prakathyate  
rasaliṃgaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sarvābhīṣṭapradaṃ bhavet  bāṇaliṃgaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahārājyapradaṃ śubham  
svarṇaliṃgaṃ tu vaiśyānāṃ mahādhanapatitvadam  śilāliṃgaṃ tu śūdrā ṇāṃ mahāśuddhikaraṃ śubham  
sphāṭikaṃ bāṇaliṃgaṃ ca sarveṣāṃsarvakāmadam  svīyābhāve'nyadīyaṃ tu pūjāyāṃ na niṣiddhyate  
strīṇāṃ tu pārthivaṃ liṃgaṃ sabhartṛṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ  vidhavānāṃ pravṛttānāṃ sphāṭikaṃ parikīrtitam  
vidhavānāṃ nivṛttānāṃ rasaliṃgaṃ viśiṣyate  bālyevāyauvanevāpi vārddhakevāpi suvratāḥ  
śuddhasphaṭikaliṃgaṃ tu strīṇāṃ tatsarvabhogadam  pravṛttānāṃ pīṭhapūjā sarvābhīṣṭapradā bhuvi  
pātreṇaiva pravṛttastu sarvapūjāṃ samācaret  abhiṣekāṃte naivedyaṃ śālyannena samācaret  
pūjāṃte sthāpayelliṃgaṃ saṃpuṭeṣu pṛthaggṛhe  karapūjāni vṛttānāṃ svabhojyaṃ tu nivedayet  
nivṛttānāṃ paraṃ sūkṣmaliṃgameva viśiṣyate  vibhūtyabhyarcanaṃ kuryādvibhūtiṃ ca nivedayet  
pūjāṃ kṛtvātha talliṃgaṃ śirasā dhārayetsadā  vibhūtistrividhā proktā lokavedaśivāgnibhiḥ  
lokāgnijamatho bhasmadra vyaśuddhyarthamāvahet  mṛddāruloharūpāṇāṃ dhānyānāṃ ca tathaiva ca  
tilādīnāṃ ca dra vyāṇāṃ vastrādīnāṃ tathaiva ca  tathā paryuṣitānāṃ ca bhasmanā śiddhiriṣyate  
śvādibhirdūṣitānāṃ ca bhasmanā śuddhiriṣyate  sajalaṃ nirjalaṃ bhasma yathāyogyaṃ tu yojayet  
vedāgnijaṃ tathā bhasma tatkarmāṃteṣu dhārayet  maṃtreṇa kriyayā janyaṃ karmāgnau bhasmarūpadhṛk  
tadbhasmadhāraṇātkarma svātmanyāropitaṃ bhavet  aghoreṇātmamaṃtreṇa bilvakāṣṭhaṃ pradāhayet  
śivāgniriti saṃproktastena dagdhaṃ śivāgnijam  kapilāgomayaṃ pūrvaṃ kevalaṃ gavyameva vā  
śamyasvatthapalāśānvā vaṭāramvadhabilvakān  śivāgninā dahecchuddhaṃ tadvai bhasma śivāgnijam  
darbhāgnau vā dahetkāṣṭhaṃ śivamaṃtraṃ samuccaran  samyaksaṃśodhya vastreṇa navakuṃbhe nidhāpayet  
dīptyarthaṃ tattu saṃgrāhyaṃ manyate pūjyatepi ca  bhasmaśabdārtha evaṃ hi śivaḥ pūrvaṃ tathā'karot  
yathā svaviṣaye rājā sāraṃ gṛhṇāti yatkaram  yathā manuṣyāḥ sasyādīndagdhvā sāraṃ bhajaṃti vai  
yathā hi jāṭharāgniśca bhakṣyādīnvividhānbahūn  dagdhvā sārataraṃ sārātsvadehaṃ paripuṣyati  
tathā prapaṃcakartāpi sa śivaḥ parameśvaraḥ  svādhiṣṭheyaprapaṃcasya dagdhvā sāraṃ gṛhītavān  
dagdhvā prapaṃcaṃ tadbhasm asvātmanyāropayacchivaḥ  uddhūlanena vyājena jagatsāraṃ gṛhītavān  
svaratnaṃ sthāpayāmāsa svakīye hi śarīrake  keśamākāśasāreṇa vāyusāreṇa vai mukham  
hṛdayaṃ cāgnisāreṇa tvapāṃ sāreṇa vaikaṭim  jānu cāvanisāreṇa tadvatsarvaṃ tadaṃgakam  
brahmaviṣṇvośca rudrā ṇāṃ sāraṃ caiva tripuṃḍrakam  tathā tilakarūpeṇa lalāṭānte maheśvaraḥ  
bhavṛddhyā sarvametaddhi manyate svayamaityasau  prapaṃcasārasarvasvamanenaiva vaśīkṛtam  
tasmādasya vaśīkartā nāstīti sa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ  yathā sarvamṛgāṇāṃ ca hiṃsako mṛgahiṃsakaḥ  
asya hiṃsāmṛgo nāsti tasmātsiṃha itīritaḥ  śaṃ nityaṃ sukhamānaṃdamikāraḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ  
vakāraḥ śaktiramṛtaṃ melanaṃ śiva ucyate  tasmādevaṃ svamātmānaṃ śivaṃ kṛtvārcayecchivam  
tasmāduddhūlanaṃ pūrvaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ dhārayetparam  pūjākāle hi sajalaṃ śuddhyarthaṃ nirjalaṃ bhavet  
divā vā yadi vārātrau nārī vātha naropi vā  pūjārthaṃ sajalaṃ bhasma tripuṃḍreṇaiva dhārayet  
tripuṃḍraṃ sajalaṃ bhasma dhṛtvā pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ  śivapūjāṃ phalaṃ sāṃgaṃ tasyaiva hi suniścitam  
bhasma vai śivamaṃtreṇa dhṛtvā hyatyāśramī bhavet  śivāśramīti saṃproktaḥ śivaikaparamo yataḥ  
śivavrataikaniṣṭhasya nāśaucaṃ na ca sūtakam  lalāṭe'gre sitaṃ bhasma tilakaṃ dhārayenmṛdā  
svahastādguruhastādvāśivabhaktasya lakṣaṇam  guṇānruṃdha iti prokto guruśabdasya vigrahaḥ  
savikārānrājasādīnguṇānruṃdhe vyapohati  guṇātītaḥ paraśivo gururūpaṃ samāśritaḥ  
guṇatrayaṃ vyapohyāgre śivaṃ bodhayatīti saḥ  viśvastānāṃ tu śiṣyāṇāṃ gururityabhidhīyate  
tasmādguruśarīraṃ tu guruliṃgaṃ bhavedbudhaḥ  guruliṃgasya pūjā tu guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ bhavet  
śrutaṃ karoti śuśrūṣā kāyena manasā girā  uktaṃ yadguruṇā pūrvaṃ śakyaṃ vā'śakyameva vā  
karotyeva hi pūtātmā prāṇairapi dhanairapi  tasmādvai śāsane yogyaḥ śiṣya ityabhidhīyate  
śarīrādyarthakaṃ sarvaṃ gurordattvā suśiṣyakaḥ  agrapākaṃ nivedyāgrebhuṃjīyādgurvanujñayā  
śiṣyaḥ putra iti proktaḥ sadāśiṣyatvayogataḥ  jihvāliṃgānmaṃtraśukraṃ karṇayonau niṣicyavai  
jātaḥ putro maṃtraputraḥ pitaraṃ pūjayedgurum  nimajjayati putraṃ vai saṃsāre janakaḥ pitā  
saṃtārayati saṃsārādgururvai bodhakaḥ pitā  ubhayoraṃtaraṃ jñātvā pitaraṃ gurumarcayet  
aṃgaśuśrūṣayā cāpi dhanādyaiḥ svārjitairgurum  pādādikeśaparyaṃtaṃ liṃgānyaṃgāni yadguroḥ  
dhanarūpaiḥ pādukādyaiḥ pādasaṃgraṇādibhiḥ  snānābhiṣekanaivedyairbhojanaiśca prapūjayet  
gurupūjaiva pūjā syācchivasya paramātmanaḥ  guruśeṣaṃ tu yatsarvamātmaśuddhikaraṃ bhavet  
guroḥ śeṣaḥ śivocchiṣṭaṃ jalamannādinirmitam  śiṣyāṇāṃ śivabhaktānāṃ grāhyaṃ bhojyaṃ bhaveddvijāḥ  
gurvanujñāvirahitaṃ coravatsakalaṃ bhavet  gurorapi viśeṣajñaṃ yatnādgṛhṇīta vai gurum  
ajñānamocanaṃ sādhyaṃ viśeṣajño hi mocakaḥ  ādau ca vighnaśamanaṃ kartavyaṃ karma pūrtaye  
nirvighnena kṛtaṃ sāṃgaṃ karma vai saphalaṃ bhavet  tasmātsakalakarmādau vighneśaṃ pūjayed budhaḥ  
sarvabādhānivṛttyarthaṃ sarvāndevānyajedbudhaḥ  jvarādigraṃthirogāśca bādhā hyādhyātmikā matā  
piśācajaṃbukādīnāṃ valmīkādyudbhave tathā  akasmādeva godhādijaṃtūnāṃ patanepi ca  
gṛhe kacchapasarpastrīdurjanādarśanepi ca  vṛkṣanārīgavādīnāṃ prasūtiviṣayepi ca  
bhāviduḥkhaṃ samāyāti tasmātte bhautikā matā  amedhyā śanipātaśca mahāmārī tathaiva ca  
jvaramārī viṣūciśca gomārī ca masūrikā  janmarkṣagrahasaṃkrāṃtigrahayogāḥ svarāśike  
duḥsvapnadarśanādyāśca matā vai hyadhidaivikāḥ  śavacāṃḍālapatitasparśādyeṃtargṛhe gate  
etādṛśe samutpanne bhāviduḥkhasya sūcake  śāṃtiyajñaṃ tu matimānkuryāttaddoṣaśāṃtaye  
devālaye'tha goṣṭhe vā caitye vāpi gṛhāṃgaṇe  prādeśonnatadhiṣṇye vai dvihaste ca svalaṃkṛte  
bhāramātravrīhidhānyaṃ prasthāpya parisṛtya ca  madhye vilikhyakamalaṃ tathā dikṣuvilikhya vai  
taṃtunā veṣṭitaṃ kuṃbhaṃ navagugguladhūpitam  madhye sthāpya mahākuṃbhaṃ tathā dikṣvapi vinyaset  
sanālāmrakakūrcādīnkalaśāṃśca tathāṣṭasu  pūrayenmaṃtrapūtena paṃcadra vyayutena hi  
prakṣipennava ratnāni nīlādīnkramaśastathā  karmajñaṃ ca sapatnīkamācāryaṃ varayedbudhaḥ  
suvarṇapratimāṃ viṣṇoriṃdrā dīnāṃ ca nikṣipet  saśiraske madhyakuṃbhe viṣṇumābāhya pūjayet  
prāgādiṣu yathāmaṃtramiṃdrā dīnkramaśo yajet  tattannāmnā caturthyāṃ ca namonte na yathākramam  
āvāhanādikaṃ sarvamācāryeṇaiva kārayet  ācārya ṛtvijā sārdhaṃ tanmātrānprajapecchatam  
kuṃbhasya paścime bhāge japāṃte homamācaret  koṭiṃ lakṣaṃ sahasraṃ vā śatamaṣṭottaraṃ budhāḥ  
ekāhaṃ vā navāhaṃ vā tathā maṃḍalameva vā  yathāyogyaṃ prakurvīta kāladeśānusārataḥ  
śamīhomaśca śāṃtyarthe vṛttyarthe ca palāśakam  samidannājyakairdra vyairnāmnā maṃtreṇa vā hunet  
prāraṃbhe yatkṛtaṃ dra vyaṃ tatkriyāṃtaṃ samācaret  puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvāṃte dine saṃprokṣyayejjalaiḥ  
brāhmaṇānbhojayetpaścādyāvadāhutisaṃkhyayā  ācāryaśca haviṣyāśīṛtvijaśca bhavedbudhāḥ  
ādityādīngrahāniṣṭvā sarvahomāṃta eva hi  ṛtvibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadyānnavaratnaṃ yathākramam  
daśadānaṃ tataḥ kuryādbhūridānaṃ tataḥ param  bālānāmupanītānāṃ gṛhiṇāṃ vanināṃ dhanam  
kanyānāṃ ca sabhartṛṇāṃ vidhavānāṃ tataḥ param  taṃtropakaraṇaṃ sarvamācāryāya nivedayet  
utpātānāṃ ca mārīṇāṃ duḥkhasvāmī yamaḥ smṛtaḥ  tasmādyamasya prītyarthaṃ kāladānaṃ pradāpayet  
śataniṣkeṇa vā kuryāddaśaniṣkeṇa vā punaḥ  pāśāṃkuśadharaṃ kālaṃ kuryātpuruṣarūpiṇam  
tatsvarṇapratimādānaṃ kuryāddakṣiṇayā saha  tiladānaṃ tataḥ kuryātpūrṇāyuṣyaprasiddhaye  
ājyāvekṣaṇadānaṃ ca kuryādvyādhinivṛttaye  sahasraṃ bhojayedviprāndaridra ḥ śatameva vā  
vittābhāve daridra stu yathāśakti samācaret  bhairavasya mahāpūjāṃ kuryādbhūtādiśāṃtaye  
mahābhiṣekaṃ naivedyaṃ śivasyānte tukārayet  brāhmaṇānbhojayetpaścādbhūribhojanarūpataḥ  
evaṃ kṛtena yajñena doṣaśāṃtimavāpnuyāt  śāṃtiyajñamimaṃ kuryādvarṣe varṣe tu phālgune  
durdarśanādau sadyo vai māsamātre samācaret  mahāpāpādisaṃprāptau kuryādbhairavapūjanam  
mahāvyādhisamutpattau saṃkalpaṃ punarācaret  sarvabhāve daridra stu dīpadānamathācaret  
tadapyaśaktaḥ snātvā vai yatkiṃciddānamācaret  divākaraṃ namaskuryānmantreṇāṣṭottaraṃ śatam  
sahasramayutaṃ lakṣaṃ koṭiṃ vā kārayed budhaḥ  namaskārātmayajñena tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ  
tvatsvarūperpitā buddhirnate'śūnye ca rocati  yā cāstyasmadahaṃteti tvayi dṛṣṭe vivarjitā  
namro'haṃ hi svadehena bho mahāṃstvamasi prabho  na śūnyo matsvarūpo vai tava dāso'smi sāṃpratam  
yathāyogyaṃ svātmayajñaṃ namaskāraṃ prakalpayet  athātra śivanaivedyaṃ dattvā tāṃbūlamāharet  
śivapradakṣiṇaṃ kuryātsvayamaṣṭottaraṃ śatam  sahasramayutaṃ lakṣaṃ koṭimanyena kārayet  
śivapradakṣiṇātsarvaṃ pātakaṃ naśyati kṣaṇāt  duḥkhasya mūlaṃ vyādhirhi vyādhermūlaṃ hi pātakam  
dharmeṇaiva hi pāpānāmapanodanamīritam  śivoddeśakṛto dharmaḥ kṣamaḥ pāpavinodane  
adhyakṣaṃ śivadharmeṣu pradakṣiṇamitīritam  kriyayā japarūpaṃ hi praṇavaṃ tu pradakṣiṇam  
jananaṃ maraṇaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ māyācakramitīritam  śivasya māyācakraṃ hi balipīṭhaṃ taducyate  
balipīṭhaṃ samārabhya prādakṣiṇyakrameṇa vai  pade padāṃtaraṃ gatvā balipīṭhaṃ samāviśet  
namaskāraṃ tataḥ kuryātpradakṣiṇamitīritam  nirgamājjananaṃ prāptaṃ namastvātmasamarpaṇam  
jananaṃ maraṇaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ śivamāyāsamarpitam  śivamāyārpitadvaṃdvo na punastvātmabhāgbhavet  
yāvaddehaṃ kriyādhīnaḥ sajīvo baddha ucyate  dehatrayavaśīkāre mokṣa ityucyate budhaiḥ  
māyācakrapraṇetā hi śivaḥ paramakāraṇam  śivamāyārpitadvaṃdvaṃ śivastu parimārjati  
śivena kalpitaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ tasminneva samarpayet  śivasyātipriyaṃ vidyātpradakṣiṇaṃ namo budhāḥ  
pradakṣiṇanamaskārāḥ śivasya paramātmanaḥ  ṣoḍaśairupacāraiśca kṛtapūjā phalapradā  
pradakṣiṇā'vināśyaṃ hi pātakaṃ nāsti bhūtale  tasmātpradakṣiṇenaiva sarvapāpaṃ vināśayet  
śivapūjāparo maunī satyādiguṇasaṃyutaḥ  kriyātapojapajñānadhyāneṣvekaikamācaret  
aiśvaryaṃ divyadehaśca jñānamajñānasaṃśayaḥ  śivasānnidhyamityete kriyādīnāṃ phalaṃ bhavet  
karaṇena phalaṃ yāti tamasaḥ parihāpanāt  janmanaḥ parimārjitvājjñabuddhyā janitāni ca  
yathādeśaṃ yathākālaṃ yathādehaṃ yathādhanam  yathāyogyaṃ prakurvīta kriyādīñchivabhaktimān  
nyāyārjitasuvittena vasetprājñaḥ śivasthale  jīvahiṃsādirahitamatikleśavivarjitam  
paṃcākṣareṇa japtaṃ ca toyamannaṃ viduḥ sukham  athavā'hurdaridra sya bhikṣānnaṃjñānadaṃ bhavet  
śivabhaktasya bhikṣānnaṃśivabhaktivivardhanam  śaṃbhusatramiti prāhurbhikṣānnaṃśivayoginaḥ  
yena kenāpyupāyena yatra kutrāpi bhūtale  śuddhānnabhuksadā maunīrahasyaṃ na prakāśayet  
prakāśayettu bhaktānāṃ śivamāhātmyameva hi  rahasyaṃ śivamaṃtrasya śivo jānāti nāparaḥ  
śivabhakto vasennityaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ samāśritaḥ  sthāṇuliṃgāśrayeṇaiva sthāṇurbhavati bhūsurāḥ  
pūjayā caraliṃgasya kramānmukto bhaveddhruvam  sarvamuktaṃ samāsena sādhyasādhanamuttamam  
vyāsena yatpurāproktaṃ yacchrutaṃ hi mayā purā  bhadra mastu hi vo'smākaṃ śivabhaktirdṛḍhā'stusā  
ya imaṃ paṭhate'dhyāyaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadā  śivajñānaṃ sa labhateśivasya kṛpayā budhāḥ  
iti śrīśaivemahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṃḍe śivaliṃgamahimāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta sūta ciraṃjīva dhanyastvaṃ śivabhaktimān  samyaguktastvayā liṃgamahimā satphalapradaḥ  
yatra pārthivamāheśaliṃgasya mahimādhunā  sarvotkṛṣṭaśca kathito vyāsato brūhi taṃ punaḥ  
sūta uvāca  śṛṇudhvamṛṣayaḥ sarve sadbhaktyā harato khilāḥ  śivapārthivaliṃgasya mahimā procyate mayā  
ukteṣveteṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ liṃgamuttamam  tasya pūjanato viprā bahavaḥ siddhimāgatāḥ  
harirbrahmā ca ṛṣayaḥ saprajāpatayastathā  saṃpūjya pārthivaṃ liṃgaṃ prāpuḥsarvepsitaṃ dvijāḥ  
devāsuramanuṣyāśca gaṃdharvoragarākṣasāḥ  anyepi bahavastaṃ saṃpūjya siddhiṃ gatāḥ param  
kṛte ratnamayaṃ liṃgaṃ tretāyāṃ hemasaṃbhavam  dvāpare pāradaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pārthivaṃ tu kalau yuge  
aṣṭamūrtiṣu sarvāsu mūrtirvai pārthivī varā  ananyapūjitā viprāstapastasmānmahatphalam  
yathā sarveṣu deveṣu jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭho maheśvaraḥ  evaṃ sarveṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ śreṣṭamucyate  
yathā nadīṣu sarvāsu jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā surāpagā  tathā sarveṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ śreṣṭhamucyate  
yathā sarveṣu maṃtreṣu praṇavo hi mahānsmṛtaḥ  tathedaṃ pārthivaṃ śreṣṭhamārādhyaṃ pūjyameva hi  
yathā sarveṣu varṇeṣu brāhmaṇaḥśreṣṭha ucyate  tathā sarveṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ śreṣṭhamucyate  
yathā purīṣu sarvāsu kāśīśreṣṭhatamā smṛtā  tathā sarveṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ śreṣṭhamucyate  
yathā vrateṣu sarveṣu śivarātrivrataṃ param  tathā sarveṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ śreṣthamucyate  
yathā devīṣu sarvāsu śaivīśaktiḥ parāsmṛtā  tathā sarveṣu liṃgeṣu pārthivaṃ śreṣṭhamucyate  
prakṛtyapārthivaṃ liṃgaṃ yonyadevaṃ prapūjayet  vṛthā bhavati sā pūjā snānadānādikaṃ vṛthā  
pārthivārādhanaṃ puṇyaṃ dhanyamāyurvivardhanam  tuṣṭidaṃ puṣṭidaṃśrīdaṃ kāryaṃ sādhakasattamaiḥ  
yathā labdhopacāraiśca bhaktyā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ  pūjayetpārthivaṃ liṃgaṃ sarvakāmārthasiddhidam  
yaḥ kṛtvā pārthivaṃ liṃge pūjayecchubhavedikam  ihaiva dhanavāñchrīmānaṃte rudro bhijāyate  
trisaṃdhyaṃ yorcayaṃlliṃgaṃ kṛtvā bilvena pārthivam  daśaikādaśakaṃyāvattasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu  
anenaiva svadehena rudra loke mahīyate  pāpahaṃ sarvamartyānāṃ darśanātsparśanādapi  
jīvanmuktaḥ sa vaijñānī śiva eva na saṃśayaḥ  tasya darśanamātreṇa bhuktirmuktiśca jāyate  
śivaṃ yaḥ pūjayennityaṃ kṛtvā liṃgaṃ tu pārthivam  yāvajjīvanaparyaṃtaṃ sa yāti śivamandiram  
mṛḍenāpramitānvarṣāñchivalokehi tiṣṭhati  sakāmaḥ punarāgatya rājendro bhārate bhavet  
niṣkāmaḥ pūjayennityaṃ pārthivaṃliṃgamuttamam  śivaloke sadā tiṣṭhettataḥ sāyujyamāpnuyāt  
pārthivaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ ca vipro yadi na pūjayet  sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ śūlaprotaṃ sudāruṇam  
yathākathaṃcidvidhinā ramyaṃ liṃgaṃ prakārayet  paṃcasūtravidhānāṃ ca pārthivena vicārayet  
akhaṇḍaṃ taddhi kartavyaṃ na vikhaṇḍaṃ prakārayet  dvikhaṇḍaṃ tu prakurvāṇo naiva pūjāphalaṃ labhet  
ratnajaṃ hemajaṃ liṃgaṃ pāradaṃ sphāṭikaṃ tathā  pārthivaṃ puṣparāgotthamakhaṃḍaṃ tu prakārayet  
akhaṃḍaṃ tu caraṃ liṃgaṃ dvikhaṃḍamacaraṃ smṛtam  khaṃḍākhaṃḍavicāroyaṃ sacarācarayoḥ smṛtaḥ  
vedikā tu mahāvidyā liṃgaṃ devo maheśvaraḥ  ato hi sthāvare liṃge smṛtā śreṣṭhādikhaṃḍitā  
dvikhaṃḍaṃ sthāvaraṃ liṃgaṃ kartavyaṃ hi vidhānataḥ  akhaṃḍaṃ jaṃgamaṃ proktaṃś aivasiddhāntavedibhiḥ  
dvikhaṃḍaṃ tu carāṃ liṃgaṃ kurvantyajñānamohitāḥ  naiva siddhāntavettāro munayaḥ śāstrakovidāḥ  
akhaṃḍaṃ sthāvaraṃ liṃgaṃ dvikhaṃḍaṃ carameva ca  yekurvantinarāmūḍhānapūjāphalabhāginaḥ  
tasmācchāstroktavidhinā akhaṃḍaṃ carasaṃjñakam  dvikhaṃḍaṃ sthāvaraṃ liṃgaṃ kartavyaṃ parayā mudā  
akhaṃḍe tu care pūjā sampūrṇaphaladāyinī  dvikhaṃḍe tu care pūjāmahāhānipradā smṛtā  
akhaṃḍe sthāvare pūjā na kāmaphaladāyinī  pratyavāyakarī nityamityuktaṃ śāstravedibhiḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṃḍe pārthivaśivaliṃgapūjanamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  atha vaidikabhaktānāṃ pārthivārcāṃ nigadyate  vaidikenaiva mārgeṇa bhuktimuktipradāyinī  
sūtroktavidhinā snātvā saṃdhyāṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi  brahmayajñaṃ vidhāyādau tatastarppaṇamācaret  
naityikaṃ sakalaṃ kāmaṃ vidhāyānaṃtaraṃ pumān  śivasmaraṇapūrvaṃ hi bhasmarudrā kṣadhārakaḥ  
vedoktāvidhinā samyaksaṃpūrṇaphalasiddhaye  pūjayetparayā bhaktyā pārthivaṃ liṃgamuttamam  
nadītīre taḍāge ca parvate kānane'pi ca  śivālaye śucau deśe pārthivārcā vidhīyate  
śuddhapradeśasaṃbhūtāṃ mṛdamāhṛtya yatnataḥ  śivaliṃgaṃ prakalpeta sāvadhānatayā dvijāḥ  
vipre gaurā smṛtā śoṇā bāhuje pītavarṇakā  vaiśye kṛṣṇā pādajāte hyathavā yatra yā bhavet  
saṃgṛhya mṛttikāṃ liṃganirmāṇārthaṃ prayatnataḥ  atīva śubhadeśe ca sthāpayettāṃ mṛdaṃ śubhām  
saṃśodhya ca jalenāpi piṃḍīkṛtya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ  vidhīyeta śubhaṃ liṃgaṃ pārthivaṃ vedamārgataḥ  
tataḥ saṃpūjayedbhaktyā bhuktimuktiphalāptaye  tatprakāramahaṃ vacmi śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃvidhānataḥ  
namaḥ śivāya maṃtreṇārcanadra vyaṃ ca prokṣayet  bhūrasīti ca maṃtreṇa kṣetrasiddhiṃ prakārayet  
āposmāniti maṃtreṇa jalasaṃskāramācaret  namaste rudra maṃtreṇa phāṭikābaṃdhamucyate  
śaṃbhavāyeti maṃtreṇa kṣetraśuddhiṃ prakārayet  namaḥ pūrveṇa kuryātpaṃcāmṛtasyāpi prokṣaṇam  
nīlagrīvāya maṃtreṇa namaḥpūrveṇa bhaktimān  carecchaṃkaraliṃgasya pratiṣṭhāpanamuttamam  
bhaktitastata etatte rudrā yeti ca maṃtrataḥ  āsanaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ vai dadyādvaidikamārgakṛt  
māno mahantamiti ca maṃtreṇāvāhanaṃ caret  yāte rudre ṇa maṃtreṇa saṃcaredupaveśanam  
maṃtreṇa yāmiṣumiti nyāsaṃ kuryyācchivasya ca  adhyavocaditi premṇādhivāsaṃ manunācaret  
manunā saujīva iti devatānyāsamācaret  asau yovasarpatīti cācaredapasarpaṇam  
namostu nīlagrīvāyeti pādyaṃ manunāharet  arghyaṃ ca rudra gāyatr yā'camanaṃ tr yaṃbakeṇa ca  
payaḥ pṛthivyāmiti ca payasā snānamācaret  dadhikrāvṇetimaṃtreṇa dadhisnānaṃ ca kārayet  
ghṛṭaṃ snāne khalu ghṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ yāveti maṃtrataḥ  madhuvātā madhunaktaṃ madhumānna iti tr yṛcā  
madhukhaṃḍasnapanaṃ proktamiti paṃcāmṛtaṃ smṛtam  athavā pādyamaṃtreṇa snānaṃ paṃcāmṛtena ca  
mānastoke iti premṇā maṃtreṇa kaṭibaṃdhanam  namo dhṛṣṇave iti vā uttarīyaṃ ca dhāpayet  
yā te hetiriti premṇā ṛkcatuṣkeṇa vaidikaḥ  śivāya vidhinā bhaktaścaredvastrasamarpaṇam  
namaḥ śvabhya iti premṇā gaṃdhaṃ dadyādṛcā sudhīḥ  namastakṣabhya iti cākṣatānmaṃtreṇa cārpayet  
namaḥ pāryāya iti vā puṣpa maṃtreṇa cārpayet  namaḥ parṇyāya iti vā bilbapatrasamarpaṇam  
namaḥ kapardine ceti dhūpaṃ dadyādyathāvidhi  dīpaṃ dadyādyathoktaṃ tu nama āśava ityṛcā  
namo jyeṣṭhāya maṃtreṇa dadyānnaivedyamuttamam  manunā tr yambakamiti punarācamanaṃ smṛtam  
imā rudrā yeti ṛcā kuryātphalasamarpaṇam  namo vrajyāyeti ṛcā sakalaṃ śaṃbhaverpayet  
māno mahāṃtamiti ca mānastoke iti tataḥ  maṃtradvayenaikadaśākṣatai rudrā nprapūjayet  
hiraṇyagarbha iti tr yṛcā dakṣiṇāṃ hi samarpayet  devasya tveti maṃtreṇa hyabhiṣekaṃ caredbudhaḥ  
dīpamaṃtreṇa vā śaṃbhornīrājanavidhiṃ caret  puṣpāṃjaliṃ caredbhaktyā imā rudrā ya ca tr yṛcā  
māno mahāntamiti ca caretprājñaḥ pradakṣiṇām  mānastoketi maṃtreṇa sāṣṭāṇgaṃ praṇametsudhīḥ  
eṣate iti maṃtreṇa śivamudrā ṃ pradarśayet  yatoyata ityabhayāṃ jñānākhyāṃ tr yaṃbakeṇa ca  
namaḥseneti maṃtreṇa mahāmudrā ṃ pradarśayet  darśayeddhenumudrā ṃ ca namo gobhya ṛcānayā  
paṃcamudrā ḥ pradarśyātha śivamaṃtrajapaṃ caret  śatarudri yamaṃtreṇa japedvedavicakṣaṇaḥ  
tataḥ paṃcāṇgapāṭhaṃ ca kuryyādvedavicakṣaṇaḥ  devāgātviti maṃtreṇa kuryācchaṃbhorvisarjanam  
ityuktaḥ śivapūjāyā vyāsato vaidikovidhiḥ  samāsataśca śṛṇuta vaidikaṃ vidhimuttamam  
ṛcā sadyojātamiti mṛdāharaṇamācaret  vāmadevāya iti ca jalaprakṣepamācaret  
aghoreṇa ca maṃtreṇa liṃganirmāṇamācaret  tatpuruṣāya maṃtreṇāhvānaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi  
saṃyojayedvedikāyāmīśānamanunā haram  anyatsarvaṃ vidhānaṃ ca kuryyātsaṃkṣepataḥ sudhīḥ  
paṃcākṣareṇa maṃtreṇa gurudattena vā tathā  kuryātpūjāṃ ṣoḍaśopacāreṇa vidhivatsudhīḥ  
bhavāya bhavanāśāya mahādevāya dhīmahi  ugrāya ugranāśāya śarvāya śaśimauline  
anena manunā vāpi pūjayecchaṃkaraṃ sudhīḥ  subhaktyā ca bhramaṃ tyaktvā bhaktyaiva phaladaḥ śivaḥ  
ityapi proktamādṛtya vaidikakramapūjanam  procyatenyavidhiḥ samyaksādhāraṇatayā dvijaḥ  
pūjā pārthivaliṃgasya saṃproktā śivanāmabhiḥ  tāṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvakāmapradāyinīm  
haro maheśvaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ śūlapāṇiḥ pinākadhṛk  śivaḥ paśupatiścaiva mahādeva iti kramāt  
mṛdāharaṇasaṃghaṭṭapratiṣṭhāhvānameva ca  snapanaṃ pūjanaṃ caiva kṣamasveti visarjanam  
oṃkārādicaturthyaṃtairnamontairnāmabhiḥ kramāt  kartavyā ca kriyā sarvā bhaktyā paramayā mudā  
kṛtvā nyāsavidhiṃ samyakṣaḍaṇgakarayostathā  ṣaḍakṣareṇa maṃtreṇa tato dhyānaṃ samācaret  
kailāsapīṭhāsanamadhyasaṃsthaṃ bhaktaiḥ sanaṃdādibhirarcyamānam  bhaktārtidāvānalamaprameyaṃ dhyāyedumāliṃgitaviśvabhūṣaṇam  
dhyāyennityaṃ maheśaṃ rajatagirinibhaṃ cārucaṃdrā vataṃsaṃ ratnākalpojjvalāṃgaṃ paraśumṛgavarābhītihastaṃ prasannam  padmāsīnaṃ samaṃtātsthitamamaragaṇairvyāghrakṛttiṃ vasānaṃ viśvādyaṃ viśvabījaṃ nikhilabhayaharaṃ paṃcavaktraṃ trinetram  
iti dhyātvā ca saṃpūjya pārthivaṃ liṃgamuttamam  japetpaṃcākṣaraṃ maṃtraṃ gurudattaṃ yathāvidhi  
stutibhiścaiva deveśaṃ stuvīta praṇamansudhīḥ  nānābhidhābhirviprendrā ḥ paṭhedvai śatarudri yam  
tataḥ sākṣatapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvāṃjalinā mudā  prārthayecchaṃkaraṃ bhaktyā maṃtrairebhiḥ subhaktitaḥ  
tāvakastvadguṇaprāṇastvaccittohaṃ sadā mṛḍa  kṛpānidha iti jñātvā bhūtanātha prasīda me  
ajñānādyadi vā jñānājjapa pūjādikaṃ mayā  kṛtaṃ tadastu saphalaṃ kṛpayā tava śaṃkara  
ahaṃ pāpī mahānadya pāvanaśca bhavānmahān  iti vijñāya gaurīśa yadicchasi tathā kuru  
vedaiḥ purāṇaiḥ siddhāntairṛṣibhirvividhairapi  na jñātosi mahādeva kutohaṃ tvaṃ mahāśiva  
yathā tathā tvadīyosmi sarvabhāvairmaheśvara  rakṣaṇīyastvayāhaṃ vai prasīda parameśvara  
ityevaṃ cākṣatānpuṣpānāropya ca śivopari  praṇamedbhaktitaśśaṃbhuṃ sāṣṭāṃgaṃ vidhivanmune  
tataḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kuryādyathoktavidhinā sudhīḥ  punaḥ stuvīta deveśaṃ stutibhiḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ  
tato galaravaṃ kṛtvā praṇamecchucinamradhīḥ  kuryādvijñaptimādṛtya visarjanamathācaret  
ityuktā muniśārdūlāḥ pārthivārcā vidhānataḥ  bhuktidā muktidā caiva śivabhaktivivardhinī  
ityadhyāyaṃ sucittena yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādapi  sarvapāpaviśuddhātmāsarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt  
āyurāyogyadaṃ caiva yaśasyaṃ svargyameva ca  putrapautrādisukhadamākhyānamidamuttamam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe pārthivaśivaliṃgapūjāvidhivarṇanaṃ nāma viṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta sūta mahābhāga vyāsaśiṣya namostu te  samyaguktaṃ tvayā tāta pārthivārcāvidhānakam  
kāmanābhedamāśritya saṃkhyāṃ brūhi vidhānataḥ  śivapārthivaliṃgānāṃ kṛpayā dīnavatsala  
sūta uvāca  śṛṇudhvamṛṣayaḥ sarve pārthivārcāvidhānakam  yasyānuṣṭhānamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ  
akṛtvā pārthivaṃ liṃgaṃ yonyadevaṃ prapūjayet  vṛthā bhavati sā pūjā damadānādikaṃ vṛthā  
saṃkhyā pārthivaliṃgānāṃ yathākāmaṃ nigadyate  saṃkhyā sadyo muniśreṣṭha niścayena phalapradā  
prathamāvāhanaṃ tatra pratiṣṭhā pūjanaṃ pṛthak  liṃgākāraṃ samaṃ tatra sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ pṛthakpṛthak  
vidyārthī puruṣaḥ prītyā sahasramitapārthivam  pūjayecchivaliṃgaṃ hi niścayāttatphalapradam  
naraḥ pārthivaliṃgānāṃ dhanārthī ca tadarddhakam  putrārthī sārddhasāhasraṃ vastrārthī śatapaṃcakram  
mokṣārthī koṭiguṇitaṃ bhūkāmaśca sahasrakam  dayārthī ca trisāhasraṃ tīrthārthī dvisahasrakam  
suhṛtkāmī trisāhasraṃ vaśyārthī śatamaṣṭakam  māraṇārthī saptaśataṃ mohanārthī śatāṣṭakam  
uccāṭanaparaścaiva sahasraṃ ca yathoktataḥ  staṃbhanārthī sahasraṃ tu dveṣaṇārthī tadarddhakam  
nigaḍānmuktikāmastu sahasraṃ sarddhamuttamam  mahārājabhaye paṃcaśataṃ jñeyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ  
caurādisaṃkaṭe jñeyaṃ pārthivānāṃ śatadvayam  ḍākinyādibhaye paṃcaśatamuktaṃ japārthivam  
dāridra ye paṃcasāhasramayutaṃ sarvakāmadam  atha nityavidhiṃ vakṣye śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ  
ekaṃ pāpaharaṃ proktaṃ dviliṃgaṃ cārthasiddhidam  triliṃgaṃ sarvakāmānāṃ kāraṇaṃ paramīritam  
uttarottaramevaṃ syātpūrvoktagaṇanāvidhi  matāṃtaramatho vakṣye saṃkhyāyāṃ munibhedataḥ  
liṃgānāmayutaṃ kṛtvā pārthivānāṃ subuddhimān  nirbhayo hi bhavennūnaṃ mahārājabhayaṃ haret  
kārāgṛhādimuktyarthamayutaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ  ḍākinyādibhaye saptasahasraṃ kārayettathā  
sahasrāṇi paṃcapaṃcāśadaputraḥ prakārayet  liṃgānāmayutenaiva kanyakāsaṃtatiṃ labhet  
liṃgānāmayutenaiva viṣṇvādaiśvaryamāpnuyāt  liṃgānāṃ prayutenaiva hyatulāṃ śriyamāpnuyāt  
koṭimekāṃ tu liṃgānāṃ yaḥ karoti naro bhuvi  śiva eva bhavetsopi nātra kāryyā vicāraṇā  
arcā pārthivaliṃgānāṃ koṭiyajñaphalapradā  bhuktidā muktidā nityaṃ tataḥ kāmarthināṃ nṛṇām  
vinā liṃgārcanaṃ yasya kālo gacchati nityaśaḥ  mahāhānirbhavettasya durvṛttasya durātmanaḥ  
ekataḥ sarvadānāni vratāni vividhāni ca  tīrthāni niyamā yajñā liṃgārcā caikataḥ smṛtā  
kalau liṃgārcanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tathā loke pradṛśyate  tathā nāstīti śāstrāṇāmeṣa siddhāntaniścayaḥ  
bhuktimuktipradaṃ liṃgaṃ vividhāpannivāraṇam  pūjayitvā naro nityaṃ śivasāyujyamāpnuyāt  
śivānāmamayaṃ liṃgaṃ nityaṃ pūjyaṃ maharṣibhiḥ  yataśca sarvaliṃgeṣu tasmātpūjyaṃ vidhānataḥ  
uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ nīcaṃ trividhaṃ liṃgamīritam  mānato muniśārdūlāstacchṛṇudhvaṃ vadāmyaham  
caturaṃgulamucchrāyaṃ ramyaṃ vedikayā yutam  uttamaṃ liṃgamākhyātaṃ munibhiḥ śāstrakovidaiḥ  
tadarddhaṃ madhyamaṃ proktaṃ tadarddhamaghamaṃ smṛtam  itthaṃ trividhamākhyātamuttarottarataḥ param  
anekaliṃgaṃ yo nityaṃ bhaktiśraddhāsamanvitaḥ  pūjayetsa labhetkāmānmanasā mānasepsitān  
na liṃgārādhanādanyatpuṇyaṃ vedacatuṣṭaye  vidyate sarvaśāstrāṇāmeṣa eva viniścayaḥ  
sarvametatparityajya karmajālamaśeṣataḥ  bhaktyā paramayā vidvāṃ lliṃgamekaṃ prapūjayet  
liṃgercitercitaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṃgamam  saṃsārāṃbudhimagnānāṃ nānyattāraṇasādhanam  
ajñānatimirāṃdhānāṃ viṣayāsaktacetasām  plavo nānyosti jagati liṃgārādhanamaṃtarā  
haribrahmādayo devā munayo yakṣarākṣasāḥ  gaṃdharvāścaraṇāssiddhā daiteyā dānavāstathā  
nāgāḥ śeṣaprabhṛtayo garuḍādyāḥkhagāstathā  saprajāpatayaścānye manavaḥ kinnarā narāḥ  
pūjayitvā mahābhaktyā liṃgaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam  prāptāḥ kāmānabhīṣṭāṃśca tāṃstānsarvānhṛdi sthitān  
brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā pratilomajaḥ  pūjayetsatataṃ liṃgaṃ tattanmaṃtreṇa sādaram  
kiṃ bahūktena munayaḥ strīṇāmapi tathānyataḥ  adhikārosti sarveṣāṃ śivaliṃgārcane dvijāḥ  
dvijānāṃ vaidikenāpi mārgeṇārādhanaṃ varam  anyeṣāmapi jaṃtūnāṃ vaidikena na saṃmatam  
vaidikānāṃ dvijānāṃ ca pūjā vaidikamārgataḥ  kartavyānānyamārgeṇa ityāha bhagavāñchivaḥ  
dadhīcigautamādīnāṃ śāpenādagdhacetasām  dvijānāṃ jāyate śraddhānaiva vaidikakarmaṇi  
yo vaidikamanādṛtya karma smārtamathāpi vā  anyatsamācarenmartyo na saṃkalpaphalaṃ labhet  
itthaṃ kṛtvārcanaṃ śaṃbhornaivedyāṃtaṃ vidhānataḥ  pūjayedaṣṭamūrtīśca tatraiva trijaganmayīḥ  
kṣitirāponalo vāyurākāśaḥ sūryyasomakau  yajamāna iti tvaṣṭau mūrtayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ  
śarvo bhavaśca rudra śca ugrobhīma itīśvaraḥ  mahādevaḥ paśupatiretānmūrtibhirarcayet  
pūjayetparivāraṃ ca tataḥ śaṃbhoḥ subhaktitaḥ  īśānādikramāttatra caṃdanākṣatapatrakaiḥ  
īśānaṃ naṃdinaṃ caṃḍaṃ mahākālaṃ ca bhṛṃgiṇam  vṛṣaṃ skaṃdaṃ kapardīśaṃ somaṃ śukraṃ ca tatkramāt  
agrato vīrabhadraṃ ca pṛṣṭhe kīrtimukhaṃ tathā  tata ekādaśānrudrā npūjayedvidhinā tataḥ  
tataḥ paṃcākṣaraṃ japtvā śatarudri yameva ca  stutīrnānāvidhāḥ kṛtvā paṃcāṃgapaṭhanaṃ tathā  
tataḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā natvā liṃgaṃ visarjayet  iti proktamaśeṣaṃ ca śivapūjanamādarāt  
rātrāvudaṇmukhaḥ kuryāddevakāryaṃ sadaiva hi  śivārcanaṃ sadāpyevaṃ śuciḥ kuryādudaṇmukhaḥ  
na prācīmagrataḥ śaṃbhornodīcīṃ śaktisaṃhitān  na pratīcīṃ yataḥ pṛṣṭhamato grāhyaṃ samāśrayet  
vinā bhasmatripuṃḍreṇa vinā rudrā kṣamālayā  bilvapatraṃ vinā naiva pūjayecchaṃkaraṃ budhaḥ  
bhasmāprāptau muniśreṣṭhāḥ pravṛtte śivapūjane  tasmānmṛdāpi kartavyaṃ lalāṭe ca tripuṃḍrakam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe prathamāyāṃ vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe pārthivapūjanavarṇanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ  agrāhyaṃ śivanaivedyamiti pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ vacaḥ  brūhi tannirṇayaṃ bilvamāhātmyamapi sanmune  
sūta uvāca  śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve sāvadhānatayādhunā  sarvaṃ vadāmi saṃprītyā dhanyā yūyaṃ śivavratāḥ  
śivabhaktaḥ śuciḥ śuddhaḥ sadvratīdṛḍhaniścayaḥ  bhakṣayecchivanaivedyaṃ tyajedagrāhyabhāvanām  
dṛṣṭvāpi śivanaivedye yāṃti pāpāni dūrataḥ  bhakte tu śivanaivedye puṇyānyā yāṃti koṭiśaḥ  
alaṃ yāgasahasreṇāpyalaṃ yāgārbudairapi  bhakṣite śivanaivedye śivasāyujyamāpnuyāt  
yadgṛhe śivanaivedyapracāropi prajāyate  tadgṛhaṃ pāvanaṃ sarvamanyapāvanakāraṇam  
āgataṃ śivanaivedyaṃ gṛhītvā śirasā mudā  bhakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnena śivasmaraṇapūrvakam  
āgataṃ śivanaivedyamanyadā grāhyamityapi  vilaṃbe pāpasaṃbaṃdho bhavatyeva hi mānave  
na yasya śivanaivedyagrahaṇecchā prajāyate  sa pāpiṣṭho gariṣṭhaḥ syānnarakaṃ yātyapi dhruvam  
hṛdaye candra kānte ca svarṇarūpyādinirmite  śivadīkṣāvatā bhaktenedaṃ bhakṣyamitīryyate  
śivadīkṣānvito bhakto mahāprasādasaṃjñakam  sarveṣāmapi liṃgānāṃ naivedyaṃ bhakṣayecchubham  
anyadīkṣāyujāṃ nṝṇāṃ śivabhaktiratātmanām  śṛṇudhvaṃ nirṇayaṃ prītyā śivanaivedyabhakṣaṇe  
śālagrāmodbhave liṃge rasaliṃge tathā dvijāḥ  pāṣāṇe rājate svarṇe surasiddhapratiṣṭhite  
kāśmīre sphāṭike rātne jyotirliṃgeṣu sarvaśaḥ  cāndrāyaṇasamaṃ proktaṃ śaṃbhornaivedyabhakṣaṇam  
brahmahāpi śucirbhūtvā nirmālyaṃ yastu dhārayet  bhakṣayitvā drutaṃ tasya sarvapāpaṃ praṇaśyati  
caṃḍādhikāro yatrāsti tadbhoktavyaṃ na mānavaiḥ  caṃḍādhikāro no yatra bhoktavyaṃ tacca bhaktitaḥ  
bāṇaliṃge ca lauhe ca siddhe liṃge svayaṃbhuvi  pratimāsu ca sarvāsu na caṃḍodhikṛto bhavet  
snāpayitvā vidhānena yo liṃgasnāpanodakam  triḥpibettrividhaṃ pāpaṃ tasyehāśu vinaśyati  
agrāhyaṃ śivanaivedyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam  śālagrāmaśilāsaṃgātsarvaṃ yāti pavitritām  
liṃgopari ca yaddravyaṃ tadagrāhyaṃ munīśvarāḥ  supavitraṃ ca tajjñeyaṃ yalliṃgasparśabāhyataḥ  
naivedyanirṇayaḥ proktaṃ itthaṃ vo munisattamāḥ  śṛṇudhvaṃ bilvamāhātmyaṃ sāvadhānatayā'darāt  
mahādevasvarūpoyaṃ bilvo devairapi stutiḥ  yathākathaṃcidetasya mahimā jñāyate katham  
puṇyatīrthāni yāvaṃti lokeṣu prathitānyapi  tāni sarvāṇi tīrthānibilvamūleva saṃti hi  
bilvamūle mahādevaṃ liṃgarūpiṇamavyayam  yaḥ pūjayati puṇyātmā sa śivaṃ prāpnuyāddhruvam  
bilvamūle jalairyastu mūrddhānamabhiṣiṃcati  sa sarvatīrthasnātaḥ syātsa eva bhuvi pāvanaḥ  
etasya bilvamūlasyāthālavālamanuttamam  jalākulaṃ mahādevo dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭobhavatyalam  
pūjayedbilvamūlaṃ yo gaṃdhapuṣpādibhirnaraḥ  śivalokamavāpnoti saṃtatirvarddhate sukham  
bilvamūle dīpamālāṃ yaḥ kalpayati sādaram  sa tattvajñānasaṃpanno maheśāṃtargato bhavet  
bilvaśākhāṃ samādāya hastena navapallavam  gṛhītvā pūjayedbilvaṃ sa ca pāpaiḥ pramucyate  
bilvamūle śivarataṃ bhojayedyastu bhaktitaḥ  ekaṃ vā koṭiguṇitaṃ tasya puṇyaṃ prajāyate  
bilvamūle kṣīramuktamannamājyena saṃyutam  yo dadyācchivabhaktāya sa daridro na jāyate  
sāṃgopāṃgamiti proktaṃ śivaliṃgaprapūjanam  pravṛttānāṃ nivṛttānāṃ bhedato dvividhaṃ dvijāḥ  
pravṛttānāṃ pīṭhapūjāṃ sarvapūjāṃ samācaret  abhiṣekānte naivedyaṃ śālyannena samācaret  pūjānte sthāpayelliṃgaṃ puṭe śuddhe pṛthaggṛhe  
karapūjānivṛttānāṃ svabhojyaṃ tu nivedayet  nivṛttānāṃ paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ liṃgameva viśiṣyate  
vibhūtyabhyarcanaṃ kuryādvibhūtiṃ ca nivedayet  pūjāṃ kṛtvā tathā liṃgaṃ śirasādhārayetsadā  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe śivanaivedyavarṇanonāmadvāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta sūta mahābhāga vyāsaśiṣya namostu te  tadeva vyāsato brūhi bhasmamāhātmyamuttamam  
tathā rudrā kṣamāhātmyaṃ nāma māhātmyamuttamam  tritayaṃ brūhi suprītyā mamānaṃdayacetasam  
sūta uvāca  sādhupṛṣṭaṃ bhavadbhiśca lokānāṃ hitakārakam  bhavaṃto vai mahādhanyāḥ pavitrāḥ kulabhūṣaṇāḥ  
yeṣāṃ caiva śivaḥ sākṣāddaivataṃ paramaṃ śubham  sadā śivakathā loke vallabhā bhavatāṃ sadā  
te dhanyāśca kṛtārthāśca saphalaṃ dehadhāraṇam  uddhṛtañca kulaṃ teṣāṃ ye śivaṃ samupāsate  
mukhe yasya śivanāma sadāśivaśiveti ca  pāpāni na spṛśaṃtyeva khadirāṃgāraṃkayathā  
śrīśivāya namastubhyaṃ mukhaṃ vyāharate yadā  tanmukhaṃ pāvanaṃ tīrthaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam  
tanmukhañca tathā yo vai paśyatiprītimānnaraḥ  tīrthajanyaṃ phalaṃ tasya bhavatīti suniścitam  
yatra trayaṃ sadā tiṣṭhedetacchubhataraṃ dvijā  tasya darśanamātreṇa veṇīsnānaphalaṃlabhet  
śivanāmavibhūtiśca tathā rudrā kṣa eva ca  etattrayaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ triveṇīsadṛśaṃ smṛtam  
etattrayaṃ śarīre ca yasya tiṣṭhati nityaśaḥ  tasyaiva darśanaṃ loke durlabhaṃ pāpahārakam  
taddarśanaṃ yathā veṇī nobhayoraṃtaraṃ manāk  evaṃ yonavijānāti sapāpiṣṭho na saṃśayaḥ  
vibhūtiryasya no bhāle nāṃge rudrā kṣadhāraṇam  nāsye śivamayī vāṇī taṃ tyajedadhamaṃ yathā  
śaivaṃ nāma yathā gaṃgā vibhūtiryamunā matā  rudrā kṣaṃ vidhinā proktā sarvapāpāvināśinī  
śarīre ca trayaṃ yasya tatphalaṃ caikataḥ sthitam  ekato veṇikāyāśca snānajaṃtuphalaṃ budhaiḥ  
tadevaṃ tulitaṃ pūrvaṃ brahmaṇāhitakāriṇā  samānaṃ caiva tajjātaṃ tasmāddhāryaṃ sadā budhaiḥ  
taddinaṃ hi samārabhya brahmaviṣṇvādibhiḥ saraiḥ  dhāryate tritayaṃ tacca darśanātpāpahārakam  
ṛṣya ūcuḥ  īdṛśaṃ hi phalaṃ proktaṃ nāmāditritayodbhavam  tanmāhātmyaṃ viśeṣeṇa vaktumarhasi suvrata  
sūta uvāca  ṛṣayo hi mahāprājñāḥ sacchaivā jñānināṃ varāḥ  tanmāhātmyaṃ hi sadbhaktyā śṛṇutādarato dvijāḥ  
sugūḍhamapi śāstreṣu purāṇeṣu śrutiṣvapi  bhavatsnehānmayā viprāḥ prakāśaḥ kriyate'dhunā  
kastattritayamāhātmyaṃ saṃjānāti dvijottamāḥ  maheśvaraṃ vinā sarvaṃ brahmāṇḍe sadasatparam  
vacmyahaṃ nāma māhātmyaṃ yathābhakti samāsataḥ  śṛṇuta prītito viprāḥ sarvapāpaharaṃ param  
śiveti nāmadāvāgnermahāpātakaparvatāḥ  bhasmībhavaṃtyanāyāsātsatyaṃsatyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
pāpamūlāni duḥkhāni vividhānyapi śaunaka  śivanāmaikanaśyāni nānyanaśyāni sarvathā  
sa vaidikaḥ sa puṇyātmā sa dhanyassa budho mataḥ  śivanāmajapāsakto yo nityaṃ bhuvi mānava  
bhavaṃti vividhā dharmāsteṣāṃ sadyaḥ phalonmukhāḥ  yeṣāṃ bhavati viśvāsaḥ śivanāmajape mune  
pātakāni vinaśyaṃti yāvaṃti śivanāmataḥ  bhuvi tāvaṃti pāpāni kriyaṃte na narairmune  
brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ rāśīnapramitānmune  śivanāma drutaṃ proktaṃ nāśayatyakhilānnaraiḥ  
śivanāmatarīṃ prāpya saṃsārābdhiṃ taraṃti ye  saṃsāramūlapāpāni tāni naśyaṃtyasaṃśayam  
saṃsāramūlabhūtānāṃ pātakānāṃ mahāmune  śivanāmakuṭhāreṇa vināśo jāyate dhruvam  
śivanāmāmṛtaṃ peyaṃ pāpadāvānalārditaiḥ  pāpadāvāgnitaptānāṃ śāṃtistena vinā na hi  
śiveti nāmapīyūṣavarṣadhārāpariplutāḥ  saṃsāradavamadhyepi na śocaṃti kadācana  
śivanāmni mahadbhaktirjātā yeṣāṃ mahātmanām  tadvidhānāṃ tu sahasā muktirbhavati sarvathā  
anekajanmabhiryena tapastaptaṃ munīśvara  śivanāmni bhavedbhaktiḥ sarvapāpāpahāriṇī  
yasyā sādhāraṇaṃ śaṃbhunāmni bhaktirakhaṃḍitā  tasyaiva mokṣaḥ sulabho nānyasyeti matirmama  
kṛtvāpyanekapāpāni śivanāmajapādaraḥ  sarvapāpavinirmukto bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ  
bhavaṃti bhasmasādvṛkṣā davadagdhā yathā vane  tathā tāvaṃti dagdhāni pāpāni śivanāmataḥ  
yo nityaṃ bhasmapūtāṃgaḥ śivanāmajapādaraḥ  saṃtaratyeva saṃsāraṃ saghoramapi śaunaka  
brahmasvaharaṇaṃ kṛtvā hatvāpi brāhmaṇānbahūn  na lipyate naraḥ pāpaiḥ śivanāmajapādaraḥ  
vilokya vedānakhilāñchivanāmajapaḥ param  saṃsāratāraṇopāya iti pūrvairviniścitaḥ  
kiṃ bahūktyā muniśreṣṭhāḥ ślokenaikena vacmyaham  śivanāmno mahimānaṃ sarvapāpāpahāriṇam  
pāpānāṃ haraṇe śaṃbhornāmaḥ śaktirhi pāvanī  śaknoti pātakaṃ tāvatkartuṃ nāpi naraḥ kvacit  
śivanāmaprabhāveṇa lebhe sadgatimuttamām  indra dyumnanṛpaḥ pūrvaṃ mahāpāpaḥ purāmune  
tathā kāciddvijāyoṣā sau mune bahupāpinī  śivanāmaprabhāveṇa lebhe sadgatimuttamām  
ityuktaṃ vo dvijaśreṣṭhā nāmamāhātmyamuttamam  śṛṇudhvaṃ bhasmamāhātmyaṃ sarvapāvanapāvanam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṃḍeśivanamamāhātmyavarṇanonāmatrayoviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  dvividhaṃ bhasma saṃproktaṃ sarvamaṃgaladaṃ param  tatprakāramahaṃ vakṣye sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
ekaṃ jñeyaṃ mahābhasma dvitīyaṃ svalpasaṃjñakam  mahābhasma iti proktaṃ bhasma nānāvidhaṃ param  
tadbhasma trividhaṃ proktaṃ śrotaṃ smārtaṃ ca laukikam  bhasmaiva svalpasaṃjñaṃ hi bahudhā parikīrtitam  
śrautaṃ bhasma tathā smārtaṃ dvijānāmeva kīrtitam  anyeṣāmapi sarveṣāmaparaṃ bhasma laukikam  
dhāraṇaṃ maṃtrataḥ proktaṃ dvijānāṃ munipuṃgavaiḥ  kevalaṃ dhāraṇaṃ jñeyamanyeṣāṃ maṃtravarjitam  
āgneyamucyate bhasma dagdhagomayasaṃbhavam  tadāpi dra vyamityuktaṃ tripuṃḍrasya mahāmune  
agnihotrotthitaṃ bhasmasaṃgrāhyaṃ vā manīṣibhiḥ  anyayajñotthitaṃ vāpi tripuṇḍrasya ca dhāraṇe  
agnirityādibhirmaṃtrairjābālopaniṣadgateḥ  saptabhidhūlanaṃ kāryaṃ bhasmanā sajalena ca  
varṇānāmāśramāṇāṃ ca maṃtrato maṃtratopi ca  tripuṃḍroddhūlanaṃ proktajābālairādareṇa ca  
bhasmanoddhūlanaṃ caiva yathā tiryaktripuṃḍrakam  pramādādapi mokṣārthī na tyajediti viśrutiḥ  
śivena viṣṇunā caiva tathā tiryaktripuṃḍrakam  umādevī ca lakṣmīṃśca vācānyābhiśca nityaśaḥ  
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyairvaiśyaiḥ śūdrai rapi ca saṃskaraiḥ  apabhraṃśairdhṛtaṃ bhasmatripuṃḍroddhūlanātmanā  
uddhūlanaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ ca śraddhayā nācaraṃti ye  teṣāṃ nāsti samācāro varṇāśramasamanvitaḥ  
uddhūlanaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ ca śraddhayā nācaraṃti ye  teṣāṃ nāsti vinirmuktissaṃsārājjanmakoṭibhiḥ  
uddhūlanaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ ca śraddhayā nācaranti ye  teṣāṃ nāsti śivajñānaṃ kalpakoṭiśatairapi  
uddhūlanaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ ca śraddhayā nācaranti ye  te mahāpātakairyuktā iti śāstrīyanirṇayaḥ  
uddhūlanaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ ca śraddhayā nācaranti ye  teṣāmācaritaṃ sarvaṃ viparītaphalāya hi  
mahāpātakayuktānāṃ jaṃtūnāṃ śarvavidviṣām  tripuṃḍroddhūlanadveṣo jāyate sudṛḍhaṃ mune  
śivāgnikāryaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā kuryāttriyāyuṣātmavit  mucyate sarvapāpaistu spṛṣṭena bhasmanā naraḥ  
sitena bhasmanā kuryyāttrisandhyaṃ yastripuṇḍrakam  sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ śivena saha modate  
sitena bhasmanā kuryāllāṭe tu tripuṇḍrakam  yo sāvanādibhūtānhi lokānāpto mṛto bhavet  
akṛtvā bhasmanā snānaṃ na japedvai ṣaḍakṣaram  tripuṃḍraṃ ca racitvā tu vidhinā bhasmanā japet  
adayo vādhamo vāpi sarvapāpānvitopi vā  uṣaḥpāpānvito vāpi mūrkho vā patitopi vā  
yasmindeśeva sennityaṃ bhūtiśāsanasaṃyutaḥ  sarvatīrthaiśca kratubhiḥ sāṃnidhyaṃ kriyate sadā  
tripuṃḍrasahito jīvaḥ pūjyaḥ sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ  pāpānvitopi śuddhātmā kiṃ punaḥ śraddhayā yutaḥ  
yasmindeśe śivajñānī bhūtiśāsanasaṃyutaḥ  gato yadṛcchayādyāpi tasmistīrthāḥ samāgatāḥ  
bahunātra kimuktena dhāryaṃ bhasma sadā budhaiḥ  liṃgārcanaṃ sadā kāryaṃ japyo maṃtraḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ  
brahmaṇā viṣṇunā vāpi rudre ṇa munibhiḥ suraiḥ  bhasmadhāraṇamāhātmyaṃ na śakyaṃ paribhāṣitum  
iti varṇāśramācāro luptavarṇakriyopi ca  pāpātsakṛttripuṃḍrasya dhāraṇātsopi mucyate  
ye bhasmadhāriṇaṃ tyaktvā karma kurvaṃti mānavāḥ  teṣāṃ nāsti vinirmokṣaḥ saṃsārājjanmakoṭibhiḥ  
te nādhītaṃ guroḥ sarvaṃ te na sarvamanuṣṭhitam  yena vipreṇa śirasi tripuṃḍraṃ bhasmanā kṛtam  
ye bhasmadhāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā narāḥ kurvaṃti tāḍanam  teṣāṃ caṃḍālato janma brahmannūhyaṃ vipaścitā  
mānastokena maṃtreṇa maṃtritaṃ bhasma dhārayet  brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaścaiva prokteṣvaṃgeṣu bhaktimān  
vaiśyastriyaṃ bakenaiva śūdra ḥ paṃcākṣareṇa tu  anyāsāṃ vidhavāstrīṇāṃ vidhiḥ proktaśca śūdra vat  
paṃcabrahmādimanubhirgṛhasthasya vidhīyate  triyaṃbakena manunā vidhirvai brahmacāriṇaḥ  
aghoreṇātha manunā vipinasthavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ  yatistu praṇavenaiva tripuṃḍrādīni kārayet  
ativarṇāśramī nityaṃ śivohaṃ bhāvanātparāt  śivayogī ca niyatamīśānenāpi dhārayet  
na tyājyaṃ sarvavarṇaiśca bhasmadhāraṇamuttamam  anyairapi yathājīvaissadeti śivaśāsanam  
bhasmasnānena yāvaṃtaḥ kaṇāḥ svāṇge pratiṣṭhitāḥ  tāvaṃti śivaliṃgāni tanau dhatte hi dhārakaḥ  
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā ścāpi ca saṃkarāḥ  striyotha vidhavā bālāḥ prāptāḥ pākhaṃḍikāstathā  
brahmacārī gṛhī vanyaḥ saṃnyāsī vā vratī tathā  nāryo bhasma tripuṃḍrāṃkā muktā eva na saṃśayaḥ  
jñānājñānadhṛto vāpi vahnidāhasamo yathā  jñānājñānadhṛtaṃ bhasma pāvayetsakalaṃ naram  
nāśnīyājjalamannamalpamapi vā bhasmākṣadhṛtyā vinā  bhuktvāvātha gṛhī vanīpatiyatirvarṇī tathā saṃkaraḥ  enobhuṇnarakaṃ prayāti sata dāgāyatrijāpena tadvarṇānāṃ tu yatestu mukhyapraṇavājapena muktaṃbhavet  
tripuṃḍraṃ ye viniṃdaṃti nindanti śivameva te  dhārayaṃti ca ye bhaktyā dhārayanti tameva te  
dhigbhasmarahitaṃ bhālaṃ dhiggrāmamaśivālayam  dhiganīśārcanaṃ janma dhigvidyāmaśivāśrayām  
ye niṃdaṃti maheśvaraṃ trijagatāmādhārabhūtaṃ haraṃ ye nindaṃti tripuṃḍradhāraṇakaraṃ doṣastu taddarśane  te vai saṃkarasūkarāsurakharaśvakroṣṭukīṭopamā jātā eva bhavaṃti pāpaparamāstenārakāḥ kevalam  
te dṛṣṭvā śaśibhāskarau niśi dine svapnepi no kevalaṃ paśyaṃtu śrutirudra sūktajapato mucyeta tenādṛtāḥ  satsaṃbhāṣaṇato bhaveddhi narakaṃ nistāravānāsthitaṃ ye bhasmādividhāraṇaṃ hi puruṣaṃ niṃdaṃti maṃdā hi te  
na tāṃtrikastvadhikṛto norddhvapuṃḍradharo mune  saṃtaptacakracihnotra śivayajñe bahiṣkṛtaḥ  
tatraite bahavo lokā bṛhajjābālacoditāḥ  te vicāryāḥ prayatnena tato bhasmarato bhavet  
yaccaṃdanaiścaṃdanakepi miśraṃ dhāryaṃ hi bhasmaiva tripuṃḍrabhasmanā  vibhūtibhālopari kiṃcanāpi dhāryaṃ sadā no yadi saṃtibuddhayaḥ  
strībhistripuṇḍramalakāvadhi dhāraṇīyaṃ bhasma dvijādibhiratho vidhavābhirevam  tadvatsadāśramavatāṃ viśadāvibhūtirdhāryāpavargaphaladā sakalāghahantrī  
tripuṇḍraṃ kurute yastu bhasmanā vidhipūrvakam  mahāpātakasaṃghātairmucyate copapātakaiḥ  
brahmacārī gṛhastho vā vānaprasthotha vā yatiḥ  brahmakṣattrāśca viṭśūdrā stathānye patitādhamāḥ  
uddhūlanaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ ca dhṛtvā śuddhā bhavaṃti ca  bhasmano vidhinā samyakpāparāśiṃ vihāya ca  
bhasmadhārī viśeṣeṇa strīgohatyādipātakaiḥ  vīrahatyāśvahatyābhyāṃ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
paradra vyāpaharaṇaṃ paradārābhimarśanam  paranindā parakṣetraharaṇaṃ parapīḍanam  
sasyārāmādiharaṇaṃ gṛhadāhādikarma ca  gohiraṇyamahiṣyāditilakambalavāsasām  
annadhānyajalādīnāṃ nīcebhyaśca parigrahaḥ  daśaveśyāmataṃgīṣu vṛṣalīṣu naṭīṣu ca  
rajasvalāsu kanyāsu vidhavāsu ca maithunam  māṃsacarmarasādīnāṃ lavaṇasya ca vikrayaḥ  
paiśunyaṃ kūṭavādaśca sākṣimithyābhilāṣiṇām  evamādīnyasaṃkhyāni pāpāni vividhāni ca  sadya eva vinaśyaṃti tripuṃḍrasya ca dhāraṇāt  
śivadra vyāpaharaṇaṃ śivaniṃdā ca kutracit  niṃdā ca śivabhaktānāṃ prāyaścittairna śuddhyati  
rudrā kṣaṃ yasya gātreṣu lalāṭe tu tripaṃḍrakam  sacāṃḍālopi saṃpūjyassarvavarṇottamottamaḥ  
yāni tīrthāni lokesmingaṃgādyāssaritaśca yāḥ  snāto bhavati sarvatra lalāṭe yastripuṃḍrakam  
saptakoṭi mahāmaṃtrāḥ paṃcākṣarapurassarāḥ  tathānye koṭiśo maṃtrāḥ śaivakaivalyahetavaḥ  
anye maṃtrāśca devānāṃ sarvasaukhyakarā mune  te sarve tasya vaśyāḥ syuryo bibharti tripuṃḍrakam  
sahasraṃ pūrvajātānāṃ sahasraṃ janayiṣyatām  svavaṃśajānāṃ jñātīnāmuddharedyastripuṃḍrakṛt  
iha bhuktvā khilānbhogāndīrghāyurvyādhivarjitaḥ  jīvitāṃte ca maraṇaṃ sukhenaiva prapadyate  
aṣṭaiśvaryaguṇopetaṃ prāpya divyavapuḥ śivam  divyaṃ vimānamāruhya divyatridaśasevitam  
vidyādharāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ gaṃdharvāṇāṃ mahaujasām  iṃdrā dilokapālānāṃ lokeṣu ca yathākramam  
bhuktvā bhogānsuvipulānprajeśānāṃ padeṣu ca  brahmaṇaḥ padamāsādya tatra kanyāśataṃ ramet  
tatra brahmāyuṣo mānaṃ bhuktvā bhogānanekaśaḥ  viṣṇorloke labhedbhogaṃ yāvadbrahmaśatātyayaḥ  
śivalokaṃ tataḥ prāpya labdhveṣṭaṃ kāmamakṣayam  śivasāyujyamāpnoti saṃśayo nātra jāyate  
sarvopaniṣadāṃ sāraṃ samālokya muhurmuhuḥ  idameva hi nirṇītaṃ paraṃ śreyastripuṃḍrakam  
vibhūtiṃ niṃdate yo vai brāhmaṇaḥ sonyajātakaḥ  yāti ca narake ghore yāvadbrahmā caturmukhaḥ  
śrāddhe yajñe jape home vaiśvadeve surārcane  dhṛtatripuṃḍraḥ pūtātmā mṛtyuṃ jayati mānavaḥ  
jalasnānaṃ malatyāge bhasmasnānaṃ sadā śuci  maṃtrasnānaṃ haretpāpaṃ jñānasnāne paraṃ padam  
sarvatīrtheṣu yatpuṇyaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu yatphalam  tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti bhasmasnānakaro naraḥ  
bhasmasnānaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ gaṃgāsnānaṃ dine dine  bhasmarūpī śivaḥ sākṣādbhasma trailokyapāvanam  
na tadūnaṃ na taddhyānaṃ na taddānaṃ japo na saḥ  tripuṃḍreṇa vināyena vipreṇa yadanuṣṭhitam  
vānaprasthasya kanyānāṃ dīkṣāhīnanṛṇāṃ tathā  madhyāhnātprāgjalairyuktaṃ parato jalavarjitam  
evaṃ tripuṃḍraṃ yaḥ kuryyānnityaṃ niyatamānasaḥ  śivabhaktaḥ savijñeyo bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca viṃdati  
yasyāṃgenaiva rudrā kṣa ekopi bahupuṇyadaḥ  tasya janmanirarthaṃ syāttripuṃḍrarahito yadi  
evaṃ tripuṃḍramāhātmyaṃ samāsātkathitaṃ mayā  rahasyaṃ sarvajaṃtūnāṃ gopanīyamidaṃ tvayā  
tisro rekhā bhavaṃtyeva sthāneṣu munipuṃgavāḥ  lalāṭādiṣu sarveṣu yathokteṣu budhairmune  
bhruvormadhyaṃ samārabhya yāvadaṃto bhavedbhruvoḥ  tāvatpramāṇaṃ saṃdhāryaṃ lalāṭe ca tripuṃḍrakam  
madhyamānāmikāṃgulyā madhye tu pratilomataḥ  aṃguṣṭhena kṛtā rekhā tripuṃḍrākhyā bhidhīyate  
madhyeṃgulibhirādāya tisṛbhirbhasma yatnataḥ  tripuṇḍradhārayedbhaktyā bhuktimuktipradaṃ param  
tisṛṇāmapi rekhānāṃ pratyekaṃ navadevatāḥ  sarvatrāṃgeṣu tā vakṣye sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
akāro gārhapatyāgnirbhūdharmaśca rajoguṇaḥ  ṛgvedaśca kriyāśaktiḥ prātaḥsavanameva ca  
mahadevaśca rekhāyāḥ prathamāyāśca devatā  vijñeyā muniśārdūlāḥ śivadīkṣāparāyaṇaiḥ  
ukāro dakṣiṇāgniśca nabhastattvaṃ yajustathā  madhyaṃdinaṃ ca savanamicchāśaktyaṃtarātmakau  
maheśvaraśca rekhāyā dvitīyāyāśca devatā  vijñeyā muniśārdūla śivadīkṣāparāyaṇaiḥ  
makārāhavanīyau ca paramātmā tamodivau  jñānaśaktiḥ sāmavedastṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ tathā  
śivaścaiva ca rekhāyāstṛtiyāyāśca devatā  vijñeyā muniśārdūla śivadīkṣāparāyaṇau  
evaṃ nityaṃ namaskṛtya sadbhaktyā sthānadevatāḥ  tripuṃḍraṃ dhārayecchuddho bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca viṃdati  
ityuktāḥ sthānadevāśca sarvāṃgeṣu munīśvaraḥ  teṣāṃ saṃbaṃdhino bhaktyā sthānāni śṛṇu sāṃpratam  
dvātriṃśatsthānake vārddhaṣoḍaśasthānakepi ca  aṣṭasthāne tathā caiva paṃcasthānepi nānyaset  
uttamāṃge lalāṭe ca karṇayornetrayostathā  nāsāvaktragaleṣvevaṃ hastadvaya ataḥ param  
kūrpare maṇibaṃdhe ca hṛdaye pārśvayordvayoḥ  nābhau muṣkadvaye caivamūrvorgulphe ca jānuni  
jaṃghādvayepadadvandve dvātriṃśatsthānamuttamam  agnyabbhūvāyudigdeśadikpālānvasubhiḥ saha  
dharā dhruvaśca somaśca apaścevānilonalaḥ  pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavoṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ  
eteṣāṃ nāmamātreṇa tripuṃḍraṃ dhārayedbudhāḥ  kuryādvā ṣoḍaśasthāne tripuṇḍraṃ tu samāhitaḥ  
śīrṣake ca lalāṭeca kaṃṭhe cāṃsadvaye bhuje  kūrpare maṇibaṃdhe ca hṛdaye nābhipārśvake  
pṛṣṭhe caivaṃ pratiṣṭhāya yajettatrāśvidaivate  śivaśaktiṃ tathā rudra mīśaṃ nāradameva ca  
vāmādinavaśaktīśca etāḥ ṣoḍaśadevatāḥ  nāsatyo dasrakaścaiva aśvinau dvau prakīrtitau  
athavā mūrddhni keśe ca karmayorvadane tathā  bāhudvaye ca hṛdaye nābhyāmūruyuge tathā  
jānudvaye ca padayoḥ pṛṣṭhabhāge ca ṣoḍaśa  śivaścandra śca rudra ḥ ko vighneśo viṣṇureva vā  
śrīścaiva hṛdaye śambhustathā nābhau prajāpatiḥ  nāgaśca nāgakanyāśca ubhayorṛṣikanyakāḥ  
pādayośca samudrā śca tīrthāḥ pṛṣṭhe viśālataḥ  ityeva ṣoḍaśasthānamaṣṭasthānamathocyate  
guhyasthānaṃ lalāṭaśca karṇadvayamanuttamam  aṃsayugmaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ nābhirityevamaṣṭakam  
brahmā ca ṛṣayaḥ saptadevatāśca prakīrtitāḥ  ityevaṃ tu samuddiṣṭaṃ bhasmavidbhirmunīśvarāḥ  
atha vā mastakaṃ bāhūhṛdayaṃ nābhireva ca  paṃcasthānānyamūnyāhurdhāraṇe bhasmavijjanāḥ  
yathāsaṃbhavanaṃ kuryyāddeśakālādyapekṣayā  uddhūlanepyaśaktiścettripuṇḍrādīni kārayet  
trinetraṃ triguṇādhāraṃ trivedajanakaṃ śivam  smarannamaḥ śivāyeti lalāṭe tu tripuṇḍrakam  
īśābhyāṃ nama ityuktvāpārśvayośca tripuṇḍrakam  bījābhyāṃ nama ityuktvā dhārayettu prakoṣṭhayoḥ  
kuryādadhaḥ pitṛbhyāṃ ca umeśābhyāṃ tathopari  bhīmāyeti tataḥ pṛṣṭhe śirasaḥ paścime tathā  
sūta uvāca  śaunakarṣe mahāprājña śivarūpamahāpate  śṛṇu rudrā kṣamāhātmyaṃ samāsātkathayāmyaham  
śivapriyatamo jñeyo rudrā kṣaḥ parapāvanaḥ  darśanātsparśanājjāpyātsarvapāpaharaḥ smṛtaḥ  
purā rudrā kṣamahimā devyagre kathito mune  lokopakaraṇārthāya śivena paramātmanā  
śiva uvāca  śṛṇu devimaheśāni rudrā kṣamahimā śive  kathayāmi tavaprītyā bhaktānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
divyavarṣasahasrāṇi maheśāni punaḥ purā  tapaḥ prakurvatastrastaṃ manaḥ saṃyamya vai mama  
svataṃtreṇa pareśena lokopakṛtikāriṇā  līlayā parameśāni cakṣurunmīlitaṃ mayā  
puṭābhyāṃ cārucakṣurbhyāṃ patitā jalabiṃdavaḥ  tatrāśrubindavo jātā vṛkṣā rudrā kṣasaṃjñakāḥ  
sthāvaratvamanuprāpya bhaktānugrahakāraṇāt  te dattā viṣṇubhaktebhyaścaturvarṇebhya eva ca  
bhūmau gauḍodbhavāṃścakre rudrā kṣāñchivavallabhān  mathurāyāmayodhyāyāṃ laṃkāyāṃ malaye tathā  
sahyādrau ca tathā kāśyāṃ daśeṣvanyeṣu vā tathā  parānasahyapāpaughabhedanāñchrutinodanāt  
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā jātā mamājñayā  rudrā kṣāste pṛthivyāṃ tu tajjātīyāḥ śubhākṣakāḥ  
śvetaraktāḥ pītakṛṣṇā varṇājñeyāḥ kramādbudhaiḥ  svajātīyaṃ nṛbhirdhāryaṃ rudrā kṣaṃ varṇataḥ kramāt  
varṇaistu tatphalaṃ dhāryaṃ bhuktimuktiphalepsubhiḥ  śivabhaktairviśeṣeṇa śivayoḥ prītaye sadā  
dhātrīphalapramāṇaṃ yacchreṣṭhametadudāhṛtam  badarīphalamātraṃ tu madhyamaṃ saṃprakīrttitam  
adhamaṃ caṇamātraṃ syātprakriyaiṣā parocyate  śṛṇu pārvati suprītyā bhaktānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
badarīphalamātraṃ ca yatsyātkila maheśvari  tathāpi phaladaṃ loke sukhasaubhāgyavarddhanam  
dhātrīphalasamaṃ yatsyātsarvāriṣṭavināśanam  guṃjayā sadṛśaṃ yatsyātsarvārthaphalasādhanam  
yathā yathā laghuḥ syādvai tathādhikaphalapradam  ekaikataḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ daśāṃśairadhikaṃ budhaiḥ  
rudrā kṣadhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ pāpanāśanahetave  tasmācca dhāraṇī yo vai sarvārthasādhano dhruvam  
yathā ca dṛśyate loke rudrā kṣaphaladaḥ śubhaḥ  na tathā dṛśyate'nyā ca mālikā parameśvari  
samāḥ snigdhā dṛḍhāḥ sthūlāḥ kaṃṭakaiḥ saṃyutāḥ śubhāḥ  rudrā kṣāḥ kāmadā devi bhuktimuktipradāḥ sadā  
krimiduṣṭaṃ chinnabhinnaṃ kaṃṭakairhīnameva ca  vraṇayuktamavṛttaṃ ca rudrā kṣānṣaḍvivarjayet  
svayameva kṛtadvāraṃ rudrā kṣaṃ syādihottamam  yattu pauruṣayatnena kṛtaṃ tanmadhyamaṃ bhavet  
rudrā kṣadhāraṇaṃ prāptaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam  rudra saṃkhyāśataṃ dhṛtvā rudra rūpo bhavennaraḥ  
ekādaśaśatānīha dhṛtvā yatphalamāpyate  tatphalaṃ śakyate naiva vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi  
śatārddhena yutaiḥ paṃcaśatairvai mukuṭaṃ matam  rudrā kṣairviracetsamyagbhaktimānpuruṣo varaḥ  
tribhiḥ śataiḥ ṣaṣṭiyuktaistrirāvṛttyā tathā punaḥ  rudrā kṣairupavītaṃ va nirmīyādbhaktitatparaḥ  
śikhāyāṃ ca trayaṃ proktaṃ rudra kṣāṇāṃ maheśvari  karṇayoḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaṭcaiva vāmadakṣiṇayostathā  
śatamekottaraṃ kaṃṭhe bāhvorvai rudra saṃkhyayā  kūrparadvārayostatra maṇibaṃdhe tathā punaḥ  
upavīte trayaṃ dhāryaṃ śivabhaktiratairnaraiḥ  śeṣānurvaritānpaṃca sammitāndhārayetkaṭau  
etatsaṃkhyā dhṛtā yena rudrā kṣāḥ parameśvari  tadrū paṃ tu praṇamyaṃ hi stutyaṃ sarvairmaheśavat  
evaṃbhūtaṃ sthitaṃ dhyāne yadā kṛtvāsanairjanam  śiveti vyāharaṃścaiva dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate  
śatādikasahasrasya vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ  tadabhāve prakāronyaḥ śubhaḥ saṃprocyate mayā  
śikhāyāmekarudrā kṣaṃ śirasā triṃśataṃ vahet  paṃcāśacca gale dadhyādbāhvoḥ ṣoḍaśa ṣoḍaśa  
maṇibaṃdhe dvādaśadviskaṃdhe paṃcaśataṃ vahet  aṣṭottaraśatairmālyamupavītaṃ prakalpayet  
evaṃ sahasrarudrā kṣāndhārayedyo dṛḍhavrataḥ  taṃ namaṃti surāḥ sarve yathā rudra stathaiva saḥ  
ekaṃ śikhāyāṃ rudrā kṣaṃ catvāriṃśattu mastake  dvātriṃśatkaṇṭhadeśe tu vakṣasyaṣṭottaraṃ śatam  
ekaikaṃ karṇayoḥ ṣaṭṣaḍbāhvoḥ ṣoḍaśa ṣoḍaśa  karayoravimānena dviguṇena munīśvara  
saṃkhyā prītirdhṛtā yena sopi śaivajanaḥ paraḥ  śivavatpūjanīyo hi vaṃdyassarvairabhīkṣṇaśaḥ  
śirasīśānamaṃtreṇa karṇe tatpuruṣeṇa ca  aghoreṇa gale dhāryaṃ tenaiva hṛdayepi ca  
aghorabījamaṃtreṇa karayordhārayetsudhīḥ  paṃcadaśākṣagrathitāṃ vāmadevena codare  
paṃca brahmabhiraṃgaśca trimālāṃ paṃcasapta ca  athavā mūlamaṃtreṇa sarvānakṣāṃstudhārayet  
madyaṃ māṃsaṃ tu laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ śigrumeva ca  śleṣmāṃtakaṃ viḍvarāhaṃ bhakṣaṇe varjayettataḥ  
valakṣaṃ rudrā kṣaṃ dvijatanubhireveha vihitaṃ suraktaṃ kṣattrāṇāṃ pramuditamume pītamasakṛt  
chinnaṃ khaṃḍitaṃ bhinnaṃ vidīrṇa  tato vaiśyairdhāryaṃ pratidivasabhāvaśyakamaho tathā kṛṣṇaṃ śūdrai ḥ śrutigaditamārgoyamagaje  
varṇī vanī gṛhayatīrniyamena dadhyādetadra hasyaparamo na hi jātu tiṣṭhet  rudrā kṣadhāraṇamidaṃ sukṛtaiśca labhyaṃ tyaktvedametadakhilānnarakānprayāṃti  
ādāvāmalakātsvato laghutarā rugṇāstataḥ kaṃṭakaiḥ saṃdaṣṭāḥ kṛmibhistanūpakaraṇacchidre ṇa hīnāstathā  dhāryā naiva śubhepsubhiścaṇakavadrudrā kṣamapyaṃtato rudrā kṣomama liṃgamaṃgalamume sūkṣmaṃ praśastaṃ sadā  
sarvāśramāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ strīśūdrā ṇāṃ śivājñayā  dhāryāḥ sadaiva rudrā kṣā yatīnāṃ praṇavena hi  
divā bibhradrā trikṛtai rātrau vibhraddivākṛtaiḥ  prātarmadhyāhnasāyāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ  
ye tripuṇḍradharā loke jaṭādhāriṇa eva ye  ye rudrā kṣadharāste vai yamalokaṃ prayāṃti na  
rudrā kṣamekaṃ śirasā bibharti tathā tripuṇḍraṃ ca lalāṭamadhye  paṃcākṣaraṃ ye hi japaṃti maṃtraṃ pūjyā bhavadbhiḥ khalu te hi sādhavaḥ  
yasyāṇge nāsti rudrā kṣastripuṇḍraṃ bhālapaṭṭake  mukhe paṃcākṣaraṃ nāsti tamānaya yamālayam  
jñātvā jñātvā tatprabhāvaṃ bhasmarudrā kṣadhāriṇaḥ  te pūjyāḥ sarvadāsmākaṃ no netavyāḥ kadācana  
evamājñāpayāmāsa kālopi nijakiṇkarān  tatheti mattvā te sarve tūṣṇīmāsansuvismitāḥ  
ata eva mahādevi rudrā kṣotyaghanāśanaḥ  taddharo matpriyaḥ śuddho'tyaghavānapi pārvati  
haste bāhau tathā mūrdhni rudrā kṣaṃ dhārayettu yaḥ  avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudra rūpī caredbhuvi  
surāsurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vaṃdanīyaḥ sadā sa vai  pūjanīyo hi dṛṣṭasya pāpahā ca yathā śivaḥ  
dhyānajñānāvamuktopi rudrā kṣaṃ dhārayettu yaḥ  sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim  
rudrā kṣeṇa japanmantraṃ puṇyaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet  daśakoṭiguṇaṃ puṇyaṃ dhāraṇāllabhate naraḥ  
yāvatkālaṃ hi jīvasya śarīrastho bhavetsa vai  tāvatkālaṃ svalpamṛtyurna taṃ devi vibādhate  
tripuṃḍreṇa ca saṃyuktaṃ rudrā kṣāvilasāṃgakam  mṛtyuṃjayaṃ japaṃtaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rudra phalaṃ labhet  
paṃcadevapriyaścaiva sarvadevapriyastathā  sarvamantrāñjapedbhakto rudrā kṣamālayā priye  
viṣṇvādidevabhaktāśca dhārayeyurna saṃśayaḥ  rudra bhakto viśeṣeṇa rudrā kṣāndhārayetsadā  
rudrā kṣā vividhāḥ proktāsteṣāṃ bhedānvadāmyaham  śṛṇu pārvati sadbhaktyā bhuktimuktiphalapradān  
ekavaktraḥ śivaḥ sākṣādbhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ  tasya darśanamātreṇa brahmahatyā vyapohati  
yatra saṃpūjitastatra lakṣmīrdūratarā na hi  naśyaṃtyupadra vāḥ sarve sarvakāmā bhavaṃti hi  
dvivaktro devadeveśassarvakāmaphalapradaḥ  viśeṣataḥ sa rudrā kṣo govadhaṃ nāśayeddrutam  
trivaktro yo hi rudrā kṣaḥ sākṣātsādhanadassadā  tatprabhāvādbhaveyurvai vidyāḥ sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ  
caturvaktraḥ svayaṃ brahmā narahatyāṃ vyapohati  darśanātsparśanātsadyaścaturvargaphalapradaḥ  
paṃcavaktraḥ svayaṃ rudra ḥ kālāgnirnāmataḥ prabhuḥ  sarvamuktipradaścaiva sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ  
agamyāgamanaṃ pāpamabhakṣyasya ca bhakṣaṇam  ityādisarvapāpāni paṃcavaktro vyapohati  
ṣaḍvaktraḥ kārtikeyastudhāraṇāddakṣiṇe bhuje  brahmahatyādikaiḥ pāpairmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
saptavaktro maheśāni hyanaṃgo nāma nāmataḥ  dhāraṇāttasya deveśidaridro pīśvaro bhavet  
rudrā kṣaścāṣṭavaktraśca vasumūrtiśca bhairavaḥ  dhāraṇāttasya pūrṇāyurmṛto bhavati śūlabhṛt  
bhairavo navavaktraśca kapilaśca muniḥ smṛtaḥ  durgā vāta dadhiṣṭhātrī navarūpā maheśvarī  
taṃ dhārayedvāmahaste rudrā kṣaṃ bhaktitatparaḥ  sarveśvaro bhavennūnaṃ mama tulyo na saṃśayaḥ  
daśavaktro maheśāni svayaṃ devo janārdanaḥ  dhāraṇāttasya deveśi sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt  
ekādaśamukho yastu rudrā kṣaḥ parameśvari  sa rudro dhāraṇāttasya sarvatra vijayī bhavet  
dvādaśāsyaṃ tu rudrā kṣaṃ dhārayetkeśadeśake  ādityāścaiva te sarvedvādaśaiva sthitāstathā  
trayodaśamukho viśvedevastaddhāraṇānnaraḥ  sarvānkāmānavāpnoti saubhāgyaṃ maṃgalaṃlabhet  
caturdaśamukho yo hi rudrā kṣaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ  dhārayenmūrdhni taṃ bhaktyā sarvapāpaṃ praṇaśyati  
iti rudrā kṣabhedā hi proktā vai mukhabhedataḥ  tattanmaṃtrāñchṛṇu prītyā kramācchailleśvarātmaje  
oṃ hrīṃ namaḥ  oṃ namaḥ  oṃ klīṃ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ huṃ namaḥ  oṃ huṃnamaḥ  oṃ huṃ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ huṃ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ namaḥ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ huṃ namaḥ  oṃ krauṃ kṣauṃ rauṃ namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ namaḥ  oṃ nama  
bhaktiśraddhā yutaścaiva sarvakāmārthasiddhaye  rudrā kṣāndhārayenmaṃtrairdevanālasya varjitaḥ  
vinā maṃtreṇa ho dhatte rudrā kṣaṃ bhuvi mānavaḥ  sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvadindrā ścaturdaśa  
rudrā kṣamālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūtapretapiśācakāḥ  ḍākinīśākinī caiva ye cānye dro hakārakāḥ  
kṛtrimaṃ caiva yatkiṃcidabhicārādikaṃ ca yat  tatsarvaṃ dūrato yāti dṛṣṭvā śaṃkitavigraham  
rudrā kṣamālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā śivo viṣṇuḥ prasīdati  devīgaṇapatissūryaḥ surāścānyepi pārvati  
evaṃ jñātvā tu māhātmyaṃ rudrā kṣasya maheśvari  samyagdhāryāssamaṃtrāśca bhaktyādharmavivṛddhaye  
ityuktaṃ girijāgre hi śivena paramātmanā  bhasmarūdrā kṣamāhātmyaṃ bhuktimuktiphalapradam  
śivasyātipriyau jñeyau bhasmarudrā kṣadhāriṇau  taddhāraṇaprabhāvaddhi bhuktirmuktirna saṃśayaḥ  
bhasmarudrā kṣadhārī yaḥ śivabhaktassa ucyate  paṃcākṣarajapāsaktaḥ paripūrṇaśca sanmukhe  
vinā bhasmatripuṃḍreṇa vinā rudrā kṣamālayā  pūjitopi mahādevo nābhīṣṭaphaladāyakaḥ  
tatsarvaṃ ca samākhyātaṃ yatpṛṣṭaṃ hi munīśvara  bhasmarudrā kṣamāhātmyaṃ sarvakāmasamṛddhidam  
etadyaḥ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ māhātmyaparamaṃ śubham  rudrā kṣabhasmanorbhaktyāsarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt  
iha sarvasukhaṃ bhuktvā putrapautrādisaṃyutaḥ  labhetparatra sanmokṣaṃ śivasyātipriyo bhavet  
vidyeśvarasaṃhiteyaṃ kathitā vo munīśvarāḥ  sarvasiddhipradā nityaṃ muktidā śivaśāsanāt  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe prathamāyāṃ vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe rudrā kṣamahātmyavarṇanonāma pañcaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
viśvodbhavasthitilayādiṣu hetumekaṃ gaurīpartividitatattvamanantakīrtim  māyāśrayamvigatamāyamaciṃtyarūpambodhasvarūpamamalaṃ hi śivannamāmi  
vande śivantamprakṛteranādimpraśāntamekampuruṣottamaṃ hi  svamāyayā kṛtsnamidaṃ hi sṛṣṭvā nabhovadantarbahirāsthito yaḥ  
vandetarasthaṃ nijagūḍharūpaṃ śivaṃsvatassraṣṭumidamvicaṣṭe  jaganti nityamparito bhramaṃti yatsannidhau cumbakalohavattam  
vyāsa uvāca  jagataḥ pitaraṃ śambhuñjagato mātaraṃ śivām  tatputraśca gaṇādhīśannatvaitadvarṇayāmahe  
ekadā munayassarve naimiṣāraṇya vāsinaḥ  papracchurvarayā bhaktyā sūtante śaunakādayaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāḥ śrutā sā satkathā śubhā  sādhyasādhanakhaṃḍā khyā ramyādyā bhaktavatsalā  
sūta sūta mahābhāga cirañjīva sukhī bhava  yacchrāvayasi nastāta śāṃkarīṃ paramāṃ kathām  
pibantastvanmukhāmbhojacyutaṃ jñānāmṛtamvayam  avitṛptāḥ punaḥ kiṃcitpraṣṭumicchāmahe'nagha  
vyāsaprasādātsarvajño prāpto'si kṛtakṛtyatām  nājñātamvidyate kiṃcidbhūtaṃ bhabyaṃ bhavacca yat  
gurorvyāsasya sadbhaktyā samāsādya kṛpāṃ parām  sarvaṃ jñātaṃ viśeṣeṇa sarvaṃ sārthaṃ kṛtaṃ januḥ  
idānīṃ kathaya prājña śivarūpamanuttamam  divyāni vai caritrāṇi śivayorapyaśeṣataḥ  
aguṇo guṇatāṃ yāti kathaṃ loke maheśvaraḥ  śivatattvaṃ vayaṃ sarve na jānīmo vicārataḥ  
sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ śaṃbhussvarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate  sṛṣṭimadhye sa hi kathaṃ krīḍansaṃvarttate prabhuḥ  
tadante ca kathandevassa tiṣṭhati maheśvaraḥ  kathamprasannatāṃ yāti śaṃkaro lokaśaṃkaraḥ  
sa prasanno maheśānaḥ kiṃ prayacchati satphalam  svabhaktebhyaḥ parebhyaśca tatsarvaṃ kathayasva naḥ  
sadyaḥ prasanno bhagavānbhavatītyanuśaśruma  bhaktaprayāsaṃ sa mahānna paśyati dayāparaḥ  
brahmāviṣṇurmaheśaśca trayo devāśśivāṃgajāḥ  maheśastatra pūrṇāṃśassvayameva śivo'paraḥ  
tasyāvirbhāvamākhyāhi caritāni viśeṣataḥ  umāvirbhāvamākhyāhi tadvivāhaṃ tathā prabho  
tadgārhasthyaṃ viśeṣeṇa tathā līlāḥ parā api  etatsarvaṃ tadanyacca kathanīyaṃ tvayā'nagha  
vyāsa uvāca  iti pṛṣṭastadā taistu sūto harṣasamanvitaḥ  smṛtvā śaṃbhupadāṃbhojampratyuvāca munīśvarān  
sūta uvāca  samyakpṛṣṭaṃ bhavadbhiśca dhanyā yūyaṃ munīśvarāḥ  sadāśivakathāyāṃ vo yajjātā naiṣṭhikī matiḥ  
sadāśivakathāpraśnaḥ puruṣāṃstrīnpunāti hi  vaktāraṃ pṛcchakaṃ śrotṝñjāhnavīsalilaṃ yathā  
śaṃbhorguṇānuvādātko virajyeta pumāndvijāḥ  vinā paśughnaṃ trividhajanānandakarātsadā  
gīyamāno vitṛṣṇaiśca bhavarogauṣadho'pi hi  manaḥśrotrābhirāmaśca yattassarvārthadassa vai  
kathayāmi yathābuddhi bhavatpraśnānusārataḥ  śivalīlāṃ prayatnena dvijāstāṃ śṛṇutādarāt  
bhavadbhiḥ pṛcchyate yadvattattathā nāradena vai  pṛṣṭaṃ pitre preritena hariṇā śivarūpiṇā  
brahmā śrutvā sutavacaśśivabhaktaḥ prasannadhīḥ  jagau śivayaśaḥ prītyā harṣayanmunisattamam  
vyāsa  sūtoktamiti tadvākyamākarṇya dvijasattamāḥ  papracchustatsusaṃvādaṃ kutūhalasamanvitāḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta sūta mahābhāga śaivottama mahāmate  śrutvā tava vaco ramyaṃ ceto nassakutūhalam  
kadā babhūva sukhakṛdvidhināradayormahān  saṃvādo yatra giriśasu līlā bhavamocinī  
vidhināradasaṃvādapūrvakaṃ śāṃkaraṃ yaśaḥ  brūhi nastāta tatprītyā tattatpraśnānusārataḥ  
ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām  sūtaḥ provāca suprītastatsaṃvādānusārataḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne munipraśnavarṇano nāma prathamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  etasminsamaye viprā nārado munisattamaḥ  brahmaputro vinītātmā taporthaṃ mana ādadhe  
himaśailaguhā kācidekā paramaśobhanā  yatsamīpe suranadī sadā vahati vegataḥ  
tatrāśramo mahādivyo nānāśobhāsamanvitaḥ  taporthaṃ sa yayau tatra nārado divyadarśanaḥ  
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā muniśārdūlastepe sa suciraṃ tapaḥ  badhvāsanaṃ dṛḍhaṃ maunī prāṇānāyamya śuddhadhīḥ  
cakre munissamādhiṃ tamahambrahmeti yatra ha  vijñānaṃ bhavati brahmasākṣātkārakaraṃ dvijāḥ  
itthaṃ tapati tasminvai nārade munisattame  cakaṃpe'tha śunāsīro manassaṃtāpavihvalaḥ  
manasīti viciṃtyāsau munirme rājyamicchati  tadvighnakaraṇārthaṃ hi hariryatnamiyeṣa saḥ  
sasmāra smaraṃ śakraścetasā devanāyakaḥ  ājagāma drutaṃ kāmassamadhīrmahiṣīsutaḥ  
athāgataṃ smaraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbodhya surarāṭ prabhuḥ  uvāca taṃ prapaśyāśu svārthe kuṭilaśemuṣiḥ  
indra uvāca  mitravaryya mahāvīra sarvadā hitakāraka  śṛṇu prītyā vaco me tvaṃ kuru sāhāyyamātmanā  
tvadbalānme bahūnāñca tapogarvo vināśitaḥ  madrājyasthiratā mitra tvadanugrahatassadā  
himaśailaguhāyāṃ hi munistapati nāradaḥ  manasoddiśya viśveśaṃ mahāsaṃyamavāndṛḍhaḥ  
yācenna vidhito rājyaṃ sa mameti viśaṃkitaḥ  adyaiva gaccha tatra tvaṃ tattapovighnamācara  
ityājñapto mahendreṇa sa kāmassamadhu priyaḥ  jagāma tatsthalaṃ garvādupāyaṃ svañcakāra ha  
racayāmāsa tatrāśu svakalāssakalā api  vasaṃtopi svaprabhāvaṃ cakāra vividhaṃ madāt  
na babhūva muneśceto vikṛtaṃ munisattamāḥ  bhraṣṭo babhūva tadgarvo maheśānugraheṇa ha  
śṛṇutādaratastatra kāraṇaṃ śaunakādayaḥ  īśvarānugraheṇātra na prabhāvaḥ smarasya hi  
atraiva śambhunā'kāri sutapaśca smarāriṇā  atraiva dagdhastenāśu kāmo munitapopahaḥ  
kāmajīvanahetorhi ratyā saṃprārthitaissuraiḥ  samprārthita uvācedaṃ śaṃkaro lokaśaṃkaraḥ  
kaṃcitsamayamāsādya jīviṣyati surāḥ smaraḥ  paraṃ tviha smaropāyaścariṣyati na kaścana  
iha yāvaddṛśyate bhūrjanaiḥ sthitvā'marāssadā  kāmabāṇaprabhāvotra na caliṣyatyasaṃśayam  
iti śaṃbhūktitaḥ kāmo mithyātmagatikastadā  nārade sa jagāmāśu divamindrasamīpataḥ  
ācakhyau sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca muneḥ smaraḥ  tadājñayā yayau sthānaṃ svakīyaṃ sa madhupriyaḥ  
vismitobhūtsurādhīśaḥ praśaśaṃsātha nāradam  tadvṛttāṃtānabhijño hi mohitaśśivamāyayā  
durjñeyā śāṃbhavī māyā sarveṣāṃ prāṇināmiha  bhaktaṃ vinārpitātmānaṃ tayā saṃmohyate jagat  
nārado'pi ciraṃ tasthau tatreśānugraheṇa ha  pūrṇaṃ matvā tapastatsvaṃ virarāma tato muniḥ  
kāmopyajeyaṃ nijaṃ matvā garvito'bhūnmunīśvaraḥ  vṛthaiva vigatajñānaśśivamāyāvimohitaḥ  
dhanyā dhanyā mahāmāyā śāṃbhavī munisattamāḥ  tadgatiṃ na hi paśyaṃti viṣṇubrahmādayopi hi  
tayā saṃmohitotīva nārado munisattamaḥ  kailāsaṃ prayayau śīghraṃ svavṛttaṃ gadituṃ madī  
rudraṃ natvābravītsarvaṃ svavṛttaṅgarvavānmuniḥ  matvātmānaṃ mahātmānaṃ svaprabhuñca smarañjayam  
tacchrutvā śaṃkaraḥ prāha nāradaṃ bhaktavatsalaḥ  svamāyāmohitaṃ hetvanabhijñaṃ bhraṣṭacetasam  
rudra uvāca  he tāta nārada prājña dhanyastvaṃ śṛṇu madvacaḥ  vācyamevaṃ na kutrāpi hareragre viśeṣataḥ  
pṛcchamāno'pi na brūyāḥ svavṛttaṃ me yaduktavān  gopyaṃ gopyaṃ sarvathā hi naiva vācyaṃ kadācana  
śāsmyahaṃ tvāṃ viśeṣeṇa mama priyatamo bhavān  viṣṇubhakto yatastvaṃ hi tadbhaktotīva me'nugaḥ  
śāstismetthañca bahuśo rudrassūtikaraḥ prabhuḥ  nārado na hitaṃ mene śivamāyāvimohitaḥ  
prabalā bhāvinī karma gatirjñeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ  na nivāryā janaiḥ kaiścidapīcchā saiva śāṃkarī  
tatassa munivaryo hi brahmalokaṃ jagāma ha  vidhiṃ natvā'bravītkāmajayaṃ svasya tapobalāt  
tadākarṇya vidhissotha smṛtvā śambhupadāmbujam  jñātvā sarvaṃ kāraṇaṃ tanniṣiṣedha sutaṃ tadā  
mene hitanna vidhyuktaṃ nārado jñānisattamaḥ  śivamāyāmohitaśca rūḍhacittamadāṃkuraḥ  
śivecchā yādṛśī loke bhavatyeva hi sā tadā  tadadhīnaṃ jagatsarvaṃ vacastaṃtyāṃta sthitaṃ yataḥ  
nārado'tha yayau śīghraṃ viṣṇulokaṃ vinaṣṭadhīḥ  madāṃkuramanā vṛttaṃ gadituṃ svaṃ tadagrataḥ  
āgacchaṃtaṃ munindṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ viṣṇurādarāt  utthitvāgre gato'raṃ taṃ śiśleṣajñātahetukaḥ  
svāsane samupāveśya smṛtvā śivapadāmbujam  hariḥ prāha vacastathyaṃ nāradaṃ madanāśanam  
viṣṇuruvāca  kuta āgamyate tāta kimarthamiha cāgataḥ  dhanyastvaṃ muniśārdūla tīrtho'haṃ tu tavāgamāt  
viṣṇuvākyamiti śrutvā nārado garvito muniḥ  svavṛttaṃ sarvamācaṣṭa samadaṃ madamohitaḥ  
śrutvā munivaco viṣṇussamadaṃ kāraṇaṃ tataḥ  jñātavānakhilaṃ smṛtvā śivapādāmbujaṃ hṛdi  
tuṣṭāva giriśaṃ bhaktyā śivātmā śaivarāḍ hariḥ  sāṃjalirvisudhīrnamramastakaḥ parameśvaram  
viṣṇuruvāca  devadeva mahādeva prasīda parameśvara  dhanyastvaṃ śiva dhanyā te māyā sarva vimohinī  
ityādi sa stutiṃ kṛtvā śivasya paramātmanaḥ  nimīlya nayane dhyātvā virarāma padāmbujam  
yatkartavyaṃ śaṃkarasya sa jñātvā viśvapālakaḥ  śivaśāsanataḥ prāha hṛdātha munisattamam  
viṣṇuruvāca  dhanyastvaṃ muniśārdūla taponidhirudāradhīḥ  bhaktitrikaṃ na yasyāsti kāmamohādayo mune  
vikārāstasya sadyo vai bhavaṃtyakhiladuḥkhadāḥ  naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī tvaṃ jñānavairāgyavānsadā  
kathaṃ kāmavikārī syā janmanā vikṛtassudhīḥ  ityādyuktaṃ vaco bhūri śrutvā sa munisattamaḥ  
vijahāsa hṛdā natvā pratyuvāca vaco harim  nārada uvāca  kiṃ prabhāvaḥ smaraḥ svāminkṛpā yadyasti te mayi  
ityuktvā harimānamya yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne nāradatapovarṇanaṃ nāma dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūtasūta mahābhāga vyāsaśiṣya namo'stu te  adbhuteyaṃ kathā tāta varṇitā kṛpayā hi naḥ  
munau gate haristāta kiṃ cakāra tataḥ param  nāradopi gataḥ kutra tanme vyākhyātumarhasi  
vyāsa uvāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ sūtaḥ paurāṇikottamaḥ  pratyuvāca śivaṃ smṛtvā nānāsūtikaraṃ budhaḥ  
sūta uvāca  munau yadṛcchayā viṣṇurgate tasminhi nārade  śivecchayā cakārāśu māyā māyāviśāradaḥ  
munimārgasya madhye tu virece nagaraṃ mahat  śatayojanavistāramadbhutaṃ sumanoharam  
svalokādadhikaṃ ramyaṃ nānāvastuvirājitam  naranārīvihārāḍhyaṃ caturvarṇākulaṃ param  
tatra rājā śīlanirdhirnāmaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ  sutāsvayamvarodyukto mahotsavasamanvitaḥ  
caturdigbhyaḥ samāyātaissaṃyutaṃ nṛpanandataiḥ  nānāveṣaissuśobhaiśca tatkanyāvaraṇotsukaiḥ  
etādṛśampuraṃ dṛṣṭvā mohamprāpto'tha nāradaḥ  kautukī tannṛpadvāraṃ jagāma madanedhitaḥ  
āgataṃ munivaryaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā śīlanidhirnṛpaḥ  upaveśyārcayāṃcakre ratnasiṃhāsane vare  
atha rājā svatanayāṃ nāmataśśrīmatīṃ varām  samānīya nāradasya pādayossamapātayat  
tatkanyāṃ prekṣya sa munirnāradaḥ prāha vismitaḥ  keyaṃ rājanmahābhāgā kanyā surasutopamā  
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā prāha kṛtāṃjaliḥ  duhiteyaṃ mama mune śrīmatī nāma nāmataḥ  
pradānasamayaṃ prāptā varamanveṣatī śubham  sā svayaṃvarasaṃprāptā sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitā  
asyā bhāgyaṃ vada mune sarvaṃ jātakamādarāt  kīdṛśaṃ tanayeyaṃ me varamāpsyati tadvada  
ityukto muniśārdūlastāmicchuḥ kāmavihvalaḥ  samābhāṣya sa rājānaṃ nārado vākyamabravīt  
suteyaṃ tava bhūpāla sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitā  mahābhāgyavatī dhanyā lakṣmīriva guṇālayā  
sarveśvaro'jito vīro girīśasadṛśo vibhuḥ  asyāḥ patirdhruvaṃ bhāvī kāmajitsurasattamaḥ  
ityuktvā nṛpamāmaṃtrya yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ  babhūva kāmavivaśaśśivamāyā vimohitaḥ  
citte vicintya sa munirāpnuyāṃ kathamenakām  svayaṃvare nṛpālānāmekaṃ māṃ vṛṇuyātkatham  
saundaryaṃ sarvanārīṇāṃ priyaṃ bhavati sarvathā  taddṛṣṭvaiva prasannā sā svavaśā nātra saṃśayaḥ  
vidhāyetthaṃ viṣṇurūpaṃ grahītuṃ munisattamaḥ  viṣṇulokaṃ jagāmāśu nāradaḥ smaravihvalaḥ  
praṇipatya hṛṣīkeśaṃ vākyametaduvāca ha  rahasi tvāṃ pravakṣyāmi svavṛttāntamaśeṣataḥ  
tathetyukte tathā bhūte śivecchā kāryakarta hi  brūhītyuktavati śrīśe munirāha ca keśavam  
nārada uvāca  tvadīyo bhūpatiḥ śīlanidhissa vṛṣatatparaḥ  tasya kanyā viśālākṣī śrīmatīvaravarṇinī  
jaganmohinyabhikhyātā trailokyepyati sundarī  pariṇetumahaṃ viṣṇo tāmicchāmyadya mā ciram  
svayaṃvaraṃ cakarāsau bhūpatistanayecchayā  caturdigbhyaḥ samāyātā rājaputrāssahasraśaḥ  
yadi dāsyasi rūpaṃ me tadā tāṃ prāpnuyāṃ dhruvam  tvadrūpaṃ sā vinā kaṃṭhe jayamālāṃ na dhāsyati  
svarūpaṃ dehi me nātha sevako'haṃ priyastava  vṛṇuyānmāṃ yathā sā vai śrīmatī kṣitipātmajā  
suta uvāca  vacaḥ śrutvā muneritthaṃ vihasya madhusūdanaḥ  śāṃkarīṃ prabhutāṃ buddhvā pratyuvāca dayāparaḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  sveṣṭadeśaṃ mune gaccha kariṣyāmi hitaṃ tava  bhiṣagvaro yathārttasya yataḥ priyataro'si me  
ityuktvā munaye tasmai dadau viṣṇurmukhaṃ hare  svarūpamanugṛhyāsya tirodhānaṃ jagāma saḥ  
evamukto munirhṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ prāpya vai hareḥ  mene kṛtārthamātmānaṃ tadyatnaṃ na bubodha saḥ  
atha tatra gataḥ śīghrannārado munisattamaḥ  cakre svayamvaraṃ yatra rājaputraissamākulam  
svayamvarasabhā divyā rājaputrasamāvṛtā  śuśubhe'tīva viprendrā yathā śakrasa bhā parā  
tasyāṃ nṛpasabhāyāṃ vai nāradaḥ samupāviśat  sthitvā tatra vicintyeti prītiyuktena cetasā  
māṃ variṣyati nānyaṃ sā viṣṇurūpadharandhruvam  ānanasya kurūpatvaṃ na veda munisattamaḥ  
pūrvarūpaṃ muniṃ sarve dadṛśu'statra mānavāḥ  tadbhedaṃ bubudhuste na rājaputrādayo dvijāḥ  
tatra rudragaṇau dvau tadrakṣaṇārthaṃ samāgatau  viprarūpadharau gūḍhau tatredaṃ jajñatuḥ param  
mūḍha matvā muniṃ tau tannikaṭaṃ jagmaturgaṇau  kurutastatprahāsaṃ vai bhāṣamāṇau parasparam  
paśya nārada rūpaṃ hi viṣṇoriva mahottamam  mukhaṃ tu vānarasyeva vikaṭaṃ ca bhayaṃkaram
