icchatyayaṃ nṛpasutā vṛthaiva smaramohitaḥ  ityuktvā sacchalaṃ vākyamupahāsaṃ pracakratuḥ  
na śuśrāva yathārthaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ smaravihvalaḥ  paryaikṣacchrīmatīṃ tāṃ vai tallipsurmohito muniḥ  
etasminnaṃtare bhūpakanyā cāṃtaḥpurāttu sā  strībhissamāvṛtā tatrājagāma varavarṇinī  
mālāṃ hiraṇmayīṃ ramyāmādāya śubha kṣaṇā  tatra svayambare reje sthitā madhye rameva sā  
babhrāma sā sabhāṃ sarvāṃ mālāmādāya suvratā  varamanveṣatī tatra svātmābhīṣṭaṃ nṛpātmajā  
vānarāsyaṃ viṣṇutanuṃ muniṃ dṛṣṭvā cukopa sā  dṛṣṭiṃ nivārya ca tataḥ prasthitā prītamānasā  
na dṛṣṭvā svavaraṃ tatra trastāsīnmanasepsitam  aṃtassabhāsthitā kasminnarpayāmāsa na srajam  
etasminnaṃtare viṣṇurājagāma nṛpākṛtiḥ  na dṛṣṭaḥ kaiścidaparaiḥ kevalaṃ sā dadarśa hi  
atha sā taṃ samālokya prasannavadanāmbujā  arpayāmāsa tatkaṇṭhe tāṃ mālāṃ varavarṇinī  
tāmādāya tato viṣṇū rājarūpadharaḥ prabhuḥ  aṃtardhānamagātsadyassvasthānaṃ prayayau kila  
sarve rājakumārāśca nirāśāḥ śrīmatīmprati  munistu vihvalo'tīva babhūva madanāturaḥ  
tadā tāvūcatussadyo nāradaṃ svaravihvalam  viprarūpadharau rudragaṇau jñānaviśāradau  
gaṇāvūcatuḥ  he nāradamune tvaṃ hi vṛthā madanamohitaḥ  tallipsussvamukhaṃ paśya vānarasyeva garhitam  
sūta uvāca  ityākarṇya tayorvākyaṃ nārado vismito'bhavat  mukhaṃ dadarśa mukure śivamāyāvimohitaḥ  
svamukhaṃ vānarasyeva dṛṣṭvā cukrodha satvaram  śāpandadau tayostatra gaṇayormohito muniḥ  
yuvāṃ mamopahāsaṃ vai cakraturbrāhmaṇasya hi  bhavetāṃ rākṣasau vipravīryajau vai tadākṛtī  
śrutvā haragaṇāvitthaṃ svaśāpaṃ jñānisattamau  na kiṃcidūcatustau hi munimājñāya mohitam  
svasthānaṃ jagmaturviprā udāsīnau śivastutim  cakraturmanyamānau vai śivecchāṃ sakalāṃ sadā  
iti śrīśiva mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne nāradamohavarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta sūta mahāprājña varṇitā hyadbhutā kathā  dhanyā tu śāṃbhavī māyā tadadhīnaṃ carācaram  
gatayorgaṇayośśaṃbhossvayamātmecchayā vibhoḥ  kiṃ cakāra muniḥ kruddho nāradaḥ smaravihvalaḥ  
sūta uvāca  vimohito munirdattvā tayośśāpaṃ yathocitam  jale mukhaṃ nirīkṣyātha svarūpaṃ giriśecchayā  
śivecchayā na prabuddhaḥ smṛtvā harikṛtacchalam  krodhaṃ durviṣahaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇulokaṃ jagāma ha  
uvāca vacanaṃ kuddhassamiddha iva pāvakaḥ  duruktigarbhitaṃ vyaṅgaḥ naṣṭajñānaśśivecchayā  
nārada uvāca  he hare tvaṃ mahāduṣṭaḥ kapaṭī viśvamohanaḥ  parotsāhaṃ na sahase māyāvī malināśayaḥ  
mohinīrūpamādāya kapaṭaṃ kṛtavānpurā  asurebhyo'pāyayastvaṃ vāruṇīmamṛtaṃ na hi  
cetpibenna viṣaṃ rudro dayāṃ kṛtvā maheśvaraḥ  bhavennaṣṭā'khilā māyā tava vyājarate hare  
gatissa kapaṭā te'tipriyā viṣṇo viśeṣataḥ  sādhusvabhāvo na bhavānsvataṃtraḥ prabhuṇā kṛtaḥ  
kṛtaṃ samucitannaiva śivena paramātmanā  tatprabhāvabalaṃ dhyātvā svataṃtrakṛtikārakaḥ  
tvadgatiṃ susamājñāya paścāttāpamavāpa saḥ  vipraṃ sarvopari prāha svoktaveda pramāṇakṛt  
tajjñātvāhaṃ hare tvādya śikṣayiṣyāmi tadbalāt  yathā na kuryāḥ kutrāpīdṛśaṃ karma kadācana  
adyāpi nirbhayastvaṃ hi saṃgaṃ nāpastarasvinā  idānīṃ lapsyase viṣṇo phalaṃ svakṛtakarmaṇaḥ  
itthamuktvā hariṃ sotha munirmāyā vimohitaḥ  śaśāpa krodhanirviṇṇo brahmatejaḥ pradarśayan  
strīkṛte vyākulaṃ viṣṇo māmakārṣīrvimohakaḥ  anvakārṣīssvarūpeṇa yena kāpaṭyakāryakṛt  
tadrūpeṇa manuṣyastvaṃ bhava tadduḥkhabhugghare  yanmukhaṃ kṛtavānme tvaṃ te bhavaṃtu sahāyinaḥ  
tvaṃ strīviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ labhasva paraduḥkhadaḥ  manuṣyagatikaḥ prāyo bhavājñānavimohitaḥ  
iti śaptvā hariṃ mohānnārado'jñānamohitaḥ  viṣṇurjagrāha taṃ śāpaṃ praśaṃsañśāṃbhavīmajām  
atha śaṃbhurmahālīlo niścakarṣa vimohinīma  svamāyāṃ mohito jñānī nāradopyabhavadyayā  
aṃtarhitāyāṃ māyāyāṃ pūrvavanmatimānabhūt  nārado vismitamanāḥ prāptabodho nirākulaḥ  
paścāttāpamavāpyāti nininda svaṃ muhurmuhuḥ  praśaśaṃsa tadā māyāṃ śāṃbhavīṃ jñānimohinīm  
atha jñātvā munissarvaṃ māyāvibhramamātmanaḥ  apatatpādayorviṣṇornārado vaiṣṇavottamaḥ  
haryyupasthāpitaḥ prāha vacanaṃ naṣṭa durmatiḥ  mayā duraktayaḥ proktā mohitena kubuddhinā  
dattaśśāpo'pi tenātha vitathaṃ kuru taṃ prabho  mahatpāpamakārṣaṃ hi yāsyāmi nirayaṃ dhuvam  
kamupāyaṃ hare kuryāṃ dāso'haṃ te tamādiśa  yena pāpakulaṃ naśyennirayo na bhavenmama  
ityuktvā sa punarviṣṇoḥ pādayormunisattamaḥ  papāta sumatirbhaktyā paścāttāpamupāgataḥ  
atha viṣṇustamutthāpya babhāṣe sūnṛtaṃ vacaḥ  viṣṇuruvāca  na khedaṃ kuru me bhakta varastvaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ  
śṛṇu tāta pravakṣyāmi suhitaṃ tava niścayāt  
nirayaste na bhavitā śivaśśaṃ te vidhāsyati  
yadakārṣīśśivavaco vitathaṃ madamohitaḥ  sa dattavānīdṛśaṃ te phalaṃ karma phalapradaḥ  
śivecchā'khilaṃ jātaṃ kurvitthaṃ niścitāṃ matim  garvāpahartā sa svāmī śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ  
paraṃ brahma parātmā sa saccidānaṃdabodhanaḥ  nirguṇo nirvikāro ca rajassatvatamaḥpara  
sa evamādāya māyāṃ svāṃ tridhā bhavati rūpataḥ  brahmaviṣṇumaheśātmā nirguṇo'nirguṇo'pi saḥ  
nirguṇatve śivāhvo hi paramātmā maheśvaraḥ  paraṃ brahmāvyayo'naṃto mahādeveti gīyate  
tatsevayā vidhissraṣṭā pālako jagatāmaham  svayaṃ sarvasya saṃhārī rudrarūpeṇa sarvadā  
sākṣī śivasvarūpeṇa māyābhinnassa nirguṇaḥ  svecchācārī saṃvihārī bhaktānugrahakārakaḥ  
śṛṇu tvaṃ nārada mune sadupāyaṃ sukhapradam  sarvapāpāpaharttāraṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ sadā  
ityuktvāstvasaṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃkarasadyaśaḥ  śatanāmaśivastotraṃ sadānanyamatirjapa  
yajjapitvā drutaṃ sarvaṃ tava pāpaṃ vinaśyati  ityuktvā nāradaṃ viṣṇuḥ punaḥ prāha dayānvitaḥ  
mune na kuru śokaṃ tvaṃ tvayā kiṃcitkṛtaṃ nahi  svecchayā kṛtavānśaṃbhuridaṃ sarvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
ahārṣittvanmatiṃ divyāṃ kāma kleśamadātsa te  tvanmukhāddāpayāṃcakre śāpaṃ me sa maheśvaraḥ  
itthaṃ svacaritaṃ loke prakaṭīkṛtavān svayam  mṛtyuṃjayaḥ kālakālo bhaktoddhāraparāyaṇaḥ  
na me śivasamānosti priyaḥ svāmī sukhapradaḥ  sarvaśaktiprado me'sti sa eva parameśvaraḥ  
tasyopāsyāṃ kuru mune tameva satataṃ bhaja  tadyaśaḥ śṛṇu gāya tvaṃ kuru nityaṃ tadarcanam  
kāyena manasā vācā yaśśaṃkaramupaiti bho  sa paṇḍita iti jñeyassa jīvanmukta ucyate  
śiveti nāmadāvāgnermahāpātakapa rvatāḥ  bhasmībhavantyanāyāsātsatyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
pāpamūlāni duḥkhāni vividhānyapi tānyataḥ  śivārcanaikanaśyāni nānya naśyāni sarvathā  
sa vaidikasya puṇyātmā sa dhanyassa budho mune  yassadā kāyavākcittaiśśaraṇaṃ yāti śaṃkaram  
bhavaṃti vividhā dharmā yeṣāṃ sadyaḥphalonmukhāḥ  teṣāṃ bhavati viśvāsastripurāṃtakapūjane  
pātakāni vinaśyaṃti yāvaṃti śivapūjayā  bhuvi tāvaṃti pāpāni na saṃtyeva mahāmune  
brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ rāśayopyamitā mune  śivasmṛtyā vinaśyaṃti satyaṃsatyaṃ vadāmyaham  
śivanāmatarīṃ prāpya saṃsārābdhiṃ taraṃti te  saṃsāramūlapāpāni tasya naśyaṃtyasaṃśayam  
saṃsāramūlabhūtānāṃ pātakānāṃ mahāmune  śivanāmakuṭhāreṇa vināśo jāyate dhruvam  
śivanāmāmṛtaṃ peyaṃ pāpadāvānalārditaiḥ  pāpadāvāgnitaptānāṃ śāṃtistena vinā na hi  
śiveti nāmapīyūṣavarṣadhārāpariplutaḥ  saṃsāradavamadhyapi na śocati na saṃśayaḥ  
na bhaktiśśaṃkare puṃsāṃ rāgadveṣaratātmanām  tadvidhānāṃ hi sahasā muktirbhavati sarvathā  
anaṃtajanmabhiryena tapastaptaṃ bhaviṣyati  tasyaiva bhaktirbhavati bhavānī prāṇavallabhe  
jātāpi śaṃkare bhaktiranyasādhāraṇī vṛthā  paraṃ tvavyabhicāreṇa śivabhaktirapekṣitā  
yasyā sādhāraṇī śaṃbhau bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī  tasyaiva mokṣassulabho nāsyetinya matirmama  
kṛtvāpyanaṃtapāpāni yadi bhaktirmaheśvare  sarvapāpavinirmukto bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ  
bhavaṃti bhasmasādvṛkṣādavadagdhā yathā vane  tathā bhavaṃti dagdhāni śāṃkarāṇāmaghānyapi  
yo nityaṃ bhasmapūtāṃgo śivapūjonmukho bhavet  sa taratyeva saṃsāramapāramatidāruṇam  
brahmasvaharaṇaṃ kṛtvā hatvāpi brāhmaṇānbahūn  lipyate naraḥ pāpairvirūpākṣasya sevakaḥ  
vilokya vedānakhilāñchivasyaivārcanamparam  saṃsāranāśanopāya iti pūrvairviniścitam  
adyaprabhṛti yatnena sāvadhāno yathāvidhi  sāmbaṃ sadāśivaṃ bhaktyā bhaja nityaṃ maheśvaram  
āpādamastakaṃ samyak bhasmanoddhūlya sādaram  sarvaśrutiśrutaṃ śaivammaṃtrañjapa ṣaḍakṣaram  
savārṅgeṣu prayatnena rudrākṣāñchivavallabhān  dhārayasvātisadbhaktyā samantramvidhipūrvakam  
śṛṇu śaivīṃ kathāṃ nityaṃ vada śaivīṃ kathāṃ sadā  pūjayasvātiyatnena śivabhaktānpunaḥ punaḥ  
apramādena satataṃ śivaikaśaraṇo bhava  śivārcanena satatamānandaḥ prāpyate yataḥ  
urasyādhāya viśade śivasya caraṇāmbujau  śivatīrthāni vicara prathamaṃ munisattama  
paśyanmāhātmyamatulaṃ śaṃkarasya parātmanaḥ  gacchānandavanaṃ paścācchaṃbhupriyatamaṃ mune  
tatra viśveśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjanaṃ kuru bhaktitaḥ  natvā stutvā viśeṣeṇa nirvikalpo bhaviṣyasi  
tataśca bhavatā nūnaṃ vidheyaṃ gamanaṃ mune  brahmaloke svakāmārthaṃ śāsanānmama bhaktitaḥ  
natvā stutvā viśeṣeṇa vidhiṃ svajanakaṃ mune  praṣṭavyaṃ śivamāhātmyaṃ bahuśaḥ prītacetasā  
sa śaivapravaro brahmā māhātmyaṃ śaṃkarasya te  śrāvayiṣyati suprītyā śatanāmastavaṃ ca hi  
adyatastvaṃ bhava mune śaivaśśivaparāyaṇaḥ  muktibhāgī viśeṣeṇa śivaste śaṃ vidhāsyati  
itthaṃ viṣṇurmuniṃ prītyā hyupadiśya prasannadhīḥ  smṛtvā nutvā śivaṃ stutvā tatastvaṃtaradhīyata  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne nāradasya viṣṇūpadeśavarṇano nāma caturtho'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  aṃtarhite harau viprā nārado munisattamaḥ  vicacāra mahīṃ paśyañchivaliṃgāni bhaktitaḥ  
pṛthivyā aṭanaṃ kṛtvā śivarūpāṇyanekaśaḥ  dadarśa prītito viprā bhuktimuktipradāni saḥ  
atha taṃ vicaraṃtaṃ kau nāradaṃ divyadarśanam  jñātvā śaṃbhugaṇau tau tu sucittamupajagmatuḥ  
śirasā supraṇamyāśu gaṇāvūcaturādarāt  gṛhītvā caraṇau tasya śāpoddhārecchayā ca tau  
śivagaṇāvūcatuḥ  brahmaputra surarṣe hi śṛṇu prītyā vayorvacaḥ  tavāparādhakartārāvāvāṃ viprau na vastutaḥ  
āvāṃ haragaṇau vipra tavāgaskāriṇau mune  svayambare rājaputryā māyāmohitacetasā  
tvayā dattaśca nau śāpaḥ pareśapreritena ha  jñātvā kusamayaṃ tatra maunameva hi jīvanam  
svakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ prāptaṃ kasyāpi na hi dūṣaṇam  suprasanno bhava vibho kurvanugrahamadya nau  
sūta uvāca  vaca ākarṇya gaṇayoriti bhaktyuktamādarāt  pratyuvāca muniḥ prītyā paścāttāpamavāpya saḥ  
nārada uvāca  śṛṇutaṃ me mahādeva gaṇā mānyatamau satām  vacanaṃ sukhadaṃ mohanirmuktaṃ ca yathārthakam  
purā mama matirbhraṣṭāsīcchivecchāvaśāt yuvam  sarvathā mohamāpannaśśaptavānvāṃ kuśemuṣiḥ  
yaduktaṃ tattathā bhāvi tathāpi śṛṇutāṃ gaṇau  śāpoddhāramahaṃ vacmi kṣamathā maghamadya me  
vīryānmunivarasyāptvā rākṣaseśatvamādiśam  syātāṃ vibhavasaṃyuktau balino supratāpinau  
sarvabrahmāṃḍarājānau śivabhaktau jitendriyau  śivāparatanormṛtyuṃ prāpya svaṃ padamāpsyathaḥ  
sūta uvāca  ityākarṇya munervākyaṃ nāradasya mahātmanaḥ  ubhau haragaṇau prītau svaṃ padaṃ jagmaturmudā  
nārado'pi paraṃ prīto dhyāyañchivamananyadhīḥ  vicacāra mahīṃ paśyañchivatīrthānyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ  
kāśīṃ prāpyātha sa muniḥ sarvopari virājitām  śivapriyāṃ śaṃbhusukhapradāṃ śambhusvarūpiṇīm  
dṛṣṭvā kāśīṃ kṛtā'rthobhūtkāśīnāthaṃ dadarśa ha  ānarca parama prītyā paramānandasaṃyutaḥ  
sa mudaḥ sevyatāṃ kāśīṃ kṛtārtho munisattamaḥ  namansaṃvarṇayanbhaktyā saṃsmaranpremavihvalaḥ  
brahmalokaṃ jagāmātha śivasmaraṇasanmatiḥ  śivatattvaṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātumicchussa nāradaḥ  
natvā tatra vidhiṃ bhaktyā stutvā ca vividhaistavaiḥ  papraccha śivattatvaṃ śivasaṃbhaktamānasaḥ  
nārada uvāca  brahmanbrahmasvarūpajña pitāmaha jagatprabho  tvatprasādānmayā sarvaṃ viṣṇormāhātmyamuttamam  
bhaktimārgaṃ jñānamārgaṃ tapomārgaṃ sudustaram  dānamārgañca tīrthānāṃ mārgaṃ ca śrutavānaham  
na jñātaṃ śivatattvaṃ ca pūjāvidhimataḥ kramāt  caritraṃ vividhaṃ tasya nivedaya mama prabho  
nirguṇo'pi śivastāta saguṇaśśaṃkaraḥ katham  śivatattvaṃ na jānāmi mohitaśśivamāyayā  
sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ śaṃbhussvarūpeṇa pratiṣṭhitaḥ  sṛṣṭimadhye sa hi kathaṃ krīḍansaṃvartate prabhuḥ  
tadante ca kathaṃ devassa tiṣṭhati maheśvaraḥ  kathaṃ prasannatāṃ yāti śaṃkaro lokaśaṃkaraḥ  
saṃtuṣṭaśca svabhaktebhyaḥ parebhyaśca maheśvaraḥ  kiṃ phalaṃ yacchati vidhe tatsarvaṃ kathayasva me  
sadyaḥ prasanno bhagavānbhavatītyanusaṃśrutam  bhaktaprayāsaṃ sa mahānna paśyati dayāparaḥ  
brahmā viṣṇurmaheśaśca trayo devāśśivāṃśajāḥ  maheśastatra pūrṇāṃśassvayameva śivaḥ paraḥ  
tasyāvirbhāvamākhyāhi caritāni viśeṣataḥ  umāvirbhāvamākhyāhi tadvivāhaṃ tathā vibho  
tadgārhasthyaṃ viśeṣeṇa tathā līlāḥ parā api  etatsarvaṃ tathānyacca kathanīyaṃ tvayānagha  
tadutpattiṃ vivāhaṃ ca śivāyāstu viśeṣataḥ  prabrūhi me prajānātha guhajanma tathaiva ca  
bahubhyaśca śrutaṃ pūrvaṃ na tṛpto'smi jagatprabho  atastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaḥ kṛpāṃ kuru mamopari  
iti śrutvā vacastasya nāradasyāṃgajasya hi  uvāca vacanaṃ tatra brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne nāradapraśnavarṇanonāma pañcamo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  bho brahmansādhu pṛṣṭo'haṃ tvayā vibudhasattama  lokopakāriṇā nityaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
yacchrutvā sarvalokānāṃ sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet  tadahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śivatattvamanāmayam  
śivatattvaṃ mayā naiva viṣṇunāpi yathārthataḥ  jñātaśca paramaṃ rūpamadbhutaṃ ca pareṇa na  
mahāpralayakāle ca naṣṭe sthāvarajaṃgame  āsīttamomayaṃ sarvamanarkagrahatārakam  
acandramanahorātramanagnyanilabhūjalam  apradhānaṃ viyacchūnyamanyatejovivarjitam  
adṛṣṭatvādirahitaṃ śabdasparśasamujjhitam  avyaktagaṃdharūpaṃ ca rasatyaktamadiṅmukham  
itthaṃ satyaṃdhatamase sūcībhedyaṃ niraṃtare  tatsadbrahmeti yacchrutvā sadekaṃ pratipadyate  
itīdṛśaṃ yadā nāsīdyattatsadasadātmakam  yoginoṃtarhitākāśe yatpaśyaṃti niraṃtaram  
amanogocaramvācāṃ viṣayanna kadācana  anāmarūpavarṇaṃ ca na ca sthūlaṃ na yatkṛśam  
ahrasvadīrghamalaghugurutvaparivarjitam  na yatropacayaḥ kaścittathā nāpacayo'pi ca  
abhidhatte sa cakitaṃ yadastīti śrutiḥ punaḥ  satyaṃ jñānamanaṃtaṃ ca parānaṃdamparammahaḥ  
aprameyamanādhāramavikāramanākṛti  nirguṇaṃ yogigamyañca sarvavyāpyekakārakam  
nirvikalpaṃ nirāraṃbhaṃ nirmāyaṃ nirupadravam  advitīyamanādyantamavikāśaṃ cidātmakam  
yasyetthaṃ saṃvikalpaṃte saṃjñāsaṃjñoktitaḥ sma vai  kiyatā caiva kālena dvitīyecchā'bhavatkila  
amūrtena svamūrtiśca tenākalpi svalīlayā  sarvaiśvaryaguṇopetā sarvajñānamayī śubhā  
sarvagā sarvarūpā ca sarvadṛksarvakāriṇī  sarvekavaṃdyā sarvādyā sarvadā sarvasaṃskṛtiḥ  
parikalyeti tāṃ mūrtimaiśvarīṃ śuddharūpiṇīm  advitīyamanādyaṃtaṃ sarvābhāsaṃ cidātmakam  aṃtardadhe parākhyaṃ yadbrahma sarvagamavyayam  
amūrte yatparākhyaṃ vai tasya mūrtissadāśivaḥ  arvācīnāḥ parācīnā īśvaraṃ taṃ jagurbudhāḥ  
śaktistadaikalenāpi svairaṃ viharatā tanuḥ  svavigrahātsvayaṃ sṛṣṭā svaśarīrānapāyinī  
pradhānaṃ prakṛti tāṃ ca māyāṃ guṇavatīṃ parām  buddhitattvasya jananīmāhurvikṛtivarjitām  
sā śaktirambikā proktā prakṛtissakaleśvarī  tridevajananī nityā mūlakāraṇamityuta  
asyā aṣṭau bhujāścāsanvicitravadanā śubhā  rākācandrasahasrasya vadane bhāśca nityaśaḥ  
nānābharaṇasaṃyuktā nānāgatisamanvitā  nānāyudhadharā devī phullapaṃkajalocanā  
aciṃtyatejasā yuktā sarvayonissamudyatā  ekākinī yadā māyā saṃyogāccāpyanekikā  
paraḥ pumānīśvarassa śivaśśaṃbhuranīśvaraḥ  śīrṣe mandākinīdhārī bhālacandrastrilocanaḥ  
paṃcavaktraḥ prasannātmā daśabāhustriśūladhṛk  karpūragaurasusito bhasmoddhūlitavigrahaḥ  
yugapacca tayā śaktyā sākaṃ kālasvarūpiṇā  śivalokābhidhaṃ kṣetraṃ nirmitaṃ tena brahmaṇā  
tadeva kāśiketyetatprocyate kṣetramuttamam  paraṃ nirvāṇasaṃkhyānaṃ sarvopari virājitam  
tābhyāṃ ca ramamāṇābhyāṃ ca tasminkṣetre manorame  paramānaṃdarūpābhyāṃ paramānandarūpiṇī  
mune pralayakālepi na tatkṣetraṃ kadācana  vimuktaṃ hi śivābhyāṃ yadavimuktaṃ tato viduḥ  
asyānandavanaṃ nāma purākāri pinākinā  kṣetrasyānaṃdahetutvādavimuktamanaṃtaram  
athānandavane tasmiñcchivayo ramamāṇayoḥ  icchetyabhūtsurarṣe hi sṛjyaḥ kopyaparaḥ kila  
yasminyasya mahābhāramāvāṃ svasvairacāriṇau  nirvāṇadhāraṇaṃ kurvaḥ kevalaṃ kāśiśāyinau  
sa eva sarvaṃ kurutāṃ sa eva paripātu ca  sa eva saṃvṛṇotvaṃ te madanugrahatassadā  
cetassamudramākuṃcya ciṃtākallolalolitam  sattvaratnaṃ tamogrāhaṃ rajovidrumavallitam  
yasya prasādāttiṣṭhāvassukhamānaṃdakānane  parikṣiptamanovṛttau bahiściṃtāture sukham  
saṃpradhāryyeti sa vibhustayā śaktyā pareśvaraḥ  savye vyāpārayāṃcakre daśameṃ'gesudhāsavam  
tataḥ pumānāvirāsīdekastrailokyasuṃdaraḥ  śāṃtassattvaguṇodrikto gāṃbhīryyāmitasāgaraḥ  
tathā ca kṣamayā yukto mune'labdhopamo 'bhavat  indranīladyutiḥ śrīmānpuṇḍarīkottamekṣaṇaḥ  
suvarṇakṛtibhṛcchreṣṭha dukūlayugalāvṛtaḥ  lasatpracaṃḍadordaṇḍayugalohyaparājitaḥ  
tatassa puruṣaśśaṃbhuṃ praṇamya parameśvaram  nāmāni kuru me svāminvada karmaṃ jagāviti  
tacchrutvā vacanamprāha śaṃkaraḥ prahasanprabhuḥ  puruṣaṃ taṃ maheśāno vācā meghagabhīrayā  
śiva uvāca  viṣṇvitivyāpakatvātte nāma khyātaṃ bhaviṣyati  bahūnyanyāni nāmāni bhaktasaukhyakarāṇi ha  
tapaḥ kuru dṛḍho bhūtvā paramaṃ kāryasādhanam  ityuktvā śvāsamārgeṇa dadau ca nigamaṃ tataḥ  
tato'cyutaśśivaṃ natvā cakāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ  aṃtarddhānaṃ gataśśaktyā salokaḥ parameśvaraḥ  
divyaṃ dvādaśa sāhasraṃ varṣaṃ taptvāpi cācyutaḥ  na prāpa svābhilaṣitaṃ sarvadaṃ śaṃbhudarśanam  
tattatsaṃśayamāpannaściṃtitaṃ hṛdi sādaram  mayādya kiṃ prakartavyamiti viṣṇuśśivaṃ smaran  
etasminnaṃtare vāṇī samutpannā śivācchubhā  tapaḥ punaḥ prakarttavyaṃ saṃśayasyāpanuttaye  
tatastena ca tacchrutvā tapastaptaṃ sudāruṇam  bahukālaṃ tadā brahmadhyānamārgapareṇa hi  
tatassa puruṣo viṣṇuḥ prabuddho dhyānamārgataḥ  suprīto vismayaṃ prāptaḥ kiṃ yattava mahā iti  
pariśramavatastasya viṣṇoḥ svāṅgebhya eva ca  jaladhārā hi saṃyātā vividhāśśivamāyayā  
abhivyāptaṃ ca sakalaṃ śūnyaṃ yattanmahāmune  brahmarūpaṃ jalamabhūtsparśanātpāpanāśanam  
tadā śrāṃtaśca puruṣo viṣṇustasmiñjale svayam  suṣvāpa parama prīto bahukālaṃ vimohitaḥ  
nārāyaṇeti nāmāpi tasyasīcchrutisaṃmatam  nānyatkiṃcittadā hyāsītprākṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ vinā  
etasminnantare kāle tattvānyāsanmahātmanaḥ  tatprakāraṃ śṛṇu prājña gadato me mahāmate  
prakṛteśca mahānāsīnmahataśca guṇāstrayaḥ  ahaṃkārastato jātastrividho guṇabhedataḥ  
tanmātrāśca tato jātaḥ pañcabhūtāni vai tatā  tadaiva tānīndriyāṇi jñānakarmamayāni ca  
tattvānāmiti saṃkhyānamuktaṃ te ṛṣisattama  jaḍātmakañca tatsarvaṃ prakṛteḥ puruṣaṃ vinā  
tattadaikīkṛtaṃ tattvaṃ caturviṃśatisaṃkhyakam  śivecchayā gṛhītvā sa suṣvāpa brahmarūpake  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ sṛṣṭivyākhyane prathamakhaṃḍe viṣṇūtpattivarṇano nāma ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  supte nārāyaṇe deve nābhau paṃkajamuttamam  āvirbabhūva sahasā bahava saṃkarecchayā  
anaṃtayaṣṭikāyuktaṃ karṇikārasamaprabham  anaṃtayojanāyāmamanaṃtocchrāyasaṃyutam  
koṭisūryapratīkāśaṃ suṃdara vacasaṃyutam  atyadbhutaṃ mahāramyaṃ darśanīyamanuttamam  
kṛtvā yatnaṃ pūrvavatsa śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ  dakṣiṇāṃgānnijānmāṃ kaisāśīśśaṃbhurajījanat  
sa māyāmohitaṃ kṛtvā māṃ maheśo drutaṃ mune  tannābhipaṃkajādāvirbhāvayāmāsa līlayā  
eṣa padmāttato jajñe putro'haṃ hemagarbhakaḥ  caturmukho raktavarṇastripuḍrāṃkitamastakaḥ  
tanmāyāmohitaścāhaṃ nāvidaṃ kamala vinā  svadehajanakaṃ tāta pitaraṃ jñānadurbalaḥ  
kohaṃ vā kuta āyātaḥ kiṃ kārya tu madīyakam  kasya putro'hamutpannaḥ kenaiva nirmito'dhunā  
iti saṃśayamāpannaṃ buddhirmāṃ samapadyata  kimarthaṃ mohamāyāmi tajjñānaṃ sukaraṃ khalu  
etatkamalapuṣpasya patrārohasthalaṃ hyadhaḥ  matkartā ca sa vai tatra bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ  
iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya kamalādavarohayan  nāle nālegatastatra varṣāṇāṃ śatakaṃ mune  
na labdhaṃ tu mayā tatra kamalasthānamuttamam  saṃśayaṃ ca punaḥ prāptaḥ kamale gantumutsukaḥ  
ārurohātha kamalaṃ nālamārgeṇa vai mune  kuḍmalaṃ kamalasyātha labdhavānna vimohitāḥ  
nālamārgeṇa bhramato gataṃ varṣaśataṃ punaḥ  kṣaṇamātra tadā tatra tatastiṣṭhanvimohitaḥ  
tadā vāṇī samutpannā tapeti paramā śubhā  śivecchayā parā vyomno mohavidhvaṃsinī mune  
tacchrutvā vyomavacanaṃ dvādaśābdaṃ prayatnataḥ  punastaptaṃ tapo ghoraṃ draṣṭuṃ svajanakaṃ tadā  
tadā hi bhagavānviṣṇuścaturbāhussulocanaḥ  mayyevānugrahaṃ kartuṃ drutamāvirbabhūva ha  
śaṃkhacakrāyudhakaro gadāpadmadharaḥ paraḥ  ghanaśyāmalasarvāṃgaḥ pītāmbaradharaḥ paraḥ  
mukuṭādimahābhūṣaḥ prasannamukhapaṃkajaḥ  koṭikaṃdarpasaṃkāśassandaṣṭo mohitena saḥ  
taddṛṣṭvā sundaraṃ rūpaṃ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ  kālābhaṃ kāṃcanābhaṃ ca sarvātmānaṃ caturbhujam  
tathābhūtamahaṃ dṛṣṭvā sadasanmayamātmanā  nārāyaṇaṃ mahābāhu harṣito hyabhavaṃ tadā  
māyayā mohitaśśambhostadā līlātmanaḥ prabhoḥ  avijñāya svajanakaṃ tamavocaṃ praharṣitaḥ  
brahmovāca  kastvaṃ vadeti hastena samutthāpya sanātanam  tadā hastaprahāreṇa tīvreṇa sudṛḍhena tu  
prabuddhyotthāya śayanātsamāsīnaḥ kṣaṇaṃ vaśī  dadarśa nidrāviklinnanīrajāmalalocanaḥ  
māmatra saṃsthitaṃ bhāsādhyāsito bhagavānhariḥ  āha cotthāya brahmāṇaṃ hasanmāṃ madhuraṃ sakṛt  
viṣṇuruvāca  svāgataṃ svāgataṃ vatsa pitāmaha mahādyute  nirbhayo bhava dāsye'haṃ sarvānkāmānna saṃśayaḥ  
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā smitapūrvaṃ surarṣabhaḥ  rajasā baddhavairaśca tamavocaṃ janārdanam  
brahmovāca  bhāṣase vatsa vatseti sarvasaṃhārakāraṇam  māmihāti smitaṃ kṛtvā guruśśiṣyamivānagha  
kartāraṃ jagatāṃ sākṣātprakṛteśca pravartakam  sanātanamajaṃ viṣṇuṃ viriṃciṃ viṣṇusaṃbhavam  
viśvātmānaṃ vidhātāraṃ dhātārampaṃkajekṣaṇam  kimarthaṃ bhāṣase mohādvaktumarhasi satvaram  
vedo māṃ vakti niyamātsvayaṃbhuvamajaṃ vibhum  pitāmahaṃ svarājaṃ ca parameṣṭhinamuttamam  
ityākarṇya harirvākyaṃ mama kruddho ramāpatiḥ  so'pi māmāha jāne tvāṃ kartāramiti lokataḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  kartuṃ dharttuṃ bhavānaṃgādavatīrṇo mamāvyayāt  vismṛto'si jagannāthaṃ nārāyaṇamanāmayam  
puruṣaṃ paramātmānaṃ puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutam  viṣṇumacyutamīśānaṃ viśvasya prabhavodbhavam  
nārāyaṇaṃ mahābāhuṃ sarvavyāpa kamīśvaram  mannābhipadmatastvaṃ hi prasūto nātra saṃśayaḥ  
tavāparādho nāstyatra tvayi māyākṛtaṃ mama  śṛṇu satyaṃ caturvaktra sarvadeveśvaro hyaham  
kartā hartā ca bhartā ca na mayāstisamo vibhuḥ  ahameva paraṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ pitāmaha  
ahameva paraṃ jyotiḥ paramātmā tvahaṃ vibhuḥ  adya dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ sarvaṃ jagatyasmiṃścarācaram  
tattadviddhi caturvaktra sarvaṃ manmayamityatha  mayā sṛṣṭaṃ purā vyaktaṃ caturviṃśatitattvakam  
nityaṃ teṣvaṇavo baddhāssṛṣṭakrodhabhayādayaḥ  prabhāvācca bhavānaṃgānyanekānīha līlayā  
sṛṣṭā buddhirmayā tasyāmahaṃkārastridhā tataḥ  tanmātraṃ paṃkajaṃ tasmānmanodehendriyāṇi ca  
ākāśādīni bhūtāni bhautikāni ca līlayā  iti buddhvā prajānātha śaraṇaṃ vraja me vidhe  
ahaṃ tvāṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo rakṣiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ  brahmovāca  iti śrutvā vacastasya brahmā krodhasamanvitaḥ  ko vā tvamiti saṃbhartsmābruvaṃ māyāvimohitaḥ  
kimarthaṃ bhāṣase bhūri vahvanarthakaraṃ vacaḥ  neśvarastvaṃ parabrahma kaścitkartā bhavettava  
māyayā mohitaścāhaṃ yuddhaṃ cakre sudāruṇam  hariṇā tena vai sārddhaṃ śaṃkarasya mahāprabhoḥ  
evaṃ mama hareścāsītsaṃgaro romaharṣaṇaḥ  pralayārṇavamadhye tu rajasā baddhavairayoḥ  
etasminnaṃtare liṃgamabhavaccāvayoḥ puraḥ  vivādaśamanārthaṃ hi prabodhārthaṃ tathā''vayoḥ  
jlāmālāsahasrāḍhyaṃ kālānalaśatopamam  kṣayavṛddhi vinirmuktamādimadhyāṃtavarjitam  
anaupamyamanirdeśyamavyaktaṃ viśvasaṃbhavam  tasya jvālāsahasreṇa mohito bhagavānhariḥ  
mohitaṃ cāha māmatra kimarthaṃ sparddhase'dhunā  āgatastu tṛtīyo'tra tiṣṭhatāṃ yuddhamāvayoḥ  
kuta evātra saṃbhūtaḥ parīkṣāvo 'gnisaṃbhavam  adho gamiṣyāmyanalastaṃbhasyānupamasya ca  
parīkṣārthaṃ prajānātha tasya vai vāyuvegataḥ  bhavānūrddhvaṃ prayatnena gaṃtumarhati satvaram  
brahmovāca  evaṃ vyāhṛtya viśvātmā svarūpamakarottadā  vārāhamahapyāśu haṃsatvaṃ prāptavānmune  
tadā prabhṛti māmāhurhaṃsahaṃso virāḍiti  haṃsahaṃseti yo brūyātsa haṃso'tha bhaviṣyati  
suśve hyanalaprakhyo viśvataḥ pakṣasaṃyutaḥ  manonilajavo bhūtvā gatvorddhvaṃ corddhvataḥ purā  
nārāyaṇo'pi viśvātmā suśveto hyabhavattadā  daśa yojanavistīrṇaṃ śatayojanamāyatam  
meruparvatavarṣmāṇaṃ gauratīkṣṇogradaṃṣṭriṇam  kālādityasamābhāsaṃ dīrghaghoṇaṃ mahāsvanam  
hrasvapādaṃ vicitrāṃgaṃ jaitraṃ dṛḍhamanaupamam  vārāhākāramāsthāya gatavāṃstadadhau javāt  
evambarṣasahasraṃ ca caranviṣṇuradho gataḥ  tathāprabhṛti lokeṣu śvetavārāhasaṃjñakaḥ  
kalpo babhūva devarṣe narāṇāṃ kālasaṃjñakaḥ  babhrāma bahudhā viṣṇuḥ prabhaviṣṇuradhogataḥ  
nāpaśyadalpamapyasya mūlaṃ liṃgasya sūkaraḥ  tāvatkālaṃ gataścorddhvamahamapyarisūdana  
satvaraṃ sarvayatnena tasyāntaṃ jñātumicchayā  śrānto na dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃtamahaṃ kālādadhogataḥ  
tathaiva bhagavānviṣṇuścāṃtaṃ kamalalocanaḥ  sarvadevanibhastūrṇamutthitassa mahāvapuḥ  
samāgato mayā sārddhaṃ praṇipatya bhavaṃ muhuḥ  māyayā mohitaśśaṃbhostasthau saṃvignamānasaḥ  
pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvataścaiva hyagrataḥ parameśvaram  praṇipatya mayā sārddhaṃ sasmāra kimidaṃ tviti  
anirdeśyaṃ ca tadrūpamanāma karmavarjitam  aliṃgaṃ liṃgatāṃ prāptaṃ dhyānamārgepyagocaram  
svasthaṃ cittaṃ tadā kṛtvā namaskāra parāyaṇo  babhūvaturubhāvāvāmahaṃ harirapi dhruvam  
jānīvo na hi te rūpaṃ yo'siyo'si mahāprabho  namo'stu te maheśāna rūpaṃ darśaya nau tvaran  
evaṃ śaracchatānyāsannamaskāraṃ prakurvatoḥ  āvayormuniśārdūla madamāsthitayostadā  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃ hitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe viṣṇubrahmavivādavarṇanonāma saptamo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  evaṃ tayormuniśreṣṭha darśanaṃ kāṃkṣamāṇayoḥ  vigarvayośca surayoḥ sadā nau sthitayormune  
dayālurabhavacchaṃbhurdīnānāṃ pratipālakaḥ  garviṇāṃ garvahartā ca saveṣāṃ prabhuravyayaḥ  
tadā samabhavattatra nādo vai śabdalakṣaṇaḥ  omomiti suraśreṣṭhātsuvyaktaḥ plutalakṣaṇaḥ  
kimidaṃ tviti saṃciṃtya mayā tiṣṭhanmahāsvanaḥ  viṣṇussarvasurārādhyo nirvairastuṣṭacetasā  
liṃgasya dakṣiṇe bhāge tathāpaśyatsanātanam  ādyaṃ varṇamakārākhyamukāraṃ cottaraṃ tataḥ  
makāraṃ madhyataścaiva nādamaṃte'sya comiti  sūryamaṃḍalavaddṛṣṭvā varṇamādyaṃ tu dakṣiṇe  
uttare pāvakaprakhyamukāramṛṣi sattama  śītāṃśumaṇḍalaprakhyaṃ makāraṃ tasya madhyataḥ  
tasyopari tadā'paśyacchuddhasphaṭikasuprabham  turīyātītamamalaṃ niṣkalaṃ nirupadravam  
nirdvaṃdvaṃ kevalaṃ śūnyaṃ bāhyābhyaṃtaravarjitam  sa bāhyabhyaṃtare caiva bāhyābhyaṃtarasaṃsthitam  
ādimadhyāṃtarahitamānaṃdasyāpikāraṇam  satyamānandamamṛtaṃ paraṃ brahmaparāyaṇam  
kuta evātra saṃbhūtaḥ parīkṣāvo'gnisaṃbhavam  adhogamiṣyāmyanalastaṃbhasyānupamasya ca  
vedaśabdobhayāveśaṃ viśvātmānaṃ vyaciṃtayat  tadā'bhavadṛṣistatra ṛṣessāratamaṃ smṛtam  
tenaiva ṛṣiṇā viṣṇurjñātavānparameśvaram  mahādevaṃ paraṃ brahma śabdabrahmatanuṃ param  
ciṃtayā rahito rudro vāco yanmanasā saha  aprāpya tannivartaṃte vācyastvekākṣareṇa saḥ  
ekākṣareṇa tadvākyamṛtaṃ paramakāraṇam  satyamānandamamṛtaṃ paraṃ brahma parātparam  
ekākṣarādakārākhyādbhagavānbījakoṇḍajaḥ  ekākṣarādukārākhyāddhariḥ paramakāraṇam  
ekākṣarānmakārākhyādbhagavānnīlalohitaḥ  sargakartā tvakārākhyo hyukārākhyastu mohakaḥ  
makārākhyastu yo nityamanugrahakaro'bhavat  makārākhyo vibhurbījī hyakāro bīja ucyate  
ukārākhyo hariryoniḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvaraḥ  bījī ca bījaṃ tadyonirnādākhyaśca maheśvaraḥ  
bījī vibhajya cātmānaṃ svecchayā tu vyavasthitaḥ  asya liṃgādabhūdbījamakāro bījinaḥ prabhoḥ  
ukārayonau niḥkṣiptamavarddhata samaṃtataḥ  sauvarṇamabhavaccāṃḍamāvedya tadalakṣaṇam  
anekābdaṃ tathā cāpsu divyamaṃḍaṃ vyavasthitam  tato varṣasahasrāṃte dvidhākṛtamajodbhavam  
aṃḍamapsu sthitaṃ sākṣādvyāghāteneśvareṇa tu  tathāsya suśubhaṃ haimaṃ kapālaṃ corddhvasaṃsthitam  
jajñe sā dyaustadaparaṃ pṛthivī paṃcalakṣaṇā  tasmādaṃḍādbhavo jajñe kakārākhyaścaturmukhaḥ  
sa sraṣṭā sarvalokānāṃ sa eva trividhaḥ prabhuḥ  evamomomiti proktamityāhuryajuṣāṃ varāḥ  
yajuṣāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ṛcaḥ samāni sādaram  evameva hare brahmannityāhuścāvayostadā  
tato vijñāya deveśaṃ yathāvacchaktisaṃbhavaiḥ  maṃtraṃ maheśvaraṃ devaṃ tuṣṭāva sumahodayam  
etasminnaṃtare'nyacca rūpamadbhutasundaram  dadarśa ca mayā sārddhaṃ bhagavānviśvapālakaḥ  
paṃcavaktraṃ daśabhujaṃ gaurakarpūravanmune  nānākāṃti samāyuktaṃ nānābhūṣaṇabhūṣitam  
mahodāraṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahāpuruṣalaṇam  taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtārtho'bhūnmayā hariḥ  
atha prasanno bhagavānmaheśaḥ parameśvaraḥ  divyaṃ śabdamayaṃ rūpamākhyāya prahasansthitaḥ  
akārastasya mūrddhā hi lalāṭo dīrgha ucyate  ikāro dakṣiṇaṃ netramīkāro vāmalocanam  
ukāro dakṣiṇaṃ śrotramūkāro vāma ucyate  ṛkāro dakṣiṇaṃ tasya kapolaṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ  
vāmaṃ kapolamūkāro lṛ lṝ nāsāpuṭe ubhe  ekāraścoṣṭha ūrddhvaśca hyaikārastvadharo vibhoḥ  
okāraśca tathaukāro dantapaṃktidvayaṃ kramāt  amastu tālunī tasya devadevasya śūlinaḥ  
kādipaṃcākṣarāṇyasya pañca hastāśca dakṣiṇe  cādipaṃcākṣarāṇyevaṃ paṃca hastāstu vāmataḥ  
ṭādipaṃcākṣaraṃ pādāstādipaṃcākṣaraṃ tathā  pakāra udaraṃ tasya phakāraḥ pārśva ucyate  
bakāro vāmapārśvastu bhakāraḥ skaṃdha ucyate  makāro hṛdayaṃ śaṃbhormahādevasya yoginaḥ  
yakārādisakārāntā vibhorvai saptadhātavaḥ  hakāro nābhirūpo hi kṣakāro ghrāṇa ucyate  
evaṃ śabdamayaṃ rūpamaguṇasya guṇātmanaḥ  dṛṣṭvā tamumayā sārddhaṃ kṛtārtho'bhūnmayā hariḥ  
evaṃ dṛṣṭvā maheśānaṃ śabdabrahmatanuṃ śivam  praṇamya ca mayā viṣṇuḥ punaścāpaśyadūrddhvataḥ  
oṃkāraprabhavaṃ maṃtraṃ kalāpaṃcakasaṃyutam  śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ śubhāṣṭatriṃśadakṣaram  
medhākāramabhūdbhūyassarvadharmārthasādhakam  gāyatrīprabhavaṃ maṃtraṃ sahitaṃ vaśyakārakam  
caturviṃśativarṇāḍhyaṃ catuṣkālamanuttamam  atha paṃcasitaṃ maṃtraṃ kalāṣṭaka samāyutam  
ābhicārikamatyarthaṃ prāyastriṃśacchubhākṣaram  yajurvedasamāyuktaṃ pañcaviṃśacchubhākṣaram  
kalāṣṭakasamā yuktaṃ suśvetaṃ śāṃtikaṃ tathā  trayodaśakalāyuktaṃ bālādyaissaha lohitam  
babhūvurasya cotpattivṛddhisaṃhārakāraṇam  varṇā ekādhikāḥ ṣaṣṭirasya maṃtravarasya tu  
punarmṛtyuṃjayaṃ mantraṃ pañcākṣaramataḥ param  ciṃtāmaṇiṃ tathā maṃtraṃ dakṣiṇāmūrti saṃjñakam  
tatastattvamasītyuktaṃ mahāvākyaṃ harasya ca  pañcamaṃtrāṃstathā labdhvā jajāpa bhagavānhariḥ  
atha dṛṣṭvā kalāvarṇamṛgyajussāmarūpiṇam  īśānamīśamukuṭaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ purātanam  
aghorahṛdayaṃ hṛdyaṃ sarvaguhyaṃ sadāśivam  vāmapādaṃ mahādevaṃ mahābhogīndrabhūṣaṇam  
viśvataḥ pādavantaṃ taṃ viśvatokṣikaraṃ śivam  brahmaṇo'dhipati sargasthitisaṃhārakāraṇam  
tuṣṭāva vāgbhiriṣṭābhissāmbaṃ varadamīśvaram  mayā ca sahito viṣṇurbhagavāṃstuṣṭacetasā  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṇḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne śabdabrahmatanuvarṇano nāmāṣṭamo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  athākarṇya nurtiviṣṇukṛtāṃ svasya maheśvaraḥ  prādurbabhūva suprītassavāmaṃ karuṇānidhiḥ  
paṃcavaktrastrinayano bhālacandro jaṭādharaḥ  gauravarṇo viśālākṣo bhasmoddhūlitavigrahaḥ  
daśabāhurnīlagala sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ  sarvāṃgasundaro bhasmatripuṇḍrāṃkitamastakaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ devaṃ savāmaṃ parameśvaram  tuṣṭāva punariṣṭābhirvāgbhirviṣṇurmayā saha  
nigamaṃ śvāsarūpeṇa dadau tasmai tato haraḥ  viṣṇave ca prasannātmā maheśaḥ karuṇākaraḥ  
tato jñānamadāttasmai haraye paramātmane  paramātmā punarmahyaṃ dattavānkṛpayā mune  
saṃprāpya nigamaṃ viṣṇuḥ papraccha punareva tam  kṛtārthassāṃjalirnatvā mayā saha maheśvaram  
viṣṇuruvāca  kathaṃ ca tuṣyase deva mayā pūjyaḥ kathaṃ prabho  kathaṃ dhyānaṃ prakartavyaṃ kathaṃ vrajasi vaśyatām  
kiṃ kartavyaṃ mahādeva hyāvābhyāṃ tava śāsanāt  sadāsadājñāpaya nau prītyarthaṃ kuru śaṃkara  
etatsarvaṃ mahārāja kṛpāṃ kṛtvā'vayoḥ prabho  kathanīyaṃ tathānyacca vijñāya svānugau śiva  
brahmovāca  ityetadvacanaṃ śrutvā prasanno bhagavānharaḥ  uvāca vacanaṃ prītyā suprasannaḥ kṛpānidhiḥ  
śrīśiva uvāca  bhaktyā ca bhavatornūnaṃ prītohaṃ surasattamau  paśyataṃ māṃ mahādevaṃ bhayaṃ sarvaṃ vimuṃcatām  
mama liṃgaṃ sadā pūjya dhyeyaṃ caitādṛśaṃ mama  idānīṃ dṛśyate yadvattathā kāryaṃ prayatnataḥ  
pūjito liṃgarūpeṇa prasanno vividhaṃ phalam  dāsyāmi sarvalokebhyo manobhīṣṭānyanekaśaḥ  
yadā duḥkhaṃ bhavettatra yuvayossurasattamau  pūjite mama liṃge ca tadā syādduḥkhanāśanam  
yuvāṃ prasūtau prakṛtermadīyāyā mahābalau  gātrābhyāṃ savyasavyābhyāṃ mama sarveśvarasya hi  
ayaṃ me dakṣiṇātpārśvādbrahmā lokapitāmahaḥ  vāmapārśvācca viṣṇustvaṃ samutpannaḥ parātmanaḥ  
prītohaṃ yuvayossamyagvaraṃ dadyāṃ yathepsitam  mayi bhaktirdṛḍhā bhūyādyuvayorabhyanujñayā  
pārthivīṃ caiva manmūrtiṃ vidhāya kurutaṃ yuvām  sevāṃ ca vividhāṃ prājñau kṛtvā sukhamavāpsyatha  
brahmansṛṣṭiṃ kuru tvaṃ hi madājñāparipālakaḥ  vatsa vatsa hare tvaṃ ca pālayaivaṃ carācaram  
brahmovāca  ityuktvā nau prabhuratābhyāṃ pūjāvidhimadācchubhām  yenaiva pūjitaśśaṃbhuḥ phalaṃ yacchatyanekaśaḥ  
brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacaśśaṃbhormayā ca sahito hariḥ  pratyuvāca maheśānaṃ praṇipatya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  yadi prītiḥ samutpannā yadi deyo varaśca nau  bhaktirbhavatu nau nityaṃ tvayi cāvyabhicāriṇī  
tvamapyavatarasvādya līlayā nirguṇopi hi  sahāyaṃ kuru nau tāta tvaṃ paraḥ parameśvaraḥ  
āvayordevadeveśa vivādamapi śobhanam  ihāgato bhavānyasmādvivādaśamanāya nau  
brahmovāca  tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā punaḥ prāha haro harim  praṇipatya sthitaṃ mūrdhnā kṛtāṃjalipuṭaḥ svayam  
śrīmaheśa uvāca  pralayasthitisargāṇāṃ kartāhaṃ saguṇo'guṇaḥ  parabrahma nirvikārī saccidānaṃdalakṣaṇaḥ  
triyā bhinno hyahaṃ viṣṇo brahmaviṣṇuharākhyayā  sargarakṣālayaguṇairniṣkalohaṃ sadā hare  
stuto'haṃ yattvayā viṣṇo brahmaṇā me'vatāraṇe  prārthanāṃ tāṃ kariṣyāmi satyāṃ yadbhaktavatsalaḥ  
madrūpaṃ paramaṃ brahmannīdṛśaṃ bhavadaṃgataḥ  prakaṭībhavitā loke nāmnā rudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ  
madaṃśāttasya sāmarthyaṃ nyūnaṃ naiva bhaviṣyati  yohaṃ sohaṃ na bhedosti pūjāvidhividhānataḥ  
yathā ca jyotiṣassaṃgājjalādeḥ sparśatā na vai  tathā mamāguṇasyāpi saṃyogādbandhanaṃ na hi  
śivarūpaṃ mamaitañca rudro'pi śivavattadā  na tatra parabhedo vai kartavyaśca mahāmune  
vastuto hyekarūpaṃ hi dvidhā bhinnaṃ jagatyuta  ato na bhedā vijñeyaḥ śive rudre kadācana  
suvarṇasya tathaikasya vastutvaṃ naiva gacchati  alaṃkṛtikṛte deva nāmabhedo na vastutaḥ  
tathaikasyā mṛdo bhedo nānāpātre na vastutaḥ  kāraṇasyaiva kārye ca sannidhānaṃ nidarśanam  
jñātavyaṃ budhavaryaiśca nirmalajñānibhiḥ surau  evaṃ jñātvā bhavabhyāṃ tu na dṛśyaṃ bhedakāra ṇam  
vastuvatsarvadṛśyaṃ ca śivarūpammatammama  ahaṃ bhavānajaścaiva rudro yo'yaṃ bhaviṣyati  
ekarūpā na bhedastu bhede vai baṃdhanaṃ bhavet  tathāpi ca madīyaṃ hi śivarūpaṃ sanātanam  
mūlībhūtaṃ sadoktaṃ ca satyajñānamanaṃtakam  evaṃ jñātvā sadā dhyeyaṃ manasā caiva tattvataḥ  
śrūyatāṃ caiva bho brahmanyadgopyaṃ kathyate mayā  bhavaṃtau prakṛteryātau nāyaṃ vai prakṛteḥ punaḥ  
madājñā jāyate tatra brahmaṇo bhrukuṭeraham  guṇeṣvapi yathā proktastāmasaḥ prakṛto haraḥ  
vaikārikaśca vijñeyo yo'haṃkāra udāhṛtaḥ  nāmato vastuto naiva tāmasaḥ paricakṣyate  
etasmātkāraṇādbrahmankaraṇīyamidaṃ tvayā  sṛṣṭikartā bhava brahmansṛṣṭeśca pālako hariḥ  
madīyaśca tathāṃ'śo yo layakartā bhaviṣyati  iyaṃ yā prakṛtirdevī hyumākhyā parameśvarī  
tasyāstu śaktirvā devī brahmāṇaṃ sā bhajiṣyati  anyā śaktiḥ punastatra prakṛteḥ saṃbhaviṣyati  
samāśrayiṣyati viṣṇuṃ lakṣmīrūpeṇa sā tadā  punaśca kālī nāmnā sā madaṃśaṃ prāpsyati dhruvam  
jyotī rūpeṇa sā tatra kāryārthe saṃbhaviṣyati  evaṃ devyāstathā proktāśśaktayaḥ paramāśśubhāḥ  
sṛṣṭisthitilayānāṃ hi kāryaṃ tāsāṃ kramāddhruvam  etasyāḥ prakṛtteraṃśā matpriyāyāssurauttama  
tvaṃ ca lakṣmīmupāśritya kāryaṃ kartumihārhasi  brahmaṃstvaṃ ca girāṃ devīṃ prakṛtyaṃśāmavāpya ca  
sṛṣṭikāryaṃ hṛdā kartummannideśādihārhasi  ahaṃ kālīṃ samāśritya matpriyāṃśāṃ parātparām  
rudrarūpeṇa pralayaṃ kariṣye kāryamuttamam  caturvarṇamayaṃ lokaṃ tatsarvairāśramai dhruvam  
tadanyairvividhaiḥ kāryaiḥ kṛtvā sukhamavāpsyathaḥ  jñānavijñānasaṃyukto lokānāṃ hitakārakaḥ  
muktido'tra bhavānadya bhava loke madājñayā  maddarśane phalaṃ yadvattadeva tava darśane  
iti datto varastedya satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  mamaiva hṛdaye viṣṇurviṣṇośca hṛdaye hyaham  
ubhayoraṃtaraṃ yo vai na jānāti mano mama  vāmāṃgajo mama harirdakṣiṇāṃgodbhavo vidhiḥ  
mahāpralayakṛdrudro viśvātmā hṛdayodbhavaḥ  tridhā bhinno hyahaṃ viṣṇo brahmaviṣṇubhavākhyayā  
sargarakṣālayakarastriguṇairaja ādibhiḥ  guṇabhinnaśśivassākṣātprakṛte puruṣātparaḥ  
paraṃ brahmādvayo nityo'nantaḥ pūrṇo niraṃjanaḥ  aṃtastamo vahissattvastrijagatpālako hariḥ  
aṃtassattvastamobāhyastrijagallayakṛddharaḥ  
aṃtarbahīrajāścaiva trijagatsṛṣṭikṛdvidhiḥ  evaṃ guṇāstrideveṣu guṇabhinnaḥ śivaḥ smṛtaḥ  
viṣṇo sṛṣṭikaraṃ prītyā pālayainaṃ pitāmaham  saṃpūjyastriṣu lokeṣu bhaviṣyasi madājñayā  
tava sevyo vidheścāpi rudra eva bhaviṣyati  śivapūrṇāvatāro hi trijagallayakārakaḥ  
pādme bhaviṣyati sutaḥ kalpe tava pitāmahaḥ  tadā drakṣyasi māṃ caiva so'pi drakṣyati padmajaḥ  
evamuktvā maheśānaḥ kṛpāṃ kṛtvātulāṃ haraḥ  punaḥ provāca suprītyā viṣṇuṃ sarveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathama khaṇḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne śivatattvavarṇano nāma navamo'dhyāyaḥ  
parameśvara uvāca  anyacchṛṇu hare viṣṇo śāsanaṃ mama suvrata  sadā sarveṣu lokeṣu mānyaḥ pūjyo bhaviṣyasi  
brahmaṇā nirmite loke yadā dukhaṃ prajāyate  tadā tvaṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ nāśāya tatparo bhava  
sahāyaṃ te kariṣyāmi sarvakārye ca dussahe  tava śatrūnhaniṣyāmi dussādhyānparamotkaṭān  
vividhānavatārāṃśca gṛhītvā kīrtimuttamām  vistāraya hare loke tāraṇāya paro bhava  
guṇarūpo hyayaṃ rudro hyanena vapuṣā sadā  kāryaṃ kariṣye lokānāṃ tavāśakyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
rudradhyeyo bhavāṃścaiva bhavaddhyeyo harastathā  yuvayorantarannaiva tava rudrasya kiṃcana  
vastutaścāpi caikatvaṃ varato'pi tathaiva ca  līlayāpi mahāviṣṇo satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
rudrabhakto naro yastu tava niṃdāṃ kariṣyati  tasya puṇyaṃ ca nikhilaṃ drutaṃ bhasma bhaviṣyati  
narake patanaṃ tasya tvaddveṣātpuruṣottama  madājñayā bhavedviṣṇo satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
loke'sminmuktido nṝṇāṃ bhuktidaśca viśeṣataḥ  dhyeyaḥ pūjyaśca bhaktānāṃ nigrahānugrahau kuru  
ityuktvā māṃ ca dhātāraṃ haste dhṛtvā svayaṃ harim  kathayāmāsa duḥkheṣu sahāyo bhava sarvadā  
sarvādhyakṣaśca sarveṣu bhuktimuktipradāyakaḥ  bhava tvaṃ sarvathā śreṣṭhassarvakāmaprasādhakaḥ  
sarveṣāṃ prāṇarūpaśca bhava tvaṃ ca mamājñayā  saṃkaṭe bhajanīyo hi sa rudro mattanurhare  
tvāṃ yassamāśrito nūnaṃ māmeva sa samāśritaḥ  aṃtaraṃ yaśca jānāti niraye patati dhruvam  
āyurbalaṃ śṛṇuṣvādya tridevānāṃ viśeṣataḥ  saṃdeho'tra na karttavyo brahmaviṣṇu harātmanām  
caturyugasahasrāṇi brahmaṇo dinamucyate  rātriśca tāvatī tasya mānametatkrameṇa ha  
teṣāṃ triṃśaddinermāso dvādaśaistaiśca vatsaraḥ  śatavarṣapramāṇena brahmāyuḥ parikīrtitam  
brahmaṇo varṣamātreṇa dinaṃ vaiṣṇavamucyate  so'pi varṣaśataṃ yāvadātmamānena jīvati  
vaiṣṇavena tu varṣeṇa dinaṃ raudraṃ bhaveddhruvam  haro varṣaśate yāte nararūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ  
yāvaducchvasitaṃ vaktre sadāśivasamudbhavam  paścācchaktiṃ samabhyeti yāvanniśvasitaṃ bhavet  
niḥśvāsocchvasitānāṃ ca sarveṣāmeva dehinām  brahmaviṣṇuharāṇāṃ ca gaṃdharvoragarakṣasām  
ekaviṃśasahasrāṇi śataiḥ ṣaḍbhiśśatāni ca  ahorātrāṇi coktāni pramāṇaṃ surasattamau  
ṣaḍbhicchavāsaniśvāsaiḥ palamekaṃ pravartitam  ghaṭī ṣaṣṭi palāḥ proktā sā ṣaṣṭyā ca dinaṃ niśā  
niśvāsocchvāsitānāṃ ca parisaṃkhyā na vidyate  sadāśivasamutthānametasmātso'kṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ  
itthaṃ rūpaṃ tvayā tāvadrakṣaṇīyaṃ mamājñayā  tāvatsṛṣṭeśca kāryaṃ vai kartavyaṃ vividhairguṇaiḥ  
brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacaśśaṃbhormayā ca bhagavānhariḥ  praṇipatya ca viśveśaṃ prāha maṃdataraṃ vaśī  
viṣṇuruvāca  śaṃkara śrūyatāmetatkṛpāsiṃdho jagatpate  sarvametatkariṣyāmi bhavadājñāvaśānugaḥ  
mama dhyeyassadā tvaṃ ca bhaviṣyasi na cānyathā  bhavatassarvasāmarthyaṃ labdhaṃ caiva purā mayā  
kṣaṇamātramapi svāmiṃstava dhyānaṃ paraṃ mama  cetaso dūrato naiva nirgacchatu kadācana  
mama bhaktaśca yaḥ svāmiṃstava niṃdā kariṣyati  tasya vai niraye vāsaṃ prayaccha niyataṃ dhruvam  
tvadbhakto yo bhavetsvāminmama priyataro hi saḥ  evaṃ vai yo vijānāti tasya muktirna durlabhā  
mahimā ca madīyodya varddhito bhavatā dhruvam  kadācidaguṇaścaiva jāyate kṣamyatāmiti  
brahmovāca  tadā śaṃbhustadīyaṃ hi śrutvā vacanamuttamam  uvāca viṣṇuṃ suprītyā kṣamyā te'guṇatā mayā  
evamuktvā hariṃ nau sa karābhyāṃ parameśvaraḥ  pasparśa sakalāṃgeṣu kṛpayā tu kṛpānidhiḥ  
ādiśya vividhāndharmānsarvaduḥkhaharo haraḥ  dadau varānanekāṃścāvayorhitacikīrṣayā  
tatassa bhagavāñchaṃbhuḥ kṛpayā bhaktavatsalaḥ  dṛṣṭayā saṃpaśyato śīghraṃ tatraivāṃtaradhīyataḥ  
tadā prakṛti loke'smiṃlliṃgapūjāvidhiḥ smṛtaḥ  liṃge pratiṣṭhitaśśaṃbhurbhuktimuktipradāyakaḥ  
liṃgavedirmahādevī liṃgaṃ sākṣānmaheśvaraḥ  layanālliṃgamityuktaṃ tatraiva nikhilaṃ jagat  
yastu laiṃgaṃ paṭhennityamākhyānaṃ liṃgasannidhau  ṣaṇmāsācchivarūpo vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  
yastu liṃgasamīpe tu kāryaṃ kiṃcitkaroti ca  tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknomi mahāmune  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne parama śivatattvavarṇanaṃ nāma daśamo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūtasūta mahābhāga vyāsaśiṣya namostu te  śrāvitādyādbhutā śaivakathā paramapāvanī  
tatrādbhutā mahādivyā liṃgotpattiḥ śrutā śubhā  śrutvā yasyāḥ prabhāvaṃ ca duḥkhanāśo bhavediha  
brahmanāradasaṃvādamanusṛtya dayānidhe  śivārcanavidhiṃ brūhi yena tuṣṭo bhavecchivaḥ  
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyairvaiśyaiḥ śūdrairvā pūjyate śivaḥ  kathaṃ kāryaṃ ca tad brūhi yathā vyāsamukhācchrutam  
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ śarmadaṃ śrutisaṃmatam  uvāca sakalaṃ prītyā muni praśnānusārataḥ  
sūta uvāca  sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ bhavadbhiśca tadrahasyaṃ munīśvarāḥ  tadahaṃ kathayāmyadya yathābuddhi yathāśrutam  
bhavadbhiḥ pṛcchayate tadvattathā vyāsena vai purā  pṛṣṭaṃ sanatkumārāya tacchrutaṃ hyupamanyunā  
tato vyāsena vai śrutvā śivapūjādikaṃ ca yat  mahyaṃ ca pāṭhitaṃ tena lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
tacchrutaṃ caiva kṛṣṇena hyupamanyormahātmanaḥ  tadahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathā brahmāvadatpurā  
brahmovāca  śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepālliṃgapūjanam  vaktuṃ varṣaśatenāpi na śakyaṃ vistarānmune  
evaṃ tu śāṃkaraṃ rūpaṃ mukhaṃ svacchaṃ sanātanam  pūjayetparayā bhaktyā sarvakāmaphalāptaye  
dāridryaṃ rogaduḥkhaṃ ca pīḍanaṃ śatrusaṃbhavam  pāpaṃ caturvidhaṃ tāvadyāvannārcayate śivam  
sampūjite śive deve sarvaduḥkhaṃ vilīyate  saṃpadyate sukhaṃ sarvaṃ paścānmuktiravāpyate  
ye vai mānuṣyamāśritya mukhyaṃ saṃtānatassukham  tena pūjyo mahādevaḥ sarvakāryārthasādhakaḥ  
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāśśūdrāśca vidhivatkramāt  śaṃkarārcāṃ prakurvaṃtu sarvakāmārthasiddhaye  
prātaḥkāle samutthāya muhūrte brahmasaṃjñake  gurośca smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā śaṃbhoścaiva tathā punaḥ  
tīrthānāṃ smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā dhyānaṃ caiva harerapi  mamāpi nirjarāṇāṃ vai munyādīnāṃ tathā mune  
tataḥ stotraṃ śubhaṃ nāma gṛhṇīyādvidhipūrvakam  tatotthāya malotsargaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ careddiśi  
ekānte tu vidhiṃ kuryānmalotsargassa yacchrutam  tadeva kathayāmyadya śṛṇvādhāya mano mune  
śuddhāṃ mṛdaṃ dvijo lipyātpaṃcavāraṃ viśuddhaye  kṣatriyaśca caturvāraṃ vaiśyo varatrayaṃ tathā  
śūdro dvivāraṃ ca mṛdaṃ gṛhṇīyādvidhiśuddhaye  gude vātha sakṛlliṃge vāramekaṃ prayatnataḥ  
daśavāraṃ vāmahaste saptavāraṃ dvayostathā  pratyekampādayostāta trivāraṃ karayoḥ punaḥ  
strībhiśca śūdravatkāryaṃ mṛdāgrahaṇamuttamam  hastau pādau ca prakṣālya pūrvavanmṛdamāharet  
daṃtakāṣṭhaṃ tataḥ kuryātsvavarṇakramato naraḥ  
vipraḥ kuryāddaṃtakāṣṭhaṃ dvādaśāṃgulamānataḥ  ekādaśāṃgulaṃ rājā vaiśyaḥ kuryāddaśāṃgulam  
śūdro navāgulaṃ kuryāditi mānamidaṃ smṛtam  kāladoṣaṃ vicāryyaiva manudṛṣṭaṃ vivarjayet  
ṣaṣṭyādyāmāśca navamī vratamastaṃ raverdinam  tathā śrāddhadinaṃ tāta niṣiddhaṃ radadhāvane  
snānaṃ tu vidhivatkāryaṃ tīrthādiṣu krameṇa tu  deśakālaviśeṣeṇa snānaṃ kāryaṃ samaṃtrakam  
ācamya prathamaṃ tatra dhautavastreṇa cādharet  ekānte susthale sthitvā saṃdhyāvidhimathācaret  
yathāyogyaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā pūjāvidhimathārabhet  manastu susthiraṃ kṛtvā pūjāgāraṃ praviśya ca  
pūjāvidhiṃ samādāya svāsane hyupaviśya vai  nyāsādikaṃ vidhāyādau pūjayetkramaśo haram  
prathamaṃ ca gaṇādhīśaṃ dvārapālāṃstathaiva ca  dikpālāṃśca susaṃpūjya paścātpīṭhaṃ prakalpayet  
atha vā'ṣṭadalaṃ kṛtvā pūjādravyaṃ samīpataḥ  upaviśya tatastatra upaveśya śivam prabhum  
ācamanatrayaṃ kṛtvā prakṣālya ca punaḥ karau  prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā madhye dhyāyecca tryambakam  
paṃcavaktraṃ daśabhujaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasannibham  sarvābharaṇasaṃyuktaṃ vyāghracarmottarīyakam  
tasya sārūpyatāṃ smṛtvā dahetpāpaṃ narassadā  śivaṃ tataḥ samutthāpya pūjayetparameśvaram  
dehaśuddhiṃ tataḥ kṛtvā mūla maṃtraṃ nyasetkramāt  sarvatra praṇavenaiva ṣaḍaṃganyāsamācaret  
kṛtvā hṛdi prayogaṃ ca tataḥ pūjāṃ samārabhet  pādyārghācamanārthaṃ ca pātrāṇi ca prakalpayet  
sthāpayedvividhānkuṃbhānnava dhīmānyathāvidhi  darbhairācchādya taireva saṃsthāpyābhyukṣya vāriṇā  
teṣu teṣu ca sarveṣu kṣipettoyaṃ suśītalam  praṇavena kṣipetteṣu dravyāṇyālokya buddhimān  
uśīraṃ candanaṃ caiva pādye tu parikalpayet  jātīkaṃ kolakarpūravaṭamūla tamālakam  
cūrṇayitvā yathānyāyaṃ kṣipedācamanīyake  etatsarveṣu pātreṣu dāpayeccandanānvitam  
pārśvayordevadevasya naṃdīśaṃ tu samarcayet  gaṃdhairdhūpaistathā dīpairvividhaiḥ pūjayecchivam  
liṃgaśuddhiṃ tataḥ kṛtvā mudā yukto narastadā  yathocitaṃ tu maṃtraughaiḥ praṇavādirnamoṃtakaiḥ  
kalpayedāsanaṃ svastipadmādi praṇavena tu  tasmātpūrvadiśaṃ sākṣādaṇimāmayamakṣaram  
laghimā dakṣiṇaṃ caiva mahimā paścimaṃ tathā  prāptiścaivottaraṃ patraṃ prākāmyaṃ pāvakasya ca  
īśitvaṃ nairṛtaṃ patraṃ vaśitvaṃ vāyugocare  sarvajñatvaṃ tathaiśānyaṃ karṇikā soma ucyate  
somasyādhastathā sūryastasyādhaḥ pāvakastvayam  dharmādīnapi tasyādho bhavataḥ kalpayet kramāt  
avyaktādi caturdikṣu somasyāṃte guṇatrayam  sadyojātaṃ pravakṣyāmītyāvāhya parameśvaram  
vāmadevena maṃtreṇa tiṣṭheccaivāsanopari  sānnidhyaṃ rudragāyatryā aghoreṇa nirodhayet  
īśānaṃ sarvavidyānāmiti maṃtreṇa pūjayet  pādyamācanīyaṃ ca vidhāyārghyaṃ pradāpayet  
sthāpayedvidhinā rudraṃ gaṃdhacaṃdanavāriṇā  pañcāgavyavidhānena gṛhyapātre'bhimaṃtrya ca  
praṇavenaiva gavyena snāpayetpayasā ca tam  dadhnā ca madhunā caiva tathā cekṣurasena tu  
ghṛtena tu yathā pūjya sarvakāmahitāvaham  puṇyairdravyairmahādevaṃ praṇavenābhiṣecayet  
pavitrajalabhāṇḍeṣu maṃtraiḥ toyaṃ kṣipettataḥ  śuddhīkṛtya yathānyāyaṃ sitavastreṇa sādhakaḥ  
tāvaddūraṃ na kartavyaṃ na yāvaccandanaṃ kṣipet  taṃdulaissundaraistatra pūjayecchaṃkarammudā  
kuśāpāmārgakarpūra jāticaṃpakapāṭalaiḥ  karavīraissitaiścaiva mallikākamalotpalaiḥ  
apūrvapuṣpairvividhaiścandanādyaistathaiva ca  jalena jaladhārāñca kalpayetparameśvare  
pātraiśca vividhairdevaṃ snāpayecca maheśvaram  maṃtrapūrvaṃ prakartavyā pūjā sarvaphalapradā  
maṃtrāṃśca tubhyaṃ tāṃstāta sarvakāmārthasiddhaye  pravakṣyāmi samāsena sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
pāṭhayamānena maṃtreṇa tathā vāṅmayakena ca  rudreṇa nīlarudreṇa suśuklena subhena ca  
hotāreṇa tathā śīrṣṇā śubhenātharvaṇena ca  śāṃtyā vātha punaśśāṃtyāmāruṇenāruṇena ca  
arthābhīṣṭena sāmnā ca tathā devavratena ca  
rathāṃtareṇa puṣpeṇa sūktena yuktena ca  mṛtyuṃjayena maṃtreṇa tathā paṃcākṣareṇa ca  
jaladhārāḥ sahasreṇa śatenaikottareṇa vā  kartavyā vedamārgeṇa nāmabhirvātha vā punaḥ  
tataścaṃdanapuṣpādi ropaṇīyaṃ śivopari  dāpayetpraṇavenaiva mukhavāsādikaṃ tathā  
tataḥ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ devaṃ niṣkalamakṣayam  kāraṇaṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvalokamayaṃ param  
brahmendropendraviṣṇvādyairapi devairagocaram  vedavidbhirhi vedāṃte tvagocara miti smṛtam  
ādimadhyāntarahitaṃ bheṣajaṃ sarvarogiṇām  śivatattvamiti khyātaṃ śivaliṃgaṃ vyavasthitam  
praṇavenaiva maṃtreṇa pūjayelliṃgamūrddhani  dhūpairdīpaiśca naivaidyaistāmbūlaiḥ sundaraistathā  
nīrājanena ramyeṇa yathoktavidhinā tataḥ  namaskāraiḥ stavaiścānyairmaṃtrairnānāvidhairapi  
arghyaṃ dattvā tu puṣpāṇi pādayossuvikīrya ca  praṇipatya ca deveśamātmanārādhayecchivam  
haste gṛhītvā puṣpāṇi samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  prārthayetpunarīśānaṃ maṃtreṇānena śaṃkaram  
ajñānādyadi vā jñānājjapapūjādikaṃ mayā  kṛtaṃ tadastu saphalaṃ kṛpayā tava śaṃkara  
paṭhitvaivaṃ ca puṣpāṇi śivopari mudā nyaset  svastyayanaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā hyāśiṣo vividhāstathā  
mārjanaṃ tu tataḥ kāryaṃ śivasyopari vai punaḥ  namaskāraṃ tataḥ kṣāṃtiṃ punarācamanāya ca  
aghoccāraṇamuccārya namaskāraṃ prakalpayet  prārthayecca punastatra sarvabhāvasamanvitaḥ  
śive bhaktiśśive bhaktiśśive bhaktirbhave bhave  anyathā śaraṇaṃ nāsti tvameva śaraṇaṃ mama  
iti saṃprārthya deveśaṃ sarvasiddhipradāyakam  pūjayetparayā bhaktyā galanādairviśeṣataḥ  
namaskāraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā parivāragaṇaissaha  praharṣamatulaṃ labdhvā kāryaṃ kuryādyathāsukham  
evaṃ yaḥ pūjayennityaṃ śivabhaktiparāyaṇaḥ  tasya vai sakalā siddhirjāyate tu pade pade  
vāgmī sa jāyate tasya manobhī ṣṭaphalaṃ dhruvam  rogaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca śokaṃ ca hyudvegaṃ kṛtrimaṃ tathā  
kauṭilyaṃ ca garaṃ caiva yadyaduḥkhamupasthitam  tadduḥkhaṃ nāśa yatyeva śivaḥ śivakaraḥ paraḥ  
kalyāṇaṃ jāyate tasya śuklapakṣe yathā śaśī  varddhate sadguṇastatra dhruvaṃ śaṃkarapūjanāt  
iti pūjāvidhiśśaṃbhoḥ proktaste munisattama  ataḥ paraṃ ca śuśrūṣuḥ kiṃ praṣṭāsi ca nārada  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitī yāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṇḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne śivapūjāvidhivarṇano nāmaikādaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
nārada uvāca  brahmanprajāpate tāta dhanyastvaṃ śivasaktadhīḥ  etadeva punassamyagbrūhi me vistarādvidhe  
brahmovāca  ekasminsamaye tāta ṛṣīnāhūya sarvataḥ  nirjarāṃścā'vadaṃ prītyā suvacaḥ padmasaṃbhavaḥ  
yadi nityasukhe śraddhā yadi siddheśca kāmukāḥ  āgaṃtavyaṃ mayā sārddhaṃ tīraṃ kṣīrapayonidheḥ  
ityetadvacanaṃ śrutvā gatāste hi mayā saha  yatrāste bhagavānviṣṇussarveṣāṃ hitakārakaḥ  
tatra gatvā jagannāthaṃ devadevaṃ janārddanam  upatasthussurā natvā sukṛtāṃjalayoḥ mune  
tāndṛṣṭvā ca tadā viṣṇurbrahmādyānamarānsthitān  smarañchivapadāṃbhojamabravītparamaṃ vacaḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  kimarthamāgatā yūyaṃ brahmādyāśca surarṣayaḥ  sarvaṃ vadata tatprītyā kiṃ kāryaṃ vidyate'dhunā  
brahmovāca  iti pṛṣṭāstadā tena viṣṇunā ca mayā surāḥ  punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prītyā kiṃ kāryaṃ vidyate'dhunā  vinivedayituṃ kāryaṃ hyabruvanvacanaṃ śubham  
devā ūcuḥ  nityaṃ sevā tu kasyaiva kāryā duḥkhapahāriṇī  
ityetadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhagavānbhaktavatsalaḥ  sāmarasya mama prītyā kṛpayā vākyamabravīt  
śrībhagavānuvāca  brahmañcchṛṇu suraissamyakśrutaṃ ca bhavatā purā  tathāpi kathyate tubhyaṃ devebhyaśca tathā punaḥ  
dṛṣṭaṃ ca dṛśyate'dyaiva kiṃ punaḥ pṛcchyate 'dhunā  brahmandevaissamastaiśca bahudhā kāryatatparaiḥ  
sevyasevyassadā devaśśaṃkarassarvaduḥkhahā  mamāpi kathitaṃ tena brahma ṇo'pi viśeṣataḥ  
prastutaṃ caiva dṛṣṭaṃ vassarvaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtamadbhutam  tyājyaṃ tadarcanaṃ naiva kadāpi sukhamīpsubhiḥ  
saṃtyajya devadeveśaṃ liṃgamūrtiṃ maheśvaram  tāraputrāstathaivaite naṣṭāste'pi sabāṃdhavāḥ  
mayā ca mohitāste vai māyayā dūrataḥ kṛtāḥ  sarve vinaṣṭāḥ pradhvastāḥ śivena rahitā yadā  
tasmātsadā pūjanīyo liṃgamūrtidharī haraḥ  sevanīyo viśeṣeṇa śraddhayā devasattamaḥ  
śarvaliṅgārcanādeva devā daityāśca sattamāḥ  ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathā brahmankathaṃ tadvismṛtaṃ tvayā  
talliṅgamarcayennityaṃ yena kenāpi hetunā  tasmāt brahmansuraḥ śarvaḥ sarvakāmaphalepsayā  
sā hanistanmahāchidraṃ sāndhatā sā ca mugdhatā  yanmuhūrttaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vāpi śivaṃ naiva samarcayet  
bhavabhaktiparā ye ca bhavapraṇatacetasaḥ  bhavasaṃsmaraṇā ye ca na te duḥkhasyabhājanāḥ  
bhavanāni manojñāni manojñābharaṇāḥ striyaḥ  dhanaṃ ca tuṣṭiparyaṃtaṃ putrapautrādisaṃtatiḥ  
ārogyaṃ ca śarīraṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ cāpyalaukikīm  ye vāṃchaṃti mahābhāgāḥ sukhaṃ vā tridaśālayam  
aṃte muktiphalaṃ caiva bhaktiṃ vā parameśituḥ  pūrvapuṇyātirekeṇa te'rcayaṃti sadāśivam  
yo'rcayecchivaliṃgaṃ vai nityaṃ bhaktiparāyaṇaḥ  tasya vai saphalā siddhirna sa pāpaiḥ prayujyate  
brahmovāca  ityuktāśca tadā devāḥ praṇipatya hariṃ svayam  liṃgāni prārthayāmāsussarvakāmāptaye nṛṇām  
tacchrutvā ca tadā viṣṇu viśvakarmāṇamabravīta  ahaṃ ca muniśārdūla jīvoddhāraparāyaṇaḥ  
viśvakarmanyathā śaṃbhoḥ kalpayitvā śubhāni ca  liṃgāni sarvadevebhyo deyāni vacanānmama  
brahmovāca  liṃgāni kalpayitvevamadhikārānurūpataḥ  viśvakarmā dadau tebhyo niyogānmama vā hareḥ  
tadeva kathayāmyadya śrūyatāmṛṣisattama  padmarāgamayaṃ śakro hema viśra vasassutaḥ  
pītaṃ maṇimayaṃ dharmo varuṇaśśyāmalaṃ śivam  indranīlamayaṃ viṣṇurbrahmā hemamayaṃ tathā  
viśvedevāstathā raupyaṃ vasavaśca tathaiva ca  ārakūṭamayaṃ vāpi pārthivaṃ hyaśvinau mune  
lakṣmīśca sphāṭikaṃ devī hyādityāstāmranirmitam  mauktikaṃ somarājo vai vajraliṃgaṃ vibhāvasuḥ  
mṛṇmayaṃ caiva vipreṃdrā viprapatnyastathaiva ca  cāṃdanaṃ ca mayo nāgāḥ pravālamayamādarāt  
navanītamayaṃ devī yogī bhasmamayaṃ tathā  yakṣā dadhimayaṃ liṃgaṃ chāyā piṣṭamayaṃ tathā  
śivaliṃgaṃ ca brahmāṇī ratnaṃ pūjayati dhruvam  pāradaṃ pārthivaṃ bāṇassamarcati pare'pi vā  
evaṃ vidhāni liṃgāni dattāni viśvakarmaṇā  te pūjayaṃti sarve vai devā ṛṣigaṇā stathā  
viṣṇurdattvā ca liṃgāni devebhyo hitakāmyayā  pūjāvidhiṃ samācaṣṭa brahmaṇe me pinākinaḥ  
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya brahmāhaṃ devasattamaiḥ  āgacchaṃ ca svakaṃ dhāma harṣanirbharamānasaḥ  
tatrāgatya ṛṣīnsarvāndevāṃścāhaṃ tathā mune  śivapūjāvidhiṃ samyagabruvaṃ sakaleṣṭadam  
brahmovāca  śrūyatāmṛṣayaḥ sarve sāmarāḥ prematatparāḥ  śivapūjāvidhiṃ prītyā kathaye bhuktimuktidam  
mānuṣaṃ janma saṃprāpya durlabhaṃ sarvajaṃtuṣu  tatrāpi satkule devā duṣprāpyaṃ ca munīśvarāḥ  
avyaṃgaṃ caiva vipreṣu sācāreṣu sapuṇyataḥ  śivasaṃtoṣahetośca karmasvoktaṃ samācaret  
yadyajjātisamuddiṣṭaṃ tattatkarma na laṃghayet  yāvaddānasya saṃpattistāvatkarma samāvahet  
karmayajñasahasrebhyastapoyajño viśiṣyate  tapoyajñasahasrebhyo japayajño viśiṣyate  
dhyānayajñātparaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ jñānasya sādhanam  yatassamarasaṃ sveṣṭaṃ yāgī dhyānena paśyati  
dhyānayajñaratasyāsya sadā saṃnihitaśśivaḥ  nāsti vijñānināṃ kiṃcitprāyaścittādiśodhanam  
viśuddhā vidyayā ye ca brahmanbrahmavido janāḥ  nāsti kriyā ca teṣāṃ vai sukhaṃ dukhaṃ vicārataḥ  
dharmādharmau japo homo dhyānaṃ dhyānavidhistathā  sarvadā nirvikārāste vidyayā ca tayāmarāḥ  
parānaṃdakaraṃ liṃgaṃ viśuddhaṃ śivamakṣaram  niṣkalaṃ sarvagaṃ jñeyaṃ yogināṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam  
liṃgaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyaṃtaraṃ dvijāḥ  bāhyaṃ sthūlaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ sūkṣmamābhyaṃtaraṃ matam  
karmayajñaratā ye ca sthūlaliṃgārcane ratāḥ  asatāṃ bhāvanārthāya sūkṣmeṇa sthūlavigrahāḥ  
ādhyātmikaṃ yalliṃgaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yasya no bhavet  sa talliṃge tathā sthūle kalpayecca na cānyathā  
jñānināṃ sūkṣmamamalaṃ bhāvātpratyakṣamavyayam  yathā sthūlamayuktānāmutkṛṣṭādau prakalpitam  
aho vicārato nāsti hyanyattatvārthavādinaḥ  niṣkalaṃ sakalaṃ citte sarvaṃ śivamayaṃ jagat  
evaṃ jñānavimuktānāṃ nāsti doṣa vikalpanā  vidhiścaiva tathā nāsti vihitāvihite tathā  
yathā jaleṣu kamalaṃ salilairnāvalipyate  tathā jñānī gṛhe tiṣṭhankarmaṇā nāvabadhyate  
iti jñānaṃ samutpannaṃ yāvannaiva narasya vai  tāvacca karmaṇā devaṃ śivamārādhayennaraḥ  
pratyayārthaṃ ca jagatāmekastho'pi divākaraḥ  eko'pi bahudhā dṛṣṭo jalādhārādivastuṣu  
dṛśyate śrūyate loke yadyatsadasadātmakam  tattatsarvaṃ surā vitta paraṃ brahma śivātmakam  
bhedo jalānāṃ loke'sminpratibhāve vicārataḥ  evamāhustathā cānye sarve vedārthatattvagāḥ  
hṛdi saṃsāriṇaḥ sākṣātsakalaḥ parameśvaraḥ  iti vijñānayuktasya kiṃ tasya pratimādibhiḥ  
iti vijñānahīnasya pratimākalpanā śubhā  padamuccaissamāroḍhuṃ puṃso hyālambanaṃ smṛtam  
ālambanaṃ vinā tasya padamuccaiḥ suduṣkaram  nirguṇaprāptaye nṝṇāṃ pratimālambanaṃ smṛtam  
saguṇānirguṇā prāptirbhavatī suniścitam  evaṃ ca sarvadevānāṃ pratimā pratyayāvahā  
devaścāyaṃ mahīyānvai tasyārthe pūjanaṃ tvidam  gaṃdhacandanapuṣpādi kimarthaṃ pratimāṃ vinā  
tāvacca pratimā pūjya yāvadvijñānasaṃbhavaḥ  jñānābhāvena pūjyeta patanaṃ tasya niścitam  
evasmātkāraṇādviprāḥ śrūyatāṃ paramārthataḥ  svajātyuktaṃ tu yatkarma kartavyaṃ tatprayatnataḥ  
yatra yatra yathā bhaktiḥ kartavyaṃ pūjanādikam  vinā pūjanadānādi pātakaṃ na ca dūrataḥ  
yāvacca pātakaṃ dehe tāvatsiddhirna jāyate  gate ca pātake tasya sarvaṃ ca saphalaṃ bhavet  
tathā ca maline vastre raṃgaḥ śubhataro na hi  kṣālane hi kṛte śuddhe sarvo raṃgaḥ prasajjate  
tathā ca nirmale dehe devānāṃ samyagarcayā  jñānaraṃgaḥ prajāyeta tadā vijñānasaṃbhavaḥ  
vijñānasya ca sanmūlaṃ bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī  jñānasyāpi ca sanmūlaṃ bhaktirevā'bhidhīyate  
bhaktermūlaṃ tu satkarma sveṣṭadevādipūjanam  tanmūlaṃ sadguruḥ proktastanmūlaṃ saṃgatiḥ satām  
saṃgatyā gururāpyeta gurormaṃtrādi pūjanam  pūjanājjāyate bhaktirbhaktyā jñānaṃ prajāyate  
vijñānaṃ jāyate jñānātparabrahmaprakāśakam  vijñānaṃ ca yadā jātaṃ tadā bhedo nivartate  
bhede nivṛtte sakale dvaṃdvaduḥkhavihīnatā  dvaṃdvaduḥkhavihīnastu śivarūpo bhavatyasau  
dvaṃdvāprāptau na jāyetāṃ sukhaduḥkhe vijānataḥ  vihitāvihite tasya na syātāṃ ca surarṣayaḥ  
īdṛśo viralo loke gṛhāśramavivarjitaḥ  yadi loke bhavatyasmindarśanātpāpahārakaḥ  
tīrthāni ślāghayaṃtīha tādṛśaṃ jñānavittamam  devāśca munayassarve parabrahmātmakaṃ śivam  
tādṛśāni na tīrthāni na devā mṛcchilāmayāḥ  te punaṃtyurukālena vijñānī darśanādapi  
yāvadgṛhāśrame tiṣṭhettāvadākārapūjanam  kuryācchreṣṭhasya saprītyā sureṣu khalu paṃcasu  
athavā ca śivaḥ pūjyo mūlamekaṃ viśiṣyate  mūle sikte tathā śākhāstṛptāssatyakhilāssurāḥ  
śākhāsu ca sutṛptāsu mūlaṃ tṛptaṃ na karhicit  evaṃ sarveṣu tṛpteṣu sureṣu munisattamāḥ  
sarvathā śivatṛptirno vijñeyā sūkṣmabuddhibhiḥ  śive ca pūjite devāḥ pūjitāssarva eva hi  
tasmācca pūjayeddevaṃ śaṃkaraṃ lokaśaṃkaram  sarvakāmaphalāvāptyai sarvabhūtahite rataḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudra saṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṇḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne pūjāvidhivarṇane sārāsāravicāravarṇano nāma dvādaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi pūjāvidhimanuttamam  śrūyatāmṛṣayo devāssarvakāmasukhāvaham  
brāhme muhūrte cotthāya saṃsmaretsāṃbakaṃ śivam  kuryāttatprārthanāṃ bhaktyā sāṃjalirnatamastakaḥ  
uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha deveśa uttiṣṭha hṛdayeśaya  uttiṣṭha tvamumāsvāminbrahmāṇḍe maṃgalaṃ kuru  
jānāmi dharmaṃ na ca me pravṛttirjānāmyadharmaṃ na ca me nivṛttiḥ  tvayā mahādeva hṛdisthitena yathā niyukto'smi tathā karomi  
ityuktvā vacanaṃ bhaktyā smṛtvā ca gurupādake  bahirgaccheddakṣiṇāśāṃ tyāgārthaṃ malamūtrayoḥ  
dehaśuddhiṃ tataḥ kṛtvā sa mṛjjalaviśodhanaiḥ  hastau pādau ca prakṣālya daṃtadhāvanamācaret  
divānāthe tvanudite kṛtvā vai daṃtadhāvanam  mukhaṃ ṣoḍaśavāraṃ tu prakṣālyāṃjalibhistathā  
ṣaṣṭhyādyamāśca tithayo navamyarkadine tathā  varjyāssurarṣayo yatnādbhaktena radadhāvane  
yathāvakāśaṃ susnāyānnadyādiṣvathavā gṛhe  deśakālāviruddhaṃ ca snānaṃ kāryaṃ nareṇa ca  
raverdine tathā śrāddhe saṃkrāntau grahaṇe tathā  mahādāne tathā tīrthe hyupavāsadine tathā  
aśaucepyathavā prāpte na snāyāduṣṇavāriṇā  yathā sābhimukhaṃsnāyāttīrthādau bhaktimānnaraḥ  
tailābhyaṃgaṃ ca kurvīta vārāndṛṣṭvā krameṇa ca  nityamabhyaṃgake caiva vāsitaṃ vā na dūṣitam  
śrāddhe ca grahaṇe caivopavāse pratipaddine  athavā sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ na duṣyedgrahaṇaṃ vinā  
deśaṃ kālaṃ vicāryaivaṃ snānaṃ kuryādyathā vidhi  uttarābhimukhaścaiva prāṅmukhopyathavā punaḥ  
ucchiṣṭenaiva vastreṇa na snāyātsa kadācana  śuddhavastreṇa saṃsnāyāttaddevasmarapūrvakam  
paradhāryyaṃ ca nocchiṣṭaṃ rātrau ca vidhṛtaṃ ca yat  tena snānaṃ tathā kāryaṃ kṣālitaṃ ca parityajet  
tarpaṇaṃ ca tataḥ kāryaṃ devarṣipitṛtṛptidam  dhautavastraṃ tato dhāryaṃ punarācamanaṃ caret  
śucau deśe tato gatvā gomayādyupamārjite  āsanaṃ ca śubhaṃ tatra racanīyaṃ dvijottamāḥ  
śuddhakāṣṭhasamutpannaṃ pūrṇaṃ staritameva vā  citrāsanaṃ tathā kuryātsarvakāmaphalapra dam  
yathāyogyaṃ punargrāhyaṃ mṛgacarmādikaṃ ca yat  tatropaviśya kurvīta tripuṃḍraṃ bhasmanā sudhīḥ  
japastapastathā dānaṃ tripuṇḍrātsaphalaṃ bhavet  abhāve bhasmanastatra jalasyādi prakīrtitam  
evaṃ kṛtvā tripuṃḍraṃ ca rudrākṣāndhārayennaraḥ  saṃpādya ca svakaṃ karma punarārādhayecchivam  
punarācamanaṃ kṛtvā trivāraṃ maṃtrapūrvakam  ekaṃ vātha prakuryācca gaṃgābinduriti bruvan  
annodakaṃ tathā tatra śivapūjārthamāharet  anyadvastu ca yatkiṃcidyathāśakti samīpagam  
kṛtvā stheyaṃ ca tatraiva dhairyamāsthāya vai punaḥ  arghaṃ pātraṃ tathā caikaṃ jalagaṃdhākṣatairyutam  
dakṣiṇāṃse tathā sthāpyamupacārasya klṛptaye  gurośca smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tadanujñāmavāpya ca  
saṃkalpaṃ vidhivatkṛtvā kāmanāṃ ca niyujya vai  pūjayetparayā bhaktyā śivaṃ saparivārakam  
mudrāmekāṃ pradarśyaiva pūjayedvighnahārakam  siṃdurādipadārthaiśca siddhibuddhisamanvitam  
lakṣalābhayutaṃ tatra pūjayitvā nametpunaḥ  caturthyaṃtairnāmapadairnamontaiḥ praṇavādibhiḥ  
kṣamāpyainaṃ tadā devaṃ bhrātrā caiva samanvitam  pūjayetparayā bhaktyā namaskuryātpunaḥ punaḥ  
dvārapālaṃ sadā dvāri tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ ca mahodaram  pūjayitvā tataḥ paścātpūjayedgirijāṃ satīm  
caṃdanaiḥ kuṃkumaiścaiva dhūpairdīpairanekaśaḥ  naivedyairvividhaiścaiva pūjayitvā tataśśivam  
namaskṛtya punastatra gacchecca śivasannidhau  yadi gehe pārthivīṃ vā haimīṃ vā rājatīṃ tathā  
dhātujanyāṃ tathaivānyāṃ pāradāṃ vā prakalpayet  namaskṛtya punastāṃ ca pūjayedbhaktitatparaḥ  
tasyāṃ tu pūjitāyāṃ vai sarve syuḥ pūjitāstadā  sthāpayecca mṛdā liṃgaṃ vidhāya vidhipūrvakam  
kartavyaṃ sarvathā tatra niyamāssvagṛhe sthitaiḥ  prāṇapratiṣṭhāṃ kurvīta bhūtaśuddhiṃ vidhāya ca  
dikpālānpūjayettatra sthāpayitvā śivālaye  gṛhe śivassadā pūjyo mūlamaṃtrābhiyogataḥ  
tatra tu dvārapālānāṃ niyamo nāsti sarvathā  gṛhe liṃgaṃ ca yatpūjyaṃ tasminsarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam  
pūjākāle ca sāṃgaṃ vai parivāreṇa saṃyutam  āvāhya pūjayeddevaṃ niyamo'tra na vidyate  
śivasya saṃnidhiṃ kṛtvā svāsanaṃ parikalpayet  udaṅmukhastadā sthitvā punarācamanaṃ caret  
prakṣālya hastau paścādvai prāṇāyāmaṃ prakalpayet  mūlamaṃtreṇa tatraiva daśāvartaṃ nayennaraḥ  
paṃcamudrāḥ prakartavyāḥ pūjāvaśyaṃ karepsitāḥ  etā mudrāḥ pradarśyaiva caretpūjāvidhiṃ naraḥ  
dīpaṃ kṛtvā tadā tatra namaskāraṃ guroratha  badhvā padmāsanaṃ tatra bhadrāsanamathāpi vā  
uttānāsanakaṃ kṛtvā paryaṃkāsanakaṃ tathā  yathāsukhaṃ tathā sthitvā prayogaṃ punareva ca  
kṛtvā pūjāṃ purājātāṃ vaṭṭakenaiva tārayet  yadi vā svayameveha gṛhe na niyamo'sti ca  
paścāccaivārghapātreṇa kṣārayelliṃgamuttamam  ananyamānaso bhūtvā pūjādravyaṃ nidhāya ca  
paścāccāvāhayeddevaṃ maṃtreṇānena vai naraḥ  kailāsaśikharasthaṃ ca pārvatīpatimuttamam  
yathoktarūpiṇaṃ śaṃbhuṃ nirguṇaṃ guṇarūpiṇam  paṃcavaktraṃ daśabhujaṃ trinetraṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam  
karpūragauraṃ divyāṃgaṃ candramauliṃ kapardinam  vyāghracarmottarīyaṃ ca gajacarmāmbaraṃ śubham  
vāsukyādiparītāṃgaṃ pinākādyāyudhānvitam   siddhayo'ṣṭau ca yasyāgre nṛtyaṃtīha niraṃtaram  
jayajayeti śabdaśca sevitaṃ bhakta pūjakaiḥ  tejasā duḥsahenaiva durlakṣyaṃ devasevitam  
śaraṇyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prasannamukhapaṃkajam  vedaiśśāstrairyathā gītaṃ viṣṇubrahmanutaṃ sadā  
bhaktavatsalamānaṃdaṃ śivamāvāhayāmyaham  evaṃ dhvātvā śivaṃ sāmbamāsanaṃ parikalpayet  
caturthyaṃtapadenaiva sarvaṃ kuryādyathākramam  tataḥ pādyaṃ pradadyādvai tatorghyaṃ śaṃkarāya ca  
tataścācamanaṃ kṛtvā śaṃbhave paramātmane  paścācca paṃcabhirdravyaiḥ snāpayecchaṃkaraṃ mudā  
vedamaṃtrairyathāyogyaṃ nāmabhirvā samaṃtrakaiḥ  caturthyaṃtapadairbhaktyā dravyāṇyevārpayettadā  
tathābhilaṣitaṃ dravyamarpayecchaṃkaropari  tataśca vāruṇaṃ snānaṃ karaṇīyaṃ śivāya vai  
sugaṃdhaṃ caṃdanaṃ dadyādanyalepāni yatnataḥ  sasugaṃdhajalenaiva jaladhārāṃ prakalpayet  
vedamaṃtraiḥ ṣaḍaṃgairvā nāmabhī rudrasaṃkhyayā  yathāvakāśaṃ tāṃ datvā vastreṇa mārjayettataḥ  
paścādācamanaṃ dadyāttato vastraṃ samarpayeta  tilāścaiva javā vāpi godhūmā mudgamāṣakāḥ  
arpaṇīyāḥ śivāyaiva maṃtrairnānāvidhairapi  tataḥ puṣpāṇi deyāni paṃcāsyāya mahātmane  
prativaktraṃ yathādhyānaṃ yathāyogyābhilāṣataḥ  kamalaiśśatapatraiśca śaṃkhapuṣpaiḥ paraistathā  
kuśapuṣpaiśca dhattūrairmaṃdārairdroṇasaṃbhavaiḥ  tathā ca tulasīpatrairbilvapatrairviśeṣataḥ  
pūjayetparayā bhaktyā śaṃkaraṃ bhaktavatsalam  sarvābhāve bilvapatramaparṇīyaṃ śivāya vai  
bilvapatrārpaṇenaiva sarvapūjā prasidhyati  tatassugaṃdhacūrṇaṃ vai vāsitaṃ tailamuttamam  
arpaṇīyaṃ ca vividhaṃ śivāya parayā mudā  tato dhūpaṃ prakartavyo guggulāgurubhirmudā  
dīpo deyastatastasmai śaṃkarāya ghṛtaplutaḥ  arghaṃ dadyātpunastasmai maṃtreṇānena bhaktitaḥ  
kārayedbhāvato bhaktyā vastreṇa mukhamārjanam  rūpaṃ dehi yaśo dehi bhogaṃ dehi ca śaṃkara  
bhuktimuktiphalaṃ dehi gṛhītvārghaṃ namostu te  tato deyaṃ śivāyaiva naivedyaṃ vividhaṃ śubham  
tata ācamanaṃ prītyā kārayedvā vilambataḥ  tataśśivāya tāmbūlaṃ sāṃgopāṅgaṃ vidhāya ca  
kuryādārārtikaṃ pañcavartikāmanusaṃkhyayā  pādayośca caturvāraṃ dviḥkṛtvo nābhimaṇḍale  
ekakṛtve mukhe saptakṛtvaḥ sarvāṅgaṃ eva hi  tato dhyānaṃ yathoktaṃ vai kṛtvā maṃtramudīrayet  
yathāsaṃkhyaṃ yathājñānaṃ kuryānmaṃtravidhinnaraḥ  gurūpadiṣṭamārgeṇa kṛtvā maṃtrajapaṃ sudhīḥ  
gurūpadiṣṭamārgeṇa kṛtvā mantramudīrayet  yathāsaṃkhyaṃ yathājñānaṃ kuryānmaṃtravidhinnaraḥ  
stotrairnānāvidhaiḥ prītyā stuvīta vṛṣabhadhvajam  tataḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kuryācchivasya ca śanaiśśanaiḥ  
namaskārāṃstataḥ kuryātsāṣṭāṃgaṃ vidhivatpumān  tataḥ puṣpāṃjalideṃyo maṃtreṇānena bhaktitaḥ  
śaṃkarāya pareśāya śivasaṃtoṣahetave  ajñānādyadi vā jñānādyadyatpūjādikaṃ mayā  
kṛtaṃ tadastu saphalaṃ kṛpayā tava śaṃkara  tāvakastvadgataprāṇa tvaccittohaṃ sadā mṛḍa  
iti vijñāya gaurīśa bhūtanātha prasīda me  bhūmau skhalitavādānāṃ bhūmirevāvalaṃbanam  
tvayi jātāparādhānāṃ tvameva śaraṇaṃ prabho  ityādi bahu vijñaptiṃ kṛtvā samyagvidhānataḥ  
puṣpāṃjaliṃ samarpyaiva punaḥ kuryānnatiṃ muhuḥ  svasthānaṃ gaccha deveśa parivārayutaḥ prabho  pūjākāle punarnātha tvayā gaṃtavyamādarāt  iti saṃprārthya vahuśaśśaṃkaraṃ bhaktavatsalam  
visarjayetsvahṛdaye tadapo mūrdhni vinyaset  iti proktamaśeṣeṇa munayaḥ śivapūjanam  bhuktimuktipradaṃ caiva kimanyacchrotumarhatha  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamakhaṃḍe sṛṣṭyupākhyāne śivapūjana varṇano nāma trayodaśodhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  vyāsaśiṣya mahābhāga kathaya tvaṃ pramāṇataḥ  kaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjitaśśaṃbhuḥ kiṃ kiṃ yacchati vai phalam  
 sūta uvāca  śaunakādyāśca ṛṣayaḥ śṛṇutādarato'khilam  kathayāmyadya suprītyā puṣpārpaṇavinirṇayam  
eṣa eva vidhiḥ pṛṣṭo nāradena maharṣiṇā  provāca paramaprītyā puṣpārpaṇavinirṇayam  
brahmovāca  kamalairbilvapatraiśca śatapatraistathā punaḥ  śaṃkhapuṣpaistathā devaṃ lakṣmīkāmo'rcayecchivam  
etaiśca lakṣasaṃkhyākaiḥ pūjitaścedbhavecchivaḥ  pāpahānistathā vipra lakṣmīssyānnātra saṃśayaḥ  
viṃśatiḥ kamalānāṃ tu prasthamekamudāhṛtam  bilvo dalasahasreṇa prasthārddhaṃ paribhāṣitam  
śatapatrasahasreṇa prasthārddhaṃ paribhāṣitam  palaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ pratthaḥ palaṃ ṭaṃkadaśasmṛtaḥ  
anenaiva tu mānena tulāmāropayedyadā  sarvānkāmānavāpnoti niṣkāmaścecchivo bhavet  
rājyasya kāmuko yo vai pārthivānāṃ ca pūjayā  toṣayecchaṃkaraṃ devaṃ daśakoṣṭyā munīśvarāḥ  
liṃgaṃ śivaṃ tathā puṣpamakhaṇḍaṃ taṃdulaṃ tathā  carcitaṃ caṃdanenaiva jaladhārāṃ tathā punaḥ  
pratirūpaṃ tathā maṃtraṃ bilvīdalamanuttamam  athavā śatapatraṃ ca kamalaṃ vā tathā punaḥ  
śaṃkhapuṣpaistathā proktaṃ viśeṣeṇa purātanaiḥ  sarvakāmaphalaṃ divyaṃ paratrehāpi sarvathā  
dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ ca naivedyamarghaṃ cārārtika tathā  pradakṣiṇāṃ namaskāraṃ kṣamāpanavisarjane  
kṛtvā sāṃgaṃ tathā bhojyaṃ kṛtaṃ yena bhavediha  tasya vai sarvathā rājyaṃ śaṃkaraḥ pradadāti ca  
pradhānyakāmuko yo vai tadarddhenārcayetpumān  kārāgṛhagato yo vai lakṣenaivārcayeddhanam  
rogagrasto yadā syādvai tadarddhenārcayecchivam  kanyākāmo bhavedyo vai tadarddhena śivaṃ punaḥ  
vidyākāmastathā yaḥ syāttadarddhenārcayecchivam  vāṇīkāmo bhavedyo vai ghṛtenaivārcayecchivam  
uccāṭanārthaṃ śatrūṇāṃ tanmitenaiva pūjanam  māraṇe vai tu lakṣeṇa mohane tu tadardhataḥ  
sāmaṃtānāṃ jaye caiva koṭipūjā praśasyate  rājñāmayutasaṃkhyaṃ ca vaśīkaraṇakarmaṇi  
yaśase ca tathā saṃkhyā vāhanādyaiḥ sahasrikā  muktikāmorcayecchaṃbhuṃ paṃcakoṭyā subhaktitaḥ  
jñānārthī pūjayetkoṭyā śaṃkaraṃ loka śaṃkaram  śivadarśanakāmo vai tadardhena prapūjayet  
tathā mṛtyuṃjayo jāpyaḥ kāmanāphalarūpataḥ  paṃcalakṣā japā yarhi pratyakṣaṃ tu bhavecchivaḥ  
lakṣeṇa bhajate kaściddvitīye jātisaṃbhavaḥ  tṛtīye kāmanālābhaścaturthe taṃ prapaśyati  
paṃcamaṃ ca yadā lakṣaṃ phalaṃ yacchatyasaṃśayam  anenaiva tu maṃtreṇa daśalakṣe phalaṃ bhavet  
muktikāmo bhavedyo vai darbhaiśca pūjanaṃ caret  lakṣasaṃkhyā tu sarvatra jñātavyā ṛṣisattama  
āyuṣkāmo bhavedyo vai dūrvābhiḥ pūjanaścaret  putrakāmo bhavedyo vai dhattūrakusumaiścaret  
raktadaṇḍaśca dhattūraḥ pūjane śubhadaḥ smṛtaḥ  agastyakusumaiścaiva pūjakasya mahadyaśaḥ  
bhuktimuktiphalaṃ tasya tulasyāḥ pūjayedyadi  arkapuṣpaiḥ pratāpaśca kubjakalhārakaistathā  
japākusumapūjā tu śatrūṇāṃ mṛtyudā smṛtā  rogoccāṭanakānīha karavīrāṇi vai kramāt  
baṃdhukairbhūṣaṇāvāptirjātyāvāhānna saṃśayaḥ  atasīpuṣpakairdevaṃ viṣṇuvallabhatāmiyāt  
śamīpatraistathā muktiḥ prāpyate puruṣeṇa ca  mallikākusumairdattaiḥ striyaṃ śubhatarāṃ śivaḥ  
yūthikākusumaiśśasyairgṛhaṃ naiva vimucyate  karṇikāraistathā vastrasaṃpattirjāyate nṛṇām  
nirguṇḍīkusumairloke mano nirmalatāṃ vrajet  bilvapatraistathā lakṣaiḥ sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt  
śṛṅgārahārapuṣpaistu varddhate sukha sampadā  ṛtujātāni puṣpāṇi muktidāni na saṃśayaḥ  
rājikākusumānīha śatrūṇāṃ mṛtyudāni ca  eṣāṃ lakṣaṃ śive dadyāddadyācca vipulaṃ phalam  
vidyate kusumaṃ tanna yannaiva śivavallabham  caṃpakaṃ ketakaṃ hitvā tvanyatsarvaṃ samarpayet  
ataḥ paraṃ ca dhānyānāṃ pūjane śaṃkarasya ca  pramāṇaṃ ca phalaṃ sarvaṃ prītyā śṛṇu ca sattama  
taṃdulāropaṇe nṝṇāṃ lakṣmī vṛddhiḥ prajāyate  akhaṇḍitavidhau vipra samyagbhaktyā śivopari  
ṣaṭkenaiva tu prasthānāṃ tadardhena tathā punaḥ  paladvayaṃ tathā lakṣamānena samadāhṛtam  
pūjāṃ rudrapradhānena kṛtvā vastraṃ susundaram  śivopari nyasettatra taṃdulārpaṇamuttamam  
upari śrīphalaṃ tvekaṃ gaṃdhapuṣpādibhistathā  ropayitvā ca dhūpādi kṛtvā pūjāphalaṃ bhavet  
prajāpatyadvayaṃ raupyamāsaṃkhyā ca dakṣiṇā  deyā tadupadeṣṭre hi śaktyā vā dakṣiṇā matā  
ādityasaṃkhyayā tatra brāhmaṇānbhojayettataḥ  lakṣapūjā tathā jātā sāṅgaśca mantrapūrvakam  
śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tatra maṃtre vidhirudāhṛtaḥ  tilānāṃ ca palaṃ lakṣaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam  
ekādaśapalaireva lakṣamānamudāhṛtam  pūrvavatpūjanaṃ tatra kartavyaṃ hitakāmyayā  
bhojyā vai brāhmaṇāstasmādatra kāryā nareṇa hi  mahāpātakajaṃ dukhaṃ tatkṣaṇānnaśyati dhruvam  
yavapūjā tathā proktā lakṣeṇa paramā śive  prasthānāmaṣṭakaṃ caiva tathā prasthārddhakaṃ punaḥ  
paladvayayutaṃ tatra mānametatpurātanam  yavapūjā ca munibhiḥ svargasaukhyavivarddhinī  
prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ kartavyaṃ ca phalepsubhiḥ  godhūmānnaistathā pūjā praśastā śaṃkarasya vai  
saṃtatirvarddhate tasya yadi lakṣāvadhiḥ kṛtā  droṇārddhena bhavellakṣaṃ vidhānaṃ vidhipūrvakam  
mudgānāṃ pūjane devaḥ śivo yacchati vai sukham  prasthānāṃ saptakenaiva prasthārddhenāthavā punaḥ  
paladvayayutenaiva lakṣamuktaṃ purātanaiḥ  brāhmaṇāśca tathā bhojyā rudrasaṃkhyāpramāṇataḥ  
priyaṃgupūjanādeva dharmādhyakṣe parātmani  dharmārthakāmā varddhaṃte pūjā sarvasukhāvahā  
prasthaikena ca tasyoktaṃ lakṣamekaṃ purātanaiḥ  brahmabhojaṃ tathā proktamarkasaṃkhyāpramāṇataḥ  
rājikāpūjanaṃ śaṃbhośśatrormṛtyukaraṃ smṛtam  sārṣapānāṃ tathā lakṣaṃ palairviśatisaṃkhyayā  
teṣāṃ ca pūjanādeva śatrormṛtyurudāhṛtaḥ  āḍhakīnāṃ dalaiścaiva śobhayitvārcayecchivam  
vṛtā gauśca pradātavyā balīvardastathaiva ca  marīcisaṃbhavā pūjā śatrornāśakarī smṛtā  
āḍhakīnāṃ dalaiścaiva raṃjayi tvārcayecchivam  nānāsukhakarī hyeṣā pūjā sarvaphalapradā  
dhānyamānamiti proktaṃ mayā te munisattama  lakṣamānaṃ tu puṣpāṇāṃ śṛṇu prītyā munīśvara  
prasthānāṃ ca tathā caikaṃ śaṃkhapuṣpasamudbhavam  proktaṃ vyāsena lakṣaṃ hi sūkṣmamānapradarśinā  
prasthairekādaśairjātilakṣamānaṃ prakīrtitam  yūthikāyāstathā mānaṃ rājikāyāstadarddhakam  
prasthairviṃśatikaiścaiva mallikāmāna muttamam  tilapuṣpaistathā mānaṃ prasthānnyūnaṃ tathaiva ca  
tataśca dviguṇaṃ mānaṃ karavīrabhave smṛtam  nirguṃḍīkusume mānaṃ tathaiva kathitaṃ budhaiḥ  
karṇikāre tathā mānaṃ śirīṣakusume punaḥ  baṃdhujīve tathā mānaṃ prasthānaṃ daśakena ca  
ityādyairvividhai mānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kuryācchivārcanam  sarvakāmasamṛdhyarthaṃ muktyarthaṃ kāmanojjhitaḥ  
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dhārāpūjāphalaṃ mahat  yasya śravaṇamātreṇa kalyāṇaṃ jāyate nṛṇām  
vidhānapūrvakaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhaktyā śivasya vai  paścācca jaladhārā hi kartavyā bhaktitatparaiḥ  
jvarapralāpaśāṃtyarthaṃ jala dhārā śubhāvahā  śatarudriyamaṃtreṇa rudrasyaikādaśena tu  
rudrajāpyena vā tatra sūkten pauruṣeṇa vā  ṣaḍaṃgenātha vā tatra mahāmṛtyuṃjayena ca  
gāyatryā vā namoṃtaiśca nāmabhiḥ praṇavādibhiḥ  maṃtraivāthāgamoktaiśca jaladhārādikaṃ tathā  
sukhasaṃtānavṛddhyarthaṃ dhārāpūjanamuttamam  nānādravyaiḥ śubhairdivyaiḥ prītyā sadbhasmadhāriṇā  
ghṛtadhārā śive kāryā yāvanmaṃtrasahasrakam  tadā vaṃśasya vistāro jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
evaṃ maduktamaṃtreṇa kāryaṃ vai śivapūjanam  brahmabhojyaṃ tathā proktaṃ prājāpatyaṃ munīśvaraiḥ  
kevalaṃ dugdhadhārā ca tadā kāryā viśeṣataḥ  śarkarāmiśritā tatra yadā buddhijaḍo bhavet  
tasyā saṃjāyate jīvasadṛśī buddhiruttamā  yāvanmaṃtrāyutaṃ na syāttāvaddhārāprapūjanam  
yadā coccāṭanaṃ dehe jāyate kāraṇaṃ vinā  yatra kutrāpi vā prema duḥkhaṃ ca parivarddhitam  
svagṛhe kalaho nityaṃ yadā caiva prajāyate  taddhārāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ vai sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ vilīyate  
śatrūṇāṃ tāpanārthaṃ vai tailadhārā śivopari  kartavyā suprayatnena kāryasiddhirdhuvaṃ bhavet  
māsi tenaiva tailena bhogavṛddhiḥ prajāyate  sārṣapenaiva tailena śatrunāśobhaveddhruvam  
madhunā yakṣarājo vai gacchecca śivapūjanāta  dhārā cekṣurasasyāpi sarvānandakarī śive  
dhārā gaṃgājalasyaiva bhuktimuktiphalapradā  etāssarvāśca yāḥ proktā mṛtyaṃjayasamudbhavāḥ  
tatrā'yutapramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ tadvidhānataḥ  kartavyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca bhojyaṃ vai rudrasaṃkhyayā  
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yatpṛṣṭo'haṃ munīśvara  etadvai saphalaṃ loke sarvakāmahitāvaham  
skaṃdomāsahitaṃ śaṃbhuṃ saṃpūjya vidhinā saha  yatphalaṃ labhate bhaktyā tadvadāmi yathāśrutam  
atra bhuktvākhilaṃ saukhyaṃ putrapautrādibhiḥ śubham  tato yāti maheśasya lokaṃ sarvasukhāvaham  
sūryakoṭipratīkāśairvimānaiḥ sarvakāmagaiḥ  rudrakanyāsamākīrṇairgeyavādyasamanvitaiḥ  
krīḍate śivabhūtaśca yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam  tato mokṣamavāpnoti vijñānaṃ prāpya cāvyayam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe prathama khaṃḍe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ sṛṣṭyupākhyāne śivapūjāvidhānavarṇano nāma caturdaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
nārada uvāca  vidhe vidhe mahābhāga dhanyastvaṃ surasattama  śrāvitādyādbhutā śaivakathā paramapāvanī  
tatrādbhutā mahādivyā liṃgotpattiḥ śrutā śubhā  śrutvā yasyāḥ prabhāvaṃ ca duḥkhanāśo bhavediha  
anaṃtaraṃ ca yajjātaṃ māhātmyaṃ caritaṃ tathā  sṛṣṭeścaiva prakāraṃ ca kathaya tvaṃ viśeṣataḥ  
brahmovāca  samyak pṛṣṭe ca bhavatā yajjātaṃ tadanaṃtaram  kathayiṣyāmi saṃkṣepādyathā pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ mayā  
aṃtarhite tadā deve śivarūpe sanātane  ahaṃ viṣṇuśca viprendra adhikaṃ sukhamāptavān  
mayā ca viṣṇunā rūpaṃ haṃsavārāhayostadā  saṃvṛtaṃ tu tatastābhyāṃ lokasargāvanecchayā  
nārada uvāca  vidhe brahman mahāprājña saṃśayo hṛdi me mahān  kṛpāṃ kṛtvātulāṃ śīghraṃ taṃ nāśayitumarhasi  
haṃsavārāhayo rūpaṃ yuvābhyāṃ ca dhṛtaṃ katham  anyadrūpaṃ vihāyaiva kimatra vada kāraṇam  
sūta uvāca  ityetadvacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya mahātmanaḥ  smṛtvā śivapadāṃbhojaṃ brahmā sādaramabravīt  
brahmovāca  haṃsasya corddhvagamane gatirbhavati niścalā  tattvātattvaviveko'sti jaladugdhavibhāgavat  
ajñānajñānayostattvaṃ vivecayati haṃsakaḥ  haṃsarūpaṃ dhṛtaṃ tena brahmaṇā sṛṣṭikāriṇā  
viveko naiva labdhaśca yato haṃso vyalīyata  śivasvarūpatattvasya jyotirūpasya nārada  
sṛṣṭipravṛttikāmasya kathaṃ jñānaṃ prajāyate  yato labdho viveko'pi na mayā haṃsarūpiṇā  
gamane'dho varāhasya gatirbhavati niścalā  dhṛtaṃ vārāharūpaṃ hi viṣṇunā vanacāriṇā  
athavā bhavakalpārthaṃ tadrūpaṃ hi prakalpitam  viṣṇunā ca varāhasya bhuvanāvanakāriṇā  
yaddinaṃ hi samārabhya tadrūpaṃ dhṛtavānhariḥ  taddinaṃ prati kalpo'sau kalpo vārāhasaṃjñakaḥ  
tadicchā vā yadā jātā tābhyāṃ rūpaṃ hi dhāraṇe  taddinaṃ pratikalpo'sau kalpo vārāhasaṃjñak  
iti praśnottaraṃ dattaṃ prastutaṃ śṛṇu nārada  smṛtvā śivapadāṃbhojaṃ vakṣye sṛṣṭividhiṃ mune  
aṃtarhite mahādeve tvahaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ  tadīyaṃ vacanaṃ kartumadhyāyandhyānatatparaḥ  
namaskṛtya tadā śaṃbhuṃ jñānaṃ prāpya harestadā  ānaṃdaṃ paramaṃ gatvā sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ mano dadhe  
viṣṇuścāpi tadā tatra praṇipatya sadāśivam  upadiśya ca māṃ tāta hyaṃtardhānamupāgataḥ  
brahmāṇḍācca bahirgatvā prāpya śambhoranugraham  vaikuṃṭhanagaraṃ gatvā tatrovāsa harissadā  
ahaṃ smṛtvā śivaṃ tatra viṣṇuṃ vai sṛṣṭikāmyayā  pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ jalaṃ yacca tatrāṃjalimudākṣipam  
ato'ṇḍamabhavattatra caturviṃśatisaṃjña kam  virāḍrūpamabhūdvipra jalarūpamapaśyataḥ  
tatassaṃśayamāpannastapastepe sudāruṇam  dvādaśābdamahaṃ tatra viṣṇudhyānaparāyaṇaḥ  
tasmiṃśca samaye tāta prādurbhūto harissvayam  māmuvāca mahāprītyā madaṃgaṃ saṃspṛśanmudā  
 viṣṇuruvāca  varaṃ brūhi prasanno'smi nādeyo vidyate tava  brahmañchaṃbhuprasādena sarvaṃ dātuṃ samarthakaḥ  
brahmovāca  yuktametanmahābhāga datto'haṃ śaṃbhunā ca te  taduktaṃ yācate me'dya dehi viṣṇo namo'stu te  
virāḍrūpamidaṃ hyaṃḍaṃ caturviṃśatisaṃjñakam  na caitanyaṃ bhavatyādau jaḍībhūtaṃ pradṛśyate  
prādurbhūto bhavānadya śivānugrahato hare  prāptaṃ śaṃkarasaṃbhūtyā hyaṇḍaṃ caitanyamāvaha  
ityukte ca mahāviṣṇuśśaṃbhorājñāparāyaṇaḥ  anaṃtarūpamāsthāya praviveśa tadaṃḍakam  
sahasraśīrṣā puruṣassahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt  sa bhūmiṃ sarvataspṛtvā tadaṇḍaṃ vyāptavāniti  
praviṣṭe viṣṇunā tasminnaṇḍe samyakstutena me  sacetanamabhūdaṇḍaṃ caturviṃśatisaṃjñakam  
pātālādi samārabhya saptalokādhipaḥ svayam  rājate sma haristatra vairājaḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ  
kailāsanagaraṃ ramyaṃ sarvopari virājitam  nivāsārthaṃ nijasyaiva paṃcavaktra ścakāra ha  
brahmāṃḍasya tathā nāśe vaikuṇṭhasya ca tasya ca  kadācideva devarṣe nāśo nāsti tayoriha  
satyaṃ padamupāśritya sthito'haṃ munisattama  sṛṣṭikāmo'bhavaṃ tāta mahādevājñayā hyaham  
sisṛkṣoratha me prādurabhavatpāpasargakaḥ  avidyāpaṃcakastāta buddhipūrvastamopamaḥ  
tataḥ prasannacitto'hamasṛjaṃ sthāvarābhidham  mukhyasargaṃ ca nissaṃgamadhyāyaṃ śaṃbhuśāsanāt  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā me sisṛkṣośca jñātvā sādhakamātmanaḥ  sargo'vartata duḥkhāḍhyastiryaksrotā na sādhakaḥ  
taṃ cāsādhakamājñāya punaściṃtayataśca me  abhavatsāttvikassarga ūrdhvasrotā iti drutam  
devasargaḥ pratikhyātassatyo'tīva sukhāvahaḥ  tamapyasādhakaṃ matvā'ciṃtayaṃ prabhumātmanaḥ  
prādurāsīttatassargo rājasaḥ śaṃkarājñayā  avāksrotā iti khyāto mānuṣaḥ parasādhakaḥ  
mahādevājñayā sargastato bhūtādiko'bhavat  iti paṃcavidhā sṛṣṭiḥ pravṛttā vai kṛtā mayā  
trayassargāḥ prakṛtyāśca brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitāḥ  tatrādyo mahatassargo dvitīyaḥ sūkṣmabhautikaḥ  
vaikārikastṛtīyaśca ityete prakṛtāstrayaḥ  evaṃ cāṣṭavidhāssargāḥ prakṛtervekṛtaiḥ saha  
kaumāro navamaḥ proktaḥ prākṛto vaikṛtaśca saḥ  eṣāmavāṃtaro bhedo mayā vaktuṃ na śakyate  
alpatvādupayogasya vacmi sargaṃ dvijātmakam  kaumāraḥ sanakādīnāṃ yatra sargo mahānabhūt  
sanakādyāḥ sutā me hi mānasā brahmasaṃmitāḥ  mahāvairāgyasaṃpannā abhavanpaṃca suvratāḥ  
mayājñaptā api ca te saṃsāravimukhā budhāḥ  śivadhyānaikamanaso na sṛṣṭau cakrire matim  
pratyuttaraṃ ca tadanu śrutvāhaṃ munisattama  akārṣaṃ krodhamatyugraṃ mohamāptaśca nārada  
kuddhasya mohitasyātha vihvalasya mune mama  krodhena khalu netrābhyāṃ prāpatannaśrubiṃdavaḥ  
tasminnavasare tatra smṛtena manasā mayā  prabodhitohaṃ tvaritamāgatenā hi viṣṇunā  
tapaḥ kuru śivasyeti hariṇā śikṣito'pyaham  tapokārī mahadghoraṃ paramaṃ munisattama  
tapasyataśca sṛṣṭyarthaṃ bhruvorghrāṇasya madhyataḥ  avimuktābhidhāddeśātsvakīyānme viśeṣataḥ  
trimūrtīnāṃ maheśasya prādurāsīdghṛṇānidhiḥ  ārddhanārīśvaro bhūtvā pūrṇāśassakaleśvaraḥ  
tamajaṃ śaṃkaraṃ sākṣāttejorāśimumāpatim  sarvajñaṃ sarvakartāraṃ nīlalohitasaṃjñakam  
dṛṣṭvā natvā mahābhaktyā stutvāhaṃ tu praharṣitaḥ  avocaṃ devadeveśaṃ sṛja tvaṃ vividhāḥ prajāḥ  
śrutvā mama vacassotha devadevo maheśvaraḥ  sasarja svātmanastulyānrudro rudragaṇānbahūna  
avocaṃ punareveśaṃ mahārudraṃ maheśvaram  janmamṛtyubhayāviṣṭāssṛja deva prajā iti  
evaṃ śrutvā mahādevo madvacaḥ karuṇānidhiḥ  prahasyovāca māṃ sadyaḥ prahasya munisattama  
mahādeva uvāca  janmamṛtyubhayāviṣṭā nāhaṃ srakṣye prajā vidhe  aśobhanāḥ karmavaśā vimagnā duḥkhavāridhau  
ahaṃ duḥkhodadhau magnā uddhariṣyāmi ca prajāḥ  samyakjñānapradānena gurumūrtiparigrahaḥ  
tvameva sṛja duḥkhāḍhyāḥ prajāssarvāḥ prajāpate  madājñayā na baddhastvaṃ māyayā saṃbhaviṣyasi  
brahmovāca  ityuktvā māṃ sa bhagavānsuśrīmānnīlalohitaḥ  sagaṇaḥ paśyato me hi drutamaṃtardadhe haraḥ  
brahmovāca  śabdādīni ca bhūtāni paṃcīkṛtvāhamātmanā  tebhyaḥ sthūlaṃ nabho vāyuṃ vahniṃ caiva jalaṃ mahīm  
parvatāṃśca samudrāṃśca vṛkṣādīnapi nārada  kalādiyugaparyetānkālānanyānavāsṛjam  
sṛṣṭyaṃtānaparāṃścāpi nāhaṃ tuṣṭo'bhava nmune  tato dhyātvā śivaṃ sāmbaṃ sādhakānasṛjaṃ mune  
marīciṃ ca svanetrābhyāṃ hṛdayādbhṛgumeva ca  śiraso'girasaṃ vyānātpulahaṃ munisattamam  
udānācca pulastyaṃ hi vasiṣṭhañca samānataḥ  kratuṃ tvapānācchrotrābhyāmatriṃ dakṣaṃ ca prāṇataḥ  
asṛjaṃ tvāṃ tadotsaṃgācchāyāyāḥ kardamaṃ munim  saṃkalpādasṛjaṃ dharmaṃ sarvasādhanasādhanam  
evametānahaṃ sṛṣṭvā kṛtārthassādhakottamān  abhavaṃ muniśārdūla mahādevaprasādataḥ  
tato madājñayā tāta dharmaḥ saṃkalpasaṃbhavaḥ  mānavaṃ rūpamāpannassādhakaistu pravartitaḥ  
tato'sṛjaṃ svagātrebhyo vividhebhyo'mitānsutān  surāsurādikāṃstebhyo dattvā tāṃ tāṃ tanuṃ mune  
tato'haṃ śaṃkareṇātha preritoṃ'targatena ha  dvidhā kṛtvātmano dehaṃ dvirūpaścābhavaṃ mune  
arddhena nārī puruṣaścārddhena saṃtato mune  sa tasyāmasṛjaddvaṃdvaṃ sarvasādhanamuttamam  
svāyaṃbhuvo manustatra puruṣaḥ parasādhanam  śatarūpābhidhā nārī yoginī sā tapasvinī  
sā punarmanunā tena gṛhītātīva śobhanā  vivāhavidhinā tātā'sṛjatsargaṃ samaithunam  
tasyāṃ tena samutpannastanayaśca priyavrataḥ  tathaivottānapādaśca tathā kanyātrayaṃ punaḥ  
ākūtirdevahūtiśca prasūtiriti viśrutāḥ  ākūtiṃ rucaye prādātkardamāya tu madhyamām  
dadau prasūtiṃ dakṣāyottānapādānujāṃ sutāḥ  tāsāṃ prasūtiprasavaissarvaṃ vyāptaṃ carācaram  
ākūtyāṃ ca ruceścābhūdvaṃdvaṃ yajñaśca dakṣiṇā  yajñasya jajñire putrā dakṣiṇāyāṃ ca dvādaśa  
devahūtyāṃ kardamācca bahvyo jātāssutā mune  daśājjātāścatasraśca tathā putryaśca viṃśatiḥ  
dharmāya dattā dakṣeṇa śraddhādyāstu trayodaśa  śṛṇu tāsāṃ ca nāmāni dharmastrīṇāṃ munīśvara  
śraddhā lakṣmīrdhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā tathā kriyā  vasuḥrbuddhi lajjā śāṃtiḥ siddhiḥ kīrtistrayodaśa  
tābhyāṃ śiṣṭā yavīyasya ekādaśa sulocanāḥ  khyātissatpathasaṃbhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā
