koyaṃ kastvamime ke hi sarvohamapi tattvataḥ  iti buddhyā hi vimṛśa vṛthā śaptāstvayā dvijāḥ  
tattvajñānena nirhṛtya prapaṃcaracano bhava  budhassvastho mahābuddhe nandin krodhādivarjitaḥ  
 brahmovāca  evaṃ prabodhitastena śambhunā nandikeśvaraḥ  vivekaparamo bhūtvā śāṃto'bhūtkrodhavarjitaḥ  
śivopi taṃ prabodhyāśu svagaṇaṃ prāṇavallabham  sagaṇassa yayau tasmātsvasthānaṃ pramudānvitaḥ  
dakṣopi sa ruṣāviṣṭastairddhijaiḥ parivāritaḥ  svasthānaṃ ca yayau citte śivadro haparāyaṇaḥ  
rudraṃ tadānīṃ pariśapyamānaṃ saṃsmṛtya dakṣaḥ parayā ruṣānvitaḥ  śraddhāṃ vihāyaiva sa mūḍhabuddhirniṃdāparobhūcchivapūjakānām  
ityukto dakṣadurbuddhiśśaṃbhunā paramātmanā  parāṃ durdhiṣaṇāṃ tasya śṛṇu tāta vadāmyaham  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīyakhaṇḍe satyupākhyāne śivena dakṣavirodho nāma ṣaḍviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 brahmovāca  ekadā tu mune tena yajñaḥ prāraṃbhito mahān  tatrāhūtāstadā sarve dīkṣitena surarṣayaḥ  
maharṣayo'khilāstatra nirjarāśca samāgatāḥ  yadyajñakaraṇārthaṃ hi śivamāyāvimohitaḥ  
agastyaḥ kaśyapotriśca vāmadevastathā bhṛguḥ  dadhīcirbhagavān vyāso bhāradvājo'tha gautamaḥ  
pailaḥ parāśaro gargo bhārgavaḥ kakupassitaḥ  sumaṃtutrikakaṃkāśca vaiśaṃpāyana eva ca  
ete cānye ca bahavo munayo harṣitā yayu  mama putrasya dakṣasya sadārāssasutā makham  
tathā sarve suragaṇā lokapālā mahodayāḥ  tathopanirjarāssarve svāpakārabalānvitāḥ  
satyalokātsamānīto nutohaṃ viśvakārakaḥ  sasutassa parīvāro mūrtavedāpisaṃyutaḥ  
vaikuṃṭhācca tathā viṣṇussaṃprārthya vividhādarāt  sapārṣadaparīvārassamānīto makhaṃ prati  
evamanye samāyātā dakṣayajñaṃ vimohitāḥ  satkṛtāstena dakṣena sarve te hi durātmanā  
bhavanāni mahārhāṇi suprabhāṇi mahāṃti ca  tvaṣṭrā kṛtāni divyāni tebhyo dattāni tena vai  
teṣu sarveṣu dhiṣṇyeṣu yathāyogyaṃ ca saṃsthitāḥ  sanmānitā arājaṃste sakalā viṣṇunā mayā  
varttamāne mahāyajñe tīrthe kanakhale tadā  ṛtvijaśca kṛtāstena bhṛgvādyāśca tapodhanāḥ  
adhiṣṭhātā svayaṃ viṣṇussaha sarvamarudgaṇaiḥ  ahaṃ tatrā'bhavaṃ brahmā trayīvidhinidarśakaḥ  
tathaiva sarvadikpālā dvārapālāśca rakṣakāḥ  sāyudhāssaparīvārāḥ kutūhalakarāssadā  
upatasthe svayaṃ yajñassurūpastasya cādhvare  sarve mahāmuniśreṣṭhāḥ svayaṃ vedadharā'bhavan  
tanūnapādapi nijaṃ cakre rūpaṃ sahasraśaḥ  haviṣā grahaṇāyāśu tasmin yajñe mahotsave  
aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi juhvati saha ṛtvijaḥ  udgātāraścatuṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi surarṣayaḥ  
adhvaryavotha hotārastāvanto nāradādayaḥ  saptarṣayassamā gāthāḥ kurvaṃti sma pṛthakpṛthak  
gaṃdharvavidyādharasiddhasaṃghānādityasaṃghān sagaṇān sayajñān  saṃkhyāvarānnāgacarān samastān vavre sa dakṣo hi mahādhvare sve  
dvijarṣirājarṣisurarṣisaṃghā nṛpāssamitrāḥ sacivāssa sainyāḥ  vasupramukhyā gaṇadevatāśca sarve vṛtāstena makhopavettrāḥ  
dīkṣāyuktastadā dakṣaḥ kṛtakautukamaṃgalaḥ  bhāryayā sahito reje kṛtasvastyayano bhṛśam  
tasmin yajñe vṛtaśśaṃbhurna dakṣeṇa durātmanā  kapālīti viniścitya tasya yajñārhatā na hi  
kapālibhāryeti satī dayitā svasutāpi ca  nāhūtā yajñaviṣaye dakṣeṇāguṇadarśinā  
evaṃ pravartamāne hi dakṣayajñe mahotsave  svakāryalagnāstatrāsan sarve te'dhvarasaṃmatāḥ  
etasminnaṃtare'dṛṣṭvā tatra vai śaṃkaraṃ prabhum  prodvignamānasaśśaivo dadhīco vākyamabravīt  
dadhīca uvāca  sarve śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ devarṣipramukhā mudā  kasmānnaivāgataśśaṃbhurasmin yajñe mahotsave  
ete sureśā munayo mahattarāssalokapālāśca samāgatā hi  tathāpi yajñastu na śobhate bhṛśaṃ pinākinā tena mahātmanā vinā  
yenaiva sarvāṇyapi maṃgalāni bhavaṃti śaṃsanti mahāvipaścitaḥ  so'sau na dṛṣṭo'tra pumān purāṇo vṛṣadhvajo nīlagalaḥ pareśaḥ  
amaṃgalānyeva ca maṃgalāni bhavaṃti yenādhigatāni dakṣaḥ  tripaṃcakenāpyatha maṃgalāni bhavaṃti sadyaḥ parataḥ purāṇi  
tasmāttvayaiva kartavyamāhvānaṃ parameśituḥ  tvaritaṃ brahmaṇā vāpi viṣṇunā prabhuviṣṇunā  
indreṇa lokapālaiśca dvijaissiddhaissahādhunā  sarvathā''nayanīyosau śaṃkaro yajñapūrttaye  
sarvairbhavadbhirgaṃtavyaṃ yatra devo maheśvaraḥ  dākṣāyaṇyā samaṃ śambhumānayadhvaṃ tvarānvitāḥ  
tena sarvaṃ pavitraṃ syācchambhunā paramātmanā  atrāgatena deveśāssāṃbena paramātmanā  
yasya smṛtyā ca nāmoktyā samagraṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet  tasmātsarvaprayatnena hyānetavyo vṛṣadhvajaḥ  
samāgate śaṃkare'tra pāvano hi bhavenmakhaḥ  bhaviṣyatyanyathā'pūrṇaḥ satyametadbravīmyaham  
brahmovāca  tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dakṣo roṣasamanvitaḥ  uvāca tvaritaṃ mūḍhaḥ prahasanniva duṣṭadhīḥ  
mūlaṃ viṣṇurdevatānāṃ yatra dharmassanātanaḥ  samānīto mayā samyak kimūnaṃ yajñakarmaṇi  
yasminvedāśca yajñāśca karmāṇi vividhāni ca  pratiṣṭhitāni sarvāṇi so'sau viṣṇurihāgataḥ  
satyalokātsamāyāto brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ  vedaissopaniṣadbhiśca vividhairāgamaissaha  
tathā suragaṇaissākamāgatassurarāṭ svayam  tathā yūyaṃ samāyātā ṛṣayo vītakalmaṣāḥ  
yeye yajñocitāśśāṃtāḥ pātrabhūtāssamāgatāḥ  vedavedārthatattvajñāssarve yūyaṃ dṛḍhavratāḥ  
atraiva ca kimasmākaṃ rudreṇāpi prayojanam  kanyā dattā mayā vipra brahmaṇā noditena hi  
haro'kulīnosau vipra pitṛmātṛvivarjitaḥ  bhūtapretapiśācānāṃ patireko duratyayaḥ  
ātmasaṃbhāvito mūḍha stabdho maunī samatsaraḥ  karmaṇyasminna yogyosau nānīto hi mayā'dhunā  
tasmāttvamīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ punarvācyaṃ na hi kvacit  sarverbhavadbhiḥ kartavyo yajño me saphalo mahān  
brahmovāca  etacchrutvā vacastasya dadhīco vākyamabravīt  sarveṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ devamunīnāṃ sārasaṃ yutam  
dadhīca uvāca  ayajñoyaṃ mahājāto vinā tena śivena hi  vināśopi viśeṣeṇa hyatra te hi bhaviṣyati  
evamuktvā dadhīcosāveka eva vinirgataḥ  yajñavāṭācca dakṣasya tvaritaḥ svāśramaṃ yayau  
tatonye śāṃkarā ye ca mukhyāśśivamatānugāḥ  niryayussvāśramān sadyaśśāpaṃ dattvā tathaiva ca  
munau vinirgate tasmin makhādanyeṣu duṣṭadhīḥ  śivadrohī munīn dakṣaḥ prahasannidamabravīt  
 dakṣa uvāca  gataḥ śivapriyo vipro dadhīco nāma nāmataḥ  anye tathāvidhā ye ca gatāste mama cādhvarāt  
etacchubhataraṃ jātaṃ saṃmataṃ me hi sarvathā  satyaṃ bravīmi deveśa surāśca munayastathā  
vinaṣṭacittā maṃdāśca mithyāvādaratāḥ khalāḥ  vedabāhyā durācārāstyājyāste makhakarmaṇi  
vedavādaratā yūyaṃ sarve viṣṇupurogamāḥ  yajñaṃ me saphalaṃ viprāssurāḥ kurvaṃtu mā'ciram  
 brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacastasya śivamāyāvimohitāḥ  yanmakhe devayajanaṃ cakrussarve surarṣayaḥ  
iti tanmakhaśāpo hi varṇito me munīśvara  yajñavidhvaṃsayogopi procyate śṛṇu sādaram  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe yajñaprāraṃbho nāma saptaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 brahmovāca  yadā yayurdakṣamakhamutsavena surarṣayaḥ  tasminnaivāṃtare devo parvate gaṃdhamādane  
dhārāgṛhe vitānena sakhībhiḥ parivāritā  dākṣāyaṇī mahākrīḍāścakāra vividhāssatī  
krīḍāsaktā tadā devī dadarśātha mudā satī  dakṣayajñe prayāṃtaṃ ca rohiṇyā pṛcchya satvaram  
dṛṣṭvā sīmaṃtayā bhūtāṃ vijayāṃ prāha sā satī  svasakhīṃ pravarāṃ prāṇapriyāṃ sā hi hitāvahām  
 satyuvāca  he sakhīpravare prāṇapriye tvaṃ vijaye mama  kva gamiṣyati candroyaṃ rohiṇyāpṛcchya satvaram  
brahmovāca  tathoktā vijayā satyā gatvā tatsannidhau drutam  kva gacchasīti papraccha śaśinaṃ taṃ yathocitam  
vijayoktamathākarṇya svayātrāṃ pūrvamādarāt  kathitaṃ tena tatsarvaṃ dakṣayajñotsavādikam  
tacchrutvā vijayā devīṃ tvaritā jātasaṃbhramā  kathayāmāsa tatsarvaṃ yaduktaṃ śaśinā satīm  
tacchrutvā kālikā devī vismitābhūtsatī tadā  vimṛśya kāraṇaṃ tatrājñātvā cetasyaciṃtayat  
dakṣaḥ pitā me mātā ca vīriṇī nau kutassatī  āhvānaṃ na karoti sma vismṛtā māṃ priyāṃ sutām  
pṛccheyaṃ śaṃkaraṃ tatra kāraṇaṃ sarvamādarāt  ciṃtayitveti sāsīdvai tatra gaṃtuṃ suniścayā  
atha dākṣāyaṇī devī vijayāṃ pravarāṃ sakhīm  sthāpayitvā drutaṃ tatra samagacchacchivāṃtikam  
dadarśa taṃ sabhāmadhye saṃsthitaṃ bahubhirgaṇaiḥ  naṃdyādibhirmahāvīraiḥ pravarairyūthayūthapai  
dṛṣṭvā taṃ prabhumīśānaṃ svapatiṃ sātha dakṣajā  praṣṭuṃ tatkāraṇaṃ śīghraṃ prāpa śaṃkarasaṃnidhim  
śivena sthāpitā svāṃke prītiyuktena svapriyā  pramoditā vacobhissā bahumānapurassaram  
atha śaṃbhurmahālīlassarveśassukhadassatām  satīmuvāca tvaritaṃ gaṇamadhyastha ādarāt  
śaṃbhuruvāca  kimarthamāgatātra tvaṃ sabhāmadhye savismayā  kāraṇaṃ tasya suprītyā śīghraṃ vada sumadhyame  
brahmovāca  evamuktā tadā tena maheśena munīśvara  sāṃjalissupraṇamyāśu satyuvāca prabhuṃ śivā  
satyuvāca  piturmama mahān yajño bhavatīti mayā śrutam  tatrotsavo mahānasti samavetāssurarṣayaḥ  
piturmama mahāyajñe kasmāttava na rocate  gamanaṃ devadeveśa tatsarvaṃ kathaya prabho  
suhṛdāmeṣa vai dharmassuhṛdbhissaha saṃgatiḥ  kurvaṃti yanmahādeva suhṛdaḥ prītivarddhinīm  
tasmātsarvaprayatnena mayāgaccha saha prabho  yajñavāṭaṃ piturmedya svāmin prārthanayā mama  
brahmovāca  tasyāstadvacanaṃ śrutvā satyā devo maheśvaraḥ  dakṣa vāgiṣuhṛdviddho babhāṣe sūnṛtaṃ vacaḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  dakṣastava pitā devī mama drohī viśeṣataḥ  
yasya ye māninassarve sasurarṣimukhāḥ pare  te mūḍhā yajanaṃ prāptāḥ pituste jñānavarjitāḥ  
anāhūtāśca ye devī gacchaṃti paramaṃdiram  avamānaṃ prāpnuvaṃti maraṇādadhikaṃ tathā  
parālayaṃ gatopīṃdro laghurbhavati tadvidhaḥ  kā kathā ca pareṣāṃ vai rīḍhā yātrā hi tadvidhā  
tasmāttvayā mayā cāpi dakṣasya yajanaṃ prati  na gaṃtavyaṃ viśeṣeṇa satyamuktaṃ mayā priyaṃ  
tathāribhirna vyathate hyarditopi śarairjanaḥ  svānāṃduruktibhirmarmatāḍitassa yathā mataḥ  
vidyādibhirguṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhirasadanyaissatāṃ smṛtau  hatāyāṃ bhūyasāṃ dhāma na paśyaṃti khalāḥ priye  
brahmovāca  evamuktā satī tena maheśena mahātmanā  uvāca roṣasaṃyuktā śivaṃ vākyavidāṃ varam  
satyuvāca  yajñassyātsaphalo yena sa tvaṃ śaṃbhokhileśvara  anāhūtosi tenādya pitrā me duṣṭakāriṇā  
tatsarvaṃ jñātumicchāmi bhava bhāvaṃ durātmanaḥ  surarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṣāmāgatānāṃ durātmanām  
tasmāccādyaiva gacchāmi svapituryajanaṃ prabho  anujñāṃ dehi me nātha tatra gaṃtuṃ maheśvara  
 brahmovāca  ityuktau bhagavān rudrastayā devyā śivassvayam  vijñātākhiladṛk draṣṭā satīṃ sūtikaro'bravīt  
 śiva uvāca  yadyevaṃ te rucirdevi tatra gaṃtumavaśyakam  suvrate vacanānme tvaṃ gaccha śīghraṃ piturmakham  
etaṃ naṃdinamāruhya vṛṣabhaṃ sajjamādarāt  mahārājopacārāṇi kṛtvā bahuguṇānvitā  
bhūṣitaṃ vṛṣamārohetyuktā rudreṇa sā satī  subhūṣitā satī yuktā hyagamatpitumaṃdiram  
mahārājopacārāṇi dattāni paramātmanā  succhatracāmarādīni sadvastrābharaṇāni ca  
gaṇāḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi raudrā jagmuśśivājñayā  kutūhalayutāḥ prītā mahotsavasamanvitāḥ  
tadotsavo mahānāsīdyajane tatra sarvataḥ  satyāśśivapriyāyāstu vāmadevagaṇaiḥ kṛtaḥ  
kutūhalaṃ gaṇāścakruśśivayoryaśa ujjaguḥ  bālāṃtaḥ pupluvuḥ prītyā mahāvīrāśśivapriyāḥ  
sarvathāsīnmahāśobhā gamane jāgadambike  sukhārāvassaṃbabhūva pūritaṃ bhuvanatrayam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe satīyātrāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaviṃśodhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  dākṣāyaṇī gatā tatra tatra yajño mahāprabhaḥ  surāsuramunīndrādikutūhalasamanvitaḥ  
svapiturbhavanaṃ tatra nānāścaryasamanvitam  dadarśa suprabhaṃ cāru surarṣigaṇa saṃyutam  
dvāri sthitā tadā devī hyavaruhya nijāsanāt  nandino'bhyaṃtaraṃ śīghramekaivāgacchadadhvaram  
āgatāṃ ca satīṃ dṛṣṭvā'siknī mātā yaśasvinī  akarodādaraṃ tasyā bhaginyaśca yathocitam  
nākarodādaraṃ dakṣo dṛṣṭvā tāmapi kiṃcana  nānyopi tadbhayāttatra śivamāyāvimohitaḥ  
atha sā mātaraṃ devī pitaraṃ ca satī mune  anamadvismitātyaṃtaṃ sarvaloka parābhavāt  
bhāgānapaśyaddevānāṃ haryādīnāṃ tadadhvare  na śaṃbhubhāgamakarot krodhaṃ durviṣahaṃ satī  
satyuvāca  tadā dakṣaṃ dahantīva ruṣā pūrṇā satī bhṛśam  krūradṛṣṭyā vilokyaiva sarvānapyapamānitā  
satyuvāca  anāhūtastvayā kasmācchaṃbhuḥ paramaśobhanaḥ  yena pūtamidaṃ viśvaṃ samagraṃ sacarācaram  
yajño yajñavidāṃ śreṣṭho yajñāṃgo yajñadakṣiṇaḥ  yajñakartā ca yaśśaṃbhustaṃ vinā ca kathaṃ makhaḥ  
yasya smaraṇamātreṇa sarvaṃ pūtaṃ bhavatyaho  vinā tena kṛtaṃ sarvamapavitraṃ bhaviṣyati  
dravyamaṃtrādikaṃ sarvaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca yanmayam  śaṃbhunā hi vinā tena kathaṃ yajñaḥ pravartitaḥ  
kiṃ śivaṃ surasāmānyaṃ matyākārṣīranādaram  bhraṣṭabuddhirbhavānadya jātosi janakādhama  
viṣṇubrahmādayo devā yaṃ saṃsevya maheśvaram  prāptāḥ svapadavīṃ sarve taṃ na jānāsi re haram  
ete kathaṃ samāyātā viṣṇubrahmādayassurāḥ  tava yajñe vinā śaṃbhuṃ svaprabhuṃ munayastathā  
 brahmovāca  ityuktvā parameśānī viṣṇvādīnsakalān prati  pṛthakpṛthagavocatsā bhartsayaṃtī bhavātmikā  
satyuvāca  he viṣṇo tvaṃ mahādevaṃ kiṃ na jānāsi tattvataḥ  saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ cāpi śrutayo yaṃ vadaṃti ha  
yadyapi tvāṃ karaṃ dattvā bahuvāraṃ maheśvaraḥ  aśikṣayatpurā śālvapramukhākṛtibhirhare  
tadapi jñānamāyātaṃ na te cetasi durmate  bhāgārthī dakṣayajñesmin śivaṃ svasvāminaṃ vinā  
purā paṃcamukho bhūtvā garvito'si sadāśivam  kṛtaścaturmukhastena vismṛtosi tadadbhutam  
indra tvaṃ kiṃ na jānāsi mahādevasya vikramam  bhasmī kṛtaḥ paviste hi hareṇa krūrakarmaṇā  
he surāḥ kinna jānītha mahādevasya vikramam  atre vasiṣṭha munayo yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃ kṛtaṃ tviha  
bhikṣāṭanaṃ ca kṛtavān purā dāruvane vibhuḥ  śapto yadbhikṣuko rudro bhavadbhirmunibhistadā  
śaptenāpi ca rudreṇa yatkṛtaṃ vismṛtaṃ katham  talliṃgenākhilaṃ dagdhaṃ bhuvanaṃ sacarācaram  
sarve mūḍhāśca saṃjātā viṣṇubrahmādayassurāḥ  munayo'nye vinā śaṃbhumāgatā yadihādhvare  
sarve vedāśca saṃbhūtāḥ sāṃgāśśāstrāṇi vāgyataḥ  yosau vedāṃtagaśśambhuḥ kaiścijjñātuṃ na pāryate  
 brahmovāca  ityanekavidhā vāṇīragadajjagadambikā  kopānvitā satī tatra hṛdayena vidūyatā  
viṣṇvādayokhilā devā munayo ye ca tadvacaḥ  maunībhūtāstadākarṇya bhayavyākulamānasāḥ  
atha dakṣassamākarṇya svaputryāstādṛśaṃ vacaḥ  vilokya krūradṛṣṭyā tāṃ satīṃ kuddho'bravīdvacaḥ  
dakṣa uvāca  tava kiṃ bahunoktena kāryaṃ nāstīha sāṃpratam  gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā bhadre kasmāttvaṃ hi samāgatā  
amaṃgalastu te bhartā śivosau gamyate budhaiḥ  akulīko vedabāhyo bhūtapretapiśācarāṭ  
tasmānnāhvārito rudro yajñārthaṃ sukuveṣabhṛt  devarṣisaṃsadi mayā jñātvā putri vipaścitā  
vidhinā preritena tvaṃ dattā maṃdena pāpinā  rudrāyāviditārthāya coddhatāya durātmane  
tasmātkopaṃ parityajya svasthā bhava śucismite  yadyāgatāsi yajñesmin dāyaṃ gṛhṇīṣva cātmanā  
brahmovāca  dakṣeṇokteti sā putrī satī trailokyapū jitā  niṃdāyuktaṃ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvāsīdruṣitā bhṛśam  
arcitayattadā seti kathaṃ yāsyāmi śaṃkaram  śaṃkaraṃ draṣṭukāmāhaṃ pṛṣṭā vakṣye kimuttaram  
atha provāca pitaraṃ dakṣaṃ taṃ duṣṭamānasam  niśśvasaṃtī ruṣāviṣṭā sā satī trijagatprasūḥ  
satyuvāca  yo niṃdati mahādevaṃ niṃdyamānaṃ śṛṇoti vā  tāvubhau narakaṃ yātau yāvaccandradivākarau  
tasmāttyakṣyāmyahaṃ devaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam  kiṃ jīvitena me tāta śṛṇvaṃtyānādaraṃ prabhoḥ  
yadi śaktassvayaṃ śaṃbhorniṃdakasya viśeṣataḥ  chiṃdyāt prasahya rasanāṃ tadā śuddhyenna saṃśayaḥ  
yadyaśakto janastatra nirayātsupidhāya vai  karṇau dhīmān tataśśuddhyedvadaṃtīdaṃ budhānvarān  
brahmovāca  itthamuktvā dharmanītiṃ paścāttāpamavāpa sā  asmaracchāṃkaraṃ vākyaṃ dūyamānena cetasā  
tatassaṃkuddhya sā dakṣaṃ niśśaṃkaṃ prāha tānapi  sarvānviṣṇvādikāndevānmunīnapi satī dhruvam  
satyuvāca  tāta tvaṃ niṃdakaśśaṃbhoḥ paścāttāpaṃ gamiṣyasi  iha bhuktvā mahāduḥkhamaṃte yāsyasi yātanām  
yasya loke'priyo nāsti priyaścaiva parātmanaḥ  tasminnavaire śarvesmin tvāṃ vinā kaḥ pratīpakaḥ  
mahadviniṃdā nāścaryaṃ sarvadā'satsu serṣyakam  mahadaṃghrirajo dhvastatamassu saiva śobhanā  
śiveti dvyakṣaraṃ yasya nṛṇāṃ nāma gireritam  sakṛtprasaṃgātsakalamaghamāśu vihaṃti tat  
pavitrakīrtitamalaṃ bhavān dveṣṭi śivetaraḥ  alaṃghyaśāsanaṃ śaṃbhumaho sarveśvaraṃ khalaḥ  
yatpādapadmaṃ mahatāṃ mano'lisuniṣevitam  sarvārthadaṃ brahmarasaiḥ sarvārthibhirathādarāt  
yadvarṣatyarthinaśśīghraṃ lokasya śivaādarāt  bhavān druhyati mūrkhatvāttasmai cāśeṣabaṃdhave  
kiṃvā śivākhyamaśivaṃ tvadanye na vidurbudhāḥ  brahmādayastaṃ munayassanakādyāstathāpare  
avakīrya jaṭābhūtaiśśmaśāne sa kapāladhṛk  tanmālyabhasma vā jñātvā prītyāvasadudāradhīḥ  
ye mūrddhabhirdadhati taccaraṇotsṛṣṭamārād  nirmālyaṃ munayo devāssa śivaḥ parameśvaraḥ  
pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karmacodi tam  vede vivicya vṛttaṃ ca tadvicāryaṃ manīṣibhiḥ  
virodhiyaugapadyaikakartṛke ca tathā dvayam  parabrahmaṇi śaṃbho tu karmarcchaṃti na kiṃcana  
mā vaḥ padavyassma pitaryā asmadāsthitāssadā  yajñaśālāsu vo dhūmravartmabhuktojjhitāḥ param  
no'vyaktaliṃgassatatamavadhūtasusevitaḥ  abhimānamato na tvaṃ kuru tāta kubuddhidhṛk  
kiṃbahūktena vacasā duṣṭastvaṃ sarvathā kudhīḥ  tvadudbhavena dehena na me kiṃcitprayojanam  
tajjanma dhigyo mahatāṃ sarvathāvadyakṛtkhalaḥ  parityājyo viśeṣeṇa tatsaṃbaṃdho vipaścitā  
gotraṃ tvadīyaṃ bhagavān yadāha vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ  dākṣāyaṇīti sahasāhaṃ bhavāmi sudurmanāḥ  
tasmāttvadaṃgajaṃ dehaṃ kuṇapaṃ garhitaṃ sadā  vyutsṛjya nūnamadhunā bhaviṣyāmi sukhāvahā  
he surā munayassarve yūyaṃ śṛṇuta madvacaḥ  sarvathānucitaṃ karma yuṣmākaṃ duṣṭacetasām  
sarve yūyaṃ vimūḍhā hi śivaniṃdāḥ kalipriyāḥ  prāpsyaṃti daṇḍaṃ niyatamakhilaṃ ca harāddhruvam  
 brahmovāca  dakṣamuktvādhvare tāṃśca vyaramatsā satī tadā  anūdya cetasā śambhumasmaratprāṇavallabham  
itiśrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe satīvākyavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 nārada uvāca  maunībhūtā yadā sāsītsatī śaṃkaravallabhā  caritraṃ kimabhūttatra vidhe tadvada cādarāt  
 brahmovāca  maunībhūtā satī devī smṛtvā svapatimādarāta  kṣitāvudīcyāṃ sahasā niṣasāda praśāṃtadhīḥ  
jalamācamya vidhivat saṃvṛtā vāsasā śuciḥ  dṛṅnimīlya patiṃ smṛtvā yogamārgaṃ samāviśat  
kṛtvāsamānāvanilau prāṇāpānau sitānanā  utthāpyodānamatha ca yatnātsā nābhicakrataḥ  
hṛdi sthāpyorasi dhiyā sthitaṃ kaṃṭhādbhruvossatī  aniṃditānayanmadhyaṃ śaṃkaraprāṇavallabhā  
evaṃ svadehaṃ sahasā dakṣakopājjihāsatī  dagdhe gātre vāyuśucirdhāraṇaṃ yogamārgataḥ  
tatassvabhartuścaraṇaṃ ciṃtayaṃtī na cāparam  apaśyatsā satī tatra yogamārganiviṣṭadhīḥ  
hatakalmaṣataddehaḥ prāpatacca tadagninā  bhasmasādabhavatsadyo muniśreṣṭha tadicchayā  
tatpaśyatāṃ ca khe bhūmau vādo'bhūtsumahāṃstadā  hāheti sodbhutaścitrassurādīnāṃ bhayāvahaḥ  
haṃ priyā parā śaṃbhordevī daivatamasya hi  ahādasūn satī kena suduṣṭena prakopitā  
aho tvanātmyaṃ sumahadasya dakṣasya paśyata  carācaraṃ prajā yasya yatputrasya prajāpateḥ  
ahodya dvimanā'bhūtsā satī devī manasvinī  vṛṣadhvajapriyā'bhīkṣṇaṃ mānayogyā satāṃ sadā  
soyaṃ durmarṣahṛdayo brahmadhṛk sa prajāpatiḥ  mahatīmapakīrtiṃ hi prāpsyati tvakhile bhave  
yatsvāṃgajāṃ sutāṃ śaṃbhudviṭ nyaṣe dhatsamudyatām  mahānarakabhogī sa mṛtaye no'parādhataḥ  
vadatyevaṃ jane satyā dṛṣṭvā'sutyāgamadbhutam  drutaṃ tatpārṣadāḥ krodhādudatiṣṭhannudāyudhāḥ  
dvāri sthitā gaṇāssarve rasāyutamitā ruṣā  śaṃkarasya prabhoste vā'kudhyannatimahābalāḥ  
hāhākāramakurvaṃste dhikdhik na iti vādinaḥ  uccaissarve'sakṛdvīraḥśśaṃkarasya gaṇādhipāḥ  
hāhākāreṇa mahatā vyāpta māsīddigantaram  sarve prāpan bhayaṃ devā munayonyepi te sthitāḥ  
gaṇāssaṃmaṃtrya te sarve'bhūvan kruddhā udāyudhāḥ  kurvantaḥ pralayaṃ vādyaśastrairvyāptaṃ digaṃtaram  
śastrairaghnannijāṃgāni kecittatra śucākulāḥ  śiromukhāni devarṣe sutīkṣṇaiḥ prāṇanāśibhiḥ  
itthaṃ te vilayaṃ prāptā dākṣāyaṇyā samaṃ tadā  gaṇāyute dve ca tadā tadadbhutamivābhavat  
gaṇā nāśā'vaśiṣṭā ye śaṃkarasya mahātmanaḥ  dakṣaṃ taṃ krodhitaṃ hantuṃ mudā tiṣṭhannudāyudhāḥ  
teṣāmāpatatāṃ vegaṃ niśamya bhagavān bhṛguḥ  yajñaghnaghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇāgnau juhonmune  
hūyamāne ca bhṛguṇā samutpeturmahāsurāḥ  ṛbhavo nāma prabalavīrāstatra sahasraśaḥ  
tairalātāyudhaistatra pramathānāṃ munīśvara  abhūdyuddhaṃ suvikaṭaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ romaharṣaṇam  
ṛbhubhistairmahāvīrairhanyamānāssamantataḥ  ayatnayānāḥ pramathā uśadbhirbrahmatejasā  
evaṃ śivagaṇāste vai hatā vidrāvitā drutam  śivecchayā mahāśaktyā tadadbhutamivā'bhavat  
taddṛṣṭvā ṛṣayo devāśśakrādyāssamarudgaṇāḥ  viśveśvinau lokapālāstūṣṇīṃ bhūtāstadā'bhavan  
kecidviṣṇuṃ prabhuṃ tatra prārthayantassamantataḥ  udvignā mantrayaṃtaśca viprābhāvaṃ muhurmuhuḥ  
suvicāryodarkaphalaṃ mahodvignāssubuddhayaḥ  suraviṣṇvādayobhūvan tannāśādrāvaṇānmuhuḥ  
evaṃbhūtastadā yajño vighno jāto durātmanaḥ  brahmabaṃdhośca dakṣasya śaṃkaradrohiṇo mune  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṇḍe satyupākhyāne satīdehatyāgopadravavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  etasminnantare tatra nabhovāṇī munīśvara  avocacchṛṇvatāṃ dakṣasurādīnāṃ yathārthataḥ  
vyomavāṇyuvāca  re re dakṣa durācāra daṃbhācāraparāyaṇa  kiṃ kṛtaṃ te mahāmūḍha karma cānarthakārakam  
na kṛtaṃ śaivarājasya dadhīcervacanasya hi  pramāṇaṃ tatkṛte mūḍha sarvānaṃdakaraṃ śubham  
nirgataste makhādvipraḥ śāpaṃ dattvā sudussaham  tatopi buddhaṃ kiṃcinno tvayā mūḍhena cetasi  
tataḥ kṛtaḥ kathaṃ no vai svaputryāstvādaraḥ paraḥ  samāgatāyāssatyāśca maṃgalāyā gṛhaṃ svataḥ  
satībhavau nārcitau hi kimidaṃ jñānadurbala  brahmaputra iti vṛthā garvitosi vimohitaḥ  
sā satyeva sadārādhyā sarvā pāpaphalapradā  trilokamātā kalyāṇī śaṃkarārddhāṃgabhāginī  
sā satyevārcitā nityaṃ sarvasaubhāgyadāyinī  māheśvarī svabhaktānāṃ sarvamaṃgaladāyinī  
sā satyevārcitā nityaṃ saṃsārabhayanāśinī  manobhīṣṭapradā daivī sarvopadravahāriṇī  
sā satyevārcitā nityaṃ kīrtisaṃpatpradāyinī  paramā parameśānī bhuktimuktipradāyinī  
sā satyeva jagaddhātrī jagadrakṣaṇakāriṇī  anādiśaktiḥ kalpānte jagatsaṃhārakāriṇī  
sā satyeva jaganmātā viṣṇu mātāvilāsinī  brahmendracandravahnyarkadevādijananī smṛtā  
sā satyeva tapodharmadātādiphaladāyinī  śaṃbhuśaktirmahādevī duṣṭahaṃtrī parātparā  
īdṛgvidhā satī devī yasya patnī sadā priyā  tasyai bhāgo na dattaste mūḍhena kuvicāriṇā  
śaṃbhurhi parameśānassarvasvāmī parātparaḥ  viṣṇubrahmādisaṃsevyaḥ sarvakalyāṇakārakaḥ  
tapyate hi tapaḥ siddhairetaddarśanakāṃkṣibhiḥ  yujyate yogibhiryogairetaddarśanakāṃkṣibhiḥ  
anaṃtadhanadhānyānāṃ yāgādīnāṃ tathaiva ca  darśanaṃ śaṃkarasyaiva mahatphalamudāhṛtam  
śiva eva jagaddhātā sarvavidyāpatiḥ prabhuḥ  ādividyāvarasvāmī sarvamaṃgalamaṃgalaḥ  
tacchakterna kṛto yasmātsatkarodya tvayā khala  ataevā'dhvarasyāsya vināśo hi bhaviṣyati  
amaṃgalaṃ bhavatyeva pūjārhāṇāmapūjayā  pūjyamānā ca nāsau hi yataḥ pūjyatamā śivā  
sahasreṇāpi śirasāṃ śeṣo yatpādajaṃ rajaḥ  vahatyaharahaḥ prītyā tasya śaktiḥ śivā satī  
yatpādapadmamaniśaṃ dhyātvā saṃpūjya sādaram  viṣṇuviṣṇutvamāpannastasya śaṃbhoḥ priyā satī  
yatpādapadmamaniśaṃ dhyātvā saṃpūjya sādaram  brahmā brahmatvamāpannastasya śaṃbhoḥ priyā satī  
yatpādapadmamaniśaṃ dhyātvā saṃpūjya sādaram  indrādayo lokapālāḥ prāpussvaṃ svaṃ paraṃ padam  
jagatpitā śivaśśaktirjaganmātā ca sā satī  satkṛtau na tvayā mūḍha kathaṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati  
daurbhāgyaṃ tvayi saṃkrāṃtaṃ saṃkrāṃtāstvayi cāpadaḥ  yau cānārādhitau bhaktyā bhavānīśaṃkarau ca tau  
anabhyarcya śivaṃ śaṃbhuṃ kalyāṇaṃ prāpnuyāmiti  kimasti garvo durvārassa garvodya vinaśyati  
sarveśavimukho bhūtvā deveṣveteṣu kastava  kariṣyati sahāyaṃ taṃ na te paśyāmi sarvathā  
yadi devāḥ kariṣyaṃti sāhāyyamadhunā tava  tadā nāśaṃ samāpsyaṃti śalabhā iva vahninā  
jvalatvadya mukhaṃ te vai yajñadhvaṃso bhavatvati  sahāyāstava yāvaṃtaste jvalaṃtvadya satvaram  
amarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śapatho'maṃgalāya te  kariṣyaṃtyadya sāhāyyaṃ yadetasya durātmanaḥ  
nirgacchaṃtvamarāssvokametadadhvaramaṃḍapāt  anyathā bhavato nāśo bhaviṣyatyadya sarvathā  
nirgacchaṃtvapare sarve munināgādayo makhāt  anyathā bhavatāṃ nāśo bhaviṣyatyadya sarvathā  
nirgaccha tvaṃ hare śīghrametadadhvaramaṃḍapāt  anyathā bhavato nāśo bhaviṣyatyadya sarvathā  
nirgaccha tvaṃ vidhe śīghrametadadhvaramaṃḍapāt  anyathā bhavato nāśo bhaviṣyatyadya sarvathā  
brahmovāca  ityuktvādhvaraśālāyāmakhilāyāṃ susaṃsthitān  vyaramatsā nabhovāṇī sarvakalyāṇakāriṇī  
tacchrutvā vyomavacanaṃ sarve haryādayassurāḥ  akārṣurvismayaṃ tāta munayaśca tathā pare  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe satyupākhyāne nabhovāṇīvarṇanaṃ nāmaikatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 nārada uvāca  śrutvā vyomagiraṃ dakṣaḥ kimakārṣīttadā'budhaḥ  anye ca kṛtavaṃtaḥ kiṃ tataśca kimabhūdvada  
parājitāḥ śivagaṇā bhṛgumaṃtrabalena vai  kimakārṣuḥ kutra gatāstattvaṃ vada mahāmate  
brahmovāca  śrutvā vyomagiraṃ sarve vismitāśca surādayaḥ  nāvocatkiṃcidapi te tiṣṭhantastu vimohitāḥ  
palāyamānā ye vīrā bhṛgumaṃtrabalena te  avaśiṣṭā śśivagaṇāśśivaṃ śaraṇamāyayuḥ  
sarvaṃ nivedayāmāsū rudrāyāmitatejase  caritraṃ ca tathābhūtaṃ supraṇamyādarācca te  
gaṇā ūcuḥ  devadeva mahādeva pāhi naśśaraṇāgatān  saṃśṛṇvādarato nātha satī vārtāṃ ca vistarāt  
garvitena maheśānadakṣena sudurātmanā  avamānaḥ kṛtassatyā'nādaro nirjaraistathā  
tubhyaṃ bhāgamadātro sa devebhyaśca pradattavān  durvacāṃsyavadatproccairduṣṭo dakṣassugarvitaḥ  
tato dṛṣṭvā na te bhāgaṃ yajñe'kupyatsatī prabho  viniṃdya bahuśastātamadhākṣītsvatanuṃ tadā  
gaṇāstvayutasaṃkhyākā mṛtāstatra vilajjayā  svāṃgānyāchidya śastraiśca krudhyāma hyapare vayam  
tadyajñe dhvaṃsituṃ vegātsannaddhāstu bhayāvahāḥ  tiraskṛtā hi bhṛguṇā svaprabhāvādvirodhinā  
te vayaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptāstava viśvaṃbhara prabho  nirbhayān kuru nastasmāddayamānabhavādbhayāt  
apamānaṃ viśeṣeṇa tasmin yajñe mahāprabho  dakṣādyāste'khilā duṣṭā akurvan garvitā ati  
ityuktaṃ nikhilaṃ vṛttaṃ sveṣāṃ satyāśca nārada  teṣāṃ ca mūḍhabuddhīnāṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru  
 brahmovāca  ityākarṇyavacastasya svagaṇānāṃ vacaḥ prabhuḥ  sasmāra nāradaṃ sarvaṃ jñātuṃ taccaritaṃ laghu  
āgatastvaṃ drutaṃ tatra devarṣe divyadarśana  praṇamya śaṃkaraṃ bhaktyā sāṃjalistatra tasthivān  
tvāṃ praśasyātha sa svāmī satyā vārttāṃ ca pṛṣṭavān  dakṣayajñagatāyā vai paraṃ ca caritaṃ tathā  
pṛṣṭena śaṃbhunā tāta tvayāśveva śivātmanā  tatsarvaṃ kathitaṃ vṛtaṃ jātaṃ dakṣādhvare hi yat  
tadākarṇyeśvaro vākyaṃ mune tattvanmukhoditam  cukopātidrutaṃ rudro mahāraudraparākramaḥ  
utpāṭyaikāṃ jaṭāṃ rudro lokasaṃhārakārakaḥ  āsphālayāmāsa ruṣā parvatasya tadopari  
todanācca dvidhā bhūtā sā jaṭā ca mune prabhoḥ  saṃbabhūva mahārāvo mahāpralayabhīṣaṇaḥ  
tajjaṭāyāssamudbhūto vīrabhadro mahābalaḥ  pūrvabhāgena devarṣe mahābhīmo gaṇāgraṇīḥ  
sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛttvātyatiṣṭhaddaśāṃgulam  pralayānalasaṃkāśaḥ pronnato dossahasravān  
kopaniśvāsatastatra mahārudrasya ceśituḥ  jātaṃ jvarāṇāṃ śatakaṃ saṃnipātāstrayodaśa  
mahākālī samutpannā tajjaṭāparabhā gataḥ  mahābhayaṃkarā tāta bhūtakoṭibhirāvṛtā  
sarve mūrttidharāḥ krūrāḥ svara lokabhayaṃkarāḥ  svatejasā prajvalaṃto dahaṃta iva sarvataḥ  
atha vīro vīrabhadraḥ praṇamya parameśvaram  kṛtāṃjalipuṭaḥ prāha vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ  
vīrabhadra uvāca  mahārudra mahāraudra somasūryāgnilocana  kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā kāryaṃ śīghramājñāpaya prabho  
śoṣaṇīyāḥ kimīśāna kṣaṇārddhenaiva siṃdhavaḥ  peṣaṇīyāḥ kimīśāna kṣaṇārddhenaiva parvatāḥ  
kṣaṇena bhasmasātkuryāṃ brahmāṃḍamuta kiṃ hara  kṣaṇena bhasmasātkuryāmsurānvā kiṃ munīśvarān  
vyāśvāsaḥ sarvalokānāṃ kimu cāryo hi śaṃkara  kartavya kimuteśāna sarvaprāṇivihiṃsanam  
mamāśakyaṃ na kutrāpi tvatprasādānmaheśvara  parākrameṇa mattulyo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati  
yatra yatkāryamuddiśya preṣayiṣyasi māṃ prabho  tatkāryaṃ sādhayāmyeva satvaraṃ tvatprasādataḥ  
kṣudrāstaraṃti lokābdhiṃ śāsanācchaṃkarasya te  harātohaṃ na kiṃ tartuṃ mahāpatsāgaraṃ kṣamaḥ  
tvatpreṣitatṛṇenāpi mahatkāryaṃ mayatnataḥ  kṣaṇena śakyate kartuṃ śaṃkarātra na saṃśayaḥ  
līlāmātreṇa te śaṃbho kāryaṃ yadyapi siddhyati  tathāpyahaṃ preṣaṇīyo tavaivānugraho hyayam  
śaktiretādṛśī śaṃbho mamāpi tvadanugrahāt  vinā śaktirna kasyāpi śaṃkara tvadanugrahāt  
tvadājñayā vinā kopi tṛṇādīnapi vastutaḥ  naiva cālayituṃ śaktassatyametanna saṃśayaḥ  
śaṃbho niyamyāssarvepi devādyāste maheśvara  tathaivāhaṃ niyamyaste niyaṃtussarvadehinām  
praṇatosmi mahādeva bhūyopi praṇatosmyaham  preṣaya sveṣṭa siddhyarthaṃ māmadya hara satvaram  
spaṃdopi jāyate śaṃbho sakhyāṃgānāṃ muhurmuhuḥ  bhaviṣyatyadya vijayo māmataḥ preṣaya prabho  
harṣotsāhaviśeṣopi jāyate mama kaścana  śaṃbho tvatpādakamale saṃsaktaśca mano mama  
bhaviṣyati pratipadaṃ śubhasaṃtānasaṃtatiḥ  
tasyaiva vijayo nityaṃ tasyaiva śubhamanvaham  yasya śaṃbhau dṛḍhā bhaktistvayi śobhanasaṃśraye  
brahmovāca  ityuktaṃ tadvacaḥ śrutvā saṃtuṣṭo maṃgalāpatiḥ  vīrabhadra jayeti tvaṃ proktāśīḥ prāha taṃ punaḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  śṛṇu madvacanaṃ tāta vīrabhadra sucetasā  karaṇīyaṃ prayatnena taddrutaṃ me pratoṣakam  
yāgaṃ kartuṃ samudyukto dakṣo vidhisutaḥ khalaḥ  madvirodhī viśeṣeṇa mahāgarvo'budho'dhunā  
tanmakhaṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā sayāgaparivārakam  punarāyāhi matsthānaṃ satvaraṃ gaṇasattama  
surā bhavaṃtu gaṃdharvā yakṣā vānye ca kecana  tānapyadyaiva sahasā bhasmasātkuru satvaram  
tatrāstu viṣṇurbrahmā vā śacīśo vā yamopi vā  api cādyaiva tānsarvānpātayasva prayatnataḥ  
surā bhavaṃtu gaṃdharvā yakṣā vānye ca kecana  tānapyadyaiva sahasā bhasmasātkuru satvaram  
dadhīcikṛtamullaṃghya śapathaṃ mayi tatra ye  tiṣṭhaṃti te prayatnena jvālanīyāstvayā dhruvam  
pramathāścāgamiṣyaṃti yadi viṣṇvādayo bhramāt  nānākarṣaṇamaṃtreṇa jvālayānīya satvaram  
ye tatrollaṃghya śapathaṃ madīyaṃ garvitāḥ sthitāḥ  te hi maddrohiṇo'tastān jvālayānalamālayā  
sapatnīkānsasārāṃśca dakṣayāgasthalasthitān  prajvālya bhasmasātkṛtvā punarāyāhi satvaram  
tatra tvayi gate devā viśvādya api sādaram  stoṣyaṃti tvāṃ tadāpyāśu jvālayā jvālayaiva tān  
devānapi kṛtadrohān jvālāmālāsamākulaḥ  jvālaya jvalanaiśśīghraṃ mādhyāyādhyāyapālakam  
dakṣādīnsakalāṃstatra sapatnīkānsabāṃdhavān  prajvālya vīra dakṣaṃ nu salīlaṃ salilaṃ piba  
brahmovāca  ityukto roṣatāmrākṣo vedamaryādapālakaḥ  virarāma mahāvīraṃ kālārissakaleśvaraḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe vīrabhadrotpattiśivopadeśavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  ityuktaṃ śrīmaheśasya śrutvā vacanamādarāt  vīrabhadrotisaṃtuṣṭaḥ praṇanāma maheśvarama  
śāsanaṃ śirasā dhṛtvā devadevasya śūlinaḥ  pracacāla tataḥ śīghraṃ vīrabhadro makhaṃ prati  
śivotha preṣayāmāsa śobhārthaṃ koṭiśo gaṇān  tena sārddhaṃ mahāvīrānmalayānalasannibhān  
atha te vīrabhadrasya purataḥ prabalā gaṇāḥ  paścādapi yayurvīrāḥ kutūhalakarā gaṇāḥ  
vīrabhadrasametā yegaṇāśśatasahasraśaḥ  pārṣadāḥ kālakālasya sarve rudrasvarūpiṇaḥ  
gaṇaissametaḥ kilatairmahātmā sa vīrabhadro haraveṣabhūṣaṇaḥ  sahasrabāhurbhujagādhipāḍhyo yayau rathasthaḥ prabalotibhīkaraḥ  
nalvānaṃ ca sahasre dve pramāṇaṃ syaṃdanasya hi  ayutenaiva siṃhānāṃ vāhanānāṃ prayatnataḥ  
tathaiva prabalāḥ siṃhā bahavaḥ pārśvarakṣakāḥ  śārdūlā makarā matsyā gajāstatra sahasraśaḥ  
vīrabhadre pracalite dakṣanāśāya satvaram  kalpavṛkṣasamutsṛṣṭā puṣpavṛṣṭirabhūttadā  
tuṣṭuvuśca gaṇā vīra śipiviṣṭe praceṣṭitam  cakruḥ kutūhalaṃ sarve tasmiṃśca gamanotsavaiḥ  
kālī kātyāyinīśānī cāmuṃḍā muṃḍamardinī  bhadrakālī tathā bhadrā tvaritā vaiṣṇavī tathā  
etābhirnavadurgābhirmahākālī samanvitā  yayau dakṣavināśāya sarvabhūtagaṇaissaha  
ḍākinī śākinī caiva bhūtapramathaguhyakāḥ  kūṣmāṃḍāḥ parpaṭā ścaiva caṭakā brahmarākṣasāḥ  
bhairavāḥ kṣetrapālāśca dakṣayajñavināśakāḥ  niryayustvaritaṃ vīrāśśivājñāpratipālakāḥ  
tathaiva yoginīcakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭigaṇānvitam  niryayau sahasā kruddhaṃ dakṣayajñaṃ vināśitum  
teṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃkhyānaṃ śṛṇu nārada  mahābalavatāṃ saṃghomukhyānāṃ dhairyaśālinām  
abhyayācchaṃkukarṇaśca daśakoṭyā gaṇeśvaraḥ  daśabhiḥ kekarākṣaśca vikṛto ṣṭābhireva  
catuḥṣaṣṭyā viśākhaśca navabhiḥ pāriyātrikaḥ  ṣaḍbhissarvāṅgako vīrastathaiva vikṛtānanaḥ  
jvālakeśo dvādaśabhiḥ koṭibhirgaṇapuṃgavaḥ  saptabhiḥ samadajjīmān dudrabhoṣṭābhireva ca  
paṃcabhiśca kapālīśaḥ ṣaḍbhissaṃdārako gaṇaḥ  koṭikoṭibhireveha koṭikuṇḍastathaiva ca  
viṣṭaṃbho'ṣṭābhirvīraiḥ koṭibhirgaṇasaptamaḥ  sahasrakoṭibhistāta saṃnādaḥ pippalastathā  
āveśanastathāṣṭābhiraṣṭābhiścaṃdratāpanaḥ  mahāveśaḥ sahasreṇa koṭinā gaṇapo vṛtaḥ  
kuṇḍī dvādaśakoṭībhistathā parvatako mune  vināśituṃ dakṣayajñaṃ niryayau gaṇasattama  
kālaśca kālakaścaiva mahākālastathaiva ca  koṭīnāṃ śatakenaiva dakṣayajñaṃ yayau prati  
agnikṛcchatakoṭyā ca koṭyāgnimukha eva ca  ādityamūrddhā koṭyā ca tathā caiva ghanāvahaḥ  
sannāhaśśatakoṭyā ca koṭyā ca kumudo gaṇaḥ  amoghaḥ kokilaścaiva koṭikoṭyā gaṇādhipaḥ  
kāṣṭhāgūḍhaścatuḥṣaṣṭyā sukeśī vṛṣabhastathā  sumantrako gaṇādhīśastathā tāta suniryayau  
kākapādodaraḥ ṣaṣṭikoṭibhirgaṇasattamaḥ  tathā santānakaḥ ṣaṣṭikoṭibhirgaṇapuṃgavaḥ  
mahābalaśca navabhiḥ koṭibhiḥ puṃgavastathā  
madhupiṃgastathā tāta gaṇādhīśo hi niryayau  nīlo navatyā koṭīnāṃ pūrṇabhadrastathaiva ca  
niryayau śatakoṭībhiścaturvaktro gaṇādhipaḥ  kāṣṭhāgūḍheścatuṣṣaṣṭyā sukeśo vṛṣabhastathā  
virūpākṣaśca koṭīnāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā gaṇeśvaraḥ  tālaketuḥ ṣaḍāsyaśca paṃcāsyaśca gaṇādhipaḥ  
saṃvartakastathā caiva kulīśaśca svayaṃ prabhuḥ  lokāṃtakaśca dīptātmā tathā daityāntako mune  
gaṇo bhṛṃgīriṭiḥ śrīmān devadevapriyastathā  aśanirbhālakaścaiva catuḥṣaṣṭyā sahsrakaḥ  
koṭikoṭisahasrāṇāṃ śatairviṃśa tibhirvṛtaḥ  vīreśo hyabhyayādvīraḥ vīrabhadra śivājñayā  
bhūtakoṭisahasraistu prayayau koṭibhistribhiḥ  romajaiḥ śvagaṇai ścaiva tathā vīro yayau drutam  
tadā bherīmahānādaḥ śaṃkhāśca vividhasvanāḥ  jaṭāharomukhāścaiva śṛṃgāṇi vividhāni ca  
te tāni vitatānyeva baṃdhanāni sukhāni ca  vāditrāṇi vineduśca vividhāni mahotsave  
vīrabhadrasya yātrāyāṃ sabalasya mahāmune  śakunānyabhavaṃstatra bhūrīṇi sukhadāni ca  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṇḍe vīrabhadrayātrāvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  evaṃ pracalite cāsmin vīrabhadre gaṇānvite  duṣṭacihnāni dakṣeṇa dṛṣṭāni vibudhairapi  
utpātā vividhāścāsan vīrabhadre gaṇānvite  trividhā api devarṣe yajñavidhvaṃsasūcakāḥ  
dakṣavāmākṣibāhūruvispaṃdassamajāyata  nānākaṣṭapradastāta sarvathā'śubhasūcakaḥ  
bhūkaṃpassamabhūttatra dakṣayāgasthale tadā  dakṣopaśyacca madhyāhne nakṣatrāṇyadbhutāni ca  
diśaścāsansumalināḥ karburobhūddivākaraḥ  pariveṣasahasreṇa saṃkrāṃtaśca bhayaṃkaraḥ  
nakṣatrāṇi pataṃti sma vidyudagniprabhāṇi ca  nakṣatrāṇāmabhūdvakrā gatiścādhomukhī tadā  
gṛdhrā dakṣa śiraḥ spṛṣṭvā samudbhūtāḥ sahasraśaḥ  āsīdgṛdhrapakṣacchāyaissacchāyo yāgamaṃḍapaḥ  
vavāśire yāgabhūmau kroṣṭāro netrakastadā  ulkāvṛṣṭirabhūttatra śvetavṛścikasaṃbhavā  
kharā vātā vavustatra pāṃśuvṛṣṭisamanvitāḥ  śalabhāśca samudbhūtā vivartānilakaṃpitāḥ  
rītaiśca pavanai rūrddhvaṃ sa dakṣādhvaramaṃḍapaḥ  daivānvitena dakṣeṇa yaḥ kṛto nūtanodbhutaḥ  
vemurdakṣādayassarve tadā śoṇitamadbhutam  vemuśca māṃsakhaṇḍāni saśalyāni muhurmuhuḥ  
sakaṃpāśca babhūvuste dīpā vātahatā iva  duḥkhitāścābhavansarve śastradhārāhatā iva  
tadā ninādajātāni bāṣpavarṣāṇi tatkṣaṇe  prātastuṣāravarṣīṇi padmānīva vanāṃtare  
dakṣādyakṣīṇi jātāni hyakasmādviśadānyapi  niśāyāṃ kamalāścaiva kumudānīva saṃgave  
asṛgvavarṣa devaśca timireṇāvṛtā diśaḥ  digdāhobhūdviśeṣeṇa trāsayan sakalāñjanān  
evaṃ vidhānyariṣṭāni dadṛśurvibudhādayaḥ  bhayamāpedire'tyaṃtaṃ mune viṣṇvādikāstadā  
bhuvi te mūrchitāḥ peturhā hatāḥ sma itīrayan  taravastīrasaṃjātā nadīvegahatā iva  
patitvā te sthitā bhūmau krūrāḥ sarpā hatā iva  kaṃdukā iva te bhūyaḥ patitāḥ punarutthitāḥ  
tataste tāpasaṃtaptā ruruduḥ kurarī iva  rodanadhvanisaṃkrātoruktipratyuktikā iva  
savaikuṃṭhāstatassarve tadā kuṃṭhitaśaktayaḥ  svasvopakaṃṭhamākaṃṭhaṃ luluṭhuḥ kamaṭhā iva  
etasminnaṃtare tatra saṃjātā cāśarīravāk  śrāvayatyakhilān devāndakṣaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ  
ākāśavāṇyuvāca  dhik janma tava dakṣādya mahāmūḍhosi pāpadhīḥ  bhaviṣyati mahadduḥkhamanivāryaṃ harodbhavam  
hāhāpi notra ye mūḍhāstava devādayasthitāḥ  teṣāmapi mahāduḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ  
brahmovāca  tacchrutvākāśavacanaṃ dṛṣṭvāriṣṭāni tāni ca  dakṣaḥ prāpadbhayaṃ cāti pare devādayopi ha  
vepamānastadā dakṣo vikalaścāti cetasi  agacchaccharaṇaṃ viṣṇoḥ svaprabhoriṃdirāpateḥ  
supraṇamya bhayāviṣṭaḥ saṃstūya ca vicetanaḥ  avocaddevadevaṃ taṃ viṣṇuṃ svajanavatsalam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satī khaṃḍe duśśakunadarśanaṃ nāma catustriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
dakṣa uvāca  devadeva hare viṣṇo dīnabaṃdho kṛpānidhe  mama rakṣā vidhātavyā bhavatā sādhvarasya ca  
rakṣakastvaṃ makhasyaiva makhakarmā makhātmakaḥ  kṛpā vidheyā yajñasya bhaṃgo bhavatu na prabho  
 brahmovāca  itthaṃ bahuvidhāṃ dakṣaḥ kṛtvā vijñaptimādarāt  papāta pādayostasya bhayavyākulamānasaḥ  
utthāpya taṃ tato viṣṇurdakṣaṃ viklinnamānasam  śrutvā ca tasya tadvākyaṃ kumaterasmaracchivam  
smṛtvā śivaṃ maheśānaṃ svaprabhuṃ parameśvaram  avadacchivatattvajño dakṣaṃ sabodhayanhariḥ  
hariruvāca  śṛṇu dakṣa pravakṣyāmi tattvataḥ śṛṇu me vacaḥ  sarvathā te hitakaraṃ mahāmaṃtrasukhapradam  
avajñā hi kṛtā dakṣa tvayā tattvamajānatā  sakalādhīśvarasyaiva śaṃkarasya parātmanaḥ  
īśvarāvajñayā sarvaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati sarvathā  viphalaṃ kevalaṃ naiva vipattiśca padepade  
apūjyā yatra pūjyaṃte pūjanīyo na pūjyate  trīṇi tatra bhaviṣyaṃti dāridryaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam  
tasmātsarvaprayatnena mānanīyo vṛṣadhvajaḥ  amānitānmaheśācca mahadbhayamupasthitam  
adyāpi na vayaṃ sarve prabhavaḥ prabhavāmahe  bhavato durnayenaiva mayā satyamudīryyate  
brahmovāca  viṣṇostadvacanaṃ śrutvā dakṣaściṃtāparo'bhavat  vivarṇavadano bhūtvā tūṣṇīmāsīdbhuvi sthitaḥ  
etasminnaṃtare vīrabhadraḥ sainyasamanvitaḥ  agacchadadhvaraṃ rudraprerito gaṇanāyakaḥ  
pṛṣṭhe kecitsamāyātā gagane kecidāgatāḥ  diśaśca vidiśaḥ sarve samāvṛtya tathāpare  
śarvājñayā gaṇāḥ śūrā nirbhayā rudravikramāḥ  asaṃkhyāḥ siṃhanādānvai kurvaṃto vīrasattamāḥ  
tena nādena mahatā nāditaṃ bhuvanatrayam  rajasā cāvṛtaṃ vyoma tamasā cāvṛtā diśaḥ  
saptadvīpānvitā pṛthvī cacālāti bhayākulā  saśailakānanā tatra cukṣubhussakalābdhayaḥ  
evaṃbhūtaṃ ca tatsainyaṃ lokakṣayakaraṃ mahat  dṛṣṭvā ca vismitāssarve babhūvuramarādayaḥ  
sainyodyogamathālokya dakṣaścāsṛṅmukhākulaḥ  daṃḍavatpatito viṣṇuṃ sakalatro'bhyabhāṣata  
 dakṣa uvāca  bhavadbalenaiva mayā yajñaḥ prāraṃbhito mahān  satkarmasiddhaye viṣṇo pramāṇaṃ tvaṃ mahāprabho  
viṣṇo tvaṃ karmaṇāṃ sākṣī yajñānāṃ pratipālakaḥ  dharmasya vedagarbhasya brahmaṇastvaṃ mahāprabho  
tasmādrakṣā vidhātavyā yajñasyāsya mama prabho  tvadanyaḥ yassamarthosti yatastvaṃ sakalaprabhuḥ  
 brahmovāca  dakṣasya vacanaṃ śrutvā viṣṇurdīnataraṃ tadā  avocadbodhayaṃstaṃ vai śivatattvaparāṅmukham  
viṣṇuruvāca  mayā rakṣā vidhātavyā tava yajñasya dakṣa vai  khyāto mama paṇaḥ satyo dharmasya paripālanam  
tatsatyaṃ tu tvayoktaṃ hi kiṃ tattasya vyatikramaḥ  śṛṇu tvaṃ vacmyahaṃ dakṣa krūrabuddhiṃ tyajā'dhunā  
naimiṣe nimiṣakṣetre yajjātaṃ vṛttamadbhutam  tatkiṃ na smaryate dakṣa vismṛtaṃ kiṃ kubuddhinā  
rudrakopācca ko hyatra samartho rakṣaṇe tava  na yasyābhimataṃ dakṣa yastvāṃ rakṣati durmatiḥ  
kiṃ karma kimakarmeti tatra paśyasi durmate  samarthaṃ kevalaṃ karma na bhaviṣyati sarvadā  
svakarmaviddhi tadyena samarthatvena jāyate  na tvanyaḥ karmaṇo dātā śaṃ bhavedīśvaraṃ vinā  
īśvarasya ca yo bhaktyā śāṃtastadgatamānasaḥ  karmaṇo hi phalaṃ tasya prayacchati tadā śivaḥ  
kevalaṃ jñānamāśritya nirīśvaraparā narāḥ  nirayaṃ te ca gacchaṃti kalpakoṭiśatāni ca  
punaḥ karmamayaiḥ pāśairvaddhā janmani janmani  nirayeṣu prapacyaṃte kevalaṃ karmarūpiṇaḥ  
ayaṃ rudragaṇādhīśo vīrabhadro'ri mardanaḥ  rudrakopāgnisaṃbhūtaḥ samāyātodhvarāṃgaṇe  
ayamasmadvināśārthamāgatosti na saṃśayaḥ  aśakyamasya nāstyeva kimapyastu tu vastutaḥ  
prajvālyāsmānayaṃ sarvān dhruvameva mahāprabhuḥ  tataḥ praśāṃtahṛdayo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ  
śrīmahādevaśapathaṃ samullaṃghya bhramānmayā  yataḥ sthitaṃ tataḥ prāpyaṃ mayā duḥkhaṃ tvayā saha  
śaktirmama tu nāstyeva dakṣādyaitannivāraṇe  śapathollaṃghanādeva śivadrohī yatosmyaham  
kālatrayepi na yato maheśadrohiṇāṃ sukham  tato'vaśyaṃ mayā prāptaṃ duḥkhamadya tvayā saha  
sudarśanābhidhaṃ cakrametasminna lagiṣyati  śaivacakramidaṃ yasmādaśaivalayakāraṇam  
vināpi vīrabhadreṇa nāmaitaccakramaiśvaram  hatvā gamiṣyatyadhunā satvaraṃ harasannidhau  
śaivaṃ śapathamullaṃghya sthitaṃ māṃ cakramīdṛśam  asaṃhatyaiva sahasā kṛpayaiva sthiraṃ param  
ataḥ paramidaṃ cakramapi na sthāsyati dhruvam  gamiṣyatyadhunā śīghraṃ jvālāmālāsamākulam  
vīrabhadraḥ pūjitopi śīghramasmābhirādarāt  mahākrodhasamākrāṃto nāsmānsaṃrakṣayiṣyati  
akāṃḍapralayo'smākamāgatodya hi hā hahā  hā hā bata tavedānīṃ nāśosmākamupasthitaḥ  
śaraṇyo'smākamadhunā nāstyeva hi jagattraye  śaṃkaradrohiṇo loke kaśśaraṇyo bhaviṣyati  
tanunāśepi saṃprāpyāstaiścāpi yamayātanāḥ  tānaiva śakyate soḍhuṃ bahuduḥkhapradāyinīḥ  
śivadrohiṇamālokya daṣṭadaṃto yamaḥ svayam  taptatailakaṭāheṣu pātayatyeva nānyathā  
gantumevāhamudyuktaṃ sarvathā śapathottaram  tathāpi na gataśśīghraṃ duṣṭasaṃsargapāpataḥ  
yadadya kriyatesmābhiḥ palāyanamitastadā  śārvo nā karṣakaśśastrairasmānākarṣayiṣyati  
svarge vā bhuvi pātāle yatra kutrāpi vā yataḥ  śrīvīrabhadraśastrāṇāṃ gamanaṃ na hi durla bham  
yāvataśca gaṇāssaṃti śrīrudrasya triśūlinaḥ  tāvatāmapi sarveṣāṃ śaktiretādṛśī dhuvam  
śrīkālabhairavaḥ kāśyāṃ nakhāgreṇaiva līlayā  purā śiraśca ciccheda paṃcamaṃ brahmaṇo dhruvam  
etaduktvā sthito viṣṇuratitrastamukhāmbujaḥ  vīrabhadropi saṃprāpa tadaivā'dhvaramaṃḍapam  
evaṃ bruvati govinda āgataṃ sainyasāgaram  vīrabhadreṇa sahitaṃ dadṛśuśca surādayā  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe satyupākhyāne viṣṇuvākyavarṇanaṃ nāma paṃcatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  indro'pi prahasan viṣṇumātmavādarataṃ tadā  vajrapāṇissuraissārddhaṃ yoddhukāmo'bhavattadā  
tadendro gajamārūḍho bastārūḍho'nalastathā  yamo mahiṣamārūḍho nirṛtiḥ pretameva ca  
pāśī ca makarārūḍho mṛgārūḍho ssadāgatiḥ  kuberaḥ puṣpakārūḍhassaṃnaddhobhūdataṃdritaḥ  
tathānye surasaṃghāśca yakṣacāraṇaguhyakāḥ  āruhya vāhanānyeva svāni svāni pratāpinaḥ  
teṣāmudyogamālokya dakṣaścāsṛṅmukhastathā  tadaṃtikaṃ samāgatya sakalatro'bhyabhāṣata  
dakṣauvāca  yuṣmadbalenaiva mayā yajñaḥ prāraṃbhito mahān  satkarmasiddhaye yūyaṃ pramāṇāssyurmahāprabhāḥ  
brahmovāca  tacchrutvā dakṣavacanaṃ sarve devāssavāsavāḥ  niryayustvaritaṃ tatra yuddhaṃ kartuṃ samudyatāḥ  
atha devagaṇāḥ sarve yuyudhuste balānvitāḥ  śakrādayo lokapālā mohitāḥ śivamāyayā  
devānāṃ ca gaṇānāṃ ca tadāsītsamaro mahān  tīkṣṇatomaranārācairyuyudhuste parasparam  
neduśśaṃkhāśca bheryyaśca tasmin raṇamahotsave  mahāduṃdubhayo neduḥ paṭahā ḍiṃḍimādayaḥ  
tena śabdena mahatā ślāghmānāstadā surāḥ  lokapālaiśca sahitā jaghnustāñchivakiṃkarān  
indrādyairlokapālaiśca gaṇāśśaṃbho parāṅmukhāḥ  kṛttāśca muniśārdūla bhṛgormaṃtrabalena ca  
uccāṭanaṃ kṛtaṃ teṣāṃ bhṛguṇā yajvanā tadā  yajanārthaṃ ca devānāṃ tuṣṭyarthaṃ dīkṣitasya ca  
parājitānsvakāndṛṣṭvā vīrabhadro ruṣānvitaḥ  bhūtapretapiśācāṃśca kṛtvā tāneva pṛṣṭhataḥ  
vṛṣabhasthān puraskṛtya svayaṃ caiva mahābalaḥ  mahātriśūlamādāya pātayāmāsa nirjarān  
devānyakṣān sādhyagaṇān guhyakān cāraṇānapi  śūlaghātaiśca sarve gaṇā vegāt prajaghnire  
keciddvidhā kṛtāḥ khaḍgairmudgaraiśca vipothitāḥ  anyaiśśastrairapi surā gaṇairbhinnāstadā'bhavan  
evaṃ parājitāssarve palāyanaparāyaṇāḥ  parasparaṃ parityajya gatā devāstriviṣṭapam  
kevalaṃ lokapālāste śakrādyāstasthurutsukāḥ  saṃgrāme dāruṇe tasmin dhṛtvā dhairyaṃ mahābalāḥ  
sarve militvā śakrādyā devāstatra raṇājire  bṛhaspatiṃ ca papracchurvinayāvanatāstadā  
lokapālā ūcuḥ  guro bṛhaspate tāta mahāprājña dayānidhe  śīghraṃ vada pṛcchato naḥ kuto' smākaṃ jayo bhavet  
brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ smṛtvā śaṃbhuṃ prayatnavān  bṛhaspatiruvācedaṃ mahendraṃ jñānadurbalam  
bṛhaspatiruvāca  yaduktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ tatsarvaṃ jātamadya vai  tadeva vivṛṇomīndra sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
asti yakṣeśvaraḥ kaścit phaladaḥ sarvakarmaṇām  kartāraṃ bhajate sopi na svakarttuḥ prabhurhi saḥ  
amaṃtrauṣadhayassarve nābhicārā na laukikāḥ  na karmāṇi na vedāśca na mīmāṃsādvayaṃ tathā  
anyānyapi ca śāstrāṇi nānāvedayutāni ca  jñātuṃ neśaṃ saṃbhavaṃti vadaṃtyevaṃ purātanāḥ  
na svajñeyo maheśānassarvavedāyutena saḥ  bhakterananyaśaraṇairnānyatheti mahāśrutiḥ  
śāṃtyā ca parayā dṛṣṭyā sarvathā nirvikārayā  tadanugrahato nūnaṃ jñātavyo hi sadāśivaḥ  
paraṃ tu saṃvadiṣyāmi kāryākārya vivakṣitau  sidhyaṃśaṃ ca sureśāna taṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ hitāya vai  
tvamiṃdra bāliśo bhūtvā lokapālaiḥ sadādya vai  āgato dakṣa yajñaṃ hi kiṃ kariṣyasi vikramam  
ete rudrasahāyāśca gaṇāḥ paramakopanāḥ  āgatā yajñavighnārthaṃ taṃ kariṣyaṃtyasaṃśayama  
sarvathā na hyupāyotra keṣāṃcidapi tattvataḥ  yajñavighnavināśārtha satyaṃ satyaṃ bravīmyaham  
brahmovāca  evaṃ bṛhaspatervākyaṃ śrutvā te hi divaukasaḥ  ciṃtāmāpedire sarve lokapālāssavāsavāḥ  
tatobravīdvīrabhadro mahāvīragaṇairvṛtaḥ  indrādīn lokapālāṃstān smṛtvā manasi śaṃkaram  
vīrabhadra uvāca  sarve yūyaṃ bāliśatvādavadānārthamāgatāḥ   avadānaṃ prayacchāmi āgacchata mamāṃtikam  
he śakra he śuce bhāno he śaśin he dhanādhipa  he pāśapāṇe he vāyo nirṛte yama śeṣa he  
he surāsurasaṃghāhīhaita yūyaṃ he vicakṣaṇāḥ  avadānāni dāsyāmi ātṛptyādyāsatāṃ varāḥ  
 brahmovāca  evamuktvā sitairbāṇairjaghānātha ruṣānvitaḥ  nikhilāṃstān surān sadyo vīrabhadro gaṇāgraṇīḥ  tairbāṇairnihatāssarve vāsavādyāḥ sureśvarāḥ  
palāyanaparā bhūtvā jagmuste ca diśo daśa  gateṣu lokapāleṣu vidruteṣu sureṣu ca  yajñavāṭopakaṃṭhaṃ hi vīrabhadrogamadgaṇaiḥ  
tadā te ṛṣayassarve subhītā hi rameśvaram  vijñaptukāmāssahasā śīghramūcurnatā bhṛśam  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  devadeva ramānātha sarveśvara mahāprabho  rakṣa yajñaṃ hi dakṣasya yajñosi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
yajñakarmā yajñarūpo yajñāṃgo yajñarakṣakaḥ  rakṣa yajñamato rakṣa tvattonyo na hi rakṣakaḥ  
 brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ vacanaṃ hariḥ  yoddhukāmo bhayādviṣṇurvīrabhadreṇa tena vai  
caturbhujassusanaddho cakrāyudhadharaḥ karaiḥ  mahābalomaragaṇairyajñavāṭātsa niryayau  
vīrabhadraḥ śūlapāṇirnānāgaṇasamanvitaḥ  dadarśa viṣṇuṃ saṃnaddhaṃ yoddhukāmaṃ mahāprabhum  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīrabhadrobhūdbhrukuṭīkuṭilānanaḥ  kṛtāṃta iva pāpiṣṭhaṃ mṛgendra iva vāraṇam  
tathāvidhaṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā vīrabhadro rimardanaḥ  avadattvaritaḥ kruddho gaṇairvīraissamāvṛtaḥ  
vīrabhadra uvāca  rere hare mahādeva śapathollaṃghanaṃ tvayā  kathamadya kṛtaṃ citte garvaḥ kimabhavattava  
tava śrīrudraśapathollaṃghane śaktirasti kim  ko vā tvamasiko vā te rakṣa kosti jagattraye  
atra tvamāgataḥ kasmādvayaṃ tannaiva vidmahe  dakṣasya yajñapātāttvaṃ kathaṃ jātosi tadvada  
dākṣāyaṇyākṛtaṃ yacca tanna dṛṣṭaṃ kimu tvayā  proktaṃ yacca dadhīcena śrutaṃ tanna kimu tvayā  
tvañcāpi dakṣayajñesminnavadānārthamāgataḥ  avadānaṃ prayacchāmi tava cāpi mahābhuja  
vakṣo vidārayiṣyāmi triśūlena hare tava  kastavāsti samāyāto rakṣakodya mamāṃtikam  
pātayiṣyāmi bhūpṛṣṭhe jvālayiṣyāmi vahninā  dagdhaṃ bhavaṃtamadhunā peṣayiṣyāmi satvaram  
rere hare durācāra maheśa vimukhādhama  śrīmahārudramāhātmyaṃ kinna jānāsi pāvanam  
tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho yoddhukāmogrataḥ sthitaḥ  neṣyāmi punarāvṛttiṃ yadi tiṣṭhestvamātmanā  
brahmovāca  tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vīrabhadrasya buddhimān  uvāca vihasan prītyā viṣṇustra sureśvaraḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  śṛṇu tvaṃ vīrabhadrādya pravakṣyāmi tvadagrataḥ  na rudravimukhaṃ māṃ tvaṃ vada śaṃkarasevakam  
anena prārthitaḥ pūrvaṃ yajñārthaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ  dakṣeṇāviditārthena karmaniṣṭhena mauḍhyataḥ  
ahaṃ bhaktaparādhīnastathā sopi maheśvaraḥ  dakṣo bhakto hi me tāta tasmādatrāgato makhe  
śṛṇu pratijñāṃ me vīra rudrakopasamudbhava  rudratejassvarūpo hi supratāpālayaṃprabho  
ahaṃ nivārayāmi tvāṃ tvaṃ ca māṃ vinivāraya  tadbhaviṣyati yadbhāvi kariṣye'haṃ parākramam  
 brahmovāca  ityuktavati govinde prahasya sa mahābhujaḥ  avadatsuprasannosmi tvāṃ jñātvāsmatprabhoḥ priyam  
tato vihasya suprīto vīrabhadro gaṇāgraṇīḥ  praśrayāvanatovādīdviṣṇuṃ devaṃ hi tattvataḥ  
 vīrabhadra uvāca  tava bhāvaparīkṣārthamityuktaṃ me mahāprabho  idānīṃ tattvato vacmi śṛṇu tvaṃ sāvadhānataḥ  
yathā śivastathā tvaṃ hi yathā tvaṃ ca tathā śivaḥ  iti vedā varṇayaṃti śivaśāsanato hare  
śivājñayā vayaṃ sarve sevakāḥ śaṃkarasya vai  tathāpi ca ramānātha pravādocitamādarāt  
 brahmovāca  tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya vīrabhadrasya so'cyutaḥ  prahasya cedaṃ provāca vīrabhadramidaṃ vacaḥ  
 viṣṇuruvāca  yuddhaṃ kuru mahāvīra mayā sārddhamaśaṃkitaḥ  tavāstraiḥ pūryamāṇohaṃ gamiṣyāmi svamāśramam  
 brahmovāca  ityuktvā hi viramyāsau sannaddhobhūdraṇāya ca  svagaṇairvīrabhadropi sannaddhotha mahābalaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe viṣṇuvīrabhadrasamvādo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 brahmovāca  vīrabhadrotha yuddhe vai viṣṇunā sa mahābalaḥ  saṃsmṛtya śaṃkaraṃ citte sarvāpadvinivāraṇam  
āruhya syaṃdanaṃ divyaṃ sarvavairivimardanaḥ  gṛhītvā paramāstrāṇi siṃhanādaṃ jagarja ha  
viṣṇuścāpi mahāghoṣaṃ pāṃcajanyā bhidhannijam  dadhmau balī mahāśaṃkhaṃ svakīyān harṣayanniva  
tacchrutvā śaṃkhanirhrādaṃ devā ye ca palāyitāḥ  raṇaṃ hitvā gatāḥ pūrvaṃ te drutaṃ punarāyayuḥ  
vīrabhadra gaṇaisteṣāṃ lokapālāssavāsavāḥ  yuddhañcakrustathā siṃhanādaṃ kṛtvā balānvitāḥ  
gaṇānāṃ lokapālānāṃ dvandvayuddhaṃ bhayāvaham  abhavattatra tumulaṃ garjatāṃ siṃhanādataḥ  
nandinā yuyudhe śakro'nalo vai vaiṣṇavāstathā  kuberopi hi kūṣmāṇḍapatiśca yuyudhe balī  
tadendreṇa hato nandī vajreṇa śataparvaṇā  
nandinā ca hataśśakrastriśūlena stanāṃtare  
balinau dvāvapi prītyā yuyudhāte parasparam  nānāghātāṃśca kurvaṃtau nandiśakrau jigīṣayā  
śaktyā jaghāna cāśmānaṃ śuciḥ paramakopanaḥ  sopi śūlena taṃ vegācchitadhāreṇa pāvakam  
yamena saha saṃgrāmaṃ mahāloko gaṇāgraṇīḥ  cakāra tumulaṃ vīro mahādevaṃ smaranmudā  
nairṛtena samāgamya caṃḍaśca balavattaraḥ  yuyudhe paramāstraiśca nairṛtiṃ nibiḍaṃ vayan  
varuṇena samaṃ vīro muṃḍaścaiva mahābalaḥ  yuyudhe parayā śaktyā trilokīṃ vismayanniva  
vāyunā ca hato bhṛṃgī svāstreṇa paramojasā  bhṛṃgiṇā ca hato vāyustriśūlena pratāpinā  
kubereṇaiva saṃgamya kūṣmāṃḍapatirādarāt  yuyudhe balavān vīro dhyātvā hṛdi maheśvaram  
yoginīcakrasaṃyukto bhairavīnāyako mahān  vidīryya devānakhilānpapau śoṇitamadbhutam  
kṣetrapālāstathā tatra bubhukṣuḥ surapuṃgavān  kālī cāpi vidāryaiva tānpapau rudhiraṃ bahu  
atha viṣṇurmahātejā yuyudhe taiśca śatruhā  cakraṃ cikṣepa vegena dahanniva diśo daśa  
kṣetrapālassamāyāṃtaṃ cakramālokya vegataḥ  tatrāgatyāgato vīraścāgrasatsahasā balī  
cakraṃ grasitamālokya viṣṇuḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ  mukhaṃ tasya parāmṛjya tamudgālitavānarim  
svacakramādāya mahānubhāvaścukopa cātīva bhavaikabharttā  mahābalī tairyuyudhe pravīraissakruddhanānāyudhadhārakostraiḥ  
cakre mahāraṇaṃ viṣṇustaissārddhaṃ yuyudhe mudā  nānāyudhāni saṃkṣipya tumulaṃ bhīmavikramam  
atha te bhairavādyāśca yuyudhustena bhūriśaḥ  nānāstrāṇi vimuṃcaṃtassaṃkuddhāḥ paramojasā  
itthaṃ teṣāṃ raṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā hariṇātulatejasā  vinivṛtya samāgamya tānsvayaṃ yuyudhe balī  
atha viṣṇurmahātejāścakramudyamya mūrcchitaḥ  yuyudhe bhagavāṃstena vīrabhadreṇa mādhavaḥ  
tayoḥ samabhavadyuddhaṃ sughoraṃ romaharṣaṇam  mahāvīrādhipatyostu nānāstradharayormune  
viṣṇoryogabalāttasya devadeva sudāruṇāḥ  śaṅkhacakragadāhastā asaṃkhyātāśca jajñire  
te cāpi yuyudhustena vīrabhadreṇa bhāṣatā  viṣṇuvat balavaṃto hi nānāyudhadharā gaṇāḥ  
tānsarvānapi vīrosau nārāyaṇasamaprabhān  bhasmīcakāra śūlena hatvā smṛtvā śivaṃ prabhum  
tataścorasi taṃ viṣṇuṃ līlayaiva raṇājire  jaghāna vīrabhadro hi triśūlena mahābalī  
tena ghātena sahasā vihataḥ puruṣottamaḥ  papāta ca tadā bhūmau visaṃjñobhūnmune hariḥ  
tato yajñodbhutaṃ tejaḥ pralayānalasannibham  trailokyadāhakaṃ tīvraṃ vīrāṇāmapi bhīkaram  
krodharaktekṣaṇaḥ śrīmān punarutthāya sa prabhuḥ  prahartuṃ cakramudyamya hyatiṣṭhatpuruṣarṣabhaḥ  
tasya cakraṃ mahāraudraṃ kālā dityasamaprabham  vyaṣṭaṃbhayadadīnātmā vīrabhadraśśivaḥ prabhuḥ  
mune śaṃbhoḥ prabhāvāttu māyeśasya mahāprabhoḥ  na cacāla hareścakraṃ karasthaṃ staṃbhitaṃ dhruvam  
atha viṣṇurgaṇeśena vīrabhadreṇa bhāṣatā  atiṣṭhatstaṃbhitastena śṛṃgavāniva niścalaḥ  
tato viṣṇuḥ staṃbhito hi vīrabhadreṇa nārada  yajvopamaṃtraṇamanā nīrastaṃbhanakārakam  
tatasstaṃbhananirmuktaḥ śārṅgadhanvā rameśvaraḥ  śārṅgaṃ jagrāha sa kruddhaḥ svadhanussaśaraṃ mune  
tribhiśca dharṣito bāṇaistena śārṅgaṃ dhanurhareḥ  vīrabhadreṇa tattāta tridhābhūttatkṣaṇānmune  
atha viṣṇurmayā vāṇyā bodhitastaṃ mahāgaṇam  asahyavarcasaṃ jñātvā hyaṃtardhātuṃ mano dadhe  
jñātvā ca tatsarvamidaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ satīkṛtaṃ duṣprasahaṃ pareṣām  gatāḥ svalokaṃ svagaṇānvitāstu smṛtvā śivaṃ sarvapatiṃ svataṃtram  
satyalokagataścāhaṃ putra śokena pīḍitaḥ  aciṃtayaṃ suduḥkhārto mayā kiṃ kāryamadya vai  
viṣṇau mayi gate caiva devāśca munibhissaha  vinirjitā gaṇaissarve ye te yajñopajīvinaḥ  
samupadravamālakṣya vidhvastaṃ ca mahāmakham  mṛgasvarūpo yajño hi mahābhīto'pi dudruve  
taṃ tadā mṛgarūpeṇa dhāvaṃtaṃ gaganaṃ prati  vīrabhadrassamādāya viśiraskamathākarot  
tataḥ prajāpatiṃ dharmaṃ kaśyapaṃ ca pragṛhya saḥ  ariṣṭaneminaṃ vīro bahupatramunīśvaram  
munimāṃgirasaṃ caiva kṛśāśvaṃ ca mahāgaṇaḥ  jaghāna mūrdhni pādena dattaṃ ca munipuṃgavam  
sarasvatyāśca nāsāgraṃ devamāstu tathaiva ca  ciccheda karajāgreṇa vīra bhadraḥ pratāpavān  
tatonyānapi devādīn vidārya pṛthivītale  pātayāmāsa soyaṃ vai krodhākrāṃtātilocanaḥ  
vīrabhadro vidāryyāpi devānmukhyānmunīnapi  nābhūcchāṃto drutakrodhaḥ phaṇirāḍiva maṃḍitaḥ  
vīrabhadroddhṛtārātiḥ kesarīva vanadvipān  diśo vilokayāmāsa kaḥ kutrāstītyanukṣaṇam  
vyapothayadbhṛguṃ yāvanmaṇibhadraḥ pratāpavān  padākramyorasi tadā'kārṣīttacchmaśruluṃcanam  
caṃḍaścotpāṭayāmāsa pūṣṇo daṃtān pravegataḥ  śapyamāne hare pūrvaṃ yo'hasaddarśayandataḥ  
nandī bhagasya netre hi pātitasya ruṣā bhuvi  ujjahāra sa dakṣokṣṇā yaśśapaṃtamasūsucat  
viḍaṃbitā svadhā tatra sā svāhā dakṣiṇā tathā  maṃtrāstaṃtrāstathā cānye tatrasthā gaṇanāyakaiḥ  
vavṛṣuste purīṣāṇi vitānā'gnau ruṣā gaṇāḥ  anirvācyaṃ tadā cakrurgaṇā vīrāstamadhvaram  
aṃtarvedyaṃtaragataṃ nilīnaṃ tadbhayādbalāt  ānināya samājñāya vīrabhadreḥ svabhūścutam  
kapole'sya gṛhītvā tu khaḍgenopahṛtaṃ śiraḥ  abhedyamabhavattasya tacca yogaprabhāvataḥ  
abhedyaṃ tacchiro matvā śastrāstraiśca tu sarvaśaḥ  kareṇa troṭayāmāsa padbhyāmākramya corasi  
tacchirastasya duṣṭasya dakṣasya haravairiṇaḥ  agnikuṃḍe pracikṣepa vīrabhadro gaṇāgraṇīḥ  
reje tadā vīrabhadrastriśūlaṃ bhrāmayankare  kruddhā raṇākṣasaṃvartāḥ prajvālya parvatopamāḥ  
anāyāsena hatvaitān vīrabhadrastato'gninā  jvālayāmāsa sakrodho dīptāgniśśalabhāniva  
vīrabhadrastato dagdhāndṛṣṭvā dakṣapurogamān  aṭṭāṭṭahāsamakarotpūrayaṃśca jagattrayam  
vīraśriyā vṛtastatra tato nandanasaṃbhavā  puṣpavṛṣṭirabhūddivyā vīrabhadre gaṇānvite  
vavurgaṃdhavahāśśītāssugandhāssukhadāḥ śanaiḥ  devaduṃdubhayo nedussamameva tataḥ param  
kailāsaṃ sa yayau vīraḥ kṛtakāryyastataḥ param  vināśitadṛḍhadhvāṃto bhānumāniva satvaram  
kṛtakāryaṃ vīrabhadraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃtuṣṭamā nasaḥ  śaṃbhurvīragaṇādhyakṣaṃ cakāra parameśvaraḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasahitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe yajñavidhvaṃ savarṇano nāma saptatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 sūta uvāca  ityākarṇya vacastasya vidheramitadhīmataḥ  papraccha nāradaḥ prītyā vismitastaṃ dvijottamaḥ  
 nārada uvāca  śivaṃ vihāya dakṣasya surairyajñaṃ harirgataḥ  hetunā kena tad brūhi yatrāvajñā' bhavattataḥ  
jānāti kiṃ sa śaṃbhuṃ no hariḥ pralayavikramam  raṇaṃ kathaṃ ca kṛtavān tadgaṇairabudho yathā  
eṣa me saṃśayo bhūyāṃstaṃ chiṃdhi karuṇānidhe  caritaṃ brūhi śaṃbhostu cittotsāhakaraṃ prabho  
brahmovāca  dvijavarya śṛṇu prītyā caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  yatpṛcchate kurvataśca sarvasaṃśayahārakam  
dadhīcasya muneḥ śāpādbhraṣṭajñāno hariḥ purā  sāmaro dakṣayajñaṃ vai gataḥ kṣuvasahāyakṛt  
 nārada uvāca  kimarthaṃ śaptavānviṣṇuṃ dadhīco munisattamaḥ  kopākāraḥ kṛtastasya hariṇā tatsahāyinā  
brahmovāca  samutpanno mahātejā rājā kṣuva iti smṛtaḥ  abhūnmitraṃ dadhīcasya munīndrasya mahāprabhoḥ  
cirāttapaḥprasaṃgādvai vādaḥ kṣuvadadhīcayoḥ  mahānarthakaraḥ khyātastrilokeṣvabhavatpurā  
tatra trivarṇataḥ śreṣṭho vipra eva na saṃśayaḥ  iti prāha dadhīco hi śivabhaktastu vedavit  
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya dadhīcasya mahāmune  kṣuvaḥ prāheti nṛpatiḥ śrīmadena vimohitaḥ  
kṣuva uvāca  aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ vapurdhārayate nṛpaḥ  tasmānnṛpo variṣṭho hi varṇāśramapatiḥ prabhuḥ  
sarvadevamayorājā śruti prāheti tatparā  mahatī devatā yā sā sohameva tato mune  
tasmādviprādvaro rājā cyavaneya vicāryatām  nāvamaṃtavya evātaḥ pūjyo'haṃ sarvathā tvayā  
brahmovāca  śrutvā tathā mataṃ tasya kṣuvasya munisattamaḥ  śrutismṛtiviruddhaṃ taṃ cukopātīva bhārgavaḥ  
atha kruddho mahātejā gauravāccātmano mune  atāḍayatkṣuvaṃ mūrdhni dadhīco vāmamuṣṭitaḥ  
vajreṇa taṃ ca ciccheda dadhīcaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣuvaḥ  jagarjātīva saṃkruddho brahmāṃḍādhipatiḥ kudhīḥ  
papāta bhūmau nihato tena vajreṇa bhārgavaḥ  śukraṃ sasmāra kṣuvakṛdbhārgavasya kulaṃdharaḥ  
śukrotha saṃdhayāmāsa tāḍitaṃ ca kṣuvena tu  yogī dadhīcasya tadā dehamāgatya sadrutam  
saṃdhāya pūrvavaddehaṃ dadhīcasyāha bhārgavaḥ  śivabhaktāgraṇīrbhṛtyaṃ jayavidyāpravartakaḥ  
śukra uvāca  dadhīca tāta saṃpūjya śivaṃ sarveśvaraṃ prabhum  mahāmṛtyuṃjayaṃ maṃtraṃ śrautamagryaṃ vadāmi te  
tryambakaṃ yajāmahe trailokyaṃ pitaraṃ prabhum  trimaṃḍalasya pitaraṃ triguṇasya maheśvaram  
tritattvasya trivahneśca tridhābhūtasya sarvataḥ  tridivasya tribāhośca tridhābhūtasya sarvataḥ  
tridevasya mahādevassugaṃdhi puṣṭivarddhanam  sarvabhūteṣu sarvatra triguṇeṣu kṛtau yathā  
indriyeṣu tathānyeṣu deveṣu ca gaṇeṣu ca  puṣpe sugaṃdhivatsūrassugaṃdhimamareśvaraḥ  
puṣṭiśca prakṛteryasmātpuruṣādvai dvijottama  mahadādiviśeṣāṃtavikalpaścāpi suvrata  
viṣṇoḥ pitāmahasyāpi munīnāṃ ca mahāmune  indriyasya ca devānāṃ tasmādvai puṣṭivarddhanaḥ  
taṃ devamamṛtaṃ rudraṃ karmaṇā tapasāpi vā  svādhyāyena ca yogena dhyānena ca prajāpate  
satyenānyena sūkṣmāgrānmṛtyupāśādbhavaḥ svayam  vaṃdhamokṣakaro yasmādurvārukamiva prabhuḥ  
mṛtasaṃjīvanīmantro mama sarvottamaḥ smṛtaḥ  evaṃ japaparaḥ prītyā niyamena śivaṃ smaran  
japtvā hutvābhimaṃtryaiva jalaṃ piba divāniśam  śivasya sannidhau dhyātvā nāsti mṛtyubhayaṃ kvacit  
kṛtvā nyāsādikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivacchivam  saṃvidhāyedaṃ nirvyagraśśaṃkaraṃ bhaktavatsalam  
dhyānamasya pravakṣyāmi yathā dhyātvā japanmanum  siddha mantro bhaveddhīmān yāvacchaṃbhuprabhāvataḥ  
hastāṃbhojayugasthakuṃbhayugalāduddhṛtyatoyaṃ śirassiṃcaṃtaṃ karayoryugena dadhataṃ svāṃkebhakuṃbhau karau  akṣasraṅmṛgahastamaṃbujagataṃ mūrddhasthacandrasravatpīyūṣārdratanuṃ bhaje sagirijaṃ tryakṣaṃ ca mṛtyuṃjayam  
brahmovāca  upadiśyeti śukraḥ svaṃ dadhīciṃ munisattamam  svasthānamagamattāta saṃsmarañ śaṃkaraṃ prabhum  
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dadhīco hi mahāmuniḥ  vanaṃ jagāma tapase mahāprītyā śivaṃ smaran  
tatra gatvā vidhānena mahāmṛtyuṃjayābhidham  taṃ manuṃ prajapan prītyā tapastepe śivaṃ smaran  
tanmanuṃ suciraṃ japtvā tapasārādhya śaṃkaram  śivaṃ saṃtoṣayāmāsa mahāmṛtyuṃjayaṃ hi saḥ  
atha śaṃbhuḥ prasannātmā tajjapādbhaktavatsalaḥ  āvirbabhūva puratastasya prītyā mahāmune  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā svaprabhuṃ śaṃbhuṃ sa mumoda munīśvaraḥ  praṇamya vidhivadbhaktyā tuṣṭāva sukṛtāṃjaliḥ  
atha prītyā śivastāta prasannaścyāvaniṃ mune  varaṃ brūhīti sa prāha suprasannena cetasā  
tacchutvā śaṃbhuvacanaṃ dadhīco bhaktasattamaḥ  sāṃjalirnatakaḥ prāha śaṃkaraṃ bhaktavatsalam  
dadhīca uvāca  devadeva mahādeva mahyaṃ dehi varatrayam  vajrāsthitvādavadhyatvamadīnatvaṃ hi sarvataḥ  
brahmovāca  taduktavacanaṃ śrutvā prasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ  varatrayaṃ dadau tasmai dadhīcāya tathāstviti  
varatrayaṃ śivātprāpya sānaṃdaśca mahāmuniḥ  kṣuvasthānaṃ jagāmāśu vedamārge pratiṣṭhitaḥ  
brahmovāca  prāpyāvadhyatvamugrātsa vajrāsthitvamadīnatām  atāḍayacca rājendraṃ pādamūlena mūrddhani  
kṣuvo dadhīcaṃ vajreṇa jaghānorasyatho nṛpaḥ  krodhaṃ kṛtvā viśeṣeṇa viṣṇugauravagarvitaḥ  
nābhūnnāśāya tadvajraṃ dadhīcasya mahātmanaḥ  prabhāvātparameśasya dhātṛputro visismiye  
dṛṣṭvāpyavadhyatvamadīnatāṃ ca vajrasya cātyaṃtaparaprabhāvam  kṣuvo dadhīcasya munīśvarasya visismiye cetasi dhātṛputraḥ  
ārādhayāmāsa hariṃ mukundamindrānujaṃ kānanamāśu gatvā  prapannapālaśca parājito hi dadhīcamṛtyuṃjayasevakena  
pūjayā tasya santuṣṭo bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ  pradadau darśanaṃ tasmai divyaṃ vai garuḍadhvajaḥ  
divyena darśanenaiva dṛṣṭvā devaṃ janārdanam  tuṣṭāva vāgbhiriṣṭābhiḥ praṇamya garuḍadhvajam  
sampūjya caivaṃ tridaśeśvarādyaiḥ stutaṃ devamajeyamīśam  vijñāpayāmāsa nirīkṣya bhaktyā janārdanāya praṇipatya mūrdhnā  
rājovāca  bhagavan brāhmaṇaḥ kaściddadhīca iti viśrutaḥ  dharmavettā vinītātmā sakhā mama purābhavat  
avadhyassarvadā sarvaiśśaṃkarasya prabhāvataḥ  tamārādhya mahādevaṃ mṛtyuṃjayamanāmayam  
sāvajñaṃ vāmapādena mama mūrdhni sadasyapi  tāḍayāmāsa vegena sa dadhīco mahātapāḥ  
uvāca taṃ ca garveṇa na bibhemīti sarvataḥ  mṛtyuṃjayāpta suvaro garvito hyatulaṃ hariḥ  
 brahmovāca  atha jñātvā dadhīcasya hyavadhyatvaṃ mahātmanaḥ  sasmārāsya maheśasya prabhāvamatulaṃ hariḥ  
evaṃ smṛtvā hariḥ prāha kṣuvaṃ vidhisutaṃ drutam  viprāṇāṃ nāsti rājendra bhayamaṇvapi kutracit  
viśeṣādrudrabhaktānāṃ bhayaṃ nāsti ca bhūpate  duḥkhaṃ karoti viprasya śāpārthaṃ sasurasya me  
bhavitā tasya śāpena dakṣayajñe sureśvarāt  vināśo mama rājendra punarutthānameva ca  
tasmātsametya rājendra sarvayajño na bhūyate  karomi yatnaṃ rājendra dadhīcavijayāya te  
śrutvā vākyaṃ kṣuvaḥ prāha tathāstviti harernṛpaḥ  tasthau tatraiva tatprītyā tatkāmotsukamānasaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīyasatīkhaṃḍe kṣuvadadhīcavādavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  kṣuvasya hitakṛtyena dadhīcasyāśramaṃ yayau  viprarūpamathāsthāya bhagavān bhaktavatsalaḥ  
dadhīcaṃ prāha viprarṣimabhivaṃdya jagadguruḥ  kṣuvakāryyārthamudyuktaśśaivendraṃ chalamāśritaḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  bho bho dadhīca viprarṣe bhavārcanaratāvyaya  varamekaṃ vṛṇe tvattastadbhavān dātumarhati  
brahmovāca  yācito devadevena dadhīcaśśaivasattamaḥ  kṣuvakāryārthinā śīghraṃ jagāda vacanaṃ harim  
dadhīca uvāca  jñātaṃ tavepsitaṃ vipra kṣuvakāryārthamāgataḥ  bhagavān viprarūpeṇa māyī tvamasi vai hariḥ  
bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ deveśa vartamānaṃ janārdana  jñānaṃ prasādādrudrasya sadā traikālikaṃ mama  
tvāṃ jānehaṃ hariṃ viṣṇuṃ dvijatvaṃ tyaja suvrata  ārādhito'si bhūpena kṣuveṇa khalabuddhinā  
jāne tavaiva bhagavan bhaktavatsalatāṃ hare  chalaṃ tyaja svarūpaṃ hi svīkuru smara śaṃkaram  
asti cetkasyacidbhītirbhavārcanaratasya me  vaktumarhasi yatnena satyadhāraṇapūrvakam  
vadāmi na mṛṣā kvāpi śivasmaraṇasaktadhīḥ  na bibhemi jagatyasmindevadaityādikādapi  
viṣṇuruvāca  bhayaṃ dadhīca sarvatra naṣṭaṃ ca tava suvrata  bhavārcanarato yasmādbhavānsarvajña eva ca  
bibhemīti sakṛdvaktumarhasi tvaṃ namastava  niyogānmama rājendra kṣuvāt pratisahasya ca  
brahmovāca  evaṃ śrutvāpi tadvākyaṃ viṣṇossa tu mahāmuniḥ  vihasya nirbhayaḥ prāha dadhīcaśśaivasattamaḥ  
dadhīca uvāca   na bibhemi sadā kvāpi kutaścidapi kiṃcana  prabhāvāddevadevasya śaṃbhossākṣātpinākinaḥ  
brahmovāca  tatastasya muneḥ śrutvā vacanaṃ kupito hariḥ  cakramudyamya saṃtasthau didhakṣumunisattamam  
abhavatkuṃṭhitaṃ tatra vipre cakraṃ sudāruṇam  prabhāvācca tadīśasya nṛpatessaṃnidhāvapi  
dṛṣṭvā taṃ kuṃṭhitāsyaṃ taccakraṃ viṣṇuṃ jagāda ha  dadhīcassasmitaṃ sākṣātsadasadvyakti kāraṇam  
dadhīca uvāca  bhagavan bhavatā labdhaṃ purātīva sudāruṇam  sudarśanamiti khyātaṃ cakraṃ viṣṇoḥ prayatnataḥ  bhavasya tacchubhaṃ cakraṃ na jighāṃsati māmiha  
bhagavānatha kruddho'smai sarvāstrāṇi kramāddhariḥ  brahmāstrādyaiḥ śaraiścāstraiḥ prayatnaṃ kartumarhasi  
brahmovāca  sa tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā nirvīryyamānuṣam  sasarjātha krudhā tasmai sarvāstrāṇi kramāddhariḥ  
cakrurdevāstatastasya viṣṇossāhāyyamādarāt  dvijenaikena saṃyoddhuṃ prasṛtasya vibuddhayaḥ  
cikṣipuḥ svāni svānyāśu śastrāṇyastrāṇi sarvataḥ  dadhīcopari vegena śakrādyā haripākṣikāḥ  
kuśamuṣṭimathādāya dadhīcassaṃsmaran śivam  sasarja sarvadevebhyo vajrāsthi sarvato vaśī  
śaṃkarasya prabhāvāttu kuśamuṣṭirmunerhi sā  divyaṃ triśūlamabhavat kālāgnisadṛśaṃ mune  
dagdhuṃ devān matiṃ cakre sāyudhaṃ saśikhaṃ ca tat  prajvalatsarvataśśaivaṃ yugāṃtāgryadhikaprabham  
nārāyaṇendumukhyaistu devaiḥ kṣiptāni yāni ca  āyudhāni samastāni praṇemustriśikhaṃ ca tat  
devāśca dudruvussarve dhvastavīryā divaukasaḥ  tasthau tatra harirbhītaḥ kevalaṃ māyināṃ varaḥ  
sasarja bhagavān viṣṇuḥ svadehātpuruṣottamaḥ  ātmanassadṛśān divyān lakṣalakṣāyutān gaṇān  
te cāpi yuyudhustatra vīrā viṣṇugaṇāstataḥ  muninaikena devarṣe dadhīcena śivātmanā  
tato viṣṇugaṇān tānvai niyudhya bahuśo raṇe  dadāha sahasā sarvān dadhī caśśaiva sattamaḥ  
tatastadvismayāthāya dadhīcesya munerhariḥ  viśvamūrtirabhūcchīghraṃ mahāmāyāviśāradaḥ  
tasya dehe hareḥ sākṣādapaśyaddvijasattamaḥ  dadhīco devatādīnāṃ jīvānāṃ ca sahasrakam  
bhūtānāṃ koṭayaścaiva gaṇānāṃ koṭayastathā  aṃḍānāṃ koṭayaścaiva viśvamūtastanau tadā  
dṛṣṭvaitadakhilaṃ tatra cyāvanissatataṃ tadā  viṣṇumāha jagannāthaṃ jagatstu vamajaṃ vibhum  
dadhīca uvāca  māyāṃ tyaja mahābāho pratibhāso vicārataḥ  vijñātāni sahasrāṇi durvijñeyāni mādhava  
mayi paśya jagatsarvaṃ tvayā yuktamataṃdritaḥ  brahmāṇaṃ ca tathā rudraṃ divyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ dadāmi te  
 brahmovāca  ityuktvā darśayāmāsa svatanau nikhilaṃ muniḥ  brahmāṃḍaṃ cyāvaniśśaṃbhutejasā pūrṇadehakaḥ  
dadāha viṣṇuṃ deveśaṃ dadhīcaśśaivasattamaḥ  saṃsmarañ śaṃkaraṃ citte vihasan vibhayassudhīḥ  
dadhīca uvāca  māyayā tvanayā kiṃ vā maṃtraśaktyātha vā hare  satkāmāyāmimāṃ tasmādyoddhumarhasi yatnataḥ  
brahmovāca  etacchutvā munestasya vacanaṃ nirbhayastadā  śaṃbhutejomayaṃ viṣṇuścukopātīva taṃ munim  
devāśca dudruvurbhūyo devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ ca tam  yoddhukāmāśca muninā dadhīcena pratāpinā  
etasminnaṃtare tatrāgamanmatsaṃgataḥ kṣuvaḥ  avārayaṃtaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ padmayoniṃ hariṃ surān  
niśamya vacanaṃ me hi brāhmaṇo na vinirjitaḥ  jagāma nikaṭaṃ tasya praṇanāma muniṃ hariḥ  
kṣuvo dīnataro bhūtvā gatvā tatra munīśvaram  dadhīcamabhivādyaiva prārthayāmāsa viklavaḥ  
kṣuva uvāca  prasīda muniśārdūla śivabhaktaśiromaṇe  prasīda parameśāna durlakṣye durjanaissaha  
brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacastasya rājñassuragaṇasya hi  anujagrāha taṃ vipro dadhīcastapasāṃ nidhiḥ  
atha dṛṣṭvā rameśādīn krodhavihvalito muniḥ  hṛdi smṛtvā śivaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśāpa ca surānapi  
dadhīca uvāca  rudrakopāgninā devāssadeveṃdrā munīśvarāḥ  dhvastā bhavaṃtu devena viṣṇunā ca samaṃ gaṇaiḥ  
 brahmovāca  evaṃ śaptvā surān prekṣya kṣuvamāha tato muniḥ  devaiśca pūjyo rājendra nṛpaiścaiva dvijottamaḥ  
brāhmaṇā eva rājendra balinaḥ prabhaviṣṇavaḥ  ityuktvā sa sphuṭa vipraḥ praviveśa nijāśramam  
dadhīcamabhivaṃdyaiva kṣuvo nijagṛhaṃ gataḥ  viṣṇurjagāma svaṃ lokaṃ suraissaha yathāgatam  
tadevaṃ tīrthamabhavat sthāneśvara iti smṛtam  sthāneśvaramanuprāpya śivasāyujyamāpnuyāt  
kathitastava saṃkṣepādvādaḥ kṣuvadadhīcayoḥ  nṛpāptaśāpayostāta brahmaviṣṇvoḥ śivaṃ vinā  
ya idaṃ kīttayennityaṃ vādaṃ kṣuvadadhīcayoḥ  jitvāpamṛtyuṃ dehānte brahmalokaṃ prayāti saḥ  
raṇe yaḥ kīrtayitvedaṃ praviśettasya sarvadā  mṛtyubhītibhavennaiva vijayī ca bhaviṣyati  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṇḍe viṣṇudadhīcayuddhavarṇano nāma navatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 nārada ucāca  vidhe vidhe mahāprājñā śaivatattvapradarśaka  śrāvitā ramaṇīprāyā śivalīlā mahādbhutā  
vīreṇa vīrabhadreṇa dakṣayajñaṃ vināśya vai  kailāsādrau gate tāta kimabhūttadvadādhunā  
 brahmovāca  atha devagaṇāssarve munayaśca parājitāḥ  rudrānīkairvibhinnāṃgā mama lokaṃ yayustadā  
svayaṃbhuve namaskṛtya mahyaṃ saṃstūya bhūriśaḥ  tatsvakleśaṃ viśeṣeṇa kārtsyenaiva nyavedayan  
tadākarṇya tatohaṃ vai putraśokena pīḍitaḥ  acintayamativyagro dūyamānena cetasā  
kiṃ kāryyaṃ kāryamadyāśu mayā devasukhāvaham  yena jīvatu dakṣāsau makhaḥ pūrṇo bhavetsuraḥ  
evaṃ vicārya bahudhā nālabhaṃ śamahaṃ mune  viṣṇuṃ tadā smaran bhaktyā jñānamāptaṃ tadocitam  
atha devaiśca munibhirviṣṇorlokamahaṃ gataḥ  natvā nutvā ca vividhaisstavairduḥkhaṃ nyavedayam  
yathādhvaraḥ prapūrṇaḥ syāddeva yajñakaraśca saḥ  sukhinassyussurāssarve munayaśca tathā kuru  
deva deva ramānātha viṣṇo devasukhāvaha  vayaṃ tvaccharaṇaṃ prāptāssadevamunayo dhruvam  
 brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vaco me hi brahmaṇassa rameśvaraḥ  pratyuvāca śivaṃ smṛtvā śivātmā dīnamānasaḥ  
 viṣṇuruvāca  tejīyasi na sā bhūtā kṛtāgasi bubhūṣatām  tatra kṣemāya bahudhā bubhūṣā hi kṛtāgasām  
kṛtapāpāssurā sarve śive hi parameśvare  parādaduryajñabhāgaṃ tasya śaṃbhorvidhe yataḥ  
prasādayadhyaṃ sarve hi yūyaṃ śuddhena cetasā  athāparaprasādaṃ taṃ gṛhītāṃghriyugaṃ śivam  
yasmin prakupite deve vinaśyatyakhilaṃ jagat  salokapālayajñasya śāsanājjīvitaṃ drutam  
tamāśu devaṃ priyayā vihīnaṃ ca duruktibhiḥ  kṣamāpayadhvaṃ hṛdviddhaṃ dakṣeṇa sudurātmanā  
ayameva mahopāyastacchāṃtyai kevalaṃ vidhe  śaṃbhossaṃtuṣṭaye manye satyamevoditaṃ mayā  
nāhaṃ na tvaṃ surāścānye munayopi tanūbhṛtaḥ  yasya tattvaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca na vidurbalavīryayoḥ  
ātmataṃtrasya tasyāpi parasya paramātmanaḥ  ka upāyaṃ vidhitsedvai paraṃ mūḍhaṃ virodhinam  
caliṣyehamapi brahman sarvaiḥ sārddha śivālayam  kṣamāpayāmi giriśaṃ kṛtāgāśca śive dhuvam  
 brahmovāca  itthamādiśya viṣṇurmāṃ brahmāṇaṃ sāmarādikam  sārddhaṃ devermatiṃ cakre tadgirau gamanāya saḥ  
yayau svadhiṣṇya nilayaṃ śivasyādrivaraṃ śubham  kailāsaṃ sāmaramuniprajeśādimayo hariḥ  
atipriyaṃ prabhornityaṃ sujuṣṭaṃ kinnarādibhiḥ  naretarairapsarobhiryogasiddhaimahonnatam  
nānāmaṇimayaiśśṛṃgaiḥ śobhamānaṃ samaṃtataḥ  nānādhātuvicitraṃ vai nānādrumalatākulam  
nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ nānāpakṣisamanvitam  nānājalaprasravaṇairamaraissiddhayoṣitām  
ramaṇaivāharaṃtīnāṃ nānākaṃdara sānubhiḥ  drumajātibhiranyābhī rājitaṃ rājataprabham  
vyāghrādibhirmahāsattvairnirghuṣṭaṃ krūratojjhitam  sarvaśobhānvitaṃ divyaṃ mahāvismayakārakam  
paryastaṃ gaṃgayā satyā sthānapuṇyatarodayā  sarvapāvanasaṃkartryā viṣṇupadyā sunirmalam  
evaṃvidhaṃ giriṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsākhyaṃ śivapriyam  yayuste vismayaṃ devā viṣṇvādyāssamunīśvarāḥ  
tassamīpe'lakāṃ ramyāṃ dadṛśurnāma te purīm  kuberasya mahādivyāṃ rudramitrasya nirjarāḥ  
vanaṃ saugaṃdhikaṃ cāpi dadṛśustatsamīpataḥ  sarvadrumānvitaṃ divyaṃ yatra tannādamadrutam  
tadbāhyatastasya divye saritāvatipāvane  naṃdā cālakanaṃdā ca darśanātpāpahārike  
papuḥ surastriyo nityamavagūhya svalokataḥ  vigāhya puṃbhistāstatra krīḍaṃti ratikarśitāḥ  
hitvā yakṣeśvarapurīṃ vanaṃ saugaṃdhikaṃ ca yat  gacchaṃtaste surā ārāddadṛśuśśāṃkaraṃ vaṭam  
paryak kṛtācalacchāyaṃ pādona viṭapāya tam  śatayojana kotsedhaṃ nirnīḍaṃ tāpavarjjitam  
mahāpuṇyavatāṃ dṛśyaṃ suramyaṃ cātipāvanam  śaṃbhuyogasthalaṃ divyaṃ yogisevyaṃ mahottamam  
mumukṣuśaraṇe tasmin mahāyogamaye vaṭe  āsīnaṃ dadṛśussarve śivaṃ viṣṇvādayassurāḥ  
vidhiputrairmahāsiddhaiśśiva bhaktirataissadā  upāsyamānaṃ sumudā śāṃtaissaṃśāṃtavigrahaiḥ  
tathā sakhyā kubereṇa bhartrā guhyakarakṣasām  sevyamānaṃ viśeṣeṇa svagaṇairjñātibhissadā  
tāpasābhīṣṭasadrūpaṃ bibhrataṃ parameśvaram  vātsalyādviśvasuhṛdaṃ bhasmādisuvirājitam  
mune tubhyaṃ pravocaṃtaṃ pṛcchate jñānamuttamam  kuśāsane sūpaviṣṭaṃ sarveṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ satām  
kṛtvorau dakṣiṇe savyaṃ caraṇaṃ caiva jānuni  bāhuprakoṣṭhākṣamālaṃ sthitaṃ sattarkamudrayā  
evaṃvidhaṃ śivaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā viṣṇvādayassurāḥ  praṇemustvaritaṃ sarve karau badhvā vinamrakāḥ  
upalabhyāgataṃ rudro mayā viṣṇuṃ satāṃ gatiḥ  utthāya cakre śirasābhivaṃdanamapi prabhuḥ  
vaṃditāṃghristadā sarvairdivyairviṣṇvādibhiśśivaḥ  nanāmātha yathā viṣṇuṃ kaśyapaṃ lokasadgatiḥ  
surasiddhagaṇādhīśamaharṣisu namaskṛtam  samuvāca surairviṣṇuṃ kṛtasannatimādarāt  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe śivadarśanavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ  
viṣṇvādaya ūcuḥ  devadeva mahādeva laukikācārakṛtprabho  brahma tvāmīśvaraṃ śaṃbhuṃ jānīmaḥ kṛpayā tava  
kiṃ mohayasi nastāta māyayā parayā tava  durjñeyayā sadā puṃsāṃ mohinyā parameśvara  
prakṛtaḥ puruṣasyāpi jagato yonibījayoḥ  parabrahma parastvaṃ ca manovācāmagocaraḥ  
tvameva viśvaṃ sṛjasi pāsyatsi nijataṃtrataḥ  svarūpāṃ śivaśaktiṃ hi krīḍannūrṇapaṭo yathā  
tvameva kratumīśāna sasarjitha dayāparaḥ  dakṣeṇa sūtreṇa vibho sadā trayyabhipattaye  
tvayaiva lokevasitāssetavo yān dhṛtavratāḥ  śuddhān śraddadhate viprā vedamārgavicakṣaṇāḥ  
kartustvaṃ maṃgalānāṃ hi svaparaṃ tu mukhe vibho  amaṃgalānāṃ ca hitaṃ miśraṃ vātha viparyayam  
sarvakarmaphalānāṃ hi sadā dātā tvameva hi  sarve hi proktā hi yaśastatpatistvaṃ śrutiśrutaḥ  
pṛthagdhiyaḥ karmadṛśo'ruṃtudāśca durāśayāḥ  vitudaṃti parānmūḍhā duruktairmatsarānvitāḥ  
teṣāṃ daivavadhānāṃ bho bhūyāttvacca vadho vibho  bhagavanparameśāna kṛpāṃ kuru paraprabho  
namo rudrāya śāṃtāya brahmaṇe paramātmane  kapardine maheśāya jyotsnāya mahate namaḥ  
tvaṃ hi viśvasṛjāṃ sraṣṭā dhātā tvaṃ prapitāmahaḥ  triguṇātmā nirguṇaśca prakṛteḥ puruṣātparaḥ  
namaste nīlakaṃṭhāya vedhase paramātmane  viśvāya viśvabījāya jagadānaṃdahetave  
oṃkārastvaṃ vaṣaṭkārassarvāraṃbhapravartakaḥ  haṃtakāssvadhākāro havyakavyānnabhuk sadā  
kṛtaḥ kathaṃ yajñabhaṃgastvayā dharmaparāyaṇa  brahmaṇyastvaṃ mahādeva kathaṃ yajñahano vibho  
brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva dharmasya pratipālakaḥ  śaraṇyosi sadānaṃtyaḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ prabho  
namaste bhagavan rudra bhāskarāmitatejase  namo bhavāya devāya rasāyāṃbumayāya te  
śarvāya kṣitirūpāya sadā surabhiṇe namaḥ  rudrāyāgnisvarūpāya mahātejasvine namaḥ  
īśāya vāyave tubhyaṃ saṃsparśāya namonamaḥ  paśūnāṃpataye tubhyaṃ yajamānāya vedhase  
bhīmāya vyomarūpāya śabdamātrāya te namaḥ  mahādevāya somāya pravṛttāya namostu te  
ugrāya sūryarūpāya namaste karmayogine  namaste kālakālāya namaste rudra manyave  
namaśśivāya bhīmāya śaṃkarāya śivāya te  ugrosi sarva bhūtānāṃ niyaṃtā yacchivosi naḥ  
mayaskarāya viśvāya brahmaṇe hyārtināśine  ambikāpataye tubhyamumāyāḥ pataye namaḥ  
śarvāya sarvarūpāya puruṣāya parātmane  sadasadvyaktihīnāya mahataḥ kāraṇāya te  
jātāya bahudhā loke prabhūtāya namonamaḥ  nīlāya nīlarudrāya kadrudrāya pracetase  
mīḍhuṣṭamāya devāya śipiviṣṭāya te namaḥ  mahīyase namastubhyaṃ haṃtre devāriṇāṃ sadā  
tārāya ca sutārāya taruṇāya sutejase  harikeśāya devāya maheśāya namonamaḥ  
devānāṃ śaṃbhave tubhyaṃ vibhave paramātmane  paramāya namastubhyaṃ kālakaṃṭhāya te namaḥ  
hiraṇyāya pareśāya hiraṇyavapuṣe namaḥ  bhīmāya bhīmarūpāya bhīmakarmaratāya ca  
bhasmadigdhaśarīrāya rudrākṣābharaṇāya ca  namo hrasvāya dīrghāya vāmanāya namostu te  
dūrevadhāya te devā grevadhāya namonamaḥ  dhanvine śūline tubhyaṃ gadine haline namaḥ  
nānāyudhadharāyaiva daityadānavanāśine  sadyāya sadyarūpāya sadyojātāya vai namaḥ  
vāmāya vāmarūpāya vāmanetrāya te namaḥ  aghorāya pareśāya vikaṭāya namonamaḥ  
tatpuruṣāya nāthāya purāṇapuruṣāya ca  puruṣārthapradānāya vratine parameṣṭhine  
īśānāya namastubhyamīśvarāya namo namaḥ  brahmaṇe brahmarūpāya namassākṣātparātmane  
ugrosi sarvaduṣṭānāṃ niyaṃtāsi śivosi naḥ  kālakūṭāśine tubhyaṃ devādyavana kāriṇe  
vīrāya vīrabhadrāya rakṣadvīrāya śūline  mahādevāya mahate paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ  
vīrātmane suvidyāya śrīkaṃṭhāya pinākine  namonaṃtāya sūkṣmāya namaste mṛtyumanyave  
parāya parameśāya parātparatarāya te  parātparāya vibhave namaste viśvamūrtaye  
namo viṣṇukalatrāya viṣṇukṣetrāya bhānave  bhairavāya śaraṇyāya tryaṃbakāya vihāriṇe  
mṛtyuṃjayāya śokāya triguṇāya guṇātmane  candrasūryāgninetrāya sarvakāraṇasetave  
bhavatā hi jagatsarvaṃ vyāptaṃ svenaiva tejasā  parabrahma nirvikārī cidānaṃdaḥprakāśavān  
brahmaviṣṇviṃdracandrādipramukhāssakalāssurāḥ  munayaścāpare tvattassaṃprasūtā maheśvara  
yato bibharṣi sakalaṃ vibhajya tanumaṣṭadhā  aṣṭamūrtiritīśaśca tvamādyaḥ karuṇāmayaḥ  
tvadbhayādvāti vātoyaṃ dahatyagnirbhayāttava  sūryastapati te bhītyā mṛtyurdhāvati sarvataḥ  
dayāsindho maheśāna prasīda parameśvara  rakṣa rakṣa sadaivāsmān yasmānnaṣṭān vicetasaḥ  
rakṣitāḥ satataṃ nātha tvayaiva karuṇānidhe  nānāpadbhyo vayaṃ śaṃbho tathaivādya prapāhi naḥ  
yajñasyoddharaṇaṃ nātha kuru śīghraṃ prasādakṛt  asamāptasya durgeśa dakṣasya ca prajāpateḥ  
bhagokṣiṇī prapadyeta yajamānaśca jīvatu  pūṣṇo daṃtāśca rohaṃtu bhṛgoḥ śmaśrūṇi pūrvavat  
bhavatānugrahītānāṃ devādīnāṃśca sarvaśaḥ  ārogyaṃ bhagnagātrāṇāṃ śaṃkara tvāyudhāśmabhiḥ  
pūrṇabhāgostu te nāthāvaśiṣṭe'dhvarakarmaṇi  rudrabhāgena yajñaste kalpito nānyathā kvacit  
ityuktvā saprajeśaśca rameśaśca kṛtāṃjaliḥ  daṃḍavatpatito bhūmau kṣamāpayitumudyataḥ  
iti śrīśiva mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe devastutivarṇanaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 brahmovāca  śrībrahmeśaprajeśena sadaiva muninā ca vai  anunītaśśaṃbhurāsītprasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ  
āśvāsya devān viṣṇvādīnvihasya karuṇānidhiḥ  uvāca parameśānaḥ kurvan paramanugraham  
śrīmahādeva uvāca  śṛṇutaṃ sāvadhānena mama vākyaṃ surottamau  yathārthaṃ vacmi vāṃ tāta vāṃ krodhaṃ sarvadāsaham  
nāghaṃ tanau tu bālānāṃ varṇamevānuciṃtaye  mama māyābhibhūtānāṃ daṃḍastatra dhṛto mayā  
dakṣasya yajñabhaṃgoyaṃ na kṛtaśca mayā kvacit  paraṃ dveṣṭi pareṣāṃ yadātmanastadbhaviṣyati  
pareṣāṃ kledanaṃ karma na kāryaṃ tatkadācana  paraṃ dveṣṭi pareṣāṃ yadātmanastadbhaviṣyati  
dakṣasya yajñaśīrṣṇo hi bhavatvajamukhaṃ śiraḥ  mitranetreṇa saṃpaśyedyajñabhāgaṃ bhagassuraḥ  
pūṣābhidhassurastātau dadbhiryajñasupiṣṭabhuk  yājamānairbhagnadaṃtassatyametanmayoditam  
bastaśmaśrurbhavedeva bhṛgurmama virodha kṛt  devāḥ prakṛtisarvāṃgā ye ma ucchedanaṃ daduḥ  
bāhubhyāmaśvinau pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ kṛtavāhakau  bhavaṃtvadhvaryavaścānye bhavatprītyā mayoditam  
brahmovāca  ityuktvā parameśāno virarāma dayānvitaḥ  carācarapatirdevaḥ samrāṭ vedānusārakṛt  
tadā sarva surādyāste śrutvā śaṃkarabhāṣitam  sādhusādhviti saṃprocuḥ parituṣṭāḥ saviṣṇvajāḥ  
tataśśaṃbhuṃ samāmaṃtrya mayā viṣṇussurarṣibhiḥ  bhūyastaddevayajanaṃ yayau ca parayā mudā  
evaṃ teṣāṃ prārthanayā viṣṇuprabhṛtibhissuraiḥ  yayau kanakhalaṃ śaṃbhuryajñavāṭaṃ prajāpateḥ  
rudrastadā dadarśātha vīrabhadreṇa yatkṛtam  pradhvaṃsaṃ taṃ kratostatra devarṣīṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ  
svāhā svadhā tathā pūṣā tuṣṭirdhṛtiḥ sarasvatī  tathānye ṛṣayassarve pitaraścāgnayastathā  
ye'nye ca bahavastatra yakṣagaṃdhavarrākṣasāḥ  troṭitā luṃcitāścaiva mṛtāḥ kecidraṇājire  
yajñaṃ tathāvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāhūya gaṇādhipam  vīrabhadraṃ mahāvīramuvāca prahasan prabhuḥ  
vīrabhadra mahābāho kiṃ kṛtaṃ karma te tvidam  mahāndaṃḍo dhṛtastāta devarṣyādiṣu satvaram  
dakṣamānaya śīghraṃ tvaṃ yenedaṃ kṛtamīdṛśam  yajño vilakṣaṇastāta yasyedaṃ phalamīdṛśam  
 brahmovāca  evamuktaśśaṃkareṇa vīrabhadrastvarānvitaḥ  kabaṃdhamānayitvāgre tasya śaṃbhorathākṣipat  
viśiraskaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṃkaro lokaśaṃkaraḥ  vīrabhadramuvācāgre vihasanmunisattama  
śiraḥ kutreti tenokte vīrabhadro'bravītprabhuḥ  mayā śiro hutaṃ cāgnau tadānīmeva śaṃkara  
iti śrutvā vacastasya vīrabhadrasya śaṃkaraḥ  devān tathājñapatprītyā yaduktaṃ tatpurā prabhuḥ  
vidhāya kārtsnyena ca tadyadāha bhagavān bhavaḥ  mayā viṣṇvādayaḥ sarve bhṛgvādīnatha satvaram  
atha prajāpatestasya savanīyapaśośśiraḥ  bastasya saṃdadhuśśaṃbhoḥ kāyenāraṃ suśāsanāt  
saṃdhīyamāne śirasi śaṃbhusaddṛṣṭivīkṣitaḥ  sadyassupta ivottasthau labdhaprāṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ  
utthitaścāgrataśśaṃbhuṃ dadarśa karuṇānidhim  dakṣaḥ prītamatiḥ prītyā saṃsthitaḥ suprasannadhīḥ  
purā hara mahādveṣakalilātmābhavaddhi saḥ  śivāvalokanātsadyaśśaraccandra ivāmalaḥ  
bhavaṃ stotumanā sotha nāśaknodanurāgataḥ  utkaṃṭhāvikalatvācca saṃparetāṃ sutāṃ smaran  
atha dakṣaḥ prasannātmā śivaṃ lajjāsamanvitaḥ  tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā śaṃkaraṃ lokaśaṃkaram  
dakṣa uvāca  namāmi deva varadaṃ vareṇyaṃ maheśvaraṃ jñānanidhiṃ sanātanam  namāmi devādhipatīśvaraṃ haraṃ sadāsukhāḍhyaṃ jagadekabāṃdhavam  
namāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpaṃ purātanaṃ brahmanijātmarūpam  namāmi śarvaṃ bhava bhāvabhāvaṃ parātparaṃ śaṃkaramānatomi  
devadeva mahādeva kṛpāṃ kuru namostu te  aparādhaṃ kṣamasvādya mama śaṃbho kṛpānidhe  
anugrahaḥ kṛtaste hi daṃḍavyājena śaṃkara  khalohaṃ mūḍhadhīrdeva jñātaṃ tattvaṃ mayā na te  
adya jñātaṃ mayā tattvaṃ sarvopari bhavānmataḥ  viṣṇubrahmādibhissevyo vedavedyo maheśvaraḥ  
sādhūnāṃ kalpavṛkṣastvaṃ duṣṭānāṃ daṃḍadhṛksadā  svataṃtraḥ paramātmā hi bhaktābhīṣṭavarapradaḥ  
vidyātapovratadharānasṛjaḥ prathamaṃ dvijā  ātmatattvaṃ samāvettuṃ mukhataḥ parameśvaraḥ  
sarvāpadbhyaḥ pālayitā gopatistu paśūniva  gṛhītadaṃḍo duṣṭāṃstān maryādāparipālakaḥ  
mayā duruktaviśikhaiḥ praviddhaḥ parameśvaraḥ  amarānatidīnāśān madanugrahakārakaḥ  
sa bhavān bhagavān śaṃbho dīnabaṃdho parātparaḥ  svakṛtena mahārheṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhaktavatsala  
 brahmovāca  iti stutvā maheśānaṃ śaṃkaraṃ lokaśaṃkaram  prajāpatirvinītātmā virarāma mahāprabhum  
atha viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā tuṣṭāva vṛṣabhadhvajam  bāṣpagadgadayā vāṇyā supraṇamya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  
viṣṇuvāca  mahādeva maheśāna lokānugrahakāraka  parabrahma parātmā tvaṃ dīnabaṃdho dayānidhe  
sarvavyāpī svairavartī vedavedyayaśāḥ prabhoḥ  anugrahaḥ kṛtastena kṛtāścāsukṛtā vayam  
dakṣoyaṃ mama bhaktastvāṃ yanniniṃda khalaḥ purā  tat kṣaṃtavyaṃ maheśādya nirvikāro yato bhavān  
kṛto mayāparādhopi tava śaṃkara mūḍhataḥ  tvadgaṇena kṛtaṃ yuddhaṃ vīrabhadreṇa pakṣataḥ  
tvaṃ me svāmī parabrahma dāsohaṃ te sadāśiva  poṣyaścāpi sadā te hi sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ pitā yataḥ  
brahmovāca  devadeva mahādeva karuṇāsāgara prabho  svataṃtraḥ paramātmā tvaṃ parameśo dvayovyayaḥ  
mama putropari kṛto devānugraha īśvara  svāpamānamagaṇayan dakṣayajñaṃ samuddhara  
prasanno bhava deveśa sarvaśāpānnirākuru  sabodhaḥ prerakastvaṃ me tvamevaṃ vinivārakaḥ  
iti stutvā maheśānaṃ paramaṃ ca mahāmune  kṛtāṃjalipuṭo bhūtvā vinamrīkṛtamastakaḥ  
atha śakrādayo devā lokapālāssucetasaḥ  tuṣṭuvuḥ śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ prasannamukhapaṃkajam  
tataḥ prasannamanasaḥ sarve devāstathā pare  siddharṣayaḥ prajeśāśca tuṣṭuvuḥ śaṃkaraṃ mudā  
tathopadevanāgāśca sadasyā brāhmaṇāstathā  praṇamya parayā bhaktyā tuṣṭuvuśca pṛthak pṛthak  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ dvitīye satīkhaṃḍe dakṣaduḥkhanirākaraṇavarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ  
brahmovāca  iti stuto rameśena mayā caiva surarṣibhiḥ  tathānyaiśca mahādevaḥ prasannassaṃbabhūva ha  
atha śaṃbhuḥ kṛpā dṛṣṭyā sarvān ṛṣisurādikān  brahmaviṣṇū samādhāya dakṣametaduvāca ha  
mahādeva uvāca  śṛṇu dakṣa pravakṣyāmi prasannosmi prajāpate  bhaktādhīnaḥ sadāhaṃ vai svataṃtropyakhileśvaraḥ  
caturvidhā bhajaṃte māṃ janāḥ sukṛtinassadā  uttarottarataḥ śreṣṭhāsteṣāṃ dakṣaprajāpate
