sannāhaṃ sarvavāhāṃśca kirīṭaṃ mukuṭojjvalam  vīraśabdaṃ cakārāsau jagarja ca punaḥ punaḥ  
cikṣepa śaktiṃ sūryābhāṃ dānavendrasya vakṣasi   tatprahāreṇa saṃprāpa mūrcchāṃ dīrghatamena ca  
muhūrtamātraṃ tatkleśaṃ vinīya sa mahābalaḥ  cetanāṃ prāpya cottasthau jagarja harivarca saḥ  
śaktyā jaghāna taṃ cāpi kārtikeyaṃ mahābalam  sa papāta mahīpṛṣṭhe'moghāṃ kurvanvidhipradām  
kālī gṛhītvā taṃ kroḍe nināya śivasannidhau  jñānena taṃ śivaścāpi jīvayāmāsa līlayā  
dadau balamanaṃtaṃ ca samuttasthau pratāpavān  gamanāya matiṃ cakre punastatra śivātmajaḥ  
etasminnaṃtare vīro vīrabhadro mahābalaḥ  śaṃkhacūḍena yuyudhe samare balaśālinā  
vavarṣa samare'strāṇi yāniyāni ca dānavaḥ  ciccheda līlayā vīrastānitāni nijaiśśaraiḥ  
divyānyastrāṇi śataśo mumuce dānaveśvaraḥ  tāni ciccheda taṃ bāṇairvīrabhadraḥ pratāpavān  
athātīva cukopoccaiśśaṃkhacūḍaḥ pratāpavān  śaktyā jaghānorasi taṃ sa cakaṃpe papāta kau  
kṣaṇena cetanāṃ prāpya samuttasthau gaṇeśvaraḥ  jagrāha ca dhanurbhūyo vīrabhadro gaṇāgraṇīḥ  
etasminnaṃtare kālī jagāma samaraṃ punaḥ  bhakṣituṃ dānavān svāṃśca rakṣituṃ kārtikecchayā  
vīrāstāmanujagmuśca te ca nandīśvarādayaḥ  sarve devāśca gaṃdharvā yakṣā rakṣāṃsi pannagāḥ  
vādyabhāṃḍāśca bahuśaśśataśo madhuvāhakāḥ  punaḥ samudyatāścāsan vīrā ubhayato'khilāḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasahitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe śaṃkhacūḍavadhe sasainyaśaṃkhacūḍayuddhavarṇanaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  sā ca gatvā hi saṃgrāmaṃ siṃhanādaṃ cakāra ha  devyāśca tena nādena mūrcchāmāpuśca dānavāḥ  
aṭṭāṭṭahāsamaśivaṃ cakāra ca punaḥ punaḥ  tadā papau ca mādhvīkaṃ nanarta raṇamūrddhani  
ugradaṃṣṭrā cogradaṃḍā koṭavī ca papau madhu  anyāśca devyastatrājau nanṛturmadhu saṃpapuḥ  
mahān kolāhalo jāto gaṇadevadale tadā  jahṛṣurbahugarjaṃtassarve suragaṇādayaḥ  
dṛṣṭvā kālīṃ śaṃkhacūḍaśśīghramājau samāyayau  dānavāśca bhayaṃ prāptā rājā tebhyo'bhayaṃ dadau  
kālī cikṣepa vahniṃ ca pralayāgniśikhopamam  rājā jaghāna taṃ śīghraṃ vaiṣṇavāṃkitalīlayā  
nārāyaṇāstraṃ sā devī cikṣepa taduparyaram  vṛddhiṃ jagāma tacchastraṃ dṛṣṭvā vāmaṃ ca dānavam  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṃkhacūḍaśca pralayāgniśikhopamam  papāta daṃḍavadbhūmau praṇanāma punaḥpunaḥ  
nivṛttiṃ prāpa tacchstraṃ dṛṣṭvā namraṃ ca dānavam  brahmāstramatha sā devī cikṣepa maṃtrapūrvakam  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā prajjvalaṃtaṃ ca praṇamya bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ  brahmāstreṇa dānavendro vinivāraṃ cakāra ha  
atha kruddho dānavendro dhanurākṛṣya raṃhasā  cikṣepa divyānyastrāṇi devyai vai maṃtrapūrvakam  
āhāraṃ samare cakre prasārya mukhamāyatam  jagarja sāṭṭahāsaṃ ca dānavā bhayamāyayuḥ  
kālyai cikṣepa śaktiṃ sa śatayojanamāyatām  devī divyāstrajālena śatakhaṃḍaṃ cakāra sā  
sa ca vaiṣṇavamastraṃ ca cikṣepa caṃḍikopari  māheśvareṇa kālī ca vinivāraṃ cakāra sā  
evaṃ cirataraṃ yuddhamanyonyaṃ saṃbabhūva ha  prekṣakā abhavansarve devāśca dānavā api  
atha kuddhā mahādevī kālī kālasamā raṇe  jagrāha mantrapūtaṃ ca śaraṃ pāśupataṃ ruṣā  
kṣepātpūrvaṃ tanniṣeddhuṃ vāgbabhūvāśarīriṇī  na kṣipāstramidaṃ devi śaṃkhacūḍāya vai ruṣā  
mṛtyuḥ pāśupatānnāstyamoghādapi ca caṃḍike  śaṃkhacūḍasya vīrasyopāyamanyaṃ vicāraya  
ityākarṇya bhadrakālī na cikṣepa tadastrakam  śatalakṣaṃ dānavānāṃ jaghāsa līlayā kṣudhā  
attuṃ jagāma vegena śaṃkhacūḍaṃ bhayaṃkarī  divyāstreṇa ca raudreṇa vārayāmāsa dānavaḥ  
atha kruddho dānavendraḥ khaḍgaṃ cikṣepa satvaram  grīṣmasūryopamaṃ tīkṣṇadhāramatyaṃtabhīkaram  
sā kālī taṃ samālokyāyāṃtaṃ prajvalitaṃ ruṣā  prasārya mukhamāhāraṃ cakre tasya ca paśyataḥ  
divyānyastrāṇi cānyāni ciccheda dānaveśvaraḥ  prāptāni pūrvataścakre śatakhaṃḍāni tāni ca  
punarattuṃ mahādevī vegatastaṃ jagāma ha  sarvasiddheśvaraḥ śrīmānaṃtardhānaṃ cakāra saḥ  
vegena muṣṭinā kālī tamadṛṣṭvā ca dānavam  babhaṃja ca rathaṃ tasya jaghāna kila sārathim  
athāgatya drutaṃ māyī cakraṃ cikṣepa vegataḥ  bhadrakālyai śaṃkhacūḍaḥ pralayāgniśikho pamam  
sā devī taṃ tadā cakraṃ vāmahastena līlayā  jagrāha svamukhenaivāhāraṃ cakre ruṣā drutam  
muṣṭyā jaghāna taṃ devī mahākopena vegataḥ  babhrāma dānavendropi kṣaṇaṃ mūrcchāmavāpa saḥ  
kṣaṇena cetanāṃ prāpya sa cottasthau pratāpavān  na cakre bāhu yuddhaṃ ca mātṛbuddhyā tayā saha  
gṛhītvā dānavaṃ devī bhrāmayitvā punaḥpunaḥ  ūrddhvaṃ ca prāpayāmāsa mahākopena vegataḥ  
utpapāta ca vegena śaṃkhacūḍaḥ pratāpavān  nipatya ca samuttasthā praṇamya bhadrakālikām  
ratnendrasāranirmāṇavimānaṃ sumano haram  āruroha sa hṛṣṭātmā na bhrāntopi mahāraṇe  
dānavānāṃ hi kṣatajaṃ sā papau kālikā kṣudhā  etasminnaṃtare tatra vāgvabhūvāśarīriṇī  
lakṣaṃ ca dānavendrāṇāmavaśiṣṭaṃ raṇe'dhunā  uddhataṃ guñjatāṃ sārddhaṃ tatastvaṃ bhuṃkṣva ceśvari  
saṃgrāme dānavendraṃ ca haṃtuṃ na kuru mānasam  avadhyoyaṃ śaṃkhacūḍastava devīti niścayam  
tacchutvā vacanaṃ devī niḥsṛtaṃ vyomamaṃḍalāt  dānavānāṃ bahūnāṃ ca māṃsaṃ ca rudhiraṃ tathā  
bhuktvā pītvā bhadrakālī śaṃkarāṃtikamāyayau  uvāca raṇavṛttāṃtaṃ paurvāparyeṇa sakramam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvi rudrasaṃpaṃyuddhakhaṃḍe śaṃkhacūḍavadhe kālīyuddhavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  śrutvā kālyuktamīśāno kiṃ cakāra kimuktavān  tattvaṃ vada mahāprājña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama  
sanatkumāra uvāca  kālyuktaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ  mahālīlākaraśśaṃbhurjahāsāśvāsayañca tām  
vyomavāṇīṃ samākarṇya tattvajñānaviśāradaḥ  yayau svayaṃ ca samare svagaṇaissaha śaṃkaraḥ  
mahāvṛṣabhamārūḍho vīrabhadrādisaṃyutaḥ  bhairavaiḥ kṣetrapālaiśca svasamānaissamanvitaḥ  
raṇaṃ prāpto maheśaśca vīrarūpaṃ vidhāya ca  virarājādhikaṃ tatra rudro mūrta ivāṃtakaḥ  
śaṃkhacūḍaśśivaṃ dṛṣṭvā vimānādavaruhya saḥ  nanāma parayā bhaktyā śirasā daṃḍavadbhuvi  
taṃ praṇamya tu yogena vimānamāruroha saḥ  tūrṇaṃ cakāra sannāhaṃ dhanurjagrāha seṣukam  
śivadānavayoryuddhaṃ śatamabdaṃ babhūva ha  bāṇavarṣamivograṃ tadvarṣatormoghayostadā  
śaṃkhacūḍo mahāvīraśśarāṃścikṣepa dāruṇān  ciccheda śaṃkarastānvai līlayā svaśarotkaraiḥ  
tadaṃgeṣu ca śastroghaistāḍayāmāsa kopataḥ  mahārudro virūpākṣo duṣṭadaṇḍassatāṃ gati  
dānavo niśitaṃ khaḍgaṃ carma cādāya vegavān  vṛṣaṃ jaghāna śirasi śivasya varavāhanam  
tāḍite vāhane rudrastaṃ kṣurapreṇa līlayā  khaḍgaṃ ciccheda tasyāśu carma cāpi mahojjvalam  
chinne'sau carmaṇi tadā śaktiṃ cikṣepa so'suraḥ  dvidhā cakre svabāṇena harastāṃ saṃmukhāgatām  
kopādhmātaśśaṃkhacūḍaścakraṃ cikṣepa dānavaḥ  muṣṭipātena taccāpyacūrṇayatsahasā haraḥ  
gadāmāvidhya tarasā saṃcikṣepa haraṃ prati  śaṃbhunā sāpi sahasā bhinnā bhasmatvamāgatā  
tataḥ paraśumādāya hastena dānaveśvaraḥ  dhāvati sma haraṃ vegācchaṃkhacūḍaḥ krudhākulaḥ  
samāhṛtya svabāṇaughairapātayata śaṃkaraḥ  drutaṃ paraśuhastaṃ taṃ bhūtale līlayāsuram  
tataḥ kṣaṇena saṃprāpya saṃjñāmāruhya sadratham  dhṛtadivyāyudhaśaro babhau vyāpyākhilaṃ nabhaḥ  
āyāṃtaṃ taṃ nirīkṣyaiva ḍamarudhvani mādarāt  cakāra jyāravaṃ cāpi dhanuṣo dussahaṃ hara  
pūrayāmāsa kakubhaḥ śṛṃganādena ca prabhuḥ  svayaṃ jagarja giriśastrāsayannasurāṃstadā  
tyājitebha mahāgarvairmahānādairvṛṣeśvaraḥ  pūrayāmāsa sahasā khaṃ gāṃ vasudiśastathā  
mahākālassamutpatyā tāḍayadgāṃ tathā nabhaḥ  karābhyāṃ tanninādena kṣiptā āsanpurāravāḥ  
aṭṭāṭṭahāsamaśivaṃ kṣetrapālaścakāra ha  bhairavo'pi mahānādaṃ sa cakāra mahāhave  
mahākolāhalo jāto raṇamadhye bhayaṃkaraḥ  vīraśabdo babhūvātha gaṇamadhye samaṃtataḥ  
saṃtresurdānavāssarve taiśśabdairbhayadaiḥ kharaiḥ  cukopātīva tacchrutvā dānavendro mahābalaḥ  
tiṣṭhatiṣṭheti duṣṭātmanvyājahāra yadā haraḥ  devairgaṇaiśca taiḥ śīghramuktaṃ jaya jayeti ca  
athāgatya sa daṃbhasya tanayassupratāpavān  śaktiṃ cikṣepa rudrāya jvālāmālātibhīṣaṇām  
vahnikūṭaprabhā yāṃtī kṣetrapālena satvaram  nirastāgatya sājau vai mukhotpannamaholkayā  
punaḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ śivadānavayormahat  cakaṃpe dharaṇī dyauśca sanagābdhijalāśayā  
dāṃbhimuktāccharāñśaṃbhuśśarāṃstatprahitānsa ca  sahasraśaśśarairugraiściccheda śataśastadā  
tataśśaṃbhustriśūlena saṃkuddhastaṃ jaghāna ha  tatprahāramasahyāśu kau papāta sa mūrcchitaḥ  
tataḥ kṣaṇena saṃprāpa saṃjñāṃ sa ca tadāsuraḥ  ājaghāna śarai rudraṃ tānsarvānāttakārmukaḥ  
bāhūnāgayutaṃ kṛtvā chādayāmāsa śaṃkaram  cakrāyutena sahasā śaṃkhacūḍaḥ pratāpavān  
tato durgāpatiḥ kruddho rudro durgārtināśanaḥ  tāni cakrāṇi ciccheda svaśarairuttamai drutam  
tato vegena sahasā gadāmādāya dānavaḥ  abhyadhāvata vai haṃtuṃ bahusenāvṛto haram  
gadāṃ ciccheda tasyāśvāpatataḥ so'sinā haraḥ  śitadhāreṇa saṃkruddho duṣṭagarvāpahārakaḥ  
chinnāyāṃ svagadāyāṃ ca cukopātīva dānavaḥ  śūlaṃ jagrāha tejasvī pareṣāṃ dussahaṃ jvalat  
sudarśanaṃ śūlahastamāyāṃte dānaveśvaram  svatriśūlena vivyādha hṛdi taṃ vegato haraḥ  
triśūlabhinnahṛdayānniṣkrāṃtaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ  tiṣṭhatiṣṭheti covāca śaṃkhacūḍasya vīryavān  
niṣkrāmato hi tasyāśu prahasya svanavattataḥ  ciccheda ca śiro bhīma masināso'patadbhuvi  
tataḥ kālīṃ cakhādograṃ daṃṣṭrākṣuṇṇaśirodharān  asurāṃstān bahūn krodhāt prasārya svamukhaṃ tadā  
kṣetrapālaścakhādānyānbahūndaityānkrudhākulaḥ  kecinneśurbhairavāstracchinnā bhinnāstathāpare  
vīrabhadro'parāndhīmānbahūn krodhādanāśayat  nandīśvaro jaghānānyānbahūnamaramardakān  
evaṃ bahugaṇā vīrāstadā saṃnahya kopataḥ  vyanāśayanbahūndaityānasurān deva mardakān  
itthaṃ bahutaraṃ tatra tasya sainyaṃ nanāśa tat  vidrutāścāpare vīrā bahavo bhayakātarāḥ  iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe śaṃkhacūḍasainyavadhavarṇanaṃ nāma navatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  svabalaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā mukhyaṃ bahutaraṃ tataḥ  tathā vīrān prāṇasamān cukopātīva dānavaḥ  
uvāca vacanaṃ śaṃbhuṃ tiṣṭhāmyājau sthiro bhava  kimetairnihatairmedya saṃmukhe samaraṃ kuru  
ityuktvā dānavendrosau sannaddhassamare mune  agacchanniścayaṃ kṛtvā'bhimukhaṃ śaṃkarasya ca  
divyānyastrāṇi cikṣepa mahārudrāya dānavaḥ  cakāra śaravṛṣṭiñca toyavṛṣṭiṃ yathā ghanaḥ  
māyāścakāra vividhā adṛśyā bhayadarśitāḥ  apratarkyāḥ suragaṇairnikhilairapiḥ sattamaiḥ  
tā dṛṣṭvā śaṃkarastatra cikṣe pāstraṃ ca līlayā  māheśvaraṃ mahādivyaṃ sarvamāyāvināśanam  
tejasā tasya tanmāyā naṣṭāścāsan drutaṃ tadā  divyānyastrāṇi tānyeva nistejāṃsyabhavannapi  
atha yuddhe maheśānastadvadhāya mahābalaḥ  śūlaṃ jagrāha sahasā durnivāryaṃ sutejasām  
tadaiva tanniṣeddhuṃ ca vāgbabhūvāśarīriṇī  kṣipa śūlaṃ na cedānīṃ prārthanāṃ śṛṇu śaṃkara  
sarvathā tvaṃ samartho hi kṣaṇād brahmāṇḍanāśane  kimekadānavasyeśa śaṅkhacūḍasya sāṃpratam  
tathāpi vedamaryādā na nāśyā svāminā tvayā  tāṃ śṛṇuṣva mahādeva saphalaṃ kuru satyataḥ  
yāvadasya kare'tyugraṃ kavacaṃ paramaṃ hareḥ  yāvatsatītvamastyeva satyā asya hi yoṣitaḥ  
tāvadasya jarāmṛtyuśśaṃkhacūḍasya śaṃkara  nāstītyavitathaṃ nātha vidhehi brahmaṇo vacaḥ  
ityākarṇya nabhovāṇīṃ tathetyukte hare tadā  harecchayāgato viṣṇustaṃ dideśa satāṃ gatiḥ  
vṛddhabrāhmaṇaveṣeṇa viṣṇurmāyāvināṃ varaḥ  śaṅkhacūḍopakaṃṭhaṃ ca gatvovāca sa taṃ tadā  
vṛddhabrāhmaṇa uvāca  dehi bhikṣāṃ dānavendra mahyaṃ prāptāya sāṃpratam  
nedānīṃ kathayiṣyāmi prakaṭaṃ dīnavatsalam  paścāttvāṃ kathayiṣyāmi punassatyaṃ kariṣyasi  
omityuvāca rājendraḥ prasannavadanekṣaṇaḥ  kavacārthī janaścāhamityuvāceti sacchalāt  
tacchrutvā dānavendrosau brahmaṇyaḥ satyavāgvibhuḥ  taddadau kavacaṃ divyaṃ viprāya prāṇasaṃmatam  
māyāyetthaṃ tu kavacaṃ tasmājjagrāha vai hariḥ  śaṅkhacūḍasya rūpeṇa jagāma tulasīṃ prati  
gatvā tatra haristasyā yonau māyāviśāradaḥ  vīryādhānaṃ cakārāśu devakāryārthamīśvaraḥ  
etasminnaṃtare śaṃbhumīrayan svavacaḥ prabhuḥ  śaṃkhacūḍavadhārthāya śūlaṃ jagrāha prajvalat  
tacchūlaṃ vijayaṃ nāma śaṅkarasya paramātmanaḥ  sañcakāśe diśassarvā rodasī saṃprakāśayan  
koṭimadhyāhnamārtaṃḍapralayāgniśikhopamam  durnivāryaṃ ca durddharṣamavyarthaṃ vairighātakam  
tejasāṃ cakramatyugraṃ sarvaśastrāstrasāyakam  surāsurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ dussahaṃ ca bhayaṃkaram  
saṃhartuṃ sarvabrahmāḍamavalaṃbya ca līlayā  saṃsthitaṃ paramaṃ tatra ekatrībhūya vijvalat  
dhanussahasraṃ dīrgheṇa prasthena śatahastakam  jīvabrahmāsvarūpaṃ ca nityarūpamanirmitam  
vibhramad vyomni tacchūlaṃ śaṃkha cūḍopari kṣaṇāt  cakāra bhasma tacchīghraṃ nipatya śivaśāsanāt  
atha śūlaṃ maheśasya drutamāvṛtya śaṃkarama  yayau vihāyasā vipramanoyāyi svakāryakṛt  
nedurduṃdubhayassvarge jagurgaṃdharvakinnarāḥ  tuṣṭuvurmunayo devā nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ  
babhūva puṣpavṛṣṭiśca śivasyopari saṃtatam  praśaśaṃsa harirbrahmā śakrādyā munayastathā  
śaṃkhacūḍo dānavendraḥ śivasya kṛpayā tadā  śāpa mukto babhūvātha pūrvarūpamavāpa ha  
asthibhiśśaṃkhacūḍasya śaṃkhajātirbabhūva ha  praśastaṃ śaṃkhatoyaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śaṃkaraṃ vinā  
viśeṣeṇa harerlakṣmyāḥ śaṃkhatoyaṃ mahāpriyam  saṃbaṃdhināṃ ca tasyāpi na harasya mahāmune  
tamitthaṃ śaṃkaro hatvā śivalokaṃ jagāma saḥ  suprahṛṣṭo vṛṣārūḍhaḥ somaskandagaṇairvṛtaḥ  
harirjagāma vaikuṃṭhaṃ kṛṣṇassvavastho babhūva ha  surāssvaviṣayaṃ prāpuḥ paramānandasaṃyutāḥ  
jagatsvāsthyamatīvāpa sarvanirvighnamāpakam  nirmalaṃ cābhavadvyoma kṣitissarvā sumaṃgalā  
iti proktaṃ maheśasya caritaṃ pramudāvaham  sarvaduḥkhaharaṃ śrīdaṃ sarvakāmaprapūrakam  
dhanyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ sarvavighnanivāraṇam  bhuktidaṃ muktidaṃ caiva sarvakāmaphalapradam  
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  śrāvayedvā paṭhedvāpi pāṭhayedvā sudhīrnaraḥ  
dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutaṃ saukhyaṃ labhetātra na saṃśayaḥ  sarvānkāmānavāpnoti śivabhaktiṃ viśeṣataḥ  
idamākhyānamatulaṃ sarvopadravanāśanam  paramajñānajananaṃ śivabhaktivivarddhanam  
brāhmaṇo brahmavarcasvī kṣatriyo vijayī bhavet  dhanāḍhyo vaiśyajaśśūdraśśṛṇvan sattamatāmiyāt  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaḍe śaṃkhacūḍavadhopākhyānaṃ nāma catvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  nārāyaṇaśca bhagavān vīryādhānaṃ cakāra ha  tulasyāḥ kena yatnena yonau tadvaktumarhasi  
sanatkumāra uvāca  nārāyaṇo hi devānāṃ kāryakartā satāṃ gatiḥ  śaṃkhacūḍasya rūpeṇa reme tadramayā saha  
tadeva śṛṇu viṣṇośca caritaṃ pramudāvaham  śivaśāsanakartuśca mātuśca jagatāṃ hareḥ  
raṇamadhye vyomavacaḥ śrutvā devena śaṃbhunā  preritaśśaṃkhacūḍasya gṛhītvā kavacaṃ param  
viprarūpeṇa tvaritaṃ māyayā nijayā hariḥ  jagāma śaṃkhacūḍasya rūpeṇa tulasīgṛham  
dundubhiṃ vādayāmāsa tulasī dvārasannidhau  jayaśabdaṃ ca tatraiva bodhayāmāsa sundarīm  
tacchrutvā caiva sā sādhvī paramānandasaṃyutā  rājamārgaṃ gavākṣeṇa dadarśa paramādarāt  
brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā kārayāmāsa maṃgalam  drutaṃ cakāra śṛṃgāraṃ jñātvā''yātaṃ nijaṃ patim  
avaruhya rathādviṣṇustaddevyābhavanaṃ yayau  śaṃkhacūḍasvarūpaḥ sa māyāvī devakāryakṛt  
dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca puraḥ prāptaṃ svakāṃtaṃ sā mudānvitā  tatpādau kṣālayāmāsa nanāma ca ruroda ca  
ratnasiṃhāsane ramye vāsayāmāsa maṃgalam  tāmbūlaṃ ca dadau tasmai karpūrādisuvāsitam  
adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvanaṃ saṃbabhūva ha  raṇe gataṃ ca prāṇeśaṃ paśyaṃtyāśca punargṛhe  
ityuktvā sakaṭākṣaṃ sā nirīkṣya sasmitaṃ mudā  papraccha raṇavṛttāṃtaṃ kāṃtaṃ madhurayā girā  
tulasyuvāca  asaṃkhyaviśvasaṃhartā sa devapravaraḥ prabhuḥ  yasyājñāvarttino devā viṣṇubrahmādayassadā  
tridevajanakassotra triguṇātmā ca nirguṇaḥ  bhaktecchayā ca saguṇo haribrahmapravartakaḥ  
kuberasya prārthanayā guṇarūpadharo haraḥ  kailāsavāsī gaṇapaḥ parabrahma satāṃ gatiḥ  
yasyaikapalamātreṇa koṭibrahmāṃḍasaṃkṣayaḥ  viṣṇubrahmādayo'tītā bahavaḥ kṣaṇamātrataḥ  
kartuṃ sārddhaṃ ca tenaiva samaraṃ tvaṃ gataḥ prabho  kathaṃ babhūva saṃgrāmastena devasahāyinā  
kuśalī tvamihāyātastaṃ jitvā parameśvaram  kathaṃ babhūva vijayastava brūhi tadeva me  
śrutvetthaṃ tulasīvākyaṃ sa vihasya ramāpatiḥ  śaṃkhacūḍarūpadharastāmuvācāmṛtaṃ vacaḥ  
bhagavānuvāca  yadāhaṃ raṇabhūmau ca jagāma samarapriyaḥ  kolāhalo mahān jātaḥ pravṛtto'bhūnmahāraṇaḥ  
devadānavayoryuddhaṃ saṃbabhūva jayaiṣiṇoḥ  daityāḥ parājitāstatra nirjarairbalagarvitaiḥ  
tadāhaṃ samaraṃ tatrākārṣaṃ devairbalotkaṭaiḥ  parājitāśca te devāśśaṃkaraṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ  
rudro'pi tatsahāyārthamājagāma raṇaṃ prati  tenāhaṃ vai ciraṃ kālamayautsaṃbaladarpita  
āvayossamaraḥ kānte pūrṇamabdaṃ babhūva ha  nāśo babhūva sarveṣāmasurāṇāṃ ca kāmini  
prītiṃ ca kārayāmāsa brahmā ca svayamāvayoḥ  devānāmadhikārāśca pradattā brahmaśāsanāt  
mayāgataṃ svabhavanaṃ śivalokaṃ śivo gataḥ  sarvasvāsthyamatīvāpa dūrībhūto hyupadravaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā jagatāṃ nāthaḥ śayanaṃ ca cakāra ha  reme ramāpatistatra ramayā sa tayā mudā  
sā sādhvī sukhasaṃbhāvakarṣaṇasya vyatikramāt  sarvaṃ vitarkayāmāsa kastvamevetyuvāca sā  
tulasyuvāca  ko vā tvaṃ vada māmāśu bhuktāhaṃ māyayā tvayā  dūrīkṛtaṃ yatsatītvamatha tvāṃ vai śapāmyaham  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tulasīvacanaṃ śrutvā hariśśāpabhayena ca  dadhāra līlayā brahmansvamūrtiṃ sumanoharām  
taddṛṣṭvā tulasīrūpaṃ jñātvā viṣṇuṃ tu cihnataḥ  pātivratyaparityāgāt kruddhā sā tamuvāca ha  
tulasyuvāca  he viṣṇo te dayā nāsti pāṣāṇasadṛśaṃ manaḥ  patidharmasya bhaṃgena mama svāmī hataḥ khalu  
pāṣāṇasadṛśastvaṃ ca dayāhīno yataḥ khalaḥ  tasmātpāṣāṇarūpastvaṃ macchāpena bhavādhunā  
ye vadaṃti dayāsindhuṃ tvāṃ bhrāṃtāste na saṃśayaḥ  bhakto vināparādhena parārthe ca kathaṃ hataḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā tulasī sā vai śaṃkhacūḍapriyā satī  bhṛśaṃ ruroda śokārtā vilalāpa bhṛśaṃ muhuḥ  
tatastāṃ rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa viṣṇuḥ parameśvaraḥ  sasmāra śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ yena saṃmohitaṃ jagat  
tataḥ prādurbabhūvātha śaṃkaro bhaktavatsalaḥ  hariṇā praṇataścāsītsaṃnuto vinayena saḥ  
śokākulaṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā vilapaṃtīṃ ca tatpriyām  nayena bodhayāmāsa taṃ tāṃ kṛpaṇavatsalām  
śaṃkara uvāca  mā rodīstulasi tvaṃ hi bhuṃkte karmaphalaṃ janaḥ  sukhaduḥkhado na kopyasti saṃsāre karmasāgare  
prastutaṃ śṛṇu nirduḥkhaṃ śṛṇoti sumanā hariḥ  dvayossukhakaraṃ yattadbravīmi sukhahetave  
tapastvayā kṛtaṃ bhadre tasyaiva tapasaḥ phalam  tadanyathā kathaṃ syādvai jātaṃ tvayi tathā ca tat  
idaṃ śarīraṃ tyaktvā ca divyadehaṃ vidhāya ca  ramasva hariṇā nityaṃ ramayā sadṛśī bhava  
taveyaṃ tanurutsṛṣṭā nadīrūpā bhavediha  bhārate puṇyarūpā sā gaṇḍakīti ca viśrutā  
kiyatkālaṃ mahādevi devapūjanasādhane  pradhānarūpā tulasī bhaviṣyati vareṇa me  
svargaṃ martye ca pātāle tiṣṭha tvaṃ harisannidhau  bhava tvaṃ tulasīvṛkṣo varā puṣpeṣu sundarī  
vṛkṣādhiṣṭhātṛdevī tvaṃ vaikuṃṭhe divyarūpiṇī  sārddhaṃ rahasi hariṇā nityaṃ krīḍāṃ kariṣyasi  
nadyadhiṣṭhātṛdevī yā bhārate bahu puṇyadā  lavaṇodasya patnī sā haryaṃśasya bhaviṣyasi  
harirve śailarūpī ca gaṃḍakī tīrasaṃnidhau  saṃkariṣyatyadhiṣṭhānaṃ bhārate tava śāpataḥ  
tatra koṭyaśca kīṭāśca tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrā bhayaṃkarāḥ  tacchittvā kuhare cakraṃ kariṣyaṃti tadīyakam  
śālagrāmaśilā sā hi tadbhedādatipuṇyadā  lakṣmīnārāyaṇākhyādiścakrabhedādbhaviṣyati  
śālagrāmaśilā viṣṇo tulasyāstava saṃgamaḥ  sadā sādṛśyarūpā yā bahupuṇyavivarddhinī  
tulasīpatravicchedaṃ śālagrāme karoti yaḥ  tasya janmāntare bhadre strīvicchedo bhaviṣyati  
tulasīpatravicchedaṃ śaṃkhaṃ hitvā karoti yaḥ  bhāryāhīno bhavetsopi rogī syātsaptajanmasu  
śālagrāmaśca tulasī śaṃkhaṃ caikatra eva hi  yo rakṣati mahājñānī sa bhavecchrīharipriyaḥ  
tvaṃ priyaḥ śaṃkhacūḍasya caikamanvantarāvadhi  śaṃkhena sārddhaṃ tvadbhedaḥ kevalaṃ duḥkhadastava  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā śaṃkarastatra māhātmyamūcivāṃstadā  śālagrāmaśilāyāśca tulasyā bahupuṇyadam  
tataścāṃtarhito bhūtvā modayitvā hariṃ ca tām  jagām svālayaṃ śaṃbhuḥ śarmado hi sadā satām  
iti śrutvā vacaśśaṃbhoḥ prasannā tu tulasyabhūt  taddehaṃ ca parityajya divyarūpā babhūva ha  
prajagāma tayā sārddhaṃ vaikuṃṭhaṃ kamalāpatiḥ  sadyastaddehajātā ca babhūva gaṃḍakī nadī  
śailobhūdacyutasso'pi tattīre puṇyado nṛṇām  kurvaṃti tatra kīṭāśca chidraṃ bahuvidhaṃ mune  
jale pataṃti yāstatra śilāstāstvatipuṇyadāḥ  sthalasthā piṃgalā jñeyāścopatāpāya caiva hi  
ityevaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tava praśnānusārataḥ  caritaṃ puṇyadaṃ śaṃbhoḥ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām  
ākhyānamidamākhyātaṃ viṣṇumāhātmyamiśritam  bhuktimuktipradaṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe śaṃkhacūḍava dhopākhyāne tulasīśāpavarṇanaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
nārada uvāca  śaṃkhacūḍavadhaṃ śrutvā caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  ayaṃ tṛpto'smi no tvatto'mṛtaṃ pītvā yathā janaḥ  
brahmanyaccaritaṃ tasya maheśasya mahātmanaḥ  māyāmāśritya sallīlāṃ kurvato bhaktamodadām  
brahmovāca  jalaṃdharavadhaṃ śrutvā vyāsassatyavatīsutaḥ  aprākṣīdimamevārthaṃ brahmaputraṃ munīśvaram  
sanatkumāraḥ provāca vyāsaṃ satyavatīsutam  supraśaṃsya maheśasya caritaṃ maṃgalāyanam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa maheśasya caritaṃ maṃgalāyanam  yathāndhako gāṇapatyaṃ prāpa śaṃbhoḥ parātmanaḥ  
kṛtvā paramasaṃgrāmaṃ tena pūrvaṃ munīśvara  prasādya taṃ maheśānaṃ sattvabhāvātpunaḥ punaḥ  
māhātmyamadbhutaṃ śaṃbhośśaraṇāgatarakṣiṇaḥ  subhaktavatsalasyaiva nānālīlāvihāriṇaḥ  
māhātmyametadvṛṣabhadhvajasya śrutvā munirgaṃdhavatīsuto hi  vaco mahārthaṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā hyuvāca taṃ brahmasutaṃ munīṃdram  
vyāsa uvāca  ko hyaṃdhako vai bhagavanmunīśa kasyānvaye vīryavataḥ pṛthivyām  jāto mahātmā balavān pradhānaḥ kimātmakaḥ kasya sutoṃ'dhakaśca  
etatsamastaṃ sarahasyamadya bravīhi me brahmasutaprasādāt  skaṃdānmayā vai viditaṃ hi samyak maheśaputrādamitāvabodhāt  
gāṇapatyaṃ kathaṃ prāpa śaṃbhoḥ paramatejasaḥ  soṃdhako dhanya evāti yo vabhūva gaṇeśvaraḥ  
 brahmovāca  vyāsasya caitadvacanaṃ niśamya provāca sa brahmasutastadānīm  maheśvarotīḥ paramāptalakṣmīssaṃśrotukāmaṃ janakaṃ śukasya  
sanatkumāra uvāca  purā''gato bhaktakṛpākaro'sau kailāsataśśailasutā gaṇāḍhyaḥ  vihartukāmaḥ kila kāśikā vai svaśailato nirjaracakravatī  
sa rājadhānīṃ ca vidhāya tasyāṃ cakraṃ parotīḥ sukhadā janānām  tadrakṣakaṃ bhairavanāmavīraṃ kṛtvā samaṃ śailajayāhi bahvīḥ  
sa ekadā maṃdaranāmadheyaṃ gato nage tadvarasuprabhāvāt  tatrāpi mānāgaṇavīramukhyaiśśivāsameto vijahāra bhūri  
pūrve diśo mandara śailasaṃsthā kaparddinaścaṃḍaparākamasya  cakre tato netranimīlanaṃ tu sā pārvatī narmayutaṃ salīlam  
pravālahemābjadhṛtaprabhābhyāṃ karāmbujābhyāṃ nimimīla netre  harasya netreṣu nimīliteṣu kṣaṇena jātaḥ sumahāṃdhakāraḥ  
tatsparśayogācca maheśvarasya karau ca tasyāḥ skhalitaṃ madāṃbhaḥ  śaṃbhorlalāṭe kṣaṇavahnitapto vinirgato bhūrijalasya binduḥ  
garbho babhūvātha karālavaktro bhayaṃkaraḥ krodhaparaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ  andho virūpī jaṭilaśca kṛṣṇo naretaro vaikṛtikassuromā  
gāyanhasanprarudannṛtyamāno vilelihāno gharaghoraghoṣaḥ  jātena tenādbhutadarśanena gaurīṃ bhavo'sau smitapūrvamāha  
śrīmaheśa uvāca  nimīlya netrāṇi kṛtaṃ ca karma bibheṣi sā'smāddayite kathaṃ tvam  gaurī harāttadvacanaṃ niśamya vihasyamānā pramumoca netre  
jāte prakāśe sati ghorarūpo jātoṃdhakārādapi netrahīnaḥ  tādṛgvidhaṃ taṃ ca nirīkṣya bhūtaṃ papraccha gaurī puruṣaṃ maheśam  
gauryyuvāca  koyaṃ virūpo bhagavanhi jāto nāvagrato ghorabhayaṃkaraśca  vadasva satyaṃ mama kiṃ nimittaṃ sṛṣṭo'tha vā kena ca kasya putraḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śrutvā harastadvacanaṃ priyāyā līlākarassṛṣṭikṛtoṃ'dharūpām  līlākarāyāstrijagajjananyā vihasya kiṃcidbhagavānuvāca  
maheśa uvāca  śṛṇvaṃbike hyadbhutavṛttakāre utpanna eṣo'dbhutacaṇḍavīryaḥ  nimīlite cakṣuṣi me bhavatyā sa svedajo meṃdhakanāmadheyaḥ  
tvaṃ cāsya kartāsyayathānurūpaṃ tvayā sasakhyā dayayā gaṇebhyaḥ  sa rakṣitavyastva yi taṃ hi vaikaṃ vicārya buddhyā karaṇīyamārye  
sanatkumāra uvāca  gaurī tato bhṛtyavaco niśamya kāruṇyabhāvātsahitā sakhībhiḥ  nānāprakārairbahubhirhyupāyaiścakāra rakṣāṃ svasutasya yadvat  
kāle'tha tasmiñśiśire prayāto hiraṇyanetrastvatha putrakāmaḥ  svajyeṣṭhabaṃdhostanayapratānaṃ saṃvīkṣya cāsītpriyayā niyuktaḥ  
araṇyamāśritya tapaścakārāsurastadā kaśyapajassutārtham  kāṣṭhopamo'sau jitaroṣadoṣassaṃdarśanārthaṃ tu maheśvarasya  
tuṣṭaḥ pinākī tapasāsya samyagvarapradānāya yayau dvijendra  tatsthānamāsādya vṛṣadhvajo'sau jagāda daityapravaraṃ maheśaḥ  
maheśa uvāca  he daityanātha kuru nendriyasaṃghapātaṃ kimarthametadvratamāśritaṃ te  prabrūhi kāmaṃ varado bhavo'haṃ yadicchasi tvaṃ sakalaṃ dadāmi  
sanatkumāra uvāca  sarasyamākarṇya maheśavākyaṃ hyatiprasannaḥ kanakākṣadaityaḥ  kṛtāṃjalirnamraśirā uvāca stutyā ca natvā vividhaṃ girīśam  
 hiraṇyākṣa uvāca  putrastu me candralalāṭa nāsti suvīryavāndaityakulānurūpī  tadarthametadvratamāsthito'haṃ taṃ dehi deveśa suvīryavaṃtam  
yasmācca madbhrāturanaṃtavīryāḥ prahlādapūrvā api paṃcaputrāḥ  mameha nāstīti gatānvayo'haṃ ko māmakaṃ rājyamidaṃ bubhūṣet  
rājyaṃ parasya svabalena hṛtvā bhuṃkte'thavā svaṃ pitureva dṛṣṭam  ca procyate putra iha tvamutra putrī sa tenāpibhavetpitāsau  
ūrddhvaṃ gatiḥ putravatāṃ niruktā manīṣibhirdharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaiḥ  sarvāṇi bhūtāni tadarthamevamataḥ pravarteta paśūn svatejasaḥ  
niranvayasyātha na saṃti lokāstadarthamicchaṃti janāḥ surebhyaḥ  sadā samārādhya surātripaṃkajaṃ yācaṃta itthaṃ sutamekameva  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etadbhavastadvacanaṃ niśamya kṛpākaro daityanṛpasya tuṣṭaḥ  tamāha daityātapa nāsti putrastvadvīryajaḥ kiṃtu dadāmi putram  
mamātmajaṃ tvaṃdhakanāmadheyaṃ tvattulyavīryaṃ tvaparājitaṃ ca  vṛṇīṣva putraṃ sakalaṃ vihāya duḥkhaṃ pratīcchasva sutaṃ tvameva  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityevamuktvā pradadau sa tasmai hiraṇyanetrāya sutaṃ prasannaḥ  harastu gauryyā sahito mahātmā bhūtādināthastripurārirugraḥ  
nato harātprāpya sutaṃ sa daityaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathākrameṇa  stotrairanekairabhipūjya rudraṃ tuṣṭassvarājyaṃ gatavānmahātmā  
tatastu putraṃ giriśādavāpya rasātalaṃ caṃḍaparākramastu  imāṃ dharitrīmanayatsvadeśaṃ daityo vijitvā tridaśānaśeṣān  
tatastu devermunibhiśca siddhaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ yajñamayaṃ karālam  vārāhamāśritya vapuḥ pradhānamārādhito viṣṇuranaṃtavīryaḥ  
ghoṇāprahārairvividhairdharitrīṃ vidārya pātālatalaṃ praviśya  tuṃḍena daityāñśataśo vicūrṇya daṃṣṭrābhiragryābhi akhaṃḍitābhiḥ  
pādaprahārairaśaniprakāśairunmathya sainyāni niśācarāṇām  mārtaṃḍakoṭipratimena paścātsudarśanenādbhutacaṃḍatejāḥ  
hiraṇyanetrasya śiro jvalaṃtaṃ ciccheda daityāṃśca dadāha duṣṭān  tataḥ prahṛṣṭo ditijendrarājaṃ svamaṃdhakaṃ tatra sa cābhyaṣiṃcat  
svasthānamāgatya tato dharitrīṃ dṛṣṭvāṃkureṇoddharataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ  bhūmiṃ ca pātālatalānmahātmā pupoṣa bhāgaṃ tvatha pūrvakaṃ tu  
devaissamastairmunibhiḥprahṛṣṭai rabhiṣutaḥ padmabhuvā ca tena  yayau svalokaṃ harirugrakāyo varāharūpastu sukāryakartā  
hiraṇyanetre'tha hate'sureśe varāharūpeṇa sureṇa devāḥ  devāssamastā munayaśca sarve pare ca jīvāssukhino babhūvuḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe hiraṇyākṣavadho nāma dvicatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña hate tasminsuradruhi  kimakārṣīttatastasya jyeṣṭhabhrātā mahāsuraḥ  
kutūhalamiti śrotuṃ mamā'tīha munīśvara  tacchrāvaya kṛpāṃ kṛtvā brahmaputra namostu te  
brahmovāca  ityākarṇya vacastasya vyāsasya sa munīśvaraḥ  sanatkumāraḥ provāca smṛtvā śivapadāmbujam  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  bhrātaryevaṃ vinihate hariṇā kroḍamūrtinā  hiraṇyakaśipurvyāsa paryatapyadruṣā śucā  
tataḥ prajānāṃ kadanaṃ vidhātuṃ kadanapriyān  nirdideśā'surānvīrānhari vairapriyo hi saḥ  
atha te bhartṛsaṃdeśamādāya śirasā'surāḥ  devaprajānāṃ kadanaṃ vidadhuḥ kadanapriyāḥ  
tato viprakṛte loke'suraisterduṣṭamānasaiḥ  divaṃ devāḥ parityajya bhuvi ceruralakṣitāḥ  
hiraṇyakaśipurbhrātussaṃparetasya duḥkhitaḥ  kṛtvā karodakādīni tatkalatrādyasāṃtvayat  
tatassa daityarājendro hyajeyamajarāmaram  ātmānamapra tidvaṃdvamekarājyaṃ vyadhitsata  
sa tepe maṃdaradroṇyāṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam  ūrddhvabāhurnabhodṛṣṭiḥ ṣādāṃguṣṭhāśritāvaniḥ  
tasmiṃstapastapyamāne devāssarve balānvitāḥ  daityānsarvānvinirjitya svāni sthānāni bhejire  
tasya mūrddhnassamudbhūtaḥ sadhūmognistapomayaḥ  tiryagūrddhvamadholokānatapadviṣvagīritaḥ  
tena taptā divaṃ tyaktvā brahmalokaṃ yayussurāḥ  dhātre vijñāpayāmāsustattapovikṛtānanāḥ  
atha vijñāpito devairvyāsa tairātmabhūrvidhiḥ  parīto bhṛgudakṣādyairyayau daityeśvarāśramam  
pratāpya lokānakhilāṃstato'sau samāgataṃ padmabhavaṃ dadarśa  varaṃ hi dātuṃ tamuvāca dhātā varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti pitāmahopi  niśamya vācaṃ madhurāṃ vidhāturvaco'bravīdeva mamūḍhabuddhiḥ  
hiraṇyakaśipuruvāca  mṛtyorbhayaṃ me bhagavanprajeśa pitāmahābhūnna kadāpi deva  śāstrāstrapāśāśaniśuṣkavṛkṣagirīndratoyāgniripuprahāraiḥ  
devaiśca daityairmunibhiśca siddhaistvatsṛṣṭajīvairbahuvākyataḥ kim  svarge dharaṇyāṃ divase niśāyāṃ naivorddhvato nāpyadhataḥ prajeśa  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tasyaitadīdṛgvacanaṃ niśamya daityendra tuṣṭo'smi labhasva sarvam  praṇamya viṣṇuṃ manasā tamāha dayānvito'sāviti padmayoniḥ  
alaṃ tapaste paripūrṇa kāmassamāḥ sahasrāṇi ca ṣaṇṇavatya  uttiṣṭha rājyaṃ kuru dānavānāṃ śrutvā giraṃ tatsumukho babhūva  
rājyābhiṣiktaḥ prapitāmahena trailokyanāśāya matiṃ cakāra  utsādya dharmān sakalānpramatto jitvāhave sopi surānsamastān  
tato bhayādiṃdramukhāśca devāḥ pitāmahājñāṃ samavāpya sarve  upadrutā daityavareṇa jātāḥ kṣīrodadhiṃ yatra haristu śete  
ārādhayāmāsuratīva viṣṇuṃ stutvā vacobhitsukhadaṃ hi matvā  nivedayāmāsuratho prasannaṃ duḥkhaṃ svakīyaṃ sakalaṃ hi tete  
śrutvā tadīyaṃ sakalaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ tuṣṭo rameśaḥ pradadau varāṃstu  utthāya tasmācchayanādupendro nijānurūpairvividhairvacobhiḥ  
āśvāsya devānakhilānmunīnvā uvāca vaiśvānaratulyatejāḥ  daityaṃ haniṣye prasabhaṃ sureśāḥ prayāta dhāmāni nijāni tuṣṭāḥ  
śrutvā rameśasya vacassureśāḥ śakrādikāste nikhilāḥ sutuṣṭāḥ  yayuḥ svadhāmāni hiraṇyanetrānujaṃ ca matvā nihataṃ munīśa  
āśritya rūpaṃ jaṭilaṃ karālaṃ daṃṣṭrāyudhaṃ tīkṣṇanakhaṃ sunāsam  saiṃhaṃ ca nāraṃ suvidāritāsyaṃ mārtaṃḍakoṭipratimaṃ sughoram  
yugāṃtakālāgnisamaprabhāvaṃ jaganmayaṃ kiṃ bahubhirvacobhiḥ  astaṃ ravauso'pi hi gacchatīśo gato'surāṇāṃ nagarīṃ mahātmā  
kṛtvā ca yuddhaṃ prabalaissa daityairhatvātha tāndaityagaṇāngṛhītvā  babhrāma tatrādrutavikramaśca babhaṃja tāṃstānasurānnṛsiṃhaḥ  
dṛṣṭassa daityairatulaprabhāvaste rebhire te hi tathaiva sarve  siṃhaṃ ca taṃ sarvamayaṃ nirīkṣya prahlādanāmā ditijendraputraḥ  uvāca rājānamayaṃ mṛgendro jaganmayaḥ kiṃ samupāgataśca  
prahlāda uvāca  eṣa praviṣṭo bhagavānanaṃto nṛsiṃhamātro nagaraṃ tvadaṃtaḥ  nivṛtya yuddhāccha raṇaṃ prayāhi paśyāmi siṃhasya karālamūrttim  
yasmānna yoddhā bhuvanatraye'pi kuruṣva rājyaṃ vinamanmṛgendram  śrutvā svaputrasya vaco durātmā tamāha bhīto'si kimatra putra  
uktveti putraṃ ditijādhinātho daityarṣabhānvīravarānsa rājā  gṛhṇaṃtu vai siṃhamamuṃ bhavaṃto vīrā virūpabhrukuṭīkṣaṇaṃ tu  
tasyājñayā daityavarāstataste grahītukāmā viviśurmṛgendram  kṣaṇena dagdhāśśalabhā ivāgniṃ rūpābhilāṣātpravivikṣavo vai  
daityeṣu dagdheṣvapi daityarājaścakāra yuddhaṃ sa mṛgādhipena  śastraissamagrairakhilaistathāstraiśśa ktyarṣṭipāśāṃkuśapāvakādyaiḥ  
saṃyudhyatoreva tayorjagāma brāhmaṃ dinaṃ vyāsa hi śastrapāṇyoḥ  pravīrayorvīraraveṇa garjatoḥ parasparaṃ krodhasuyuktacetasoḥ  
tataḥ sa daityassahasā bahūṃśca kṛtvā bhujāñchastrayutānnirīkṣya  nṛsiṃharūpaṃ prayayau mṛgendra saṃyudhyamānaṃ sahasā samaṃtāt  
tatassuyuddhaṃ tvatidussahaṃ tu śastraissamastaiśca tathākhilāstraiḥ  kṛtvā mahādaityavaro nṛsiṃhaṃ kṣayaṃ gataiśśūla dharo'bhyupāyāt  
tato gṛhītassa mṛgādhipena bhujairanekairgirisāravadbhi  nidhāya jānau sa bhujāṃtareṣu nakhāṃkurairdānavamarmabhidbhiḥ  
nakhāstrahṛtpadmamasṛgvimiśramutpādya jīvādvigataḥ kṣaṇena  tyaktastadānīṃ sa tu kāṣṭhabhūtaḥ punaḥ punaścūrṇitasarvagātraḥ  
tasminhate devaripau prasannaḥ prahlādamāmaṃtrya kṛtapraṇāmam  rājye'bhiṣicyādbhutavīryaviṣṇustataḥ prayāto gatimapratarkyām  
tato'tihṛṣṭāssakalāssureśāḥ praṇamya viṣṇuṃ diśi vipra tasyām  yayuḥ svadhāmāni pitāmahādyāḥ kṛtasvakāryaṃ bhagavaṃtamīḍyam  
pravarṇitaṃ tvaṃdhakajanma rudrāddhiraṇyanetrasya mṛtirvarāhāt  nṛsiṃhatastatsahajasya nāśaḥ prahlādarājyāptiriti prasaṃgāt  
śṛṇu tvidānīṃ dvijavarya mattoṃdhakaprabhāvaṃ bhavakṛtyalabdham  hareṇa yuddhaṃ khalu tasya paścādgaṇādhipatyaṃ giriśasya tasya  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe gaṇādhipatyaprāptyaṃdhakajanma hiraṇyanetrahiraṇyakaśipuvadhavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tato hiraṇyākṣasutaḥ kadācitsaṃśrāvito narmayutairmadāṃdhaiḥ  tairbhrātṛbhissaṃprayuto vihāre kimaṃdha rājyena tavādya kāryam  
hiraṇyanetrastu babhūva mūḍhaḥ kalipriyaṃ netravihīnameva  yo labdhavāṃstvāṃ vikṛtaṃ virūpaṃ ghoraistapobhirgiriśaṃ prasādya  
sa tvaṃ na bhāgī khalu rājyakasya kimanyajāto'pi labheta rājyam  vicāryatāṃ tadbhavataiva nūnaṃ vayaṃ tu tadbhāgina eva satyam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  teṣāṃ tu vākyāni niśamya tāni vicārya buddhyā svayameva dīnaḥ  tāñchāṃtayitvā vividhairvacobhirgatastvaraṇyaṃ niśi nirjanaṃ tu  
varṣāyutaṃ tatra tapaścacāra jajāpa jāpyaṃ vidhṛtaikapādaḥ  āhārahīno niyamorddhvabāhuḥ karttuṃ na śakyaṃ hi surā surairyat  
prajālya vahniṃ sma juhoti gātramāṃsaṃ saraktaṃ khalu varṣamātram  tīkṣṇena śastreṇa nikṛtya dehātsamaṃtrakaṃ pratyahameva hutvā  
snāyvasthiśeṣaṃ kuṇapaṃ tadāsau kṣayaṃ gataṃ śoṇitameva sarvam  yadāsya māṃsāni na saṃti dehaṃ prakṣeptukāmastu hutāśanāya  
tataḥ sa dṛṣṭastridaśālayairjanaiḥ suvismitairbhītiyutaissamastaiḥ  athāmaraiśśīghrataraṃ prasādito babhūva dhātā nutibhirnuto hi  
nivārayitvātha pitāmahastaṃ hyuvāca taṃ cādyavaraṃ vṛṇīṣva  yasyāptikāmastava sarvaloke sudurlabhaṃ dānava taṃ gṛhāṇa  
sa padmayonestu vaco niśamya provāca dīnaḥ praṇatastu daityaḥ  yairniṣṭhurairme prahṛtaṃ tu rājyaṃ prahrādamukhyā mama saṃtu bhṛtyāḥ  
aṃdhasya divyaṃ hi tathāstu cakṣurindrādayo me karadā bhavaṃtu  mṛtyustu mābhūnmama devadaityagaṃdharvayakṣoragamānuṣebhyaḥ  
nārāyaṇādvā ditijendraśatrossarvājjanātsarvamayācca śarvāt  śrutvā vacastasya sudāruṇaṃ tatsuśaṃkitaḥ padmabhavastamāha  
brahmovāca  daityendra sarvaṃ bhavitā tadetadvināśahetuṃ ca gṛhāṇa kiṃcit  yasmānna jāto na janiṣyate vā yo na praviṣṭo mukhamaṃtakasya  
atyantadīrghaṃ khalu jīvitaṃ tu bhavādṛśāssatpuruṣāstyajaṃtu  etadvacassānunayaṃ niśamya pitāmahātprāha punastasya daityaḥ  
aṃdhaka uvāca  kālatraye yāśca bhavaṃti nāryaḥ śreṣṭhāśca madhyāśca tathā kaniṣṭhāḥ  tāsāṃ ca madhye khalu ratnabhūtā mamāpi nityaṃ jananīva kācit  
kāyena vācā manasāpyagamyā nārī nṛlokasya ca durlabhāya  tāṃ kāmayānasya mamāstu nāśo daityendrabhāvādbhagavānsvayaṃbhūḥ  
vākyaṃ tadākarṇya sa padmayoniḥ suvismitaśśaṃkarapādapadmamam  sasmāra saṃprāpya nirdeśamāśu śaṃbhostu taṃ prāha tatoṃdhakaṃ vai  
brahmovāca  yatkāṃkṣase daityavarāstu te vai sarvaṃ bhavatyeva vacassakāmam  uttiṣṭha daityendra labhasva kāmaṃ sadaiva vīraistu kuruṣva yuddham  
śrutvā tadetadvacanaṃ munīśa vidhāturāśu praṇipatya bhaktyā  lokeśvaraṃ hāṭakanetraputraḥ snāyvasthiśeṣastu tamāha devam  
aṃdhaka uvāca  kathaṃ vibho vairibalaṃ praviśya hyanena dehena karomi yuddham  snāyvasthiśeṣaṃ kuru māṃsapuṣṭaṃ kareṇa puṇye na ca māṃ spṛśādya  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  śrutvā vacastasya sa padmayoniḥ kareṇa saṃspṛśya ca taccharīram  gatassurendraissahitaḥ svadhāma saṃpūjyamāno munisiddhasaṃghaiḥ  
saṃspṛṣṭamātrassa ca daityarājassaṃpūrṇadeho balavānbabhūva  saṃjātanetrassubhago babhūva hṛṣṭassvameva nagaraṃ viveśa  
utsṛjya rājyaṃ sakalaṃ ca tasmai prahlādamukhyāstvatha dānavendrāḥ  tamāgataṃ labdhavaraṃ ca matvā bhṛtyā babhūvurvaśa gāstu tasya  
tatondhakaḥ svargamagādvijetuṃ senābhiyuktassahabhṛtyavargaḥ  vijitya lekhānpradhane samastānkarapradaṃ vajradharaṃ cakāra  
nāgānsuparṇānvararākṣasāṃśca gaṃdharvayakṣānapi mānuṣāṃstu  girīndravṛkṣānsamareṣu sarvāṃścatuṣpadaḥ siṃhamukhānvijigye  
trailokyametaddhi carācaraṃ vai vaśaṃ cakārātmani saṃniyojya  sakūlāni sudarśanāni nārīsahasrāṇi bahūni gatvā  
rasātale caiva tathā dharāyāṃ triviṣṭape yāḥ pramadāḥ surūpāḥ  tābhiryuto'nyeṣu saparvateṣu rarāma ramyeṣu nadītaṭeṣu  
krīḍāyamānassa tu madhyavartī tāsāṃ praharṣādatha dānavendraḥ  tatpītaśiṣṭāni pibanpravṛttyai divyāni peyāni sumānuṣāṇi  
anyāni divyāni tu yadrasāni phalāni mūlāni sugaṃdhavaṃti  saṃprāpya yānāni suvāhanāni mayena sṛṣṭāni gṛhottamāni  
puṣpārghadhūpānnavilepanaiśca suśobhitānyadbhutadarśanaiśca  saṃkrīḍamānasya gatāni tasya varṣāyutānīha tathāṃdhakasya  
jānāti kiṃcinna śubhaṃ paratra yadātmanassaukhyakaraṃ bhaveddhi  sadāndhako daityavarassa mūḍho madāṃdhabuddhiḥ kṛtaduṣṭasaṃgaḥ  
tataḥ pramattastu sutānpradhānānkutarkavādairabhibhūya sarvān  cacāra daityaissahito mahātmā vināśayanvaidikasarvadharmān  
vedāndvijānvitta madābhibhūto na manyate smāpyamarāngurūṃśca  reme tathā daivagato hatāyuḥ svasyairahobhirgamayanvayaśca  
tataḥ kadācidgatavānsasainyo bahuprayātā pṛthivītale'smin  anekasaṃkhyā api varṣakoṭyaḥ praharṣito maṃdaraparvataṃ tu  
svarṇopamāṃ tatra nirīkṣya śobhāṃ babhrāma sainyaissaha mānamattaḥ  krīḍārthamāsādya ca taṃ girīndraṃ matiṃ sa vāsāya cakāra mohāt  
śubhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ tatra puraṃ sa kṛtvā mudāsthito daityapatiḥ prabhāvāt  niveśayāmāsa punaḥ krameṇa atyadbhutaṃ mandaraśailasānau  
duryodhano vaidhasahastisaṃjñau tanmaṃtriṇau dānavasattamasya  te vai kadācidgirisusthale hi nārīṃ surūpāṃ dadṛśustrayo'pi  
te śīghragā daityavarāstu harṣāddrutaṃ mahādaityapatiṃ sametya  ūcuryathādṛṣṭamatīva prītyā tathāndhakaṃ vīravaraṃ hi sarve  
maṃtriṇaḥ ūcuḥ  guhāṃtare dhyānanimīlitākṣo daityendra kaścinmuniratra dṛṣṭaḥ  rūdānvitaścandrakalārddhacūḍaḥ kaṭisthale baddhagajendrakṛttiḥ  
nāgendrabhogāvṛtasarvagātraḥ kapālamālābharaṇo jaṭālaḥ  sa śūlahastaśśaratūṇadhārī mahādhanuṣmānvivṛtākṣasūtraḥ  
khaḍgī triśūlī lakuṭī kapardī caturbhujo gauratarākṛtirhi  bhasmānulipto vilasatsutejāstapasvivaryo'dbhutasarvaveśaḥ  
tasyāvidūre puruṣaśca dṛṣṭassa vānaro ghoramukhaḥkarālaḥ  sarvāyudho rūkṣakaraśca rakṣansthito jaradgovṛṣabhaśca śuklaḥ  
tasyopaviṣṭasya tapasvinopi sucārurūpā taruṇī manojñā  nārī śubhā pārśvagatā hi tasya dṛṣṭā ca kācidbhuvi ratnabhūtā  
pravālamuktāmaṇi hemaratnavastrāvṛtā mālyaśubhopagūḍhā  sā yena dṛṣṭā sa ca dṛṣṭimānsyād dṛṣṭena cānyena kimatra kāryam  
mānyā maheśasya ca divyanārī bhāryyā muneḥ puṇyavataḥ priyā sā  yogyā hi draṣṭuṃ bhavataśca samyagānāyya daityendra suratnabhoktaḥ  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  śrutveti teṣāṃ vacanāni tāni kāmāturo ghūrṇitasarvagātraḥ  visarjayāmāsa munaissakāśaṃ duryodhanādīnsahasā sa daityaḥ  
āsādya te taṃ munimaprameyaṃ bṛhadvrataṃ maṃtrivarā hi tasya  surājanītipravaṇā munīśa praṇamya taṃ daityanideśamāhuḥ  
maṃtriṇa ūcuḥ  hiraṇyanetrasya suto mahātmā daityādhirājo'ndhakanāmadheyaḥ  trailokyanātho bhavakṛnnideśādihopaviṣṭo'dya vihāraśālī  
tanmaṃtriṇo vai vayamaṃgavīrāstavopakaṃṭhaṃ ca samāgatāḥ smaḥ  tatpreṣitāstvāṃ yaduvāca tadvai śṛṇuṣva saṃdattamanāstapasvin  
tvaṃ kasya putro'si kimarthamatra sukhopaviṣṭo munivarya dhīman  kasyeyamīdṛktaruṇī surūpā deyā śubhā daityapatermunīndra  
kvedaṃ śarīraṃ tava bhasmadigdhaṃ kapālamālābharaṇaṃ virūpam  tūṇīrasatkārmukabāṇakhaḍgabhuśuṃḍiśūlāśanitomarāṇi  
kva jāhnavī puṇyatamā jaṭāgre kvāyaṃ śaśī vā kuṇapāsthikhaṇḍam  viṣānalo dīrghamukhaḥ kva sarpaḥ kva saṃgamaḥ pīnapayodharāyāḥ  
jaradgavārohaṇamapraśastaṃ kṣamāvatastasya na darśanaṃ ca  saṃdhyāpraṇāmaḥ kvacideṣa dharmaḥ kva bhojanaṃ lokaviruddhametat  
prayaccha nārīṃ sama sāntvapūrvaṃ striyā tapaḥ kiṃ kuruṣe vimūḍha  ayuktametattvayi nānurūpaṃ yasmādahaṃ ratnapatistriloke  
vimuṃca śastrāṇi mayādya coktaḥ kuruṣva paścāttava eva śuddham  ullaṃghya macchāsanamapradhṛṣyaṃ vimokṣyase sarvamidaṃ śarīram  
matvāṃdhakaṃ duṣṭamatiṃ pradhāno maheśvaro laukikabhāvaśīlaḥ  provāca daityaṃ smitapūrvamevamākarṇya sarvaṃ tvatha dūtavākyam  
śiva uvāca  yadyasmi rudrastava kiṃ mayā syātkimarthamevaṃ vadasīti mithyā  śṛṇu prabhāvaṃ mama daityanātha nyāyyaṃ na vaktuṃ vacanaṃ tvayaivam  
nāhaṃ kvacitsvaṃ pitaraṃ smarāmi guhāṃtare ghoramananyacīrṇam  etadvrataṃ paśupātaṃ carāmi na mātaraṃ tvajñatamo virūpaḥ  
amūlametanmayi tu prasiddhaṃ sudustyajaṃ sarvamidaṃ mamāsti  bhāryā mameyaṃ taruṇī surūpā sarvaṃsahā sarvagatasya siddhiḥ  
etarhi yadyadrucitaṃ tavāsti gṛhāṇa tadvai khalu rākṣasa tvam  etāvaduktvā virarāma śaṃbhustapasviveṣaḥ puratastu teṣām  
sanatkumāra uvāca  gaṃbhīrametadvacanaṃ niśamya te dānavāstaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā  jagmustato daityavarasya sūnuṃ trailokyanāśāya kṛtapratijñam  
babhāṣire daityapatiṃ pramattaṃ praṇamya rājānamadīnasattvāḥ  te tatra sarve jayaśabdapūrvaṃ rudreṇa yattatsmitapūrvamuktam  
maṃtriṇa ucuḥ  niśācaraścaṃcalaśauryadhairyaḥ kva dānavaḥ kṛpaṇassattvahīnaḥ  krūraḥ kṛtaghnaśca sadaiva pāpī kva dānavaḥ sūryasutādbibheti  
rājatvamukto'khiladaityanāthastapasvinā tanmuninā vihasya  matvā svabuddhyā tṛṇavattrilokaṃ mahaujasā vīravareṇa nūnam  
kvāhaṃ ca śastrāṇi ca dāruṇāni mṛtyośca saṃtrāsakaraṃ kva yuddha  kva vīrako vānaravaktratulyo niśācaro jarasā jarjarāṃgaḥ  
kvāyaṃ svarūpaḥ kva ca maṃdabhāgyo balaṃ tvadīyaṃ kva ca vīrudho vā  śakto'pi cettvaṃ prayatasva yuddhaṃ kartuṃ tadā hyehi kuruṣva kiṃcit  
vajrāśanestulyamihāsti śastraṃ bhavādṛśāṃ nāśakaraṃ ca ghoram  kva te śarīraṃ mṛdupadmatulyaṃ vicārya caivaṃ kuru rocate yat  
maṃtriṇa ūcuḥ  ityevamādīni vacāṃsi bhadraṃ tapasvinoktāni ca dānaveśa  yuktaṃ na te tena sahātra yuddhaṃ tvāmāha rājansmayamāna eva  
vivastuśūnyairbahubhiḥ pralāpairasmābhiruktairyadi budhyase tvam  tapobhiyuktena tapasvinā vai smartāsi paścānmunivākyametat  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  tatassa teṣāṃ vacanaṃ niśamya jajvāla roṣeṇa sa maṃdabuddhiḥ  ājyāvasiktastviva kṛṣṇavartmā satyaṃ hitaṃ tatkuṭilaṃ sutīkṣṇam  
gṛhītakhaḍgo varadānamattaḥ pracaṃḍavātānukṛtiṃ ca kurvan  gaṃtuṃ ca tatra smarabāṇaviddhassamudyato'bhūdvipa rītadevaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe aṃdhakagāṇapatyalābhopākhyāne dūtasaṃvādo nāma catuścatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  gatastato mattagajendragāmī pītvā surāṃ ghūrṇitalocanaśca  mahānubhāvo bahusainyayuktaḥ pracaṃḍavīro varavīrayāyī  
dadarśa daityaḥ smarabāṇaviddho guhāṃ tato vīrakaruddhamārgām  snigdhaṃ yathā vīkṣya pataṃgasaṃjñaḥ daśāpradīpaṃ ca kṛmirhyupetya  
tathā pradarśyāśu punaḥ punaśca saṃpīḍyamānopi sa vīrakeṇa  babhūva kāmāgnisudagdhadehoṃ'dhako mahādaityapatiḥ sa mūḍhaḥ  
pāṣāṇavṛkṣāśanitoyavahnibhujaṃgaśastrāstravibhīṣikābhiḥ  saṃpīḍito'sau na punaḥ prapīḍyaḥ pṛṣṭaśca kastvaṃ samupāgatosi  
niśamya tadgāṃ svamataṃ sa tasmai cakāra yuddhaṃ sa tu vīrakeṇa  muhūrtamāścaryavadaprameyaṃ saṃkhye jito vīratareṇa daityaḥ  
tatastu saṃgrāmaśiro vihāya kṣutkṣāmakaṃṭhastṛṣito gato'bhūt  cūrṇīkṛte khaḍgavare ca khinne palāyamāno gatavismayaḥ saḥ  
cakrustadājiṃ saha vīrakeṇa prahlādamukhyā ditijapradhānāḥ  lajjāṃkuśākṛṣṭadhiyo babhūvussudāruṇāḥ śastraśatairanekaiḥ  
virocanastatra cakāra yuddhaṃ baliśca bāṇaśca sahasrabāhuḥ  bhajiḥ kujaṃbhastvatha śaṃbaraśca vṛtrādayaścāpyatha vīryavaṃtaḥ  
te yuddhyamānā vijitāḥ samaṃtāddvidhākṛtā vai gaṇavīrakeṇa  śeṣe hatānāṃ bahudānavānāmuktaṃ jayatyeva hi siddhasaṃghaiḥ  
bheruṃḍajānābhinayapravṛtte medovasāmāṃsasupūyamadhye  kravyādasaṃghātasamākule tu bhayaṃkare śoṇitakardame tu  
bhagnaistu daityairbhagavān pinākī vrataṃ mahāpāśupataṃ sughoram  priyeḥ mayā yatkṛtapūrvamāsīddākṣāyaṇīṃ prāha susāṃtvayitvā  
śiva uvāca  tasmādbalaṃ yanmama tatpraṇaṣṭaṃ martyairamartyasya yataḥ prapātaḥ  puṇyakṣayāhī graha eva jāto divāniśaṃ devi tava prasaṃgāt  
utpādya divyaṃ paramādbhutaṃ tu punarvaraṃ ghorataraṃ ca gatvā  tasmādvrataṃ ghorataraṃ carāmi sunirbhayaḥ sundari vai viśokā  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etāvaduktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā upādya ghoṣaṃ śanakaiścakāra  sa tatra gatvā vratamugradīpto gato vanaṃ puṇyatamaṃ sughoram  
cartuṃ hi śakyaṃ tu surāsurairyatra tādṛśaṃ varṣasahasramātram  sā pārvatī maṃdaraparvatasthā pratīkṣyamāṇāgamanaṃ bhavasya  
pativratā śīlaguṇopapannā ekākinī nityamatho vibhītā  guhāṃtare duḥkhaparā babhūva saṃrakṣitā sā sutavīrakeṇa  
tatassa daityo varadānamattastairyodhamukhyaissahito guhāṃ tām  vibhinnadhairyaḥ punarājagāma śilīmukhairmārasamudbhavaiśca  
atyadbhutaṃ tatra cakāra yuddhaṃ hitvā tadā bhojanapānanidrāḥ  rātriṃ divaṃ paṃcaśatāni paṃca kruddhassa sainyaissaha vīrakeṇa  
khaḍgaissakuṃtaissaha bhiṃdipālargadābhuśuṃḍībhiratho prakāṃḍaiḥ  śilīmukhairarddhaśaśībhirugrairvitastibhiḥ kūrmamukhairjvaladbhiḥ  
nārācamukhyai niśitaiśca śūlaiḥ paraśvadhaistomaramudgaraiśca  khaḍgairguḍaiḥ parvatapādapaiśca divyairathāstrairarapi daityasaṃghaiḥ  
na dīdhitirbhinnatanuḥ papāta dvāraṃ guhāyā pihitaṃ samastam  tairāyudhairdaityabhujaprayuktairguhāmukhe mūrchita eva paścāt  
ācchāditaṃ vīrakamastrajālairdaityaiśca sarvaistu muhūrtamātram  apāvṛtaṃ kartumaśakyamāsīnnirīkṣya devī ditijān sughorān  
bhayena sasmāra pitāmahaṃ tu devī sakhībhissahitā ca viṣṇum  sainyaṃ ca madvīravarasya sarvaṃ sasmārayāmāsa guhāṃtarasthā  
brahmā tayā saṃsmṛtamātra eva strīrūpadhārī bhagavāṃśca viṣṇuḥ  indraśca sarveḥ saha sainyakaiśca strīrūpamāsthāya samāgatāste  
bhūtvā striyaste viviśustadānīṃ munīndrasaṃghāśca mahānubhāvāḥ  siddhāśca nāgāstvatha guhyakāśca guhāṃtaraṃ parvatarājaputryāḥ  
yasmātsurājya sanasaṃsthitānāmaṃtaḥ pure saṃgamanaṃ viruddham  tatassahasrāṇi nitaṃbinīnāmanaṃtasaṃkhyānyapi darśayaṃtyaḥ  
rūpāṇi divyāni mahādbhutāni gaurye guhāyāṃ tu savīrakāryaiḥ  striyaḥ prahṛṣṭā girirājakanyā guhāṃtaraṃ parvatarājaputryā  
strībhissahasraiśca śatairanekairneduśca kalpāṃtarameghaghoṣāḥ  bheryyaśca saṃgrāmajayapradāstu dhmātāssuśaṃkhāḥ sunitambinībhiḥ  
mūrchāṃ vihāyādbhuta caṃḍavīryassa vīrako vai purataḥ sthitastu  pragṛhya śastrāṇi mahārathānāṃ taireva śastrairditijaṃ jaghāna  
brāhmī tato daṃḍa karā viruddhā gaurī tadā krodhaparītacetāḥ  nārāyaṇī śaṃkhagadāsucakradhanurddharā pūritabāhudaṃḍā  
viniryayau lāṃgaladaṇḍahastā vyomālakā kāṃcanatulyavarṇā  dhārāsahasrākulamugravegaṃ baiḍaujasī vajrakarā tadānīm  
sahasranetrā yudhi susthirā ca sadurjayā daityaśatairadhṛṣyā  vaiśvānarī śaktirasaumyavaktrā yāmyā ca daṃḍodyatapāṇirugrā  
sutīkṣṇakhaṅgodyatapāṇirūpā samāyayau nairṛti ghoracāpā  toyālikā vāraṇapāśahastā vinirgatā yuddhamabhīpsamānā  
pracaṃḍavātaprabhavā ca devī kṣudhāvapustvaṃkuśapāṇi reva  kalpāntavahnipratimāṃ gadāṃ ca pāṇau gṛhītvā dhanadodbhavā ca  
yākṣeśvarī tīkṣṇamukhā virūpā nakhāyudhā nāgabhayaṃkarī ca  etāstathānyāśśataśo hi devyaḥ sunirgatāḥ saṃkulayuddhabhūmim  
dṛṣṭvā ca tatsainyamanaṃtapāraṃ vivarṇavarṇāśca suvismitāśca  samākulāssaṃcakitābhayādvai devyo babhūburhṛdadīnasattvāḥ  
cakrussamādhāya manassamastāstā devavadhvo vidhiśaktimukhyāḥ  susaṃmata tvena girīśaputryāḥ senāpatirvīrasughoravīryaḥ  
cakrurmahāyuddhamabhūtapūrvaṃ nidhāya buddhau ditijāḥ pradhānāḥ  nivartanaṃ mṛtyumathātmanaśca nārībhiranye varadānasattvāḥ  
atyadbhutaṃ tatra cakāra yuddhaṃ gaurī tadānīṃ sahitā sakhībhiḥ  kṛtvā raṇe cādbhutabuddhiśauṇḍaṃ senāpatiṃ vīrakaghoravīryam  
hiraṇyanetrātmaja eva bhūpaścakre mahāvyūhamaraṃ sukarmā  saṃbhāvya viṣṇuṃ ca nirīkṣya yāmyāṃ sudāruṇaṃ tadgilanāmadheyam  
mukhaṃ karālaṃ vidhisevayāsya tasmin kṛte bhagavānājagāma  kalpāntaghorārkasahasrakāṃtikīrṇañca vai kupitaḥ kṛtti vāsāḥ  
gate tato varṣasahasramātre tamāgataṃ prekṣya maheśvaraṃ ca  cakrurmahāyuddhamatīvamātraṃ nāryaḥ prahṛṣṭāssaha vīrakeṇa  
praṇamya gaurī giriśaṃ ca mūrdhnā saṃdarśayan bharturatīva śauryamam  gaurī prayuddhaṃ ca cakāra hṛṣṭā harastataḥ parvatarājaputrīm  
kaṃṭhe gṛhītvā tu guhāṃ praviṣṭo ramāsahasrāṇi visarjitāni  gaurī ca sanmānaśataiḥ prapūjya guhāmukhe vīrakameva sthāpayan  
tato na gaurīṃ giriśaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā'sureśvaro nītivicakṣaṇo hi  drutaṃ svadūtaṃ vidhasākhyameva sa preṣayāmāsa śivopakaṃṭham  
taistaiḥ prahārairapi jarja rāṃgastasmin raṇe devagaṇeritairyaḥ  jagāda vākyaṃ tu sagarvamugraṃ praviśya śaṃbhuṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā  
dūta uvāca  saṃpreṣitohaṃ viviśe guhāṃtu hyaṣau'ndhakastvāṃ samuvāca vākyam  nāryā na kāryaṃ tava kiṃcidastivimuca nārīṃ taruṇīṃ surūpām  
prāyobhavāstāpasastajjuṣasva kṣāṃtaṃ mayā yatkamanīyamantaḥ  munirvirodhavya iti praciṃtya na tvaṃ munistāpasa kiṃ tu śatruḥ  
atīva daityeṣu mahāvirodhī yudhyasva vegena mayā pramathya  nayāmi pātālatalānurūpaṃ yamakṣayaṃ tāpasa dhūrta hi tvām  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etadvaco dūtamukhānniśamya kapālamālī tamuvāca kopāt  jvalanviṣādena mahāṃstrinetrassatāṃ gatirduṣṭamadaprahartā  
śiva uvāca  vyaktaṃ vacaste tadatīva cograṃ proktaṃ hi tattvaṃ tvaritaṃ prayāhi  kuruṣva yuddhaṃ hi mayā prasahya yadi praśaktosi balena hi tvam  
yaḥ syādaśakto bhuvi tasya kortho dārairdhanairvā sumanoharaiśca  āyāṃtu daityāśca balena mattā vicāryamevaṃ tu kṛtaṃ mayai tat  
śarīrayātrāpi kutastvaśakteḥ kurvantu yadyadvihitaṃ tu teṣām  mamāpi yadyatkaraṇīyamasti tattattkariṣyāmi na saṃśa yotra  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etadvacastadvidhasopi tasmācchrutvā harānnirgata eva hṛṣṭaḥ  prāgāttato garjitahuṃkṛtāni kurvaṃstatodaityapatessakāśam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṇḍe yuddhaprāraṃbhadūtasamvādavarṇanaṃnāma pañcacatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tasyeṃgitajñaśca sa daityarājo gadāṃ gṛhītvā tvaritassasainyaḥ  kṛtvātha sā'gre gilanāmadheyaṃ sudāruṇaṃ devavarairabhedyam  
guhāmukhaṃ prāpya maheśvarasya bibheda śastrairaśaniprakāśaiḥ  anye tato vīrakameva śastrairavākirañchaila sutāṃ tathānye  
dvāraṃ hi kecidruciraṃ babhaṃjuḥ puṣpāṇi patrāṇi vināśayeyuḥ  phalāni mūlāni jalaṃ ca hṛdyamudyānamārgānapi khaṃḍayeyuḥ  
viloḍayeyurmuditāśca kecicchṛṃgāṇi śailasya ca bhānumaṃti  tato harassasmṛtavānsvasainyaṃ samāhvayankupitaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ  
bhūtāni cānyāni sudāruṇāni devānsasainyānsaha viṣṇumukhyān  āhūtamātrānugaṇāssasainyā rathairgajairvājivṛṣaiśca gobhiḥ  
uṣṭraiḥ kharaiḥ pakṣivaraiśca siṃhaiste sarvadevāḥ sahabhūtasaṃghaiḥ  vyāghraimṛgaissūkarasārasaiśca samīnamatsyaiśśiśumāramukhyaiḥ  
anyaiśca nānā vidhajīvasaṃghairviśīrṇadaṃśāḥ sphuṭitaissmaśānaiḥ  bhujaṃgamaiḥ pretaśataiḥ piśācairdivyairvimānaiḥ kamalākaraiśca  
nadīnadaiḥ parvatavāhanaiśca samāgatāḥ prāṃjalayaḥ praṇamya  kapardinaṃ tasthuradīnasattvāssenāpatiṃ vīrakameva kṛtvā  
visarjayāmāsa raṇāya devānviśrāṃtavāhānatha tatpinākī  yuddhe sthiraṃ labdhajayaṃ pradhānaṃ saṃpreṣitāste tu maheśvareṇa  
cakruryugāṃtapratimaṃ ca yuddhaṃ maryyādahīnaṃ sagilena sarve  daityendrasainyena sadaiva ghoraṃ krodhānnigīrṇāstridaśāstu saṃkhye  
tasminkṣaṇe yudhyamānāśca sarve brahmendraviṣṇvarkaśaśāṃkamukhyāḥ  āsannigīrṇā vidhasena tena sainye nigīrṇe'sti tu vīrako hi  
vihāya saṃgrāmaśiroguhāṃ tāṃ praviśya śarvaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā  provāca duḥkhābhihataḥ smarāriṃ suvīrako vāggmivaro'tha vṛttam  
nigīrṇaite sainyaṃ vidhasaditijenādya bhagavannigīrṇo'sau viṣṇustribhuvanagururdaityadalanaḥ  nigīrṇau candrārkaudruhiṇamaghavānau ca varadau nigīrṇāste sarve yamavaruṇavātāśca dhanadaḥ  
sthitosmyekaḥ prahvaḥ kimiha karaṇīyaṃ bhavatu me ajeyo daityendraḥ pramuditamanā daityasahitaḥ  
ajeyaṃ tvāṃ prāptaḥ pratibhayamanā mārutagatissvayaṃ viṣṇurdevaḥ kanakakaśipuṃ kaśyapasutam  nakhaistīkṣṇairbhaktyā tadapibhagavañchiṣṭavaśagaḥ pravṛttastrailokya vidhamatu malaṃ vyāttavadanaḥ  
vasiṣṭhādyaiśśapto bhuvanapatibhissaptamunibhistathābhūte bhūyastvamiti suciraṃ daityasahitaḥ  
tatastenoktāste praṇayavacanairātmani hitaiḥ kadāsmādvai ghorādbhavati mama mokṣo munivarāḥ  yataḥ kruddhairukto vidhasaharaṇādyuddhasamaye tato ghorairbāṇairvidalitamukhe muṣṭibhiralam  
badaryākhyāraṇye nanu harigṛhāpuṇyavasatau nisaṃstabhyātmānaṃ vigatakaluṣo yāsyasi param  tatasteṣāṃ vākyātpratidinamasau daityagilanaḥ kṣudhārtassaṃgrāmādbhramati punarāmodamuditaḥ  
tamasvedaṃ ghoraṃ jagaduditayossūryaśaśinoryathāśukrastubhyaṃ paramaripuratyaṃtavikaraḥ  hatāndevairdetyānpunaramṛtavidyāstutipadaissavīryānsaṃdṛṣṭānvraṇaśataviyuktānprakurute  
varaṃ prāṇāstyājyāstava mama tu saṃgrāmasamaye bhavānsākṣībhūtaḥ kṣaṇamapi vṛtaḥ kāryakaraṇe  
sanatkumāra uvāca  itīdaṃ satputrātpramathapatirākarṇya kupitaściraṃ dhyātvā cakre tribhuvanapatiḥ prāganupamam  pragāyatsāmākhyaṃ dinakarakarākāravapuṣā prahāsāttannāmnā tadanu nihataṃ tena ca tamaḥ  
prakāśesmiṃlloke punarapi mahāyuddhamakarodraṇe daityaissārddhaṃ vikṛtavadanairvīrakamuniḥ  śilācūrṇaṃ bhuktvā pravaramuninā yastu janitassa kṛtvā saṃgrāmaṃ puramapi purā yaśca jitavān  
mahārudrassadyaḥ sa khalu ditijenātigilitastataścāsau nandī niśitaśaraśūlāsisahitaḥ  pradhāno yodhānāṃ munivaraśatānāmapi mahānnivāso vidyānāṃ śamadamamahādhairyasahitaḥ  
nirīkṣyaivaṃ paścādvṛṣabhavaramāruhya bhagavānkaparddī yuddhārthī vidhasaditijaṃ sammukhamukhaḥ  japandivyaṃ mantraṃ nigalanavidhānodgilanakaṃ sthitassajjaṃ kṛtvā dhanuraśanikalpānapi śarān  
tatau niṣkāṃto'sau vidhasavadanādvīrakamunirgṛhītvā tatsarve svabalamatulaṃ viṣṇusahitaḥ  samudgīrṇāssarve kamalajabalārīndudinapāḥ prahṛṣṭaṃ tasainyaṃ punarapi mahāyuddhamakarot  
jite tasmiñchukrastadanu ditijānyuddhavihatān yadā vidyāvīryātpunarapi sajīvānprakurute  tadā baddhvānītaḥ paśuriva gaṇaibhūtapataye nigīrṇastenāsau tripuraripuṇā dānavaguruḥ  
vinaṣṭe śukrākhyo suraripunivāsastadakhilo jito dhvasto bhagno bhṛśamapi suraiścāpi dalitam  prabhūtairbhūtaughairditijakuṇapagrāsarasikaissaruṃḍairnṛtyadbhirniśitaśaraśaktyuddhṛtakaraiḥ  
pramattairvetālaissudṛḍhakaratuṃḍairapi khagaivṛkairnānābhedaiśśavakuṇapapūrṇāsyakavalaiḥ  vikīrṇe saṃgrāme kanakakaśiporvaṃśajanakaściraṃ yuddhaṃ kṛtvā hariharamahendraiśca vijitaḥ  
praviṣṭe pātāle girijaladhiraṃdhrāṇyapi tathā tatassainye kṣīṇe ditijavṛṣabhaścāṃdhakavaraḥ  prakope devānāṃ kadanadavaro viśvadalano gadāghātairghorairvidalitamadaścāpi hariṇā  
na vai yassagrāmaṃ tyajati varalabdhaḥ kilaḥ yata stadā tāḍairghoraistridaśapatinā pīḍitatanuḥ  tataśśastrāstraughaistarugirijalaiścāśu vibudhāñjigāyoccairgarjanpramathapatimāhūya śanakaiḥ  
sthito yuddhaṃ kurvanraṇapatitaśastrairbahuvidhaiḥ parikṣīṇaissarvaistadanu girijā rudramatudat  tathā vṛkṣaissarpairaśaninivahaiḥ śastrapa ṭalairvirūpairmāyābhiḥ kapaṭaracanāśambaraśataiḥ  
vijetuṃ śaileśaṃ kuhakamaparaṃ tatra kṛtavānmahāsattvo vīrastripurariputulyaśca matimān  na vadhyo devānāṃ varaśatamanonmādavivaśaḥ prabhūtaiśśastrāstraissapadi ditijo jarjaratanuḥ  
tadīyādviṣyandātkṣiti talagatairandhakagaṇairativyāptaghoraṃ vikṛtavadanaṃ svātmasadṛśam  dadhatkalpāṃtāgnipratimavapuṣā bhūtapatinā triśūle nodbhinnastripuraripuṇā dāruṇataram  
yadā sainyāsainyaṃ paśupatihatādanyadabhavadvraṇotthairatyuṣṇaiḥ piśitanisṛtairbindubhiralam  tadā viṣṇuryogā tpramathapatimāhūya matimān cakārograṃ rūpaṃ vikṛtavadanaṃ straiṇamajitam  
karālaṃ saṃśuṣkaṃ bahubhujalatākrāṃtakupito viniṣkrāṃtaḥ karṇādraṇaśirasi śaṃbhośca bhagavān  
raṇasthā sā devī caraṇayugalālaṃkṛtamahī stutā devaissarvaismadanu bhagavān preritamatiḥ  kṣudhārtā tatsainyaṃ ditijanisṛtaṃ tacca rudhiraṃ papau sātyuṣṇaṃ tadraṇaśirasi sṛkkardamamalam  
tatastveko daityastadapi yuyudhe śuṣkarudhirastalāghātairghoraiśanisadṛśairjānucaraṇaiḥ  nakhairvajrākārairmukhabhujaśirobhiśca giriśaṃ smaran kṣātraṃ dharmaṃ svakula vihitaṃ śāśvatamajam  
raṇe śāṃtaḥ paścātpramathapatinā bhinnahṛdayastriśūle saproto nabhasi vidhṛtassthāṇusadṛśaḥ  adhaḥkāyaśśuṣkasnapanakiraṇairjīrṇatanumāñjalāsārermeghaiḥ pavanasahitaiḥ kleditavapuḥ  
viśīrṇastigmāṃśostuhinaśakalākāraśakalastathābhūtaḥ prāṇāṃstadapi na jahau daitya vṛṣabhaḥ  tadā tuṣṭaśśaṃbhuḥ paramakaruṇāvāridhirasau dadau tasmai prītyā gaṇapatipadaṃ tena vinutaḥ  
tato yuddhasyāṃte bhuvanapatayassārtha ramaṇaistavairnānābhedaiḥ pramathapatimabhyarcya vidhivat  haribrahmādyāste paramanutibhisstuṣṭuvuralaṃ nataskaṃdhāḥ prītā jayajaya giraṃ procya sukhitāḥ  
harastaistaissārddhaṃ girivaraguhāyāṃ pramudito visṛjyaikānaṃśān vividhabalinā pūjyasunagān  cakārājñāṃ krīḍāṃ girivara sutāṃ prāpya muditāṃ tathā putraṃ ghorādvidhasavadanānmuktamanagham  
iti śrīśivamahā purāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ paṃcame yuddhakhaṇḍe aṃdhakavadhopākhyāne andhakayuddhavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  tasminmahati saṃgrāme dāruṇe lomaharṣaṇe  śukro daityapatirvidvānbhakṣitastripurāriṇā  
iti śrutaṃ samāsānme tatpunarbrūhi vistarāta  kiṃ cakāra mahāyogī jaṭharasthaḥ pinākinaḥ  
na dadāha kathaṃ śabhośśukraṃ taṃ jaṭharānalaḥ  kalpāntadahanaḥ kālo dīptatejāśca bhārgavaḥ  
viniṣkrāṃtaḥ kathaṃ dhīmācchaṃbhorjaṭharapaṃjarāt  kathamārādhayāmāsa kiyatkālaṃ sa bhārgavaḥ  
atha ca labdhavānvidyāṃ tāṃ mṛtyuśamanīṃ parām  kā sā vidyā parā tāta yathā mṛtyurhi vāryate  
lebhendhako gāṇapatyaṃ kathaṃ śūlā dvinirgataḥ  devadevasya vai śaṃbhormunerlīlāvihāriṇaḥ  
etatsarvamaśeṣeṇa mahādhīman kṛpāṃ kuru  śivalīlāmṛtaṃ tāta śṛṇvata kathayasva me  
brahmovāca  iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ  sanatkumāraḥ provāca smṛtvā śivapadāṃbujam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa mahābuddhe śivalīlāmṛtaṃ param  dhanyastvaṃ śaivamukhyosi mamānandakaraḥ svataḥ  
pravartamāne samare śaṃkarāṃdhakayostayoḥ  anirbhedyapavivyūhagirivyūhādhināthayoḥ  
purā jayo babhūvāpi daityānāṃ balaśālinām  śivaprabhā vādabhavatpramathānāṃ mune jayaḥ  
tacchutvāsīdviṣaṇṇo hi mahādaityoṃdhakāsuraḥ  kathaṃ syānme jaya iti vicāraṇaparo'bhavat  
apasṛtya tato yuddhādaṃdhakaḥ parabuddhimān  drutamabhyagamadvīra ekalaśśukrasannidhim  
praṇamya svaguruṃ kāvyamavaruhya rathācca saḥ  babhāṣedaṃ vicāryātha sāṃjalirnītivittamaḥ  
aṃdhaka uvāca  bhagavaṃstvāmupāśritya gurorbhāvaṃ vahāmahe  parājitā bhavāmo no sarvadā jayaśālinaḥ  
tvatprabhāvātsadā devānsamastānsānugānvayam  manyāmahe haroṣendramukhānapi hi kattṛṇān  
asmatto bibhyati surāstadā bhavadanugrahāt  gajā iva haribhyaśca tārkṣyebhya iva pannagāḥ  
anirbhedyaṃ pavivyūhaṃ viviśurdaitya dānavāḥ  pramathānīkamakhilaṃ vidhūya tvadanugrahāt  
vayaṃ tvaccharaṇā bhūtvā sadā gā iva niścalāḥ  sthitvā carāmo niśśaṃkamājāvapi hi bhārgava  
rakṣarakṣābhito vipra pravrajya śaraṇāgatān  asurāñchatrubhirvīrairarditāṃśca mṛtānapi  
prathamairbhīmavikrāṃtaiḥ krāṃtānmṛtyupramāthibhiḥ  sūditānpatitānpaśya huṃḍādīnmadgaṇānvarān  
yaḥ pītvā kaṇadhūmaṃ vai sahasraṃ śaradāṃ purā  tvayā prāptā varā vidyā tasyāḥ kāloyamāgataḥ  
adya vidyāphalaṃ tatte sarve paśyaṃtu bhārgava  pramathā asurānsarvān kṛpayā jīvayiṣyataḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  itthamandhakavākyaṃ sa śrutvā dhīro hi bhārgavaḥ  tadā vicārayāmāsa dūyamānena cetasā  
kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayādyāpi kṣemaṃ me syātkathaṃ tviti  sannipātavidhirjīvaḥ sarvathānucito mama  
vidheyaṃ śaṃkarātprāptā tadguṇān prati yojaye  tadraṇe marditānvīraḥ pramathaiśśaṃkarānugaiḥ  
śaraṇāgatadharmotha pravarassarvato hṛdā  vicārya śukreṇa dhiyā tadvāṇī svīkṛtā tadā  
kiṃcitsmitaṃ tadā kṛtvā so'bravīddānavādhipam  bhārgavaśśivapādābjaṃ sappā svasthena cetasā  
śukra uvāca  yattvayā bhāṣitaṃ tāta tatsarvaṃ tathyameva hi  etadvidyopārjanaṃ hi dānavārthaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā  
dussahaṃ kaṇadhūmaṃ vai pītvā varṣasahasrakam  vidyeyamīśvarātprāptā baṃdhūnāṃ sukhadā sadā  
pramathairmathitāndaityānraṇehaṃ vidyayānayā  utthāpayiṣye mlānāni śasyāni jalabhugyathā  
nirvraṇānnīrujaḥ svasthānsuptveva puna rutthitān  muhūrtesmiṃśca draṣṭāsi daityāṃstānutthitānnijān  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā sodhakaṃ śukro vidyāmāvartayatka viḥ  ekaikaṃ daityamuddiśya smṛtvā vidyeśamādarāt  
vidyāvartanamātreṇa te sarve daityadānavāḥ  uttasthuryugapadvīrāssuptā iva dhṛtāyudhāḥ  
sadābhyastā yathā vedāssamare vā yathāmbudā  śradayārthāstathā dattā brāhmaṇebhyo yathāpadi  
ujjīvitāṃstu tāndṛṣṭvā huṃḍādīṃśca mahāsurān  vinedurasurāḥ sarve jalapūrṇā ivāṃbudāḥ  
raṇodyatāḥ punaścāsangarjaṃto vikaṭānravān  pramathaissaha nirbhītā mahābalaparākramāḥ  
śukreṇojjīvitāndṛṣṭvā pramathā daityadānavān  visiṣmire tatassarve naṃdyādyā yuddhadurmadāḥ  
vijñāpyamevaṃ karmaitaddeveśe śaṃkare'khilam  vicārya buddhimaṃtaśca hyevaṃ te'nyonyamabruvan  
āścaryarūpe pramatheśvarāṇāṃ tasmiṃstathā vartati yuddhayajñe  amarṣito bhārgavakarma dṛṣṭvā śilādaputro'bhyagamanmaheśam  
jayeti coktvā jayayonimugramuvāca naṃdī kanakāvadātam  gaṇeśvarāṇāṃ raṇakarma deva devaiśca sendrairapi duṣkaraṃ sat  
tadbhārgaveṇādya kṛtaṃ vṛthā nassaṃjīvatāṃstānhi mṛtānvipakṣān  āvartya vidyāṃ mṛtajīvadātrīmekekamuddiśya sahelamīśa  
tuhuṃḍahuṃḍādikakuṃbhajaṃbhavipā kapākādimahāsurendrāḥ  yamālayādadya punarnivṛttā vidrāvayaṃtaḥ pramathāṃścaraṃti  
yadi hyasau daityavarānnirastānsaṃjīvayedatra punaḥ punastān  jayaḥ kuto no bhavitā maheśa gaṇeśvarāṇāṃ kuta eva śāṃtiḥ  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  ityevamuktaḥ pramatheśvareṇa sa naṃdinā vai pramatheśvareśaḥ  uvāca devaḥ prahasaṃstadānīṃ taṃ naṃdinaṃ sarvagaṇeśarājam  
śiva uvāca  nandinprayāhi tvarito'ti mātraṃ dvijendravaryaṃ ditinandanānām  madhyātsamuddhṛtya tathā nayāśu śyeno yathā lāvakamaṃḍajātam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  sa evamukto vṛṣabhadhvajena nanāda naṃdī vṛṣasiṃhanādaḥ  jagāma tūrṇaṃ ca vigāhya senāṃ yatrābhavadbhārgavavaṃśadīpaḥ  
taṃ rakṣyamāṇaṃ ditijaissamastaiḥ pāśāsivṛkṣopalaśailahastaiḥ  vikṣobhya daityānbalavāñjahāra kāvyaṃ sa nandī śarabho yathebham  
srastāṃbaraṃ vicyutabhūṣaṇaṃ ca vimuktakeśaṃ balinā gṛhītam  vimocayiṣyaṃta ivānujagmuḥ surārayassiṃharavāṃstyajaṃtaḥ  
daṃbholi śūlāsiparaśvadhānāmuddaṃḍacakropalakaṃpanānām  naṃdīśvarasyopari dānavendrā varṣaṃ vavarṣurjaladā ivogram  
taṃ bhārgavaṃ prāpya gaṇādhirājo mukhāgninā śastraśatāni dagdhvā  āyātpravṛddhe'suradevayuddhe bhavasya pārśve vyathitāripakṣaḥ  
ayaṃ sa śukro bhagavannitīdaṃ nivedayāmāsa bhavāya śīghram  jagrāha śukraṃ sa ca devadevo yathopahāraṃ śucinā pradattam  
na kiṃciduktvā sa hi bhūtagoptā cikṣepa vaktre phalavatkavīndram  hāhāravastairasuraissamastairuccairvimukto hahaheti bhūri  
iti śrīśiva mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe aṃdhakayuddhe śukranigīrṇanavarṇanaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  śukre nigīrṇe rudreṇa kimakārṣuśca dānavāḥ  aṃdhakeśā mahāvīrā vada tattvaṃ mahāmune  
sanatkumāra uvāca  kāvye nigīrṇe girijeśvareṇa daityā jayāśārahitā babhūvuḥ  hastairvimuktā iva vāraṇendrāḥ śṛṃgairvihīnā iva govṛṣāśca  
śiro vihīnā iva devasaṃghā dvijā yathā cādhyayanena hīnāḥ  nirudyamāssattvagaṇā yathā vai yathodyamā bhāgyavivarjitāśca  
patyā vihīnāśca yathaiva yoṣā yathā vipakṣāḥ khalu mārgaṇaughāḥ  āyūṃṣi hīnāni yathaiva puṇyairvratairvihīnāni yathā śrutāni  
vinā yathā vaibhavaśaktimekāṃ bhavaṃti hīnāssvaphalaiḥ kriyaughāḥ  yathā viśūrāḥ khalu kṣatriyāśca satyaṃ vinā dharmagaṇo yathaiva  
nandinā cā hṛte śukre gilite ca viṣādinā  viṣādamagamandaityā yatamānaraṇotsavāḥ  
tān vīkṣya vigatotsāhānaṃdhakaḥ pratyabhāṣata  daityāṃstuhuṃḍāhuṃḍadīnmahādhīraparākramaḥ  
aṃdhaka uvāca  kaviṃ vikramya nayatā nandinā vaṃcitā vayam  tanūrvinā kṛtāḥ prāṇāssarveṣāmadya no nanu  
dhairyaṃ vīryaṃ gatiḥ kīrtissattvaṃ tejaḥ parākramaḥ  yugapanno hṛtaṃ sarvamekasmin bhārgave hṛte  
dhigasmān kulapūjyo yairekopi kulasattamaḥ  gurussarvasamarthaśca trātā trāto na cāpadi  
tadyūyamavilaṃbyeha yudhyadhvamaribhissaha  vīraistaiḥ pramathaivīrāḥ smṛtvā gurupadāṃbujam  
guroḥ kāvyasya sukhadau smṛtvā caraṇapaṃkajau  sūdayiṣyāmyahaṃ sarvān pramathān saha nandinā  
adyaitān vivaśān hatvā sahadevaissavāsavaiḥ  bhārgavaṃ mocayiṣyāmi jīvaṃ yogīva karmataḥ  
sa cāpi yogī yogena yadi nāma svayaṃ prabhuḥ  śarīrāttasya nirgacchedasmākaṃ śeṣapālitā  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityandhakavacaḥ śrutvā dānavā meghanissvanāḥ  pramathān nirdayāḥ prāhurmartavye kṛtaniścayāḥ  
satyāyuṣi na no jātu śaktāssyuḥ pramathā balāt  asatyāyupi kiṃ gatvā tyaktvā svāminamāhave  
ye svāminaṃ vihāyāto bahumānadhanā janāḥ  yāṃti te yāṃti niyatamaṃdhatāmisramālayam  
ayaśastamasā khyātiṃ malinīkṛtya bhūriśaḥ  ihāmutrāpi sukhino na syurbhagnā raṇājire  
kiṃ dānai kiṃ tapobhiśca kiṃ tīrthaparimajjanaiḥ  dhārātīrthe yadi snānaṃ punarbhavamalāpahe  
saṃprathāryeti tadvākyaṃ daityāste danujāstathā  mamaṃthuḥ pramathānājau raṇabherīṃ ninādya ca  
tatra bāṇāsivajraughaiḥ kaṭhinaiśca śilāmayaiḥ  bhuśuṇḍibhiṃdipālaiśca śakti bhallaparaśvadhaiḥ  
khaṭvāṃgaiḥ paṭṭiśaiśśūlairlakuṭairmusalairalam  parasparamabhighnaṃtaḥ pracakruḥ kadanaṃ mahat  
kārmukāṇāṃ vikṛṣṭānāṃ patatāṃ ca patattriṇām  bhiṃdipālabhuśuṃḍīnāṃ kṣveḍitānāṃ ravo'bhavat  
raṇatūryyaninādaiśca gajānāṃ bahubṛṃhitaiḥ  heṣāravairhayānāṃ ca mahānkolāhalo'bhavat  
astisvanairavāpūri dyāvābhūmyoryadaṃtaram  abhīrūṇāṃ ca bhīrūṇāṃ mahāromodgamo'bhavat  
gajavājimahārāvasphuṭaśabdagrahāṇi ca  bhagnadhvajapatākāni kṣīṇapraharaṇāni ca  
rudhirodgāracitrāṇi vyaśvahastirathāni ca  pipāsitāni sainyāni mumūrcchurubhayatra vai  
atha te pramathā vīrā naṃdiprabhṛtayastadā  balena jaghnurasurānsarvānprāpurjayaṃ mune  
dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ ca pramatherbhajyamānamitastataḥ  dudrāva rathamāsthāya svayamevāṃdhako gaṇān  
śarāvāraprayuktaistairvajrapātairnagā iva  pramathā neśire cāstrairnistoyā iva toyadāḥ  
yāṃtamāyāṃtamālokya dūrasthaṃ nikaṭasthitam  pratyekaṃ romasaṃkhyābhirvivyādheṣubhirandhakaḥ  
dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ bhajyamānamaṃdhakena balīyasā  skaṃdo vināyako naṃdī somanaṃdyādayaḥ pare  
pramathā prabalā vīrāśśaṃkarasya gaṇā nijāḥ  cukrudhussamaraṃ cakrurvicitraṃ ca mahābalāḥ  
vināyakena skaṃdena naṃdinā somanaṃdinā  vīreṇa naigameyena vaiśākhena balīyasā  
ityādyaistu gaṇairugrairaṃdhakopyadhakīkṛtaḥ  triśūlaśaktibāṇaughadhārāsaṃpātapātibhiḥ  
tataḥ kolāhalo jātaḥ pramathāsurasainyayoḥ  tena śabdena mahatā śukraśśaṃbhūdare sthgtiḥ  
chidrānveṣī bhramansotha viniketo yathānilaḥ  saptalokānsapātālānrudradehe vyalokayat  
brahmanārāyaṇendrāṇāṃ sādityāpsarasāṃ tathā  bhuvanāni vicitrāṇi yuddhaṃ ca pramathāsuram  
sa varṣāṇāṃ śataṃ kukṣau bhavasya parito bhraman  na tasya dadṛśe randhraṃ śuce raṃdhraṃ khalo yathā  
śāṃbhavenātha yogena śukrarūpeṇa bhārgavaḥ  imaṃ maṃtravaraṃ japtvā śaṃbhorjaṭharapaṃjarāt  
niṣkrāṃtaṃ liṃgamārgeṇa praṇanāma tataśśivam  gauryyā gṛhītaḥ putrārthaṃ tadavighneśvarīkṛtaḥ  
atha kāvyaṃ viniṣkrātaṃ śukramārgeṇa bhārgavam  dṛṣṭvovāca maheśāno vihasya karuṇānidhiḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  śukravannissṛto yasmālliṃgānme bhṛgunandana  karmaṇā tena śuklatvaṃ mama putrosi gamyatām  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityevamukto devena śukrorkasadṛśadyutiḥ  praṇanāma śivaṃ bhūyastuṣṭāva vihitāṃjaliḥ  
śukra uvāca  anaṃtapādastvamanaṃtamūrtiranaṃtamūrddhāṃtakaraśśivaśca  anaṃtabāhuḥ kathamīdṛśaṃ tvāṃ stoṣye ha nutyaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā  
tvamaṣṭamūrtistvamanaṃtamūrtistvamiṣṭadassarvasurāsurāṇām  aniṣṭadṛṣṭaśca vimardakaśca stoṣye ha nutyaṃ kathamīdṛśaṃ tvām  
sanatkumāra uvāca  iti stutvā śivaṃ śukraḥ punarnatvā śivājñayā  viveśa dānavānīkaṃ meghamālāṃ yathā śaśī  
nigīrṇanamiti proktaṃ śaṃkareṇa kave raṇe  śṛṇu maṃtraṃ ca taṃ japto yaśśaṃbhoḥ kavinodare  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudra saṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe śukranigīrṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  oṃ namaste deveśāya surāsuranama skṛtāya bhūtabhavyamahādevāya haritapigalalocanāya balāya buddhirūpiṇe vaiyāghravasanacchadāyāraṇeyāya trailokyaprabhave īśvarāya harāya haritanetrāya yugāntakaraṇāyānalāyagaṇeśāyalokapālāya mahābhujāyamahāhastāya śūline mahādaṃṣṭriṇe kālāya maheśvarāyaavyayāya kālarūpiṇe nīlagrīvāya mahodarāya gaṇādhyakṣāya sarvātmane sarvabhāvanāya sarvagāya mṛtyuhaṃtre pāriyātrasuvratāya brahmacāriṇe vedānta gāya tapoṃtagāya paśupataye vyaṃgāya śūlapāṇaye vṛṣaketave haraye jaṭine śikhaṃḍine lakuṭine mahāyaśase bhūteśvarāya guhāvāsine vīṇā paṇavatālaṃbate amarāya darśanīyāya bālasūryanibhāya śmaśānavāsine bhagavate umāpataye arindamāya bhagasyākṣipātine pūṣṇordaśananāśanāya kūrakartakāya pāśahastāya pralayakālāya ulkāmukhāyāgniketave munaye dīptāya viśāṃpataye unnayate janakāya caturthakāya loka sattamāya vāmadevāya vāgdākṣiṇyāya vāmato bhikṣave bhikṣurūpiṇe jaṭine svayaṃjaṭilāya śakrahastapratistaṃbhakāya vasūnāṃ staṃbhāya kratave kratukarāya kālāya medhāvine madhukarāya calāya vānaspatyāya vājasaneti samāśramapūjitāya jagaddhātre jagatkartre puruṣāya śāśvatāya dhruvāya dharmādhyakṣāya trivartmane bhūtabhāvanāya trinetrāya bahurūpāya sūryāyutasamaprabhāya devāya sarvatūryaninādine sarvabādhāvimocanāya baṃdhanāya sarvadhāriṇe dharmmottamāya puṣpadaṃtāyāpi bhāgāya mukhāya sarvaharāya hiraṇyaśravase dvāriṇe bhīmāya bhīmaparākramāya oṃnamo namaḥ  sanatkumāra uvāca  imaṃ mantravaraṃ japtvā śukro jaṭharapaṃjarāt  niṣkrānto liṃgamārgeṇa śaṃbhośśukramivotkaṭam  
gauryā gṛhītaḥ putrārthaṃ viśveśena tataḥ kṛtaḥ  ajaraścāmaraḥ śrīmāndvitīya iva śaṃkaraḥ  
tribhirvarṣasahasraistu samatītairmahītale  maheśvarātpunarjātaḥ śukro vedanidhirmuniḥ  
dadarśa śūle saṃśuṣkaṃ dhyāyaṃtaṃ parameśvaram  aṃdhakaṃ dhairyasadvanyadānaveśaṃ tapasvinam  
mahādevaṃ virūpākṣaṃ candrārddhakṛtaśekharam  amṛtaṃ śāśvataṃ sthāṇuṃ nīlakaṃṭhaṃ pinākinam  
vṛṣabhākṣaṃ mahājñeyaṃ puruṣaṃ sarvakāmadam  kāmāriṃ kāmadahanaṃ kāmarūpaṃ kapardinam  
virūpaṃ giriśaṃ bhīmaṃ sragviṇaṃ raktavāsasam  yoginaṃ kāladahanaṃ tripuraghnaṃ kapālinam  
gūḍhavrataṃ guptamaṃtraṃ gaṃbhīraṃ bhāvagocaram  aṇimādiguṇādhāratrilokyaiśvaryyadāyakam  
vīraṃ vīrahaṇaṃ ghoraṃ virūpaṃ māṃsalaṃ paṭum  mahāmāṃsādamunmattaṃ bhairavaṃ vai maheśvaram  
trailokyadrāvaṇaṃ lubdhaṃ lubdhakaṃ yajñasūdanam  kṛttikānāṃ sutairyuktamunmattakṛttivāsasam  
gajakṛttiparīdhānaṃ kṣubdhaṃ bhujagabhūṣaṇam  dadyālaṃbaṃ ca vetālaṃ ghoraṃ śākinipūjitam  
aghoraṃ ghoradaityaghnaṃ ghoraghoṣaṃ vanaspatim  bhasmāṃgaṃ jaṭilaṃ śuddhaṃ bheruṃḍaśatasevitam  
bhūteśvaraṃ bhūtanāthaṃ pañcabhūtāśritaṃ khagam  krodhitaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ caṇḍaṃ caṇḍīśaṃ caṇḍikāpriyam  
caṇḍaṃ tuṃgaṃ garutmaṃtaṃ nityamāsavabhojanam  lelihānaṃ mahāraudraṃ mṛtyuṃ mṛtyoragocaram  
mṛtyormṛtyuṃ mahāsenaṃ śmaśānāraṇyavāsinam  rāgaṃ virāgaṃ rāgāṃdhaṃ vītarāgaśatācitam  
sattvaṃ rajastamodharmamadharmaṃ vāsavānujam  satyaṃ tvasatyaṃ sadrūpamasadrūpamahetukam  
arddhanārīśvaraṃ bhānuṃ bhānukoṭiśataprabham  yajñaṃ yajñapatiṃ rudramīśānaṃ varadaṃ śivam  
aṣṭottaraśataṃ hyetanmūrtīnāṃ paramātmanaḥ  śivasya dānavo dhyāyanmuktastasmānmahābhayāt  
divyenāmṛtavarṣeṇa so'bhiṣiktaḥ kapardinā  tuṣṭena mocitaṃ tasmācchūlāgrādavaropitaḥ  
uktaścātha mahādaityo maheśānena soṃ'dhakaḥ  asurassāṃtvapūrvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mahātmanā  
īśvara uvāca  bho bho daityendratuṣṭo'smi damena niyamena ca  śauryeṇa tava dhairyeṇa varaṃ varaya suvrata  
ārādhitastvayā nityaṃ sarvanirdhūtakalmaṣaḥ  varado'haṃ varārhastvaṃ mahādaityendrasattama  
prāṇasaṃdhāraṇādasti yacca puṇyaphalaṃ tava  tribhirvarṣasahasraistu tenāstu tava nirvṛtiḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etacchrutvāṃdhakaḥ prāha vepamānaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ  bhūmau jānudvayaṃ kṛtvā bhagavaṃtamumāpatim  
aṃdhaka uvāca  bhagavanyanmayokto'si dīnodīnaḥ parātparaḥ  harṣagadgadayā vācā mayā pūrvaṃ raṇājire  
yadyatkṛtaṃ vimūḍhatvātkarma lokeṣu garhitam  ajānatā tvāṃ tatsarvaṃ prabho manasi mā kṛthāḥ  
pārvatyāmapi duṣṭaṃ yatkāmadoṣātkṛtaṃ mayā  kṣamyatāṃ me mahādeva kṛpaṇo duḥkhito bhṛśam  
duḥkhitasya dayā kāryā kṛpaṇasya viśeṣataḥ  dīnasya bhaktiyuktasya bhavatā nityameva hi  
sohaṃ dīno bhaktiyukta āgataśśaraṇaṃ tava  rakṣā mayi vidhātavyā racito'yaṃ mayāṃjaliḥ  
iyaṃ devī jaganmātā parituṣṭā mamopari  krodhaṃ vihāya sakalaṃ prasannā māṃ nirīkṣatām  
kvāsyāḥ krodhaḥ kva kṛpaṇo daityo'haṃ candraśekhara  tatsoḍhā nāhamarddhenducūḍa śaṃbho maheśvara  
kva bhavānparamodāraḥ kva cāhaṃ vivaśīkṛtaḥ  kāmakrodhādibhirdoṣairjarasā mṛtyunā tathā  
ayaṃ te vīrakaḥ putro yuddhaśauṃḍo mahābalaḥ  kṛpaṇaṃ māṃ samālakṣya mā manyuvaśamanvagāḥ  
tuṣārahāraśītāṃśuśaṃkhakundenduvarṇa bhāk  paśyeyaṃ pārvatīṃ nityaṃ mātaraṃ gurugauravāt  
nityaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ bhaktastu nirvairo daivataiḥ saha  nivaseyaṃ gaṇaissārddhaṃ śāṃtā tmā yogaciṃtakaḥ  
mā smareyaṃ punarjātaṃ viruddhaṃ dānavodbhavam  tvatkṛpāto maheśāna dehyetadvaramuttamam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etāvaduktvā vacanaṃ daityendro maunamāsthitaḥ  dhyāyaṃstrilocanaṃ devaṃ pārvatīṃ prekṣya mātaram  
tato dṛṣṭastu rudreṇa prasannenaiva cakṣuṣā  smṛtavānpūrvavṛttāṃtamātmano janma cādbhutam  
tasminsmṛte ca vṛttāṃte tataḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ  praṇamya mātāpitarau kṛtakṛtyo'bhavattataḥ  
pārvatyā mūrdhnyupāghrātaśśaṃkareṇa ca dhīmatā  tathā'bhilaṣitaṃ lebhe tuṣṭādbālenduśekharāt  
etadvassarvamākhyātamandhakasya purātanam  gāṇapatyaṃ mahādevaprasādātparasaukhyadam  
mṛtyuṃjayaśca kathito maṃtro mṛtyuvināśanaḥ  paṭhitavyaḥ prayatnena sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṇḍe aṃdhakagaṇa jīvitaprāptivarṇanaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa yathā prāptā mṛtyupraśamanī parā  vidyā kāvyena muninā śivānmṛtyuñjayābhidhāt  
purāsau bhṛgudāyādo gatvā vārāṇasīṃ purīm  bahukālaṃ tapastepe dhyāyanviśveśvaraṃ prabhum  
sthāpayāmāsa tatraiva liṃgaṃ śaṃbhoḥ parātmanaḥ  kūpaṃ cakāra sadramyaṃ vedavyāsa tadagrataḥ  
paṃcāmṛtairdroṇamitairlakṣakṛtvaḥ prayatnataḥ  snāpayāmāsa deveśaṃ sugaṃdhasnapanairbahu  
sahasrakṛtvo deveśaṃ candanairyakṣakardamaiḥ  samāliliṃpa suprītyā sugandhodvarttanānyanu  
rājacaṃpakadhattūraiḥ karavīrakuśeśayaiḥ  mālatīkarṇikāraiśca kadaṃbairbakulotpalaiḥ  
mallikāśatapatrībhissiṃdhuvāraissakiṃśukaḥ  bandhūkapuṣpaiḥ punnāgairnāgakeśarakeśaraiḥ  
navamallīcibilikaiḥ kuṃdaissamucukundakaiḥ  mandārairbilvapatraiśca droṇairmarubakairvṛkaiḥ  granthiparṇairdamanakaiḥ suramyaiścūtapallavaiḥ  
tulasīdevagaṃdhārībṛhatpatrīkuśāṃkuraiḥ  nadyāvartairagastyaiśca saśālairdevadārubhiḥ  
kāṃcanāraiḥ kurabakairdūrvāṃkurakuruṃṭakaiḥ  pratyekamebhiḥ kusumaiḥ pallavairaparairapi  
patraiḥ sahasrapatraiśca ramyairnānāvidhaiśśubhaiḥ  sāvadhānena suprītyā sa samānarca śaṃkaram  
gītanṛtyopahāraiśca saṃstutaḥ stutibhirbahu  nāmnāṃ sahasrairanyaiśca stotraistuṣṭāva śaṃkaram  
sahasraṃ pañcaśaradāmitthaṃ śukro maheśvaram  nānāprakāravidhinā maheśaṃ sa samarcayat  
yadā devaṃ nānuloke manāgapi varonmukham  tadānyaṃ niyamaṃ ghoraṃ jagrāhātīva dussaham  
prakṣālya cetaso'tyaṃtaṃ cāṃcalyākhyaṃ mahāmalam  bhāvanāvārbhirasakṛdiṃdriyaissahitasya ca  
nirmalīkṛtya tacceto ratnaṃ dattvā pinākine  prayayau kaṇadhūmaughaṃ sahasraṃ śaradāṃ kaviḥ  
kāvyamitthaṃ tapo ghoraṃ kurvantaṃ dṛḍhamānasam  prasasāda sa taṃ vīkṣya bhārgavāya maheśvaraḥ  
tasmālliṃgādvinirgatya sahasrārkādhikadyutiḥ  uvāca taṃ virūpākṣassākṣāddākṣāyaṇīpatiḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  taponidhe mahābhāga bhṛguputra mahāmune  tapasānena te nityaṃ prasanno'haṃ viśeṣataḥ  
manobhilaṣitaṃ sarvaṃ varaṃ varaya bhārgava  prītyā dāsye'khilānkāmānnādeyaṃ vidyate tava  
sanatkumāra uvāca  niśamyeti vacaśśaṃbhormahāsukhakaraṃ varam  sa babhūva kavistuṣṭo nimagnassukhavāridhau  
udyadānaṃdasaṃdoha romāṃcācitavigrahaḥ  praṇanāma mudā śaṃbhumaṃbho janayano dvijaḥ  
tuṣṭāvāṣṭatanuṃ tuṣṭaḥ praphullanayanācalaḥ  maulāvaṃjalimādhāya vadañjayajayeti ca  
bhārgava uvāca  tvaṃ bhābhirābhirabhibhūya tamassamastamastaṃ nayasyabhimatāni niśācarāṇām  dedīpyase divamaṇe gagane hitāya lokatrayasya jagadīśvara tannamaste  
loke'tivelamativelamahāmahobhirnirbhāsi kau ca gagane'khilalokanetraḥ  vidrāvitākhilatamāssutamo himāṃśo pīyūṣa pūraparipūritaḥ tannamaste  
tvaṃ pāvane pathi sadāgatirapyupāsyaḥ kastvāṃ vinā bhuvanajīvana jīvatīha  stabdhaprabhaṃjanavivarddhi tasarvajaṃtoḥ saṃtoṣitā hi kulasarvagaḥ vai namaste  
viśvekapāvaka na tāvakapāvakaikaśakterṛte mṛtavatāmṛtadivyakāryam  prāṇiṣyado jagadaho jagadaṃtarātmaṃstvaṃ pāvakaḥ pratipadaṃ śamado namaste  
pānīyarūpa parameśa jagatpavitra citravicitrasucaritrakaro'si nūnam  viśvaṃ pavitramamalaṃ kila viśvanātha pānīyagāhanata etadato nato'smi  
ākāśarūpabahiraṃtarutāvakāśadānādvikasvaramiheśvara viśvametat  tvattassadā sadaya saṃśvasiti svabhāvātsaṃkocameti bhakto'smi natastatastvām  
viśvaṃbharātmaka bibharṣi vibhotra viśvaṃ ko viśvanātha bhavato'nyatamastamoriḥ  sa tvaṃ vināśaya tamo tama cāhibhūṣastavyātparaḥ paraparaṃ praṇatastatastvām  
ātmasvarūpa tava rūpaparaṃparābhirābhistataṃ hara carācararūpametat  sarvāṃtarātmanilayapratirūparūpa nityaṃ nato'smi paramātmajano'ṣṭamūrte  
ityaṣṭamūrtibhirimābhirabaṃdhabaṃdho yuktau karoṣi khalu viśvajanīnamūrtte  etattataṃ suvitataṃ praṇatapraṇīta sarvārthasārthaparamārtha tato nato'smi  
sanatkumāra uvāca  aṣṭamūrtyaṣṭakenetthaṃ pariṣṭutyeti bhārgavaḥ  bhargaṃ bhūmimilanmauliḥ praṇanāma punaḥpunaḥ  
iti stuto mahādevo bhārgaveṇātitejasā  utthāya bhūmerbāhubhyāṃ dhṛtvā taṃ praṇataṃ dvijam  
uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā meghanādagabhīrayā  suprītyā daśanajyotsnā pradyotitadiṃgataraḥ  
mahādeva uvāca  vipravarya kave tāta mama bhakto'si pāvanaḥ  anenātyugratapasā svajanyācaritena ca  
liṃgasthāpanapuṇyena liṃgasyārādhanena ca  dattacittopahāreṇa śucinā niścalena ca  
avimuktamahākṣetrapavitrācaraṇena ca  tvāṃ sutābhyāṃ prapaśyāmi tavādeyaṃ na kiṃcana  
anenaiva śarīreṇa mamodaradarīgataḥ  madvarendriyamārgeṇa putrajanmatvameṣyasi  
yacchāmyahaṃ varaṃ te'dya duṣprāpyaṃ pārṣadairapi  harerhiraṇyagarbhācca prāyaśohaṃ jugopa yam  
mṛtasaṃjīvanī nāma vidyā yā mama nirmalā  tapobalena mahatā mayaiva parinirmitā    
tvāṃ tāṃ tu prāpayāmyadya maṃtrarūpāṃ mahāśuce  yogyatā te'sti vidyāyāstasyāśśuci taponidhe  
yaṃyamuddiśya niyatametāmāvartayiṣyasi  vidyāṃ vidyeśvaraśreṣṭhaṃ satyaṃ prāṇi ṣyati dhuvam  
atyarkamatyagniṃ ca te tejo vyomni ca tārakam  dedīpyamānaṃ bhavitā grahāṇāṃ pravaro bhava  
api ca tvāṃ kariṣyaṃti yātrāṃ nāryo naro'pi vā  teṣāṃ tvaddṛṣṭipātena sarvakāryaṃ praṇaśyati  
tavodaye bhaviṣyaṃti vivāhādīni suvrata  sarvāṇi dharmakāryāṇi phalavaṃti nṛṇāmiha  
sarvāśca tithayo nandāstava saṃyogataśśubhāḥ  tava bhaktā bhaviṣyaṃti bahuśukrā bahu prajāḥ  
tvayedaṃ sthāpitaṃ liṃgaṃ śukreśamiti saṃjñitam  ye'rcayiṣyaṃti bhanujāsteṣāṃ siddhirbhaviṣyati  
āvarṣaṃ pratighasrāṃ ye naktavrataparāyaṇāḥ  tvaddine śukrakūpe ye kṛtasarvodakakriyāḥ  
śukreśamarcayiṣyaṃti śṛṇu teṣāṃ tu yatphalam  abaṃdhyaśukrāste martyāḥ putravaṃto'tiretasaḥ  
puṃstvasaubhāgyasaṃpannā bhaviṣyaṃti na saṃśayaḥ  upetavidyāste sarve janāssyuḥ sukhabhāginaḥ  
iti dattvā varāndevastatra liṃge layaṃ yayau  bhārgavo'pi nijaṃ dhāma prāpa saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ  
iti te kathitaṃ vyāsa yathā prāptā tapobalāt  mṛtyuṃjayābhidhā vidyā kimanyacchrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe mṛtasaṃjīvinīvidyāprāptivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña śrāvitā sukathādbhutā  bhavatānugrahātprītyā śabhvanugrahanirbharā  
idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  gāṇapatyaṃ dadau prītyā yathā bāṇāsurāya vai  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsādarāttāṃ vai kathāṃ śaṃbhoḥ parātmanaḥ  gāṇapatyaṃ yathā prītyā dadau bāṇā surāya hi  
atraiva sucaritraṃ ca śaṃkarasya mahāprabhoḥ  kṛṣṇena samaropyatra śaṃbhorbāṇānugṛhṇataḥ  
atrānurūpaṃ śṛṇu me śivalīlānvitaṃ param  itihāsaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ manaḥśrotrasukhāvaham  
brahmaputro marīciryo munirāsīnmahāmatiḥ  mānasassarvaputreṣu jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatiḥ  
tasya putro mahātmāsītkaśyapo munisattamaḥ  sṛṣṭipravṛddhako'tyaṃtaṃ piturbhakto vidherapi  
svasya trayodaśamitādakṣakanyā ssuśīlikāḥ  kaśyapasya munervyāsa patnyaścāsanpativratāḥ  
tatra jyeṣṭhā ditiścāsīddaityāstattanayāssmṛtāḥ  anyāsāṃ ca sutā jātā devādyāssacarācarāḥ  
jyeṣṭhāyāḥ prathamau putrau diteścāstāṃ mahābalau  hiraṇyakaśipurjyeṣṭho hiraṇyākṣo'nujastataḥ  
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāścatvāro daityasattamāḥ  hrādānuhrādasaṃhrādā prahrādaścetyanukramāt  
prahrādastatra hi mahānviṣṇubhakto jitendriyaḥ  yaṃ nāśituṃ na śaktāste'bhavandaityāśca kepi ha  
virocanaḥ sutastasya mahā dātṛvaro'bhavat  śakrāya svaśiro yo'dādyācamānāya viprataḥ  
tasya putro baliścāsīnmahādānī śivapriyaḥ  yena vāmanarūpāya haraye'dāyi medinī  
tasyaurasaḥ suto bāṇaśśivabhakto babhūva ha  mānyo vadānyo dhīmāṃśca satyasaṃdhassa hasradaḥ  
śoṇitākhye pure sthitvā sa rājyamakarotpurā  trailokyaṃ ca balāñjjitvā tannāthānasureśvaraḥ  
tasya bāṇāsurasyaiva śivabhaktasya cāmarāḥ  śaṃkarasya prasādena kiṃkarā iva te'bhavan  
tasya rājye'marānhitvā nābhavanduḥkhitāḥ prajāḥ  sāpatnyāduḥkhitāste hi paradharmapravartinaḥ  
sahasrabāhuvādyena sa kadācinmahāsuraḥ  tāṃḍavena hi nṛtyenātoṣayattaṃ maheśvaram  
tena nṛtyena saṃtuṣṭassuprasanno babhūva ha  dadarśa kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā śaṃkaro bhaktavatsalaḥ  
bhagavānsarvalokeśśaśaraṇyo bhaktakāmadaḥ  vareṇa cchaṃdayāmāsa bāleyaṃ taṃ mahāsuram  
śaṃkara uvāca  bāleyaḥ sa mahādaityo bāṇo bhaktavarassudhīḥ  praṇamya śaṃkaraṃ bhaktyā nunāva parameśvaram  
bāṇāsura uvāca  devadeva mahādeva śaraṇāgatavatsala  saṃtuṣṭo'si maheśāna mamopari vibho yadi  
madrakṣako bhava sadā madupasthaḥ purādhipaḥ  sarvathā prītikṛnme hi sasutassagaṇaḥ prabho  
sanatkumāra uvāca  baliputrassa vai bāṇo mohitaśśivamāyayā  muktipradaṃ maheśānaṃ durārādhyamapi dhruvam  
sa bhaktavatsalaḥ śaṃbhurdattvā tasmai varāṃśca tān  tatrovāsa tathā prītyā sagaṇassasutaḥ prabhuḥ  
sa kadācidbāṇapure cakre devāsuraissaha  nadītīre haraḥ krīḍāṃ ramye śoṇitakāhvaye  
nanṛturjahasuścāpi gaṃdharvāsarasastathā  jeyuḥ praṇemurmunaya ānarcustuṣṭuvuśca tam  
vavalguḥ prathamāssarve ṛṣayo juhuvustathā  āyayuḥ siddhasaṃghāśca dṛdṛśuśśāṃkarī ratim  
kutarkikā vineśuśca mlecchāśca paripaṃthinaḥ  mātarobhimukhāstasthurvineśuśca vibhīṣikā  
rudrasadbhāvabhaktānāṃ bhavadoṣāśca vistṛtāḥ  tasmindṛṣṭe prajāssarvāḥ suprītiṃ paramāṃ yayuḥ  
vavalgurmunayassiddhāḥ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā viceṣṭitam  pupuṣuścāpi ṛtavassvaprabhāvaṃ tu tatra ca  
vavurvātāśca mṛdavaḥ puṣpakesaradhūsarāḥ  cukūjuḥ pakṣisaṃghāśca śākhināṃ madhulampaṭāḥ  
puṣpabhārāvanaddhānāṃ rāraṭyeraṃśca kokilāḥ  madhuraṃ kāmajananaṃ vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca  
tataḥ krīḍāvihāre tu matto bālenduśekharaḥ  anirjitena kāmena dṛṣṭāḥ provāca nandinam  
candraśekhara uvāca  vāmāmānaya gaurīṃ tvaṃ kailāsātkṛtamaṃḍanām  śīghramasmādvanādgatvā hyuktvā'kṛṣṇāmihānaya  
sanatkumāra uvāca  sa tatheti pratijñāya gatvā tatrāha pārvatīm  supraṇamya raho dūtaśśaṃkarasya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  
 nandīśvara uvāca  draṣṭumicchati devi tvāṃ devadevo maheśvaraḥ  svavallabhāṃ rūpakṛtāṃ mayoktaṃ tannideśataḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tatastadvacanādgaurī maṃḍanaṃ kartumādarāt  udyatābhūnmuniśreṣṭha pativrataparāyaṇā  
āgacchāmi prabhuṃ gaccha vada taṃ tvaṃ mamājñayā  ājagāma tato naṃdī rudrāsannaṃ manogatiḥ  
punarāha tato rudro nandinaṃ paravibhramaḥ  punargaccha tatastāta kṣipramā naya pārvatīm  
bāḍhamuktvā sa tāṃ gatvā gaurīmāha sulocanām  draṣṭumicchati te bhartā kṛtaveṣāṃ manoramām  
śaṃkaro bahudhā devi vihartuṃ saṃpratīkṣate  evaṃ patau sukāmārte gamyatāṃ girinaṃdini  
ksarobhissamagrābhiranyonyamabhimaṃtritam  labdhabhāvo yathā sadyaḥ pārvatyā darśanotsukaḥ  
ayaṃ pinākī kāmāriḥ vṛṇuyādyāṃ nitaṃbinīm  sarvāsāṃ divyanārīṇāṃ rājñī bhavati vai dhuvam  
vīkṣaṇaṃ gaurirūpeṇa krīḍayenmanmathairgaṇaiḥ  kāmo'yaṃ haṃti kāmārimūcuranyonyamādatāḥ
