spraṣṭuṃ śaknoti yā kācidṛte dākṣāyaṇī striyam  sā gacchettatra niśśaṃkaṃ mohayetpārvatīpatim  
kūṣmāṃḍatanayā tatra śaṃkaraṃ spraṣṭumutsahe  ahaṃ gaurīsurūpeṇa citralekhā vaco'bravīt  
citralekhovāca  yadadhānmohinīrūpaṃ keśavo moha necchayā  purā tadvaiṣṇavaṃ yogamāśritya paramārthataḥ  
urvaśyāśca tato dṛṣṭvā rūpasya parivartanam  kālīrūpaṃ ghṛtācī tu viśvācī cāṃḍikaṃ vapuḥ  
sāvitrirūpaṃ raṃbhā ca gāyatraṃ menakā tathā  sahajanyā jayārūpaṃ vaijayaṃ puṃjikasthalī  
mātṝṇāmapyanuktānāmanuktāścāpsarovarāḥ  ratnādrūpāṇi tāścakrussvavidyāsaṃyutā anu  
tatastāsāṃ tu rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā kuṃbhāṃ ḍanaṃdinī  vaiṣṇavādātmayogācca vijñātārthā vyaḍaṃbayat  
ūṣā bāṇāsurasutā divyayogaviśāradā  cakāra rūpaṃ pārvatyā divyamatyadbhutaṃ śubham  
mahāraktābjasaṃkāśaṃ caraṇaṃ coktamaprabham  divyalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ mano'bhīṣṭārthadāyakam  
tasyā ramaṇasaṃkalpaṃ vijñāya girijā tataḥ  uvāca sarvavijñānā sarvāntaryāminī śivā  
girijovāca  yato mama svarūpaṃ vai dhṛtabhūṣe sakhi tvayā  sakāmatvena samaye saṃprāpte sati mānini  
asmiṃstu kārtike māsi ṛtudharmāstu mādhave  dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu yastu ghore niśāgame  
kṛtopavāsāṃ tvāṃ bhoktā suptāmaṃtaḥpure naraḥ  sa te bharttā kṛto devaistena sārddhaṃ ramiṣyasi  
ābālyādviṣṇubhaktāsi yato'niśamataṃdritā  evamastviti sā prāha manasā lajjitānanā  
atha sā pārvatī devī kṛtakautukamaṇḍanā  rudrasaṃnidhimāgatya cikrīḍe tena śaṃbhunā  
tato ratāṃte bhagavānrudraścādarśanaṃ yayau  sadāraḥ sagaṇaścāpi sahito daivatairmune  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe ūṣā caritravarṇanaṃ śivaśivāvivāhavarṇanaṃ nāmaikapaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇuṣvānyaccaritraṃ ca śivasya paramātmanaḥ  bhaktavātsalyasaṃgarbhi paramānandadāyakam  
purā bāṇāsuro nāma daivadoṣācca garvitaḥ  kṛtvā tāṃḍavanṛtyaṃ ca toṣayāmāsa śaṃkaram  
jñātvā saṃtuṣṭamanasaṃ pārvatīvallabhaṃ śivam  uvāca cāsuro bāṇo nataskandhaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ  
bāṇa uvāca  devadeva mahādeva sarvadevaśiromaṇe  tvatprasādādbalī cāhaṃ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ  
dossahasraṃ tvayā dattaṃ paraṃ bhārāya me'bhavet  trilokyāṃ pratiyoddhāraṃ na labhe tvadṛte samam  
he deva kimanenāpi sahasreṇa karomyaham  bāhūnāṃ giritulyānāṃ vinā yuddhaṃ vṛṣadhvaja  
kaḍūṃtyā nibhṛtaidoṃrbhiryuyutsurdiggajānaham  purāṇyācūrṇayannadrīnbhītāstepi pradudruvuḥ  
mayā yamaḥ kṛto yoddhā vahniśca kṛtako mahān  varuṇaścāpi gopālo gavāṃ pālayitā tathā  
gajādhyakṣaḥ kuberastu sairandhrī cāpi nirṛtiḥ  jitaścākhaṃḍalo loke karadāyī sadā kṛtaḥ  
yuddhasyāgamanaṃ brūhi yatraite bāhavo mama  śatruhastaprayuktaśca śastrāstrairjarjarīkṛtāḥ  
pataṃtu śatruhastādvā pātayantu sahasradhā  etanmanorathaṃ me hi pūrṇaṃ kuru maheśvara  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tacchrutvā kupito rudrastvaṭṭahāsaṃ mahādbhutam  kṛtvā'bravīnmahāmanyurbhaktabādhā'pahārakaḥ  
rudra uvāca  dhigdhiktvāṃ sarvato garvinsarvadaityakulādhama  baliputrasya bhaktasya nocitaṃ vaca īdṛśam  
darpasyāsya praśamanaṃ lapsyase cāśu dāruṇam  mahāyuddhamakasmādvai balinā matsamena hi  
tatra te girisaṃkāśā bāhavo'nalakāṣṭhavat  chinnā bhūmau patiṣyaṃti śastrāstraiḥ kadalīkṛtāḥ  
yadeṣa mānuṣaśiro mayūrasahito dhvajaḥ  vidyate tava duṣṭātmaṃstasya syātpatanaṃ yadā  
sthāpitasyāyudhāgāre vinā vātakṛtaṃ bhayam  tadā yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ saṃprāptamiti cetasi  
nidhāya ghoraṃ saṃgrāmaṃ gacchethāḥ sarvasainyavān  sāṃprataṃ gaccha tadveśma yatastadvidyate śivaḥ  
tathā tānsvamahotpātāṃstatra draṣṭāsi durmate  ityuktvā virarāmātha garvahṛdbhaktavatsalaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tacchrutvā rudramabhyarcya divyairajaṃlikuḍmalaiḥ  praṇamya ca mahādevaṃ bāṇaśca svagṛhaṃ gataḥ  
kuṃbhāṇḍāya yathāvṛttaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ provāca harṣitaḥ  paryaikṣiṣṭāsuro bāṇastaṃ yogaṃ hyutsukassadā  
atha daivātkadācitsa svayaṃ bhagnaṃ dhvajaṃ ca tam  dṛṣṭvā tatrāsuro bāṇo hṛṣṭo yuddhāya niryayau  
sa svasainyaṃ samāhūya saṃyuktaḥ sāṣṭabhirgaṇaiḥ  iṣṭiṃ sāṃgrāmikāṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā sāṃgrāmikaṃ madhu  
kakubhāṃ maṃgalaṃ sarvaṃ saṃprekṣya prasthito'bhavat  mahotsāho mahāvīro baliputro mahārathaḥ  
iti hṛtkamale kṛtvā kaḥ kasmādāgamiṣyati  yoddhā raṇapriyo yastu nānāśastrāstrapāragaḥ  
yastu bāhusahasraṃ me chinattvanalakāṣṭhavat  tathā śastrairmahātīkṣṇaiścchinadmi śataśastviha  
etasminnaṃtare kālaḥ saṃprāptaśśaṃkareṇa hi  yatra sā bāṇaduhitā sujātā kṛtamaṃgalā  
mādhavaṃ mādhave māsi pūjayitvā mahāniśi  suptā cāṃtaḥ pure gupte strībhāvamupalaṃbhitā  
gauryā saṃpreṣitenāpi vyākṛṣṭā divyamāyayā  kṛṣṇātmajātmajenātha rudaṃtī sā hyanāthavat  
sa cāpi tāṃ balādbhuktvā pārvatyāḥ sakhibhiḥ punaḥ  nītastu divyayogena dvārakāṃ nimiṣāṃtarāt  
mṛditā sā tadotthāya rudaṃtī vividhā giraḥ  sakhībhyaḥ kathayitvā tu dehatyāge kṛtakṣaṇā  
sakhyā kṛtātmano doṣaṃ sā vyāsa smāritā punaḥ  sarvaṃ tatpūrvavṛttāṃtaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā ca sā bhavat  
abravīccitralekhāṃ ca tato madhurayā girā  ūṣā bāṇasya tanayā kuṃbhāṃḍatanayāṃ mune  
ūṣovāca  sakhi yadyeṣa me bhartā pārvatyā vihitaḥ purā  kenopāyena te guptaḥ prāpyate vidhivanmayā  
kasminkule sa vā jāto mama yena hṛtaṃ manaḥ  ityuṣāvacanaṃ śrutvā sakhī provāca tāṃ tadā  
citralekhovāca  tvayā svapne ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ puruṣo devi taṃ katham  ahaṃ saṃmānayiṣyāmi na vijñātastu yo mama  
daityakanyā tadukte tu rāgāṃdhā maraṇotsukā  rakṣitā ca tayā sakhyā prathame divase tataḥ  
punaḥ provāca soṣā vai citralekhā mahāmatiḥ  kuṃbhāṃḍasya sutā bāṇatanayāṃ munisattama  
citralekhovāca  vyasanaṃ te'pakarṣāmi trilokyāṃ yadi bhāṣyate  samāneṣye naraṃ yaste manohartā tamādiśa  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā vastrapuṭake devāndaityāṃśca dānavān  gandharvasiddhanāgāṃśca yakṣādīṃśca tathālikhat  
tathā narāṃsteṣu vṛṣṇīñśūramānakaduṃdubhim  vyalikhadrāmakṛṣṇau ca pradyumnaṃ narasattamam  
aniruddhaṃ vilikhitaṃ prādyumniṃ vīkṣya lajjitā  āsīdavāṅmukhī coṣā hṛdaye harṣapūritā  
ūṣā provāca cauro'sau mayā prāptastu yo niśi  puruṣaḥ sakhi yenāśu cetoratnaṃ hṛtaṃ mama  
yasya saṃsparśanādeva mohitāhaṃ tathābhavam  tamahaṃ jñātumicchāmi vada sarvaṃ ca bhāmini  
kasyāyamanvaye jāto nāma kiṃ cāsya vidyate  ityuktā sābravīnnāma yoginī tasya cānvayam  
sarvamākarṇya sā tasya kulādi munisattama  utsukā bāṇatanayā babhāṣe sā tu kāminī  
ūṣovāca  upāyaṃ racaya prītyā tatprāptyai sakhi tatkṣaṇāt  yenopāyena taṃ kāṃtaṃ labheyaṃ prāṇavallabham  
yaṃ vināhaṃ kṣaṇaṃ naikaṃ sakhi jīvitumutsahe  tamānayeha sadyatnātsukhinīṃ kuru māṃ sakhi  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktā sā tathā bāṇātmajayā maṃtrikanyakā  vismitābhūnmuniśreṣṭha suvicāraparā'bhavat  
tatassakhīṃ samābhāṣya citralekhā manojavā  buddhvā taṃ kṛṣṇapautraṃ sā dvārakāṃ gaṃtumudyatā  
jyeṣṭhakṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ tṛtīye tu gate'hani  āprabhātānmuhūrte tu saṃprāptā dvārakāṃ purīm  
ekena kṣaṇamātreṇa nabhasā divyayoginī  tataścāṃtaḥpurodyāne prādyumnirdadṛśe tayā  
krīḍannārījanaissārddhaṃ prapibanmādhavī madhu  sarvāṃgasundaraḥ śyāmaḥ susmito navayauvanaḥ  
tataḥ khaṭvāṃ samārūḍhamaṃdhakārapaṭena sā  ācchādayitvā yogena tāmasena ca mādhavam  
tatassā mūrdhni tāṃ khaṭvāṃ gṛhītvā nimiṣāṃtarāt  saṃprāptā śoṇitapuraṃ yatra sā bāṇanaṃdinī  
kāmārtā vividhānbhāvāñcakāronmattamānasā  ānītamatha taṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā bhītā ca sābhavat  
aṃtaḥpure sugupte ca nave tasminsamāgame  yāvatkrīḍitumārabdhaṃ tāvajjñātaṃ ca tatkṣaṇāt  
aṃtaḥpuradvāragatairvetrajarjarapāṇibhiḥ  iṃgitairanumānaiśca kanyādauḥśīlyamācaran  
sa cāpi dṛṣṭastaistatra naro divyavapurdharaḥ  taruṇo darśanīyastu sāhasī samarapriyaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvamācakhyurbāṇāya balisūnave  puruṣāste mahāvīrāḥ kanyāntaḥpurarakṣakāḥ  
dvārapālā ūcuḥ  deva kaścinna jānīte guptaścāṃtaḥpure balāt  sa kastu tava kanyāṃ vai svayaṃgrāhādadharṣayat  
dānavendra mahābāho paśyapaśyainamatra ca  yadyuktaṃ syāttatkuruṣva na duṣṭā vayamityuta  
sanatkumāra uvāca  teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dānavendro mahābalaḥ  vismitobhūnmuniśreṣṭha kanyāyāḥ śrutadūṣaṇaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhi tāyāṃ paṃcame yuddhakhaṇḍe ūṣācaritravarṇanaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  atha bāṇāsuraḥ kruddhastatra gatvā dadarśa tam  divyalīlāttavapuṣaṃ prathame vayasi sthitam  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitaṃ vākyaṃ kiṃ kāraṇamathābravīt  bāṇaḥ krodha parītātmā yudhi śauṃḍo hasanniva  
aho manuṣyo rūpāḍhyassāhasī dhairyavāniti  koyamāgatakālaśca duṣṭabhāgyo vimūḍhadhīḥ  
yena me kulacāritraṃ dūṣitaṃ duhitā hitā  taṃ mārayadhvaṃ kupitāśśīghraṃ śastraissudāruṇaiḥ  
durācāraṃ ca taṃ baddhvā ghore kārā gṛhe tataḥ  rakṣadhvaṃ vikaṭe vīrā bahukālaṃ viśeṣataḥ  
na jāne koyamabhayaḥ ko vā ghoraparākramaḥ  vicāryeti mahābuddhissaṃ digdho'bhūccharāsuraḥ  
tato daityena sainyaṃ tu daśasāhasrakaṃ śanaiḥ  vadhāya tasya vīrasya vyādiṣṭaṃ pāpabuddhinā  
tadādiṣṭāstu te vīrāḥ sarvatontaḥpuraṃ drutam  chādayāmāsuratyugrāśchiṃdi bhiṃdīti vādinaḥ  
śatrusainyaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā garjamānaḥ sa yādavaḥ  aṃtaḥpuraṃ dvāragataṃ parighaṃ gṛhya cātulam  
niṣkrāṃto bhavanāttasmādvajrahasta ivāṃtakaḥ  tena tānkiṃkarān hatvā punaścāṃtaḥpuraṃ yayau  
evaṃ daśasahasrāṇi sainyāni munisattama  jaghāna roṣaraktākṣo varddhitaśśivatejasā  
lakṣe hate'tha yodhānāṃ tato bāṇāsuro ruṣā  kubhāṃḍaṃ sa gṛhītvā tu yuddhe śauṃḍaṃ samāhvayat  
aniruddhaṃ mahābuddhiṃ dvandvayuddhe mahā have  prādyumniṃ rakṣitaṃ śaivatejasā prajvalattanum  
tato daśasahasrāṇi turagāṇāṃ rathottamān  yuddhaprāptena khaḍgena daityendrasya jaghāna saḥ  
tadvadhāya tataśśaktiṃ kālavaiśvānaropamām  aniruddho gṛhītvā tāṃ tayā taṃ nijaghāna hi  
rathopasthe tato bāṇastena śaktyāhato dṛḍham  sa sāśvastatkṣaṇaṃ vīrastatraivāṃtaradhīyata  
tasmiṃstvadarśanaṃ prāpte prādyumniraparājitam  ālokya kakubhassarvāstasthau giririvācalaḥ  
adṛśyamānastu tadā kūṭayodhassa dānavaḥ  nānāśastrasahasraistaṃ jaghāna hi punaḥ punaḥ  
chadmanāṃ nāgapāśaistaṃ babaṃdha sa mahābalaḥ  baliputro mahāvīraśśivabhaktaśśarāsuraḥ  
taṃ baddhvā paṃjarāṃtaḥsthaṃ kṛtvā yuddhādupāramat  uvāca bāṇaḥ saṃkuddhassūtaputraṃ mahābalam  
bāṇāsura uvāca  sūtaputra śiraśchiṃdhi puruṣasyāsya vai laghu  yena me dūṣitaṃ pūtaṃ balādduṣṭena satkulam  
chitvā tu sarvagātrāṇi rākṣasebhyaḥ prayaccha bhoḥ  athāsya raktamāṃsāni kravyādā api bhuṃjatām  
agādhe tṛṇasaṃkīrṇe kūpe pātakinaṃ jahi  kiṃ bahūktyā sūtaputra māraṇīyo hi sarvathā  
sanatku māra uvāca  tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dharmabuddhirniśācaraḥ  kuṃbhāṃḍastvabravīdvākyaṃ bāṇaṃ sanmaṃtrisattamam  
kuṃbhāṃḍa uvāca  naitatkartuṃ samucitaṃ karma deva vicāryatām  asminhate hato hyātmā bhavediti matirmama  
ayaṃ tu dṛśyate deva tulyo viṣṇoḥ parākramaiḥ  vardhitaścandra cūḍasya tvadduṣṭasya sutecasā  
atha candralalāṭasya sāhasena samatsvayam  imāmavasthāṃ prāptosi pauruṣe saṃvyavasthitaḥ  
ayaṃ śivaprasādādvai kṛṣṇapautro mahābalaḥ  asmāṃstṛṇopamān vetti daṣṭopi bhujagairbalāt  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etadvākyaṃ tu bāṇāya kathayitvā sa dānavaḥ  aniruddhamuvācedaṃ rājanītividuttamaḥ  
kuṃbhāṃḍa uvāca  kosi kasyāsi re vīra satyaṃ vada mamāgrataḥ  kena vā tvamihānīto durācāra narādhama  
daityendraṃ stuhi vīraṃ tvaṃ namaskuru kṛtājaliḥ  jitosmīti vaco dīnaṃ kathayitvā punaḥpunaḥ  
evaṃ kṛte tu mokṣassyādanyathā baṃdhanādi ca  tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya prativākyamuvāca saḥ  
aniruddha uvāca  daityā'dhamasakhe kararpiḍopajīvaka  niśācara durācāra śatrudharmaṃ na vetsi bhoḥ  
dainyaṃ palāyanaṃ cātha śūrasya maraṇādhikam  viruddhaṃ copaśalyaṃ ca bhavediti matirmama  
kṣatriyasya raṇe śreyo maraṇaṃ sanmukhe sadā  na vīramānino bhūmau dīnasyeva kṛtāṃjaliḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityādi vīravākyāni bahūni sa jagāda tam  tadākarṇya sabāṇo'sau vismito'bhūccukopa ca  
tadovāca nabhovāṇī bāṇasyāśvāsanāya hi  śṛṇvatāṃ sarvavīrāṇāmaniruddhasya maṃtriṇaḥ  
vyomavāṇyuvāca  bho bho bāṇa mahāvīra na krodhaṃ kartumarhasi  baliputrosi sumate śivabhakta vicāryatām  
śivassarveśvarassākṣī karmaṇāṃ parameśvaraḥ  tadadhīnamidaṃ sarvaṃ jagadvai sacarācaram  
sa eva kartā bhartā ca saṃhartā jagatāṃ sadā  rajassattvatamodhārī vidhiviṣṇuharātmakaḥ  
sarvasyāṃtargataḥ svāmī prerakassarvataḥ paraḥ  nirvikāryavyayo nityo māyādhīśopi nirguṇaḥ  
tasyecchayā'balo jñeyo balī bali varātmaja  iti vijñāya manasi svastho bhava mahāmate  
garvāpahārī bhagavānnā nālīlāviśāradaḥ  nāśayiṣyati te garvamidānīṃ bhaktavatsalaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityābhāṣya nabhovāṇī virarāma mahāmune  bāṇāsurastadvacanādaniruddhaṃ na jaghnivān  
kiṃ tu svāntaḥpuraṃ gatvā papau pānamanuttamam  madvākyaṃ ca visasmāra vijahāra viruddhadhīḥ  
tatoniruddho baddhastu nāgabhogairviṣolbaṇaiḥ  priyayā'tṛptacetāstu durgāṃ sasmāra tatkṣaṇāt  
aniruddha uvāca  śaraṇye devi baddhosmi dahyamānastu pannagaiḥ  āgaccha me kuru trāṇaṃ yaśode caṃḍaroṣiṇi  
śivabhakte mahādevi sṛṣṭisthityaṃtakāriṇī  tvāṃ vinā rakṣako nānyastasmādrakṣa śive hi mām  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tenetthaṃ toṣitā tatra kālī bhinnāṃjanaprabhā  jyeṣṭhakṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ saṃprāptāsīnmahāniśi  
gurubhirmuṣṭinirghātairdārayāmāsa paṃjaram  śarāṃstānbhasmasātkṛtvā sarparūpānbhayānakān  
mocayitvā niruddhaṃ tu tataścāṃtaḥpuraṃ tataḥ  praveśayitvā durgā tu tatraivādarśanaṃ gatā  
itthaṃ devyāḥ prasādāttu śivaśaktermunīśvara  kṛcchramuktoniruddhobhūtsukhī caiva gatavyathaḥ  
atha labdhajayo bhūtvāniruddhaśśivaśaktitaḥ  prādyumnirbāṇatanayāṃ priyāṃ prāpya mumoda ca  
pūrvaṃvadvijahārāsau tayā svapriyayā sukhī  pītapānassuraktākṣassa bāṇasutayā tataḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe ūṣācaritre aniruddhoṣāvihāravarṇanaṃnāma tripaṃcāśattamo 'dhyāya  
vyāsa uvāca  aniruddhe hṛtai pautre kṛṣṇasya munisattama  kuṃbhāṃḍasutayā kṛṣṇaḥ kimakārṣīddhi tadvada  
sanatkumāra uvāca  tato gate'niruddhe tu tatstrīṇāṃ rodanasvanam  śrutvā ca vyathitaḥ kṛṣṇo babhūva munisattama  
apaśyatāṃ cāniruddhaṃ tadbaṃdhūnāṃ harestathā  catvāro vārṣikā māsā vyatīyuranuśocatām  
nāradāttadupākarṇya vārtāṃ baddhasya karma ca  āsansuvyathitāssarve vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇadevatāḥ  
kṛṣṇastadvṛttamakhilaṃ śrutvā yuddhāya cādarāt  jagāma śoṇitapuraṃ tārkṣyamāhūya tatkṣaṇāt  
pradyumno yuyudhānaśca gatassāṃbotha sāraṇaḥ  naṃdopanaṃdabhadrādyā rāmakṛṣṇānuvartinaḥ  
akṣauhiṇībhirdvādaśabhissametāsarvato diśam  rurudhurbāṇanagaraṃ samaṃtātsātvatarṣabhāḥ  
bhajyamānapurodyānaprākārāṭṭālagopuram  vīkṣyamāṇo ruṣāviṣṭastulyasainyobhiniryayau  
bāṇārthe bhagavān rudrassasutaḥ pramathairvṛtaḥ  āruhya nandivṛṣabhaṃ yuddhaṃ karttuṃ samāyayau  
āsītsutumulaṃ yuddhamadbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇam  kṛṣṇādikānāṃ taistatra rudrādyairbāṇarakṣakaiḥ  
kṛṣṇaśaṃkarayorāsītpradyumnaguhayorapi  kūṣmāṃḍakūpakarṇābhyāṃ balena saha saṃyugaḥ  
sāṃbasya bāṇaputreṇa bāṇena saha sātyakeḥ  nandinā garuḍasyāpi pareṣāṃ ca parairapi  
brahmādayassurādhīśā munayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ  gaṃdharvā'psaraso yānairvimānairdraṣṭumāgaman  
pramathairvividhākārai revatyaṃtaiḥ sudāruṇam  yuddhaṃ babhūva viprendra teṣāṃ ca yaduvaṃśinām  
bhrātrā rāmeṇa sahitaḥ pradyumnena ca dhīmatā  kṛṣṇaścakāra samaramatulaṃ pramathaissaha  
tatrāgninā'bhavadyuddhaṃ yamena varuṇena ca  vimukhena tripādena jvareṇa ca guhena ca  
pramathairvividhākāraisteṣāmanyaṃ tadāruṇam  yuddhaṃ babhūva vikaṭaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ romaharṣaṇam  
vibhīṣikābhirbahvībhiḥ koṭarībhiḥ padepade  nirllajjābhiśca nārībhiḥ prabalābhiradūrataḥ  
śaṃkarānucarāñśaurirbhūtapramathaguhyakān  drāvayāmāsa tīkṣṇāgraiḥ śaraiḥ śārṅgadhanuścyutaiḥ  
evaṃ pradyumnapramukhā vīrā yuddhamahotsavāḥ  cakruryuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ śatrusainyaṃ vināśayan  
viśīryamāṇaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā rudrotyamarṣaṇaḥ  krodhaṃ cakāra sumahannanāda ca maholbaṇam  
tacchrutvā śaṃkaragaṇā vineduryuyudhuśca te  mardayanpratiyoddhāraṃ varddhitāśśaṃbhutejasā  
pṛthagvidhāni cāyuktaṃ śārṅgāstrāṇi pinākine  pratyakṣaiśśamayāmāsa śūlapāṇiravismitaḥ  
brahmāstrasya ca brahmāstraṃ vāyavyasya ca pārvatam  āgneyasya ca pārjanyaṃ naijaṃ nārāyaṇasya ca  
kṛṣṇasainyaṃ vidudrāva prativīreṇa nirjitam  na tasthau samare vyāsa pūrṇarudrasutejasā  
vidrāvite svasainye tu śrīkṛṣṇaśca paraṃtapaḥ  svaṃ jvaraṃ śītalākhyaṃ hi vyasṛjaddāruṇaṃ mune  
vidrāvite kṛṣṇasainye kṛṣṇasya śītalajvaraḥ  abhyapadyata taṃ rudraṃ mune daśadiśo dahan  
maheśvarotha' taṃ dṛṣṭvāyāṃtaṃ svaṃ visṛjajjvaram  māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaśca yuyudhāte jvarāvubhau  
vaiṣṇavo'tha samākradanmāheśvarabalārditaḥ  alabdhvā bhayamanyatra tuṣṭāva vṛṣabhadhvajam  
atha prasanno bhagavānviṣṇujvaranuto haraḥ  viṣṇuśītajvaraṃ prāha śaraṇāgatavatsalaḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  śītajvara prasanno'haṃ vyetu te majjvarādbhayam  yo nau smarati saṃvādaṃ tasya na syājjvarādbhayam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityukto rudramānamya gato nārāyaṇajvaraḥ  taṃ dṛṣṭvā caritaṃ kṛṣṇo visismāya bhayānvitaḥ  
skanda pradyumnabāṇaughairardyamāno'tha kopitaḥ  jaghāna śaktyā pradyumnaṃ daityasaṃghātyamarṣaṇaḥ  
skaṃdaprāptihatastatra pradyumnaḥ prabalopi hi  asṛgvimuṃcangātrebhyo balenāpākramadraṇāt  
kuṃbhāṃḍakūpakarṇābhyāṃ nānāstraiśca samāhataḥ  dudrāva balabhadropi na tasthepi raṇe balī  
kṛtvā sahasraṃ kāyānāṃ pītvā toyaṃ mahārṇavāt  garuḍo nāśayatyarthā''vartairmeghārṇavāṃbubhiḥ  
atha kruddho maheśasya vāhano vṛṣabho balī  vegena mahatāraṃ vai śṛṃgābhyāṃ nijaghāna tam  
śṛṃgaghātaviśīrṇāṃgo garuḍo'tīva vismitaḥ  vidudrāva raṇāttūrṇaṃ vihāya ca janārdanam  
evaṃ jāte caritraṃ tu bhagavāndevakīsutaḥ  uvāca sārathiṃ śīghraṃ rudratejotivismitaḥ  
śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca  he sūta śṛṇu madvākyaṃ rathaṃ me vāhaya drutam  mahādevasamīpastho yathā syāṃ gadituṃ vacaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityukto hariṇā sūto dārukassvaguṇāgraṇīḥ  drutaṃ taṃ vāhayāmāsa rathaṃ rudrasamīpataḥ  
atha vijñāpayāmāsa nato bhūtvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ  śrīkṛṣṇaḥ śaṃkaraṃ bhaktyā prapanno bhaktavatsalam  
śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca  devadeva mahādeva śaraṇāgatavatsala  namāmi tvā'naṃtaśaktiṃ sarvātmānaṃ pareśvaram  
viśvotpattisthānanāśahetuṃ sajjñapti mātrakam  brahmaliṃgaṃ paraṃ śāṃtaṃ kevalaṃ parameśvaram  
kālo daivaṃ karma jīvassvabhāvo dravyameva ca  kṣetraṃ ca prāṇa ātmā ca vikārastatsamūhakaḥ  
bījarohapravāhastu tvanmāyaiṣā jagatprabho  tannibaṃdhaṃ prapadyeha tvāmahaṃ parameśvaram  
nānā bhāvairlīlayaiva svīkṛtairnirjarādikān  nūnaṃ bibhaṣiṃ lokeśo haṃsyunmārgānsvabhāvataḥ  
tvaṃ hi brahma paraṃ jyotirgūḍhaṃ brahmaṇi vāṅmaye  yaṃ paśyaṃtyamalātmānamākāśamiva kevalam  
tvameva cādyaḥ puruṣo'dvitīyasturya ātmadṛk  īśo heturahetuśca savikāraḥ pratīyase  
svamāyayā sarvaguṇaprasiddhyai bhagavanprabho  sarvānvitaḥ prabhinnaśca sarvatastvaṃ maheśvara  
yathaiva sūryo'pihitaśchāyārūpāṇi ca prabho  svacchāyayā saṃcakāsti hyayaṃ paramadṛgbhavān  
guṇenāpihitopi tvaṃ guṇe va guṇān vibho  svapradīpaścakāssi tvaṃ bhūman giriśa śaṃkara  
tvanmāyāmohitadhiyaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu  unmajjaṃti nimajjaṃti prasaktā vṛjinārṇave  
daivadattamimaṃ labdhvā nṛlokamajitendriyaḥ  yo nādriyeta tvatpādau sa śocyo hyātmavaṃcakaḥ  
tvadājñayāhaṃ bhagavānbāṇadośchettumāgataḥ  tvayaiva śapto bāṇo'yaṃ garvito garvahāriṇā  
nivarttasva raṇā ddeva tvacchāpo na vṛthā bhavet  ājñāṃ dehi prabho me tvaṃ bāṇasya bhujakṛṃtane  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityākarṇya vacaśśaṃbhuḥ śrīkṛṣṇasya munīśvara  pratyuvāca prasannātmā kṛṣṇastutyā maheśvaraḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  satyamuktaṃ tvayā tāta mayā śapto hi daityarāṭ  madājñayā bhavānprāpto bāṇadodaṃḍakṛṃtane  
kiṃ karomi ramānātha bhaktādhīnassadā hare  paśyato me kathaṃ vīra syādbāṇabhujakṛṃtanam  
atastvaṃ jṛṃbhaṇāstreṇa māṃ jaṃbhaya madājñayā  tatastvaṃ kuru kāryaṃ svaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca sukhī bhava  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktaśśaṃkareṇātha śārṅgapāṇistu vismitaḥ  svaraṇasthānamāgatya mumoda sa munīśvaraḥ  
jṛṃbhaṇāstraṃ mumocātha saṃdhāya dhanuṣi drutam  pinākapāṇaye vyāsa nānāstrakuśalo hariḥ  
mohayitvā tu giriśaṃ jṛṃbhaṇāstreṇa jṛṃbhitam  bāṇasya pṛtanāṃ śaurirjaghānāsigadarṣṭibhiḥ  
iti śivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe bāṇā'surarudrakṛṣṇādiyuddhavarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥpaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña brahmaputra namostu te  adbhuteyaṃ kathā tāta śrāvitā me tvayā mune  
jṛṃbhite jṛṃbhaṇāstreṇa hariṇā samare hare  hate bāṇabale bāṇaḥ kimakārṣīcca tadvada  
sūta uvāca  ityākarṇya vacastasya vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ  pratyuvāca prasannātmā brahmaputro munīśvaraḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa mahāprājña kathāṃ ca paramādbhutām  kṛṣṇaśaṃkarayostāta lokalīlānusāriṇoḥ  
śayite līlayā rudre saputre sagaṇe sati  bāṇo vinirgato yuddhaṃ kartuṃ kṛṣṇena daityarāṭ  
kuṃbhāṃḍasaṃgṛhītāśvo nānāśastrāstradhṛk tataḥ  cakāra yuddhamatulaṃ baliputro mahābalaḥ  
dṛṣṭvā nijabalaṃ naṣṭaṃ sa daityendro'tyamarṣitaḥ  cakāra yuddhamatulaṃ bali putro mahābalaḥ  
śrīkṛṣṇopi mahāvīro giriśāptamahābalaḥ  uccairjagarja tatrājau bāṇaṃ matvā tṛṇopamam  
dhanuṣṭaṃkārayāmāsa śārṅgākhyaṃ nijamadbhutam  trāsayanbāṇasainyaṃ tadavaśiṣṭaṃ munīśvara  
tena nādena mahatā dhanuṣṭaṃkārajena hi  dyāvābhūmyoraṃtaraṃ vai vyāptamāsīdanaṃtaram  
cikṣepa vividhānbāṇānbāṇāya kupito hariḥ  karṇāntaṃ tadvikṛṣyātha tīkṣṇānāśīviṣopamān  
āyātāṃstānnirīkṣyā'tha sa bāṇo balinandanaḥ  aprāptāneva ciccheda svaśaraissvadhanuścyutaiḥ  
punarjagarja sa vibhurbāṇo vairigaṇārdanaḥ  tatrasurvṛṣṇayassarve kṛṣṇātmāno vicetasaḥ  
smṛtvā śivapadāmbhojaṃ cikṣepa nijasāyakān  sa kṛṣṇāyātiśūrāya mahāgarvo balessutaḥ  
kṛṣṇopi tānasaṃprāptānacchinatsaśarairdrutam  smṛtvā śivapadāmbhojamamarāri mahābalaḥ  
rāmādayo vṛṣṇayaśca svaṃsvaṃ yoddhāramāhave  nijaghnurbalinassarve kṛtvā krodhaṃ samākulāḥ  
itthaṃ cirataraṃ tatra balinośca dvayorapi  babhūva tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ vismayāvaham  
tasminnavasare tatra krodhaṃ kṛtvā'tipakṣirāṭ  bāṇāsurabalaṃ sarvaṃ pakṣāghātairamardayat  
marditaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā mardayaṃtaṃ ca taṃ balī  cukopāti baleḥ putraḥ śaivarāḍ ditijeśvaraḥ  
smṛtvā śivapadāmbhojaṃ sahasrabhujavāndrutam  mahatparākramaṃ cakre vairiṇāṃ dussahaṃ sa vai  
cikṣepa yugapadbāṇānamitāṃstatra vīrahā  kṛṣṇādisarvayaduṣu garuḍe ca pṛthakpṛthak  
jaghānaikena garuḍaṃ kṛṣṇamekena pattriṇā  balamekena ca mune parānapi tathā balī  
tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahāvīryo viṣṇurūpassurārihā  cukopātiraṇe tasmiñjagarja ca maheśvaraḥ  
jaghāna bāṇaṃ tarasā śārṅganissṛtasaccharaiḥ  ati tadbalamatyugraṃ yugapatsmṛtaśaṃkaraḥ  
ciccheda taddhanuśśīghraṃ chatrādikamanā kulaḥ  hayāṃśca pātayāmāsa hatvā tānsvaśarairhariḥ  
bāṇo'pi ca mahāvīro jagarjāti prakupya ha  kṛṣṇaṃ jaghāna gadayā so'pataddharaṇītale  
utthāyāraṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇo yuyudhe tena śatruṇā  śivabhaktena devarṣe lokalīlā'nusārataḥ  
evaṃ dvayościraṃ kāla babhūva sumahānraṇaḥ  śivarūpo hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sa ca śaivottamo balī  
kṛṣṇo'tha kṛtvā samaraṃ ciraṃ bāṇena vīryavān  śivā''jñayā prāptabalaścukopāti munīśvaraḥ  
tatassudarśanenāśu kṛṣṇo bāṇabhujānbahūn  ciccheda bhagavāñśaṃbhu śāsanātparavīrahā  
avaśiṣṭā bhujāstasya catvāro'tīva sundarāḥ  gatavyatho babhūvāśu śaṃkarasya prasādataḥ  
gatasmṛtiryadā bāṇa śiraśchettuṃ samudyataḥ  kṛṣṇo vīratvamāpannastadā rudrassamutthitaḥ  
rudra uvāca  bhagavandevakīputra yadājñaptaṃ mayā purā  tatkṛtaṃ ca tvayā vipra madājñākāriṇā sadā  
mā bāṇasya śiraśchiṃdhi saṃharasva sudarśanam  madājñayā cakramidaṃ syānmoghaṃ majjane sadā  
dattaṃ mayā purā tubhyamanivāryaṃ raṇe tava  cakraṃ jayaṃ ca govinda nivartasva raṇāttataḥ  
dadhīce rāvaṇe vīre tārakādipureṣvapi  vinā madājñāṃ lakṣmīśa rathāṅgaṃ nāmucaḥ purā  
tvaṃ tu yogīśvarasssākṣātparamātmā janārdana  vicāryatāṃ svamanasā sarvabhūtahite rataḥ  
varamasya mayā dattaṃ na mṛtyurbhayamasti vai  tanme vacassadā satyaṃ parituṣṭosmyahaṃ tava  
purā'yaṃ garvito matto yuddhaṃ dehīti me'bravīt  bhujānkaṇḍūyamānastu vismṛtātmagatirhare  
tadāhamaśapaṃ taṃ vai bhujacchettā''gamiṣyati  acireṇātikālena gatagarvo bhaviṣyasi  
madājñayā hariḥ prāpto bhujacchettā tavā'tha vai  nivartasva raṇādgaccha svagṛhaṃ savadhūvaraḥ  
ityuktaḥ sa tayomaitrīṃ kārayitvā maheśvaraḥ  tamamujñāpya sagaṇaḥ saputraḥ svālayaṃ yayau  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  ityākarṇya vacaśśaṃbhossaṃhṛtya ca sudarśanam  akṣatāṃgastu vijayī tatkṛṣṇoṃtaḥpuraṃ yayau  
aniruddhaṃ samāśvāsya sahitaṃ bhāryayā punaḥ  jagrāha ratnasaṃghātaṃ bāṇadattamanekaśaḥ  
tatsakhīṃ citralekhāṃ ca gṛhītvā parayoginīm  prasanno'bhūttataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtakāryaḥ śivājñayā  
hṛdā praṇamya giriśamāmaṃtrya ca balestutam  parivārasametastu jagāma svapurīṃ hariḥ  
pathi jitvā ca varuṇaṃ viruddhaṃ tamanekadhā  dvārakāṃ ca purīṃ prāptassamutsavasamanvitaḥ  
visarjayitvā garuḍaṃ sakhīnvīkṣyopahasya ca  dvārakāyāṃ tato dṛṣṭvā kāmacārī cacāra ha  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ paṃcame yuddhakhaṃḍe bāṇabhujakṛṃtanagarvāpahāravarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ  
 nārada uvāca  kṛṣṇe gate dvārakāyāma niruddhena bhāryayā  akārṣītkiṃ tato bāṇastattvaṃ vada mahāmune  
sanatkumāra uvāca  kṛṣṇe gate dvārakāyāmaniruddhena bhāryayā  duḥkhito'bhūttato bāṇassvājñānaṃ saṃsmaranhṛdā  
tato nandīśivagaṇo bāṇaṃ provāca duḥkhitam  daityaṃ śoṇitadigdhāṃgamanutā pasamanvitam  
 nandīśvara uvāca  bāṇa śaṃkarasadbhakta mānutāpaṃ kuruṣva bhoḥ  bhaktānukaṃpī śaṃbhurvai bhaktavatsalanāmadhṛk  
tadicchayā ca yajjātaṃ tajjātamiti cetasā  manyasva bhaktaśārdūla śivaṃ smara punaḥpunaḥ  
mana ādye samādhāya kuru nityaṃ maho tsavam  bhaktānukaṃpanaścā'sya śaṃkarasya punaḥpunaḥ  
nandivākyāttato bāṇo dviṣā śīrṣakamātrakaḥ  śivasthānaṃ jagāmāśu dhṛtvā dhairyaṃ mahāmanāḥ  
gatvā tatra prabhuṃ natvā rurodātīva vihvalaḥ  gatagarvavrajo bāṇaḥ premākulitamānasaḥ  
saṃstuvanvividhaiḥ stotrai ssaṃnamannutitastathā  yathocitaṃ pādaghātaṃ kurvanvikṣepayankarān  
nanarta tāṃḍavaṃ mukhyaṃ pratyālīḍhādiśobhitam  sthānakairvividhākārairālīḍhapramukhairapi  
sukhavādasahasrāṇi bhrūkṣepasahitānyapi  śiraḥkampasahasrāṇi prāptānīkaḥ sahasraśaḥ  
vārīśca vividhākārā darśayitvā śanaiśśanaḥ  tathā śoṇitadhārābhissiñcayitvā mahītalam  
rudraṃ prasādayāmāsa śūlinaṃ candra śekharam  bāṇāsuro mahābhakto vismṛtātmagatirnataḥ  
tato nṛtyaṃ mahatkṛtvā bhagavānbhaktavatsalaḥ  uvāca bāṇaṃ saṃhṛṣṭo nṛtya gītapriyo haraḥ  
rudra uvāca  bāṇa tāta baleḥ putra saṃtuṣṭo nartanena te  varaṃ gṛhāṇa daityendra yatte manasi vartate  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityākarṇya vacaśśaṃmbhordaityendreṇa tadā mune  bāṇena saṃvṛṇīto'bhūdvarastu vraṇaropaṇe  
bāhuyuddhasya coddha ttirgāṇapatyamathākṣayam  uṣāputrasya rājyaṃ tu tasmiñśoṇitakāhvaye  
nirvairatā ca vibudhairviṣṇunā ca viśeṣataḥ  na punardaityatā duṣṭā rajasā tamasā yutā  
śaṃbhubhaktirviśeṣeṇa nirvikārā sadā mune  śivabhakteṣu ca sneho dayā sarveṣu jaṃtuṣu  
kṛtvā varāñśaṃbhorbaliputro mahā'suraḥ  premṇā'śrunayano rudraṃ tuṣṭāva sukṛtāṃjaliḥ  
bāṇa uvāca  devadeva mahādeva śaraṇā gatavatsala  tvāṃ namāmi maheśāna dīnabandho dayānidhe  
kṛtā mayi kṛpātīva kṛpāsāgara śaṃkara  garvopahāritassarvaḥ prasannena mama prabho  
tvaṃ brahma paramātmā hi sarvavyāpyakhileśvaraḥ  brahmāṃḍatanurugreśo virāṭ sarvānvitaḥ paraḥ  
nābhirnabho'gnirvadanamaṃbu reto diśaḥ śrutiḥ  dyauśśīrṣamaṃghrirurvī te manaścandrastava prabho  
dṛgarko jaṭharaṃ vārddhirbhujeṃdro dhiṣaṇā vidhiḥ  prajāpatirvisargaśca dharmo hi hṛdayaṃ tava  
romāṇyauṣadhayo nātha keśā jalamucastava  guṇāstrayastrinetrāṇi sarvātmā puruṣo bhavān  
brāhmaṇaṃ te mukhaṃ prāhurbāhuṃ kṣatriyameva ca  ūrujaṃ vaiśyamāhuste pādajaṃ śūdrameva ca  
tvameva sarvadopāsyassarvairjīvairmaheśvara  tvāṃ bhajanparamāṃ muktiṃ labhate puruṣo dhruvam  
yastvāṃ visṛjate martya ātmānaṃ priyamīśvaram  viparyayendriyārthārthaṃ viṣamattyamṛtaṃ tyajan  
viṣṇurbrahmā'tha vibudhā munayaścāmalāśayāḥ  sarvātmanā prapannāstvāṃ śaṃkaraṃ priyamīśvaram  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā baliputrastu virarāma śarāsuraḥ  premapraphullitāṃgaśca praṇamya sa maheśvaram  
iti śrutvā svabhaktasya bāṇasya bhagavānbhavaḥ  sarvaṃ labhiṣyasītyuktvā tatraivāṃtaradhīyata  
tataśśaṃbhoḥ prasādena mahākālatvamāgataḥ  rudrasyānucaro bāṇo mahāpramudito'bhavat  
iti kila śaranāmnaḥ śaṃkarasyāpi vṛttaṃ sakalaguru janānāṃ sadgurośśūlapāṇeḥ  kathitamiha variṣṭhaṃ śrotraramyairvacobhissakalabhuvanamadhye krīḍamānasya nityam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitī yāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ paṃ yuddhakhaṃḍe bāṇāsuragaṇapatvaprāptivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa mahāpremṇā caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  yathā'vadhīttriśūlena dānavendraṃ gajāsuram  
dānave nihate devyā samare mahiṣāsure  devānāṃ ca hitārthāya purā devāḥ sukhaṃ yayuḥ  
tasya putro mahāvīro munīśvara gajāsuraḥ  piturvadhaṃ hi saṃsmṛtya kṛtaṃ devyā surārthanāt  
sa tadvairamanusmṛtya taporthaṃ gatavānvane  samuddiśya vidhiṃ prītyā tatāpa paramaṃ tapaḥ  
avadhyohaṃ bhaviṣyāmi strīpuṃsaiḥ kāmanirjitaḥ  saṃvicāryeti manasā'bhūttaporatamānasaḥ  
sa tepe himavaddroṇyāṃ tapaḥ paramadāru ṇam  ūrddhvabāhurnabhodṛṣṭiḥ pādāṃguṣṭhāśritāvaniḥ  
jaṭābhāraissa vai reje pralayārka ivāṃśubhiḥ  mahiṣāsuraputro'sau gajāsura udāradhīḥ  
tasya mūrdhnaḥ samudbhūtassadhūmognistapomayaḥ  tiryagūrdhvamadholokāstāpayanviṣvagīritaḥ  
cukṣubhurnadyudanvaṃtaścāgnermūrddhasamudbhavāt  nipetussagrahāstārā jajvaluśca diśo daśa  
tena taptāsturāssarve divaṃ tyaktvā savāsavāḥ  brahmalokaṃ yayurvijñāpayāmāsuścacāla bhūḥ  
devā ūcuḥ  vidhe gajāsuratapastaptā vayamathākulāḥ  na śaknumo divi sthātumataste śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ  
vidhehyupaśamaṃ tasya cānyāñjīvayituṃ kṛpā  lokā naṃkṣyatyanyathā hi satyaṃsatyaṃ bruvāmahe  
iti vijñāpito devairvāsavādyaissa ātmabhūḥ  bhṛgudakṣādibhirbrahmā yayau daityavarāśramam  
tapaṃtaṃ tapasā lokā nyathā'bhrāpihitaṃ divi  vilakṣya vismitaḥ prāha vihasansṛṣṭikārakaḥ  
brahmovāca  uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha daityendra tapassiddhosi māhiṣe  prāpto'haṃ varadastāta varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  utthāyotthāya daityendra īkṣamāṇo dṛśā vibhum  girā gadgadayā prīto'gṛṇāddevaṃ sa māhiṣiḥ  
gajāsura uvāca  namaste devadeveśa yadi dāsyasi me varam  avadhyo'haṃ bhaveyaṃ vai strīpuṃsaiḥ kāmanirjitaiḥ  
mahābalo mahāvīryo'jeyo devādibhissadā  sarveṣāṃ lokapālānāṃ nikhilarddhisubhugvibho  
sanatkumāra uvāca  evaṃ vṛtaśśatadhṛtirdānavena sa tena vai  prādāttattapasā prīto varaṃ tasya sudurlabham  
evaṃ labdhavaro daityo māhiṣiśca gajāsuraḥ  suprasannamanāsso'tha svadhāma pratyapadyata  
sa vijitya diśassarvā lokāṃśca trīnmahāsuraḥ  devāsuramanuṣyendrāngaṃdharvagaruḍoragān  
ityādīnnikhilāñjitvā vaśamānīya viśvajit  jahāra lokapālānāṃ sthānāni saha tejasā  
devodyānaśriyā juṣṭamadhyāste sma triviṣṭapam  mahendrabhavanaṃ sākṣānnirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā  
tasminmahendrasya gṛhe mahābalo mahāmanā nirjitaloka ekarāṭ  reme'bhivaṃdyāṃghriyugaḥ surādibhiḥ pratāpitairūrjitacaṃḍaśāsanaḥ  
sa itthaṃ nirjitakakubekarāḍ viṣayānpriyān  yathopajoṣaṃ bhuṃjāno nātṛpyadajitendriyaḥ  
evamaiśvaryamattasya dṛptasyocchāstravartinaḥ  kāle vyatīte mahati pāpabuddhirabhūttataḥ  
mahiṣāsuraputro'sau saṃcikleśa dvijānvarān  tāpasānnitarāṃ pṛthvyāṃ dānavassukhamardanaḥ  
surānnarāṃśca pramathānsarvāñcikleśa durmatiḥ  dharmānvitānviśeṣeṇa pūrvavairamanusmaran  
ekasminsamaye tāta dānavo'sau mahābalaḥ  agacchadrājadhānīṃ va śaṃkarasya gajāsuraḥ  
samāgate'surendre hi mahānkalakalo mune  trātatrāteti tatrāsīdānaṃdanavāsinām  
mahiṣā'suraputro'sau yadā puryāṃ samāgataḥ  pramathanpramathānsarvānnijavīryamadoddhataḥ  
tasminnavasare devāśśakrādyāstatparājitāḥ  śivasya śaraṇaṃ jagmurnatvā tuṣṭuvurādarāt  
nyavedayandānavasya tasya kāśyāṃ samāgamam  kleśādhikyaṃ tatratyānāṃ tannāthānāṃ viśeṣataḥ  
devā ūcuḥ  devadeva mahādeva tava puryāṃ gatosuraḥ  kaṣṭaṃ datte tvajjanānāṃ taṃ jahi tvaṃ kṛpānidhe  
yatrayatra dharāyāṃ ca caraṇaṃ pramiṇoti hi  acalāṃ sacalāṃ tatra karoti nija bhārataḥ  
ūruvegena taravaḥ pataṃti śikharaissaha  yasya dordaṃḍaghātena cūrṇā syuśca śiloccayāḥ  
yasya maulijasaṃgharṣādghanā vyoma tyajaṃtyapi  nīlimānaṃ na cādyāpi jahyustatkeśasaṃgajam  
yasya viśvāsasaṃbhārairuttaraṃgā mahābdhayaḥ  nadyopyamandakallolā bhavaṃti timibhissaha  
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi nava yasya samucchrayaḥ  tāvāneva hi vistārastanormāyāvino'sya hi  
yannetrayoḥ piṃgalimā tathā taralimā punaḥ  vidyutāḥ nohyate'dyāpi so'yaṃ smā''yāti satvaram  
yāṃ yāṃ diśaṃ samabhyeti soyaṃ dussaha dānavaḥ  avadhyo'haṃ bhavāmīti strīpuṃsaiḥ kāmanirjitaiḥ  
ityevaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ tasya dānavasya niveditam  rakṣasva bhaktāndeveśa kāśīrakṣaṇatatpara  
sanatkumāra uvāca  iti saṃprārthito devairbhaktarakṣaṇatatparaḥ  tatrā''jagāma soraṃ tadvadhakāmanayā haraḥ  
āgataṃ taṃ samālokya śaṃkaraṃ bhaktavatsalam  triśūlahastaṃ garjaṃtaṃ jagarja sa gajāsuraḥ  
tatastayormahānāsītsamaro dāruṇo'dbhutaḥ  nānāstraśastrasaṃpātairvīrārāvaṃ prakurvatoḥ  
gajāsurotitejasvī mahābalaparākramaḥ  vivyādha giriśaṃ bāṇaistīkṣṇairdānavaghātinam  
atha rudro raudratanuḥ svaśarairatidāruṇaiḥ  taccharāṃścicchide tūrṇamaprāptāṃstilaśo mune  
tato gajāsuraḥ kuddho'bhyadhāvattaṃ maheśvaram  khaḍgahastaḥ pragarjyoccairhatosītyadya vai mayā  
tatastriśūlahetistamāyāṃtaṃ daityapuṃgavam  vijñāyāvadhyamanyena śūlenābhijaghāna tam  
protastena triśūlena sa ca daityo gajāsuraḥ  chatrīkṛtamivātmānaṃ manyamānā jagau haram  
gajāsura uvāca  devadeva mahādeva tava bhakto'smi sarvathā  jāne tvāṃ tridiveśānaṃ triśūlinsmarahāriṇam  
tava haste mama vadho mahāśreyaskaro mataḥ  aṃdhakāre maheśāna tripurāṃtaka sarvaga  
kiṃcidvijñaptumicchāmi tacchṛṇuṣva kṛpākara  satyaṃ bravīmi nāsatyaṃ mṛtyuṃjaya vicāraya  
tvameko jagatāṃ vaṃdyo viśvasyopari saṃsthitaḥ  kālena sarvairmartavyaṃ śreyase mṛtyurīdṛśaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityākarṇya vacastasya śaṃkaraḥ karuṇānidhiḥ  prahasya pratyuvāceśo māhiṣeyaṃ gajāsuram  
īśvara uvāca  mahāparākramanidhe dānavottama sanmate  gajāsura prasannosmi svānakūlaṃ varaṃ vṛṇu  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityākarṇya maheśasya vacanaṃ varadasya hi  pratyuvāca prasannātmā dānavendro gajāsuraḥ  
gajāsura uvāca  yadi prasanno digvāsastadā dityaṃ vasāna me  imāṃ kṛttiṃ maheśāna tvattriśūlāgnipāvitām  
svapramāṇāṃ sukhasparśāṃ raṇāṃgaṇapaṇīkṛtām  darśanīyāṃ mahādivyāṃ sarvadaiva sukhāvahām  
iṣṭagaṃdhissadaivāstu sadaivāstvatikomalā  sadaiva nirmalā cāstu sadaivāstvatimaṃḍanām  
mahātaponalajvālāṃ prāpyāpi suciraṃ vibho  na dagdhā kṛttireṣā me puṇyagaṃdhanidhestataḥ  
yadi puṇyavatī naiṣā mama kṛtti digaṃbara  tadā tvadaṃgasaṃgosyāḥ kathaṃ jāto raṇāṃgaṇe  
anyaṃ ca me varaṃ dehi yadi tuṣṭo'si śaṃkara  nāmāstu kṛttivāsāste prārabhyādyatanaṃ dinam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śrutveti sa vacastasya śaṃkaro bhaktavatsalaḥ  tathetyuvāca suprīto mahiṣāsurajaṃ ca tam  
punaḥ provāca prītātmā dānavaṃ taṃ gajāsuram  bhaktapriyo maheśāno bhaktinirmalamānasam  
īśvara uvāca  idaṃ puṇyaṃ śarīraṃ te kṣetre'sminmuktisādhane  mama liṃgaṃ bhavatvatra sarveṣāṃ muktidāyakam  
kṛttivāseśvaraṃ nāma mahāpātakanāśanam  sarveṣāmeva liṃgānāṃ śirobhūtaṃ vimuktidam  
kathayitveti deveśastatkṛtiṃ parigṛhya ca  gajāsurasya mahatīṃ prāvṛṇoddhi digaṃbaraḥ  
mahāmahotsavo jātastasminnahni munīśvara  harṣamāpurjanāssarve kāśīsthāḥ pramathāstathā  
hari brahmādayo devā harṣanirbharamānasāḥ  tuṣṭuvustaṃ maheśānaṃ natvā sāṃjalayastataḥ  
hate tasmindānaveśe māhiṣe hi gajāsure  svasthānaṃ bhejire devā jagatsvāsthyamavāpa ca  
ityuktaṃ caritaṃ śaṃbhorbhaktavātsalyasūcakam  svargyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ dhanadhānyapravarddhanam  
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyātprītyā śrāvayedvā śucivrataḥ  sa bhuktvā ca mahāsaukhyaṃ labhetāṃte paraṃ sukham  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe gajāsuravadho nāma saptapaṃcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa pravakṣyāmi caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  yathā duṃdubhinirhrādamavadhīdditijaṃ haraḥ  
hiraṇyākṣe hate daitye ditiputre mahābale  viṣṇudevena kālena prāpa dukhaṃ pahadditiḥ  
daityo duṃdubhinirhrādo duṣṭaḥ prahlādamātulaḥ  sāṃtvayāmāsa tāṃ vāgbhirduḥkhitāṃ devaduḥkhadaḥ  
atha daityassa māyāvī ditimāśvāsya daityarāṭ  devāḥ kathaṃ sujeyāḥ syurityupāyamarcitayat  
devaiśca ghātito vīro hiraṇyākṣo mahāsuraḥ  viṣṇunā ca saha bhrātrā sacchalairdetyavairibhiḥ  
kiṃbalāśca kimāhārā kimādhārā hi nirjarāḥ  mayā kathaṃ sujeyāssyurityupāyamaciṃtayat  
vicārya bahuśo daityastattvaṃ vijñāya niścitam  avaśyamagrajanmāno hetavo'tra vicārataḥ  
brāhmaṇānhaṃtumasakṛdanvadhāvata vai tataḥ  daityo dundubhinirhrādo devavairī mahākhalaḥ  
yataḥ kratubhujo devāḥ kratavo vedasaṃbhavāḥ  te vedā brāhmaṇādhārāstato devabalaṃ dvijāḥ  
niścitaṃ brāhmaṇādhārāssarve vedāssavāsavāḥ  gīrvāṇā brāhmaṇabalā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  
brāhmaṇā yadi naṣṭāssyurvedā naṣṭāstatastvayam  atasteṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu vinaṣṭāḥ satataṃ surāḥ  
yajñeṣu nāśaṃ gacchatsu hatāhārāstatassurāḥ  nirbalāssukhajayyāḥ syurnirjiteṣu sureṣvatha  
ahameva bhaviṣyāmi mānyastrijagatīpatiḥ  ahariṣyāmi devā nāmakṣayāssarvasaṃpadaḥ  
nirvekṣyāmi sukhānyeva rājye nihatakaṃṭake  iti niścitya durbuddhiḥ punaściṃtitavānkhalaḥ  
dvijāḥ kva saṃti bhūyāṃso brahmatejotibṛṃhitā  śrutyadhyanasaṃpannāstapobalasamanvitāḥ  
bhūyasāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu sthānaṃ vārāṇasī khalu  tāmādāvupasaṃhṛtya yāyāṃ tīrthāṃtaraṃ tataḥ  
yatra yatra hi tīrtheṣu yatra yatrāśrameṣu ca  saṃti sarve'grajanmānaste mayādyāssamaṃtataḥ  
iti duṃdubhinirhrādo matiṃ kṛtvā kulocitām  prāpyāpi kāśīṃ durvṛtto māyāvī nyavadhīddvijān  
samitkuśānsamādātuṃ yatra yāṃti dvijottamāḥ  araṇye tatra tānsarvānsa bhakṣayati durmatiḥ  
yathā ko'pi na vettyevaṃ tathā'cchanno'bhavatpunaḥ  vane vanecaro bhūtvā yādorūpo jalāśaye  
adṛśyarūpī māyāvī devānāmapyagocaraḥ  divā dhyānaparastiṣṭhenmunivanmunimadhyagaḥ  
praveśamuṭajānāṃ ca nirgamaṃ hi vilokayan  yāminyāṃ vyāghrarūpeṇābhakṣayadbrāhmaṇānbahūn  
niśśaṃkambhakṣayatyevaṃ na tyajatyapi kīkaśam  itthaṃ nipātitāstena viprā duṣṭena bhūriśaḥ  
ekadā śivarātrau tu bhaktastveko nijoṭaje  saparyāṃ devadevasya kṛtvā dhyānasthito'bhavat  
sa ca duṃdubhinirhrādo daityendro baladarpitaḥ  vyāghrarūpaṃ samāsthāya tamādātuṃ matiṃ dadhe  
taṃ bhaktaṃ dhyānamāpannaṃ dṛḍhacittaṃ śivekṣaṇe  kṛtāstramantravinyāsaṃ taṃ krāṃtumaśakanna saḥ  
atha sarvaṃ gataśśambhurjñātvā tasyāśayaṃ haraḥ  daityasya duṣṭarūpasya vadhāya vidadhe dhiyam  
yāvadāditsati vyāghrastāvadāvirabhūddharaḥ  jagadrakṣāmaṇistryakṣo bhaktarakṣaṇadakṣadhīḥ  
rudramāyāṃtamālokya tadbhaktārcitaliṃgataḥ  daityastenaiva rūpeṇa vavṛdhe bhūdharopamaḥ  
sāvajñamatha sarvajñaṃ yāvatpaśyati dānavaḥ  tāvadāyātamādāya kakṣāyaṃtre nyapīḍayat  
paṃcāsyastvatha paṃcāsyaṃ muṣṭyā mūrddhanyatāḍayata  bhaktavatsalanāmāsau vajrādapi kaṭhorayā  
sa tena muṣṭighātena kakṣāniṣpeṣaṇena ca  atyārtamāraṭadvyāghro rodasīṃ pūrayanmṛtaḥ  
tena nādena mahatā saṃpravepitamānasāḥ  tapodhanāssamājagmurniśi śabdānusārataḥ  
atreśvaraṃ samālokya kakṣīkṛtamṛgeśvaram  tuṣṭuvuḥ praṇatāssarve śarvaṃ jayajayākṣaraiḥ  
brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ  paritrātāḥ paritrātāḥ pratyūhāddāruṇāditaḥ  anugrahaṃ kuruṣveśa tiṣṭhātraiva jagadguro  
anenaiva svarūpeṇa vyāghreśa iti nāmataḥ  kuru rakṣāṃ mahādeva jyeṣṭhasthānasya sarvadā  
anyebhyo hyupasargebhyo rakṣa nastīrthavāsinaḥ  duṣṭānaṣṭāsya gaurīśa bhaktebhyo dehi cābhayam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ bhaktānāṃ candraśekharaḥ  tathetyuktvā punaḥ prāha sa bhaktānbhaktavatsalaḥ  
maheśvara uvāca  yo māmanena rūpeṇa drakṣyati śraddhayātra vai  tasyopasargasaṃdhānaṃ pātayiṣyāmyasaṃśayam  
maccaritramidaṃ śrutvā smṛtvā liṃgamidaṃ hṛdi  saṃgrāme praviśanmartyo jayamāpnotyasaṃśayam  
etasminnaṃtare devāssamājagmussavāsavāḥ  jayeti śabdaṃ kurvaṃto mahotsavapurassaram  
praṇamya śaṃkaraṃ premṇā sarve sāṃjalayassurāḥ  nataskaṃdhāḥ suvāgbhiste tuṣṭuvurbhaktavatsalam  
devā ūcuḥ  jaya śaṃkara deveśa praṇatārtihara prabho  etadduṃdubhinirhrādavadhāttrātā vayaṃ surāḥ  
sadā rakṣā prakartavyā bhaktānāṃ bhaktavatsala  vadhyāḥ khalāśca deveśa tvayā sarveśvara prabho  
ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ surāṇāṃ parameśvaraḥ  tathetyuktvā prasannātmā tasmiṃlliṃge layaṃ yayau  
savismayāstato devāssvaṃsvaṃ dhāma yayurmudā  te'pi viprā mahāharṣātpunaryātā yathāgatam  
idaṃ caritraṃ parama vyāghreśvarasamudbhavam  śṛṇuyācchrāvayedvāpi paṭhedvā pāṭhayettathā  
sarvānkāmānavāpnoti narassvamanasesitān  paratra labhate mokṣaṃ sarvaduḥkhavivarjitaḥ  
idamākhyānamatulaṃ śivalīlā mṛtākṣaram  svargyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ putrapautrapravarddhanam  
paraṃ bhaktipradaṃ dhanyaṃ śivaprītikaraṃ śivam  paramajñānadaṃ ramyaṃ vikāraharaṇaṃ param  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvi rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañca yuddhakhaṇḍe duṃdubhinirhrādadaityavadhavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa susaṃprītyā caritaṃ parameśituḥ  yathāvadhītsvapriyayā daityamuddiśya saṃjñayā  
āstāṃ purā mahādaityo vidalotpalasaṃjñakau  apuṃvadhyau mahāvīrau sudṛptau varato vidheḥ  
tṛṇīkṛtatrijagatī puruṣābhyāṃ svadorba lāt  tābhyāṃ sarve surā brahman daityābhyāṃ nirjitā raṇe  
tābhyāṃ parājitā devā vidheste śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ  natvā taṃ vidhivatsarve kathayāmāsurādarāta  
iti brahmā hyavocattān devyā vadhyau ca tau dhruvam  dhairyyaṃ kuruta saṃsmṛtya saśivaṃ śivamādarāt  
bhaktavatsalanāmāsau saśivaśśaṃkaraśśivaḥ  śaṃ kariṣyatyadīrgheṇa kālena parameśvaraḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktvā tāṃstato brahmā tūṣṇīmāsīcchivaṃ smaran  tepi devā mudaṃ prāpya svaṃsvaṃ dhāma yayustadā  
atha nāradadevarṣiśśivapreraṇayā tadā  gatvā tadīyabhavanaṃ śivāsauṃdaryamājagau  
śrutvā tadvacanaṃ daityāvāstāṃ māyāvimohitau  devīṃ parijihīrṣū tau viṣameṣu prapīḍitau  
vicārayāmāsatustau kadā kutra śivā ca sā  bhaviṣyati vidheḥ prāptodayānnāviti sarvadā  
ekasminsamaye śaṃbhurvijahāra sulīlayā  kautukenaiva cikrīḍe śivā kandukalīlayā  
sakhībhissaha suprītyā kautukācchivasannidhau  
udaṃcaṃtyaṃcadaṃgānāṃ lāghavaṃ paritanvatī  niśvāsāmodamuditabhramarākulitekṣaṇā  
bhraśyaddhammillasanmālyasvapurīkṛtabhūmikā  svidyatkapolapatrālīsravadaṃbukaṇojjvalā  
sphuṭaccolāṃśukapathatiryadaṃgaprabhāvṛtā  ullasatkaṃdukāsphālātiśroṇitakarāmbujā  
kaṃdukānugasaddṛṣṭinartitabhrūlatāṃcalā  mṛḍānī kila khelaṃtī dadṛśe jagadambikā  
aṃtarikṣacarābhyāṃ ca ditijābhyāṃ kaṭā kṣitā  kroḍīkṛtābhyāmiva vai samupasthitamṛtyunā  
vidalotpalasaṃjñābhyāṃ dṛptābhyāṃ varato vidheḥ  tṛṇīkṛtatrijagatī puruṣābhyāṃ svadorbalāt  
devīṃ tāṃ saṃjihīrṣaṃtau viṣameṣu prapīḍitau  diva utteratuḥ kṣipraṃ māyāṃ svīkṛtya śāṃbarīm  
dhṛtvā pāriṣadīṃ māyāmāyātāvaṃbikāṃtikam  tāvatyaṃtaṃ sudurvṛttāvaticaṃcalamānasau  
atha duṣṭanihaṃtrā vai sāvajñena hareṇa tau  vijñātau ca kṣaṇādāstāṃ cāṃcalyāllocanodbhavāt  
kaṭākṣitātha devena durgā durgatighātinī  daityāvimāmiti gaṇau neti sarvasvarūpiṇā  
atha sā netrasaṃjñāṃ svasvāminastāṃ bubodha ha  mahākautukinastāta śaṃkarasya pareśituḥ  
tato vijñāya saṃjñāṃ tāṃ sarvajñārddhaśarīriṇī  tenaiva kaṃdukenātha yugapannirjaghāna tau  
mahābalau mahādevyā kaṃdukena samāhatau  paribhramya paribhramya tau duṣṭau vinipetatuḥ  
vṛntādiva phale pakve tālenānilalolite  daṃbholinā parihate śṛṃge iva mahāgireḥ  
tau nipātya mahādaityāvakāryakaraṇodyatau  tataḥ pariṇatiṃ yāto liṃgarūpeṇa kaṃdukaḥ  
kaṃdukeśvarasaṃjñāṃ ca talliṃgamabhavattadā  jyeṣṭheśvarasamīpe tu sarvaduṣṭanivāraṇam  
etasminneva samaye haribrahmādayassurāḥ  śivāvirbhāvamājñāya ṛṣayaśca samāyayuḥ  
atha sarve surāśśambhorvarānprāpya tadājñayā  svadhāmāni yayuḥ prītāstathā kāśīnivāsinaḥ  
sāṃbikaṃ śaṃkaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭāśca te  praṇamya tuṣṭuvurbhaktyā vāgbhiriṣṭābhirādarāt  
sāṃbiko'pi śivo vyāsa krīḍitvā suvihāravit  jagāma svālayaṃ prītassagaṇo bhaktavatsalaḥ  
kaṃdukeśvaraliṃgaṃ ca kāśyāṃ duṣṭanibarhaṇam  bhuktimuktipradaṃ sarvakāmadaṃ sarvadā satām  
idamākhyānamatulaṃ śṛṇuyādyo mudānvitaḥ  śrāvayedvā paṭhedyaśca tasya duḥkhabhayaṃ kutaḥ  
iha sarvasukhaṃ bhuktvā nānāvidhamanuttamam  paratra labhate divyāṃ gatiṃ vai devadurlabhām  
iti taṃ varṇitaṃ tāta caritaṃ paramādbhutam  śivayorbhaktavātsalyasūcakaṃ śivadaṃ satām  
brahmovāca  ityuktvāmaṃtrya taṃ vyāsaṃ tannuto madvarātmajaḥ  yayau vihāyasā kāśīṃ caritaṃ śaśimaulinaḥ  
yuddhakhaṃḍamidaṃ proktaṃ mayā te munisattama  raudrīyasaṃhitāmadhye sarvakāmaphalapradam  
iyaṃ hi saṃhitā raudrī sampūrṇā varṇitā mayā  sadāśivapriyatarā bhuktimuktiphalapradā  
imāṃ yaśca paṭhennityaṃ śatrubādhānivārikām  sarvānkāmānavāpnoti tato muktiṃ labheta nā  
sūta uvāca  iti brahmasutaśśrutvā pitrā śivayaśaḥ param  śatanāmāpya śaṃbhośca kṛtārtho'bhūcchivānugaḥ  
brahmanāradasamvādaḥ sampūrṇaḥ kathito mayā  śivassarvapradhāno hi kiṃ bhūyaśśrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe dvitīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ pañcame yuddhakhaṃḍe vidalotpaladaityavadhavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ  
samāptoyaṃ yuddhakhaṇḍaḥ  samāpteyaṃ dvitīyā rudrasaṃhitā  
vande mahānandamanantalīlammaheśvaraṃ sarvvavibhummahāntam  gaurīpriyaṃ kārtikavighnarājasamudbhavaṃ śaṃkaramādidevam  
śaunaka uvāca  vyāsaśiṣyamahābhāga sūta jñānadayānidhe  vada śaṃbhvavatārāṃśca yairakārṣītsatāṃ śivam  
sūta uvāca  mune śaunaka sadbhaktyā dattacitto jitendriyaḥ  avatārāñchivasyāhaṃ vacmi te munaye śṛṇu  
etatpṛṣṭaḥ purā nandī śivamūrtissatāṃ gatiḥ  sanatkumāreṇa mune tamuvāca śivaṃ smaran  
nandīśvara uvāca  asaṃkhyātā hi kalpeṣu vibhoḥ sarvveśvarasya vai  avatārāstathāpīha vacmyahaṃ tānyathāmati  
ekonaviṃśakaḥ kalpo vijñeyaḥ śveta lohitaḥ  sadyojātāvatārastu prathamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  
tasmiṃstatparamaṃ brahma dhyāyato brahmaṇastathā  utpannastu śikhāyuktaḥ kumāraḥ śvetalohitaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣaṃ brahmā brahmarūpiṇamīśvaram  jñātvā dhyātvā sa hṛdaye vavande prayatāñjaliḥ  
sadyojātaṃ śivaṃ buddhvā jaharṣa bhuvaneśvaraḥ  muhurmuhuśca sadbuddhyā paraṃ taṃ samacintayat  
tato'sya dhyāyataḥ śvetāḥ prādurbhūtā yaśasvinaḥ  kumārāḥ paravijñānaparabrahmasvarūpiṇaḥ  
sunando nandanaścaiva viśvanandopanandanau  śiṣyāstasya mahātmāno yaistadbrahma samāvṛtam  
sadyojātaśca vai śambhurdadau jñānaṃ ca vedhase  sargaśaktimapi prītyā prasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ  
tato viṃśatimaḥ kalpo rakto nāma prakīrtitaḥ  brahmā yatra mahātejā raktavarṇamadhārayat  
dhyāyataḥ putrakāmasya prādurbhū to vidhessutaḥ  raktamālyāmbaradharo raktākṣo raktabhūṣaṇaḥ  
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ kumāraṃ dhyānamāśritaḥ  vāmadevaṃ śivaṃ jñātvā praṇanāma kṛtāṃjaliḥ  
tatastasya sutā hyāsaṃścatvāro raktavāsasaḥ  virajāśca vivāhaśca viśoko viśvabhāvanaḥ  
vāmadevaḥ sa vai śambhurdadau jñānaṃ ca vedhase  sargaśaktimapi prītyā prasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ  
ekaviṃśatimaḥ kalpaḥ pītavāsā iti smṛtaḥ  brahmā yatra mahābhāgaḥ pītavāsā babhūva ha  
dhyāyataḥ putrakāmasya vidherjātaḥ kumārakaḥ  pītavastrādika prauḍho mahātejā mahābhujaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā dhyānasaṃyuktaṃ jñātvā tatpuruṣaṃ śivam  praṇanāma tato buddhyā gāyatrīṃ śāṃkarīṃ vidhiḥ  
japitvā tu mahādevīṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtām  prasannastu mahādevo dhyānayuktena cetasā  
tato'sya pārśvato divyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ kumārakāḥ  pītavastrā hi sakalā yogamārgapravartakāḥ  
tatastasmingate kalpe pītavarṇe svayaṃbhuvaḥ  punaranyaḥ pravṛttastu kalpo nāmnā śivastu sa  
ekārṇave saṃvyatīte divyavarṣasahasrake  sraṣṭukāmaḥ prajā brahmā cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ  
tato'paśyanmahātejā prādurbhūtaṃ kumārakam  kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ mahāvīryaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā  
dhṛtakṛṣṇāmbaroṣṇīṣaṃ kṛṣṇayajñopavītinam  kṛṣṇena maulināyuktaṃ kṛṣṇasnānānulepanam  
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānamaghoraṃ ghoravikramam  vavande devadeveśamadbhutaṃ kṛṣṇapiṃgalam  
aghoraṃ tu tato brahmā brahmarūpaṃ vyaciṃtayat  tuṣṭāva vāgbhiriṣṭābhirbhaktavatsalamavyayam  
athāsya pārśvataḥ kṛṣṇāḥ kṛṣṇasnānānulepanāḥ  catvārastu mahātmānaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ kumārakāḥ  
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇaśikhaścaiva kṛṣṇā syaḥ kṛṣṇakaṇṭhadhṛk  iti te'vyaktanāmānaḥ śivarūpāḥ sutejasaḥ  
evaṃbhūtā mahātmāno brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭihetave  yogaṃ pravarttayā māsurghorākhyaṃ mahadadbhutam  
athānyo brahmaṇaḥ kalpaḥ prāvarttata munīśvarāḥ  viśvarūpa iti khyāto nāmataḥ paramādbhutaḥ  
brahmaṇaḥ putrakāmasya dhyāyato manasā śivam  prādurbhūtā mahānādā viśvarūpā sarasvatī  
tathāvidhaḥ sa bhagavānīśānaḥ parameśvaraḥ  śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇanāmāsau brahmeśānamajaṃ vibhum  sarvagaṃ sarvadaṃ sarvaṃ surūpaṃ rūpavarjitam  
īśāno'pi tathādiśya sanmārgaṃ brahmaṇe vibhuḥ  saśaktiḥ kalpayāṃcakre sa bālāṃścaturaḥ śubhān  
jaṭīmuṇḍī śikhaṇḍī ca arddhamuṇḍaśca jajñire  yogenādiśya saddharmaṃ kṛtvā yogagatiṃ gatāḥ  
evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ sadyādīnāṃ samudbhavaḥ  sanatkumāra sarvajña lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
atha teṣāṃ mahāprājña vyavahāraṃ yathāyatham  trilokahitakāraṃ hi sarvaṃ brahmāṇḍasaṃsthitam  
īśānaḥ puruṣo ghoro vāmasaṃjñastathaiva ca  brahmasaṃjño maheśasya mūrtayaḥ paṃca viśrutāḥ  
īśānaḥ śivarūpaśca garīyānprathamaḥ smṛtaḥ  bhoktāraṃ prakṛteḥ sākṣātkṣetrajñamadhitiṣṭhati  
śaivastatpuruṣākhyaśca svarūpo hi dvitīyakaḥ  guṇāśrayātmakaṃ bhogyaṃ sarvajñamadhitiṣṭhati  
dharmāya svāṃgasaṃyuktaṃ buddhitattvaṃ pinākinaḥ  aghorākhyasvarūpo yastiṣṭhatyaṃtastṛtīyakaḥ  
vāmadevāhvayo rūpaścaturthaḥ śaṅkarasya hi  ahaṃkṛteradhiṣṭhāno bahukāryakaraḥ sadā  
īśānāhvasvarūpo hi śaṃkarasyeśvaraḥ sadā  śrotrasya vacasaścāpi vibhorvyomnastathaiva ca  
tvakpāṇisparśavāyūnāmīśvaraṃ rūpamaiśvaram  puruṣākhyaṃ vicārajñā matimantaḥ pracakṣate  
vapuṣaśca rasasyāpi rūpasyāgnestathaiva ca  aghorākhyamadhiṣṭhānaṃ rūpamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ  
raśanāyāśca pāyośca rasasyāpāṃ tathaiva ca  īśvaraṃ vāmadevākhyaṃ svarūpaṃ śāṃkaraṃ smṛtam  
prāṇasya caivopasthasya gaṃdhasya ca bhuvastathā  sadyojātāhvayaṃ rūpamīśvaraṃ śāṃkaraṃ viduḥ  
ime svarūpāḥ śaṃbhorhi vandanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ  śreyorthibhirnarairnityaṃ śreyasāmekahetavaḥ  
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sadyādīnāṃ samudbhavam  sa bhuktvā sakalānkāmānprayāti paramāṃ gatim  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ śatarudrasaṃhitāyāṃ śivasya pañcabrahmāvatāravarṇanaṃ nāma prathamo'dhyāyaḥ  
 nandīśvara uvāca  śṛṇu tāta maheśasyāvatārānparamānprabho  sarvakāryakarāṃlloke sarvasya sukhadānmune  
tasya śaṃbhoḥ pareśasya mūrtyaṣṭakamayaṃ jagat  tasminvyāpya sthitaṃ viśvaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva  
śarvo bhavastathā rudra ugro bhīmaḥ paśo patiḥ  īśānaśca mahādevo mūrtayaścāṣṭa viśrutāḥ  
bhūmyaṃbhognimarudvyomakṣetrajñārkaniśākarāḥ  adhiṣṭhitāśca śarvādyairaṣṭarūpaiḥ śivasya hi  
dhatte carācaraṃ viśvaṃ rūpaṃ viśvaṃbharātmakam  śaṃkarasya maheśasya śāstrasyaiveti niścayaḥ  
saṃjīvanaṃ samastasya jagataḥ salilātmakam  bhava ityucyate rūpaṃ bhavasya paramātmanaḥ  
bahiraṃtarjagadviśvaṃ bibharti spandatesya yam  ugra ityucyate sadbhī rūpamugrasya satprabho  
sarvāvakāśadaṃ sarvavyāpakaṃ gaganātmakam  rūpaṃ bhīmasya bhīmākhyaṃ bhūpavṛndasva bhedakam  
sarvātmanāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvakṣetranivāsakam  rūpaṃ paśupaterjñeyaṃ paśupāśanikṛntanam  
sandīpayañjagatsarvaṃ divākarasamāhvayam  īśānākhyaṃ maheśasya rūpaṃ divi visarpati  
āpyāyayati yo viśvamamṛtāṃśurniśākaraḥ  mahādevasya tadrūpaṃ mahādevasya cāhvayam  
ātmā tasyāṣṭamaṃ rūpaṃ śivasya paramātmanaḥ  vyāpiketaramūrtīnāṃ viśvaṃ tasmācchivātmakam  
śākhāḥ puṣyanti vṛkṣasya vṛkṣamūlasya secanāt  tadvadasya vapurviśvaṃ puṣyate ca śivārcanāta  
yatheha putrapautrādeḥ prītyā prīto bhavetpitā  tathā viśvasya samprītyā prīto bhavati śaṃkaraḥ  
kriyate yasya kasyāpi dehino yadi nigrahaḥ  aṣṭamūrtteraniṣṭaṃ tatkṛtameva na saṃśayaḥ  
aṣṭamūrtyātmanā viśvamadhiṣṭhāyāsthitaṃ śivam  bhajasva sarvabhāvena rudraṃ paramakāraṇam  
iti proktāḥ svarūpāste vidhiputrāṣṭaviśrutāḥ  sarvopakāraniratāḥ sevyāḥ śreyorthibhirnaraiḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ śatarudrasaṃhitāyāṃ śivāṣṭamūrttivarṇanaṃ nāma dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
nandīśvara uvāca  śṛṇu tāta mahāprājña vidhikāmaprapūrakam  arddhanārīnarākhyaṃ hi śivarūpamanuttamam  
yadā sṛṣṭāḥ prajā sarvāḥ na vyavarddhaṃta vedhasā  tadā ciṃtākulo'bhūtsa tena duḥkhena dukhitaḥ  
nabhovāṇī tadābhūdvai sṛṣṭiṃ mithunajāṃ kuru  tacchrutvā maithunīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ brahmā kartumamanyata  
nārīṇāṃ kulamīśānānnirgataṃ na purā yataḥ  tato maithunajāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ śeke na padmabhūḥ  
prabhāveṇa vinā śaṃbhorna jāyerannimāḥ prajāḥ  evaṃ saṃcintayanbrahmā tapaḥ karttuṃ pracakrame  
śivayā parayā śaktyā saṃyuktaṃ parameśvaram  saṃciṃtya hṛdaye prītyā tepe sa paramaṃ tapaḥ  
tīvreṇa tapasā tasya saṃyuktasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ  acireṇaiva kālena tutoṣa sa śivo drutam  
tataḥ pūrṇacidīśasya mūrtimāviśya kāmadām  arddhanārīnaro bhūtvā tato brahmāntikaṃ haraḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ śaktyā praramayānvitam  praṇamya daṇḍavadbrahmā sa tuṣṭāva kṛtāñjaliḥ  
atha devo mahādevo vācā meghagabhīrayā  saṃbhavāya susaṃprīto viśvakarttā maheśvaraḥ  
īśvara uvāca  vatsavatsa mahābhāga mama putra pitāmaha  jñātavānasmi sarva tattattvataste manoratha  
prajānāmeva vṛddhyarthaṃ tapastaptaṃ tvayādhunā  tapasā tena tuṣṭo'smi dadāmi ca tavepsitam  
ityuktvā paramodāraṃ svabhāvamadhuraṃ vacaḥ  pṛthakcakāra vapuṣo bhāgāddevīṃ śivāṃ śivaḥ  
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramāṃ śaktiṃ pṛthagbhūtāṃ śivāgatām  praṇipatya vinītātmā prārthayāmāsa tāṃ vidhiḥ  
brahmovāca  devadevena sṛṣṭohamādau tvatpatinā śive  prajāḥ sarvā niyuktāśca śaṃbhunā paramātmanā  
manasā nirmitāḥ sarve śive devādayo mayā  na vṛddhimupagacchaṃti sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥpunaḥ  
mithunaprabhavāmeva kṛtvā sṛṣṭimataḥ param  saṃvarddhayitumicchāmi sarvā eva mama prajāḥ  
na nirgataṃ purā tvatto nārīṇāṃ kulamavyayam  tena nārīkulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mama śaktirna vidyate  
sarvāsāmeva śaktīnāṃ tvattaḥ khalu samudbhavaḥ  tasmāttvaṃ paramāṃ śaktiṃ prārthayāmyakhileśvarīm  
śive nārīkulaṃ sraṣṭuṃ śaktiṃ dehi namo'stu te  carācaraṃ jagadviddhi hetormātaḥ śivaṃ priye  
anyaṃ tvattaḥ prārthayāmi varaṃ ca varadeśvari  dehi me taṃ kṛpāṃ kṛtvā jaganmātarnamo'stu te  
carācaravivṛddhyarthamīśenaikena sarvage  dakṣasya mama putrasya putrī bhava bhavāmbike  
evaṃ saṃyācitā devī brahmaṇā parameśvarī  tathāstviti vacaḥ procya tacchaktiṃ vidhaye dadau  
tasmāddhi sā śivā devī śivaśaktirjaganmayī  śaktimekāṃ bhruvormadhyātsasarjātmasamaprabhām  
tāmāha prahasanprekṣya śaktiṃ devavaro haraḥ  kṛpāsindhurmaheśāno līlākārī bhavāmbikām  
śiva uvāca  tapasārādhitā devi brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā  prasannā bhava suprītyā kuru tasyākhilepsitam  
tāmājñāṃ parameśasya śirasā pratigṛhya sā  brahmaṇo vacanāddevī dakṣasya duhitābhavat  
dattvaivamatulāṃ śaktiṃ brahmaṇo sā śivā mune  viveśa dehaṃ śaṃbhorhi śaṃbhuścāntardadhe prabhuḥ  
tadāprabhṛti loke'sminstriyā bhāgaḥ prakalpitaḥ  ānandaṃ prāpa sa vidhiḥ sṛṣṭirjātā ca maithunī  
etatte kathitaṃ tāta śivarūpaṃ mahottamam  arddhanārīnarārddhaṃ hi mahāmaṃgaladaṃ satām  
etadākhyānamanaghaṃ yaḥ paṭhcchṛṇuyādapi  sa bhuktvā sakalānbhogānprayāti paramāṃ gatim  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ rudrasaṃhitāyāṃ śivasyārddhanārīnarāvatāravarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
nandīśvara uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña caritaṃ śāṃkaraṃ mudā  rudreṇa kathitaṃ prītyā brahmaṇe sukhadaṃ sadā  
śiva uvāca  saptame caiva vārāhe kalpe manvantarābhidhe  kalpeśvaro'tha bhagavānsarvaṃ lokaprakāśanaḥ  
marnorvaivasvatasyaiva te praputro bhaviṣyati  tadā caturyugāścaiva tasminmanvantare vidhe  
anugrahārthaṃ lokānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ hitāya ca  utpaśyāmi vidhe brahmandvāparākhyayugāntike  
yugapravṛttyā ca tadā tasmiṃśca prathame yuge  dvāpare prathame brahmanyadā vyāsaḥ svayaṃprabhuḥ  
tadāhaṃ brāhmaṇārthāya kalau tasminyugāntike  bhaviṣyāmi śivāyuktaḥ śveto nāma mahāmuniḥ  
himavacchikhare ramye chāgale parvatottame  tadā śiṣyāḥ śikhāyuktā bhaviṣyanti vidhe mama  
śvetaḥ śvetaśikhaścaiva śvetāśvaḥ śvetalohitaḥ  catvāro dhyānayogātte gamiṣyanti puraṃ mama  
tato bhaktā bhaviṣyanti jñātvā māṃ tattvato'vyayam  janmamṛtyujarāhīnāḥ parabrahmasamādhayaḥ  
draṣṭuṃ śakyo narairnāhamṛte dhyānātpitāmaha  dānadharmādibhirvatsa sādhanaiḥ karmahetubhiḥ  
dvitīye dvāpare vyāsaḥ satyo nāma prajāpatiḥ  yadā tadā bhaviṣyāmi sutāro nāmataḥ kalau  
tatrāpi me bhaviṣyanti śiṣyā vedavido dvijāḥ  dundubhiḥ śatarūpaśca hṛṣīkaḥ ketumāṃstathā  
catvāro dhyānayogātte gamiṣyanti puraṃ mama  tato muktā bhaviṣyanti jñātvā māṃ tattvato'vyayam  
tṛtīye dvāpare caiva yadā vyāsastu bhārgavaḥ  tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi damanastu purāntike  
tatrāpi ca bhaviṣyanti catvāro mama putrakāḥ  viśokaśca viśeṣaśca vipāpaḥ pāpanāśanaḥ  
śiṣyaiḥ sāhāyyaṃ vyāsasya kariṣye caturānana  nivṛttimārgaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ varttayiṣye kalāviha  
caturthe dvāpare caiva yadā vyāsoṃ'girāḥ smṛtaḥ  tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi suhotro nāma nāmataḥ  
tatrāpi mama te putrāścatvāro yogasādhakāḥ  bhaviṣyaṃti mahātmānastannāmāni bruve vidhe  
sumukho durmukhaścaiva dudarbho duratikramaḥ  śiṣyaiḥ sāhāyyaṃ vyāsasya kariṣye'haṃ tadā vidhe  
pañcame dvāpare caiva vyāsastu savitā smṛtaḥ  tadā yogī bhaviṣyāmi kaṃko nāma mahātapāḥ  
tatrāpi mama te putrāścatvāro yogasādhakāḥ  bhaviṣyanti mahātmānastannāmāni śṛṇuṣva me  
sanakaḥ sanātanaścaiva prabhuryaśca sanandanaḥ  vibhuḥ sanatkumāraśca nirmalo nirahaṃkṛtiḥ  
tatrāpi kaṃkanāmāhaṃ sāhāyyaṃ saviturvidhe  vyāsasya hi kariṣyāmi nivṛttipathavarddhakaḥ  
parivarte punaḥ ṣaṣṭhe dvāpare lokakārakaḥ  kartā vedavibhāgasya mṛtyurvyāso bhaviṣyati  
tadā'pyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi lokākṣirnāma nāmataḥ  vyāsasya susāhā yyārthaṃ nivṛttipathavarddhanaḥ  
tatrāpi śiṣyāścatvāro bhaviṣyanti dṛḍhavratāḥ  sudhāmā virajāścaiva saṃjayo vijayastathā  
saptame parivarte tu yadā vyāsaḥ śatakratuḥ  tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi jaigīṣavyo vibhurvidhe  
yogaṃ saṃdraḍhayiṣyāmi mahāyogavicakṣaṇaḥ  kāśyāṃ guhāntare saṃstho divyadeśe kuśāstariḥ  
sāhāyyaṃ ca kariṣyāmi vyāsasya hi śatakratoḥ  uddhariṣyāmi bhaktāṃśca saṃsārabhayato vidhe  
tatrāpi mama catvāro bhaviṣyanti sutā yuge  sārasvataśca yogīśo meghavāhaḥ suvāhanaḥ  
aṣṭame parivarte hi vasiṣṭho munisattamaḥ  karttā vedavibhāgasya vedavyāso bhaviṣyati  
tatrāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi nāmato dadhivāhanaḥ  vyāsasya hi kariṣyāmi sāhāyyaṃ yogavittama  
kapilaścāsuriḥ pañcaśikhaḥ śālvalapūrvakaḥ  catvāro yoginaḥ putrā bhaviṣyanti samā mama  
navame parivarte tu tasminneva yuge vidhe  bhaviṣyati muniśreṣṭho vyāsaḥ sārasvatāhvayaḥ  
vyāsasya dhyāyatastasya nivṛttipathavṛddhaye  tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi ṛṣabho nāmataḥ smṛtaḥ  
parāśaraśca gargaśca bhārgavo giriśastathā  catvārastatra śiṣyā me bhaviṣyanti suyoginaḥ  
taiḥ sākaṃ draḍhayiṣyāmi yogamārgaṃ prajāpate  kariṣyāmi sāhāyyaṃ vai vedavyāsasya sanmune  
tena rūpeṇa bhaktānāṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vidhe  uddhāraṃ bhavato'haṃ vai kariṣyāmi dayākaraḥ  
so'vatāro vidhe me hi ṛṣabhākhyassuyogakṛt  sārasvatavyāsamanaḥ karttā nānotikārakaḥ  
avatāreṇa me yena bhadrāyurnṛpabālakaḥ  jīvito hi mṛtaḥ kṣveḍadoṣato janakojjhitaḥ  
prāpte'tha ṣoḍaśe varṣe tasya rājaśiśoḥ punaḥ  yayau tadveśma sahasā ṛṣabhaḥ sa madātmakaḥ  
pūjitastena sa muniḥ sadrūpaśca kṛpānidhiḥ  upādideśa taddharmānrājyayogānprajāpate  
tataḥ sa kavacaṃ divyaṃ śaṃkhaṃ khaṅgaṃ ca bhāsvaram  dadau tasmai prasannātmā sarvaśatruvināśanam  
tadaṅga bhasmanāmṛśya kṛpayā dīnavatsalaḥ  sa dvādaśasahasrasya gajānāṃ ca balaṃ dadau  
iti bhadrāyuṣaṃ samyaganuśvāsya samātṛkam  yayau svairagatastasyāṃ pūjitastvṛṣabhaḥ prabhuḥ  
bhadrāyurapi rājarṣirjitvā ripugaṇānvidhe  rājyaṃ cakāra dharmeṇa vivāhya kīrttimālinīm  
itthaṃ prabhāvaṃ ṛṣabho'vatāraḥ śaṅkarasya me  satāṃ gatirdīnabandhurnavamaḥ kathitastava  
ṛṣabhasya caritraṃ hi paramaṃ pāvanaṃ mahat  svargyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca prayatnataḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ śatarudrasaṃhitāyāmṛṣabhacaritravarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho'dhyāyaḥ  
 śiva uvāca  daśame dvāpare vyāsastridhāmā nāmato muni  himavacchikhare ramye bhṛgutuṃge nagottame  
tatrāpi mama putrāśca bhṛgvādyāḥ śrutisaṃmitāḥ  balabandhurnarāmitraḥ ketuśṛṃgastapodhanaḥ  
ekādaśe dvāpare tu vyāsaśca trivṛto yadā  gaṃgādvāre kalau nāmnā tapo'haṃ bhavitā tadā  
lambodaraśca lambākṣaḥ keśalamvaḥ pralambakaḥ  tatrāpi putrāścatvāro bhaviṣyanti dṛḍhavratāḥ  
dvādaśe parivartte tu śatatejāśca vedakṛt  tatrāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi dvāparānte kalāviha  
hemakaṃcukamāsādya nāmnā hyatriḥ pariplutaḥ  vyāsasyaiva sāhāyyārthaṃ nivṛttipatharoṣaṇaḥ  
sarvajñaḥ samabuddhiśca sādhyaḥ śarvasuyoginaḥ  tatreti putrāścatvāro bhaviṣyanti mahāmune  
trayodaśe yuge tasmindharmo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā  vyāsastadāhaṃ bhavitā balirnāma mahāmuniḥ  
bālakhilyāśrame gaṃdhamādane parvatottame  sudhāmā kāśyapaścaiva vasiṣṭho virajāḥ śubhāḥ  
yadā vyāsastu rakṣākhyaḥ paryāye tu caturdaśe  vaṃśa āṅgirase tatra bhavitāhaṃ ca gautamaḥ  
tatrāpi mama te putrā bhaviṣyanti kalau tadā  atrirdavaśadaścaiva śravaṇotha śraviṣkaṭaḥ  
vyāsaḥ pañcadaśe trayyāruṇirvai dvāpare yadā  tadāhaṃ bhavitā vedaśirā vedaśirastathā  
mahāvīryaṃ tadastraṃ ca vedaśīrṣaśca parvataḥ  himavatpṛṣṭhamāsādya sarasvatyāstathottare  
tatrāpi mama catvāro bhaviṣyanti sutā dṛḍhāḥ  kuṇiśca kuṇibāhuśca kuśarīraḥ kunetrakaḥ  
vyāso yuge ṣoḍaśe tu yadā devo bhaviṣyati  tadā yogapradānāya gokarṇo bhavitā hyaham  
tatraiva ca supuṇyaṃ ca gokarṇaṃ nāma tadvanam  tatrāpi yoginaḥ putra bhaviṣyaṃtityambusaṃmitāḥ  
kāśyapopyuśanāścaiva cyavano'tha bṛhaspatiḥ  tepi tenaiva mārgeṇa gamiṣyanti śivālayam  
parivartte saptadaśe vyāso devakṛtaṃjayaḥ  guhāvāsīti nāmnāhaṃ himavacchikhare śubhe  
mahālaye mahottuṃge śivakṣetraṃ himāla yam  utathyo vāmadevaśca mahāyogo mahābalaḥ  
parivartte'ṣṭādaśe tu yadā vyāsa ṛtaṃjayaḥ  śikhāṇḍīnāmatohaṃ taddhimavacchikhare śubhe  
siddhakṣetre mahāpuṇye śikhaṇḍī nāma parvataḥ  śikhaṇḍino vanaṃ vāpi yatra siddhaniṣevitam  
vācaḥśravā rucīkaśca syāvāsyaśca yatīśvaraḥ  ete putrā bhaviṣyanti tatrāpi ca tapodhanāḥ  
ekonaviṃśe vyāsastu bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ  tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi jaṭī mālī ca nāmataḥ  
himavacchikhare tatra putrā me'mbudhisaṃhitāḥ  hiraṇyanāmā kauśalyo lokākṣī pradhimistathā  
parivartte viṃśatime bhavitā vyāsa gautamaḥ  tatrāṭṭahāsanāmāhamaṭṭahāsapriyā narāḥ  
tatraiva himavatpṛṣṭhe aṭṭahāso mahāgiriḥ  devamānuṣayakṣendrasiddhacāraṇasevitaḥ  
tatrāpi mama te putrā bhavi ṣyanti suyoginaḥ  sumanturbabarirvidvān kabaṃdhaḥ kuśikandharaḥ  
ekaviṃśe yuge tasmin vyāso vācaḥśravā yadā  tadāhaṃ dāruko nāma tasmāddāruvanaṃ śubham  
tatrāpi mama te putrā bhaviṣyanti suyoginaḥ  plakṣo dārbhāyaṇiścaiva ketumān gautamastathā  
dvāviṃśe parivarte tu vyāsaḥ śuṣmāyaṇo yadā  tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi vārāṇasyāṃ mahāmuniḥ  
nāmnā vai lāṃgalī bhīmo yatra devāḥ savāsavāḥ  drakṣyaṃti māṃ kalau tasminbhavaṃ caiva halāyudham  
tatrāpi mama te putrā bhaviṣyaṃti sudhārmikāḥ  bhallavī madhupiṃgaśca śvetaketustathaiva ca  
parivarte trayoviṃśe tṛṇabinduryadā muniḥ  śveto nāma tadāhaṃ vai girau kālaṃjare śubhe  
tatrāpi mama te putrā bhaviṣyanti tapasvinaḥ  uśiko bṛhadaśvaśca devalaḥ kavireva ca  
parivarte caturviṃśe vyāso yakṣo yadā vibhuḥ  śūlī nāma mahāyogī tadyuge naimiṣe tadā  
tatrāpi mama te śiṣyā bhaviṣyanti tapasvinaḥ  śālihotro'gniveśaśca yuvanāśvaḥ śaradvasuḥ  
paṃcaviṃśe yadā vyāsaḥ śaktirnāmnā bhaviṣyati  tadāpyahaṃ mahāyogī daṇḍī muṇḍīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ  
tatrāpi mama te śiṣyā bhaviṣyanti tapasvinaḥ  chagalaḥ kuṇḍakarṇaśca kumbhāṇḍaśca pravāhakaḥ  
vyāsaḥ parāśaro yarhi ṣaḍviṃśe bhavitāpyaham  puraṃ bhadravaṭaṃ prāpya sahiṣṇurnāma nāmataḥ  
tatrāpi mama te śiṣyā bhaviṣyanti tapasvinaḥ  ulūko vidyutaścaiva śambūko hyāśvalāyanaḥ  
saptaviṃśe yadā vyāso jātūkarṇyo bhaviṣyati  prabhāsatīrthamāśritya somaśarmā tadāpyaham  
tatrāpi mama te śiṣyā bhaviṣyaṃti tapasvinaḥ  akṣapādaḥ kumāraścolūko vatsastathaiva ca  
aṣṭāviṃśe drāpare tu parāśarasuto hariḥ  yadā vyāso bhaviṣyāmi nāmnā dvaipāyanaḥ pramuḥ  
tadā ṣaṣṭhena cāṃśena kṛṣṇaḥ puruṣasattamaḥ  vasudevasutaḥ śreṣṭho vāsudevo bhaviṣyati  
tadāpyahaṃ bhaviṣyāmi yogātmā yogamāyayā  lokavismāpanārthāya brahmacāriśarīrakaḥ  
śmaśāne mṛtamutsṛjya dṛṣṭvā kāyamanāmayam  brāhmaṇānāṃ hitārthāya praviṣṭo yogamāyayā  
divyāṃ meruguhāṃ puṇyāṃ tvayā sārddhaṃ ca viṣṇunā  bhaviṣyāmi tadā brahmaṃllakulī nāmanāmataḥ  
kāyāvatāra ityevaṃ siddhakṣetraṃ paraṃ tadā  bhaviṣyati suvikhyātaṃ yāvadbhūmirdhariṣyati  
tatrāpi mama te śiṣyā bhaviṣyanti tapasvinaḥ  kuśikaścaiva gargaśca mitraḥ kauruṣya eva ca  
yogino brāhmaṇā vedapāragā ūrddhvaretasaḥ  prāpya māheśvaraṃ yogaṃ gamiṣyaṃti śivaṃ puram  
vaivasvate'ntare samyak proktā hi paramātmanā  yogeśvarāvatārāśca sarvāvarteṣu suvratāḥ  
vyāsāścaivāṣṭaviṃśatkā dvāparedvāpare vibho  yogeśvarāvatāraśca prāraṃbhe ca kalau kalau  
yogeśvarāvatārāṇāṃ yogamārgapravarddhakāḥ  mahāśaivāśca catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ pratyekamavyayā  
ete pāśupatāḥ śiṣyā bhasmoddhūlitavigrahāḥ  rudrākṣamālābharaṇāstripuṇḍrāṃkitamastakāḥ  
śiṣyā dharmaratāḥ sarve vedavedāṃgapāragāḥ  liṃgārcanaratā nityaṃ bāhyābhyantarataḥ sthitāḥ  
bhaktyā mayi ca yogena dhyānaniṣṭhā jitendriyāḥ  saṃkhyayā dvādaśādhikya śataṃ ca gaṇitā budhaiḥ  
ityetadvai mayā proktamavatāreṣu lakṣaṇam  manvādikṛṣṇaparyantamaṣṭāviṃśadyugakramāt  
tatra śrutisamūhānāṃ vidhānaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam  bhaviṣyati tadā kalpe kṛṣṇadvaipāyano yadā  
ityevamuktvā brahmāṇamanugṛhya maheśvaraḥ  punaḥ saṃprekṣya deveśastatraivāntaradhīyata  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ śatarudrasaṃhitāyāṃ śivāvatāropākhyāna ekonaviṃśatiśivāvatāravarṇanaṃ nāma pañcamo'dhyāyaḥ  
iti dvicatvāriṃśāvatārāḥ  
atha nandīśvarāvatāramāha  sanatkumāra uvāca  bhavānkathamanuprāpto mahādevāṃśajaḥ śivam  śrotumicchāmi tatsarvaṃ vaktumarhasi me prabho  
nandīśvara uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  yathāhaṃ ca śivaṃ prāpto mahādevāṃśajo mune  
prajākāmaḥ śilādo'bhūduktaḥ pitṛbhirādarāt  taduddhartumanā bhaktyā samuddhāramabhīpsubhiḥ  
adhodṛṣṭiḥ sudharmātmā śilādo nāma vīryavān  tasyāsīnmunikairvṛttiḥ śivaloke ca sogamat  
śakramuddiśya sa munistapastepe suduḥ saham  niścalātmā śilādākhyo bahukālaṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ  
tapatastasya tapasā saṃtuṣṭo'bhūcchatakratuḥ  jagāma ca varaṃ dātuṃ sarvadevaprabhustadā  
śilādamāha suprītyā śakrastuṣṭo'smi te'nagha  tena tvaṃ muniśārdūla varayasva varāniti  
tataḥ praṇamya deveśaṃ stutvā stutibhirādarāt  śilādo muniśārdūlastamāha sukṛtāñjaliḥ  
śilāda uvāca  śatakrato sureśāna santuṣṭo yadi me prabho  ayonijaṃ mutyuhīnaṃ putramicchāmi suvratam  
śakra uvāca  putraṃ dāsyāmi putrārthinyonijaṃ mṛtyusaṃyutam  anyathā te na dāsyāmi mṛtyuhīnā na santi vai  
na dāsyāmi sutaṃ te'haṃ mṛtyuhīnamayonijam  harirvidhiśca bhagavānkimutānyo mahāmune  
tāvapi tripurāryaṃgasambhāvau maraṇānvitau  tayorapyāyuṣā mānaṃ kathitaṃ nigame pṛthak  
tasmādayonije putre mṛtyuhīne prayatnataḥ  parityajāśāṃ viprendra gṛhāṇātmakṣamaṃ sutam  
kintu deveśvaro rudraḥ prasīdati maheśvaraḥ  sudurlabho mṛtyuhīnastava putro hyayonijaḥ  
ahaṃ ca viṣṇurbhagavāndruhiṇaśca mahāmune  ayonijaṃ mṛtyuhīnaṃ putraṃ dātuṃ na śaknumaḥ  
ārādhaya mahādevaṃ tatputravinikāmyayā  sarveśvaro mahāśaktaḥ sa te putraṃ pradāsyati  
nandīśvara uvāca  evaṃ vyāhṛtya viprendramanugṛhya ca taṃ ghṛṇī  devairvṛtaḥ sureśānassvalokaṃ samagānmune  
gate tasmiṃśca varade sahasrākṣe śilāśanaḥ  ārādhayanmahādevaṃ tapasātoṣayadbhavam  
atha tasyaivamaniśantatparasya dvijasta vai  divyamvarṣasahasraṃ tu gataṃ kṣaṇamivādbhutam  
valmīkena vṛtāṃgaśca lakṣakoṭagaṇairmuniḥ  sūcīmukhaiścānyai raktabhugbhiśca sarvataḥ  
nirmāṃsarudhira tvagvai bile tasminnavasthitaḥ  asthiśeṣobhavatpaścācchilādo munisattamaḥ  
tuṣṭaḥ prabhustadā tasmai darśayāmāsa svāṃ tanum  divyāṃ divyaguṇairyuktāmalabhyāṃ vāmabuddhibhiḥ  
divyavarṣasahasreṇa tapyamānāya śūladhṛk  sarvadevādhipastasmai varadosmītyabhāṣata  
mahāsamādhisaṃlīnassa śilādo mahāmuniḥ  nāśṛṇottadgiraṃ śambhorbhaktyadhīnaratasya vai  
yadā spṛṣṭo munistena kareṇa tripurāriṇā  tadaiva muniśārdūla utsasarja tapaḥkramam  
athonmīlya munirnetre somaṃ śaṃbhuṃ vilokayan  drutaṃ praṇamya sa mudā pādayornyapatanmune  
harṣagadgadayā vācā nataskaṃdhaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ  prasannātmā śilādassa tuṣṭāva parameśvaram  
tataḥ prasanno bhagavāndevadevastrilocanaḥ  varado'smīti tamprāha śilādaṃ munipuṃgavam  
tapasānena kiṃ kāryaṃ bhavate hi mahā mate  dadāmi putraṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśāstrārthapāragam  
tataḥ praṇamya deveśaṃ tacchrutvā ca śilāśanaḥ  harṣagadgadayā vācovāca somavibhūṣaṇam  
śilāda uvāca  maheśa yadi tuṣṭo'si yadi vā varadaśca me  icchāmi tvatsamaṃ putraṃ mṛtyuhīnamayonijam  
naṃdīśvara uvāca  evamuktastato devastryambakastena śaṅkaraḥ  pratyuvāca prasannātmā śilādaṃ munisattamam  
 śiva uvāca  pūrvamārādhito vipra brahmaṇāhaṃ tapodhana  tapasā cāvatārārthaṃ munibhiśca surottamaiḥ  
tava putro bhaviṣyāmi nandī nāmnā tvayonijaḥ  pitā bhaviṣyasi mama piturvai jagatāṃ mune  
nandīśvara uvāca  evamuktvā muniṃ prekṣya praṇipatyāsthitaṃ ghṛṇī  somastūrṇaṃ tamādiśya tatraivāntardadhe haraḥ  
gate tasminmahādeve sa śilādo mahāmuniḥ  svamāśrayamupāgamya ṛṣibhyo'kathayattataḥ  
kiyatā caiva kālena tadāsau janakaḥ sa me  yajñāṃgaṇaṃ cakarṣāśu yajñārthaṃ yajñavittamaḥ  
tataḥ kṣaṇādahaṃ śaṃbhostanujastasya cājñayā  sa jātaḥ pūrvvamevāhaṃ yugāntāgnisamaprabhaḥ  
avarṣaṃstadā puṣkarāvartakādyā jaguḥ khecarāḥ kinnarāḥ siddhasādhyā  śilādātmajatvaṃ gate mayyṛṣīndrāssamantācca vṛṣṭiṃ vyadhuḥ kausumīṃ te  
atha brahmādayo devā devapalyaśca sarvaśaḥ  tatrājagmuśca suprītyā hariścaiva śivo'mbikā  
tadotsavo mahānāsīnnanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ  ādṛtya māṃ tathā liṃgaṃ tuṣṭuvurharṣitāśca te  
supraśasya śilādaṃ taṃ stutvā ca sustavaiḥ śivau  sarve jagmuśca dhāmāni śivāvapyakhileśvarau  
śilādo'pi ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā kālasūryyānalaprabham  tryakṣaṃ caturbhujaṃ bālaṃ jaṭāmukuṭadhāriṇam  
triśūlādyāyudhaṃ dīptaṃ sarvathā rudrarūpiṇam  mahānandabharaḥ prītyā praṇamyaṃ praṇanāma ca  
śilāda uvāca  tvayāhaṃ nandito yasmānnandī nāmnā sureśvara  tasmāttvāṃ devamānandaṃ namāmi jagadīśvaram  
nandīśvara uvāca  mayā saha pitā hṛṣṭaḥ supraṇamya maheśvaram  uṭajaṃ svaṃ jagāmāśu nidhiṃ labdhveva nirdhanaḥ  
yadā gatohamuṭajaṃ śilādasya mahāmune  tadāhaṃ tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ tyaktvā mānuṣyamāsthitaḥ  
mānuṣyamāsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā me lokapūjitaḥ  vilalāpātiduḥkhārttaḥ svajanaiśca samāvṛtaḥ  
jātakarmādikānyeva sarvāṇyapi cakāra me  śālaṃkāyanaputro vai śilādaḥ putravatsalaḥ  
vedānadhyāpayāmāsa sāṃgopāṃgānaśeṣataḥ  śāstrāṇyanyānyapi tathā pañcavarṣe pitā ca mām  
sampūrṇe saptame varṣe mitrāvaruṇasaṃjñakau  munī tasyāśramaṃ prāptau draṣṭuṃ māṃ cājñayā vibhoḥ  
satkṛtau muninā tena sūpaviṣṭo mahāmunī  ūcatuśca mahātmānau māṃ nirīkṣya muhurmuhuḥ  
mitrāvaruṇāvūcatuḥ  tāta naṃdīstavālpāyuḥ sarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ  na dṛṣṭameva cāpaśyaṃ hyāyurvarṣādataḥ param  
viprayorityuktavatoḥ śilādaḥ putravatsalaḥ  tamāliṅgya ca duḥkhārtto rurodātīva visvaram  
mṛtavatpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitaraṃ ca pitāmaham  pratyavocatprasannātmā smṛtvā śivapadāmbujam  
kena tvaṃ tāta duḥkhena vepamānaśca rodiṣi  duḥkhaṃ te kuta utpannaṃ jñātumicchāmi tattvataḥ  
 pitovāca  tavālpamṛtyuduḥkhena duḥkhito'tīva putraka  ko me duḥkhaṃ haratu vai śaraṇaṃ prayāmi hi  
 putra uvāca  devo vā dānavo vāpi yamaḥ kālotha vāpi hi  ṛdhyeyuryadyapi hyete māmanyepi janāstathā  
athāpi cālpamṛtyurme na bhaviṣyati māṃ tudaḥ  satyaṃ bravīmi janakaṃ śapathante karomyaham  
 pitovāca  kiṃ tapaḥ kiṃ parijñānaṃ ko yogaśca prabhuśca te  yena tvaṃ dāruṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ vañcayiṣyasi putra me  
 putra uvāca  na tāta tapasā mṛtyuṃ vaṃcayiṣye na vidyayā  mahādevasya bhajanānmṛtyuṃ jeṣyāmi nānyathā  
 nandīśvara uvāca  ityuktvāhaṃ pituḥ pādau praṇamya śirasā mune  pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca tamagacchaṃ vanamuttamam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ śatarudrasaṃhitāyāṃ nandikeśāvatāravarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ  
 nandikeśvara uvāca  tatra gatvā mune'haṃ vai sthitvaikāntasthale sudhīḥ  atapaṃ tapa ugraṃ sanmunīnāmapi duṣkaram  
hṛtpuṇḍarīkasuṣire dhyātvā devaṃ triyambakam  tryakṣaṃ daśabhujaṃ śāntaṃ pañcavaktraṃ sadā śivam  
rudrajāpyamakārṣaṃ vai paramadhyānamāsthitaḥ  saritaścottare puṇye hyekacittaḥ samāhitaḥ  
tasmiñjāpye'tha saṃprītaḥ sthitaṃ māṃ parameśvaraḥ  tuṣṭo'bravīnmahādevaḥ somaḥ somārddhabhūṣaṇaḥ  
śiva uvāca  śailāde varadohaṃ te tapasānena toṣitaḥ  sādhu taptaṃ tvayā dhīman brūhi yatte manogatam  
sa evamukto devena śirasā pādayornataḥ  astavaṃ parameśānaṃ jarāśokavināśanam  
atha māṃ nandinaṃ śambhurbhaktyā parāmayā yutam  aśrupūrṇekṣaṇaṃ samyak pādayoḥ śirasā natam  
utthāya parameśānaḥ pasparśa paramārtihā  karābhyāṃ saṃmukhābhyāntu saṃgṛhya vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ  
nirīkṣya gaṇapāṃścaiva devīṃ himavataḥ sutām  uvāca māṃ kṛpādṛṣṭyā samīkṣya jagatāmpatiḥ  
vatsa nandinmahāprājña mṛtyorbhītiḥ kutastava  mayaiva preṣitau viprau matsamastvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
amaro jarayā tyakto'duḥkhī gaṇapatiḥ sadā  avyayaścākṣayaśceṣṭaḥ sa pitā sa suhṛjjanaḥ  
madbalaḥ pārśvago nityaṃ mameṣṭo bhavitāniśam  na jarā janma mṛtyurvai matprasādādbhaviṣyati  
nandīśvara uvāca  evamuktvā śiromālāṃ kuśeśayamayīṃ nijām  samunmucya babandhāśu mama kaṇṭhe kṛpānidhiḥ  
tayāhaṃ mālayā vipra śubhayā kaṇṭhasaktayā  tryakṣo daśabhujaścāsaṃ dvitīya iva śaṅkara  
tata eva samādāya hastena parameśvaraḥ  uvāca brūhi kiṃ te'dya dadāmi varamuttamam  
tato jaṭāśritaṃ vāri gṛhītvā hāra nirmalam  uktvā nandī bhavetīha visasarja vṛṣadhvajaḥ  
tataḥ pañcamitā nadyaḥ prāvartata śubhāvahāḥ  sutoyāśca mahāvegā divya rūpā ca sundarī  
jaṭodakā trisrotāśca vṛṣadhvaniritīva hi  svarṇodakā jambunadī pañcanadyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ  
etatpañcanadaṃ nāma śivapṛṣṭhatamaṃ śubham  japeśvarasamīpe tu pavitraṃ paramaṃ mune  
yaḥ pañcanadamāsādya snātvā japtveśvareśvaram  pūjayecchivasāyujyaṃ prayātyeva na saṃśayaḥ  
atha śambhuruvācomāmabhiṣiñcāmi nandinam  gaṇendraṃ vyāhariṣyāmi kiṃ vā tvaṃ manyase'vyaye  
umovāca  dātumarhasi deveśa nandine parameśvara  mahāpriyatamo nātha śailādistanayo mama  
nandīśvara uvāca  tatassa śaṅkaraḥ svīyānsasmāra gaṇapānvarān  svatantraḥ parameśānassarvado bhaktavatsalaḥ  
smaraṇādeva rudrasya samprāptāśca gaṇeśvarāḥ  asaṅkhyātā mahāmodāśśaṅkarākṛtayo'khilāḥ  
te gaṇeśāśśivaṃ devīṃ praṇamyāhuḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ  te praṇamya karau baddhvā nataskandhā mahābalāḥ  
gaṇeśā ūcuḥ  kimarthaṃ ca smṛtā deva hyājñāpaya mahāprabho  kiṅkarānnaḥ samāyātāṃstripurārdana kāmada  
kiṃ sāgarāñśoṣayāmo yamaṃ vā saha kiṃkaraiḥ  hanmo mṛtyuṃ mahāmṛtyuṃ viśeṣaṃ vṛddhapadmajam  
baddhvendraṃ saha devaiśca viṣṇuṃ vā pārṣadaiḥ saha  ānayāmaḥ susaṃkuddhāndaityānvā dānavaiḥ saha  
kasyādya vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ kariṣyāmastavājñayā  kasya vādyotsavo deva sarvakāmasamṛddhaye  
nandīśvara uvāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ vīravādinām  uvāca tānsa praśaṃsya gaṇeśānparameśvaraḥ  
śiva uvāca  nandīśvaroyaṃ putro me sarveṣāmīśvareśvaraḥ  priyo gaṇāmagraṇīssarvaiḥ kriyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama  
sarve prītyābhiṣiñcadhvaṃ madgaṇānāṃ gatimpatim  adyaprabhṛti yuṣmākamayaṃ nandīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ  
nandīśvara uvāca  evamuktāḥ śaṅkareṇa gaṇapāssarvva eva te  evamastviti samprocya sambhārānāharaṃstataḥ  
tato devāśca sendrāśca nārāyaṇamukhāstathā  munayaḥ sarvato lokā ājagmurmuditānanāḥ  
pitāmahopi bhagavanniyogācchaṅkarasya vai  cakāra naṃdinassarvvamabhiṣekaṃ samāhitaḥ  
tato viṣṇustataśśakro lokapālāstathaiva ca  ṛṣayastuṣṭuvuścaiva pitāmahapurogamāḥ  
stutimatsu tatasteṣu viṣṇuḥ sarvajagatpatiḥ  śirasyañjalimādhāya tuṣṭāva ca samāhitaḥ  
prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā jayaśabdaṃ cakāra ca  tato gaṇādhipāssarvve tato devāstato'surāḥ  
evaṃ stutaścābhiṣikto devaissa brahmakaistadā  nandīśvarohaṃ viprendra niyogātpa rameśituḥ  
udvāhaśca kṛtastatra niyogātparameṣṭhinaḥ  mahotsavayutaḥ prītyā viṣṇubrahmādibhirmama  
marutāṃ ca sutā devī suyaśāstu manoharā  patnī sā me'bhavaddivyā manonayananandinī  
labdhaṃ śaśiprabhaṃ chatraṃ tayā tatra vibhūṣitam  cāmaraiścāmarāsaktahastāgraiḥ strīgaṇairyutam  
siṃhāsanaṃ ca paramaṃ tayā cādhiṣṭhitaṃ mayā  alaṃkṛto mahālakṣmyā mukuṭādyaissubhūṣaṇaiḥ  
labdho hāraśca paramo devyāḥ kaṇṭhagatastathā  vṛṣendraśca śito nāgassiṃhassiṃhadhvajastathā  
rathaśca hemahāraśca candrabiṃbasamaḥ śubhaḥ  anyānyapi ca vastūni labdhāni hi mayā mune  
evaṃ kṛtavivāho'haṃ tayā patnyā mahāmune  pādau vavande śambhośca śivāyā brahmaṇo hareḥ  
tathāvidhaṃ trilokeśassapatnīkaṃ ca māmprabhuḥ  provāca parayā prītyā sa śivo bhaktavatsalaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  śṛṇu satputra tātastvaṃ suyaśeyantava priyā  dadāmi te varamprītyā yatte manasi vāñchitam  
sadāhantava nandīśa santuṣṭo'smi gaṇeśvara  devyā ca sahito vatsa śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ  
sadeṣṭaśca viśiṣṭaśca paramaiśvaryyasaṃyutaḥ  mahāyogī maheṣvāsaḥ sa pitā sa pitāmahaḥ  
ajeyassarvajetā ca sadā pūjyo mahābalaḥ  ahaṃ yatra bhavāṃstatra yatra tvaṃ tatra cāpyaham  
ayaṃ ca te pitā putra paramaiśvaryyasaṃyutaḥ  bhaviṣyati gaṇādhyakṣo mama bhakto mahābalaḥ  
pitāmaho'pi te vatsa tathāstu niyamā ime  matsamīpaṃ gamiṣyanti mayā dattavarāstathā  
nandīśvara uvāca  tato devī mahābhāgā nandinaṃ varadābravīt  varaṃ brūhīti māmputra sarvvānkāmānyathesitān  
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ devyāḥ prāvocatsāñjalistadā  bhaktirbhavatu me devi pādayoste sadā varā  
śrutvā mama vaco devī hyevamastviti sābravīt  suyaśāṃ tāñca suprītyā nandipriyatamāṃ śivām  
devyuvāca  vatse varaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ hi trinetrā janmavarjitā  putrapautrestu bhaktirme tathā ca bhartureva hi  
nandyuvāca  tadā brahmā ca viṣṇuśca sarvve devagaṇāśca vai  tābhyāṃ varāndaduḥ prītyā suprasannāśśivājñayā  
sānvayaṃ māṃ gṛhītveśastatassambandhibāndhavaiḥ  āruhya vṛṣamīśāno gato devyā nijaṃ gṛham  
viṣṇvādayaḥ surāssarvve praśaṃsanto hyamī tadā  svadhāmāni yayuḥ prītyā saṃstuvantaḥ śivaṃ śivam  
iti te kathito vatsa svāvatāro mahāmune  sadānandakaraḥ puṃsāṃ śivabhaktipravarddhanaḥ  
ya idannandino janma varadānantathā mama  abhiṣekaṃ vivāhaṃ ca śṛṇuyācchrāvayettathā  
paṭhedvā pāṭhayedvāpi śraddhāvānbhaktisaṃyutaḥ  iha sarvvasukhambhuktvā paratra labhate gatim  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāyāṃ śatarudrasaṃhitāyāṃ nandikeśvarāvatārābhiṣekavivāha varṇanaṃ nāma saptamo'dhyāyaḥ  
iti tricatvāriṃśovatāraḥ  
atha bhairavāvatāramāha  nandīśvara uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvvajña śṛṇu tvaṃ bhairavīṃ kathām  yasyāḥ śravaṇamātreṇa śaivī bhaktirdṛḍhā bhavet  
bhairavaḥ pūrṇarūpo hi śaṃkarasya parātmanaḥ  mūḍhāstaṃ vai na jānanti mohitāśśivamāyayā  
sanatkumāra no vetti mahimānaṃ maheśituḥ  caturbhujo'pi viṣṇurvai caturvvaktro'pi vai vidhiḥ  
citramatra na kiñcidvai durjñeyā khalu śāmbhavī  tayā saṃmohitāssarve nārcayantyapi tamparam  
veda cedyadi vātmānaṃ sa eva parameśvaraḥ  tadā vihanti te sarvve svecchayā na hi ke'pi tam  
sarvvago'pi maheśāno nekṣyate mūḍhabuddhibhiḥ  devavad budhyate loke yo'tīto manasāṃ girām  
atretihāsaṃ vakṣye'haṃ paramarṣe purātanam  śṛṇu taṃ śraddhayā tāta paramaṃ jñānakāraṇam  
meruśṛṅge'dbhute ramye sthitambrahmāṇamīśvaram  jagmurdevarṣayaḥ sarvve sutattvaṃ jñātumicchayā  
tatrāgatya vidhinnatvā papracchuste mahādarāt  kṛtāñjalipuṭāssarve nataskandhā munīśvarāḥ  
devarṣaya ūcuḥ  devadeva prajānātha sṛṣṭikṛllokanāyaka  tattvato vada cāsmabhyaṃ kimekaṃ tattvamavyayam  
nandīśvara uvāca  sa māyayā maheśasya mohitaḥ padmasambhavaḥ  avijñāya parambhāvaṃ saṃbhāvaṃ pratyuvāca ha  
brahmovāca  he surā ṛṣayaḥ sarvve sumatyā śṛṇutādarāt  vacmyahaṃ paramaṃ tattvamavyayaṃ vai yathārthataḥ  
jagadyonirahaṃ dhātā svayambhūraja īśvaraḥ  anādibhāgahaṃ brahma hyeka ātmā nirañjanaḥ  
pravartako hi jagatāmahameva nivarttakaḥ  saṃvartako madadhiko nānyaḥ kaścitsurottamāḥ  
nandīśvara uvāca  tasyaivaṃ vadato dhāturviṣṇustatra sthito mune  provāca prahasanvākyaṃ saṃkruddho mohito'jayā  
na caitaducitā brahmanyogayuktasya mūrkhatā  avijñāya paraṃ tattvaṃ vṛthaitatte nigadyate  
kartā vai sarvalokānāṃ paramātmā paraḥ pumān  yajño nārāyaṇo devo māyādhīśaḥ parā gatiḥ  
mamājñayā tvayā brahmansṛṣṭireṣā vidhī yate  jagatāṃ jīvanaṃ naiva māmanādṛtya ceśvaram  
evaṃ triprakṛtau mohātparasparajayaiṣiṇau  procaturnigamāṃścātra pramāṇe sarvathā tanau  
praṣṭavyāste viśeṣeṇa sthitā mūrtidharāśca te  papracchatuḥ pramāṇajñānityuktvā caturo'pi tān  
vidhiviṣṇū ūcatuḥ  vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvvatra pratiṣṭhā paramāmitāḥ  yūyaṃ vadata viśrabdhaṃ kimekaṃ tattvamavyayam  
nandīśvara uvāca  ityākarṇya tayorvācaṃ punaste hi ṛgādayaḥ  avadaṃstattvataḥ sarvve saṃsmarato paraṃ prabhum  
yadi mānyā vayandevau sṛṣṭisthitikarau vibhū  tadā pramāṇaṃ vakṣyāmo bhavatsandehabhedakam  
nandīśvara uvāca  śrutyuktavidhimākarṇya procatustau surau śrutīḥ  yuṣmaduktaṃ pramāṇaṃ nau kintattvaṃ samyagucyatām  
ṛgveda uvāca  yadantassthāni bhūtāni yatassarvvampravarttate  yadāhuḥ paramantattvaṃ sa rudrastveka eva hi  
yajurveda uvāca  yo yajñairakhilairīśo yogena ca samijyate  yena pramāṇaṃ khalu nassa ekaḥ sarvvadṛk chivaḥ  
sāmaveda uvāca  yenedambhramyate viśvaṃ yogibhiryo vicintyate  yadbhāsā bhāsate viśvaṃ sa ekastryambakaḥ paraḥ  
atharvaveda uvāca  yaṃ prapaśyanti deveśambhaktyanugrahiṇo janāḥ  tamāhurekaṃ kaivalyaṃ śaṃkaraṃ duḥkhataḥ param  
nandīśvara uvāca  śrutyuktamidamākarṇyātīvamāyāvimohitau  smitvāhaturvidhiharī nigamāṃstānvicetanau  
vidhiharī ūcatuḥ  he vedāḥ kimidaṃ yūyambhāṣante gatacetanāḥ  kiñjātaṃ vo'dya sarvvaṃ hi naṣṭaṃ suvayunaṃ param  
kathampramathanātho'sau ramamāṇo nirantaram  digambaraḥ pītavarṇo śivayā dhūlidhūsaraḥ  
virūpaveṣo jaṭilo vṛṣago vyālabhūṣaṇaḥ  paraṃ brahmatvamāpannaḥ kva ca tatsaṃgavarjitam  
ityudīritamākarṇya praṇavaḥ sarvagastayoḥ  amūrto mūrtimānprītyā jṛmbhamāṇa uvāca tau  
praṇava uvāca  na hīśo bhagavāñchaktyā hyātmano vyatiriktayā  kadācidramate rudro līlārūpadharo haraḥ  
asau hi parameśānassvayaṃjyotissanātanaḥ  ānandarūpā tasyaiṣā śaktirnāgantukī śivā  
nandīśvara uvāca  ityevamukto'pi tadā vidherviṣṇośca vai tadā  nājñānamagamannāśaṃ śrīkaṇṭhasyaiva māyayā  
prādurāsīttato jyotirubhayorantare mahat  pūrayannijayā bhāsā dyāvābhūmyoryadantaram  
jyotirmaṇḍalamadhyastho dadṛśe puruṣākṛtiḥ  vidhikratubhyāṃ tatraiva mahādbhutatanurmune  
prajajvālātha kopena brahmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ śiraḥ  āvayorantare ko'sau bibhṛyātpuruṣākṛtim  
vidhiḥ saṃbhāvayedyāvattāvatsa trivilocanaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇena ca mahāpuruṣo nīlalohitaḥ  
triśūlapāṇirbhālākṣo nāgoḍupavibhūṣaṇaḥ  hiraṇyagarbhastaṃ dṛṣṭvā vihasanprāha mohitaḥ  
brahmovāca  nīlalohita jāne tvāṃ mā bhaiṣīścandraśekhara  bhālasthalānmama purā rudraḥ prādurabhūdbhavān  
rodanādrudranāmāpi yojito'si mayā purā  māmeva śaraṇaṃ yāhi putra rakṣāṅkaromi te  
 nandīśvara uvāca  atheśvaraḥ padmayoneḥ śrutvā garvavatīṃ giram  cukopātīva ca tadā kurvanniva layammune  
sa kopatassamutpādya puruṣaṃ bhairavaṃ kvacit  prajvalantaṃ sumahasā prītyā ca parameśvaraḥ  
īśvara uvāca  prākca paṃkajajanmāsau śāsyaste kālabhairava  kālavadrājase sākṣātkālarājastato bhavān  
viśvaṃ bhartuṃ samarthosi bhīṣaṇādbhairavaḥ smṛtaḥ  tvatto bheṣyati kālo'pi tatastvaṃ kālabhairavaḥ  
āmardayiṣyati bhavānruṣṭo duṣṭātmano yataḥ  āmardaka iti khyātiṃ tatassarvatra yāsyasi  
yataḥ pāpāni bhaktānāṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi tatkṣaṇāt  pāpabhakṣaṇa ityeva tava nāma bhaviṣyati  
yā me muktipurī kāśī sarvvābhyo'hi garīyasī  ādhipatyaṃ ca tasyāste kālarāja sadaiva hi  
tatra ye pātakinarāsteṣāṃ śāstā tvameva hi  śubhāśubhaṃ ca tatkarma citragupto likhiṣyati  
nandīśvara uvāca  etānvarānpragṛhyātha tatkṣaṇātkālabhairavaḥ  vāmāṃgulinakhāgreṇa cakarta ca vidheśśiraḥ
