iti te kathitā tāta sarvabrahmāṃḍasaṃsthitiḥ  tadūrdhvaṃ lokasaṃsthānaṃ kimanyacchrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ lokavarṇanaṃnāmaikonaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 vyāsa uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña tatprāptiṃ vada sattama  yadgatvā na nivartaṃte śivabhaktiyutā narāḥ  
 sanatkumāra uvāca  parāśarasuta vyāsa śṛṇu prītyā śubhāṃ gatim  vrataṃ hi śuddhabhaktānāṃ tathā śuddhaṃ tapasvinām  
ye śivaṃ śuddhakarmāṇassuśuddhatapasānvitāḥ  samarcayanti taṃ nityaṃ vandyāste sarvathānvaham  
nātaptatapaso yāṃti śivalokamanāmayam  śivānugrahasaddhetustapa eva mahāmune  
tapasā divi modante pratyakṣaṃ devatāgaṇāḥ  ṛṣayo munayaścaiva satyaṃ jānīha madvacaḥ  
sudurddharaṃ durāsādhyaṃ sudhuraṃ duratikramam  tatsarvaṃ tapasā sādhyaṃ tapo hi duratikramam  
susthitastapasi brahmā nityaṃ viṣṇurharastathā  devā devyo'khilāḥ prāptāstapasā durlabhaṃ phalam  
yena yena hi bhāvena sthitvā yatkriyate tapaḥ  tatassaṃprāpyate'sau tairiha loke na saṃśayaḥ  
sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tāmasaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam  vijñeyaṃ hi tapo vyāsa sarvasādhanasādhanam  
sāttvikaṃ daivatānāṃ hi yatīnāmūrddhvaretasām  rājasaṃ dānavānāṃ hi manuṣyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca  tāmasaṃ rākṣasānāṃ hi narāṇāṃ krūrakarmaṇām  
trividhaṃ tatphalaṃ proktaṃ munibhistattvadarśibhiḥ  japo dhyānaṃ tu devānāmarcanaṃ bhaktitaśśubham  
sāttvikaṃ taddhi nirdiṣṭamaśeṣaphalasādhakam  iha loke pare caiva manobhipretasādhanam  
kāmanāphalamuddiśya rājasaṃ tapa ucyate  nijadehaṃ susaṃpīḍya dehaśoṣakadussahaiḥ  
tapastāmasamuddiṣṭaṃ manobhipretasādhanam  
uttamaṃ sāttvikaṃ vidyāddharmabuddhiśca niścalā  snānaṃ pūjā japo homaḥ śuddhaśaucamahiṃsanam  
vratopavāsacaryā ca maunamindriyanigrahaḥ  dhīrvidyā satyamakrodho dānaṃ kṣāṃtirdamo dayā  
vāpīkūpataḍāgādeḥ prasādasya ca kalpanā  kṛcchraṃ cāṃdrāyaṇaṃ yajñassutīrthānyāśramāḥ punaḥ  
dharmasthānāni caitāni sukhadāni manīṣiṇām  sudharmaḥ paramo vyāsaḥ śivabhakteśca kāraṇam  
saṃkrātiviṣuvadyogo nādamukte niyujyatām  dhyānaṃ trikālikaṃ jyotirunmanībhāvadhāraṇā  
recakaḥ pūrakaḥ kumbhaḥ prāṇāyāmastridhā smṛtaḥ  nāḍīsaṃcāravijñānaṃ pratyāhāranirodhanam  
turīyaṃ tadadho buddhiraṇimādyaṣṭasaṃyutam  pūrvottamaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ parajñānaprasādhanam  
kāṣṭhāvasthā mṛtāvasthā haritāveti kīrtitāḥ  nānopalabdhayo hyetāssarvapāpapraṇāśanāḥ  
nārī śayyā tathā pānaṃ vastradhūpavilepanam  tāmbūlabhakṣaṇaṃ paṃca rājaiśvaryyavibhūtayaḥ  
hemabhārastathā tāmraṃ gṛhāśca ratnadhenavaḥ  pāṃḍityaṃ vedaśāstrāṇāṃ gītanṛtyavibhūṣaṇam  
śaṃkhavīṇāmṛdaṃgāśca gajendraśchatracāmare  bhogarūpāṇi caitāni ebhiśśakto'nurajyate  
ādarśavanmunesnehaistilavatsa nipīḍyate  araṃ gaccheti cāpyenaṃ kurute jñānamohitaḥ  
jānannapīha saṃsāre bhramate ghaṭiyaṃtravat  sarvayoniṣu duḥkhārtassthāvareṣu careṣu ca  
evaṃ yoniṣu sarvāsu pratikramya bhrameṇa ta  kālāṃtaravaśādyāti mānuṣyamatidurlabham  
vyutkrameṇāpi mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate puṇyagauravāt  vicitrā gatayaḥ proktāḥ karmaṇāṃ gurulāghavāt  
mānuṣyaṃ ca samāsādya svargamokṣaprasādhanam  nācaratyātmanaḥ śreyassa mṛtaśśocate ciram  
devāsurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ mānuṣyaṃ cāti durlabhaṃ  tatsaṃprāpya tathā kuryānna gacchennarakaṃ yathā  
svargāpavargalābhāya yadi nāsti samudyamaḥ  durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ vṛthā tajjanma kīrtitam  
sarvasya mūlaṃ mānuṣyaṃ caturvargasya kīrtitam  saṃprāpya dharmato vyāsa tadyattādanupālayet  
dharmamūlaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ labdhvā sarvārthasādhakam  yadi lābhāya yatnaḥ syānmūlaṃ rakṣetsvayaṃ tataḥ  
mānuṣye'pi ca vipratvaṃ yaḥ prāpya khalu durlabham  nācaratyātmanaḥ śreyaḥ ko'nyastasmādacetanaḥ  
dvīpānāmeva sarveṣāṃ karmabhūmiriyamucyate  itassvargaśca mokṣaśca prāpyate samupārjitaḥ  
deśe'sminbhārate varṣe prāpya mānuṣyamadhruvam  na kuryādātmanaḥ śreyastenātmā khalu vaṃcitaḥ  
karmabhūmiriyaṃ vipra phalabhūmirasau smṛtā  iha yatkriyate karma svarge tadanubhujyate  
yāvatsvāsthyaṃ śarīrasya tāvaddharmaṃ samācaret  asvasthaścodito'pyanyairna kiṃcitkartumutsahet  
adhruveṇa śarīreṇa dhruvaṃ yo na prasādhayet  dhruvaṃ tasya paribhraṣṭamadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca  
āyuṣaḥ khaṃḍakhaṃḍāni nipataṃti tadagrataḥ  ahorātropadeśena kimarthaṃ nāvabudhyate  
yadā na jñāyate mṛtyuḥ kadā kasya bhaviṣyati  ākasmike hi maraṇe dhṛtiṃ viṃdati kastathā  
parityajya yadā sarvamekākī yāsyati dhruvam  na dadāti kadā kasmātpātheyārthamidaṃ dhanam  
gṛhītadānapātheyaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam  anyathā kliśyate jaṃtuḥ pātheyarahite pathi  
yeṣāṃ kāleya puṇyāni paripūrṇāni sarvataḥ  gacchatāṃ svargadeśaṃ hi teṣāṃ lābhaḥ padepade  
iti jñātvā naraḥ puṇyaṃ kuryātpāpaṃ vivarjayet  puṇyena yāti devatvamapuṇyo narakaṃ vrajet  
ye manāgapi deveśaṃ prapannāśśaraṇaṃ śivam  te'pi ghoraṃ na paśyaṃti yamaṃ na narakaṃ tathā  
kiṃtu pāpairmahāmohaiḥ kiṃcitkāle śivājñayā  vasaṃti tatra mānuṣyāstato yāṃti śivāspadam  
ye punassarvabhāvena pratipannā maheśvaram  na te limpaṃti pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā  
uktaṃ śiveti yairnāma tathā harahareti ca  na teṣāṃ narakādbhītiryamāddhi munisattama  
paralokasya pātheyaṃ mokṣopāyamanāmayam  puṇyasaṃghaikanilayaṃ śiva ityakṣaradvayam  
śivanāmaiva saṃsāramahārogekaśāmakam  nānyatsaṃsārarogasya śāmakaṃ dṛśyate mayā  
brahmahatyāsahasrāṇi purā kṛtvā tu pulkasaḥ  śiveti nāma vimalaṃ śrutvā mokṣaṃ gataḥ purā  
tasmādvivarddhayedbhaktimīśvare satataṃ budhaḥ  śivabhaktyā mahāprājña bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca viṃdati  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ manuviśeṣakathanaṃ nāma viṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 vyāsa uvāca  brāhmaṇatvaṃ hi duṣprāpyaṃ nisargādbrāhmaṇo bhavet  īśvarasya mukhātkṣatraṃ bāhubhyāmūruto viśaḥ  
padbhyāṃ śūdrassamutpanna iti tasya mukhācchrutiḥ  kimu sthitimadhaḥsthānādāpnuvanti hyato vada  
sanatkumāra uvāca  duṣkṛtena tu kāleya sthānādbhraśyanti mānavāḥ  śreṣṭhaṃ sthānaṃ samāsādya tasmādrakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ  
yastu vipratvamutsṛjya kṣatrayonyāṃ prasūyate  brāhmaṇyātsa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatriyatvaṃ niṣevate  
adharmasevanānmūḍhastathaiva parivartate  janmāntarasahasrāṇi tamasyāviśate yataḥ  
tasmātprāpya paraṃ sthānaṃ pramādyanna tu nāśayet  svasthānaṃ sarvadā rakṣetprāpyāpi vipado naraḥ  
brāhmaṇatvaṃ śubhaṃ prāpya brāhmaṇyaṃ yo'vamanyate  bhojyābhojyaṃ na jānāti sa pumānkṣatriyo bhavet  
karmaṇā yena medhāvī śūdro vaiśyo hi jāyate  tatte vakṣyāmi nikhilaṃ yena varṇottamo bhavet  
śūdrakarma yathoddiṣṭaṃ śūdro bhūtvā samācaret  yathāvatparicaryyāṃ tu triṣu varṇeṣu nityadā  
kurute kāmayānastu śūdro'pi vaiśyatāṃ vrajet  yo yojayeddhanairvaiśyo juhvānaśca yathāvidhi  
agnihotramupādāya śeṣānna kṛtabhojanaḥ  sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
kṣattriyo jāyate yajñaisaṃskṛtairāttadakṣiṇaiḥ  adhīte svargamanvicchaṃstretāgniśaraṇaṃ sadā  
ārdrahastapado nityaṃ kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa pālayet  ṛtukālābhigāmī ca svabhāryyādharmatatparaḥ  
sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya bhūtebhyo dīyatāmiti  gobrāhmaṇātmano'rthaṃ hi saṃgrāmābhihato bhavet  
tenāgnimantrapūtātmā kṣattriyo brāhmaṇo bhavet  vidhito brāhmaṇo bhūtvā yājakastu prajāyate  
svakarmanirato nityaṃ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ  prāpyate vipulassvargo devānāmapi vallabhaḥ  
brahmaṇatvaṃ hi duṣprāpyaṃ kṛcchreṇa sādhyate naraiḥ  brāhmaṇyātsakalaṃ prāpya mokṣaścāpi munīśvara  
tasmātsarvaprayatnena brāhmaṇo dharmatatparaḥ  sādhanaṃ sarvavargasya rakṣedbrāhmaṇyamuttamam  
vyāsa uvāca  saṃgrāmasyeha māhātmyaṃ tvayoktaṃ munisattama  etadicchāmyahaṃ śrotuṃ brūhi tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara  
sanatkumāra uvāca  agniṣṭomādibhiryajñairiṣṭvā vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ  na tatphalamavāpnoti saṃgrāme yadavāpnuyāt  
iti tattvavidaḥ prāhuryajñakarmavidassadā  tasmāttatte pravakṣyāmi yatphalaṃ śastrajīvinām  
dharmalābho'rthalābhaśca yaśolābhastathaiva ca  yaśśūro vāṃchate yuddhaṃ vimṛndanparavāhinīm  
tasya dharmārtha kāmāśca yajñaścaiva sadakṣiṇaḥ  paraṃ hyabhimukhaṃ dattvā tadyānaṃ yo'dhirohati  
viṣṇuloke sa jāyeta yaśca yuddhe'parājitaḥ  aśvamedhānavāpnoti caturo na mṛtassa cet  
yastu śastramanutsṛjya mriyate vāhinī mukhe  sammukho vartate śūrassa svargānna nivartate  
rājā vā rājaputro vā senāpatirathāpi vā  hatakṣātreṇa yaḥ śūrastasya loko'kṣayo bhavet  
yāvaṃti tasya romāṇi bhidyante'strairmahāhave  tāvato labhate lokānsarvakāmadughā'kṣayān  
vīrāsanaṃ vīraśayyā vīrasthānasthitissthirā  sarvadā bhavati vyāsa iha loke paratra ca  
gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe ca sthānasvāmyarthameva ca  ye mṛtāste sukhaṃ yāṃti yathā sukṛtinastathā  
yaḥ kaścidbrāhmaṇaṃ hatvā paścātprāṇānparityajet  tatrāsau svapateryuddhe sa svargānna nivartate  
kravyādairdatibhiścaiva hatasya gatiruttamā  dvijagosvāmināmarthe bhavedvipuladākṣayā  
śaknotviha samarthaśca yaṣṭuṃ kratuśatairapi  ātmadehaparityāgaḥ kartuṃ yudhi suduṣkaraḥ  
yuddhaṃ puṇyatamaṃ svargyaṃ rūpajñaṃ sarvatomukham  sarveṣāmeva varṇānāṃ kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥ  
bhṛśaṃ caiva pravakṣyāmi yuddhadharmaṃ sanātanam  yādṛśāya prahartavyaṃ yādṛśaṃ parivarjayet  
ātatāyinamāyāṃtamapi vedāṃtagaṃ dvijam  jighāṃsaṃtaṃ jighāṃsettu na tena brahmahā bhavet  
haṃtavyo'pi na haṃtavyaḥ pānīyaṃ yaśca yācate  raṇe hatvāturānvyāsa sa naro brahmahā bhavet  
vyādhitaṃ durbalaṃ bālaṃ stryanāthau kṛpaṇaṃ dhruvam  dhanurbhagnaṃ chinnaguṇaṃ hatvā vai brahmahā bhavet  
evaṃ vicāryya saddhīmānbhavetprītyāḥ raṇapriyaḥ  sajanmanaḥ phalaṃ prāpya paratreha pramodate  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ raṇaphalavarṇanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  vidhiṃ tāta vadedānīṃ jīva janmavidhānataḥ  garbhe sthitiṃ ca tasyāpi vairāgyārthaṃ munīśvara  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa samāsena śāstrasāramaśeṣataḥ  vadiṣyāmi suvairāgyaṃ mumukṣorbhavabaṃdhakṛt  
pākapātrasya madhye tu pṛthagannaṃ pṛthagjalam  agnerūrdhvaṃ jalaṃ sthāpyaṃ tadannaṃ ca jalopari  
jalasyādhassa cāgnirhi sthito'gniṃ dhamate śanaiḥ  vāyunādhamyamāno'gniratyuṣṇaṃ kurute jalam  
tadannamuṣṇatoyena samantātpacyate punaḥ  dvidhā bhavati tatpakvaṃ pṛthakkiṭṭaṃ pṛthagrasaḥ  
malairdvādaśabhiḥ kiṭṭaṃ bhinnaṃ dehādbahirbhavet  rasastu dehe sarati sa puṣṭastena jāyate  
karṇākṣināsikā jihvā dantāḥ śiśno gudaṃ nakhāḥ  malāśrayaḥ kaphaḥ svedo viṇmūtraṃ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ  
hṛtpadme pratibaddhāśca sarvanāḍyassamaṃtataḥ  jñeyā rasapravāhinyastatprakāraṃ bruve mune  
tāsāṃ mukheṣu taṃ sūkṣmaṃ prāṇassthāpayet rasam  rasena tena nāḍīstāḥ prāṇaṃ pūrayate punaḥ  
punaḥ prayāṃti saṃpūrṇāstāśca dehaṃ samaṃtataḥ  tatassa nāḍīmadhyasthaśśarīreṇātmanā rasaḥ  
pacyate pacyamānācca bhavetpākadvayaṃ punaḥ  tvak tayā veṣṭyate pūrvaṃ rudhiraṃ ca prajāyate  
raktāllomāni māṃsaṃ ca keśāḥ snāyuśca māṃsataḥ  snāyutaśca tathāsthīni nakhā majjāsthisaṃbhavāḥ  
majjākāraṇavaikalyaṃ śukraṃ hi prasavātmakam  iti dvādaśadhānnasya pariṇāmaḥ prakīrtitāḥ  
śukro'nnājjāyate śukrāddivyadehasya saṃbhavaḥ  ṛtukāle yadā śukraṃ nirdoṣaṃ yonisaṃsthitam  
tadvā tadvāyusaṃspṛṣṭaṃ strīraktenaikatāṃ vrajet  visargakāle śukrasya jīvaḥ kāraṇasaṃyutaḥ  
saṃvṛtaḥ praviśedyoniṃ karmabhissvairniyojitaḥ  tacchukraraktamekasthamekāhātkalilaṃ bhavet  
paṃcarātreṇa kalilaṃ budbudākāratāṃ vrajet  budbudassaptarātreṇa māṃsapeśī bhavetpunaḥ  
grīvā śiraśca skaṃdhau ca pṛṣṭhavaṃśastathodaram  pāṇipādantathā pārśve kaṭirgātraṃ tathaiva ca  
dvimāsābhyantareṇaiva kramaśassaṃbhavediha  tribhirmāsaiḥ prajāyaṃte sarve hyaṃkurasaṃdhayaḥ  
māsaiścaturbhiraṃgulyaḥ prajāyaṃte yathākramam  mukhaṃ nāsā ca karṇau māsaiḥ paṃcabhireva ca  
dantapaṃktistathā guhyaṃ jāyaṃte ca nakhāḥ punaḥ  karṇayostu bhavecchidraṃ ṣaṇmāsābhyaṃtareṇa tu  
pāyurmehamupasthaṃ ca nābhiścābhyupajāyate  saṃdhayo ye ca gātreṣu māsairjāyaṃti saptabhiḥ  
aṃgapratyaṃgasaṃpūrṇaḥ paripakvassa tiṣṭhati  udare māturācchanno jarāyau muni sattama  
māturāhāracauryyeṇa ṣaḍvidhena rasena tu  nābhinālanibaddhena varddhate sa dinedine  
tatasmṛtiṃ labhejjīvassaṃpūrṇe'smiñśarīrake  sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānāti nidrāsvapnaṃ purākṛtam  
mṛtaścāhaṃ punarjāto jātaścāhaṃ punarmṛtaḥ  nānāyonisahasrāṇi mayā dṛṣṭāni jāyatā  
adhunā jātamātro'haṃ prāptasaṃskāra eva ca  śreyo'munā kariṣyāmi yena garbhe na saṃbhavaḥ  
garbhasthaściṃtayatyevamahaṃ garbhādvinissṛtaḥ  anveṣyāmi śivajñānaṃ saṃsāravinivartakam  
evaṃ sa garbhaduḥkhena mahatā paripīḍitaḥ  jīvaḥ karmavaśādāste mokṣopāyaṃ viciṃtayan  
yathā girivarākrāṃtaḥ kaścidduḥkhena tiṣṭhati  tathā jarāyuṇā dehī duḥkhaṃ tiṣṭhati veṣṭitaḥ  
patitassāgare yadvadduḥkhamāste samākulaḥ  garbhodakena siktāṃgassarvadākulitastadā  
lohakuṃbhe yathā nyastaḥ pacyate kaścidagninā  garbhakuṃbhe tathā kṣiptaḥ pacyate jaṭharāgninā  
sūcībhiragnivarṇābhinirbhinnasya niraṃtaram  yadduḥkhaṃ jāyate tasya tatra saṃsthasya cādhikam  
garbhāvāsātparaṃ duḥkhaṃ kaṣṭaṃ naivāsti kutracit  dehināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ sughoramatisaṃkaṭam  
ityetatsumahadduḥkhaṃ pāpināṃ parikīrtitam  kevalaṃ dharmabudīnāṃ saptamāsairbhavassadā  
garbhātsudurlabhaṃ duḥkhaṃ yoniyaṃtranipīḍanāt  bhavetpāpātmanāṃ vyāsa na hi dharmayutātmanām  
ikṣuvatpīḍyamānasya yaṃtreṇaiva samaṃtataḥ  śirasā tāḍyamānasya pāpa mudgarakeṇa ca  
yaṃtreṇa pīḍitā yadvannissārā ssyustilāḥ kṣaṇāt  tathā śarīraṃ nissāraṃ yoniyaṃtranipīḍanāt  
asthipādatulāstaṃbhaṃ snāyubandhena yaṃtritam  raktamāṃsamṛdāliptaṃ viṇmūtradravyabhājanam  
keśaromanakhacchannaṃ rogāyatanamāturam  vadanaikamahādvāraṃ gavākṣāṣṭakabhūṣitam  
oṣṭhadvayakapāṭaṃ ca tathā jihvārgalānvitam  bhogatṛṣṇāturaṃ mūḍhaṃ rāgadveṣavaśānugam  
saṃvartitāṃgapratyaṃgaṃ jarāyupariveṣṭitam  saṃkaṭenāviviktena yonimārgeṇa nirgatam  
viṇmūtraraktasiktāṃgaṃ vikośikasamudbhavam  asthipañjaravikhyātamasmiñjñeyaṃ kalevaram  
śatatrayaṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ paṃcapeśīśatāni ca  sārddhābhistisṛbhiśchannaṃ samaṃtādromakoṭibhiḥ  
śarīraṃ sthūlasūkṣmābhirdṛśyā'dṛśyā hi tāssmṛtāḥ  etāvatībhirnāḍībhiḥ koṭibhistatsamaṃtataḥ  
asvedamadhubhiryābhiraṃtasthaḥ sravate bahiḥ  dvātriṃśaddaśanāḥ proktā viṃśatiśca nakhāḥ smṛtāḥ  
pittasya kuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ kaphasyāthāḍhakaṃ smṛtam  vasāyāśca palaṃ viṃśattadardhaṃ kapilasya ca  
paṃcārddhaṃ tu tulā jñeyā palāni daśa medasaḥ  palatrayaṃ mahāraktaṃ majjāyāśca caturguṇam  
śukrorddhaṃ kuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ tadbījaṃ dehināṃ balam  māṃsasya caikapiṃḍena palasāhasramucyate  
raktaṃ palaśataṃ jñeyaṃ viṇmūtraṃ yatpramāṇata  aṃjalayaśca catvāraścatvāro munisattama  
iti dehagṛhaṃ hyetannityasyānityamātmanaḥ  aviśuddhaṃ viśuddhasya karmabaṃdhādvinirmitam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ dehotpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sanatkumāra uvāca  śṛṇu vyāsa mahābuddhe dehasyāśucitāṃ mune  mahattvaṃ ca svabhāvasya samāsātkathayāmyaham  
śukraśoṇitasaṃyogāddehassaṃjāyate yataḥ  nityaṃ viṇmūtrasaṃpūrṇastenāyamaśucissmṛtaḥ  
yathāṃtarviṣṭhayā pūrṇaśśucimānna bahirghaṭaḥ  śodhyamāno hi deho'yaṃ tenāyamaśucistataḥ  
saṃprāpyātipavitrāṇi paṃcagavyahavīṃṣi cā  aśucitvaṃ kṣaṇādyāṃti kimanyadaśucistataḥ  
hṛdyānyapyannapānāni yaṃ prāpya surabhīṇi ca  aśucitvaṃ prayāṃtyāśu kimanyadaśucistataḥ  
he janāḥ kinna paśyaṃti yanniryāti dinedine  svadehātkaśmalaṃ pūtistadādhāraḥ kathaṃ śuciḥ  
dehassaṃśodhyamāno'pi paṃcagavyakuśāṃbubhiḥ  ghṛṣyamāṇa ivāṃgāro nirmalatvaṃ na gacchati  
srotāṃsi yasya satataṃ prabhavaṃti gireriva  kaphamūtrapurīṣādyaissa dehaśśudhyate katham  
sarvāśucinidhānasya śarīrasya na vidyate  śucirekaḥ pradeśo'pi viṇmūtrasya dṛteriva  
sṛṣṭvātmadehasrotāṃsi mṛttoyaiḥ śodhyate karaḥ  tathāpyaśucibhāṃḍasya na vibhraśyati kiṃ karaḥ  
kāyassugaṃdhadhūpādyairya nnenāpi susaṃskṛtaḥ  na jahāti svabhāvaṃ sa śvapucchamiva nāmitam  
yathā jātyaiva kṛṣṇorthaḥ śuklassyānna hyupāyataḥ  saṃśoddhyamānāpi tathā bhavenmūrtirna nirmalā  
jighrannapi svadurgaṃdhaṃ paśyannapi svakaṃ malam  na virajyeta loko'yaṃ pīḍayannapi nāsikām  
aho mohasya māhātmyaṃ yenedaṃ chāditaṃ jagat  śīghraṃ paśyansvakaṃ doṣaṃ kāyasya na virajyate  
svadehasya vigaṃdhena na virajyeta yo naraḥ  virāgakāraṇaṃ tasya kimetadupadiśyate  
sarvasyaiva jaganmadhye deha evāśucirbhavet  tanmalāvayavasparśācchucirapyaśucirbhavet  
gaṃdhalepāpanodārtha śaucaṃ dehasya kīrtitam  dvayasyāpagamācchuddhiśśuddhasparśādviśudhyati  
gaṃgātoyena sarveṇa mṛdbhāraiḥ parvatopamaiḥ  āmṛtyorācarecchaucaṃ bhāvaduṣṭo na śudhyati  
tīrthasnānaistapobhirvā duṣṭātmā naiva śudhyati  śvadṛtiḥ kṣālitā tīrthe kiṃ śuddhimadhigacchati  
aṃtarbhāvapraduṣṭasya viśato'pi hutāśanam  na svargo nāpavargaśca dehanirdahanaṃ param  
sarveṇa gāṃgena jalena samyaṅ mṛtparvatenāpyatha bhāvaduṣṭaḥ  ājanmanaḥ snānaparo manuṣyo na śudhyatītyeva vayaṃ vadāmaḥ  
prajvālya vahniṃ ghṛtatailasiktaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartaśikhaṃ mahāṃtam  praviśya dagdhastvapi bhāvaduṣṭo na dharmamāpnoti phalaṃ na cānyata  
gaṃgāditīrtheṣu vasaṃti matsyā devālaye pakṣigaṇāśca nityam  bhāvojjhitāste na phalaṃ labhaṃte tīrthāvagāhācca tathaiva dānāt  
bhāvaśuddhiḥ paraṃ śaucaṃ pramāṇe sarvakarmasu  anyathā''liṃgyate kāṃtā bhāvena duhitānyathā  
manaso bhidyate vṛttirabhinneṣvapi vastuṣu  anyathaiva sutaṃ nārī cintayatyanyathā patim  
paśyadhvamasya bhāvasya mahābhāgyamaśeṣataḥ  pariṣvaktopi yannāryyā bhāvahīnaṃ na kāmayet  
nādyādvividhamannādyaṃ bhakṣyāṇi surabhīṇi ca  yadi ciṃtāṃ samādhatte citte kāmādiṣu triṣu  
gṛhyate tena bhāvena naro bhāvādvimucyate  bhāvataśśuci śuddhātmā svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca viṃdati  
bhāvenaikātmaśuddhātmā dahañjuhvanstuvanmṛtaḥ  jñānāvāpteravāpyāśu lokānsubahuyājinām  
jñānāmalāṃbhasā puṃsāṃ sadvairāgyamṛdā punaḥ  avidyārāgaviṇmūtralepagaṃdhaviśodhanam  
evametaccharīraṃ hi nisargādaśuci smṛtam  tvaṅmātrasāraṃ niḥsāraṃ kadalīsārasannibham  
jñātvaivaṃ doṣavaddehaṃ yaḥ prājñaśśithilo bhavet  deha bhogodbhavādbhāvācchamacittaḥ prasannadhīḥ  
so'tikrāmati saṃsāraṃ jīvanmuktaḥ prajāyate  saṃsāraṃ kadalīsāradṛḍhagrāhyavatiṣṭhate  
evametanmahākaṣṭaṃ janma duḥkhaṃ prakīrtitam  puṃsāmajñānadoṣeṇa nānākārmavaśena ca  
ślokārdhena tu vakṣyāmi yaduktaṃ granthakoṭibhiḥ  mameti paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ na mameti paraṃ sukham  
bahavopīha rājānaḥ paraṃ loka mito gatāḥ  nirmamatvasametāstu baddhāśśatasahasraśaḥ  
garbhasthasya smṛtiryāsītsā ca tasya praṇaśyati  saṃmūrchitena duḥkhena yoniyantranipīḍanāt  
bāhyena vāyunā vāsya mohasaṅgena dehinaḥ  spṛṣṭamātreṇa ghoreṇa jvarassamupajāyate  
tena jvāreṇa mahatā sammohaśca prajāyate  sammūḍhasya smṛtibhraṃśaśśīghraṃ saṃjāyate punaḥ  
smṛtibhraṃśāttatastasya smṛtirnno'pūrvakarmaṇaḥ  ratiḥ saṃjāyate tūrṇaṃ jantostatraiva janmani  
rakto mūḍhaśca loko'yaṃ na kāryye sampravartate  na cātmānaṃ vijānāti na paraṃ na ca daivatam  
na śṛṇoti paraṃ śreyassati karṇe'pi sanmune  na paśyati paraṃ śreyassati cakṣuṣi tatkṣame  
same pathi śanairgacchan skhalatīva padepade  satyāṃ buddhau na jānāti bodhyamāno budhairapi  
saṃsāre kliśyate tena garbhalobhavaśānugaḥ  garbhasmṛtena pāpena samujjhitamatiḥ pumān  
itthaṃ mahatparaṃ divyaṃ śāstramuktaṃ śivena tu  tapasaḥ kathanārthāya svargamokṣaprasādhanam  
ye satyasmicchive jñāne sarvakāmārtha sādhane  na kurvantyātmanaḥ śreyastadatra mahadadbhutam  
avyaktendriyavṛttitvādbālye duḥkhaṃ mahatpunaḥ  icchannapi na śaknoti vaktuṃ karttuṃ pratikriyām  
daṃtotthāne mahadduḥkhamalpena vyādhinā tathā   bālarogaiśca vividhai pīḍā bālagrahairapi  
kvacitkṣuttṛṭparītāṃgaḥ kvacittiṣṭhati saṃraṭan  viṇmūtrabhakṣaṇādyaṃ ca mohādbālassamācaret  
kaumāre karṇapīḍāyāṃ mātāpitrośca sādhanaḥ  akṣarādhyayanādyaiśca nānāduḥkhaṃ pravartate  
bālye duḥkhamatītyaiva paśyannapi vimūḍhadhīḥ  na kurvītātmanaḥ śreyastadatra mahadadbhutam  
pravṛttendriyavṛttitvātkāmarogaprapīḍanāt  tadaprāpte tu satataṃ kutassaukhyaṃ tu yauvane  
īrṣyayā ca mahadduḥkhaṃ mohādraktasya tasya ca  netrasya kupitasyeva tyāgī duḥkhāya kevalam  
na rātrau viṃdate nidrāṃ kāmāgnipariveditaḥ  divāpi ca kutassaukhyamarthopārjanaciṃtayā  
strīṣvadhyāsitacittasya ye puṃsaḥ śukrabindavaḥ  te sukhāya na manyante svedajā iva te tathā  
kṛmibhistudyamānasya kuṣṭhino vānarasya ca  kaṃḍūyanābhitāpena yadbhavetstriṣu tadvidaḥ  
yādṛśaṃ manyate saukhyaṃ gaṃḍe pūtivinirgamāt  tādṛśaṃ strīṣu mantavyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate  
viṇmūtrasya samutsargātsukhaṃ bhavati yādṛśam  tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ mūḍhaiḥ kalpitamanyathā  
nārīṣvavastubhūtāsu sarvadoṣāśrayāsu vā  nāṇumātraṃ sukhaṃ tāsu kathitaṃ paṃcacūḍayā  
sammānanāvamānābhyāṃ viyogeneṣṭasaṃgamāt  yauvanaṃ jarayā grastaṃ kva saukhyamanupadravam  
valīpalitakhālityaiśśithilikṛtavigraham  sarvakriyāsvaśaktiṃ ca jarayā jarjarīkṛtam  
strīpuṃsayauvanaṃ hṛdyamanyo'nyasya priyaṃ purā  tadeva jarayāgrastamanayorapi na priyam  
apūrvavatsvamātmānaṃ jarayā parivartitam  yaḥ paśyannapi rajyeta ko'nyastasmādacetanaḥ  
jarābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ putrīputrādibāṃdhavaiḥ  āsaktatvāddurādharṣairbhṛtyaiśca paribhūyate  
dharmamarthaṃ ca kāmaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vātijarāturaḥ  aśaktassādhituṃ tasmādyuvā dharmaṃ samācaret  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ saṃsāracikitsāyāṃ dehā śucitvabālyādyavasthāduḥkhavarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  kutsitaṃ yoṣidarthaṃ yatsaṃproktaṃ paṃcacūḍayā  tanme brūhi samāsena yadi tuṣṭo'si me mune  
sanatkumāra uvāca  strīṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu vipra yathātatham  yasya śravaṇamātreṇa bhavedvairāgyamuttamam  
striyo mūlaṃ hi doṣāṇāṃ laghucittāḥ sadā mune  tadāsaktirna kartavyā mokṣepsubhiratandritaiḥ  
atrāpyudāharaṃtīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam  nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ puṃścalyā paṃcacūḍayā  
lokānparicarandhīmāndevarṣirnāradaḥ purā  dadarśāpsarasaṃ bālāṃ paṃcacūḍāmanuttamām  
papracchāpsarasaṃ subhrūṃ nārado munisattamaḥ  saṃśayo hṛdi me kaścittanme brūhi sumadhyame  
evamuktā tu sā vipraṃ pratyuvāca varāpsarā  viṣaye sati vakṣyāmi samarthāṃ manyase'tha mām  
nārada uvāca  na tvāmaviṣaye bhadre niyokṣyāmi kathaṃcana  strīṇāṃ svabhāvamicchāmi tvattaḥ śrotuṃ sumadhyame  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etacchrutvā vacastasya devarṣerapsarottamā  pratyuvāca munīśaṃ taṃ devarṣiṃ munisattamam  
paṃcacūḍovāca  mune śṛṇu na śakyā strī satī vai niṃdituṃ striyā  viditāste striyo yāśca yādṛśyaśca svabhāvataḥ  
na māmarhasi devarṣe niyoktuṃ praśnamīdṛśam  ityuktvā sā'bhavattūṣṇīṃ paṃcacūḍāpsarovarā  
atha devarṣivaryo hi śrutvā tadvākyamuttamam  pratyuvāca punastāṃ vai lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
nārada uvāca  mṛṣāvāde bhaveddoṣassatye doṣo na vidyate  iti jānīhi satyaṃ tvaṃ vadātastatsumadhyame  
sanatkumāra uvāca  ityuktā sā kṛtamatī rabhasā cāruhāsinī  strīdoṣāñśāśvatānsatyānbhāṣituṃ saṃpracakrame  
pañcacūḍovāca  kulīnā nāthavaṃtyaśca rūpavaṃtyaśca yoṣitaḥ  maryādāsu na tiṣṭhaṃti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu nārada  
na strībhyaḥ kiṃcidanyadvai pāpīyastaramasti hi  striyo mūlaṃ hi pāpānāṃ tathā tvamapi vettha ha  
samājñātānarthavataḥ pratirūpān yathepsitān  yatīnantaramāsādya nālaṃ nāryyaḥ pratīkṣitum  
asaddharmastvayaṃ strīṇāmasmākaṃ bhavati prabho  pāpīyaso narān yadvai lajjāṃ tyaktvā bhajāmahe  
striyaṃ ca yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchati  īṣacca kurute sevāṃ tamevecchati yoṣitaḥ  
anarthitvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ bhayātpatijanasya ca  maryādāyāmamaryādāḥ striyastiṣṭhaṃti bhartṛṣu  
nāsāṃ kaścidamānyo'sti nāsāṃ vayasi niścayaḥ  surūpaṃ vā kurūpaṃ vā pumāṃsamupabhuṃjate  
na bhayādatha vākrośānnārthahetoḥ kathaṃcana  na jñātikulasambandhāstriyastiṣṭhaṃti bhartṛṣu  
yauvane vartamānānāmiṣṭābharaṇavāsasām  nārīṇāṃ svairavṛttīnāṃ spṛhayanti kulastriyaḥ  
yā hi śaśvadbahumatā rakṣyante dayitāḥ striyaḥ  api tāḥ samprasajjante kubjāndhajaḍavāmane  
paṃguṣvapi ca devarṣe ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ  strīṇāmagamyo lokeṣu nāsti kaścinmahāmune  
yadi puṃsāṃ gatirbrahmankathaṃcinnopapadyate  apyanyonyaṃ pravartante na ca tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu  
alābhātpuruṣāṇāṃ ca bhayātparijanasya ca  vadhabandhabhayāccaiva tā bhagnāśā hi yoṣitaḥ  
calasvabhāva duśceṣṭā durgāhyā bhavatastathā  prājñasya puruṣasyeha yathā ratiparigrahāt  
nāgnistuṣyati kāṣṭhānāṃ nāpagānāṃ mahodadhi  nāntakassarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ  
idamanyacca devarṣe rahasyaṃ sarvayoṣitām  dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ sadyo yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ  
susnātaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugandhaṃ malavarjitam  yoniḥ praklidyate strīṇāṃ dṛteḥ pātrādivodakam  
kāyānāmapi dātāraṃ karttāraṃ mānasāṃtvayoḥ  rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyaṃti bhartāraṃ paramaṃ striyaḥ  
na kāmabhogātparamānnālaṃkārārthasaṃcayāt  tathā hitaṃ na manyante yathā ratiparigrahāt  
antakaśśamano mṛtyuḥ pātālaṃ vaḍavāmukham  kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ  
yataśca bhūtāni mahāṃti paṃca yataśca loko vihito vidhātrā  yataḥ pumāṃsaḥ pramadāśca nirmitāḥ sadaiva doṣaḥ pramadāsu nārada  
sanatkumāra uvāca  iti śrutvā vacastasyā nāradastuṣṭamānasaḥ  tathyaṃ matvā tatastadvai viraktobhūddhi tāsu ca  
ityuktaḥ strī svabhāvaste paṃcacūḍokta ādarāt  vairāgyakāraṇaṃ vyāsa kimanyacchrotumarhasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ strīsvabhāvavarṇanaṃ nāma caturviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  sanatkumāra sarvajña tvatsakāśānmayā mune  strīsvabhāvaḥ śrutaḥ prītyā kālajñānaṃ vadasva me  
sanatkumāra uvāca  idameva purā'pṛcchatpārvatī parameśvaram  śrutvā nānākathāṃ divyāṃ prasannā supraṇamya tam  
pārvatyuvāca  bhagavaṃstvatprasādena jñātaṃ me sakalaṃ matam  yathārcanaṃ tu te deva yairmaṃtraiśca yathāvidhi  
adyāpi saṃśayastvekaḥ kālacakraṃ prati prabho  mṛtyucihnaṃ yathā deva kiṃ pramāṇaṃ yathāyuṣaḥ  
tathā kathaya me nātha yadyahaṃ tava vallabhā  iti pṛṣṭastayā devyā pratyuvāca maheśvaraḥ  
 īśvara uvāca  satyaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi śāstraṃ sarvottamaṃ priye  yena śāstreṇa deveśi naraiḥ kālaḥ prabudhyate  
ahaḥ pakṣaṃ tathā māsamṛtuṃ cāyanavatsarau  sthūlasūkṣmagataiścihnairbahiraṃtargataistathā  
tattehaṃ sampravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena sundari  lokānāmupakārārthaṃ vairāgyārthamume'dhunā  
akasmātpāṃḍuraṃ dehamūrddhvarāgaṃ samaṃtataḥ  tadā mṛtyuṃ vijānīyātṣaṇmāsābhyantare priye  
mukhaṃ karṇau tathā cakṣurjihvāstambho yadā bhavet  tadā mṛtyuṃ vijānīyātṣaṇmāsābhyantare priye  
rauravānugataṃ bhadra dhvaniṃ nākarṇayeddrutam  ṣaṇmāsābhyaṃtare mṛtyurjñātavyaḥ kālavedibhiḥ  
ravisomāgnisaṃyogādyadodyotaṃ na paśyati  kṛṣṇaṃ sarvaṃ samastaṃ ca ṣaṇmāsaṃ jīvitaṃ tathā  
vāmahasto yadā devi saptāhaṃ spaṃdate priye  jīvitaṃ tu tadā tasya māsamekaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
unmīlayati gātrāṇi tālukaṃ śuṣyate yadā  jīvitaṃ tu tadā tasya māsamekaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
nāsā tu sravate yasya tridoṣe pakṣajīvitam  vaktraṃ kaṃṭhaṃ ca śuṣyeta ṣaṇmāsāṃte gatāyuṣaḥ  
sthūlajihvā bhavedyasya dvijāḥ klidyaṃti bhāmini  ṣaṇmāsājjāyate mṛtyuścihnaistairupalakṣayet  
aṃbutailaghṛtasthaṃ tu darpaṇe varavarṇini  na paśyati yadātmānaṃ vikṛtaṃ palameva ca  
ṣaṇmāsāyussa vijñeyaḥ kālacakraṃ vijānatā  anyacca śṛṇu deveśi yena mṛtyurvibuddhyate  
śirohīnāṃ yadā chāyāṃ svakīyāmupalakṣayet  athavā chāyayā hīnaṃ māsamekaṃ na jīvati  
āṃgikāni mayoktāni mṛtyucihnāni pārvati  bāhyasthāni bruve bhadre cihnāni śṛṇu sāṃpratam  
raśmihīnaṃ yadā devi bhavetsomārkamaṇḍalam  dṛśyate pāṭalākāraṃ māsārdedhena vipadyate  
aruṃdhatī mahāyānamiṃdulakṣaṇavarjitam  adṛṣṭatārako yo'sau māsamekaṃ sa jīvati  
dṛṣṭe grahe ca diṅmohaḥ ṣaṇmāsājjāyate dhruvam  utathyaṃ na dhruvaṃ paśyedyadi vā ravimaṇḍalam  
rātrau dhanuryadāpaśyenmadhyāhne colkapātanam  veṣṭyate gṛdhrakākaiśca ṣaṇmāsāyurna saṃśayaḥ  
ṛṣayassvargapaṃthāśca dṛśyaṃte naiva cāmbare  ṣaṇmāsāyurvijanīyātpuruṣaiḥ kālavedibhiḥ  
akasmādrāhuṇā grastaṃ sūryaṃ vā somameva ca  dikcakraṃ bhrāṃtavatpaśyetṣaṇmāsānmriyate sphuṭam  
nīlābhirmakṣikābhiśca hyakasmādveṣṭyate pumān  māsamekaṃ hi tasyāyurjñātavyaṃ paramārthataḥ  
gṛdhraḥ kākaḥ kapotaśca śiraścākramya tiṣṭhati  śīghraṃ tu mriyate jaṃturmāsaikena na saṃśayaḥ  
evaṃ cāriṣṭabhedastu bāhyasthaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ  mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmyaham  
hastayorubhayordevi yathā kālaṃ vijānate  vāmadakṣiṇayormadhye pratyakṣaṃ cetyudāhṛtam  
evaṃ pakṣau sthitau dvau tu samāsātsurasuṃdari  śucirbhūtvā smarandevaṃ susnātassaṃyatendriyaḥ  
hastau prakṣālya dugdhenālaktakena vimardayet  gaṃdhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ karau kṛtvā mṛgayecca śubhāśubham  
kaniṣṭhāmāditaḥ kṛtvā yāvadaṃguṣṭhakaṃ priye  parvatrayakrameṇaiva hastayorubhayorapi  
pratipadādivinyasya tithiṃ pratipadāditaḥ  saṃpuṭākārahastau tu pūrvadiṅmukhasaṃsthitaḥ  
smarennavātmakaṃ maṃtraṃ yāvadaṣṭottaraṃ śatam  nirīkṣayettato hastau pratiparvaṇi yatnataḥ  
tasminparvaṇi sā rekhā dṛśyate bhṛṃgasannibhā  tattithau hi mṛtirjñeyā kṛṣṇe śukle tathā priye  
adhunā nādajaṃ vakṣye saṃkṣepātkālalakṣaṇam  gamāgamaṃ viditvā tu karma kuryāñchṛṇu priye  
ātmavijñānaṃ suśroṇi cāraṃ jñātvā tu yatnataḥ  kṣaṇaṃ truṭirlavaṃ caiva nimeṣaṃ kāṣṭhakālikam  
muhūrtakaṃ tvahorātraṃ pakṣamāsartuvatsaram  abdaṃ yugaṃ tathā kalpaṃ mahākalpaṃ tathaiva ca  
evaṃ sa harate kālaḥ paripāṭyā sadāśivaḥ  vāmadakṣiṇamadhye tu pathi trayamidaṃ smṛtam  
dināni paṃca cārabhya paṃcaviṃśaddināvadhi  vāmācāragatau nādaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathitaṃ tava  
bhūtaraṃdhradiśaścaiva dhvajaśca varavarṇini  vāmacāragatau nādaḥ pramāṇaṃ kālavedinaḥ  
ṛtorvikārabhūtāśca guṇāstatraiva bhāmini  pramāṇaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ proktaṃ jñātavyaṃ prāṇavedibhiḥ  
bhūtasaṃkhyā yadā prāṇānvahaṃte ca iḍādayaḥ  varṣasyābhyaṃtare tasya jīvitaṃ hi na saṃśayaḥ  
daśaghasrapravāheṇa hyabdamānaṃ sa jīvati  paṃcadaśapravāheṇa hyabdamekaṃ gatāyuṣam  
viṃśaddinapravāheṇa ṣaṇmāsaṃ lakṣayettadā  paṃcaviṃśaddinamitaṃ vahate vāmanāḍikā  
jīvitaṃ tu tadā tasya trimāsaṃ hi gatāyuṣaḥ  ṣaḍviṃśaddinamānena māsadvayamudāhṛtam  
saptaviṃśaddinamitaṃ vahatetyativiśramā  māsamekaṃ samākhyātaṃ jīvitaṃ vāmagocare  
etatpramāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ vāmavāyupramāṇataḥ  savyetare dinānyeva catvāraścānupūrvaśaḥ  
catussthāne sthitā devi ṣoḍaśaitāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ vakṣyāmi sāmprataṃ hi yathārthataḥ  
ṣaḍdinānyāditaḥ kṛtvā saṃkhyāyāśca yathāvidhi  etadaṃtargate caiva vāmaraṃdhre prakāśitam  
ṣaḍdināni yadā rūḍhaṃ dvivarṣaṃ ca sa jīvati  māsānaṣṭau vijānīyāddinānyaṣṭa ca tāni tu  
prāṇaḥ saptadaśe caiva viddhi varṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  saptamāsānvijānīyāddinaiḥ ṣaḍbhirna saṃśayaḥ  
aṣṭaghasraprabhedena dvivarṣaṃ hi sa jīvati  caturmāsā hi vijñeyāścaturviṃśaddināvadhiḥ  
yadā navadinaṃ prāṇā vahaṃtyeva trimāsakam  māsadvayaṃ ca dve māse dinā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ  
pūrvavatkathitā ye tu kālaṃ teṣāṃ tu pūrvakam  avāṃtaradinā ye tu tena māsena kathyate  
ekādaśa pravāheṇa varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati  māsā nava tathā proktā dinānyaṣṭamitānyapi  
dvādaśena pravāheṇa varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati  māsān sapta vijānīyātṣaḍghasrāṃścāpyudāharet  
nāḍī yadā ca vahati trayodaśadināvadhi  samvatsaraṃ bhavettasya caturmāsāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  
caturviśaddinaṃ śeṣaṃ jīvitaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ  prāṇavāhā yadā vāme caturddaśadināni tu  
samvatsaraṃ bhavettasya māsāḥ ṣaṭ ca prakīrtitāḥ  caturviṃśaddinānyeva jīvitaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ  
paṃcadaśapravāheṇa nava māsānsa jīvati  caturviśaddinānyeva kathitaṃ kālavedibhiḥ  
ṣoḍaśāhapravāheṇa daśamāsānsa jīvati  caturviśaddinādhikyaṃ kathitaṃ kālavedibhiḥ  
saptadaśapravāheṇa navamāsairgatāyuṣam  aṣṭādaśadinānyatra kathitaṃ sādhakeśvari  
vāmacāraṃ yadā devi hyaṣṭādaśadināvadhiḥ  jīvitaṃ cāṣṭamāsaṃ tu ghasrā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ  
caturviṃśaddinānyatra niścayenāvadhāraya  prāṇavāho yadā devi trayoviṃśaddināvadhiḥ  
catvāraḥ kathitā māsāḥ ṣaḍdināni tathottare  caturviṃśapravāheṇa trīnmāsāṃśca sa jīvati  
dinānyatra daśāṣṭau ca saṃharaṃtyeva cārataḥ  avāṃtaradine yastu saṃkṣepātte prakīrtitaḥ  
vāmacāraḥ samākhyāto dakṣiṇaṃ śṛṇu sāṃpratam  aṣṭāviṃśapravāheṇa tithimānena jīvati  
pravāheṇa daśāhena tatsaṃsthena vipadyate  triṃśaddhasrapravāhena pañcāhena vipadyate  
ekatriṃśadyadā devi vahate ca niraṃtaram  dinatrayaṃ tadā tasya jīvitaṃ hi na saṃśayaḥ  
dvātriṃśatprāṇasaṃkhyā ca yadā hi vahate raviḥ  tadā tu jīvitaṃ tasya dvidinaṃ hi na saṃśayaḥ  
dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ prāṇo madhyasthaṃ kathayāmi te  ekabhāgagato vāyupravāho mukhamaṇḍale  
dhāvamānapravāheṇa dinamekaṃ sa jīvati  cakrame tatparāsorhi purāvidbhirudāhṛtam  
etatte kathitaṃ devi kālacakraṃ gatāyuṣaḥ  lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya kimanyacchrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe paṃcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ kālajñānavarṇanaṃ nāma paṃcaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
devyuvāca  kathitaṃ tu tvayā deva kālajñānaṃ yathārthataḥ  kālasya vaṃcanaṃ brūhi yathā tattvena yoginaḥ  
kālastu sannikṛṣṭo hi vartate sarvajaṃtuṣu  yathā cāsya na mṛtyuśca vaṃcate kālamāgatam  
tathā kathaya me deva prītiṃ kṛtvā mamopari  yogināṃ ca hitāya tvaṃ brūhi sarvasukhaprada  
 śaṃkara uvāca  śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi pṛṣṭohaṃ yattvayā śive  samāsena ca sarveṣāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthataḥ  
pṛthivyāpastathā tejo vāyurākāśameva ca  eteṣāṃ hi samāyogaḥ śarīraṃ pāṃcabhautikam  
ākāśastu tato vyāpī sarveṣāṃ sarvagaḥ sthitaḥ  ākāśe tu vilīyaṃte saṃbhavaṃti punastataḥ  
viyoge tu sadā kasya svaṃ dhāma pratipedire  tasyā sthiratā cāsti sannipātasya suṃdari  
jñānino'pi tathā tatra tapomaṃtrabalādapi  te sarve suvijānaṃti sarvametanna saṃśayaḥ  
devyuvāca  khaṃ tena yannaśyati ghorarūpaḥ kālaḥ karālastridivaikanāthaḥ  dagdhastvayā tvaṃ punareva tuṣṭaḥ stotrai stutaḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ sa lebhe  
tvayā sa coktaḥ kathayā janānāmadṛṣṭarūpaḥ pracariṣyasīti  dṛṣṭastvayā tatra mahāprabhāvaḥ prabhorvarātte punarutthitaśca  
tadadya bhoḥ kāla ihāsthi kiṃcinnihanyate yena vadasva tanme  tvaṃ yogivaryaḥ prabhurātmataṃtraḥ paropakārāttatanurmaheśa  
śaṃkara uvāca  na hanyate devavaraistu daityaissayakṣarakṣoragamānuṣaiśca  ye yogino dhyānaparāssadehā bhavaṃti te ghnaṃti sukhena kālam  
sanatkumāra uvāca  etacchrutvā tribhuvanaguroḥ prāha gaurī vihasya satyaṃ tvaṃ me vada kathamasau hanyate yena kālaḥ  śambhustāmāha sadyo hi makaravadane yogino ye kṣipaṃti kālavyālaṃ sakalamanaghāstacchṛṇuṣvaikacittā  
śaṅkara uvāca  paṃcabhūtātmako dehassadāyuktastu tadguṇaiḥ  utpādyate varārohe tadvilīno hi pārthivaḥ  
ākāśājjāyate vāyurvāyostejaśca jāyate  tejaso'mbu vinirddiṣṭaṃ tasmāddhi pṛthivī bhavet  
pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni gacchaṃti kramaśaḥ param  dharā paṃcaguṇā proktā hyāpaścaiva caturguṇāḥ  
triguṇaṃ ca tathā tejo vāyurdviguṇa eva ca  śabdaikaguṇamākāśaṃ pṛthivyādiṣu kīrtitam  
śabdassparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca paṃcamaḥ  vijahāti guṇaṃ svaṃ svaṃ tadā bhūtaṃ vipadyate  
tadā guṇaṃ vigṛhṇāti prādurbhūtaṃ taducyate  evaṃ jānīhi deveśi paṃcabhūtāni tattvataḥ  
tasmāddhi yoginā nityaṃ svasvakāleṃ'śajā guṇāḥ  ciṃtanīyāḥ prayatnena devi kālajigīṣuṇā  
devyuvāca  kathaṃ jejīyyate kālo yogibhiryogavitprabho  dhyānena cātha mantreṇa tatsarvaṃ kathayasva me  
śaṅkara uvāca  śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi yogināṃ hitakāmyayā  parajñānaprakathanaṃ na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit  
śraddadhānāya dātavyaṃ bhaktiyuktāya dhīmate  anāstikāya śuddhāya dharmanityāya bhāmini  
suśvāsena suśayyāyāṃ yogaṃ yuṃjīta yogavit  dīpaṃ vināṃdhakāre tu prajāḥ supteṣu dhārayet  
tarjanyā pihitau karṇau pīḍayitvā muhūrttakam  tasmātsaṃśrūyate śabdastudanvahnisamudbhavaḥ  
sandhyāto bhuktamevaṃ hi cāvasannaṃ kṣaṇādapi  sarvarogānnihatyāśu jvaropadravakānbahūn  
yaścopalakṣayennityairākāraṃ ghaṭikādvayam  jitvā mṛtyuṃ tathā kāmaṃ svecchayā paryyaṭediha  
sarvajñassarvadarśī ca sarvasiddhimavāpnuyāt  yathā nadati khe'bdo hi prāvṛḍadbhissusaṃyataḥ  
taṃ śrutvā mucyate yogī sadyaḥ saṃsārabandhanāt  tatassa yogibhirnnityaṃ sūkṣmātsūkṣmataro bhavet  
eṣa te kathito devi śabdabrahmavidhikramaḥ  palālamiva dhānyārthī tyajedbandhamaśeṣataḥ  
śabdabrahmatvidaṃ prāpya ye kecidanyakāṃkṣiṇaḥ  ghnaṃti te muṣṭinākāśaṃ kāmayaṃte kṣudhāṃ tṛṣām  
jñātvā paramidaṃ brahma sukhadaṃ muktikāraṇam  avāhyamakṣaraṃ caiva sarvopādhivivarjitam  
mohitāḥ kālapāśena mṛtyupāśavaśaṃgatāḥ  śabdabrahma na jānaṃti pāpinaste kubuddhayaḥ  
tāvadbhavaṃti saṃsāre yāvaddhāma na viṃdate  vidite tu pare tattve mucyate janmabandhanāt  
nidrālasyaṃ mahā vighnaṃ jitvā śatruṃ prayatnataḥ  sukhāsane sthito nityaṃ śabdabrahmābhyasanniti  
śatavṛddhaḥ pumāṃllabdhvā yāvadāyussamabhyaset  mṛtyuñjayavapustambha ārogyaṃ vāyuvarddhanam  
pratyayo dṛśyate vṛddhe kiṃ punastaruṇe jane  na coṃkāro na mantropi naiva bījaṃ na cākṣaram  
anāhatamanuccāryyaṃ śabdabrahma śivaṃ param  dhyāyante devi satataṃ sudhiyā yatnataḥ priye  
tasmācchabdā nava proktāḥ prāṇavidbhistu lakṣitāḥ  tānpravakṣyāmi yatnena nādasiddhimanukramāt  
ghoṣaṃ  kāṃsyaṃ  tathā śṛṃgaṃ  ghaṇṭāṃ  vīṇā  divaṃśajān  
dundubhiṃ  śaṃkhaśabdaṃ  tu navamaṃ meghagarjitam   
nava śabdānparityajya tuṃkāraṃ tu samabhyaset  dhyāyannevaṃ sadā yogī puṇyaiḥ pāpairna lipyate  
na śṛṇoti yadā śṛṇvanyogābhyāsena devike  mriyatebhyasamānastu yogī tiṣṭheddivāniśam  
tasmādutpadyate śabdo mṛ tsaptabhirdinaiḥ  sa vai navavidho devi taṃ bravīmi yathārthataḥ  prathamaṃ nadate ghoṣamātmaśuddhikaraṃ param  sarvavyādhiharaṃ nādaṃ vaśyākarṣaṇamuttamam  
dvitīyaṃ nādate kāṃsyastambhayetprāṇināṃ gatim  viṣabhūtagrahānsarvānbadhnīyānnātra saṃśayaḥ  
tṛtīyaṃ nādate śṛṃgamabhicāri niyojayet  vidviḍuccāṭane śatrormāraṇe ca prayojayet  
ghaṃṭānādaṃ caturtha tu vadate parameśvaraḥ  ākarṣassarvadevānāṃ kiṃ punarmānuṣā bhuvi  
yakṣagandharvakanyāśca tasyākṛṣṭā dadaṃti hi  yathepsitāṃ mahāsiddhiṃ yogine kāmato'pi vā  
vīṇā tu paṃcamo nādaḥ śrūyate yogibhissadā  tasmādutpadyate devi dūrādarśanameva hi  
dhyāyato vaṃśanādaṃ tu sarvatattvaṃ prajāyate  dundubhiṃ dhyāyamānastu jarāmṛtyuvivarjitaḥ  
śaṃkhaśabdena deveśi kāmarūpaṃ prapadyate  yogino meghanādena na vipatsaṃgamo bhavet  
yaścaikamanasā nityaṃ tuṃkāraṃ brahmarūpiṇam  kimasādhyaṃ na tasyāpi yathāmati varānane  
sarvajñassarvadarśī ca kāmarūpī vrajatyasau  na vikāraiḥ prayujyeta śiva eva na saṃśayaḥ  
etatte parameśāni śabdabrahmasvarūpakam  navadhā sarvamākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ kālavaṃcanavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
devyuvāca  vāyostu padamāpnoti yogākāśasamudbhavam  tanme sarvaṃ samācakṣva prasannastvaṃ yadi prabho  
 śaṃkara uvāca  purā me sarvamākhyātaṃ yogināṃ hitakāmyayā  kālaṃ jigāya yassamyagvāyorliṃgaṃ yathā bhavet  
tena jñātvā dinaṃ yogī prāṇāyāmaparaḥ sthitaḥ  sa jayatyāgataṃ kālaṃ māsārddhenaiva suṃdari  
hṛtstho vāyussadā vahnerdīpakasso'nupāvakaḥ  sa bāhyābhyaṃtaro vyāpī vāyussarvagato mahān  
jñānavijñānamutsāhaḥ sarvaṃ vāyoḥ pravartate  yeneha nirjito vāyustena sarvamidaṃ jagat  
dhāraṇāyāṃ sadā tiṣṭhejjarāmṛtyujighāṃsayā  yogī yogarataḥ samyagdhāraṇādhyānatatparaḥ  
lohakāro yathā bhastrāmāpūryya mukhato mune  sādhayedvāyunā karma tadvadyogī samabhyaset  
devassahasrake netrapādahastasahasrakaḥ  graṃthīnhi sarvamāvṛtya so'gre tiṣṭheddaśāṃgulam  
gāyatrīṃ śirasā sārddhaṃ japedvyāhṛtipūrvikām  trivāramāyataprāṇāḥ prāṇāyāmassa ucyate  
gatāgatā nivartaṃte candrasūryādayo grahāḥ  adyāpi na nivartaṃte yogadhyānaparāyaṇāḥ  
śatamabdaṃ tapastaptvā kuśāgrāpaḥ pibeddvijaḥ  tadāpnoti phalaṃ devi viprāṇāṃ dhāraṇaikayā  
yo dvijaḥ kalyamutthāya prāṇāyāmaikamācaret  sarvaṃ pāpaṃ nihaṃtyāśu brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati  
yo'taṃdritassadaikāṃte praṇāyāmaparo bhavet  jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ vinirjitya vāyugaḥ khecarīti saḥ  
siddhasya bhajate rūpaṃ kāṃtiṃ medhāṃ parākramam  śauryaṃ vāyusamo gatyā saukhyaṃ ślāghyaṃ paraṃ sukham  
etatkathitamaśeṣaṃ vāyossiddhiṃ yadāpnute yogī  yattejaso'pi labhate tatte vakṣyāmi deveśi  
sthitvā sukhāsane sve śete janavacanahīne tu  śaśiraviyutayā tejaḥ prakāśayanmadhyame deśe  
vahnigataṃ bhrūmadhye prakāśate yastvataṃdrito yogī  dīpahīnadhvāṃta paśyennyūnamasaṃśayaṃ loke  
netre karaśākhābhiḥ kiṃcitsaṃpīḍya yatnato yogī  tāraṃ paśyandhyāyenmuhūrtamarddhaṃ tamekabhāvo'pi  
tatastu tamasi dhyāyanpaśyate jyotiraiśvaram  śvetaṃ raktaṃ tathā pītaṃ kṛṣṇamindradhanuṣprabham  
bhuvormadhye lalāṭasthaṃ bālārkasamatejasam  taṃ viditvā tu kāmāṃgī krīḍate kāmarūpadhṛk  
kāraṇapraśamāveśaṃ parakāyapraveśanam  aṇimādiguṇāvāptirmanasā cāvalokanam  
dūraśravaṇa vijñānamadṛśyaṃ bahurūpadhṛk  satatābhyāsayogena khecaratvaṃ prajāyate  
śrutādhyayanasaṃpannā nānāśāstraviśāradāḥ  jñānino'pi vimuhyaṃte pūrvakarmavaśānugāḥ  
paśyaṃto'pi na paśyaṃti śṛṇvānā badhirā yathā  yathāṃdhā mānuṣā loke mūḍhāḥ pāpavimohitāḥ  
vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāṃtamādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt  tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ paṃthā vidyate prāyaṇāyaḥ  
eṣa te kathitaḥ samyaktejaso vidhiruttamaḥ  kālaṃ jitvā yathā yogī cāmaratvaṃ prapadyate  
punaḥ parataraṃ vakṣye yathā mṛtyurna jāyate  sāvadhānatayā devi śṛṇuṣvaikāgramānasā  
turīyā devi bhūtānāṃ yogināṃ dhyānināṃ tathā  sukhāsane yathāsthānaṃ yogī niyatamānasaḥ  
samunnataśarīro'pi sa baddhvā karasaṃpuṭam  cañcvākāreṇa vaktreṇa pibanvāyuṃ śanaiśśanaiḥ  
prasravaṃti kṣaṇādāpastālusthā jīvadāyikāḥ  tā jighredvāyunādāyāmṛtaṃ tacchītalaṃ jalam  
pibannanudinaṃ yogī na mṛtyuvaśago bhavet  divyakāyo mahātejāḥ pipāsā kṣudvivarjitaḥ  
balena nāgasturago javena dṛṣṭyā suparṇassuśrutistu dūrāt  ākuṃcitākuṃḍalikṛṣṇakeśo gaṃdharvavidyādharatulyavarṇaḥ  
jīvennaro varṣaśataṃ surāṇāṃ sumedhasā vākpatinā samatvam  evaṃ caran khecaratāṃ prayāti yatheṣṭacārī sukhitassadaiva  
punaranyatpravakṣṇami vidhānaṃ yatsurairapi  gopitaṃ tu prayatnena tacchṛṇuṣva varānane  
samākuṃcyābhyasedyogī rasanāṃ tālukaṃ prati  kiṃcitkālāṃtareṇaiva kramātprāpnoti laṃbikām  
tataḥ prasravate sā tu saṃspṛṣṭā śītalāṃ sudhām  pibanneva sadā yogī so'maratvaṃ hi gacchati  
rephāgraṃ laṃbakāgraṃ karatalaghaṭanaṃ śubhrapadmasya bindostenākṛṣṭā sudheyaṃ patati parapade devatānaṃdakārī  sāraṃ saṃsāratāraṃ kṛtakaluṣataraṃ kālatāraṃ satāraṃ yenedaṃ plāvitāṃgaṃ sa bhavati na mṛtaḥ kṣutpipāsāvihīnaḥ  
ebhiryuktā caturbhiḥ kṣitidharatanaye yogibhirvai dharaiṣā dhairyyānnityaṃ kuto'ntaṃ sakalamapi jagadyatsukhaprāpaṇāya  svapne dehī vidhatte sakalamapi sadā mānayanyacca duḥkhaṃ svarge hyevaṃ dharitryāḥ prabhavati ca tato vā sa kiñciccaturṇām  
tasmānmaṃtraistapobhirvrataniyamayutairauṣadhairyogayuktā dhātrī raktā manuṣyairnayavinayayutairdharmavidbhiḥ krameṇa  bhūtānāmādi devo na hi bhavati calaḥ saṃyuto vai caturṇāṃ tasmādevaṃ pravakṣye vidhimanugaditaṃ chāyikaṃ yacchivākhyam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ kālavaṃcanaśivaprāptivarṇanaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
devyuvāca  devadeva mahādeva kathitaṃ kālavaṃcanam  śabdabrahmasvarūpaṃ ca yogalakṣaṇamuttamam  
kathitaṃ te samāsenacchāyikaṃ jñānamuttamam  vistareṇa samākhyāhi yogināṃ hitakāmyayā  
 śaṃkara uvāca  śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmicchāyāpuruṣalakṣaṇam  yajjñātvā puruṣaḥ samyaksarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  
sūryyaṃ hi pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā somaṃ vā varavarṇini  śuklāmbaradharassragvī gaṃdhadhūpādivāsitaḥ  
saṃsmarenme mahāmaṃtraṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam  navātmakaṃ piṃḍabhūtaṃ svāṃ chāyāṃ saṃnirīkṣayet  
dṛṣṭvā tāṃ punarākāśe śvetavarṇasvarūpiṇīm  sa paśyatyekabhāvastu śivaṃ paramakāraṇam  
brahmaprāptirbhavettasya kālavidbhiritīritam  brahmahatyādikaiḥ pāpairmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
śirohīnaṃ yadā paśyetṣaḍbhirmāsairbhavetkṣayaḥ  samastaṃ vāṅmayaṃ tasya yoginastu yathā tathā  
śukle dharmaṃ vijānīyātkṛṣṇe pāpaṃ vinirdiśet  rakte baṃdhaṃ vijānīyātpīte vidviṣamādiśet  
vivāho baṃdhunāśassyāddvituṃḍe caiva kṣudbhayam  vikaṭau naśyate bhāryyā vijaṃghe dhanameva hi  
pādābhāve videśassyādityetatkathitaṃ mayā  tadvicāryyaṃ prayattnena puruṣeṇa maheśvari  
samyaktaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃniveśyātmanātmani  japennavātmakaṃ maṃtraṃ hṛdayaṃ me maheśvari  
vatsare vigate maṃtrī tannāsti yanna sādhayet  aṇimādiguṇānaṣṭau khecaratvaṃ prapadyate  
punaranyatpravakṣyāmi śaktiṃ jñātuṃ durāsadām  pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate loke jñānināmagrataḥ sthitam  
ajñeyā likhyate loke yā sarpīkṛtakuṇḍalī  sā mātrā yānasaṃsthāpi dṛśyate na ca paṭhyate  
brahmāṇḍamūrdhnigā yā ca stutā vedaistu nityaśaḥ  jananī sarvavidyānāṃ guptavidyeti gīyate  
khecarā sā vinirdiṣṭā sarvaprāṇiṣu saṃsthitā  dṛśyādṛśyācalā nityā vyaktāvyaktā sanātanī  
avarṇā varṇasaṃyuktā procyate biṃdumālinī  tāṃ paśyansarvadā yogī kṛtakṛtyo'bhijāyate  
sarvatīrthakṛtasnānādbhaveddānasya yatphalam  sarvayajñaphalaṃ yacca mālinyā darśanāttadā  
prāpnotyatra na saṃdehassatyaṃ vai kathitaṃ mayā  sarvatīrtheṣu yatsnātvā dattvā dānāni sarvaśaḥ  
sarveṣāṃ devi yajñānāṃ yatphalaṃ tallabhetpumān  kiṃ bahūktyā maheśāni sarvānkāmānsamaśnute  
tasmājjñānaṃ yathāyogamabhyasetsatataṃ budhaḥ  abhyāsājjāyate siddhiryogo'bhyāsātpravardhate  
saṃvittirlabhyate'bhyāsādabhyāsānmokṣamaśnute  abhyāsassatataṃ kāryo dhīmatā mokṣakāraṇam  
ityetatkathitaṃ devi bhuktimuktiphalapradam  kimanyatpṛcchyate tattvaṃ vada satyaṃ bravīmi te  
sūta uvāca  iti śrutvā brahmaputravacanaṃ paramārthadam  prasanno'bhūdati vyāsaḥ pārāśaryyo munīśvarāḥ  
sanatkumāraṃ sarvajñaṃ brahmaputraṃ kṛpānidhim  vyāsaḥ paramasaṃtuṣṭaḥ praṇanāma muhurmuhuḥṣa  
tatastuṣṭāva taṃ vyāsaḥ kāleyassa munīśvaraḥ  sanatkumāraṃ munayaḥ suravijñānasāgaram  
vyāsa uvāca  kṛtārtho'haṃ muniśreṣṭha brahmatvaṃ me tvayā kṛtam  namaste'stu namaste'tu dhanyastvaṃ brahmavittamaḥ  
sūta uvāca  iti stutvā sa kāleyo brahmaputraṃ mahāmunim  tūṣṇīṃ babhūva suprītaḥ paramānaṃdanirbharaḥ  
brahmaputrastamāmaṃtrya pūjitastena śaunakaḥ  yayau svadhāma suprīto vyāso'pi prītamānasaḥ  
iti me varṇito viprāḥ sukhadaḥ paramārthayuk  sanatkumārakāleyasaṃvādo jñānavarddhanaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ chāyāpuruṣadarśanavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
śaunaka uvāca  śrutaṃ me mahadākhyānaṃ yattvayā parikīrtitam  sanatkumārakāleyasaṃvādaṃ paramārthadam  
atohaṃ śrotumicchāmi yathā sargastu brahmaṇaḥ  samutpannaṃ tu me brūhi yathā vyāsācca te śrutam  
sūta uvāca  mune śṛṇu kathāṃ divyāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm  kathyamānāṃ mayā citrāṃ bahvarthāṃ śrutavistarām  
yaścaināṃ pāṭhayettāṃ ca śṛṇuyādvā'pyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ  svavaṃśadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā svargaloke mahīyate  
pradhānaṃ puruṣo yattannityaṃ sadasadātmakam  pradhānapuruṣo bhūtvā nirmame lokabhāvanaḥ  
sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇam  taṃ vai viddhi muniśreṣṭha brahmāṇamamitaujasam  
yasmādakalpayatkalpāntamagrāśśucayo yataḥ  bhavaṃti muniśārdūla namastasmai svayambhuve  
tasmai hiraṇyagarbhāya puruṣāyeśvarāya ca  namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ sargamanuttamam  
brahmā sraṣṭā hariḥ pātā saṃhartā ca maheśvaraḥ  tasya sargasya nānyo'sti kāle kāle tathā gate  
so'pi svayaṃbhūrbhagavānsisṛkṣurvividhāḥ prajāḥ  apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryamavāsṛjat  
āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ  ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ  
hiraṇyavarṇamabhavattadaṃḍamudakeśayam  tatra jajñe svayaṃ brahmā svayaṃbhūriti viśrutaḥ  
hiraṇyagarbho bhagavānuṣitvā parivatsaram  tadaṃḍamakaroddvaidhaṃ divaṃ bhūmi ca nirmame  
adho'thorddhvaṃ prayuktāni bhuvanāni caturddaśa  tayośśakalayormadhya ākāśamamṛjatprabhuḥ  
apsu pāriplavāṃ pṛthvīṃ diśaśca daśadhā divi  tatra kāle mano vācaṃ kāmakrodhāvatho ratim  
marīcimatryaṃgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratuma  vasiṣṭhaṃ tu mahatejāsso'sṛjatsapta mānasān  
sapta bahmāṇa ityete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ  tato'sṛjatpunarbrahmā rudrānkrodhasamudbhavān  
sanatkumāraṃ ca ṛṣiṃ sarveṣāmapi pūrvajam  sapta caite prajāyaṃte paścādrudrāśca sarvataḥ  
atassanatkumārastu tejassaṃkṣipya tiṣṭhati  teṣāṃ saptamahāvaṃśā divyā devarṣipūjitāḥ  
prajāyante kriyāvanto maharṣibhiralaṃkṛtāḥ  vidyuto'śani meghāṃśca rohitendradhanūṃṣi ca  
payāṃsi ca sasarjādau parjanyaṃ ca sasarja ha  ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni nirmame yajñasiddhaye  
pūjyāṃstairayajandevānityevamanuśuśruma  mukhāddevānajanayatpitṝṃścaivātha vakṣasaḥ  prajanācca manuṣyānvai jaghanānnirmame'surān  
uccāvacāni bhūtāni gātrebhyastasya jajñire  āpavasya prajāsargaṃ sṛjato hi prajāpateḥ  
sṛjyamānāḥ prajāścaiva nāvarddhanta yadā tadā  dvidhā kṛtvātmano dehaṃ strī caiva puruṣo'bhavat  
sasṛje'tha prajāssarvā mahimnā vyāpya viśvataḥ  virājamasṛjadviṣṇussa sṛṣṭaḥ puruṣo virāṭ  
dvitīyaṃ taṃ manuṃ viddhi manorantarameva ca  sa vairājaḥ prajāssarvāssasarja puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ  
nārāyaṇavisargasya prajāstasyāpyayonijaḥ  āyuṣmānkīrtimāndhanyaḥ prajāvāṃścābhavattataḥ  
ityevamādisargaste varṇito munisattama  ādisargaṃ viditvaivaṃ yatheṣṭāṃ prāpnuyādgatim  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāmādisargavarṇanaṃ nāma ekonatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  saṃsṛṣṭāsu prajāsveva āpavo'tha prajāpratiḥ  lebhe vai puruṣaḥ patnīṃ śatarūpāmayo nijām  
āpavasya mahimnā tu divamāvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥ  dharmeṇaiva mahātmā sa śatarūpāpyajāyata  
sā tu varṣaśataṃ taptvā tapaḥ paramaduścaram  bhartāraṃ dīptatapasaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyapadyata  
sa vai svāyaṃbhuvo jajñe puruṣo manurucyate  tasyaikasaptatiyugaṃ manvaṃtaramihocyate  
vairājātpuruṣādvīrā śatarūpā vyajāyata  priyavratottānapādau vīrakāyāmajāyatām  
kāmyā nāma mahābhāgā kardamasya prajāpateḥ  kāmyāputrāstrayastvāsansamrāṭsākṣiraviṭprabhuḥ  
uttānapādo'janayatputrāñchakrasamānprabhuḥ  dhruvaṃ ca tanayaṃ divyamātmānaṃdasuvarcasam  
dharmasya kanyā suśroṇī sunītirnāma viśrutā  utpannā cāpi dharmmeṇa dhuvasya jananī tathā  
dhruvo varṣasahasrāṇi trīṇi divyāni kānane  tapastepe sa bālastu prārthayansthānamavyayam  
tasmai brahmā dadau prītassthānamātmasamaṃ prabhuḥ  acalaṃ caiva puratassaptarṣīṇāṃ prajāpatiḥ  
tasmātpuṣṭiśca dhānyaśca dhruvātputrau vyajāyatām  puṣṭirevaṃ samutthāyāḥ pañcaputrānakalmaṣān  
ripuṃ ripuṃjayaṃ vipraṃ vṛkalaṃ vṛṣatejasam  riporevaṃ ca mahiṣī cākṣuṣaṃ sarvatodiśam  
ajījanatpuṣkariṇyāṃ varuṇaṃ cākṣuṣo manuḥ  manorajāyanta daśa naḍvalāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ  
kanyāyāṃ hi muniśreṣṭha vaiśyajanma prajāyateḥ  pururmāsaḥ śatadyumnastapasvī satyavitkaviḥ  
agniṣṭomo'tirātraścātimanyussuyaśā daśa  pūrorajanayatputrānṣaḍāgneyī mahāprabhān  
aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ khyātiṃ sṛtimaṃgirasaṃ gayam  aṅgātsunīthā bhāryyā vai venamekamasūyata  
apacāreṇa venasya kopasteṣāṃ mahānabhūt  huṃkāreṇaiva taṃ jaghnurmunayo dharmatatparāḥ  
atha prajārthamṛṣayaḥ prārthitāśca sunīthayā  sārasvatāstadā tasya mamaṃthurdakṣiṇaṃ karam  
venasya pāṇau mathite saṃbabhūva tataḥ pṛthuḥ  sa dhanvī kavacī jātastejasādityasannibhaḥ  
avatārasya viṣṇorhi prajāpālanahe tave  dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthāya duṣṭānāṃ daṃḍahetave  
pṛthurvainyastadā pṛdhvīmarakṣatkṣatrapūrvajaḥ  rājasūyābhiṣiktānāmādyassa vasudhāpatiḥ  
tasmāccaiva samutpannau nipuṇau sūtamāgadhau  teneyaṃ gaurmuniśreṣṭha dugdhā sarvahitāya vai  
sarveṣāṃ vṛttidaścābhūddevarṣisura rakṣasām  manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa śatayajñakaro nṛpaḥ  
pṛthoḥ putrau tu jajñāte dharmajñau bhuvi pārthivau  vijitāśvaśca haryakṣo mahāvīrau suviśrutau  
śikhaṃḍinī cājanayatputraṃ prācīnabarhiṣam  prācīnāgrāḥ kuśāstasya pṛthivītalacāriṇaḥ  
samudratanayā tena dharmatassuvivāhitā  reje'dhikataraṃ rājā kṛtadāro mahāprabhuḥ  
samudratanayāyāstu daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ  babhūvustanayā divyā bahuyajñakarasya vai  
sarve prācetasā nāmnā dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ  apṛthagdharmācaraṇāste'tapyaṃta mahattapaḥ  
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ  rudragītaṃ japaṃtaśca śivadhyānaparāyaṇāḥ  
tapaścaratsu pṛthivyāmabhavaṃśca mahīruhāḥ  arakṣyamāṇāyāṃ pṛthvyāṃ babhūvātha prajākṣayaḥ  
tāndṛṣṭvā tu nivṛttāste tapaso labdhasadvarāḥ  cukrudhurmuniśārdūla dagdhukāmā stapobalāḥ  
prācetasā mukhebhyaste prāsṛjannagnimārutau  vṛkṣānunmūlya vāyustānadahaddhavyavāhanaḥ  
vṛkṣakṣayaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā kiṃciccheṣeṣu śākhiṣu  upagamyābravīdetānrājā somaḥ pratāpavān  
soma uvāca  kopaṃ yacchata rājānassarve prācīnabarhiṣaḥ  anubhūtānukanyeyaṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ varavarṇinī  
bhaviṣyaṃ jānatā sā tu dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā  bhāryyā vo'stu mahābhāgāssomavaṃśavivarddhinī  
asyāmutpatsyate vidvāndakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ  sṛṣṭikartā mahātejā brahmaputraḥ purātanaḥ  
yuṣmākaṃ tejasārddhena mama cānena tejasā  brahmatejomayo bhūpaḥ prajā saṃvarddhayiṣyati  
tatassomasya vacanājjagṛhuste pracetasaḥ  bhāryyāṃ dharmeṇa tāṃ prītyā vṛkṣajāṃ varavarṇinīm  
tebhyastasyāstu saṃjajñe dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ  so'pi jajñe mahātejāssomasyāṃśena vai mune  
acarāṃśca carāṃścaiva dvipado'tha catuṣpadaḥ  saṃsṛjya manasā dakṣo maithunīṃ sṛṣṭimārabhat  
vīraṇasya sutāṃ nāmnā vīraṇīṃ sa prajāpateḥ  upayeme suvidhinā sudharmeṇa pativratām  
haryyaśvānayutaṃ tasyāṃ sutānpuṇyānajījanat  te viraktā babhūvuśca nāradasyopadeśataḥ  
tacchutvā sa punardakṣassubalāśvānajījanat  nāmatastanayāṃstasyāṃ sahasraparisaṃkhyayā  
te'pi bhrātṛpathā yātāstanmunerupadeśataḥ  nāgamanpitṛsānnidhyaṃ viraktā bhikṣumārgiṇaḥ  
tacchrutvā śāpamākruddho munaye dussahaṃ dadau  kutracinna labhasveti saṃsthitiṃ kalahapriya  
sāṃtvito'tha vidhātrā hi sa paścādasṛjatstriyaḥ  mahājvālāsvarūpeṇa guṇaiścāpi munīśvaraḥ  
dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa  dve caivaṃ brahmaputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tadā  
dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe munaye munisattama  śiṣṭāssomāya dakṣo'pi nakṣatrākhyā dadau prabhuḥ  
tābhyo dakṣasya putrībhyo jātā devāsurādayaḥ  bahavastanayā khyātāstaissarvaiḥ pūritaṃ jagat  
tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra prajā maithunasaṃbhavāḥ  saṃkalpāddarśanātsparśātpūrveṣāṃ sṛṣṭirucyate  
 śaunaka uvāca  aṃguṣṭhādbrahmaṇo jajñe dakṣaścoktastvayā purā  kathaṃ prācetasatvaṃ hi punarlebhe mahātapāḥ  
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sūta pratyākhyātuṃ tvamarhasi  citrametatsa somasya kathaṃ śvaśuratāṃ gataḥ  
 sūta uvāca  utpattiśca nirodhaśca nityaṃ bhūteṣu vartate  kalpekalpe bhavaṃtyete sarve dakṣādayo mune  
imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ dakṣasya yo vidyātsacarācarām  prajāvānāyuṣā pūrṇassvargaloke mahīyate  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ sargavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
śaunaka uvāca  devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām  sṛṣṭiṃ tu vistareṇemāṃ sūtaputra vadāśu me  
sūta uvāca  yadā na vavṛdhe sā tu vīraṇasya prajāpatiḥ  sutāṃ sutapasā yuktāmāhvayatsargakāraṇāt  
sa maithunena dharmeṇa sasarja vividhāḥ prajāḥ  tāḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ mahāprājña kathayāmi samāsataḥ  
tasyāṃ putrasahasrāṇi vīriṇyāṃ paṃca vīryavān  āśritya janayāmāsa dakṣa eva prajāpatiḥ  
etānsṛṣṭāṃstu tāndṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ prāha vai muniḥ  sarvaṃ sa tu samutpanno nāradaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  
śrutavānvā kaśyapādvai puṃsāṃ sṛṣṭirbhaviṣyati  dakṣasyeva duhitṛṣu tasmāttānabravīttu saḥ  
ajānataḥ kathaṃ sṛṣṭiṃ bāliśā vai kariṣyatha  diśaṃ kāṃcidajānaṃtastasmādvijñāya tāṃ bhuvam  
ityuktāḥ prayayussarve āśāṃ vijñātumojasā  tadaṃtaṃ na hi saṃprāpya na nivṛttāḥ piturgṛham  
tajjñātvā janayāmāsa punaḥ paṃcaśatānsutān  tānuvāca punasso'pi nāradassarvadarśanaḥ  
nārada uvāca  bhuvo mānamajānaṃtaḥ kathaṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kariṣyatha  sarve hi bāliśāḥ kiṃ hi sṛṣṭikartuṃ samudyatāḥ  
sūta uvāca  te'pi tadvacanaṃ śrutvā niryātāssarvatodiśam  subalāśvā dakṣasutā haryaśvā iva te purā  
anaṃtaṃ puṣkaraṃ prāpya gatāste'pi parābhavam  adyāpi na nivartaṃte samudrebhya ivāpagāḥ  
tadāprabhṛti vai bhrātā bhrāturanveṣaṇe rataḥ  prayāto naśyati mune tanna kāryyaṃ vipaścitā  
tāṃścāpi naṣṭānvijñāya putrāndakṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ  sa ca krodhā ddadau śāpaṃ nāradāya mahātmane  
kutracinna labhasveti saṃsthitiṃ kalahapriya  tava sānnidhyato loke bhavecca kalahassadā  
sāṃtvito'tha vidhātrā hi sa dakṣastu prajāpatiḥ  kanyāḥ ṣaṣṭyasṛjatpaścādvīriṇyāmiti naḥ śrutam  
dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa  saptaviṃśati somāya catasro'riṣṭanemine  
dve caivaṃ brahmaputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tadā  dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu  
aruṃdhatī vasuryyāmirlambā bhānurmarutvatī  saṃkalpā ca muhūrtā ca saṃdhyā viśvā ca vai mune  
dharmapatnyo mune tvetāstāsvapatyāni me śṛṇu  viśvedevāstu viśvāyāssādhyānsādhyā vyajāyata  
marutvatyāṃ marutvaṃto vasostu vasavastathā  bhānostu bhānavassarve muhūrtāyāṃ muhūrtajāḥ  
lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo'tha nāgavīthī ca yāmijā  pṛthivī viṣamastasyāmarundhatyāmajāyata  
saṃkalpāyāstu satyātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi  ayādayā vasoḥ putrā aṣṭau tāñchṛṇu śaunaka  
ayo dhuvaśca somaśca dharaścaivānilo'nalaḥ  pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavā'ṣṭā ca nāmataḥ  
ayasya putro vaitaṇḍaḥ śramaḥ śāṃto munistathā  dhruvasya putro bhagavānkālo lokabhāvanaḥ  
somasya bhagavānvarcā varcasvī yena jāyate  dharasya putro draviṇo hutahavyavahastathā  
manoharāyāśśiśiraḥ prāṇo'tha ramaṇastathā  anilasya śivā bhāryyā yasyāḥ putrāḥ purojavaḥ  
avijñātagatiścaiva dvau putrāvanilasya tu  agniputraḥ kumārastu śarastambe śriyāvṛte  
tasya śākho viśākhaśca naigameyaśca pṛṣṭhataḥ  apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ  
pratyūṣasya tvabhūtputra ṛṣirnāmnā tu devalaḥ  dvau putrau devalasyāpi prajāvantau manīṣiṇau  
bṛhaspate tu bhaginī varastrī brahmacāriṇī  yogasiddhā jagatkṛtsnaṃ samaṃtādvyacarattadā  
prabhāsasya tu sā bhāryyā vasūnāmaṣṭamasya ca  viśvakarmā mahābhāga tasya jajñe prajāpatiḥ  
kartā śilpasahasrāṇāṃ tridaśānāṃ ca vārddhakiḥ  bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kartā śilpavatāṃ varaḥ  
yassarvāsāṃ vimānāni devatānāṃ cakāra ha  manuṣyāścopajīvanti yasya śilpaṃ mahātmanaḥ  
matāṃtaramāha  raivato'jo bhavo bhīmo vāma ugro vṛṣākapiḥ  ajaikapādahirbudhnyo bahurūpo mahāniti  
sarūpāyāṃ prasūtasya striyāṃ rudraśca koṭiśaḥ  tatraikādaśamukhyāstu tannāmāni mune śṛṇu  
ajaikapādahirbudhnyastvaṣṭā rudraśca vīryavān  haraśca bahurūpaśca tryambakaścāparājitaḥ  
vṛṣākapiśca śambhuśca kapardī raivatastathā  ekādaśaite kathitā rudrāstribhuvaneśvarāḥ  
śataṃ tvevaṃ samākhyātaṃ rudrāṇāmamitaujasām  śṛṇu kaśyapapatnīnāṃ nāmāni munisattama  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ sargavarṇanaṃ nāmaika'triṃśodhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  aditirditiśca surasāriṣṭelā danureva ca  surabhirvinatā celā tāmrā krodhavaśā tathā  
kadūrmuniśca viprendra tāsvapatyāni me śṛṇu  pūrvamanvaṃtare śreṣṭhe dvādaśāsansurottamāḥ  
tuṣitā nāma te'nyonyamūcurvaivasvateṃtare  upasthite suyaśasaścākṣuṣasyāṃtare manoḥ  
hitāya sarvalokānāṃ samāgamya parasparam  āgacchatastu tānūcuraditiṃ ca praviśya vai  
manvaṃtare prasūyāmassatāṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati  evamuktāstu te sarve cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ  
mārīcātkaśyapājjātāste'dityāṃ dakṣakanyayā  tatra viṣṇuśca śakraśca jajñāte punareva hi  
aryamā caiva dhātā ca tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca  vivasvānsavitā caiva mitrāvaruṇa eva ca  
aṃśo bhagaścātitejā ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ  pūrvamāsanye tuṣitāssurāḥ  
puraiva tasyāṃtare tu ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ  iti proktāni kramaśo'dityapatyāni śaunaka  
saptaviṃśati yāḥ proktāssomapatnyo'tha suvratāḥ  tāsāmapatyānyabhavandīptayo'mitatejasaḥ  
ariṣṭanemipatnīnāmapatyānīha ṣoḍaśa  bahuputrasya viduṣaścatasro yāssutāḥ smṛtāḥ  
kṛśāśvasya tu devarṣe devapraharaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ  bhārmyāyāmarciṣi mune dhūmrakeśastathaiva ca  
svadhā satī ca dve patnyau svadhā jyeṣṭhā satī parā  svadhāsūta pitṝnvedamatharvāṅgirasaṃ satī  
ete yugasahasrāṃte jāyaṃte punareva hi  sarvadevanikāyāśca trayastriṃśattu kāmajāḥ  
yathā sūryyasya nityaṃ hi udayāstamayāviha  evaṃ devānikāste ca saṃbhavaṃti yugeyuge  
dityāṃ babhūvatuḥ putrau kaśyapāditi naḥ śrutam  hiraṇyakaśipuścaiva hiraṇyākṣaśca vīryavān  
siṃhikā hyabhavatkanyā vipracitteḥ parigrahaḥ  hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāścatvāraḥ prathitaujasaḥ  
anuhrādaśca hrādaśca saṃhrādaścaiva vīryavān  prahrādaścānujastatra viṣṇubhaktivicāradhīḥ  
anuhrādasya sūryāyāṃ pulomā mahiṣastathā  hrādasya dhamanirbhāryāsūta vātāpimilvalam  
saṃhrādasya kṛtirbhāryāsūtaḥ paṃcajanaṃ tataḥ  virocanastu prāhrādirdevyāstasyābhavadbaliḥ  
baleḥ putraśataṃ tvāsīdaśanāyāṃ munīśvara  balirāsīnmahāśaivaḥ śivabhaktiparāyaṇaḥ  
dānaśīla udāraśca puṇyakīrti tapāḥ smṛtaḥ  tatputro bāṇanāmā yatso'ṣi śaivavarassudhīḥ  yassaṃtoṣya śivaṃ samyaggāṇapatyamavāpa ha  
sā kathā śrutapūrvā te bāṇasya hi mahātmanaḥ  kṛṣṇaṃ yassamare vīrassuprasannaṃ cakāra ha  
hiraṇyākṣasutāḥ paṃca paṃḍitāstu mahābalāḥ  kukuraḥ śakuniścaiva bhūtasaṃtāpanastathā  
mahānādaśca vikrāṃtaḥ kālanābhastathaiva ca  ityuktā ditiputrāśca danoḥ putrānmune śṛṇu  
abhavandanuputrāśca śataṃ tīvraparākramāḥ  ayomukhaśśaṃbaraśca kapolo vāmanastathā  
vaiśvānaraḥ pulomā ca vidrāvaṇamahāśirau  svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca vipracittiśca vīryavān  
ete sarve danoḥ putrāḥ kaśyapādanujajñire  eṣāṃ putrāñcchṛṇu mune prasaṃgādvacmi te'nagha  
svabhārnostu prabhā kanyā pulomnastu śacī sutā  upadānavī hayaśirā śarmmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī  
pulomā pulomikā caiva vaiśvānarasute ubhe  bahvapatye mahāvīryye mārīcestu parigrahaḥ  
tayoḥ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭirdānavanandanāḥ  marīcirjanayāmāsa mahatā tapasānvitaḥ  
paulomāḥ kālakhaṃjāśca dānavānāṃ mahābalā  avadhyā devatānāṃ ca hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥ  
pitāmahaprasādena ye hatāḥ savyasācinā  siṃhikāyāmathotpannā vipracittessutāstathā  
daityadānavasaṃyogājjātāstīvraparākramāḥ  saiṃhikeyā iti khyātāstrayodaśa mahābalāḥ  
rāhuḥ śalyo subalino balaścaiva mahābalaḥ  vātāpirnamuciścaivāthelvalaḥ svasṛpastathā  
ajiko narakaścaiva kālanābhastathaiva ca  śaramāṇaśśarakalpaśca ete vaṃśavivarddhanāḥ  
eṣāṃ putrāśca pautrāśca danuvaṃśavivarddhanāḥ  bahavaśca samudbhūtā vistaratvānna varṇitāḥ  
saṃhrādasya tu daiteyā nivātakavacāḥ kule  utpannā marutastasmiṃstapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ  
ṣaṇmukhādyā mahāsattvāstāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ  kākī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī ca śukī tathā  
gṛddhrikāśvī hyulūkī ca tāmrā kanyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  kākī kākānajanayadulūkī pratyulūkakān  
śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsā ngṛddhī tu gṛdhrakān  śukī śukānajanayatsugrīvī śubhapakṣiṇaḥ  
aśvānuṣṭrāngardabhāṃśca tāmrā ca kaśyapapriyā  janayāmāsa cetyevaṃ tāmrāvaṃśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  
vinatāyāśca putrau dvāvaruṇo garuḍastathā  suparṇaḥ patatāṃ śreṣṭho nāruṇassvena karmaṇā  
surasāyāssahasraṃ tu sarpāṇāmamitaujasām  anekaśirasāṃ teṣāṃ khecarāṇāṃ mahātmanām  
yeṣāṃ pradhānā rājānaḥ śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ  airāvato mahāpadmaḥ kaṃbalāśvatarāvubhau  
ailāputrastathā padmaḥ karkoṭakadhanaṃjayau  mahānīlamahākarṇau dhṛtarāṣṭro balāhakaḥ  
kuharaḥ puṣpadantaśca durmukhāssumukhastathā  bahuśaḥ khararomā ca pāṇirityevamādayaḥ  
gaṇāḥ krodhavaśāyāśca tasyāssarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ  aṃḍajāḥ pakṣiṇo'bjāśca varāhyāḥ paśavo matāḥ  
anāyuṣāyāḥ putrāśca paṃcāśacca mahābalāḥ  abhavanbalavṛkṣau ca vikṣaro'tha bṛhaṃstathā  
śaśāṃstu janayāmāsa surarabhirmahiṣāṃstathā  ilā vṛkṣāṃllatā vallīstṛṇajātīstu sarvaśaḥ  
khaśā tu yakṣarakṣāṃsi munirapsarasastathā  ariṣṭāsūta sarpāṃśca prabhāvairmānavottamān  
ete kaśyapadāyādāḥ kīrtitāste munīśvara  yeṣāṃ putrāśca pautrāśca śataśo'tha sahasraśaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyā mumāsaṃhitāyāṃ kaśyapavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  eṣa manvantare tāta sargassvārociṣe smṛtaḥ  vaivasvate tu mahati vāruṇe vitate kratau  
juhvānasya brahmaṇo vai prajāsarga ihocyate  pūrvaṃ yānatha brahmarṣīnutpannānsapta mānasān  
putrānvai kalpayāmāsa svayameva pitāmahaḥ  teṣāṃ virodho devānāṃ dānavānāṃ mahānṛṣe  
diti vinaṣṭaputrā tu kaśyapaṃ samupasthitā  sa kaśyapaḥ prasannātmā samgayagārādhitastayā  
vareṇacchaṃdayāmāsa sā ca vavre varaṃ tadā  putramindravadhārthāya samarthamamitaujasam  
sa tasyai ca varaṃ prādātprārthitaṃ sumahātapāḥ  brahmacaryyādiniyamaṃ prāha caiva śataṃ samāḥ  
dhārayāmāsa garbhaṃ tu śucissā varavarṇinī  brahmacaryyādiniyamaṃ ditirdadhre tathaiva vai  
tatastvādhāya so'dityāṃ garbhaṃ taṃ śaṃsitavrataḥ  jagāma kaśyapastaptuṃ tapassaṃhṛṣṭamānasaḥ  
tasyāścaivāṃtaraṃ prepsusso'bhavatpākaśāsanaḥ  ūnavarṣe śate cāsyā dadarśāntarameva saḥ  
akṛtvā pādayoḥ śaucaṃ ditirarvākśirāstadā  nidrāmāhārayāmāsa bhāvino'rthasya gauravāt  
etasminnantare śakrastasyāḥ kukṣiṃ praviśya saḥ  vajrapāṇistu taṃ garbhaṃ saptadhā hi nyakṛntata  
sa pāṭyamāno garbho'tha vajreṇa praruroda ha  rudantaṃ saptadhaikaikaṃ mārodīriti tānpunaḥ  cakarta vajrapāṇistānneva mamrustathāpi te  
te tamūcuḥ pātyamānāssarve prāṃjalayo mune  no jighāṃsasi kiṃ śakra bhrātaro marutastava  
iṃdreṇa svīkṛtāste hi bhrātṛtve sarva eva ca  tatyajurddaityabhāvaṃ te viprarṣe śaṃkarecchayā  
maruto nāma te devā babhūvustu mahābalāḥ  khagā ekonapaṃcāśatsahāyā vajrapāṇinaḥ  
teṣāmeva pravṛddhānāṃ hariḥ prādātprajāpatiḥ  kramaśastāni rājyāni pṛthupūrvaṃ śṛṇuṣva tat  
ariṣṭapuruṣo vīraḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ  parjanyastu dhanādhyakṣastasya sarvamidaṃ jagat  
bhūtasargamimaṃ samyagavocaṃ te mahāmune  vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu rājyānāṃ kramaśastaṃ bruve'dhunā  
abhiṣicyādhirājye tu pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ pitāmahaḥ  tataḥ krameṇa rājyāni vyādeṣṭumupacakrame  
dvijānāṃ vīrudhāṃ caiva nakṣatragrahayostathā  yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva somaṃ rājye'bhyaṣecayat  
apāṃ tu varuṇaṃ rājye rājñāṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ prabhum  ādityānāṃ tathā viṣṇuṃ vasūnāmatha pāvakam  
prajāpatīnāṃ dakṣaṃ tu marutāmatha vāsavam  daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca prahlādamamitaujasam  
vaivasvataṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca yamaṃ rājye'bhyaṣecayat  mātṝṇāṃ ca vratānāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ ca tathā gavām  
yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca  sarvabhūtapiśācānāṃ giriśaṃ śūlapāṇinam  
śailānāṃ himavantaṃ ca nadīnāmatha sāgaram  mṛgāṇāmatha śārdūlaṃ govṛṣaṃ tu gavāmapi  
vanaspatīnāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ vaṭaṃ rājye'bhyaṣecayat  iti dattaṃ prajeśena rājyaṃ sarvatra vai kramāt  
pūrvasyāṃ diśi putraṃ tu vairājasya prajāpateḥ  sthāpayāmāsa sarvātmā rājye viśvapatirvibhuḥ  
tathaiva muniśārdūla kardamasya prajāpateḥ  dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā putraṃ sudhanvānamacīklṛpat  
paścimāyāṃ diśi tathā rajasaḥ putramacyutam  ketumantaṃ mahātmānaṃ rājānaṃ vyādiśatprabhuḥ  
tathā hiraṇyaromāṇaṃ parjanyasya prajāpateḥ  udīcyāṃ diśi rājānaṃ durdharṣaṃ so'bhyaṣecayat  
tasya vistāramākhyātaṃ pṛthorvenyasya śaunaka  mahardhye tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ purāṇe parikīrtitam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ sargavarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśattamodhyāyaḥ  
 śaunaka uvāca  manvaṃtarāṇi sarvāṇi vistareṇānukīrtaya  yāvaṃto manavaścaiva śrotumicchāmi tānaham  
sūta uvāca  svāyaṃbhuvo manuścaiva tatasstvārociṣastathā  uttamastāmasaścaiva raivataścākṣuṣastathā  
ete ca manavaḥ ṣaṭ te saṃproktā munipuṃgava  vaivasvato muniśreṣṭha sāṃprataṃ manurucyate  
sāvarṇiśca manuścaiva tato raucyastathā paraḥ  tathaiva brahmasāvarṇiścatvāro manavastathā  
tathaiva dharmasāvarṇī rudrasāvarṇireva ca  devasāvarṇirākhyātaṃ iṃdrasāvarṇireva ca  
atītā vartamānāśca tathaivānāgatāśca ye  kīrtitā manavaścāpi mayaivaite yathā śrutāḥ  
mune caturdaśaitāni trikālānugatāni te  proktāni nirmitaḥ kalpo yugasāhasraparyyayaḥ  
ṛṣīṃsteṣāṃ pravakṣyāmi puttrāndevagaṇāṃstathā  śṛṇu śaunaka suprītyā kramaśastānyaśasvinaḥ  
marīciratrirbhagavānaṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ  pulastyaśca vasiṣṭhaśca saptaite brahmaṇassutāḥ  
uttarasyāṃ diśi tathā mune saptarṣa yastathā  yāmā nāma tathā devā āsansvāyaṃbhuveṃtare  
āgnīdhraścāgnibāhuśca medhā medhātithirvasuḥ  jyotiṣmāndhṛtimānhavyaḥ savanaśśubhra eva ca  
svāyaṃbhuvasya putrāste manordaśa mahātmanaḥ  kīrtitā muniśārdūla tatrendro yajña ucyate  
prathamaṃ kathitaṃ tāta divyaṃ manvataraṃ tathā  dvitīyaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tannibodha yathātatham  
ūrjastaṃbhaḥ parastaṃbha ṛṣabho vasumāṃ stathā  jyotiṣmāndyutimāṃścaiva rociṣmānsaptamastathā  
ete maharṣayo jñeyāstatrendro rocanastathā  devāśca tuṣitā nāma smṛtāḥ svārociṣeṃ'tare  
harighnassukṛtirjyotirayomūrtirayasmayaḥ  prathitaśca manasyuśca nabhassūryastathaiva ca  
svārociṣasya putrāste manordaśamahātmanaḥ  kīrtitā muniśārdūla mahāvīryaparākramāḥ  
dvitīyametatkathitaṃ mune manvantaraṃ mayā  tṛtīyaṃ tava vakṣyāmi tannibodha yathātatham  
vasiṣṭhaputrāḥ saptāsanvāsiṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ  hiraṇyagarbhasya sutā ūrjā nāma mahaujasaḥ  
ṛṣayo'tra samākhyātāḥ kīrtyamānānnibodha me  auttameyā ṛṣiśreṣṭha daśaputrā manoḥ smṛtāḥ  
iṣa ūrjita ūrjaśca madhurmādhava eva ca  śuciśśukravahaścaiva nabhaso nabha eva ca  
ṛṣabhastatra devāśca satyaveda śrutādayaḥ  tatrendrassatyajinnāma trailokyādhipatirmune  
tṛtīyametatparamaṃ manvataramudāhṛtam  manvataraṃ caturthaṃ te kathayāmi mune śṛṇu  
gārgyaḥ pṛthustathā vāgmī jayo dhātā kapīnakaḥ  kapīvānsaptaṛṣayaḥ satyā devagaṇāstathā  
tatreṃdrastriśikho jñeyo manuputrānmune śṛṇu  dyūtipotassautapasyastamaśśūlaśca tāpanaḥ  
taporatirakalmāṣo dhanvī khaḍgī mahānṛṣiḥ  tāmasasya smṛtā ete daśa putrā mahāvratāḥ  
tāmasasyāṃtaraṃ caiva mano me kathitaṃ tava  caturthaṃ pañcamaṃ tāta śṛṇu manvaṃtaraṃ param  
devabāhurjayaścaiva munirvedaśirāstathā  hiraṇyaromā parjanya ūrdhvabāhuśca somapāḥ  
satyanetraratāścānye ete saptarṣayo'pare  devāśca bhūtarajasastapaḥprakṛtayastathā  
tatreṃdro vibhunāmā ca trailokyādhipatistathā  raivatākhyo manustatra jñeyastāmasasodaraḥ  
arjunaḥ paṃktiviṃdhyo vā dayāyāsta nayā mune  mahatā tapasā yuktā merupṛṣṭhe vasaṃti hi  
ruceḥ prajāpatiḥ putro raucyo nāma manuḥ smṛtaḥ  bhūtyā cotpādito devyāṃ bhautyo nāmābhavatsutaḥ  
anāgatāśca saptaite kalpe'sminmanavassmṛtāḥ  anāgatāśca saptaiva smṛtā divi maharṣayaḥ  
rāmo vyāsastathātreyo dīptimānsu bahuśrutaḥ  bharadvājastathā drauṇiraśvatthāmā mahādyutiḥ  
gautamasyātmajaścaiva śaradvān gautamaḥ kṛpaḥ  kauśiko gālavaścaiva ruruḥ kaśyapa eva ca  
ete sapta mahātmāno bhaviṣyā munisattamāḥ  devāścānāgatāstatra trayaḥ proktāssvayaṃbhuvā  
marīceścaiva putrāste kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ  teṣāṃ virocanasuto baliriṃdro bhaviṣyati  
viṣāṃṅgaścāvanīvāṃśca sumaṃto dhṛtimānvasuḥ  sūriḥ surākhyo viṣṇuśca rājā sumatireva ca  
sāvarṇeśca manoḥ putrā bhaviṣyā daśa śaunaka  ihāṣṭamaṃ hi kathitaṃ navamaṃ cāntaraṃ śṛṇu  
prathamaṃ dakṣasāvarṇi pravakṣyāmi manuṃ śṛṇu  medhātithiśca paulastyo vasuḥ kaśyapa eva ca  
jyotiṣmānbhārgavaścaiva dhṛtimānaṃgirāstathā  savanaścaiva vāsiṣṭha ātreyo havya eva ca  
pulahassapta ityete ṛṣayo rauhiteṃtare  devatānāṃ gaṇāstatra traya eva mahāmune  
dīkṣāputrasya putrāste rohitasya prajāpateḥ  dhṛṣṭaketurdīptaketuḥ paṃcahasto nirākṛtiḥ  
pṛthuśravā bhūridyumno ṛcīko bṛhato gayaḥ  prathamasya tu sāvarṇernava putrā mahaujasa  
daśame tvatha paryāye dvitīyasyāṃtare manoḥ  haviṣmānpulahaścaiva prakṛtiścaiva bhārgavaḥ  
āyo muktistathātreyo vasiṣṭhaścāvyayassmṛtaḥ  paulastyaḥ prayatiścaiva bhāmāraścaiva kaśyapaḥ  
aṅgirānenasassatyaḥ saptaite paramarṣayaḥ  devatānāṃ gaṇāścāpi dviṣimaṃtaśca te smṛtāḥ  
teṣāmindrassmṛtaḥ śambhustvayameva maheśvaraḥ  akṣatvānuttamaujāśca bhūriṣeṇaśca vīryavān  
śatānīko nirāmitro vṛṣaseno jayadrathaḥ  bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcārcirdaśa tvete manossutāḥ  
ekādaśe tu paryāye tṛtīyasyāṃtare manoḥ  tasyāpi sapta ṛṣayaḥ kīrtyamānānnibodha me  
haviṣmānkaśyapaścāpi vapuṣmāṃścaiva vāruṇaḥ  atreyo'tha vasiṣṭhaśca hyanayastvaṃgirāstathā  
cārudhṛṣyaśca paulastyo niḥsvaro'gnistu taijasaḥ  saptaite ṛṣayaḥ proktāstrayo devagaṇāssmṛtāḥ  
brahmaṇastu sutāste hi ta ime vaidhṛtāḥ smṛtāḥ  sarvagaśca suśarmmā ca devānīkastu kṣemakaḥ  
dṛḍheṣuḥ khaṃḍako darśaḥ kuhurbāhurmanoḥ smṛtāḥ  sāvarṇasya tu pautrā vai tṛtīyasya nava smṛtāḥ  
caturthasya tu sāvarṇerṛṣīnsapta nibodha me  dyutirvasiṣṭhaputraśca ātreyassutapāstathā  
aṃgirāstapaso mūrtistapasvī kaśyapastathā  tapodhanaśca paulastyaḥ pulahaśca taporatiḥ  
bhārgavassaptamasteṣāṃ vijñeya tapaso nidhiḥ  paṃca devagaṇāḥ proktā mānasā brahmaṇassutāḥ  
ṛtadhāmā tadindro hi trilokī rājyakṛtsukhī  dvādaśe caiva paryāye bhāvye raucyāṃtare mune  
aṃgirāścaiva dhṛtimānpaulastyo havyavāṃstu yaḥ  paulahastattvadarśī ca bhārgavaśca nirutsavaḥ  
niṣprapaṃcastathātreyo nirdehaḥ kaśyapastathā  sutapāścaiva vāsiṣṭhassaptaivaite maharṣayaḥ  
traya eva gaṇāḥ proktā devatānāṃ svayaṃbhuvā  divaspatistamindro vai vicitraścitra eva ca  
nayo dharmo dhṛtoṃdhraśca sunetraḥ kṣatravṛddhakaḥ  nirbhayassutapā droṇo mano raucyasya te sutāḥ  
caturddaśe tu paryāye satyasyaivāṃtare manoḥ  āgnīdhraḥ kāśyapaścaiva paulastyo māgadhaśca yaḥ  
bhārgavo'pyativāhyaśca śucirāṃgirasastathā  yuktaścaiva tathātreyaḥ pautro vāśiṣṭha eva ca  
ajitaḥ pulahaścaiva hyaṃtyāssaptarṣayaśca te  pavitrāścākṣuṣā devāḥ śucirindro bhaviṣyati  
eteṣāṃ kalya utthāya kīrtanātsukhamedhate  atītānāgatānāṃ vai maharṣīṇāṃ naraissadā  
devatānāṃ gaṇāḥ proktāśśṛṇu paṃca mahāmune  turaṃgabhīrurbudhnaśca tanugro'nūgra eva ca  
atimānī pravīṇaśca viṣṇussaṃkraṃdanastathā  tejasvī sabalaścaiva satyastvete manossutā  
bhaumasyaivādhikāre vai pūrvakalpastu pūryate  ityete'nāgatā'tītā manavaḥ kīrtitā mayā  
uktāssanatkumāreṇa vyāsāyāmitatejasā  pūrṇe yugasahasrāṃte paripālyaḥ svadharmataḥ  
prajābhistapasā yuktā brahmalokaṃ vrajaṃti te  yugāni sapratistvekaṃ sāgrāṇyaṃtaramucyate  
caturdaśaite manavaḥ kīrtitā kīrtivardhanāḥ  manvaṃtareṣu sarveṣu saṃhārāṃte punarbhavaḥ  
na śakyamantaraṃ teṣāṃ vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi  pūrṇe śatasahasre tu kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate  
tatra sarvāṇi bhūtāni dagdhānyādityaraśmibhiḥ  brahmāṇamagrataḥ kṛtvā sadādityagaṇairmune  
praviśaṃti suraśreṣṭha hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param  sraṣṭāraṃ sarva bhūtānāṃ kalpāṃteṣu punaḥpunaḥ  
bhūyopi bhagavān rudrassaṃhartā kāla eva hi  kalpāṃte tatpravakṣyāmi manorvaivasvatasya vai  
iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ manvaṃtarasamudbhavam  visargaṃ puṇyamākhyānaṃ dhanyaṃ kulavivarddhanam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ sarvamanvatarānurkārtanaṃ nāma catustriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 sūta uvāca  vivasvānkaśyapājjajñe dākṣāyaṇyāṃ mahāṛṣeḥ  tasya bhāryā'bhavatsaṃjñā tvāṣṭrī devī sureṇukā  
mune'sahiṣṇunā tena tejasā dussahena ca  bhartṛrūpeṇa nātuṣyadrūpa yauvanaśālinī  
ādityasya hi tadrūpamasahiṣṇustu tejasaḥ  dahyamānā tadodvegamakarodvaravarṇinī  
ṛṣe'syāṃ trīṇyapatyāni janayāmāsa bhāskaraḥ  saṃjñāyāṃ tu manuḥ pūrvaṃ śrāddhadevaḥ prajāpatiḥ  
yamaśca yamunā caiva yamalau saṃbabhūvatuḥ  evaṃ hi trīṇyapatyāni tasyāṃ jātāni sūryyataḥ  
saṃvartulaṃ tu tadrūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjñā vivasvataḥ  asahaṃtī tataśchāyāmātmanassā' sṛjacchubhām  
māyāmayī tu sā saṃjñāmavocadbhaktitaśśubhe  kiṃ karomīha kāryyaṃ te kathayasva śucismite  
saṃjñovāca  ahaṃ yāsyāmi bhadraṃ te mamaiva bhavanaṃ pituḥ  tvayaitadbhavane satyaṃ vastavyaṃ nirvikārataḥ  
imau me bālakau sādhū kanyā ceyaṃ sumadhyamā  pālanīyāḥ sukhenaiva mama cedicchasi priyam  
chāyovāca  ākeśagrahaṇāddevi sahiṣye'haṃ suduṣkṛtam  nākhyāsyāmi mataṃ tubhyaṃ gaccha devi yathāsukham  
sūta uvāca  ityuktā sā'gamaddevī vrīḍitā sannidhau pituḥ  pitrā nirbhartsitā tatra niyuktā sā punaḥ punaḥ  
agacchadvaḍavā bhūtvā''cchādyarūpaṃ tatastvakam  kuruṃstadottarānprāpya nṛṇāṃ madhye cacāra ha  
saṃjñāṃ tāṃ tu ravirmatvā chāyāyāṃ susutaṃ tadā  janayāmāsa sāvarṇiṃ manuṃ vai savitā kila  
saṃjñā'nu prārthitā chāyā sā svaputre'pi nityaśaḥ  cakārābhyadhikaṃ snehaṃ na tathā pūrvaje sute  
anujaścākṣamastattu yamastaṃ naiva cakṣame  sa saroṣastu bālyācca bhāvino'rthasya gauravāt  
chāyāṃ saṃtarjayāmāsa yadā vaivasvato yamaḥ  taṃ śaśāpa tataḥ krodhācchāyā tu kaluṣīkṛtā  
caraṇaḥ patatāmeṣa taveti bhṛśaroṣitaḥ  yamastataḥ pitussarvaṃ prāṃjaliḥ pratyavedayat  
bhṛśaṃ śāpa bhayodvignassaṃjñāvākyairviceṣṭitaḥ  mātrā snehena sarveṣu vartitavyaṃ suteṣu vai  
snehamasmāsvapākṛtya kanīyāṃsaṃ bibharti sā  tasmānmayodyataḥ pādastadbhavān kṣaṃtumarhati  
śaptohamasmi deveśa jananyā tapatāṃvara  tava prasādāccaraṇo na patenmama gopate  
savitovāca  asaṃśayaṃ putra mahadbhaviṣyatyatra kāraṇam  yena tvāmāviśatkrodho dharmajñaṃ satyavādinam  
na śakyate tanmithyā vai karttuṃ mātṛvacastava  kṛmayo māṃsamādāya gamiṣyaṃti mahītale  
tadvākyaṃ bhavitā satyaṃ tvaṃ ca trātau bhaviṣyasi  kuru tāta na saṃdehaṃ manaścāśvāsya svaṃ prabho  
sūta uvāca  ityuktvā tanayaṃ sūryo yamasaṃjñaṃ munīśvara  ādityaścābravīttānttu chāyāṃ krodhasamanvitaḥ  
sūrya uvāca  he priye kumate caṃḍi kiṃ tvayā''caritaṃ kila  kiṃ tu me'bhyadhikaḥ sneha etadākhyātumarhasi  
sūta uvāca  sā ravervacanaṃ śrutvā yathā tathyaṃ nyavedayat  nirdagdhā kāmaraviṇā sāṃtvayāmāsa vai tadā  
chāyovāca  tavātitejasā dagdhā idaṃ rūpaṃ na śobhate  asahaṃtī ca tatsaṃjñā vane vasati śādvale  
ślāghyā yogabalopetā yogamāsādya gopate  anukūlastu deveśa saṃdiśyātmamayaṃ matam  
rūpaṃ nivartayāmyadya tava kāṃtaṃ karomyaham  sūta uvāca  tacchrutvā'pagataḥ krodho mārtaṇḍasya vivasvataḥ  
bhramimāropya tattejaḥ śātayāmāsa vai muniḥ  tato vibhrājitaṃ rūpa tejasā saṃvṛtena ca  
kṛtaṃ kāṃtataraṃ rūpaṃ tvaṣṭrā tacchuśubhe tadā  tatobhiyogamāsthāya svāṃ bhāryyāṃ hi dadarśa ha  
adhṛṣyāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tejasā niyamena ca  so'śvarūpaṃ samāsthāya gatvā tāṃ maithunecchayā  
maithunāya viceṣṭaṃtīṃ parapuṃsobhiśaṃkayā  mukhato nāsikāyāṃ tu śukraṃ tat vyadadhānmune  
devau tataḥ prajāyetāmaśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau  nāsatyau tau ca dasrau ca smṛtau dvāvaśvināvapi  
tau tu kāṃtena rūpeṇa darśayāmāsa bhāskaraḥ  ātmānaṃ sā tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭā patimādarāt  
patyā tena gṛhaṃ prāyātsvaṃ satī muditānanā  mumudāte'tha tau prītyā daṃpato pūrvatodhikam  
yamastu karmaṇā tena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ  dharmeṇa raṃjayāmāsa dharmarāja imā prajāḥ  
lebhe sa karmaṇā tena dharmarājo mahādyutiḥ  pitṝṇāmādhipatyaṃ ca lokapālatvameva ca  
manuḥ prajāpatistvāsītsāvarṇissa tapodhanaḥ  bhāvyaḥ sa karmaṇā tena manossāvarṇikeṃtare  
merupṛṣṭhe tapo ghoramadyāpi carate prabhuḥ  yavīyasī tayoryā tu yamī kanyā yaśasvinī  
abhavatsā saricchreṣṭhā yamunā lokapā vanī  manurityucyate loke sāvarṇiriti cocyate  
ya idaṃ janma devānāṃ śṛṇuyāddhārayettu vā  āpadaṃ prāpya mucyeta prāpnuyātsumahadyaśaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ manvantarakīrtane vaivasvatavarṇanaṃ nāma pacatriṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  manorvaivasvatasyāsanputrā vai nava tatsamāḥ  paścānmahonnatā dhīrāḥ kṣatradharmaparāyaṇāḥ  
ikṣvākuḥ śibinābhāgau dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireva ca  nariṣyanto'tha nābhāgaḥ karūṣaśca priyavrataḥ  
akarotputtrakāmastu manuriṣṭiṃ prajāpati  anutpanneṣu putreṣu tatreṣṭyāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ  
sā hi divyāṃbaradharā divyābharaṇabhūṣitā  divyasaṃhananā caivamilā jajñe hi viśrutā  
tāmiḍetyeva hovāca manurdaṇḍadharastathā  anugacchatva māmeti tamiḍā pratyuvāca ha  
iḍovāca  dharmayuktamidaṃ vākyaṃ putrakāmaṃ prajāpatim  mitrāvaruṇayoraṃśairjātāsmi vadatāṃ vara  
tayossakāśaṃ yāsyāmi na me dharme rucirbhavet  evamuktvā satī sā tu mitrāvaruṇayostataḥ  
gatvāṃtikaṃ varārohā prāṃjalirvākyamabravīt  aṃśaistu yuvayorjātā manuyajñe mahāmunī  
āgatā bhavatoraṃti brūtaṃ kiṃ karavāṇi vām  anyānputrānsṛja vibho tairvaṃśaste bhaviṣyati  
sūta uvāca  tāṃ tathāvādinīṃ sādhvīmiḍāṃ manvadhvarodbhavām  mitrāvaruṇānāmānau munī ūcaturādarāt  
mitrāvaruṇāvūcatuḥ  anena tava dharmajñe praśrayeṇa damena ca  satyena caiva suśroṇi prītau dvau varavarṇini  
āvayostvaṃ mahābhāge khyātiṃ caiva gamiṣyasi  manorvaśakaraḥ putrastvameva ca bhaviṣyasi  
sudyumna iti vikhyātastriṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ  jagatpriyo dharmaśīlau manuvaṃśavivarddhanaḥ  
sūta uvāca  nivṛttā sā tu tacchrutvā gacchaṃtī pituraṃtike  budhenāṃtaramāsādya maidhunāyopamaṃtritā  
somaputrāttato jajñe tasyāṃ rājā purūravāḥ  putro'tisundaraḥ prājña urvaśī patirunnataḥ  
janayitvā ca sā tatra purūravasamādarāt  putraṃ śivaprasādāttu punassudyumnatāṃ gataḥ  
sudyumnasya tu dāyādāstrayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ  utkalaśca gayaścāpi vinatāśvaśca vīryavān  
utkalasyotkalā viprā vinatāśvasya paścimāḥ  dikpūrvā muni śārdūla gayasya tu gayā smṛtāḥ  
praviṣṭe tu manau tāta divākaratanuṃ tadā  daśadhā tatra tatkṣetramakarotpṛthivīṃ manuḥ  
ikṣvākuḥ śreṣṭhadāyādo madhyadeśamavāptavān  vasiṣṭhavacanādāsītpratiṣṭhānaṃ mahātmanaḥ  
pratiṣṭhāṃ dharmarājyasya sudyumnotha tato dadau  tatpurūravase prādādrājyaṃ prāpya mahāyaśāḥ  
mānavo yo muniśreṣṭhāḥ strīpuṃsorlakṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ  nariṣyaṃtācchakāḥ putrā nabhagasya suto 'bhavat  
aṃbarīṣastu bāhleyo bāhlakaṃ kṣetrāmāptavān  śaryātirmithunaṃ tvāsīdānarto nāma viśrutaḥ  
putrassukanyā kanyā ca yā patnī cyavanasya hi  ānartasya hi dāyādo raibhyo nāma sa raivataḥ  
ānartaviṣaye yasya purī nāma kuśasthalī  mahādivyā saptapurīmadhye yā saptamī matā  
tasya putraśataṃ tvāsītkakudmī jyeṣṭha uttamaḥ  tejasvī subalaḥ pāro dharmiṣṭho brahmapālakaḥ  
kakudminastu saṃjātā revatī nāma kanyakā  mahālāvaṇyasaṃyuktā divyalakṣmīrivāparā  
praṣṭuṃ kanyāvaraṃ rājā kakudmī kanyayā saha  brahmaloke vidhessamyaksarvādhīśo jagāma ha  
āvartamāne gāṃdharve sthito labdhakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇam  śuśrāva tatra gāṃdharvaṃ nartane brahmaṇoṃ'tike  
muhūrtabhūtaṃ tatkāle gataṃ bahuyugaṃ tadā  na kiṃcidbubudhe rājā kakudmī munayassa tu  
tadāsau vidhimā namya svābhiprāyaṃ kṛtāṃjaliḥ  nyavedayadvinītātmā brahmaṇe paramātmane  
tadabhiprāyamākarṇya sa prahasya prajāpatiḥ  kakudminaṃ mahārājaṃ samābhāṣya samabravīt  
brahmovāca  śṛṇu rājanraibhyasuta kakudminpṛthivapite  madvacaḥ prītitassatyaṃ pravakṣyāmi viśeṣataḥ  
kālena saṃhṛtāste vai varā ye te kṛtā hṛdi  na tadgotraṃ hi tatrāsti kālassarvasya bhakṣakaḥ  
tvatpuryyapi hatā puṇyajanaissā rākṣasairnṛpa  aṣṭāviṃśaddvāpare'dya kṛṣṇena nirmitā punaḥ  
kṛtā dvārāvatī nāmnā bahudvārā manoramā  bhojavṛṣṇyaṃdhakairguptā vāsudevapurogamaiḥ  
tadgaccha tatra prītātmā vāsudevāya kanyakām  baladevāya dehi tvamimāṃ svatanayāṃ nṛpa  
sūta uvāca  ityādiṣṭo nṛpo'yaṃ taṃ natvā tāṃ ca purīṃ gataḥ  gatānbahūnyugāñjñātvā vismitaḥ kanyayā yutaḥ  
tatastu yuvatīṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ ca svāṃ suvidhānataḥ  kṛṣṇabhrātre balāyāśu prādāttatra sa revatīm  
tato jagāma śikharaṃ merordivyaṃ mahāprabhuḥ  śivamārādhayāmāsa sa nṛpastapasi sthitaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  tatra sthito bahuyugaṃ brahmaloke sa revataḥ  yuvaivāgānmartyalokametannaḥ saṃśayo mahān  
sūta uvāca  na jarā kṣutpipāsā vā vikārāstatra saṃti vai  apamṛtyurna keṣāṃcinmunayo brahmaṇoṃ'tike  
ato na rājā saṃprāpa jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ ca sā sutā  sa yuvaivāgatastatra saṃmaṃtrya tanayāvaram  
gatvā dvārāvatīṃ divyāṃ purīṃ kṛṣṇavinirmitām  vivāhaṃ kārayāmāsa kanyāyāḥ sa balena hi  
tasya putraśataṃ tvāsīddhārmikasya mahāprabho  kṛṣṇasyāpi sutā jātā bahustrībhyo'mitāstataḥ  
anvavāyo mahāṃstatra dvayorapi mahātmanoḥ  kṣatriyā dikṣu sarvāsu gatā hṛṣṭāssudhārmikāḥ  
iti prokto hi śaryātervaṃśo'nyeṣāṃ vadāmyaham  mānavānāṃ hi saṃkṣepācchṛṇutādarato dvijāḥ  
nābhāgo diṣṭaputro'bhūtsa tu brāhmaṇatāṃ gataḥ  svakṣatravaṃśaṃ saṃsthāpya brahmakarmabhirāvṛtaḥ  
dhṛṣṭāddhārṣṭamabhūtkṣatraṃ brahmabhūyaṃ gataṃ kṣitau  karūṣasya tu kārūṣāḥ kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ  
nṛgo yo manuputrastu mahādātā viśeṣataḥ  nānāvasūnāṃ suprītyā viprebhyaśca gavāṃ tathā  
godātavyatyayādyastu svakubuddhyā svapāpataḥ  kṛkalāsatvamāpannaḥ śrīkṛṣṇena samuddhṛtaḥ  
tasyekobhūtsutaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prayātirdharmavittathā  iti śrutaṃ mayā vyāsāttatproktaṃ hi samāsataḥ  
vṛṣaghnastu manoḥ putro gopālo guruṇā kṛtaḥ  pālayāmāsa gā yatto rātryāṃ vīrāsanavrataḥ  
sa ekadā''gataṃ goṣṭhe vyāghraṃ gā hiṃsituṃ balī  śrutvā gokadanaṃ buddho haṃtuṃ taṃ khaḍgadhṛgyayau  
ajānannahanadbabhrośśiraśśārdūlaśaṃkayā  niścakrāma sabhīrvyāghro dṛṣṭvā taṃ khaḍginaṃ prabhum  
manyamāno hataṃ vyāghraṃ svasthānaṃ sa jagāma ha  rātryāṃ tasyāṃ bhramāpanno varṣavātavinaṣṭadhīḥ  
vyuṣṭāyāṃ niśi cotthāya prage tatra gato hi saḥ  adrākṣītsa hatāṃ babhruṃ na vyāghraṃ duḥkhito'bhavat  
śrutvā tadvṛttamājñāya taṃ śaśāpa kṛtāgasam  akāmatovicāryyeti śūdro bhava na kṣatriyaḥ  
evaṃ śaptastu guruṇā kulācāryyeṇa kopataḥ  nissṛtaśca pṛṣadhrastu jagāma vipinaṃ mahat  
nirviṇṇaḥ sa tu kaṣṭena virakto'bhūtsa yogavān  vanāgnau dagdhadehaśca jagāma paramāṃ gatim  
kaviḥ putro manoḥ prājñaśśivānugrahato'bhavat  bhuktvā sukhaṃ divyaṃ muktiṃ prāpa sudurlabhām  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ manunavaputravaṃśavarṇanaṃnāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  pūrvatastu manorjajñe ikṣvākurghrāṇatassutaḥ  tasya putraśataṃ tvāsīdikṣvākorbhūridakṣiṇam
