manasā ye cikīrṣaṃti mūrtisthāpanamuttamam  tetyumāyāḥ paraṃ lokaṃ prayānti munidurlabham  
kriyamāṇantu yaḥ prekṣya cetasā hyanucintayet  kārayiṣyāmyahaṃ yarhi saṃpanme saṃbhaviṣyati  
evantasya kulaṃ sadyo yāti svargaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  mahāmāyāprabhāveṇa durlabhaṃ kiṃ jagattraye  
śrīparāmbājagadyoniṃ kevalaṃ ye samāśritāḥ  te manuṣyā na mantavyāssākṣāddevīgaṇāśca te  
ye vrajantaḥ svapantaśca tiṣṭhanto vāpyaharniśam  umeti dvyakṣaraṃ nāma bruvate te śivāgaṇāḥ  
nitye naimittike devīṃ ye yajanti parāṃ śivām  puṣpairdhūpaistathādīpaiste prayāsyantyumālayam  
ye devīmaṇḍapaṃ nityaṃ gomayena mṛdāthavā  upaliṃpanti mārjanti te prayāsyantyumālayam  
yairdevyā mandiraṃ ramyaṃ nirmāpi tamanuttamam  tatkulīnāñjanānmātā hyāśiṣaḥ saṃprayacchati  
madīyāḥ śatavarṣāṇi jīvantu premabhāgjanāḥ  nāpadāmayanānītthaṃ śrīmātā vaktyaharniśam  
yena mūrtirmmahādebyā umāyāḥ kāritā śubhā  narāyutantatkulajaṃ maṇidvīpe mahīyate  
sthāpayitvā mahāmāyāmūrtiṃ samyakprapūjya ca  yaṃyaṃ prārthayate kāmaṃ taṃtaṃ prāpnoti sādhakaḥ  
yaḥ snāpayati śrīmātuḥ sthāpitāṃ mūrtimuttamām  ghṛtena madhunāktena tatphalaṃ gaṇayettu kaḥ  
candanāgurukarpūra māṃsīmustādiyugjalaiḥ  ekavarṇagavāṃ kṣīraiḥ snāpayetparameśvarīm  
dhūpenāṣṭādaśāṃgena dadyādāhutimuttamām  nīrājanaṃ careddevyā ssājyakarpūravartibhiḥ  
kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ navamyāṃ vāmāyāṃ vā paṃcadiktithau  pūjayejjagatāṃ dhātrīṃ gaṃdhapuṣpairviśeṣataḥ  
saṃpaṭhañjananīsūktaṃ śrīsūktamatha vā paṭhan  devīsūktamatho vāpi mūkamantramathāpi vā  
viṣṇukrāntāṃ ca tulasīṃ varjayitvākhilaṃ sumam  devīprītikaraṃ jñeyaṃ kamalantu viśeṣataḥ  
arpayetsvarṇapuṣpaṃ yo devyai rājatameva vā  sa yāti paramaṃ dhāma siddhakoṭi bhiranvitam  
pūjanānte sadā kāryaṃ dāsairenaḥ kṣamāpanam  prasīda parameśāni jagadānandadāyini  
iti vākyaisstuvanmantrī devībhaktiparāyaṇaḥ  dhyāyetkaṇṭhīravārūḍhāṃ varadābhayapāṇikām  
itthaṃ dhyātvā maheśānīṃ bhaktābhīṣṭaphalapradām  nānāphalāni pakvāni naivedyatve prakalpayet  
naivedyaṃ bhakṣayedyastu śaṃbhuśakteḥ parātmanaḥ  sa nirbhūyākhilaṃ paṅkaṃ nirmalo mānavo bhavet  
caitraśuklatṛtīyāyāṃ yo bhavānīvrataṃ caret  bhavavandhananirmuktaḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam  
asyāmeva tṛtīyāyāṃ kuryāddolotsavaṃ budhaḥ  pūjayejjagatāṃ dhātrīmumāṃ śaṃkarasaṃyutām  
kusumaiḥ kuṃkumairvastraiḥ karpūrāgurucandanaiḥ  dhūpairddīpaissanaivedyaiḥ sraggandhairaparairapi  
āndolayettato devīṃ mahāmāyāṃ maheśvarīm  śrīgaurīṃ śivasaṃyuktāṃ sarvakalyāṇakāriṇīm  
pratyabdaṃ kurute yosyāṃ batamāndolanaṃ tathā  niyamena śivā tasmai sarvamiṣṭaṃ prayacchati  
mādhavasya site pakṣe tṛtīyā yā'kṣayābhidhā  tasyāṃ yo jagadambāyā vrataṃ kuryādatandritaḥ  
mallikāmālatīcaṃpājapābandhūkapaṃkajaiḥ  kusumaiḥ pūjayedgaurīṃ śaṃkareṇa samanvitām  
koṭijanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ manovākkāyasambhavam  nirdhūya caturo vargānakṣayāniha so'śnute  
jyeṣṭhe śuklatṛtīyāyāṃ vrataṃ kṛtvā maheśvarīm  yo'rcayetparamaprītyā tasyāsādhyaṃ na kiṃcana  
āṣāḍhaśuklapakṣīyatṛtīyāyāṃ rathotsavama  devyāḥ priyatamaṃ kuryādyathāvittānusārataḥ  
rathaṃ pṛthvīṃ vijānīyādrathāṃge candrabhāskarau  vedānaśvānvijānīyātsārathiṃ padmasaṃ bhavam  
nānāmaṇigaṇākīrṇaṃ puṣpamālāvirājitam  evaṃ rathaṃ kalpayitvā tasmintsaṃsthāpayecchivām  
lokasaṃrakṣaṇārthāya lokaṃ draṣṭuṃ parāmbikā  rathamadhye saṃsthiteti bhāvayenmatimānnaraḥ  
rathe pracalite mandaṃ jayaśabdamudīrayet  pāhi devi janānasmānprapannāndīnavatsale  
iti vākyaistoṣayecca nānāvāditranisvanaiḥ  sīmānte tu rathaṃ nītvā tatra saṃpūjaye drathe  
nānāstotraistataḥ stutvāpyānayettāṃ svaveśmani  praṇipātaśataṃ kṛtvā prārthayejjagadambikām  
evaṃ yaḥ kurute vidvānpūjāvratarathotsavam  iha bhuktvākhilānbhogānsonte devīpadaṃ vrajet  
śuklāyāntu tṛtīyāyāmevaṃ śrāvaṇabhādrayoḥ  yo vrataṃ kurute'mbāyāḥ pūjanaṃ ca yathāvidhi  
modate putrapautrādyairdhanādyairiha santatam  so'nte gacchedumālokaṃ sarvalokopari sthitam  
āśvine dhavale pakṣe navarātravrataṃ caret  yatkṛte sakalāḥ kāmāssiddhyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ  
navarātravratasyāsya prabhāvaṃ vaktumīśvaraḥ  caturāsyo na paṃcāsyo na ṣaḍāsyo na ko'paraḥ  
navarātravrataṃ kṛtvā bhūpālo virathātmajaḥ  hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ nijaṃ lebhe suratho munisattamāḥ  
dhruvasaṃdhisuto dhīmānayodhyādhipatirnṛpaḥ  sudarśano hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ prāpadasya prabhāvataḥ  
vratarājamimaṃ kṛtvā samārādhya maheśvarīm  saṃsārabandhanānmuktaḥ samādhirmuktibhāgabhūt  
tṛtīyāyāṃ ca pañcamyāṃ saptamyāma ṣṭamītithau  navamyāṃ vā caturdaśyāṃ yo devī pūjayennaraḥ  
āśvinasya site pakṣe vrataṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ  tasya sarvaṃ manobhīṣṭaṃ pūrayatyaniśaṃ śivā  
yaḥ kārttikasya mārgasya pauṣasya tapasastathā  tapasyasya site pakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ vrataṃ caret  
lohitaiḥ karavīrādyaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaissugandhitaiḥ  pūjayenmaṅgalāndevīṃ sa sarvaṃ maṃgalaṃ labhet  
saubhāgyāya sadā strībhiḥ kāryyametanmahāvratam  vidyādhanasutāptyarthaṃ vidheyaṃ puruṣairapi  
umāmaheśvarādīni vratānyanyāni yānyapi  devīpriyāṇi kāryāṇi svabhaktyaivaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ  
saṃhiteyaṃ mahāpuṇyā śivabhaktivivarddhinī  nānākhyānasamāyuktā bhuktimuktipradā śivā  
ya enāṃ śṛṇuyādbhaktyā śrāvayedvā samāhitaḥ  paṭhedvā pāṭhayedvāpi sa yāti paramāṃ gatim  
yasya gehe sthitā ceyaṃ likhitā lalitākṣaraiḥ  saṃpūjitā ca vidhivatsarvānkāmānsa āpnuyāt  
bhūtapretapiśācādiduṣṭebhyo na bhayaṃ kvacita  putrapautrādisampattiṃ labhatyeva na saṃśayaḥ  
tasmādiyaṃ mahāpuṇyā ramyomāsaṃhitā sadā  śrotavyā paṭhitavyā ca śivabhaktimabhīpsubhiḥ  
iti śrīśiva mahāpurāṇe pañcamyāmumāsaṃhitāyāṃ kriyāyoganirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo'dhyāyaḥ  
namaḥ śivāya sāmbāya sagaṇāya sasūnave  pradhānapuruṣeśāya sargasthitatyantahetave  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  śrutomāsaṃhitā ramyā nānākhyānasamanvitā  kailāsasaṃhitāmbrūhi śivatattvavivarddhinīm  
vyāsa uvāca  śṛṇuta prītito vatsāḥ kailāsākhyāṃ hi saṃhitām  śivatattvaparāndivyāṃ vakṣye vaḥ snehataḥ parām  
himavacchikhare pūrvvaṃ tapasyanto mahaujasaḥ  vārāṇasīṅgantukāmā munayaḥ kṛtasamvidaḥ  
nirgatya tasmātsamprāpya gireḥ kāśīṃ samāhitāḥ  snātavyameveti tadā dadṛśurmaṇikarṇikām  
tatra snātvā susantapya devādīnatha jāhnavīm  dṛṣṭvā snātvā munīśāste viśveśaṃ tridaśeśvaram  
namaskṛtyātha sampūjya bhaktyā paramayānvitāḥ  śatarudrādibhiḥ stutvā stutibhirvvedapāragāḥ  
ātmānaṃ menire sarve kṛtārthā vayamityuta  śivaprītyā supūrṇārthāśśivabhaktiratāssadā  
tasminnavasare sūtaṃ pañcakrośadidṛkṣayā  gatvā samāgataṃ vīkṣya mudā te taṃ vavandire  sopi viśveśvaraṃ sākṣāddevadevamumāpatim  namaskṛtyātha taissākammuktimaṇḍapamāviśat  
tatrāsīnammahātmānaṃ sūtampaurāṇikottamam  arghyādibhistadā sarvve munayassamupācaran  
tataḥ sūtaḥ prasannātmā munīnālokya suvratān  papraccha kuśalāntepi procuḥ kuśalamātmanaḥ  
te tu saṃhṛṣṭahṛdayaṃ jñātvā taṃ vai munīśvarāḥ  praṇavārthāvagatyarthamūcuḥ prāstāvikaṃ vacaḥ  
munaya ūcuḥ  vyāsaśiṣya mahābhāga sūta paurāṇikottama  dhanyastvaṃ śivabhakto hi sarvavijñāna sāgaraḥ  
bhavantameva bhagavānvyāsassarvajagadguruḥ  abhiṣicya purāṇānāṃ gurutve samayojayat  
tasmātpaurāṇikī vidyā bhavato hṛdi saṃsthitā  purāṇāni ca sarvāṇi vedārthampravadanti hi  
vedāḥ praṇavasambhūtāḥ praṇavārtho maheśvaraḥ  ato maheśvarasthānaṃ tvayi dhiṣṇyampratiṣṭhitam  
tvanmukhābjaparisyandanmakaraṃde manoharam  praṇavārthāmṛtaṃ pītvā bhaviṣyāmo gatajvarāḥ  
viśeṣato gurustvaṃ hi nānyo'smākaṃ mahāmate  paraṃ bhāvaṃ maheśasya parayā kṛpayā vada  
iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sūto vyāsapriyassudhīḥ  gaṇeśaṃ ṣaṇmukhaṃ sākṣānmaheśānaṃ maheśvarīm  
śilādatanayaṃ devaṃ nandīśaṃ suyaśāpatim  sanatkumāraṃ vyāsaṃ ca praṇipatyedamabravīt  
sūta uvāca  sādhusādhu mahābhāgā munayaḥ kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ  matirdṛḍhatarā jātā durlabhā sāpi duṣkṛtām  
pārāśaryeṇa guruṇā naimiṣāraṇyavāsinām  munīnāmupadiṣṭaṃ yadvakṣye tanmunipuṃgavāḥ  
yasya śravaṇamātreṇa śivabhaktirbhavennṛṇām  sāvadhānā bhavantodya śṛṇvantu parayā mudā  
svārociṣentare pūrvaṃ tapasyaṃto dṛḍhavratāḥ  ṛṣayo naimiṣāraṇye sarvasiddhaniṣevite  
dīrghasatraṃ vitanvanto rudramadhvaranāyakam  prīṇayantaḥ paraṃ bhāvamaiśvaryyaṃ jñātumicchavaḥ  
nivasanti sma te sarve vyāsadarśanakāṃkṣiṇaḥ  śivabhaktiratā nityaṃ bhasmarudrākṣadhāriṇaḥ  
teṣāṃ bhāvaṃ samālokya bhagavānbādarāyaṇaḥ  prādurbabhūva sarvātmā parāśaratapaḥphalam  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayassarve prahṛṣṭavadanekṣaṇāḥ  abhyutthānādibhissarvairupacārairupācaran  
satkṛtya pradadustasmai sauvarṇaṃ viṣṭaraṃ śubham  sukhopaviṣṭaḥ sa tadā tasminsauvarṇaviṣṭare  prāha gaṃbhīrayā vācā pārāśaryyo mahāmuniḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  kuśalaṃ kiṃ nu yuṣmākamprabrūtāsminmahāmakhe  arcitaṃ kiṃ nu yuṣmābhissamyagadhvaranāyakaḥ  
kimarthamatra yuṣmābhiradhvare parameśvaraḥ  svarcito bhaktibhāvena sāmbassaṃsāramocakaḥ  
yuṣmatpravṛttirme bhāti śuśrūṣā pūrvameva hi  parabhāve maheśasya muktihetośśivasya ca  
evamuktā munīndreṇa vyāsenāmitatejasā  munayo naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ paramaujasaḥ  
praṇipatya mahātmānaṃ pārāśaśaryyaṃ mahāmunim  śivānurāgasaṃhṛṣṭamānasaṃ ca tamabruvan  
munaya ūcuḥ  bhagavanmuniśārdūla sākṣānnārāyaṇāṃśaja  kṛpānidhe mahāprājña sarvavidyādhipa prabho  
tvaṃ hi sarvajagadbharturmahā devasya vedhasaḥ  sāmbasya sagaṇasyāsya prasādānāṃ nidhissvayam  
tvatpādābjarasāsvādamadhupāyitamānasāḥ  kṛtārthā vayamadyaiva bhavatpādābjadarśanāt  
tvadīyacaraṇāmbhojadarśanaṃ khalu pāpinām  durlabhaṃ labdhamasmābhistvasmātsukṛtino vayam  
asmindeśe mahābhāga naimiṣāraṇyasaṃjñake  dīrghasatrānvitāssarve praṇavārthaprakāśakāḥ  
śrotavyaḥ parameśāna iti kṛtvā viniścitāḥ  parasparaṃ cintayantaḥ paraṃ bhāvaṃ maheśitu  
ajñātavanta evaite vayaṃ tasmādbhavānprabho  chettumarhati tānsarvānsaṃśayānalpacetasām  
tvadanyaḥ saṃśayasyāsyacchettā na hi jagattraye  tasmādapāragaṃbhīravyāmohābdhau nimajjataḥ  
tārayasva śivajñānapotenāsmāndayānidhe  śivasadbhaktitattvārthaṃ jñātuṃ śraddhālavo vayam  
evamabhyarthitasta munibhirvedapāragaiḥ  sarvavedārthavinmukhyaḥ śukatāto mahāmuniḥ  vedāntasārasarvasvaṃ praṇavaṃ parameśvaram  
dhyātvā hṛtkarṇikāmadhye sāmbaṃ saṃsāramocakam  prahṛṣṭamānaso bhūtvā vyājahāra mahāmuni  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ vyāsaśaunakādisaṃvādo nāma prathamo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  sādhu pṛṣṭamidaṃ viprā bhavadbhirbhāgyavattamaiḥ  durlabhaṃ hi śivajñānaṃ praṇavārthaprakāśakam  
yeṣāṃ prasanno bhagavānsākṣācchūlavarāyudhaḥ  teṣāmeva śivajñānaṃ praṇavārthaprakāśakama  
jāyate na hi sandeho netareṣāmiti śrutiḥ   śivabhaktivihīnānāmiti tattvārthaniścayaḥ  
dīrghasatreṇa yuṣmābhirbhagavānambikāpatiḥ  upāsita itīdaṃ me dṛṣṭamadya viniścitam  
tasmādvakṣyāmi yuṣmākamitihāsampurātanam  umāmaheśasamvādarūpamadbhutamāstikāḥ  
purākhilajaganmātā satī dākṣāyaṇī tanum  śivanindāprasaṅgena tyaktvā ca janakādhvare  
tataḥ prabhāvātsā devī sutā'bhūddhimavadgireḥ  śivārthamatapatsā vai nāradasyopadeśataḥ  
tasminbhūdharavaryye tu svayaṃvaravidhānataḥ  deveśe ca kṛtodvāhe pārvatī sukhamāpa sā  
tathaikasminmahādevī samaye patinā saha  sūpaviṣṭā mahāśaile gaurī devamabhāṣata  
mahādevyuvāca  bhagavanparameśāna pañcakṛtyavidhāyaka  sarvajña bhaktisulabha paramāmṛtavigraha  
dākṣāyaṇīntanuṃ tyaktvā tava nindāprasaṃgataḥ  āsamadya maheśāna putrī himavato gireḥ  kṛpayā parameśāna maṃtradīkṣāvidhānataḥ  māṃ viśuddhātmatattvasthāṃ kuru nityaṃ maheśvara  
iti samprārthito devyā devaḥ śītāṃśu bhūṣaṇaḥ  pratyuvāca tato devīṃ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā  
mahādeva uvāca  dhanyā tvaṃ devadevaśi yadi jātedṛśī matiḥ  kailāsa śikharaṃ gatvā kariṣye tvāṃ ca tādṛśīm  
tato himavato gatvā kailāsambhūdhareśvaram  jagau dīkṣāvidhānena praṇavādīnmanūn kramāt  
uktvā maṃtrāṃśca tāndevīṃ kṛtvā śuddhātmani sthitām  sārddhaṃ devyā mahādevo devodyānaṃ gato'bhavat  
tataḥ sumālinīmukhyairdaivyāḥ priyasakhījanaiḥ  samāhṛtaiḥ praphullaistaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kalpatarūdbhavaiḥ  
alaṃkṛtya mahādevīṃ svāṃkamāropya śaṃkaraḥ  prahṛṣṭavadanastasthau vilokya ca tadānanam  
tataḥ priyakathā jātāḥ pārvatīparameśayoḥ  hitāya sarvalokānāṃ sākṣācchrutyarthaṃ sammitā  
tadā sarvajaganmātā bharturaṃkaṃ samāśritā  vilokya vadanaṃ bharturidamāhaḥ tapodhanāḥ  
 śrīdevyuvāca  upadiṣṭāstvayā deva maṃtrāssapraṇavā matāḥ  tatrādau śrotumicchāmi praṇavārthaṃ viniścitam  
kathampraṇava utpannaḥ kathaṃ praṇava ucyate  mātrāḥ kati samākhyātāḥ kathaṃ vedādirucyate  
devatāḥ kati ca proktāḥ kathaṃ vedādibhāvanā  kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktā vyāpyavyāpakatā katham  
brahmāṇi paṃca maṃtre'sminkathaṃ tiṣṭhaṃtyanukramāt  kalāḥ kati samākhyātāḥ prapaṃcātmakatā katham  
vācyavācakasambandhasthānāni ca kathaṃ śiva  ko'trādhikārī vijñeyo viṣayaḥ ka udāhṛtaḥ  
sambandhaḥ kotra vijñeyaḥ kiṃprayojanamucyate  upāsakastu kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃ vā sthānamupāsanam  
upāsyaṃ vastu kiṃrūpaṃ kiṃ vā phalamupāsituḥ  anuṣṭhāna vidhiḥ kovā pūjāsthānaṃ ca kiṃ prabho  
pūjāyāṃ maṇḍalaṃ kiṃ vā kiṃ vā ṛṣyādikaṃ hara  nyāsajātavidhiḥ ko vā ko vā pūjāvidhikramaḥ  
etatsarvaṃ maheśāna samācakṣva viśeṣataḥ  śrotumicchāmi tattvena yadyasti mayi te kṛpā  
iti devyā samāpṛṣṭo bhagavānindubhūṣaṇaḥ  sampraśasya maheśānīṃ vaktuṃ samupacakrame  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsa saṃhitāyāṃ devīdevasaṃvāde devīkṛtapraśnavarṇanaṃ nāma dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ  
 īśvara uvāca  śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi yanmāṃ tvampari pṛcchasi  tasya śravaṇamātreṇa jīvassākṣācchivo bhavet  
praṇavārthaparijñānameva jñānaṃ madātmakam  bījantatsarvavidyānāṃ maṃtra mpraṇavanāmakam  
atisūkṣmaṃ mahārthaṃ ca jñeyaṃ tadvaṭabījavat  vedādi vedasāraṃ ca madrūpaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ  
devo guṇatrayātītaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvakṛtprabhuḥ  omityekākṣare maṃtre sthitohaṃ sarvagaśśivaḥ  
yadasti vastu tatsarvaṃ guṇaprādhānyayogataḥ  samastaṃ vyasta mapi ca praṇavārthaṃ pracakṣate  
sarvārthasādhakaṃ tasmādekaṃ brahmaitadakṣaram  tenomiti jagatkṛsnaṃ kurute prathamaṃ śivaḥ  
śivo vā praṇavo hyeṣa praṇavo vā śivaḥ smṛtaḥ  vācyavācakayorbhedo nātyaṃtaṃ vidyate yataḥ  
tasmādekākṣaraṃ devaṃ māṃ ca brahmarṣayo viduḥ  vācyavācakayoraikyaṃ manyamānā vipaścitaḥ  
atastadeva jānīyātpraṇavaṃ sarvakāraṇam  nirvikārī mumukṣurmāṃ nirguṇaṃ parameśvaram  
enameva hi deveśi sarvamaṃtraśiromaṇim  kāśyāmahaṃ pradāsyāmi jīvānāṃ muktihetave  
tatrādau sampravakṣyāmi praṇavoddhārama mbike  yasya vijñānamātreṇa siddhiśca paramā bhavet  
nivṛttimuddharetpūrvamindhanaṃ ca tataḥ param  kālaṃ samuddharetpaścāddaṃḍamī śvarameva ca  
varṇapaṃcakarūpoyamevaṃ praṇava uddhṛtaḥ  trimātrabindunādātmā muktido japatāṃ sadā  
brahmādisthāvarāntānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ khalu  prāṇaḥ praṇava evāyaṃ tasmātpraṇava īritaḥ  
ādyamvarṇamakāraṃ ca ukāramuttare tataḥ  makāraṃ madhyataścaiva nādāṃtaṃ tasya comiti  
jalavadvarṇamādyantu dakṣiṇe cottare tathā  madhye makāraṃ śucivadoṃkāre munisattama  
akāraścāpyukāroyaṃ makārāśca trayaṃ kramāt  tisro mātrāssamākhyātā arddhamātrā tataḥ param  
arddhamātrā maheśāni bindunādasvarūpiṇī  varṇanīyā na vai cāddhā jñeyā jñānibhireva sā  
īśānassarvavidyānāmityadyāśśrutayaḥ priye  matta eva bhavantīti vedāssatyamvadanti hi  
tasmādvedādirevāhaṃ praṇavo mama vācakaḥ  vācakatvānmamaiṣo'pi vedādiriti kathyate  
akārastu mahadbījaṃ rajassraṣṭā caturmukhaḥ  ukāraḥ prakṛtiryonissattvaṃ pālayitā hariḥ  
makāraḥ puruṣo bījī tamassaṃhārako haraḥ  bindurmaheśvaro devastiro bhāva udāhṛtaḥ  
nādassadāśivaḥ proktassarvānugrahakārakaḥ  nādamūrddhani saṃcintya parātparataraḥ śivaḥ  
sa sarvajñaḥ sarvakarttā sarveśo nirmalo'vyayaḥ  anirdeśyaḥ parabrahma sākṣātsadasataḥ paraḥ  
akārādiṣu varṇeṣu vyāpakaṃ cottarottaram  vyāpyantvadhastanaṃ varṇamevaṃ sarvatra bhāvayet  
sadyādīśānaparyyaṃtānyakārādiṣu paṃcasu  sthitāni paṃca brahmāṇi tāni manmūrttayaḥ kramāt  
aṣṭau kalāssamākhyātā akāre sadyajāśśive  ukāre vāmarūpiṇyastrayodaśa samīritāḥ  
aṣṭāvaghorarūpiṇyo makāre saṃsthitāḥ kalāḥ  bindau catasrassaṃbhūtāḥ kalāḥ puruṣagocarāḥ  
nāde paṃca samākhyātāḥ kalā īśānasaṃbhavāḥ  ṣaḍvidhaikyānusaṃdhānātprapaṃcātmakatocyate  
mantro yantraṃ devatā ca prapaṃco gurureva ca  śiṣyaśca ṣaṭpadārthā nāmeṣāmarthaṃ śṛṇu priye  
paṃcavarṇasamaṣṭiḥ syānmantraḥ pūrvamudāhataḥ  sa eva yaṃtratāṃ prāpto vakṣye tanmaṇḍalakramam  
yantraṃ tu devatārūpaṃ devatā viśvarūpiṇī  viśvarūpo guruḥ proktaśśiṣyo guruvapustvataḥ  
omitīdaṃ sarvamiti sarvaṃ brahmeti ca śruteḥ  vācyavācakasambandhopyayamevārtha īritaḥ  
ādhāro maṇipūraśca hṛdayaṃ tu tataḥ param  viśuddhirājñā ca tataḥ śaktiḥ śāntiriti kramāt  
sthānānyetāni deveśi śāntyatītaṃ parātparam  adhikārī bhavedyasya vairāgyaṃ jāyate dṛḍham  
viṣayaḥ syāmahaṃ devi jīvabrahmaikyabhāvanāt  sambandhaṃ śṛṇu deveśi viṣayaḥ samyagīritaḥ  
jīvātmanormayā sārddhamaikyasya praṇavasya ca  vācyavācakabhāvotra samvandhassamudīritaḥ  
vratādinirataḥ śāntastapasvī vijitendriyaḥ  śaucācārasamāyukto bhūdevo vedaniṣṭhitaḥ  
viṣayeṣu viraktaḥ sannaihikāmuṣmikeṣu ca  devānāṃ brāhmaṇo'pīha lokajeṣu śivavratī  
sarvaśāstrārtha tattvajñaṃ vedāntajñānapāragam  ācāryyamupasaṃgamya yatiṃ matimatāṃ varam  
dīrghadaṇḍapraṇāmādyaistoṣayedyatnatassudhīḥ  śāntyādiguṇasaṃyuktaḥ śiṣyassauśīlyavānvaraḥ  
yo guruḥ sa śivaḥ prokto yaśśivassa guruḥ smṛtaḥ  iti niścitya manasā svavicāraṃ nivedayet  
labdhānujñastu guruṇā dvādaśāhaṃ payovatī  samudratīre nadyāṃ ca parvate vā śivālaye  
śuklapakṣe tu paṃcamyāmekādaśyāṃ tathāpi vā  prātaḥ snātvā tu śuddhātmā kṛtanitya kriyassudhīḥ  
gurumāhūya vidhinā nāndīśrāddhaṃ vidhāya ca  kṣauraṃ ca kārayitvātha kakṣopasthavivarjitam  
keśaśmaśrunakhānāṃ vai snātvā niyatamānasaḥ  saktuṃ prāśyātha sāyāhne snātvā sandhyāmupāsya ca  
sāyamaupāsanaṃ kṛtvā guruṇā sahito dvijaḥ  śāstroktadakṣiṇāndattvā śivāya gururūpiṇe  
homadravyāṇi saṃpādya svasūtroktavidhānataḥ  agnimādhāya vidhivallaukikādivibhedataḥ  
āhitāgnistu yaḥ kuryātprājāpatye ṣṭināhite  śraute vaiśvānare samyak sarvavedasadakṣiṇam  
athāgnimātmanyāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajedgṛhāt  śrapayitvā caruṃ tasminsamidannājyabhedataḥ  
pauruṣeṇaiva sūktena hutvā pratyṛcamātmavān  hutvā ca sauviṣṭakṛtīṃ svasūtroktavidhānataḥ  
hutvopariṣṭāttantraṃ ca tenāgneruttare budhaḥ  sthitvāsane japenmaunī cailājinakuśottare  yāvadbrāhmamuhūrttaṃ tu gāyatrīṃ dṛḍhamānasaḥ  
tataḥ snātvā yathā pūrvaṃ śrapayitvā caruṃ tataḥ  pauruṣaṃ sūktamārabhya virajāntaṃ hunedbudhaḥ  
vāmadevamatenāpi śaunakādimatena vā  tatra mukhyaṃ vāmadevyaṃ garbhayukto yato muniḥ  
homaśeṣaṃ samāpyātha hunet  tatognimātmanyāropya prātassandhyamupāsya ca  
savitaryudite paścātsāvitrīṃ prāviśetkramāt  eṣaṇānāṃ trayaṃ tyaktvā preṣamuccārya ca kramāt  
śikhopavīte saṃtyajya kaṭisūtrādikaṃ tataḥ  visṛjya prāṅmukho gaccheduttarāśāmukhopi vā  
gṛhṇīyāddaṇḍakaupīnādyucitaṃ lokavartane  viraktaścena gṛhṇīyāllokavṛttivicāraṇe  
guroḥ samīpaṃ gatvātha daṇḍavatpraṇamettrayam  samutthāya tatastiṣṭhedgurupādasamīpataḥ  
tato guruḥ samādāya virajānalajaṃ śitam  bhasma tenaiva taṃ śiṣyaṃ samuddhṛtya yathāvidhi  
agnirityādibhirmantraistripuṇḍraṃ dhārayettataḥ  hṛtpaṃkaje samāsīnaṃ māṃ tvayā saha cintayet  
hastaṃ nidhāya śirasi śiṣyasya prītamānasaḥ  ṛṣyādisahitaṃ tasya dakṣakarṇe samuccaret  
praṇavaṃ triḥprakāraṃ tu tatastasyārthamādiśet  ṣaḍvidhārthaṃ parijñānasahitaṃ gurusattamaḥ  
dviṣaṭprakāraṃ sa guruṃ praṇamya bhuvi daṇḍavat  tadadhīno bhavennityaṃ vedāntaṃ samyagabhyaset  
māmeva ciṃtayennityaṃ paramātmānamātmani  viśuddhe nirvikāre vai brahmasākṣiṇamavyayam  
śamādidharmanirato vedāntajñānapāragaḥ  atrādhikārī sa prokto yatirvigatamatsaraḥ  
hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ virajaṃ viśokaṃ viśadamparam  aṣṭapatraṃ keśarāḍhyaṃ karṇikopari śo bhitam  
ādhāraśaktimārabhya tritatvāṃtamayaṃ padam  vicintya madhyatastasya daharaṃ vyoma bhāvayet  
omityekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharanmāṃ tvayā saha  ciṃtayenmadhyatastasya nityamudyuktamānasaḥ  
evaṃvidhopāsakasya mallokagatimeva ca  matto vijñānamāsādya matsāyujyaphalaṃ priye  
īśvara uvāca  ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi saṃnyāsāhnikakarma ca  tava snehānmahādevi saṃpradāyānurodhataḥ  
brāhme muhūrtta utthāya śirasi śvetapaṃkaje  sahasrāre samāsīnaṃ guruṃ saṃcitayedyatiḥ  
śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ dvinetraṃ varadābhaye  dadhānaṃ śivasadbhāvamevātmani manoharam  
bhāvopanītaiḥ saṃpūjya gandhādibhiranukramāt  baddhāṃjalipuṭo bhūtvā namaskuryādguruṃ tataḥ  
prātaḥprabhṛti sāyānte sāyādiprātaraṃ tataḥ  yatkaromi mahādeva tadastu tava pūjanam  
prativijñāpya gurave labdhānujñastato guroḥ  niruddhaprāṇa āsīno vijitātmā jitendriyaḥ  
mūlādibrahmaraṃdhrāṃtaṃ ṣaṭcakraṃ pariciṃtayet  vidyutkoṭisamaprakhyaṃ sarvatejomayaṃ param  
tanmadhye ciṃtayenmāṃ ca saccidānandavigraham  nirguṇaṃ paramaṃ brahma sadāśivamanāmayam  
sohamasmīti matimānma daikyamanubhūya ca  bahirnirgatya ca tato dūraṃ gacchedyathāsukham  
vastreṇācchādya matimāñchiro nāsikayā saha  viśodhya dehaṃ vi dhivattṛṇamādhāya bhūtale  
gṛhītaśiśna utthāya tato gacchejjalāśayam  uddhṛtya vāryathānyāyaṃ śaucaṃ kuryādatandritaḥ  
hastau pādau ca saṃśodhya dvirācamyomiti smaran  uttarābhimukho maunī dantadhāvanamācaret  
tṛṇaparṇaiḥ sadā kuryādamāmekādaśī vinā  apāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣairmukhaṃ saṃśodhayettataḥ  
dvirācamya mṛdā toyaiḥ kaṭiśaucaṃ vidhāya ca  aruṇodayakāle tu snānaṃ kuryānmṛdā saha  
guruṃ saṃsmṛtya māṃ caiva snānasaṃdhyādyamācaret  vistārabhayato noktamatra draṣṭavyamanyataḥ  
ābadhya śaṃkhamudrāṃ ca praṇavenābhiṣecayet  śirasi dvādaśāvṛttyā tadardhaṃ vā tadardhakam  
tīramāgatya kaupīnaṃ prakṣālyācamya ca dvidhā  prokṣayetpraṇavenaiva vastramaṃgopamārjanam  
mukhamprathamato mṛjya śira ārabhya sarvataḥ  tenaiva mārjayeddehaṃ sthitvā ca gurusannidhau  
ābadhyādvāmataḥ śuddhaṃ kaupīnaṃ ca saḍorakam  tataḥ saṃdhārayedbhasma tadvidhiḥ procyate'drije  
dvirācamya samādāya bhasma sadyādimaṃtrataḥ  agnirityādibhirmaṃtrairabhimaṃtrya spṛśettanum  
āpovetyabhimaṃtryātha jalaṃ tenaiva secayet  omāpojyotirityuktvā mānastoketi maṃtrataḥ  
samadya kamaladvandvaṃ kuryā kekaṃ tu paṃcadhā  śirovadanahṛdguhyapādeṣu parameśvari  
īśānādisamārabhya sadyāntaṃ paṃcabhiḥ kramāt  uddhūlya kavalaṃ paścātpraṇavenābhiṣecayet  
sarvāṃgaṃ ca tato hastau prakṣālyānyatsamāharet  samarcya pūrvattattu tripuṇḍrāṃstena dhārayet  
triyāyuṣaistryambakaiśca praṇavena śivena ca  śirasyatha lalāṭe ca vakṣasi skandha eva ca  
nābhau bāhvauḥ saṃdhiṣu ca pṛṣṭha caiva yathākramam  prakṣālya hastau ca tato dvirācamya yathāvidhi  
paṃcīkaraṇamuccārya bhāvayetsvaguruṃ budhaḥ  vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa prāṇāyāmānṣaḍācaret  
dakṣahastena saṃgṛhya jalaṃ vāmena pāṇinā  samācchādya dviṣaḍvāraṃ praṇave nābhimaṃtrayet  
evaṃ trivāraṃ saṃprokṣya śirasi triḥ pibettataḥ  samāhitena manasā dhyāyannoṃkāramīśvaram  
sauramaṇḍalamadhyasthaṃ sarvatejomayaṃ param  aṣṭabāhuṃ caturvaktramarddhanārīkamadbhutam  
sarvāścaryyaguṇopetaṃ sarvālaṃkāraśobhitam  evaṃ dhyātvātha vidhivaddadyādarghyatrayaṃ tataḥ  
aṣṭottaraśataṃ japtvā dviṣaḍvāraṃ tu tarpayet  punarācamya vidhivatprāṇāyāmatrayaṃ caret  
pūjāsadanamāgacchenmanasā saṃsmarañcchivam  dvāramāsādya prakṣālya pādau maunī dvirācamet  
praviśedvidhinā tatra dakṣapādapurassa ram  maṇḍapāntassudhīstatra maṇḍalaṃ racayetkramāt  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ saṃnyāsācāravarṇanaṃnāma caturtho'dhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  parīkṣya vidhivadbhūmiṃ gaṃdhavarṇarasādibhiḥ  manobhilaṣite tatra vitānavitatāmbare  
supralipte mahīpṛṣṭhe darpaṇodarasannibhe  aratniyugmamānena caturasraṃ prakalpayet  
tālapatraṃ samādāya tatsamāyāmavistaram  tasminbhāgānprakurvīta trayodaśasamāṃ kalām  
tatpatraṃ tatra nikṣipya paścimābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ  tatpūrvabhāge sudṛḍhaṃ sūtramādāya raṃjitam  
prākpratyagdakṣiṇodak ca caturdiśi nipātayet  sūtrāṇi devadeveśi navaṣaṣṭyuttaraṃ śatam  
koṣṭhāni syustatastasya madhyakoṣṭhaṃ tu karṇikā  koṣṭhāṣṭakaṃ bahistasya dalāṣṭakamihocyate  
dalāni śvetavarṇāni dalāṣṭakamihocyate  dalāni śvetavarṇātri samagrāṇi prakalpayet  pītarūpāṃ karṇikāṃ ca kṛtvā raktaṃ ca vṛttakam  
vanabhiddaladakṣaṃ tu samārabhya sureśvari  raktakṛṣṇāḥ krameṇaiva dalasandhīnvicitrayet  
karṇikāyāṃ likhedyaṃtraṃ praṇavārthaprakāśakam  adhaḥ pīṭhaṃ samālikhya śrīkaṇṭhaṃ ca tadūrdhvataḥ  
taduparyyamareśaṃ ca mahākālaṃ ca madhyataḥ  tanmastakasthaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca tata īśvaramālikhet  
śyāmena pīṭhaṃ pītena śrīkaṇṭhaṃ ca vicitrayet  amareśaṃ mahākālaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca tau kramāt  
kuryātsudhūmraṃ daṇḍaṃ ca dhavalaṃ ceśvaraṃ budhaḥ  evaṃ yaṃtraṃ samālikhya raktaṃ sadyena veṣṭayet  
tadutthenaiva nādena vidyādīśānamīśvari  tadvāsapaṃktīrgṛhṇīyādāgneyādikrameṇa vai  
koṣṭhāni koṇabhāgeṣu catvāryetāni sundari  śuklenāpūryya varṇādi catuṣkaṃ raktadhātubhiḥ  
āpūryya tāni catvāri dvārāṇi parikalpayet  tatastatpārśvayordvaṃdvaṃ pītenaiva prapūrayet  
āgneyakoṣṭhamadhye tu pītābhe caturasrake  aṣṭapatraṃ likhetpadmaṃ raktābhaṃ pītakarṇikam  
hakāraṃ vilikhenmadhye vinduyuktaṃ samāhitaḥ  padmasya nairṛte koṣṭhe caturasrantadā likhet  
padmamaṣṭadalaṃ raktaṃ pītakiṃjalkakarṇikam   śavargasya tṛtīyantu ṣaṣṭhasvarasamanvitam  
caturdaśasvaropetaṃ bindunādavibhūṣitam  etadbījavaraṃ bhadre padmamadhye samālikhet  
padmasyeśānakoṣṭhe tu tathā padmaṃ samālikhet  kavargasya tṛtīyaṃ tu paṃcamasvarasaṃyutam  
vilikhenmadhyatastasya bindukaṇṭhe svalaṃkṛtam  tadbāhyapaṃktitritaye pūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt  
koṣṭhāni paṃca gṛhrīyādgirirājasute śive  madhye tu karṇikāṃ kuryātpītāṃ raktaṃ ca vṛttakam  
dalāni raktavarṇāni kalpayetkalpavittamaḥ  dalabāhye tu kṛṣṇena raṃdhrāṇi paripūrayet  
āgneyādīni catvāri śuklenaiva prapūrayet  pūrve ṣaḍbindusahitaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ kṛṣṇamālikhet  
raktavarṇaṃ dakṣiṇatastrikoṇaṃ cottare tataḥ  śvetābhamarddhacandraṃ ca pītavarṇaṃ ca paścime  
caturasraṃ kramātteṣu likhedbījacatuṣṭayam  pūrve binduṃ samālikhya śubhraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tu dakṣiṇe  
ukāramuttare raktaṃ makāraṃ paścime tataḥ  akāraṃ pītamevaṃ tu kṛtvā varṇacatuṣṭayam  
sarvorddhvapaṃktyadhaḥ paṃktau samārabhya ca sundari  pītaṃ śvetaṃ ca raktaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ceti catuṣṭayam  
tadadho dhavalaṃ śyāmaṃ pītaṃ raktaṃ catuṣṭayam  adhastrikoṇake raktaṃ śuklaṃ pītaṃ varānane  
evandakṣiṇamārabhya kuryātsomāntamīśvari  tadbāhyapaṃktau pūrvādimadhyamāntaṃ vicitrayet  
pītaṃ raktaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca śyāmaṃ śvetaṃ ca pītakam  āgreyyādi samārabhya raktaṃ śyāmaṃ sitaṃ priye  
raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca raktaṃ ca ṣaṭkameva prakīrtitam  dakṣiṇādyaṃ maheśāni pūrvāvadhi samīritam  
nairṛtādyantu vijñeyamāgneyāvadhi ceśvari  vāruṇaṃ tu samārabhya dakṣiṇāvadhi ceritama  
vāyavyādyaṃ mahādevi nairṛtāvadhi ceritam  somārthaṃ parameśāni vāruṇāvadhi ceritam  
īśānādyaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ vāyavyāvadhi cāmbike  ityukto maṇḍalavidhirmayā tubhyaṃ ca pārvati  
evaṃ maṇḍalamālikhya niyatātmā yatissvataḥ  saurapūjāṃ prakurvīta sa hi tadvastutatparaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ saṃnyāsamaṇḍalavidhivarṇanaṃ nāma paṃcamo'dhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  dakṣiṇe maṃḍalasyātha vaiyāghraṃ carmaśobhanam  āstīryya śuddhatoyena prokṣayedastramaṃtrataḥ  
praṇavaṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya paścādādhāra muddharet  tatpaścācchaktikamalaṃ caturthyaṃtaṃ namontakam  
manumevaṃ samuccārya sthitvā tasminnudaṅmukhaḥ  prāṇānāyamya vidhivatpra ṇavoccārapūrvakam  
agnirityādibhirmaṃtrairbhasma saṃdhārayettataḥ  śirasi śrīguruṃ natvā maṇḍalaṃ racayetpunaḥ  
trikoṇavṛttaṃ bāhye tu caturasrātmakaṃ kramāt  abhyarcyomiti sādhāraṃ sthāpya śaṃkhaṃ samarcayet  
āpūrya śuddhatoyena praṇavena sugaṃdhinā  abhyarcya gaṃdhapuṣpādyaiḥ praṇavena ca saptadhā  
abhimaṃtrya tatastasmindhenumudrāṃ pradarśayeta  śaṃkhamudrāṃ ca tenaiva prokṣayedastramaṃtrataḥ  
ātmānaṃ gaṃdhapuṣpādipūjopakaraṇāni ca  prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā ṛṣyādikamathācaret  
asya śrīsauramaṃtrasya devabhāga ṛṣistataḥ  chando gāyatramityuktaṃ devassūryo maheśvaraḥ  
devatā syātṣaḍaṃgāni hrāmityādīni vinyaset  tatassaṃprokṣayetpadmamastreṇāgneragocaram  
tasminsamarcayedvidvān prabhūtāṃ vimalāmapi  sārāṃ cātha samārādhya pūrvādiparataḥ kramāt  
atha kālāgnirudraṃ ca śaktimādhārasaṃjñitām  anantaṃ pṛthivīṃ caiva ratnadvīpaṃ tathaiva ca  
saṃkalpavṛkṣodyānaṃ ca gṛhaṃ maṇimayaṃ tataḥ  raktapīṭhaṃ ca saṃpūjya pādeṣu prāgupakramāt  
dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca catuṣṭayam  adharmādyagnikoṇādikoṇeṣu ca samarcayet  
māyādhaśchadanaṃ paścādvidyordhvacchadanaṃ tataḥ  sattvaṃ rajastamaścaiva samabhyarcya yathākramam  
pūrvādidikṣu madhye ca dīptāṃ sūkṣmāṃ jayāmapi  bhadrāṃ vibhūti vimalāmamoghāṃ vaidyutāmapi  
sarvatomukhasaṃjñāṃ ca kandanālaṃ tathaiva ca  suṣiraṃ ca tatastaṃ tu kaṃṭakāṃstadanaṃtaram  
mūlacchadanakiṃjalkaprakāśasakalātmanaḥ  paṃcagraṃthikarṇikāṃ ca dalāni tadanaṃtaram  
keśarānbrahmaviṣṇū ca rudramātmānameva ca  antarātmānamapi ca jñānātmaparamātmani  
sampūjya paścātsaurākhyaṃ yogapīṭhaṃ samarcayet  pīṭhopari samākalpya mūrttiṃ mūlena mūlavit  
niruddhaprāṇa āsīno mūlenaiva svamūlataḥ  śaktimutthāpya tattejaḥ prabhāvātpiṃgalādhvanā  
puṣpāṃjalau nirgamayya maṇḍalasthasya bhāsvataḥ  sindūrāruṇadehasya vāmārddhadayitasya ca  
akṣasrakpāśakhaṭvāṃgakapālāṃkuśapaṃkajam  śaṃkhaṃ cakraṃ dadhānasya caturvaktrasya locanaiḥ  
rājitasya dvādaśabhistasya hṛtpaṃkajodare  praṇavaṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya hrāṃhrīṃsastadanantaram  
prakāśaśaktisahitaṃ mārtaṇḍaṃ ca tataḥ param  āvāhayāmi nama ityāvāhyā vāhanākhyayā  
mudrayā sthāpanādyāśca mudrāssaṃdarśayettataḥ  vinyasyāṃgāni hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūmaṃtena manunā tataḥ  
paṃcopacārānsaṃkalpya mūlenābhyarcayettridhā  keśareṣu ca padmasya ṣaḍaṃgāni maheśvari  
vahnīśarakṣovāyūnāṃ paritaḥ kramataḥ sudhīḥ  dvitīyāvaraṇe pūjyāścatasro mūrtayaḥ kramāt  
pūrvādyuttaraparyaṃtaṃ dalamūleṣu pārvati  ādityo bhāskaro bhānū raviścetyanupūrvaśaḥ  
arko brahmā tathā rudro viṣṇuśceti punaḥ priye  īśānādiṣu saṃpūjyāstṛtīyāvaraṇe punaḥ  
somaṃ kujaṃ budhaṃ jīvaṃ kaviṃ maṃdaṃ tama stamaḥ  samaṃtato yajedetānpūrvādidalamadhyataḥ  
athavā dvādaśādityāndvitīyāvaraṇe yajeta  tṛtīyāvaraṇe caiva rāśīrdvādaśa pūjayet  
saptasāgaragaṃgāśca bahirasya samaṃtataḥ  ṛṣīndevāṃśca gaṃdharvānpannagānapsarogaṇān  
grāmaṇyaśca tathā yakṣānyātudhānāṃstathā hayān  saptacchandomayāṃścaiva vālakhilyāṃśca pūjayet  
evaṃ tryāvaraṇaṃ devaṃ samabhyarcya divākaram  viracya maṃḍalaṃ paścāccaturasraṃ samāhitaḥ  
sthāpya sādhārakaṃ tāmrapātraṃ prasthodavistṛtam  pūrayitvā jalaiḥ śuddhairvāsitaiḥ kusumādibhiḥ  
abhyarcya gaṃdhapuṣpādyairjānubhyāmavanīṃ gataḥ  arghyapātraṃ samādāya bhūmadhyāntaṃ samuddharet  
tato brūyādimaṃ maṃtraṃ sāvitraṃ sarvasiddhidam  śṛṇu tacca mahādevi bhaktimuktipradaṃ sadā  
sindūravarṇāya sumaṇḍalāya namo'stu vajrābharaṇāya tubhyam  padmābhanetrāya supaṃkajāya brahmendranārāyaṇakāraṇāya  
saraktacūrṇaṃ sasuvarṇatoyaṃ srakkuṃkumāḍhyaṃ sakuśaṃ sapuṣpam  pradattamādāya sahemapātraṃ praśastamarghyaṃ bhagavanprasīda  
evamuktvā tato dattvā tadarthaṃ sūryamūrttaye  namaskuryādimaṃ maṃtraṃ paṭhitvā susamāhitaḥ  
namaśśivāya sāmbāya sagaṇāyādihetave  rudrāya viṣṇave tubhyaṃ brahmaṇe ca trimūrtaye  
evamuktvā namaskṛtya svāsane samavasthitaḥ  ṛṣyādikaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā karaṃ saṃśodhya vāriṇā  
punaśca bhasma saṃdhārya pūrvoktenaiva vartmanā  nyāsajātamprakurvīta śivabhāvavivṛddhdhaye  
paṃcopacāraissaṃpūjya śirasā śrīgurumbudhaḥ  praṇavaṃ śrīcaturthyaṃtaṃ namoṃtaṃ praṇamettataḥ  
paṃcātmakaṃ binduyutaṃ paṃcamasvarasaṃyutam  tadeva bindusahitaṃ paṃcamasvaravarjitam  
paṃcamasvarasaṃyuktaṃ maṃtrīśaṃ ca sabindukam  uddhṛtya bindusahitaṃ saṃvartakamathoddharet  
etaireva kramādbījairuddhṛtaiḥ praṇamedbudhaḥ  bhujayorūruyugme ca guruṃ gaṇapatintathā  
durgāṃ ca kṣetrapālaṃ ca baddhāṃjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ  omastrāya phaḍityuktvā karau saṃśodhya ṣaṭ kramāt  
apasarppantviti procya praṇavaṃ tadanaṃtaram  astrāya phaḍiti procya pārṣṇighātatrayeṇa tu  
uddhṛtya vighnānbhūyiṣṭhānkara tālatrayeṇa tu  antarikṣagatā ndṛṣṭvā vilokya divi saṃsthitān  
niruddhaprāṇa āsīno haṃsamaṃtramanusmaran  hṛdisthaṃ jīvacaitanyaṃ brahmanāḍyā samāna yet  
dvādaśāṃtassthaviśade sahasrāramahāmbuje  ciccandramaṇḍalāntasthaṃ cidrūpaṃ parameśvaram  
śoṣadāhaplavānkuryādrecakādi krameṇa tu  saṣoḍaśacatuṣṣaṣṭidvātriṃśadgaṇanāyutaiḥ  
vāyvagnisalilādyaistaisstavedādyairanukramāt  prāṇānāyamya mūlasthāṃ kuṇḍalīṃ brahmaraṃdhragām  
ānīya dvādaśāṃtasthasahasrārāmbujodare  ciccandramaṇḍalodbhūtaparamāmṛtadhārayā  
saṃsiktāyāṃ tanau bhūyaśśuddhadehassubhāvanaḥ  sohamityavatīryātha svātmānaṃ hṛdayāmbuje  
ātmanyāveśya cātmānamamṛtaṃ sṛtidhārayā  prāṇapratiṣṭhāṃ vidhivatkuryādatra samāhitaḥ  
ekāgramānaso yogī vimṛśyāttāṃ ca mātṛkām  puṭitāṃ praṇavenātha nyasedbāhye ca mātṛkām  
punaśca saṃyataprāṇaḥ kuryāddṛṣṭyādikaṃ budhaḥ  śaṃkaraṃ saṃsmaraṃścitte saṃnyasecca vimatsaraḥ  
praṇavasya ṛṣirbrahmā devi gāyatramīritam  chandotra devatāhaṃ vai paramātmā sadāśivaḥ  
akāro bījamākhyātamukāraḥ śaktirucyate  makāraḥ kīlakaṃ proktaṃ mokṣārthe viniyujyate  
aṃguṣṭhadvayamārabhya talāṃtaṃ parimārjayet  omityuktvātha deveśi karanyāsaṃ samārabhet  
dakṣahastasthitāṃguṣṭhaṃ samārabhya yathākramam  vāmahastakaniṣṭhāṃtaṃ vinyasetpūrvavatkramāt  
akāramapyukāraṃ ca makāraṃ bindusaṃyutam  namontaṃ procya sarvatra hṛdayādau nyasedatha  
akāraṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya brahmātmānamathācaret  ṅeṃtaṃ namoṃtaṃ hṛdaye viniyujyāttathā punaḥ  
ukāraṃ viṣṇusahitaṃ śirodeśe pravinyaset  makāraṃ rudrasahitaṃ śikhāyāntu pravinyaset  
evamuktvā munirmaṃtrī kavacaṃ netramastake  vinyaseddevadeveśi sāvadhānena cetasā  
aṃgavaktrakalābhedātpaṃca brahmāṇi vinyaset  śirovadanahṛdaguhyapādeṣvetāni vinyaset  
īśānyasya kalāḥ paṃca paṃcasveteṣu ca kramāt  tataścaturṣu vaktreṣu puruṣasya kalā api  
catasraḥ praṇidhātavyāḥ pūrvādikramayogataḥ  hṛtkaṃṭhāṃseṣu nābhau ca kukṣau pṛṣṭhe ca vakṣasi  
aghorasya kalāścāṣṭau pūjanīyā yathākramam  paścāttrayodaśakalāḥ pāyumeḍhrorujānuṣu  
jaṃghāsphikkaṭipārśveṣu vāmadevasya bhāvayet  sadyasyāpi kalā cāṣṭau netreṣu ca yathākramam  
kīrtitāstāḥ kalāścaiva pādayorapi hastayoḥ  prāṇe śirasi bāhvośca kalpayetkalpavittamaḥ  
aṣṭatriṃśatkalānyāsamevaṃ kṛtvā tu sarvaśaḥ  paścātpraṇavaviddhīmānpraṇavanyāsamācaret  bāhudvaye kūrparayostathā ca maṇibandhayoḥ  pārśvatodarajaṃgheṣu pādayoḥ pṛṣṭhatastathā  
itthaṃ praṇavavinyāsaṃ kṛtvā nyāsavicakṣaṇaḥ  haṃsanyāsaṃ prakurvīta paramātmavibodhini  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ saṃnyāsapaddhatau nyāsavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  svavāme caturasraṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ parikalpayet  omityabhyarcya tasmiṃstu śaṃkhamastropaśobhitam  
sthāpya sādhārakaṃ taṃ tu praṇavenārcayettataḥ  āpūryya śuddhatoyena candanādisugaṃdhinā  
abhyarcya gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ praṇavena ca saptadhā  abhimaṃtrya tatastasmindhenumudrāṃ pradarśayet  
śaṃkhamudrāṃ ca purataścaturasraṃ prakalpayet  tadantarerddhacandraṃ ca trikoṇaṃ ca tadantare  
ṣaṭkoṇaṃ vṛttamevedaṃ maṇḍalaṃ parikalpayet  abhyarcya gaṃdhapuṣpādyaiḥ praṇavenātha madhyataḥ  
sādhāramarghyapātraṃ ca sthāpya gaṃdhādinārcayet  āpūryya śuddhatoyena tasminpātre viniḥkṣipet  
kuśāgrāṇyakṣatāścaiva yavavrīhitilānapi  ājyasiddhārtha puṣpāṇi bhasitaṃ ca varānane  
sadyojātādibhirmaṃtraiḥ ṣaḍaṃgaiḥ praṇavena ca  abhyarcya gaṃdhapuṣpādyairabhimaṃtrya ca varmaṇā  
avaguṃṇṭhyāstramaṃtreṇa saṃrakṣārthaṃ pradarśayet  dhenumudrāṃ ca tenaiva prokṣayedastramaṃtrataḥ  
svātmānaṃ gaṃdhapuṣpādipūjopakaraṇānyapi  padmasyeśānadikpadmaṃ praṇavoccārapūrvakam  
gurvāsanāya nama ityāsanaṃ parikalpayet  gurormūrtiṃ ca tatraiva kalpa yedupadeśataḥ  
praṇavaṃ guṃ gurubhyonte namaḥ procyāpi deśikam  samāvāhya tato dhyāyeddakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ sthitam  
suprasannamukhaṃ saumyaṃ śuddhasphaṭikanirmalam  varadābhayahastaṃ ca dvinetraṃ śivavigraham  
evaṃ dhyātvā yajedgandhapuṣpādibhiranukramāt  padmasya nairṛte padme gaṇapatyāsanopari  
mūrtimprakalpya tatraiva gaṇānāṃ tveti maṃtrataḥ  samāvāhya tato devaṃ dhyāyedekā gramānasaḥ  
raktavarṇaṃ mahākāyaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  pāśāṃkuśeṣṭadaśanāndadhānaṅkarapaṅkajaiḥ  
gajānanamprabhuṃ sarvavighnaughaghnamupāsituḥ  evandhyātvā yajedgandhapuṣpādyairupacārakaiḥ  
kadalīnārikelāmraphalalaḍḍukapūrvakam  naivedyaṃ ca samarpyātha namaskuryādgajānanam  
padmasya vāyudikpadme saṃkalpya skāndamāsanam  skandamūrtimprakalpyātha skandamāvāhayedbudhaḥ  
uccāryya skandagāyatrīṃ dhyāyedatha kumārakam  udyadādityasaṃkāśaṃ mayūravaravāhanam  
caturbhujamudārāṅgaṃ mukuṭādivibhūṣitam  varadābhayahastaṃ ca śaktikukkuṭadhāriṇam  
evandhyātvā'tha gaṃdhādyairupacārairanukramāt  saṃpūjya pūrvadvārasya dakṣaśākhāmupāśritam  
antaḥpurādhipaṃ sākṣānnandinaṃ samyagarcayet  cāmīkarācalaprakhyaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  
bālendumukuṭaṃ saumyaṃ trinetraṃ ca caturbhujam  dīptaśūlamṛgīṭaṃkahemavetradharaṃ vibhum  
candrabimbābhavadanaṃ harivaktramathāpi vā  uttarasyāntathā tasya bhāryāṃ ca marutāṃ sutām  
suyaśāṃ suvratāmambāpādamaṇḍanatatparām  saṃpūjya vidhivadgandhapuṣpādyairupacārakaiḥ  
tatassaṃprokṣayetpadmaṃ sāstraśaṃ khodabindubhiḥ  kalpayedāsanaṃ paścādādhārādi yathākramāt  
ādhāraśaktiṃ kalyāṇīṃ śyāmāṃ dhyāyedadho bhuvi  tasyāḥ purastādutkaṃṭhamanantaṃ kuṃḍalākṛtim  
dhavalaṃ paṃcaphaṇinaṃ lelihānamivāmbaram  tasyoparyāsanaṃ bhadraṃ kaṃṭhīravacatuṣpadam  
dharmo jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca padāni vai  āgneyādiśvetapītaraktaśyāmāni varṇataḥ  
adharmādīni pūrvādīnyuttarāṃ tānyanukramāt  rājāvartamaṇiprakhyānyasya gātrāṇi bhāvayet  
adhorddhvacchadanaṃ paścātkaṃdaṃ nālaṃ ca kaṇṭakān  dalādikaṃ karṇikāñca vibhāvya kramaśo'rcayet  
daleṣu siddhayaścāṣṭau kesareṣu ca śaktikāḥ  rudrā vāmādayastvaṣṭau pūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt  
karṇikāyāṃ ca vairāgyaṃ bījeṣu nava śaktayaḥ  vāmādyā eva pūrvādi tadantaśca manonmanī  
kande śivātmako dharmo nāle jñānaṃ śivāśrayam  karṇikopari vāhneyaṃ maṃḍalaṃ sauramaindavam  
ātmavidyā śivākhyaṃ ca tattvatrayamataḥ param  sarvāsanopari sukhaṃ vicitrakusumojjvalam  
paravyomāvakāśākhyaṃ vidyayātīva bhāsvaram  parikalpyāsanaṃ mūrtteḥ puṣpavinyāsa pūrvakam  
ādhāraśaktimārabhya śuddhavidyāsanāvadhi  oṃkārādicaturthyaṃtaṃ nāmamantraṃ namontakam  
uccārya pūjayedvidvānsarvatraivaṃ vidhikramaḥ  aṅgavaktrakalābhedātpaṃcabrahmāṇi pūrvavat  
vinyasetkramaśo mūrttau tattanmudrāvicakṣaṇaḥ  āvāhayettato devaṃ puṣpāñjalipuṭasthitaḥ  
sadyojātamprapadyāmītyārabhyomantamuccaran  ādhārotthitanādaṃ tu dvādaśagrandhibhedataḥ  
brahmarandhāṃtamuccārya dhyāyedoṃkāragocaram  śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ devaṃ niṣkalamakṣaram  
kāraṇaṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvalokamayaṃ param  antarbahiḥ sthitaṃ vyāpya hyaṇoralpaṃ mahattamam  
bhaktānāmaprayatnena dṛśyamīśvaramavyayam  brahmendraviṣṇurudrādyairapi devairagocaram  
vedasārañca vidvadbhiragocaramiti śrutam  āvirmadhyāntarahitaṃ bheṣajaṃ bhavarogiṇām  
samāhitena manasā dhyātvaivaṃ parameśvaram  āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca sannirodhaṃ nirīkṣaṇam  
namaskāraṃ ca kurvīta badhvā mudrāḥ pṛthakpṛthak  dhyāyetsadāśivaṃ sākṣāddevaṃ sakalaniṣkalam  
śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ prasannaṃ śītaladyutim  vidyudvalayasaṃkāśaṃ jaṭāmukuṭabhūṣitam  
śārdūlacarmavasanaṃ kiṃcitsmitamukhāmbujam  raktapadmadalaprakhyapāṇipādatalādharam  
sarvalakṣaṇasampannaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  divyā yudhakarairyuktaṃ divyagandhānulepanam  
pañcavaktrandaśabhujañcandrakhaṇḍaśikhāmaṇim  asya pūrvamukhaṃ saumyaṃ bālārkasadṛśaprabham  
trilocanāravindāḍhyaṃ bālendukṛtaśekharam  dakṣiṇaṃ nīlajīmūtasamānaruciraprabham  
bhrukuṭīkuṭilaṃ ghoraṃ raktavṛttatrilocanam  daṃṣṭrā karālaṃ duṣprekṣyaṃ sphuritādharapallavam  
uttaraṃ vidrumaprakhyaṃ nīlālakavibhūṣitam  sadvilāsantrinayanaṃ candrārddhakṛtaśekharam  
paścimampūrṇacandrābhaṃ locanatritayojjvalam  candralekhādharaṃ saumyaṃ mandasmitamanoharam  
pañcamaṃ sphaṭikaprakhyamindurekhāsamujjvalam  atīvasaumyamutphullalocanatritayojjvalam  
dakṣiṇe śūlaparaśuvajrakhaḍgānalojjvalam  
pūrvve pinākanārācaghaṇṭā pāśāṃkuśojjvalam  nivṛttyājānuparyyaṃtamānābhi ca pratiṣṭhayā  
ākaṇṭhaṃ vidyayā tadvadālalāṭaṃ tu śāntayā  tadūrdhvaṃ śāntyatītākhyakalayā parayā tathā  
pañcādhvavyāpinaṃ tasmātkalāpañcakavigraham  īśānamukuṭaṃ devampuruṣākhyampurātanam  
aghorahṛdayaṃ tadvadvāmaguhyaṃ maheśvaram  sadyojātaṃ ca tanmūrtimaṣṭatriṃśatkalāmayam  
mātṛkāmayamīśānampañcabrahmamayantathā  oṃkārākhyamayaṃ caiva haṃsanyāsamayantathā  
pañcākṣaramayandevaṃ ṣaḍakṣaramayantathā  aṅgaṣaṭkamayañcaiva jātiṣaṭkasamanvitam  
evandhyātvātha madvāmabhāge tvāṃ ca manonmanīm  gaurī mimāya mantreṇa praṇavādyena bhaktitaḥ  
āvāhya pūrvavatkuryānnamaskārāṃtamī śvari  dhyāyettatastvāṃ deveśi samāhitamanā muniḥ  
praphullotpalapatrābhāṃ vistīrṇāyatalocanām  pūrṇacandrābhavadanānnīla kuṃcitamūrddhajām  
nīlotpaladalaprakhyāñcandrārdhakṛtaśekharām  ativṛttaghanottuṃgasnigdhapīnapayodharām  
tanumadhyāmpṛthuśroṇīmpītasūkṣmatarāmbarām  sarvābharaṇasampannāṃ lalāṭatilakojjvalām  
vicitrapuṣpasaṃkīrṇakeśapāśopaśobhitām  sarvato'nuguṇākārāṃ kiṃcillajjānatānanām  
hemāravindaṃ vilasaddadhānāṃ dakṣiṇe kare  caṇḍavaccāmaraṃ hastaṃ nyasyāsīnāṃ sukhāsane  
evammāntvāṃ ca deveśi dhyātvā niyatamānasaḥ  snāpayecchaṃkhatoyena praṇavaprokṣaṇakramāt  
bhave bhave nātibhava iti pādyamprakalpayet  vāmāya nama ityuktvā dadyādācamanīyakam  
jyeṣṭhāya nama ityuktvā śubhravastramprakalpayet  śreṣṭhāya nama ityuktvā dadyādyajñopavītakam  
rudrāya nama ityuktvā punarācamanīyakam  kālāya nama ityuktvā gandhandadyātsusaṃskṛtam  
kalāvikaraṇāya namo'kṣataṃ ca parikalpayet  balavikaraṇāya nama iti puṣpāṇi dāpayet  
balāya nama ityuktvā dhūpandadyātpra yatnataḥ  balapramathanāyeti sudīpaṃ caiva dāpayet  
brahmabhiśca ṣaḍaṃgaiśca tato mātṛkayā saha  praṇavena śivenaiva śaktiyuktena ca kramāt  
mudrāḥ pradarśayenmahyantubhyañca varavarṇini  mayi prakalpayetpūrvamupacārāṃstatastvayi  
yadā tvayi prakurvīta strīliṃgaṃ yojayettadā  iyāneva hi bhedo'sti nānyaḥ pārvati kaścana  
evandhyānampūjanaṃ ca kṛtvā samyagvidhānataḥ  mamāvaraṇapūjāṃ ca prārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāśasaṃhitāyāṃ śivadhyānapūjanavarṇanaṃ nāma saptamo'dhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  atrāsti ca mahādevi khalvāvaraṇapaṃcakam  paṃcāvaraṇapūjāntu prārabheta yathākramam  
prathamampūjitau yatra tatraiva kramaśassudhīḥ  gandhādyairarcayetpūrvaṃ devau heraṃbaṣaṇmukhau  
paṃca brahmāṇi parito vṛtte sampūjayetkramāt  īśānadeśe pūrve ca dakṣiṇe cottare tathā  
paścime ca tatastasminṣaḍaṃgāni samarcayeta  āgneye ca tathaiśāne nairṛte vāyudeśake  
madhye netrantadvadastrampūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt  prathamāvaraṇamproktaṃ dvitīyāvaraṇaṃ śṛṇu  
anantampūrvadikpatre sūkṣmandakṣiṇatastathā  śivottamaṃ paścimata ekanetrantathottare  
ekarudrantathaiśāne trimūrtiṃ vahnidigdale  śrīkaṇṭhaṃ nairṛte vāyau śikhaṇḍīśaṃ samarcayet  
dvitīyāvaraṇe caiva pūjyāste cakravartinaḥ  pūrvadvārasya madhye tu vṛṣeśānamprapūjayet  
taddakṣiṇe nandinañca mahākālantaduttare  bhṛṃgīśandakṣiṇadvārapaścime samprapūjayet  
tatpūrvakoṣṭhe gandhādyaissamprapūjya vināyakam  paścimottarakoṣṭhe ca vṛṣabhandakṣiṇe guham  
uttaradvārapūrve tu pradakṣiṇavidhānataḥ  nāmāṣṭakavidhānena pūjayeducyate hi tat  
bhavaṃ śarvaṃ tatheśānaṃ rudrampaśupatimpunaḥ  ugrambhīmammahādevantṛtīyāvaraṇantvidam  
yo vedādau svara iti samāvāhya maheśvaram  pūjayetpūrvadigbhāge kamale karṇikopari  
īśvarampūrvadikpatre viśveśandakṣiṇe tataḥ  saumye tu parameśānaṃ sarveśampa ścime yajet  
dakṣiṇe tu yajedrudramāvorājānamityṛcā  āvāhya gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ karṇikāyāndaleṣu ca  
śivaḥ pūrve dakṣiṇato hara uttarato mṛḍaḥ  bhavaḥ paścimadikpatre pūjyā ete yathākramam  
uttare viṣṇumāvāhya gandhapuṣpādibhiryajet  pratadviṣṇuriti procya karṇikāyāndaleṣu ca  
vāsudevampūrvabhāge dakṣiṇe cāniruddhakam  saumye saṃkarṣaṇañcaiva pradyumnampaścime yajet  
brahmāṇampaścime padme samāvāhya samarcayet  hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartata iti maṃtreṇa maṃtravit  
hiraṇyagarbhaṃ pūrvasyāṃ virājandakṣiṇe tataḥ  uttare puṣkarañcaiva kālampaścimato yajet  
sarvorddhvapaṃktau pūrvādipradakṣiṇavidhānataḥ  tattatsthāneṣu saṃpūjya lokapālānanukramāt  
rāntaṃpāntaṃ tathā jñāntaṃ lāntaṃ lāntamapūrvakam  ṣāntaṃ sāntañca vedādyaṃ śrībījañca daśakramāt  
bījāni lokapālānāmetairetānsamarcayet  nairṛte cottare tadvadīśānasya ca dakṣiṇe  
brahma viṣṇū ca vidhinā pūjayedupacārakaiḥ  bāhyarekhāsu deveśampañcamāvaraṇe yajet  
śrīmattriśūlamīśāne vajraṃ māhendradiṅmukhe  paraśuṃ vahnidigbhāge yāmye sāyakamarcayet  
nairṛte tu yajetkhaḍgampāśaṃ varuṇagocare  aṃkuśaṃ mārute bhāge pinākaṃ cottare yajet  
paścimābhimukhaṃ raudraṃ kṣetrapālaṃ samarcayet  yathāvidhi vidhānajñaśśivaprītyarthameva ca  
kṛtāñjalipuṭāssarve cintyāḥ smitamukhāmbujāḥ  sādaraṃ prekṣamāṇāśca devaṃ devīñca sarvadā  
itthamāvaraṇābhyarcāṃ kṛtvā vikṣepaśāntaye  punarabhyarcya deveśampraṇavaṃ ca śivaṃ vadet  
evamabhyarcya vidhivadgandhādyairupacārakaiḥ  upacaryya tato dadyānnaivedyaṃ vidhisādhitam  
punarācamanīyaṃ ca dadyādarghyaṃ yathā purā  tato nivedya pānīyantāmbūlaṃ copadeśataḥ  
nīrājanādikaṃ kṛtvā pūjāśeṣaṃ samāpayet  dhyātvā devaṃ ca devīñca manumaṣṭottaraṃ japet  
tata utthāya racitapuṣpāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ  japeddhyātvā mahādevaṃ yo devānāmiti kramāt  
yo vedādau svaraḥ prokta ityaṃtamparameśvari  puṣpāñjalintato dattvā triḥ pradakṣiṇamācaret  
sāṣṭāṃgampraṇamettaṃ sa bhaktyā paramayānvitaḥ  punaḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā praṇametpunarekadhā  
sthitvāsane samabhyarcya devaṃ nāmāṣṭakena ca  sādhu vāsādhu vā karma yadyadācaritaṃ mayā  
tatsarvaṃ bhagavañchambho bhavadārādhanamparam  iti śaṃkhodakenaiva sapuṣpeṇa samarpayet  
pūjyaṃ punassamabhyarcya sārthaṃ nāmāṣṭakaṃ japet  tadeva śṛṇu deveśi saṃbruve tava bhaktitaḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāmāvaraṇapūjāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭamo'dhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  śivo maheśvaraścaiva rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ  saṃsāravaidyassarvajñaḥ paramātmeti mukhyataḥ  
nāmāṣṭakamidaṃ nityaṃ śivasya pratipādakam  ādyantapañcakantatra śāntyatītādyanukramāt  
saṃjñā sahāśivādīnāṃ pañcopādhiparigrahāt  upādhivinivṛttau tu yathāsvaṃ vini vartate  
padameva hitaṃ nityamanityāḥ padinaḥ smṛtāḥ  padānāṃ parivṛtti syānmucyaṃte padino yataḥ  
parivṛttyantare tvevaṃ bhūyastasyāpyupādhinā  ātmāntarābhidhānaṃ syātpādādyaṃ nāmapaṃcakam  
anyattu tritayaṃ nāmnāmupādānādibhedataḥ  trividhopādhiracanācchiva eva tu vartate  
anādimalasaṃśleṣaprāgabhāvātsvabhāvataḥ  atyantapariśuddhātmetyato'yaṃ śiva ucyate  
athavā'śeṣakalyāṇaguṇaikaghana īśvaraḥ  śiva ityucyate sadbhiśśivatattvārthavedibhiḥ  
trayoviṃśatitatvebhyaḥ parāprakṛtirucyate  prakṛtestu paramprāhuḥ puruṣampañcaviṃśakam  
yadvedādau svaramprāhurvācyavācakabhāvataḥ  vedaikavedyaṃ yāthātmyādvedānte ca pratiṣṭhitam  
sa eva prakṛtau līno bhoktā yaḥ prakṛteryataḥ  tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ parassa maheśvaraḥ  
tadadhīnapravṛttittvātprakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca  athavā triguṇantattvaṃ māyeyamidamavyayam  
māyāntu prakṛtimvidyānmāyinantu maheśvaram  māyāvimocako'nantomaheśvarasamanvayāt  
ru dduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaheturvā taddrāvayati yaḥ prabhuḥ  rudra ityucyate tasmācchivaḥ paramakāraṇam  
śivatattvādibhūmyantaṃ śarīrādi ghaṭādi ca  vyāpyādhitiṣṭhati śivastamādviṣṇurudāhṛtaḥ  
jagataḥ pitṛbhūtānāṃ śivo mūrtyātmanāmapi   pitṛbhāvena sarveṣāṃ pitāmaha udīritaḥ  
nidānajño yathā vaidyo rogasya nivartakaḥ  upāyairbheṣajaistadvallayabhogādhikārakaḥ  
saṃsārasyeśvaro nityaṃ sthūlasya vinivartakaḥ  saṃsāra vaidya ityuktassarvatattvārthavedibhiḥ  
daśārddhajñānasiddhyarthamindriyeṣu ca satsvapi  trikālabhāvino bhāvānsthūlānsūkṣmānaśeṣataḥ  
aṇavo naiva jānanti māyārṇavamalāvṛtāḥ  asatsvapi ca sarveṣu siddhasarvārthavediṣu  
yadyathāvasthitaṃ vastu tattathaiva sadāśivaḥ  ayatnenaiva jānāti tasmātsarvajña ucyate  
sarvātmā paramairebhirguṇairnityasamanvayāt  svasmātparātmavirahātparamātmā śivassvayam  
iti stutvā mahādevaṃ praṇavātmānamavyayam  dattvā parāṅmukhādyañca paścādīśānamastake  
punararcya deveśampraṇavena samāhitaḥ  hastena baddhāñjalinā pūjāpuṣpampragṛhya ca  
unmanāntaṃ śivaṃ nītvā vāmanāsāpuṭādhvanā  devomudvāsya ca tato dakṣanāsāpuṭādhvanā  
śiva evāhamasmīti tadaikyamanubhūya ca  sarvāvaraṇadevāṃśca punarudvāsayeddhṛdi  
vidyāpūjāṃ guroḥpūjāṃ kṛtvā paścādyathākramam  śaṃkhārghapātramaṃtrāṃśca hṛdaye vinyasetkramāt  
nirmālyañca samarpyā'tha caṇḍeśāyeśagocare  punaśca saṃyataprāṇa ṛṣyādikamathoccaret  
kailāsaprastaro nāma maṇḍalamparibhāṣitam  arcayennityamevaitatpakṣe vā māsimāsi vā  
ṣaṇmāse vatsare vāpi cāturmāsyādiparvaṇi  avaśyañca samabhyarcennityaṃ malliṅgamāstikaḥ  
tasminkrame mahādevi viśeṣaḥ ko'pi kathyate  upadeśadine liṃgampūjitaṃ guruṇā saha  
gṛhṇīyādarcayiṣyāmi śivamāprāṇasaṃkṣayam  evantrivāramuccāryya śapathaṃ gurusannidhau  
tatassamarcayennityampūrvoktavidhinā priye  arghaṃ samarpayelliṃgamūrddhanyarghyodakena ca  
praṇavena samabhyarcya dhūpadīpau samarpayet  aiśānyāṃ caṇḍamārādhya nirmālyañca nivedayet  
prakṣālya lliṃgamvedīñca vastrapūtairjalaistataḥ  niḥkṣipya puṣpaṃ śirasi liṃgasya praṇavena tu  
ādhāraśaktimārabhya śuddhavidyāsanāvadhi  vibhāvya sarvaṃ manasā sthāpayetparameśvaram  
pañcagavyādibhirdravyairyathāvibhavasambhṛtaiḥ  kevalairvā jalaiśśuddhaissurabhi dravyavāsitaiḥ  
pāvamānena rudreṇa nīlena tvaritena ca  ṛgbhiśca sāmabhirvāpi brahmabhiścaiva pañcabhiḥ  
snāpayeddevadeveśaṃ praṇavena śivena ca  viśeṣārghyodakenāpi praṇavenābhiṣecayet  
viśodhya vāsasā puṣpaṃ liṃgamūrddhani vinyaset  pīṭhe liṃgaṃ samāropya sūryādyarcāṃ samācaret  
ādhāraśaktyanantau dvau pīṭhādhastātsamarcayet  siṃhāsanantadūrdhvantu samabhyarcya yathākramam  
athordhvacchadanampīṭhapāde skandaṃ samarcayet  liṃge mūrtiṃ samākalpya māntvayā saha pūjayet  
samyag bhaktyā vidhānena yatirmaddhyānatatparaḥ  evammayā te kathitamatiguhyamidampriye  
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena na deyaṃ yasya kasya cit  mama bhaktāya dātavyaṃ yataye vītarāgiṇe  
gurubhaktāya śāntāya madarthe yogabhāgine  mamājñāmatilaṃghyaitadyo dadāti vimūḍhadhīḥ  
sa nārakī mama drohī bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ  madbhaktadānāddeveśi matpriyaśca bhaveddhruvam  iha bhuktvākhilānbhogānmatsānnidhyamavāpnuyāt  
vyāsa uvāca  etacchutvā mahādevī mahādevena bhāṣitam  stutvā tu vividhaiḥ stotrairdevamvedārthagarvitaiḥ  
śrīmatpādābjayoḥ patyuḥ praṇavaṃ parameśvarī  atiprahṛṣṭahṛdayā mumoda munisattamāḥ  
atiguhyamidamviprāḥ praṇavārthaprakāśakam  śivajñānaparaṃ hyetadbhavatāmārtināśanam  
sūta uvāca  ityuktvā muniśārdūlaḥ parāśaryyo mahātapāḥ  pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā munibhirvedavādibhiḥ  
kailāsādrimanusṛtya yayau tasmāttapovanāt  te'pi prahṛṣṭahṛdayāssatrānte parameśvaram  
sampūjya parayā bhaktyā somaṃ somārddhaśekharam  yamādiyoganiratāśśivadhyānaparābhavan  
guhāya kathitaṃ hyetaddevyā tenāpi nandine  sanatkumāramunaye provāca bhagavān hi saḥ  
tasmāllabdhaṃ madguruṇā vyāsenāmitatejasā  tasmāllabdhamidampuṇyammayāpi munipuṃgavāḥ  
mayā vaśśrāvitaṃ hyetadguhyādguhyataramparam  jñātvā śivapriyānbhaktyā bhavato giriśapriyam  
bhavadbhirapi dātavyametadguhyaṃ śivapriyam  yatibhyaśśāntacittebhyo bhaktebhyaśśivapādayoḥ  
etaduktvā mahābhāgassūtaḥ paurāṇikottamaḥ  tīrthayātrāprasaṃgena cacāra pṛthivīmimām  
etadrahasyamparamaṃ labdhvā sūtānmunīśvarāḥ  kāśyāmeva samāsīnā muktāśśivapadaṃ yayuḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ praṇavārthapaddhativarṇanaṃ nāma navamo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  gate'tha sūte munayassuvismitā vicintya cānyonyamidantu vismṛtam  yadvāmadevasya matanmunīśvara pratyūcitantatkhalu naṣṭamadya naḥ  
kadānubhūyānmunivaryadarśanambhāvābdhiduḥkhaughaharamparaṃ hi tat  maheśvarārādhanapuṇyato'dhunā munīśvarassatvaramāvirastu naḥ  
iti cintāsamāviṣṭā munayo munipuṃgavam  vyāsaṃ saṃpūjya hṛtpadme tasthustaddaśarnotsukāḥ  
samvatsarānte sa punaḥ kāśīmprāpa mahāmuniḥ  śivabhaktirato jñānī purāṇārthaprakāśakaḥ  
tandṛṣṭvā sūtamāyāntammunayo hṛṣṭacetasaḥ  abhyutthānāsanārghyādipūjayā samapūjayan  
sopi tānmuniśārdūlānabhinandya smitodaram  prītyā snātvā jāhnavīye jale paramapāvane  
ṛṣīnsaṃtarpya ca surānpitṝṃśca tilataṇḍulaiḥ  tīramāgatya samprokṣya vāsasī paridhāya ca  
dvirācamya samādāya bhasma sadyādimaṃtrataḥ  uddhūlanādikramato vidhāryyā'tha munīśvaraḥ  
rudrākṣamālābharaṇaḥ kṛtanityakriyassudhī  yathoktāṃgeṣu vidhinā tripuṇḍraṃ racati sma ha  
viśveśvaramumākāntaṃ sasutaṃ sagaṇādhipam  pūjayāmāsa sadbhaktyā hyastau nnatvā muhurmuhuḥ  
kālabhairavanāthaṃ ca saṃpūjyātha vidhānataḥ  pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punastredhā natvā ca paṃcadhā  
punaḥ pradakṣiṇī kṛtya praṇamya bhuvi daṇḍavat  tuṣṭāva parayā stutyā saṃsmaraṃstatpadāmbujam  
śrīmatpaṃcākṣarīmvidyāmaṣṭottarasahasrakam  saṃjapya purataḥ sthitvā kṣamāpayya maheśvaram  
caṇḍeśaṃ samprapūjyā'tha muktimaṇḍapamadhyataḥ  nirddiṣṭamāsanaṃ bheje munibhirvedapāragaiḥ  
evaṃ sthiteṣu sarveṣu namaskṛtya samaṃtrakam  atha prāha munīndrāṇāṃ bhāvavṛddhikaramvaca  
sūta kṛtaḥ  dhanyā yūyaṃ mahāprājñā munayaśśaṃsitavratāḥ  bhavadarthamiha prāpto'hantadvṛttamidaṃ śṛṇu  
yadāhamupadiśyātha bhavataḥ praṇavārthakam  gatastīrthāṭanārthāya tadvṛttāntambravīmi vaḥ  
ito nirgatya samprāpya tīraṃ dakṣapayonidheḥ  snātvā sampūjya vidhivaddevīṃ kanyāmayīṃ śivām  punarāgatya viprendrāssuvarṇamukharītaṭam  
śrīkālahastiśailākhyanagare paramādbhute  suvarṇamukharītoye snātvā devānṛṣīnapi  
santarpya vidhivadbhaktyā samudaṃ giriśaṃ smaran  samarcya kālahastīśaṃ candrakāṃtasamaprabham  
paścimābhimukhampaṃcaśirasamparamādbhutam  sakṛddarśanamātreṇa sarvāghakṣayakāraṇam  
sarvasiddhipradambhuktimuktidantriguṇeśvaram  tataśca parayā bhaktyā tasya dakṣiṇagāṃ śivām  
jñānaprasūnakalikāṃ samarcya hi jagatprasūm  śrīmatpaṃcākṣarīṃ vidyāmaṣṭottarasahasrakam  
japtvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya stutvā natvā muhurmuhuḥ  
tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya girimpratyahamādarāt  āmodatīva manasi pratyahanniyamāsthitaḥ  
anayañcaturo māsānevantatra munīśvarāḥ  jñānaprasūnakalikā mahādevyāḥ prasādataḥ  
ekadā tu samāstīrya cailājinakuśottaram  āsanamparamantasminsthitvā ruddhendriyo muni  
samādhimāsthāya sadā paramānaṃdaciddhanaḥ  paripūrṇaśśivosmīti nirvyagrahṛdayo'bhavam  
etasminneva samaye sadguruḥ karuṇānidhiḥ  nīlajīmūtasaṅkāśo vidyutpiṅgajaṭādharaḥ  
prāṃśuḥ kamaṇḍalūddaṇḍakṛṣṇājinadharassvayam  bhasmāvadātasarvāṅgassarvalakṣaṇalakṣitaḥ  
tripuṇḍravilasadbhālo rudrākṣālaṅkṛtākṛtiḥ  padmapatrāruṇāyāmavistīrṇanayanadvayaḥ  
prādurbhūya hṛdambhoje tadānīmeva satvaram  vimohitastadaivāsametadadbhutamāstikāḥ  
tata unmīlya nayane vilāpaṃ kṛtavānaham  āsīnmamāśrupātaśca girinirjharasannibhaḥ  
etasminneva samaye śrutā vāgaśarīriṇī  vyomno mahādbhutā viprāstāmeva śṛṇutādarāt  
sūtaputra mahābhāga gaccha vārāṇasīmpurīm  tatrāsanmunayaḥ pūrvamupadiṣṭāstvayā'dhunā  
tvadupāgamakalyāṇaṃ kāṃkṣaṃte vivaśā bhṛśam  tiṣṭhanti te nirāhārā ityuktvā virarāma sā  
tata utthāya tarasā devandevīñca bhaktitaḥ  pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ praṇamya bhuvi daṇḍavat  
dviṣaḍvāraṃ gurorājñāṃ vijñāya śivayoratha  kṣetrānnirgatya tarasā catvāriṃśaddināntare  
āgato'smi muniśreṣṭhā anugṛhṇantu māmiha  mayā kimadya vaktavyaṃ bhavantastadbruvantu me  
iti sūtavacaśśrutvā ṛṣayo hṛṣṭamānasāḥ  avocanmuniśārdūlaṃ vyāsannatvā muhurmuhuḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ sūtopadeśo nāma daśamo'dhyāyaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta sūta mahābhāgastvamasmadgururuttamaḥ  atastvāṃ paripṛcchāmo bhavato'nugraho yadi  
śraddhāluṣu ca śiṣyeṣu tvādṛśā guravassadā  snigdhabhāvā itīdaṃ no darśitambhavatādhunā  
virajāhomasamaye vāmadevamatampurā  sūcitambhavatāsmābhirna śrutaṃ vistarānmune  
tadidānīṃ śrotukāmāḥ śraddhayā paramādarāt  vayaṃ sarvve kṛpāsiṃdho prītyā tadvaktumarhasi  
iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sūto hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ  namaskṛtya mahādevaṃ guroḥ parataraṃ gurum  
mahādevīṃ trijananīṃ guruṃ vyāsaśca bhaktitaḥ  prāha gambhīrayā vācā munīnāhlādayannidam  
sūta uvāca  svastyastu munayassarve sukhina ssantu sarvvadā  śivabhaktā sthirātmānaśśive bhaktipravartakāḥ  
tadatīva vicitraṃ hi śrutaṃ gurumukhāmbujāt  itaḥ pūrvammayā noktaṃ guhyaprākaṭyaśaṃkayā  
yūyaṃ khalu mahābhāgāśśivabhaktā dṛḍhavratāḥ  iti niścitya yuṣmākaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatāmmudā  
purā rathantare kalpe vāmadevo mahāmuniḥ  garbhamuktaśśivajñānavidāṃ gurutamassvayam  
vedāgamapurāṇādisarvvaśāstrārthavattvavit  devāsuramanuṣyādijīvānāṃ janmakarmmavit  
bhasmāvadātasarvvāṃgo jaṭāmaṇḍalalamaṃḍitaḥ  nirāśrayo niḥspṛhaśca nirdvandvo nirahaṃkṛtiḥ  
digaṃbaro mahājñānī maheśvara ivāparaḥ  śiṣyabhūtairmunīndraiśca tādṛśaiḥ parivāritaḥ  
paryyaṭanpṛthivīmetāṃ svapāda sparśapuṇyataḥ  pavitrayanpare dhāmni nimagnahṛdayonvaham  
kumāraśikharammerorddakṣiṇaṃ prāviśanmudā  yatrāste bhagavānīśatana yaśśikhivāhanaḥ  
jñānaśaktidharo vīrassarvāsuravimardanaḥ  gajāvallīsamāyuktassarvvairdevairnamaskṛtaḥ  
tatra skandasaro nāma sarassāgarasannibham  śiśirasvādupānīyaṃ svacchāgādhabahūdakam  
sarvvāścaryyaguṇopetaṃ vidyate svāmisannidhau  tatra snātvā vāmadevassahaśiṣyairmahāmuniḥ  
kumāraṃ śikharāsīnaṃ munivṛndaniṣevitam  udyadādityasaṃkāśaṃ mayūravaravāhanam  
caturbhujamudārāṃgaṃ mukuṭādivibhūṣitam  śaktiratnadvayopāsyaṃ śaktikukkuṭadhāriṇam  
varadābhayahastañca dṛṣṭvā skandaṃ munīśvaraḥ  sampūjya parayā bhaktyā stotuṃ samupacakrame  
 vāmadeva uvāca  oṃ namaḥ praṇavārthāya praṇavārthavidhāyine  praṇavākṣarabījāya praṇa vāya namonamaḥ  
vedāntārthasvarūpāya vedāntārthavidhāyine  vedāntārthavide nityaṃ viditāya namonamaḥ  
namo guhāya bhūtānāṃ guhāsu nihitāya ca  guhyāya guhyarūpāya guhyāgamavide namaḥ  
aṇoraṇīyase tubhyaṃ mahatopi mahīyase  namaḥ parāvarajñāya paramātmasvarūpiṇe  
skandāya skandarūpāya mihirāruṇetejase  namo mandāramālodyanmukuṭādibhṛte sadā  
śivaśiṣyāya putrāya śivasya śivadāyine  śivapriyāya śivayorānandanidhaye nama  
gāṃgeyāya namastubhyaṃ kārtikeyāya dhīmate  umāputrāya mahate śarakānanaśāyine  
ṣaḍakṣaraśarīrāya ṣaḍvidhārthavidhāyine  ṣaḍadhvātītarūpāya ṣaṇmukhāya namonamaḥ  
dvādaśāyatanetrāya dvādaśodyatabāhave  dvādaśāyudhadhārāya dvādaśātmannamostu te  
caturbhujāya śāntāya śaktikukkuṭa dhāriṇe  varadāya vihastāya namo'suravidāriṇe  
gajāvallīkucāliptakuṃkumāṃkitavakṣase  namo gajānanānandamahi mānaṃditātmane  
brahmādidevamunikinnaragīyamānagāthāviśeṣaśuciciṃtitakīrttidhāmne  vṛndārakāmalakirīṭavibhūṣaṇasrakpūjyābhirāmapadapaṃkaja te namostu  
iti skandastavandivyaṃ vāmadevena bhāṣitam  yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti paramāṃ gatim  
mahāprajñākaraṃ hyetacchivabhaktivivarddhanam  āyurārogyadhanakṛtsarvvakāmapradaṃ sadā  
iti stutvā vāmadevo devaṃ senāpatiṃ prabhum  pradakṣiṇātrayaṃ kṛtvā praṇamya bhuvi daṇḍavat  
sāṣṭāṃgaṃ ca punaḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇanamaskṛtam  abhavatpārśvatastasya vinayāvanato dvijāḥ  
vāmadevakṛtaṃ stotramparamārthavijṛmbhitam  śrutvābhavatprasanno hi mahe śvarasutaḥ prabhuḥ  
tamuvāca mahāsenaḥ prītosmi tava pūjayā  bhaktyā stutyā ca bhadrante kimadyakaravāṇyaham  
mune tvaṃ yoginānmukhyaḥ paripūrṇaśca nispṛhaḥ  bhavādṛśāṃ hi lokesmiprārthanīyaṃ na vidyate  
tathāpi dharmmarakṣāyai lokānugrahakāṃkṣayā  tvādṛśā sādhavassanto vicaranti mahītale  
śrotavyamasti cedbrahmanvaktumarhasi sāmpratam  tadidānīmahaṃ vakṣye lokānugrahahe tave  
iti skandavacaḥ śrutvā vāmadevo mahāmuniḥ  praśrayāvanataḥ prāha meghagambhīrayā girā  
vāmadeva uvāca   bhagavanparameśastvaṃ parāparavibhūtidaḥ  sarvvajñasarvakarttā ca sarvvaśaktidharaḥ prabhuḥ  
jīvā vayaṃ tu te vaktuṃ sannidhau parameśituḥ  tathāpyanugraho yante yattvaṃ vadasi māṃ prati  
kṛtārthohaṃ mahāprājña vijñānakaṇamātrataḥ  preritaḥ paripṛcchāmi kṣantavyotikramo mama  
praṇavo hi paraḥ sākṣātparameśvaravācakaḥ  vācyaḥ paśupatirdevaḥ paśūnāṃ pāśamocakaḥ  
vācakena samāhūtaḥ paśūnmocayate kṣaṇāt  tasmādvācakatāsiddhiḥ praṇavena śivamprati  
oṃ mitīdaṃ sarvamiti śrutirāha sanātanī  omiti brahma sarvvaṃ hi brahmeti ca samabravīt  
devasenāpate tubhyandevānāmpataye namaḥ  namo yatīnāmpataye paripūrṇāya te namaḥ  
evaṃ sthite jagatyasmiñchivādanyanna vidyate  sarvvarūpadharaḥ svāmī śivo vyāpī maheśvaraḥ  
samaṣṭivyaṣṭibhāvena praṇavārthaḥ śruto mayā  na jātucinmahāsena saṃprāptastvādṛśo guruḥ  
ataḥ kṛtvānukaṃpāṃ vai tamarthaṃ vaktumarhasi  upadeśavidhānena sadācārakrameṇa ca  
svāmyekaḥ sarbvajantūnāṃ pāśacchedakaro guruḥ  atastvatkṛpayā so'rthaḥ śrotavyo hi mayā guro  
iti sa muninā pṛṣṭaḥ skandaḥ praṇamya sadāśivaṃ praṇavavapuṣaṃ sāṣṭatriṃśatkalāvaralakṣitam  sahitamumayā śaśvatpārśve munipravarānvitaṃ gaditumupacakrāma śreyaḥ śrutiṣvapi gopitam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ vāmadevabrahmavarṇanannāmaikādaśo'yāya  
śrībrahmaṇya uvāca  sādhusādhu mahābhāga vāmadeva munīśvara  tvamatīva śive bhaktaśśvijñānavatāṃvaraḥ  
tvayā tvaviditaṃ kiṃcinnā sti lokeṣu kutracit  tathāpi tava vakṣyāmi lokānugrahakāriṇaḥ  
lokesminpaśavassarvve nānāśāstravimohitāḥ  vañcitāḥ parameśasya māyayātivicitrayā  
na jānati paraṃ sākṣātpraṇavārthammaheśvaram  saguṇannirguṇaṃ brahma tridevajanakamparam  
dakṣiṇambāhumuddhṛtya śapathamprabravīmi te  satyaṃ satyaṃ punassatyaṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ  
praṇavārthaśśivaḥ sākṣātprādhānyena prakīrttitaḥ   śrutiṣu smṛtiśāstreṣu purāṇeṣvāgameṣu ca  
yato vāco nivarttante aprāpya manasā saha  ānandaṃ yasya ve vidvānna bibheti kutaśca na  
yasmājjagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vidhiviṣṇvindrapūrvakam  saha bhūtendriyagrāmaiḥ prathamaṃ samprasūyate  
na samprasūyate yo vai kutaścana kadācana  yasminna bhāsate vidyunna na sūryo na candramāḥ  
yasya bhāso vibhātīdañjagatsarvaṃ samantataḥ  sarvvaiśvaryyeṇa sampanno nāmnā sarvveśvarassvayam  
yo vai mumukṣubhirdhyeyaḥ śambhurākāśamadhyagaḥ  sarvavyāpī prakāśātmā bhāsarūpo hi cinmayaḥ  
yasya puṃsaḥ parā śaktirbhāvagamyā manoharā  nirguṇā svaguṇaireva nigūḍhā niṣkalā śivā  
tadīyantrividhaṃrūpaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ parantataḥ  dhyeyaṃ mumukṣubhirnityaṃ kramato yogibhirmune  
niṣkalassarvvadevānāmādidevassanātanaḥ  jñānakriyāsvabhāvo yaḥ para mātmeti gīyate  
tasya devādhidevasya mūrttissākṣātsadāśivaḥ  pañcamaṃtratanurdevaḥ kalāpañcakavigrahaḥ  
śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaḥ prasannaḥ śītaladyutiḥ  paṃcavaktro daśabhujastripaṃcanayanaḥ prabhuḥ  
īśānamukuṭopetaḥ puruṣāsyaḥ purātanaḥ  aghorahṛdayo vāmadevaguhyapradeśavān  
sadyapādaśca tanmūrttiḥ sākṣātsakalaniṣkalaḥ  sarvvajñatvādiṣaṭśaktiṣaḍaṃgīkṛtavigrahaḥ  
śabdādiśaktisphuritahṛtpaṃkajavirājitaḥ  svaśaktyā vāmabhāge tu manonmanyā vibhūṣitaḥ  
mantrādiṣaḍvidhārthānāmarthopanyāsasārgataḥ  samaṣṭivyaṣṭibhāvārthaṃ vakṣyāmi praṇavātmakam  
upadeśakramo hyādau vaktavyaśśrūyatāmayam  cāturvvarṇyaṃ hi lokesminprasiddhammānuṣe mune  
traivarṇikānāmevātra śrutyācārasamanvayaḥ  śuśrūṣāmātrasārā hi śūdrāḥ śrutibahiṣkṛtāḥ  
traivarṇikānāṃ sarvveṣāṃ svasvāśramaratātmanām  śrutismṛtyudito dharmo'nuṣṭheyo nāparaḥ kvacit  
śrutismṛtyuditaṃ karmma kurvva nsiddhimavāpsyati  ityuktamparameśena vedamārgapradarśinā  
varṇāśramācārapuṇyairabhyarcya parameśvaram  tatsāyujyaṃ gatāssarve bahavo munisattamāḥ  
brahmacaryeṇa munayo devā yajñakriyādhvanā  pitaraḥ prajayā tṛptā iti hi śrutirabravīt  
evaṃ ṛṇatrayānmukto vānaprasthāśramaṃ gataḥ  śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhādisahiṣṇurvijitendriyaḥ  
tapasvī vijitāhāro yamāya yogama bhyaset  yathā dṛḍhatarā buddhiravicālyā bhavettathā  
evaṃ krameṇa śuddhātmā sarvvakarmmāṇi vinyaset  sanyasya sarvvakarmmāṇi jñānapūjāparo bhavet  
sā hi sākṣācchivaikyena jīvanmuktiphalapradā  sarvvottamā hi vijñeyā nirvikārā yatātma nām  
tatprakāramahaṃ vakṣye lokānugrahakāmyayā  tava stehānmahāprājña sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
sarvvaśāstrārthatattvajñaṃ vedāṃtajñānapāragam  ācāryyamupagacchetsa yatirmmatimatāṃ varam  
tatsamīpamupavrajya yathāvidhi vicakṣaṇaḥ  dīrghadaṇḍapraṇāmādyaistoṣayedyatnatassudhīḥ  
yo gurussa śivaḥ prokto yaśśivassa gurussmṛtaḥ  iti niścitya manasā svavicārannivedayet  
labdhānujñastu guruṇā dvādaśāhaṃ payovratī  śuklapakṣe caturthyāṃ vā daśamyāṃ vā vidhānataḥ  
prātaḥ snātvā viśuddhātmā kṛtanitya kriyassudhīḥ  gurumāhūya vidhinā nāṃdīśrāddhaṃ samārabhet  
viśvedevāḥ satyavasusaṃjñāvaṃtaḥ prakīrttitāḥ  devaśrāddhe brahmaviṣṇu maheśāḥ kathitāstrayaḥ  
ṛṣiśrāddhe tu samproktā devakṣetramanuṣyajāḥ  devaśrāddhe tu vasurudrādityāssamprakīrttitāḥ  
catvāro mānuṣaśrāddhe sanakādyā munīśvarāḥ  bhūtaśrāddhe paṃca mahābhūtāni ca tataḥ param  
cakṣurādīndriyagrāmo bhūtagrāmaścaturvidhaḥ  pitṛśrāddhe pitā tasya pitā tasya pitā trayaḥ  
mātṛśrāddhe mātṛpitāmahyau ca prapitāmahī  ātmaśrāddhe tu catvāra ātmā pitṛpitāmahau  
prapitāmahanāmā ca sapatnīkāḥ prakīrttitāḥ  mātāmahātmakaśrāddhe trayo mātāmahādayaḥ  
pratiśrāddhaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yugmaṃ kṛtvopakalpitān  āhūya pādau prakṣālya svayamācamya yatnataḥ  
samastasaṃpatsamavāptihetavaḥ samutthitāpatkuladhūmaketavaḥ  apārasaṃsārasamudrasetavaḥ punantu māṃ brāhmaṇapādareṇavaḥ  
āpaddhanadhvāntasahasrabhānavaḥ samīhitā rthārpaṇakāmadhenavaḥ  samastatīrthāṃbupavitramūrttayo rakṣaṃtu māṃ brāhmaṇapādapāṃsavaḥ  
iti japtvā namaskṛtya sāṣṭāṃgaṃ bhuvi daṇḍavat  sthitvā tu prāṅmukhaḥ śambhoḥ pādābjayugalaṃ smaran  
sapavitrakaraśśuddha upavītī dṛḍhāsanaḥ  prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kuryyā cchrutvātithyādikaṃ punaḥ  
matsaṃnyāsāṃgabhūtaṃ yadviśvedevādikaṃ tathā  śrāddhamaṣṭavidhaṃ mātāmahagataṃ pārvaṇena vai  
vidhānena kariṣyāmi yuṣmadājñāpurassaram  evaṃ vidhāya saṃkalpaṃ darbhānuttaratastyajet  
upaspṛśyāpa utthāya varaṇakramamārabhet  pavitrapāṇiḥ saṃspṛśya pāṇī brāhmaṇayorvadet  
viśvedevārtha ityādi bhavadbhyāṃ kṣaṇa ityapi  
prasādanīya ityantaṃ sarvva traivaṃ vidhikramaḥ  evaṃ samāpya varaṇaṃ maṇḍalāni prakalpayet  
udagārabhya daśa ca kṛtvābhyarcanamakṣataiḥ  teṣu krameṇa saṃsthāpya brāhmaṇānpādayoḥ punaḥ  
viśvedevādināmāni sasaṃvabodhanamuccaret  idaṃ vaḥ pādyamiti sakuśapuṣpākṣatodakaiḥ  
pādyaṃ dattvā svayamapi kṣālitāṃghrirudaṅmukhaḥ  ācamya yugmaklṛptāṃstānāsaneṣūpaveśya ca  
viśvedevasvarūpasya brāhmaṇasyedamāsanam  iti darbhāsanaṃ dattvā darbhapāṇissvayaṃ sthitaḥ  
asminnāndīmukhaśrāddhe viśvedevārtha ityapi  bhavadbhyāṃ kṣaṇa ityuktvā kriyatāmiti saṃvadet  
prāpnutāmiti samprocya bhavantāviti saṃvadet  vadetāṃ prāpnuyāveti tau ca brāhmaṇapuṃgavau  
saṃpūrṇamastu saṃkalpasiddhirastviti tānprati  bhavanto'nugṛhṇaṃtviti prārthayeddvijapuṃgavān  
tataśśuddhakadalyādipātreṣu kṣāliteṣu ca  annādibhojyadravyāṇi dattvā darbhaiḥ pṛthakpṛthak  
paristīryya svayaṃ tatra pariṣicyodakena ca  hastābhyāmavalaṃbyātha pātraṃ pratyekamādarāt  
pṛthivī te pātramityādi kṛtvā tatra vyavasthitān  devādīṃśca caturthyantānanūdyākṣatasaṃyutān  
udaggṛhītvā svāheti devārthe'nnaṃ yajetpunaḥ  na mameti vadedante sarvatrāyaṃ vidhikramaḥ  
yatpādapadmasmaraṇādyasya nāmajapādapi  nyūnaṃ karma bhavetpūrṇantaṃ vande sāmbamīśvaram  
iti japtvā tato brūyānmayā kṛta midaṃ punaḥ  nāndīmukhaśrāddhamiti yathoktaṃ ca vadettataḥ  
asviti brūteti ca tānprasādya dvijapuṃgavān  visṛjya svakarasthodaṃ praṇamya bhuvi daṇḍavat  
utthāya ca tato brūyādamṛtambhavatu dvijān  prārthayecca paraṃ prītyā kṛtāṃjalirudāradhīḥ  
śrīrudraṃ camakaṃ sūktaṃ pauruṣaṃ ca yathāvidhi  citte sadāśivandhyātvā japedbrahmāṇi pañca ca  
bhojanānte rudrasūktaṃ kṣamā payya dvijānmunaḥ  tanmantreṇa tato dadyāduttarāpośaṇaṃ puraḥ  
prakṣālitāṃghrirācamya piṇḍasthānaṃ vrajettataḥ  āsīnaḥ prāṅmukho maunī prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ caret  
nāndīmukhoktaśrāddhāṃgaṃ kariṣye piṇḍadānakam  iti saṃkalpya dakṣādisamārabhyodakānti kam  
nava rekhāḥ samālikhya prāgagrāndvādaśa kramāt  saṃstīryya darbhāndakṣādidevādisthānapañcakam  
tūṣṇīṃ dadyātsākṣatodaṃ triṣu sthāneṣu ca kramāt  sthāneṣvanyeṣu mātṛṣu mārjjayantāstataḥ param  
atreti pitaraḥ paścātsākṣatodaṃ samarcya ca  dadyāttataḥ krameṇaiva devādisthānapañcake  
tattaddevādināmāni caturthyantānyudīryya ca  piṇḍatrayaṃ tato dadyātpratyekaṃ sthānapañcake  
svagṛhyoktena mārgeṇa dadyātpiṇḍānpṛthakpṛthak  dadyādidaṃ sākṣataṃ ca pitṛsāṅguṇyahetave  
dhyāyetsadāśivaṃ devaṃ hṛdayāmbhojamadhyataḥ  tatpādapadmasmaraṇāditi ślokaṃ paṭhanpunaḥ  
namaskṛtya brāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ ca svaśa ktitaḥ  dattvā kṣamāpayya ca tānvisṛjya ca tataḥ kramāt  
piṇḍānutsṛjya gogrāsaṃ dadyānnocejjale kṣipet  puṇyāhavācanaṃ tvāṃ bhuṃjīta svajanaissaha  
anyedyuḥ prātarutthāya kṛtanityakriyassudhīḥ  upoṣya kṣaurakarmādi kakṣopasthavivarjitam  
keśaśmaśrunakhāneva karmmāvadhi visṛjya ca  samāṣṭakeśānvidhivatkārayitvā vidhānataḥ  
snātvā dhautapaṭaśśuddho dvirācamyātha vāgyataḥ  bhasma saṃdhāryya vidhinā kṛtvā puṇyāhavācanam  
tena saṃprokṣya saṃprāpya śuddhadehasvabhāvataḥ  homadravyārthamācāryya dakṣiṇārthaṃ vihāya ca  
dravyajātaṃ maheśāya dvijebhyaśca viśeṣataḥ  bhaktebhyaśca pradāyātha śivāya gururūpiṇe  
vastrādi dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā praṇamya bhuvi daṇḍavat  dorakaupīnavasanaṃ daṇḍācca kṣālitambhuvi  
ādāya homadravyāṇi samidhādīni ca kramāt  samudratīre nadyāṃ vā parvvate vā śivālaye  
araṇye cāpī goṣṭhe vā vicāryya sthānamuttamam  sthitvācamya tataḥ pūrvvaṃ kṛtvā mānasamañjarīm  
brāhmamoṃkārasahitaṃ namo brahmaṇa ityapi  japitvā tristato brūyādagnimīḷe purohitam  
atha mahāvratamiti agnirvai devā nāmataḥ  tathaitasya samāmnāyamiṣetvorjje tvā veti tat  
agna āyāhi vītaye śanno devīrabhiṣṭaye  paścātprocya mayarasatajabhanalagaiḥ saha  
sammitaṃ ca tataḥ pañcasaṃvatsaramayaṃ tataḥ  samāmnāyassamāmnātaḥ atha śikṣāṃ vadetpunaḥ  pravakṣyāmītyudīryātha vṛddhirādaicca samvadet  
athāto dharmajijñāsetyuccārya punaraṃjasā  athāto brahmajijñāsā vedādīnapi saṃjapet  
brahmāṇamindraṃ sūryyañca somaṃ caiva prajāpatim  ātmānamantarātmānaṃ jñānātmānamataḥ param  
paramātmānamapi ca praṇavādyaṃ namoṃtakam  caturthyantaṃ japitvā'tha saktumuṣṭiṃ pragṛhya ca  
prāśyātha praṇavenaiva dvirācamyātha saṃspṛśet  nābhiṃ mantrānvakṣyamāṇanpraṇavādyānnamontakān  
ātmānamantarātmānaṃ jñānātmānaṃ puraṃ punaḥ  ātmānaṃ ca samuccārya prajāpatimataḥ param  
svāhāṃtānprajapetpaścātpayodadhighṛtaṃ pṛthak  trivāraṃ praṇavenaiva prāśyācamya dvidhā punaḥ  
prāgāsya upaviśyātha dṛḍhacittaḥ sthirāsanaḥ  yathoktavidhinā samyakprāṇāyāmatrayañcaret  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ saṃnyāsavidhivarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 subrahmaṇya uvāca  atha madhyāhnasamaye snātvā niyatamānasaḥ  gandhapuṣpākṣatādīni pūjādravyāṇyupāhareta  nairṛtye pūjayeddevaṃ vighreśaṃ devapūjitam  gaṇānāṃ tveti mantreṇāvāhayetsuvidhānataḥ  
raktavarṇaṃ mahākāyaṃ sarvvābharaṇabhūṣitam  pāśāṃkuśākṣābhīṣṭañca dadhānaṃ karapaṃkajaiḥ  
evamāvāhya sandhyāya śaṃbhuputraṃ gajānanam  abhyarcya pāyasāpūpanālikeraguḍādibhiḥ  
naivedyamuttamaṃ dadyāttāmbūlādimathāparam  paritoṣya namaskṛtya nirvighnamprārthayettataḥ  
aupāsanāgnau karttavyaṃ svagṛhyoktavidhānataḥ  ājyabhāgāntamāgneyaṃ makhatantramataḥ param  
bhūḥ svāheti tryṛcā pūrṇāhutiṃ hutvā samāpya ca  gāyatrīṃ prajapedyāvadaparāhṇamataṃdritaḥ  
atha sāyantanīṃ sandhyāmupāsya snānapūrvakam   sāyamaupāsanaṃ hutvā maunī vijñāpayedgurum  
śrapayitvā caruntasminsamidannājyabhedataḥ  juhuyādraudrasūktena sadyojātādi pañcabhiḥ  
brahmabhiśca mahādevaṃ sāṃbaṃ vahnau vibhāvayet  gaurīrmimāya mantreṇa hutvā gaurīmanusmaran  
tato'gnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāheti juhuyātsakṛt  hutvopariṣṭāttantrantu tato'gneruttare budhaḥ  
sthitvāsane japenmaunī cailājinakuśottare  ābrāhmaṃ ca muhūrte tu gāyatrī dṛḍhamānasaḥ  
tataḥ snātvā tvaśaktaścedbhasmanā vā vidhānataḥ  śrapayitvā caruṃ tasminnagnāve vābhidhāritam  
udagudvāsya barhiṣyāsādyājyena caruṃ tataḥ  abhighāryya vyāhṛtīśca raudrasūktañca pañca ca  
japedbrahmāṇi sandhāryya cittaṃ śivapadāṃbuje  prajāpatimathendrañca viśvedevāstataḥ param  
brahmāṇaṃ sacaturthyantaṃ svāhāṃtānpraṇavā dikān  saṃjapya vācayitvā'tha puṇyāhaṃ ca tataḥ param  
parastāttaṃtramagnaye svāhetyagnimukhāvadhi  nirvartya paścātprāṇāya svāhetyārabhya pañcabhiḥ  
sājyena caruṇā paścādagniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ hunet  punaśca prajapetsūktaṃ raudraṃ brahmāṇi pañca ca  
maheśādicaturvyūhamantrāṃśca prajapetpunaḥ  hutvopariṣṭāttantrantu svaśākhoktena vartmanā  
tattaddevānsamuddiśya sāṃgaṃ kuryyādvicakṣaṇaḥ  evamagnimukhādyaṃ yatkarmatantrampravarttitam  
ataḥ paraṃ prajuhuyādvirajāhomamātmanaḥ  ṣaḍviṃśatattvarūpesmindehe līnasya śuddhaye  
tattvānyetāni maddehe śudhyantāmityanusmaran  tatrātmatattvaśuddhyarthaṃ mantrairāruṇaketukaiḥ  
paṭhyamānaiḥ pṛthivyādipuruṣāṃtaṃ kramānmune  sājyena caruṇā maunī śivapādāmbujaṃ smaran  
pṛthivyādi ca śabdādi vāgādyaṃ pañcakaṃ punaḥ  śrotrādyañca śiraḥ pārśvapṛṣṭhodaracatuṣṭayam  
jaṃghāṃ ca yojayetpaścāttvagādyaṃ dhātusaptakam  prāṇādyaṃ pañcakaṃ paścādannādyaṃ kośapañcakam  
manāścittaṃ ca buddhiścāhaṃkṛtiḥ khyātireva ca  saṃkalpantu guṇāḥ paścātprakṛtiḥ puruṣastataḥ  
puruṣasya tu bhoktṛtvaṃ pratipannasya bhojane  antaraṃgatayā tattvapaṃcakaṃ parikīrtitam  
niyatiḥ kālarāgaśca vidyā ca tadanantaram  kalā ca paṃcakamidaṃ mayotpannammunīśvara  
māyāntu prakṛtiṃ vidyāditi māyā śrutīritā  tajjānyetāni tattvāni śrutyuktāni na saṃśayaḥ  
kālasvabhāvo niyatiriti ca śrutitabravīt  etatpañcakamevāsya pañcakañcakramucyate  
ajānanpañcatattvāni vidvānapi ca mūḍhadhīḥ  nipatyādhastātprakṛterupariṣṭātpumānayam  
kākākṣinyāyamāśritya varttate pārśvatonvaham  vidyātattvamidaṃ proktaṃ śuddhavidyāmaheśvarau  
sadāśivaśca śaktiśca śivaścedaṃ tu pañcakam  śiva tattvamidambrahmanprajñānabrahmavāgyataḥ  
pṛthivyādiśivāṃtaṃ yattattvajātaṃ munīśvara  svakāraṇalayadvārā śuddhirasya vidhīyatām  
ekādaśānāṃ mantrāṇāmparasmaipada pūrvakam  śivajyotiścaturthyantamidampadamathoccaret  
na mameti vadetpaścāduddeśatyāga īritaḥ  ataḥ paraṃ vividyaiti kapotakāyeti mantrayoḥ  
vyāpakāya padasyānte paramātmana ityapi  śivajyotiścaturthyantaṃ viśvabhūtapadampunaḥ  
ghasanotsukaśabdañca caturthyaṃtamatho vadet  parasmaipadamuccāryya devāya padamuccaret  
uttiṣṭhasveti mantrasya viśvarūpāya śabdataḥ  puruṣāya padambrūyādosvāhetyasya saṃvadet  
lokatrayapadasyānte vyāpine paramātmane  śivāyedaṃ na mama ca padambrūyādataḥ param  
sva śākhoktaprakāreṇa purastāttantrakarmma ca  nirvartya sarpiṣā miśraṃ carumprāśya purodhase  
pradadyāddakṣiṇāntasmai hemādiparibṛṃhitām  brahmāṇamudvāsya tataḥ prātaraupāsanaṃ hunet  
saṃ māṃ siñcantu maruta iti mantrañjapennaraḥ  yāte agna ityanena mantreṇāgnau pratāpya ca  
hastamagnau samāropya svātmanyadvaitadhāmani  prābhātikīṃ tataḥ sandhyāmupāsyādityamapyatha  
upasthāya praviśyāpsu nābhidaghnaṃ praveśayan  tanmantrānprajapetprītyā niścalātmā samutsukaḥ  
āhitāgnistu yaḥ kuryyātprājāpatyeṣṭimāhite  śraute vaiśvānare samyaksarvavedasadakṣiṇām  
athāgnimātmanyāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajedgṛhāt  sāvitrīprathamaṃ pādaṃ sāvitrīmityudīrya ca  
praveśayāmi śabdānte bhūromiti ca saṃvadet  dvitīyampādamuccāryya sāvitrīmiti pūrvvavat  
praveśayāmi śabdānte bhuvaromiti saṃvadet  tṛtīyampādamuccāryya sāvitrīmityataḥ param  
praveśayāmi śabdānte suvaromityudīrayet  tripādamuccaretpūrvaṃ sāvitrīmityataḥ param  
praveśayāmi śabdānte bhūrbhuvassuvaromiti  udīrayetparamprītyā niścalātmā munīśvara  
iyambhagavatī sākṣācchaṃkarārddhaśarīriṇī  paṃcavaktrā daśabhujā vipañcanayanojjvalā  
navaratnakirīṭodyaccandra lekhāvataṃsinī  śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśā dayāyudhadharā śubhā  
hārakeyūrakaṭakakiṃkiṇīnūpurādibhiḥ  bhūṣitāvayavā divyavasanā ratnabhūṣaṇā  
viṣṇunā vidhinā devaṛṣigaṃdharvvanāyakaiḥ  mānavaiśca sadā sevyā sarvvātmavyāpinī śivā  
sadāśivasya devasya dharmapatnī manoharā  jagadambā trijananī triguṇā nirguṇāpyajā  
ityevaṃ saṃvicāryyātha gāyatrīṃ prajapetsudhīḥ  ādidevīṃ ca tripadāṃ brāhmaṇatvādidāmajām  
yo hyanyathā japetpāpo gāyatrī śivarūpiṇīm  sa pacyate mahāghore narake kalpasaṃkhyayā  
sā vyāhṛtibhyaḥ saṃjātā tāsveva vilayaṃ gatā  tāśca praṇavasambhūtāḥ praṇave vilayaṃ gatā  
praṇavassarvavedādiḥ praṇavaḥ śivavācakaḥ  mantrādhirājarājaśca mahābījaṃ manuḥ paraḥ  
śivo vā praṇavo hyeṣa praṇavo vā śivaḥ smṛtaḥ  vācyavācakayorbhedo nātyantaṃ vidyate yataḥ  
enameva mahāmantrañjīvānāñca tanutyajām  kāśyāṃ saṃśrāvya maraṇe datte muktiṃ parāṃ śivaḥ  
tasmādekākṣarandevaṃ śivaṃ paramakāraṇam  upāsate yatiśreṣṭhā hṛdayāmbhojamadhyagam  
mumukṣavo'pare dhīrā viraktā laukikā narāḥ  viṣayānmanasā jñātvopāsate paramaṃ śivam  
evaṃ vilāpya gāyatrīṃ praṇave śivavācake  ahaṃ vṛkṣasya rerivetyanuvākaṃ japetpunaḥ  
yaśchandasāmṛṣabha ityanuvākamupakramāt  gopāyāṃtaṃ japanpaścādutthitohamitīrayet  
vadejjayettridhā mandamadhyocchrāyakramānmune  praṇavampūrvvamuddhatya sṛṣṭisthitilayakramāt  
teṣāmatha kramādbhūyādbhūssaṃnyastambhuvastathā  saṃnyastaṃ suvarityuktvā saṃnyastaṃ padamuccaram  
sarvamaṃtrādyaḥ pradeśe mayeti ca padaṃ vadet  praṇavaṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya samaṣṭiṃ vyāhṛtīrvadet  
samastamityato brūyānmayeti ca samabravīt  sadāśivaṃ hṛdi dhyātvā maṃdādīti tato mune  
praiṣamaṃtrāṃstu japtvaivaṃ sāvadhānena cetasā  abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo mattaḥ svāheti saṃjapan  
prācyāṃ diśyapa uddhṛtya prakṣipedajaliṃ tataḥ  śikhāṃ yajñopavītaṃ ca yatrotpāṭya ca pāṇinā  
gṛhītvā praṇavaṃ bhūśca samudraṃ gaccha samvadet  vahnijāyāṃ samuccāryya sodakāñjalinā tataḥ  
apsu hūyādatha preṣairabhimaṃtrya tridhā tvapaḥ  prāśya tīre samāgatya bhūmau vastrādikaṃ tyajet  
udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā gacchessaptapadādhikam  kiñciddūramathācāryastiṣṭha tiṣṭheti saṃvadet  
lokasya vyavahārārthaṃ kaupīnaṃ daṇḍameva ca  bhagavansvīkuruṣveti dadyātsvenaiva pāṇinā  
dattvā sudoraṃ kaupīnaṃ kāṣāyavasanaṃ tataḥ  ācchādyācamya ca dvedhā ta śiṣyamiti saṃvadet  
indrasya vajro'si tata iti mantramudāharet  samprārthya daṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīyātsakhāya iti saṃjapan  
atha gatvā guroḥ pārśvaṃ śivapādāṃbujaṃ smaran  praṇameddaṇḍavadbhūmau trivāraṃ saṃyatātmavān  
punarutthāya ca śanaiḥ premṇā paśyanguruṃ nijam  kṛtāñjalipuṭastiṣṭhedgurupāda samīpataḥ  
karmmārambhātpūrvameva gṛhītvā gomayaṃ śubham  sthūlāmalakamātreṇa kṛtvā piṇḍānviśoṣayeta  
sauraistu kiraṇaireva homārambhāgnimadhyagān  nikṣipya homasampūrttau bhasma saṃgṛhya gopayet  
tato gurussamādāya virajānalajaṃ sitam  bhasma tenaiva taṃ śiṣyamagnirityādibhiḥ kramāt  
maṃtrairaṃgāni saṃspṛśya mūrddhādicaraṇāntataḥ  īśānādyaiḥ pañcamaṃtrai śira ārabhya sarvataḥ  
samuddhṛtya vidhānena tripuṇḍraṃ dhārayettataḥ  triyāyuṣaistryambakaiśca mūrdhna ārabhya ca kramāt  
tatassadbhaktiyuktena cetasā śiṣyasattamaḥ  hṛtpaṃkaje samāsīnaṃ dhyāyecchivamumāsakham  
hastaṃ nidhāya śirasi śiṣyasya sa gururvadet  trivāraṃ praṇavaṃ dakṣakarṇe ṛṣyādisaṃyutam  
tataḥ kṛtvā ca karuṇāṃ praṇavasyārtha mādiśet  ṣaḍvidhārtthapari jñānasahitaṃ gurusattamaḥ  
dviṣaṭprakāraṃ sa guruṃ praṇamedbhuvi daṇḍavat  tadadhīno bhavennityaṃ nānyatkarmma samācaret  
tadājñayā tataḥ śiṣyo vedāntārthānusārataḥ  śivajñānaparo bhūyātsaguṇāguṇabhedataḥ  
tatastenaiva śiṣyeṇa śravaṇādyaṃgapūrvvakam  prabhātikādyanuṣṭhānaṃ japānte kārayedguruḥ  
pūjāṃ ca maṇḍale tasminkailāsaprastarāhvaye  śivoditena mārgeṇa śiṣyastatraiva pūjayet  
devannityamaśaktaścetpūjituṃ guruṇā śubham  sphāṭikaṃ pīṭhikopetaṃ gṛhṇīyālliṃgamaiśvaram  
varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaśchedanaṃ śiraso'pi me  na tvanabhyarcya bhuñjīyāṃ bhagavantaṃ trilocanam  
evantrivāramuccāryya śapathaṃ gurusannidhau  kuryyāddṛḍhamanāśśiṣyaḥ śivabhaktisamudvahan  
tata eva mahādevaṃ nityamudyuktamānasaḥ  pūjayetparayā bhaktyā pañcāvaraṇamārgataḥ  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ trayodaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vāmadeva uvāca  bhagavanṣaṇmukhāśeṣa vijñānāmṛtavāridhe  viśvāmareśvarasuta praṇatārttiprabhañjana  
ṣaḍvidhārtthaparijñānamiṣṭadaṃ kimudāhṛtam  ke tatra ṣaḍvidhā arthāḥ parijñānañca kiṃ prabho  
pratipādyaśca kastasya parijñāne ca kiṃ phalam  etatsarvaṃ samācakṣva yadyatpṛṣṭaṃ mayā guha  
etamartthamavijñāya paśuśāstravimohitaḥ  adyāpyahammahāsena bhrāntaśca śivamāyayā  
ahaṃ śivapadadvaṃdvajñānāmṛtarasāyanam  pīttvā vigatasammoho bhaviṣyāmi yathā tathā  
kṛpāmṛtārdrayā dṛṣṭyā vilokya suciraṃ mayi  karttavyo'nugrahaḥ śrīmatpādābjaśaraṇāgate  
iti śrutvā munīndroktaṃ jñānaśaktidharo vibhuḥ  prāhānyadarśanamahāsaṃtrāsajanakaṃ vacaḥ  
subrahmaṇya uvāca  śrūyatāmmuniśārdūla tvayā yatpṛṣṭamādarāt  samaṣṭivyaṣṭibhāvena parijñānammaheśituḥ  
praṇavārtthaparijñānarūpaṃ tadvistarādaham  vadāmi ṣaḍvidhārthaikya parijñānena suvrata  
prathamo maṃtrarūpaḥ syāddvitīyo maṃtrabhāvitaḥ  devatārtthastṛtīyo'rthaḥ prapañcārthastataḥ param  
caturthaḥ pañcamārthassyādgururūpapradarśakaḥ  ṣaṣṭhaśśiṣyātmarūpo'rthaḥ ṣaḍvidhārthāḥ prakīrttitāḥ  
tatra mantrasvarūpante vadāmi munisattama  yena vijñātamātreṇa mahājñānī bhavennaraḥ  
ādyassvaraḥ paṃcamaśca pañcamāntastataḥ paraḥ  bindunādau ca pañcārṇāḥ proktā vedairna cānyathā  
etatsamaṣṭirūpo hi vedādissamudāhṛtaḥ  nādassarvvasamaṣṭiḥ syādbiṃdvāḍhyaṃ yaccatuṣṭayam  
vyaṣṭirūpeṇa saṃsiddhaṃ praṇave śivavācake  yaṃtrarūpaṃ śṛṇu prājña śivaliṃgaṃ tadeva hi  
sarvvādhastāllikhetpīṭhaṃ tadūrdhvamprathamaṃ svaram  uvarṇaṃ ca tadūrddhvaṃ sthampavargāntaṃ tadūrdhvagam  
tanmastakasthaṃ biṃduṃ ca tadūrddhvaṃ nādamālikhet  yaṃtre saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti sarvakāmaḥ prasidhyati  
etaṃ yaṃtraṃ samālikhya praṇave nava veṣṭayet  tadutthenaiva nādena vidyannādāvasānakam  
devatārtthampravakṣyāmi gūḍhaṃ sarvvatra yanmune  tava snehādvāmadeva yathā śaṃkarabhāṣitam  
sadyojātamprapadyāmītyupakramya sadāśivom  iti prāha śrutistāraṃ brahmapaṃcakavācakam  
vijñeyā brahmarūpiṇyassūkṣmāḥ paṃcaiva devatāḥ  etā eva śivasyāpi mūrtitve nopabṛṃhitāḥ  
śivasya vācako mantraśśivamūrtteśca vācakaḥ  mūrttimūrtimatorbhedo nātyantaṃ vidyate yataḥ  
īśānamukuṭopeta ityārabhya puroditaḥ  śivasya vigrahaḥ pañcavaktrāṇi śṛṇu sāṃpratam  
paṃcamādi samārabhya sadyojātādyanukramāt  urddhvāṃtamīśānāṃtaṃ ca mukhapaṃcakamīritam  
īśānasyaiva devasya caturvyūhapade sthitam  puruṣādyaṃ ca sadyāṃtaṃ brahmarūpaṃ catuṣṭayam  
paṃca brahmasamaṣṭissyādīśānaṃ brahma viśrutam  puruṣādyaṃ tu tadvyaṣṭissadyojātāntikaṃ mune  
anugrahamayaṃ cakramidaṃ paṃcārtthakāraṇam  parabrahmātmakaṃ sūkṣmaṃ nirvikāramanāmayam  
anugraho'pi dvividhastirobhāvādigocaraḥ  prabhuścānyastu jīvānāṃ parāvaravimuktidaḥ  
etatsadāśivasyaiva kṛtyadvayamudāhṛtam  anugrahe'pi sṛṣṭyādikṛtyānāṃ paṃcakaṃ vibhoḥ  
mune tatrāpi sadyādyā devatāḥ parikīrttitāḥ  parabrahmasvarūpāstāḥ paṃca kalyāṇadāssadā  
anugrahamayaṃ cakraṃ śāṃtyatītakalāmayam  sadāśivādhiṣṭhitaṃ ca paramaṃ padamucyate  
etadeva padaṃ prāpyaṃ yatīnāṃ bhavitātmanām  sadāśivopāsakānāṃ praṇavāsaktacetasām  
etadeva padaṃ prāpya tena sākaṃ munīśvarāḥ  bhuktvā suvipulānbhogāndevena brahmarūpiṇā  
mahāpralayasaṃbhūtau śivasāmyaṃ bhajaṃti hi  na pataṃti punaḥ kvāpi saṃsārābdhau janāśca te  
te brahmaloka iti ca śrutirāha sanātanī  aiśvaryyaṃ tu śivasyāpi samaṣṭiridameva hi  
sarvaiśvaryeṇa sampanna ityāhātharvvaṇī śikhā  sarvaiśvaryyapradātṛtvamasyaiva pravadanti hi  
camakasya padānnānya dadhikaṃ vidyate padam  brahmapaṃcakavistāraprapaṃcaḥ khalu dṛśyate  
brahmabhya evaṃ saṃjātā nivṛttyādyāḥ kalā matāḥ  sūkṣmabhūtasvarūpiṇyaḥ kāraṇatvena viśrutāḥ  
sthūlarūpasvarūpasya prapaṃcasyāsya suvrata  paṃcadhāvasthitaṃ yattadbrahmapaṃcakamiṣyate
