puruṣaḥ śrotravāṇyau ca śabdakāśau ca paṃcakam  vyāptamīśānarūpeṇa brahmaṇā munisattama  
prakṛtistvakca pāṇiśca sparśo vāyuśca paṃcakam  vyāptaṃ puruṣarūpeṇa brahmaṇaiva munīśvara  
ahaṃkārastathā cakṣuḥ pādo rūpaṃ ca pāvakaḥ  aghoravrahmaṇā vyāptametatpaṃcakamaṃcitam  
buddhiśca rasanā pāyū rasa āpaśca paṃcakam  brahmaṇā vāmadevena vyāptaṃ bhavati nityaśaḥ  
mano nāsā tathopastho gandho bhūmiśca paṃcakam  sadyena brahmaṇā vyāptaṃ paṃcabrahmamayaṃ jagat  
yaṃtrarūpeṇopadiṣṭaḥ praṇavaśśivavācakaḥ  samaṣṭiḥ paṃcavarṇānāṃ biṃdvādyaṃ yaccatuṣṭayam  
śivopadiṣṭamārgeṇa yaṃtrarūpaṃ vibhāvayet  praṇavamparamaṃ mantrādhirājaṃ śivarūpiṇam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ śivarūpapraṇavavarṇanaṃ nāma caturddaśodhyāyaḥ  
īśvara uvāca  tataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sṛṣṭipaddhatimuttamām  sadāśivānmaheśādicatuṣkasya varānane  
sadāśivassamaṣṭissyādākāśadhipatiḥ prabhuḥ  asyaiva vyaṣṭitāpannammaheśādicatuṣṭayam  
sadāśivasahasrāṃśānmaheśasya samudbhavaḥ  puruṣānanarūpatvādvāyoradhipatiśca saḥ  
māyāśaktiyuto vāme sakalaśca kriyādhikaḥ  asyaiva vyaṣṭirūpaṃ syādīśvarādicatuṣṭayam  
īśo viśveśvaraḥ paścātparameśastataḥ param  sarveśvara itīdantu tirodhācakramuttamam  
tirobhāvo dvidhā bhinna eko rudrādigocaraḥ  anyaśca dehabhāvena paśuvargasya santateḥ  
bhogānuraṃjanaparaḥ karmasāmyakṣaṇāvadhi  karmasāmye sa ekaḥ syādanugrahamayo vibhuḥ  
tatra sarveśvarā yāste devatāḥ parikīrttitāḥ  parabrahmātmakāḥ sākṣānnirvikalpā nirāmayāḥ  
tirobhāvātmakaṃ cakraṃ bhavecchāntikalāmayam  maheśvarādhiṣṭhitaṃ ca padametadanuttamam  
etadeva padaṃ prāpyaṃ maheśapadasevinām  māheśvarāṇāṃ sālokyakramādeva vimuktidam  
maheśvarasahasrāṃśādrudramūrtirajāyata  aghoravadanākārastejastattvādhipaśca saḥ  
gaurīśaktiyuto vāme sarvvasaṃhārakṛtprabhuḥ  asyaiva vyaṣṭirūpaṃ syācchivādyatha catuṣṭayam  
śivo haro mṛḍabhavau viditaṃ cakramadbhutam  saṃhārākhyaṃ mahādivyaṃ paramaṃ hi munīśvara  
sa saṃhārastridhā prokto budhairnityādibhedataḥ  nityo jīvasuṣuptyākhyo vidhernaimittikaḥ smṛtaḥ  
vilayastasya tu mahāniti vedanidarśitaḥ  jīvānāṃ janmaduḥkhādiśāṃtānāmuṣitātmanām  
viśrāṃtyarthaṃ muniśreṣṭha karmaṇāṃ pākahetave  saṃhāraḥ kalpitastredhā rudreṇāmitatejasā  
rudrasyaiva tu kṛtyānāṃ trayametadudāhṛtam  saṃhṛtavapi sṛṣṭyādikṛtyānāṃ pañcakaṃ vibhoḥ  
mune tatra bhavādyāste devatāḥ parikīrttitāḥ  parabrahmasvarūpāśca lokānugrahakārakāḥ  
saṃhārākhyamidaṃ cakraṃ vidyārūpakalāmayam  adhiṣṭhitaṃ ca rudreṇa padametannirāmayam  
etadeva padaṃ prāpyaṃ rudrārādhanakāṃkṣiṇām  rudrāṇāṃ taddhi sālokyakramātsāyujyadammune  
rudramūrttessahasrāṃśādviṣṇoścaivābhavajjaniḥ  sa vāmadevacakrātmā vāritattvaikanāyakaḥ  
ramāśāktiyuto vāme sarvvarakṣākaro mahān  caturbhujo'raviṃdākṣaḥ śyāmaśśaṃkhādicihnabhṛt  
asyaiva vāsudevādicatuṣkaṃ vyaṣṭitāṃ gatam  upāsanaratānāṃ vai vaiṣṇavānāṃ vimuktidam  
vāsudevo'niruddhaśca tatassaṃkarṣaṇaḥ paraḥ  pradyumnaśceti vikhyātaṃ sthiticakramanuttamam  
sthitissṛṣṭasya jagatastatkartrā saha pālanam  ārabdhakarmabhogāntaṃ jīvānāṃ phalabhoginām  
viṣṇorevedamākhyātaṃ kṛtyaṃ rakṣāvidhāyinaḥ  sthitāvapi tu sṛṣṭyādi kṛtyānāṃ paṃcakaṃ vibhoḥ  
tatra pradyumnamukhyāste devatāḥ parikīrtitāḥ  nirvikalpā nirātaṃkā muktānaṃdakarāssadā  
sthiticakramidaṃ brahmanpratiṣṭhārūpamuttamam  janārdanādhiṣṭhitaṃ ca paramaṃ padamucyate  
evadeva padaṃ prāpyaṃ viṣṇupādābjasevinām  vaiṣṇavānāṃ cakramidaṃ sālokyādipadapradam  
viṣṇoreva sahasrāṃśātsaṃbabhūva pitāmahaḥ  sadyojātamukhātmā yaḥ pṛthivītattvanāyakaḥ  
vāgdevīsahito vāme sṛṣṭikarttā jagatprabhuḥ  caturmukho raktavarṇo rajorūpasvarūpavān  
hiṇyagarbhādyasyaiva vyaṣṭirūpaṃ catuṣṭayam  hiraṇyagarbhotha virāṭ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca  
sṛṣṭi cakramidaṃ brahma putrādiṛṣisevitam  sarvvakāmārthadaṃ brahmanparivārasukhapradam  
sṛṣṭistu saṃhṛtasyāsya jīvasya prakṛtau bahiḥ  ānīya karmabhogārtha sādhanāṃgaphalaissaha  
saṃyojanamitīdaṃ tu kṛtyaṃ paitāmahaṃ viduḥ  jagatsṛṣṭikriyāvijñā yāvadvyūhaṃ sukhāvaham  
jagatsṛṣṭāvapi mune kṛtyānāṃ ca paṃcakaṃ vibhoḥ  asti kālodayastatra devatāḥ parikīrttitāḥ  
nivṛttirūpamākhyātaṃ sṛṣṭicakramidaṃ budhaiḥ  pitāmahādhiṣṭhitaṃ ca padametaddhi śobhanam  
etadeva pradaṃ prāpyaṃ brahmārpitadhiyāṃ nṛṇām  paitāmahānāmetaddhi sālokyā divimuktidam  
asminnapi catuṣke tu cakrāṇāṃ praṇavo bhavet  maheśādikramādeva gauṇyā vṛttyā sa vācakaḥ  
idaṃ khalu jagaccakraṃ śrutiviśrutavaibhavam  pañcāraṃ cakramiti ha stauti śrutiridammune  
ekameva jagaccakraṃ śambhośśaktivijṛṃbhitam  sṛṣṭyādipaṃcāṃvayavaṃ paṃcāramiti kathyate  
alātacakrabhramivadavicchinnalayodayam  parito vartate yasmāttasmāccakramitīritam  
sṛṣṭyādipṛthusṛṣṭitvātpṛthutvenopadṛśyate  hiraṇmayasya devasya śambhoramitatejasaḥ  
śaktikāryamidaṃ cakraṃ hiraṇyajyotirāśritam  salilenāvṛtamidaṃ salilaṃ vahnināvṛtam  
āvṛto vāyunā vahnirākāśenāvṛtaṃ mahat  bhūtādinā tathākāśo bhūtādirmahatāvṛtaḥ  
avyaktenāvṛtastadvanmahānityevamāstikaiḥ  brahmāṇḍamiti saṃproktamācāryyairmunisattama  
uktāni saptāvaraṇānyasya viśvasya guptaye  cakrāddaśaguṇādhikyaṃ salilasya vidhīyate  
uparyupari cānyonyamevaṃ daśaguṇādhikam  brahmāṇḍamiti vijñeyaṃ taddvijairmunināyaka  
imamarthamurīkṛtya cakrasāmīpyavarttanāt  salilasya ca tanmadhye iti prāha śrutissvayam  
anugrahatirobhāvasaṃhṛtisthitisṛṣṭibhiḥ  karotyavirataṃ līlāmekaśśaktiyutaśśivaḥ  
bahuneha kimuktena mune sāraṃ vadāmi te  śiva evedamakhilaṃ śaktimāniti niścitam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāmupāsanāmūrttivarṇanaṃ nāma paṃcadaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
sūta uvāca  śrutvopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā vedārthaṃ munipuṃgavaḥ  paramātmani saṃdigdhaṃ paripapraccha sādaram  
vāmadeva uvāca  jñānaśaktidhara svāminparamānandavigraha  praṇavārthāmṛtaṃ pītaṃ śrīmukhakhjātparisrutam  
dṛḍhaprajñaśca jāto'smi saṃdeho vigato mama  kiṃcidanyanmahāsena pṛcchāmi tvāṃ śṛṇu prabho  
sadāśivādikīṭāṃtarūpasya jagataḥ sthitiḥ  strīpuṃrūpeṇa sarvatra dṛśyate na hi saṃśayaḥ  
evaṃ rūpasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ yatsanātanam  strīrūpaṃ tatkimāhosvitpuruṣo vā napuṃsakam  
uta miśraṃ kimanyadvā na jātastatra nirṇayaḥ  bahudhā vivadantīha vidvāṃsaśśāstramohitāḥ  
jagatsṛṣṭividhāyinyaḥ śrutayo jagatā saha  viṣṇubrahmādayo devāḥ siddhāśca na vidanti hi  
yathaikyabhāvaṃ gaccheyuretadanyacca vedaya  jānāmīti karomīti vyavahāraḥ pradṛśyate  
sa hi sarvātmasaṃsiddho vivādo nātra kasyacit  sarvadehendriyamanobudhyahaṃkārasaṃbhavaḥ  
āhosvi dātmanorūpaṃ mahānatrāpi saṃśayaḥ  dvayametaddhi sarvveṣāṃ vivādāspadamadbhutam  
utpāṭyājñānasaṃbhūtaṃ saṃśayākhyaṃ viṣadrumam  śivādvaitamahākalpavṛkṣabhūmiryathābhavet  
cittaṃ mama yathā deva bodhyo'smi kṛpayā tava  kṛpātastava deveśa dṛḍhajñānī bhavā myaham  
sūta uvāca  śrutvaivaṃ muninā pṛṣṭaṃ vaco vedāntanirvṛtam  rahasyaṃ prabhurāhedaṃ kiṃcitprahasitānanaḥ  
subrahmaṇya uvāca  etadeva mune guhyaṃ śivena paribhāṣitam  ambāyāḥ śṛṇvato devyā vāmadeva mamāpi hi  
tasyāḥ stanyaṃ tadā pītvā saṃtṛpto'smi muhurmuhuḥ  śrutavānniścalaṃ tadvai niścitaṃ me vicāritam  
tatte vadāmi dayayā vāmadeva mahāmune  mahadguhyaṃ ca paramaṃ suta tvaṃ śṛṇu sāṃpratam  
karmāsti tattvādārabhya śāstravādassuvistaraḥ  yathāvivekaṃ śrotavyo jñāninā jñānado mune  
tvayopadiṣṭā ye śiṣyāstatra ko vā bhavatsamaḥ  kapilādiṣu śāstreṣu bhramaṃtyadyāpi te'dhamāḥ  
te śaptā munibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiśśivanindā parāḥ purā  na śrotavyā hi tadvārttā te'nyathāvādino yataḥ  
anumānaprayogasyāpyavakāśo na vidyate  paṃcāvayavayuktasya sa tu dhūmasya darśanāt  
parvvatasyāgnimadbhāvaṃ vadaṃtyatrāpi suvrata  pratyakṣasya prapaṃcasya darśanālaṃbanaṃ tvataḥ  
jñātavyaḥ parameśānaḥ paramātmā na saṃśayaḥ  strīpuṃrūpamayaṃ viśvaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva dṛśyate  
ṣaṭkośarūpaḥ piṇḍo hi tatra cādyatrayambhavet  mātraṃśajaṃ punaścānyatpitraṃśajamiti śrutiḥ  
evaṃ sarvaśarīreṣu strīpuṃbhāvavido janāḥ  paramātmanyapi mune strīpuṃbhāvaṃ vidurbudhā  
saccidānadarūpatvaṃ vadati brahmaṇaḥ śrutiḥ  asannivarttakaḥ śabdaḥ sadātmeti nigadyate  
nivarttanaṃ jagattvasya cicchabdena vidhīyate  triliṃgavarttī sacchabdaḥ puruṣotra vidhīyatām  
prakāśavācī sa bhavetsatprakāśa iti sphuṭam  jñānaśabdasya paryyāyaścicchabdaḥ strītvamāgataḥ  
prakāśaścicca mithunaṃ jagatkāraṇatāṃ gatam  saccidātmanyapi tathā jagatkāraṇatāṃ gatam  
ekatraiva śivaśśaktiriti bhāvo vidhīyate  tailavarttyādimālinyātprakāśasyāpi varttate  
mālinyamaśivatvaṃ ca citāgnyādiṣu dṛśyate  evaṃ vivarttakatvena śivatvaṃ śruticoditam  
jīvāśritāyāścicchakterdaurbalyaṃ vidyate sadā  tannivṛtyarthamevātra śaktitvaṃ sārvakālikam  
balavāñchaktimāṃśceti vyavahāraḥ pradṛśyate  loke vede ca sasataṃ vāmadeva mahāmune  
evaṃ śivatvaṃ śaktitvaṃ paramātmani darśitam  śivaśaktyostu saṃyogādānaṃdassatatoditaḥ  
ato mune tamuddiśya munayaḥ kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ  śive manassamādhāya prāptāśśivamanāmayam  
sarvātmatvaṃ tayorevaṃ brahmetyupaniṣatsu ca  gīyate brahmaśabdena bṛṃhidhātvarthagocaram  
bṛṃhaṇatvaṃ bṛhattvaṃ ca śaṃbhvākhyavigrahe  paṃcabrahmamaye viśvapratītirbrahma śabditā  
pratilomātmake haṃse vakṣyāmi praṇavodbhavam  tava snehādvāmadeva sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
vyaṃjanasya sakārasya hakārasya ca varjanāt  omityeva bhavetsthūlo vācakaḥ paramātmanaḥ  
mahāmantrassa vijñeyo munibhistattvadarśibhiḥ  tatra sūkṣmo mahāmantrastaduddhāraṃ vadāmi te  
ādye tripaṃcarūpe ca svare ṣoḍaśake triṣu  mahāmantro bhavedādau sa sakāro bhavedyadā  
haṃsasya pratilomaḥ syātsakārārthaśśivaḥ smṛtaḥ  śaktyātmako mahāmantravācyaḥ syāditi nirṇayaḥ  
gurūpadeśa kāle tu sohaṃśaktyātmakaśśivaḥ  iti jīvaparo bhūyānmahāmantrastadā paśuḥ  
śaktyātmakaśśivāṃśaśca śivaikyācchivasāmyabhāk  prajñānaṃ brahmavākye tu prajñānārthaḥ pradṛśyate  
prajñānaśabdaścaitanyaparyyāyassyānna saṃśayaḥ  caitanyamātmeti mune śivasūtraṃ pravarttitam  
caitanyamiti viśvasya sarvajñānakriyātmakam  svātantryaṃ tatsvabhāvo yaḥ sa ātmā parikīrttitaḥ  
ityādiśivasūtrāṇāṃ vārtikaṃ kathitaṃ mayā  jñānaṃ baṃdha itīdaṃ tu dvitīyaṃ sūtramīśituḥ  
jñānamityātmanastasya kiṃcijjñānakriyātmakam  ityāhādyapadeneśaḥ paśuvargasya lakṣaṇam  
etaddvayaṃ parāśakteḥ prathamaṃ spaṃdatāṃ gatam  etāmeva parāṃ śaktiṃ śvetāśvataraśākhinaḥ  
svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā cetyastuvanmudā  jñānakriyecchārūpaṃ hi śaṃbhordṛṣṭitrayaṃ viduḥ  
etanmanomadhyagaṃ sadindriyajñānagocaram  anupraviśya jānāti karoti ca paśuḥ sadā  
tasmādātmana evedaṃ rūpamityeva niścitam  prapaṃcārthaṃ pravakṣyāmi praṇavai kyapradarśanam  
oṃmitīdaṃ sarvamiti śrutirāha sanātanī  tasmādvetītyupakramya jagatsṛṣṭiḥ prakrīrtitā  
tasyāḥ śrutestu tātparyaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatāmidam  tava snehādvāmadeva vivekārthavijṛṃbhitam  
śivaśaktisamāyogaḥ paramātmeti niścitam  parāśaktestu saṃjātā cicchaktistu tadudbhavā  
ānandaśaktistajjāsyādicchāśaktistadudbhavā  jñānaśaktistato jātā kriyāśa ktistu paṃcamī  etābhya eva saṃjātā nivṛttyādyāḥ kalā mune  
cidānandasamutpannau nādabindū prakīrttitau  icchāśaktermakārastu jñānaśaktestu paṃcamaḥ  
svaraḥ kriyāśaktijāto hyakārastu munīśvara  ityuktā praṇavotpattiḥ paṃcabrahmodbhavaṃ śṛṇu  
śivādīśāna utpannastatastatpuruṣodbhavaḥ  tato'ghorastato vāmassadyojātodbhavastataḥ  
etasmānmātṛkādaṣṭatriṃśanmātṛsamudbha vaḥ  īśānācchāntyatītākhyā kalā jātātha pūruṣāt  utpadyate śāntikalā vidyā'ghorasamudbhavā  
pratiṣṭhā ca nivṛttiśca vāma sadyodbhave mate  īśāccicchaktimukhato vibhormithunapañcakam  
anugrahādikṛtyānāṃ hetuḥ pañcakamiṣyate  tadvidbhirmunibhiḥ prājñairvaratattvapradarśibhiḥ  
vācyavācakasambandhānmithunatvamupeyuṣi  kalāvarṇasvarūpe'sminpañcake bhūtapañcakam  
viyadādi kramādāsīdutpannammunipuṅgava  ādyaṃ mithunamārabhya pañcamaṃ yanmayaṃ viduḥ  
śabdaikaguṇa ākāśaḥ śabdasparśaguṇo marut  śabdasparśarūpaguṇapradhāno vahnirucyate  
śabdasparśarūparasaguṇakaṃ salilaṃ smṛtam  śabdsparśarūparasagandhāḍhyā pṛthivī smṛtā  
vyāpakatvañca bhūtānāmidameva prakīrtitam  vyāpyatvaṃ vaiparītyena gandhādikramato bhavet  
bhūtapañcakarūpo'yamprapañcaḥ parikīrtyate  virāṭ sarvasamaṣṭyātmā brahmāṇḍamiti ca sphuṭam  
pṛthivītattvamārabhya śivatattvāvadhi kramāt  nilīya tattvasaṃdohe jīva eva vilīyate  
saṃśaktikaḥ punassṛṣṭau śaktidvārā vinirgataḥ  sthūlaprapañcarūpeṇa tiṣṭhatyāpralayaṃ sukham  
nijecchayā jagatsṛṣṭamudyuktasya maheśituḥ  prathamo yaḥ parispandaśśiva tattvantaducyate  
eṣaivecchāśaktitatvaṃ sarvakṛtyānuvartanāt  jñānakriyāśaktiyugme jñānādhikye sadāśivaḥ  
maheśvaraṃ kriyodreke tattvaṃ viddhi munīśvara  jñānakriyāśaktisāmyaṃ śuddhavidyātmakaṃ matam  
svāṅgarūpeṣu bhāveṣu māyātattvavibhedadhīḥ  śivo yadā nijaṃ rūpaṃ paramaiśvaryyapūrvakam  
nigṛhya māyayāśeṣapadārthagrāhako bhavet  tadā puruṣa ityākhyā tatsṛṣṭvetyabhavacchrutiḥ  
ayameva hi saṃsārī māyayā mohitaḥ paśuḥ  śivajñānavihīno hi nānākarmavimūḍhadhīḥ  
śivādabhinnaṃ na jagadātmānaṃ bhinnamityapi  jānato'sya paśoreva moho bhavati na prabho  
yathaindrajālikasyāpi yogino na bhavedbhramaḥ  guruṇā jñāpitaiśvaryaśśivo bhavati ciddhanaḥ  
sarvakartṛtvarūpā ca sarvajatvasvarūpiṇī  pūrṇatvarūpānnityatvavyāpakatva svarūpiṇī  
śivasya śaktayaḥ pañca saṃkucadūpabhāskarāḥ  
api saṃkocarūpeṇa vibhāṃtya iti nityaśaḥ  paśoḥ kalākhya vidyeti rāgakālau niyatyapi  tattvapañcakarūpeṇa bhavatyatra kaleti sā  
kiṃcitkartṛtttvahetussyātkiṃcittattvaikasādhanam  sā tu vidyā bhavedrāgo viṣayeṣvanuraṃjakaḥ  
kālo hi bhāvabhāvānāṃ bhāsānāṃ bhāsanātmakaḥ  kramāvacchedako bhūtvā bhūtādiriti kathyate  
idantu mama kartavyamidanneti niyāmikā  niyatissyādvibhośśaktistadākṣepātpatetpaśuḥ  
etatpaṃcakamevāsya svarūpā vārakatvataḥ  pañcakañcukamākhyātamantaraṃgaṃ ca sādhanam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ śivatattvavarṇanannāma ṣoḍaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vāmadeva uvāca  niyatyadhastātprakṛteruparisthaḥ pumāniti  pūrvatra bhavatā proktamidānīṃ kathamanyathā  
māyayā saṃkucadrūpastadadhastāditi prabho  iti me saṃśayaṃ nātha chettumarhasi tattvataḥ  
śrīsubahmaṇya uvāca  advaitaśaivavādo'yaṃ dvaitanna sahate kvacit  dvaitaṃ ca naśvaraṃ brahmādvaitamparamanaśvaram  
sarvajñassarvakartā ca śivassarveśvaro'guṇaḥ  tridevajanako brahmā saccidānandavigrahaḥ  
sa eva śaṃkaro devassvecchayā ca svamāyayā  saṃkucadrūpa iva sanpuruṣassaṃbabhūva ha  
kalādi pañcakenaiva bhoktṛtvena prakalpitaḥ  prakṛtisthaḥ pumāneṣa bhuṅkte prakṛtijānguṇān  
iti sthānadvayāntasthaḥ puruṣo na virodhakaḥ  saṃkucannijarūpāṇāṃ jñānādīnāṃ samaṣṭimān  
sattvādiguṇasādhyaṃ ca budhyāditritayātmakam  cittamprakṛtitattvaṃ tadāsītsattvādikāraṇāt  
sāttvikādivibhedena guṇāḥ prakṛtisambhavāḥ  guṇebhyo buddhirutpannā vastuniścayakāriṇī  
tato mahānahaṅkārastato buddhīndriyāṇi ca  jātāni manaso rūpaṃ syātsaṃkalpavikalpakam  
buddhīndriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurjihvā ca nāsikā  śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca gocaraḥ  
buddhīndriyāṇāṃ kathitaḥ śrotrādikramatastataḥ  vaikārikādahaṃkārāttanmātrāṇyabhavankramāt  
tāni proktāni sūkṣmāṇi munibhi stattvadarśibhiḥ  karmendriyāṇi jñeyāni svakāryyasahitāni ca  
viprarṣe vākkarau pādau pāyūpasthau ca tatkriyāḥ  vacanādānagamanavisarggānandasaṃjñitāḥ  
bhūtādikādahaṃkārāttanmātrāṇyabhavankramāt  tāni sūkṣmāṇi rūpāṇī śabdādīnāmiti sthitiḥ  
tebhyaścākāśavāyvagnijalabhūmijaniḥ kramāt  vijñeyā muniśārdūla pañcabhūtamitīṣyate  
avakāśapradānaṃ ca vāhakatvañca pāvanam  saṃrambho dhāranteṣāṃ vyāpārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ  
vāmadeva uvāca  bhūtasṛṣṭiḥ purā proktā kalādibhyaḥ kathampunaḥ  anyathā procyate skanda saṃdeho'tra mahānmama  
ātmatattvamakārassyādvidyā syādustataḥ param  śivatattvammakārassyādvāmadeveti ciṃtyatām  
bindunādau tu vijñeyau sarvatattvārthakāvubhau  tatratyā devatāyāśca tā mune śṛṇu sāmpratam  
brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca maheśvarasadāśivau  te hi sākṣācchivasyaiva mūrtayaḥ śrutiviśrutāḥ  
ityuktambhavatā pūrvamidānīmucyate'nyathā  tanmātrebhyo bhavantīti sandeho'tra mahānmama  
kṛtvā tatkaruṇāṃ skanda saṃśayaṃ chettumarhasi  ityākarṇya munervākyaṃ kumāraḥ pratyabhāṣata  
śrīsubrahmaṇya uvāca  tasmādveti samārabhya bhūtasṛṣṭikrame mune  tāñchṛṇuṣva mahāprājña sāvadhānatayā da rāt  
jātāni pañca bhūtāni kalābhya iti niścitam  sthūlaprapañcarūpāṇi tāni bhūtapatervapuḥ  
śivatattvādi pṛthvyantaṃ tattvānāmudayakrame  tanmātrebhyo bhavantīti vaktavyāni kramānmune  
tanmātrāṇāṃ kalānāmapyaikyaṃ syādbhūtakāraṇam  aviruddhatva mevātra viddhi brahmāvidāṃvara  
sthūlasūkṣmātmake viśve candrasūryyādayo grahāḥ  sanakṣatrāśca saṃjātāstathānye jyotiṣāṃ gaṇāḥ  
brahmaviṣṇumaheśādidevatā bhūtajātayaḥ  indrādayo'pi dikpālā devāśca pitaro'surāḥ  
rākṣasā mānuṣāścānye jaṃgamatvavibhāginaḥ  paśavaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ kīṭāḥ pannagādi prabhedinaḥ  
tarugulmalatauṣadhyaḥ parvatāścāṣṭa viśrutāḥ  gaṃgādyāssaritassapta sāgarāśca maharddhayaḥ  
yatkiṃcidvastujātantatsarvamatra pratiṣṭhitam  vicāraṇīyaṃ sadbudhyā na bahirmunisattama  
strīpuṃrūpamidaṃ viśvaṃ śivaśaktyātmakaṃ budhaiḥ  bhavādṛśairupāsyaṃ syācchivajñānaviśāradaiḥ  
sarvaṃ brahmetyupāsīta sarvaṃ vai rudra ityapi  śrutirāha mune tasmātprapañcātmā sadāśivaḥ  
aṣṭatriṃśatkalānyāsasāmarthyādvaitabhāvanā  sadāśivo'hameveti bhāvi tātmā guruḥ śivaḥ  
evaṃ vicārī sacchiṣyo gurussyātsa śivassvayam  prapañcadevatāyaṃtramaṃtrātmā na hi saṃśayaḥ  
ācāryya rūpayā vipra saṃchinnākhilabandhanaḥ  śiśuḥ śivapadāsakto gurvātmā bhavati dhuvam  
yadasti vastu tatsarvaṃ guṇa prādhānyayogataḥ  samastaṃ vyastamapi ca praṇavārthampracakṣate  
rāgādidoṣarahitaṃ vedasāraḥ śivo diśaḥ  tubhyamme kathitamprītyā'dvaitajñānaṃ śivapriyam  
yo hyanyathaitanmanute madvaco madagarvitaḥ  devo vā mānavassiddho gandharvo manujo'pi vā  
durātmanastasya śiraśchiṃdyāṃ samatayāddhruvam  sacchaktyā ripukālāgnikalpayā na hi saṃśayaḥ  
bhavāneva mune sākṣācchivādvaitavidāṃvaraḥ  śivajñānopadeśe hi śivācārapradarśakaḥ  
yaddehabhasmasamparkātsaṃchinnāghavrajo'śuciḥ  mahāpiśācaḥ samprāpya tvatkṛpātassatāṃ gatim  
śivayogīti saṃkhyātatriloka vibhavo bhavān  bhavatkaṭākṣasamparkātpaśu paśupatirbhavet  
tava tasya mayi prekṣā lokāśikṣārthamādarāt  lokopakārakaraṇe vicarantīha sādhavaḥ  
idaṃ rahasyamparamaṃ pratiṣṭhitamatastvayi  tvamapi śraddhayā bhaktyā praṇaveṣveva sādaram  
upaviśya ca tānsarvānsaṃyojya parameśvare  śivācāraṃ grāhayasva bhūtirudrākṣamiśritam  
tvaṃ śivo hi śivācārī samprāptādvaitabhāvataḥ  vicaraṃlokarakṣāyai sukhamakṣayamāpnuhi  
 sūta uvāca  śrutvedamadbhutamataṃ hi ṣaḍānanoktaṃ vedāntaniṣṭhitamṛṣistu vinamramūrttiḥ  bhūtvā praṇamya bahuśo bhuvi daṇḍavattatpādāravindaviharanmadhupatvamāpa  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ śivādvaitajñānakathanādi sṛṣṭikathanaṃ nāma saptadaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 śaunaka uvāca  śrutvā vedāntasāraṃ tadrahasyamparamādbhutam  kimpṛṣṭavānvāmadevo maheśvarasutaṃ tadā  
dhanyo yogī vāmadevaḥ śivajñānaratassadā  yatssambandhātkathotpannā divyā paramapāvanī  
iti śrutvā munīnāntadvacanampremagarbhitam  sūtaḥ prāha prasannastāñchivāsaktamanā budhaḥ  
sūta uvāca  dhanyā yūyaṃ mahādevabhaktā lokopakārakāḥ  śṛṇudhvammunayassarve saṃvādaṃ ca tayoḥ punaḥ  
śrutvā maheśatanayavacanaṃ dvaitanāśakam  advaitajñānajanakaṃ santuṣṭo'bhūnmahānmuniḥ  
natvā stutvā ca vividhaṃ kārtikeyaṃ śivātmajam  punaḥ papraccha tattvaṃ hi vinayena mahāmuniḥ  
vāmadeva uvāca  bhagavansarvatattvajña ṣaṇmukhāmṛtavāridhe  gurutvaṃ kathameteṣāṃ yatīnāmbhāvitātmanām  
jīvānāṃ bhogamokṣādisiddhissidhyati yadvaśāt  pāramparyyaṃ vinā naiṣā mupadeśādhikāritā  
evaṃ ca kṣaurakarmāṃgaṃ snānañca kathamīdṛśam  iti vijñāpaya svāminsaṃśayaṃ chettumarhasi  
iti śrutvā kārtikeyo vāmadevavacaḥ smaran  śivaṃ śivāṃ ca manasā vyācaṣṭumupacakrame  
śrīsubrahmaṇya uvāca  yogapaṭṭampravakṣyāmi gurutvaṃ yena jāyate  tava snehādvāmadeva mahadgopyaṃ vimuktidam  
vaiśākhe śrāvaṇemāsi tathāśvayuji kārtike  mārgaśīrṣe ca māghe vā śuklapakṣe śubhe dine  
paṃcamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā kṛtaprābhātikakriyaḥ  labdhānujñastu guruṇā snātvā niyatamānasaḥ  
paryyaṃkaśaucaṃ kṛtvā tadvāsasāṃgaṃ pramṛjya ca  dviguṇaṃ doramābadhya vāsasī paridhāya ca  
kṣālitāṃghrirdvirācamya bhasma sadyādima ntrataḥ  dhārayeddhi samādāya samuddhūlanamārgataḥ  
gṛhītahasto guruṇā sānukūlena vai mune  sacchiṣyaḥ sāñjalissvābhyāṃ hastābhyāmprāṅmukho yathā  
tathopaveṣṭitastiṣṭhenmaṃḍape samalaṃkṛte  gurvāsanavare śuddhe cailājinakuśottare  
atha deśika ādāya śaṃkhaṃ sādhāramastrataḥ  viśodhya tasya purataḥ sthāpayetsānukūlataḥ  
sādhāraṃ śaṅkhamapi ca sampūjya kusumādibhiḥ  niḥkṣipeda stravarmabhyāṃ śodhitaṃ tatra sajjalam  
āpūrya pūrvavatpūjya ṣaḍaṃgoktakrameṇa ca  praṇavena punastadvai saptadhaivābhimantrayet  
abhyarcya gandhapuṣpādyairdhūpadīpau pradarśya ca  saṃrakṣāstreṇa taṃ śaṃkhaṃ varmaṇāthāvaguṇṭhayet  
dhenuśaṃkhākhyamudre ca darśayedatha deśikaḥ  punassvapurataśśaṃkhaṃ dakṣiṇe deśa uttame  
pūjyārghyoktavidhānena sundarammaṇḍalaṃ śubham  kuryyātsampūjayettañca sugandhakusumā dibhiḥ  
sādhāraṃ śodhitaṃ śuddhaṃ ghaṭantantupariṣkṛtam  dhūpitaṃ sthāpitaṃ śuddhavāsitodaprapūritam  
pañcatvakpañcapatraiśca mṛttikābhiśca pañcabhiḥ  militaṃ ca sugandhena lepayettammunīśvara  
vastrāmradaladūrvāgranārikelasumaistataḥ  taṃ ghaṭaṃ vastubhiścānyaissaṃkuryātsamalaṃkṛtam  
vinyasetpañcaratnāni ghaṭe tatra munīśvara  hiraṇyañcāpi teṣāṃ vābhāve bhaktyā pravinyaset  
nīlākhyaratnaṃ ca tathā ratne māṇikyahemanī  pravālagomedake ca pañcaratnamidaṃ smṛtam  
nṛmlaskamiti samprocya glūmityante 'tha deśikaḥ  samyagvidhānataḥ prītyā sānukūlaḥ samarcayet  
ādhāraśaktimārabhya yajanoktavidhānataḥ  pañcāvaraṇamārgeṇa devamāvāhya pūjayet  
nivedya pāyasānnañca tāṃbūlādi yathā purā  nāmāṣṭakārcanāntaṃ ca kṛtvā tamabhimantrayet  
praṇavāṣṭottaraśataṃ brahmabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ kramāt  sadyādīśāntamapyastraṃ rakṣitaṃ varmaṇā punaḥ  
avaguṃṭhya pradarśyātha dhūpadīpau ca bhaktitaḥ  dhenuyonyākhyamudre ca samyaktatra pradarśayet  
tataśca deśikastasya darbhairācchādya mastake  maṇḍalastheśadigbhāge caturasraṃ prakalpayet  
taduparyyāsanaṃ ramyaṃ kalpayitvā vidhānataḥ  tatra saṃsthāpayecchiṣyaṃ śiśuṃ sānukūlataḥ  
tataḥ kumbhaṃ samutthāya svastivācanapūrvakam  abhiṣiṃcedguruḥ śiṣyaṃ prādakṣiṇyena mastake  
praṇavaṃ pūrvamuccāryya saptadhā brahmabhi stataḥ  pañcabhiścābhiṣekānte śaṃkhodenābhiveṣṭayet  
cārudīpaṃ pradarśyātha vāsasā parimṛjya ca  nūtanaṃ dorakaupīnaṃ vāsasī paridhāpayet  
kṣālitāṃghrirdvirācamya dhṛtabhasmaguruśśiśum  hastābhyāmavalaṃbyātha hastau maṃḍapamadhyataḥ  
tadaṃgeṣu samālipya tadbhasma vidhinā guruḥ  āsane saṃpraveśyātha kalpite sthāpayetsukham  
pūrvābhimukhamātmīyatattvajñānābhilāṣiṇam  svasanastho gururbrūyādamalātmā bhaveti tam  
guruśca paripūrṇo'smi śiva ityacalasthitiḥ  samādhimācaretsamyaṅmuhūrttaṃ gūḍhamānasaḥ  
paścādunmīlya nayane sānukūlena cetasā  sāṃjaliṃ saṃsthitaṃ śuddhaṃ paśyecchiṣyamanākulaḥ  
svahastambhasitāliptaṃ vinyasya śiśumastake  dakṣaśrutāvupadiśeddhaṃsassohamiti sphuṭam  
tatrādyāhaṃpadasyārthaḥ śaktayātmā sa śivassvayam  sa evāhaṃ śivosmīti svātmānaṃ saṃvibhāvaya  
ya ityaṇorarthatattvamupadiśya tato vadet  avāṃtarāṇāṃ vākyānāmarthatātparyamādarāt  
vākyāni vacmi te brahmansāvadhānamatiśśṛṇu  tāni dhāraya citte hi sa brūyāditi saṃsphuṭam  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ saṃnyāsapaddhatau śiṣyakaraṇavidhirnāmāṣṭādaśo'dhyāyaḥ  
prajñānaṃ brahmavākyārthaḥ pūrvameva prabodhitaḥ  ahaṃpadasyārthabhūtaḥ śaktyātmā parameśvaraḥ  
akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryaḥ prakāśaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ  hakāro vyomarūpaḥ syācchaktyātmā saṃprakīrtitaḥ  
śivaśaktyostu saṃyogādānandaḥ satatoditaḥ  brahmeti śivaśaktyostu sarvātmatvamiti sphuṭam  
pūrvamevopadiṣṭaṃ tatsohamasmīti bhāvayet  tattvamityatra taditi saśabdārthaḥ prabodhitaḥ  
anyathā so'hamityatra viparītārthabhāvanā  ahaṃśabdastu puruṣastaditi syānnapuṃsakam  evamanyonyavairudhyādanvayo nabhavettayoḥ  
strīpuṃrūpasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ cānyathā bhavet  sa tattvamasi ityevamupadeśārthabhāvanā  
ayamātmeti vākye ca puṃrūpaṃ padayugmakam  īśena rakṣaṇīyatvādīśāvasyamidaṃ jagat  
prajñānātmā yadeveha tadamutreti cintayet  yaḥ sa eveti vidvadbhissiddhāntibhirihocyate  
uparisthitavākye ca yo'mutra sa iha sthitaḥ  iti pūrvavadevārthaḥ puruṣo viduṣāṃ mataḥ  
anyadeva tadviditādatho  aviditādapi  asminvākye phalasyāpi vaiparītyavibhāvanā  
yathāsyāttadvadevātra vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ mune  ayathāviditāchabdo pūrvavadviditāditi  
pravṛttissyāttadviditāttathaivāviditātparam  anyadeva hi saṃsiddhyai na bhavediti niścitam  
eṣa ta ātmāṃtaryāmī yo'mṛtaśca śivassvayam  yaścāyampuruṣe śaṃbhuryaścāditye vyavasthitaḥ  
sa cā'sau seti pārthakyaṃ naikaṃ sarvaṃ sa īritaḥ  sopādhidvayamasyārtha upacārāttathocyate  
taṃ śambhunāthaṃ śrutayo vadanti hi hiraṇmayam  hiraṇya bāhava iti sarvāṃgasyo palakṣalam  
anyathā tatpatitvaṃ tu na bhavediti yatnataḥ  ya eṣontariti śaṃbhuśchāndogye śrūyate śivaḥ  
hiraṇyaśmaśruvāṃstadvaddhiraṇyamayakeśavān  nakhamārabhya keśāgrā sarvatrāpi hiraṇmayaḥ  
ahamasmi paraṃ brahma parāparaparātparam  iti vākyasya tātparyaṃ vadāmi śrūyatāmidam  
ahaṃpadasyārthabhūtaḥ śaktyātmā śivaīritaḥ  sa evāsmīti vākyārtha yojanā bhavati dhruvam  
sarvotkṛṣṭaśca sarvātmā parabrahma sa īritaḥ  paraścāthāparaśceti parātparamiti tridhā  
rudro brahmā ca viṣṇuśca proktāḥ śrutyaiva nānyathā  tebhyaśca paramo devaḥ paraśabdena bodhitaḥ  
vedaśāstra gurūṇāṃ ca vākyābhyā savaśācchiśoḥ  pūrṇānandamayaśśaṃbhuḥ prādurbhūto bhaveddhṛdi  
sarvabhūtasthitaśśambhussa evāhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  tattvajātasya sarvasya prāṇosmyahamahaṃ śivaḥ  
ityuktvā punarapyāha śivastattvatrayasya ca  prāṇosmītyatra pṛthvyādiguṇāntagrahaṇānmune  
ātmatattvāni sarvāṇi gṛhītānīti bhāvaya  punaśca sarvagrahaṇaṃ vidyātattvaśivātmanoḥ  
tattvayoścāsmyahaṃ prāṇāssarvasssarvātmako hyaham  jīvasya cāntaryāmitvājjīvo'haṃ tasya sarvadā  
yadbhūtaṃ yacca bhavyaṃ yadbhavipyatsarvameva ca  manmayatvādahaṃ sarvaḥ sarvo vai rudra ityapi  
śrutirāha mune sā hi sākṣācchivamukhodgatā  sarvātmā paramairebhirguṇairnityasamanvayāt  
svasmātparātmavirahādadvitīyo'hameva hi  sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmeti vākyārthaḥ pūrvvamīritaḥ  
pūrṇo'haṃ bhāvarūpatvānnityamukto'hameva hi  paśavo matprasādena muktā madbhāvamāśritāḥ  
yo'sau sarvātmakaśśambhusso'haṃ sa śivo'smyaham  iti vai sarvavākyārtho vāmadeva śivoditaḥ  
itīśaśrutivākyābhyāmupadiṣṭārthamādarāt  sākṣācchivaikyadaṃ puṃsāṃ śiśogururupādiśet  
ādāya śaṃkhaṃ sādhāramastramantreṇa bhasmanā  śodhya tatpuratassthāpya caturasre samarcite  
omityabhyarcya gandhādyairastraṃ vastropaśobhitam  vāsitaṃ jalamāpūrya sampūjyomiti mantrataḥ  
saptadhaivābhimaṃtryātha praṇavena punaśca tam  yastvantaraṃ kiṃcidasti kurute tyatibhītibhāk  
ityāha śrutisattattvaṃ dṛḍhātmā gatabhīrbhava  ityābhāṣya svayaṃ śiṣyaṃ devaṃ dhyāyansamarcayet  
śiṣyāsanaṃ samprapūjya ṣaḍutthāpanamārgataḥ  śivāsanaṃ ca saṃkalpya śivamūrtiṃ prakalpayet  
pañca brahmāṇi vinyasya śiraḥ pādāvasānakam  muṇḍavatkrakalābhedaiḥ praṇavasya kalā api  
aṣṭatriṃśanmaṃtrarūpā śśiṣyadehe'tha mastake  samāvāhya śivaṃ mudrāḥ sthāpanīyāḥ pradarśayet  
tataścāṅgāni vinyasya sarvajñānītyanukramāt  kalpayedupacārāṃśca ṣoḍaśāsanapūrvakān  
pāyasānnañca naivedyaṃ samarpyo magnijāyayā  gaṇḍūṣācamanārghyādi dhūpadīpādikaṃ kramāt  
nāmāṣṭakena sampūjya brāhmaṇairvedapāragaiḥ  japedbrahmavidāpnoti bhṛgurvai vāruṇistataḥ  
yo devānāmupakramyaḥ yaḥ paraḥ sa maheśvaraḥ  ityaṃtaṃ tasya purataḥ kahlārādivirnitām  
ādāya mālāmutthāya śrīvirūpākṣa nirmite  śāstre paṃcāśike rūpe siddhiskandhaṃ japecchanaiḥ  
khyātiḥ pūrṇohamityaṃtaṃ sānukūlena cetasā  deśikastasya śiṣyasya kaṇṭhadeśe samarpayet  
tilakaṃ vandanenātha sarvāṅgālepanaṃ punaḥ  svasampradāyānuguṇaṃ kārayecca yathāvidhi  
tataśca deśikaḥ prītyā nāmaśrīpādasaṃjñitam  chatrañca pādukāṃ dadyāddūrvākalpavikalpanam  
vyākhyātatvañca karmmādigurvāsanaparigraham  anugṛhya gurustasmai śiṣyāya śivarūpiṇe  
śivohamasmīti sadā samādhistho bhaveti tam  samprocyātha svayaṃ tasmai namaskāraṃ samācaret  
sampradāyānuguṇyena namaskuryustathāpare  śiṣyastadā samutthāya namaskuryādguruntathā  gurorapi guruṃ tasya śiṣyāṃśca svagurorapi  
evaṃ kṛtanamaskāraṃ śiṣyandadyādguruḥ svayam  suśīlaṃ yatavācaṃ taṃ vinayāvanataṃ sthitam  
adyaprabhṛti lokānāmanugrahaparo bhava  parīkṣya vatsaraṃ śiṣyamaṃgīkuru vidhānataḥ  
rāgādidoṣānsaṃtyajya śivadhyānaparo bhava  satsampradāyasaṃsiddhaissaṃgaṃ kuru na cetaraiḥ  
anabhyarcya śivaṃ jātumā bhuṃkṣvāprāṇa saṃkṣayam  gurubhaktiṃ samāsthāya sukhī bhava sukhī bhava  
iti kramādguruvaro dayālurjñānasāgaraḥ  sānukūlena cittena samaṃ śiṣyaṃ samācaret  
tava snehānmayāyaṃ vai vāmadeva munīśvara  yogapaṭṭaprakāraste prokto guhyataro'pi hi  
ityuktvā ṣaṇmukhastasmai kṣaurasnānavidhikramam  vaktumārabhata prītyā yatīnāṃ kṛpayā śubham  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ yogapaṭṭavidhivarṇanaṃnāmaikonaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
subrahmaṇya uvāca  kṣaurasnānavidhiṃ vakṣye vāmadeva mahāmune  yasya sadyo vidhānena śuddhissyādyatinaḥ parā  
yogapaṭṭaprakārasya vidhimprāpya munīśvara  sa śiṣyassyādvratī pūrṇaḥ kṣaurakarmmodyato bhavet  
guruṃ natvā viśeṣeṇa labdhānujñastato guroḥ  śirassaṃkṣālya cācamya savāsāḥ kṣauramācaret  
kṣālayedvasanaṃ paścānmṛdambhobhiḥ kṣurādikam  taddhastau ca mṛdālipya kṣālayeti mṛdaṃ dadet  
sthāpitamprokṣitantoyaiśśivaṃ śivamitīrayan  svanetre pihite caivānāmāṃguṣṭhābhimaṃtrite  
astreṇonmīlya saṃdṛśya kṣurā dikṣau rasādhanam  abhimantrya dvādaśātha prokṣayedastramaṃtrataḥ  
kṣuraṃ gṛhītvā tāreṇa dakṣabhāge nikṛntayet  keśāṃśca kāṃści dagreṣu vaptvā sarvaṃ ca vāpayet  
pṛthivyāṃ parṇamādāya vikṣipenna bhuvaḥ sthale  śmaśrūṇi hastapādasthanakhāni ca nikṛṃtayet  
bilvāśvatthatulasyādisthāne saṃgṛhya mṛtikām  dviṣaṭvāraṃ nimajyāpsu tīraṃ gatvopaviśya ca  
śuddhe deśe tu saṃsthāpya mṛdaṃ tredhā vibhajya ca  evampunastridhā kṛtvā prokṣyāstreṇābhimantrayet  
tatraikāṃ mṛdamādāya dāpayitvānyapāṇinā  karau dvādaśadhā lipya pratyekaṃ kena kṣālayet  
punarekāmpādayośca mukhe cānyāṃ kare kramāt  saṃlipyākṣālya cāmbhobhiḥ punaśca jalamāviśet  
anyāṃ mṛdambhāgayitvā śirasi dvādaśa kramāt  ālipya mṛdamāsyāntanimajya ca punaḥ punaḥ  
tīraṃ gatvā tu gaṃḍūṣānṣoḍaśācamanaṃ dvidhā  prāṇānāyamya ca punaḥ praṇavaṃ dvyaṣṭasaṃkhyayā  
mṛdamanyāṃ punastredhā vibhajya ca tadekayā  kaṭiśaucaṃ pādaśaucaṃ vidhāyācamya ca dvidhā  
praṇavenātha ṣoḍaśa prāṇānāyamya vāgyataḥ  punaranyāṃ svorudeśe tridhā vinyasya comiti  
prokṣyābhimaṃtrayetsapta svapāṇyostalamekadhā  tridhālipyātha sampaśyetsūryyamūrtiṃ ca pāvanīm  
svakakṣayoḥ samālipya vyatyastābhyāmathānyayā  pāṇibhyāñca mṛdā śiṣyassumatirdṛḍhamānasaḥ  
gṛhītvānyāṃ mṛdaṃ śuddhāṃ tathāsau gurubhaktimān  śira ārabhya pādāntaṃ vilipyādityadṛṣṭayā  
samutthāya tato'sau vai daṇḍamādāya bhūtale  svaguruṃ mantradambhaktyā saṃsmarejjñānaniṣṭhayā  
tatassāmbaṃ maheśānaṃ śaṃkaraṃ candraśekharam  saṃsmaredbhaktitaśśiṣya sarveśvaryapatiṃ śivam  
trivārampraṇametprītyā sāṣṭāṃgaṃ ca guru śivam  pañcāṅgenaikavārañca samutthāya ca vandayet  
tīrthaṃ praviśya tanmadhye nimajyonmajya tāmmṛdam  skandhe saṃsthāpya pūrvoktaprakāreṇa vilepayet  
tatrāvaśiṣṭaṃ saṃgṛhya jalamadhye praviśya ca  viloḍya samyak tāṃ tatra sarvāṃgeṣu vilipya ca  
trivāramomiti procya śivapādāmbujaṃ smaran  saṃsārāmbudhisaṃtāraṃ sadā yadvidhito hi saḥ  
abhiṣicyomiti jalaṃ virajābhasmalolitam  aṃgopamārjjanaṃ kṛtvā susnāyādbhasmanā tataḥ  
tripuṃḍraṃ ca vidhāyātha yathoktavidhinā śubham  yathoktāṃgeṣu sarveṣu sāvadhāna tayā mune  
tataśśuddhamanā bhūtvā kuryyānmadhyaṃdinakriyāḥ  maheśvaraṃ namaskṛtya gurūṃstīrthādikāni ca  
sampūjayenmaheśānaṃ bhaktyā paramayā mune  sāmbikaṃ jñānadātāraṃ pātāraṃ tribhavasya vai  
tatosau dṛḍhacetasko yatiḥ svavṛṣasaṃsthitaḥ  bhikṣārthampravrajecchuddho vipravargeṣu sādhuṣu  
tatastatra ca śuddhātmā pañcadhā parikalpitam  bhaikṣyaṃ yathocitaṃ kuryyāddūṣitānnaṃ vivarjjayet  
śaucaṃ snānaṃ tathā bhikṣāṃ nityamekāntasevanam  bhikṣauścatvāri karmmāṇi pañcamaṃ naiva vidyate  
alābuṃ veṇupātraṃ ca dāravammṛṇmayantathā  bhikṣoścattvāri pātrāṇi pañcamannaiva vidyate  
tāmbūlaṃ taijasampātraṃ retassekaṃ sitāṃbaram  divāsvāpo hi naktānnaṃ yatīnāṃ ṣaḍvivarjitāḥ  
sākṣarā viparītāśca rākṣasāsta iti smṛtāḥ  tasmādvai viparītaṃ ca karmma naivācaredyatiḥ  
yatiḥ prayatnataḥ kuryyātkṣaurasnānaṃ ca śuddhaye  saṃsmaranmanasā śuddhaṃ paraṃ brahma sadāśivam  
ityaiva muniśārddūla tava snehānmayākhilaḥ  kṣaurasnānavidhiḥ proktaḥ kimbhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ kṣaurasnānavidhivarṇanaṃ nāma viṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vāmadeva uvāca  ye muktā yatayasteṣāṃ dāhakarmma na vidyate  mṛte śarīre khananaṃ taddehasya śrutaṃ mayā  
tatkarmācakṣva suprītyā kārtikeya guro mama  tvattonyo na hi saṃvaktā triṣu lokeṣu vidyate  
pūrṇāhaṃ bhāvamāśritya ye muktā dehapaṃjarāt  ye tūpāsanamārgeṇa dehamuktāḥ paraṃgataḥ  
teṣāṃ gativiśeṣañca bhagavañchaṃkarātmaja  vaktumarhasi suprītyā māṃ vicāryya svaśiṣyataḥ  
sūta uvāca  munivijñaptimākarṇya śaktiputrassurārihā  prāhātyantarahasyaṃ tadbhṛguṇā śrutamīśvarāt  
 subrahmaṇya uvāca  idameva mune guhyaṃ bhṛgave śivayogine  uktaṃ bhagavatā sākṣātsarvajñena pinākinā  
vakṣye tadadya te brahmanna deyaṃ yasya kasyacit  deyaṃ śiṣyāya śāntāya śivabhaktiyutāya vai  
samādhistho yatiḥ kaścicchivabhāvena dehabhuk  asti cetsa mahādhīraḥ paripūrṇaśśivo bhavet  
adhairyyacitto yaḥ kaścitsamādhiṃ na ca viṃdati  tadupāyampravakṣyāmi sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
tripadārthaparijñānaṃ vedāntāgamavākyajam  śrutvā gurormukhādyogamabhyasetsa yamādikam  
tatkurvansa yatissamyakchivadhyānaparo bhavet  niyamena mune nityaṃ praṇavāsaktamānasaḥ  
dehadaurbalyavaśato yadyadhairyyadharo yatiḥ  akāmaśca śivaṃ smṛtvā sa jīrṇāṃ svāṃ tanuṃ tyajet  
sadāśivānugrahato naṃdinā preritā mune  ātivāhikarūpiṇyo devatāḥ pañca viśrutāḥ  
ātmahantākṛtiḥ kācijjyottiḥpuṃjavapuṣmatī  ahno'bhimāninī kācicchuklapakṣābhimāninī  
uttarāyaṇarūpā ca paṃcānugrahatatparā  dhūmrā tamasvinī rātriḥ kṛṣṇapakṣābhimāninī  
dakṣiṇāyanarūpeti viśrutāḥ pañca devatāḥ  tāsāṃ vṛttiṃ śṛṇuṣvādya vāmadeva mahāmune  
tāḥ paṃcadevatā jīvānkarmānuṣṭhāna tatparān  gṛhītvā tridivaṃ yāṃti tatpuṇyavaśato mune  
bhuktvā bhogānyathoktāṃśca te tatpuṇyakṣaye punaḥ  mānuṣaṃ lokamāsādya bhajate janmapūrvavat  
tāḥ punaḥ paṃcadhā mārgaṃ vibhajyārabhya bhūtalam  agnyādikramatāṃ gṛhyaṃ sadāśivapadaṃ yatiḥ  
ninīya vandyacaraṇau devadevasya pṛṣṭhataḥ  tiṣṭhaṃtyanugrahākārāḥ karmmaṇyeva prayojitāḥ  
samāgatamabhiprekṣya devadevassadā śivaḥ  viraktaścenmahāmaṃtratātparyamupadiśya ca  
svasāmyaṃ ca vapurdatte gāṇapatyebhiṣicya ca  anugṛhṇāti sarveśaśśaṃkaraḥ sarvanāyakaḥ  
mṛgaṭaṃkatriśūlāgryavaradānavibhūṣitam  trinetraṃ candraśakalaṃ gaṃgollāsijaṭādharam  
adhiṣṭhitavimānāgryaṃ sarvadaṃ sarvakāmadam  iti śākhāviraktaścedrudrakanyāsamāvṛtam  
nṛtyagītamṛdaṃgādivādyaghoṣamanoharam  divyāmbarasragālepa bhūṣaṇairapi bhūṣitam  
divyāmṛtaghaṭaiḥ pūrṇaṃ divyāṃbhaḥparipūritam  sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ caṃdrakoṭisuśītalam  
manovegaṃ sarvagaṃ ca vimānamanugṛhya ca  bhuktabhogasya tasyāpi bhogakautūhalakṣaye  
nipātya śaktiṃ tīvratarāṃ prakṛtyā hyati durgamām  kāntāraṃ dagdhukāmāntānmalayānalasuprabhām  
anugṛhya mahāmaṃtratātparyamparameśvaraḥ  pūrṇohaṃ bhāvanārūpaḥ śaṃbhura smīti niścalam  
anugṛhya samādhiśca svadāsyaspandarūpiṇīḥ  ravyādikarmmasāmarthyarūpāḥ siddhīranargalāḥ  
āyuḥ kṣaye padmayoneḥ punarāvṛttivarjitām  muktiṃ ca paramāṃ tasmai prayacchati jagadguruḥ  
etadeva padaṃ tasmātsarvaiśvaryyaṃ samaṣṭimat  muktighaṃṭāpathaṃ ceti vedāṃtānāṃ viniścayaḥ  
mumūrṣostasya mandasya yatessatsampradāyinaḥ  yatayaḥ sānukūlatvāttiṣṭheyuḥ parita stadā  
tatassarve ca te tatra praṇavādīnyanukramāt  upadiśya ca vākyāni tātparyaṃ ca samāhitāḥ  
varṇayeyuḥ sphuṭaṃ prītyā śivaṃ saṃsmārayansadā  nirguṇaṃ paramajyotiḥ praṇamya vilayāvadhi  
eteṣāṃ samamevātra saṃskārakrama ucyate  asaṃskṛtaśarīrāṇāṃ daurgatyaṃ naiva jāyate  
saṃnyasya sarvakarmmāṇi śivāśrayaparā yataḥ  dehaṃ dūṣayatasteṣāṃ rājño rāṣṭraṃ ca naśyati  
tadgrāmavāsinaste'pi bhaveyurbhṛśaduḥkhinaḥ  taddoṣaparihārāya vidhānaṃ caivamucyate  
sa tu nama hariṇyāya cetyārabhya vinamradhīḥ  nama āmīvatkebhyāntaṃ tatkāle prajapenmanum  
oṃmityante japandevayajanampūrayettataḥ  tataśśāntirbhavettasya doṣasya hi munīśvara  
putrādayo yathā nyāyaṃ kuryyussaṃskāramuttamam  vacmi tatkṛpayā vipra sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  
abhyarcya snāpya śuddhodairabhyarcya kusumādibhiḥ  śrīrudracamakābhyāṃ ca rudrasūktena ca kramāt  
śaṃkhaṃ ca purataḥ sthāpya tajjalenābhiṣicya ca  puṣpaṃ nidhāya śirasi praṇavena pramārjayet  
kaupīnādīni saṃtyajya punaranyāni dhārayet  bhasmanoddhūlayettasya sarvāṃgaṃ vidhinā tataḥ  
tripuṇḍraṃ ca vidhānena tilakaṃ candanena ca  viracya puṣpairmālābhiralaṃkuryyātkalevaram  
uraḥ kaṇḍaśirobāhuprakoṣṭhaśrutiṣu kramāt  rudrākṣamālābharaṇairalaṃkuryyācca maṃtrataḥ  
sudhūpitaṃ samutthāpya śikyopari nidhāya ca  paṃcabrahmamaye ramye rathe saṃsthāpayettanum  
oṃmādyaiḥ paṃcabhirbrahmamaṃtraissadyādibhiḥ krmāt  sugaṃdhakusumairmālyairalaṃkuryyādrathaṃ ca tam  
nṛtyavādyairbrāhmaṇānāṃ vedaghoṣaiśca sarvataḥ  grāmampradakṣiṇīkṛtya gacche tpretaṃ tamudvahan  
tataste yatinaḥ sarve tathā prācyāmathāpi vā  udīcyampuṇyadeśe tu puṇyavṛkṣasamīpataḥ  
khanitvā devayajanaṃ daṇḍamātrapramāṇataḥ  praṇavavyāhṛtibhyāṃ ca prokṣya cāstīryya ca kramāt  
śamīpatraśca kusumairuttarāgraṃ tadūrdhvataḥ  āstīrya darbhāṃstatpīṭhaṃ cailājinakuśottaram  
praṇavena brahmabhiśca pañcagavyena tāṃ tanum  prokṣyābhiṣicya raudreṇa sūktena praṇavena ca  
śaṃkhatoyenābhiṣicya mūrdhni puṣpaṃ viniḥkṣipet  tadgatasyānukūlo'sau śivasmaraṇatatparaḥ  
oṃmityatha samuddhṛtya svastivācanapūrvakam  garte yogāsane sthāpya prāṅmukhaṃ syādyathā tathā  
gaṃdhapuṣpairalaṃkṛtvā dhūpaguggulunā tataḥ  viṣṇo havyamiti procya rakṣasveti vadandadet  
daṇḍaṃ dakṣiṇahaste tu vāme dadyātkamaṇḍalum  prajāpate na tvadetānyanyo maṃtreṇa sodakam  
brahmajajñānamprathamamitimaṃtreṇa mastake  spṛśañjaptvā rudrasūktaṃ bhuvormadhye spṛśañjapet  
māno mahāntamityādicaturbhirmastakantataḥ  nālikereṇa nirbhidyādavaṭaṃ pūrayettataḥ  
paṃcabhirbrahmabhisspṛṣṭvā japetsthalamananyadhīḥ  yo devānāmupakramya yaḥ paraḥ sa maheśvaraḥ  
iti japtvā mahādevaṃ sāṃbaṃ saṃsārabheṣajam  sarvajñamaparādhīnaṃ sarvānugrahakārakam  
ekāratnisamutsedhamaratnidvayavistṛtam  mṛdā pīṭhaṃ prakalpyātha gopaye nopalepayet  
caturasraṃ ca tanmadhye gaṃdhākṣatasamanviteḥ  sugaṃdhakusumairbilvaistulasyā ca samarcayet  
praṇavena tato dayāddhūpadīpau payohaviḥ  dattvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya namaskuryyācca paṃcadhā  
praṇavaṃ dvādaśāvṛttvā saṃjapya praṇamettataḥ  digvidikkramato dadyādbrahmādyampraṇavena ca  
evaṃ daśāhaparyyaṃtaṃ vidhiste samudāhṛtaḥ  yatīnāṃ munivaryyāthaikādaśāhavidhiṃ śṛṇu  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ yatīnānmaraṇānantaradaśāhaparyyaṃtakṛtyavarṇanannāmaikaviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
 subrahmaṇya uvāca  ekādaśehni samprāpte yo vidhissamudāhṛtaḥ  taṃ vakṣye muniśārdūla yatīnāṃ snehatastava  
sammārjya vedīmālipya kṛtvā puṇyāhavācanam  prokṣya paścimamārabhya pūrvāntampañca ca kramāt  
maṇḍalānyuttarāśāsyaḥ kuryātsvayamavasthitaḥ  prādeśamātraṃ saṃkalpya caturasraṃ ca madhyataḥ  
bindutrikoṇaṣaṭkoṇavṛttākārāṇi ca kramāt  śaṃkhaṃ ca puratasthāpya pūjoktakramamārgataḥ  
prāṇānāyamya saṃkalpya pūjayitvā sureśvarī  devatāḥ pañca pūrvoktā ativāhikarūpiṇīḥ  
saṃtyajyottarato darbhān yaśca saṃspṛśate tataḥ  paścimādi samārabhya ṣaḍutthāsanamārgataḥ  
maṇḍalāni ca teṣvantaḥ puṣpāṇyādhāya pīṭhavat  oṃ hrī mityuktvāgnirūpāntāmativāhikadevatām  
āvāhayāmi nama ityantaṃ sarvatra bhāvayet  darśayetsthāpanādyāstu mudrāḥ pratyekamādarāt  
hrāṃhrīmityādinā kuryyādāsāmaṃgāni ca kramāt  pāśāṃkuśābhayābhīṣṭapāṇicandropalaprabhāḥ  
raktāṃgulīyakacchāyarañjitākhiladiṅmukhā  raktāmbaradharāḥ kārapadapaṃkajaśobhitāḥ  
trinetrollāsivadanapūrṇacandramanoharāḥ  māṇikya mukuṭodbhāsicandralekhāvataṃsitāḥ  
kuṇḍalāmṛṣṭagaṇḍāśca pīnonnatapayodharāḥ  hārakeyūrakaṭakakāṃcīdāmamanoharāḥ  
tanumadhyāḥ pṛthuśroṇyo raktadivyāmbarāvṛtāḥ  māṇikyamayamaṃjīrasiṃjatpadasaroruhāḥ  pādāṃgulīyakaśroṇīrmaṃjulātimanoharāḥ  
anugraheṇa mūrtena śivavatkiṃ nu sādhyate  tasmācchaktyātmamūrtena sarvaṃ sādhyaṃ maheśavat  
sarvānugrahakartraiva svīkṛtāḥ paṃcamūrtaya  sarvakāryyakarā divyāḥ parānugrahatatparāḥ  
evaṃ dhyātvā tu tāḥ sarvā anugrahaparāśśivāḥ  pādayoḥ pādyametāsāṃ dadyācchaṃkhodabindubhiḥ  
hasteṣvācamanīyaṃ ca mauliṣvarghyaṃ pradāpayet  śaṃkhoda bindubhistāsāṃ snānakarma ca bhāvayet  
raktāmbarāṇi divyāni sottarīyāṇi dāpayet  mukuṭādīnyanarghyāṇi dadyādābharaṇāni ca  
suvāsitaṃ ca śrīkhaṇḍamakṣatāṃścātiśobhanān  surabhīṇi manojñāni kusumāni ca dāpayet  
dhūpaṃ ca paramāmodaṃ sājyavarti ca dīpakam  sarvaṃ samarpayāmīti praṇavaṃ hrīmupakramāt  
namo'ntaṃcatatodadyātpāyastamadhunāplutam  sājyaśarkarayāpūpakadalīguḍapūritam  
pratyekaṃ kadalīpatre bharitaṃ ca suvāsitam  bhūrbhuvassvariti procya prokṣṇādīni kārayeta  
oṃ hrīmiti samuccāryya naivedyaṃ vahnijāyayā  pānīyaṃ nama ityuktvā parampremṇā samarpayet  
tata udvāsayetprītyā pūrvato munisattama  sthalaṃ viśodhya gaṃḍūṣācamanārghyāṇi dāpayet  
tāṃbūlaṃ dhūpa dīpau ca pradakṣiṇanamaskṛtī  vidhāya prārthayedetāśśirasyaṃjalimādadhat  
śrīmātarassuprasannā yatiṃ śivapadaiṣiṇam  rakṣaṇīya mprabruvantu parameśapadābjayoḥ  
iti saṃprārthya tāssarvā visṛjya ca yathāgatam  tāsāmprasādamuddhṛtya kanyakābhyaḥ pradāpayeta  
gobhyo vā jalamadhye vā nikṣipennānyathā kvacit  atraiva pārvaṇaṃ kuryyānnaikoddiṣṭaṃ yateḥ kvacit  
atrāyaṃ pārvaṇaśrāddhe niyamaḥ procyate mayā  taṃ śṛṇuṣva muniśreṣṭha yena śreyo bhavettataḥ  
kartā snātvā dhṛtaprāṇa upavītī samāhitaḥ  sapavitrakarastvasyāṃ puṇyatithyāmiti bruvan  
kariṣye pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhamiti saṃkalpya cottare  dadyāddarbhānuttamāṃśca hyāsanārthaṃ jalaṃ spṛśet  
tatropaveśayedbhaktyā sābhyaṃgaṃ kṛtamajjanān  āhūya caturo viprāñchivabhaktāndṛḍhavratān  
viśvedevārthaṃ bhavatā prasādaḥ kriyatāmiti  ātmane bhavatā paścādantarātmana ityapi  
paramātmana ityevaṃ procya prārthyaṃ ca tānyatiḥ  śraddhayā caraṇanteṣāṃ kuryyādyāthārthyamādarāt  
pādau prakṣālya teṣāntu prāṅmukhānupaveśya ca  gandhādibhiralaṃkṛtya bhojayecca śivā grataḥ  
gomayenopalipyātra darbhānprāgagrakalpitān  āstīryya saṃyataprāṇaḥ piṇḍānāṃ ca pradānakam  
kariṣya iti saṃkalpya maṇḍalatrayamarcya ca  ātmānamantarātmānaṃ paramātmanamapyataḥ  
caturthyantaṃ vadanpaścādimaṃ piṇḍamitīrayan  dadāmīti ca samprocya dadyātpiṇḍānsvabhaktitaḥ  
kuśodakaṃ tato dadyādyathāvidhividhānataḥ  tata utthāpya vai kuryyātpradakṣiṇanamaskṛtī  
tato dattvā brāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ ca yathāvidhi  nārāyaṇabaliṃ kuryyāttasminneva sthale dine  
rakṣārthameva sarvatra viṣṇoḥ pūjāvidhiḥ smṛtaḥ  kuryyādviṣṇormahāpūjāṃ pāyasānnaṃ nivedayet  
dvādaśātha samāhūya brāhmaṇānvedapāragān  keśavādibhirabhyarcya gandhapuṣpākṣatādibhiḥ  
upānacchatravastrādi dattvā tebhyo yathāvidhi  santoṣayenmahābhaktyā vividhairvaca naiśśubhaiḥ  
āstīryya darbhānpūrvāgrānbhūssvāhā ca bhuvassuvaḥ  praṇavādi procya bhūmau pāyasānnaṃ baliṃ haret  
ekādaśāha suvidhirmayā prokto munīśvara  dvādaśāhavidhiṃ vakṣye śṛṇuṣvādarato dvija  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ yatīnāmekādaśāhakṛtyavarṇanannāma dvāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
subrahmaṇya uvāca  dvādaśāhe samutthāya prātaḥ snātvā kṛtāhnikaḥ  śivabhaktānyatīnvāpi brāhmaṇānvā śivapriyān  
vimantrya tānsamāhūya madhyāhna cāplutāñchucīn  vidhivadbhojayedbhaktyā svādvannairvividhaiśśubhaiḥ  
sannidhau parameśasya paṃcāvaraṇamārgataḥ  pūjayettasya saṃsthāpya prāṇānāyamya vāgyataḥ  
mahāsaṃkalpamārgeṇa saṃkalpyāsmadguroriha  pūjāṃ kariṣya ityuktvā tato darbhānuspapṛśet  
pādau prakṣālya cācamya svayaṃ kartā ca vāgyataḥ  sthāpayedāsane tānvai prāṅmukhānbhasmabhūṣitān  
sadāśivādikramato dhyāyedaṣṭau ca tatra tān  parayā sambhāvanayetarānapi mune dvijān  parameṣṭhiguruṃ dhyāyetsāṃbabuddhyā svanāmataḥ  guruśca paramantasmātparāparaguruṃ tataḥ  
idamāsanamityuktvā cāsanāni prakalpayet  praṇavādidvitīyāṃte svasya nāma samuccaran  
āvāhayāmi nama ityāvāhyārghodakena tu  pādyamācamanaṃ cārghyaṃ vastragandhākṣatānapi  
dattvā puṣpairalaṃkṛtya praṇavādyaṣṭanāmabhiḥ  sacaturthauṃnamo'ntaiśca sugandhakusumaistataḥ  
dhūpadīpau hi dattvā ca sakalārādhanaṃ kṛtam  sampūrṇamastviti procya namaskuryātsamutthitaḥ  
pātrāṇi kadalīpatrāṇyāstīryādbhiviśodhya ca  śuddhānnapāyasāpūpasūpavyañjanapūrvakam  
dattvā padārthānkadalīnālikeraguḍānvitān  pātrāsanāni ca pṛthagdadyātsamprocya ca kramāt  
pariṣicya ca samprokṣya viṣṇorhavyamiti bruvan  rakṣasveti karasparśaṃ kārayitvā samutthitaḥ  
āpośanaṃ samarpyātha prārthayettānidamprati  sadāśivādayaḥ prītā varadāśca bhavantu me  
ye devā iti ca tato japtvedaṃ sākṣataṃ tyajet  namaskṛtya samutthāya sarvatrāmṛtamastviti  
uktvā prasādya ca japangaṇānāṃtvetyupa kramāt  vedādīn rudracamakau rudrasūktaṃ ca paṃca ca  
brahmāṇi bhojanānte tu yāvanmantrāṃśca sākṣatān  dattvottarāpośanaṃ ca hastāṃghrimukhaśodhanam  
kṛtvā cāntānsvāsaneṣu sthāpayitvā yathāsukham  śuddhodakampradāyātha karppūrādi yathoditam  
mukhavāsaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ ca pādukāsanapatrakam  vyajanaṃ phalakāndaṇḍaṃ vaiṇavaṃ ca pradāya tān  
pradakṣiṇanamaskāraissaṃtoṣyāśiṣamā vaheta  punaḥ praṇamya samprārthya gurubhaktimacaṃcalām  
sadāśivādayaḥ prītā gacchantu ca yathāsukham  ityudvāsya dvāradeśāvadhi samyaganuvrajan  
niruddhastaḥ parāvṛtya dvāsthairvipraiśca bandhubhiḥ  dīnānāthaiśca sahito bhuktvā tiṣṭhedyathāsukham  
vikṛtaṃ na bhavetkvāpi satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ  pratyabdameva kurvāṇo gurvārādhanamuttamam  iha bhuktvā mahābhogāñchivalokamavāpnuyāt  
 sūta uvāca  evaṃ kṛtānugrahamātmaśiṣyaṃ śrīvāmadevaṃ munivaryyamuktvā  prasannadhīrjñānivaro mahātmā kṛtvā parānugrahamāśu devaḥ  
yannaimiṣāraṇyamunīśvarāṇāṃ proktaṃ purā vyāsamunīśvareṇa  tasmādasāvādigururbhavāṃstu dvitīya āryyo bhuvane prasiddhaḥ  
śrutvā munīndro bhavato mukhājjātsanatkumāraḥ śivabhaktipūrṇaḥ  vyāsāya vaktā sa ca śaivavaryyaśśukāya vaktā bhavitā ca pūrṇaḥ  
pratyekaṃ muniśārdūlaṃ śiṣyavargacatuṣṭayam  vedādhyayanasaṃvṛttaṃ dharmasthāpanapūrvakam  
vaiśampāyana eva syātpailo jaiminireva ca  sumantuśceti catvāro vyāsaśiṣyā mahaujasaḥ  
agastyaśca pulastyaśca pulahaḥ kratureva ca  tava śiṣyā mahātmāno vāmadeva mahāmune  
sanakaśca sanandaśca sanātanamunistataḥ  sanatsujāta ityete yogivaryāḥ śivapriyāḥ  
sanatkumāraśiṣyāste sarvavedārthavittamāḥ  guruśca paramaścaiva parātparagurustataḥ  parameṣṭhiguruścaite pūjyāssyuśśukayoginaḥ  
idaṃ praṇavavijñānaṃ sthitaṃ vargacatuṣṭaye  sarvotkṛṣṭanidānaṃ ca kāśyāṃ sanmuktikāraṇam  
etanmaṇḍalamadbhutaṃ paraśivādhiṣṭhāna rūpaṃ sadāvedāntārthavicārapūrṇamatibhiḥ pūjyaṃ yatīndraiḥ param  vedādipravibhāgakalpitamahākāśādināpyāvṛtantvatsaṃtoṣakaraṃ tathāstu jagatāṃ śreyaskaraṃ śrīpradam  
idaṃ rahasyamparamaṃ śivoditaṃ vedāntasiddhātaviniścitamparam  mattaśśrutaṃ yadbhavatā tato mune bhavanmatamprājñatamā vadaṃti  
tasmādanenaiva pathā gataśśivaṃ śivohamasmīti śivo bhavedyatiḥ  pitāmahādipravibhāgamuktaye nadyo yathāsindhumimāḥ prayānti  
śrīsūta uvāca  evammunīśvarāyaitadupadiśya sureśvaraḥ  saṃsmṛtya caraṇāmbhoje pitro ssarvvasurārcite  
kailāsaśikharamprāpa kumāraśśikharāvṛtam  rājitamparamāścaryyadivyajñānaprado guruḥ  
vāmadevo'pi sacchiṣyaissaṃvṛtaśśikhivāhanam  sampraṇamya jagāmāśu kailāsamparamādbhutam  
gatvā kailāsaśikharamprāpyeśanikaṭammuniḥ  dadarśa mokṣadammāyānāśañcaraṇamīśayoḥ  
bhaktyā cārpitasarvāṃgo vismṛtya svakalevaram  papāta sannidhau bhūyo bhūyo natvā samu tthitaḥ  
tato bahuvidhaiḥ stotrairvedāgamarasotkaṭaiḥ  tuṣṭāva parameśānaṃ sāṃbikaṃ sasutaṃ muniḥ  
nidhāya caraṇatmbhojandeva devyossvamūrddhani  pūrṇānugrahamāsādya tatraiva nyavasatsukham  
bhavanto'pi viditvaivampraṇavārthammaheśvaram  vedaguhyaṃ ca sarvasvantāra kambrahma muktidam  
atraiva sukhamāsīnāḥ śrīviśveśvarapādayoḥ  sāyujyarūpāmatulāmbhajadhvammuktimuttamām  
ahaṃ gurupadāmbhojasevāyai bādarāśramam  gamiṣye bhavatāmbhūyassatsambhāṣaṇamastu me  
iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kailāsasaṃhitāyāṃ dvādaśāhakṛtyavarṇanapūrvvakavyāsādiśiṣyavargakathanannāma trayoviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ  
vyāsa uvāca  namaśśivāya somāya sagaṇāya sasūnave  pradhānapuruṣeśāya sargasthityaṃtahetave  
śaktirapratimā yasya hyaiśvaryaṃ cāpi sarvagam  svāmitvaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ saṃpracakṣate  
tamajaṃ viśvakarmāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ śivamavyayam  mahādevaṃ mahātmānaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ śivam  
dharmakṣetre mahātīrthe gaṃgākāliṃdisaṃgame  prayāge naimiṣāraṇye brahmalokasya vartmani  
munayaśśaṃsitātmānaḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ  mahaujaso mahābhāgā mahāsatraṃ vitenire  
tatra satraṃ samākarṇya teṣāmakliṣṭakarmaṇām  sākṣātsatyavatīsūnorvedavyāsasya dhīmataḥ  
śiṣyo mahātmā medhāvī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ  pañcāvayavayuktasya vākyasya guṇadoṣavit  
uttarottaravaktā ca bruvato 'pi bṛhaspateḥ  madhuraḥ śravaṇānāṃ ca manojñapadaparvaṇām  
kathānāṃ nipuṇo vaktā kālavinnayavitkaviḥ  ājagāma sa taṃ deśaṃ sūtaḥ paurāṇikottamaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sūtamāyāṃtaṃ munayo hṛṣṭamānasāḥ  tasmai sāma ca pūjāṃ ca yathāvatpratyapādayan  
pratigṛhya satāṃ pūjāṃ munibhiḥ pratipāditām  uddiṣṭamānasaṃ bheje niyukto yuktamātmanaḥ  
tatastatsaṃgamādeva munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām  sotkaṃṭhamabhavaccitaṃ śrotuṃ paurāṇikīṃ kathām  
tadā tamanukūlābhirvāgbhiḥ pūjya  maharṣayaḥ  atīvābhimukhaṃ kṛtvā vacanaṃ cedamabruvan  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  romaharṣaṇa sarvajña bhavānno bhāgyagauravāt  saṃprāptodya mahābhāga śaivarāja mahāmate  
purāṇavidyāmakhilāṃ vyāsātpratyakṣamīyivān  tasmādāścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ tvaṃ hi bhājanam  
ratnānāmurusārāṇāṃ ratnākara ivārṇavaḥ  yacca bhūtaṃ yacca bhavyaṃ yaccānyadvastu vartate  
na tavāviditaṃ kiñcittriṣu lokeṣu vidyate  tvamadṛṣṭavaśādasmaddarśanārthamihāgataḥ  
akurvankimapi śreyo na vṛthā gantumarhasi  tasmācchrāvyataraṃ puṇyaṃ satkathājñānasaṃhitam  
vedāṃtasārasarvasvaṃ purāṇaṃ śrāvayāśu naḥ  evamabhyarthitassūto munibhirvedavādibhiḥ  
ślakṣṇāṃ ca nyāyasaṃyuktāṃ pratyuvāca śubhāṃ giram  sūta uvāca  pūjito 'nugṛhītaśca bhavadbhiriti coditaḥ  
kasmātsamyaṅna vibrūyāṃ purāṇamṛṣipūjitam  abhivaṃdya mahādevaṃ devīṃ skaṃdaṃ vināyakam  
naṃdinaṃ ca tathā vyāsaṃ sākṣātsatyavatīsutam  vakṣyāmi paramaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam  
śivajñānārṇavaṃ sākṣādbhaktimuktiphalapradam  śabdārthanyāyasaṃyuktai rāgamārthairvibhūṣitam  
śvetakalpaprasaṃgena vāyunā kathitaṃ purā  vidyāsthānāni sarvāṇi purāṇānukramaṃ tathā  
tatpurāṇasya cotpattiṃ bruvato me nibodhata  aṃgāni vedāścatvāro mīmāṃsānyāyavistaraḥ  
purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyāścetāścaturdaśa  āyurvedo dhanurvedo gāṃdharvaścetyanukramāt  
arthaśāstraṃ paraṃ tasmādvidyā hyaṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ  aṣṭādaśānāṃ vidyānāmetāsāṃ bhinnavartmanām  
ādikartā kavissākṣācchūlapāṇiriti śrutiḥ  sa hi sarvajagannāthaḥ sisṛkṣurakhilaṃ jagat  
brahmāṇaṃ vidadhe sākṣātputramagre sanātanam  tasmai prathamaputrāya brahmaṇe viśvayonaye  
vidyāścemā dadau pūrvaṃ viśvasṛṣṭyarthamīśvaraḥ  pālanāya hariṃ devaṃ rakṣāśaktiṃ dadau tataḥ  
madhyamaṃ tanayaṃ viṣṇuṃ pātāraṃ brahmaṇo 'pi hi  labdhavidyena vidhinā prajāsṛṣṭiṃ vitanvatā  
prathamaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ purāṇaṃ brahmaṇā smṛtam  anaṃtaraṃ tu vaktrebhyo vedāstasya vinirgatāḥ  
pravṛttissarvaśāstrāṇāṃ tanmukhādabhavattataḥ  yadāsya vistaraṃ śaktā nādhigaṃtuṃ prajā bhuvi  
tadā vidyāsamāsārthaṃ viśveśvaraniyogataḥ  dvāparāṃteṣu viśvātmā viṣṇurviśvaṃbharaḥ prabhuḥ  
vyāsanāmnā caratyasminnavatīrya mahītale  evaṃ vyastāśca vedāśca dvāparedvāpare dvijāḥ  
nirmitāni purāṇāni anyāni ca tataḥ param  sa punardvāpare cāsminkṛṣṇadvaipāyanākhyayā  
araṇyāmiva havyāśī satyavatyāmajāyata  saṃkṣipya sa punarvedāṃścaturdhā kṛtavānmuniḥ  
vyastavedatayā loke vedavyāsa iti śrutaḥ  purāṇānāñca saṃkṣiptaṃ caturlakṣapramāṇataḥ  
adyāpi devaloke tacchatakoṭipravistaram  yo vidyāccaturo vedān sāṃgopaṇiṣadāndvijaḥ  
na cetpurāṇaṃ saṃvidyānnaiva sa syādvicakṣaṇaḥ  itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet  
bibhetyalpaśrutādvedo māmayaṃ pratariṣyati  sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvaṃtarāṇi ca  
vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva purāṇaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam  daśadhā cāṣṭadhā caitatpurāṇamupadiśyate  
bṛhatsūkṣmaprabhedena munibhistattvavittamaiḥ  brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca śaivaṃ bhāgavataṃ tathā  
bhaviṣyaṃ nāradīyaṃ ca mārkaṃḍeyamataḥ param  āgneyaṃ brahmavaivartaṃ laiṃgaṃ vārāhameva ca  
skāndaṃ ca vāmanaṃ caiva kaurmyaṃ mātsyaṃ ca gāruḍam  brahmāṃḍaṃ ceti puṇyo 'yaṃ purāṇānāmanukramaḥ  
tatra śaivaṃ turīyaṃ yacchārvaṃ sarvārthasādhakam  graṃtho lakṣapramāṇaṃ tadvyastaṃ dvādaśasaṃhitam  
nirmitaṃ tacchivenaiva tatra dharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ  taduktenaiva dharmeṇa śaivāstraivarṇikā narāḥ  
tasmādvimukutimanvicchañcchivameva samāśrayet  tamāśrityaiva devānāmapi muktirna cānyathā  
yadidaṃ śaivamākhyātaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam  tasya bhedānsamāsena bruvato me nibodhata  
vidyeśvaraṃ tathā raudraṃ vaināyakamanuttamam  aumaṃ mātṛpurāṇaṃ ca rudraikādaśakaṃ tathā  
kailāsaṃ śatarudraṃ ca śatarudrākhyameva ca  sahasrakoṭirudrākhyaṃ vāyavīyaṃ tataḥparam  
dharmasaṃjñaṃ purāṇaṃ cetyevaṃ dvādaśa saṃhitāḥ  vidyeśaṃ daśasāhasramuditaṃ graṃthasaṃkhyayā  
raudraṃ vaināyakaṃ caumaṃ mātṛkākhyaṃ tataḥ param  pratyekamaṣṭasāhasraṃ trayodaśasahasrakam  
raudrakādaśakākhyaṃ yatkailāsaṃ ṣaṭsahasrakam  śatarudraṃ trisāhasraṃ koṭirudraṃ tataḥ param  
sahasrairnavabhiryuktaṃ sarvārthajñānasaṃyutam  sahasrakoṭirudrākhyamekādaśasahasrakam  
catussahasrasaṃkhyeyaṃ vāyavīyamanuttamam  dharmasaṃjñaṃ purāṇaṃ yattaddvādaśasahasrakam  
tadevaṃ lakṣamuddiṣṭaṃ śaivaṃ śākhāvibhedataḥ  purāṇaṃ vedasāraṃ tadbhuktimuktiphalapradam  
vyāsena tattu saṃkṣiptaṃ caturviṃśatsahasrakam  śaivantatra purāṇaṃ vai caturthaṃ saptasaṃhitam  
vidyeśvarākhyā tatrādyā dvitīyā rudrasaṃhitā  tṛtīyā śatarudrākhyā koṭirudrā caturthikā  
pañcamī kathitā comā ṣaṣṭhī kailāsasaṃhitā  saptamī vāyavīyākhyā saptaivaṃ saṃhitā iha  
vidyeśvaraṃ dvisāhasraṃ raudraṃ pañcaśatāyutam  triṃśattathā dvisāhasraṃ sārdhaikaśatamīritam  
śatarudrantathā koṭirudraṃ vyomayugādhikam  dvisāhasraṃ ca dviśataṃ tathomaṃ bhūsahasrakam  
catvāriṃśatsāṣṭaśataṃ kailāsaṃ bhūsahasrakam  catvāriṃśacca dviśataṃ vāyavīyamataḥ param  
catussāhasrasaṃkhyākamevaṃ saṃkhyāvibhedataḥ  śrutamparamapuṇyantu purāṇaṃ śivasaṃjñakam  
catuḥsāhasrakaṃ yattu vāyavīyamudīritam  tadidaṃ vartayiṣyāmi bhāgadvayasamanvitam  
nāvedaviduṣe vācyamidaṃ śāstramanuttamam  na caivāśraddhadhānāya nāpurāṇavide tathā  
parīkṣitāya śiṣyāya dhārmikāyānasūyave  pradeyaṃ śivabhaktāya śivadharmānusāriṇe  
purāṇasaṃhitā yasya prasādānmayi vartate  namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase  
sūta uvāca  purā kālena mahatā kalpetīte punaḥpunaḥ  asminnupasthite kalpe pravṛtte sṛṣṭhikarmaṇi  
pratiṣṭhitāyāṃ vārtāyāṃ prabuddhāsu prajāsu ca  munīnāṃ ṣaṭkulīyānāṃ bruvatāmitaretaram  
idaṃ paramidaṃ neti vivādassumahānabhūt  parasya durnirūpatvānna jātastatra niścayaḥ  
te 'bhijagmurvidhātāraṃ draṣṭuṃ brahmāṇamavyayam  yatrāste bhagavān brahmā stūyamānassurāsuraiḥ  
meruśṛṃge śubhe ramye devadānavasaṃkule  siddhacāraṇasaṃvāde yakṣagaṃdharvasevite  
vihaṃgasaṃghasaṃghuṣṭe maṇividrumabhūṣite  nikuṃjakaṃdaradarīgṛhānirjharaśobhite  
tatra brahmavanaṃ nāma nānāmṛgasamākulam  daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ śatayojanamāyatam  
surasāmalapānīyapūrṇaramyasarovaram  mattabhramarasaṃchannaramyapuṣpitapādapam  
taruṇādityasaṃkāśaṃ tatra cāru mahatpuram  durdharṣabaladṛptānāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām  
taptajāṃbūnadamayaṃ prāṃśuprākāratoraṇam  nirvyūhavalabhīkūṭapratolīśatamaṃḍitam  
mahārhamaṇicitrābhirlelihānamivāṃbaram  mahābhavanakoṭībhiranekābhiralaṃkṛtam  
tasminnivasati brahmā sabhyaiḥ sārdhaṃ prajāpatiḥ  tatra gatvā mahātmānaṃ sākṣāllokapitāmaham  
daddaśurmunayo devā devarṣigaṇasevitam  śuddhacāmīkaraprakhyaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  
prasannavadanaṃ saumyaṃ padmapatrāyatekṣaṇam  divyakāṃtisamāyuktaṃ divyagaṃdhānulepanam  
divyaśuklāṃbaradharaṃ divyamālāvibhūṣitam  surāsurendrayogīṃdravaṃdyamānapadāṃbujam  
sarvalakṣaṇayuktāṃgyā labdhacāmarahastayā  bhrājamānaṃ sarasvatyā prabhayeva divākaram  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayassarve prasannavadanekṣaṇāḥ  śirasyaṃjalimādhāya tuṣṭuvussurapuṃgavam  
munaya ūcuḥ  namastrimūrtaye tubhyaṃ sargasthityaṃtahetave  puruṣāya purāṇāya brahmaṇe paramātmane  
namaḥ pradhānadehāya pradhānakṣobhakāriṇe  trayoviṃśatibhedena vikṛtāyāvikāriṇe  
namo brahmāṇḍadehāya brahmāṃḍodaravartine  tatra saṃsiddhakāryāya saṃsiddhakaraṇāya ca  
namostu sarvalokāya sarvalokavidhāyine  sarvātmadehasaṃyoga viyogavidhihetave  
tvayaiva nikhilaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ saṃhṛtaṃ pālitaṃ jagat  tathāpi māyayā nātha na vidmastvāṃ pitāmaha  
sūta uvāca  evaṃ brahmā mahābhāgairmaharṣibhirabhiṣṭutaḥ  prāha gaṃbhīrayā vācā munīn prahlādayanniva  
brahmovāca  ṛṣayo he mahābhāgā mahāsattvā mahaujasaḥ  kimarthaṃ sahitāssarve yūyamatra samāgatāḥ  
tamevaṃvādinaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ brahmavittamāḥ  vāgbhirvinayagarbhābhissarve prāṃjalayo 'bruvan  
munaya ūcuḥ  bhagavannaṃdhakāreṇa mahatā vayamāvṛtāḥ  khinnā vivadamānāśca na paśyāmo 'tra yatparam  
tvaṃ hi sarvajagaddhātā sarvakāraṇakāraṇam  tvayā hyaviditaṃ nātha neha kiṃcana vidyate  
kaḥ pumān sarvasattvebhyaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ  viśuddhaḥ paripūrṇaśca śāśvataḥ parameśvaraḥ  
kenaiva citrakṛtyena prathamaṃ sṛjyate jagat  tattvaṃ vada mahāprājña svasaṃdehāpanuttaye  
evaṃ pṛṣṭastadā brahmā vismayasmeravīkṣaṇaḥ  devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca munīnāmapi sannidhau  
utthāya suciraṃ dhyātvā rudra ityuddharan girim  ānaṃdaklinnasarvāṃgaḥ kṛtāṃjalirabhāṣata  
brahamovāca  yato vāco nivartaṃte aprāpya manasā saha  ānaṃdaṃ yasya vai vidvānna bibheti kutaścana  
yasmātsarvamidaṃ brahmaviṣṇurudrendrapūrvakam  saha bhūtendriyaiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamaṃ saṃprasūyate  
kāraṇānāṃ ca yo dhātā dhyātā paramakāraṇam  na saṃprasūyate 'nyasmātkutaścana kadācana  
sarvaiśvaryeṇa saṃpanno nāmnā sarveśvaraḥ svayam  sarvairmumukṣubhirdhyeyaśśaṃbhurākāśamadhyagaḥ  
yo 'gre māṃ vidadhe putraṃ jñānaṃ ca prahiṇoti me  tatprasādānmayālabdhaṃ prājāpatyamidaṃ padam  
īśo vṛkṣa iva stabdho ya eko divi tiṣṭhati  yenedamakhilaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa mahātmanā  
eko bahūnāṃ jaṃtūnāṃ niṣkriyāṇāṃ ca sakriyaḥ  ya eko bahudhā bījaṃ karoti sa maheśvaraḥ  
jīvairebhirimāṃllokānsarvānīśo ya īśate  
ya eko bhāgavānrudro na dvitīyo 'sti kaścana  
sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭo 'pi yaḥ paraiḥ  alakṣyo lakṣayanviśvamadhitiṣṭhati sarvadā  
yastu kālātpramuktāni kāraṇānyakhilānyapi  anantaśaktirevaiko bhagavānadhitiṣṭhati  
na yasya divaso rātrirna samāno na cādhikaḥ  svabhāvikī parāśaktirnityā jñānakriye api  
yadidaṃ kṣaramavyaktaṃ yadapyamṛtamakṣaram  tāvubhāvakṣarātmānāveko devaḥ svayaṃ haraḥ  
īśate tadabhidhyānādyojanāsattvabhāvanaḥ  bhūyo hyasya paśorante viśvamāyā nivartate  
yasminna bhāsate vidyunna sūryo na ca candramāḥ  yasya bhāsā vibhātīdamityeṣā śāśvatī śrutiḥ  
eko devo mahādevo vijñeyastu maheśvaraḥ  na tasya paramaṃ kiṃcitpadaṃ samadhigamyate  
ayamādiranādyantassvabhāvādeva nirmalaḥ  svatantraḥ paripūrṇaśca svecchādhīnaścarācaraḥ  
aprākṛtavapuḥ śrīmāṃllakṣyalakṣaṇavarjitaḥ  ayaṃ mukto mocakaśca hyakālaḥ kālacodakaḥ  
sarvoparikṛtāvāsassarvāvāsaśca sarvavit  ṣaḍvidhādhvamayasyāsya sarvasya jagataḥ patiḥ  
uttarottarabhūtānāmuttaraśca niruttaraḥ  anantānantasandohamakaraṃdamadhuvrataḥ  
akhaṃḍajagadaṃḍānāṃ piṃḍīkaraṇapaṃḍitaḥ  audāryavīryagāṃbhīryamādhuryamakarālayaḥ  
naivāsya sadṛśaṃ vastu nādhikaṃ cāpi kiṃcana  atulaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rājarājaśca tiṣṭhati  
anena citrakṛtyena prathamaṃ sṛjyate jagat  aṃtakāle punaścedaṃ tasminpralayameṣyate  
asya bhūtāni vaśyāni ayaṃ sarvaniyojakaḥ  ayaṃ tu parayā bhaktyā dṛśyate nānyathā kvacit  
vratāni sarvadānāni tapāṃsi niyamāstathā  kathitāni purā sadbhirbhāvārthaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ  
hariścāhaṃ ca rudraśca tathānye ca surāsurāḥ  tapobhirugrairadyāpi tasya darśanakāṃkṣiṇaḥ  
adṛśyaḥ patitairmūḍhairdurjanairapi kutsitaiḥ  bhaktairantarbahiścāpi pūjyaḥ saṃbhāṣya eva ca  
tadidaṃ trividhaṃ rūpaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tataḥ param  asmadādyamarairdṛśyaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tu yogibhiḥ  
tataḥ paraṃ tu yannityaṃ jñānamānaṃdamavyayam  tanniṣṭhaistatparairbhaktairdṛśyaṃ tadvratamāśritaiḥ  
bahunātra kimuktena guhyādguhyataraṃ param  śive bhaktirna sandehastayā yukto vimucyate  
prasādādeva sā bhaktiḥ prasādo bhaktisaṃbhavaḥ  yathā cāṃkurato bījaṃ bījato vā yathāṃkuraḥ  
prasādapūrvikā eva paśossarvatra siddhayaḥ  sa eva sādhanairante sarvairapi ca sādhyate  
prasādasādhanaṃ dharmassa ca vedena darśitaḥ  tadabhyāsavaśātsāmyaṃ pūrvayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ  
sāmyātprasādasaṃparko dharmasyātiśayastataḥ  dharmātiśayamāsādya paśoḥ pāpaparikṣayaḥ  
evaṃ prakṣīṇapāpasya bahubhirjanmabhiḥ kramāt  sāṃbe sarveśvare bhaktirjñānapūrvā prajāyate  
bhāvānuguṇamīśasya prasādo vyatiricyate  prasādātkarmasaṃtyāgaḥ phalato na svarūpataḥ  
tasmātkarmaphalatyāgācchivadharmānvayaḥ śubhaḥ  sa ca gurvanapekṣaśca tadapekṣa iti dvidhā  
tatrānapekṣātsāpekṣo mukhyaḥ śataguṇādhikaḥ  śivadharmānvayasyāsya śivajñānasamanvayaḥ  
jñanānvayavaśātpuṃsaḥ saṃsāre doṣadarśanam  tato viṣayavairāgyaṃ vairāgyādbhāvasādhanam  
bhāvasiddhyupapannasya dhyāne niṣṭhā na karmaṇi  jñānadhyānābhiyuktasya puṃso yogaḥ pravartate  
yogena tu parā bhaktiḥ prasādastadanaṃtaram  prasādānmucyate jaṃturmuktaḥ śivasamo bhavet  
anugrahaprakārasya kramo 'yamavivakṣitaḥ  yādṛśī yogyatā puṃsastasya tādṛganugrahaḥ  
garbhastho mucyate kaścijjāyamānastathāparaḥ  bālo vā taruṇo vātha vṛddho vā mucyate paraḥ  
tiryagyonigataḥ kaścinmucyate nārako 'paraḥ  aparastu padaṃ prāpto mucyate svapadakṣaye  
kaścitkṣīṇapado bhūtvā punarāvartya mucyate  kaścidadhvagatastasmin sthitvāsthitvā vimucyate  
tasmānnaikaprakāreṇa narāṇāṃ muktiriṣyate  jñānabhāvānurūpeṇa prasādenaiva nirvṛtiḥ  
tasmādasya prasādārthaṃ vāṅmanodoṣavarjitāḥ  dhyāyaṃtaśśivamevaikaṃ sadāratanayāgnayaḥ  
tanniṣṭhāstatparāssarve tadyuktāstadupāśrayāḥ  sarvakriyāḥ prakurvāṇāstameva manasāgatāḥ  
dīrghasūtrasamārabdhaṃ divyavarṣasahasrakam  satrāṃte maṃtrayogena vāyustatra gamiṣyati  
sa eva bhavataḥ śreyaḥ sopāyaṃ kathayiṣyati  tato vārāṇasī puṇyā purī paramaśobhanā  
gaṃtavyā yatra viśveśo devyā saha pinākadhṛk  sadā viharati śrīmān bhaktānugrahakāraṇāt  
tatrāścaryaṃ mahaddṛṣṭvā matsamīpaṃ gamiṣyatha  tato vaḥ kathayiṣyāmi mokṣopāya dvijottamāḥ  
yenaikajanmanā muktiryuṣmatkaratale sthitā  anekajanmasaṃsārabaṃdhanirmokṣakāriṇī  
etanmanomayaṃ cakraṃ mayā sṛṣṭaṃ visṛjyate  yatrāsya śīryate nemiḥ sa deśastapasaśśubhaḥ  
ityuktvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ cakraṃ dṛṣṭvā manomayam  praṇipatya mahādevaṃ visasarja pitāmahaḥ  
te 'pi hṛṣṭatarā viprāḥ praṇamya jagatāṃ prabhum  prayayustasya cakrasya yatra nemiraśīryata  
cakraṃ tadapi saṃkṣiptaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ cāruśilātale  vimalasvādupānīye nijapāta vane kvacit  
tadvanaṃ tena vikhyātaṃ naimiṣaṃ munipūjitam  anekayakṣagaṃdharvavidyādharasamākulam  
aṣṭādaśa samudrasya dvīpānaśnanpurūravāḥ  vilāsavaśamurvaśyā yāto daivena coditaḥ  
akrameṇa haranmohādyajñavāṭaṃ hiraṇmayam  munibhiryatra saṃkruddhaiḥ kuśavajrairnipātitaḥ  
viśvaṃ sisṛkṣamāṇā vai yatra viśvasṛjaḥ purā  satramārebhire divyaṃ brahmajñā gārhapatyagāḥ  
ṛṣibhiryatra vidvadbhiḥ śabdārthanyāyakovidaiḥ  śaktiprajñākriyāyogairvidhirāsīdanuṣṭhitaḥ  
yatra vedavido nityaṃ vedavādabahiṣkṛtān  vādajalpabalairghnaṃti vacobhirativādinaḥ  
sphaṭikamayamahībhṛtpādajābhyaśśilābhyaḥ prasaradamṛtakalpassvacchapānīyaramyam  atirasaphalavṛkṣaprāyamavyālasattvaṃ tapasa ucitamāsīnnaimiṣaṃ tanmunīnām  
sūta uvāca  tasmindeśe mahābhāgā munayaśśaṃsitavratāḥ  arcayaṃto mahādevaṃ satramārebhire tadā  
tacca satraṃ pravavṛte sarvāścaryaṃ maharṣiṇām  
viśvaṃ sisṛkṣamāṇānāṃ purā viśvasṛjāmiva  
atha kāle gate satre samāpte bhūridakṣiṇe  pitāmahaniyogena vāyustatrāgamatsvayam  
śiṣyassvayaṃbhuvo devassarvapratyakṣadṛgvaśī  ājñāyāṃ maruto yasya saṃsthitāssaptasaptakāḥ  
prerayañchaśvadaṃgāni prāṇādyābhiḥ svavṛttibhiḥ  sarvabhūtaśarīrāṇāṃ kurute yaśca dhāraṇam  
aṇimādibhiraṣṭābhiraiśvaryaiśca samanvitaḥ  tiryakkālādibhirmedhyairbhuvanāni bibharti yaḥ  
ākāśayonirdviguṇaḥ sparśaśabdasamanvayāt  tejasāṃ prakṛtiśceti yamāhustattvaciṃtakāḥ  
tamāśramagataṃ dṛṣṭvā munayo dīrghasatriṇaḥ  pitāmahavacaḥ smṛtvā praharṣamatulaṃ yayuḥ  
abhyutthāya tatassarve praṇamyāṃbarasaṃbhavam  cāmīkaramayaṃ tasmai viṣṭaraṃ samakalpayan  
sopi tatra samāsīno munibhissamyagarcitaḥ  pratinaṃdya ca tān sarvān papraccha kuśalaṃ tataḥ  
vāyuruvāca  atra vaḥ kuśalaṃ viprāḥ kaccidvṛtte mahākratau  kaccidyajñahano daityā na bādheransuradviṣaḥ  
prāyaścittaṃ duriṣṭaṃ vā na kaccitsamajāyata  stotraśastragṛhairdevān pitḥn pitryaiśca karmabhiḥ  
kaccidabhyarcya yuṣmābhirvidhirāsītsvanuṣṭhitaḥ  nivṛtte ca mahāsatre paścātkiṃ vaścikīrṣitam  
ityuktā munayaḥ sarve vāyunā śivabhāvinā  prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ pūtāḥ pratyūcurvinayānvitāḥ  
munaya ūcuḥ  adya naḥ kuśalaṃ sarvamadya sādhu bhavettapaḥ  asmacchreyobhivṛddhyarthaṃ bhavānatrāgato yataḥ  
śṛṇu cedaṃ purāvṛttaṃ tamasākrāṃtamānasaiḥ  upāsitaḥ purāsmābhirvijñānārthaṃ prajāpatiḥ  
sopyasmānanugṛhyāha śaraṇyaśśaraṇāgatān  sarvasmādadhiko rudro viprāḥ paramakāraṇam  
tamapratarkyaṃ yāthātmyaṃ bhaktimāneva paśyati  bhaktiścāsya prasādena prasādādeva nirvṛtiḥ  
tasmādasya prasādārthaṃ naimiṣe satrayogataḥ  yajadhvaṃ dīrghasatreṇa rudraṃ paramakāraṇam  
tatprasādena satrāṃte vāyustatrāgamiṣyati  tanmukhājjñānalābho vastatra śreyo bhaviṣyati  
ityādiśya vayaṃ sarve preṣitā parameṣṭhinā  asmindeśe mahābhāga tavāgamanakāṃkṣiṇaḥ  
dīrghasatraṃ samāsīnā divyavarṣasahasrakam  atastavāgamādanyatprārthyaṃ no nāsti kiṃcana  
ityākarṇya purāvṛttamṛṣīṇāṃ dīrghasatriṇām  vāyuḥ prītamanā bhūtvā tatrāsīnmunisaṃvṛtaḥ  
tatastairmunibhiḥ pṛṣṭasteṣāṃ bhāvavivṛddhaye  sargādi śārvamaiśvaryaṃ samāsāda vadadvibhuḥ  
sūta uvāca  tatra pūrvaṃ mahābhāgā naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ  praṇipatya yathānyāyaṃ papracchuḥ pavanaṃ prabhum  
naimiṣīyā ūcuḥ  bhavān kathamanuprāpto jñānamīśvaragocaram  kathaṃ ca śivabhāvaste brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ  
vāyuruvāca  ekonaviṃśatiḥ kalpo vijñeyaḥ śvetalohitaḥ  tasminkalpe caturvaktrassraṣṭukāmo 'tapattapaḥ  
tapasā tena tīvreṇa tuṣṭastasya pitā svayam  divyaṃ kaumāramāsthāya rūpaṃ rūpavatāṃ varaḥ  
śveto nāma munirbhūtvā divyāṃ vācamudīrayan  darśanaṃ pradadau tasmai devadevo maheśvaraḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā pitaraṃ brahmā brahmaṇo 'dhipatiṃ patim  praṇamya paramajñānaṃ gāyatryā saha labdhavān  
tatassa labdhavijñāno viśvakarmā caturmukhaḥ  asṛjatsarvabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca  
yataśśrutvāmṛtaṃ labdhaṃ brahmaṇā parameśvarāt  tatastadvadanādeva mayā labdhaṃ tapobalāt  
munaya ūcuḥ  kiṃ tajjñānaṃ tvayā labdhaṃ tathyāttathyaṃtaraṃ śubham  yatra kṛtvā parāṃ niṣṭhāṃ puruṣassukhamṛcchati  
vayuruvāca  paśupāśapatijñānaṃ yallabdhaṃ tu mayā purā  tatra niṣṭhā parā kāryā puruṣeṇa sukhārthinā  
ajñānaprabhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ jñānenaiva nivartate  jñānaṃ vastuparicchedo vastu ca dvividhaṃ smṛtam  
ajaḍaṃ ca jaḍaṃ caiva niyaṃtṛ ca tayorapi  paśuḥ pāśaḥ patiśceti kathyate tattrayaṃ kramāt  
akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva kṣarākṣaraparaṃ tathā  tadetattritayaṃ bhūmnā kathyate tattvavedibhiḥ  
akṣaraṃ paśurityuktaḥ kṣaraṃ pāśa udāhṛtaḥ  kṣarākṣaraparaṃ yattatpatirityabhidhīyate  
munaya ūcuḥ  kiṃ tadakṣaramityuktaṃ kiṃ ca kṣaramudāhṛtam  tayośca paramaṃ kiṃ vā tadetadbrūhi māruta  
vāyuruvāca  prakṛtiḥ kṣaramityuktaṃ puruṣo 'kṣara ucyate  tāvimau prerayatyanyassa parā parameśvaraḥ  
munaya ūcuḥ  kaiṣā prakṛtirityuktā ka eṣa puruṣo mataḥ  anayoḥ kena sambandhaḥ koyaṃ preraka īśvaraḥ  
vāyuruvāca  māyā prakṛtiruddiṣṭā puruṣo māyayā vṛtaḥ  saṃbandho mūlakarmabhyāṃ śivaḥ preraka īśvaraḥ  
munaya ūcuḥ  keyaṃ māyā samā khyātā kiṃrūpo māyayā vṛtaḥ  mūlaṃ kīdṛkkuto vāsya kiṃ śivatvaṃ kutaśśivaḥ  
vāyuruvāca  māyā māheśvarī śaktiścidrūpo māyayā vṛtaḥ  malaścicchādako naijo viśuddhiśśivatā svataḥ  
munaya ūcuḥ  āvṛṇoti kathaṃ māyā vyāpinaṃ kena hetunā  kimarthaṃ cāvṛtiḥ puṃsaḥ kena vā vinivartate  
vāyuruvāca  āvṛtirvyapino 'pi syādvyāpi yasmātkalādyapi  hetuḥ karmaiva bhogārthaṃ nivarteta malakṣayāt  
munaya ūcuḥ  kalādi kathyate kiṃ tatkarma vā kimudāhṛtam  tatkimādi kimantaṃ vā kiṃ phalaṃ vā kimāśrayam  
kasya bhogena kiṃ bhogyaṃ kiṃ vā tadbhogasādhanam  malakṣayasya ko hetuḥ kīdṛkkṣīṇamalaḥ pumān  
vāyuruvāca  kalā vidyā ca rāgaśca kālo niyatireva ca  kalādayassamākhyātā yo bhoktā puruṣo bhavet  
puṇyapāpātmakaṃ karma sukhaduḥkhaphalaṃ tu yat  anādimalabhogāntamajñānātmasamāśrayam  
bhogaḥ karmavināśāya bhogamavyaktamucyate  bāhyāṃtaḥkaraṇadvāraṃ śarīraṃ bhogasādhanam  
bhāvātiśayalabdhena prasādena malakṣayaḥ  kṣīṇe cātmamale tasmin pumāñcchivasamo bhavet  
munaya ūcuḥ  kalādipañcatattvānāṃ kiṃ karma pṛthagucyate  bhokteti puruṣaśceti yenātmā vyapadiśyate  
kimātmakaṃ tadavyaktaṃ kenākāreṇa bhujyate  kiṃ tasya śaraṇaṃ bhuktau śarīraṃ ca kimucyate  
vāyuruvāca  dikkriyāvyaṃjakā vidyā kālo rāgaḥ pravartakaḥ  kālo 'vacchedakastatra niyatistu niyāmikā  
avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yattattriguṇaṃ prabhavāpyayam  pradhānaṃ prakṛtiśceti yadāhustattvaciṃtakāḥ  
kalātastadabhivyaktamanabhivyaktalakṣaṇam  sukhaduḥkhavimohātmā bhujyate guṇavāṃstridhā  
sattvaṃ rajastama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ  prakṛtau sūkṣmarūpeṇa tile tailamiva sthitāḥ  
sukhaṃ ca sukhahetuśca samāsātsāttvikaṃ smṛtam  rājasaṃ tadviparyāsātstaṃbhamohau tu tāmasau  
sāttvikyūrdhvagatiḥ proktā tāmasī syādadhogatiḥ  madhyamā tu gatiryā sā rājasī paripaṭhyate  
tanmātrāpañcakaṃ caiva bhūtapañcakameva ca  jñāneṃdriyāṇi pañcaikyaṃ pañca karmendriyāṇi ca  
pradhānabuddhyahaṃkāramanāṃsi ca catuṣṭayam  samāsādevamavyaktaṃ savikāramudāhṛtam  
tatkāraṇadaśāpannamavyaktamiti kathyate  vyaktaṃ kāryadaśāpannaṃ śarīrādighaṭādivat  
yathā ghaṭādikaṃ kāryaṃ mṛdādernātibhidyate  śarīrādi tathā vyaktamavyaktānnātibhidyate  
tasmādavyaktamevaikyakāraṇaṃ karaṇāni ca  śarīraṃ ca tadādhāraṃ tadbhogyaṃ cāpi netarat  
munaya ūcuḥ  buddhīndriyaśarīrebhyo vyatirekasya kasyacit  ātmaśabdābhidheyasya vastuto 'pi kutaḥ sthitiḥ  
vāyuruvāca  buddhīndriyaśarīrebhyo vyatireko vibhordhruvam  astyeva kaścidātmeti hetustatra sudurgamaḥ  
buddhīndriyaśarīrāṇāṃ nātmatā sadbhiriṣyate  smṛteraniyatajñānādayāvaddehavedanāt  
ataḥ smartānubhūtānāmaśeṣajñeyagocaraḥ  antaryāmīti vedeṣu vedāṃteṣu ca gīyate  
sarvaṃ tatra sa sarvatra vyāpya tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥ  tathāpi kvāpi kenāpi vyaktameṣa na dṛśyate  
naivāyaṃ cakṣuṣā grāhyo nāparairindriyairapi  manasaiva pradīptena mahānātmāvasīyate   
na ca strī na pumāneṣa naiva cāpi napuṃsakaḥ  naivordhvaṃ nāpi tiryaknādhastānna kutaścana  
aśarīraṃ śarīreṣu caleṣu sthāṇumavyayam  sadā paśyati taṃ dhīro naraḥ pratyavamarśanāt  
kimatra bahunoktena puruṣo dehataḥ pṛthak  apṛthagye tu paśyaṃti hyasamyakteṣu darśanam  
yaccharīramidaṃ proktaṃ puruṣasya tataḥ param  aśuddhamavaśaṃ duḥkhamadhruvaṃ na ca vidyate  
vipadāṃ vījabhūtena puruṣastena saṃyutaḥ  sukhī duḥkhī ca mūḍhaśca bhavati svena karmaṇā  
adbhirāplavitaṃ kṣetraṃ janayatyaṃkuraṃ yathā  ājñānātplāvitaṃ karma dehaṃ janayate tathā  
atyaṃtamasukhāvāsāssmṛtāścaikāṃtamṛtyavaḥ  anāgatā atītāśca tanavo 'sya sahasraśaḥ  
āgatyāgatya śīrṇeṣu śarīreṣu śarīriṇaḥ  atyaṃtavasatiḥ kvāpi na kenāpi ca labhyate  
chāditaśca viyuktaśca śarīraireṣu lakṣyate  caṃdrabiṃbavadākāśe taralairabhrasaṃcayaiḥ  
anekadehabhedena bhinnā vṛttirihātmanaḥ  aṣṭāpadaparikṣepe hyakṣamudreva lakṣyate  
naivāsya bhavitā kaścinnāsau bhavati kasyacit  pathi saṃgama evāyaṃ dāraiḥ putraiśca baṃdhubhiḥ  
yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau  sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ tadvadbhūtasamāgamaḥ  
sa paśyati śarīraṃ taccharīraṃ tanna paśyati  tau paśyati paraḥ kaścittāvubhau taṃ na paśyataḥ  
brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāṃtaśca paśavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ  paśūnāmeva sarveṣāṃ proktametannidarśanam  
sa eṣa badhyate pāśaiḥ sukhaduḥkhāśanaḥ paśuḥ  līlāsādhanabhūto ya īśvarasyeti sūrayaḥ  
ajño jaṃturanīśo 'yamātmanassukhaduḥkhayoḥ  īśvaraprerito gacchetsvargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā  
sūta uvāca  ityākarṇyānilavaco munayaḥ prītamānasāḥ  procuḥ praṇamya taṃ vāyuṃ śaivāgamavicakṣaṇam  
munaya ūcuḥ  yo 'yaṃ paśuriti prokto yaśca pāśa udāhṛtaḥ  abhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ kaścitkoyamasti tayoḥ patiḥ  
vāyuruvāca  asti kaścidaparyaṃtaramaṇīyaguṇāśrayaḥ  patirviśvasya nirmātā paśupāśavimocanaḥ  
abhāve tasya viśvasya sṛṣṭireṣā kathaṃ bhavet  acetanatvādajñānādanayoḥ paśupāśayoḥ  
pradhānaparamāṇvādi yāvatkiṃcidacetanam  tatkartṛkaṃ svayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ buddhimatkāraṇaṃ vinā  
jagacca kartṛsāpekṣaṃ kāryaṃ sāvayavaṃ yataḥ  tasmātkāryasya kartṛtvaṃ patyurna paśupāśayoḥ  
paśorapi ca kartṛtvaṃ patyuḥ preraṇapūrvakam  ayathākaraṇajñānamaṃdhasya gamanaṃ yathā  
ātmānaṃ ca pṛthaṅmatvā preritāraṃ tataḥ pṛthak  asau juṣṭastatastena hyamṛtatvāya kalpate  
paśoḥ pāśasya patyuśca tattvato 'sti padaṃ param  brahmavittadviditvaiva yonimukto bhaviṣyati  
saṃyuktametaddvitayaṃ kṣaramakṣarameva ca  vyaktāvyaktaṃ bibhartīśo viśvaṃ viśvavimocakaḥ  
bhoktā bhogyaṃ prerayitā maṃtavyaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam  nātaḥ paraṃ vijānadbhirveditavyaṃ hi kiṃcanaḥ  
tileṣu vā yathā tailaṃ dadhni vā sarpirarpitam  yathāpaḥ srotasi vyāptā yathāraṇyāṃ hutāśanaḥ  
evameva mahātmānamātmanyātmavilakṣaṇam  satyena tapasā caiva nityayukto 'nupaśyati  
ya eko jālavānīśa īśānībhissvaśaktibhiḥ  sarvāṃllokānimān kṛtvā eka eva sa īśate   
eka eva tadā rudro na dvitīyo 'sti kaścana  saṃsṛjya viśvabhuvanaṃ goptā te saṃcukoca yaḥ  
viśvataścakṣurevāyamutāyaṃ viśvatomukhaḥ  tathaiva viśvatobāhuviśvataḥ pādasaṃyutaḥ  
dyāvābhūmī ca janayan deva eko maheśvaraḥ  sa eva sarvadevānāṃ prabhavaścodbhavastathā  
hiraṇyagarbhaṃ devānāṃ prathamaṃ janayedayam  viśvasmādadhiko rudro maharṣiriti hi śrutiḥ  
vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāṃtamamṛtaṃ dhruvam  ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastātsaṃsthitaṃ prabhum  
asmānnāsti paraṃ kiṃcidaparaṃ paramātmanaḥ  nāṇīyo 'sti na ca jyāyastena pūrṇamidaṃ jagat  
sarvānanaśirogrīvaḥ sarvabhūtaguhāśayaḥ  sarvavyāpī ca bhagavāṃstasmātsarvagataśśivaḥ  
sarvataḥ pāṇipādo 'yaṃ sarvato 'kṣiśiromukhaḥ  sarvataḥ śrutimāṃlloke sarvamāvṛtya tiṣṭhati  
sarvendriyaguṇābhāsassarvendriyavivarjitaḥ  sarvasya prabhurīśānaḥ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ suhṛt  
acakṣurapi yaḥ paśyatyakarṇo 'pi śṛṇoti yaḥ  sarvaṃ vetti na vettāsya tamāhuḥ puruṣaṃ param  
aṇoraṇīyānmahato mahīyānayamavyayaḥ  guhāyāṃ nihitaścāpi jaṃtorasya maheśvaraḥ  
tamakratuṃ kratuprāyaṃ mahimātiśayānvitam  dhātuḥ prasādādīśānaṃ vītaśokaḥ prapaśyati  
vedāhamenamajaraṃ purāṇaṃ sarvagaṃ vibhum  nirodhaṃ janmano yasya vadaṃti brahmavādinaḥ  
eko 'pi trīnimāṃllokān bahudhā śaktiyogataḥ  vidadhāti vicetyaṃte  viśvamādau maheśvaraḥ  
viśvadhātrītyajākhyā ca śaivī citrā kṛtiḥ parā  tāmajāṃ lohitāṃ śuklāṃ kṛṣṇāmekāṃ tvajaḥ prajām  
janitrīmanuśete 'nyojuṣamāṇassvarūpiṇīm  tāmevājāmajo 'nyastu bhaktabhogā jahāti ca  
dvau suparṇau ca sayujau samānaṃ vṛkṣamāsthitau  eko 'tti pippalaṃ svādu paro 'naśnan prapaśyati  
vṛkṣesmin puruṣo magno guhyamānaśca śocati  juṣṭamanyaṃ yadā paśyedīśaṃ paramakāraṇam  
tadāsya mahimānaṃ ca vītaśokassukhī bhavet  chaṃdāṃsi yajñāḥ ṛtavo yadbhūtaṃ bhavyameva ca  
māyī viśvaṃ sṛjatyasminniviṣṭo māyayā paraḥ  māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram  
tasyāstvavayavaireva vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat  sūkṣmātisūkṣmamīśānaṃ kalalasyāpi madhyataḥ  
sraṣṭāramapi viśvasya veṣṭitāraṃ ca tasya tu  śivameveśvaraṃ jñātvā śāṃtimatyaṃtamṛcchati  
sa eva kālo goptā ca viśvasyādhipatiḥ prabhuḥ  taṃ viśvādhipatiṃ jñātvā mṛtyupāśātpramucyate  
ghṛtātparaṃ maṃḍamiva sūkṣmaṃ jñātvā sthitaṃ prabhum  sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaṃ ca sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  
eṣa eva paro devo viśvakarmā maheśvaraḥ  hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaṃ taṃ jñātvaivāmṛtamaśnute  
yadā samastaṃ na divā na rātrirna sadapyasat  kevalaśśiva evaiko yataḥ prajñā purātanī  
nainamūrdhvaṃ na tiryakca na madhyaṃ paryajigrahat  na tasya pratimā cāsti yasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ  
ajātamimamevaike buddhā janmani bhīravaḥ  rudrasyāsya prapadyaṃte rakṣārthaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ sukham  
dve akṣare brahmapare tvanaṃte samudāhṛte  vidyāvidye samākhyāte nihite yatra gūḍhavat  
kṣaraṃ tvavidyā hyamṛtaṃ vidyeti parigīyate  te ubhe īśate yastu so 'nyaḥ khalu maheśvaraḥ  
ekaikaṃ bahudhā jālaṃ vikurvannekavacca yaḥ  sarvādhipatyaṃ kurute sṛṣṭvā sarvān pratāpavān  
diśa ūrdhvamadhastiryakbhāsayan bhrājate svayam  yo niḥsvabhāvādapyeko vareṇyastvadhitiṣṭhati  
svabhāvavācakān sarvān vācyāṃśca pariṇāmayan  guṇāṃśca bhogyabhoktṛtve tadviśvamadhitiṣṭhati  
te vai guhyopaṇiṣadi gūḍhaṃ brahma parātparam  brahmayoniṃ jagatpūrvaṃ vidurdevā maharṣayaḥ  
bhāvagrāhyamanīhākhyaṃ bhāvābhāvakaraṃ śivam  kalāsargakaraṃ devaṃ ye viduste jahustanum  
svabhāvameke manyaṃte kālameke vimohitāḥ  devasya mahimā hyeṣa yenedaṃ bhrāmyate jagat  
yenedamāvṛtaṃ nityaṃ kālakālātmanā yataḥ  teneritamidaṃ karma bhūtaiḥ saha vivartate  
tatkarma bhūyaśaḥ kṛtvā vinivṛtya ca bhūyaśaḥ  tattvasya saha tattvena yogaṃ cāpi sametya vai  
aṣṭābhiśca tribhiścaivaṃ dvābhyāṃ caikena vā punaḥ  kālenātmaguṇaiścāpi kṛtsnameva jagatsvayam  
guṇairārabhya karmāṇi svabhāvādīni yojayet  teṣāmabhāve nāśaḥ syātkṛtasyāpi ca karmaṇaḥ  
karmakṣaye punaścānyattato yāti sa tattvataḥ  sa evādissvayaṃ yoganimittaṃ bhoktṛbhogayoḥ  
parastrikālādakalassa eva parameśvaraḥ  sarvavittriguṇādhīśo brahmasākṣātparātparaḥ  
taṃ viśvarūpamabhavaṃ bhavamīḍyaṃ prajāpatim  devadevaṃ jagatpūjyaṃ svacittasthamupāsmahe  
kālādibhiḥ paro yasmātprapañcaḥ parivartate  dharmāvahaṃ pāpanudaṃ bhogeśaṃ viśvadhāma ca  
tamīśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ taṃ devatānāṃ paramaṃ ca daivatam  patiṃ patīnāṃ paramaṃ parastādvidāma devaṃ bhuvaneśvareśvaram  
na tasya vidyeta kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate  na tatsamo 'dhikaścāpi kvacijjagati dṛśyate  
parāsya vividhā śaktiḥ śrutau svābhāvikī śrutā  jñānaṃ balaṃ kriyā caiva yābhyo viśvamidaṃ kṛtam  
tasyāsti patiḥ kaścinnaiva liṃgaṃ na ceśitā  kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ ca sa teṣāmadhipādhipaḥ  
na cāsya janitā kaścinna ca janma kutaścana  na janmahetavastadvanmalamāyādisaṃjñakāḥ  
sa ekassarvabhūteṣu gūḍho vyāptaśca viśvataḥ  sarvabhūtāṃtarātmā ca dharmādhyakṣassa kathyate  
sarvabhūtādhivāsaśca sākṣī cetā ca nirguṇaḥ  eko vaśī niṣkriyāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ vivaśātmanām  
nityānāmapyasau nityaścetanānāṃ ca cetanaḥ  eko bahūnāṃ cākāmaḥ kāmānīśaḥ prayacchati  
sāṃkhyayogādhigamyaṃ yatkāraṇaṃ jagatāṃ patim  jñātvā devaṃ paśuḥ pāśaissarvaireva vimucyate  
viśvakṛdviśvavitsvātmayonijñaḥ kālakṛdguṇī  pradhānaḥ kṣetrajñapatirguṇeśaḥ pāśamocakaḥ  
brahmāṇaṃ vidadhe pūrvaṃ vedāṃścopādiśatsvayam  yo devastamahaṃ buddhvā svātmabuddhiprasādataḥ  
mumukṣurasmātsaṃsārātprapadye śaraṇaṃ śivam  niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāṃtaṃ niravadyaṃ niraṃjanam  
amṛtasya paraṃ setuṃ dagdheṃdhanamivānilam  yadā carmavadākāśaṃ veṣṭayiṣyaṃti mānavāḥ  
tadā śivamavijñāya duḥkhasyāṃto bhaviṣyati  tapaḥprabhāvāddevasya prasādācca maharṣayaḥ  
atyāśramocitajñānaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam  vedāṃte paramaṃ guhyaṃ purākalpapracoditam  
brahmaṇo vadanāllabdhaṃ mayedaṃ bhāgyagauravāt  nāpraśāṃtāya dātavyametajjñānamanuttamam  
na putrāyāśuvṛttāya nāśiṣyāya ca sarvathā  yasya deve parābhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau  
tasyaite kathitāhyarthāḥ prakāśaṃte mahātmanaḥ  ataśca saṃkṣepamidaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ śivaḥ parastātprakṛteśca puṃsaḥ  
sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṃ saṃhārakāle punarādadāti  
munaya ūcuḥ  kālādutpadyate sarvaṃ kāladeva vipadyate  na kālanirapekṣaṃ hi kvacitkiṃcana vidyate  
yadāsyāṃtargataṃ viśvaṃ śaśvatsaṃsāramaṇḍalam  sargasaṃhṛtimudrābhyāṃ cakravatparivartate  
brahmā hariśca rudraśca tathānye ca surāsurāḥ  yatkṛtāṃ niyatiṃ prāpya prabhavo nātivartitum  
bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyādyairvibhajya jarayan prajāḥ  atiprabhuriti svairaṃ vartate 'tibhayaṃkaraḥ  
ka eṣa bhagavān kālaḥ kasya vā vaśavartyayam  ka evāsya vaśe na syātkathayaitadvicakṣaṇa  
vāyuruvāca  kālakāṣṭhānimeṣādikalākalitavigraham  kālātmeti samākhyātaṃ tejo māheśvaraṃ param  
yadalaṃghyamaśeṣasya sthāvarasya carasya ca  niyogarūpamīśasya balaṃ viśvaniyāmakam  
tasyāṃśāṃśamayī muktiḥ kālātmani mahātmani  tato niṣkramya saṃkrāṃtā visṛṣṭāgrerivāyasī  
tasmātkālavaśe viśvaṃ na sa viśvavaśe sthitaḥ  śivasya tu vaśe kālo na kālasya vaśe śivaḥ  
yato 'pratihataṃ śārvaṃ tejaḥ kāle pratiṣṭhitam  mahatī tena kālasya maryādā hi duratyayā  
kālaṃ prajñāviśeṣeṇa ko 'tivartitumarhati  kālena tu kṛtaṃ karma na kaścidativartate  
ekacchatrāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ ye parākramya śāsati  te 'pi naivātivartaṃte kālavelāmivābdhayaḥ  
ye nigṛhyeṃdriyagrāmaṃ jayaṃti sakalaṃ jagat  na jayaṃtyapi te kālaṃ kālo jayati tānapi  
āyurvedavido vaidyāstvanuṣṭhitarasāyanāḥ  na mṛtyumativartaṃte kālo hi duratikramaḥ  
śriyā rūpeṇa śīlena balena ca kulena ca  anyacciṃtayate jaṃtuḥ kālo 'nyatkurute balāt  
apriyaiśca priyaiścaiva hyaciṃtitagamāgamaiḥ  saṃyojayati bhūtāni viyojayati ceśvaraḥ  
yadaiva duḥkhitaḥ kaścittadaiva sukhitaḥ paraḥ  durvijñeyasvabhāvasya kālāsyāho vicitratā  
yo yuvā sa bhavedvṛddho yo balīyānsa durbalaḥ  yaḥ śrīmānso 'pi niḥśrīkaḥ kālaścitragatirdvijā  
nābhijātyaṃ na vai śīlaṃ na balaṃ na ca naipuṇam  bhavetkāryāya paryāptaṃ kālaśca hyanirodhakaḥ  
ye sanāthāśca dātāro gītavādyairupasthitāḥ  ye cānāthāḥ parānnādāḥ kālasteṣu samakriyaḥ  
phalaṃtyakāle na rasāyanāni samyakprayuktānyapi cauṣadhāni  tānyeva kālena samāhṛtāni siddhiṃ prayāṃtyāśu sukhaṃ diśaṃti  
nākālato 'yaṃ mriyate jāyate vā nākālataḥ puṣṭimagryāmupaiti  nākālataḥ sukhitaṃ duḥkhitaṃ vā nākālikaṃ vastu samasti kiṃcit  
kālena śītaḥ prativāti vātaḥkālena vṛṣṭirjaladānupaiti  kālena coṣmā praśamaṃ prayāti kālena sarvaṃ saphalatvameti  
kālaśca sarvasya bhavasya hetuḥ kālena sasyāni bhavaṃti nityam  kālena sasyāni layaṃ prayāṃti kālena saṃjīvati jīvalokaḥ  
itthaṃ kālātmanastattvaṃ yo vijānāti tattvataḥ  kālātmānamatikramya kālātītaṃ sa paśyati  
na yasya kālo na ca baṃdhamuktī na yaḥ pumānna prakṛtirna viśvam  vicitrarūpāya śivāya tasmai namaḥparasmai parameśvarāya  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kena mānena kālesminnāyussaṃkhyā prakalpyate  saṃkhyārūpasya kālasya kaḥ punaḥ paramo 'vadhiḥ  
vāyuruvāca  āyuṣo 'tra nimeṣākhyamādyamānaṃ pracakṣate  saṃkhyārūpasya kālasya śāṃttvatītakalāvadhi  
akṣipakṣmaparikṣepo nimeṣaḥ parikalpitaḥ  tādṛśānāṃ nimeṣāṇāṃ kāṣṭhā daśa ca pañca ca  
kāṣṭhāṃstriṃśatkalā nāma kalāṃstriṃśanmuhūrtakaḥ  muhūrtānāmapi triṃśadahorātraṃ pracakṣate  
triṃśatsaṃkhyairahorātrairmāsaḥ pakṣadvayātmakaḥ  jñeyaṃ pitryamahorātraṃ māsaḥ kṛṣṇasitātmakaḥ
