māsaistairayanaṃ ṣaḍbhirvarṣaṃ dve cāyanaṃ matam  laukikenaiva mānena abdo yo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ  
etaddivyamahorātramiti śāstrasya niścayaḥ  dakṣiṇaṃ cāyanaṃ rātristathodagayanaṃ dinam  
māsastriṃśadahorātrairdivyo mānuṣavatsmṛtaḥ  saṃvatsaro 'pi devānāṃ māsairdvādaśabhistathā  
trīṇi varṣaśatānyeva ṣaṣṭivarṣayutānyapi  divyassaṃvatsaro jñeyo mānuṣeṇa prakīrtitaḥ  
divyenaiva pramāṇena yugasaṃkhyā pravartate  catvāri bhārate varṣe yugāni kavayo viduḥ  
pūrvaṃ kṛtayugaṃ nāma tatastretā vidhīyate  dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva yugānyetāni kṛtsnaśaḥ  
catvāri tu sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tatkṛtaṃ yugam  tasya tāvacchatīsaṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaśca tathāvidhaḥ  
itareṣu sasaṃdhyeṣu sasaṃdhyāṃśeṣu ca triṣu  ekāpāyena vartaṃte sahasrāṇi śatāni ca  
etaddvādaśasāhasraṃ sādhikaṃ ca caturyugam  caturyugasahasraṃ yatsaṃkalpa iti kathyate  
caturyugaikasaptatyā manoraṃtaramucyate  kalpe caturdaśaikasminmanūnāṃ parivṛttayaḥ  
etena kramayogena kalpamanvaṃtarāṇi ca  saprajāni vyatītāni śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  
ajñeyatvācca sarveṣāmasaṃkhyeyatayā punaḥ  śakyo naivānupūrvyādvai teṣāṃ vaktuṃ suvistaraḥ  
kalpo nāma divā prokto brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ  kalpānāṃ vai sahasraṃ ca brāhmaṃ varṣamihocyate  
varṣāṇāmaṣṭasāhasraṃ yacca tadbrahmaṇo yugam  savanaṃ yugasāhasraṃ brahmaṇaḥ padmajanmanaḥ  
savanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca triguṇaṃ trivṛtaṃ tathā  kalpyate sakalaḥ kālo brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  
tasya vai divase yāṃti caturdaśa puraṃdarāḥ  śatāni māse catvāri viṃśatyā sahitāni ca  
abde pañca sahasrāṇi catvāriṃśadyutāni ca  catvāriṃśatsahasrāṇi pañca lakṣāṇi cāyuṣi  
brahmā viṣṇordine caiko viṣṇū rudradine tathā  īśvarasya dine rudrassadākhyasya tatheśvaraḥ  
sākṣācchivasya tatsaṃkhyastathā so 'pi sadāśivaḥ  catvāriṃśatsahasrāṇi pañcalakṣāṇi cāyuṣi  
tasminsākṣācchivenaiṣa kālātmā sampravartate  yattatsṛṣṭessamākhyātaṃ kālāntaramiha dvijāḥ  etatkālāntaraṃ jñeyamaharvai pārameśvaram  rātriśca tāvatī jñeyā parameśasya kṛtsnaśaḥ  ahastasya tu yā sṛṣṭī rātriśca pralayaḥ smṛtaḥ  
aharna vidyate tasya na rātririti dhārayet  eṣopacāraḥ kriyate lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  
prajāḥ prajānāṃ patayo mūrtayaśca surāsurāḥ  indriyāṇīndriyārthāśca mahābhūtāni pañca ca  
tanmātrāṇyatha bhūtādirbuddhiśca saha daivataḥ  ahastiṣṭhaṃti sarvāṇi pārameśasya dhīmataḥ  
aharaṃte pralīyante rātryante viśvasaṃbhavaḥ  yo viśvātmā karmakālasvabhāvādyarthe śaktiryasya nollaṃghanīyā  
yasyaivājñādhīnametatsamastaṃ namastasmai mahate śaṃkarāya  
munaya ūcuḥ  kathaṃ jagadidaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vidhāya ca nidhāya ca  ājñayā paramāṃ krīḍāṃ karoti parameśvaraḥ  
kiṃ tatprathamasaṃbhūtaṃ kenedamakhilaṃ tatam  kenā vā punarevedaṃ grasyate pṛthukukṣiṇā  
vāyuruvāca  śaktiḥ prathamasambhūtā śāṃtyatītapadottarā  tato māyā tato 'vyaktaṃ śivācchaktimataḥ prabhoḥ  
śāntyatītapadaṃ śaktestataḥ śāntipadakramāt  tato vidyāpadaṃ tasmātpratiṣṭhāpadasaṃbhavaḥ  
nivṛttipadamutpannaṃ pratiṣṭhāpadataḥ kramāt  evamuktā samāsena sṛṣṭirīśvaracoditā  
ānulomyāttathaiteṣāṃ pratilomyena saṃhṛtiḥ  asmātpañcapadoddiṣṭātparassraṣṭā samiṣyate  
kalābhiḥ pañcabhirvyāptaṃ tasmādviśvamidaṃ jagat  avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yattadātmanā samanuṣṭhitam  
mahadādiviśeṣāṃtaṃ sṛjatītyapi saṃmatam  kiṃ tu tatrāpi kartṛtvaṃ nāvyaktasya na cātmanaḥ  
acetanatvātprakṛterajñatvātpuruṣasya ca  pradhānaparamāṇvādi yāvatkiñcidacetanam  
tatkartṛkaṃ svayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ buddhimatkāraṇaṃ vinā  jagacca kartṛsāpekṣaṃ kāryaṃ sāvayavaṃ yataḥ  
tasmācchaktassvatantro yaḥ sarvaśaktiśca sarvavit  anādinidhanaścāyaṃ mahadaiśvaryasaṃyutaḥ  
sa eva jagataḥ kartā mahādevo maheśvarāḥ  pātā hartā ca sarvasya tataḥ pṛthagananvayaḥ  
pariṇāmaḥ pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ puruṣasya ca  sarvaṃ satyavratasyaiva śāsanena pravartate  
itīyaṃ śāśvatī niṣṭhā satāṃ manasi vartate  na cainaṃ pakṣamāśritya vartate svalpacetanaḥ  
yāvadādisamāraṃbho yāvadyaḥ pralayo mahān  tāvadapyeti sakalaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāradāṃ śatam  
paramityāyuṣo nāma brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ  tatparākhyaṃ tadardhaṃ ca parārdhamabhidhīyate  
parārdhadvayakālāṃte pralaye samupasthite  avyaktamātmanaḥ kāryamādāyātmani tiṣṭhati  
ātmanyavasthite 'vyakte vikāre pratisaṃhṛte  sādharmyeṇādhitiṣṭhete pradhānapuruṣāvubhau  
tamaḥ sattvaguṇāvetau samatvena vyavasthitau  anudriktāvanantau tāvotaprotau parasparam  
guṇasāmye tadā tasminnavibhāge tamodaye  śāṃtavātaikanīre ca na prājñāyata kiṃcana  
aprajñāte jagatyasminneka eva maheśvaraḥ  upāsya rajanīṃ kṛtsnāṃ parāṃ māheśvarīṃ tataḥ  
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pradhānapuruṣāvubhau  praviśya kṣobhayāmāsa māyāyogānmaheśvaraḥ  
tataḥ punaraśeṣāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayāt  avyaktādabhavatsṛṣṭirājñayā parameṣṭhinaḥ  
viśvottarottaravicitramanorathasya yasyaikaśaktiśakale sakalassamāptaḥ  ātmānamadhvapatimadhvavido vadaṃti tasmai namaḥ sakalalokavilakṣaṇāya  
vāyuruvāca  puruṣādhiṣṭhitātpūrvamavyaktādīśvarājñayā  buddhyādayo viśeṣāṃtā vikārāścābhavan kramāt  
tatastebhyo vikārebhyo rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ  kāraṇatvena sarveṣāṃ trayo devāḥ prajajñire  
sarvato bhuvanavyāptiśaktimavyāhatāṃ kvacit  jñānamapratimaṃ śaśvadaiśvaryaṃ cāṇimādikam  
sṛṣṭisthitilayākhyeṣu karmasu triṣu hetutām  prabhutvena sahaiteṣāṃ prasīdati maheśvaraḥ  
kalpāntare punasteṣāmaspardhā buddhimohinām  sargarakṣālayācāraṃ pratyekaṃ pradadau ca saḥ  
ete parasparotpannā dhārayanti parasparam  paraspareṇa vardhaṃte parasparamanuvratāḥ  
kvacidbrahmā kvacidviṣṇuḥ kvacidrudraḥ praśasyate  nānena teṣāmādhikyamaiśvaryaṃ cātiricyate  
mūrkhā niṃdaṃti tānvāgbhiḥ saṃraṃbhābhiniveśinaḥ  yātudhānā bhavaṃtyeva piśācāśca na saṃśayaḥ  
devo guṇatrayātītaścaturvyūho maheśvaraḥ  sakalassakalādhāraśakterutpattikāraṇam  
soyamātmā trayasyāsya prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca  līlākṛtajagatsṛṣṭirīśvaratve vyavasthitaḥ  
yassarvasmātparo nityo niṣkalaḥ parameśvaraḥ  sa eva ca tadādhārastadātmā tadadhiṣṭhitaḥ  
tasmānmaheśvaraścaiva prakṛtiḥ puruṣastathā  sadāśivabhavo viṣṇurbrahmā sarvaśivātmakam  
pradhānātprathamaṃ jajñe vṛddhiḥ khyātirmatirmahān  mahattattvasya saṃkṣobhādahaṃkārastridhā 'bhavat  
ahaṃkāraśca bhūtāni tanmātrānīṃdriyāṇi ca  vaikārikādahaṃkārātsattvodriktāttu sāttvikaḥ  
vaikārikaḥ sa sargastu yugapatsaṃpravartate  buddhīndriyāṇi pañcaiva pañcakarmeṃdriyāṇi ca  
ekādaśaṃ manastatra svaguṇenobhayātmakam  tamoyuktādahaṃkārādbhūtatanmātrasaṃbhavaḥ  
bhūtānāmādibhūtatvādbhūtādiḥ kathyate tu saḥ  bhūtādeśśabdamātraṃ syāttatra cākāśasaṃbhavaḥ  
ākāśātsparśa utpannaḥ sparśādvāyusamudbhavaḥ  vāyo rūpaṃ tatastejastejaso rasasaṃbhavaḥ  
rasādāpassamutpannāstebhyo gandhasamudbhavaḥ  gandhācca pṛthivī jātā bhūtebhyonyaccarācaram  
puruṣādhiṣṭhitatvācca avyaktānugraheṇa ca  mahadādiviśeṣāntā hyaṇḍamutpādayanti te  
tatra kāryaṃ ca karaṇaṃ saṃsiddhaṃ brahmaṇo yadā  tadaṃḍe supravṛddho 'bhūtkṣetrajño brahmasaṃjñitaḥ  
sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate  ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata  
tasyeśvarasya pratimā jñānavairāgyalakṣaṇā  dharmaiśvaryakarī buddhirbrāhmī yajñe 'bhimāninaḥ  
avyaktājjāyate tasya manasā yadyadīpsitam  vaśī vikṛtvāttraiguṇyātsāpekṣatvātsvabhāvataḥ  
tridhā vibhajya cātmānaṃ trailokye saṃpravartate  sṛjate grasate caiva vīkṣate ca tribhissvayam  
caturmukhastu brahmatve kālatve cāṃtakassmṛtaḥ  sahasramūrdhā puruṣastisrovasthāssvayaṃbhuvaḥ  
sattvaṃ rajaśca brahmā ca kālatve ca tamo rajaḥ  viṣṇutve kevalaṃ sattvaṃ guṇavṛddhistridhā vibhau  
brahmatve sṛjate lokān kālatve saṃkṣipatyapi  puruṣatve 'tyudāsīnaḥ karma ca trividhaṃ vibhoḥ  
evaṃ tridhā vibhinnatvādbrahmā triguṇa ucyate  caturdhā pravibhaktatvāccāturvyūhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ  
āditvādādidevo 'sāvajātatvādajaḥ smṛtaḥ  pāti yasmātprajāḥ sarvāḥ prajāpatiriti smṛtaḥ  
hiraṇmayastu yo merustasyolbaṃ sumahātmanaḥ  garbhodakaṃ samudrāśca jarāyuścā'pi parvatāḥ  
tasminnaṃḍe tvime lokā aṃtarviśvamidaṃ jagat  caṃdrādityau sanakṣatrau sagrahau saha vāyunā  
adbhirdaśaguṇābhistu bāhyatoṇḍaṃ samāvṛtam  āpo daśaguṇenaiva tejasā bahirāvṛtāḥ  
tejo daśaguṇenaiva vāyunā bahirāvṛtam  ākāśenāvṛto vāyuḥ khaṃ ca bhūtādināvṛtam  
bhūtādirmahatā tadvadavyaktenāvṛto mahān  etairāvaraṇairaṇḍaṃ saptabhirbahirāvṛtam  
etadāvṛttya cānyonyamaṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ sthitāḥ  sṛṣṭipālanavidhvaṃsakarmakartryo dvijottamāḥ  
evaṃ parasparotpannā dhārayaṃti parasparam  ādhārādheyabhāvena vikārāstu vikāriṣu  
kūrmoṃgāni yathā pūrvaṃ prasārya viniyacchati  vikārāṃśca tathā 'vyaktaṃ sṛṣṭvā bhūyo niyacchati  
avyaktaprabhavaṃ sarvamānulomyena jāyate  prāpte pralayakāle tu pratilomyenulīyate  
guṇāḥ kālavaśādeva bhavaṃti viṣamāḥ samāḥ  guṇasāmye layo jñeyo vaiṣamye sṛṣṭirucyate  
tadidaṃ brahmaṇo yoniretadaṃḍaṃ ghanaṃ mahat  brahmaṇaḥ kṣetramuddiṣṭaṃ brahmā kṣetrajña ucyate  
itīdṛśānāmaṇḍānāṃ koṭyo jñeyāḥ sahasraśaḥ  sarvagatvātpradhānasya tiryagūrdhvamadhaḥ sthitāḥ  
tatra tatra caturvaktrā brahmāṇo harayo bhavāḥ  sṛṣṭā pradhānena tathā labdhvā śaṃbhostu sannidhim  
maheśvaraḥ parovyaktādaṃḍamavyaktasaṃbhavam  aṇḍājjajñe vibhurbrahmā lokāstena kṛtāstvime  
abuddhipūrvaḥ kathito mayaiṣa pradhānasargaḥ prathamaḥ pravṛtaḥ  ātyaṃtikaśca pralayontakāle līlākṛtaḥ kevalamīśvarasya  
yattatsmṛtaṃ kāraṇamaprameyaṃ brahmā pradhānaṃ prakṛteḥ prasūtiḥ  anādimadhyāntamanantavīryaṃ śuklaṃ suraktaṃ puruṣeṇa yuktam  
utpādakatvādrajasotirekāllokasya saṃtānavivṛddhihetūn  aṣṭau vikārānapi cādikāle sṛṣṭvā samaśnāti tathāṃtakāle  
prakṛtyavasthāpitakāraṇānāṃ yā ca sthitiryā ca punaḥ pravṛttiḥ  tatsarvamaprākṛtavaibhavasya saṃkalpamātreṇa maheśvarasya  
munaya ūcuḥ  manvaṃtarāṇi sarvāṇi kalpabhedāṃśca sarvaśaḥ  teṣvevāṃtarasargaṃ ca pratisargaṃ ca no vada  
vāyuruvāca  kālasaṃkhyāvivṛttasya parārdho brahmaṇassmṛtaḥ  tāvāṃścaivāsya kālonyastasyāṃte pratisṛjyate  
divase divase tasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrvajanmanaḥ  caturdaśamahābhāgā manūnāṃ parivṛttayaḥ  
anāditvādanaṃtatvādajñeyatvācca kṛtsnaśaḥ  manvaṃtarāṇi kalpāśca na śakyā vacanātpṛthak  
ukteṣvapi ca sarveṣu śṛṇvatāṃ vo vaco mama  kimihāsti phalaṃ tasmānna pṛthakvaktumutsahe  
ya eva khalu kalpeṣu kalpaḥ saṃprati vartate  tatra saṃkṣipya vartaṃte sṛṣṭayaḥ pratisṛṣṭayaḥ  
yastvayaṃ vartate kalpo vārāho nāma nāmataḥ  asminnapi dvijaśreṣṭhā manavastu caturdaśa  
svāyaṃbhuvādayassapta sapta sāvarṇikādayaḥ  teṣu vaivasvato nāma saptamo vartate manuḥ  
manvaṃtareṣu sarveṣu sargasaṃhāravṛttayaḥ  prāyaḥ samābhavaṃtīti tarkaḥ kāryo vijānatā  
pūrvakalpe parāvṛtte pravṛtte kālamārute  samunmūlitamūleṣu vṛkṣeṣu ca vaneṣu ca  
jagaṃti tṛṇavaktrīṇi deve dahati pāvake  vṛṣṭyā bhuvi niṣiktāyāṃ viveleṣvarṇaveṣu ca  
dikṣu sarvāsu magnāsu vāripūre mahīyasi  tadadbhiścaṭulākṣepaistaraṃgabhujamaṇḍalaiḥ  
prārabdhacaṇḍanṛtyeṣu tataḥ pralayavāriṣu  brahmā nārāyaṇo bhūtvā suṣvāpa salile sukham  
imaṃ codāharanmaṃtraṃ ślokaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prati  taṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhāstadarthaṃ cākṣarāśrayam  
āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ  ayanaṃ tasya tā yasmāttena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ  
śivayogamayīṃ nidrāṃ kurvantaṃ tridaśeśvaram  baddhāṃjali puṭāssiddhā janalokanivāsinaḥ  
stotraiḥ prabodhayāmāsuḥ prabhātasamaye surāḥ  yathā sṛṣṭyādisamaye īśvaraṃ śrutayaḥ purā  
tataḥ prabuddha utthāya śayanāttoyamadhyagāt  udaikṣata diśaḥ sarvā yoganidrālasekṣaṇaḥ  
nāpaśyatsa tadā kiṃcitsvātmano vyatireki yat  savismaya ivāsīnaḥ parāṃ ciṃtāmupāgamat  
kva sā bhagavatī yā tu manojñā mahatī mahī  nānāvidhamahāśailanadīnagarakānanā  
evaṃ saṃciṃtayanbrahmā bubudhe naiva bhūsthitim  tadā sasmāra pitaraṃ bhagavaṃtaṃ trilocanam  
smaraṇāddevadevasya bhavasyāmitatejasaḥ  jñātavānsalile magnāṃ dharaṇīṃ dharaṇīpatiḥ  
tato bhūmessamuddhāraṃ kartukāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ  jalakrīḍocitaṃ divyaṃ vārāhaṃ rūpamasmarat  
mahāparvatavarṣmāṇaṃ mahājaladaniḥsvanam  nīlameghapratīkāśaṃ dīptaśabdaṃ bhayānakam  
pīnavṛttaghanaskaṃdhapīnonnatakaṭītaṭam  hrasvavṛttorujaṃghāgraṃ sutīkṣṇapuramaṇḍalam  
padmarāgamaṇiprakhyaṃ vṛttabhīṣaṇalocanam  vṛttadīrghamahāgātraṃ stabdhakarṇasthalojjvalam  
udīrṇocchvāsaniśvāsaghūrṇitapralayārṇavam  visphuratsusaṭācchannakapolaskaṃdhabaṃdhuram  
maṇibhirbhūṣaṇaiścitrairmahāratnaiḥpariṣkṛtam  virājamānaṃ vidyudbhirmeghasaṃghamivonnatam  
āsthāya vipulaṃ rūpaṃ vārāhamamitaṃ vidhiḥ  pṛthivyuddharaṇārthāya praviveśa rasātalam  
sa tadā śuśubhe 'tīva sūkaro girisaṃnibhaḥ  liṃgākṛtermaheśasya pādamūlaṃ gato yathā  
tatassa salile magnāṃ pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīṃdharaḥ  uddhṛtyāliṃgya daṃṣṭrābhyāmunmamajja rasātalāt  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayassiddhā janalokanivāsinaḥ  mumudurnanṛturmūrdhni tasya puṣpairavākiran  
vapurmahāvarāhasya śuśubhe puṣpasaṃvṛtam  patadbhiriva khadyotaiḥ prāśuraṃjanaparvataḥ  
tataḥ saṃsthānamānīya varāho mahatīṃ mahīm  svameva rūpamāsthāya sthāpayāmāsa vai vibhuḥ  
pṛthivīṃ ca samīkṛtya pṛthivyāṃ sthāpayangirīn  bhūrādyāṃścaturo lokān kalpayāmāsa pūrvavat  
iti saha mahatīṃ mahīṃ mahīdhraiḥ pralayamahājaladheradhaḥsthamadhyāt  upari ca viniveśya viśvakarmā caramacaraṃ ca jagatsasarja bhūyaḥ  
vāyuruvāca  sargaṃ ciṃtayatastasya tadā vai buddhipūrvakam  pradhyānakāle mohastu prādurbhūtastamomayaḥ  tamomoho mahāmohastāmisraścāndhasaṃjñitaḥ  avidyā pañcamī caiṣā prādurbhūtā mahātmanaḥ  
pañcadhā 'vasthitaḥ sargo dhyāyatastvabhimāninaḥ  sarvatastamasātīva bījakumbhavadāvṛtaḥ  bahirantaścāprakāśaḥ stabdho niḥsaṃjña eva ca  tasmātteṣāṃ vṛtā buddhirmukhāni karaṇāni ca  
tasmātte saṃvṛtātmāno nagā mukhyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  taṃ dṛṣṭvā'sādhakaṃ brahmā prathamaṃ sargamīdṛśam  aprasannamanā bhūtvā dvitīyaṃ so 'bhyamanyata  tasyābhidhāyataḥ sargaṃ tiryaksroto 'bhyavartata  
antaḥprakāśāstiryaṃca āvṛtāśca bahiḥ punaḥ  paśvātmānastato jātā utpathagrāhiṇaśca te  tamapyasādhakaṃ jñātvā sargamanyamamanyata  tadordhvasrotaso vṛtto devasargastu sāttvikaḥ  
te sukhaprītibahulā bahirantaśca nāvṛtāḥ  prakāśā bahirantaścasvabhāvādeva saṃjñitāḥ  tato 'bhidhyāyatovyaktādarvāksrotastu sādhakaḥ  manuṣyanāmā sañjātaḥ sargo duḥkhasamutkaṭaḥ  
prakāśābahirantaste tamodriktā rajo 'dhikāḥ  pañcamonugrahaḥ sargaścaturdhā saṃvyavasthitaḥ  viparyayeṇa śaktyā ca tuṣṭyāsiddhyā tathaiva ca  te 'parigrāhiṇaḥ sarve saṃvibhāgaratāḥ punaḥ  
khādanāścāpyaśīlāśca bhūtādyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ  prathamo mahataḥ sargo brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  tanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargaḥ sa ucyate  vaikārikastṛtīyastu sarga aindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ  
ityeṣa prakṛteḥ sargaḥ sambhṛto 'buddhipūrvakaḥ  mukhyasargaścaturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ  tiryaksrotastu yaḥ proktastiryagyoniḥ sa pañcamaḥ  tadūrdhvasrotasaḥ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu sa smṛtaḥ  
tato 'rvāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mānuṣaḥ  aṣṭamo 'nugrahaḥ sargaḥ kaumāro navamaḥ smṛtaḥ  prākṛtāśca trayaḥ pūrve sargāste 'buddhipūrvakāḥ  buddhipūrvaṃ pravartante mukhyādyāḥ pañca vaikṛtāḥ  
agre sasarja vai brahmā mānasānātmanaḥ samān  sanandaṃ sanakañcaiva vidvāṃsañca sanātanam  ṛbhuṃ sanatkumārañca pūrvameva prajāpatiḥ  sarve te yogino jñeyā vītarāgā vimatsarāḥ  
īśvarāsaktamanaso na cakruḥ sṛṣṭaye matim  teṣu sṛṣṭyanapekṣeṣu gateṣu sanakādiṣu  sraṣṭukāmaḥ punarbrahmā tatāpa paramaṃ tapaḥ  tasyaivaṃ tapyamānasya na kiṃcitsamavartata  
tato dīrgheṇa kālena duḥkhātkrodho vyajāyata  krodhāviṣṭasya netrābhyāṃ prāpatannaśrubindavaḥ  tatastebhyo 'śrubindubhyo bhūtāḥ pretāstadābhavan  sarvāṃstānaśrujāndṛṣṭvā brahmātmānamaniṃdata  
tasya tīvrā 'bhavanmūrchā krodhāmarṣasamudbhavā  mūrchitastu jahau prāṇānkrodhāviṣṭaḥ prajāpatiḥ  tataḥ prāṇeśvaro rudro bhagavānnīlalohitaḥ  prasādamatulaṃ kartuṃ prādurāsītprabhormukhāt  
daśadhā caikadhā cakre svātmānaṃ prabhurīśvaraḥ  te tenoktā mahātmāno daśadhā caikadhā kṛtāḥ  yūyaṃ sṛṣṭā mayā vatsā lokānugrahakāraṇāt  tasmātsarvasya lokasya sthāpanāya hitāya ca  
prajāsantānahetośca prayatadhvamatandritāḥ  evamuktāśca rurudurdudruvuśca samantataḥ  rodanāddrāvaṇāccaiva te rudrā nāmataḥ smṛtāḥ  ye rudrāste khalu prāṇā ye prāṇāste mahātmakāḥ  
tato mṛtasya devasya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  ghṛṇī dadau punaḥ prāṇānbrahmaputro maheśvaraḥ  prahṛṣṭavadano rudraḥ prāṇapratyāgamādvibhoḥ  abhyabhāṣata viśveśo brahmāṇaṃ paramaṃ vacaḥ  
mābhairmābhairmahābhāga viriṃca jagatāṃ guro  mayā te prāṇitāḥ prāṇāḥ sukhamuttiṣṭha suvrata  svapnānubhūtamiva tacchrutvā vākyaṃ manoharam  haraṃ nirīkṣya śanakairnetraiḥ phullāmbujaprabhaiḥ  
tathā pratyāgataprāṇaḥ snigdhagambhīrayā girā  uvāca vacanaṃ brahmā tamuddiśya kṛtāñjaliḥ  tvaṃ hi darśanamātreṇa cānandayasi me manaḥ  ko bhavān viśvamūrtyā vā sthita ekādaśātmakaḥ  
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vyājahāra maheśvaraḥ  spṛśan kārābhyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ susukhābhyāṃ sureśvaraḥ  māṃ viddhi paramātmānaṃ tava putratvamāgatam  ete caikādaśa rudrāstvāṃ surakṣitumāgatāḥ  
tasmāttīvrāmimāmmūrchāṃ vidhūya madanugrahāt  prabuddhasva yathāpūrvaṃ prajā vai sraṣṭumarhasi  evaṃ bhagavatā prokto brahmā prītamanā hyabhūt  nānāṣṭakena viśvātmā tuṣṭāva parameśvaram  
brahmovāca  namaste bhagavan rudra bhāskarāmitatejase  namo bhavāya devāya rasāyāmbumayātmane  śarvāya kṣitirūpāya nandīsurabhaye namaḥ  
īśāya vasave tubhyaṃ namassparśamayātmane  paśūnāṃ pataye caiva pāvakāyātitejase  bhīmāya vyomarūpāya śabdamātrāya te namaḥ  ugrāyograsvarūpāya yajamānātmane namaḥ  mahādevāya somāya namostvamṛtamūrtaye  
evaṃ stutvā mahādevaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ  prārthayāmāsa viśveśaṃ girā praṇatipūrvayā  bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa mama putra maheśvara  sṛṣṭihetostvamutpanno mamāṃge 'naṃganāśanaḥ  
tasmānmahati kāryesmin vyāpṛtasya jagatprabho  sahāyaṃ kuru sarvatra sraṣṭumarhasi sa prajāḥ  tenaiṣāṃ pāvito devo rudrastripuramardanaḥ  bāḍhamityeva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratijagrāha śaṃkaraḥ  
tatassa bhagavān brahmā hṛṣṭaṃ tamabhinaṃdya ca  sraṣṭuṃ tenābhyanujñātastathānyāścāsṛjatprajāḥ  marīcibhṛgvaṃgirasaḥ pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum  dakṣamatriṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca so 'sṛjanmanasaiva ca  
purastādasṛjadbrahmā dharmaṃ saṃkalpameva ca  ityete brahmaṇaḥ putrā dvādaśādau prakīrtitāḥ  saha rudreṇa saṃbhūtāḥ purāṇā gṛhamedhinaḥ  
teṣāṃ dvādaśa vaṃśāḥ syurdivyā devagaṇānvitāḥ  prajāvantaḥ kriyāvanto maharṣibhiralaṃkṛtāḥ  atha devāsurapitḥnmanuṣyāṃśca catuṣṭayam  saha rudreṇa sisṛkṣuraṃbhasyetāni vai vidhiḥ  
sa sṛṣṭyarthaṃ samādhāya brahmātmānamayūyujat  mukhādajanayaddevān pitḥṃścaivopapakṣataḥ  jaghanādasurān sarvān prajanādapi mānuṣān  avaskare kṣudhāviṣṭā rākṣasāstasya jajñire  
putrāstamorajaḥprāyā balinaste niśācarāḥ  sarpā yakṣāstathā bhūtā gaṃdharvāḥ saṃprajajñire  vayāṃsi pakṣataḥ sṛṣṭāḥ pakṣiṇo vakṣaso 'sṛjat  mukhatojāṃstathā pārśvāduragāṃśca vinirmame  
padbhyāṃ cāśvānsamātaṃgān śarabhān gavayānmṛgān  uṣṭrānaśvatarāṃścaiva nyaṃkūnanyāśca jātayaḥ  
auṣadhyaḥ phalamūlāni romabhyastasya jajñire  gāyatrīṃ ca ṛcaṃ caiva trivṛtsāma rathaṃtaram  
agniṣṭomaṃ ca yajñānāṃ nirmame prathamānmukhāt  yajūṃṣi traiṣṭubhaṃ chaṃdaḥstomaṃ pañcadaśaṃ tathā  bṛhatsāma tathokthaṃ ca dakṣiṇādasṛjanmukhāt  sāmāni jagatīchaṃdaḥ stomaṃ saptadaśaṃ tathā  
vairūpyamatirātraṃ ca paścimādasṛjanmukhāt  ekaviṃśamatharvāṇamāptoryāmāṇameva ca  anuṣṭubhaṃ sa vairājamuttarādasṛjanmukhāt  uccāvacāni bhūtāni gātrebhyastasya jajñire  
yakṣāḥ piśācā gaṃdharvāstathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ  narakinnararakṣāṃsi vayaḥpaśumṛgoragāḥ  avyayaṃ caiva yadidaṃ sthāṇusthāvarajaṃgamam  teṣāṃ vai yāni karmāṇi prāksṛṣṭāni prapedire  
tānyeva te prapadyaṃte sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ  hiṃsrāhiṃsre mṛdukrūre dharmādharmāvṛtānṛte  tadbhāvitāḥ prapadyaṃte tasmāttattasya rocate  mahābhūteṣu nānātvamiṃdriyārtheṣu muktiṣu  
viniyogaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ dhātaiva vyadadhatsvayam  nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ prākṛtānāṃ prapañcanam  vedaśabdebhya evādau nirmame 'sau pitāmahaḥ  ārṣāṇi caiva nāmāni yāśca vedeṣu vṛttayaḥ  
śarvaryaṃte prasūtānāṃ tānyevaibhyo dadāvajaḥ  yathartāvṛtuliṃgāni nānārūpāṇi paryaye  dṛśyaṃte tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu  ityeṣa karaṇodbhūto lokasargassvayaṃbhuvaḥ  
mahadādyoviśeṣāṃto vikāraḥ prakṛteḥ svayam  caṃdrasūryaprabhājuṣṭo grahanakṣatramaṃḍitaḥ  nadībhiśca samudraiśca parvataiśca sa maṃḍitaḥ  paraiśca vividhairamyaissphītairjanapadaistathā  
tasmin brahmavane 'vyakto brahmā carati sarvavit  avyaktabījaprabhava īśvarānugrahe sthitaḥ  buddhiskaṃdhamahāśākha indriyāṃtarakoṭaraḥ  mahābhūtapramāṇaśca viśeṣāmalapallavaḥ  
dharmādharmasupuṣpāḍhyaḥ sukhaduḥkhaphalodayaḥ  ājīvyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmavṛkṣaḥ sanātanaḥ  dyāṃ mūrdhānaṃ tasya viprā vadaṃti khaṃ vai nābhiṃ caṃdrasūryau ca netre  diśaḥ śrotre caraṇau ca kṣitiṃ ca so 'cintyātmā sarvabhūtapraṇetā  
vaktrāttasya brahmaṇāssaṃprasūtāstadvakṣasaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pūrvabhāgāt  vaiśyā urubhyāṃ tasya padbhyāṃ ca śūdrāḥ sarve varṇā gātrataḥ saṃprasūtāḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  bhavatā kathitā sṛṣṭirbhavasya paramātmanaḥ  caturmukhamukhāttasya saṃśayo naḥ prajāyate  
devaśreṣṭho virūpākṣo dīptaśśūladharo haraḥ  kālātmā bhagavān rudraḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ  
sabrahmakamimaṃ lokaṃ saviṣṇumapi pāvakam  yaḥ saṃharati saṃkruddho yugāṃte samupasthite  
yasya brahmā ca viṣṇuśca praṇāmaṃ kuruto bhayāt  lokasaṃkocakasyāsya yasya tau vaśavartinau  
yo 'yaṃ devaḥ svakādaṃgādbrahmaviṣṇū purāsṛjat  sa eva hi tayornityaṃ yogakṣemakaraḥ prabhuḥ  
sa kathaṃ bhagavān rudra ādidevaḥ purātanaḥ  putratvamagamacchaṃbhurbrahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ  
prajāpatiśca viṣṇuśca rudrasyaitau parasparam  sṛṣṭau parasparasyāṃgāditi prāgapi śuśruma  
kathaṃ punaraśeṣāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ hetubhūtayoḥ  guṇapradhānabhāvena prādurbhāvaḥ parasparāt  
nāpṛṣṭaṃ bhavatā kiṃcinnāśrutaṃ ca kathaṃcana  bhagavacchiṣyabhūtena bhavatā sakalaṃ smṛtam  
tattvaṃ vada yathā brahmā munīnāmavadadvibhuḥ  vayaṃ śraddhālavastāta śrotumīśvarasadyaśaḥ  
vāyuruvāca  sthāne pṛṣṭamidaṃ viprā bhavadbhiḥ praśnakovidaiḥ  idameva purā pṛṣṭo mama prāha pitāmahaḥ  
tadahaṃ sampravakṣyāmi yathā rudrasamudbhavaḥ  yathā ca punarutpattirbrahmaviṣṇvoḥ parasparam  
trayaste kāraṇātmāno jatāssākṣānmaheśvarāt  carācarasya viśvasya sargasthityaṃtahetavaḥ  
paramaiśvaryasaṃyuktāḥ parameśvarabhāvitāḥ  tacchaktyādhiṣṭhitā nityaṃ tatkāryakaraṇakṣamāḥ  
pitrā niyamitāḥ pūrvaṃ trayopi triṣu karmasu  brahmā sarge haristrāṇe rudraḥ saṃharaṇe tathā  
tathāpyanyonyamātsaryādanyonyātiśayāśinaḥ  tapasā toṣayitvā svaṃ pitaraṃ parameśvaram  
labdhvā sarvātmanā tasya prasādātparameṣṭhinaḥ  brahmanārāyaṇau pūrvaṃ rudraḥ kalpāntare 'sṛjat  
kalpāntare punarbrahmā rudraviṣṇū jaganmayaḥ  viṣṇuśca bhagavānrudraṃ brahmāṇamasṛjatpunaḥ  
nārāyaṇaṃ punarbrahmā brahmāṇamasṛjatpunaḥ  evaṃ kalpeṣu kalpeṣu brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ  
paraspareṇa jāyaṃte parasparahitaiṣiṇaḥ  tattatkalpāntavṛttāntamadhikṛtya maharṣibhiḥ  
prabhāvaḥ kathyate teṣāṃ parasparasamudbhavāt  śṛṇu teṣāṃ kathāṃ citrāṃ puṇyāṃ pāpapramocinīm  
kalpe tatpuruṣe vṛttāṃ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  purā nārāyaṇo nāma kalpe vai meghavāhane  
divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu megho bhūtvāvahaddharām  tasya bhāvaṃ samālakṣya viṣṇorviśvajagadguruḥ  
sarvassarvātmabhāvena pradadau śaktimavyayām  śaktiṃ labdhvā tu sarvātmā śivātsarveśvarāttadā  
sasarja bhagāvan viṣṇurviśvaṃ viśvasṛjā saha  viṣṇostadvaibhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sṛṣṭastena pitāmahaḥ  
īrṣyayā parayā grastaḥ prahasannidamabravīt  gaccha viṣṇo mayā jñātaṃ tava sargasya kāraṇam  
āvayoradhikaścāsti sa rudro nātra saṃśayaḥ  tasya devādhidevasya prasādātparameṣṭhinaḥ  
sraṣṭā tvaṃ bhagavānādyaḥ pālakaḥ paramārthataḥ  ahaṃ ca tapasārādhya rudraṃ tridaśanāyakam  
tvayā saha jagatsarvaṃ srakṣyāmyatra na saṃśayaḥ  evaṃ viṣṇumupālabhya bhagavānabjasambhavaḥ  
evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa tapasā prāpya śaṃkaram  bhagavan devadeveśa viśveśvara maheśvara  
tava vāmāṃgajo viṣṇurdakṣiṇāṃgabhavo hyaham  mayā saha jagatsarvaṃ tathāpyasṛjadacyutaḥ  
sa matsarādupālabdhastvadāśrayabalānmayā  madbhāvānnādhikasteti bhāvastvayi maheśvare  
tvatta eva samutpattirāvayossadṛśī yataḥ  tasya bhaktyā yathāpūrvaṃ prasādaṃ kṛtavānasi  
tathā mamāpi tatsarvaṃ dātumarhasi śaṃkara  iti vijñāpitastena bhagavān bhaganetrahā  
nyāyena vai dadau sarvaṃ tasyāpi sa ghṛṇānidhiḥ  labdhvaivamīśvarādeva brahmā sarvātmatāṃ kṣaṇāt  
tvaramāṇotha saṃgamya dadarśa puruṣottamam  kṣīrārṇavālaye śubhre vimāne sūryasaṃnibhe  
hemaratnānvite divye manasā tena nirmite  anaṃtabhogaśayyāyāṃ śayānaṃ paṃkajekṣaṇam  
caturbhujamudārāṃgaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  śaṃkhacakradharaṃ saumyaṃ candrabiṃbasamānanam  
śrīvatsavakṣasaṃ devaṃ prasannamadhurasmitam  dharāmṛdukarāṃbhojasparśaraktapadāṃbujam  
kṣīrārṇavāmṛtamiva śayānaṃ yoganidrayā  tamasā kālarudrākhyaṃ rajasā kanakāṃḍajam  
sattvena sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ nirguṇatve maheśvaram  taṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣaṃ brahmā pragalbhamidamabravīt  
grasāmi tvāmahaṃ viṣṇo tvamātmānaṃ yathā purā  tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā pratibuddhya pitāmaham  
udaikṣata mahābāhussmitamīṣaccakāra ca  tasminnavasare viṣṇurgrastastena mahātmanā  
sṛṣṭaśca brahmaṇā sadyo bhruvormadhyādayatnataḥ  tasminnavasare sākṣādbhagavānindubhūṣaṇaḥ  
śaktiṃ tayorapi draṣṭumarūpo rūpamāsthitaḥ  prasādamatulaṃ kartuṃ purā dattavarastayoḥ  
āgacchattatra yatremau brahmanārāyaṇau sthitau  atha tuṣṭuvaturdevaṃ prītau bhītau ca kautukāt  
praṇematuśca bahuśo bahumānena dūrataḥ  bhavopi bhagavānetāvanugṛhya pinākadhṛk  
sādaraṃ paśyatoreva tayoraṃtaradhīyata  
vāyuruvāca  pratikalpaṃ pravakṣyāmi rudrāvirbhāvakāraṇam  yato vicchinnasaṃtānā brahmasṛṣṭiḥ pravartate  
kalpekalpe prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā brahmā brahmāṃḍasaṃbhavaḥ  avṛddhihetorbhūtānāṃ mumoha bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ  
tasya duḥkhapraśāṃtyarthaṃ prajānāṃ ca vivṛddhaye  tattatkalpeṣu kālātmā rudro rudragaṇādhipaḥ  
nirdiṣṭaḥ pamameśena maheśo nīlalohitaḥ  putro bhūtvānugṛhṇāti brahmāṇaṃ brahmaṇonujaḥ  
sa eva bhagavānīśastejorāśiranāmayaḥ  anādinidhanodhātā bhūtasaṃkocako vibhuḥ  
paramaiśvaryasaṃyuktaḥ parameśvarabhāvitaḥ  tacchaktyādhiṣṭhitaśśaśvattaccihnairapi cihnitaḥ  
tannāmanāmā tadrūpastatkāryakaraṇakṣamaḥ  tattulyavyavahāraśca tadājñāparipālakaḥ  
sahasrādityasaṃkāśaścandrāvayavabhūṣaṇaḥ  bhujaṃgahārakeyūravalayo muṃjamekhalaḥ  
jalaṃdharaviriṃcendrakapālaśakalojjvalaḥ  gaṅgātuṃgataraṃgārdhapiṃgalānanamūrdhajaḥ  
bhagnadaṃṣṭrāṃkurākrāntaprāntakāntadharādharaḥ  savyaśravaṇapārśvāṃtamaṃḍalīkṛtakuṇḍalaḥ  
mahāvṛṣabhaniryāṇo mahājaladaniḥsvanaḥ  mahānalasamaprakhyo mahābalaparākramaḥ  
evaṃ ghoramahārūpo brahmaputrīṃ maheśvaraḥ  vijñānaṃ brahmaṇe dattvā sarge sahakaroti ca  
tasmādrudraprasādena pratikalpaṃ prajāpateḥ  pravāharūpato nityā prajāsṛṣṭiḥ pravartate  
kadācitprārthitaḥ sraṣṭuṃ brahmaṇā nīlalohitaḥ  svātmanā sadṛśān sarvān sasarja manasā vibhuḥ  
kapardino nirātaṃkānnīlagrīvāṃstrilocanān  jarāmaraṇanirmuktān dīptaśūlavarāyudhān  
taistu saṃcchāditaṃ sarvaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ jagat  tāndṛṣṭā vividhānrudrān rudramāha pitāmahaḥ  
namaste devadeveśa māsrākṣīrīdṛśīḥ prajāḥ  anyāḥ sṛja tvaṃ bhadraṃ te prajā mṛtyusamanvitāḥ  
ityuktaḥ prahasanprāha brahmāṇaṃ parameśvaraḥ  nāsti me tādṛśassargassṛja tvamaśubhāḥ prajāḥ  
ye tvime manasā sṛṣṭā mahātmāno mahābalāḥ  cariṣyaṃti mayā sārdhaṃ sarva eva hi yājñikāḥ  
ityuktvā viśvakarmāṇaṃ viśvabhūteśvaro haraḥ  saha rudraiḥ prajāsargānnivṛttātmā vyatiṣṭhata  
tataḥ prabhṛti devo 'sau na prasūte prajāḥ śubhāḥ  ūrdhvaretāḥ sthitaḥ sthāṇuryāvadābhūtasaṃplavam  
vāyuruvāca  yadā punaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭā na vyavardhanta vedhasaḥ  tadā maithunajāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ brahmā kartumamanyata  
na nirgataṃ purā yasmānnārīṇāṃ kulamīśvarāt  tena maithunajāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ na śaśāka pitāmahaḥ  
tatassa vidadhe buddhimarthaniścayagāminīm  prajānameva vṛddhyarthaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ parameśvara  
prasādena vinā tasya na vardherannimāḥ prajāḥ  evaṃ saṃcintya viśvātmā tapaḥ kartuṃ pracakrame  
tadādyā paramā śaktiranaṃtā lokabhāvinī  ādyā sūkṣmatarā śuddhā bhāvagamyā manoharā  
nirguṇā niṣprapañcā ca niṣkalā nirupaplavā  niraṃtaratarā nityā nityamīśvarapārśvagā  
tayā paramayā śaktyā bhagavaṃtaṃ triyambakam  saṃcintya hṛdaye brahmā tatāpa paramaṃ tapaḥ  
tīvreṇa tapasā tasya yuktasya parameṣṭhinaḥ  acireṇaiva kālena pitā saṃpratutoṣa ha  
tataḥ kenacidaṃśena mūrtimāviśya kāmapi  ardhanārīśvaro bhūtvā yayau devassvayaṃ haraḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ devaṃ tamasaḥ paramavyayam  advitīyamanirdeśyamadṛśyamakṛtātmabhiḥ  
sarvalokavidhātāraṃ sarvalokeśvareśvaram  sarvalokavidhāyinyā śaktyā paramayā yutam  
apratarkyamanābhāsamameyamajaraṃ dhruvam  acalaṃ nirguṇaṃ śāṃtamanaṃtamahimāspadam  
sarvagaṃ sarvadaṃ sarvasadasadvyaktivarjitam  sarvopamānanirmuktaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam  
praṇamya daṃḍavadbrahmā samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  śraddhāvinayasaṃpannaiḥ śrāvyaiḥ saṃskarasaṃyutaiḥ  
yathārthayuktasarvārthairvedārthaparibṛṃhitaiḥ  tuṣṭāva devaṃ devīṃ ca sūktaiḥ sūkṣmārthagocaraiḥ  
brahmovāca  jaya deva mahādeva jayeśvara maheśvara  jaya sarvaguṇa śreṣṭha jaya sarvasurādhipa  
jaya prakṛti kalyāṇi jaya prakṛtināyike  jaya prakṛtidūre tvaṃ jaya prakṛtisundari  
jayāmoghamahāmāya jayāmogha manoratha  jayāmoghamahālīla jayāmoghamahābala  
jaya viśvajaganmātarjaya viśvajaganmaye  jaya viśvajagaddhātri jaya viśvajagatsakhi  
jaya śāśvatikaiśvarye jaya śāśvatikālaya  jaya śāśvatikākāra jaya śāśvatikānuga  
jayātmatrayanirmātri jayātmatrayapālini  jayātmatrayasaṃhartri jayātmatrayanāyike  
jayāvalokanāyattajagatkāraṇabṛṃhaṇa  jayopekṣākaṭākṣotthahutabhugbhuktabhautika  
jaya devādyavijñeye svātmasūkṣmadṛśojjvale  jaya sthūlātmaśaktyeśejaya vyāptacarācare  
jaya nāmaikavinyastaviśvatattvasamuccaya  jayāsuraśironiṣṭhaśreṣṭhānugakadaṃbaka  
jayopāśritasaṃrakṣāsaṃvidhānapaṭīyasi  jayonmūlitasaṃsāraviṣavṛkṣāṃkurodgame  
jaya prādeśikaiśvaryavīryaśauryavijṛṃbhaṇa  jaya viśvabahirbhūta nirastaparavaibhava  
jaya praṇītapañcārthaprayogaparamāmṛta  jaya pañcārthavijñānasudhāstotrasvarūpiṇi  
jayati ghorasaṃsāramahārogabhiṣagvara  jayānādimalājñānatamaḥpaṭalacaṃdrike  
jaya tripurakālāgne jaya tripurabhairavi  jaya triguṇanirmukte jaya triguṇamardini  
jaya prathamasarvajña jaya sarvaprabodhika  jaya pracuradivyāṃga jaya prārthitadāyini  
kva deva te paraṃ dhāma kva ca tucchaṃ ca no vacaḥ  tathāpi bhagavan bhaktyā pralapaṃtaṃ kṣamasva mām  
vijñāpyaivaṃvidhaiḥ sūktairviśvakarmā caturmukhaḥ  namaścakāra rudrāya radrāṇyai ca muhurmuhuḥ  
idaṃ stotravaraṃ puṇyaṃ brahmaṇā samudīritam  ardhanārīśvaraṃ nāma śivayorharṣavardhanam  
ya idaṃ kīrtayedbhaktyā yasya kasyāpi śikṣayā  sa tatphalamavāpnoti śivayoḥ prītikāraṇāt  
sakalabhuvanabhūtabhāvanābhyāṃ jananavināśavihīnavigrahābhyām  naravarayuvatīvapurdharābhyāṃ satatamahaṃ praṇatosmi śaṃkarābhyām  
vāyuruvāca  atha devo mahādevo mahājaladanādayā  vācā madhuragaṃbhīraśivadaślakṣṇavarṇayā  
arthasaṃpannapadayā rājalakṣaṇayuktayā  aśeṣaviṣayāraṃbharakṣāvimaladakṣayā  
manoharatarodāramadhurasmitapūrvayā  saṃbabhāṣe susaṃpīto viśvakarmāṇamīśvaraḥ  
īśvara uvāca  vatsa vatsa mahābhāga mama putra pitāmaha  jñātameva mayā sarvaṃ tava vākyasya gauravam  
prajānāmeva bṛddhyarthaṃ tapastaptaṃ tvayādhunā  tapasā 'nena tuṣṭosmi dadāmi ca tavepsitam  
ityuktvā paramodāraṃ svabhāvamadhuraṃ vacaḥ  sasarja vapuṣo bhāgāddevīṃ devavaro haraḥ  
yāmāhurbrahmavidvāṃso devīṃ divyaguṇānvitām  parasya paramāṃ śaktiṃ bhavasya paramātmanaḥ  
yasyāṃ na khalu vidyaṃte janma mṛtyujarādayaḥ  yā bhavānī bhavasyāṃgātsamāvirabhavatkila  
yasyā vāco nivartante manasā ceṃdriyaiḥ saha  sā bharturvapuṣo bhāgājjāteva samadṛśyata  
yā sā jagadidaṃ kṛtsnaṃ mahimnā vyāpya tiṣṭhati  śarīriṇīva sa devī vicitraṃ samalakṣyata  
sarvaṃ jagadidaṃ caiṣā saṃmohayati māyayā  īśvarātsaiva jātābhūdajātā paramārthataḥ  
na yasyā paramo bhāvaḥ surāṇāmapi gocaraḥ  viśvāmareśvarī caiva vibhaktā bharturaṃgataḥ  
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā parameśānīṃ sarvalokamaheśvarīm  sarvajñāṃ sarvagāṃ sūkṣmāṃ sadasadvyaktivarjitām  
paramāṃ nikhilaṃ bhāsā bhāsayantīmidaṃ jagat  praṇipatya mahādevīṃ prārthayāmāsa vai virāṭ  
brahmovāca  devi devena sṛṣṭo 'hamādau sarvajaganmayi  prajāsarge niyuktaśca sṛjāmi sakalaṃ jagat  
manasā nirmitāḥ sarve devi devādayo mayā  na vṛddhimupagacchanti sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ  
mithunaprabhavāmeva kṛtvā sṛṣṭimataḥ param  saṃvardhayitumicchāmi sarvā eva mama prajāḥ  
na nirgataṃ purā tvatto nārīṇāṃ kulamavyayam  tena nārīkulaṃ sraṣṭuṃ śaktirmama na vidyate  
sarvāsāmeva śaktīnāṃ tvattaḥ khalu samudbhavaḥ  tasmātsarvatra sarveṣāṃ sarvaśaktipradāyinīm  
tvāmeva varadāṃ māyāṃ prārthayāmi sureśvarīm  carācaravivṛddhyarthamaṃśenaikena sarvage  
dakṣasya mama putrasya putrī bhava bhavārdini  evaṃ sā yācitā devī brahmaṇā brahmayoninā  
śaktimekāṃ bhruvormadhyātsasarjātmasamaprabhām  tāmāha prahasanprekṣya devadevavaro haraḥ  
brahmāṇaṃ tapasārādhya kuru tasya yathepsitam  tāmājñāṃ parameśasya śirasā pratigṛhya sā  
brahmaṇo vacanāddevī dakṣasya duhitābhavat  dattvaivamatulāṃ śaktiṃ brahmaṇe brahmarūpiṇīm  
viveśa dehaṃ devasya devaścāṃtaradhīyata  tadā prabhṛti loke 'smin striyāṃ bhogaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ  
prajāsṛṣṭiśca vipreṃdrā maithunena pravartate  brahmāpi prāpa sānandaṃ santoṣaṃ munipuṃgavāḥ  
etadvassarvamākhyātaṃ devyāḥ śaktisamudbhavam  puṇyavṛddhikaraṃ śrāvyaṃ bhūtasargānupaṃgataḥ  
ya idaṃ kīrtayennityaṃ devyāḥ śaktisamudbhavam  puṇyaṃ sarvamavāpnoti putrāṃśca labhate śubhān  
adhyāya  
vāyuruvāca  evaṃ labdhvā parāṃ śaktimīśvarādeva śāśvatīm  maithunaprabhavāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartṛkāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ  svayamapyadbhuto nārī cārdhena puruṣo 'bhavat  yārdhena nārī sā tasmācchatarūpā vyajāyata  
virājamasṛjadbrahmā so 'rdhana puruṣo 'bhavat  sa vai svāyaṃbhuvaḥ pūrvaṃ puruṣo manurucyate  sā devī śatarūpā tu tapaḥ kṛtvā suduścaram  bhartāraṃ dīptayaśasaṃ manumevānvapadyata  
tasmāttu śatarūpā sā putradvayamasūyata  priyavratottānapādau putrau putravatāṃ varau  kanye dve ca mahābhāge yābhyāṃ jātāstvimāḥ prajāḥ  ākūtirekā vijñeyā prasūtiraparā smṛtā  
svāyaṃbhuvaḥ prasūtiṃ ca dadau dakṣāya tāṃ prabhuḥ  ruceḥ prajāpatiścaiva cākūtiṃ samapādayat  ākūtyāṃ mithunaṃ jajñe mānasasya ruceḥ śubham  yajñaśca dakṣiṇā caiva yābhyāṃ saṃvartitaṃ jagat  
svāyaṃbhuvasutāyāṃ tu prasūtyāṃ lokamātaraḥ  
catasro viṃśatiḥ kanyā dakṣastvajanayatprabhuḥ  śraddhā lakṣmīrdhṛtiḥ puṣṭistuṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā  buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāṃtissiddhiḥ kīrtistrayodaśī  
patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīḥ prabhuḥ  tābhyaḥ śiṣṭā yavīyasya ekādaśa sulocanāḥ  khyātiḥ satyarthasaṃbhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā  sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā  
bhṛguśśarvo marīciśca aṃgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ  pulastyo 'trirviśiṣṭhaśca pāvakaḥ pitarastathā  khyātyādyā jagṛhuḥ kanyāmunayo munisattamāḥ  kāmādyāstu yaśoṃtā ye te trayodaśa sūnavaḥ  
dharmasya jajñire tāstu śraddhādyāssusukhottarāḥ  duḥkhottarāśca hiṃsāyāmadharmasya ca saṃtatau  nikṛtyādaya utpannāḥputrāśca dharmalakṣaṇāḥ  naiṣāṃ bhāryāśca putrā vā sarve tvaniyamāḥ smṛtāḥ  
sa eṣa tāmasassargo jajñe dharmaniyāmakaḥ  yā sā dakṣasya duhitā rudrasya dayitā satī  bhartṛnindāprasaṃgena tyaktvā dākṣāyiṇīṃ tanum  dakṣaṃ ca dakṣabhāryāṃ ca viniṃdya saha bandhubhiḥ  
sā menāyāmāvirabhūtputrī himavato gireḥ  rudrastu tāṃ satīṃ dṛṣṭvā rudrāṃstvātmasamaprabhān  yathāsṛjadasaṃkhyātāṃstathā kathitameva ca  bhṛgoḥ khyātyāṃ samutpannā lakṣmīrnārāyaṇapriyā  
devau dhātṛvidhātārau manvaṃtaravidhāriṇau  tayorvai putrapautrādyāśśataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  svāyaṃbhuve 'ṃtare nītāḥ sarve te bhārgavā matāḥ  marīcerapi saṃbhūtiḥ paurṇamāsamasūyata  
kanyācatuṣṭayaṃ caiva mahīyāṃsastadanvayāḥ  yeṣāṃ vaṃśe samutpanno bahuputrasya kaśyapaḥ  smṛtiścāṃgirasaḥ patnī janayāmāsa vai sutau  āgnīdhraṃ śarabhañcaiva tathā kanyācatuṣṭayam  
tadīyāḥ putrapautrāśca yetītāste sahasraśaḥ  prītyāṃ pulastyabhāryāyāṃ dantognirabhavatsutaḥ  pūrvajanmani yogastyassmṛtaḥ svāyaṃbhuve 'ṃtare  tatsaṃtatīyā bahavaḥ paulastyā iti viśrutāḥ  kṣamā tu suṣuve putrānpulahasya prajāpateḥ  
kardamaśca suriścaiva sahiṣṇuśceti te trayaḥ  tretāgnivarcasassarve yeṣāṃ vaṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ  kratoḥ kratusamānbhāryā sannatissuṣuve sutān  naiṣāṃ bhāryāśca putrāśca sarve te hyūrdhvaretasaḥ  
ṣaṣṭistāni sahasrāṇi vālakhilyā iti smṛtāḥ  anūroragrato yāṃti parivārya divākaram  atrerbhāryānusūyā ca pañcātreyānasūyata  kanyakāṃ ca śrutiṃ nāma mātā śaṃkhapadasya ca  
satyanetraśca havyaśca āpomūrtiśśanaiścaraḥ  somaśca pañcamastvete pañcātreyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  teṣāṃ putrāśca pautrāśca hyātreyāṇāṃ mahātmanām  svāyaṃbhuve 'ṃtare 'tītāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  
ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭhasya putrā vai sapta jajñire  jyāyasī ca svasā teṣāṃ puṃḍarīkā sumadhyamā  rajo gātrordhvabāhū ca savanaścānayaśca yaḥ  sutapāśśukra ityete sapta saptarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ  
gotrāṇi nāmabhisteṣāṃ vāsiṣṭhānāṃ mahātmanām  svāyaṃbhuve 'ṃtare 'tītānyarbudāni śatāni ca  ityeṣa ṛṣisargastu sānubaṃdhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ  samāsādvistarādvaktumaśakyo 'yamiti dvijāḥ  
yo 'sau rudrātmako bahnibrahmaṇo mānasassutaḥ  svāhā tasya priyā lebhe putrāṃstrīnamitaujasaḥ  pāvakaḥ pavamānaśca śucirityeṣa te trayaḥ  nirmaṃthyaḥ pavamānassyādvaidyutaḥ pāvakassmṛtaḥ  
sūrye tapati yaścāsau śuciḥ saura udāhṛtaḥ  havyavāhaḥ kavyavāhaḥ saharakṣā iti trayaḥ  trayāṇāṃ kramaśaḥ putrā devapitṛsurāśca te  eteṣāṃ putrapautrāśca catvāriṃśannavaiva te  
kāmyanaimittikājasrakarmasu triṣu saṃsthitāḥ  sarve tapasvino jñeyāḥ sarve vratabhṛtastathā  sarve rudrātmakaścaiva sarve rudraparāyaṇāḥ  tasmādagnimukhe yattaddhutaṃ syādeva kenacit  
tatsarvaṃ rudramuddiśya dattaṃ syānnātra saṃśayaḥ  ityevaṃ niścayognīnāmanukrāṃto yathātatham  nātivistarato viprāḥ pitṝnvakṣyāmyataḥ param  yasmātṣaḍṛtavasteṣāṃ sthānaṃ sthānābhimāninām  
ṛtavaḥ pitarastasmādityeṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ  yuṣmādṛtuṣu sarve hi jāyaṃte sthāsnujaṃgamā  tasmādete pitara ārtavā iti ca śrutam  evaṃ pitṝṇāmeteṣāmṛtukālābhimāninām  
ātmaiśvaryā mahātmānastiṣṭhaṃtīhābbhrasaṃgamāt  āgniṣvāttā barhiṣadaḥ pitaro dvividhāḥ smṛtāḥ  ayajvānaśca yajvānaḥ kramātte mṛhamedhinaḥ  svadhāsūta pitṛbhyaśca dve kanye lokaviśrute  
menāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ caiva yābhyāṃ viśvamidaṃ dhṛtam  agniṣvāttasutā menā dharaṇī barhiṣatsutā  menā himavataḥ patnī mainākaṃ krauṃcameva ca  gaurīṃ gaṃgāṃ ca suṣuve bhavāṃgāśleṣapāvanīm  
merostu dharaṇī patnī divyauṣadhisamanvitam  maṃdaraṃ suṣuve putraṃ citrisundarakandharam  sa eva maṃdaraḥ śrīmānmeruputrastapobalāt  sākṣācchrīkaṃṭhanāthasya śivasyāvasathaṃ gataḥ  
sāsūtā dharaṇī bhūyastriṃśatkanyāśca viśrutāḥ  velāṃ ca niyatiṃ caiva tṛtīyāmapi cāyatim  āyatirniyatiścaiva patnyau dve bhṛguputrayoḥ  svāyaṃbhuve 'ṃtare pūrvaṃ kathitaste tadanvayaḥ  
suṣuve sāgarādvelā kanyāmekāmaniṃditām  savarṇāṃ nāma sāmudrīṃ patnīṃ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ  sāmudrī suṣuve putrāndaśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ  sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ  
yeṣāṃ svāyaṃbhuve dakṣaḥ putratvamagamatpurā  triyambakasya śāpena cākṣuṣasyāṃtare manoḥ  ityete brahmaputrāṇāṃ dharmādīnāmmahātmanām  nātisaṃkṣepato viprā nāti vistarataḥ kramāt  
varṇitā vai mayā vaṃśā divyā devagaṇānvitāḥ  kriyāvaṃtaḥ prajāvaṃto mahardhibhiralaṃkṛtāḥ  prajānāṃ saṃniveśo 'yaṃ prajāpatisamudbhavaḥ  na hi śakyaḥ prasaṃkhyātuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi  
rājñāmapi ca yo vaṃśo dvidhā so 'pi pravartate  sūryavaṃśassomavaṃśa iti puṇyatamaḥ kṣitau  ikṣvākurambarīṣaśca yayātirnāhuṣādayaḥ  puṇyaślokāḥ śrutā ye 'tra te pi tadvaṃśasaṃbhavāḥ  
anye ca rājaṛṣayo nānāvīryasamanvitā  kiṃ taiḥ phalamanutkrāṃtairuktapūrvaiḥ purātanaiḥ  kiṃ ceśvarakathā vṛttā yatra tatrānyakīrtanam  na sadbhiḥ saṃmataṃ matvā notsahe bahubhāṣitum  
prasaṃgādīśvarasyaiva prabhāvadyotanādapi  sargādayo 'pi kathitā ityatra tatpravistaraiḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  devī dakṣasya tanayā tyaktvā dākṣāyaṇī tanum  kathaṃ himavataḥ putrī menāyāmabhavatpurā  
kathaṃ ca nindito rudro dakṣeṇa ca mahātmanā  nimittamapi kiṃ tatra yena syānniṃdito bhavaḥ  
utpannaśca kathaṃ dakṣo abhiśāpādbhavasya tu  cākṣuṣasyāṃtare pūrvaṃ manoḥ prabrūhi māruta  
vāyuruvāva  śṛṇvaṃtu kathayiṣyāmi dakṣasya laghucetasaḥ  vṛttaṃ pāpātpramādācca viśvāmaravidūṣaṇam  
purā surāsurāḥ sarve siddhāśca paramarṣayaḥ  kadāciddraṣṭumīśānaṃ himavacchikharaṃ yayuḥ  
tadā devaśca devī ca divyāsanagatāvubhau  darśanaṃ dadatusteṣāṃ devādīnāṃ dvijottamāḥ  
tadānīmeva dakṣo 'pi gatastatra sahāmaraiḥ  jāmātaraṃ haraṃ draṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ cātmasutāṃ satīm  
tadātmagauravāddevo devyā dakṣe samāgate  devādibhyo viśeṣeṇa na kadācidabhūtsmṛtiḥ  
tasya tasyāḥ paraṃ bhāvamajñātuścāpi kevalam  putrītyevaṃ vimūḍhasya tasyāṃ vairamajāyata  
tatastenaiva vaireṇa vidhinā ca pracoditaḥ  nājuvāha bhavaṃ dakṣo dīkṣitastāmapi dviṣan  
anyāñ āmātarassarvānāhūya sa yathākramam  śataśaḥ puṣkalāmarcāñcakāra ca pṛthakpṛthak  
tathā tānsaṃgatāñchrutvā nāradasya mukhāttadā  yayau rudrāya rudrāṇī vijñāpya bhavanaṃ pituḥ  
atha saṃnihitaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ viśvatomukham  lakṣaṇāḍhyaṃ sukhārohamatimātramanoharam  
taptajāṃbūnadaprakhyaṃ citraratnapariṣkṛtam  muktāmayavitānāgnyaṃ sragdāmasamalaṃkṛtam  
taptakaṃcananirvyūhaṃ ratnastaṃbhaśatāvṛtam  vajrakalpitasopānaṃ vidrumastaṃbhatoraṇam  
puṣpapaṭṭaparistīrṇaṃ citraratnamahāsanam  vajrajālakiracchidramacchidramaṇikuṭṭimam  
maṇidaṃḍamanojñena mahāvṛṣabhalakṣmaṇā  alaṃkṛtapurobhāgamabbhraśubbhreṇa ketunā  
ratnakaṃcukaguptāṃgaiścitravetrakapāṇibhiḥ  adhiṣṭhitamahādvāramapradhṛṣyairguṇeśvaraiḥ  
mṛdaṃgatālagītādiveṇuvīṇāviśāradaiḥ  vidagdhaveṣabhāṣaiśca bahubhiḥ strījanairvṛtam  
āruroha mahādevī saha priyasakhījanaiḥ  cāmāravyañjanaṃ tasyā vajradaṃḍamanohare  
gṛhītvā rudrakanye dve vivījaturubhe śubhe  tadācāmarayormadhye devyā vadanamābabhau  
anyonyaṃ yudhyatormadhye haṃsayoriva paṃkajam  chatraṃ śaśinibhaṃ tasyāścūḍopari sumālinī  
dhṛtamuktāparikṣiptaṃ babhāra premanirbharā  tacchatramujjvalaṃ devyā ruruce vadanopari  
uparyamṛtabhāṃḍasya maṃḍalaṃ śaśino yathā  atha cāgre samāsīnā susmitāsyā śubhāvatī  
akṣadyūtavinodena ramayāmāsa vai satīm  suyaśāḥ pāduke devyāśśubhe ratnapariṣkṛte  
stanayoraṃtare kṛtvā tadā devīmasevataḥ  anyā kāṃcanacārvaṃgī dīptaṃ jagrāha darpaṇam  
aparā tālavṛntaṃ ca parā tāṃbūlapeṭikām  kācitkrīḍāśukaṃ cāru kare 'kuruta bhāminī  
kācittu sumanojñāni puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca  kācidābharaṇādhāraṃ babhāra kamalekṣaṇā  
kācicca punarālepaṃ suprasūtaṃ śubhāṃjanam  anyāśca sadṛśāstāstā yathāsvamucitakriyāḥ  
āvṛttyā tāṃ mahādevīmasevaṃta samaṃtataḥ  atīva śuśubhe tāsāmaṃtare parameśvarī  
tārāpariṣado madhye caṃdralekheva śāradī  tataḥ śaṃkhasamutthasya nādasya samanaṃtaram  
prāsthāniko mahānādaḥ paṭahaḥ samatāḍyata  tato madhuravādyāni saha tālodyataissvanaiḥ  
anāhatāni sanneduḥ kāhalānāṃ śatāni ca  sāyudhānāṃ gaṇeśānāṃ maheśasamatejasām  
sahasrāṇi śatānyaṣṭau tadānīṃ purato yayuḥ  teṣāṃ madhye vṛṣārūḍho gajārūḍho yathā guruḥ  
jagāma gaṇapaḥ śrīmān somanaṃdīśvarārcitaḥ  devaduṃdubhayo nedurdivi divyasukhā ghanāḥ  
nanṛturmunayassarve mumuduḥ siddhayoginaḥ  sasṛjuḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca vitānopari vāridāḥ  
tadā devagaṇaiścānyaiḥ pathi sarvatra saṃgatā  kṣaṇādiva piturgehaṃ praviveśa maheśvarī  
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kupito dakṣaścātmanaḥ kṣayakāraṇāt  tasyā yavīyasībhyo 'pi cakre pūjāma satkṛtām  
tadā śaśimukhī devī pitaraṃ sadasi sthitam  aṃbikā yuktamavyagramuvācākṛpaṇaṃ vacaḥ  
devyuvāca  brahmādayaḥ piśācāṃtā yasyājñāvaśavartinaḥ  sa devassāṃprataṃ tāta vidhinā nārcitaḥ kila  
tadāstāṃ mama jyāyasyāḥ putryāḥ pūjāṃ kimīdṛśīm  asatkṛtāmavajñāya kṛtavānasi garhitam  
evamukto 'bravīdenāṃ dakṣaḥ krodhādamarṣitaḥ  tvattaḥ śreṣṭhā viśiṣṭāśca pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama  
tāsāṃ tu ye ca bhartāraste me bahumatā mudā  gunaiścāpyadhikāssarvairbhartuste tryaṃbakādapi  
stabdhātmā tāmasaśśarvastvamimaṃ samupāśritā  tena tvāmavamanye 'haṃ pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ  
tathoktā pitaraṃ dakṣaṃ kruddhā devī tamabravīt  śṛṇvatāmeva sarveṣāṃ ye yajñasadasi sthitāḥ  
akasmānmama bhartāramajātāśeṣadūṣaṇam  vācā dūṣayase dakṣa sākṣāllokamaheśvaram  
vidyācauro gurudrohī vedeśvaravidūṣakaḥ  ta ete bahupāpmānassarve daṃḍyā iti śrutiḥ  
tasmādatyutkaṭasyāsya pāpasya sadṛśo bhṛśam  sahasā dāruṇo daṃḍastava daivādbhaviṣyati  
tvayā na pūjito yasmāddevadevastriyaṃbakaḥ  tasmāttava kulaṃ duṣṭaṃ naṣṭamityavadhāraya  
ityuktvā pitaraṃ ruṣṭā satī saṃtyaktasādhvasā  tadīyāṃ ca tanuṃ tyaktvā himavaṃtaṃ yayau girim  
sa parvataparaḥ śrīmāṃllabdhapuṇyaphalodayaḥ  tadarthameva kṛtavān suciraṃ duścaraṃ tapaḥ  
tasmāttamanugṛhṇāti bhūdhareśvaramīśvarī  svecchayā pitaraṃ cakre svātmano yogamāyayā  
yadā gatā satī dakṣaṃ viniṃdya bhayavihvalā  tadā tirohitā maṃtrā vihataśca tato 'dhvaraḥ  
tadupaśrutya gamanaṃ devyāstripurumardanaḥ  dakṣāya ca ṛṣibhyaśca cukopa ca śaśāpa tān  
yasmādavamatā dakṣamatkṛte 'nāgasā satī  pūjitāścetarāḥ sarvāḥ svasutā bhartṛbhiḥ saha  
vaivasvate 'ṃtare tasmāttava jāmātarastvamī  utpatsyaṃte samaṃ sarve brahmayajñeṣvayonijāḥ  
bhavitā mānuṣo rājā cākṣuṣasya tvamanvaye  prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraścāpi pracetasaḥ  
ahaṃ tatrāpi te vighnamācariṣyāmi durmate  dharmārthakāmayukteṣu karmasvapi punaḥ punaḥ  
tenaivaṃ vyāhṛto dakṣo rudreṇāmitatejasā  svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā papāta bhuvi duḥkhitaḥ  
tataḥ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣe 'ntare  prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraścaiva pracetasām  
bhṛgvādayo 'pi jātā vai manorvaivasvatasya tu  aṃtare brahmaṇo yajñe vāruṇīṃ bibhratastanum  
tadā dakṣasya dharmārthaṃ yajñe tasya durātmanaḥ  maheśaḥ kṛtavānvighnaṃ manā vavasvate sati  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kathaṃ dakṣasya dharmārthaṃ pravṛttasya durātmanaḥ  maheśaḥ kṛtavān vighnametadicchāma veditum  
vāyuruvāca  viśvasya jagato māturapi devyāstapobalāt  pitṛbhāvamupāgamya mudite himavadgirau  
deve 'pi tatkṛtodvāhe himavacchikharālaye  saṃkīḍati tayā sārdhaṃ kāle bahutare gate  
vaivasvate 'ṃtare prāpte dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ svayam  aśvamedhena yajñena yakṣyamāṇo 'nvapadyata  
tato himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe dakṣo vai yajñamāharat  gaṃgādvāre śubhe deśe ṛṣisiddhaniṣevite  
tasya tasminmakhedevāḥ sarve śakra purogamāḥ  gamanāya samāgamya buddhimāpedire tadā  
ādityā vasavo rudrāssādhyāssaha marudgaṇaiḥ  ūṣmapāḥ somapāścaiva ājyapā dhūmapāstathā  
aśvinau pitaraścaiva tathā cānye maharṣayaḥ  viṣṇunā sahitāḥ sarve svāgatā yajñabhāginaḥ  
dṛṣṭvā devakulaṃ sarvamīśvareṇa vināgatam  dadhīco manyunāviṣṭo dakṣamevamabhāṣata  
dadhīca uvāca  aprapūjye caiva pūjā pūjyānāṃ cāpya pūjane  naraḥ pāpamavāpnoti mahadvai nātra saṃśayaḥ  
asatāṃ saṃmatiryatra satāmavamatistathā  daṃḍo devakṛtastatra sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ  
evamuktvā tu viprarṣiḥ punardakṣamabhāṣata  pūjyaṃ tu paśubhartāraṃ kasmānnārcayase prabhum  
dakṣa uvāca  saṃti me bahavo rudrāḥ śūlahastāḥ kapardinaḥ  ekādaśāvasthitā ye nānyaṃ vedmi maheśvaram  
dadhīca uvāca  kimebhiramarairanyaiḥ pūjitairadhvare phalam  rājā cedadhvarasyāsya na rudraḥ pūjyate tvayā  
brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ sraṣṭā yaḥ prabhuravyayaḥ  brahmādayaḥ piśācāṃtā yasya kaiṃkaryavādinaḥ  
prakṛtīnāṃ paraścaiva puruṣasya ca yaḥ paraḥ  ciṃtyate yogavidvadbhi ṛṣibhistattvadarśibhiḥ  
akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma hyasacca sadasacca yat  anādimadhyanidhanamapratarkyaṃ sanātanam  
yaḥ sraṣṭā caiva saṃhartā bhartā caiva maheśvaraḥ  tasmādanyaṃ na paśyāmi śaṃkarātmānamadhvare  
dakṣa uvāca  etanmakheśasya suvarṇapātre haviḥ samastaṃ vidhimaṃtrapūtam  viṣṇornayāmyapratimasya bhāgaṃ prabhorvibhajyāvahanīyamadya  
dadhīca uvāca  yasmānnārādhito rudrassarvadeveśvareśvaraḥ  tasmāddakṣa tavāśeṣo yajño 'yaṃ na bhaviṣyati  
ityuktvā vacanaṃ kruddho dadhīco munisattamaḥ  nirgamya ca tato deśājjagāma svakamāśramam  
nirgate 'pi munau tasmindevā dakṣaṃ na tatyajuḥ  avaśyamanubhāvitvādanarthasya tu bhāvinaḥ  
etasminneva kāle tu jñātvaitatsarvamīśvarāt  dagdhuṃ dakṣādhvaraṃ viprā devī devamacodayat  
devyā saṃcodito devo dakṣādhvarajighāṃsayā  sasarja sahasā vīraṃ vīrabhadraṃ gaṇeśvaram  
sahasravadanaṃ devaṃ sahasrakamalekṣaṇam  sahasramudgaradharaṃ sahasraśarapāṇikam  
śūlaṭaṃkagadāhastaṃ dīptakārmukadhāriṇam  cakravajradharaṃ ghoraṃ caṃdrārdhakṛtaśekharam  
kuliśodyotitakaraṃ taḍijjvalitamūrdhajam  daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ mahāvaktraṃ mahodaram  
vidyujjihvaṃ pralaṃboṣṭhaṃ meghasāgaraniḥsvanam  vasānaṃ carma vaiyāghraṃ mahadrudhiranisravam  
gaṇḍadvitayasaṃsṛṣṭamaṇḍalīkṛtakuṇḍalam  varāmaraśiromālāvalīkalitaśekharam  
raṇannūpurakeyūramahākanakabhūṣitam  ratnasaṃcayasaṃdīptaṃ tārahārāvṛtorasam  
mahāśarabhaśārdūlasiṃhaiḥ sadṛśavikramam  praśastamattamātaṃgasamānagamanālasam  
śaṃkhacāmarakuṃdendumṛṇālasadṛśaprabham  satuṣāramivādrīndraṃ sākṣājjaṃgamatāṃ gatam  
jvālāmālāparikṣiptaṃ dīptamauktikabhūṣaṇam  tejasā caiva dīvyaṃtaṃ yugāṃta iva pāvakam  
sa jānubhyāṃ mahīṃ gatvā praṇataḥ prāṃjalistataḥ  pārśvato devadevasya paryatiṣṭhadgaṇeśvaraḥ  
manyunā cāsṛjadbhadrāṃ bhadrakālīṃ maheśvarīm  ātmanaḥ karmasākṣitve tena gaṃtuṃ sahaiva tu  
taṃ dṛṣṭvāvasthitaṃ vīrabhadraṃ kālāgnisannibham  bhadrayā sahitaṃ prāha bhadramastviti śaṃkaraḥ  
sa ca vijñāpayāmāsa saha devyā maheśvaram  ājñāpaya mahādeva kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇyaham  
tatastripurahā prāha haimavatyāḥ priyecchayā  vīrabhadraṃ mahābāhuṃ vācā vipulanādayā  
devadeva uvāca  prācetasasya dakṣasya yajñaṃ sadyo vināśaya  bhadrakālyā sahāsi tvametatkṛtyaṃ gaṇeśvara  
ahamapyanayā sārdhaṃ raibhyāśramasapīpataḥ  sthitvā vīkṣe gaṇeśāna vikramaṃ tava duḥsaham  
vṛkṣā kanakhale ye tu gaṃgādvārasamīpagāḥ  suvarṇaśṛṃgasya girermerumaṃdarasaṃnibhāḥ  
tasminpradeśe dakṣasya yujñaḥ saṃprati vartate  sahasā tasya yajñasya vighātaṃ kuru mā ciram  
ityukte sati devena devī himagirīndrajā  bhadraṃ bhadraṃ ca saṃprekṣya vatsaṃ dhenurivaurasam  
āliṃgya ca samāghrāya mūrdhni ṣaḍvadanaṃ yathā  sasmitā vacanaṃ prāha madhuraṃ madhuraṃ svayam  
devyuvāca  vatsa bhadra mahābhāga mahābalaparākrama  matpriyārthaṃ tvamutpanno mama manyuṃ pramārjaka  
yajñeśvaramanāhūya yajñakarmarato 'bhavat  dakṣaṃ vaireṇa taṃ tasmādbhiṃdhi yajñaṃ gaṇeśvara  
yajñalakṣmīmalakṣmīṃ tvaṃ bhadra kṛtvā mamājñayā  yajamānaṃ ca taṃ hatvā vatsa hiṃsaya bhadrayā  
aśeṣāmiva tāmājñāṃ śivayościtrakṛtyayoḥ  mūrdhni kṛtvā namaskṛtya bhadro gaṃtuṃ pracakrame  
athaiṣa bhagavānkruddhaḥ pretāvāsakṛtālayaḥ  vīrabhadro mahādevo devyā manyupramārjakaḥ  
sasarja romakūpebhyo romajākhyāngaṇeśvarān  dakṣiṇādbhujadeśāttu śatakoṭigaviśvarān  
pādāttathorudeśācca pṛṣṭhātpārśvānmukhādgalāt  guhyādgulphācchiromadhyātkaṃṭhādāsyāttathodarāt  
tadā gaṇeśvarairbhadrairbhadratulyaparākramaiḥ  saṃchāditamabhūtsarvaṃ sākāśavivaraṃ jagat  
sarve sahasrahastāste sahasrāyudhapāṇayaḥ  rudrasyānucarāssarve sarve rudrasamaprabhāḥ  
śūlaśaktigadāhastāṣṭaṃkopalaśilādharāḥ  kālāgnirudrasadṛśāstrinetrāśca jaṭādharāḥ  
nipeturbhṛśamākāśe śataśassiṃhavāhanāḥ  vineduśca mahānādāñjaladā iva bhadrajāḥ  
tairbhadrairbhagavānmadrastathā parivṛto babhau  kālānalaśatairyukto yathāṃte kālabhairavaḥ  
teṣāṃ madhye samāruhya vṛṣeṃdraṃ vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ  jagāma bhagavānbhadraśśubhamabhraṃ yathā bhavaḥ  
tasminvṛṣabhamārūḍhe bhadre tu bhasitaprabhaḥ  babhāra mauktikaṃ chatraṃ gṛhītasitacāmaraḥ  
sa tadā śuśubhe pārśve bhadrasya bhasitaprabhaḥ  bhagavāniva śailendraḥ pārśve viśvajagadguroḥ  
so 'pi tena babhau bhadraḥ śvetacāmarapāṇinā  bālasomena saumyena yathā śūlavarāyudhaḥ  
dadhmau śaṃkhaṃ sitaṃ bhadraṃ bhadrasya purataḥ śubham  bhānukaṃpo mahātejā hemaratnairalaṃkṛtaḥ  
devaduṃdubhayo nedurdivyasaṃkulaniḥsvanāḥ  vavṛṣuśśataśo mūrdhni puṣpavarṣaṃ balāhakāḥ  
phullānāṃ madhugarbhāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gaṃdhabaṃdhavaḥ  mārgānukūlasaṃvāhā vabuśca pathi mārutāḥ  
tato gaṇeśvarāḥ sarve mattā yuddhabaloddhatāḥ  nanṛturmumudur edurjahasurjagadurjaguḥ  
tadā bhadragaṇāṃtaḥstho babhau bhadraḥ sa bhadrayā  yathā rudragaṇāṃtaḥ sthastryambakoṃbikayā saha  
tatkṣaṇādeva dakṣasya yajñavāṭaṃ raṇmayam  praviveśa mahābāhurvīrabhadro mahānugaḥ  
tatastu dakṣapratipāditasya kratupradhānasya gaṇapradhānaḥ  prayogabhūmiṃ praviveśa bhadro rudro yathāṃte bhuvanaṃ didhakṣuḥ  
vāyuruvāca  tato viṣṇupradhānānāṃ surāṇāmamitaujasām  dadarśa ca mahatsatraṃ citradhvajaparicchadam  
sudarbhaṛtusaṃstīrṇaṃ susamiddhahutāśanam  kāṃcanairyajñabhāṃḍaiśca bhrājiṣṇubhiralaṃkṛtam  
ṛṣibhiryajñapaṭubhiryathāvatkarmakartṛbhiḥ  vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena svanuṣṭhitabahukramam  
devāṃganāsahasrāḍhyamapsarogaṇasevitam  veṇuvīṇāravairjuṣṭaṃ vedaghoṣaiśca bṛṃhitam  
dṛṣṭvā dakṣādhvare vīro vīrabhadraḥ pratāpavān  siṃhanādaṃ tadā cakre gaṃbhīro jalado yathā  
tataḥ kilakilāśabda ākāśaṃ pūrayanniva  gaṇeśvaraiḥ kṛto jajñe mahānnyakkṛtasāgaraḥ  
tena śabdena mahatāḥ grastā sarvedivaukasaḥ  dudruvuḥ parito bhītāḥ srastavastravibhūṣaṇāḥ  
kiṃsvidbhagno mahāmeruḥ kiṃsvitsaṃdīryate mahī  kimidaṃ kimidaṃ veti jajalpustridaśā bhṛśam  
mṛgendrāṇāṃ yathā nādaṃ gajeṃdrā gahane vane  śrutvā tathāvidhaṃ kecittatyajurjīvitaṃ bhayāt  
parvatāśca vyaśīryaṃta cakampe ca vasuṃdharā  marutaśca vyaghūrṇaṃta cukṣubhe makarālayaḥ  
agnayo naiva dīpyaṃte na ca dīpyati bhāskaraḥ  grahāśca na prakāśaṃte nakṣatrāṇi ca tārakāḥ  
etasminneva kāle tu yajñavāṭaṃ tadujjvalam  saṃprāpa bhagavānbhadro bhadraiśca saha bhadrayā  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītabhīto 'pi dakṣo dṛḍha iva sthitaḥ  kruddhavadvacanaṃ prāha ko bhavān kimihecchasi  
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dakṣasya ca durātmanaḥ  vīrabhadro mahātejā meghasaṃbhīranissvanaḥ  
smayanniva tamālokya dakṣaṃ devāśca ṛtvijaḥ  arthagarbhamasaṃbhrāntamavocaducitaṃ vacaḥ  
vīrabhadra uvāca  vayaṃ hyanucarāḥ sarve śarvasyāmitatejasaḥ  bhāgābhilipsayā prāptā bhāgo nassaṃpradīyatām  
atha cedadhvare 'smākaṃ na bhāgaḥ parikalpitaḥ  kathyatāṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra yudhyatāṃ vā mayāmaraiḥ  
ityuktāste gaṇeṃdreṇa devā dakṣapurogamāḥ  ūcurmantrāḥ pramāṇaṃ no na vayaṃ prabhavastviti  
mantrā ūcussurā yūyaṃ mohopahatacetasaḥ  yena prathamabhāgārhaṃ na yajadhvaṃ maheśvaram  
maṃtroktā api te devāḥ sarve saṃmūḍhacetasaḥ  bhadrāya na dadurbhāgaṃ tatprahāṇamabhīpsavaḥ  
yadā tathyaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca svavākyaṃ tadvṛthā 'bhavat  tadā tato yayurmaṃdā brahmalokaṃ sanātanam  
athovāca gaṇādhyakṣo devānviṣṇupurogamān  mantrāḥ pramāṇaṃ na kṛtā yuṣmābhirbalagarvitaiḥ  
yasmādasminmakhe devairitthaṃ vayamasatkṛtāḥ  tasmādvo jīvitaissārdhamapaneṣyāmi garvitam  
ityuktvā bhagavān kruddho vyadahannetravahninā  yakṣavāṭaṃ mahākūṭaṃ yathātisraḥ puro haraḥ  
tato gaṇeśvarāssarve parvatodagravigrahāḥ  yūpānutpāṭya hotḥṇāṃ kaṃṭheṣvābadhya rajjubhiḥ  
yajñapātrāṇi citrāṇi bhittvā saṃcūrṇya vāriṇi  gṛhītvā caiva yajñāṃgaṃ gaṃgāsrotasi cikṣipuḥ  
tatra divyānnapānānāṃ rāśayaḥ parvatopamāḥ  kṣīranadyo 'mṛtasrāvāḥ susnigdhadadhikardamāḥ  
uccāvacāni māṃsāni bhakṣyāṇi surabhīṇi ca  rasavanti ca pānāni lehyacoṣyāṇi tāni vai  
vīrāstadbhujate vaktrairviluṃpaṃti kṣipaṃti ca  vajraiścakrairmahāśūlaiśśaktibhiḥ pāśapaṭṭiśaiḥ  
musalairasibhiṣṭaṃkairbhidhipālaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ  uddhatāṃstridaśānsarvāṃllokapālapurassarān  
bibhidurbalino vīrā vīrabhadrāṃgasaṃbhavāḥ  chiṃdhi bhiṃdhi kṣipa kṣipraṃ māryatāṃ dāryatāmiti  
harasva praharasveti pāṭayotpāṭayeti ca  saṃraṃbhaprabhavāḥ krūrāśśabdāḥ śravaṇaśaṃkavaḥ  
yatratatra gaṇeśānāṃ jajñire samarocitāḥ  vivṛttanayanāḥ keciddaṣṭadaṃṣṭroṣṭhatālavaḥ  
āśramasthānsamākṛṣya mārayanti tapodhanāt  sruvānapaharantaśca kṣipantogniṃ jaleṣu ca  
kalaśānapi bhindaṃtaśchiṃdaṃto maṇivedikāḥ  gāyaṃtaśca nadantaśca hasantaśca muhurmuhuḥ  
raktāsavaṃ pibantaśca nanṛturgaṇapuṃgavāḥ  nirmathya seṃdrānamarān gaṇendrānvṛṣendranāgendramṛgendrasārāḥ  
cakrurbahūnyapratimabhāvāḥ saharṣaromāṇi viceṣṭitāni  nandaṃti kecitpraharanti keciddhāvanti kecitpralapanti kecit  
nṛtyanti kecidvihasanti kecidvalganti kecitpramathā balena  kecijjighṛkṣaṃti ghanānsa toyānkecidgrahītuṃ ravimutpataṃti  
kecitprasartuṃ pavanena sārdhamicchaṃti bhīmāḥ pramathā viyatsthāḥ  ākṣipya kecicca varāyudhāni mahā bhujaṃgāniva vainateyāḥ  
bhramaṃti devānapi vidravaṃtaḥ khamaṃḍale parvatakūṭakalpāḥ  utpāṭya cotpāṭyagṛhāṇi kecitsajālavātāyanavedikāni  
vikṣipya vikṣipya jalasya madhye kālāṃbudābhāḥ pramathā nineduḥ  udvartitadvārakapāṭakuḍyaṃ vidhvastaśālāvalabhīgavākṣam  
aho batābhajyata yajñavāṭamanāthavadvākyamivāyathārtham  hā nātha tāteti pituḥ suteti bhratarmamāmbeti ca mātuleti  
utpāṭyamāneṣu gṛheṣu nāryo hyānāthaśabdānbahuśaḥ pracakruḥ  
vāyuruvāca  tatastridaśamukhyāste viṣṇuśakrapurogamāḥ  sarve bhayaparitrastādudruvurbhayavihvalāḥ  
nijairadūṣitairaṃgairdṛṣṭvā devānupadrutān  daṃḍyānadaṃḍitānmatvā cukopa gaṇapuṃgavaḥ  
tatastriśūlamādāya śarvaśaktinibarhaṇam  ūrdhvadṛṣṭirmahābāhurmukhājjvālāḥ samutsṛjan  
amarānapi dudrāva dviradāniva kesarī  tānabhidravatastasya gamanaṃ sumanoharam  
vārāṇasyeva mattasya jagāma prekṣaṇīyatām  tatastatkṣobhayāmāsa mahatsurabalaṃ balī  
mahāsarovaraṃ yadvanmatto vāraṇayūthapaḥ  vikurvanbahudhāvarṇānnīlapāṃḍuralohitān  
vibhradvyāghrājinaṃ vāso hemapravaratārakam  chindanbhindannuda  lindandārayanpramathannapi  
vyacaraddevasaṃgheṣu bhadro 'gniriva kakṣagaḥ  tatra tatra mahāvegāccaraṃtaṃ śūladhāriṇam  
tamekaṃ tridaśāḥ sarve sahasramiva menire  bhadrakālī ca saṃkruddhā yuddhavṛddhamadoddhatā  
muktajvālena śūlena nirbibheda raṇe surān  sa tayā ruruce bhadro rudrakopasamudbhavaḥ  
prabhayeva yugāṃtāgniścalayā dhūmadhūmrayā  bhadrakālī tadāyuddhe vidrutatridaśābabhau  
kalpe śeṣānalajvālādagdhāviśvajagadyathā  tadā savājinaṃ sūryaṃ rudrānrudragaṇāgraṇīḥ  
bhadro mūrdhni jaghānāśu vāmapādena līlayā  asibhiḥ pāvakaṃ bhadraḥ paṭṭiśaistu yamaṃ yamī  
rudrāndṛḍhena śūlena mudgarairvaruṇaṃ dṛḍhaiḥ  parighairnirṛtiṃ vāyuṃ ṭaṃkaiṣṭaṃkadharaḥ svayam  
nirbibheda raṇe vīro līlayaiva gaṇeśvaraḥ  sarvāndevagaṇānsadyo munīñchaṃbhorvirodhinaḥ  
tato devaḥ sarasvatyā nāsikāgraṃ suśobhanam  ciccheda karajāgreṇa devamātustathaiva ca  
ciccheda ca kuṭhāreṇa bāhudaṃḍaṃ vibhāvasoḥ  agrato dvyaṃgulāṃ jihvāṃ māturdevyā lulāva ca  
svāhādevyāstathā devo dakṣiṇaṃ nāsikāpuṭam  cakarta karajāgreṇa vāmaṃ ca stanacūcukam  
bhagasya vipule netre śatapatrasamaprabhe  prasahyotpāṭayāmāsa bhadraḥ paramavegavān  
pūṣṇo daśanarekhāṃ ca dīptāṃ muktāvalīmiva  jaghāna dhanuṣaḥ koṭyā sa tenāspaṣṭavāgabhūt  
tataścaṃdramasaṃ devaḥ pādāṃguṣṭhena līlayā  kṣaṇaṃ kṛmivadākramya gharṣayāmāsa bhūtale  
śiraściccheda dakṣasya bhadraḥ paramakopataḥ  krośaṃtyāmeva vairiṇyāṃ bhadrakālyai dadau ca tat  
tatprahṛṣṭā samādāya śirastālaphalopamam  sā devī kaṃḍukakrīḍāṃ cakāra samarāṃgaṇe  
tato dakṣasya yajñastrī kuśīlā bhartṛbhiryathā  pādābhyāṃ caiva hastābhyāṃ hanyate sma gaṇeśvaraiḥ  
ariṣṭanemine somaṃ dharmaṃ caiva prajāpatim  bahuputraṃ cāṃgirasaṃ kṛśāśvaṃ kaśyapaṃ tathā  
gale pragṛhya balino gaṇapāḥ siṃhavikramāḥ  bhartsayaṃto bhṛśaṃ vāgbhirnirjaghnurmūrdhni muṣṭibhiḥ  
dharṣitā bhūtavetālairdārāssutaparigrahāḥ  yathā kaliyuge jārairbalena kulayoṣitaḥ  
tacca vidhvastakalaśaṃ bhagnayūpaṃ gatotsavam  pradīpitamahāśālaṃ prabhinnadvāratoraṇam  
utpāṭitasurānīkaṃ hanyamānaṃ tapodhanam  praśāntabrahmanirghoṣaṃ prakṣīṇajanasaṃcayam  
krandamānāturastrīkaṃ hatāśeṣaparicchadam  śūnyāraṇyanibhaṃ jajñe yajñavāṭaṃ tadārditam  
śūlavegaprarugṇāśca bhinnabāhūruvakṣasaḥ  vinikṛttottamāṃgāśca petururvyāṃ surottamāḥ  
hateṣu teṣu deveṣu patiteṣuḥ sahasraśaḥ  praviveśa gaṇeśānaḥ kṣaṇādāhavanīyakam  
praviṣṭamatha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadraṃ kālāgnisaṃnibham  dudrāva maraṇādbhīto yajño mṛgavapurdharaḥ  
sa visphārya mahaccāpaṃ dṛḍhajyāghoṣaṇabhīṣaṇam  bhadrastamabhidudrāva vikṣipanneva sāyakān  
ākarṇapūrṇamākṛṣṭaṃ dhanurambudasaṃnibham  nādayāmāsa ca jyāṃ dyāṃ khaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca sarvaśaḥ  
tamupaśritya sannādaṃ hato 'smītyeva vihvalam  śaraṇārdhena vakreṇa sa vīro 'dhvarapūruṣam  
mahābhayaskhalatpādaṃ vepantaṃ vigatatviṣam  mṛgarūpeṇa dhāvantaṃ viśiraskaṃ tadākarot  
tamīdṛśamavajñātaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai sūryasaṃbhavam  viṣṇuḥ paramasaṃkruddho yuddhāyābhavadudyataḥ  
tamuvāha mahāvegātskandhena natasaṃdhinā  sarveṣāṃ vayasāṃ rājā garuḍaḥ pannagāśanaḥ  
devāśca hataśiṣṭā ye devarājapurogamāḥ  pracakrustasya sāhāyyaṃ prāṇāṃstyaktumivodyatāḥ  
viṣṇunā sahitāndevānmṛgendraḥ kroṣṭukāniva  dṛṣṭvā jahāsa bhūtendro mṛgendra iva vivyathaḥ  
tasminnavasare vyomni samāvirabhavadrathaḥ  sahasrasūryasaṃkāśaścārucīravṛṣadhvajaḥ  
aśvaratnadvayodāro rathacakracatuṣṭayaḥ  sañcitānekadivyāstraśastraratnapariṣkṛtaḥ  
tasyāpi rathavaryasya syātsa eva hi sārathiḥ  yathā ca traipure yuddhe pūrvaṃ śārvarathe sthitaḥ  
sa taṃ rathavaraṃ brahmā śāsanādeva śūlinaḥ  haressamīpamānīya kṛtāñjalirabhāṣata  
bhagavanbhadra bhadrāṃga bhagavānindubhūṣaṇaḥ  ājñāpayati vīrastvāṃ rathamāroḍhumavyayaḥ  
rebhyāśramasamīpasthastryaṃbako 'ṃbikayā saha  sampaśyate mahābāho dussahaṃ te parākramam  
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sa vīro gaṇakuñjaraḥ  āruroha rathaṃ divyamanugṛhya pitāmaham  
tathā rathavare tasminsthite brahmaṇi sārathau  bhadrasya vavṛdhe lakṣmī rudrasyeva puradviṣaḥ  
tataḥ śaṃkhavaraṃ dīptaṃ pūrṇacaṃdrasamaprabham  pradadhmau vadane kṛtvā bhānukaṃpo mahābalaḥ  
tasya śaṃkhasya taṃ nādaṃ bhinnasārasasannibham  śrutvā bhayena devānāṃ jajvāla jaṭharānalaḥ  
yakṣavidyādharāhīndraiḥ siddhairyuddhadidṛkṣubhiḥ  kṣaṇena nibaḍībhūtāḥ sākāśavivarā diśāḥ  
tataḥ śārṅgeṇa cāpāṅkātsa nārāyaṇanīradaḥ  mahatā bāṇavarṣeṇa tutoda gaṇagovṛṣam  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣṇumāyāṃtaṃ śatadhā bāṇavarṣiṇam  sa cādade dhanurjaitraṃ bhadro bāṇasahasramuk  
samādāya ca taddivyaṃ dhanussamarabhairavam  śanairvisphārayāmāsa meruṃ dhanuriveśvaraḥ  
tasya visphāryamāṇasya dhanuṣo 'bhūnmahāsvanaḥ  tena svanena mahatā pṛthivīṃ samakaṃpayat  
tataḥ śaravaraṃ ghoraṃ dīptamāśīviṣopamam  jagrāha gaṇapaḥ śrīmānsvayamugraparākramaḥ  
bāṇoddhāre bhujo hyasya tūṇīvadanasaṃgataḥ  pratyadṛśyata valmīkaṃ vivekṣuriva pannagaḥ  
samuddhṛtaḥ kare tasya tatkṣaṇaṃ ruruce śareḥ  mahābhujaṃgasaṃdaṣṭo yathā bālabhujaṅgamaḥ  
śareṇa ghanatīvreṇa bhadro rudraparākramaḥ  vivyādha kupito gāḍhaṃ lalāṭe viṣṇumavyayam  
lalāṭe 'bhihito viṣṇuḥ pūrvamevāvamānitaḥ  cukopa gaṇapeṃdrāya mṛgeṃdrāyeva govṛṣaḥ  
tatastvaśanikalpena krūrāsyena maheṣuṇā  vivyādha gaṇarājasya bhuje bhujagasannibhe  
so 'pi tasya bhuje bhūyaḥ sūryāyutasamaprabham  visasarja śaraṃ vegādvīrabhadro mahābalaḥ  
sa ca viṣṇuḥ punarbhadraṃ bhadro viṣṇuṃ tathā punaḥ  sa ca taṃ sa ca taṃ viprāśśaraistāvanujaghnatuḥ  
tayoḥ parasparaṃ vegāccharānāśu vimuṃcatoḥ  dvayossamabhavadyuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam  
taddṛṣṭvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ tayoreva parasparam  hāhākāro mahānāsīdākāśe khecareritaḥ  
tatastvanalatuṃḍena śareṇādityavarcasā  vivyādha sudṛḍhaṃ bhadro viṣṇormahati vakṣasi  
sa tu tīvraprapātena śareṇa dṛḍhamāhataḥ  mahatīṃ rujamāsādya nipapāta vimohitaḥ  
punaḥ kṣaṇādivotthāya labdhasaṃjñastadā hariḥ  sarvāṇyapi ca divyāstrāṇyathainaṃ pratyavāsṛjat  
sa ca viṣṇurdhanurmuktānsarvāñcharvacamūpatiḥ  sahasā vārayāmāsa ghoraiḥ pratiśaraiḥ śarān  
tato viṣṇussvanāmāṃkaṃ bāṇamavyāhataṃ kvacit  sasarja krodharaktā kṣastamuddiśya gaṇeśvaram  
taṃ bāṇaṃ bāṇavaryeṇa bhadro bhadrāhvayeṇa tu  aprāptameva bhagavāñciccheda śatadhā pathi  
athaikeneṣuṇā śārṅgaṃ dvābhyāṃ pakṣau garutmataḥ  nimeṣādeva ciccheda tadadbhutamivābhavat  
tato yogabalādviṣṇurdehāddevānsudāruṇān  śaṃkhacakragadāhastān visasarja sahasraśaḥ  
sarvāṃstānkṣaṇamātreṇa traipurāniva śaṃkaraḥ  nirdadāha mahābāhurnetrasṛṣṭena vahninā  
tataḥ kruddhataro viṣṇuścakramudyamya satvaraḥ  tasminvīro samutsraṣṭuṃ tadānīmudyato 'bhavat  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā cakramudyamya purataḥ samupasthitam  smayanniva gaṇeśāno vyaṣṭaṃbhayadayatnataḥ  
staṃbhitāṃgastu taccakraṃ ghoramapratimaṃ kvacit  icchannapi samutsraṣṭuṃ na viṣṇurabhavatkṣamaḥ  
śvasannivaikamuddhṛtya bāhuṃ cakrasamanvitam  atiṣṭhadalaso bhūtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ  
viśarīro yathājīvo viśṛṅgo vā yathā vṛṣaḥ  vidaṃṣṭraśca yathā siṃhastathā viṣṇuravasthitaḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā durdaśāpannaṃ viṣṇumiṃdrādayaḥ surāḥ  samunnaddhā gaṇendreṇa mṛgeṃdreṇeva govṛṣāḥ  
pragṛhītāyudhā yauddhuṃkruddhāḥ samupatasthire  tāndṛṣṭvā samare bhadraḥkṣudrāniva harirmṛgān  
sākṣādrudratanurvīro varavīragaṇāvṛtaḥ  aṭṭahāsena ghoreṇa vyaṣṭaṃ bhayadaniṃditaḥ  
tathā śatamakhasyāpi savajro dakṣiṇaḥ karaḥ  sisṛkṣoreva udvajraścitrīkṛta ivābhavat  
anyeṣāmapi sarveṣāṃ saraktā api bāhavaḥ  alasānāmivāraṃbhāstādṛśāḥ pratiyāṃtyuta  
evaṃ bhagavatā tena vyāhatāśeṣavaibhavāt  amarāḥ samare tasya purataḥ sthātumakṣamāḥ  
stabdhairavayavaireva dudruvurbhayavihvalāḥ  sthitiṃ ca cakrire yuddhe vīratejobhayākulāḥ  
vidrutāṃstridaśānvīrānvīrabhadro mahābhujaḥ  vivyādha niśitairbāṇairmagho varṣairivācalān  
bahavastasya vīrasya bāhavaḥ parighopamāḥ  śastraiścakāśire dīptaiḥ sāgnijvālā ivoragāḥ  
astraśastrāṇyanekānisavīro visṛjanbabhau  visṛjansarvabhūtāni yathādau viśvasaṃbhavaḥ  
yathā raśmibhirādityaḥ pracchādayati medinīm  tathā vīraḥ kṣaṇādeva śaraiḥ prācchādayaddiśaḥ  
khamaṃḍale gaṇendrasya śarāḥ kanakabhūṣitāḥ  utpataṃtastaḍidrūpairupamānapadaṃ yayuḥ  
mahāṃtaste suragaṇānmaṃḍūkānivaḍuṃḍubhāḥ  prāṇairviyojayāmāsuḥ papuśca rudhirāsavam  
nikṛttabāhavaḥ kecitkecillūnavarānanāḥ  pārśve vidāritāḥ kecinnipeturamarā bhuvi  
viśikhonmathitairgātrairbahubhiśchinnasandhibhiḥ  vivṛttanayanāḥ kecinnipeturbhūtale mṛtāḥ  
gāṃ praveṣṭumivecchaṃtaḥ khaṃ gaṃtumiva lipsavaḥ  alabdhātmanirodhānāṃ vyalīyaṃtaḥ parasparam  
bhūmau kecitpraviviśuḥ parvatānāṃ guhāḥ pare  apare jagmurākāśaṃ pare ca viviśurjalam  
tathā saṃchinnasarvāṃgaissa vīrastridaśairbabhau  parigrastaprajāvargo bhagavāniva bhairavaḥ  
dagdhatripurasaṃvyūhastripurāriryathābhavat  evaṃ devabalaṃ sarvaṃ dīnaṃ bībhatsadarśanam  
gaṇeśvarasamutpannaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vapurādade  tadā tridaśavīrāṇāmasṛksalilavāhinī  
prāvartata nadī ghorā prāṇināṃ bhayaśaṃsinī  rudhireṇa pariklinnā yajñabhūmistadā babhau  
raktārdravasanā śyāmā hataśuṃbheva kaiśikī  tasminmahati saṃvṛtte samare bhṛśadāruṇe  
bhayeneva paritrastā pracacāla vasundharā  mahormikalilāvartaścukṣubhe ca mahodadhiḥ  
petuścolkā mahotpātāḥ śākhāśca mumucurdrumāḥ  aprasannā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pavanaścāśivo vavau  
aho vidhiviparyāsastvaśvamedhoyamadhvaraḥ  yajamānassvayaṃ dakṣau brahmaputraprajāpatiḥ  
dharmādayassadasyāśca rakṣitā garuḍadhvajaḥ  bhāgāṃśca pratigṛhṇaṃti sākṣādiṃdrādayaḥ surāḥ  
tathāpi yajamānasya yajñasya ca sahartvijaḥ  sadya eva śiraśchedassādhu saṃpadyate phalam  
tasmānnāvedanirdiṣṭaṃ na ceśvarabahiṣkṛtam  nāsatparigṛhītaṃ ca karma kuryātkadācana  
kṛtvāpi sumahatpuṇyamiṣṭvā yajñaśatairapi  na tatphalamavāpnoti bhaktihīno maheśvare  
kṛtvāpi sumahatpāpaṃ bhaktyā yajati yaśśivam  mucyate pātakaiḥ sarvairnātra kāryā vicāraṇā  
bahunātra kimuktena vṛthā dānaṃ vṛthā tapaḥ  vṛthā yajño vṛthā homaḥ śivanindāratasya tu  
tataḥ sanārāyaṇakāssarudrāḥ salokapālāssamare suraughāḥ  gaṇeṃdracāpacyutabāṇaviddhāḥ pradudruvurgāḍharujābhibhūtāḥ  
celuḥ kvacitkecana śīrṇakeśāḥ seduḥ kvacitkecana dīrghagātrāḥ  petuḥ kvacitkecana bhinnavaktrā neśuḥ kvacitkecana devavīrāḥ  
kecicca tatra tridaśā vipannā visrastavastrābharaṇāstraśastrāḥ  nipeturudbhāsitadīnamudrā madaṃ ca darpaṃ ca balaṃ ca hitvā  
sasmutpathaprasthitamapradhṛṣyo vikṣipya dakṣādhvaramakṣatāstraiḥ  babhau gaṇeśassa gaṇeśvarāṇāṃ madhye sthitaḥ siṃha ivarṣabhāṇām  
adhyāya  
vāyuruvāca  iti sañchinnabhinnāṃgā devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ  kṣaṇātkaṣṭāṃ daśāmetya tresuḥ stokāvaśeṣitā  
trastāṃstānsamare vīrān devānanyāṃśca vai gaṇāḥ  pramathāḥ paramakruddhā vīrabhadrapraṇoditāḥ  
pragṛhya ca tathā doṣaṃ nigaḍairāyasairdṛḍhaiḥ  babandhuḥ pāṇipādeṣu kaṃdhareṣūdareṣu ca  
tasminnavasare brahmā bhadramadrīndrajānutam  sārathyāllabdhavātsalyaḥ prārthayan praṇato 'bravīt  
alaṃ krodhena bhagavannaṣṭāścaite divaukasaḥ  prasīda kṣamyatāṃ sarvaṃ romajaissaha suvrata  
evaṃ vijñāpitastena brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā  śamaṃ jagāma saṃprīto gaṇapastasya gauravāt  
devāśca labdhāvasarā devadevasya maṃtriṇaḥ  dhārayanto 'ñjalīnmūrdhni tuṣṭuvurvividhaiḥ stavaiḥ  
devā ūcuḥ  namaḥ śivāya śāntāya yajñahantre triśūline  rudrabhadrāya rudrāṇāṃ pataye rudrabhūtaye  
kālāgnirudrarūpāya kālakāmāṃgahāriṇe  devatānāṃ śirohantre dakṣasya ca durātmanaḥ  
saṃsargādasya pāpasya dakṣasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ  śāsitāḥ samare vīra tvayā vayamaninditā  
dagdhāścāmī vayaṃ sarve tvatto bhītāśca bho prabho  tvameva gatirasmākaṃ trāhi naśśaraṇāgatān  
vāyuruvāca  tuṣṭastvevaṃ stuto devān visṛjya nigaḍātprabhuḥ  ānayaddevadevasya samīpamamarāniha  
devopi tatra bhagavānantarikṣe sthitaḥ prabhuḥ  sagaṇaḥ sarvagaḥ śarvassarvalokamaheśvaraḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā parameśānaṃ devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ  prītā api ca bhītāśca namaścakrurmaheśvaram  
dṛṣṭvā tānamarānbhītānpraṇatārtiharo haraḥ  idamāha mahādevaḥ prahasan prekṣya pārvatīm  
mahādeva uvāca  mābhaiṣṭa tridaśāssarve yūyaṃ vai māmikāḥ prajāḥ  anugrahārthameveha dhṛto daṃḍaḥ kṛpālunā  
bhavatāṃ nirjarāṇāṃ hi kṣānto 'smābhirvyatikramaḥ  kruddheṣvasmāsu yuṣmākaṃ na sthitirna ca jīvitam  
vāyuruvāca  ityuktāstridaśāssarve śarveṇāmitatejasā  sadyo vigatasandehā nanṛturvibudhā mudā  
prasannamanaso bhūtvānandavihvalamānasāḥ  stutimārebhire kartuṃ śaṃkarasya divaukasaḥ  
devā ūcuḥ  tvameva devākhilalokakartā pātā ca hartā parameśvaro 'si  kaviṣṇurudrākhyasvarūpabhedai rajastamassattvadhṛtātmamūrte  
sarvamūrte namaste 'stu viśvabhāvana pāvana  amūrte bhaktahetorhi gṛhītākṛtisaukhyada  
caṃdro 'gado hi deveśa kṛpātastava śaṃkara  nimajjanānmṛtaḥ prāpa sukhaṃ mihirajājaliḥ  
sīmantinī hatadhavā tava pūjanataḥ prabho  saubhāgyamatulaṃ prāpa somavāravratātsutān  
śrīkarāya dadau devaḥ svīyaṃ padamanuttamam  sudarśanamarakṣastvaṃ nṛpamaṃḍalabhītitaḥ  
meduraṃ tārayāmāsa sadāraṃ ca ghṛṇānidhiḥ  śāradāṃ vidhavāṃ cakre sadhavāṃ kriyayā bhavān  
bhadrāyuṣo vipattiṃ ca vicchidya tvamadāḥ sukham  sauminī bhavabandhādvai muktā 'bhūttava sevanāt  
viṣṇuruvāca  tvaṃ śaṃbho kaharīśāśca rajassattvatamoguṇaiḥ  kartā pātā tathā hartā janānugrahakāṃkṣayā  
sarvagarvāpahārī ca sarvatejovilāsakaḥ  sarvavidyādigūḍhaśca sarvānugrahakārakaḥ  
tvattaḥ sarvaṃ ca tvaṃ sarvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ girīśvara  trāhi trāhi punastrāhi kṛpāṃ kuru mamopari  
athāsminnantare brahmā praṇipatya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  evaṃ tvavasaraṃ prāpya vyajñāpayata śūline  
brahmovāca  jaya deva mahādeva praṇatārtivibhaṃjana  īdṛśeṣvaparādheṣu ko 'nyastvattaḥ prasīdati  
labdhamāno bhaviṣyaṃti ye purā nihitā mṛdhe  pratyāpattirna kasya syātprasanne parameśvare  
yadidaṃ devadevānāṃ kṛtamantuṣu dūṣaṇam  tadidaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ manyeta aṃgīkāragauravāt  
iti vijñāpyamānastu brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā  vilokya vadanaṃ devyā devadevassmayanniva  
putrabhūtasya vātsalyādbrahmaṇaḥ padmajanmanaḥ  devādīnāṃ yathāpūrvamaṃgāni pradadau prabhuḥ  
prathamādyaiśca yā devyo daṃḍitā devamātaraḥ  tāsāmapi yathāpūrvāṇyaṃgāni giriśo dadau  
dakṣasya bhagavāneva svayaṃ brahmā pitāmahaḥ  tatpāpānuguṇaṃ cakre jaracchāgamukhaṃ mukham  
so 'pi saṃjñāṃ tato labdhvā sa dṛṣṭvā jīvitaḥ sudhī  bhītaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ śaṃbhuṃ tuṣṭāva pralapanbahu  
dakṣa uvāca  jaya deva jagannātha lokānugrahakāraka  kṛpāṃ kuru maheśānāparādhaṃ me kṣamasva ha  
kartā bhartā ca hartā ca tvameva jagatāṃ prabho  mayā jñātaṃ viśeṣeṇa viṣṇvādisakaleśvaraḥ  
tvayaiva vitataṃ sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ na nāśitam  na hi tvadadhikāḥ kecidīśāste 'cyutakādayaḥ  
vāyuruvāca  taṃ tathā vyākulaṃ bhītaṃ pralapaṃtaṃ kṛtāgasam  smayannivāvadatprekṣya mā bhairiti  ghṛṇānidhiḥ  
tathoktvā brahmaṇastasya pituḥ priyacikīrṣayā  gāṇapatyaṃ dadau tasmai dakṣāyākṣayamīśvaraḥ  
tato brahmādayo devā abhivaṃdya kṛta  ṃjaliḥ  tuṣṭuvuḥ praśrayā vācā śaṃkaraṃ girijādhipam  
brahmādaya ūcuḥ  jaya śaṃkara deveśa dīnānātha mahāprabho  kṛpāṃ kuru maheśānāparādhaṃ no kṣamasva vai  
makhapāla makhādhīśa makhavidhvaṃsakāraka  kṛpāṃ kuru maśānāparādhaṃ naḥ kṣamasva vai  
devadeva pareśāna bhaktaprāṇaprapoṣaka  duṣṭadaṇḍaprada svāminkṛpāṃ kuru namo 'stu te  
tvaṃ prabho garvahartā vai duṣṭānāṃ tvāmajānatām  rakṣako hi viśeṣeṇa satāṃ tvatsaktacetasām  
adbhutaṃ caritaṃ te hi niścitaṃ kṛpayā tava  sarvāparādhaḥ kṣaṃtavyo vibhavo dīnavatsalāḥ  
vāyuruvāca  iti stuto mahādevo brahmādyairamaraiḥ prabhuḥ  sa bhaktavatsalassvāmī tutoṣa karuṇodadhiḥ  
cakārānugrahaṃ teṣāṃ brahmādīnāṃ divaukasām  dadau narāṃśca suprītyā śaṃkaro dīnavatsalaḥ  
sa ca tatastridaśāñcharaṇāgatān paramakāruṇikaḥ parameśvaraḥ  anugatasmitalakṣaṇayā girā śamitasarvabhayaḥ samabhāṣata  
śiva uvāca  yadidamāga ihācaritaṃ surairvidhiniyogavaśādiva yantritaiḥ  śaraṇameva gatānavalokya vastadakhilaṃ kila vismṛtameva naḥ  
tadiha yūyamapi prakṛtaṃ manasyavigaṇayya vimardamapatrapāḥ  hariviriṃcisurendramukhāssukhaṃ vrajata devapuraṃ prati saṃprati  
iti surānabhidhāya sureśvaro nikṛtadakṣakṛtakraturakratuḥ  sagirijānucarassaparicchadaḥ sthita ivāmbaratontaradhāddharaḥ  
atha surā api te vigatavyathāḥ kathitabhadrasubhadraparākramāḥ  sapadi khena sukhena yathāsukhaṃ yayuranekamukhāḥ maghavanmukhāḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  antardhānagato devyā saha sānucaro haraḥ  kva yātaḥ kutra vāsaḥ kiṃ kṛtvā virarāma ha  
vāyuruvāca  mahīdharavaraḥ śrīmānmaṃdaraścitrakaṃdaraḥ  dayito devadevasya nivāsastapaso 'bhavat  
tapo mahatkṛtaṃ tena voḍhuṃ svaśirasā śivau  cireṇa labdhaṃ tatpādapaṃkajasparśajaṃ sukham  
tasya śailasya saundaryaṃ sahasravadanairapi  na śakyaṃ vistarādvaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi  
śakyamapyasya saundaryaṃ na varṇayitumutsahe  parvatāntarasaundaryaṃ sādhāraṇavidhāraṇāt  
idantu śakyate vaktumasminparvatasundare  ṛddhyā kayāpi saundaryamīśvarāvāsayogyatā  
ata eva hi devena devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā  atīva ramaṇīyoyaṃ girirantaḥpurīkṛtaḥ  
mekhalābhūmayastasya vimalopalapādapāḥ  śivayornityasānnidhyānnyakkurvaṃtyakhilaṃjagat  
pitṛbhyāṃ jagato nityaṃ snānapānopayogataḥ  avāptapuṇyasaṃskāraḥ prasaradbhiritastataḥ  
laghuśītalasaṃsparśairacchācchairnirjharāmbubhiḥ  adhirājyena cādrīṇāmadrīreṣo 'bhiṣicyate  
niśāsu śikharaprāntarvartinā sa śiloccayaḥ  caṃdreṇācala sāmrājyacchatreṇeva virājate  
sa śailaścaṃcalībhūtairbālaiścāmarayoṣitām  sarvaparvatasāmrājyacāmarairiva vījyate  
prātarabhyudite bhānau bhūdharo ratnabhūṣitaḥ  darpaṇe dehasaubhāgyaṃ draṣṭukāma iva sthitaḥ  
kūjadvihaṃgavācālairvātoddhṛtalatābhujaiḥ  vimuktapuṣpaiḥ satataṃ vyālambimṛdupallavaiḥ  
latāpratānajaṭilaistarubhistapasairiva  jayāśiṣā sahābhyarcya niṣevyata ivādrirāṭ  
adhomukhairūrdhvamukhaiśśṛṃgaistiryaṅmukhaistathā  prapatanniva pātāle bhūpṛṣṭhādutpatanniva  
parītaḥ sarvato dikṣu bhramanniva vihāyasi  paśyanniva jagatsarvaṃ nṛtyanniva nirantaram  
guhāmukhaiḥ pratidinaṃ vyāttāsyo vipulodaraiḥ  ajīrṇalāvaṇyatayā jṛṃbhamāṇa ivācalaḥ  
grasanniva jagatsarvaṃ pibanniva payonidhim  vamanniva tamontasthaṃ mādyanniva khamambudaiḥ  
nivāsa bhūmayastāstā darpaṇapratimodarāḥ  tiraskṛtātapāssnigdhāśramacchāyāmahīruhāḥ  
saritsarastaḍāgādisaṃparkaśiśirānilāḥ  tatra tatra niṣaṇṇābhyāṃ śivābhyāṃ saphalīkṛtāḥ  
tamimaṃ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhaṃ smṛtvā sāmbastriyambakaḥ  raibhyāśramasamīpasthaścāntardhānaṃ gato yayau  
tatrodyānamanuprāpya devyā saha maheśvaraḥ  rarāma ramaṇīyāsu devyāntaḥpurabhūmiṣu  
tathā gateṣu kāleṣu pravṛddhāsu prajāsu ca  daityau śuṃbhaniśuṃbhākhyau bhrātarau saṃbabhūvatuḥ  
tābhyāṃ tapo balāddattaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭinā  avadhyatvaṃ jagatyasminpuruṣairakhilairapi  
ayonijā tu yā kanyā hyaṃbikāṃśasamudbhavā  ajātapuṃsparśaratiravilaṃghyaparākramā  
tayā tu nau vadhaḥ saṃkhye tasyāṃ kāmābhibhūtayoḥ  iti cābhyarthito brahmā tābhyāmprāha tathāstviti  
tataḥ prabhṛti śakrādīnvijitya samare surān  niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāraṃ jagaccakraturakramāt  
tayorvadhāya deveśaṃ brahmābhyarthitavānpunaḥ  viniṃdyāpi rahasyaṃ vāṃ krodhayitvā yathā tathā  
tadvarṇakośajāṃ śaktimakāmāṃ kanyakātmikām  niśumbhaśuṃbhayorhaṃtrīṃ surebhyo dātumarhasi  
evamabhyarthito dhātrā bhagavānnīlalohitaḥ  kālītyāha rahasyaṃ vāṃ nindayanniva sasmitaḥ  
tataḥ kruddhā tadā devī suvarṇā varṇakāraṇāt  smayantī cāha bhartāramasamādheyayā girā  
devyuvāca  īdṛśo mama varṇesminna ratirbhavato 'sti cet  evāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ kathameṣā niyamyate  
aratyā vartamāno 'pi kathaṃ ca ramase mayā  na hyaśakyaṃ jagatyasminnīśvarasya jagatprabhoḥ  
svātmārāmasya bhavato ratirna sukhasādhanam  iti hetoḥ smaro yasmātprasabhaṃ bhasmasātkṛtaḥ  
yā ca nābhimatā bharturapi sarvāṃgasundarī  sā vṛthaiva hi jāyeta sarvairapi guṇāntaraiḥ  
bharturbhogaikaśeṣo hi sarga evaiṣa yoṣitām  tathāsatyanyathābhūtā nārī kutropayujyate  
tasmādvarṇamimaṃ tyaktvā tvayā rahasi ninditam  varṇāntaraṃ bhajiṣye vā na bhajiṣyāmi vā svayam  
ityuktvotthāya śayanāddevī sācaṣṭa gadgadam  yayāce 'numatiṃ bhartustapase kṛtaniścayā  
tathā praṇayabhaṃgena bhīto bhūtapatiḥ svayam  pādayoḥ praṇamanneva bhavānīṃ pratyabhāṣata  
īśvara uvāca  ajānatī ca krīḍoktiṃ priye kiṃ kupitāsi me  ratiḥ kuto vā jāyeta tvattaścedaratirmama  
mātā tvamasya jagataḥ pitāhamadhipastathā  kathaṃ tadutpapadyeta tvatto nābhiratirmama  
āvayorabhikāmo 'pi kimasau kāmakāritaḥ  yataḥ kāmasamutpattiḥ prāgeva jagadudbhavaḥ  
pṛthagjanānāṃ rataye kāmātmā kalpito mayā  tataḥ kathamupālabdhaḥ kāmadāhādahaṃ tvayā  
māṃ vai tridaśasāmānyaṃ manyamāno manobhavaḥ  manākparibhavaṃ kurvanmayā vai bhasmasātkṛtaḥ  
vihāropyāvayorasya jagatastrāṇakāraṇāt  tatastadarthaṃ tvayyadya krīḍoktiṃ kṛtavāhanam  
sa cāyamacirādarthastavaivāviṣkariṣyate  krodhasya janakaṃ vākyaṃ hṛdi kṛtvedamabravīt  
devyuvāca  śrutapūrvaṃ hi bhagavaṃstava cāṭu vaco mayā  yenaivamatidhīrāhamapi prāgabhivaṃcitā  
prāṇānapyapriyā bharturnārī yā na parityajet  kulāṃganā śubhā sadbhiḥ kutsitaiva hi gamyate  
bhūyasī ca tavāprītiragauramiti me vapuḥ  krīḍoktirapi kālīti ghaṭate kathamanyathā  
sadbhirvigarhitaṃ tasmāttava kārṣṇyamasaṃmatam  anutsṛjya tapoyogātsthātumeveha notsahe  
śiva uvāca  sa yadyevaṃvidhatāpaste tapasā kiṃ prayojanam  mamecchayā svecchayā vā varṇāntaravatī bhava  
devyuvāca  necchāmi bhavato varṇaṃ svayaṃ vā kartumanyathā  brahmāṇaṃ tapasārādhya kṣipraṃ gaurī bhavāmyaham  
īśvara uvāca  matprasādātpurā brahmā brahmatvaṃ prāptavānpurā  tamāhūya mahādevi tapasā kiṃ kariṣyasi  
devyuvāca  tvatto labdhapadā eva sarve brahmādayaḥ surāḥ  tathāpyārādhya tapasā brahmāṇaṃ tvanniyogataḥ  
purā kila satī nāmnā dakṣasya duhitā 'bhavam  jagatāṃ patimevaṃ tvāṃ patiṃ prāptavatī tathā  
evamadyāpi tapasā toṣayitvā dvijaṃ vidhim  gaurī bhavitumicchāmi ko doṣaḥ kathyatāmiha  
evamukto mahādevyā vāmadevaḥ smayanniva  na tāṃ nirbaṃdhayāmāsa devakāryacikīrṣayā  
vāyuruvāca  tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya patimambā pativratā  niyamya ca viyogārtiṃ jagāma himavadgirim  
tapaḥkṛtavatī pūrvaṃ deśe yasminsakhījanaiḥ  tameva deśamavṛnottapase praṇayātpunaḥ  
tataḥ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ ca tayorgṛhe  praṇamya vṛttaṃ vijñāpya tābhyāṃ cānumatā satī  
punastapovanaṃ gatvā bhūṣaṇāni visṛjya ca  snātvā tapasvino veṣaṃ kṛtvā paramapāvanam  
saṃkalpya ca mahātīvraṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram  sadā manasi sandhāya bhartuścaraṇapaṃkajam  
tameva kṣaṇike liṃge dhyātvā bāhyavidhānataḥ  trisandhyamabhyarcayantī vanyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalādibhiḥ  
sa eva brahmaṇo mūrtimāsthāya tapasaḥ phalam  pradāsyati mametyevaṃ nityaṃ kṛtvā 'karottapaḥ  
tathā tapaścarantīṃ tāṃ kāle bahutithe gate  dṛṣṭaḥ kaścinmahāvyāghro duṣṭabhāvādupāgamat  
tathaivopagatasyāpi tasyātīvadurātmanaḥ  gātraṃ citrārpitamiva stabdhaṃ tasyāssakāśataḥ  
taṃ dṛṣṭvāpi tathā vyāghraṃ duṣṭabhāvādupāgatam  na pṛthagjanavaddevī svabhāvena vivicyate  
sa tu viṣṭabdhasarvāṃgo bubhukṣāparipīḍitaḥ  mamāmiṣaṃ tato nānyaditi matvā nirantaram  
nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ satataṃ devīmeva tadā 'niśam  atiṣṭhadagratastasyā upāsanamivācarat  
devyāśca hṛdaye nityaṃ mamaivāyamupāsakaḥ  trātā ca duṣṭasattvebhya iti pravavṛte kṛpā  
tasyā eva kṛpā yogātsadyonaṣṭamalatrayaḥ  babhūva sahasā vyāghro devīṃ ca bubudhe tadā  
nyavartata bubhukṣā ca tasyāṃgastambhanaṃ tathā  daurātmyaṃ janmasiddhaṃ ca tṛptiśca samajāyata  
tadā paramabhāvena jñātvā kārtārthyamātmanaḥ  sadyopāsaka evaiṣa siṣeve parameśvarīm  
duṣṭānāmapi sattvānāṃ tathānyeṣāndurātmanām  sa eva drāvako bhūtvā vicacāra tapovane  
tapaśca vavṛdhe devyāstīvraṃ tīvratarātmakam  devāśca daityanirbandhādbrahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ  
cakrurnivedanaṃ devāḥ svaduḥkhasyāripīḍanāt  yathā ca dadatuḥ śumbhaniśumbhau varasammadāt  
so 'pi śrutvā vidhirduḥkhaṃ surāṇāṃ kṛpayānvitaḥ  āsīddaityavadhāyaiva smṛtvā hetvāśrayāṃ kathām  
sāmaraḥ prārthito brahmā yayau devyāstapovanam  saṃsmaranmanasā devaduḥkhamokṣaṃ svayatnataḥ  
dadarśa ca suraśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhe tapasi niṣṭhitām  pratiṣṭhāmiva viśvasya bhavānīṃ parameśvarīm  
nanāma cāsya jagato mātaraṃ svasya vai hareḥ  rudrasya ca piturbhāryāmāryāmadrīśvarātmajām  
brahmāṇamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā devī devagaṇaiḥ saha  arghyaṃ tadarhaṃ dattvā 'smai svāgatādyairupācarat  
tāṃ ca pratyupacāroktiṃ puraskṛtyābhinaṃdya ca  papraccha tapaso hetumajānanniva padmajaḥ  
brahmovāca  tīvreṇa tapasānena devyā kimiha sādhyate  tapaḥphalānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvadadhīnā hi siddhayaḥ  
yaścaiva jagatāṃ bhartā tameva parameśvaram  bhartāramātmanā prāpya prāptañca tapasaḥ phalam  
athavā sarvamevaitatkrīḍāvilasitaṃ tava  idantu citraṃ devasya virahaṃ sahase katham  
devyuvāca  sargādau bhavato devādutpattiḥ śrūyate yadā  tadā prajānāṃ prathamastvaṃ me prathamajaḥ sutaḥ  
yadā punaḥ prajāvṛddhyai lalāṭādbhavato bhavaḥ  utpanno 'bhūttadā tvaṃ me guruḥ śvaśurabhāvataḥ  
yadā bhavadgirīndraste putro mama pitā svayam  tadā pitāmahastvaṃ me jāto lokapitāmaha  
tadīdṛśasya bhavato lokayātrāvidhāyinaḥ  vṛttavantaḥpure bhartā kathayiṣye kathaṃ punaḥ  
kimatra bahunā dehe yaścāyaṃ mama kālimā  tyaktvā sattvavidhānena gaurī bhavitumutsahe  
brahmovāca  etāvatā kimarthena tīvraṃ devi tapaḥ kṛtam  svecchaiva kimaparyāptā krīḍeyaṃ hi tavedṛśī  
krīḍā 'pi ca jaganmātastava lokahitāya vai  ato mameṣṭamanayā phalaṃ kimapi sādhyatām  
niśuṃbhaśuṃbhanāmānau daityau dattavarau mayā  dṛptau devānprabādhete tvatto labdhastayorvadhaḥ  
alaṃ vilaṃbanenātra tvaṃ kṣaṇena sthirā bhava  śaktirvisṛjyamānā 'dya tayormṛtyurbhaviṣyati  
brāhmaṇābhyarthitā caiva devī girivarātmajā  tvakkośaṃ sahasotsṛjya gaurī sā samajāyata  
sā tvakkośātmanotsṛṣṭā kauśikī nāma nāmataḥ  kālī kālāmbudaprakhyā kanyakā samapadyata  
sā tu māyātmikā śaktiryoganidrā ca vaiṣṇavī  śaṃkhacakratriśūlādisāyudhāṣṭamahābhujā  
saumyā ghorā ca miśrā ca trinetrā candraśekharā  ajātapuṃsparśaratiradhṛṣyā cātisundarī  
dattā ca brahmaṇe devyā śaktireṣā sanātanī  niśuṃbhasya ca śuṃbhasya nihaṃtrī daityasiṃhayoḥ  
brahmaṇāpi prahṛṣṭena tasyai paramaśaktaye  prabalaḥ kesarī datto vāhanatve samāgataḥ  
vindhye ca vasatiṃ tasyāḥ pūjāmāsavapūrvakaiḥ  māṃsairmatsyairapūpaiśca nirvartyāsau samādiśat  
sā caiva saṃmatā śaktirbrahmaṇo viśvakarmaṇaḥ  praṇamya mātaraṃ gaurīṃ brahmāṇaṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ  
śaktibhiścāpi tulyābhiḥ svātmajābhiranekaśaḥ  parītā prayayau vindhyaṃ daityendrau hantumudyatā  
nihatau ca tayā tatra samare daityapuṃgavau  tadbāṇaiḥ kāmabāṇaiśca cchinnabhinnāṃgamānasau  
tadyuddhavistaraścātra na kṛto 'nyatra varṇanāt  ūhanīyaṃ parasmācca prastutaṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ
