vāyuruvāca  utpādya kauśikīṃ gaurī brahmaṇe pratipādya tām  tasya pratyupakārāya pitāmahamathābravīt  
devyuvāca  dṛṣṭaḥ kimeṣa bhavatā śārdūlo madupāśrayaḥ  anena duṣṭasattvebhyo rakṣitaṃ mattapovanam  
mayyarpitamanā eṣa bhajate māmananyadhīḥ  asya saṃrakṣaṇādanyatpriyaṃ mama na vidyate  
bhavitavyamanenāto mamāntaḥpuracāriṇā  gaṇeśvarapadaṃ cāsmai prītyā dāsyati śaṃkaraḥ  
enamagresaraṃ kṛtvā sakhībhirgantumutsahe  pradīyatāmanujñā me prajānāṃ patinā  tvayā  
ityuktaḥ prahasanbrahmā devīmmugdhāmiva smayan  tasya tīvraiḥ purāvṛttairdaurātmyaṃ samavarṇayat  
brahmovāca  paśau devi mṛgāḥ krūrāḥ kva ca te 'nugrahaḥ śubhaḥ  āśīviṣamukhe sākṣādamṛtaṃ kiṃ niṣicyate  
vyāghramātreṇa sanneṣa duṣṭaḥ ko 'pi niśācaraḥ  anena bhakṣitā gāvo brāhmaṇāśca tapodhanāḥ  
tarpayaṃstānyathākāmaṃ kāmarūpī caratyasau  avaśyaṃ khalu bhoktavyaṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ  
ataḥ kiṃ kṛpayā kṛtyamīdṛśeṣu durātmasu  anena devyāḥ kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prakṛtyā kaluṣātmanā  
devyuvāca  yaduktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ tathyamastvayamīdṛśaḥ  tathāpi māṃ prapanno 'bhūnna tyājyo māmupāśritaḥ  
brahmovāca  asya bhaktimavijñāya prāgvṛttaṃ te niveditam  bhaktiścedasya kiṃ pāpairna te bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati  
puṇyakarmāpi kiṃ kuryāttvadīyājñānapekṣayā  ajā prajñā purāṇī ca tvameva parameśvarī  
tvadadhīnā hi sarveṣāṃ baṃdhamokṣavyavasthitiḥ  tvadṛte paramā śaktiḥ saṃsiddhiḥ kasya karmaṇā  
tvameva vividhā śaktiḥ bhavānāmatha vā svayam  aśaktaḥ karmakaraṇe kartā vā kiṃ kariṣyati  
viṣṇośca mama cānyeṣāṃ devadānavarakṣasām  tattadaiśvaryasamprāptyai tavaivājñā hi kāraṇam  
atītāḥ khalvasaṃkhyātā brahmāṇo harayo bhavāḥ  anāgatāstvasaṃkhyātāstvadājñānuvidhāyinaḥ  
tvāmanārādhya deveśi puruṣārthacatuṣṭayam  labdhuṃ na śakyamasmābhirapi sarvaiḥ surottamaiḥ  
vyatyāso 'pi bhavetsadyo brahmatvasthāvaratvayoḥ  sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi tvayeva sthāpitaṃ yataḥ  
tvaṃ hi sarvajagadbhartuśśivasya paramātmanaḥ  anādimadhyanidhanā śaktirādyā sanātanī  
samastalokayātrārthaṃ mūrtimāviśya kāmapi  krīḍase  vividhairbhāvaiḥ kastvāṃ jānāti tattvataḥ  
ato duṣkṛtakarmāpi vyāghro 'yaṃ tvadanugrahāt  prāpnotu paramāṃ siddhimatra kaḥ pratibandhakaḥ  
ityātmanaḥ paraṃ bhāvaṃ smārayitvānurūpataḥ  brahmaṇābhyarthitā gaurī tapaso 'pi nyavartata  
tato devīmanujñāpya brahmaṇyantarhite sati  devīṃ ca mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā menāṃ himavatā saha  
praṇamyāśvāsya bahudhā pitarau virahāsahau  tapaḥ praṇayino devī tapovanamahīruhān  
viprayogaśucevāgre puṣpabāṣpaṃ vimuṃcataḥ  tattucchākhāsamārūḍhavihago dīritai rutaiḥ  
vyākulaṃ bahudhā dīnaṃ vilāpamiva kurvataḥ  sakhībhyaḥ kathayaṃtyevaṃ sattvarā bhartṛdarśane  
puraskṛtya ca taṃ vyāghraṃ snehātputramivaurasam  dehasya prabhayā caiva dīpayantī diśo daśa  
prayayau maṃdaraṃ gaurī yatra bhartā maheśvaraḥ  sarveṣāṃ jagatāṃ dhātā kartā pātā vināśakṛt  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kṛtvā gauraṃ vapurdivyaṃ devī girivarātmajā  kathaṃ dadarśa bhartāraṃ praviṣṭā manditaṃ satī  
praveśasamaye tasyā bhavanadvāragocaraiḥ  gaṇeśaiḥ kiṃ kṛtaṃ devastāndṛṣṭvā kintadā 'karot  
vāyuruvāca  pravaktumaṃjasā 'śakyaḥ tādṛśaḥ paramo rasaḥ  yena praṇayagarbheṇa bhāvo bhāvavatāṃ hṛtaḥ  
dvāsthaissasaṃbhramaireva devo devyāgamotsukaḥ  śaṃkamānā praviṣṭāntastañca sā samapaśyata  
taistaiḥ praṇayabhāvaiśca bhavanāntaravartibhiḥ  gaṇendrairvanditā vācā praṇanāma triyambakam  
praṇamya notthitā yāvattāvattāṃ parameśvaraḥ  pragṛhya dorbhyāmāśliṣya paritaḥ parayā mudā  
svāṃke dhartuṃ pravṛtto 'pi sā paryaṃke nyaṣīdata  paryaṃkato balāddevīṃ soṅkamāropya susmitām  
sasmito vivṛtairnetraistadvaktraṃ prapibanniva  tayā saṃbhāṣaṇāyeśaḥ pūrvabhāṣitamabravīt  
devadeva uvāca  sā daśā ca vyatītā kiṃ tava sarvāṃgasundari  yasyāmanunayopāyaḥ ko 'pi kopānna labhyate  
svecchayāpi na kālīti nānyavarṇavatīti ca  tvatsvabhāvāhṛtaṃ cittaṃ subhru ciṃtāvahaṃ mama  
vismṛtaḥ paramo bhāvaḥ kathaṃ svecchāṃgayogataḥ  na sambhavanti ye tatra cittakāluṣyahetavaḥ  
pṛthagjanavadanyonyaṃ vipriyasyāpi kāraṇam  āvayorapi yadyasti nāstyevaitaccarācaram  
ahamagniśironiṣṭhastvaṃ somaśirasi sthitā  agnīṣomātmakaṃ viśvamāvābhyāṃ samadhiṣṭhitam  
jagaddhitāya caratoḥ svecchādhṛtaśarīrayoḥ  āvayorviprayoge hi syānnirālambanaṃ jagat  
asti hetvantaraṃ cātra śāstrayuktiviniścitam  vāgarthamiva me vaitajjagatsthāvarajaṃgamam  
tvaṃ hi vāgamṛtaṃ sākṣādahamarthāmṛtaṃ param  dvayamapyamṛtaṃ kasmādviyuktamupapadyate  
vidyāpratyāyikā tvaṃ me vedyo 'haṃ pratyayāttava  vidyāvedyātmanoreva viśleṣaḥ kathamāvayoḥ  
na karmaṇā sṛjāmīdaṃ jagatpratisṛjāmi ca  sarvasyājñaikalabhyatvādājñātvaṃ hi garīyasī  
ājñaikasāramaiśvaryaṃ yasmātsvātaṃtryalakṣaṇam  ājñayā viprayuktasya caiśvaryaṃ mama kīdṛśam  
na kadācidavasthānamāvayorviprayuktayoḥ  devānāṃ kāryamuddiśya līloktiṃ kṛtavānaham  
tvayāpyaviditaṃ nāsti kathaṃ kupitavatyasi  tatastrilokarakṣārthe kopo mayyapi te kṛtaḥ  
yadanarthāya bhūtānāṃ na tadasti khalu tvayi  iti priyaṃvade sākṣādīśvare parameśvare  
śṛṃgārabhāvasārāṇāṃ janmabhūmirakṛtrimā  svabhartrā lalitantathyamuktaṃ matvā smitottaram  
lajjayā na kimapyūce kauśikī varṇanātparam  tadeva varṇayāmyadya śṛṇu devyāśca varṇanam  
devyuvāca  kiṃ devena na sā dṛṣṭā yā sṛṣṭā kauśikī mayā  tādṛśī kanyakā loke na bhūtā na bhaviṣyati  
tasyā vīryaṃ balaṃ vindhyanilayaṃ vijayaṃ tathā  śuṃbhasya ca niśuṃbhasya māraṇe ca raṇe tayoḥ  
pratyakṣaphaladānaṃ ca lokāya bhajate sadā  lokānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ śaśvadbrahmā vijñāpayiṣyati  
iti saṃbhāṣamāṇāyā devyā evājñayā tadā  vyāghraḥ sakhyā samānīya puro 'vasthāpitastadā  
taṃ prekṣyāha punardevī devānītamupāyatam  vyāghraṃ paśya na cānena sadṛśo madupāsakaḥ  
anena duṣṭasaṃghebhyo rakṣitaṃ mattapovanam  atīva mama bhaktaśca viśrabdhaśca svarakṣaṇāt  
svadeśaṃ ca parityajya prasādārthaṃ samāgataḥ  yadi prītirabhūnmattaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ karoṣi me  
nityamantaḥpuradvāri niyogānnandinaḥ svayam  rakṣibhissaha taccihnairvartatāmayamīśvara  
vāyuruvāca  madhuraṃ praṇayodarkaṃ śrutvā devyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ  prīto 'smītyāha taṃ devassa cādṛśyata tatkṣaṇāt  
bibhradvetralatāṃ haimīṃ ratnacitraṃ ca kaṃcukam  churikāmuragaprakhyāṃ gaṇeśo rakṣaveṣadhṛk  
yasmātsomo mahādevo nandī cānena nanditaḥ  somanandīti vikhyātastasmādeṣa samākhyayā  
itthaṃ devyāḥ priyaṃ kṛtvā devaścardhendubhūṣaṇaḥ  bhūṣayāmāsa tandivyairbhūṣaṇai ratnabhūṣitaiḥ  
tatassa gaurīṃ giriśo girīndrajāṃ sagauravāṃ sarvamanoharāṃ haraḥ  paryaṃkamāropya varāṃgabhūṣaṇairvibhūṣayāmāsa śaśāṃkabhūṣaṇaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  devīṃ samādadhānena devenedaṃ kimīritam  agniṣomātmakaṃ viśvaṃ vāgarthātmakamityapi  
ājñaikasāramaiśvaryamājñā tvamiti coditam  tadidaṃ śrotumicchāmo yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ  
vāyuruvāca  agnirityucyate raudrī ghorā yā taijasī tanuḥ  somaḥ śākto 'mṛtamayaḥ śakteḥ śāntikarī tanuḥ  
amṛtaṃ yatpratiṣṭhā sā tejo vidyā kalā svayam  bhūtasūkṣmeṣu sarveṣu ta eva rasatejasī  
dvividhā tejaso vṛttisūryātmā cānalātmikā  tathaiva rasavṛttiśca somātmā ca jalātmikā  
vidyudādimayantejo madhurādimayo rasaḥ  tejorasavibhedaistu dhṛtametaccarācaram  
agneramṛtaniṣpattiramṛtenāgniredhate  ata eva hi vikrāntamagnīṣomaṃ jagaddhitam  
haviṣe sasyasampattirvṛṣṭiḥ sasyābhivṛddhaye  vṛṣṭereva havistasmādagnīṣomadhṛtaṃ jagat  
agnirūrdhvaṃ jvalatyeṣa yāvatsaumyaṃ parāmṛtam  yāvadagnyāspadaṃ saumyamamṛtaṃ ca sravatyadhaḥ  
ata eva hi kālāgniradhastācchaktirūrdhvataḥ  yāvadādahanaṃ cordhvamadhaścāplāvanaṃ bhavet  
ādhāraśaktyaiva dhṛtaḥ kālāgnirayamūrdhvagaḥ  tathaiva nimnagaḥ somaśśivaśaktipadāspadaḥ  
śivaścordhvamadhaśśaktirūrdhvaṃ śaktiradhaḥ śivaḥ  taditthaṃ śivaśaktibhyānnāvyāptamiha kiñcana  
asakṛccāgninā dagdhaṃ jagadyadbhasmasātkṛtam  agnervīryamidaṃ cāhustadvīryaṃ bhasma yattataḥ  
yaścetthaṃ bhasmasadbhāvaṃ jñātvā snāti ca bhasmanā  agnirityādibhirmantrairbaddhaḥ pāśātpramucyate  
agnervīryaṃ tu yadbhasma somenāplāvitampunaḥ  ayogayuktyā prakṛteradhikārāya kalpate  
yogayuktyā tu tadbhasma plāvyamānaṃ samantataḥ  śāktenāmṛtavarṣeṇa cādhikārānnivartayet  
ato mṛtyuṃjayāyetthamamṛtaplāvanaṃ sadā  śivaśaktyamṛtasparśe labdhaṃ yena kuto mṛtiḥ  
yo veda dahanaṃ guhyaṃ plāvanaṃ ca yathoditam  agnīṣomapadaṃ hitvā na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate  
śivāgninā tanuṃ dagdhvā śaktisaumyā mṛtena yaḥ  plāvayedyogamārgeṇa so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate  
hṛdi kṛtvemamarthaṃ vai devena samudāhṛtam  agnīṣomātmakaṃ viśvaṃ jagadityanurūpataḥ  
vāyuruvāca  nivedayāmi jagato vāgarthātmyaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā  ṣaḍadhvavedanaṃ samyaksamāsānna tu vistarāt  
nāsti kaścidaśabdārtho nāpi śabdo nirarthakaḥ  tato hi samaye śabdassarvassarvārthabodhakaḥ  
prakṛteḥ pariṇāmo 'yaṃ dvidhā śabdārthabhāvanā  tāmāhuḥ prākṛtīṃ mūrtiṃ śivayoḥ paramātmanoḥ  
śabdātmikā vibhūtiryā sā tridhā kathyate budhaiḥ  sthūlā sūkṣmā parā ceti sthūlā yā śrutigocarā  
sūkṣmā cintāmayī proktā ciṃtayā rahitā parā  yā śaktiḥ sā parā śaktiśśivatattvasamāśrayā  
jñānaśaktisamāyogādicchopodbalikā tathā  sarvaśaktisamaṣṭyātmā śaktitattvasamākhyayā  
samastakāryajātasya mūlaprakṛtitāṃ gatā  saiva kuṇḍalinī māyā śuddhādhvaparamā satī  
sā vibhāgasvarūpaiva ṣaḍadhvātmā vijṛṃbhate  tatra śabdāstrayo 'dhvānastrayaścārthāḥ samīritāḥ  
sarveṣāmapi vai puṃsāṃ naijaśuddhyanurūpataḥ  layabhogādhikārāssyussarvatattvavibhāgataḥ  
kalābhistāni tattvāni vyāptānyeva yathātatham  parasyāḥ prakṛterādau pañcadhā pariṇāmataḥ  
kalāśca tā nivṛttyādyāḥ paryāptā iti niścayaḥ  maṃtrādhvā ca padādhvā ca varṇādhvā ceti śabdataḥ  
bhuvanādhvā ca tattvādhvā kalādhvā cārthataḥ kramāt  atrānyonyaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ vyāpyavyāpakatocyate  
maṃtrāḥ sarvaiḥ padairvyāptā vākyabhāvātpadāni ca  varṇairvarṇasamūhaṃ hi padamāhurvipaścitaḥ  
varṇāstu bhuvanairvyāptāsteṣāṃ teṣūpalaṃbhanāt  bhuvanānyapi tattvaughairutpattyāṃtarbahiṣkramāt  
vyāptāni kāraṇaistattvairārabdhatvādanekaśaḥ  aṃtarādutthitānīha bhuvanāni tu kānicit  
paurāṇikāni cānyāni vijñeyāni śivāgame  sāṃkhyayogaprasiddhāni tattvānyapi ca kānicit  
śivaśāstraprasiddhāni tatonyānyapi kṛtsnaśaḥ  kalābhistāni tattvāni vyāptānyeva yathātatham  
parasyāḥ prakṛterādau pañcadhā pariṇāmataḥ  kalāśca tā nivṛttyādyā vyāptāḥ pañca yathottaram  
vyāpikātaḥ parā śaktiravibhaktā ṣaḍadhvanām  paraprakṛtibhāvasya tatsattvācchivatattvataḥ  
śaktyādi ca pṛthivyantaṃ śivatattvasamudbhavam  vyāptamekena tenaiva mṛdā kuṃbhādikaṃ yathā  
śaivaṃ tatparamaṃ dhāma yatprāpyaṃ ṣaḍbhiradhvabhiḥ  vyāpikā 'vyāpikā śaktiḥ pañcatattvaviśodhanāt  
nivṛttyā rudraparyantaṃ sthitiraṇḍasya śodhyate  pratiṣṭhayā tadūrdhvaṃ tu yāvadavyaktagocaram  
tadūrdhvaṃ vidyayā madhye yāvadviśveśvarāvadhi  śāntyā tadūrdhvaṃ madhvānte viśuddhiḥ śāntyatītayā  
yāmāhuḥ paramaṃ vyoma paraprakṛtiyogataḥ  etāni pañcatattvāni yairvyāptamakhilaṃ jagat  
tatraiva sarvamevedaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ khalu sādhakaiḥ  adhvavyāptimavijñāya śuddhiṃ yaḥ kartumicchati  
sa vipralambhakaḥ śuddhernālamprāpayituṃ phalam  vṛthā pariśramastasya nirayāyaiva kevalam  
śaktipātasamāyogādṛte tattvāni tattvataḥ  tadvyāptistadvivṛddhiśca jñātumevaṃ na śakyate  
śaktirājñā parā śaivī cidrūpā marameśvarī  śivo 'dhitiṣṭhatyakhilaṃ yayā kāraṇabhūtayā  
nātmano naiva māyaiṣā na vikāro vicārataḥ  na baṃdho nāpi muktiśca baṃdhamuktividhāyinī  
sarvaiśvaryaparākāṣṭā śivasya vyabhicāriṇī  samānadharmiṇī tasya taistairbhāvairviśeṣataḥ  
sa tayaiva gṛhī sāpi tenaiva gṛhiṇī sadā  tayorapatyaṃ yatkāryaṃ paraprakṛtijaṃ jagat  
sa kartā kāraṇaṃ seti tayorbhedo vyavasthitaḥ  eka eva śivaḥ sākṣāddvidhā 'sau samavasthitaḥ  
strīpuṃsabhāvena tayorbheda ityapi kecana  apare tu parā śaktiḥ śivasya samavāyinī  
prabheva bhānościdrūpā bhinnaiveti vyavasthitaḥ  tasmācchivaḥ paro hetustasyājñā parameśvarī  
tayaiva preritā śaivī mūlaprakṛtiravyayā  mahāmāyā ca māyā ca prakṛtistriguṇeti ca  
trividhā kāryavedhena sā prasūte ṣaḍadhvanaḥ  sa vāgarthamayaścādhvā ṣaḍvidho nikhilaṃ jagat  
asyaiva vistaraṃ prāhuḥ śāstrajātamaśeṣataḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  caritāni vicitrāṇi gṛhyāṇi gahanāni ca  durvijñeyāni devaiśca mohayaṃti manāṃsi naḥ  
śivayostattvasambandhe na doṣa upalabhyate  caritaiḥ prākṛto bhāvastayorapi vibhāvyate  
brahmādayo 'pi lokānāṃ sṛṣṭisthityantahetavaḥ  nigrahānugrahau prāpya śivasya vaśavartinaḥ  
śivaḥ punarna kasyāpi nigrahānugrahāspadam  ato 'nāyattamaiśvaryaṃ tasyaiveti viniścitam  
yadyevamīdṛśaiśvaryaṃ tattu svātantryalakṣaṇam  svabhāvasiddhaṃ caitasya mūrtimattāspadaṃ bhavet  
na mūrtiśca svataṃtrasya ghaṭate mūlahetunā  mūrterapi ca kāryatvāttatsiddhiḥ syādahaitukī  
sarvatra paramo bhāvo 'paramaścānya ucyate  paramāparamau bhāvau kathamekatra saṃgatau  
niṣphalo hi svabhāvo 'sya paramaḥ paramātmanaḥ  sa eva sakalaḥ kasmātsvabhāvo hyaviparyayaḥ  
svabhāvo viparītaścetsvataṃtraḥ svecchayā yadi  na karoti kimīśāno nityānityaviparyayam  
mūrtātmā sakalaḥ kaścitsa cānyo niṣphalaḥ śivaḥ  śivenādhiṣṭhitaśceti sarvatra laghu kathyate  
mūrtyātmaiva tadā mūrtiḥ śivasyāsya bhavediti  tasya mūrtau mūrtimatoḥ pārataṃtryaṃ hi niścitam  
anyathā nirapekṣeṇa mūrtiḥ svīkriyate katham  mūrtisvīkaraṇaṃ tasmānmūrtau sādhyaphalepsayā  
na hi svecchāśarīratvaṃ svātaṃtryāyopapadyate  svecchaiva tādṛśī puṃsāṃ yasmātkarmānusāriṇī  
svīkartuṃ svecchayā dehaṃ hātuṃ ca prabhavantyuta  brahmādayaḥ piśācāṃtāḥ kiṃ te karmātivartinaḥ  
icchayā dehanirmāṇamindrajālopamaṃ viduḥ  aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryavaśīkārānatikramāt  
viśvarūpaṃ dadhadviṣṇurdadhīcena maharṣiṇā  yudhyatā samupālabdhastadrūpaṃ dadhatā svayam  
sarvasmādadhikasyāpi śivasya paramātmanaḥ  śarīravattayānyātmasādharmyaṃ pratibhāti naḥ  
sarvānugrāhakaṃ prāhuśśivaṃ paramakāraṇam  sa nirgṛhṇāti devānāṃ sarvānugrāhakaḥ katham  
ciccheda bahuśo devo brahmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ śiraḥ  śivanindāṃ prakurvaṃtaṃ putreti kumaterhaṭhāt  
viṣṇorapi nṛsiṃhasya rabhasā śarabhākṛtiḥ  bibheda padbhyāmākramya hṛdayaṃ nakharaiḥ kharaiḥ  
devastrīṣu ca deveṣu dakṣasyādhvarakāraṇāt  vīreṇa vīrabhadreṇa na hi kaścidadaṇḍitaḥ  
puratrayaṃ ca sastrīkaṃ sadaityaṃ saha bālakaiḥ  kṣaṇenaikena devena netrāgneriṃdhanīkṛtam  
prajānāṃ ratihetuśca kāmo ratipatissvayam  krośatāmeva devānāṃ huto netrahutāśane  
gāvaśca kaściddugdhaughaṃ sravantyo mūrdhni khecarāḥ  saruṣā prekṣya devena tatkṣaṇe bhasmasātkṛtaḥ  
jalaṃdharāsuro dīrṇaścakrīkṛtya jalaṃ padā  baddhvānaṃtena yo viṣṇuṃ cikṣepa śatayojanam  
tameva jalasaṃdhāyī śūlenaiva jaghāna saḥ  taccakraṃ tapasā labdhvā labdhavīryo harissadā  
jighāṃsatāṃ surārīṇāṃ kulaṃ nirghṛṇacetasām  triśūlenāndhakasyoraḥ śikhinaivopatāpitam  
kaṇṭhātkālāṃganāṃ sṛṣṭvā dārako 'pi nipātitaḥ  kauśikīṃ janayitvā tu gauryāstvakkośagocarām  
śuṃbhassaha niśuṃbhena prāpito maraṇaṃ raṇe  śrutaṃ ca mahadākhyānaṃ skānde skandasamāśrayam  
vadhārthe tārakākhyasya daityendrasyendravidviṣaḥ  brahmaṇābhyarthito devo mandarāntaḥpuraṃ gataḥ  
vihṛtya suciraṃ devyā vihārā 'tiprasaṅgataḥ  rasāṃ rasātalaṃ nītāmiva kṛtvābhidhāṃ tataḥ  
devīṃ ca vaṃcayaṃstasyāṃ svavīryamatidurvaham  avisṛjya visṛjyāgnau haviḥ pūtamivāmṛtam  
gaṃgādiṣvapi nikṣipya vahnidvārā tadaṃśataḥ  tatsamāhṛtya śanakaistokaṃstokamitastataḥ  
svāhayā kṛttikārūpātsvabhartrā ramamāṇayā  suvarṇībhūtayā nyastaṃ merau śaravaṇe kvacit  
saṃdīpayitvā kālena tasya bhāsā diśo daśa  rañjayitvā girīnsarvānkāṃcanīkṛtya meruṇā  
tataścireṇa kālena saṃjāte tatra tejasi  kumāre sukumārāṃge kumārāṇāṃ nidarśane  
tacchaiśavaṃ svarūpaṃ ca tasya dṛṣṭvā manoharam  saha devasurairlokairvismite ca vimohite  
devo 'pi svayamāyātaḥ putradarśanalālasaḥ  saha devyāṃkamāropya tato 'sya smeramānanam  
pītāmṛtamiva snehavivaśenāntarātmanā  deveṣvapi ca paśyatsu vītarāgaistapasvibhiḥ  
svasya vakṣaḥsthale svairaṃ nartayitvā kumārakam  anubhūya ca tatkrīḍāṃ saṃbhāvya ca parasparam  
stanyamājñāpayandevyāḥ pāyayitvāmṛtopamam  tavāvatāro jagatāṃ hitāyetyanuśāsya ca  
svayandevaśca devī ca na tṛptimupajagmatuḥ  tataḥ śakreṇa saṃdhāya bibhyatā tārakāsurāt  
kārayitvābhiṣekaṃ ca senāpatye divaukasām  putramantarataḥ kṛtvā devena tripuradviṣā  
svayamaṃtarhitenaiva skandamindrādirakṣitam  tacchaktyā krauñcabhedinyā yudhi kālāgnikalpayā  
cheditaṃ tārakasyāpi śiraśśakrabhiyā saha  stutiṃ cakrurviśeṣeṇa haridhātṛmukhāḥ surāḥ  
tathā rakṣodhipaḥ sākṣādrāvaṇo balagarvitaḥ  uddharansvabhujairdīrghaiḥ kailāsaṃ girimātmanaḥ  
tadāgo 'sahamānasya devadevasya śūlinaḥ  padāṃguṣṭhaparispandānmamajja mṛdito bhuvi  
baṭoḥ kenacidarthena svāśritasya gatāyuṣaḥ  tvarayāgatya devena pādāṃtaṃ gamitontakaḥ  
svavāhanamavijñāya vṛṣendraṃ vaḍavānalaḥ  sagalagrahamānītastato 'styekodakaṃ jagat  
alokaviditaistaistairvṛttairānandasundaraiḥ  aṃgahārasvasenedamasakṛccālitaṃ jagat  
śānta eva sadā sarvamanugṛhṇāti cecchivaḥ  sarvāṇi pūrayedeva kathaṃ śaktena mocayet  
anādikarma vaicitryamapi nātra niyāmakam  kāraṇaṃ khalu karmāpi bhavedīśvarakāritam  
kimatra bahunoktena nāstikyaṃ hetukārakam  yathā hyāśu nivarteta tathā kathaya māruta  
vāyuruvāca  sthane saṃśayitaṃ viprā bhavadbhirhetucoditaiḥ  jijñāsā hi na nāstikyaṃ sādhayetsādhubuddhiṣu  
pramaṇamatra vakṣyāmi satāmmohanivartakam  asatāṃ tvanyathābhāvaḥ prasādena vinā prabhoḥ  
śivasya paripūrṇasya parānugrahamantarā  na kiṃcidapi kartavyamiti sādhu viniścitam  
svabhāva eva paryāptaḥ parānugrahakarmaṇi  anyathā nissvabhavena na kimapyanugṛhyate  
paraṃ sarvamanugrāhyaṃ paśupāśātmakaṃ jagat  parasyānugrahārthaṃ tu patyurājñāsamanvayaḥ  
patirājñāpakaḥ sarvamanugṛhṇāti sarvadā  tadarthamarthasvīkāre parataṃtraḥ kathaṃ śivaḥ  
anugrāhyanapekṣo 'sti na hi kaścidanugrahaḥ  ataḥ svātantryaśabdārthānanapekṣatvalakṣaṇaḥ  
etatpunaranugrāhyaṃ parataṃtraṃ tadiṣyate  anugrahādṛte tasya bhuktimuktyorananvayāt  
mūrtātmano 'pyanugrāhyā śivājñānanivartanāt  ajñānādhiṣṭhitaṃ śambhorna kiṃcidiha vidyate  
yenopalabhyate 'smābhissakalenāpi niṣkalaḥ  sa mūrtyātmā śivaḥ śaivamūrtirityupacaryate  
na hyasau niṣkalaḥ sākṣācchivaḥ paramakāraṇam  sākāreṇānubhāvena kenāpyanupalakṣitaḥ  
pramāṇagamyatāmātraṃ tatsvabhāvopapādakam  na tāvatātropekṣādhīrupalakṣaṇamaṃtarā  
ātmopamolvaṇaṃ sākṣānmūrtireva hi kācana  śivasya mūrtirmūrtyātmā parastasyopalakṣaṇam  
yathā kāṣṭheṣvanārūḍho na vahnirupalabhyate  evaṃ śivo 'pi mūrtyātmanyanārūḍha iti sthitiḥ  
yathāgnimānayetyukte jvalatkāṣṭhādṛte svayam  nāgnirānīyate tadvatpūjyo mūrtyātmanā śivaḥ  
ata eva hi pūjādau mūrtyātmaparikalpanam  mūrtyātmani kṛtaṃ sākṣācchiva eva kṛtaṃ yataḥ  
liṃgādāvapi tatkṛtyamarcāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ  tattanmūrtyātmabhāvena śivo 'smābhirupāsyate  
yathānugṛhyate so 'pi mūrtyātmā pārameṣṭhinā  tathā mūrtyātmaniṣṭhena śivena paśavo vayam  
lokānugrahaṇāyaiva śivena parameṣṭhinā  sadāśivādayassarve mūrtyātmano 'pyadhiṣṭhitāḥ  
ātmanāmeva bhogāya mokṣāya ca viśeṣataḥ  tattvātattvasvarūpeṣu mūrtyātmasu śivānvayaḥ  
bhogaḥ karmavipākātmā sukhaduḥkhātmako mataḥ  na ca karma śivo 'stīti tasya bhogaḥ kimātmakaḥ  
sarvaṃ śivo 'nugṛhṇāti na nigṛhṇāti kiṃcana  nigṛhṇatāṃ tu ye doṣāśśive teṣāmasaṃbhavāt  
ye punarnigrahāḥ kecidbrahmādiṣu nidarśitāḥ  te 'pi lokahitāyaiva kṛtāḥ śrīkaṇṭhamūrtinā  
brahmāṇḍasyādhipatyaṃ hi śrīkaṇṭhasya na saṃśayaḥ  śrīkaṇṭhākhyāṃ śivo mūrtiṃ krīḍatīmadhitiṣṭhati  
sadoṣā eva devādyā nigṛhītā yathoditam  tatastepi vipāpmānaḥ prajāścāpi gatajvarāḥ  
nigraho 'pi svarūpeṇa viduṣāṃ na jugupsitaḥ  ata eva hi daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍo rājñāṃ praśasyate  
yatsiddhirīśvaratvena kāryavargasya kṛtsnaśaḥ  na sa cedīśatāṃ kuryājjagataḥ kathamīśvaraḥ  
īśecchā ca vidhātṛtvaṃ vidherājñāpanaṃ param  ājñāvaśyamidaṃ kuryānna kuryāditi śāsanam  
tacchāsanānuvartitvaṃ sādhubhāvasya lakṣaṇam  viparītasamādhoḥ syānna sarvaṃ tattu dṛśyate  
sādhu saṃrakṣaṇīyaṃ cedvinivartyamasādhu yat  nivartate ca sāmāderaṃte daṇḍo hi sādhanam  
hitārthalakṣaṇaṃ cedaṃ daṇḍāntamanuśāsanam  ato yadviparītaṃ tadahitaṃ saṃpracakṣate  
hite sadā niṣaṇṇānāmīśvarasya nidarśanam  sa kathaṃ duṣyate sadbhirasatāmeva nigrahāt  
ayuktakāriṇo loke garhaṇīyāvivekitā  yadudvejayate lokantadayuktaṃ pracakṣate  
sarvo 'pi nigraho loke na ca vidveṣapūrvakaḥ  na hi dveṣṭi pitā putraṃ yo nigṛhyāti śikṣayet  
mādhyasthenāpi nigrāhyānyo nigṛhṇāti mārgataḥ  tasyāpyavaśyaṃ yatkiṃcinnairghṛṇyamanuvartate  
anyathā na hinastyeva sadoṣānapyasau parān  hinasti cāyamapyajñānparaṃ mādhyasthyamācaran  
tasmādduḥkhātmikāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurvāṇo yaḥ sanirghṛṇaḥ  iti nirbaṃdhayaṃtyeke niyamo neti cāpare  
nidānajñasya bhiṣajo rugṇo hiṃsāṃ prayuṃjataḥ  na kiṃcidapi nairghṛṇyaṃ ghṛṇaivātra prayojikā  
ghṛṇāpi na guṇāyaiva hiṃsreṣu pratiyogiṣu  tādṛśeṣu ghṛṇī bhrāntyā ghṛṇāntaritanirghṛṇaḥ  
upekṣāpīha doṣāha rakṣyeṣu pratiyogiṣu  śaktau satyāmupekṣāto rakṣyassadyo vipadyate  
sarpasyāsyagatampaśyanyastu rakṣyamupekṣate  doṣābhāsānsamutprekṣya phalataḥ so 'pi nirghṛṇaḥ  
tasmādghṛṇā guṇāyaiva sarvatheti na saṃmatam  saṃmataṃ prāptakāmitvaṃ sarvaṃ tvanyadasammatam  
mūrtyātmasvapi rāgādyā doṣāḥ santyeva vastutaḥ  tathāpi teṣāmevaite na śivasya tu sarvathā  
agnāvapi samāviṣṭaṃ tāmraṃ khalu sakālikam  iti nāgnirasau duṣyettāmrasaṃsargakāraṇāt  
nāgneraśucisaṃsargādaśucitvamapekṣate  aśucestvagnisaṃyogācchucitvamapi jāyate  
evaṃ śodhyātmasaṃsargānna hyaśuddhaḥ śivo bhavet  śivasaṃsargatastveṣa śodhyātmaiva hi śudhyati  
ayasyagnau samāviṣṭe dāho 'gnereva nāyasaḥ  mūrtātmanyevamaiśvaryamīśvarasyaiva nātmanām  
na hi kāṣṭhaṃ jvalatyūrdhvamagnireva jvalatyasau  kāṣṭhasyāṃgāratā nāgnerevamatrāpi yojyatām  
ata eva jagatyasminkāṣṭhapāṣāṇamṛtsvapi  śivāveśavaśādeva śivatvamupacaryate  
maitryādayo guṇā gauṇāstasmātte bhinnavṛttayaḥ  tairguṇairuparaktānāṃ doṣāya ca guṇāya ca  
yattu gauṇamagauṇaṃ ca tatsarvamanugṛhṇataḥ  na guṇāya na doṣāya śivasya guṇavṛttayaḥ  
na cānugrahaśabdārthaṃ gauṇamāhurvipaścitaḥ  saṃsāramocanaṃ kiṃ tu śaivamājñāmayaṃ hitam  
hitaṃ tadājñākaraṇaṃ yaddhitaṃ tadanugrahaḥ  sarvaṃ hite niyuñjāvaḥ sarvānugrahakārakaḥ  
yastūpakāraśabdārthastamapyāhuranugraham  tasyāpi hitarūpatvācchivaḥ sarvopakārakaḥ  
hite sadā niyuktaṃ tu sarvaṃ cidacidātmakam  svabhāvapratibandhaṃ tatsamaṃ na labhate hitam  
yathā vikāsayatyeva raviḥ padmāni bhānubhiḥ  samaṃ na vikasantyeva svasvabhāvānurodhataḥ  
svabhāvo 'pi hi bhāvānāṃ bhāvino 'rthasya kāraṇam  na hi svabhāvo naśyantamarthaṃ kartṛṣu sādhayet  
suvarṇameva nāṃgāraṃ drāvayatyagnisaṃgamaḥ  evaṃ pakvamalāneva mocayenna śivaparān  
yadyathā bhavituṃ yogyaṃ tattathā na bhavetsvayam  vinā bhāvanayā kartā svatantrassantato bhavet  
svabhāvavimalo yadvatsarvānugrāhakaśśivaḥ  svabhāvamalināstadvadātmano jīvasaṃjñitāḥ  
anyathā saṃsarantyete niyamānna śivaḥ katham  karmamāyānubandhosya saṃsāraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ  
anubandho 'yamasyaiva na śivasyeti hetumān  sa heturātmanāmeva nijo nāgantuko malaḥ  
āgantukatve kasyāpi bhāvyaṃ kenāpi hetunā  yo 'yaṃ heturasāvekastvavicitrasvabhāvataḥ  
ātmatāyāḥ samatve 'pi baddhā muktāḥ pare yataḥ  baddheṣveva punaḥ kecillayabhogādhikārataḥ  
jñānaiśvaryādivaiṣamyaṃ bhajante sottarādharāḥ  kecinmūrtyātmatāṃ yānti kecidāsannagocarāḥ  
mūrtyātmasu śivāḥ kecidadhvanāṃ mūrdhasu sthitāḥ  madhye maheśvarā rudrāstvarvācīnapade sthitāḥ  
āsanne 'pi ca māyāyāḥ parasmātkāraṇāttrayam  tatrāpyātmā sthito 'dhastādantarātmā ca madhyataḥ  
parastātparamātmeti brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ  vartante vasavaḥ kecitparamātmapadāśrayāḥ  
antarātmapade kecitkecidātmapade tathā  śāntyatītapade śaivāḥ śānte māheśvare tataḥ  
vidyāyāntu yathā raudrāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ tu vaiṣṇavāḥ  nivṛttau ca tathātmāno brahmā brahmāṃgayonayaḥ  
devayonyaṣṭakaṃ mukhyaṃ mānuṣyamatha madhyamam  pakṣyādayo 'dhamāḥ pañcayonayastāścaturdaśa  
uttarādharabhāvo 'pi jñeyassaṃsāriṇo malaḥ  yathāmabhāvo muktasya pūrvaṃ paścāttu pakvatā  
malo 'pyāmaśca pakvaśca bhavetsaṃsārakāraṇam  āme tvadharatā puṃsāṃ pakve tūttaratā kramāt  
paśvātmānastridhābhinnā ekadvitrimalāḥ kramāt  atrottarā ekamalā dvimalā madhyamā matāḥ  
trimalāstvadhamā jñeyā yathottaramadhiṣṭhitāḥ  trimalānadhitiṣṭhaṃti dvimalaikamalāḥ kramāt  
itthamaupādhiko bhedo viśvasya parikalpitaḥ  ekadvitrimalānsarvāñchiva eko 'dhitiṣṭhati  
aśivātmakamapyetacchivenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yathā  arudrātmakamityevaṃ rudrairjagadadhiṣṭhitam  
aṇḍāntā hi mahābhūmiśśatarudrādyadhiṣṭhitā  māyāntamantarikṣaṃ tu hyamareśādibhiḥ kramāt  
aṃguṣṭhamātraparyantaissamaṃtātsaṃtataṃ tatam  mahāmāyāvasānā dyaurvāyvādyairbhuvanādhipaiḥ  
anāśritāntairadhvāntarvartibhissamadhiṣṭhitāḥ  te hi sākṣāddiviṣadastvantarikṣasadastathā  
pṛthivīpada ityevaṃ devā devavrataiḥ stutā  evantribhirmalairāmaiḥ pakvaireva pṛthakpṛthak  
nidānabhūtaissaṃsārarogaḥ puṃsāṃ pravartate  asya rogasya bhaiṣajyaṃ jñānameva na cāparam  
bhiṣagājñāpakaḥ śambhuśśivaḥ paramakāraṇam  aduḥkhenā 'pi śakto 'sau paśūnmocayituṃ śivaḥ  
kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotīti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  duḥkhameva hi sarvo 'pi saṃsāra iti niścitam  
kathaṃ duḥkhamaduḥkhaṃ syātsvabhāvo hyaviparyayaḥ  na hi rogī hyarogī syādbhiṣagbhaiṣajyakāraṇāt  
rogārtaṃ tu bhiṣagrogādbhaiṣajaissukhamuddharet  evaṃ svabhāvamalinānsvabhāvādduḥkhinaḥ paśūn  
svājñauṣadhavidhānena duḥkhānmocayate śivaḥ  na bhiṣakkāraṇaṃ roge śivaḥ saṃsārakāraṇam  
ityetadapi vaiṣamyaṃ na doṣāyāsya kalpate  duḥkhe svabhāvasaṃsiddhe kathantatkāraṇaṃ śivaḥ  
svābhāviko malaḥ puṃsāṃ sa hi saṃsārayatyamūn  saṃsārakāraṇaṃ yattu malaṃ māyādyacetanam  
tatsvayaṃ na pravarteta śivasānnidhyamantarā  yathā maṇirayaskāṃtassānnidhyādupakārakaḥ  
ayasaścalatastadvacchivo 'pyasyeti sūrayaḥ  na nivartayituṃ śakyaṃ sānnidhyaṃ sadakāraṇam  
adhiṣṭhātā tato nityamajñāto jagataśśivaḥ  na śivena vinā kiṃcitpravṛttamiha vidyate  
tatpreritamidaṃ sarvaṃ tathāpi na sa muhyati  śaktirājñātmikā tasya niyantrī viśvatomukhī  
tayā tatamidaṃ śaśvattathāpi sa na duṣyati  anidaṃ prathamaṃ sarvamīśitavyaṃ sa īśvaraḥ  
īśanācca tadīyājñā tathāpi sa na duṣyati  yo 'nyathā manyate mohātsa vinaṣyati durmatiḥ  
tacchaktivaibhavādeva tathāpi sa na duṣyati  etasminnaṃtare vyomnaḥ śrutāḥ vāgarīriṇī  
satyamomamṛtaṃ saumyamityāvirabhavatsphuṭam  tato hṛṣṭatarāḥ sarve vinaṣṭāśeṣasaṃśayāḥ  
munayo vismayāviṣṭāḥ preṇemuḥ pavanaṃ prabhum  tathā vigatasandehānkṛtvāpi pavano munīn  
naite pratiṣṭhitajñānā iti matvaivamabravīt  vāyuruvācva  parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca dvividhaṃ jñānamiṣyate  
parokṣamasthiraṃ prāhuraparokṣaṃ tu susthiram  hetūpadeśagamyaṃ yattatparokṣaṃ pracakṣate  
aparokṣaṃ punaḥ śreṣṭhādanuṣṭhānādbhaviṣyati  nāparokṣādṛte mokṣa iti kṛtvā viniścayam  
śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānasiddhyarthaṃ prayatadhvamatandritāḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kiṃ tacchreṣṭamanuṣṭhānaṃ mokṣo yenaparokṣitaḥ  tattasya sādhanaṃ cādya vaktumarhasi māruta  
vāyuruvāca  śaivo hi paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ  yatrāparokṣo lakṣyeta sākṣānmokṣapradaḥ śivaḥ  
sa tu pañcavidho jñeyaḥ pañcabhiḥ parvabhiḥ kramāt  kriyātapojapadhyānajñānātmabhiranuttaraiḥ  
taireva sottaraissiddho dharmastu paramo mataḥ  parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca jñānaṃ yatra ca mokṣadam  
paramo 'paramaścobhau dharmau hi śruticoditau  dharmaśabdābhidheyerthe pramāṇaṃ śrutireva naḥ  
paramo yogaparyanto dharmaḥ śrutiśirogataḥ  dharmastvaparamastadvadadhaḥ śrutimukhotthitaḥ  
apaśvātmādhikāratvādyo dharamaḥ paramo mataḥ  sādhāraṇastato 'nyastu sarveṣāmadhikārataḥ  
sa cāyaṃ paramo dharmaḥ paradharmasya sādhanam  dharmaśāstrādibhissamyaksāṃga evopabṛṃhitaḥ  
śaivo yaḥ paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ  itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ kathaṃcidupabṛṃhitaḥ  
śaivāgamaistu saṃpannaḥ sahāṃgopāṃvistaraḥ  tatsaṃskārādhikāraiśca samyagevopabṛṃhitaḥ  
śaivāgamo hi dvividhaḥ śrauto 'śrautaśca saṃskṛtaḥ  śrutisāramayaḥ śrautassvataṃtra itaro mataḥ  
svataṃtro daśadhā pūrvaṃ tathāṣṭādaśadhā punaḥ  kāmikādisamākhyābhissiddhaḥ siddhāntasaṃjñitaḥ  
śrutisāramayo yastu śatakoṭipravistaraḥ  paraṃ pāśupataṃ yatra vrataṃ jñānaṃ ca kathyate  
yugāvarteṣu śiṣyeta yogācāryasvarūpiṇā  tatratatrāvatīrṇena śivenaiva pravartyate  
saṃkṣipyāsya pravaktāraścatvāraḥ paramarṣaya  rururdadhīco 'gastyaśca upamanyurmahāyaśāḥ  
te ca pāśupatā jñeyāssaṃhitānāṃ pravartakāḥ  tatsaṃtatīyā guravaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  
tatroktaḥ paramo dharmaścaryādyātmā caturvidhaḥ  teṣu pāśupato yogaḥ śivaṃ pratyakṣayeddṛḍham  
tasmācchreṣṭhamanuṣṭhānaṃ yogaḥ pāśupato mataḥ  tatrāpyupāyako yukto brahmaṇā sa tu kathyate  
nāmāṣṭakamayo yogaśśivena parikalpitaḥ  tena yogena sahasā śaivī prajñā prajāyate  
prajñayā paramaṃ jñānamacirāllabhate sthiram  prasīdati śivastasya yasya jñānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam  
prasādātparamo yogo yaḥ śivaṃ cāparokṣayet  śivāparokṣātsaṃsārakāraṇena viyujyate  
tataḥ syānmuktasaṃsāro muktaḥ śivasamo bhavet  brahmaprokta ityupāyaḥ sa eva pṛthagucyate  
śivo maheśvaraścaiva rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ  saṃsāravaidyaḥ sarvajñaḥ paramātmeti mukhyataḥ  
nāmāṣṭakamidaṃ mukhyaṃ śivasya pratipādakam  ādyantu pañcakaṃ jñeyaṃ śāntyatītādyanukramāt  
saṃjñā sadāśivādīnāṃ pañcopādhiparigrahāt  upādhivinivṛttau tu yathāsvaṃ vinivartate  
padameva hi tannityamanityāḥ padinaḥ smṛtāḥ  padānāṃ pratikṛttau tu mucyante padino yataḥ  
parivṛttyantare bhūyastatpadaprāptirucyate  ātmāntarābhidhānaṃ syādyadādyaṃ nāma pañcakam  
anyattu tritayaṃ nāmnāmupādānādiyogataḥ  trividhopādhivacanācchiva evānuvartate  
anādimalasaṃśleṣaḥ prāgabhāvātsvabhāvataḥ  atyaṃtaṃ pariśuddhātmetyato 'yaṃ śiva ucyate  
athavāśeṣakalyāṇaguṇaikadhana īśvaraḥ  śiva ityucyate sadbhiśśivatattvārthavādibhiḥ  
trayoviṃśatitattvebhyaḥ prakṛtirhi parā matā  prakṛtestu paraṃ prāhuḥ puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśakam  
yaṃ vedādau svaraṃ prāhurvācyavācakabhāvataḥ  vedaikavedyayāthātmyādvedānte ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ  
tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ parassa maheśvaraḥ  tadadhīnapravṛttitvātprakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca  
athavā triguṇaṃ tattvamupeyamidamavyayam  māyāntu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram  
māyāvikṣobhako 'naṃto maheśvarasamanvayāt  kālātmā paramātmādiḥ sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ  
rudduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaheturvā tadrāvayati naḥ prabhuḥ  rudra ityucyate sadbhiḥ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam  
tattvādibhūtaparyantaṃ śarīrādiṣvatandritaḥ  vyāpyādhitiṣṭhati śivastato rudra itastataḥ  
jagataḥ pitṛbhūtānāṃ śivo mūrtyātmanāmapi  pitṛbhāvena sarveṣāṃ pitāmaha udīritaḥ  
nidānajño yathā vaidyo rogasya vinivartakaḥ  upāyairbheṣajaistadvallayabhogādhikārataḥ  
saṃsārasyeśvaro nityaṃ samūlasya nivartakaḥ  saṃsāravaidya ityuktaḥ sarvatattvārthavedibhiḥ  
daśārthajñānasiddhyarthamindriyeṣveṣu satsvapi  trikālabhāvino bhāvānsthūlānsūkṣmānaśeṣataḥ  
aṇavo naiva jānanti māyayaiva malāvṛtāḥ  asatsvapi ca sarveṣu sarvārthajñānahetuṣu  
yadyathāvasthitaṃ vastu tattathaiva sadāśivaḥ  ayatnenaiva jānāti tasmātsarvajña ucyate  
sarvātmā paramairebhirguṇairnityasamanvayāt  svasmātparātmavirahātparamātmā śivaḥ svayam  
nāmāṣṭakamidaṃ caiva labdhvācāryaprasādataḥ  nivṛttyādikalāgranthiṃ śivādyaiḥ pañcanāmabhiḥ  
yathāsvaṃ kramaśaśchitvā śodhayitvā yathāguṇam  guṇitaireva soddhātairaniruddhairathāpi vā  
hṛtkaṇṭhatālubhrūmadhyabrahmarandhrasamanvitām  chittvā paryaṣṭakākāraṃ svātmānaṃ ca suṣumṇayā  
dvādaśāṃtaḥsthitasyendornītvopari śivaujasi  saṃhṛtyaṃ vadanaṃ paścādyathāsaṃskaraṇaṃ layāt  
śāktenāmṛtavarṣeṇa saṃsiktāyāṃ tanau punaḥ  avatārya svamātmānamamṛtātmākṛtiṃ hṛdi  
dvādaśāṃtaḥsthitasyendoḥ parastācchvetapaṃkaje  samāsīnaṃ mahādevaṃ śaṃkarambhaktavatsalam  
ardhanārīśvaraṃ devaṃ nirmalaṃ madhurākṛtim  śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ prasannaṃ śītaladyutim  
dhyātvā hi mānase devaṃ svasthacitto 'tha mānavaḥ  śivanāmāṣṭakenaiva bhāvapuṣpaissamarcayet  
abhyarcanānte tu punaḥ prāṇānāyamya mānavaḥ  samyakcittaṃ samādhāya śārvaṃ nāmāṣṭakaṃ japet  
nābhau cāṣṭāhutīrhutvā pūrṇāhutyā namastataḥ  aṣṭapuṣpapradānena kṛtvābhyarcanamaṃtimam  
nivedayetsvamātmānaṃ culukodakavartmanā  evaṃ kṛtvā cirādeva jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ śubham  
labhate tatpratiṣṭhāṃ ca vṛttaṃ cānuttamaṃ tathā  yogaṃ ca paramaṃ labdhvā mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  bhagavañchrotumicchāmo vrataṃ pāśupataṃ param  brahmādayo 'pi yatkṛtvā sarve pāśupatāḥ smṛtāḥ  
vāyuruvāca  rahasyaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi sarvapāpanikṛntanam  vrataṃ pāśupataṃ śrautamatharvaśirasi śrutam  
kālaścaitrī paurṇamāsī deśaḥ śivaparigrahaḥ  kṣetrārāmādyaraṇyaṃ vā praśastaśśubhalakṣaṇaḥ  
tatra pūrvaṃ trayodaśyāṃ susnātaḥ sukṛtāhnikaḥ  anujñāpya svamācāryaṃ saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca  
pūjāṃ vaiśeṣikīṃ kṛtvā śuklāṃbaradharaḥ svayam  śuklayajñopavītī ca śuklamālyānulepanaḥ  
darbhāsane samāsīno darbhamuṣṭiṃ pragṛhya ca  prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukho vāpyudaṅmukhaḥ  
dhyātvā devaṃ ca devīṃ ca tadvijñāpanavartmanā  vratametatkaromīti bhavetsaṃkalpya dīkṣitaḥ  
yāvaccharīrapātaṃ vā dvādaśābdamathāpi vā  tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā māsadvādaśakaṃ tu vā  
tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā māsamekamathāpi vā  dinadvādaśakaṃ vā 'tha dinaṣaṭkamathāpi vā  
tadardhaṃ dinamekaṃ vā vratasaṃkalpanāvadhi  agnimādhāya vidhivadvirajāhomakāraṇāt  
hutvājyena samidbhiśca caruṇā ca yathākramam  pūrṇāmāpūrya tāṃ bhūyastattvānāṃ śuddhimuddiśan  
juhuyānmūlamantreṇa taireva samidādibhiḥ  tattvānyetāni maddehe śuddhyaṃtām  tyanusmaran  
pañcabhūtāni tanmātrāḥ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca  jñānakarmavibhedena pañcakarmavibhāgaśaḥ  
tvagādidhātavassapta pañca prāṇādivāyavaḥ  manobuddhirahaṃ khyātirguṇāḥ prakṛtipūruṣau  
rāgo vidyākale caiva niyatiḥ kāla eva ca  māyā ca śuddhividyā ca maheśvarasadāśivau  
śaktiśca śivatattvaṃ ca tattvāni kramaśo viduḥ  mantraistu virajairhutvā hotāsau virajā bhavet  
śivānugrahamāsādya jñānavānsa hi jāyate  atha gomayamādāya piṇḍīkṛtyābhimaṃtrya ca  
vinyasyāgnau ca samprokṣya dine tasminhaviṣyabhuk  prabhāte tu caturdaśyāṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ puroditam  
dine tasminnirāhāraḥ kālaṃ śeṣaṃ samāpayet  prātaḥ parvaṇi cāpyevaṃ kṛtvā homā vasānataḥ  
upasaṃhṛtya rudrāgniṃ gṛhṇīyādbhasma yatnataḥ  tataśca jaṭilo muṇḍī śikhaikajaṭa eva vā  
bhūtvā snātvā tato vītalajjaścetsyāddigambaraḥ  api kāṣāyavasanaścarmacīrāmbaro 'tha vā  
ekāmbaro valkalī vā bhaveddaṇḍī ca mekhalī  prakṣālya caraṇau paścāddvirācamyātmanastanum  
saṃkulīkṛtya tadbhasma virajānalasaṃbhavam  agnirityādibhirmaṃtraiḥ ṣaḍbhirātharvaṇaiḥ kramāt  
vibhṛjyāṃgāni mūrdhādicaraṇāṃtāni taisspṛśet  tatastena krameṇaiva samuddhṛtya ca bhasmanā  
sarvāṃgoddhūlanaṃ kuryātpraṇavena śivena vā  tatastripuṇḍraṃ racayettriyāyuṣasamāhvayam  
śivabhāvaṃ samāgamya śivayogamathācaret  kuryātstrisandhyamapyevametatpāśupataṃ vratam  
bhuktimuktipradaṃ caitatpaśutvaṃ vinivartayet  tatpaśutvaṃ parityajya kṛtvā pāśupataṃ vratam  
pūjanīyo mahādevo liṃgamūrtissanātanaḥ  padmamaṣṭadalaṃ haimaṃ navaratnairalaṃkṛtam  
karṇikākeśaropetamāsanaṃ parikalpayet  vibhave tadabhāve tu raktaṃ sitamathāpi vā  
padmaṃ tasyāpyabhāve tu kevalaṃ bhāvanāmayam  tatpadmakarṇikāmadhye kṛtvā liṃgaṃ kanīyasam  
sphīṭikaṃ pīṭhikopetaṃ pūjayedvidhivatkramāt  pratiṣṭhāpya vidhānena talliṃgaṃ kṛtaśodhanam  
parikalpyāsanaṃ mūrtiṃ pañcavaktraprakārataḥ  pañcagavyādibhiḥ pūrṇairyathāvibhavasaṃbhṛtaiḥ  
snāpayetkalaśaiḥ pūrṇairaṣṭāpadasamudbhavaiḥ  gaṃdhadravyaissakarpūraiścandanādyaissakuṃkumaiḥ  
savedikaṃ samālipya liṃgaṃ bhūṣaṇabhūṣitam  bilvapatraiśca padmaiśca raktaiḥ śvetaistathotpalaiḥ  
nīlotpalaistathānyaiśca puṣpaistaistaissugaṃdhibhiḥ  puṇyaiḥ praśastaiḥ patraiśca citrairdūrvākṣatādibhiḥ  
samabhyarcya yathālābhaṃ mahāpūjāvidhānataḥ  dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ tathā cāpi naivedyaṃ ca samādiśet  
nivedayitvā vibhave kalyāṇaṃ ca samācaret  iṣṭāni ca viśiṣṭāni nyāyenopārjitāni ca  
sarvadravyāṇi deyāni vrate tasminviśeṣataḥ  śrīpatrotpalapadmānāṃ saṃkhyā sāhasrikī matā  
pratyekamaparā saṃkhyā śatamaṣṭottaraṃ dvijāḥ  tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa na tyajedbilvapatrakam  
haimamekaṃ paraṃ prāhuḥ padmaṃ padmasahasrakāt  nīlotpalādiṣvapyetatsamānaṃ bilbapatrakaiḥ  
puṣpāntare na niyamo yathālābhaṃ nivedayet  aṣṭāṅgamarghyamutkṛṣṭaṃ dhūpālepau viśeṣataḥ  
candanaṃ vāmadevākhye haritālaṃ ca pauruṣe  īśāne bhasitaṃ kecidālepanamitīdṛśām  
na dhūpamiti manyante dhūpāntaravidhānataḥ  sitāgurumaghorākhye mukhe kṛṣṇāguruṃ punaḥ  
pauruṣe guggulaṃ savye saumye saugaṃdhikaṃ mukhe  īśāne 'pi hyuśīrādi deyāddhūpaṃ viśeṣataḥ  
śarkarāmadhukarpūrakapilāghṛtasaṃyutam  caṃdanāgurukāṣṭhādyaṃ sāmānyaṃ saṃpracakṣate  
karpūravartirājyāḍhyā deyā dīpāvalistataḥ  arghyamācamanaṃ deyaṃ prativaktramataḥ param  
prathamāvaraṇe pūjyo kramāddherambaṣaṇmukhau  brahmāṃgāni tataścaiva prathamāvaraṇercite  
dvitīyāvaraṇe pūjyā vighneśāścakravartinaḥ  tṛtīyāvaraṇe pūjyā bhavādyā aṣṭamūrtayaḥ  
mahādevādayastatra tathaikādaśamūrtayaḥ  caturthāvaraṇe pūjyāḥ sarva eva gaṇeśvarāḥ  
bahireva tu padmasya pañcamāvaraṇe kramāt  daśadikpatayaḥ pūjyāḥ sāstrāḥ sānucarāstathā  
brahmaṇo mānasāḥ putrāḥ sarve 'pi jyotiṣāṃ gaṇāḥ  sarvā devyaśca devāśca sarve sarve ca khecarāḥ  
pātālavāsinaścānye sarve munigaṇā api  yogino hi sakhāssarve pataṃgā mātarastathā  
kṣetrapālāśca sagaṇāḥ sarvaṃ caitaccarācaram  pūjanīyaṃ śivaprītyā mattvā śaṃbhuvibhūtimat  
athāvaraṇapūjāṃte saṃpūjya parameśvaram  sājyaṃ savyaṃ janaṃ hṛdyaṃ havirbhaktyā nivedayet  
mukhavāsādikaṃ dattvā tāmbūlaṃ sopadaṃśakam  alaṃkṛtya ca bhūyo 'pi nānāpuṣpavibhūṣaṇaiḥ  
nīrājanāṃte vistīrya pūjāśeṣaṃ samāpayet  caṣakaṃ sopakāraṃ ca śayanaṃ ca samarpayet  
candrasaṃkāśahāraṃ ca śayanīyaṃ samarpayet  ādyaṃ nṛpocitaṃ hṛdyaṃ tatsarvamanurūpataḥ  
kṛtvā ca kārayitvā ca hitvā ca pratipūjanam  stotraṃ vyapohanaṃ japtvā vidyāṃ pañcākṣarīṃ japet  
pradakṣiṇāṃ praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvātmānaṃ samarpayet  tataḥ purastāddevasya guruviprau ca pūjayet  
dattvārghyamaṣṭau puṣpāṇi devamudvāsya liṃgataḥ  agneścāgniṃ susaṃyamya hyudvāsya ca tamapyuta  
pratyahaṃ ca janastvevaṃ kuryātsevāṃ puroditām  tatastatsāmbujaṃ liṃgaṃ sarvopakaraṇānvitam  
samarpayetsvagurave sthāpayedvā śivālaye  saṃpūjya ca gurūnviprānvratinaśca viśeṣataḥ  
bhaktāndvijāṃśca śaktaśceddīnānāthāṃśca toṣayet  svayaṃ cānaśane śaktaḥ phalamūlāśane 'tha vā  
payovrato vā bhikṣāśī bhavedekāśanastathā  naktaṃ yuktāśano nityaṃ bhūśayyānirataḥ śuciḥ  
bhasmaśāyī tṛṇeśāyī cīrājinadhṛto 'thavā  brahmacaryavrato nityaṃ vratametatsamācaret  
arkavāre tathārdrāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca pakṣayoḥ  aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ śaktastūpavasedapi  
pākhaṇḍipatitodakyāssūtakāntyajapūrvakān  varjayetsarvayatnena manasā karmaṇā girā  
kṣamadānadayāsatyāhiṃsāśīlaḥ sadā bhavet  saṃtuṣṭaśca praśāntaśca japadhyānaratastathā  
kuryāttriṣavaṇasnānaṃ bhasmasnānamathāpi vā  pūjāṃ vaiśeṣikīṃ caiva manasā vacasā girā  
bahunātra kimuktena nācaredaśivaṃ vratī  pramādāttu tathācāre nirūpya gurulāghave  
ucitāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kuryātpūjāhomajapādibhiḥ  āsamāptervratasyaivamācarenna pramādataḥ  
godānaṃ ca vṛṣotsargaṃ kuryātpūjāṃ ca saṃpadā  bhaktaśca śivaprītyarthaṃ sarvakāmavivarjitaḥ  
sāmānyametatkathitaṃ vratasyāsya samāsataḥ  pratimāsaṃ viśeṣaṃ ca pravadāmi yathāśrutam  
vaiśākhe vajraliṃgaṃ tu jyeṣṭhe mārakataṃ śubham  āṣāḍhe mauktikaṃ vidyācchrāvaṇe nīlanirmitam  
māse bhādrapade caiva padmarāgamayaṃ param  āśvine māsi vidyādvai liṃgaṃ gomedakaṃ varam  
kārtikyāṃ vaidrumaṃ liṃgaṃ vaidūryaṃ mārgaśīrṣake  puṣparāgamayaṃ pauṣe māghe dyumaṇijantathā  
phālguṇe candrakāntotthaṃ caitre tadvyatyayo 'thavā  sarvamāseṣu ratnānāmalābhe haimameva vā  
haimābhāve rājataṃ vā tāmrajaṃ śailajantathā  mṛnmayaṃ vā yathālābhaṃ jātuṣaṃ cānyadeva vā  
sarvagaṃdhamayaṃ vātha liṃgaṃ kuryādyathāruci  vratāvasānasamaye samācaritanityakaḥ  
kṛtvā vaiśeṣikīṃ pūjāṃ hutvā caiva yathā purā  saṃpūjya ca tathācāryaṃ vratinaśca viśeṣataḥ  
deśikenāpyanujñātaḥ prāṅmukho vāpyudaṅmukhaḥ  darbhāsano darbhapāṇiḥ prāṇāpānau niyamya ca  
japitvā śaktito mūlaṃ dhyātvā sāmbaṃ triyambakam  anujñāpya yathāpūrvaṃ namaskṛtya kṛtāñjaliḥ  
samutsṛjāmi bhagavanvratametattvadājñayā  ityuktvā liṃgamūlasthāndarbhānuttaratastyajet  
tato daṇḍajaṭācīramekhalā api cotsṛjet  punarācamya vidhivatpañcākṣaramudīrayet  
yaḥ kṛtvātyaṃtikīṃ dīkṣāmādehāntamanākulaḥ  vratametatprakurvīta sa tu vai naiṣṭhikaḥ smṛtaḥ  
so 'tyāśramī ca vijñeyo mahāpāśupatastathā  sa eva tapatāṃ śreṣṭha sa eva ca mahāvratī  
na tena sadṛśaḥ kaścitkṛtakṛtyo mumukṣuṣu  yo yatirnaiṣṭhiko jātastamāhurnaiṣṭhikottamam  
yo 'nvahaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ vā vratametatsamācaret  so 'pi naiṣṭhikatulyaḥ syāttīvravratasamanvayāt  
ghṛtākto yaścaredetadvrataṃ vrataparāyaṇaḥ  dvitraikadivasaṃ vāpi sa ca kaścana naiṣṭhikaḥ  
kṛtyamityeva niṣkāmo yaścaredvratamuttamam  śivārpitātmā satataṃ na tena sadṛśaḥ kvacit  
bhasmacchanno dvijo vidvānmahāpātakasaṃbhavaiḥ  pāpaissudāruṇaissadyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
rudrāgniryatparaṃ vīryantadbhasma parikīrtitam  tasmātsarveṣu kāleṣu vīryavānbhasmasaṃyutaḥ  
bhasmaniṣṭhasya naśyanti deṣā bhasmāgnisaṃgamāt  bhasmasnānaviśuddhātmā bhasmaniṣṭha iti smṛtaḥ  
bhasmanā digdhasarvāṃgo bhasmadīptatripuṃḍrakaḥ  bhasmasnāyī ca puruṣo bhasmaniṣṭha iti smṛtaḥ  
bhūtapretapiśāsāśca rogāścātīva dussahāḥ  bhasmaniṣṭhasya sānnidhyādvidravaṃti na saṃśayaḥ  
bhāsanādbhāsitaṃ proktaṃ bhasma kalmaṣabhakṣaṇāt  bhūtibhūtikarī caiva rakṣā rakṣākarī param  
kimanyadiha vaktavyaṃ bhasmamāhātmyakāraṇam  vratī ca bhasmanā snātassvayaṃ devo maheśvaraḥ  
paramāstraṃ ca śaivānāṃ bhasmaitatpārameśvaram  dhaumyāgrajasya tapasi vyāpado yannivāritāḥ  
tasmātsarvaprayatnena kṛtvā pāśupatavratam  dhanavadbhasma saṃgṛhya bhasmasnānarato bhavet  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  dhaumyāgrajena śiśunā kṣīrārthaṃ hi tapaḥ kṛtam  tasmātkṣīrārṇavo dattastasmai devena śūlinā  
sa kathaṃ śiśuko lebhe śivaśāstrapravaktṛtām  kathaṃ vā śivasadbhāvaṃ jñātvā tapasi niṣṭhitaḥ  
kathaṃ ca labdhavijñānastapaścaraṇaparvaṇi  rudrāgneryatparaṃ vīryaṃ labhe bhasma svarakṣakam  
vāyuruvāca  na hyeṣa śiśukaḥ kaścitprākṛtaḥ kṛtavāṃstapaḥ  munivaryasya tanayo vyāghrapādasya dhīmataḥ  
janmāntareṇa saṃsiddhaḥ kenāpi khalu hetunā  svapadapracyuto diṣṭyā prāpto munikumāratām  
mahādevaprasādasya bhāgyāpannasya bhāvinaḥ  dugdhābhilāṣaprabhavadvāratāmagamattapaḥ  
ataḥ sarvagaṇeśatvaṃ kumāratvaṃ ca śāśvatam  saha dugdhābdhinā tasmai pradadau śaṃkaraḥ svayam  
tasya jñānāgamopyasya prasādādeva śāṃkarāt  kaumāraṃ hi paraṃ sākṣājjñānaṃ śaktimayaṃ viduḥ  
śivaśāstrapravaktṛtvamapi tasya hi tatkṛtam  kumāro munito labdhajñānābdhiriva nandanaḥ  
dṛṣṭaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ tasya śivajñānasamanvaye  svamātṛvacanaṃ sākṣācchokajaṃ kṣīrakāraṇāt  
kadācitkṣīramatyalpaṃ pītavānmātulāśrame  īrṣayayā mātulasutaṃ saṃtṛptakṣīramuttamam  
pītvā sthitaṃ yathākāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai mātulātmajam  upamanyurvyāghrapādiḥ prītyā provāca mātaram  
upamanyuruvāca  mātarmātarmahābhāge mama dehi tapasvini  gavyaṃ kṣīramatisvādu nālpamuṣṇaṃ pibāmyaham  
vāyuruvāca  tacchrutvā putravacanaṃ tanmātā ca tapasvinī  vyāghrapādasya mahiṣī duḥkhamāpattadā ca sā  
upalālyātha suprītyā putramāliṃgya sādaram  duḥkhitā vilalāpātha smṛtvā nairdhanyamātmanaḥ  
smṛtvāsmṛtvā punaḥ kṣīramupamanyussa bālakaḥ  dehi dehīti tāmāha rudranbhūyo mahādyutiḥ  
taddhaṭhaṃ sā parijñāya dvijapatnī tapasvinī  śāntaye taddhaṭhasyātha śubhopāyamarīracat  
uñchavṛttyārjitānbījānsvayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca sā tadā  bījapiṣṭamathāloḍya toyena kalabhāṣiṇī  
ehyehi mama putreti sāmapūrvaṃ tatassutam  āliṃgyādāya duḥkhārtā pradadau kṛtrimaṃ payaḥ  
pītvā ca kṛtrimaṃ kṣīraṃ mātrāṃ dattaṃ sa bālakaḥ  naitatkṣīramiti prāha mātaraṃ cātivihvalaḥ  
duḥkhitā sā tadā prāha saṃprekṣyāghrāya mūrdhani  samārjya netra putrasya karābhyāṃ kamalāyate  
jananyuvāca  taṭinī ratnapūrṇāstāssvargapātālagocarāḥ  bhāgyahīnā na paśyanti bhaktihīnāśca ye śive  
rājyaṃ svargaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca bhojanaṃ kṣīrasaṃbhavam  na labhante priyāṇyeṣāṃ na tuṣyati yadā śivaḥ  
bhavaprasādajaṃ sarvaṃ nānyaddevaprasādajam  anyadeveṣu niratā duḥkhārtā vibhramanti ca  
kṣīraṃ tatra kuto 'smākaṃ vane nivasatāṃ sadā  kva dugdhasādhanaṃ vatsa kva vayaṃ vanavāsinaḥ  
kṛtsnābhāvena dāridryānmayā te bhāgyahīnayā  mithyādugdhamidaṃ dattampiṣṭamāloḍya vāriṇā  
tvaṃ mātulagṛhe svalpaṃ pītvā svādu payaḥ śṛtam  jñātvā svādu tvayā pītaṃ tajjātīyamanusmaran  
dattaṃ na paya ityuktvā rudan duḥkhīkaroṣi mām  prasādena vinā śaṃbho payastava na vidyate  
pādapaṃkajayostasya sāmbasya sagaṇasya ca  bhaktyā samarpitaṃ yattatkāraṇaṃ sarvasampadām  
adhunā vasudosmābhirmahādevo na pūjitaḥ  sakāmānāṃ yathākāmaṃ yathoktaphaladāyakaḥ  
dhanānyuddiśya nāsmābhiritaḥ prāgarcitaḥ śivaḥ  ato daridrāssaṃjātā vayaṃ tasmānna te payaḥ  
pūrvajanmani yaddattaṃ śivamuddiśya vai sutaḥ  tadeva labhyate nānyadviṣṇumuddiśya vā prabhum  
vāyuruvāca  iti mātṛvacaḥ śrutvā tathyaṃ śokādisūcakam  bālo 'pyanutapannaṃtaḥ pragalbhamidamabravīt  
upamanyuruvāca  śokenālamito mātaḥ sāṃbo yadyasti śaṃkaraḥ  tyaja śokaṃ mahābhāge sarvaṃ bhadraṃ bhaviṣyati  
śṛṇu mātarvaco medya mahādevo 'sti cetkvacit  cirādvā hyacirādvāpi kṣīrodaṃ sādhayāmyaham  
vāyuruvāca  iti śrutvā vacastasya bālakasya mahāmateḥ  pratyuvāca tadā mātā suprasannā manasvinī  
mātovāca  śubhaṃ vicāritaṃ tāta tvayā matprītivardhanam  vilaṃbaṃ mā kathāstvaṃ hi bhaja sāṃbaṃ sadāśivam  
sarvasmādadhiko 'styeva śivaḥ paramakāraṇam  tatkṛtaṃ hi jagatsarvaṃ brahmādyāstasya kiṃkarāḥ  
tatprasādakṛtaiśvaryā dāsāstasya vayaṃ prabhoḥ  taṃ vinānyaṃ na jānīmaśśaṃkaraṃ lokaśaṃkaram  
anyāndevānparityajya karmaṇā manasā girā  tameva sāṃbaṃ sagaṇaṃ bhaja bhāvapurassaram  
tasya devādhidevasya śivasya varadāyinaḥ  sākṣānnamaśśivāyeti maṃtro 'yaṃ vācakaḥ smṛtaḥ  
saptakoṭimahāmaṃtrāḥ sarve sapraṇavāḥ pare  tasminneva vilīyaṃte punastasmādvinirgatāḥ  
saprasādāśca te maṃtrāḥ svādhikārādyapekṣayā  sarvādhikārastveko 'yaṃ maṃtra eveśvarājñayā  
yathā nikṛṣṭānutkṛṣṭānsarvānapyātmanaḥ śivaḥ  kṣamate rakṣituṃ tadvanmaṃtro 'yamapi sarvadā  
prabalaśca tathā hyeṣa maṃtro mantrāntarādapi  sarvarakṣākṣamo 'pyeṣa nāparaḥ kaścidiṣyate  
tasmānmantrāntarāṃstyaktvā pañcākṣaraparo bhava  tasmiñjihvāṃtaragate na kiṃcidiha durlabham  
aghorāstraṃ ca śaivānāṃ rakṣāheturanuttamam  tacca tatprabhavaṃ matvā tatparo bhava nānyathā  
bhasmedantu mayā labdhaṃ pitureva tavottamam  virajānalasaṃsiddhaṃ mahāvyāpannivāraṇam  
maṃtraṃ ca te mayā dattaṃ gṛhāṇa madanujñayā  anenaivāśu japtena rakṣā tava bhaviṣyati  
vāyuruvāca  evaṃ mātrā samādiśya śivamastvityudīrya ca  visṛṣṭastadvaco mūrdhni kurvanneva tadā muniḥ  
tāṃ praṇamyaivamuktvā ca tapaḥ kartuṃ pracakrame  tamāha ca tadā mātā śubhaṃ kurvaṃtu te surāḥ  
anujñātastayā tatra tapastepe sa duścaram  himavatparvataṃ prāpya vāyubhakṣaḥ samāhitaḥ  
aṣṭeṣṭakābhiḥ prasādaṃ kṛtvā liṃgaṃ ca mṛnmayam  tatrāvāhya mahādevaṃ sāṃbaṃ sagaṇamavyayam  
bhaktyā pañcākṣareṇaiva putraiḥ puṣpairvanodbhavaiḥ  samabhyarcya ciraṃ kālaṃ cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ  
tatastapaścarattaṃ taṃ bālamekākinaṃ kṛśam  upamanyuṃ dvijavaraṃ śivasaṃsaktamānasam  
purā marīcinā śaptāḥ kecinmunipiśācakāḥ  saṃpīḍya rākṣasairbhāvaistapasovighnamācaran  
sa ca taiḥ pīḍyamāno 'pi tapaḥ kurvankathañcana  sadā namaḥ śivāyeti krośati smārtanādavat  
tannādaśravaṇādeva tapaso vighnakāriṇaḥ  te taṃ bālaṃ samutsṛjya munayassamupācaran  
tapasā tasya viprasya copamanyormahātmanaḥ  carācaraṃ ca munayaḥ pradīpitamabhūjjagat  
vāyuruvāca  atha sarve pradīptāṃgā vaikuṇṭhaṃ prayayurdrutam  praṇamyāhuśca tatsarvaṃ haraye devasattamāḥ  
śrutvā teṣāṃ tadā vākyaṃ bhagavānpuruṣottamaḥ  kimidantviti saṃcintya jñātvā tatkāraṇaṃ ca saḥ  
jagāma mandaraṃ tūrṇaṃ maheśvaradidṛkṣayā  dṛṣṭvā devaṃ praṇamyaivaṃ provāca sukṛtāṃjaliḥ  
viṣṇuruvāca  bhagavanbrāhmaṇaḥ kaścidupamanyuriti śrutaḥ  kṣīrārthamadahatsarvaṃ tapasā tannivāraya  
vāyuruvāca  iti śrutvā vaco viṣṇoḥ prāha devo maheśvaraḥ  śiśuṃ nivārayiṣyāmi tattvaṃ gaccha svamāśramam  
tacchrutvā śaṃbhuvacanaṃ sa viṣṇurdevavallabhaḥ  jagāmāśvāsya tānsarvānsvalokamamarādikān  
etasminnaṃtare devaḥ pinākī parameśvaraḥ  śakrasya rūpamāsthāya gantuṃ cakre matiṃ tataḥ  
atha jagāma munestu tapovanaṃ gajavareṇa sitena sadāśivaḥ  saha surāsurasiddhamahoragairamararājatanuṃ svayamāsthitaḥ  
sa vāraṇaścāru tadā vibhuṃ taṃ nivījya vālavyajanena divyam  dadhāra śacyā sahitaṃ sureṃdraṃ kareṇa vāmena śitātapatram  
rarāja bhagavānsomaḥ śakrarūpī sadāśivaḥ  tenātapatreṇa yathā candrabiṃbena mandaraḥ  
āsthāyaivaṃ hi śakrasya svarūpaṃ parameśvaraḥ  jagāmānugrahaṃ kartumupamanyostadāśramam  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā parameśānaṃ śakrarūpadharaṃ śivam  praṇamya śirasā prāha mahāmunivaraḥ svayam  
upamanyuruvāca  pāvitaścāśramasso 'yaṃ mama deveśvara svayam  prāpto yattvaṃ jagannātha bhagavandevasattama  
vāyuruvāca  evamuktvā sthitaṃ prekṣya kṛtāṃjalipuṭaṃ dvijam  prāha gaṃbhīrayā vācā śakrarūpadharo haraḥ  
śakra uvāca  tuṣṭo 'smi te varaṃ brūhi tapasānena suvrata  dadāmi cepsitānsarvāndhaumyāgraja mahāmune  
vāyuruvāca  evamuktastadā tena śakreṇa munipuṃgavaḥ  vārayāmi śive bhaktimityuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ  
tanniśamya hariḥ  prāha māṃ na jānāsi lekhapam  trailokyādhipatiṃ śakraṃ sarvadevanamaskṛtam  
madbhakto bhava viprarṣe māmevārcaya sarvadā  dadāmi sarvaṃ bhadraṃ te tyaja rudraṃ ca nirguṇam  
rudreṇa nirguṇenāpi kiṃ te kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati  devapaṅktibahirbhūto yaḥ piśācatvamāgataḥ  
vāyuruvāca  tacchrutvā prāha sa munirjapanpañcākṣaraṃ manum  manyamāno dharmavighnaṃ prāha taṃ kartumāgatam  
upamanyuruvāca  tvayaivaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhavaniṃdāratena vai  prasaṃgādeva devasya nirguṇatvaṃ mahātmanaḥ  
tvaṃ na jānāmi vai rudraṃ sarvadeveśvareśvaram  brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ janaka prakṛteḥ param  
sadasadvyaktamavyaktaṃ yamāhurbrahmavādinaḥ  nityamekamanekaṃ ca varaṃ tasmādvṛṇomyaham  
hetuvādavinirmuktaṃ sāṃkhyayogārthadamparam  upāsate yaṃ tattvajñā varaṃ tasmādvṛṇomyaham  
nāsti śaṃbhoḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇāt  brahmaviṣṇvādidevānāṃ sraṣṭurguṇaparādvibhoḥ  
bahunātra kimuktena mayādyānumitaṃ mahat  bhavāṃtare kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ śrutā nindā bhavasya cet  
śrutvā niṃdāṃ bhavasyātha tatkṣaṇādeva santyajet  svadehaṃ tannihatyāśu śivalokaṃ sa gacchati  
āstāṃ tāvanmameccheyaṃ kṣīraṃ prati surādhama  nihatya tvāṃ śivāstreṇa tyajāmyetaṃ kalevaram  
vāyuruvāca  evamuktvopamanyustaṃ martuṃ vyavasitassvayam  kṣīre vāñchāmapi tyaktvā nihantuṃ śakramudyataḥ  
bhasmādāya tadā ghoramaghorāstrābhimaṃtritam  visṛjya śakramuddiśya nanāda sa munistadā  
smṛtvā śaṃbhupadadvaṃdvaṃ svadehaṃ dugdhumudyataḥ  āgneyīṃ dhāraṇāṃ bibhradupamanyuravasthitaḥ  
evaṃ vyavasite vipre bhagavānbhaganetrahā  vārayāmāsa saumyena dhāraṇāṃ tasya yoginaḥ  
tadvisṛṣṭamaghorāstraṃ naṃdīśvaraniyogataḥ  jagṛhe madhyataḥ kṣiptaṃ nandī śaṃkaravallabhaḥ  
svaṃ rūpameva bhagavānāsthāya parameśvaraḥ  darśayāmāsa śiprāya bālendukṛtaśekharam  
kṣīrārṇavasahasraṃ ca pīyūṣārṇavameva vā  dadhyāderarṇavāṃścaiva ghṛtodārṇavameva ca  
phalārṇavaṃ ca bālasya bhakṣya bhojyārṇavaṃ tathā  apūpānāṃ giriṃ caiva darśayāmāsa sa prabhuḥ  
evaṃ sa dadṛśe devo devyā sārdhaṃ vṛṣopari  gaṇeśvaraistriśūlādyairdivyāstrairapi saṃvṛtaḥ  
divi duṃdubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ca  viṣṇubrahmendrapramukhairdevaiśchannā diśo daśa  
athopamanyurānandasamudrormibhirāvṛtaḥ  papāta daṇḍavadbhūmau bhaktinamreṇa cetasā  
etasminsamaye tatra sasmito bhagavānbhavaḥ  ehyehīti tamāhūya mūrdhnyāghrāya dadau varān  
śiva uvāca  bhakṣyabhojyānyathākāmaṃ bāndhavairbhukṣva sarvadā  sukhī bhava sadā duḥkhānnirmuktā bhaktimānmama  
upamanyo mahābhāga tavāmbaiṣā hi pārvatī  mayā putrīkṛto hyadya dattaḥ kṣīrodakārṇavaḥ  
madhunaścārṇavaścaiva dadhyannārṇava eva ca  ājyaudanārṇavaścaiva phalādyarṇava eva ca  
apūpagirayaścaiva bhakṣyabhojyārṇavastathā  ete dattā mayā te hi tvaṃ gṛhṇīṣva mahāmune  
pitā tava mahādevo mātā vai jagadambikā  amaratvaṃ mayā dattaṃ gāṇapatyaṃ ca śāśvatam  
varānvaraya suprītyā mano 'bhilaṣitānparān  prasanno 'haṃ pradāsyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  
vāyuruvāca  evamuktvā mahādevaḥ karābhyāmupagṛhyatam  mūrdhnyāghrāya sutaste 'yamiti devyai nyavedayat  
devī ca guhavatprītyā mūrdhni tasya karāmbujam  vinyasya pradadau tasmai kumārapadamavyayam  
kṣīrābdhirapi sākāraḥ kṣīraṃ svādu kare dadhat  upasthāya dadau piṇḍībhūtaṃ kṣīramanaśvaram  
yogaiśvaryaṃ sadā tuṣṭiṃ brahmavidyāmanaśvarām  samṛddhiṃ paramāntasmai dadau saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ  
atha śaṃbhuḥ prasannātmā dṛṣṭvā tasya tapomahaḥ  punardadau varaṃ divyaṃ munaye hyupamanyave  
vrataṃ pāśupataṃ jñānaṃ vratayogaṃ ca tattvataḥ  dadau tasmai pravaktṛtvapāṭavaṃ suciraṃ param  
so 'pi labdhvā varāndivyānkumāratvaṃ ca sarvadā  tasmācchivācca tasyāśca śivāyā mudito 'bhavat  
tataḥ prasannacetaskaḥ supraṇamya kṛtāṃjaliḥ  yayāce sa varaṃ vipro devadevānmaheśvarāt  
upamanyuruvāca  prasīda devadeveśa prasīda parameśvara  svabhaktindehi paramāndivyāmavyabhicāriṇīm  
śraddhāndehi mahādeva dvasambandhiṣu me sadā  svadāsyaṃ paramaṃ snehaṃ sānnidhyaṃ caiva sarvadā  
evamuktvā prasannātmāharṣagadgadayā girā  satuṣṭāva mahādevamupamanyurdvijottamaḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  devadeva mahādeva śaraṇāgatavatsala  prasīda karuṇāsiṃdho sāmba śaṃkara sarvadā  
vāyuruvāca  evamukto mahādevaḥ sarveṣāṃ ca varapradaḥ  pratyuvāca prasannātmopamanyuṃ munisattamam  
śiva uvāca  vatsopamanyo tuṣṭo 'smi sarvaṃ dattaṃ mayā hi te  dṛḍhabhakto 'si viprarṣe mayā vijñāsito hyasi  
ajaraścāmaraścaiva bhava tvanduḥkhavarjitaḥ  yaśasvī tejasā yukto divyajñānasamanvitaḥ  
akṣayā bāndhavāścaiva kulaṃ gotraṃ ca te sadā  bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha mayi bhaktiśca śāśvatī  
sānnidhyaṃ cāśrame nityaṃ kariṣyāmi dvijottama  upakaṃṭhaṃ mama tvaṃ vai sānandaṃ vihariṣyasi  
evamuktvā sa bhagavānsūryakoṭisamaprabhaḥ  īśānassa varāndattvā tatraivāntardadhe haraḥ  
upamanyuḥ prasannātmā prāpya tasmādvarādvarān  jagāma jananīsthānaṃ sukhaṃ prāpādhikaṃ ca saḥ  
oṃ  namassamastasaṃsāracakrabhramaṇahetave  gaurīkucataṭadvandvakuṃkumāṃkitavakṣase  
sūta uvāca  uktvā bhagavato labdhaprasādādupamanyunā  niyamādutthito vāyurmadhye prāpte divākare  
ṛṣayaścāpi te sarve naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ  athāyamarthaḥ praṣṭavya iti kṛtvā viniścayam  
kṛtvā yathā svakaṃ kṛtyaṃ pratyahaṃ te yathā purā  bhagavaṃtamupāyāṃtaṃ samīkṣya samupāviśan  
athāsau niyamasyāṃte bhagavānambarodbhavaḥ  madhye munisabhāyāstu bheje kḷptaṃ varāsanam  
sukhāsanopaviṣṭaśca vāyurlokanamaskṛtaḥ  śrīmadvibhūtimīśasya hṛdi kṛtvedamabravīt  
taṃ prapadye mahādevaṃ sarvajñamaparājitam  vibhūtissakalaṃ yasya carācaramidaṃ jagat  
ityākarṇya śubhāṃ vāṇīmṛṣayaḥ kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ  vibhūtivistaraṃ śrotumūcuste paramaṃ vacaḥ  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  uktaṃ bhagavatā vṛttamupamanyormahātmanaḥ  kṣīrārthenāpi tapasā yatprāptaṃ parameśvarāt  
dṛṣṭo 'sau vāsudevena kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā  dhaumyāgrajastatastena kṛtvā pāśupataṃ vratam  
prāptaṃ ca paramaṃ jñānamiti prāgeva śuśruma  kathaṃ sa labdhavān kṛṣṇo jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ param  
vāyuruvāca  svecchayā hyavatīrṇopi vāsudevassanātanaḥ  niṃdayanniva mānuṣyaṃ dehaśuddhiṃ cakāra saḥ  
putrārthaṃ hi tapastaptuṃ gatastasya mahāmuneḥ  āśramaṃ munibhirdṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃstatra vai munim  
bhasmāvadātasarvāṃgaṃ tripuṃḍrāṃkitamastakam  rudrākṣamālābharaṇaṃ jaṭāmaṃḍalamaṃḍitam  
tacchiṣyabhūtairmunibhiśśāstrairvedamivāvṛtam  śivadhyānarataṃ śāṃtamupamanyuṃ mahādyutim  
namaścakāra taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭasarvatanūruhaḥ  bahumānena kṛṣṇo 'sau triḥ kṛtvā tu pradakṣiṇām  
stutiṃ cakāra suprītyā nataskaṃdhaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ  tasyāvalokanādeva muneḥ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ  
naṣṭamāsīnmalaṃ sarvaṃ māyājaṃ kārmameva ca  tapaḥkṣīṇamalaṃ kṛṣṇamupamanyuryathāvidhiḥ  
bhasmanoddhūlya taṃ mantrairagnirityādibhiḥ kramāt  atha pāśupataṃ sākṣādvrataṃ dvādaśamāsikam  
kārayitvā munistasmai pradadau jñānamuttamam  tadāprabhṛti taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ munayaśśaṃsitavratāḥ  
divyāḥ pāśupatāḥ sarve parivṛtyopatasthire  tato guruniyogādvai kṛṣṇaḥ paramaśaktimān  
tapaścakāra putrārthaṃ sāṃbamuddiśya śaṃkaram  tapaso tena varṣāṃte dṛṣṭo 'sau parameśvaraḥ  
śriyā paramayā yuktassāṃbaśca sagaṇaśśivaḥ  varārthamāvirbhūtasya harasya subhagākṛteḥ  
stutiṃ cakāra natvāsau kṛṣṇaḥ samyakkṛtāṃjaliḥ  sāṃbaṃ samagaṇavyagro labdhavānputramātmanaḥ  
tapasā tuṣṭacittena dattaṃ viṣṇośśivena vai  yasmātsāṃbo mahādevaḥ pradadau putramātmanaḥ  
tasmājjāṃbavatīsūnuṃ sāṃbaṃ cakre sa nāmataḥ  tadetatkathitaṃ sarvaṃ kṛṣṇasyāmitakarmaṇaḥ  
maharṣerjñānalābhaśca putralābhaśca śaṃkarāt  ya idaṃ kīrtayennityaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayettathā  
sa viṣṇorjñānamāsādya tenaiva saha modate  
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kiṃ tatpāśupataṃ jñānaṃ kathaṃ paśupatiśśivaḥ  kathaṃ dhaumyāgrajaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā  
etatsarvaṃ samācakṣva vāyo śaṃkaravigraha  tatsamo na hi vaktāsti trailokyeṣvaparaḥ prabhuḥ  
sūta uvāca  ityākarṇya vacasteṣāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ prabhaṃjanaḥ  saṃsmṛtya śivamīśānaṃ pravaktumupacakrame  
vāyuruvāca  purā sākṣānmaheśena śrīkaṃṭhākhyena mandare  devyai devena kathitaṃ jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ param  
tadeva pṛṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇena viṣṇunā viśvayoninā  paśutvaṃ ca surādīnāṃ patitvaṃ ca śivasya ca  
yathopadiṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇāya muninā hyupamanyunā  tathā samāsato vakṣye tacchṛṇudhvamataṃdritāḥ  
puropamanyumāsīnaṃ viṣṇuḥkṛṣṇavapurdharaḥ  praṇipatya yathānyāyamidaṃ vacanamabravīt  
śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca  bhagavañchrotumicchāmi devyai devena bhāṣitam  divyaṃ pāśupataṃ jñānaṃ vibhūtiṃ vāsya kṛtsnaśaḥ  
kathaṃ paśupatirdevaḥ paśavaḥ ke prakīrtitāḥ  kaiḥ pāśaiste nibadhyaṃte vimucyaṃte ca te katham  
iti saṃcoditaḥ śrīmānupamanyurmahātmanā  praṇamya devaṃ devīṃ ca prāha puṣṭo yathā tathā  
upamanyuruvāca  brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāṃtāśca devadevasya śūlinaḥ  paśavaḥ parikīrtyaṃte saṃsāravaśavartinaḥ  
teṣāṃ patitvāddeveśaḥ śivaḥ paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ  malamāyādibhiḥ pāśaiḥ sa badhnāti paśūnpatiḥ  
sa eva mocakasteṣāṃ bhaktyā samyagupāsitaḥ  caturviṃśatitattvāni māyākarmaguṇā amī  
viṣayā iti kathyante pāśā jīvanibandhanāḥ  brahmādistambaparyaṃtān paśūnbaddhvā maheśvaraḥ  
pāśairetaiḥ patirdevaḥ kāryaṃ kārayati svakam  tasyājñayā maheśasya prakṛtiḥ puruṣocitām  
buddhiṃ prasūte sā buddhirahaṃkāramahaṃkṛtiḥ  indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca tanmātrāpañcakaṃ tathā  
śāsanāddevadevasya śivasya śivadāyinaḥ  tanmātrāṇyapi tasyaiva śāsanena mahīyasā  
mahābhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhāvayaṃtyanupūrvaśaḥ  brahmādīnāṃ tṛṇāntānāṃ dehināṃ dehasaṃgatim  
mahābhūtānyaśeṣāṇi janayaṃti śivājñayā  adhyavasyati vai buddhirahaṃkārobhimanyate  
cittaṃ cetayate cāpi manaḥ saṃkalpayatyapi  śrotrādīni ca gṛhṇanti śabdādīnviṣayān pṛthak  
svāneva nānyāndevasya divyenājñābalena vai  vāgādīnyapi yānyāsaṃstāni karmendriyāṇi ca  
yathā svaṃ karma kurvanti nānyatkiṃcicchivājñayā  śabdādayopi gṛhyaṃte kriyante vacanādayaḥ  
avilaṃghyā hi sarveṣāmājñā śaṃbhorgarīyasī  avakāśamaśeṣāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃprayacchati  
ākāśaḥ parameśasya śāsanādeva sarvagaḥ  prāṇādyaiśca tathā nāmabhedairaṃtarbahirjagat  
bibharti sarvaṃ śarvasya śāsanena prabhañjanaḥ  havyaṃ vahati devānāṃ kavyaṃ kavyāśināmapi  
pākādyaṃ ca karotyagniḥ parameśvaraśāsanāt  saṃjīvanādyaṃ sarvasya kurvatyāpastadājñayā  
viśvambharā jagannityaṃ dhatte viśveśvarājñayā  devānpātyasurān haṃti trilokamabhirakṣati  
ājñayā tasya devendraḥ sarvairdevairalaṃghyayā  ādhipatyamapāṃ nityaṃ kurute varuṇassadā  
pāśairbadhnāti ca yathā daṃḍyāṃstasyaiva śāsanāt  dadāti nityaṃ yakṣendro draviṇaṃ draviṇeśvaraḥ  
puṇyānurūpaṃ bhūtebhyaḥ puruṣasyānuśāsanāt  karoti saṃpadaḥ śaśvajjñānaṃ cāpi sumedhasām  
nigrahaṃ cāpyasādhūnāmīśānaśśivaśāsanāt  dhatte tu dharaṇīṃ mūrdhnā śeṣaḥ śivaniyogataḥ  
yāmāhustāmasīṃ raudrīṃ mūrtimaṃtakarīṃ hareḥ  sṛjatyaśeṣamīśasya śāsanāccaturānanaḥ  
anyābhirmūrtibhiḥ svābhiḥ pāti cāṃte nihanti ca  viṣṇuḥ pālayate viśvaṃ kālakālasya śāsanāt  
sṛjate trasate cāpi svakābhistanubhistribhiḥ  haratyaṃte jagatsarvaṃ harastasyaiva śāsanāt  
sṛjatyapi ca viśvātmā tridhā bhinnastu rakṣati  kālaḥ karoti sakalaṃ kālassaṃharati prajāḥ  
kālaḥ pālayate viśvaṃ kālakālasya śāsanāt  tribhiraṃśairjagadbibhrattejobhirvṛṣṭimādiśan  
divi varṣatyasau bhānurdevadevasya śāsanāt  puṣṇātyoṣadhijātāni bhūtānyāhlādayatyapi  
devaiśca pīyate caṃdraścandrabhūṣaṇaśāsanāt  ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau marutastathā  
khecarā ṛṣayassiddhā bhogino manujā mṛgāḥ  paśavaḥ pakṣiṇaścaiva kīṭādyāḥ sthāvarāṇi ca  
nadyassamudrā girayaḥ kānanāni sarāṃsi ca  vedāḥ sāṃgāśca śāstrāṇi maṃtrastomamakhādayaḥ  
kālāgnyādiśivāṃtāni bhuvanāni sahādhipaiḥ  brahmāṃḍānyapyasaṃkhyāni teṣāmāvaraṇāni ca  
vartamānānyatītāni bhaviṣyantyapi kṛtsnaśaḥ  diśaśca vidiśaścaiva kālabhedāḥ kalādayaḥ  
yacca kiṃcijjagatyasmin dṛśyate śrūyate 'pi vā  tatsarvaṃ śaṃkarasyājñā balena samadhiṣṭhitam  
ājñābalāttasya dharā sthiteha dharādharā vāridharāḥ samudrāḥ  jyotirgaṇāḥ śakramukhāśca devāḥ sthiraṃ ciraṃ vā cidacidyadasti  
upamanyuruvāca  atyāścaryamidaṃ kṛṣṇa śaṃbhoramitakarmaṇaḥ  ājñākṛtaṃ śṛṇuṣvaitacchrutaṃ śrutimukhe mayā  
purā kila surāḥ seṃdrā vivadaṃtaḥ parasparam  asurānsamare jitvā jetāhamahamityuta  
tadā maheśvarasteṣāṃ madhyato varaveṣadhṛk  svalakṣaṇairvihīnāṃgaḥ svayaṃ yakṣa ivābhavat  
sa tānāha surānekaṃ tṛṇamādāya bhūtale  ya etadvikṛtaṃ kartuṃ kṣamate sa tu daityajit  
yakṣasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vajrapāṇiḥ śacīpatiḥ  kiṃcitkruddho vihasyainaṃ tṛṇamādātumudyataḥ  
na tattṛṇamupadātuṃ manasāpi ca śakyate  yathā tathāpi tacchettuṃ vajraṃ vajradharo 'sṛjat  
tadvajraṃ nijavajreṇa saṃsṛṣṭamiva sarvataḥ  tṛṇenābhihataṃ tena tiryagagraṃ papāta ha  
tataścānye susaṃrabdhā lokapālā mahābalāḥ  sasṛjustṛṇamuddiśya svāyudhāni sahasraśaḥ  
prajajjvāla mahāvahniḥ pracaṃḍaḥ pavano vavau  pravṛddho 'pāṃpatiryadvatpralaye samupasthite  
evaṃ devaissamārabdhaṃ tṛṇamuddiśya yatnataḥ  vyarthamāsīdaho kṛṣṇa yakṣasyātmabalena vai  
tadāha yakṣaṃ deveṃdraḥ ko bhavānityamarṣitaḥ  tatassa paśyatāmeva teṣāmaṃtaradhādatha  
tadaṃtare haimavatī devī divyavibhūṣaṇā  āvirāsīnnabhoraṃge śobhamānā śucismitā  
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayāviṣṭā devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ  praṇamya yakṣaṃ papracchuḥ ko 'sau yakṣo vilakṣaṇaḥ  
sā 'bravītsasmitaṃ devī sa yuṣmākamagocaraḥ  tenedaṃ bhramyate cakraṃ saṃsārākhyaṃ carācaram  
tenādau kriyate viśvaṃ tena saṃhriyate punaḥ  na tanniyantā kaścitsyāttena sarvaṃ niyamyate  
ityuktvā sā mahādevī tatraivāṃtaradhatta vai  devāśca vismitāḥ sarve tāṃ praṇamya divaṃ yayuḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  śṛṇu kṛṣṇa maheśasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ  mūrtyātmabhistataṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagadetaccarācaram  sa śivassarvamevedaṃ svakīyābhiśca mūrtibhiḥ  adhitiṣṭhatyameyātmā hyetatsarvamanusmṛtam  
brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro maheśānassadāśivaḥ  mūrtayastasya vijñeyā yābhirviśvamidaṃ tatam  athānyāścāpi tanavaḥ pañca brahmasamāhvayāḥ  tanūbhistābhirāvyāptamiha kiṃcinna vidyate  
īśānaḥ puruṣo 'ghoro vāmaḥ sadyastathaiva ca  brahmāṇyetāni devasya mūrtayaḥ pañca viśrutāḥ  īśānākhyā tu yā tasya mūrtirādyā garīyasī  bhoktāraṃ prakṛteḥ sākṣātkṣetrajñamadhitiṣṭhati  
sthāṇostatpuruṣākhyā yā mūrtirmūrtimataḥ prabhoḥ  guṇāśrayātmakaṃ bhogyamavyaktamadhitiṣṭhati  dharmādyaṣṭāṃgasaṃyuktaṃ buddhitattvaṃ pinākinaḥ  adhitiṣṭhatyaghorākhyā mūrtiratyaṃtapūjitā  
vāmadevāhvayāṃ mūrtiṃ mahādevasya vedhasaḥ  ahaṃkṛteradhiṣṭhātrīmāhurāgamavedinaḥ  sadyo jātāhvayāṃ mūrtiṃ śambhoramitavarcasaḥ  mānasaḥ samadhiṣṭhātrīṃ matimaṃtaḥ pracakṣate  
śrotrasya vācaḥ śabdasya vibhorvyomnastathaiva ca  īśvarīmīśvarasyemāmīśākhyāṃ hi vidurbudhāḥ  tvakpāṇisparśavāyūnāmīśvarīṃ mūrtimaiśvarīm  puruṣākhyaṃ vidussarve purāṇārthaviśāradāḥ  
cakṣuṣaścaraṇasyāpi rūpasyāgnestathaiva ca  aghorākhyāmadhiṣṭhātrīṃ mūrtimāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ  rasanāyāśca pāyośca rasasyāpāṃ tathaiva ca  īśvarīṃ vāmadevākhyāṃ mūrtiṃ tanniratāṃ viduḥ  
ghrāṇasya caivopasthasya gaṃdhasya ca bhuvastathā  sadyo jātāhvayāṃ mūrtimīśvarīṃ saṃpracakṣate  mūrtayaḥ pañca devasya vaṃdanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ  śreyorthibhirnarairnityaṃ śreyasāmekahetavaḥ  
tasya devādidevasya mūrtyaṣṭakamayaṃ jagat  tasminvyāpya sthitaṃ viśvaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva  śarvo bhavastathā rudra ugro bhīmaḥ paśoḥ patiḥ  
īśānaśca mahādevo mūrtayaścāṣṭa viśrutāḥ  
bhūmyaṃbhognimarudvyomakṣetrajñārkaniśākarāḥ  adhiṣṭhitā maheśasya śarvādyairaṣṭamūrtibhiḥ  carācarātmakaṃ viśvaṃ dhatte viśvaṃbharātmikā  śārvīrśivāhvayā mūrtiriti śāstrasya niścayaḥ  
saṃjīvanaṃ samastasya jagatassalilātmikā  bhāvīti gīyate mūrtibhavasya paramātmanaḥ  bahiraṃtargatā viśvaṃ vyāpya tejomayī śubhā  raudrī rudrāvyayā mūrtirāsthitā ghorarūpiṇī  
spaṃdayatyanilātmadaṃ bibharti spaṃdate svayam  augrīti kathyate sadbhirmūrtirugrasya vedhasaḥ  sarvāvakāśadā sarvavyāpikā gaganātmikā  mūrtirbhīmasya bhīmākhyā bhūtavṛṃdasya bhedikā  
sarvātmanāmadhiṣṭhātrī sarvakṣetranivāsinī  mūrtiḥ paśupaterjñeyā paśupāśanikṛṃtanī  dīpayaṃtī jagatsarvaṃ divākarasamāhvayā  īśānākhyamaheśasya mūrtirdivi visarpati  
āpyāyayati yo viśvamamṛtāṃśurniśākaraḥ  mahādevasya sā mūrtirmahādevasamāhvayā  ātmā tasyāṣṭamī mūrtiḥ śivasya paramātmanaḥ  vyāpiketaramūrtīnāṃ viśvaṃ tasmācchivātmakam  
vṛkṣasya mūlasekena śākhāḥ puṣyaṃti vai yathā  śivasya pūjayā tadvatpuṣyatyasya vapurjagat  sarvābhayapradānaṃ ca sarvānugrahaṇaṃ tathā  sarvopakārakaraṇaṃ śivasyārādhanaṃ viduḥ  
yatheha putrapautrādeḥ prītyā prīto bhavetpitā  tathā sarvasya saṃprītyā prīto bhavati śaṃkaraḥ  dehino yasya kasyāpi kriyate yadi nigrahaḥ  aniṣṭamaṣṭamūrtestatkṛtameva na saṃśayaḥ  
aṣṭamūrtyātmanā viśvamadhiṣṭhāya sthitaṃ śivam  bhajasva sarvabhāvena rudraḥ paramakāraṇam  
kṛṣṇa uvāca  bhagavanparameśasya śarvasyāmitatejasaḥ  mūrtibhirviśvamevedaṃ yathā vyāptaṃ tathā śrutam  
athaitajjñātumicchāmi yāthātmyaṃ pameśayoḥ  strīpuṃbhāvātmakaṃ cedaṃ tābhyāṃ kathamadhiṣṭhitam  
upamanyuruvāca  śrīmadvibhūtiṃ śivayoryāthātmyaṃ ca samāsataḥ  vakṣye tadvistarādvaktuṃ bhavenāpi na śakyate  
śaktiḥ sākṣānmahādevī mahādevaśca śaktimān  tayorvibhūtileśo vai sarvametaccarācaram  
vastu kiṃcidacidrūpaṃ kiṃcidvastu cidātmakam  dvayaṃ śuddhamaśuddhaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca  
yatsaṃsarati ciccakramaciccakrasamanvitam  tadevāśuddhamaparamitaraṃ tu paraṃ śubham  
aparaṃ ca paraṃ caiva dvayaṃ cidacidātmakam  śivasya ca śivāyāśca svāmyaṃ caitatsvabhāvataḥ  
śivayorvai vaśe viśvaṃ na viśvasya vaśe śivau  īśitavyamidaṃ yasmāttasmādviśveśvarau śivau  
yathā śivastathā devī yathā devī tathā śivaḥ  nānayoraṃtaraṃ vidyāccaṃdracandrikayoriva  
caṃdro na khalu bhātyeṣa yathā caṃdrikayā vinā  na bhāti vidyamāno 'pi tathā śaktyā vinā śivaḥ  
prabhayā hi vināyadvadbhānureṣa na vidyate  prabhā ca bhānunā tena sutarāṃ tadupāśrayā  
evaṃ parasparāpekṣā śaktiśaktimatoḥ sthitā  na śivena vinā śaktirna śaktyā ca vinā śivaḥ  
śaktauyayā śivo nityaṃ bhaktau muktau ca dehinām  ādyā saikā parā śaktiścinmayī śivasaṃśrayā  
yāmāhurakhileśasya taistairanuguṇairguṇaiḥ  samānadharmiṇīmeva śivasya paramātmanaḥ  
saikā parā ca cidrūpā śaktiḥ prasavadharmiṇī  vibhajya bahudhā viśvaṃ vidadhāti śivecchayā  
sā mūlaprakṛtirmāyā triguṇā ca tridhā smṛtā  śivayā ca viparyastaṃ yayā tatamidaṃ jagat  
ekadhā ca dvidhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhā  śaktayaḥ khalu bhidyaṃte bahudhā vyavahārataḥ  
śivecchayā parāśaktiḥ śivatattvaikatāṃ gatā  tataḥ parisphuratyādau sarge tailaṃ tilādiva  
tataḥ kriyākhyayā śaktyā śaktau śaktimadutthayā  tasyāṃ vikṣobhyamāṇāyāmādau nādaḥ samudbabhau  
nādādviniḥsṛto biṃdurbiṃdodevassadāśivaḥ  tasmānmaheśvaro jātaḥ śuddhavidyā maheśvarāt  
sā vācāmīśvarī śaktirvāgīśākhyā hi śūlinaḥ  yā sā varṇasvarūpeṇa mātṛkepi vijṛmbhate  
athānaṃtasamāveśānmāyā kālamavāsṛjat  niyatiñca kalāṃ vidyāṃ kalātorāgapūruṣau  
māyātaḥ punarevābhūdavyaktaṃ triguṇātmakam  triguṇācca tato vyaktādvibhaktāḥ syustrayo guṇāḥ  
sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti yairvyāptamakhilaṃ jagat  guṇebhyaḥ kṣobhyamāṇebhyo guṇeśākhyāstrimūrtayaḥ  
abhavanmahadādīni tattvāni ca yathākramam  tebhyassyuraṇḍapiṇḍāni tvasaṃkhyāni śivājñayā  
adhiṣṭhitānyanantādyairvidyeśaiścakravartibhiḥ  śarīrāṃtarabhedena śakterbhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  
nānārūpāstu vijñeyāḥ sthūlasūkṣmavibhedataḥ  rudrasya raudrī sā śaktirviṣṇaurvai vaiṣṇavī matā  
brahmāṇī brahmaṇaḥ proktā cendrasyaiṃdrīti kathyate  kimatra bahunoktena yadviśvamiti kīrtitam  
śakyātmanaiva tadvyāptaṃ yathā dehe 'ṃtarātmanā  tasmācchaktimayaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṃgamam  
kalā yā paramā śaktiḥ kathitā paramātmanaḥ  evameṣā parā śaktirīśvarecchānuyāyinī  
sthiraṃ caraṃ ca yadviśvaṃ sṛjatīti viniścayaḥ  jñānakriyā cikīrṣābhistisṛbhissvātmaśaktibhiḥ  
śaktimānīśvaraḥ śaśvadviśvaṃ vyāpyādhitiṣṭhati  idamitthamidaṃ netthaṃ bhavedityevamātmikā  
icchāśaktirmaheśasya nityā kāryaniyāmikā  jñānaśaktistu tatkāryaṃ karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā  
prayojanaṃ ca tattvena buddhirūpādhyavasyati  yathepsitaṃ kriyāśaktiryathādhyavasitaṃ jagat  
kalpayatyakhilaṃ kāryaṃ kṣaṇātsaṃkalparūpiṇī  yathā śaktitrayotthānaṃ śaktiprasavadharmiṇī  
śaktyā paramayā nunnā prasūte sakalaṃ jagat  evaṃ śaktisamāyogācchaktimānucyate śivaḥ  
śaktiśaktimadutthaṃ tu śāktaṃ śaivamidaṃ jagat  yathā na jāyate putraḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ vinā  
tathā bhavaṃ bhavānīṃ ca vinā naitaccarācaram  strīpuṃsaprabhavaṃ viśvaṃ strīpuṃsātmakameva ca  
strīpuṃsayorvibhūtiśca strīpuṃsābhyāmadhiṣṭhitam  paramātmā śivaḥ proktaśśivā sā ca prakīrtitā  
śivassadāśivaḥ proktaḥ śivā sā ca manonmanī  śivo maheśvaro jñeyaḥ śivā māyeti kathyate  
puruṣaḥ parameśānaḥ prakṛtiḥ parameśvarī  rudro maheśvarassākṣādrudrāṇī rudravallabhā  
viṣṇurviśveśvaro devo lakṣmīrviśveśvarapriyā  brahmā śivo yadā sraṣṭā brahmāṇī brahmaṇaḥ priyā  
bhāskaro bhagavāñchaṃbhuḥ prabhā bhagavatī śivā  maheṃdro manmathārātiḥ śacī śailendrakanyakā  
jātavedā mahādevaḥ svāhā śarvārdhadehinī  yamastriyaṃbako devastatpriyā girikanyakā  
nirṛtirbhagavānīśo nairṛtī naganaṃdanī  varuṇo bhagavānrudro vāruṇī bhūdharātmajā  
bāleṃduśekharo vāyuḥ śivā śivamanoharā  yakṣo yajñaśirohartā ṛddhirhimagirīndrajā  
caṃdrārdhaśekharaścaṃdro rohiṇī rudravallabhā  īśānaḥ parameśānastadāryā parameśvarī  
anaṃtavalayo 'naṃto hyanaṃtānaṃtavallabhā  kālāgnirudraḥ kālāriḥ kālī kālāṃtakapriyā  
puruṣākhyo manuśśaṃbhuḥ śatarūpā śivapriyā  dakṣassākṣānmahādevaḥ prasūtiḥ parameśvarī  
rucirbhavo bhavānī ca budhairākūtirucyate  bhṛgurbhagākṣihā devaḥ khyātistrinayanapriyā  
marīcibhagavānrudraḥ saṃbhūtiśśarvavallabhā  gaṃgādharo 'ṃgirā jñeyaḥ smṛtiḥ sākṣādumā smṛtā  
pulastyaḥ śaśabhṛnmauliḥ prītiḥ kāṃtā pinākinaḥ  pulahastripuradhvaṃsī tatpriyā tu śivapriyā  
kratudhvaṃsī kratuḥ proktaḥ saṃnatirdayitā vibhoḥ  trinetro 'trirumā sākṣādanasūyā smṛtā budhaiḥ  
kaśyapaḥ kālahā devo devamātā maheśvarī  vasiṣṭho manmathārātirdevī sākṣādaruṃdhatī  
śaṃkaraḥ puruṣāssarve striyassarvā maheśvarī  sarve strīpuruṣāstasmāttayoreva vibhūtayaḥ  
viṣayī bhagavānīśo viṣayaḥ parameśvarī  śrāvyaṃ sarvamumārūpaṃ śrotā śūlavarāyudhaḥ  
praṣṭavyaṃ vastujātaṃ tu dhatte śaṃkaravallabhā  praṣṭā sa eva viśvātmā bālacandrāvataṃsakaḥ  
draṣṭavyaṃ vasturūpaṃ tu bibharti vaktavallabhā  draṣṭā viśveśvaro devaḥ śaśikhaṃḍaśikhāmaṇiḥ  
rasajātaṃ mahādevī devo rasayitā śivaḥ  preyajātaṃ ca girijā preyāṃścaiva garāśanaḥ  
maṃtavyavastutāṃ dhatte sadā devī maheśvarī  maṃtā sa eva viśvātmā mahādevo maheśvaraḥ  
boddhavyavasturūpaṃ tu bibharti bhavavallabhā  devassa eva bhagavānboddhā mugdhenduśekharaḥ  
prāṇaḥ pinākī sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ bhagavānprabhuḥ  prāṇasthitistu sarveṣāmaṃbikā cāṃburūpiṇī  
bibharti kṣetratāṃ devī tripurāṃtakavallabhā  kṣetrajñatvaṃ tadā dhatte bhagavānaṃtakāṃtakaḥ  
ahaḥ śūlāyudho devaḥ śūlapāṇipriyā niśā  ākāśaḥ śaṃkaro devaḥ pṛthivī śaṃkarapriyā  
samudro bhagavānīśo velā śailendrakanyakā  vṛkṣo vṛṣadhvajo devo latā viśveśvarapriyā  
puṃlliṃgamakhilaṃ dhatte bhagavānpuraśāsanaḥ  striliṃgaṃ cākhilaṃ dhatte devī devamanoramā  
śabdajālamaśeṣaṃ tu dhatte sarvasya vallabhā  arthasvarūpamakhilaṃ dhatte mugdhenduśekharaḥ  
yasya yasya padārthasya yā yā śaktirudāhṛtā  sā sā viśveśvarī devī sa sa sarvo maheśvaraḥ  
yatparaṃ yatpavitraṃ ca yatpuṇyaṃ yacca maṃgalam  tattadāha mahābhāgāstayostejovijṛṃbhitam  
yathā dīpasya dīptasya śikhā dīpayate gṛham  tathā tejastayoretadvyāpya dīpayate jagat  
tṛṇādiśivamūrtyaṃtaṃ viśvakhyātiśayakramaḥ  sannikarṣakramavaśāttayoriti parā śrutiḥ  
sarvākārātmakāvetau sarvaśreyovidhāyinau  pūjanīyau namaskāryau ciṃtanīyau ca sarvadā  
yathāprajñamidaṃ kṛṣṇa yāthātmyaṃ parameśayoḥ  kathitaṃ hi mayā te 'dya na tu tāvadiyattayā  
tatkathaṃ śakyate vaktuṃ yāthātmyaṃ parameśayoḥ  mahatāmapi sarveṣāṃ manaso 'pi bahirgatam  
aṃtargatamananyānāmīśvarārpitacetasām  anyeṣāṃ buddhyanārūḍhamārūḍhaṃ ca yathaiva tat  
yeyamuktā vibhūtirvai prākṛtī sā parā matā  aprākṛtāṃ parāmanyāṃ guhyāṃ guhyavido viduḥ  
yato vāco nivartaṃte manasā cendriyaissaha  aprākṛtī parā caiṣā vibhūtiḥ pārameśvarī  
saiveha paramaṃ dhāma saiveha paramā gatiḥ  saiveha paramā kāṣṭhā vibhūtiḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  
tāṃ prāptuṃ prayataṃte 'tra jitaśvāsā jiteṃdriyāḥ  garbhakārā gṛhadvāraṃ niśchidraṃ ghaṭituṃ yathā  
saṃsārāśīviṣālīḍhamṛtasaṃjīvanauṣadham  vibhūtiṃ śivayorvidvānna bibheti kutaścana  
yaḥ parāmaparāṃ caiva vibhūtiṃ vetti tattvataḥ  so 'paro bhūtimullaṃghya parāṃ bhūtiṃ samaśnute  
etatte kathitaṃ kṛṣṇa yāthātmyaṃ paramātmanoḥ  rahasyamapi yogyo 'si bhargabhakto bhavāniti  
nāśiṣyebhyo 'pyaśaivebhyo nābhaktebhyaḥ kadācana  vyāharedīśayorbhūtimiti vedānuśāsanam  
tasmāttvamatikalyāṇaparebhyaḥ kathayenna hi  tvādṛśebhyo 'nurūpebhyaḥ kathayaitanna cānyathā  
vibhūtimetāṃ śivayoryogyebhyo yaḥ pradāpayet  saṃsārasāgarānmuktaḥ śivasāyujyamāpnuyāt  
kīrtanādasya naśyaṃti mahāntyaḥ pāpakoṭayaḥ  triścaturdhāsamabhyastairvinaśyaṃti tato 'dhikāḥ  
naśyaṃtyaniṣṭaripavo vardhante suhṛdastathā  vidyā ca vardhate śaivī matissatye pravartate  
bhaktiḥ parāḥ śive sāmbe sānuge saparicchide  yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ cānyattattadāpnotyasaṃśayam  
antaḥśuciḥ śive bhakto visrabdhaḥ kīrtayedyadi  prabalaiḥ karmabhiḥ pūrvaiḥ phalaṃ cetpratibadhyate  
punaḥ punaḥ samabhyasyettasya nāstīha durllabham  
upamanyuruvāca  vigrahaṃ devadevasya viśvametaccarācaram  tadevaṃ na vijānaṃti paśavaḥ pāśagauravāt  
tamekameva bahudhā vadaṃti yadunaṃdana  ajānantaḥ paraṃ bhāvamavikalpaṃ maharṣayaḥ  
aparaṃ brahmarūpaṃ ca paraṃ brahmātmakaṃ tathā  kecidāhurmahādevamanādinidhanaṃ param  
bhūteṃdriyāṃtaḥkaraṇapradhānaviṣayātmakam  aparaṃ brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ paraṃ brahma cidātmakam  
bṛhattvādbṛhaṇatvādvā brahma cetyabhidhīyate  ubhe te brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇo 'dhipateḥ prabhoḥ  
vidyā 'vidyāsvarūpīti kaiścidīśo nigadyate  vidyāṃ tu cetanāṃ prāhustathāvidyāmacetanām  
vidyā 'vidyātmakaṃ caiva viśvaṃ viśvagurorvibhoḥ  rūpameva na saṃdeho viśvaṃ tasya vaśe yataḥ  
bhrāṃtirvidyā parā ceti śārvaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ viduḥ  ayathābuddhirartheṣu bahudhā bhrāṃtirucyate  
yathārthākārasaṃvittirvidyeti parikīrtyate  vikalparahitaṃ tattvaṃ paramityabhidhīyate  
vaiparītyādasacchabdaḥ kathyate vedavādibhiḥ  tayoḥ patitvāttu śivaḥ sadasatpatirucyate  
kṣarākṣarātmakaṃ prāhuḥ kṣarākṣaraparaṃ pare  kṣarassarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate  
ubhe te parameśasya rūpe tasya vaśe yataḥ  tayoḥ paraḥ śivaḥ śāṃtaḥ kṣarākṣarāparassmṛtaḥ  
samaṣṭivyaṣṭhirūpaṃ ca samaṣṭivyaṣṭikāraṇam  vadaṃti munayaḥ kecicchivaṃ paramakāraṇam  
samaṣṭimāhuravyaktaṃ vyaṣṭiṃ vyaktaṃ tathaiva ca  te rūpe parameśasya tadicchāyāḥ pravartanāt  
tayoḥ kāraṇabhāvena śivaṃ paramakāraṇam  kāraṇārthavidaḥ prāhuḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭikāraṇam  
jātivyaktisvarūpīti kathyate kaiścidīśvaraḥ  yā piṃḍepyanuvarteta sā jātiriti kathyate  
vyaktirvyāvṛttirūpaṃ taṃ piṇḍajāteḥ samāśrayam  jātayo vyaktayaścaiva tadājñāparipālitāḥ  
yatastato mahādevo jātivyaktivapuḥ smṛtaḥ  pradhānapuruṣavyaktakālātmā kathyate śivaḥ  
pradhānaṃ prakṛtiṃ prāhuḥkṣetrajñaṃ puruṣaṃ tathā  trayoviṃśatitattvāni vyaktamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ  
kālaḥ kāryaprapañcasya pariṇāmaikakāraṇam  eṣāmīśo 'dhipo dhātā pravartakanivartakaḥ  
āvirbhāvatirobhāvaheturekaḥ svarāḍajaḥ  tasmātpradhānapuruṣavyaktakālasvarūpavān  
heturnetādhipasteṣāṃ dhātā coktā maheśvaraḥ  virāḍḍhiraṇyagarbhātmā kaiścidīśo nigadyate  
hiraṇyagarbho lokānāṃ heturviśvātmako virāṭ  aṃtaryāmī paraśceti kathyate kavibhiśśivaḥ  
prājñastaijasaviśvātmetyapare saṃpracakṣate  turīyamapare prāhuḥ saumyameva pare viduḥ  
mātā mānaṃ ca meyaṃ ca matiṃ cāhurathāpare  kartā kriyā ca kāryaṃ ca karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ pare  
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptyātmetyapare saṃpracakṣate  turīyamapare prāhusturyātītamitītare  
tamāhurviguṇaṃ kecidguṇavantaṃ pare viduḥ  kecitsaṃsāriṇaṃ prāhustamasaṃsāriṇaṃ pare  
svataṃtramapare prāhurasvataṃtraṃ pare viduḥ  ghoramityapare prāhuḥ saumyameva pare viduḥ  
rāgavaṃtaṃ pare prāhurvītarāgaṃ tathā pare  niṣkriyaṃ ca pare prāhuḥ sakriyaṃ cetare janāḥ  
niriṃdriyaṃ pare prāhuḥ seṃdriyaṃ ca tathāpare  dhruvamityapare prāhustamadhruvāmitīrate  
arūpaṃ kecidāhurvai rūpavaṃtaṃ pare viduḥ  adṛśyamapare prāhurdṛśyamityapare viduḥ  
vācyamityapare prāhuravācyamiti cāpare  śabdātmakaṃ pare prāhuśśabdātītamathāpare  
keciccintāmayaṃ prāhuścintayā rahitaṃ pare  jñānātmakaṃ pare prāhurvijñānamiti cāpare  
kecicjñeyamiti prāhurajñeyamiti kecana  parameke tamevāhuraparaṃ ca tathā pare  
evaṃ vikalpyamānaṃ tu yāthātmyaṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ  nādhyavasyaṃti munayo nānāpratyayakāraṇāt  
ye punassarvabhāvena prapannāḥ parameśvaram  te hi jānaṃtyayatnena śivaṃ paramakāraṇam  
yāvatpaśurnaiva paśyatyanīśaṃ  purāṇaṃ bhuvanasyeśitāram  tāvadduḥkhe vartate baddhapāśaḥ saṃsāre 'smiñcakranemikrameṇa  
yadā  paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim  tadāvidvānpuṇyapāpe vidhūya niraṃjanaḥ paramamupaiti sāmyam  
upamanyuruvāca  naśivasyāṇavo baṃdhaḥ kāryo māyeya eva vā  prākṛto vātha boddhā vā hyahaṃkārātmakastathā  
naivāsya mānaso baṃdho na caitto neṃdriyātmakaḥ  na ca tanmātrabaṃdho 'pi bhūtabaṃdho na kaścana  
na ca kālaḥ kalā caiva na vidyā niyatistathā  na rāgo na ca vidveṣaḥ śaṃbhoramitatejasaḥ  
na cāstyabhiniveśo 'sya kuśalā 'kuśalānyapi  karmāṇi tadvipākaśca sukhaduḥkhe ca tatphale  
āśayairnāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃskāraiḥ karmaṇāmapi  bhogaiśca bhogasaṃskāraiḥ kālatritayagocaraiḥ  
na tasya kāraṇaṃ kartā nādiraṃtastathāṃtaram  na karma karaṇaṃ vāpi nākāryaṃ kāryameva ca  
nāsya baṃdhurabaṃdhurvā niyaṃtā prerako 'pi vā  na patirna gurustrātā nādhiko na samastathā  
na janmamaraṇe tasya na kāṃkṣitamakāṃkṣitam  na vidhirna niṣedhaśca na muktirna ca bandhanam  
nāsti yadyadakalyāṇaṃ tattadasya kadācana  kalyāṇaṃ sakalaṃ cāsti paramātmā śivo yataḥ  
sa śivassarvamevedamadhiṣṭhāya svaśaktibhiḥ  apracyutassvato bhāvaḥ sthitaḥ sthāṇurataḥ smṛtaḥ  
śivenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yasmājjagatsthāvarajaṃgamam  sarvarūpaḥ smṛtaśśarvastathā jñātvā na muhyati  
śarvo rudro namastasmai puruṣaḥ satparo mahān  hiraṇyabāhurbhagavānhiraṇyapatirīśvaraḥ  
aṃbikāpatirīśānaḥ pinākī vṛṣavāhanaḥ  eko rudraḥ paraṃ brahma puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇapiṃgalaḥ  
bālāgramātro hṛnmadhye viciṃtyo daharāṃtare  hiraṇyakeśaḥ padmākṣo hyaruṇastāmra eva ca  
yo 'vasarpatya sau devo nīlagrīvo hiraṇmayaḥ  saumyo ghorastathā miśraścākṣāraścāmṛto 'vyayaḥ  
sa puṃviśeṣaḥ paramo bhagavānantakāṃtakaḥ  cetanacetanonmuktaḥ prapañcācca parātparaḥ  
śivenātiśayatvena jñānaiśvarye vilokite  lokeśātiśayatvena sthitaṃ prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ  
pratisargaprasūtānāṃ brahmaṇāṃ śāstravistaram  upadeṣṭā sa evādau kālāvacchedavartinām  
kālāvacchedayuktānāṃ gurūṇāmapyasau guruḥ  sarveṣāmeva sarveśaḥ kālāvacchedavarjitaḥ  
śuddhā svābhāvikī tasya śaktissarvātiśāyinī  jñānamapratimaṃ nityaṃ vapuratyantanirmitam  
aiśvaryamapratidvaṃdvaṃ sukhamātyantikaṃ balam  tejaḥprabhāvo vīryaṃ ca kṣamā kāruṇyameva ca  
paripūrṇasya sargādyairnātmano 'sti prayojanam  parānugraha evāsya phalaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ  
praṇavo vācakastasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ  śivarudrādiśabdānāṃ praṇavo hi parassmṛtaḥ  
śaṃbho praṇavavācyasya bhavanāttajjapādapi  yā siddhissā parā prāpyā bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ  
tasmādekākṣaraṃ devamāhurāgamapāragāḥ  vācyavācakayoraikyaṃ manyamānā manasvinaḥ  
asya mātrāḥ samākhyātāścatasro vedamūrdhani  akāraścāpyukāraśca makāro nāda ityapi  
akāraṃ bahvṛcaṃ prāhurukāro yajurucyate  makāraḥ sāmanādosya śrutirātharvaṇī smṛtāḥ  
akāraśca mahābījaṃ rajaḥ sraṣṭā caturmukhaḥ  ukāraḥ prakṛtiryoniḥ sattvaṃ pālayitā hariḥ  
makāraḥ puruṣo bījaṃ tamaḥ saṃhārako haraḥ  nādaḥ paraḥ pumānīśo nirguṇo niṣkriyaḥ śivaḥ  
sarvaṃ tisṛbhirevedaṃ mātrābhirnikhilaṃ tridhā  abhidhāya śivātmānaṃ bodhayatyardhamātrayā  
yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiṃcidyasmānnāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kiṃcit  vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhatyekastenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam  
upamanyuruvāca  śaktissvābhavikī tasya vidyā viśvavilakṣaṇā  ekānekasya rūpeṇa bhāti bhānoriva prabhā  
anaṃtāḥ śaktayo yasyā icchājñānakriyādayaḥ  māyādyāścābhavanvahnorvisphuliṃgā yathā tathā  
sadāśiveśvarādyā hi vidyā 'vidyeśvarādayaḥ  abhavanpuruṣāścāsyāḥ prakṛtiśca parātparā  
mahadādiviśeṣāṃtāstvajādyāścāpi mūrtayaḥ  yaccānyadasti tatsarvaṃ tasyāḥ kāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
sā śaktissarvagā sūkṣmā prabodhānaṃdarūpiṇī  śaktimānucyate devaśśivaśśītāṃśubhūṣaṇaḥ  
vedyaśśivaśśivā vidyā prajñā caiva śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ  dhṛtireṣā sthitirniṣṭhā jñānecchākarmaśaktayaḥ  
ājñā caiva paraṃ brahma dve vidye ca parāpare  śuddhavidyā śuddhakalā sarvaṃ śaktikṛtaṃ yataḥ  
māyā ca prakṛtirjīvo vikāro vikṛtistathā  asacca sacca yatkiṃcittayā sarvamidaṃ tatam  
sā devī māyayā sarvaṃ brahmāṃḍaṃ sacarācaram  mohayatyaprayatnena mocayatyapi līlayā  
anayā saha sarveśaḥ saptaviṃśaprakārayā  viśvaṃ vyāpya sthitastasmānmuktiratra pravartate  
mumukṣavaḥ purā kecinmunayo brahmavādinaḥ  saṃśayāviṣṭamanaso vismṛśaṃti yathātatham  
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kuto jātā jīvāmaḥ kena vā vayam  kutrāsmākaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhā kena vādhiṣṭhitā vayam  
kena vartāmahe śaśvatsukheṣvanyeṣu cāniśam  avilaṃghyā ca viśvasya vyavasthā kena vā kṛtā  
kālasya bhāvo niyatiryadṛcchā nātra yujyate  bhūtāni yoniḥ puruṣo yogī caiṣāṃ paro 'tha vā  
acetanatvātkālādeścetanatvepi cātmanaḥ  sukhaduḥkhāni bhūtatvādanīśatvādvicāryate  
taddhyānayogānugatāṃ prapaśyañchaktimaiśvarīm  pāśavicchedikāṃ sākṣānnigūḍhāṃ svaguṇairbhṛśam  
tayā vicchinnapāśāste sarvakāraṇakāraṇam  śaktimaṃtaṃ mahādevamapaśyandivyacakṣuṣā  
yaḥ kāraṇānyaśeṣāṇi kālātmasahitāni ca  aprameyo 'nayā śaktyā sakalaṃ yo 'dhitiṣṭhati  
tataḥ prasādayogena yogena parameṇa ca  dṛṣṭena bhaktiyogena divyaḥ gatimavāpnuyuḥ  
tasmātsaha tathā śaktyā hṛdi paśyaṃti ye śivam  teṣāṃ śāśvatikī śāṃtirnaitareṣāmiti śrutiḥ  
na hi śaktimataśśaktyā viprayogo 'sti jātucit  tasmācchakteḥ śaktimatastādātmyānnirvṛtirdvayoḥ  
kramo vivakṣito nūnaṃ vimuktau jñānakarmaṇoḥ  prasāde sati sā mūrtiryasmātkaratale sthitā  
devo vā dānavo vāpi paśurvā vihago 'pi vā  kīro vātha kṛmirvāpi mucyate tatprasādataḥ  
garbhastho jāyamāno vā bālo vā taruṇopi vā  vṛddho vā mriyamāṇo vā svargastho vātha nārakī  
patito vāpi dharmātmā paṃḍito mūḍha eva vā  prasāde tatkṣaṇādeva mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
ayogyānāṃ ca kāruṇyādbhaktānāṃ parameśvaraḥ  prasīdati na saṃdeho vigṛhya vividhānmalān  
prasadādeva sā bhaktiḥ prasādo bhaktisaṃbhavaḥ  avasthābhedamutprekṣya vidvāṃstatra na muhyati
