prasādapūrvikā yeyaṃ bhuktimuktividhāyinī  naiva sā śakyate prāptuṃ narairekena janmanā  
anekajanmasiddhānāṃ śrautasmārtānuvartinām  viraktānāṃ prabuddhānāṃ prasīdati maheśvaraḥ  
prasanne sati deveśa paśau tasminpravartate  asti nātho mametyalpā bhaktirbuddhipurassarā  
tapasā vividhaiśśaivairdharmaissaṃyujyate naraḥ  tatra yoge tadabhyāsastato bhaktiḥ parā bhavet  
parayā ca tayā bhaktyā prasādo labhyate paraḥ  prasādātsarvapāśebhyo muktirmuktasya nirvṛtiḥ  
alpabhāvo 'pi yo martyasso 'pi janmatrayātparam  nayoniyaṃtrapīḍāyai bhavennaivātra saṃśayaḥ  
sāṃgā 'naṃgā ca yā sevā sā bhaktiriti kathyate  sā punarbhidyate tredhā manovākkāyasādhanaiḥ  
śivarūpādiciṃtā yā sā sevā mānasī smṛtā  japādirvācikī sevā karmapūjādi kāyikī  
seyaṃ trisādhanā sevā śivadharmaśca kathyate  sa tu pañcavidhaḥ proktaḥ śivena paramātmanā  
tapaḥ karma japo dhyānaṃ jñānaṃ ceti samāsataḥ  karmaliṅgārcanādyaṃ ca tapaścāndrāyaṇādikam  
japastridhā śivābhyāsaścintā dhyānaṃ śivasya tu  śivāgamoktaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatra jñānamucyate  
śrīkaṃṭhena śivenoktaṃ śivāyai ca śivāgamaḥ  śivāśritānāṃ kāruṇyācchreyasāmekasādhanam  
tasmādvivardhayedbhaktiṃ śive paramakāraṇe  tyajecca viṣayāsaṃgaṃ śreyo 'rthī matimānnaraḥ  
kṛṣṇa uvāca  bhagavañchrotumicchāmi śivena paribhāṣitam  vedasāre śivajñānaṃ svāśritānāṃ vimuktaye  
abhaktānāmabuddhīnāmayuktānāmagocaram  arthairdaśardhaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ gūḍhamaprājñaniṃditam  
varṇāśramakṛtairdharmairviparītaṃ kvacitsamam  vedātṣaḍaṃgāduddhṛtya sāṃkhyādyogācca kṛtsnaśaḥ  
śatakoṭipramāṇena vistīrṇaṃ graṃthasaṃkhyayā  kathitaṃ parameśena tatra pūjā kathaṃ prabhoḥ  
kasyādhikāraḥ pūjādau jñānayogādayaḥ katham  tatsarvaṃ vistarādeva vaktumarhasi suvrata  
upamanyuruvāca  śaivaṃ saṃkṣipya vedoktaṃ śivena paribhāṣitam  stutiniṃdādirahitaṃ sadyaḥ pratyayakāraṇam  
guruprasādajaṃ divyamanāyāsena muktidam  kathayiṣye samāsena tasya śakyo na vistaraḥ  
sisṛkṣayā purāvyaktācchivaḥ sthāṇurmaheśvaraḥ  satkāryakāraṇopetassvayamāvirabhūtprabhuḥ  
janayāmāsa ca tadā ṛṣirviśvādhikaḥ prabhuḥ  devānāṃ prathamaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ brahmaṇaspatim  
brahmāpi pitaraṃ devaṃ jāyamānaṃ nyavaikṣata  taṃ jāyamānaṃ janako devaḥ prāpaśyadājñayā  
dṛṣṭo rudreṇa devo 'sāvasṛjadviśvamīśvaraḥ  varṇāśramavyavasthāṃ ca cakāra sa pṛthakpṛthak  
somaṃ sasarja yajñārthe somāddyaussamajāyata  dharā ca vahniḥ sūryaśca yajño viṣṇuśśacīpatiḥ  
te cānye ca surā rudraṃ rudrādhyāyena tuṣṭuvuḥ  prasannavadanastasthau devānāmagrataḥ prabhuḥ  
apahṛtya svalīlārthaṃ teṣāṃ jñānaṃ maheśvaraḥ  tamapṛcchaṃstato devāḥ ko bhavāniti mohitāḥ  
so 'bravīdbhagavānrudro hyahamekaḥ purātanaḥ  āsaṃ prathamamevāhaṃ vartāmi  ca surottamāḥ  
bhaviṣyāmi ca mattonyo vyatirikto na kaścana  ahameva jagatsarvaṃ tarpayāmi svatejasā  
matto 'dhikaḥ samo nāsti māṃ yo veda sa mucyate  ityuktvā bhagavānrudrastatraivāṃtaradhatta sa  
apaśyaṃtastamīśānaṃ stuvaṃtaścaiva sāmabhiḥ  vrataṃ pāśupataṃ kṛtvā tvatharvaśirasi sthitam  
bhasmasaṃchannasarvāṃgā babhūvuramarāstadā  atha teṣāṃ prasādārthaṃ paśūnāṃ patirīśvaraḥ  
sagaṇaścomayā sārdhaṃ sānnidhyamakarotprabhuḥ  yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsā yogino dagdhakilbiṣāḥ  
hṛdi paśyaṃti taṃ devaṃ dadṛśurdevapuṃgavāḥ  yāmāhuḥ paramāṃ śaktimīśvarecchānuvartinīm  
tāmapaśyanmaheśasya vāmato vāmalocanām  ye vinirdhūtasaṃsārāḥ prāptāḥ śaivaṃ paraṃ padam  
nityasiddhāśca ye vānyaṃ te ca dṛṣṭā gaṇeśvarāḥ  atha taṃ tuṣṭuvurdevā devyā saha maheśvaram  
stotrairmāheśvarairdivyaiḥ śrotaiḥ paurāṇikairapi  devo 'pi devānālokya ghṛṇayā vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ  
tuṣṭo 'smītyāha suprītassvabhāvamadhurāṃ giram  atha suprītamanasaṃ praṇipatya vṛṣadhvajam  
arthamahattamaṃ devāḥ papracchurimamādarāt  devā ūcuḥ  bhagavankena mārgeṇa pūjanīyo 'si bhūtale  
kasyādhikāraḥ pūjāyāṃ vaktumarhasi tattvataḥ  tataḥ sasmitamālokya devīṃ devavaroharaḥ  
svarūpaṃ darśayāmāsa ghoraṃ sūryātmakaṃ param  sarvaiśvaryaguṇopetaṃ sarvatejomayaṃ param  
śaktibhirmūrtibhiścāṃgairgrahairdevaiśca saṃvṛtam  aṣṭabāhuṃ caturvaktramardhanārīkamadbhutam  
dṛṣṭvaivamadbhutākāraṃ devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ  buddhvā divākaraṃ devaṃ devīṃ caiva niśākaram  
pañcabhūtāni śeṣāṇi tanmayaṃ ca carācaram  evamuktvā namaścakrustasmai cārghyaṃ pradāya vai  
siṃdūravarṇāya sumaṇḍalāya suvarṇavarṇābharaṇāya tubhyam  padmābhanetrāya sapaṃkajāya brahmendranārāyaṇakāraṇāya  
suratnapūrṇaṃ sasuvarṇatoyaṃ sukuṃkumādyaṃ sakuśaṃ sapuṣpam  pradattamādāya sahemapātraṃ praśastamarghyaṃ bhagavanprasīda  
namaśśivāya śāṃtāya sagaṇāyādihetave  rudrāya viṣṇave tubhyaṃ brahmaṇe sūryamūrtaye  
yaśśivaṃ maṇḍale saure saṃpūjyaiva samāhitaḥ  prātarmadhyāhnasāyāhne pradadyādarghyamuttamam  
praṇamedvā paṭhedetāñchlokāñchrutimukhānimān  na tasya durllabhaṃ kiṃcidbhaktaścenmucyate dṛḍham  
tasmādabhyarcayenityaṃ śivamādityarūpiṇam  dharmakāmārthamuktyarthaṃ manasā karmaṇā girā  
atha devānsamālokya maṇḍalastho maheśvaraḥ  sarvāgamottaraṃ dattvā śāstramaṃtaradhāddharaḥ  
tatra pūjādhikāro 'yaṃ brahmakṣatraviśāmiti  jñātvā praṇamya deveśaṃ devā jagmuryathāgatam  
atha kālena mahatā tasmiñchāstre tirohite  bhartāraṃ paripapraccha tadaṃkasthā maheśvarī  
tayā sa codito devo devyā candravibhūṣaṇaḥ  avadatkaramuddhṛtya śāstraṃ sarvāgamottaram  
pravartitaṃ ca talloke niyogātparameṣṭhinaḥ  mayāgastyena guruṇā dadhīcena maharṣiṇā  
svayamapyavatīryorvyāṃ yugāvarteṣu śūladhṛk  svāśritānāṃ vimuktyarthaṃ kurute jñānasaṃtatim  
ṛbhussatyo bhārgavaśca hyaṃgirāḥ savitā dvijāḥ  mṛtyuḥ śatakraturdhīmānvasiṣṭho munipuṃgavaḥ  
sārasvatastridhāmā ca trivṛto munipuṃgavaḥ  śatatejāssvayaṃ dharmo nārāyaṇa iti śrutaḥ  
svarakṣaścāruṇirdhīmāṃstathā caiva kṛtaṃjayaḥ  kṛtaṃjayo bharadvājo gautamaḥ kaviruttamaḥ  
vācaḥsravā munissākṣāttathā sūkṣmāyaṇiḥ śuciḥ  tṛṇabiṃdurmuniḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śaktiḥ śākteya uttaraḥ  
jātūkarṇyo harissākṣātkṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥ  vyāsāvatārāñchṛṇvaṃtu kalpayogeśvarānkramāt  
laiṃge vyāsāvatārā hi dvāparāṃ teṣu suvratāḥ  yogācāryāvatārāśca tathā śiṣyeṣu śūlinaḥ  
tatra tatra vibhoḥ śiṣyāścatvāraḥ syurmahaujasaḥ  śiṣyāsteṣāṃ praśiṣyāśca śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  
teṣāṃ saṃbhāvanālloke śaivājñākaraṇādibhiḥ  bhāgyavaṃto vimucyaṃte bhaktyā cātyaṃtabhāvitāḥ  
kṛṣṇa uvāca  yugāvarteṣu sarveṣu yogācāryacchalena tu  avatārānhi śarvasya śiṣyāṃśca bhagavanvada  
upamanyuruvāca  śvetaḥ sutāro madanaḥ suhotraḥ kaṅka eva ca  laugākṣiśca mahāmāyo jaigīṣavyastathaiva ca  
dadhivāhaśca ṛṣabho munirugro 'trireva ca  supālako gautamaśca tathā vedaśirā muniḥ  
gokarṇaśca guhāvāsī śikhaṇḍī cāparaḥ smṛtaḥ  jaṭāmālī cāṭṭahāso dāruko lāṃgulī tathā  
mahākālaśca śūlī ca ḍaṃḍī muṇḍīśa eva ca  saviṣṇussomaśarmā ca lakulīśvara eva ca  
ete vārāha kalpe 'sminsaptamasyāṃtaro manoḥ  aṣṭāviṃśatisaṃkhyātā yogācāryā yugakramāt  
śiṣyāḥ pratyekameteṣāṃ catvāraśśāṃtacetasaḥ  śvetādayaśca ruṣyāṃtāṃstānbravīmi yathākramam  
śvetaśśvetaśikhaścaiva śvetāśvaḥ śvetalohitaḥ  dundubhiśśatarūpaśca ṛcīkaḥ ketumāṃstathā  
vikośaśca vikeśaśca vipāśaḥ pāśanāśanaḥ  sumukho durmukhaścaiva durgamo duratikramaḥ  
sanatkumārassanakaḥ sanaṃdaśca sanātanaḥ  sudhāmā virajāścaiva śaṃkhaścāṃḍaja eva ca  
sārasvataśca meghaśca meghavāhassuvāhakaḥ  kapilaścāsuriḥ pañcaśikho bāṣkala eva ca  
parāśarāśca gargaśca bhārgavaścāṃgirāstathā  balabandhurnirāmitrāḥ ketuśṛṃgastapodhanaḥ  
laṃbodaraśca laṃbaśca lambātmā laṃbakeśakaḥ  sarvajñassamabuddhiśca sādhyasiddhistathaiva ca  
sudhāmā kaśyapaścaiva vasiṣṭho virajāstathā  atrirugro guruśreṣṭhaḥ śravanotha śraviṣṭakaḥ  
kuṇiśca kuṇibāhuśca kuśarīraḥ kunetrakaḥ  kāśyapo hyuśanāścaiva cyavanaśca bṛhaspatiḥ  
utathyo vāmadevaśca mahākālo mahā 'nilaḥ  vācaḥśravāḥ suvīraśca śyāvakaśca yatīśvaraḥ  
hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyo lokākṣiḥ kuthumistathā  sumanturjaiminiścaiva kubandhaḥ kuśakandharaḥ  
plakṣo dārbhāyaṇiścaiva ketumāngautamastathā  bhallavī madhupiṃgaśca śvetaketustathaiva ca  
uśijo bṛhadaśvaśca devalaḥ kavireva ca  śālihotraḥ suveṣaśca yuvanāśvaḥ śaradvasuḥ  
akṣapādaḥ kaṇādaśca ulūko vatsa eva ca  kulikaścaiva gargaśca mitrako ruṣya eva ca  
ete śiṣyā maheśasya yogācāryasvarūpiṇaḥ  saṃkhyā ca śatameteṣāṃ saha dvādaśasaṃkhyayā  
sarve pāśupatāḥ siddhā bhasmoddhūlitavigrahāḥ  sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñā vedavedāṃgapāragāḥ  
śivāśramaratāssarve śivajñānaparāyaṇāḥ  sarve saṃgavinirmuktāḥ śivaikāsaktacetasaḥ  
sarvadvaṃdvasahā dhīrāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ  ṛjavo mṛdavaḥ svasthā jitakrodhā jiteṃdriyāḥ  
rudrākṣamālābharaṇāstripuṃḍrāṃkitamastakāḥ  śikhājaṭāssarvajaṭā ajaṭā muṃḍaśīrṣakāḥ  
phalamūlāśanaprāyāḥ prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇāḥ  śivābhimānasaṃpannāḥ śivadhyānaikatatparāḥ  
samunmathitasaṃsāraviṣavṛkṣāṃkurodgamāḥ  prayātumeva sannaddhāḥ paraṃ śivapuraṃ prati  
sadeśikānimānmatvā nityaṃ yaśśivamarcayet  sa yāti śivasāyujyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  
kṛṣṇa uvāca  bhagavansarvayogīṃdra gaṇeśvara munīśvara  ṣaḍānanasamaprakhya sarvajñānanidhe guro  prāyastvamavatīryorvyāṃ pāśavicchittaye nṛṇām  maharṣivapurāsthāya sthito 'si parameśvara  
anyathā hi jagatyasmin devo vā dānavo 'pi vā  tvattonyaḥ paramaṃ bhāvaṃ ko jānīyācchivātmakam  tasmāttava mukhodgīrṇaṃ sākṣādiva pinākinaḥ  śivajñānāmṛtaṃ pītvā na me tṛptamabhūnmanaḥ  
sākṣātsarvajagatkarturbharturaṃkaṃ samāśritā  bhagavankinnu papraccha bhartāraṃ parameśvarī  upamanyuruvāca  sthāne pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa tadvakṣyāmi yathātatham  bhavabhaktasya yuktasya tava kalyāṇacetasaḥ  
mahīdharavare divye maṃdare cārukaṃdare  devyā saha mahādevo divyo dhyānagato 'bhavat  tadā devyāḥ priyasakhī susmitāsyā śubhāvatī  phullānyatimanojñāni puṣpāṇi samudāharat  
tataḥ svamaṃkamāropya devīṃ devavarorahaḥ  alaṃkṛtya ca taiḥ puṣpairāste hṛṣṭataraḥ svayam  athāṃtaḥpuracāriṇyo devyo divyavibhūṣaṇāḥ  aṃtaraṃgā gaṇendrāśca sarvalokamaheśvarīm  
bhartāraṃ paripūrṇaṃ ca sarvalokamaheśvaram  cāmarāsaktahastāśca devīṃ devaṃ siṣevire  tataḥ priyāḥ kathā vṛttā vinodāya maheśayoḥ  trāṇāya ca nṛṇāṃ loke ye śivaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ  
tadāvasaramālokya sarvalokamaheśvarī  bhartāraṃ paripapraccha sarvalokamaheśvaram  devyuvāca  kena vaśyo mahādevo martyānāṃ maṃdacetasām  ātmatattvādyaśaktānāmātmanāmakṛtātmanām  
īśvara uvāca  na karmaṇā na tapasā na japairnāsanādibhiḥ  na jñānena na cānyena vaśyo 'haṃ śraddhayā vinā  śraddhā mayyasti cetpuṃsāṃ yena kenāpi hetunā  vaśyaḥ spṛśyaśca dṛśyaśca pūjyassaṃbhāṣya eva ca  
sādhyā tasmānmayi śaddhā māṃ vaśīkartumicchatā  śraddhā hetussvadharmasya rakṣaṇaṃ varṇināmiha  svavarṇāśramadharmeṇa vartate yastu mānavaḥ  tasyaiva bhavati śraddhā mayi nānyasya kasyacit  
āmnāyasiddhamakhilaṃ dharmamāśramiṇāmiha  brahmaṇā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ mamaivājñāpurassaram  sa tu paitāmaho dharmo bahuvittakriyānvitaḥ  nātyanta phalabhūyiṣṭhaḥ kleśāyā sasamanvitaḥ  
tena dharmeṇa mahatāṃ śraddhāṃ prāpya sudurllabhām  varṇino ye prapadyaṃte māmananyasamāśrayāḥ  teṣāṃ sukhena mārgeṇa dharmakāmārthamuktayaḥ  
varṇāśramasamācāro mayā bhūyaḥ prakalpitaḥ  tasminbhaktimatāmeva madīyānāṃ tu varṇinām  adhikāro na cānyeṣāmityājñā naiṣṭhikī mama  
tadājñaptena mārgeṇa varṇino madupāśrayāḥ  malamāyādipāśebhyo vimuktā matprasādataḥ  paraṃ madīyamāsādya punarāvṛttidurlabham  paramaṃ mama sādharmyaṃ prāpya nirvṛtimāyayuḥ  
tasmāllabdhvāpyalabdhvā vā varṇadharmaṃ mayeritam  āśritya mama bhaktaścetsvātmanātmānamuddharet  alabdhalābha evaiṣa koṭikoṭiguṇādhikaḥ  tasmānme mukhato labdhaṃ varṇadharmaṃ samācaret  
mamāvatārā hi śubhe yogācāryacchalena tu  sarvāṃtareṣu santyārye saṃtatiśca sahasraśaḥ  ayuktānāmabuddhīnāmabhaktānāṃ sureśvari  durlabhaṃ saṃtatijñānaṃ tato yatnātsamāśrayet  
sā hānistanmahacchidraṃ sa mohassāṃdhamūkatā  yadanyatra śramaṃ kuryānmokṣamārgabahiṣkṛtaḥ  jñānaṃ kriyā ca caryā ca yogaśceti sureśvari  catuṣpādaḥ samākhyāto mama dharmassanātanaḥ  
paśupāśapatijñānaṃ jñānamityabhidhīyate  ṣaḍadhvaśuddhirvidhinā gurvadhīnā kriyocyate  varṇāśramaprayuktasya mayaiva vihitasya ca  mamārcanādidharmasya caryā caryeti kathyate  
maduktenaiva mārgeṇa mayyavasthitacetasaḥ  vṛttyaṃtaranirodho yo yoga ityabhidhīyate  aśvamedhagaṇācchreṣṭhaṃ devi cittaprasādhanam  muktidaṃ ca tathā hyetadduṣprāpyaṃ viṣayaiṣiṇām  
vijiteṃdriyavargasya yamena niyamena ca  pūrvapāpaharo yogo viraktasyaiva kathyate  vairāgyājjāyate jñānaṃ jñānādyogaḥ pravartate  
yogajñaḥ patito vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  dayā kāryātha satatamahiṃsā jñānasaṃgrahaḥ  satyamasteyamāstikyaṃ śraddhā ceṃdriyanigrahaḥ  
adhyāpanaṃ cādhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ yājanaṃ tathā  dhyānamīśvarabhāvaśca satataṃ jñānaśīlatā  ya evaṃ vartate vipro jñānayogasya siddhaye  acirādeva vijñānaṃ labdhvā yogaṃ ca viṃdati  dagdhvā dehamimaṃ jñānī kṣaṇājjñānāgninā priye  
prasādānmama yogajñaḥ karmabaṃdhaṃ prahāsyati  puṇyaḥpuṇyātmakaṃ karmamuktestatpratibaṃdhakam  tasmānniyogato yogī puṇyāpuṇyaṃ vivarjayet  
phalakāmanayā karmakaraṇātpratibadhyate  na karmamātrakaraṇāttasmātkarmaphalaṃ tyajet  prathamaṃ karmayajñena bahiḥ sampūjya māṃ priye  jñānayogarato bhūtvā paścādyogaṃ samabhyaset  
vidite mama yāthātmye karmayajñena dehinaḥ  na yajaṃti hi māṃ yuktāḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāṃcanāḥ  nityayukto muniḥ śreṣṭho madbhaktaśca samāhitaḥ  jñānayogarato yogī mama sāyujyamāpnuyāt  
athāviraktacittā ye varṇino madupāśritāḥ  jñānacaryākriyāsveva te 'dhikuryustadarhakāḥ  dvidhā matpūjanaṃ jñeyaṃ bāhyamābhyaṃtaraṃ tathā  vāṅmanaḥkāyabhedācca tridhā madbhajanaṃ viduḥ  
tapaḥ karma japo dhyānaṃ jñānaṃ vetyanupūrvaśaḥ  pañcadhā kathyate sadbhistadeva bhajanaṃ punaḥ  anyātmaviditaṃ bāhyamasmadabhyarcanādikam  tadeva tu svasaṃvedyamābhyaṃtaramudāhṛtam  
manomatpravaṇaṃ cittaṃ na manomātramucyate  mannāmaniratā vāṇī vāṅmatā khalu netarā  liṃgairmacchāsanādiṣṭaistripuṃḍrādibhiraṃkitaḥ  mamopacāranirataḥ kāyaḥ kāyo na cetaraḥ  
madarcākarma vijñeyaṃ bāhye yāgādinocyate  madarthe dehasaṃśoṣastapaḥ kṛcchrādi no matam  japaḥ pañcākṣarābhyāsaḥ praṇavābhyāsa eva ca  rudrādhyāyādikābhyāso na vedādhyayanādikam  
dhyānammadrūpaciṃtādyaṃ nātmādyarthasamādhayaḥ  mamāgamārthavijñānaṃ jñānaṃ nānyārthavedanam  bāhye vābhyaṃtare vātha yatra syānmanaso ratiḥ  prāgvāsanāvaśāddevi tattvaniṣṭhāṃ samācaret  
bāhyādābhyaṃtaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhavecchataguṇādhikam  asaṃkaratvāddoṣāṇāṃ dṛṣṭānāmapyasambhavāt  śaucamābhyaṃtaraṃ vidyānna bāhyaṃ śaucamucyate  aṃtaḥ śaucavimuktātmā śucirapyaśuciryataḥ  
bāhyamābhyaṃrtaraṃ caiva bhajanaṃ bhavapūrvakam  na bhāvarahitaṃ devi vipralaṃbhaikakāraṇam  kṛtakṛtyasya pūtasya mama kiṃ kriyate naraiḥ  bahirvābhyaṃtaraṃ vātha mayā bhāvo hi gṛhyate  
bhāvaikātmā kriyā devi mama dharmassanātanaḥ  manasā karmaṇā vācā hyanapekṣya phalaṃ kvacit  phaloddeśena deveśi laghurmama samāśrayaḥ  phalārthī tadabhāve māṃ parityaktuṃ kṣamo yataḥ  
phalārthino 'pi yasyaiva mayi cittaṃ pratiṣṭhitam  bhāvānurūpaphaladastasyāpyahamanindite  phalānapekṣayā yeṣāṃ mano matpravaṇaṃ bhavet  prārthayeyuḥ phalaṃ paścādbhaktāste 'pi mama priyāḥ  
prāksaṃskāravaśādeva ye viciṃtya phalāphale  vivaśā māṃ prapadyaṃte mama priyatamā matāḥ  mallābhānna paro lābhasteṣāmasti yathātatham  mamāpi lābhastallābhānnāparaḥ parameśvari  
madanugrahatasteṣāṃ bhāvo mayi samarpitaḥ  phalaṃ paramanirvāṇaṃ prayacchati balādiva  mahātmanāmananyānāṃ mayi saṃnyastacetasām  aṣṭadhā lakṣaṇaṃ prāhurmama dharmādhikāriṇām  
madbhaktajanavātsalyaṃ pūjāyāṃ cānumodanam  svayamabhyarcanaṃ caiva madarthe cāṃgaceṣṭitam  matkathāśravaṇe bhaktiḥ svaranetrāṃgavikriyāḥ  mamānusmaraṇaṃ nityaṃ yaśca māmupajīvati  
evamaṣṭavidhaṃ cihnaṃ yasminmlecche 'pi vartate  sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yatissa ca paṃḍitaḥ  na me priyaścaturvedī madbhakto śvapaco 'pi yaḥ  tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hyaham  
patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati  tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati  
īśvara uvāca  atha vakṣyāmi deveśi bhaktānāmadhikāriṇām  viduṣāṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ varṇadharmasamāsataḥ  
triḥ snānaṃ cāgnikāryaṃ ca liṃgārcanamanukramam  dānamīśrarabhāvaśca dayā sarvatra sarvadā  
satyaṃ saṃtoṣamāstikyamahiṃsā sarvajaṃtuṣu  hrīśraddhādhyayanaṃ yogassadādhyāpanameva ca  
vyākhyānaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca śravaṇaṃ ca tapaḥ kṣamā  śaucaṃ śikhopavītaṃ ca uṣṇīṣaṃ cottarīyakam  
niṣiddhāsevanaṃ caiva bhasmarudrākṣadhāraṇam  parvaṇyabhyarcanaṃ devi caturdaśyāṃ viśeṣataḥ  
pānaṃ ca brahmakūrcasya māsi māsi yathāvidhi  abhyarcanaṃ viśeṣeṇa tenaiva snāpya māṃ priye  
sarvakriyānna santyāgaḥ śraddhānnasya ca varjanam  tathā paryuṣitānnasya yāvakasya viśeṣataḥ  
madyasya madyagandhasya naivedyasya ca varjanam  sāmānyaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣataḥ  
kṣamā śāṃtiśca santoṣassatyamasteyameva ca  brahmacaryaṃ mama jñānaṃ vairāgyaṃ bhasmasevanam  
sarvasaṃganivṛttiśca daśaitāni viśeṣataḥ  liṃgāni yogināṃ bhūyo divā bhikṣāśanaṃ tathā  
vānaprasthāśramasthānāṃ samānamidamiṣyate  rātrau na bhojanaṃ kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ brahmacāriṇām  
adhyāpanaṃ yājanaṃ ca kṣatriyasyāpratigrahaḥ  vaiśyasya ca viśeṣeṇa mayā nātra vidhīyate  
rakṣaṇaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ yuddhe śatruvadhastathā  duṣṭapakṣimṛgāṇāṃ ca duṣṭānāṃ śātanaṃ nṛṇām  
aviśvāsaśca sarvatra viśvāso mama yogiṣu  strīsaṃsargaśca kāleṣu camūrakṣaṇameva ca  
sadā saṃcāritaiścārairlokavṛttāṃtavedanam  sadāstradhāraṇaṃ caiva bhasmakaṃcukadhāraṇam  
rājñāṃ mamāśramasthānāmeṣa dharmasya saṃgrahaḥ  gorakṣaṇaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ kṛṣirvaiśyasya kathyate  
śuśrūṣetaravarṇānāṃ dharmaḥ śūdrasya kathyate  udyānakaraṇaṃ caiva mama kṣetrasamāśrayaḥ  
dharmapatnyāstu gamanaṃ gṛhasthasya vidhīyate  brahmacaryaṃ vanasthānāṃ yatīnāṃ brahmacāriṇām  
strīṇāṃ tu bhartṛśuśrūṣā dharmo nānyassanātanaḥ  mamārcanaṃ ca kalyāṇi niyogo bharturasti cet  
yā nārī bhartṛśuśrūṣāṃ vihāya vratatatparā  sā nārī narakaṃ yāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  
atha bhartṛvihīnāyā vakṣye dharmaṃ sanātanam  vrataṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ bhūśayyānaktabhojanam  
brahmacaryaṃ sadā snānaṃ bhasmanā salilena vā  śāṃtirmaunaṃ kṣamā nityaṃ saṃvibhāgo yathāvidhi  
aṣṭābhyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ viśeṣataḥ  ekādaśyāṃ ca vidhivadupavāsomamārcanam  
iti saṃkṣepataḥ prokto mayāśramaniṣeviṇām  brahmakṣatraviśāṃ devi yatīnāṃ brahmacāriṇām  
tathaiva vānaprasthānāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ ca sundari  śūdrāṇāmatha nārīṇāṃ dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ  
dhyeyastvayāhaṃ deveśi sadā jāpyaḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ  vedoktamakhilaṃ dharmamiti dharmārthasaṃgrahaḥ  
atha ye mānavā loke svecchayā dhṛtavigrahāḥ  bhāvātiśayasaṃpannāḥ pūrvasaṃskārasaṃyutāḥ  
viraktā vānuraktā vā stryādīnāṃ viṣayeṣvapi  pāpairna te viliṃpaṃte  padmapatramivāṃbhasā  
teṣāṃ mamātmavijñānaṃ viśuddhānāṃ vivekinām  matprasādādviśuddhānāṃ duḥkhamāśramarakṣaṇāt  
nāsti kṛtyamakṛtyaṃ ca samādhirvā parāyaṇam  na vidhirna niṣedhaśca teṣāṃ mama yathā tathā  
tatheha paripūrṇasya sādhyaṃ mama na vidyate  tathaiva kṛtakṛtyānāṃ teṣāmapi na saṃśayaḥ  
madbhaktānāṃ hitārthāya mānuṣaṃ bhāvamāśritāḥ  rudralokātparibhraṣṭāste rudrā nātra saṃśayaḥ  
mamānuśāsanaṃ yadvadbrahmādīnāṃ pravartakam  tathā narāṇāmanyeṣāṃ tanniyogaḥ pravartakaḥ  
mamājñādhārabhāvena sadbhāvātiśayena ca  tadālokanamātreṇa sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet  
pratyayāśca pravartaṃte praśastaphalasūcakāḥ  mayi bhāvavatāṃ puṃsāṃ prāgadṛṣṭārthagocarāḥ  
kaṃpasvedo 'śrupātaśca kaṇṭhe ca svaravikriyā  ānaṃdādyupalabdhiśca bhavedākasmikī muhuḥ  
sa tairvyastaissamastairvā liṃgairavyabhicāribhiḥ  maṃdamadhyottamairbhāvairvijñeyāste narottamāḥ  
yathāyognisamāveśānnāyo bhavati kevalam  sa tathaiva mama sānnidhyānna te kevalamānuṣāḥ  
hastapādādisādharmyādrudrānmartyavapurdharān  prākṛtāniva manvāno nāvajānīta paṃḍitaḥ  
avajñānaṃ kṛtaṃ teṣu narairvyāmūḍhacetanaiḥ  āyuḥ śriyaṃ kulaṃ śīlaṃ hitvā nirayamāvahet  
brahmaviṣṇusureśānāmapi tūlāyate padam  mattonyadanapekṣāṇāmuddhṛtānāṃ mahātmanām  
aśuddhaṃ bauddhamaiśvaryaṃ prākṛtaṃ pauruṣaṃ tathā  guṇeśānāmatastyājyaṃ guṇātītapadaiṣiṇām  
atha kiṃ bahunoktena śreyaḥ prāptyaikasādhanam  mayi cittasamāsaṃgo yena kenāpi hetunā  
upamanyuruvāca  itthaṃ śrīkaṇṭhanāthena śivena paramātmanā  hitāya jagatāmukto jñānasārārthasaṃgrahaḥ  
vijñānasaṃgrahasyāsya vedaśāstrāṇi kṛtsnaśaḥ  setihāsapurāṇāni vidyā vyākhyānavistaraḥ  
jñānaṃ jñeyamanuṣṭheyamadhikāro 'tha sādhanam  sādhyaṃ ceti ṣaḍarthānāṃ saṃgrahatveṣa saṃgrahaḥ  
guroradhikṛtaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ pāśaḥ paśuḥ patiḥ  liṃgārcanādyanuṣṭheyaṃ bhaktastvadhikṛto 'pi yaḥ  
sādhanaṃ śivamaṃtrādyaṃ sādhyaṃ śivasamānatā  ṣaḍarthasaṃgrahasyāsya jñānātsarvajñatocyate  
prathamaṃ karma yajñāderbhaktyā vittānusārataḥ  bāhyebhyarcya śivaṃ paścādaṃtaryāgarato bhavet  
ratirabhyaṃtare yasya na bāhye puṇyagauravāt  na karma karaṇīyaṃ hi bahistasya mahātmanāḥ  
jñānāmṛtena tṛptasya bhaktyā śaivaśivātmanaḥ  nāṃtarna ca bahiḥ kṛṣṇa kṛtyamasti kadācana  
tasmātkrameṇa saṃtyajya bāhyamābhyaṃtaraṃ tathā  jñānena jñeyamālokyājñānaṃ cāpi parityajet  
naikāgraṃ cecchive cittaṃ kiṃ kṛtenāpi karmaṇā  ekāgrameva ceccittaṃ kiṃ kṛtenāpi karmaṇā  
tasmātkarmāṇyakṛtvā vā kṛtvā vāṃtarbahiḥkramāt  yena kenāpyupāyena śive cittaṃ niveśayet  
śive niviṣṭacittānāṃ pratiṣṭhitadhiyāṃ satām  paratreha ca sarvatra nirvṛtiḥ paramā bhavet  
ihonnamaḥ śivāyeti maṃtreṇānena siddhayaḥ  sa tasmādadhigaṃtavyaḥ parāvaravibhūtaye  
śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca  maharṣivara sarvajña sarvajñānamahodadhe  pañcākṣarasya māhātmyaṃ śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  pañcākṣarasya māhātmyaṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi  aśakyaṃ vistarādvaktuṃ tasmātsaṃkṣepataḥ śṛṇu  
vede śivāgame cāyamubhayatra ṣaḍakṣareḥ  sarveṣāṃ śivabhaktānāmaśeṣārthasādhakaḥ  
tadalpākṣaramarthāḍhyaṃ vedasāraṃ vimuktidam  ājñāsiddhamasaṃdigdhaṃ vākyametacchivātmakam  
nānāsiddhiyutaṃ divyaṃ lokacittānuraṃjakam  suniścitārthaṃ gaṃbhīraṃ vākyaṃ tatpārameśvaram  
mantraṃ sukhamukoccāryamaśeṣārthaprasiddhaye  prāhonnamaḥ śivāyeti sarvajñassarvadehinām  
tadbījaṃ sarvavidyānāṃ maṃtramādyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaram  atisūkṣmaṃ mahārthaṃ ca jñeyaṃ tadvaṭabījavat  
devo guṇatrayātītaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvakṛtprabhuḥ  omityekākṣare mantre sthitaḥ sarvagataḥ śivaḥ  
iśānādyāni sūkṣmāṇi brahmāṇyekākṣarāṇi tu  maṃtre namaśśivāyeti saṃsthitāni yathākramam  
maṃtre ṣaḍakṣare sūkṣme pañcabrahmatanuḥ śivaḥ  vācyavācakabhāvena sthitaḥ sākṣātsvabhāvataḥ  
vācyaśśivoprameyatvānmaṃtrastadvācakassmṛtaḥ  vācyavācakabhāvo 'yamanādisaṃsthitastayoḥ  
yathā 'nādipravṛttoyaṃ ghorasaṃsārasāgaraḥ  śivo 'pi hi tathānādisaṃsārānmocakaḥ sthitaḥ  
vyādhīnāṃ bheṣajaṃ yadvatpratipakṣaḥ svabhāvataḥ  tadvatsaṃsāradoṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣaḥ śivassmṛtaḥ  
asatyasmin jagannāthe tamobhūtamidaṃ bhavet  acetanatvātprakṛterajñatvātpuraṣasya ca  
pradhānaparamāṇvādi yāvatkiṃcidacetanam  na tatkartṛ svayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ buddhimatkāraṇaṃ vinā  
dharmādharmopadeśaśca baṃdhamokṣau vicāraṇāt  na sarvajñaṃ vinā puṃsāmādisargaḥ prasiddhyati  
vaidyaṃ vinā nirānaṃdāḥ kliśyaṃte rogiṇo yathā  tasmādanādiḥ sarvajñaḥ paripūrṇassadāśivaḥ  
asti nāthaḥ paritrātā puṃsāṃ saṃsārasāgarāt  ādimadhyāṃtanirmuktassvabhāvavimalaḥ prabhuḥ  
sarvajñaḥ paripūrṇaśca śivo jñeyaśśivāgame  tasyābhidhānamantro 'yamabhidheyaśca sa smṛtaḥ  
abhidhānābhidheyatvānmaṃtrassiddhaḥ paraśśivaḥ  etāvattu śivajñānametāvatparamaṃ padam  
yadoṃnamaśśivāyeti śivavākyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaram  vidhivākyamidaṃ śaivaṃ nārthavādaṃ śivātmakam  
yassarvajñassusaṃpūrṇaḥ svabhāvavimalaḥ śivaḥ  lokānugrahakartā ca sa mṛṣārthaṃ kathaṃ vadet  
yadyathāvasthitaṃ vastu guṇadoṣaiḥ svabhāvataḥ  yāvatphalaṃ ca tatpūrṇaṃ sarvajñastu yathā vadet  
rāgājñānādibhirdoṣairgrastatvādanṛtaṃ vadet  te ceśvare na vidyete brūyātsa kathamanyathā  
ajñātāśeṣadoṣeṇa sarvajñeya śivena yat  praṇītamamalaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  
tasmādīśvaravākyāni śraddheyāni vipaścitā  yathārthapuṇyapāpeṣu tadaśraddho vrajatyadhaḥ  
svargāpavargasiddhyarthaṃ bhāṣitaṃ yatsuśobhanam  vākyaṃ munivaraiḥ śāṃtaistadvijñeyaṃ subhāṣitam  
rāgadveṣānṛtakrodhakāmatṛṣṇānusāri yat  vākyaṃ nirayahetutvāttaddurbhāṣitamucyate  
saṃskṛtenāpi kiṃ tena mṛdunā lalitena vā  avidyārāgavākyena saṃsārakleśahetunā  
yacchrutvā jāyate śreyo rāgādīnāṃ ca saṃśayaḥ  virūpamapi tadvākyaṃ vijñeyamiti śobhanam  
bahutvepi hi maṃtrāṇāṃ sarvajñena śivena yaḥ  praṇīto vimalo mantro na tena sadṛśaḥ kvacit  
sāṃgāni vedaśāstrāṇi saṃsthitāni ṣaḍakṣare  na tena sadṛśastasmānmantro 'pyastyaparaḥ kvacit  
saptakoṭimahāmantrairupamantrairanekadhā  mantraḥ ṣaḍakṣaro bhinnassūtraṃ vṛtyātmanā yathā  
śivajñānāni yāvaṃti vidyāsthānāpi yāni ca  ṣaḍakṣarasya sūtrasya tāni bhāṣyaṃ samāsataḥ  
kiṃ tasya bahubhirmaṃtraiśśāstrairvā bahuvistaraiḥ  yasyonnamaḥ śivāyeti mantro 'yaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ  
tenādhītaṃ śrutaṃ tena kṛtaṃ sarvamanuṣṭhitam  yenonnamaśśivāyeti maṃtrābhyāsaḥ sthirīkṛtaḥ  
namaskārādisaṃyuktaṃ śivāyetyakṣaratrayam  jihvāgre vartate yasya saphalaṃ tasya jīvitam  
aṃtyajo vādhamo vāpi mūrkho vā paṃḍito 'pi vā  pañcākṣarajape niṣṭho mucyate pāpapaṃjarāt  
ityuktaṃ parameśena devyā pṛṣṭena śūlinā  hitāya sarvamartyānāṃ dvijānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ  
devyuvāca  kalau kaluṣite kāle durjaye duratikrame  apuṇyatamasācchanne loke dharmaparāṅmukhe  
kṣīṇe varṇāśramācāre saṃkaṭe samupasthite  sarvādhikāre saṃdigdhe niścite vāpi paryaye  
tadopadeśe vihate guruśiṣyakrame gate  kenopāyena mucyaṃte bhaktāstava maheśvara  
īśvara uvāca  āśritya paramāṃ vidyāṃ hṛdyāṃ pañcākṣarīṃ mama  bhaktyā ca bhāvitātmāno mucyaṃte kalijā narāḥ  
manovākkāyajairdoṣairvaktuṃ smartumagocaraiḥ  dūṣitānāṃ kṛtaghnānāṃ niṃdakānāṃ chalātmanām  
lubdhānāṃ vakramanasāmapi matpravaṇātmanām  mama pañcākṣarī vidyā saṃsārabhayatāriṇī  
mayaivamasakṛddevi pratijñātaṃ dharātale  patito 'pi vimucyeta madbhakto vidyayānayā  
devyuvāca  karmāyogyo bhavenmartyaḥ patito yadi sarvathā  karmāyogena yatkarma kṛtaṃ ca narakāya hi  
tataḥ kathaṃ vimucyeta patito vidyayā 'nayā  īśvara uvāca  tathyametattvayā proktaṃ tathā hi śṛṇu sundari  
rahasyamiti matvaitadgopitaṃ yanmayā purā  samaṃtrakaṃ māṃ patitaḥ pūjayedyadi mohitaḥ  
nārakī syānna sandeho mama pañcākṣaraṃ vinā  abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāśca ye cānye vratakarśitāḥ  
teṣāmetairvratairnāsti mama lokasamāgamaḥ  bhaktyā pañcākṣareṇaiva yo hi māṃ sakṛdarcayet  
so 'pi gacchenmama sthānaṃ mantrasyāsyaiva gauravāt  tasmāttapāṃsi yajñāśca vratāni niyamāstathā  
pañcākṣarārcanasyaite koṭyaṃśenāpi no samaḥ  baddho vāpyatha mukto vā pāśātpañcākṣareṇa yaḥ  
pūjayenmāṃ sa mucyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  arudro vā sarudro vā sakṛtpañcākṣareṇa yaḥ  
pūjayetpatito vāpi mūḍho vā mucyate naraḥ  ṣaḍakṣareṇa vā devi tathā pañcākṣareṇa vā  
sa brahmāṃgena māṃ bhaktyā pūjayedyadi mucyate  patito 'patito vāpi mantreṇānena pūjayet  
mama bhakto jitakrodho salabdho 'labdha eva vā  alabdhālabdha eveha koṭikoṭiguṇādhikaḥ  
tasmāllabdhvaiva māṃ devi mantreṇānena pūjayet  labdhvā saṃpūjayedyastu maitryādiguṇasaṃyutaḥ  
brahmacaryarato bhaktyā matsādṛśyamavāpnuyāt  kimatra bahunoktena bhaktāssarvedhikāriṇaḥ  
mama pañcākṣare maṃtre tasmācchreṣṭhataro hi saḥ  pañcākṣaraprabhāveṇa lokavedamaharṣayaḥ  
tiṣṭhaṃti śāśvatā dharmā devāssarvamidaṃ jagat  pralaye samanuprāpte naṣṭe sthāvarajaṃgame  
sarvaṃ prakṛtimāpannaṃ tatra saṃlayameṣyati  eko 'haṃ saṃsthito devi na dvitīyo 'sti kutracit  
tadā vedāśca śāstrāṇi sarve pañcākṣare sthitāḥ  te nāśaṃ naiva saṃprāptā macchaktyā hyanupālitāḥ  
tatassṛṣṭirabhūnmattaḥ prakṛtyātmaprabhedataḥ  guṇamūrtyātmanāṃ caiva tatovāṃtarasaṃhṛtiḥ  
tadā nārāyaṇaśśete devo māyāmayīṃ tanum  āsthāya bhogiparyaṃkaśayane toyamadhyagaḥ  
tannābhipaṃkajājjātaḥ pañcavaktraḥ pitāmahaḥ  sisṛkṣamāṇo lokāṃstrīnna sakto hyasahāyavān  
munīndaśa sasarjādau mānasānamitaujasaḥ  teṣāṃ siddhivivṛddhyarthaṃ māṃ provāca pitāmahaḥ  
matputrāṇāṃ mahādeva śaktiṃ dehi maheśvara  ityevaṃ prārthitastena pañcavaktradharo hyaham  
pañcākṣarāṇi kramaśaḥ proktavānpadmayonaye  sa pañcavadanaistāni gṛhṇaṃllokapitāmahaḥ  
vācyavācakabhāvena jñātavānmāṃ maheśvaram  jñātvā prayogaṃ vividhaṃ siddhamaṃtraḥ prajāpatiḥ  
putrebhyaḥ pradadau maṃtraṃ maṃtrārthaṃ ca yathātatham  te ca labdhvā maṃtraratnaṃ sākṣāllokapitāmahāt  
tadājñaptena mārgeṇa madārādhanakāṃkṣiṇaḥ  merostu śikhare ramye muṃjavānnāma parvataḥ  
matpriyaḥ satataṃ śrīmānmadbhaktai rakṣitassadā  tasyābhyāśe tapastīvraṃ lokaṃ sraṣṭuṃ samutsukāḥ  
divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu vāyubhakṣāssamācaran  teṣāṃ bhaktimahaṃ dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ pratyakṣatāmiyām  
ṛṣiṃ chaṃdaśca kīlaṃ ca bījaśaktiṃ ca daivatam  nyāsaṃ ṣaḍaṃgaṃ digbaṃdhaṃ viniyogamaśeṣataḥ  
proktavānahamāryāṇāṃ jagatsṛṣṭivivṛddhaye  tataste maṃtramāhātmyādṛṣayastapasedhitāḥ  
sṛṣṭiṃ vitanvate samyaksadevāsuramānuṣīm  asyāḥ paramavidyāyāssvarūpamadhunocyate  
ādau namaḥ prayoktavyaṃ śivāya tu tataḥ param  saiṣā pañcākṣarī vidyā sarvaśrutiśirogatā  
sarvajātasya sarvasya bījabhūtā sanātanī  prathamaṃ manmukhodgīrṇā sā mamaivāsti vācikā  
taptacāmīkaraprakhyā pīnonnatapayodharā  caturbhujā trinayanā bāleṃdukṛtaśekharā  
padmotpalakarā saumyā varadābhayapāṇikā  sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā  
sitapadmāsanāsīnā nīlakuṃcitamūrdhajā  asyāḥ pañcavidhā varṇāḥ prasphuradraśmimaṃḍalāḥ  
pītaḥ kṛṣṇastathā dhūmraḥ svarṇābho rakta eva ca  pṛthakprayojyā yadyete biṃdunādavibhūṣitāḥ  
ardhacandranibho biṃdurnādo dīpaśikhākṛtiḥ  bījaṃ dvitīyaṃ bījeṣu maṃtrasyāsya varānane  
dīrghapūrvaṃ turīyasya pañcamaṃ śaktimādiśet  vāmadevo nāma ṛṣiḥ paṃktiśchanda udāhṛtam  
devatā śiva evāhaṃ mantrasyāsya varānane  gautamo 'trirvarārohe viśvāmitrastathāṃgirāḥ  
bharadvājaśca varṇānāṃ kramaśaścarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ  gāyatryanuṣṭuptriṣṭupca chaṃdāṃsi bṛhatī virāṭ  
indro rudro harirbrahmā skaṃdasteṣāṃ ca devatāḥ  mama pañcamukhānyāhuḥ sthāne teṣāṃ varānane  
pūrvādeścordhvaparyaṃtaṃ nakārādi yathākramam  adāttaḥ prathamo varṇaścaturthaśca dvitīyakaḥ  
pañcamaḥ svaritaścaiva tṛtīyo nihataḥ smṛtaḥ  mūlavidyā śivaṃ śaivaṃ sūtraṃ pañcākṣaraṃ tathā  
nāmānyasya vijānīyācchaivaṃ me hṛdayaṃ mahat  nakāraśśira ucyeta makārastu śikhocyate  
śikāraḥ kavacaṃ tadvadvakāro netramucyate  yakāro 'straṃ namassvāhā vaṣaṭhuṃvauṣaḍityapi  
phaḍityapi ca varṇānāmante 'ṅgatvaṃ yadā tadā  tatrāpi mūlamaṃtro 'yaṃ kiṃcidbhedasamanvayāt  
tatrāpi pañcamo varṇo dvādaśasvarabhūṣitaḥ  tāsmādanena maṃtreṇa manovākkāyabhedataḥ  
āvayorarcanaṃ kuryājjapahomādikaṃ tathā  yathāprajñaṃ yathākālaṃ yathāśāstraṃ yathāmati  
yathāśakti yathāsaṃpadyathāyogaṃ yathārati  yadā kadāpi vā bhaktyā yatra kutrāpi vā kṛtā  
yena kenāpi vā devi pūjā muktiṃ nayiṣyate  mayyāsaktena manasā yatkṛtaṃ mama sundari  
matpriyaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva krameṇāpyakrameṇa vā  tathāpi mama bhaktā ye nātyaṃtavivaśāḥ punaḥ  
teṣāṃ sarveṣu śāstreṣu mayeva niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ  tatrādau saṃpravakṣyāmi mantrasaṃgrahaṇaṃ śubham  
yaṃ vinā niṣphalaṃ jāpyaṃ yena vā saphalaṃ bhavet  
īśvara uvāca  ājñāhīnaṃ kriyāhīnaṃ śraddhāhīnaṃ varānane  ājñārthaṃ dakṣiṇāhīnaṃ sadā japtaṃ ca niṣphalam  ājñāsiddhaṃ kriyāsiddhaṃ śraddhāsiddhaṃ mamātmakam  evaṃ ceddakṣiṇāyuktaṃ maṃtrasiddhirmahatphalam  
upagamya guruṃ vipramācāryaṃ tattvavedinam  jāpitaṃ sadguṇopetaṃ dhyānayogaparāyaṇam  toṣayettaṃ prayatnena bhāvaśuddhisamanvitaḥ  vācā ca manasā caiva kāyena draviṇena ca  
ācāryaṃ pūjayedvipraḥ sarvadātiprayatnataḥ  hastyaśvaratharatnāni kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca  bhūṣaṇāni ca vāsāṃsi dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca  etāni gurave dadyādbhaktyā ca vibhave sati  
vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kurvīta yadīcchetsiddhimātmanaḥ  paścānnivedya svātmānaṃ gurave saparicchadam  evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivadyathāśaktitvavaṃcayan  ādadīta gurormaṃtraṃ jñānaṃ caiva krameṇa tu  
evaṃ tuṣṭo guruḥ śiṣyaṃ pūjakaṃ vatsaroṣitam  śuśrūṣumanahaṃkāraṃ snātaṃ śucimupoṣitam  snāpayitvā viśuddhyarthaṃ pūrṇakuṃbhaghṛtena vai  jalena mantraśuddhena puṇyadravyayutena ca  
alaṃkṛtya suveṣaṃ ca gaṃdhasragvastrabhūṣaṇaiḥ  puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā ca brāhmaṇānabhipūjya ca  samudratīre nadyāṃ ca goṣṭhe devālaye 'pi vā  śucau deśe gṛhe vāpi kāle siddhikare tithau  
nakṣatre śubhayoge ca sarvadoṣavivarjite  anugṛhya tato dadyājjñānaṃ mama yathāvidhi  svareṇoccārayetsamyagekāṃte 'tiprasannadhīḥ  uccāryoccārayitvā tamāvayormaṃtramuttamam  
śivaṃ cāstu śubhaṃ cāstu śobhano 'stu priyo 'stviti  evaṃ dadyādgururmaṃtramājñāṃ caiva tataḥ param  evaṃ labdhvā gurormaṃtramājñāṃ caiva samāhitaḥ  saṃkalpya ca japennityaṃ puraścaraṇapūrvakam  
yāvajjīvaṃ japennityamaṣṭottarasahasrakam  ananyastatparo bhūtvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim  japedakṣaralakṣaṃ vai caturguṇitamādarāt  naktāśī saṃyamī yassa pauraścaraṇikaḥ smṛtaḥ  
yaḥ puraścaraṇaṃ kṛtvā nityajāpī bhavetpunaḥ  tasya nāsti samo loke sa siddhaḥ siddhado bhavet  snānaṃ kṛtvā śucau deśe baddhvā ruciramānasam  tvayā māṃ hṛdi saṃciṃtya saṃciṃtya svaguruṃ tataḥ  
udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā maunī caikāgramānasaḥ  viśodhya pañcatattvāni dahanaplāvanādibhiḥ  mantranyāsādikaṃ kṛtvā saphalīkṛtavigrahaḥ  āvayorvigrahau dhyāyanprāṇāpānau niyamya ca  
vidyāsthānaṃ svakaṃ rūpamṛṣiñchando 'dhidaivatam  bījaṃ śaktiṃ tathā vākyaṃ smṛtvā pañcākṣarīṃ japet  uttamaṃ mānasaṃ jāpyamupāṃśuṃ caivamadhyamam  adhamaṃ vācikaṃ prāhurāgamārthaviśāradāḥ  
uttamaṃ rudradaivatyaṃ madhyamaṃ viṣṇudaivatam  adhamaṃ brahmadaivatyamityāhuranupūrvaśaḥ  yaduccanīcasvaritaiḥspaṣṭāspaṣṭapadākṣaraiḥ  maṃtramuccārayedvācā vāciko 'yaṃ japassmṛtaḥ  
jihvāmātraparispaṃdādīṣaduccārito 'pi vā  aparairaśrutaḥ kiṃcicchruto vopāṃśurucyate  dhiyā yadakṣaraśreṇyā varṇādvarṇaṃ padātpadam  śabdārthaciṃtanaṃ bhūyaḥ kathyate mānaso japaḥ  
vācikastveka eva syādupāṃśuḥ śatamucyate  sāhasraṃ mānasaḥ proktaḥ sagarbhastu śatādhikaḥ  prāṇāyāmasamāyuktassagarbho japa ucyate  ādyaṃtayoragarbho 'pi prāṇāyāmaḥ praśasyate  
catvāriṃśatsamāvṛttīḥ prāṇānāyamya saṃsmaret  maṃtraṃ maṃtrārthaviddhīmānaśaktaḥ śaktito japet  pañcakaṃ trikamekaṃ vā prāṇāyāmaṃ samācaret  agarbhaṃ vā sagarbhaṃ vā sagarbhastatra śasyate  
sagarbhādapi sāhasraṃ sadhyāno japa ucyate  eṣu pañcavidheṣvekaḥ kartavyaḥ śaktito japaḥ  aṅgulyā japasaṃkhyānamekamevamudāhṛtam  rekhayāṣṭaguṇaṃ vidyātputrajīvairdaśādhikam  
śataṃ syācchaṃkhamaṇibhiḥ pravālaistu sahasrakam  sphaṭikairdaśasāhasraṃ mauktikairlakṣamucyate  padmākṣairdaśalakṣantu sauvarṇaiḥ koṭirucyate  kuśagraṃthyā ca rudrākṣairanaṃtaguṇitaṃ bhavet  
triṃśadakṣaiḥ kṛtā mālā dhanadā japakarmaṇi  saptaviṃśatisaṃkhyātairakṣaiḥ puṣṭipradā bhavet  pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyātaiḥ kṛtā muktiṃ prayacchati  akṣaistu pañcadaśabhirabhicāraphalapradā  
aṃguṣṭhaṃ mokṣadaṃ vidyāttarjanīṃ śatrunāśinīm  madhyamāṃ dhanadāṃ śāṃtiṃ karotyeṣā hyanāmikā  aṣṭottaraśataṃ mālā tatra syāduttamottamā  śatasaṃkhyottamā mālā pañcāśadbhistu madhyamā  
catuḥ pañcāśadakṣaistu hṛcchreṣṭhā hi prakīrtitā  ityevaṃ mālayā kuryājjapaṃ kasmai na darśayet  kaniṣṭhā kṣariṇī proktā japakarmaṇi śobhanā  aṃguṣṭhena japejjapyamanyairaṃgulibhissaha  
aṃguṣṭhena vinā japyaṃ kṛtaṃ tadaphalaṃ yataḥ  gṛhe japaṃ samaṃ vidyādgoṣṭhe śataguṇaṃ viduḥ  puṇyāraṇye tathārāme sahasraguṇamucyate  ayutaṃ parvate puṇye nadyāṃ lakṣamudāhṛtam  
koṭiṃ devālaye prāhuranantaṃ mama sannidhau  sūryasyāgnerguroriṃdordīpasya ca jalasya ca  viprāṇāṃ ca gavāṃ caiva sannidhau śasyate japaḥ  tatpūrvābhimukhaṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cābhicārikam  
paścimaṃ dhanadaṃ vidyādauttaraṃ śātidaṃ bhavet  sūryāgnivipradevānāṃ gurūṇāmapi sannidhau  anyeṣāṃ ca prasaktānāṃ mantraṃ na vimukho japet  uṣṇīṣī kuṃcukī namro muktakeśo galāvṛtaḥ  
apavitrakaro 'śuddho vilapanna japetkvacit  krodhaṃ madaṃ kṣutaṃ trīṇi niṣṭhīvanavijṛṃbhaṇe  darśanaṃ ca śvanīcānāṃ varjayejjapakarmaṇi  ācametsaṃbhave teṣāṃ smaredvā māṃ tvayā saha  
jyotīṃṣi ca prapaśyedvā kuryādvā prāṇasaṃyamam  anāsanaḥ śayāne vā gacchannutthita eva vā  rathyāyāmaśive sthāne na japettimirāntare  prasārya na japetpādau kukkuṭāsana eva vā  
yānaśayyādhirūḍho vā ciṃtāvyākulito 'tha vā  śaktaścetsarvamevaitadaśaktaḥ śaktito japet  kimatra bahunoktena samāsena vacaḥ śṛṇu  sadācāro japañchuddhaṃ dhyāyanbhadraṃ samaśnute  
ācāraḥ paramo dharma ācāraḥ paramaṃ dhanaṃ  ācāraḥ paramā vidyā ācāraḥ paramā gatiḥ  ācārahīnaḥ puruṣo loke bhavati niṃditaḥ  paratra ca sukhī na syāttasmādācāravānbhavet  
yasya yadvihitaṃ karma vede śāstre ca vaidikaiḥ  tasya tena samācāraḥ sadācāro na cetaraḥ  sadbhirācaritatvācca sadācāraḥ sa ucyate  sadācārasya tasyāhurāstikyaṃ mūlakāraṇam  
āstikaścetpramādādyaiḥ sadācārādavicyutaḥ  na duṣyati naro nityaṃ tasmādāstikatāṃ vrajet  yathehāsti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukṛtairduṣkṛtairapi  tathā paratra cāstīti matirāstikyamucyate  
rahasyamanyadvakṣyāmi gopanīyamidaṃ priye  na vācyaṃ yasya kasyāpi nāstikasyātha vā paśoḥ  sadācāravihīnasya patitasyāntyajasya ca  pañcākṣarātparaṃ nāsti paritrāṇaṃ kalau yuge  
gacchatastiṣṭhato vāpi svecchayā karma kurvataḥ  aśucervā śucervāpi mantro 'yanna ca niṣphalaḥ  anācāravatāṃ puṃsāmaviśuddhaṣaḍadhvanām  anādiṣṭo 'pi guruṇā mantro 'yaṃ na ca niṣphalaḥ  
antyajasyāpi mūrkhasya mūḍhasya patitasya ca  nirmaryādasya nīcasya maṃtro 'yaṃ na ca niṣphalaḥ  sarvāvasthāṃ gatasyāpi mayi bhaktimataḥ param  sidhyatyeva na saṃdeho nāparasya tu kasyacit  
na lagnatithinakṣatravārayogādayaḥ priye  asyātyaṃtamavekṣyāḥ syurnaiṣa saptassadoditaḥ  na kadācinna kasyāpi ripureṣa mahāmanuḥ  susiddho vāpi siddho vā sādhyo vāpi bhaviṣyati  
siddhena guruṇādiṣṭassusiddha iti kathyate  asiddhenāpi vā dattassiddhasādhyastu kevalaḥ  asādhitassādhito vā sidhyatvena na saṃśayaḥ  śraddhātiśayayuktasya mayi maṃtre tathā gurau  
tasmānmaṃtrāntarāṃstyaktvā sāpāyān  dhikārataḥ  āśrametparamāṃ vidyāṃ sākṣātpañcākṣarīṃ budhaḥ  maṃtrāntareṣu siddheṣu maṃtra eṣa na sidhyati  siddhe tvasminmahāmaṃtre te ca siddhā bhavaṃtyuta  
yathā deveṣvalabdho 'smi labdheṣvapi maheśvari  mayi labdhe tu te labdhā maṃtreṣveṣu samo vidhiḥ  ye doṣāssarvamaṃtrāṇāṃ na te 'sminsaṃbhavaṃtyapi  asya maṃtrasya jātyādīnanapekṣya pravartanāt  
tathāpi naiva kṣudreṣu phaleṣu prati yogiṣu  sahasā viniyuṃjīta tasmādeṣa mahābalaḥ  upamanyuruvāca  evaṃ sākṣānmahādevyai mahādevena śūlinā  hitā ya jagatāmuktaḥ pañcākṣaravidhiryathā  
ya idaṃ kīrtayedbhaktyā śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ  sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prayāti paramāṃ gatim  
śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca  bhagavānmaṃtramāhātmyaṃ bhavatā kathitaṃ prabho  tatprayogavidhānaṃ ca sākṣācchrutisamaṃ yathā  
idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi śivasaṃskāramuttamam  maṃtrasaṃgrahaṇe kiṃcitsūcitanna tu vismṛtam  
upamanyuruvāca  hanta te kathayiṣyāmi sarvapāpaviśodhanam  saṃskāraṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ śivena patibhāṣitam  
samyakkṛtādhikāraḥ syātpūjādiṣu naro yataḥ  saṃskāraḥ kathyate tena ṣaḍadhvapariśodhanam  
dīyate yena vijñānaṃ kṣīyate pāśabaṃdhanam  tasmātsaṃskāra evāyaṃ dīkṣetyapi ca kathyate  
śāṃbhavī caiva śāktī ca māṃtrī caiva śivāgame  dīkṣopadiśyate tredhā śivena paramātmanā  
gurorālokamātreṇa sparśātsaṃbhāṣaṇādapi  sadyassaṃjñā bhavejjaṃtoḥ pāśopakṣayakāriṇī  
sā dīkṣā śāṃbhavī proktā sā punarbhidyate dvidhā  tīvrā tīvratarā ceti pāśo pakṣayabhedataḥ  
yayā syānnirvṛtiḥ sadyassaiva tīvratarā matā  tīvrā tu jīvatotyaṃtaṃ puṃsaḥ pāpaviśodhikā  
śaktī jñānavatī dīkṣā śiṣyadehaṃ praviśya tu  guruṇā yogamārgeṇa kriyate jñānacakṣuṣā  
māṃtrī kriyāvatī dīkṣā kuṃḍamaṃḍalapūrvikā  maṃdamaṃdataroddeśātkartavyā guruṇā bahiḥ  
śaktipātānusāreṇa śiṣyo 'nugrahamarhati  śaivadharmānusārasya tanmūlatvātsamāsataḥ  
yatra śaktirna patitā tatra śuddhirna jāyate  na vidyā na śivācāro na muktirna ca siddhayaḥ  
tasmālliṃgāni saṃvīkṣya śaktipātasya bhūyasaḥ  jñānena kriyayā vātha guruśśiṣyaṃ viśodhayet  
yo 'nyathā kurute mohātsa vinaśyati durmatiḥ  tasmātsarvaprakāreṇa guruḥ śiṣyaṃ parīkṣayet  
lakṣaṇaṃ śaktipātasya prabodhānaṃdasaṃbhavaḥ  sā yasmātparamā śaktiḥ prabodhānaṃdarūpiṇī  
ānaṃdabodhayorliṃgamaṃtaḥkaraṇavikriyāḥ  yathā syātkaṃparomāṃcasvaranetrāṃgavikriyāḥ  
śiṣyopi lakṣaṇairebhiḥ kuryādguruparīkṣaṇam  tatsaṃparkaiḥ śivārcādau saṃgatairvātha tadgataiḥ  
śiṣyastu śikṣaṇīyatvādgurorgauravakāraṇāt  tasmātsarvaprayatnena gurorgauravamācaret  
yo gurussa śivaḥ prokto yaḥ śivaḥ sa guruḥ smṛtaḥ  gururvā śiva evātha vidyākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ  
yathā śivastathā vidyā yathā vidyā tathā guruḥ  śivavidyā gurūṇāṃ ca pūjayā sadṛśaṃ phalam  
sarvadevātmakaścāsau sarvamaṃtramayo guruḥ  tasmātsarvaprayatnena yasyājñāṃ śirasā vahet  
śreyo 'rthī yadi gurvājñāṃ manasāpi na laṃghayet  gurvājñāpālako yasmājjñānasaṃpattimaśnute  
gacchaṃstiṣṭhansvapanbhuṃjannānyatkarma samācaret  samakṣaṃ yadi kurvīta sarvaṃ cānujñayā guroḥ  
gurorgṛhe samakṣaṃ vā na yatheṣṭāsano bhavet  gururdevo yataḥ sākṣāttadgṛhaṃ devamandiram  
pāpināṃ ca yathā saṃgāttatpāpātpatito bhavet  yatheha vahnisaṃparkānmalaṃ tyajati kāṃcanam  
tathaiva gurusaṃparkātpāpaṃ tyajati mānavaḥ  yathā vahnisamīpastho ghṛtakumbho vilīyate  
tathā pāpaṃ vilīyeta hyācāryasya samīpataḥ  yathā prajvalito vahniḥ śuṣkamārdraṃ ca nirdahet  
tathāyamapi saṃtuṣṭo guruḥ pāpaṃ kṣaṇāddahet  manasā karmaṇā vācā guroḥ krodhaṃ na kārayet  
tasya krodhena dahyaṃte hyāyuḥśrījñānasatkriyāḥ  tatkrodhakāriṇo ye syusteṣāṃ yajñāśca niṣphalāḥ  
yamaśca niyamāścaiva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  gurorviruddhaṃ yadvākyaṃ na vadejjātucinnaraḥ  
vadedyadi mahāmohādrauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet  manasā karmaṇā vācā gurumuddiśya yatnataḥ  
śreyorthī cennaro dhīmānna mithyācāramācaret  gurorhitaṃ priyaṃ kuryādādiṣṭo vā na vā sadā  
asamakṣaṃ samakṣaṃ vā tasya kāryaṃ samācaret  itthamācāravānbhakto nityamudyuktamānasaḥ  
gurupriyakaraḥ śiṣyaḥ śaivadharmāṃstato 'rhati  guruścedguṇavānprājñaḥ paramānaṃdabhāsakaḥ  
tattvavicchivasaṃsakto muktido na tu cāparaḥ  saṃvitsaṃjananaṃ tattvaṃ paramānaṃdasaṃbhavam  
tattattvaṃ viditaṃ yena sa evānaṃdadarśakaḥ  na punarnāmamātreṇa saṃvidārahitastu yaḥ  
anyonyaṃ tārayennaukā kiṃ śilā tārayecchilām  etasyā nāmamātreṇa muktirvai nāmamātrikā  
yaiḥ punarviditaṃ tattvaṃ te muktā mocayantyapi  tattvahīne kuto bodhaḥ kuto hyātmaparigrahaḥ  
parigrahavinirmuktaḥ paśurityabhidhīyate  paśubhiḥ preritaścāpi paśutvaṃ nātivartate  
tasmāttattvavideveha mukto mocaka iṣyate  sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaḥ sarvaśāstravidapyayam  
sarvopāyavidhijño 'pi tattvahīnastu niṣphalaḥ  yasyānubhavaparyaṃtā buddhistattve pravartate  
tasyāvalokanādyaiśca parānando 'bhijāyate  tasmādyasyaiva saṃparkātprabodhānaṃdasaṃbhavaḥ  
guruṃ tameva vṛṇuyānnāparaṃ matimānnaraḥ  sa śiṣyairvinayācāracaturairucito guruḥ  
yāvadvijñāyate tāvatsevanīyo mumukṣubhiḥ  jñāte tasminsthirā bhaktiryāvattattvaṃ samāśrayet  
na tu tattvaṃ tyajejjātu nopekṣeta kathaṃcana  yatrānaṃdaḥ prabodho vā nālpamapyupalabhyate  
vatsarādapi śiṣyeṇa so 'nyaṃ gurumupāśrayet  gurumanyaṃ prapanne 'pi nāvamanyeta paurvikam  
gurorbhrātḥṃstathā putrānbodhakānprerakānapi  tatrādāvupasaṃgamya brāhmaṇaṃ vedapāragam  
gurumārādhayetprājñaṃ śubhagaṃ priyadarśanam  sarvābhayapradātāraṃ karuṇākrāṃtamānasam  
toṣayettaṃ prayatnena manasā karmaṇā girā  tāvadārādhayecchiṣyaḥ prasannosau bhavedyathā  
tasminprasanne śiṣyasya sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet  tasmāddhanāni ratnāni kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca  
bhūṣaṇāni ca vāsāṃsi yānaśayyāsanāni ca  etāni gurave dadyādbhaktyā vittānusārataḥ  
vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kurvīta yadīcchetparamāṃ gatim  sa eva janako mātā bhartā bandhurdhanaṃ sukham  
sakhā mitraṃ ca yattasmātsarvaṃ tasmai nivedayet  nivedya paścātsvātmānaṃ sānvayaṃ saparigraham  
samarpya sodakaṃ tasmai nityaṃ tadvaśago bhavet  yadā śivāya svātmānaṃ dattavān deśikātmane  
tadā śaivo bhaveddehī na tato 'sti punarbhavaḥ  guruśca svāśritaṃ śiṣyaṃ varṣamekaṃ parīkṣayet  
brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ dvivarṣaṃ ca trivarṣakam  prāṇadravyapradānādyairādeśaiśca samāsamaiḥ  
uttamāṃścādhame kṛtvā nīcānuttamakarmaṇi  ākruṣṭāstāḍitā vāpi ye viṣādaṃ na yāntyapi  
te yogyāḥ saṃyatāḥ śuddhāḥ śivasaṃskārakarmaṇi  ahiṃsakā dayāvaṃto nityamudyuktacetasaḥ  
amānino buddhimaṃtastyaktaspardhāḥ priyaṃvadāḥ  ṛjavo mṛdavaḥ svacchā vinītāḥ sthiracetasaḥ  
śaucācārasamāyuktāḥ śivabhaktā dvijātayaḥ  evaṃ vṛttasamopetā vāṅmanaḥkāyakarmabhiḥ  
śodhyā bodhyā yathānyāyamiti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ  nādhikāraḥ svato nāryāḥ śivasaṃskārakarmaṇi  
niyogādbharturastyeva bhaktiyuktā yadīśvare  tathaiva bhartṛhīnāyā putrāderabhyanujñayā  
adhikāro bhavatyeva kanyāyāḥ piturājñayā  śūdrāṇāṃ martyajātīnāṃ patitānāṃ viśeṣataḥ  
tathā saṃkarajātīnāṃ nādhvaśuddhirvidhīyate  taipyakṛtrimabhāvaścecchive paramakāraṇe  
pādodakapradānādyaiḥ kuryuḥ pāpaviśodhanam  atrānulomajātā ye yuktā eva dvijātiṣu  
teṣāmadhvaviśuddhyādi kuryānmātṛkulocitam  yā tu kanyā svapitrādyaiśśivadharme niyojitā  
sā bhaktāya pradātavyā nāparāya virodhine  dattā cetpratikūlāya pramādādbodhayetpatim  
aśaktā taṃ parityajya manasā dharmamācaret  yathā munivaraṃ tyaktvā patimatriṃ pativratā  
kṛtakṛtyā 'bhavatpūrvaṃ tapasārādhya śaṅkaram  yathā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ tapasārādhya pāṃḍavān  
patīṃllabdhavatī dharme gurubhirna niyojitā  asvātantryakṛto doṣo nehāsti paramārthataḥ  
śivadharme niyuktāyāśśivaśāsanagauravāt  bahunātra kimuktena yo 'pi ko 'pi śivāśrayaḥ  
saṃskāryo gurvadhīnaścetsaṃskriyā na prabhidyate  gurorālokanādeva sparśātsaṃbhāṣaṇādapi  
yasya saṃjāyate prajñā tasya nāsti parājayaḥ  manasā yastu saṃskāraḥ kriyate yogavartmanā  
sa neha kathito guhyo guruvaktraikagocaraḥ  kriyāvānyastu saṃskāraḥ kuṃḍamaṃḍapapūrvakaḥ  
sa vakṣyate samāsena tasya śakyo na vistaraḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  puṇye 'hani śucau deśe bahudoṣavivarjite  deśikaḥ prathamaṃ kuryātsaṃskāraṃ samayāhvayam  
parīkṣya bhūmiṃ vidhivadgaṃdhavarṇarasādibhiḥ  śilpiśāstroktamārgeṇa maṇḍapaṃ tatra kalpayet  
kṛtvā vediṃ ca tanmadhye kuṇḍāni parikalpayet  aṣṭadikṣu tathā dikṣu tatraiśānyāṃ punaḥ kramāt  
pradhānakuṃḍaṃ kurvīta yadvā paścimabhāgataḥ  pradhānamekamevātha kṛtvā śobhāṃ prakalpayet  
vitānadhvajamālābhirvividhābhiranekaśaḥ  vedimadhye tataḥ kuryānmaṃḍalaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam  
raktahemādibhiścūrṇairīśvarāvāhanocitam  siṃdūraśālinīvāracūrṇairevātha nirdhanaḥ  
ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā sitaṃ vā raktameva vā  ekahastasya padmasya karṇikāṣṭāṃgulā matā  
kesarāṇi tadardhāni śeṣaṃ cāṣṭadalādikam  dvihastasya tu padmasya dviguṇaṃ karṇikādikam  
kṛtvā śobhopaśobhāḍhyamaiśānyāṃ tasya kalpayet  ekahastaṃ tadardhaṃ vā punarvedyaḥ tu maṃḍalam  
vrīhitaṃdulasiddhārthatilapuṣpakuśāstṛte  tatra lakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ śivakuṃbhaṃ prasādhayet  
sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi tāmrajaṃ mṛnmayaṃ tu vā  gandhapuṣpākṣatākīrṇaṃ kuśadūrvāṃkurācitam  
sitasūtrāvṛtaṃ kaṃṭhe navavastrayugāvṛtam  śuddhāmbupūrṇamutkūrcaṃ sadravyaṃ sapidhānakam  
bhṛṅgāraṃ vardhanīṃ cāpi śaṃkhaṃ ca cakrameva vā  vinā sūtrādikaṃ sarvaṃ padmapatramathāpi vā  
tasyāsanāraviṃdasya kalpayeduttare dale  agrataścaṃdanāṃbhobhirastrarājasya vardhanīm  
maṇḍalasya tataḥ prācyāṃ maṃtrakuṃbhe ca pūrvavat  kṛtvā vidhivadīśasya mahāpūjāṃ samācaret  
athārṇavasya tīre vā nadyāṃ goṣṭhe 'pi vā girau  devāgare gṛhe vāpi deśe 'nyasminmanohare  
kṛtvā pūrvoditaṃ sarvaṃ vinā vā maṃḍapādikam  maṃḍalaṃ pūrvavatkṛtvā sthaṃḍilaṃ ca vibhāvasoḥ  
praviśya pūjābhavanaṃ prahṛṣṭavadano guruḥ  sarvamaṃgalasaṃyuktaḥ samācaritanaityakaḥ  
mahāpūjāṃ maheśasya kṛtvā maṇḍalamadhyataḥ  śivakuṃbhe tathā bhūyaḥ śivamāvāhya pūjayet  
paścimābhimukhaṃ dhyātvā yajñarakṣakamīśvaram  arcayedastravardhanyāmastramīśasya dakṣiṇe  
mantrakumbhe ca vinyasya mantraṃ mantraviśāradaḥ  kṛtvā mudrādikaṃ sarvaṃ mantrayāgaṃ samācaret  
tataśśivānale homaṃ kuryāddeśikasattamaḥ  pradhānakuṇḍe parito juhuyuścāpare dvijāḥ  
ācāryātpādamardhaṃ vā homasteṣāṃ vidhīyate  pradhānakuṇḍa evātha juhuyāddeśikottamaḥ  
svādhyāyamapare kuryuḥ stotraṃ maṃgalavācanam  japaṃ ca vidhivaccānye śivabhaktiparāyaṇāḥ  
nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca maṃgalānyaparāṇi ca  pūjanaṃ ca sadasyānāṃ kṛtvā samyagvidhānataḥ  
puṇyāhaṃ kārayitvātha punaḥ saṃpūjya śaṃkaram  prārthayeddeśiko devaṃ śiṣyānugrahakāmyayā  
prasīda devadeveśa dehamāviśya māmakam  vimocayainaṃ viśveśa ghṛṇayā ca ghṛṇānidhe  
atha caivaṃ karomīti labdhānujñastu deśikaḥ  ānīyopoṣitaṃ śiṣyaṃ haviṣyāśinameva vā  
ekāśanaṃ vā virataṃ snātaṃ prātaḥkṛtakriyam  japaṃtaṃ praṇavaṃ devaṃ dhyāyaṃtaṃ kṛtamaṃgalam  
dvārasya paścimasyāgramaṇḍale dakṣiṇasya vā  darbhāsane samāsīnaṃ vidhāyodaṅmukhaṃ śiśum  
svayaṃ prāgvadanastiṣṭhannūrdhvakāyaṃ kṛtāṃjalim  saṃprokṣya prokṣaṇautoyairmūrdhanyastreṇa mudrayā  
puṣpakṣepeṇa saṃtāḍya badhnīyāllocanaṃ guruḥ  dukūlārdhena vastreṇa maṃtritena navena ca  
tataḥ praveśayecchiṣyaṃ gururdvāreṇa maṃḍalam  so 'pi teneritaḥ śaṃbhorācarettriḥ pradakṣiṇam  
tatassuvarṇasaṃmiśraṃ dattvā puṣpāṃjaliṃ prabhoḥ  prāṅmukhaścodaṅmukho vā praṇameddaṃḍavatkṣito  
tatassaṃprokṣya mūlena śirasyastreṇa pūrvavat  saṃtāḍya deśikastasya mocayennetrabaṃdhanam  
sa dṛṣṭvā maṃḍalaṃ bhūyaḥ praṇametsāñjaliḥ prabhum  athāsīnaṃ śivācāryo maṃḍalasya tu dakṣiṇe  
upaveśyātmanassavye śiṣyaṃ darbhāsane guruḥ  ārādhya ca mahādevaṃ śivahastaṃ pravinyaset  
śivatejomayaṃ pāṇiṃ śivamaṃtramudīrayet  śivābhimānasaṃpanno nyasecchiṣyasya mastake  
sarvāṃgālaṃbanaṃ caiva kuryāttenaiva deśikaḥ  śiṣyo 'pi praṇamedbhūmau deśikākṛtamīśvaram  
tataśśivānale devaṃ samabhyarcya yathāvidhi  hutāhutitrayaṃ śiṣyamupaveśya yathā purā  
darbhāgraiḥ saṃspṛśaṃstaṃ ca vidyayātmānamāviśet  namaskṛtya mahādevaṃ nāḍīsaṃdhānamācaret  
śivaśāstroktamārgeṇa kṛtvā prāṇasya nirgamam  śiṣyadehapraveśaṃ ca smṛtvā maṃtrāṃstu tarpayet  
saṃtarpaṇāya mūlasya tenaivāhutayo daśa  deyāstisrastathāṃgānāmaṃgaireva yathākramam  
tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā prāyaścittāya deśikaḥ  punardaśāhutīnkuryānmūlamaṃtreṇa maṃtravit  
punaḥ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ samyagācamya deśikaḥ  hutvā caiva yathānyāyaṃ svajātyā vaiśyamuddharet  
tasyaivaṃ janayetkṣātramuddhāraṃ ca tataḥ punaḥ  kṛtvā tathaiva vipratvaṃ janayedasya deśikaḥ  
rājanyaṃ caivamuddhṛtya kṛtvā vipraṃ punastayoḥ  rudratvaṃ janayedvipre rudranāmaiva sādhayet  
prokṣaṇaṃ tāḍanaṃ kṛtvā śiśossvātmānamātmani  śivātmakamanusmṛtya sphuraṃtaṃ visphuliṃgavat  
nāḍyā yathoktayā vāyuṃ recayenmaṃtrato guruḥ  nirgamya praviśennāḍyā śiṣyasya hṛdayaṃ tathā  
praviśya tasya caitanyaṃ nīlabindunibhaṃ smaran  svatejasāpāstamalaṃ jvalaṃtamanuciṃtayet  
tamādāya tayā nāḍyā maṃtrī saṃhāramudrayā  na pūrakeṇa niveśyainamekībhāvārthamātmanaḥ  
kuṃbhakena tathā nāḍyā recakena yathā purā  tasmādādāya śiṣyasya hṛdaye tanniveśayet  
tamālabhya śivāllabdhaṃ tasmai dattvopavītakam  hutvāhutitrayaṃ paścāddadyātpūrṇāhutiṃ tataḥ  
devasya dakṣiṇe śiṣyamupaveśyavarāsane  kuśapuṣpaparistīrṇe baddhāṃjalirudaṅmukham  
svastikāsanamārūḍhaṃ vidhāya prāṅmukhaḥ svayam  varāsanasthito maṃtrairmahāmaṃgalaniḥsvanaiḥ  
samādāya ghaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ pūrṇameva prasāditam  dhyāyamānaḥ śivaṃ śiṣyamābhiṣiṃceta deśikaḥ  
athāpanudya snānāṃbu paridhāya sitāṃbaram  ācāntolaṃkṛtaśśiṣyaḥ prāṃjalirmaṃḍapaṃ vrajet  
upaveśya yathāpūrvaṃ taṃ gururdarbhaviṣṭare  saṃpūjya maṃḍalaṃ devaṃ karanyāsaṃ samācaret  
tatastu bhasmanā devaṃ dhyāyanmanasi deśikaḥ  samālabheta pāṇibhyāṃ śiśuṃ śivamudīrayet  
atha tasya śivācāryo dahanaplāvanādikam  sakalīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā mātṛkānyāsavartmanā  
tataḥ śivāsanaṃ dhyātvā śiṣyamūrdhni deśikaḥ  tatrāvāhya yathānyāyamarcayenmanasā śivam  
prārthayetprāṃjalirdevaṃ nityamatra sthito bhava  iti vijñāpya taṃ śaṃbhostejasā bhāsuraṃ smaret  
saṃpūjyātha śivaṃ śaivīmājñāṃ prāpya śivātmikām  karṇe śiṣyasya śanakaiśśivamantramudīrayet  
sa tu baddhāṃjaliḥ śrutvā mantraṃ tadgatamānasaḥ  śanaistaṃ vyāharecchiṣyaśivācāryasya śāsanāt  
tataḥ śāktaṃ ca saṃdiśya mantraṃ mantravicakṣaṇaḥ  uccārayitvā ca sukhaṃ tasmai maṃgalamādiśet  
tatassamāsānmantrārthaṃ vācyavācakayogataḥ  samadiśyeśvaraṃ rūpaṃ yogamāsanamādiśet  
atha gurvājñayā śiṣyaḥ śivāgnigurusannidhau  bhaktyaivamabhisaṃdhāya dīkṣāvākyamudīrayet  
varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaśchedanaṃ śiraso 'pi vā  na tvanabhyarcya bhuṃjīya bhagavantaṃ trilocanam  
sa eva dadyānniyato yāvanmohaviparyayaḥ  tāvadārādhayeddevaṃ tanniṣṭhastatparāyaṇaḥ  
tataḥ sa samayo nāma bhaviṣyati śivāśrame  labdhādhikāro gurvājñāpālakastadvaśo bhavet  
ataḥ paraṃ nyastakaro bhasmādāya svahastataḥ  dadyācchiṣyāya mūlena rudrākṣaṃ cābhimaṃtritam  
pratimā vāpi devasya gūḍhadehamathāpi vā  pūjāhomajapadhyānasādhanāni ca saṃbhave  
sopi śiṣyaḥ śivācāryāllabdhāni bahumānataḥ  ādadītājñayā tasya deśikasya na cānyathā  
ācāryādāptamakhilaṃ śirasyādhāya bhaktitaḥ  rakṣayetpūjayecchaṃbhuṃ maṭhe vā gṛha evavā  
ataḥ paraṃ śivācāramādiśedasya deśikaḥ  bhaktiśraddhānusāreṇa prajñāyāścānusārataḥ  
yaduktaṃ yatsamājñātaṃ yaccaivānyatprakīrtitam  śivācāryeṇa samaye tatsarvaṃ śirasā vahet  
śivāgamasya grahaṇaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇaṃ tathā  deśikadeśataḥ kuryānna svecchāto na cānyataḥ  
iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ saṃskāraḥ samayāhvayaḥ  sākṣācchivapuraprāptau nṛṇāṃ paramasādhanam  
upamanyuruvāca  ataḥ paraṃ samāvekṣya guruḥ śiṣyasya yogyatām  ṣaḍadhvaśuddhiṃ kurvīta sarvabaṃdhavimuktaye  
kalāṃ tattvaṃ ca bhuvanaṃ varṇaṃ padamataḥ param  maṃtraśceti samāsena ṣaḍadhvā paripaṭhyate  
nivṛttyādyāḥ kalāḥ pañca kalādhvā kathyate budhaiḥ  vyāptāḥ kalābhiritare tvadhvānaḥ pañca pañcabhiḥ  
śivatattvādibhūmyaṃtaṃ tattvādhvā samudāhṛtaḥ  ṣaḍviṃśatsaṃkhyayopetaḥ śuddhāśuddhobhayātmakaḥ  
ādhārādyunmanāṃtaśca bhuvanādhvā prakīrtitaḥ  vinā bhedopabhedābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭisaṃkhyāsamanvitaḥ  
pañcāśadrudrarūpāstu varṇā varṇādhvasaṃjñitāḥ  anekabhedasaṃpannaḥ padādhvā samudāhṛtaḥ  
sarvopamaṃtrairmaṃtrādhvā vyāptaḥ paramavidyayā  yathā śivo na tattveṣu gaṇyate tattvanāyakaḥ  
maṃtrādhvani na gaṇyeta tathāsau maṃtranāyakaḥ  kalādhvano vyāpakatvaṃ vyāpyatvaṃ cetarādhvanām  
na vetti tattvato yasya naivārhatyadhvaśodhanam  ṣaḍvidhasyādhvano rūpaṃ na yena viditaṃ bhavet  
vyāpyavyāpakatā tena jñātumeva na śakyate  tasmādadhvasvarūpaṃ ca vyāpyavyāpakatāṃ tathā  
yathāvadavagamyaiva kuryādadhvaviśodhanam  kuṃḍamaṃḍalaparyaṃtaṃ tatra kṛtvā yathā purā  
dvihastamānaṃ kurvīta prācyāṃ kalaśamaṃḍalam  tataḥ snātaśśivācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ kṛtanaityakaḥ  
praviśya maṃḍalaṃ śaṃbhoḥ pūjāṃ pūrvavadācaret  tatrāḍhakāvaraissiddhaṃ taṃdulaiḥ pāyasaṃ prabhoḥ  
ardhaṃ nivedya homārthaṃ śeṣaṃ samupakalpayet  purataḥ kalpite vātha maṃḍale varṇimaṃḍite  
sthāpayetpañcakalaśāndikṣu madhye ca deśikaḥ  teṣu brahmāṇi mūlārṇairbindunādasamanvitaiḥ  
nama ādyairyakarāṃtaiḥ kalpayetkalpavittamaḥ  īśānaṃ madhyame kuṃbhe puruṣaṃ purataḥ sthite  
aghoraṃ dakṣiṇe vāme vāmaṃ sadyaṃ ca paścime  rakṣāṃ vidhāya mudrā ca baddhvā kuṃbhābhimaṃtraṇam  
kṛtvā śivānalairhomaṃ prārabhetyathā purā  yadardhaṃ pāyasaṃ pūrvaṃ homārthaṃ parikalpitam  
hutvā śiṣyasya taccheṣaṃ bhoktuṃ samupakalpayet  tarpaṇāṃtaṃ ca maṃtrāṇāṃ kṛtvā karma yathā purā  
hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ teṣāṃ tataḥ kuryātpradīpanam  oṃkārādanu huṃkāraṃ tato mūlaṃ phaḍaṃtakam  
svāhāṃtaṃ dīpane prāhuraṃgāni ca yathākramam  teṣāmāhutayastisro deyā dīpanakarmaṇi  
maṃtrairekaikaśastaistu vicintyā dīptamūrtayaḥ  triguṇaṃ triguṇī kṛtya dvijakanyākṛtaṃ sitam  
sūtraṃ sūtreṇa saṃmaṃtrya śikhāgre baṃdhayecchiśoḥ  caraṇāṃguṣṭhaparyaṃtamūrdhvakāyasya tiṣṭhataḥ  
laṃbayitvā tu tatsūtraṃ suṣumṇāṃ tatra yojayet  śāṃtayā mudrayādāya mūlamaṃtreṇa maṃtravit  
hutvāhutitrayaṃ tasyāssānnidhyamupakalpayet  hṛdi saṃtāḍya śiṣyasya puṣpakṣepeṇa pūrvavat  
caitanyaṃ samupādāya dvādaśāṃte nivedya ca  sūtraṃ sūtreṇa saṃyojya saṃrakṣyāstreṇa varmaṇā  
avaguṃṭhyātha tatsūtraṃ śiṣyadehaṃ viciṃtayet  mūlatrayamayaṃ pāśaṃ bhogabhogyatvalakṣaṇam  
viṣayendriyadehādijanakaṃ tasya bhāvayet  vyomādibhūtarūpiṇyaḥ śāṃtyatītādayaḥ kalāḥ  
sūtre svanāmabhiryojyaḥ pūjyaścaiva namoyutaiḥ  athavā bījabhūtaistatkṛtvā pūrvoditaṃ kramāt  
tato malādestattvādau vyāptiṃ samalokayet  kalāvyāptiṃ malādau ca hutvā saṃdīpayetkalāḥ  
śiṣyaṃ śirasi saṃtāḍya sūtraṃ dehe yathākramam  śāṃtyatītapade sūtraṃ lāñchayenmaṃtramuccaran  
evaṃ kṛtvā nivṛttyantaṃ śāṃtyatītamanukramāt  hutvāhutitrayaṃ paścānmaṇḍale ca śivaṃ yajet  
devasya dakṣiṇe śiṣyamupaveśyottarāmukham  sadarbhe maṇḍale dadyāddhomaśiṣṭaṃ caruṃ guruḥ  
śiṣyastadguruṇā dattaṃ satkṛtya śivapūrvakam  bhuktvā paścāddvirācamya śivamantramudīrayet  
apare maṇḍale dadyātpañcagavyaṃ tathā guruḥ  so 'pi tacchaktitaḥ pītvā dvirācamya śivaṃ smaret  
tṛtīye maṇḍale śiṣyamupaveśya yathā purā  pradadyāddaṃtapavanaṃ yathāśāstroktalakṣaṇam  
agreṇa tasya mṛdunā prāṅmukho vāpyudaṅmukhaḥ  vācaṃ niyamya cāsīnaśśiṣyo daṃtānviśodhayet  
prakṣālya daṃtapavanaṃ tyaktvācamya śivaṃ smaret  praviśeddeśikādiṣṭaḥ prāṃjaliḥ śivamaṇḍalam  
tyaktaṃ taddantapavanaṃ dṛśyate guruṇā yadi  prāgudakpaścime vāgre śivamanyacchivetaram  
aśastāśāmukhe tasmingurustaddoṣaśāṃtaye  śatamardhaṃ tadardhaṃ vājuhuyānmūlamantrataḥ  
tataḥ śiṣyaṃ samālabhya japitvā karṇayoḥ śivam  devasya dakṣiṇe bhāge taṃ śiṣyamadhivāsayet  
ahatāstaraṇāstīrṇe sa darbhaśayane śuciḥ  maṃtrite 'ntaḥ śivaṃ dhyāyañśayīta prākchirā niśi  
śikhāyāṃ baddhasūtrasya śikhayā tacchikhāṃ guruḥ  ābadhyāhatavastreṇa tamācchādya ca varmaṇā  
rekhātrayaṃ ca parito bhasmanā tilasarṣapaiḥ  kṛtvāstrajaptaistadvāhye digīśānāṃ baliṃ haret  
śiṣyo 'pi parato 'naśnankṛtvaivamadhivāsanam  prabudhyotthāya gurave svapnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nivedayet  
upamanyuruvāca  tataḥ snānādikaṃ sarvaṃ samāpyācāryacoditaḥ  gacchedbaddhāṃjalirdhyāyañchivamaṇḍalapārśvataḥ  
atha pūjāṃ vinā sarvaṃ kṛtvā pūrvadine yathā  netrabaṃdhanaparyaṃtaṃ darśayenmaṇḍalaṃ guruḥ  
baddhanetreṇa śiṣyeṇa puṣpāvakiraṇe kṛte  yatrāpataṃti puṣṇāṇi tasya nāmā 'sya saṃdiśet  
taṃ copanīya nirmālyamaṇḍale 'sminyathā purā  pūjayeddevamīśānaṃ juhuyācca śivānale  
śiṣyeṇa yadi duḥsvapno dṛṣṭastaddoṣaśāṃtaye  śatamardhaṃ tadardhaṃ vā juhuyānmūlavidyayā  
tataḥ sūtraṃ śikhābaddhaṃ laṃbayitvā yathā purā  ādhārapūjāprabhṛti yannivṛttikalāśrayam  
vāgīśvarīpūjanāṃtaṃ kuryāddhomapurassaram  atha praṇamya vāgīśaṃ nivṛttervyāpikāṃ satīm  
maṇḍale devamabhyarcya hutvā caivāhutitrayam  prāpayecca śiśoḥ prāptiṃ yugapatsarvayoniṣu  
sūtradehe 'tha śiṣyasya tāḍanaprokṣaṇādikam  kṛtvātmānaṃ samādāya dvādaśāṃte nivedya ca  
tato 'pyādāya mūlena mudrayā śāstradṛṣṭayā  yojayenmanasācāryo yugapatsarvayoniṣu  
devānāṃ jātayaścāṣṭau tiraścāṃ pañca jātayaḥ  jātyaikayā ca mānuṣyā yonayaśca caturdaśa  
tāsu sarvāsu yugapatpraveśāya śiśordhiyā  vāgīśānyāṃ yathānyāyaṃ śiṣyātmānaṃ niveśayet  
garbhaniṣpattaye devaṃ saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca  hutvā caiva yathānyāyaṃ niṣpannaṃ tadanusmaret  
niṣpannasyaivamutpattimanuvṛttiṃ ca karmaṇā  ārjavaṃ bhoganiṣpattiḥ kuryātprītiṃ parāṃ tathā  
niṣkṛtyarthaṃ ca jātyāyurbhogasaṃskārasiddhaye  hutvāhutitrayaṃ devaṃ prārthayeddeśikottamaḥ  
bhoktṛtvaviṣayāsaṃgamalaṃ tatkāyaśodhanam  kṛtvaivameva śiṣyasya chiṃdyātpāśatrayaṃ tataḥ  
nikṛtyā pari baddhasya pāśasyātyaṃtabhedataḥ  kṛtvā śiṣyasya caitanyaṃ svacchaṃ manyeta kevalam  
hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ vahnau brahmāṇaṃ pūjayettataḥ  hutvāhutitrayaṃ tasmai śivājñāmanusaṃdiśet  
pitāmaha tvayā nāsya yātuḥ śaivaṃ paraṃ padam  pratibandho vidhātavyaḥ śaivājñaiṣā garīyasī  
ityādiśya tamabhyarcya visṛja ca vidhānataḥ  samabhyarcya mahādevaṃ juhuyādāhutitrayam  
nivṛttyā śuddhamuddhṛtya śiṣyātmānaṃ yathā purā  niveśyātmani sūtre ca vāgīśaṃ pūjayettataḥ  
hutvāhutitrayaṃ tasmai praṇamya ca visṛjya tām  kuryānnivṛttaḥ saṃdhānaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ kalayā saha  
saṃdhāne yugapatpūjāṃ kṛtvā hutvāhutitrayam  śiṣyātmanaḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ praveśaṃ tvatha bhāvayet  
tataḥ pratiṣṭhāmāvāhya kṛtvāśeṣaṃ puroditam  tadvyāptiṃ vyāpikāṃ tasya vāgīśānīṃ ca bhāvayet  
pūrṇedumaṃḍalaprakhyāṃ kṛtvā śeṣaṃ ca pūrvavat  viṣṇave saṃviśedājñāṃ śivasya paramātmanaḥ  
viṣṇorvisarjanādyaṃ ca kṛtvā śeṣaṃ ca vidyayā  pratiṣṭhāmanusaṃdhāya tasyāṃ cāpi yathā purā  
kṛtvānucintya tadvyāptiṃ vāgīśāṃ ca yathākramam  dīptāgnau pūrṇahomāntaṃ kṛtvā śeṣaṃ ca pūrvavat  
nīlarudramupasthāpya tasmai pūjādikaṃ tathā  kṛtvā karma śivājñāṃ ca dadyātpūrvoktavartmanā  
tapastamapi codvāsya kṛtvā tasyātha śāṃtaye  vidyākalāṃ samādhāya tadvyāptiṃ cāvalokayet  
svātmano vyāpikāṃ tadvadvāgīśīṃ ca yathā purā  bālārkasadṛśākārāṃ bhāsayaṃtīṃ diśo daśa  
tataḥ śeṣaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ kṛtvā devaṃ maheśvaram  āvāhyārādhya hutvāsmai śivājñāṃ manasā diśet  
maheśvaraṃ tathotsṛjya kṛtvānyāṃ ca kalāmimām  śāṃtyatītāṃ kalāṃ nītvā tadvyāptimavalokayet  
svātmano vyāpikāṃ tadvadvāgīśāṃ ca viciṃtayet  nabhomaṃḍalasaṃkāśāṃ pūrṇāṃtaṃ cāpi pūrvavat  
kṛtvā śeṣavidhānena samabhyarcya sadāśivam  tasmai samādiśedājñāṃ śaṃbhoramitakarmaṇaḥ  
tatrāpi ca yathāpūrvaṃ śivaṃ śirasi pūrvavat  samabhyarcya ca vāgīśaṃ praṇamya ca visarjayet  
tataśśivena samprokṣya śiṣyaṃ śirasi pūrvavat  vilayaṃ śāṃtyatītāyāḥ śaktitattve 'tha ciṃtayet  
ṣaḍadhvanaḥ pare pāre sarvādhvavyāpinī parām  koṭisūryapratīkāśaṃ śaivīṃ śaktiñca cintayet  
tadagre śiṣyamānīya śuddhasphaṭikanirmalam  prakṣālya kartarīṃ paścācchivaśāstroktamārgataḥ  
kuryāttasya śikhācchedaṃ saha sūtreṇa deśikaḥ  tatastāṃ gomaye nyasya śivāgnau juhuyācchikhām  
vauṣaḍaṃtena mūlena punaḥ prakṣālya kartarīm  haste śiṣyasya caitanyaṃ taddehe vinivartayet  
tataḥ snātaṃ samācāṃtaṃ kṛtasvastyayanaṃ śiśum  praveśya maṃḍalābhyāsaṃ praṇipatya ca daṃḍavat  
pūjāṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ kriyāvaikalyaśuddhaye  vācakenaiva maṃtreṇa juhuyādāhutitrayam  
upāṃśūccārayogena juhuyādāhutitrayam  punassaṃpūjya deveśaṃ mantravaikalyaśuddhaye  
mānasoccārayogena juhuyādāhutitrayam  tatra śaṃbhuṃ samārādhya maṃḍalasthaṃ sahāṃbayā  
hutvāhutitrayaṃ paścātprārthayetprāṃjalirguruḥ  bhagavaṃstvatprasādena śuddhirasya ṣaḍadhvanaḥ  
kṛtā tasmātparaṃ dhāma gamayainaṃ tavāvyayam  iti vijñāpya devāya nāḍīsaṃdhānapūrvakam  
pūrṇāṃtaṃ pūrvavatkṛtvā tato bhūtāni śodhayet  sthirāsthire tataḥ śuddhyai śītoṣṇe ca tataḥ pade  
dhyāyedvyāptyaikatākāre bhūtaśodhanakarmaṇi  bhūtānāṃ graṃthivicchedaṃ kṛtvā tyaktvā sahādhipaiḥ  
bhūtāni sthitayogena yo japetparame śive  viśodhyāsya tanuṃ dagdhvā plāvayitvā sudhākaṇaiḥ  
sthāpyātmānaṃ tataḥ kuryādviśuddhādhvamayaṃ vapuḥ  tatrādau śāntyatītāṃ tu vyāpikāṃ svādhvanaḥ kalām  
śuddhāmeva śiśormūrdhni nyasecchāntimukhe tathā  vidyāṃ galādinābhyaṃtaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ tadadhaḥ kramāt  
jānvaṃtaṃ tadadho nyasyennivṛttiṃ cānuciṃtayet  svabījaissūtramaṃtraṃ ca nyasyāṃ gaistaṃ śivātmakam  
buddhvā taṃ hṛdayāṃbhoje devamāvāhya pūjayet  āśāsya nityasāṃnidhyaṃ śivasvātmyaṃ śiśau guruḥ  
śivatejomayasyāsya śiśorāpādayedguṇān  aṇimādīnprasīdeti pradadyādāhutitrayam  
tathaiva tu guṇāneva punarasyopapādayet  sarvajñātāṃ tathā tṛptiṃ bodhaṃ cādyantavarjitam  
aluptaśaktiṃ svātantryamanaṃtāṃ śaktimeva ca  tato devamanujñāpya sadyādikalaśaistu tam  
abhiṣiṃceta deveśaṃ dhyāyanhṛdi yathākramam  athopaveśya taṃ śiṣyaṃ śivamabhyarcya pūrvavat  
labdhānujñaḥ śivācchaivīṃ vidyāmasmai samādiśet  oṃkārapūrvikāṃ tatra saṃpuṭāntu namo 'ṃtagām  
śivaśaktiyutāñcaiva śaktividyāṃ ca tādṛśīm  ṛṣiṃ chandaśca devaṃ ca śivatāṃ śivayostathā  
pūjāṃ sāvaraṇāṃ śambhorāsanāni ca sandiśet  punaḥ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ yanmayā samanuṣṭhitam  
sukṛtaṃ kuru tatsarvamiti vijñāpayecchivam  sahaśiṣyo gururdevaṃ daṇḍavatkṣitimaṃḍale  
praṇamyodvāsayettasmānmaṃḍalātpāvakādapi  tataḥ sadasikāḥ sarve pūjyāḥ pūjārhakāḥ kramāt  
sevyā vittānusāreṇa sadasyāśca sahartvijaḥ  vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kurvīta yadīcchecchivamātmanaḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sādhakaṃ nāma nāmataḥ  saṃskāramantramāhātmyaṃ kathane sūcitaṃ mayā  
saṃpūjya maṃḍale devaṃ sthāpya kumbhe ca pūrvavat  hutvā śiṣyamanuṣṇīṣaṃ prāpayedbhuvi maṃḍale  
pūrvāṃtaṃ pūrvavatkṛtvā hutvāhutiśataṃ tathā  saṃtarpya mūlamantreṇa kalaśairdeśikottamaḥ  
sandīpya ca yathāpūrvaṃ kṛtvā pūrvoditaṃ kramāt  abhiṣicya yathāpūrvaṃ pradadyānmantramuttamam  
tatra vidyopadeśāṃtaṃ kṛtvā vistaraśaḥ kramāt  puṣpāmbunā śiśoḥ pāṇau vidyāṃ śaivīṃ samarpayet  
tavaihikāmuṣmikayoḥ sarvasiddhiphalapradaḥ  bhavatyeva mahāmantraḥ prasādātparameṣṭhinaḥ  
ityutvā devamabhyarcya labdhānujñaḥ śivādguruḥ  sādhanaṃ śivayogaṃ ca sādhakāya samādiśet  
tacchrutvā gurusaṃdeśaṃ kramaśo maṃtrasādhakaḥ  purato viniyogasya mantrasādhanamācaret  
sādhanaṃ mūlamantrasya puraścaraṇamucyate  purataścaraṇīyatvādviniyogākhyakarmaṇaḥ  
nātyantaṃ karaṇīyantu mumukṣormantrasādhanam  kṛtantu tadihānyatra tāsyāpi śubhadaṃ bhavet  
śubhe 'hani śubhe deśe kāle vā doṣavarjite  śukladantanakhaḥ snātaḥ kṛtapūrvāhṇikakriyaḥ  
alaṃkṛtya yathā labdhairgaṃdhamālyavibhūṣaṇaiḥ  soṣṇīṣaḥ sottarāsaṃgaḥ sarvaśuklasamāhitaḥ  
devālaye gṛhe 'nyasmindeśe vā sumanohare  sukhenābhyastapūrveṇa tvāsanena kṛtāsanaḥ  
tanuṃ kṛtvātmanaḥ śaivīṃ śivaśāstroktavartmanā  saṃpūjya devadeveśaṃ nakulīśvaramīśvaram  
nivedya pāyasaṃ tasmai samapyārādhanaṃ kramāt  praṇipatya ca taṃ devaṃ prāptānujñaśca tanmukhāt  
koṭivāraṃ tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā japecchivam  lakṣaviṃśatikaṃ vāpi daśalakṣamathāpi vā  
tataśca pāyasākṣāralavaṇaikamitāśanaḥ  ahiṃsakaḥ kṣamī śāṃto dāṃtaścaiva sadā bhavet  
alābhe pāyasasyāśnanphalamūlādikāni vā  vihitāni śivenaiva viśiṣṭānyuttarottaram  
caruṃ bhakṣyamatho saktukaṇānyāvakameva ca  śākaṃ payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ mūlaṃ phalamathodakam  
abhimaṃtrya ca mantreṇa bhakṣyabhojyādikāni ca  sādhane 'sminviśeṣeṇa nityaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  
mantrāṣṭaśatapūtena jalena śucinā vratī  snāyānnadīnadotthena prokṣayedvātha śaktitaḥ  
tarpayecca tathā nityaṃ juhuyācca śivānale  saptabhiḥ pañcabhirdravyaistribhirvātha ghṛtena vā  
itthaṃ bhaktyā śivaṃ śaivo yaḥ sādhayati sādhakaḥ  tasyehāmutra duṣprāpaṃ na kiṃcidapi vidyate  
athavā 'haraharmaṃtraṃ japedekāgramānasaḥ  anaśnanneva sāhasraṃ vinā mantrasya sādhanam  
na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃcinna tasyāstyaśubhaṃ kvacit  iha vidyāṃ śriyaṃ saukhyaṃ labdhvā muktiṃ ca viṃdati  
sādhane viniyoge ca nitye naimittike tathā  japejjalairbhasmanā ca snātvā mantreṇa ca kramāt  
śucirbaddhaśikhassūtrī sapavitrakarastathā  dhṛtatripuṃḍrarudrākṣo vidyāṃ pañcākṣarīṃ japet  
upamanyuruvāca  athaivaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ śiṣyaṃ kṛtapāśupatavratam  ācāryatve 'bhiṣiṃceta tadyogatvena cānyathā  
maṇḍalaṃ pūrvavatkṛttvā saṃpūjya parameśvaram  sthāpayatpañcakalaśāndikṣu madhye ca pūrvavat  
nivṛttiṃ purato nyasya pratiṣṭhāṃ paścime ghaṭe  vidyāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ śāṃtimuttare madhyataḥ parām  
kṛtvā rakṣādikaṃ tatra baddhvā mudrāṃ ca dhainavīm  abhimaṃtrya ghaṭānhutvā pūrṇāṃtaṃ ca yathā purā  
praveśya maṃḍale śiṣyamanuṣṇīṣaṃ ca deśikaḥ  tarpaṇādyaṃ tu maṃtrāṇāṃ kuryātpūrvāvasānakam  
tataḥ saṃpūjya deveśamanujñāpya ca pūrvavat  abhiṣekāya taṃ śiṣyamāsanaṃ tvadhirohayet  
sakalīkṛtya taṃ paścātkalāpañcakarūpiṇam  nyastamaṃtratanuṃ baddhvā śivaṃ śiṣyaṃ samarpayet  
tato nivṛttikuṃbhādighaṭānuddhṛtya vai kramāt  madhyamāntācchivenaiva śiṣyaṃ tamabhiṣecayat  
śivahastaṃ samarpyātha śiśoḥ śirasi deśikaḥ  śivabhāvasamāpannaḥ śivācāryaṃ tamādiśet  
athālaṃkṛtya taṃ devamārādhya śivamaṇḍale  śatamaṣṭottaraṃ hutvā dadyātpūrṇāhutiṃ tataḥ  
punaḥ sampūjya deveśaṃ praṇamya bhuvi daṃḍavat  śirasyaṃjalimādhāya śivaṃ vijñāpayedguruḥ  
bhagavaṃstvatprasādena deśikoyaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ  anugṛhya tvayā deva divyājñāsmai pradīyatām  
evaṃ vijñāpya śiṣyeṇa saha bhūyaḥ praṇamya ca  śivaṃ śivāgamaṃ divyaṃ pūjayecchivavadguruḥ  
punaḥ śivamanujñāpya śivajñānasya pustakam  ubhābhyāmatha pāṇibhyāṃ dadyācchiṣyāya deśikaḥ  
sa tāmmūrdhni samādhāya vidyāṃ vidyāsanopari  adhiropya yathānyāyamabhivaṃdya samarcayet  
atha tasmai gururdadyādrājopakaraṇānyapi  ācāryapadavīṃ prāpto rājyaṃ cāpi yato 'rhati  
athānuśāsanaṃ kuryātpūrvairācaritaṃ yathā  yathā ca śivaśāstroktaṃ yathā lokeṣu pūjyate  
śiṣyānparikṣya yatnena śivaśāstroktalakṣaṇaiḥ  saṃskṛtya ca śivajñānaṃ tebhyo dadyācca deśikaḥ  
evaṃ sarvamanāyāsaṃ śaucaṃ kṣāṃtiṃ dayāṃ tathā  aspṛhāmapyasūyāṃ ca yatnena ca vibhāvayet  
itthamādiśya taṃ śiṣyaṃ śivamudvāsya maṃḍalāt  śivakuṃbhānalādīṃśca sadasyānapi pūjayet  
yugapadvātha saṃskārānkurvīta sagaṇo guruḥ  tatra yatra dvayaṃ vāpi prayogasyopadiśyate  
tadādāveva kalaśānkalpayedadhvaśuddhivat  kṛtvā samayasaṃskāramabhiṣekaṃ vinākhilam  
samabhyarcya śivaṃ bhūyaḥ kṛtvā cādhvaviśodhanam  tasminparisamāpte tu punardevaṃ prapūjayet  
hutvā maṃtrantu saṃtarpya saṃdīpyāśāsya ceśvaram  samarpya maṃtraṃ śiṣyasya pāṇau śeṣaṃ samāpayet  
athavā maṃtrasaṃskāramanuciṃtyākhilaṃ kramāt  adhvaśuddhiṃ guruḥ kuryādabhiṣekāvasānikam  
tatra yaḥ śāntyatītādikalāsu vihito vidhiḥ  sa sarvo 'pi vidhātavyastattvatrayaviśodhane  
śivavidyātmatattvākhyaṃ tattvatrayamudāhṛtam  śaktau śivastato vidyāttasyāstvātmā samudbabhau  
śivena śāṃtyatītādhvā vyāptastadaparaḥ paraḥ  vidyayā pariśiṣṭo 'dhvā hyātmanā nikhilaḥ kramāt  
durlabhaṃ śāṃbhavaṃ matvā maṃtramūlaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ  śāktaṃ śaṃsīta saṃskāraṃ śivaśāstrārthapāragāḥ  
iti te sarvamākhyātaṃ saṃskārākhyasya karmaṇaḥ  cāturvidhyamidaṃ kṛṣṇa kiṃ bhūya śrotumicchasi  
kṛṣṇa uvāca  bhagavañchrotumicchāmi śivāśramaniṣeviṇām  śivaśāstroditaṃ karma nityanaimittikaṃ tathā  
upamanyuruvāca  prātarutthāya śayanāddhyātvā devaṃ sahāmbayā  vicārya kāryaṃ nirgacchedgṛhādabhyudite 'ruṇe  
abādhe vijane deśe kuryādāvaśyakaṃ tataḥ  kṛtvā śaucaṃ vidhānena daṃtadhāvanamācaret  
alābhe daṃtakāṣṭhānāmaṣṭamyādidineṣu ca  apāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣaiḥ kuryādāsyaviśodhanam  
ācamya vidhivatpaścādvāruṇaṃ snānamācaret  nadyāṃ vā devakhāte vā hrade vātha gṛhe 'pi vā  
snānadravyāṇi tattīre sthāpayitvā bahirmalam  vyāpohya mṛdamālipya snātvā gomayamālipet  
snātvā punaḥ punarvastraṃ tyaktvāvātha viśodhya ca  susnāto nṛpavadbhūyaḥ śuddhaṃ vāso vasīta ca  
malasnānaṃ sugaṃdhādyaiḥ snānaṃ dantaviśodhanam  na kuryādbrahmacārī ca tapasvī vidhavā tathā  
sopavītaśśikhāṃ baddhā praviśya ca jalāṃtaram  avagāhya samācāṃto jale nyasyettrimaṃḍalam  
saumye magnaḥ punarmaṃtraṃ japecchaktyā śivaṃ smaret  utthāyācamya tenaiva svātmānamabhiṣecayet  
gośṛṃgeṇa sadarbheṇa pālāśena dalena vā  pādmena vātha pāṇibhyāṃ pañcakṛtvastrireva vā  
udyānādau gṛhe caiva vardhanyā kalaśena vā  avagāhanakāle 'dbhirmaṃtritairabhiṣecayet  
atha cedvāruṇaṃ kartumaśaktaḥ śuddhavāsasā  ārdreṇa śodhayeddehamāpādatalamastakam  
āgneyaṃ vātha vā māṃtraṃ kuryātsnānaṃ śivena vā  śivaciṃtāparaṃ snānaṃ yuktasyātmīyamucyate  
svasūtroktavidhānena maṃtrācamanapūrvakam  ācaredbrahmayajñāṃtaṃ kṛtvā devāditarpaṇam  
maṃḍalasthaṃ mahādevaṃ dhyātvābhyarcya yathāvidhi  dadyādarghyaṃ tatastasmai śivāyādityarūpiṇe  
atha vaitatsvasūtroktaṃ kṛtvā hastau viśodhayet  karanyāsaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā sakalīkṛtavigrahaḥ  
vāmahastagatāṃbhobhirgaṃdhasiddhārthakānvitaiḥ  kuśapuṃjena vābhyukṣya mūlamaṃtrasamanvitaiḥ  
āpohiṣṭhādibhirmantraiḥ śeṣamāghrāya vai jalam  vāmanāsāpuṭenaiva devaṃ saṃbhāvayetsitam  
arghamādāya dehasthaṃ savyanāsāpuṭena ca  kṛṣṇavarṇena bāhyasthaṃ bhāvayecca śilāgatam  
tarpayedatha devebhya ṛṣibhiśca viśeṣataḥ  bhūtebhyaśca pitṛbhyaśca dadyādarghyaṃ yathāvidhi  
raktacaṃdanatoyena hastamātreṇa maṃḍalam  suvṛttaṃ kalpayedbhūmau raktacūrṇādyalaṃkṛtam  
tatra saṃpūjayedbhānuṃ svakīyāvaraṇaiḥ saha  svakholkāyeti maṃtreṇa sāṃgatassukhasiddhaye  
punaśca maṃḍalaṃ kṛtvā tadaṃgaiḥ paripūjya ca  tatra sthāpya hemapātraṃ māgadhaprasthasaṃmitam  
pūrayedgaṃdhatoyena raktacaṃdanayoginā  raktapuṣpaistilaiścaiva kuśākṣatasamanvitaiḥ  
dūrvāpāmārgagavyaiśca kevalena jalena vā  jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gatvā natvā devaṃ ca maṃḍale  
kṛtvā śirasi tatpātraṃ dadyādarghyaṃ śivāya tat  athavāṃjalinā toyaṃ sadarbhaṃ mūlavidyayā  
utkṣipedambarasthāya śivāyādityamūrtaye  kṛtvā punaḥ karanyāsaṃ karaśodhanapūrvakam  
buddhveśānādisadyāṃtaṃ pañcabrahmamayaṃ śivam  gṛhītvā bhasitaṃ mantrairvimṛjyāṅgāni saṃspṛśet  
yā dināṃtaiśśirovaktrahṛdguhyacaraṇānkramāt  tato mūlena sarvāṃgamālabhya vasanāntaram  
paridhāya dvirācamya prokṣyaikādaśamantritaiḥ  jalairācchādya vāso 'yaddvirācamya śivaṃ smaret  
punarnyastakaro mantrī tripuṃḍraṃ bhasmanā likhet  avakramāya taṃ vyaktaṃ lalāṭe gandhavāriṇā  
vṛttaṃ vā caturasraṃ vā bindumardhendumeva vā  lalāṭe yādṛśaṃ puṇḍraṃ likhitaṃ bhasmanā punaḥ  
tādṛśaṃ bhujayormūrdhni stanayoraṃtare likhet  sarvāṃgoddhūlanaṃ caiva na samānaṃ tripuṇḍrakaiḥ  
tasmāttripuṇḍramevaikaṃ likheduddhūlanaṃ vinā  rudrākṣāndhārayedmūrdhni kaṃṭhe śrote kare tathā  
suvarṇavarṇamacchinnaṃ śubhaṃ nānyairdhṛtaṃ śubham  viprādīnāṃ kramācchreṣṭhaṃ pītaṃ raktamathāsitam  
tadalābhe yathālābhaṃ dhāraṇīyamadūṣitam  tatrāpi nottaraṃ nīcairdhāryaṃ nīcamathottaraiḥ  
nāśucirdhārayedakṣaṃ sadā kāleṣu dhārayet  itthaṃ trisaṃdhyamathavā dvisaṃdhyaṃ sakṛdeva vā  
kṛtvā snānādikaṃ śaktyā pūjayetparameśvaram  prajāsthānaṃ samāsādya baddhvā ruciramāsanam  
dhyāyeddevaṃ ca devīṃ ca prāṅmukho vāpyudaṅmukhaḥ  śvetādīnnakulīśāṃtāṃstacchiṣyānpraṇamedgurum  
punardevaṃ śivaṃ natvā tato nāmāṣṭakaṃ japet  śivo maheśvaraścaiva rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ  
saṃsāravaidyassarvajñaḥ paramātmeti cāṣṭakam  athavā śivamevaikaṃ japitvaikādaśādhikam  
jihvāgre tejaso rāśiṃ dhyātvāvyādhyādiśāṃtaye  prakṣālya caraṇau kṛtvā karau caṃdanacarcitau  
prakurvīta karanyāsaṃ karaśodhanapūrvakam  
adhyāya  
upamanyuruvāca  nyāsastu trividhaḥ proktaḥ sthityutpattilayakramāt  sthitirnyāso gṛhasthānāmutpattirbrahmacāriṇām  yatīnāṃ saṃhṛtinyāso vanasthānāṃ tathaiva ca  sa eva bhartṛhīnāyāḥ kuṭuṃbinyāḥ sthitirbhavet  
kanyāyāḥ punarutpattiṃ vakṣye nyāsasya lakṣaṇam  aṃguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāṃtaṃ sthitinyāsa udāhṛtaḥ  dakṣiṇāṃguṣṭhamārabhya vāmāṃguṣṭhāntameva ca  utpattinyāsa ākhyāto viparītastu saṃhṛtiḥ  
sabiṃdukānnakārādīnvarṇānnyasyedanukramāt  aṃgulīṣu śivaṃ nyasyettalayorapyanāmayoḥ  astranyāsaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā daśadikṣvastramaṃtrataḥ  nivṛttyādikalāḥ pañca pañcabhūtasvarūpiṇīḥ  
pañcabhūtādhipaissārdhaṃ tataccihnasamanvitāḥ  hṛtkaṇṭatālubhrūmadhyabrahmarandhrasamāśrayāḥ  tadtadbījena saṃgraṃthīstadtadbījeṣu bhāvayet  tāsāṃ viśodhanārthāya vidyāṃ pañcākṣarīṃ japet  
niruddhvā prāṇavāyuṃ ca guṇasaṃkhyānusārataḥ  bhūtagraṃthiṃ tataśchidyādastreṇaivāstramudrayā  nāḍyā suṣumnayātmānaṃ preritaṃ prāṇavāyunā  nirgataṃ brahmarandhreṇa yojayecchivatejasā  
viśoṣya vāyunā paścāddehaṃ kālāgninā dahet  tataścoparibhāvena kalāssaṃhṛtya vāyunā  dehaṃ saṃhṛtya vai dagdhaṃ kalāsspṛṣṭvā sahābdhinā  plāvayitvāmṛtairdehaṃ yathāsthānaṃ niveśayet  
atha saṃhṛtya vai dagdhaḥ kalāsargaṃ vinaiva tu  amṛtaplāvanaṃ kuryādbhasmībhūtasya vai tataḥ  tato vidyāmaye tasmindehe dīpaśikhākṛtim  śivānnirgatamātmānaṃ brahmaraṃdhreṇa yojayet  
dehasyāntaḥ praviṣṭaṃ taṃ dhyātvā hṛdayapaṃkaje  punaścāmṛtavarṣeṇa siṃcedvidyāmayaṃ vapuḥ  tataḥ kuryātkaranyāsaṃ karaśodhanapūrvakam  dehanyāsaṃ tataḥ paścānmahatyā mudrayā caret  
aṃganyāsaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā śivoktena tu vartmanā  varṇanyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhastapādādisaṃdhiṣu  ṣaḍaṃgāni tato nyasya jātiṣaṭkayutāni ca  digbaṃdhamācaretpaścādāgneyādi yathākramam  
yadvā mūrdhādipañcāṃgaṃ nyāsameva samācaret  tathā ṣaḍaṃganyāsaṃ ca bhūtaśuddhyādikaṃ vinā  evaṃ samāsarūpeṇa kṛtvā dehātmaśodhanam  śivabhāvamupāgamya pūjayetparameśvaram  
atha yasyāstyavasaro nāsti vā mativibhramaḥ  sa vistīrṇena kalpena nyāsakarma samācaret  tatrādyo mātṛkānyāso brahmanyāsastataḥ paraḥ  tṛtīyaḥ praṇavanyāso haṃsanyāsastaduttaraḥ  
pañcamaḥ kathyate sadbhirnyāsaḥ pañcākṣarātmakaḥ  eteṣvekamanekaṃ vā kuryātpūjādi karmasu  akāraṃ mūrdhni vinyasya ākāraṃ ca lalāṭake  iṃ īṃ ca netrayostadvatuṃ ūṃ śravaṇayostathā  
ṛṃ ḥṃ kapolayoścaiva ḷaṃ ḹṃ nāsāpuṭadvaye  ememoṣṭhadvayoromauṃ daṃtapaṃktidvayoḥ kramāt  aṃ jihvāyāmatho tālunyaḥ prayojyo yathākramam  kavargaṃ dakṣiṇe haste nyasetpañcasu saṃdhiṣu  
cavargaṃ ca tathā vāmahastasaṃdhiṣu vinyaset  ṭavargaṃ ca tavargaṃ ca pādayorubhayorapi  paphau tu pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe nābhau cāpi babhau tataḥ  nyasenmakāraṃ hṛdaye tvagādiṣu yathākramam  
yakarādisakārāṃtānnyasetsaptasu dhātuṣu  haṃkāraṃ hṛdayasyāṃtaḥ kṣakāraṃ bhrūyugāṃtare  evaṃ varṇānpravinyasya pañcāśadrudravartmanā  aṃgavaktrakalābhedātpañca brahmāṇi vinyaset  
karanyāsādyamapi taiḥ kṛtvā vātha na vā kramāt  śirovadanahṛdguhyapādeṣvetāni kalpayet  tataścordhvādivaktrāṇi paścimāṃtāni kalpayet  īśānasya kalāḥ pañca pañcasveteṣu ca kramāt  
tataścaturṣu vaktreṣu puruṣasya kalā api  catasraḥ praṇidhātavyāḥ pūrvādikramayogataḥ  hṛtkaṃṭhāṃseṣu nābhau ca kukṣau pṛṣṭhe ca vakṣasi  aghorasya kalāścāṣṭau pādayorapi hastayoḥ  
paścāttrayoḥdaśakalāḥ pāyumeḍhrorujānuṣu  jaṃghāsphikkaṭipārśveṣu vāmadevasya bhāvayet  ghrāṇe śirasi bāhvośca kalpayetkalpavittamaḥ  aṣṭatriṃśatkalānyāsamevaṃ kṛtvānupūrvaśaḥ  
paścātpraṇavaviddhīmānpraṇavanyāsamācaret  bāhudvaye kūrparayostathā ca maṇibandhayoḥ  pārśvodarorujaṃgheṣu pādayoḥ pṛṣṭhatastathā  itthaṃ praṇavavinyāsaṃ kṛtvā nyāsavicakṣaṇaḥ  
haṃsanyāsaṃ prakurvīta śivaśāstre yathoditam  bījaṃ vibhajya haṃsasya netrayorghrāṇayorapi  vibhajya bāhunetrāsyalalāṭe ghrāṇayorapi  kakṣayoḥ skandhayoścaiva pārśvayostanayostathā  
kaṭhyoḥ pāṇyorgulphayośca yadvā pañcāṃgavartmanā  haṃsanyāsamimaṃ kṛtvā nyasetpañcākṣarīṃ tataḥ  yathā pūrvoktamārgeṇa śivatvaṃ yena jāyate  nāśivaḥ śivamabhyasyennāśivaḥ śivamarcayet  
nāśivastu śivaṃ dhyāyennāśivamprāpnuyācchivam  tasmācchaivīṃ tanuṃ kṛtvā tyaktvā ca paśubhāvanām  śivo 'hamiti saṃcintya śaivaṃ karma samācaret  karmayajñastapoyajño japayajñastaduttaraḥ  
dhyānayajño jñānayajñaḥ pañca yajñāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  karmayajñaratāḥ kecittapoyajñaratāḥ pare  japayajñaratāścānye dhyānayajñaratāstathā  
jñānayajñaratāścānye viśiṣṭāścottarottaram  kramayajño dvidhā proktaḥ kāmākāmavibhedataḥ  kāmānkāmī tato bhuktvā kāmāsaktaḥ punarbhavet  akāme rudrabhavane bhogānbhuktvā tataścyutaḥ  
tapoyajñarato bhūtvā jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  tapasvī ca punastasminbhogān bhuktvā tataścyutaḥ  japadhyānarato bhūtvā jāyate bhuvi mānavaḥ  japadhyānarato martyastadvaiśiṣṭyavaśādiha  
jñānaṃ labdhvācirādeva śivasāyujyamāpnuyāt  tasmānmukto śivājñaptaḥ karmayajño 'pi dehinām  akāmaḥ kāmasaṃyukto bandhāyaiva bhaviṣyati  tasmātpañcasu yajñeṣu dhyānajñānaparo bhavet  
dhyānaṃ jñānaṃ ca yasyāsti tīrṇastena bhavārṇavaḥ  hiṃsādidoṣanirmukto viśuddhaścittasādhanaḥ  dhyānayajñaḥ parastasmādapavargaphalapradaḥ  bahiḥ karmakarā yadvannātīva phalabhāginaḥ  
dṛṣṭvā narendrabhavane tadvadatrāpi karmiṇaḥ  dhyānināṃ hi vapuḥ sūkṣmaṃ bhavetpratyakṣamaiśvaram  yatheha karmaṇāṃ sthūlaṃ mṛtkāṣṭhādyaiḥ prakalpitam  dhyānayajñaratāstasmāddevānpāṣāṇamṛṇmayān  
nātyaṃtaṃ pratipadyaṃte śivayāthātmyavedanāt  ātmasthaṃ yaḥ śivaṃ tyaktvā bahirabhyarcayennaraḥ  hastasthaṃ phalamutsṛjya lihetkūrparamātmanaḥ  jñānāddhyānaṃ bhaveddhyānājjñānaṃ bhūyaḥ pravartate  
tadubhābhyāṃ bhavenmuktistasmāddhyānarato bhavet  dvādaśānte tathā mūrdhni lalāṭe bhrūyugāntare  nāsāgre vā tathāsye vā kandhare hṛdaye tathā  nābhau vā śāśvatasthāne śraddhāviddhena cetasā  
bahiryāgopacāreṇa devaṃ devīṃ ca pūjayet  athavā pūjayennityaṃ liṃge vā kṛtakepi vā  vahnau vā sthaṇḍile vātha bhaktyā vittānusārataḥ  athavāṃtarbahiścaiva pūjayetparameśvaram  aṃtaryāgarataḥ pūjāṃ bahiḥ kurvīta vā na vā  
upamanyuruvāca  vyākhyāṃ pūjāvidhānasya pravadāmi samāsataḥ  śivaśāstre śivenaiva śivāyai kathitasya tu  
aṃgamabhyaṃtaraṃ yāgamagnikāryāvasānakam  vidhāya vā na vā paścādbahiryāgaṃ samācaret  
tatra dravyāṇi manasā kalpayitvā viśodhya ca  dhyātvā vināyakaṃ devaṃ pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ  
dakṣiṇe cottare caiva naṃdīśaṃ suyaśaṃ tathā  ārādhya manasā samyagāsanaṃ kalpayedbudhaḥ  
ārādhanādikairyuktassiṃhayogāsanādikam  padmāsanaṃ vā vimalaṃ tattvatrayasamanvitam  
tasyopari śivaṃ dhyāyetsāṃbaṃ sarvamanoharam  sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ sarvāvayavaśobhanam  
sarvātiśayasaṃyuktaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  raktāsyapāṇicaraṇaṃ kuṃdacaṃdrasmitānanam  
śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ phullapadmatrilocanam  caturbhujamudārāṅgaṃ cārucaṃdrakalādharam  
varadābhayahastaṃ ca mṛgaṭaṃkadharaṃ haram  bhujaṃgahāravalayaṃ cārunīlagalāṃtaram  
sarvopamānarahitaṃ sānugaṃ saparicchadam  tataḥ saṃciṃtayettasya vāmabhāge maheśvarīm  
praphullotpalapatrābhāṃ vistīrṇāyatalocanām  pūrṇacaṃdrābhavadanāṃ nīlakuṃcitamūrdhajām  
nīlotpaladalaprakhyāṃ candrārdhakṛtaśekharām  ativṛttaghanottuṃgasnigdhapīnapayodharām  
tanumadhyāṃ pṛthuśroṇīṃ pītasūkṣmavarāmbarām  sarvābharaṇasaṃpannāṃ lalāṭatilakojjvalām  
vicitrapuṣpasaṃkīrṇakeśapāśopaśobhitām  sarvato 'nuguṇākārāṃ kiṃcillajjānatānanām  
hemāraviṃdaṃ vilasaddadhānāṃ dakṣiṇe kare  daṃḍavaccāparaṃ haste nyasyāsīnāṃ mahāsane  
pāśavicchedikāṃ sākṣātsaccidānaṃdarūpiṇīm  evaṃ devaṃ ca devīṃ ca dhyātvāsanavare śubhe  
sarvopacāravadbhaktyā bhāvapuṣpaissamarcayet  athavā parikalpyaivaṃ mūrtimanyatamāṃ vibhoḥ  
śaivīṃ sadāśivākhyāṃ vā tathā māheśvarīṃ parām  ṣaḍviṃśakābhidhānāṃ vā śrīkaṃṭhākhyāmathāpi vā  
mantranyāsādikāṃ cāpi kṛtvā svasyāṃ tanau yathā  asyāṃ mūrtau mūrtimaṃtaṃ śivaṃ sadasataḥ param  
dhyātvā bāhyakrameṇaiva pūjāṃ nirvartayeddhiyā  samidājyādibhiḥ paścānnābhau homaṃ ca bhāvayet  
bhrūmadhye ca śivaṃ dhyāyecchuddhadīpaśikhākṛtim  itthamaṃge svataṃtre vā yoge dhyānamaye śubhe  
agnikāryāvasānaṃ ca sarvatraiva samo vidhiḥ  atha ciṃtāmayaṃ sarvaṃ samāpyārādhanakramam  
liṃge ca pūjayeddevaṃ sthaṃḍile vānale 'pi vā  
upamanyuruvāca  prokṣayenmūlamaṃtreṇa pūjāsthānaṃ viśuddhaye  gandhacandanatoyena puṣpaṃ tatra vinikṣipet  
astreṇotsārya vai vighnānavaguṇṭhya ca varmaṇā  astraṃ dikṣu pravinyasya kalpayedarcanābhuvam  
tatra darbhānparistīrya kṣālayetprokṣaṇādibhiḥ  saṃśodhya sarvapātrāṇi dravyaśuddhiṃ samācaret  
prokṣaṇīmardhyapātraṃ ca pādyapātramataḥ param  tathaivācamanīyasya pātraṃ ceti catuṣṭayam  
prakṣālya prokṣya vīkṣyātha kṣipetteṣu jalaṃ śivam  puṇyadravyāṇi sarvāṇi yathālābhaṃ vinikṣipet  
ratnāni rajataṃ hema gandhapuṣpākṣatādayaḥ  phalapallavadarbhāṃśca puṇyadravyāṇyanekadhā  
snānodake sugandhādi pānīye ca viśeṣataḥ  śītalāni manojñānī kusumādīni nikṣipet  
uśīraṃ candanaṃ caiva pādye tu parikalpayet  jātikaṃkolakarpūrabahumūlatamālakān  
kṣipedācamanīye ca cūrṇayitvā viśeṣataḥ  elāṃ pātreṣu sarveṣu karpūraṃ candanaṃ tathā  
kuśāgrāṇyakṣatāṃścaiva yavavrīhitilānapi  ājyasiddhārthapuṣpāṇi bhasitañcārghyapātrake  
kuśapuṣpayavavrīhibahumūlatamālakān  prakṣipetprokṣaṇīpātre bhasitaṃ ca yathākramam  
sarvatra mantraṃ vinyasya varmaṇāveṣṭya bāhyataḥ  paścādastreṇa saṃrakṣya dhenumudrāṃ pradarśayet  
pūjādravyāṇi sarvāṇi prokṣaṇīpātravāriṇā  samprokṣya mūlamaṃtreṇa śodhayedvidhivattataḥ  
pātrāṇāṃ prokṣaṇīmekāmalābhe sarvakarmasu  sādhayedarghyamadbhistatsāmānyaṃ sādhakottamaḥ  
tato vināyakaṃ devaṃ bhakṣyabhojyādibhiḥ kramāt  pūjayitvā vidhānena dvārapārśve 'tha dakṣiṇe  
antaḥpurādhipaṃ sākṣānnandinaṃ samyagarcayet  cāmīkarācalaprakhyaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam  
bālendumukuṭaṃ saumyaṃ trinetraṃ ca caturbhujam  dīptaśūlamṛgīṭaṃkatigmavetradharaṃ prabhum  
candrabimbābhavadanaṃ harivaktramathāpi vā  uttare dvārapārśvasya bhāryāṃ ca marutāṃ sutām  
suyaśāṃ suvratāmambāṃ pādamaṇḍanatatparām  pūjayitvā praviśyāntarbhavanaṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ
