kṛtvā pañcakalānyāsaṃ dīptaṃ liṃgamanusmaret  āvāhayecchivau sākṣātprāñjaliḥ prāgudaṅmukhaḥ  
vṛṣādhirājamāruhya vimānaṃ vā nabhastalāt  alaṃkṛtaṃ sahāyāṃtaṃ devyā devamanusmaran  
sarvābharaṇaśobhāḍhyaṃ sarvamaṃgalanisvanaiḥ  brahmaviṣṇumaheśārkaśakrādyairdevadānavaiḥ  
ānaṃdaklinnasarvāṃgairvinyastāṃjalimastakaiḥ  stuvadbhireva nṛtyadbhirnāmadbhirabhito vṛtam  
tataḥ pañcopacārāṃśca kṛtvā pūjāṃ samāpayet  nātaḥ parataraḥ kaścidvidhiḥ pañcopacārakāt  
pratiṣṭhāṃ liṃgavatkuryātpratimāsvapi sarvataḥ  lakṣaṇoddhārasamaye kāryaṃ nayanamocanam  
jalādhivāse śayane śāyayettāntvadhomukhīm  kumbhodaśāyitāṃ maṃtrairhṛdi tāṃ sanniyojayet  
kṛtālayāṃ parāmāhuḥ pratiṣṭhāmakṛtālayāt  śaktaḥ kṛtālayaḥ paścātpratiṣṭhāvidhimācaret  
aśaktaścetpratiṣṭhāpya liṃgaṃ beramathāpi vā  śakteranuguṇaṃ paścātprakurvīta śivālayam  
gṛhārcāṃ ca punarvakṣye pratiṣṭhāvidhimuttamam  kṛtvā kanīyasaṃberaṃ liṃgaṃ vā lakṣaṇānvitam  
ayane cottare prāpte śuklapakśe śubhe dine  devīṃ kṛtvā śubhe deśe tatrābjaṃ pūrvavallikhet  
vikīrya patrapuṣpādyairmadhye kuṃbhaṃ nidhāya ca  paritastasya caturaḥ kalaśān dikṣu vinyaset  
pañca brahmāṇi tadbījaisteṣu pañcasu pañcabhiḥ  nyasya saṃpūjya mudrādi darśayitvābhirakṣya ca  
viśodhya liṃgaṃ beraṃ vā mṛttoyādyairyathā purā  sthāpayetpuṣpasaṃchannamuttarasthe varāsane  
nidhāya puṣpaṃ śirasi prokṣayetprokṣaṇījalaiḥ  samabhyarcya punaḥ puṣpairjayaśabdādipūrvakam  
kumbhairīśānavidyāṃtaiḥ snāpayenmūlavidyayā  tataḥ pañcakalānyāsaṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ ca pūrvavat  
nityamārādhayettatra devyā devaṃ trilocanam  ekamevātha vā kuṃbhaṃ mūrtimantrasamanvitam  
nyasya padmāṃtare sarvaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret  atyaṃtopahataṃ liṃgaṃ viśodhya sthāpayetpunaḥ  
saṃprokṣayedupahatamanāgupahataṃ yajet  liṃgāni bāṇasaṃjñāni sthāpanīyāni vā na vā  
tāni pūrvaṃ śivenaiva saṃskṛtāni yatastataḥ  śeṣāṇi sthāpanīyāni yāni dṛṣṭāni bāṇavat  
svayamudbhūtaliṃge ca divye cārṣe tathaiva ca  apīṭhe pīṭhamāveśya kṛtvā saṃprokṣaṇaṃ vidhim  
yajettatra śivaṃ teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhā na vidhīyate  dagdhaṃ ślathaṃ kṣatāṃgaṃ ca kṣipelliṃgaṃ jalāśaye  
saṃdhānayogyaṃ saṃdhāya pratiṣṭhāvidhimācaret  berādvā vikalālliṃgāddevapūjāpurassaram  
udvāsya hṛdi saṃdhānaṃ tyāgaṃ vā yuktamācaret  ekāhapūjāvihatau kuryāddviguṇamarcanam  
dvirātre ca mahāpūjāṃ saṃprokṣaṇamataḥ param  māsādūrdhvamanekāhaṃ pūjā yadi vihanyate  
pratiṣṭhā procyate kaiścitkaiścitsaṃprokṣaṇakramaḥ  saṃprokṣaṇe tu liṃgāderdevamudvāsya pūrvavat  
aṣṭapañcakrameṇaiva snāpayitvā mṛdaṃbhasā  gavāṃ rasaiśca saṃsnāpya darbhatoyairviśodhya ca  
prokṣayetprokṣaṇītoyairmūlenāṣṭottaraṃ śatam  sapuṣpaṃ sakuśaṃ pāṇiṃ nyasya liṃgasya mastake  
pañcavāraṃ japenmūlamaṣṭottaraśataṃ tataḥ  tato mūlena mūrdhādipīṭhāṃtaṃ saṃspṛśedapi  
pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ kuryāddevamāvāhya pūrvavat  alabdhe sthāpite liṃge śivasthāne jale 'tha vā  
vahnau ravau tathā vyomni bhagavaṃtaṃ śivaṃ yajet  
śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca  jñāne kriyāyāṃ caryāyāṃ sāramuddhṛtya saṃgrahāt  uktaṃ bhagavatā sarvaṃ śrutaṃ śrutisamaṃ mayā  
idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi yogaṃ paramadurlabham  sādhikāraṃ ca sāṃgaṃ ca savidhiṃ saprayojanam  
yadyasti maraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ yogādyanupamardataḥ  sadyaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyaṃ yena syānnātmahā naraḥ  
tacca tatkāraṇaṃ caiva tatkālakaraṇāni ca  tadbhedatāratamyaṃ ca vaktumarhasi tattvataḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  sthāne pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa sarvapraśnārthavedinā  tataḥ krameṇa tatsarvaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu samāhitaḥ  
niruddhavṛttyaṃtarasyaṃ śive cittasya niścalā  yā vṛttiḥ sa samāsena yogaḥ sa khalu pañcadhā  
maṃtrayogaḥsparśayogo bhāvayogastathāparaḥ  abhāvayogassarvebhyo mahāyogaḥ paro mataḥ  
maṃtrābhyāsavaśenaiva maṃtravācyārthagocaraḥ  avyākṣepā manovṛttirmaṃtrayoga udāhṛtaḥ  
prāṇāyāmamukhā saiva sparśe yogobhidhīyate  sa maṃtrasparśanirmukto bhāvayogaḥ prakīrtitaḥ  
vilīnāvayavaṃ viśvaṃ rūpaṃ saṃbhāvyate yataḥ  abhāvayogaḥ saṃprokto 'nābhāsādvastunaḥ sataḥ  
śivasvabhāva evaikaściṃtyate nirupādhikaḥ  yathā śaivamanovṛttirmahāyoga ihocyate  
dṛṣṭe tathānuśravike viraktaṃ viṣaye manaḥ  yasya tasyādhikārosti yoge nānyasya kasyacit  
viṣayadvayadoṣāṇāṃ guṇānāmīśvarasya ca  darśanādeva satataṃ viraktaṃ jāyate manaḥ  
aṣṭāṃgo vā ṣaḍaṃgo vā sarvayogaḥ samāsataḥ  yamaśca niyamaścaiva svastikādyaṃ tathāsanam  
prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhāraṇā dhyānameva ca  samādhiriti yogāṃgānyaṣṭāvuktāni sūribhiḥ  
āsanaṃ prāṇasaṃrodhaḥ pratyāhārotha dhāraṇā  dhyānaṃ samādhiryogasya ṣaḍaṃgāni samāsataḥ  
pṛthaglakṣaṇameteṣāṃ śivaśāstre samīritam  śivāgameṣu cānyeṣu viśeṣātkāmikādiṣu  
yogaśāstreṣvapi tathā purāṇeṣvapi keṣu ca  ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahaḥ  
yama ityucyate sadbhiḥ pañcāvayavayogataḥ  śaucaṃ tuṣṭistapaścaiva japaḥ praṇidhireva ca  
iti pañcaprabhedassyānniyamaḥ svāṃśabhedataḥ  svastikaṃ padmamadhyeṃduṃ vīraṃ yogaṃ prasādhitam  
paryaṃkaṃ ca yatheṣṭaṃ ca proktamāsanamaṣṭadhā  prāṇaḥ svadehajo vāyustasyāyāmo nirodhanam  
tadrocakaṃ pūrakaṃ ca kuṃbhakaṃ ca tridhocyate  nāsikāpuṭamaṃgulyā pīḍyaikamapareṇa tu  
audaraṃ recayedvāyuṃ tathāyaṃ recakaḥ smṛtaḥ  bāhyena marutā dehaṃ dṛtivatparipūrayet  
nāsāpuṭenāpareṇa pūraṇātpūrakaṃ matam  na muṃcati na gṛhṇāti vāyumaṃtarbahiḥ sthitam  
saṃpūrṇaṃ kuṃbhavattiṣṭhedacalaḥ sa tu kuṃbhaka  recakādyaṃ trayamidaṃ na drutaṃ na vilaṃbitam  
tadyataḥ kramayogena tvabhyasedyogasādhakaḥ  recakādiṣu yobhyāso nāḍīśodhanapūrvakaḥ  
svecchotkramaṇaparyaṃtaḥ prokto yogānuśāsane  kanyakādikramavaśātprāṇāyāmanirodhanam  
taccaturdhopadiṣṭaṃ syānmātrāguṇavibhāgataḥ  kanyakastu caturdhā syātsa ca dvādaśamātrakaḥ  
madhyamastu dviruddhātaścaturviṃśatimātrakaḥ  uttamastu triruddhātaḥ ṣaḍviṃśanmātrakaḥ paraḥ  
svedakaṃpādijanakaḥ prāṇāyāmastaduttaraḥ  ānaṃdodbhavaromāṃcanetrāśrūṇāṃ vimocanam  
jalpabhramaṇamūrchādyaṃ jāyate yoginaḥ param  jānuṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya na drutaṃ na vilaṃbitam  
aṃgulīsphoṭanaṃ kuryātsā mātreti prakīrtitā  mātrākrameṇa vijñeyāścodvātakramayogataḥ  
nāḍīviśuddhipūrvaṃ tu prāṇāyāmaṃ samācaret  agarbhaśca sagarbhaśca prāṇāyāmo dvidhā smṛtaḥ  
japaṃ dhyānaṃ vināgarbhaḥ sagarbhastatsamanvayāt  agarbhādgarbhasaṃyuktaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥśatādhikaḥ  
tasmātsagarbhaṃ kurvanti yoginaḥ prāṇasaṃyamam  prāṇasya vijayādeva jīyaṃte deha  āyavaḥ  
prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaśca hyudāno vyāna eva ca  nāgaḥ kūrmaśca kṛkalo devadatto dhanaṃjayaḥ  
prayāṇaṃ kurute yasmāttasmātprāṇo 'bhidhīyate  avāṅnayatyapānākhyo yadāhārādi bhujyate  
vyāno vyānaśayatyaṃgānyaśeṣāṇi vivardhayan  udvejayati marmāṇītyudāno vāyurīritaḥ  
samaṃ nayati sarvāṃgaṃ samānastena gīyate  udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrma unmīlane sthitaḥ  
kṛkalaḥ kṣavathau jñeyo devadatto vijṛṃbhaṇe  na jahāti mṛtaṃ cāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ  
krameṇābhyasyamānoyaṃ prāṇāyāmapramāṇavān  nirdahatyakhilaṃ doṣaṃ karturdehaṃ ca rakṣati  
prāṇe tu vijite samyaktaccihnānyupalakṣayet  viṇmūtraśleṣmaṇāṃ tāvadalpabhāvaḥ prajāyate  
bahubhojanasāmarthyaṃ cirāducchvāsanaṃ tathā  laghutvaṃ śīghragāmitvamutsāhaḥ svarasauṣṭhavam  
sarvarogakṣayaścaiva balaṃ tejaḥ surūpatā  dhṛtirmedhā yuvatvaṃ ca sthiratā ca prasannatā  
tapāṃsi pāpakṣayatā yajñadānavratādayaḥ  prāṇāyāmasya tasyaite kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm  
indriyāṇi prasaktāni yathāsvaṃ viṣayeṣviha  āhatya yannigṛhṇāti sa pratyāhāra ucyate  
namaḥpūrvāṇīṃdriyāṇi svargaṃ narakameva ca  nigṛhītanisṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca  
tasmātsukhārthī matimāñjñānavairāgyamāsthitaḥ  iṃdriyāśvānnigṛhyāśu svātmanātmānamuddharet  
dhāraṇā nāma cittasya sthānabandhassamāsataḥ  sthānaṃ ca śiva evaiko nānyaddoṣatrayaṃ yataḥ  
kālaṃ kaṃcāvadhīkṛtya sthāne 'vasthāpitaṃ manaḥ  na tu pracyavate lakṣyāddhāraṇā syānna cānyathā  
manasaḥ prathamaṃ sthairyaṃ dhāraṇātaḥ prajāyate  tasmāddhīraṃ manaḥ kuryāddhāraṇābhyāsayogataḥ  
dhyai ciṃtāyāṃ smṛto dhātuḥ śivaciṃtā muhurmuhuḥ  avyākṣiptena manasā dhyānaṃ nāma taducyate  
dhyeyāvasthitacittasya sadṛśaḥ pratyayaśca yaḥ  pratyayāntaranirmuktaḥ pravāho dhyānamucyate  
sarvamanyatparityajya śiva eva śivaṃkaraḥ  paro dhyeyo 'dhideveśaḥ samāptātharvaṇī śrutiḥ  
tathā śivā parā dhyeyā sarvabhūtagatau śivau  tau śrutau smṛtiśāstrebhyaḥ sarvagau sarvadoditau  
sarvajñau satataṃ dhyeyau nānārūpavibhedataḥ  vimuktiḥ pratyayaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayaścāṇimādikam  
ityetaddvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ dhyānasyāsya prayojanam  dhyātā dhyānaṃ tathā dhyeyaṃ yacca dhyānaprayojanam  
etaccatuṣṭayaṃ jñātvā yogaṃ yuñjīta yogavit  jñānavairāgyasaṃpannaḥ śraddadhānaḥ kṣamānvitaḥ  
nirmamaśca sadotsāhī dhyātetthaṃ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ  japācchrāṃtaḥ punardhyāyeddhyānācchrāṃtaḥ punarjapet  
japadhyanābhiyuktasya kṣipraṃ yogaḥ prasiddhyati  dhāraṇā dvādaśāyāmā dhyānaṃ dvādaśadhāraṇam  
dhyānadvādaśakaṃ yāvatsamādhirabhidhīyate  samādhirnnāma yogāṃgamantimaṃ parikīrtitam  
samādhinā ca sarvatra prajñālokaḥ pravartate  yadarthamātranirbhāsaṃ stimito dadhivatsthitam  
svarūpaśūnyavadbhānaṃ samādhirabhidhīyate  dhyeye manaḥ samāveśya paśyedapi ca susthiram  
nirvāṇānalavadyogī samādhisthaḥ pragīyate  na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na jalpati na paśyati  
na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na saṃkalpayate manaḥ  navābhimanyate kiṃcidbadhyate na ca kāṣṭavat  
evaṃ śive vilīnātmā samādhistha ihocyate  yathā dīpo nivātasthaḥ spandate na kadācana  
tathā samādhiniṣṭho 'pi tasmānna vicaletsudhīḥ  evamabhyasataścāraṃ yogino yogamuttamam  
tadantarāyā naśyaṃti vighnāḥ sarve śanaiḥśanaiḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  ālasyaṃ vyādhayastīvrāḥ pramādaḥ sthānasaṃśayaḥ  anavasthitacittatvamaśraddhā bhrāṃtidarśanam  
duḥkhāni daurmanasyaṃ ca viṣayeṣu ca lolatā  daśaite yuñjatāṃ puṃsāmantarāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  
ālasyamalasattvaṃ tu yogināṃ dehacetanoḥ  dhātuvaiṣamyajā doṣā vyādhayaḥ karmadoṣajāḥ  
pramādo nāma yogasya sādhanā nāma bhāvanā  idaṃ vetyubhayākrāntaṃ vijñānaṃ sthānasaṃśayaḥ  
apratiṣṭhā hi manasastvanavasthitirucyate  aśraddhā bhāvarahitā vṛttirvai yogavartmani  
viparyastā matiryā sā bhrāṃtirityabhidhīyate  duḥkhamajñānajaṃ puṃsāṃ cittasyādhyātmikaṃ viduḥ  
ādhibhautikamaṃgotthaṃ yacca duḥkhaṃ purā kṛtaiḥ  ādhidaivikamākhyātamaśanyastraviṣādikam  
icchāvighātajaṃ mokṣaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pracakṣate  viṣayeṣu vicitreṣu vibhramastatra lolatā  
śānteṣveteṣu vighneṣu yogāsaktasya yoginaḥ  upasargāḥ pravartaṃte divyāste siddhisūcakāḥ  
pratibhā śravaṇaṃ vārtā darśanāsvādavedanāḥ  upasargāḥ ṣaḍityete vyaye yogasya siddhayaḥ  
sūkṣme vyavahite 'tīte viprakṛṣṭe tvanāgate  pratibhā kathyate yo 'rthe pratibhāso yathātatham  
śravaṇaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ śravaṇe cāprayatnataḥ  vārttā vārttāsu vijñānaṃ sarveṣāmeva dehinām  
darśanaṃ nāma divyānāṃ darśanaṃ cāprayatnataḥ  tathāsvādaśca divyeṣu raseṣvāsvāda ucyate  
sparśanādhigamastadvadvedanā nāma viśrutā  gandhādīnāṃ ca divyānāmābrahmabhuvanādhipāḥ  
saṃtiṣṭhante ca ratnāni prayacchaṃti bahūni ca  svacchandamadhurā vāṇī vividhāsyātpravartate  
rasāyanāni sarvāṇi divyāścauṣadhayastathā  sidhyaṃti praṇipatyainaṃ diśaṃti surayoṣitaḥ  
yogasiddhyaikadeśe 'pi dṛṣṭe mokṣe bhavenmatiḥ  dṛṣṭametanmayā yadvattadvanmokṣo bhavediti  
kṛśatā sthūlatā bālyaṃ vārdhakyaṃ caiva yauvanam  nānācātisvarūpaṃ ca caturṇāṃ dehadhāraṇam  
pārthivāṃśaṃ vinā nityaṃ surabhirgandhasaṃgrahaḥ  evamaṣṭaguṇaṃ prāhuḥ paiśācaṃ pārthivaṃ padam  
jale nivasanaṃ caiva bhūmyāmevaṃ vinirgamaḥ  icchecchaktaḥ svayaṃ pātuṃ samudramapi nāturaḥ  
yatrecchati jagatyasmiṃstatraiva jaladarśanam  vinā kumbhādikaṃ pāṇau jalasañcayadhāraṇam  
yadvastu virasañcāpi bhoktumicchati tatkṣaṇāt  rasādikaṃ bhaveccānyattrayāṇāṃ dehadhāraṇam  
nirvraṇatvaṃ śarīrasya pārthivaiśca samanvitam  tadidaṃ ṣoḍaśaguṇamāpyamaiśvaryamadbhutam  
śarīrādagninirmāṇaṃ tattāpabhayavarjanam  śaktirjagadidaṃ dagdhuṃ yadīcchedaprayatnataḥ  
sthāpanaṃ vānalasyā 'psu pāṇau pāvakadhāraṇam  dagdhe sarge yathāpūrvaṃ mukhe cānnādipācanam  
dvābhyāṃ dehavinirmāṇamāpyaiśvaryasamanvitam  etaccaturviṃśatidhā taijasaṃ paricakṣate  
manojavatvaṃ bhūtānāṃ kṣaṇādantaḥpraveśanam  parvatādimahābhāradhāraṇañcāprayatnataḥ  
gurutvañca laghutvañca pāṇāvaniladhāraṇam  aṃgulyagranipātādyairbhūmerapi ca kampanam  
ekena dehaniṣpattiryuktaṃ bhogaiśca taijasaiḥ  dvātriṃśadguṇamaiśvaryaṃ mārutaṃ kavayo viduḥ  
chāyāhīnaviniṣpattirindriyāṇāmadarśanam  khecaratvaṃ yathākāmamindriyārthasamanvayaḥ  
ākāśalaṃghanaṃ caiva svadehe tanniveśanam  ākāśapiṇḍīkaraṇamaśarīratvameva ca  
anilaiśvaryasaṃyuktaṃ catvāriṃśadguṇaṃ mahat  aindramaiśvaryamākhyātamāmbaraṃ tatpracakṣate  
yathākāmopalabdhiśca yathākāmavinirgamaḥ  sarvasyābhibhavaścaiva sarvaguhyārthadarśanam  
karmānurūpanirmāṇaṃ vaśitvaṃ priyadarśanam  saṃsāradarśanaṃ caiva bhogairaindraissamanvitam  
etaccāṃdramasaiśvaryaṃ mānasaṃ guṇato 'dhikam  chedanaṃ tāḍanaṃ caiva baṃdhanaṃ mocanaṃ tathā  
grahaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃsāravaśavartinām  prasādaścāpi sarveṣāṃ mṛtyukālajayastathā  
ābhimānikamaiśvaryaṃ prājāpatyaṃ pracakṣate  etaccāndramasairbhogaiḥ ṣaṭpañcāśadguṇaṃ mahat  
sargaḥ saṃkalpamātreṇa trāṇaṃ saṃharaṇaṃ tathā  svādhikāraśca sarveṣāṃ bhūtacittapravartanam  
asādṛśyaṃ ca sarvasya nirmāṇaṃ jagataḥ pṛthak  śubhāśubhasya karaṇaṃ prājāpatyaiśca saṃyutam  
catuṣṣaṣṭhiguṇaṃ brāhmamaiśvaryaṃ ca pracakṣate  bauddhādasmātparaṃ gauṇamaiśvaryaṃ prākṛtaṃ viduḥ  
vaiṣṇavaṃ tatsamākhyātaṃ tasyaiva bhuvanasthitiḥ  brahmaṇā tatpadaṃ sarvaṃ vaktumanyairna śakyate  
tatpauruṣaṃ ca gauṇaṃ ca gaṇeśaṃ padamaiśvaram  viṣṇunā tatpadaṃ kiṃcijjñātumanyairna śakyate  
vijñānasiddhayaścaiva sarvā evaupasargikāḥ  niroddhavyā prayatnena varrāgyeṇa pareṇa tu  
pratibhāseṣvaśuddheṣu guṇeṣvāsaktacetasaḥ  na sidhyetparamaiśvaryamabhayaṃ sārvakāmikam  
tasmādguṇāṃśca bhogāṃśca devāsuramahībhṛtām  tṛṇavadyastyajettasya yogasiddhiḥ parā bhavet  
athavānugrahecchāyāṃ jagato vicarenmuniḥ  yathākāmaṃguṇānbhogānbhuktvā muktiṃ prayāsyati  
atha prayogaṃ yogasya vakṣye śṛṇu samāhitaḥ  śubhe kāle śubhe deśe śivakṣetrādike punaḥ  
vijane jaṃturahite niḥśabde bādhavarjite  supralipte sthale saumye gandhadhūpādivāsite  
muktapuṣpasamākīrṇe vitānādi vicitrite  kuśapuṣpasamittoyaphalamūlasamanvite  
nāgnyabhyāśe jalābhyāśe śuṣkaparṇacaye 'pi vā  na daṃśamaśakākīrṇe sarpaśvāpadasaṃkule  
na ca duṣṭamṛgākīrṇe na bhaye durjanāvṛte  śmaśāne caityavalmīke jīrṇāgāre catuṣpathe  
nadīnadasamudrāṇāṃ tīre rathyāṃtare 'pi vā  na jīrṇodyānagoṣṭhādau nāniṣṭe na ca niṃdite  
nājīrṇāmlarasodgāre na ca viṇmūtradūṣite  nacchardyāmātisāre vā nātibhuktau śramānvite  
na cāticiṃtākulito na cātikṣutpipāsitaḥ  nāpi svagurukarmādau prasakto yogamācaret  
yuktāhāravihāraśca yuktaceṣṭaśca karmasu  yuktanidrāprabodhaśca sarvāyāsavivarjitaḥ  
āsanaṃ mṛdulaṃ ramyaṃ vipulaṃ susamaṃ śuci  padmakasvastikādīnāmabhyasedāsaneṣu ca  
abhivaṃdya svagurvaṃtānabhivādyānanukramāt  ṛjugrīvaśirovakṣā nātiṣṭhecchiṣṭalocanaḥ  
kiṃcidunnāmitaśirā daṃtairdaṃtānna saṃspṛśet  daṃtāgrasaṃsthitā jihvāmacalāṃ sanniveśya ca  
pārṣṇibhyāṃ vṛṣaṇau rakṣaṃstathā prajananaṃ punaḥ  ūrvorupari saṃsthāpya bāhū tiryagayatnataḥ  
dakṣiṇaṃ karapṛṣṭhaṃ tu nyasya vāmatalopari  unnāmya śanakaiḥ pṛṣṭhamuro viṣṭabhya cāgrataḥ  
saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ diśaścānavalokayan  saṃbhṛtaprāṇasaṃcāraḥ pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ  
svadehāyatanasyāṃtarviciṃtya śivamaṃbayā  hṛtpadmapīṭhikāmadhye dhyānayajñena pūjayet  
mūle nāsāgrato nābhau kaṃṭhe vā tāluraṃdhrayoḥ  bhrūmadhye dvāradeśe vā lalāṭe mūrdhni vā smaret  
parikalpya yathānyāyaṃ śivayoḥ paramāsanam  tatra sāvaraṇaṃ vāpi nirāvaraṇameva vā  
dvidaleṣoḍaśāre vā dvādaśāre yathāvidhi  daśāre vā ṣaḍasre vā caturasre śivaṃ smaret  
bhruvoraṃtarataḥ padmaṃ dvidalaṃ taḍidujjvalam  bhrūmadhyasthāravindasya kramādvai dakṣiṇottare  
vidyutsamānavarṇe ca parṇe varṇāvasānake  ṣoḍaśārasya patrāṇi svarāḥ ṣoḍaśa tāni vai  
pūrvādīni kramādetatpadmaṃ kandasya mūlataḥ  kakārādiṭakārāṃtā varṇāḥ parṇānyanukramāt  
bhānuvarṇasya padmasya dhyeyaṃ tad hṛdayāntare  gokṣīradhavalasyoktā ḍādiphāntā yathākramam  
adho dalasyāmbujasya etasya  ca dalāni ṣaṭ  vidhūmāṃgāravarṇasya varṇā vādyāśca lāntimāḥ  
mūlādhārāraviṃdasya hemābhasya yathākramam  vakārādisakārāntā varṇāḥ parṇamayāḥ sthitāḥ  
eteṣvathāraviṃdeṣu yatraivābhirataṃ manaḥ  tatraiva devaṃ devīṃ ca ciṃtayeddhīrayā dhiyā  
aṃguṣṭhamātramamalaṃ dīpyamānaṃ samaṃtataḥ  śuddhadīpaśikhākāraṃ svaśaktyā pūrṇamaṇḍitam  
indurekhāsamākāraṃ tārārūpamathāpi vā  nīvāraśūkassadṛśaṃ bisasutrābhameva vā  
kadambagolakākāraṃ tuṣārakaṇikopamam  kṣityāditattvavijayaṃ dhyātā yadyapi vāñchati  
tattattattvādhipāmeva mūrtiṃ sthūlāṃ viciṃtayet  sadāśivāṃtā brahmādyabhavādyāścāṣṭamūrtayaḥ  
śivasya mūrtayaḥ sthūlāḥ śivaśāstre viniścitāḥ  ghorā miśrā praśāntāśca mūrtayastā munīśvaraiḥ  
phalābhilāṣarahitaiścintyāścintāviśāradaiḥ  ghorāścecciṃtitāḥ kuryuḥ pāparogaparikṣayam  
cireṇa miśre saumye tu na sadyo na cirādapi  saumye muktirviśeṣeṇa śāṃtiḥ prajñā prasidhyati  
sidhyaṃti siddhayaścātra kramaśo nātra saṃśayaḥ  
upamanyuruvāca  śrīkaṃṭhanāthaṃ smaratāṃ sadyaḥ sarvārthasiddhayaḥ  prasidhyaṃtīti matvaike taṃ vai dhyāyaṃti yoginaḥ  
sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ kecitsthūladhyānaṃ prakurvate  sthūlaṃ tu niścalaṃ ceto bhavetsūkṣme tu tatsthiram  
śive tu ciṃtite sākṣātsarvāḥ sidhyanti siddhayaḥ  mūrtyaṃtareṣu dhyāteṣu śivarūpaṃ viciṃtayet  
lakṣayenmanasaḥ sthairyaṃ tattaddhyāyetpunaḥ punaḥ  dhyānamādau saviṣayaṃ tato nirviṣayaṃ jaguḥ  
tatra nirviṣayaṃ dhyānaṃ nāstītyeva satāṃ matam  buddherhi santatiḥ kāciddhyānamityabhidhīyate  
tena nirviṣayā buddhiḥ kevaleha pravartate  tasmātsaviṣayaṃ dhyānaṃ bālārkakiraṇāśrayam  
sūkṣmāśrayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ nāparaṃ paramārthataḥ  yadvā saviṣayaṃ dhyānaṃ tatsākārasamāśrayam  
nirākārātmasaṃvittirdhyānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ matam  nirbījaṃ ca sabījaṃ ca tadeva dhyānamucyate  
nirākāraśrayatvena sākārāśrayatastathā  tasmātsaviṣayaṃ dhyānamādau kṛtvā sabījakam  
aṃte nirviṣayaṃ kuryānnirbījaṃ sarvasiddhaye  prāṇāyāmena sidhyaṃti devyāḥ śāṃtyādayaḥ kramāt  
śāṃtiḥ praśāṃtirdīptiśca prasādaśca tataḥ param  śamaḥ sarvāpadāṃ caiva śāṃtirityabhidhīyate  
tamaso 'ntabahirnāśaḥ praśāntiḥ parigīyate  bahirantaḥprakāśo yo dīptirityabhidhīyate  
svasthatā yā tu sā buddhaḥ prasādaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  kāraṇāni ca sarvāṇi sabāhyābhyaṃtarāṇi ca  
buddheḥ prasādataḥ kṣipraṃ prasannāni bhavantyuta  dhyātā dhyānaṃ tathā dhyeyaṃ yadvā dhyānaprayojanam  
etaccatuṣṭayaṃ jñātvā dhyātā dhyānaṃ samācaret  jñānavairāgyasaṃpanno nityamavyagramānasaḥ  
śraddadhānaḥ prasannātmā dhyātā sadbhirudāhṛtaḥ  dhyai ciṃtāyāṃ smṛto dhātuḥ śivaciṃtā muhurmuhuḥ  
yogābhyāsastathālpe 'pi yathā pāpaṃ vināśayet  dhyāyataḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ vā śraddhayā parameśvaram  
avyākṣiptena manasā dhyānamityabhidhīyate  buddhipravāharūpasya dhyānasyāsyāvalaṃbanam  
dhyeyamityucyate sadbhistacca sāṃbaḥ svayaṃ śivaḥ  vimuktipratyayaṃ pūrṇamaiśvaryaṃ cāṇimādikam  
śivadhyānasya pūrṇasya sākṣāduktaṃ prayojanam  yasmātsaukhyaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca dhyānādabhayamāpnuyāt  
tasmātsarvaṃ parityajya dhyānayukto bhavennaraḥ  nāsti dhyānaṃ vinā jñānaṃ nāsti dhyānamayoginaḥ  
dhyānaṃ jñānaṃ ca yasyāsti tīrṇastena bhavārṇavaḥ  jñānaṃ prasannamekāgramaśeṣopādhivarjitam  
yogābhyāsena yuktasya yoginastveva sidhyati  prakṣīṇāśeṣapāpānāṃ jñāne dhyāne bhavenmatiḥ  
pāpopahatabuddhīnāṃ tadvārtāpi sudurlabhā  yathāvahnirmahādīptaḥ śuṣkamārdraṃ ca nirdahet  
tathā śubhāśubhaṃ karma dhyānāgnirdahate kṣaṇāt  atyalpo 'pi yathā dīpaḥ sumahannāśayettamaḥ  
yogābhyāsastathālpo 'pi mahāpāpaṃ vināśayet  dhyāyataḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ vā śraddhayā parameśvaram  
yadbhavetsumahacchreyastasyāṃto naiva vidyate  nāsti dhyānasamaṃ tīrthaṃ nāsti dhyānasamaṃ tapaḥ  
nāsti dhyānasamo yajñastasmāddhyānaṃ samācaret  tīrthāni toyapūrṇāni devānpāṣāṇamṛnmayān  
yogino na prapadyaṃte svātmapratyayakāraṇāt  yogināṃ ca vapuḥ sūkṣmaṃ bhavetpratyakṣamaiśvaram  
yathā sthūlamayuktānāṃ mṛtkāṣṭhādyaiḥ prakalpitam  yathehāṃtaścarā rājñaḥ priyāḥ syurna bahiścarāḥ  
tathāṃtardhyānaniratāḥ priyāśśaṃbhorna karmiṇaḥ  bahiskarā yathā loke nātīva phalabhoginaḥ  
dṛṣṭvā narendrabhavane tadvadatrāpi karmiṇaḥ  yadyaṃtarā vipadyaṃte jñānayogārthamudyataḥ  
yogasyodyogamātreṇa rudralokaṃ gamiṣyati  anubhūya sukhaṃ tatra sa jāto yogināṃ kule  
jñānayogaṃ punarlabdhvā saṃsāramativartate  jijñāsurapi yogasya yāṃ gatiṃ labhate naraḥ  
na tāṃ gatimavāpnoti sarvairapi mahāmakhaiḥ  dvijānāṃ vedaviduṣāṃ koṭiṃ saṃpūjya yatphalam  
bhikṣāmātrapradānena tatphalaṃ śivayogine  yajñāgnihotradānena tīrthahomeṣu yatphalam  
yogināmannadānena tatsamastaṃ phalaṃ labhet  ye cāpavādaṃ kurvaṃti vimūḍhāśśivayoginām  
śrotṛbhiste prapadyante narakeṣvāmahīkṣayāt  sati śrotari vaktāsyādapavādasya yoginām  
tasmācchrotā ca pāpīyāndaṇḍyassumahatāṃ mataḥ  ye punaḥ satataṃ bhaktyā bhajaṃti śavayoginaḥ  
te vidaṃti mahābhogānaṃte yogaṃ ca śāṃkaram  bhogārthibhirnaraistasmātsaṃpūjyāḥ śivayoginaḥ  
pratiśrayānnapānādyaiḥ śayyāprāvaraṇādibhiḥ  yogadharmaḥ sasāratvādabhedyaḥ pāpamudgaraiḥ  
vajrataṃdulavajjñeyaṃ tathā pāpena yoginaḥ  na lipyaṃte ca tāpaughaiḥ padmapatraṃ yathāṃbhasā  
yasmindeśe vasennityaṃ śivayogarato muniḥ  so 'pi deśo bhavetpūtaḥ sapūta iti kiṃ punaḥ  
tasmātsarvaṃ parityajya kṛtyamanyadvicakṣaṇaḥ  sarvaduḥkhaprahāṇāya śivayogaṃ samabhyaset  
siddhayogaphalo yogī lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  bhogānbhuktvā yathākāmaṃ viharedvātra vartatām  
athavā kṣudramityeva matvā vaiṣayikaṃ sukham  tyaktvā virāgayogena svecchayā karma mucyatām  
yastvāsannāṃ mṛtiṃ martyo dṛṣṭāriṣṭaṃ ca bhūyasā  sa yogārambhanirataḥ śivakṣetraṃ samāśrayet  
sa tatra nivasanneva yadi dhīramanā naraḥ  prāṇānvināpi rogādyaiḥ svayameva parityajet  
kṛtvāpyanaśanaṃ caiva hutvā cāṃgaṃ śivānale  kṣiptvā vā śivatīrtheṣu svadehamavagāhanāt  
śivaśāstroktavidhivatprāṇānyastu parityajet  sadya eva vimucyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā   
rogādyairvātha vivaśaḥ śivakṣetraṃ samāśritaḥ  mriyate yadi sopyevaṃ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  
yathā hi maraṇaṃ śreṣṭhamuśaṃtyanaśanādibhiḥ  śāstraviśraṃbhadhīreṇa manasā kriyate yataḥ  
śivanindārataṃ hatvā pīḍitaḥ svayameva vā  yastyajeddustyajānprāṇānna sa bhūyaḥ prajāyate  
śivanindārataṃ haṃtumaśakto yaḥ svayaṃ mṛtaḥ  sadya eva pramucyeta triḥ saptakulasaṃyutaḥ  
śivārthe yastyajetprāṇāñchivabhaktārthameva vā  na tena sadṛśaḥ kaścinmuktimārgasthito naraḥ  
tasmācchīghratarā muktistasya saṃsāramaṃḍalāt  eteṣvanyatamopāyaṃ kathamapyavalambya vā  
ṣaḍadhvaśuddhiṃ vidhivatprāpto vā mriyate yadi  paśūnāmiva tasyeha na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam  
naivāśaucaṃ prapadyeta tatputrādiviśeṣataḥ  śivacārārthamathavā śivavidyārthameva vā  
khanedvā bhuvi taddehaṃ dahedvā śucināgninā  kṣipedvāpsu śivāsveva tyajedvā kāṣṭhaloṣṭavat  
athainamapi coddiśya karma cetkartumīpsitam  kalyāṇameva kurvīta śaktyā bhaktāṃśca tarpayet  
dhanaṃ tasya bhajecchaivaḥ śaivī cetasya santatiḥ  nāsti cettacchive dadyānnadadyātpaśusantatiḥ  
śrīsūta uvāca  iti sa vijitamanyoryādavenopamanyoradhigatamabhidhāya jñānayogaṃ munibhyaḥ  praṇatimupagatebhyastebhya udbhāvitātmā sapadi viyati vāyuḥ sāyamantarhito 'bhūt  
tataḥ prabhātasamaye naimiṣīyāstapodhanāḥ  satrānte 'vabhṛthaṃ kartuṃ sarva eva samudyayuḥ  
tadā brahmasamādeśāddevī sākṣātsarasvatī  prasannā svādusalilā prāvartata nadīśubhā  
sarasvatīṃ nadīṃ dṛṣṭvā munayo hṛṣṭamānasāḥ  samāpya satraṃ prārabdhaṃ cakrustatrāvagāhanam  
atha saṃtarpya devādīṃstadīyaiḥ salilaiḥ śivaiḥ  smarantaḥ pūrvavṛttāntaṃ yayurvārāṇasīṃ prati  
tadā te himavatpādātpaṃtatīṃ dakṣiṇāmukhīm  dṛṣṭvā bhāgīrathī tatra snātvā tattīrato yayuḥ  
tato vārāṇasīṃ prāpya muditāssarva eva te  tadottarapravāhāyāṃ gaṃgāyāmavagāhya ca  
avimukteśvaraṃ liṃgaṃ dṛṣṭvābhyarcya vidhānataḥ  prayātumudyatāstatra dadṛśurdivi bhāsvaram  
sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ tejodivyaṃ mahādbhutam  ātmaprabhāvitānena vyāptasarvadigantaram  
atha pāśupatāḥ siddhāḥ bhasmasañchannavigrahāḥ  munayo 'bhyetya śataśo līnāḥ syustatra tejasi  
tathā vilīyamāneṣu tapasviṣu mahātmasu  sadyastirodadhe tejastadadbhutamivābhavat  
taddṛṣṭvā mahadāścaryaṃ naimiṣīyā maharṣayaḥ  kimetadityajānanto yayurbrahmavanaṃ prati  
prāgevaiṣāṃ tu gamanātpavano lokapāvanaḥ  darśanaṃ naimiṣīyāṇāṃ saṃvādastairmahātmanaḥ  
śaddhāṃ buddhiṃ tatasteṣāṃ sāṃbe sānucare śive  samāptiṃ cāpi satrasya dīrghapūrvasya satriṇām  
vijñāpya jagatāṃ dhātre brahmaṇe brahmayonaye  svakārye tadanujñāto jagāma svapuraṃ prati  
atha sthānagato brahmā tumburornāradasya ca  paraspara spardhitayorgāne vivadamānayoḥ  
tadudbhāvitagānottharasairmādhyasthamācaran  gandharvairapsarobhiśca sukhamāste niṣevitaḥ  
tadānavasarādeva dvāḥsthairdvāri nivāritāḥ  munayo brahmabhavanādbahiḥ pārśvamupāviśan  
atha tumburuṇā gāne samatāṃ prāpya nāradaḥ  sāhacaryeṣvanujñāto brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā  
tyaktvā parasparaspardhāṃ maitrīṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ  saha tenāpsarobhiśca gandharvaiśca samāvṛtaḥ  
upavīṇayituṃ devaṃ nakulīśvaramīśvaram  bhavanānniryayau dhāturjaladādaṃśumāniva  
taṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭkulīyāste nāradaṃ munigovṛṣam  praṇamyāvasaraṃ śaṃbhoḥ papracchuḥ paramādarāt  
sa cāvasara evāyamitoṃtargamyatāmiti  vadanyayāvanyaparastvarayā parayā yutaḥ  
tato dvāri sthitā ye vai brahmaṇe tānnyavedayan  tena te viviśurveśma piṃḍībhūyāṃḍajanmanaḥ  
praviśya dūrato devaṃ praṇamya bhuvi daṃḍavat  samīpe tadanujñātāḥ parivṛtyopatasthire  
tāṃstatrāvasthitān pṛṣṭvā kuśalaṃ kamalāsanaḥ  vṛttāṃtaṃ vo mayā jñātaṃ vāyurevāha no yataḥ  
bhavadbhiḥ kiṃ kṛtaṃ paścānmāruteṃtarhite sati  ityuktavati deveśe munayo 'vabhṛthātparam  
gaṃgātīrthesya gamanaṃ yātrāṃ vārāṇasīṃ prati  darśanaṃ tatra liṃgānāṃ sthāpitānāṃ sureśvaraiḥ  
avimukteśvarasyāpi liṃgasyābhyarcanaṃ sakṛt  ākāśe mahatastasya tejorāśeśca darśanam  
munīnāṃ vilayaṃ tatra nirodhaṃ tejasastataḥ  yāthātmyavedanaṃ tasya ciṃtitasyāpi cātmabhiḥ  
sarvaṃ savistaraṃ tasmai praṇamyāhurmuhurmuhuḥ  munibhiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā viśvakarmā caturmukhaḥ  
kaṃpayitvā śiraḥ kiṃcitprāha gaṃbhīrayā girā  pratyāsīdati yuṣmākaṃ siddhirāmuṣmikī parā  
bhavadbhirdīrghasatreṇa ciramārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ  prasādābhimukho bhūta iti bhutārthasūcitam  
vārāṇasyāṃ tu yuṣmābhiryaddṛṣṭaṃ divi dīptimat  talliṃgasaṃjñitaṃ sākṣāttejo māheśvaraṃ param  
tatra līnāśca munayaḥ śrautapāśupatavratāḥ  muktā babhūvuḥ svasthāśca naiṣṭhikā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ  
prāpyānena yathā muktiracirādbhavatāmapi  sa cāyamarthaḥ sūcyeta yuṣmaddṛṣṭena tejasā  
tatra vaḥ kāla evaiṣa daivādupanataḥ svayam  prayāta dakṣiṇaṃ meroḥ śikharaṃ devasevitam  
sanatkumāro yatrāste mama putraḥ paro muniḥ  pratīkṣyāgamanaṃ sākṣādbhūtanāthasya naṃdinaḥ  
purā sanatkumāropi dṛṣṭvāpi parameśvaram  ajñānātsarvayogīndramānī vinayadūṣitaḥ  
abhyutthānādikaṃ yuktamakurvannatinirbhayaḥ  tato 'parādhātkruddhena mahoṣṭro naṃdinā kṛtaḥ  
atha kālena mahatā tadarthe śocatā mayā  upāsya devaṃ devīñca naṃdinaṃ cānunīya vai  
kathaṃciduṣṭratā tasya prayatnena nivāritā  prāpito hi yathāpūrvaṃ sanatpūrvāṃ kumāratām  
tadāha ca mahādevaḥ smayanniva gaṇādhipam  avajñāya hi māmeva tathāhaṃkṛtavānmuniḥ  
atastvameva yāthātmyaṃ mamāsmai kathayānagha  brahmaṇaḥ pūrvajaḥ putro māṃ mūḍha iva saṃsmaran  
mayaiva śiṣyate datto mama jñānapravartakaḥ  dharmādhyakṣābhiṣekaṃ ca tava nirvartayiṣyati  
sa evaṃ vyāhṛto bhūyassarvabhūtagaṇāgraṇīḥ  yatparājñāpanaṃ mūrdhnā prātaḥ pratigṛhītavān  
tathā sanatkumāro 'pi merau madanuśāsanāt  prasādārthaṃ gaṇasyāsya tapaścarati duścaram  
draṣṭavyaśceti yuṣmābhiḥ prāggaṇeśasamāgamāt  tatprasādārthamacirānnaṃdī tatrāgamiṣyati  
iti satvaramādiśya preṣitā viśvayoginā  kumāraśikharaṃ merordakṣiṇaṃ munayo yayuḥ  
sūta uvāca  tatra skaṃdasaro nāma sarassāgarasannibham  amṛtasvāduśiśirasvacchā gādhalaghūdakam  
samaṃtataḥ saṃghaṭitaṃ sphaṭiko palasaṃcayaiḥ  sarvartukusumaiḥ phullaiśchāditākhiladiṅmukham  
śaivalairutpalaiḥ padmaiḥ kumudaistārakopamaiḥ  taraṃgairabhrasaṃkāśairākāśamiva bhūmigam  
sukhāvataraṇārohaiḥ sthalairnīlaśilāmayaiḥ  sopānamārgau ruciraiśśobhamānāṣṭadiṅmukham  
tatrāvatīrṇaiśca yathā tatrottīrṇaśca bhūyasā  snātaiḥ sitopavītaiśca śuklākaupīnavalkalaiḥ  
jaṭāśikhāyanairmuṃḍaistripuṃḍrakṛtamaṃḍanaiḥ  virāgavivaśasmeramukhairmunikumārakaiḥ  
ghaṭaiḥ kamalinīpatrapuṭaiśca kalaśaiḥ śivaiḥ  kamaṇḍalubhiranyaiśca tādṛśaiḥ karakādibhiḥ  
ātmārthaṃ ca parārthaṃ ca devatārthaṃ viśeṣataḥ  ānīyamānasalilamāttapuṣpaṃ ca nityaśaḥ  
aṃtarjalaśilārūḍhairnīcānāṃ sparśaśaṃkayā  ācāravadbhirmunibhiḥ kṛtabhasmāṃgadhūsaraiḥ  
itastato 'psu majjadbhiriṣṭaśiṣṭaiḥ śilāgataiḥ  tilaiśca sākṣataiḥ puṣpaistyaktadarbhapavitrakaiḥ  
devādyamṛṣimadhyaṃ ca nirvartya pitṛtarpaṇam  nivedayedabhijñebhyo nityasnānagatān dvijān  
sthānesthāne kṛtānekabalipuṣpasamīraṇaiḥ  saurārghyapūrvaṃ kurvadbhiḥsthaṃḍalebhyarcanādikam  
kvacinnimajjadunmajjatprasrastagajayūthapam  kvacicca tṛṣayāyātamṛgīmṛgaturaṃgamam  
kvacitpītajanottīrṇamayūravaravāraṇam  kvacitkṛtataṭāghātavṛṣaprativṛṣojjvalam  
kvacitkāraṃḍavaravaiḥ kvacitsārasakūjitaiḥ  kvacicca kokaninadaiḥ kvacidbhramaragītibhiḥ  
snānapānādikaraṇaiḥ svasaṃpaddrumajīvibhiḥ  praṇayātprāṇibhistaistairbhāṣamāṇamivāsakṛt  
kūlaśākhiśikhālīnakokilākulakūjitaiḥ  ātapopahatānsarvānnāmaṃtrayadivāniśam  
uttare tasya sarasastīre kalpataroradhaḥ  vedyāṃ vajraśilāmayyāṃ mṛdule mṛgacarmaṇi  
sanatkumāramāsīnaṃ śaśvadbālavapurdharam  tatkālamātroparataṃ samādheracalātmanaḥ  
upāsyamānaṃ munibhiryogīṃdrairapi pūjitam  dadṛśurnaimiṣeyāste praṇatāścopatasthire  
yāvatpṛṣṭavate tasmai procuḥ svāgatakāraṇam  tumulaḥ śuśruve tāvaddivi duṃdubhinisvanaḥ  
dadṛśe tatkṣaṇe tasminvimānaṃ bhānusannibham  gaṇeśvarairasaṃkhyeyaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ ca samaṃtataḥ  
apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇaṃ rudrakanyābhirāvṛtam  mṛdaṃgamurajodghuṣṭaṃ veṇuvīṇāravānvitam  
citraratnavitānāḍhyaṃ muktādāmavirājitam  munibhissiddhagaṃdharvairyakṣacāraṇakinnaraiḥ  
nṛtyadbhiścaiva gāyadbhirvādayadbhiśca saṃvṛtam  vīragovṛṣacihnena vidramadrumayaṣṭinā  
kṛtagopurasatkāraṃ ketunā mānyahetunā  tasya madhye vimānasya cāmaradvitayāṃtare  
chattrasya maṇidaṃḍasya caṃdrasyeva śuceradhaḥ  divyasiṃhāsanārūḍhaṃ devyā suyaśayā saha  
śriyā ca vapuṣā caiva tribhiścāpi vilocanaiḥ  prākārairabhikṛtyānāṃ pratyabhijñāpakaṃ prabhoḥ  
avilaṃghya jagatkarturājñāpanamivāgatam  sarvānugrahaṇaṃ śaṃbhoḥ sākṣādiva puraḥsthitam  
śilādatanayaṃ sākṣācchrīmacchūlavarāyudham  viśveśvaragaṇādhyakṣaṃ viśveśvaramivāparam  
viśvasyāpi vidhātḥṇāṃ nigrahānugrahakṣamam  caturbāhumudārāṃgaṃ candrarekhāvibhūṣitam  
kaṃṭhe nāgena maulau ca śaśāṃkenāpyalaṃkṛtam  savigrahamivaiśvaryaṃ sāmarthyamiva sakriyam  
samāptamiva nirvāṇaṃ sarvajñamiva saṃgatam  dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭavadano brahmaputraḥ saharṣibhiḥ  
tasthau prāñjalirutthāya tasyātmānamivārpayan  atha tatrāṃtare tasminvimāne cāvaniṃ gate  
praṇamya daṇḍavaddevaṃ stutvā vyajñāpayanmunīm  ṣaṭkulīyā ime dīrghaṃ naimiṣe satramāsthitāḥ  
āgatā brahmaṇādiṣṭāḥ pūrvamevābhikāṃkṣayā  śrutvā vākyaṃ brahmaputrasya naṃdīchittvā pāśāndṛṣṭipātena sadyaḥ  
śaivaṃ dharmaṃ caiśvaraṃ jñānayogaṃ dattvā bhūyo devapārśvaṃ jagāma  sanatkumāreṇa ca tatsamastaṃ vyāsāya sākṣādgurave mamoktam  
vyāsena coktaṃ mahitena mahyaṃ mayā ca tadvaḥ kathitaṃ samāsāt  nāvedavidbhyaḥ kathanīyametatpurāṇaratnaṃ puraśāsanasya  
nābhaktaśiṣyāya ca nāstikebhyo dattaṃ hi mohānnirayaṃ dadāti  mārgeṇa sevānugatena yaistaddattaṃ gṛhītaṃ paṭhitaṃ śrutaṃ vā  
tebhyaḥ sukhaṃ dharmamukhaṃ trivargaṃ nirvāṇamaṃte niyataṃ dadāti  parasparasyopakṛtaṃ bhavadbhirmayā ca paurāṇikamārgayogāt  
ato gamiṣye 'hamavāptakāmaḥ samastamevāstu śivaṃ sadā naḥ  sūte kṛtāśiṣi gate munayaḥ suvṛttā yāge ca paryavasite mahati prayoge  
kāle kalau ca viṣayaiḥ kaluṣāyamāṇe vārāṇasīparisare vasatiṃ vinetuḥ  atha ca te paśupāśamumukṣayākhilatayā kṛtapāśupatavratāḥ  
adhikṛtākhilabodhasamādhayaḥ paramanirvṛtimāpuraniṃditāḥ  vyāsa uvāca  etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi samāptaṃ hitamādarāt  
paṭhitavyaṃ prayatnena śrotavyaṃ ca tathaiva hi  nāstikāya na vaktavyamaśraddhāya śaṭhāya ca  
abhaktāya maheśasya tathā dharmadhvajāya ca  etacchrutyā hyekavāraṃ bhavetpāpaṃ hi bhasmasāt  
abhakto bhaktimāpnoti bhakto bhaktisamṛddhibhāk  punaḥ śrute ca sadbhaktirmuktissyācca śruteḥ punaḥ  
tasmātpunaḥpunaścaiva śrotavyaṃ hi mumukṣubhiḥ  pañcāvṛttiḥ prakartavyā purāṇasyāsya saddhiyā  
paraṃ phalaṃ samuddiśya tatprāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ  purātanāśca rājāno viprā vaiśyāśca sattamāḥ  
saptakṛtvastadāvṛttyālabhanta śivadarśanam  śroṣyatyathāpi yaścedaṃ mānavo bhaktitatparaḥ  
iha bhuktvākhilānbhogānaṃte muktiṃ labhecca saḥ  etacchivapurāṇaṃ hi śivasyātipriyaṃ param  
bhuktimuktipradaṃ brahmasaṃmitaṃ bhaktivardhanam  etacchivapurāṇasya vaktuḥ śrotuśca sarvadā  
sagaṇassasutassāṃbaśśaṃ karotu sa śaṃkaraḥ
